content: :Ki parabangeit jong ka Balang Katholik ki la ïa leit sha ïingmane jong ka Don Bosco Technical School, Shillong ban pynlong jingduwai hadien ba la wan rah ïa ka snap jong u Don Bosco Bakhuid na Sohra sha Shillong ha kane ka sngi saitjaiñ ba la dep.Kane ka jingwanrah ïa ka snap jong u Don Bosco Bakhuid sha Don Bosco Technical School, ka long kum shi bynta na ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap shispah snem jong ka jingwan ïuh kjat jong ka kynhun riewniam ‘Salesians of Don Bosco’, jong ka Balang Katholik ha ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi. Ka snap u Don Bosco ka kynthup ïa ka kti jong u. Yn buh ïa kane ka snap u Don Bosco hangne ha Shillong mynta baroh shi bnai ban ailad ïa ki parabangeit ban kin ïawan ban pynlong jingduwai.U Provincial jong ka SDB Shillong Province, u Fr. Paul O. Lyngkot u la ïathuh ba u Apostolic Nuncio bad u Archbishop Leopoldo Girelli kin wan ban ïashim bynta lang ha ka jinglehniam, ka ban long ha ka 29 haduh 30 tarik mynta u bnai.U Fr. Lyngkot u la ïathuh shuh shuh ba u Rector Major jong ka seng riewniam ‘Salesian of Don Bosco’, u Fr. Angel Fernandez Artime, un wan sha Shillong ban ïaphylliew jingmut bad ki samla naduh ka 27 haduh 30 tarik mynta u bnai.U Fr. Lyngkot u la kyntu ïa ki parabangeit ban kin ïaleit sha ïingmane jong ka Don Bosco Technical School, Shillong ban ïashim bynta ha ki jingduwai bad ki jinglehniam.
title: Poi ka snap u Don Bosco na Sohra sha Shillong Don Bosco Technical School

content: Shi bynta ban ai mynsiem bad ban kyntiew ia ka kam ialehkai ha ka jylla, ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs ka la jingpynkup burom ia ki nongialehkai bad ki coach jong ka jylla kiba la khur takma ha ka lympung ialehkai 2nd North East Olympic Games kaba dang shu dep long ha une u bnai Naiwieng, bad ha ryngkat ka jingpyllait paidbah ia ka baibam na ka bynta ki nongialehkai kaba la tip kum ka Sports Scholarship Scheme.Ha kane ka sngi la wan ban iadon lang u Conrad K. Sangma Myntri rangbah jong ka jylla kum u kongsan, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs kum u Symbud kongsan, Bah John F Kharshïing President Meghalaya State Olympic Association, Shivansh Awasthi, IAS, Director Sports and Youth Affairs, Paia War Nongbri Assistant Director Sports and youth affairs, Bah Finely Pariat General Secretary Meghalaya State Olympics Association.Ka sorkar jylla mynta ka sngi ka 2 tarik nohprah ka la pynkup burom ia ki khynnah ialehkai jong ka jylla bad ki coach kiba la lah ban ialehkai bha bad ban khur takma ha ka lympung ialehkai kaba dang shu kut dang shen ka 2nd North East Olympics Games 2022.Ha kane ka sngi U Myntri Rangbah jong ka jylla u Conrad Sangma u la sam ia ki song pisa sha ki nongialehkai kiba la jop jong ki discipline bapher bapher ha kaba u la pyllait paidbah ruh ia ka baibam kaba la tip kum ka Sports Scholarship Scheme. Ha kane ka jingpynkup burom ba mynta ka sngi ruh, kumba T. 36 lak tam ka sorkar ka la ai sha ki 149 ngut ki nongialehkai.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ha ka jingkren pynkup burom mynta ka sngi ia ki nongialehkai jong ka jylla, kiba kynthup ruh ia ki coach bad ki jait jingialehkai bapher bapher bapher, u la ong ba ki nongialehkai baroh ki la pynsngew sarong iangi baroh ia ka jingjop takma ka jong ki, u la ong ruh ba dei lyngba ka jingtreishitom jong ki baroh ba ki sa lah ban poi haduh hangne namar ka jinglah jong ka jylla ban kiew na ka kyrdan ba 8 haduh ka kyrdan kaba 4 ha kane ka lympung North East Olympics, u la ai khublei ruh ia ki khynnah ialehkai baroh bad da kane ka jingpynlong ia kane ka lympung ialehkai kaba dang shu dep ka la long ka jingkyrkhu ia ki nongialehkai ban kyntiew lem ia ki ban pyni ba ka Meghalaya ruh ka la ban leh kumba kiwei ki lah bad ngi kham lah kham bha.U la ai khublei ruh ia ka tnat sports bad youth affairs bad ia ka Meghalaya State Olympics Association kaba la treishitom met bad mynsiem bha ban pynlong ia kane ka lympung ialehkai kaba seisoh bad kaba jop.U Conrad u la pynpaw ruh ba u ju iai ban barabor haman la ki jingialang ki skul ba u ju leit ban ai jingkren sha ki khynnah ba ki long ka bor, bad lada ym lah ban btin lynti ban kyntiew ia ki ha kaba ki don ka sap ka lah ban wallam ia ka jingjot, bad kum ka sorkar ka dei ka jingkitkhlieh ka jong ki ban iarap ia ki khynnah ban kyntiew ia ki ha ka sap kaba ki don. U la ong ruh ba ka jingpynlong ia kane ka lympung ialehkai ka don ka jingmut kaba shongkhia na ka bynta ka longdien,12 lak ki khynnah kiba ha ka rta kaba 12-30 snem, bad kine ki long ki khynnah ki ban ialm ia ka jylla ka jong ngi sha ka lashai la shisngi, kata hadien 10-15 snem nangne shakhmat.U la ong ruh ba kaei kaba ngi leh mynta kan pynwandur iangi ba ngin long kumno hadien 10-15 hadien, bad lada ma u kum u briew uba don ha ka sorkar bad ka imlang sahlang um lah ban ai ia kane ban plielad ia ki khynnah te ngi lah ban khmih lynti kaba kham sniew hadien habud. Ba kaei kaba ngi leh mynta ngin nym lah ban iohi mynta hynrei lada ngi peit kham hadien habud 10-15 snem nangne shakhmat ngin sa iohi ia kaei kaba ngi leh mynta. Kane ka long kaei kaei kaba shimpor tangba ngi dei ban iai treishitom.Ha kane ka jingsam ia ki khusnam song pisa la phiah ha ki lai bynta, kata ha ka Junior, Senior bad bad kiba dei ha ki kynhun (team). Ki nong jop ia ka takma ksiar ki long 36 ngut, kiba ioh ia ka takma rupa ki long 35 ngut bad ia ka takma rnong ki long 78 ngut bad baroh ki long 149 ngut baroh. Bad ka song pisa kaba la sam sha kine ki nongialehkai baroh ka long 36,15,625 tyngka. U myntri rangbah u la kren ruh shaphang ka Meghalaya grass root prokram ba kumba 500 ngut ki nongtem, nongrwai nongsiaw, ka sorkar ka siew ia ki ban tem ban rwai ban pynbyrngia ia u paidbah da ka sap kaba ki don.U la ong ruh ba ka Aspire Meghalaya kaba pynlong iangi ban long kiba sngew skhem bad lyngba kane ka Aspire Meghalaya kan iarap ia kiba bun ban long kiba skhem khlem jingartien. Katkum ka jingiathuh jong u myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, kine ki kam ba bha ki lah ban long la ha ka kam ialehkai, ka put ka tem, ki kam ha ka imlang sahlang, ka jingpynkhuid ia ki sawdong sawkun, kiba pynkiew ia ka kolshor bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Pynkup burom ka Sports and Youth Affairs ïa ki nongialehkai ka 2nd NEOG

content: Wanrah burom ki nongïalehkai Muay Thai jong ka Jylla ha kaba ki la khur artylli ki takma ksiar, kawei ka takma rupa bad kawei ka takma rnong ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Manipur Sangai Festival 3rd Amateur Muay Thai Championship 2022 kaba la long hapoh State Boxing Arena, Khuman Lampak Sports Complex, Imphal, kaba dei ka kynhun jong ka All Meghalaya Muay Thai Association hapoh ka jingïalam jong u President jong kane ka synjuk ïalehkai u Bah Samuel Hahshah.Kane ka kynhun ïalehkai kaba don 5 ngut, ryngkat u coach ki lah mih napoh ka jylla ban leit ïalehkai shapoh ka Manipur.Ïa kane ka lympung la pynlong hapoh State Boxing Arena, Khuman Lampak Sports Complex, Imphal.Kane ka lympung ïalehkai kaba lah neh arsngi ka la long ha ka 28 bad 29 tarik jong u bnai Naiwieng kaba la long ha ka kyrdan jong ki senior, Junior bad Sub-Junior na bynta ki shynrang bad ki kynthei.Ha ka jingïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u President jong kane ka synjuk ïalehkai, u Bah Samuel Hahshah u la pyntip ba 4 tylli ki takma ki la jop kynthup ïa u Shanbor Kurbah u la jop ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka 45-50kg, u Kordor Rynjah uba la jop ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka 45-48kg, u Royalson Lapang u la jop ïa ka takma rupa ha ka 48-51kg bad u Labiang Thawbri u la jop ïa ka takma rnong ha ka (68-71kg).
title: Khur takma ksiar ka khynhun AMMTA ha Manipur

content: Ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah, la shalan ïa u sohñiamtra (Khasi Mandarin) sha Dubai, u jait soh ba la bna nam bha ha ki thaiñ Ri-lum Khasi Jaiñtia bad u ba la ithuh da ka Geographical Indications (GI), da ka Agricultural and Processed Food Products Export Development Authority (APEDA) ha ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ka Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare, jong ka sorkar Meghalaya.Ha ka jingsdang, la shalan kumba shi ton ki soh ba la pynmih da ka FPC (farmer producer company) na Jirang ha Ri Bhoi district.La pynheh ïa kine ki sohñiamtra hapoh ka Mission Organic Value Chain Development for North Eastern Region (MOVCDNER), kaba long ka tnad mission hapoh ka National Mission for Sustainable Agriculture (NMSA).Ïa kane ka jingsdang shalan la lamkhmat da u S Sadhu, Agriculture Secretary, ha kaba u chairman ka APEDA, u M Angamuthu, u la ai jingkren.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Angamuthu u la ban jur ba la dei ban pynlong ïa ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi jong ka Ri India kum ka phang pdeng ha ka jingshalan ïa ki mar rep namar ki soh na kane ka thaiñ ki seisoh da ka sboh mariang bad ym da ka dawai.“Ka long ka jingshisha ba ki thaiñ shatei lam mihngi ki long kiba wan hakhmat ha ka jingpynmih ïa ki mar rep ba seisoh da ka sboh mariang. Ka por ka la dei ban kyntiew ïa ki mar rep ba seisoh da ka sboh mariang jong ka Meghalaya ha kylleng ka ri bad ka pyrthei bad to ngin ïa trei lang ban kyntiew ïa ka hortikolshor bad ïa ki mar rep ba seisoh da ka sboh mariang bad kiwei de ki mar na Meghalaya,” u la bynrap.Kane ka jingshalan ka long kawei na ki jingpyrshang ban kyntiew ïa ki mar rep kiba mih na kane ka thaiñ kiba la ithuh da ka GI, kiba long ki mar hapoh ka Ministry of Commerce bad Industry lyngba ka tnad ba pynkyntiew ïa ka jingshalan mar rep, kata ka APED.
title: Shaduh Dubai poi shalan ka APEDA ïa u sohñiamtra (Khasi Mandarin)

content: :Ka seng Bhartiya Janata Party (BJP) ka la pynkhreh ïalade ban ïakhun dohïap dohim na ka bynta kane ka MLA elekshon ka ban long ha u snem 2023. Ka BJP ka la pynskhem ïa ki lad jingpyntip jong ka lyngba ki rynsan ‘Social Media’, ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki jingkynnoh kiba har rukom kiba mih pyrshah ïa ka party.Kita ki ‘Social Media Campaign Team’, ki don 12 ngut ki dkhot bad ki don 12 ngut ki nongpynïaid kiba pynïaid ha baroh ki district jong ka jylla. Kine ki nongpynïaid ïa ka ‘Social Media Team’, ki khmih lang ïa ki 55 tylli ki konstitwensi ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynleit pynwan ïa ki jingtip kiba ïadei bad ka jingtreikam bad ki jingthmu jong ka seng BJP.U State President ka BJP, u Bah Ernest Mawrie u la ïathuh ba la don ki briew kiba thmu ban pynthohbria ïa ka party, ba ki la pynsaphriang ïa ki dur ki bym ïahap, kiba kynnoh ba ka BJP ka isih ïa ki rit paid. U bah Mawrie u la ong ba kine ki dur ki dei jong u snem 2018. U la ong ba na kane ka daw, ka party ka la thaw ïa kine ki rynsan jong ka ‘Social Media’ ba kin pynbeit ïa kine bad ba kin pynsaphriang ïa ka jingshisha.U la ong ba ka BJP kan ïaleh ïa kane ka elekshon da ka jingthmu ban pynleit jingmut ha ka roi ka par bad khamtam ha ki mat kiba ktah ïa ki samla jong ka jylla bad ki mat kiba ktah ïa ka imlang sahlang.“Ka jingïaleh politik da kaba wanrah ïa ka niam, ka dei kaba leh da kiwei ki party, ym da ka BJP. Kaba pynlong ïa ngi ba ngin sngewsarong ka long ba ki dkhot ka BJP ki la trei ei na ka bynta ban pynïaid ïa kine ki rynsan ‘Social Media’; ym kumba long kiwei ki party, kiba ïa ki ‘Social Media’, jong ki la pynïaid da ki kompeni shimet,” la ong u Bah Mawrie.“Ka BJP ruh ka ai jingmaham ïa baroh kito ki briew kiba thmu ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngewthuh bakla sha u paidbah lyngba ka jingpynsaphriang jong ki ïa ki dur kiba bakla; bad nangne shakhmat ka party kan pynngat ïa ki ha ka aiñ; lada ki mlien ban pynjah burom biang ïa ka party,” la ong u Bah Mawrie.“Kine ki dkhot jong ka BJP Social Media kin ïarap ban pynbeit ïa ki khubor bym dei kiba pynthohbria ïa ka party. Ka kam jong kine kan dei ba kin pynsaphriang ïa ki jingtip kiba ïadei bad ki skhim jong ka sorkar pdeng bad kin wanrah ïa ka jingsngewthuh ha ki paidbah ba ka BJP kam dei ka party kaba isih ïa ki Khristan,” la bynrap shuh shuh u Bah Mawrie.“Ka long kaei kaei ka bymsngew ïahap ba don ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba ong ba ka BJP ka dei ban ïarap ïa ka sorkar jylla watla kam don lang bad kane ka sorkar synrop. Kane ka pyni ba ki nongïalam jong kine kiwei ki seng saiñ hima ki kwah beit tang ban ïohnong ïalade na kitei ki skhim jong ka sorkar pdeng. Kim patiaw satia ïa ka roi ka par jong ka jylla hynrei ki shu kwah beit ba kita ki skhim jong ka sorkar pdeng kin wan lut ha ka pla jong ki. Ka sorkar pdeng ka lah theh bun bah ki skhim ha kane ka jylla, hynrei ka jingpyntreikam pat kam shym la paw katkum ba ka dei ban paw,” la ong u Bah Mawrie.
title: Pynkhlaiñ ka BJP Meghalaya ban ïakhun ïa ka MLA elekshon

content: Ki Mat:1.Haba shu kawut lynti2.Balei mih ka kyntien kur jan kur jngai3.Haba ïa jan ki kur neh skhem ka jaidbynriew: Kano kano ka Jaitbynriew kaba im ha Meiramew, kaba burom ïa la ka jait ka kynja bad kaba pynneh pynsah ïa ka riti ba la pynkup bor bad buh da ki longshuwa ka dei ka Jaidbynriew kaba skhem.Ka “Hok Ka Sot” ka dei ka rukom im ki Khasi kaba naduh ka por hyndai hynthai, kaba ngi kum ki long mynta ngi dei ban buh bha. Ka bat kular, ka tien hok ‘tien blei, ha ki kam ki jam baroh.Kumjuh ruh haba ïa kynduh harum haneng ki ju da ïa kylli, juh da ïa pyrthew.Kumta haba sngewthuh ba dei na ka juh ka jaid ka kynja, ka don ka jingsngewshngaiñ bad ka jingsngew ïa jan.Namar ngi long thik kum u jingthung uba mih na u juh u thning ne na u juh u jyntang uba pynmih shibun ki symbai kiba long ka juh.Hynrei katba nangmih ki sngi kane ka jingsngew ia jan wat hapdeng shi kur shi jait ruh ka la nang pynsngew ïa jngai noh, wat la ngi tip tynrai ba ngi mih na ka juh ka meirad tymmen. Ka daw ba la pynlong kumne dei namar ba la nang ïa kharoi hapdeng ka juh ka jait. Kumta haba la mih ka jingsngew ïa jngai hapdeng kajuh ka kur, ka mih ruh sa ka jingsngew ïa jngai hapdeng kawei ka kur bad kawei pat. Kam don shuh kata ka jingsngewïajan na kino kino ki thana parad ne ka thana paieid, pamen ne na ka thma u kpa, u kñi ne u pasan u pakhynnah bad kumta ter ter.Kumta haba la don kata ka jingsngew ïa jngai kawei ka kur bad kawei ka kur, la mih ruh ka jingsngew ïa jngai wat hapdeng ka juh ka kynja. Haba ka long kumne ka jingma kaba khraw ka ap ïa ka Jaidbynriew la ngi dang lah ne em ban pynsah pynneh ïa kata ka jingsngew para jait para kynja ? Ka daw kaba nang phiah pharia shuh shuh ïa kane ka jingsngew ïa jngai hapdeng ka juh ka kynja ne para Khasi, dei namar ba la wan ïa khleh ne ‘ milai’ bad kiwei ki Jaidbynriew kiba nabar. Bad kaba kham pynsngew ïa jngai shuh shuh hapdeng ka juh ka kynja dei ka jingïashong kha khleh, khamtam ki kynthei kiba shong kha ïa u bar jylla ne u Jaidbynriew u bym dei na ka jait Khasi ne ka kynja la jong. Khamtam kito ki Khasi jongngi kiba ïa shongkha bad ki bar jylla jait teng teng la lap la shem ba kim kren shuh wat ïa ka ktien Khasi ruh ha ïing ha sem, namar ki sngewpoh ki sngewrem. Nangta don ruh kiba la pyrshang ban bud ïa ka rukom im rukom man ( culture) jong kiwei. Kane ruh ka long kawei ka daw kaba ap jingma na bynta ka jingpynneh pynsah ïa la ka Jaitbynriew.2.Kumba la kdew shakhmat ngi dei ban sngewthuh ïa ki daw (Courses). Shwa ban poi sha ka phang teng teng sngew kumba kren thamula ne kren phulia, lada ngi ong ba ngi don kiba haïing kiba sah sha ri America ne Bilat. “ Kiba ngi ïa jan” katba kiba haïing kiba ïa soh marphyllaw man kyrpong ne kiba sah ha ka juh ka dong ne ka Shnong pat ki dei kiba ha ïing,” Kiba ngi ïa jngai.” Hato lada jia syndet ha ka pang ka shitom ne ha ka iap ka im mano ki ban ïarap kham kloi ? Kito kiba haïing kiba sah ha jan ne sha jngai ? Haba kumta ïano ngi kham don kam ïa ki kur jngai ne ïa ki kur jan ? Ngi ïa kubur bad ngi ïa tip shai baroh ba ki kur jngai ki dei kiba mih kham bun pateng bad kita ki kur jan pat ki dei kiba ïa mih kham khyndiat pateng.Hynrei ban pynlyngkot ïa ka jingsngewthuh la sngewdei nangne sha khmat ka bha ba ngin ïa pynjah noh ïa ka kyntien khot kur ‘ Jngai” ba lada ngi ïai ong shi ïai ong, ‘ Kur Jngai,’ kin jngai khlem pep suki suki kito ki kur kin jah noh ka jingsngew jan kur pynpan, namar ki sngewlehraiñ ne sngewrem ban ïa jan ne ïa kam kur namar ba la ïa jngai. Hangne ruh ka don ka daw ka jingma ïa ka jingsngew ïa jan para Jaitbynriew ne para Khasi. Kumta naduh mynta hi ngi dei ban sngewthuh shai kdar ba shisien ba la dei ban sngewthuh shai kdar ba shisien ba la dei ka kur ne ka juh ka jait ngi dei kiba la kha na ka juh ka meirad kaba nyngkong duh bad kata ka meirad ruh, ka lah ban don ne ym don hynmen ne para. Shuh shuh, ka tynrai ba kongsan jong ka meirad lada ka don ne ym don para ruh ka dei na ka juh ka shnong. Kum ban ai nuksa ïa kata ka meitymmen ne kata ka meirad jong ka jaid mawri ne (mawrie) ka dei na ka shnong laitkon Ka shnong ba rim bad ba nyngkong duh jong ka jait Mawri.Hynrei ha dien ka shongkha shongman bad na kiwei kiwei ki daw kum ha kaba leit rep leit riang, ki la ïa pra kylleng sawdong ka Hima Khyrim Bad don ruh hadien bna ki la kham ïa kha roi parum pareh da ka kyrteng ka briew la sin noh ne pynkylla jait noh pynban. Kumba don kaei ka meirad tymmen kaba kyrteng ne khot ka Ngum, ïa ki khun ki ksiew kiba mih pateng na kata ka meirad “ Ngum’ la khot noh pynban da ka Jaid ‘ Khongdngum.’ Sa kawei pat ka meirad ba la khot ka Iong, namar ka long ka briew kaba iong sniehdoh, hadien ïa ki khun ki ksiew kiba hiar pateng na kane ruh, ki kot noh pynban da ka Jait ‘ Mawiong’. Hynrei khnang ban ïa lait na ka shong sang shongma, ka jingshisha ka la tbeh suki suki, katba nang shai ka pyrthei, kata ka mut ba kata ka jait “ khongdngum ka la duh noh. Baroh ki la ai beit da kata ka juh ka jait Mawri(Mawrie). Bad kata ka jait “ Mawiong” ruh ka la kylla jait “ Mawri’ ne (Mawrie). Ki don sa tang katto katne ha ki thaiñ riwar mihngi kiba dang pynneh pynsah ïa kata ka jait ‘ Mawiong.’Nalor kita ki meirad tymmen jong kata ka Jait Mawri ki don kiba poi sha ka Hima Khyrim thaiñ riwar mihngi, don ruh kiba poi sha Sohra, shabar ri kum sha Bilat bad ri America. Nalor kiba shong ha sor bad khapsor.Sa kawei ka nuksa, ka dei ka jait ‘ Marbañiang.’ La ong ha ka khana ba kata ka meirad tymmen kaba nyngkong duh ka dei na ka Shnong Sadew ( Mylliem). Dei hadien suki suki ha ka rep ka riang ki don kiba poi man ban bad buhai shnong ha ka Hima Khyrim don ruh kiba poi sha Mairang bad ki shnong ba ïajan bad don ruh kiba hiar kham jngai ki poi sha duh Mawsynram, don ruh kiba buhai shnong ha sor Shillong bad sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka. Hynrei ha kaba nyngkong hi ki dei na ka juh ka kpoh na ka juh ka shnong.Kine ki ar tylli ki jait ki dei tang ki nuksa kiba rit eh, haba ïa kren ïa ka jait ka kynja jong ka Jaitbynriew u paid Khasi ba iar.Hynrei kaba kongsan tam ngi dei ban sngewthuh ba kano kano ka jait u Khasi ka mih na ka juh ka doh na ka juh ka snam.Kumta kano kano ka kur kaba dei hi na ka juh ka jait ngi dei ban kheiñ kum ka KUR LA JONG la jan ne jngai kam pher namar ka doh la jong te dei hi ka doh la jong ka snam la jong te dei hi ka snam la jong.: Kumba la kdew bad ong ha kane ka phang pdeng jong ka jingthoh bad ka jingkyrsiew “ Ba ka jait ka kynja ka tynrai ba teh pynkhlaiñ bad pynskhem ïa ka Jaidbynriew u 7 trep u 7 skum.Ka long kaei kaei kaba dei hok bad shong hok, ba hateng hateng ngi juh iohi bad iohsngew ba ki don kita ki jingïalang kur ne ki jingiakynduh lang shi kur shi jait, kum ha kita ki ‘ general meeting’ jong kano kano ka kur. Dei kum ha kine ki jing- ïalang kur ba ym shem la khot tang ïa ki kur jan ne ym shym la khot tang ia ki kur jngai.Ha kum kane ka jingïalang kur ym juh don kur jan ne kur jngai.Hynrei la khot khnang kum ïa kine ki jingialang kur khnang ban ia tip bad ithuh ïa la ki kur la kiba ïa sah hajan ne sha jngai.Kumta kane ka long kaei kaei ka bynta kaba kongsan ban pynkhlaiñ bad ai bor ïa ka Jaidbynriew ka long ruh ka daw bah, daw san, ban teh pynskhem bad teh song ia ka Jaidbynriew (Khynriam, u Pnar, U Bhoi, u War).Namar haba man la ka kur ka ïa tylli shi kur shi kur ki don ruh sa ki jingïadei thana sa ki kha ki man, ki pasan, ki pakhynnah, ki khunruit ki khun jiang, ki hep kynsi ki kong kynsi ki Bakha ki ñiakha ba kumta ter ter.Nalor kane ka don ruh sa ka jingïateh kur na ka daw bad ki nongrim bapher bapher jong ki kur bad ki jait ba pher bapher. Kane ruh ka long ka tynrai bah ban nang pynkhlaiñ bad pynskhem ïa la ka Jaidbynriew.Dei hangne ba lyngba “ Ka Jait ka Kynja” ba ka Jaidbynriew ka ieng rasong ka jing-ïatiplem bad la synshar khadar ïa ka bri u Hynñiew Trep u Hynñiew Skum da ka hok ka sot ryngkat ryngkat ka jingtieng burom ïa u Blei bad ka jingtip ïa la u para briew.Ka Jaitbynriew Khasi, ka dei ka jait bad kaba burom ïa la u para briew, wat lada dei u soh shnong ne u Nongwei nongar ( foreigners) ne u Mynder.Ka dei ruh ka Jaitbynriew ba long shisur shi dur. ( teng teng ka don ka jingshim kabu).Ka dei ka Jaitbynriew ki riewkhraw pyrkhat ba kynja Blei. ( Simple living High thinking).Dei na kane ka daw ba sa mih ka kyntien ïa u bapli ne isynei para briew” Hynrei ka por ka la poi imat kane ka juk mynta kum ka Jaidbynriew ngi dei ban long kiba ‘ sian kum u bseiñ bad kiba jemnud kum ka paro.” Lada ka Jaidbynriew ka shida eh, khlem pep suki suki ka Jaidbynriew kan sah sahteng ha ka khana pateng ( History). Lane ka Jaidbynriew u Khasi baiar kan long kum kata ka “ Indus Valley Civilization” kaba sah tang ha ka History.Haba ngi peit ha ka map India, wat ia ka Jylla Meghalaya ruh ym pat iohi bha, khamtam katno lei lei ka Jaidbynriew rit paid jongngi, lada ym lah ban teh lakam kan long kum i lieng kynda ban ngam jyllop noh ha ka Duriaw bah.Kumba ka ïai long bad long mynta ki don ki buit sianti miaw iong na kyndong, kiba ap thap kriaw kumno ban pynjot bad ban pynduh pyndam noh suki pa suki ïa ka Jaitbynriew da ki buit ban pynduh bor bad nang pyntlot. Halor kane ka bynta peit ïa ka nuksa, balei la mut ban pynduh noh ia ka subjek kong ka ktien ka thylliej la jong (Mother tongue) ha ka pule puthi, kaba long ka tynrai wad jingnang jingstad.Kumta ngi dei ban sngewthuh shai kdar ba kane ka MIL ne ngi dei ban ñiew ïa ka kum kawei ka ‘ Mother Indian Languages’ kaba ym dei ban duh, hynrei dei ban nang pynjanai shuh shuh katkum ka eight Schedule jong ka riti synshar ri.Kumta haba ngi kheiñ kor ïa la ka jait ka kynja, ngi dei ruh ban kheiñ kor ïa la ka ktien ba la hikai da kane kaba kha ba pun ba la ai buiñ ai thiang ïa ngi kum kawei ka Jaitbynriew tip Blei Tip Briew.Namar kata haba burom ïa ka ktien ka thoh ka pule kum ka subjek kongsan (Compulsory) ym kum ka subjek pynkop lang (elective course) ngi burom ïa lade, haba burom ïa lade ngi burom ïa ka kum u kpa, haba ngi burom ïa la ki kmie ki kpa ngi burom ïa ka Jait ka kynja, haba ngi burom ïa la ka Jait ka kynja ngi burom bad ngi pynneh pynsah ïa ka Jaidbynriew Khasi.Kumta la sngewdei ban buh kum ka jingkyrpad ïa ki Nongsynshar kiba dei ki jong ngi bad ki Babu Sorkar ( Govt Authority) kiba dei ki jongngi ba ki dei ban burom ïa lade bad ïa la ka Jaidbynriew khnang ba kan long ka jingkyrkhu, ym ka jingtim ha ki pateng la pateng jong ka Jaidbynriew u khun Khasi baiar, u Hynñiew trep u Hynñiew Wasa.Kyntang ïawai, ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingthoh, ka long ba ngi dei ban pynkhlaiñ ïa la ki kur ki kur bad ngi dei ban ïa tylli shi kur shi jait, namar haba ka kur ka ïatylli ka don ruh ka jingïajan, jingïatylli bad kiwei kiwei ki jait bad haba ki jait ki ïatylli, ka kynja ka neh ka sah bad haba ka kynja ka neh ka sah ieng skhem ka Jaitbynriew ha khmat ka pyrthei baiar.Ka Sangot ! IARAP IA KI BADUK KYNTIEW IA LA KA JAIDBYNRIEW BAN IA BIT IA BIANG LANG BA KA RI KAN KIEW lane Help the poor Uplift the community We progress all Will shine the country.
title: Ka Jait Ka Kynja Ka Thymmei Ba Pynskhem Ïa Ka Jaitbynriew

content: :Ha jingrakhe ïa ka sngikha kaba 55 snem, uwei u rangbah uba la tip kum u Jamberson Marak na ka shnong 15 mer Byrnihat, u la ïoh ban pyllait paidbah ïa 3 tylli ki Music Video kiba u la ak da lade hi.Ïa kitei ki Music Video jong utei u rangbah, la ïoh ban pyllait paidbah mynta ka sngi ha Nongpoh, ha kaba u Bah Cornelius Laloo, uwei na ki nongthohkhubor, u la shim ïa ka bynta ban pyllait paidbah, ha ryngkat ka jingdon u Bah Lansius Syiemlieh, President ka Ri Bhoi Artist, ka Kong Lakidora Kharsati, General Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Filmmaker Association, u Bah Larry Suchiang u wei na ki Actor khasi lem bad kiwei.Kitei ki Music Video, ki kynthup ïa kawei kaba la ai kyrteng ” kynsan Kynsan” kawei pat kaba la ak ha ka ktien Hindi bad kaba la tip kum ka ” Rehjaare Rehjaare” bad kawei pat ka dei ha ka ktien Assamese bad kaba la tip kum ka “Ronge Ronge”.
title: Ha ka sngikha ba 55, pyllait u Jamberson da ki music video

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya ka la duh ïa uwei na ki khlur ïalehkai phutbol ba paw ka jylla, u Ajay Thapa uba la dei ruh uba la leit pyntbit ïalade kum u coach. U Ajay u dei u rangïalehkai phutbol ha ki bynta ba hapdeng, uba la paw bha ha ki snem 1978 haduh u snem 1992. U la  khlad noh ha ka  29 tarik u Naiwieng 2022 bad la thang don burom ha ka 30 tarik.U Ajay u la don 62 snem ka rta bad uba shong ba sah ha Mawbah, Shillong bad uba ju ïalehkai kum u midfield ryngkat bad ki khlur ïalehkaiba ba paw bad ba tyngshaiñ kum ki jong Bah Fullmoon Pyrtuh, Augustine Kharkongor, Tenzing Khyriem, L. Darlong, Michael Wahlang, Atom Dey bad kiwei pat.Khyndiat ban shu phai shaphang une u rangïalehkai; u Ajay u la sdang ban ïalehkai phutbol mynba u dang rit ka rta ha Manipur, hynrei ha u snem 1978, na ka jingtbit bad ka sap ïalehkai kaba u don, u Ajay u la shah jied ban long syndon kum u kapten ka kynhun ïalehkai Subroto Cup jong ka skul St Anthony’s kaba la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam kum ka lahduh kane ka lympung bah ïalehkai phutbol ki skul ha ka ri ha une u snem.Hadien kane, u Ajay ha kaba nyngkong u la pynïasnoh shwa ïalade bad ka kynhun ïalehkai ka Gorkha Association bad ka samoi ïalehkai ka jong u bad kane ka kynhun ka long naduh u snem 1979-80, ha ka samoi ïalehkai u snem 1981 ki bor ba dei khmih ka Blue Max ki la ibit ban pynrung noh ïa u sha la ka jong ka kynhun bad ban ïalehkai haduh ka samoi jong u snem 1985.Hadien kane, u Ajay u la ïoh ruh ban mihkhmat ïa ka Meghalaya ha ka lympung ïalehkai ka Santosh Trophy ha u snem 1982 kaba la long ha Rourkela, Odisha bad ruh ban mihkhmat ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai ka Shillong XI ka Shillong Sports Association ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Bordoloi Trophy.Ha u snem 1989 haduh 1990 u Ajay u la leit ban pule bad pyntbit ïalade kum u coach ha NIS Kolkata ryngkat bad uwei na ki paralok ba u la ïalehkai lang ha ka Blue Max u L. Darlong.Hadien kane, u Ajay u la bteng ban ïalehkai biang ha kaba u la leit phai sha ka kynhun ka Gorkha Association ha u snem 1986 bad ïai neh haduh u snem 1988 bad haba u la mih noh u la leit ban ïalehkai pat  shipor na ka Nongthymmai Sports Club bad kumjuh na ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Sawmer Sports Club  ha kaba u la shim artad ïa ka bynta kum u coach bad hadien kane u la shongthait noh shi na ka jingim ïalehkai ha u snem 1992, ïa kaba u la ïai bteng ban shimti ne ban long kum u coach.Haba ïadei bad kane ka jingkhlad noh u Ajay, la ïoh ïa ka lad ban ïakren bad uwei na ki paralok ba la ïalehkai lang katta u Bah Agustine Kharkongor, uba la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewlem halor ka jingkhlad noh u Ajay, uba dei u player uba la kham heh ne senior ïa u Bah August hynrei kiba la don bynta lang pat ha ka Blue Max.U Bah August u ïathuh ba u Ajay, Bah Fullmoon bad u Atom Dey kidei ki snar ïalehkai ba hapdeng ne ki main midfielder ha kato ka por ïa ka Blue Max, kampher wat lada u Ajay u kham suki bha katta ka rukom ïalehkai ka jong u, hynrei ka rukom shut bo pat ka long kaba jam bad kaba khlaiñ bha.
title: Duh ka jylla ïa u rangïalehkai ba paw, u Ajay Thapa

content: Ka jingkhapngiah bad ka jingïakynduh jingeh jong ki paidbah nong-leit nongwan ha ka nongbah Shillong namar ka jingsahkut kali, ka la jubor katba nang mih ki sngi. Tang ha ka shi snem ka jingbun ki kali kila nang bun ar shah lai shah katba ka surok ka neh kumjuh bad kila kham khim kham khapngiah namar ba la ïatur ban ïadie jingdie, ban shong madan bad ka jingkyntur bad ka jingmih jong ki jingtei bapher bapher hakhmat surok. Ban ïakren ïa ka kam pynheh surok ha Shillong ka la kut, lait noh sa tang sha khapsor ne da ka surok suiñ ban kham pyn-duna ïa ka jingsahkut kali.Bunsien ki MLA, ki myntri sorkar, ki ophisar kim da sngew-thuh ïa ka jingeh jong ki riew madan namar ba ïalade ki shong ha kali ba shu siaw beit wiaw wiaw da ki ding saw, ding blu bad lada kham suki kiwei ki kali ban ai jaka, lah ban mih ka jingjia bym sngew tynnad.Ha kiwei ki jaka, ki myntri sorkar, ki ïaid da ka kjat, ki shong kali paidbah khnang ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh jong ki paidbah bad kumno ban pynbeit ïa ka jingeh jong ki hynrei ha kane ka jylla, ki myntri sorkar, ki nongmihkhmat haba ki ïaid na jaka paidbah leit, ki pynpah ïa kali, bad kin khang lut ïa ki ïing kali sbak, namar ba hapoh ki pynmeh da ka AC. Lait noh tang lada ki shah rem bad long riew paidbah biang, kin sa sngew-thuh. Lada u myntri ka tnad pyn-roi sor, u myntri ka tnad pynïaid kali un shong kali paidbah teng, un sa sngewthuh haduh katno ki paidbah kila ïakynduh jingeh ym tang namar ka jingsahkut kali hynrei ka jingshim kabu ki kali kamai, ki bos saw ruh.Ki don kiba thnum ba ka sor ka la khapngiah namar ba la bun kali hynrei kane kam dei ban long ka daw namar ba katba nang kiew ka ïoh ka kot, ki briew ki nang riew spah bad haba ki briew ki riew spah, ka kam ka jam, bad ka ïoh ka kot jong ka jylla ruh ka nangkiew bad ka jingmyntoi ka dei hi ïa ka sorkar. Hynrei hangne ha nongbah Shillong bad ha kiwei ki jaka, ka sorkar kam da shim khia kumno ban weng shisha ïa ka jingeh jong ki paidbah bad ki pynlut por bun ha kaba ïakren haba ïathnum ïa ka jingkhim ka surok hynrei kim don lad imat ba ka jinghapngiah kali ka dei namar ba la rit ka surok kiba neh sah wat haduh 30-40 snem mynta. Ïa ka sor Shillong la pynlong naduh ka sorkar Assam bad ïa ki surok kiba don mynta ruh kiba dang neh ha ka jingheh naduh ba la shna ka sorkar phareng myn hyndai bad katno tam kan long kaba eh than ban mutdur haduh mynta.Ka la donkam palat ïa ka sor-kar ban wad lad halor kumno ban pynsakar ïa ka sor Shillong bad ka jingthmu ban rah ia ki ophis sorkar sha Sor Shillong Thymmai, kan dei kawei kaban pynduna ia ka jingkhapngiah ka sor bad ka surok suiñ ruh kan dei kawei kaban pynkham than-da ïa ka jingktha khlieh jong ki paidbah na kaba sahkut kali haduh ba la pynpulom lut khait ïa ki kam ki jam.
title: Dei ban shong kali paidbah teng ki MLA, myntri sorkar

content: U Samla Anver Medon Pariat u wei na kiba samla uba don ka jingthmu ban ïakhun ïa ka ilekshon ka ban wan  na East Shillong constituency u la ong ki paidbah ki dei  ban tip naei ki seng saiñpyrthei ki ïoh pisa ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon.“Ngi kum ki paidbah ngi dei ban tip ba ki don ki bor kiba nadien kiba teh lakam ïa ka lyngba ka jingnoh synñiang kaba ki ai,” ong u samla Pariat.Dang shen une u samla u ba don jingthmu ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon na East Shillong u la pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingthoh kaba ïadei bad ka pisa kaba ki ïoh jingïarap bad ka jingpynlut ïa ka pisa.“Ngi shna bad ai jingkheiñ haba ïadei bad ka jingïoh ïa ka pisa bad ka jinglut sha ki paidbah namar ngi kwah ban pynpaw ïa ka jingkhuid bad ban pyntip sha ki paidbah ba ïa ngi ym don da ki wei pat ki ban teh lakam bad shah khanglad,” u la ong.Haba ïadei bad ka jingdon ki nongkhaïi ban ïakhun ilekshon, u la ong ha ki por ba mynshuwa ki don bynta ha ki seng saiñpyrthei hynrei mynta ïa ki la kheiñ kor haduh ba ka jingïakren ka dei beit ha ka bor jong ka pisa.“Bun ki mat kiba sah teng da ki bun bun snem, namar ka pisa ka dei ka pdeng duh ha ki mat politik jong ka jingsniew ki surok, ka jingpait jong ki pipe um,  ka jingbymtreikam jong ki light ha surok, ïa kine la shuh ieh hadien. Ngi shim tang ka pisa,” u la ong.U la ong ba kane ka long ka jingma ha kane ka juk ba mynta bad ki paidbah nongshong shnong kim dei ban sngap jar halor kane.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, ba ïa ka bor jong ka pisa la dei ban ïakhun pyrshah,  u la ai jingmut ban don da ka ‘constituency clinics’.Hangne u Pariat u la ong ba hadien kato katne por ki paidbah kin ïoh ka lad ban buh jingkylli ïa ki nongmihkhmat bad ki dei ban ai ka jubab.Haba kylli la ki paidbah jong ka jylla ki sngewthuh haba ïadei bad ka politik, ula ong  ka don ka jingïadei hapdeng ka jingnang jingstad bad ki nongthep vote bad kumno la pyrshang ban teh lakam.U la bynrap da kaba ong, ki nongïalam seng saiñpyrthei  ha ka por ilekshon ki sam ei sha kum kine ki briew bad  ki shah ïalam bakla ngat ha ka jingeh.Na ka liang u  samla Pariat u don ka jingngeit kaba skhem ba ki samla, kiba mynta ki la don ka jingsngewthuh haba ïadei bad ka Politik bad u don ka jingkyrmen ba kan don ka jingkylla.Haba ïadei bad ka jingïoh kam ïohjam, u la ong ka don ka jingdonkam ban thaw lad ban ai kam shabar na ki kam sorkar.U samla Pariat u la ong ka ‘cooperative sector’ ka dei ka wei ka lad ban ai kam ai jam, u thrang ba pynkylla ruh haba ïadei bad ka rep ka riang bad ka ri jingri.Haba ïadei bad ka jingmih jong u ban ïakhun ïa kane ka ilekshon pyrshah ïa ka Kong Amapreen Lyngdoh, u la ong ka don ka jingbym sngewtynnad na ki paidbah haba ïadei bad kane ka MLA ba mynta.  U la ong ba ha ka jingleit ïalap ilekshon jong u da kaba rung na ka wei ka ïing ha ka wei pat, u lap na ki nongthep vote ba ki don bun ki mat kiba dang shahteng haduh mynta.Ha kaba nyngkong u  samla Pariat u thmu ban ïakhun na ka New Dawn Meghalaya hynrei katkum ki tyllong khubor kiba u nongthoh u ïoh, la ïoh jingtip ba u lah ban ïakhun ïa kane ka elekshon ka ban wan na ka ‘the Voice of the People Party’.
title: Ki paidbah ki dei ban tip naei ki seng saiñ pyrthei ki ïoh pisa: A M Pariat

content: U myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah, u la plie ïa ka ophis jong ka Prime Hub jong ka All Garo Hills Multipurpose Cooperative Society (AGHMCS) Limited, ha ka shnong Babadam kaba hap hapoh ka Rongram Community bad Rural Development Block ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u nongai jingmut ïa u myntri rangbah, u Thomas A Sangma, u Secretary jong ka AGHMCS bad u Director jong ka Bakdil NGO, u Father Sunny Mavellil, Rongram BDO, MR Marak, Parish Priests, ki nongïalam shnong bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka jingkren u myntri rangbah u la pynkynmaw ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong u Father Sunny Mavellil, uba la sdang ïa ka AGHMCS, da ka jingthmu ban kyntiew ïa ka jinglong jingim jong ki nongrep ha rilum Garo bad u la ïaroh ïa u Mavellil ba u la lah ban pyndep ban shna ïa kane ka ophis hapoh ka shisnem.U Conrad u la ong ba ki don ki lad bad ki kabu ba khraw tam ha rilum Garo ban wanrah ïa ka roi ka par, ha ka rep ka riang. U la ong ba donkam shibun kiba kum kine ki ‘cooperative society’, khnang ba kin ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep bad ïa ka thaiñ baroh kawei.U Conrad u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla kaba mynta ka long kaba la kloi ban ïarap bad ban noh synñiang da kaba ka thaw ïa ka skhim FOCUS bad FOCUS Plus, ha kaba na kine ki prokram bad ki mat treikam, yn sam ïa ki jingïarap sha ki nongrep kiba don ha ka jylla.Ha ka jingai jingkren, u Thomas A Sangma, u la ong ba kane ka ophis jong ka AGHMCS ka long kum ka dak ka jingjop jong kine ki ‘cooperative societies’, ha rilum Garo. U la ong ba lyngba kine, yn ïohi ïa ka jingkylla kaba bha ha ka ïoh ka kot jong kane ka thaiñ. U la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa u myntri rangbah bad ïa u secretary jong ka AGHMCS ba ki la lah ban shna ïa kane ka ophis treikam da ka jingthmu ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha kane ka thaiñ.Ha ka jingai jingkren, u Father Sunny Mavellil, u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la ai kumba T. 3.30 klur ban shna ïa kane ka ophis bad T.3.65 klur ban thied ïa ki tiar, ki tar na ka bynta ban pynmih ïa ki mar rep khambun shah. U la ïathuh ruh ba mynta lah don kumba 30 tylli ki ‘cooperative societies’, ha rilum Garo.Ha kane ka sngi u myntri rangbah u la ïoh ban sam ïa ki cheques pisa sha ki nongpynmih ïa ki mar rep, kiba lah rung hapoh jong ka skhim FOCUS.
title: Plie u Conrad ïa ka ophis jong ka Prime Hub ha shnong Babadam

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba ka jingpynslem ban ai District ïa ka Sohra Sub Division ka long namar ka don ka jingbym ïahun lang jong ki katto katne tylli ki shnong ki ban sa shah kynthup lang ha kane ka District.Lah ban kdew ba ki shnong ne ka Pynursla Civil Sub-Division kam treh ban leit sha Sohra District bad kane ka dei ka daw kaba buh jingeh ïa ka sorkar ba kan thaw ïa ka Sohra kum ka District. Ka la don ka jingïakren ba lada ka headquarter ka district kan don ha thaiñ Laitlyngkot ne Mawjrong, ki paidbah ka Pynursla ki lah ban pdiang.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba kane ka jingdawa ka sorkar kan dang donkam ban pynbeit bha shwa namar ba hap ban pynthikna ba lada ka sorkar ka kyntiew District ïa ka Sohra-Sub division kan ym dei ban mih jingeh hadien ha bud kumta ka sorkar ka donkam ïa ka jingbishar bniah halor kane.“Ngi hap ban bishar bha ïa ki jingdawa ban kyntiew District ïa kano kano ki thaiñ, ki block, ki sub-division namar katkum ka kyndon ka long ban don ka jingïateh ban ym mih kano kano ka jingeh hadien habud, kum ka  Mairang ka la don ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut kaba shai ïa ki laiñ (line) la dro ha ka rukom ba suk bad ba ïamynjur lang kumta ka suk ban ïoh District”, u la ong.“Hynrei kiwei ki thaiñ ngi lap, ba  ki jingdawa la ka dei halor ka sub-division lane ki district ngim lah ban ai namar ba ka don ka jingbym sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki shnong hangto, kaba wanrah ïa ka jingeh hadien habud, ha ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka shynshar khadar kham jan sha ki paidbah ngin ym lah pat ban wanrah ïa ka jingbym ïahun hapdeng ki nongshong shnong ka juh ka thain, kumta, ka jingkwah jong ngi ka long ban bishar bad pynbeit ïa kine ki jingeh hadien ha bud kumta ngin dang bishar bad ngin ïasyllok bad ngin sa shim rai”, u la bynrap.
title: Bym don ka jingïa sngewthuh jingmut, slem ban ïoh district ka Sohra: Conrad Sangma

content: U MLA ka Gambegre Constituency u Saleng Sangma  u la ong ba ka jingthombor jong ka jylla Assam kam dei shuh tang ïa ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei ka dei ïa baroh hi ki jylla ki ba don ha ki thain lammihngi jong ka Ri.“Ka jingjia ha Mukroh ka dei ka jingjia ka bym lah ban pdiang hynrei lada peit ïa ki jingjia kiba la dep, ka Assam ka ju thombor ym tang ïa ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei wat ïa ka Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur, Mizoram, Nagaland”, u la ong.“Ka ju don jingshah thombor na ka Assam bad haba peit ïa ki jinglong jingman kaei kaba ngi la ïohi kam dei ka sien kaba nyngkong kum kane ka jingjia ka la dep ban jia ha Langpih bad mynta ha Mukroh bad ha kiwei kiwei ki jaka kiba jan u pud u sam bad ka Assam”, u la bynrap.U la ong ruh kaba lyngngoh ka long ba ka jylla Meghalaya kam ju mad jingeh kum kine ha kaba ïa dei bad ka Ri Burma, ka Ri Myanmar lane ka Ri Bangladesh kaba ïapher ki Ri hynrei hapoh Ri  la lap ïa kum kine ki jingjia.“Ka jaka kam dei jong ka sorkar Assam ne jong ka sorkar Meghalaya hynrei ka dei jong ki paidbah ki nongshong shnong ha kato ka jaka, kim dei ban tieng ïa kum kine ki jingjia”, u la bynrap.“Halor ka jingjia ha Mukroh ki bor ba dei peit jong ka jylla ki dei ban shim bad pyntreikam ïa ka bor pyrshah ïa ki pulit Assam ha kato ka sngi hi namar ba ka khlem jia ha ki jaka ba don ka jingïakajia “la ong u Saleng.
title: Ki nongshong shnong ha khappud kim dei ban tieng ïa kum kine ki jingjia: Saleng

content: Ki san tylli ki kynhun Sengbhalang ba kynthup ïa ka Seng HYC, HANM, CoRP, ENJC bad ka JSM kiba hap hapoh ka shatri jong ka Save Hynniewtrep Mission, mynta ka sngi ka 2 tarik u Nohprah kila pynlong da ka jingïaïaid paidbah ha Riangdo WKHD ban dawa na ka sorkar ba kan pyntreikam noh ïa ki 9 tylli ki mat jingdawa ba ka kynhun kala ïai dawa.Ïa katei ka jingïaïaid paidbah la sdang na Zero Point ter ter haduh ban da poi ha ïew Riangdo ha kaba la wan ban ïashim bynta lang ruh da ki heh nongïalam ka HYC Sengkmie bad kiwei kiwei de ki nongïalam jong kitei ki kynhun kiba la ïa pyrta jam ban pyntreikam noh ïa kitei ki mat khamtam ïa ka ILP.Hadien katei ka jingïaid paidbah la bteng pat sa ka jingïalang hapoh ïew Riangdo ha kaba ki nongkren na ki kynhun jong kitei ki san Seng kila pynshai halor kitei ki 9 tylli ki mat jingdawa.U General Secretary ka Seng HYC haba ai jingkren ha katei kajingïalang u la ong ba ngi dawa ILP namar ngim kwah ban long mynder hala ka jong ka Ri hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long wat hadien ba ka ïing bishar kala dep ban pass ïa ka resolution mynta la 3 snem khlem pat lah ban pyntreikam ïa ka ILP ha ka Jylla.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kala pynbna ban buh noh ïa ki Border Out Post ha manla ki jaka khappud ba don ki jingïakajia hynrei katei ka jingthmu buh BOP ka sorkar Jylla kam don jingmut namar kam nud ban leit buh ha ki jaka ba ïa kajia pud hynrei ka thmu pynban ban buh ha pdeng shnong ban pyntieng pynsmiej ïa ki paidbah nongshong shnong.“Haba phi buh ïa ka Outpost dei ruh ban ai ïa ki pulit kiba biang bad ai ruh ïa ki suloi ha ryngkat u kuli bad ka bor ban siat lada donkam ban ïada ïa u paradoh parasnam bad ka jingjia kaba la jia ha Mukroh kamdei shuh ban dang jia ha kaba ki pulit Meghalaya ki khlem nud ban pynphai ban siat ïa ki pulit Assam namar khlem ïoh hukum” ong u bah Synrem.Katba na ka liang jong u Samla Lumang Kharsyiemlieh President ka HYC, WKHD haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingïalang u la ong ba ha kiwei ki Jylla ban ïoh ïa ki Police Outpost ka shong ha ka jingstad jong ki nongïalam katba ha ka Jylla ka jong ngi hap ban duh shwa ïa ki mynsiem briew ba kordor ngin sa ïoh ïa ki BOP.Na ka liang jong u nongïalam ka HANM na WKHD u samla Wilstone Sohshang u la ong ngi sngewsih ba ngi ïoh ïa u DGP u bym dei u nong Meghalaya bad jin lada u dei u nong Meghalaya u la dei ban leit ïaid kjat sha Mukroh bad sha baroh ki jaka khappud ba don ki jingïakajia.U bah Sambormi Lyngdoh president ka EJNC ka wei na ki kynhun kaba hap hapoh ka lama jong ka Save Hynñiewtrep Mission u la ong ba balei ka jaitbynriew ka tlot haduh katta katta kadaw ka dei namar hapoh secretariat la dap sa tang kita ki nongkhaïi bad ki heh Saipan.U la ong ruh ba kam myntoi lada ngi ïoh ïa ka roi ka par lada ngi duh noh ïa ka khynndew ka shyiap. Shuh shuh u la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah da kaba ong ba “Kum ki paidbah haba ngi jied ïa ki nongmih khmat jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat kiba don shisha ka khmat ki ban ïohi jngai na kabynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew”.
title: Da ka rally pynlong ka SHM ha Riangdo ban dawa pyntreikam noh ïa ki 9 tylli ki mat

content: U Nongïalam ka liangpyrshah u Dr Mukul Sangma, u la ong ba ka jingmih jong ki MLA jong ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) na ka party kam dei ka mat kaba pynlyngngoh ïa ka party namar ba ki la tip lupa, kumta ka party ka la dep ruh ban pynkhreh ïa ki kyrtong kiba thikna ban jop ha ki jaka jong ki MLA kiba thmu ban mih.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka jingshim bynta jong ki paidbah ha ka jingïalang jong ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) ha kine ki sngi ba la dep ka paw shai ba ki nongshong shnong ki la thrang ïa ka jingkylla ha ka jylla.“Ka jinglong jingman ka saiñ pyrthei ha ka jylla ka long kumba ju long hi, nga ïohi ïa ka jingthrang jong u paidbah ban don ka jingkylla, kumta kane ka jingthrang jong u paidbah kan dang khlaiñ kat dang wan mih ka por bad ka ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka saiñ pyrthei ha ka jylla”, u la ong.U Dr Mukul u la ong ruh ka jingmih bad jingrung jong ki nongïalam ha ki party bapher ha ka jylla ki ju khot ka jingkylla ha ka saiñ pyrthei kaba bha, kaba wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka saiñ pyrthei bad kane ka long ba ka jingkhih win kaba la khih la bun bun bnai mynta.Halor ki MLA kiba mih na ka AITC u la ong, “ngi tip ba kino ki ban sa mih noh na ka party wat la ngim ju shim kyrteng jong ki hynrei ngi la tip lupa ïa ka sienjam kaba kin sa shim, kumta ngi la pynkhreh lupa da kiwei ki kyrtong ha ka jaka ki MLA ki ba don jingthmu ban kynriah seng ,bad kine ki kyrtong ki ba ngi son ki dei ki ba thikna ban ïoh jingjop”.U la bynrap ruh, “katno ngut eh ki MLA mynta kin sa shah jied biang ha u snem 2023 bad dei na kane ka jingkylla ha ka saiñ pyrthei, na ka liang ka party ka la shim rai ban thung da kiwei ki kyrtong ki ba thikna ba kin jop ha ka elekshon 2023”.Ha ki katto katne tylli ki Constituency,  ki don ki MLA ka TMC ki ban ym shah jied shuh kumta, ka party ka la jied da kiwei ki kyrtong ki ba la thikna ban sa ïoh jingjop bad haei ba ka TMC ka buh ïa ki kyrtong jong ka, ka mut ki dei ki ban ïoh jingjop”, u la bynrap.
title: Ka AITC kan sei ki kyrtong ba thikna ban jop ha ka jaka ki MLA kiba mih: Dr Mukul

content: Ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka ri Portugal kaba don ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong jong ka Group H da ka jingïoh 7 poiñ ka la rung sha ka thup jong ki 16, ha baroh 3 tylli ki jingïakhun ka Portugal ka khlem mad shisien ruh ïa ka jingshah rem noh ha kane ka lympung World Cup ha Qatar mynta u snem.Ha kane ka jingïakhun ka Portugal pyrshah ïa ka South Korea, ka Portugal ka khlem lah ban leh bha bad ka jingïakhun ka la kut noh da 2-1, ïa ka kol na ka bynta ka Portugal la ïoh ban thep lyngba u Ricardo Horta mar syndang ka jingïakhun, kata ha ka minit ba 5 jong ka kylla step.Ka jingïakhun jong kine ki ar kynhun ka long kaba itynnad ha kaba naduh ba sdang ka jing-ïakhun watla ka Portugal ka la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban thep ïa ka kol kaba nyngkong hynrei ki kynhun jong ka Korea ki  la ïakhun tyngeh ban khur ïa ka jingjop da ka jingthmu ban ïoh rung sha ka thup jong ki 16 namar ka Uraguay bad ka Ghana ruh kiba don ha kane kajuh ka Group ki dang ïaknieh ïa kane ka kabu.Haba phai pat ha ka jingïakhun hapdeng ka Uraguay pyrshah ïa ka Ghana ka la kut noh ha kaba ka Uraguay ka la ïoh ban thep 2 kol lyngba ka jingtbit jong Giorgian de Arrascaeta ha ka minit ba 26 bad 32.Ha ka jingshisha ka Ghana kadei ka khynhun kaba khlaiñ ha kane ka snem, bad ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Korea ha ka 28 Naiweing ka la ïoh ban thep haduh 3 kol hynrei ha kane ka sngi ka khlem ïoh ban thep 1kol ruh pyrshah ïa ka Uraguay.
title: Rung ka Portugal bad ka Uraguay sha ka Pre Quarter

content: U working President ka United Democratic Party (UDP) u Bah Titos W Chyne u la ong ba ka rai ban pynshong shuki lane ban pynhiar shuki ïa u Myntri ka tnad kam pohïing, u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, kan shong ha ka rai jong u nongïalam ka party u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh lane u nongïalam ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma.Haba kren bad u kynjatshai, u Bah Titos W Chyne u la ong, “ha man ki jingjia kum kine ka ju don ka jingpeit khmat ïa u myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnad kampohïing ha ka sorkar jylla namar ka dei ka kamram jong u ban tehlakam”.U Bah Chyne u la ong ruh ba ka party ka don ka jingsngewkhia halor kane ka jingjia ha Mukroh hynrei na ka liang ka party ka la aiti ha u nongïalam ka party bad kumjuh ha u nongïalam ka sorkar kaei ka ba bha tam ba ki dei ban leh.“Lehse na ka liang u Myntri rangbah, u ba dei u khliehduh jong ka sorkar lada u i donkam  ban pynhiar shuki ne ban pynneh kan shong ha ka rai jong u”, u la ong.U la bynrap “ngan ym lah ban ong la u dei ne em ban hiar shuki bad kan shong ha u la u sngewthuh ba ka tnad kaba u bat bad lada dei ba u sngewthuh ba ka dei ka jingbakla jong u, te un ai yn hiar shuki hynrei lada u sngewthuh ba kam dei ka jingbakla jong u te ym dei ban hiar shuki”.
title: Ngi ieh ha ka rai jong u nongïalam ka party halor u Bah Lahkmen: Titos

content: Wat la u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad Sangma u dang bunkam ban leit plie ïa ki Community and Rural Development (C&RD) ha kylleng sawdong ka jylla hynrei ki don ruh ki block ki bym don ïa ki Block Development Officer (BDO) ne  ki don kiwei pat kiba hap ban peit ïa artylli ki block.Bun na ki Block kiba don ha East Khasi Hills district ki ïakynduh jingeh. Ka Mawryngkneng  kam don BDO, katba ka Mylliem bad ka Mawlai C &RD Block la hap ban peit tang da uwei u ophisar.Kawei pat, ki block kum ka Mawpat, Mawkynrew, Mawryngkneng, Mylliem, Khatarshnong-Laitkroh bad Pynursla C&RD Blocks kim ïoh ïa ka mang pisa ban thied tiar ban ai sha ki Village Employment Councils (VEC) ban pyntrei sha khmat ïa ka kam na ka bynta ki projek  hapoh ka Meghalaya Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA).Na ka liang u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah, uba dei ruh u nongïalam ka Trinamool Congress (TMC) u Dr  Mukul Sangma , ula ong , kawei hap ban peit ïa ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar kaba pyrshang ban wanrah sha jan  ïa ki ophis sorkar ban pynsuk ïa u paidbah. U la ïathuh  ïa kawei ka jingjia kaba la jia ha kawei ka jaka ha rilum Garo ha kaba ki bor sorkar ki thmu ban thaw ïa ka Civil Sub Division khlem da ïoh ka jaka ban buh ïa kane ka ophis.“Phi dei ban don ka plan kaba biang. Kaei kaba ki leh mynta ka paw ba ki leh khlem da pynbit pynbiang bha. Kyndit kyndit mynta ki sngewthuh ba ki la hiar, dei da ka jingtieng ki la leh ïa kine baroh,” ong u Sangma.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka la rai ban buh ïa ki Border Police Outpost, hynrei u la buh jingkylli hato ki biang ki briew ban buh ha kito ki jaka. U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ki kam ba lait la shu ieh kumto khlem thep shuh bad bun na ki police station ha ka jylla ki duna briew. Kane baroh ka jia namar ka sorkar kam shym la wat ki lad ki lynti ban pyndap ïa ki kam ki ba thylli ha ka tnat pulit kaba dang pynbun shuh shuh ka jingduna briew ha ka tnad.U Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ïa ki kam kiba lait ha ki District Executive Force la pyndap da kaba pynkynriah da ki pulit jong ka SF-10. Ki SF-10 battalion la thaw khnang ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki seng lehnoh bad na ka bynta kiwei pat ki bynta.Ka sorkar mynta ka la plie ïa ki block thymmai ha bun ki jaka kum ka Siju C&RD block ha South Garo Hills, ka Rambrai C&RD block ha West Khasi Hills, ka Adokgre C&RD block ha North Garo Hills, ka Namdong C&RD block ha West Jaiñtia Hills District, ka Ri-Muliang C&RD Block ha West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah, u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad Sangma, u la plie ïa ka Purakhasia C&RD block ha Chongnapara South West Garo Hills district.  Lait na kine ka sorkar ka la thaw ruh ïa ka Rongjeng Civil Sub Division ha East Garo Hills district bad ka Dalu Civil Sub – Division ha West Garo Hills district.
title: Plie Block u Conrad shait shait hynrei bun kiba la don lypa khlem BDO

content: U Nongïalam ka liangpyrshah hapoh ka ïingdorbar  u Dr Mukul Sangma, u la ther tyngeh ïa u Tuliram Ranghang, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) halor ka kyrwoh kaba u la thoh halor ki nongshong shnong ha ka shnong Mukroh.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban pynngat ha ka kyndon aiñ ïa u CEM ka KAAC u Tuliram Ranghang, u ba don jingthmu ban pynmih ïa ka jingkulmar lyngba ka jingpynmih kyrwoh jong u.“Kane ka jingleh jong u, ka long kumba nang ai ding shuh shuh, na ka jingshah pynïap ki nongshong shnong ka Mukroh, bad ki nongshong shnong na ki ar jylla ki dei ban sngewthuh ba kane ka jingjia ka la mih na ka jingbymler kam ki ar sorkar ban pynbeit ïa ka jingeh jong ki paidbah kiba ïa dei bad ki ba la shah thombor,”u la ong.U la bynrap, “Wat la ka la don ka jingpyrshang ban pyntem ïa kane ka jingjia, hynrei shu kynsan kynsan la wan u briew, u ba donbor na ka thaiñ Assam bad kynnoh nongsah beaiñ ïa ki nongshong shnong, ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya ka dei ban pynngat ha ka aiñ ïa une u briew namar ba u pynshit ïa ki paidbah”.
title: Pynngat aiñ ïa u CEM u ba thmu ban nang ai ding ïa ka jingjia ha Mukroh: Mukul

content: Kum ka dak jong ka jingkynmaw burom ïa ka sngi ba kyrpang jong ki briew kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met ne ki ‘Persons with Disabilities’ (PwDs); na ka liang ka Tehsonglang Multipurpose Co-operative Society Limited, Jakrem ka la ïoh ban rakhe ïa kane ka sngi ha CLF, Laitlawsang ha kaba u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, u nongmihkhmat ka Mawkyrwat konstitwensi bad uba long u myntri ba dei khmih ïa ka tnad umbam umdih, u la long kum u kongsan.Ïa kane ka prokram la rakhe ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang ka ophis jong u District Social Welfare Officer, South West Khasi Hills District, ka District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), South West Khasi Hills District bad ka NPRPD Scheme, South West Khasi Hills District bad ka phang pdeng ka long, “Transformative solutions for inclusive development: the role of innovation in fuelling an accessible and equitable world”.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram ka long ban tehsonglang ïa ki briew kiba don ka jinglah ba kyrpang da kaba pynlong ka jingïalang ban ai mynsiem ïa ki ba wat hapdeng ki jingduna ha ka met hynrei kim dei ban duh jingkyrmen namar ha ki, ki don pat ïa ka jinglah ban leh shibun kiei kiei ki kam kiba khraw, kum ha ka rwai ka siaw, ka put ka tem bad kiwei de ki kam kumba long lem kiwei pat kiba biang ha ka met ka phad.La khmih lynti ruh ba lyngba kane kane ka prokram, ka NRLM ruh ka la khmih lynti ba ki dkhot jong ki SHGs kin nang lah ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot lyngba ki sap kaba ki don bad ban pynmih ruh de ïa ki mar rep kiba bun jait. Shuh shuh ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ym tang ban rakhe ïa kane ka sngi jong ki briew kiba don ka jinglah ba kyrpang (PwDs) hynrei la ïoh ruh ban plie ïa ka ïew ïa die ïa thied na ki mar kiba la pynmih da ki Self Help Groups (SHGs).U bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, haba kren ha ka jingïalang u la pynpaw ka jingkhublei kaba kyrpang eh na ka bynta ki kmie ki kpa kiba long ka jingkyrmen na ka bynta ki khun ha kaba ki la wan lang ha kane ka sngi ryngkat bad ki khun kiba don ka jinglah ba kyrpang (PwDs). U la ai mynsiem ïa ki, ‘ba watla ki don ïa ki khun kiba don ka jingduna hynrei ki tip ba U Blei U buh ha kane ka pyrthei ryngkat ki jingthmu namar ‘wat la ki don ha kata ka bynta ruh ki don napdeng jong ki kiba ki lah ban pyntbit ïalade ha ka rwai ka siaw, ka put ka tem bad kiwei de katkum ka jinglah lyngba ka sap kyrpang kaba U Blei U la ai.U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingrakhe ïa ka sngi ba kyrpang, kan da long shisha kaba pynkynmaw ba kim dei ban shah peit beiñ hynrei ban ñiew ïa ki kumba long ki para briew bad u la ong ba ka kmie kaba kha, ba pun kam lah ban ieh ïa la ki jong ki khun hynrei ka kdup ieit ïa ki man la ka sngi.“Watla ka pyrthei ka ïohi ba ki don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met, hynrei ka kmie hi kam don jingsngewpher namar ka don la ka jong ka jingieit kaba kyrpang,” la ong u bah Renik. U la ai mynsiem ïa ki khun kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met ba kim dei ban duh jingkyrmen ne ban rit mynsiem hynrei ki dei ban long kiba shlur bad kiba pynkmen ïa la ka mynsiem khnang ba ka lawei jong ki ruh kan long kaba phyrnai kumba long kiwei de ki para briew.Shuh shuh u Bah Renik u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba haba ki rakhe ïa kane ka sngi ba kyrpang, ki dei ban shim ba kin da don ka jingkut jingmut ban peit ba kum ïa kine ki briew kiba don ka jingduna, kumba peit ka kmie kaba pun ba kha bad ba kin ïohi ïa kata ka jinglong kyrpang ha ki khun bad kin ieit ïa ki, kin burom ïa ki bad dei tang hangta ba kin ïohi ba ka pyrthei baroh kan don ïa kata ka jingburom kyrpang iwei ïa iwei pat.“Ai ba lyngba kane ka jingrakhe kan long ka sngi ba don jingmut ha ki khun jong ngi kiba la kha kyrpang ha kane ka pyrthei namar baroh ki long kiba kordor ha khmat u briew bad ha khmat U Blei bad Un da kyrkhu ruh ïa ki ha ki bynta baroh,” la bynrap u Bah Renikton.Kiwei de kiba la ai jingkren ki long ka kong J.U. Kharpuri, MCS, Additional Deputy Commissioner, South West Khasi Hills District kum ka symbud kongsan, u bah I. Lawrynñiang, MCS, Block Development Officer (BDO) ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block, ka kong D. Sohtun, Chief Judicial Magistrate-cum-Secretary jong ka District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), South West Khasi Hills District bad kiwei de.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban sam ïa ki jingai sngewbha sha ki katto katne ngut ki briew kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met. La pynshit pynshngaiñ ïa kane ka prokram da ka jingrwai na ka Chilajong Village Organisation, Mawkyrwat bad ka jingshad na ki hep kiba rit jong ka kynhun Children Group na Domjyrti.
title: La rakhe ïa ka sngi kyrpang jong kiba duna dkhot met ha Mawkyrwat

content: Ka National Council jong ka Young Men Christian Association (YMCA) lyngba ka tnad Youth Empowerment ka la pynlong ïa ka National Leadership bad Training Camp, ha ka ophis treikam jong ka YMCA, ha nongbah Shillong. Kumba 80 ngut ki samla, kynthei bad shynrang bad 32 ngut ki dkhot YMCA na kylleng ki jylla jong ka ri, ki la ïawan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka NLTC. Kane ka prokram ka la neh haduh lai sngi lynter.U President jong kane ka National Council, u J. B. Kosh, uba dei u Chief Justice jong ka Bihar, ba la shongthait, u la long kum u kongsan ha kane ka prokram. La wan synranlang ïa u da u Youth Vice President, Gaurav Kalyan, u National General Secretary u Bertram Devadas, u Secretary Youth Empowerment u Koshy Alexander Vaidyan bad u Secretary jong ka YMCA Northern Region u Bhen Samson.U Vice Chairman jong ka YMCA North East Region, u Dr. Andrew Ahoto, u Regional Secretary jong ka YMCA North East Region u Shamir Thabah bad u Director jong ka National Council na North East u Joe Rz Thanga ki la long ki dkhot ba pawkhmat ha kine ki lai sngi.U President jong ka YMCA Shillong, u Reverend Dr. P. Lyngdoh, u la ïoh ban pdiang sngewbha ïa kine ki nongwan ïashimbynta bad u la khot ba dei ban don ka jingsngew kawei hapdeng ki jaitbynriew bapher bapher jong ka ri India. U la kyntu ruh ïa kine ki dkhot kiba wan na ki jaka ri thor, ba kin sngewthuh ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi, ïa ki briew bad ïa ka kolshor jong ki jylla kane ka thaiñ.U President ka NCYI, u Justice J.B.Koshy, u la ïoh ban ai ïa ka jingkren lamkhmat bad u la pynkynmaw ïa kine ki samla ba kin kitkhia ïa la ki jong ki jingkitkhlieh ha la ki jong ki jong ki jaka. Ki nongai jingkren ha kine ki lai sngi, ki kynthup ïa u Dr.Andrew Ahoto, u J.R.Myrboh, Secretary Shillong YMCA bad u Koshy Alexander.Kine ki dkhot ki la ïoh ban leit jngoh kai ïa ka Sohra, ïa ki krem bad ki la ïohi ïa ki khappud jong ka ri India bad ka ri Bangladesh. Ki la sngewkmen ba ki lah ïoh ban mad ïa ki jingbam Khasi. La ïoh ban sam ïa ki Certificates bad ki mementos da ki dkhot jong ka YMCA Board sha baroh ki nongïashim bynta.
title: Pynlong ka YMCA ïa ka National Leadership bad Training Camp

content: U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Kongkal Sangma, ha ka 1 tarik u Nohprah, u la plie sa ïa ka Purakhasia Community & Rural Development (C&RD) Block ha Chongnapara, South West Garo Hills District.Mynshuwa bym pat ïoh ban plie ïa kane ka block ba thymmai, ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Purakhasia, kiba hap hapoh ka Dalu C&RD Block ha West Garo Hills ki la shem shitom ban leit sha nongbah, khamtam ka bam por haduh shi kynta tang na ka bynta ki kam ba rit.Haba kren ha kane ka jingplie u Conrad u la ong ba watla ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei kaba rit hynrei ki don kumba 6000 tylli ki shnong bad ka pynshem jingeh ïa ka sorkar shikatdei eh ban pynpoi ïa ki kam pynroi sha baroh ki shnong. Kumta la donkam bha ïa kum kine ki C&RD, ki Sub-Divisions bad ki Administrative Units khnang ba lada donkam ki paidbah kin ïoh kloi ïa ka jingïarap.Kumta na ka liang ka sorkar ka trei shitom ban thaw lane pynkha ïa ki block ba thymmai ha baroh ki bynta jong ka jylla katkum ka jingdonkam. U la kular ba da ka jingdon kine ki block ba thymmai shibun ki kam pynroi lane ki project bapher bapher ki paidbah kin ïoh ka jingmyntoi.Ha kane ka sngi u Conrad u la sam ïa ki card jong ka FOCUS, kumjuh u la sam ïa ki khun sniang bad ki khun syiar hapoh ka skhim PROGRESS sha ki Self Help Goup (SHG). U la ïoh ban sam ruh ïa ki symbai sha ki nongrep lyngba ka MeghaLAMP project ba la mang da ka IFAD.Ka FOCUS ka dei kawei ka lad ka lynti ban ai jingiarap bad kumba 4 lak tam ki longïing ki la ïoh jingmyntoi na kane. U la kyntu ïa ki nongrep kumjuh ki SHG ban pynrung kyrteng ha ka FOCUS+ bad u la pynthikna ba ka pisa yn sa ai sha baroh kiba dei ban ïoh ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai bad ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kane ka sngi la don lang u MLA u Winnerson D Sangma, u Co-Chairman ka State Planning Board u Ian Botham K.Sangma bad kiwei.
title: Ïoh CRD Block ka Purakhasia ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah ka thaiñ

content: Ka ophis ka District Legal Service Authority (DLSA) jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ryngkat ka ophis jong u District Medical & Health Officer (DM&HO) South West Khasi Hills District ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah ka la rakhe ia ka ‘World Aids Day’, ha Sngap Syiem College, Mawkyrwat. Ha kane ka sngi la wan ban ïashim bynta ki samla pule, ki nonghikai ka Sngap Syiem College, Mawkyrwat.U Senior Medical & Health Officer, Mawkyrwat CHC Dr. Archeloster Lyngdoh u la kren shaphang ka jingpang ‘ñiangkulia ne HIV/AIDS bad kumno ban ïada, ban leh ïa ki test bad kumjuh ruh kumno ban sumar ïa ki briew kiba ioh ia une u jingpang.Ka Chief Judicial Magistrate-cum-Secretary jong ka District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), kong D. Sohtun, ka la kren halor ki lad jingïada bad kumno ban tehlakam ïa kiba ïoh ïa une u khñiang jingpang hapoh ka kyndon aiñ ne ka Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) and Acquired Immune Deficiency Syndrome (AIDS) Prevention and Control Act, 2017 ba ki briew kiba don ïa une u khñiang jingpang kim dei ban shah i-beiñ ne shah ñiew beiñ ha ka imlang ka sahlang ne wat ha kiba ha ïing ha sem.Ka la ïathuh ruh ba lada don kiba ñiew shiliang khmat ïa kum kine, kita ki briew kin shah pynshitom da kaba shah set patok bad shah daiñ kuna. Ha kajuh ka por ka la iathuh ïa ki katto katne ki kyndon aiñ ba ki samla pule kin tip kumno ba leh lada don kiba pang ‘ñiangkulia ne HIV/AIDs bad kiei ki lad ba kin leh haba ki lap bad shem ïa kum kine ki briew. Namarkata, ka la kyntu ïa ki samla pule ba ha kum kine ki sngi ki dei ban long kiba phikir ïa la ka jong ka jingim da kaba ki long adkar ha kiei kiei khnang ba kin lait na kine.Ban pynsngewthuh shuh shuh ïa ki samla pule la ïoh ruh ban ïa phylliew jingmut bad kumjuh ruh ha kaba la pyni ïa kawei ka phlim kaba kyrteng ka “Nangno ka jingïarap kan wan”.U Principal jong ka Sngap Syiem College, Mawkyrwat, Dr. K.K. Nongsiej u la ai ka jingkren pdiang sngewbha katba ka Ms. Darisha Lyngdoh kawei na ki nonghikai hapoh ka Sngap Syiem College.
title: La rakhe ïa ka ‘World Aids Day’ ha Mawkyrwat

content: Uno uno ne kano kano ka ne u briew kiba shong kulai  da u Khla, ki kwah ban pyni katno ki long kiba shlur bad ban pyntieng ïa kiwei ba kin dem ha khmat jong ki, hynrei ka long pat kaba eh ban teh lakam ïa u Khla bad ban pynphai kat shaba mon.U Tuliram Ronghang, Chief Executive Member ka Karbi-Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) bad ki nongbud jong u ha ka jingwan jong ki sha Mukroh ki la wan da kaba shong kulai ha u Khla bad ban pyntieng ïa ki Khasi-Pnar bad ïa ki nong shong shnong jong ka Mukroh ba katno ki long kiba shlur bad ban pyntieng ïa ki nong shong shnong jong ka Mukroh ba kin dem ha khmat jong ki, hynrei kim pyrkhat ba une u Khla uba ki shong kim lah ban teh lakam bad pynphai ïa u kat shaba ki mon.Shuh shuh u Luliram Ronghang (CEM -KAAC) u ong ba ki Pnar kiba shong basah ha Block I bad kum juh ïa ki nong shong shnong jong ka Mukroh ba ki dei ki poi wir kiba shu wan shong ha kane ka thaiñ, hynrei u Luliram Ronghang um tip pat ba ki Nong Jaiñtia (Khasi-Pnar) kiba shong basah ha Elaka Labang-Nongphyllut,Nongphyllut Dolloiship, Pangam Raliang, Elaka Dolloi Raliang bad ki Nongshong shnong jong ka Mukroh, Elaka Shilliangmyntang, ki tip ïa ki Mikir kiba shu khot mynta kum ki Karbi, nangno ki wan shong, naduh mynno ki wan shong hapoh ki pud ki sam jong kine ki Elaka bad naduh mynno ki ïoh ïa ka District Mikir (Karbi-Anglong ba mynta). U Tuliram Ronghang u la dei ban kylli shwa halade ba ha shwa ba ki Mikir (Karbi) kin wan shong ha kane ka thaiñ ïa kaba ki briew ki kham ïatip kum ka Block I, kane ka thaiñ (Block I) ka dei ka jongno?Ïa ka thaiñ kaba ki briew ki kham ïatip kum ka “BLOCK I” la pynlong da shi bynta u Dolloi Nongjngi, Dolloi Shiliang Myntang, Dolloi Raliang bad u Dolloi Labang-Nongphyllut bad kiba dei ki bynta jong ka Rilum Jaiñtia naduh hyndai hynthai.U Tuliram Ronghang bad ki lok Karbi kiba shong basah ha BLOCK I, ha shwa ba yn kynthoh ba ki Khasi-ki Pnar bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Mukroh ki dei ki briew kiba shu wan poiwir bad shong ha kane ka thaiñ, ko Tuliram Ronghang bad phi ki lok Karbi kiba shong basah ha Block I, kylli shwa ïalade nangno phi wan bad wan shong ha kine ki Elaka Dolloi jong ka Rilum Jaiñtia.U Tuliram Ronghang bad ka kynhun jong u, ki la wan jngoh ïa ka shnong Mukroh da kaba shong kulai ha u Khla ban pyni katno ki long kiba shlur bad ban pyntieng ïa ki Khasi- ki Pnar kiba don ha kane ka thaiñ ba kin dem hapoh jong ki. Ki Khasi- ki Pnar (Jaiñtia) naduh hyndai hynthai ki long ki briew kiba “KOMTI-NEI” ki don ki Nongsiat Khla, kiba la nud wat ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki bor jong ka Great Britain (England) ïa kaba la tip kum ka Jaiñtia-Anglo War.U Tuliram Ronghang, Chief Executive Member jong ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council, u la ai ding ha u ‘langïap bad kane ka ding ym lah tip shano kan pur? Lada kane ka ding kan pur u Tuliram Ronghang CEM, ka KAAC u hap ban kitkhlieh ba pynsniewdur ïa ka jingïadei paralok hapdeng ki Karbi- bad ki Khasi-ki Pnar (Jaiñtia). U Tuliram Ronghang u la dei ban pan map shisyndon ïa kane ka jingkynthoh jong u ba ki Pnar ki dei ki poiwir kiba shu wan shong ha Mukroh bad ha ka thaiñ Block I.
title: U Tuliram Ronghang CEM-KAAC u la Shong Kulai Khla

content: Ha ki 3 tylli ki jaka ba u Conrad K. Sangma, Myntri Rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u la leit ban iuhkjat ha Ri Bhoi, ki la don 2 tylli ki jaka ba ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC), ki la ap bad rah Plakad ha ryngkat ki jingpyrta No ILP No Rest.Nyngkong ka jingrah Plakad bad ka jingpyrta dawa ILP da ki dkhot ka HYC, la ïohi ha ka por ba u Myntri Rangbah, u la leit ban plie paidbah ïa ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division, hadien kata pat ha ka por ba u leit plie ïa ka GNM Nursing School ha Pahamsyiem, hynrei kaba lait shah rah Plakad ka dei tang ha ka por ba u leit ban plie ïa ka Marmaiñ PHC.Na kaei kaba la ïohi, ka long ba ha ka por ba u Conrad K. Sangma, u poi ha kitei ki jaka, la ïohi ba ki dkhot ka HYC ki la pyrta ïa ki kyntien No ILP No Rest.
title: Rah plakad ka seng HYC ban pyrshah ïa ka jingwan u myntri rangbah

content: U myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Conrad Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ïoh ban plie ïa u mawnongrim na ka bynta ban shna ïa kata ka, ‘Integrated Development Complex’ lane kata ka ‘District Secretariat’, ha Jowai, ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u Bah Sñiawbhalang Dhar uba dei u myntri ka sorkar jylla ba dei khmih ïa ka tnad Urban Affairs, Tourism bad u MLA ka Jowai konstitwensi, u ma Wailadmiki Shylla.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Conrad Sangma u la ong ba ka jingthmu ba kongsan ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshna ïa kane ka District Secretariat, ka long ban lum lang ïa ki ophis sorkar kiba la saphriang ha kylleng ka nongbah Jowai bad ban pynrung lang ïa kito ki ophis sorkar kiba dang treikam hapoh ki ïing ba shu wai.“Da ka jingdon kane ka District Secretariat, baroh ki kam jong ki tnad bapher bapher kin dep kham kloi bad kan ïarap ïa ki paidbah ha kiba bun ki bynta,” la bynrap u Conrad Sangma.Ka sorkar ka lah mang kumba T.20 klur ban shna ïa kane District Secretariat. Ka jaka ban shna ïa kane ka ïing treikam ba heh ka dei ha Ladthadlaboh, PWD Compound, Jowai West Jaiñtia Hills District.Ki ophis jong ki tnad sorkar ki ban rung lang ha kane ka District Secretariat ki long kum ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner (DC) ryngkat bad ki tnad treikam kum ka tnad Election, Supply, Revenue, Planning, Basin Development bad ka tnad Social Welfare, District Child Protection, Sport, Treasury Officer, Excise, I.P.R., Tourism, Border Area, Mining bad kiwei kiwei ki ophis sorkar kiba dang treikam mynta na ki ïing wai.
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ïa u maw nongrim ka District Secretariat ha Jowai

content: : Ka kam ri jingri kadei kawei na ki lad kamai kajih kaba la iarap ia shibun ki samla khlem kam khlem jam jong ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ ban ieng hala ki jong ki kjat khamtam ha kane ka juk kyrduh kam namar lyngba katei ka kam kaba ki trei kila lah ban im ja kpoh bad kila lah ruh ban pyndap ia ki jingdonkam kiba bun ha iing ha sem bad ioh ruh ban ai kam pat ia kiwei de ki para samla.Kawei na kitei ki kam ri jingri kaba la khring bha ia kiba bun ki samla jong ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ kadei ka kam ri syiar ia kaba ki nongri syiar jong ka thaiñ kila ioh lad ruh ban pynïaid iew ia ki jingri ki jong ki hapoh ka Iew Nongstoiñ bad kila lah ruh ban pyndap doh syiar ia ka sor Nongstoiñ.Hynrei kumba ka long mynta kiba bun ki nongri syiar kila pynpaw ia ka jingsngewdiaw ban iohi ba ka kamai kajih ka jong ki kala nang hiar noh na ki kawei ka sngi sha kawei pat namar ka jingjur palat ka jingwan rung ki syiar kiba na shabar kaba buh jingeh pat ia ki nongri syiar trai shnong.Kumta ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingjyllei jong ka jingwan tuid ki syiar na shabar shapoh ka sor Nongstoiñ na ka liang jong ka Synjuk ki nongri bad nongdie doh syiar ka Nongstoiñ Town Area kila iamih sha surok ban pynlong ka jingap ktem ia ki kali kiba thmu ban wan pynpoi ia ki syiar ba nabar shapoh ka sor Nongstoiñ.U Samla Chesterwell Kharbani Secretary ka Synjuk haba iakren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka jingwan tuid ki syiar na shabar mynta kala long kumba khaïi martuh bad kiwan die ruh ha kador kaba jem kata ha kador 120 shi kilo katba kiba na Nongstoin kidei 180 shi kilo bad watla ka kham rem khyndiat kador hynrei la dep ban iakhein ia diah ba ka dang long pat kaba biang ban die ha iew ha hat.U la ong ruh ba ki nong supply na shabar kila pynkhuid lypa ruh ia ki syiar sha kiwei ki jaka bad ki sat hep lang ha ki synduk dohkha bad kane ka ktam ym tang ia ki nongri bad nongdie syiar hynrei ka lah ruh ban wanrah jingma ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongbam namar ym tip kaba kum kano ka jaka ki pyndonkam ban pynkhuid ia ki syiar.Shuh shuh u la ong ba na ka liang jong ka Synjuk ka kyntu ia ki nongsupply siar ba kimdei ban wanrah ia ki syiar na shabar bad kidei ban atreilang bad ka Synjuk khnang bad kumjuh ia ki nongshim lang bad die lang ba kin sngewthuh bad iatreilang khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ha baroh ki liang.
title: Mih ki nongdie syiar ka thaiñ Nongstoiñ ban khanglad ïa ka jingwantuid ki syiar na shabar

content: Ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division, kaba la ap khmih lynti bad angnud la slem bah da ki paidbah ka Ri Bhoi Sepngi, ka la urlong noh mynta ka sngi, kata ka dei hadien ba u Conrad K. Sangma, Myntri Rangbah, u la hiar ban leit plie paidbah noh ïa katei ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division.Ïa katei ka jingïalang ban plie ïa katei ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division, la sakhi da ka jingdon u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun, MLA Jirang, nangta u Bah Macmillan Byrsat, MLA Nongstoiñ, u Bah Victor Rani, MDC Jirang lem bad shibun ngut ki heh ophisar sorkar na Ri Bhoi.Ha katei ka sngi, la ïohi ba ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi Sepngi hi baroh kawei, ka la kham kynjah, namar ba bun na ki paidbah jong katei ka thaiñ, ki la leit ban sakhi ïa katei ka sngi jong ka jingkmen bad ka jingsah jingkynmaw ïa katei ka thaiñ hi baroh kawei.Ha katei ka sngi, u Conrad K. Sangma, hadien ba u la dep ban plie ïa ka Patharkhmah Civil Sub-Division, u leit sa sha Marmaiñ ban leit plie paidbah ia ka Marmaiñ PHC bad hadien kata pat u leit sa sha Pahamsyiem ban plie ïa ka GNM Nursing School kaba don ha shnong Pahamsyiem, Nongpoh.
title: Plie u Conrad Sangma ïa ka PHC ha Marmain bad ka GNM Nursing School ha Pahamsyiem

content: U myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Conrad Sangma ha ka 3 tarik u Nohprah, u la plie ïa ka hospital kaba 100 jingthiah ha Jowai. Kane ka hospital kaba lah mang ban don 100 jingthiah, ka don ha Panaliar, Jowai ha West Jaiñtia Hills District bad la dep tei ïa ka ha u snem 2017. Ha kane ka jingïalang plie la ïadonryngkat ruh u myntri ka sorkar jylla ba dei khmih ïa ka tnad Urban Affairs Department, Tourism, u Bah Sñiawbhalang Dhar, nangta u MLA ka Jowai konstitwensi u ma Wailadmiki Shylla, u Deputy Commisioner West Jaiñtia HIlls, ki ophisar jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah bad ki ophisar jong ki tnad bapher bapher jong ka District.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ïa u mawnongrim jong kane ka hospital la plie da u myntri barim jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah u Bah A L Hek ha u bnai Lber 2014.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u myntri rangbah u la ïathuh ba la shna ïa kane ka hospital khnang ba kan lah ban ai jingshakri ïa ki paidbah khamtam na ka bynta ki longkmie ba armet, ki khynnah, khyllung kiba don ha ka East bad West Jaiñtia Hills District.Ka rilum Jaiñtia ka lah jan kot sha ka 4 lak ngut ka jingdon ki briew. Ka jingdon ki longkmie ba armet bad ki khynnah ha rilum Jaiñtia kam duna shuh ïa ka 9299 bad 8932 ngut.“Ki longïing kiba duna ka ïoh ka kot, kin ïoh jingmyntoi bha na kane ka hospital. Ka sorkar kan sa thung noh shen ïa ki doktor, ki nurse kiba tbit kiba lah ban wan ai ka jingshakri ha kane ka hospital. Watla ki la don ki doktor kiba peit ïa ki khyllung bad kiwei de ki nongtrei kum ki nurse, hynrei ka dang donkam shuh shuh ban thung ïa ki doktor bad ki nurse khnang ba kane ka hospital kan treikam bha. Ngi kyrmen ba kane ka hospital kan treikam shaid shaid bad ki longkmie, ki khynnah kiba sah ha kine ki thaiñ kin myntoi da ka jingdon kane ka hospital,” la bynrap u myntri rangbah.
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka hospital ba 100 jingthiah ha Jowai

content: Hadien ka jingmih jingeh jong ki paidbah kiba ïadei kam bad ka Meghalaya Rural Bank (MRB) ha Mawkyrwat Branch, u MLA jong ka Mawkyrwat konstitwensi, u Bah Renikton L. Thongkhar uba dei u myntri ka sorkar jylla ba khmih ïa ka tnad PHE, u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka mat. U la khot la wer ïa ki paidbah ba kin long kiba ïatreilang khnang ban lah ban weng noh ïa kane ka jingeh kaba ki ïakynduh.Na ka liang jong u MLA haba ïakren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka janmiet 3 tarik Nohprah, u la kular ruh ba un sa ai da ka jingthoh sha ki bor ba halor jong kane ka Bank khnang ba kin lah ban pynbiang ïa ka jingdonkam jong u paidbah bad ha kajuh ka por ba kin pynkha biang ïa ki tnad treikam hangne ha Mawkyrwat khnang ba kan kham pynsuk ïa ki paidbah kiba ïadei kam bad kane ka bank.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kumba ki paidbah ki la ai ka jingshakri bad ka jingshaniah ïa kane ka MRB, kumta kum ki nongtrei jong kane ka Bank ki dei ban ai ruh ka jingshakri kaba biang khnang ba ki paidbah kin ym duh ïa ki sngi bad ki por jong ki khamtam hangne hapoh jong kane ka South West Khasi Hills District; ha kaba ki ju wan donkam, ha kane ka MRB. U la ong ba ki briew kiba wan na ki shnong kiba na jngai, ki la shah ktah shibun ha ka leit ka wan, ha ka jinglut jingsep jong ki bad ka la wanrah ïa ka jingduhnong kaba khraw.Ha kajuh ka por u la kyntu ruh khamtam ïa ki nongkhaïi (business) bad ki Contractor ba kin pyrshang ban plie account sha kiwei de ki bank khnang ban lait ban ïaknieh bad ki paidbah namar ‘kumba long mynta kiba bun ki account hapoh bank nongkyndong ki dei ki ‘Job Card Holder’ kiba trei ïa ka kam 100 sngi.
title: Sngewkhia u MLA ïa ka jingeh ki paidbah ha Mawkyrwat

content: Na la ka “Shlem Saiñdur” hapoh i iingwai barit ryngkat ki jingmut jingpyrkhat ba kynrum kynram nga mutdur aiu kan jia ïa ka lawei ka jongngi ki longdien hapoh ka dara jong ka ri Khasi?Ngam dei u kynja seng bhalang ne u Kynja seng sniew lang ne u riew shah parti (politics) hynrei nga kwah ba ka ri Khasi jongngi kan urlong ne kan wandur ryngkat kata ka kyrteng kumba ki longshuwa manshuwa ki khot “Ka ri tipbriew tipblei” ne ka ri ki Blei. Kaei ka jingmut kaba nga mut ban ïa tei ne pyni lyngba kane ka paper hangne, ba ïa ka ri jongngi la wan buhai shnong da ki bun paid ki khyllah jait kaba la pynsniew dur ïa ka long rynieng jongngi ki Khasi (Tribals) rit paid khatduh mynta ki kyrteng jong ki jaka puta ba bun da ka kyrteng khyllah kiba ngim tip wat ïa ka jingmut jong kata ka ktien hynrei ngi khot bad bud beit namar ngim lah shuh ban pynkylla khasi paka ïa kita.Nuksa hangne ha ri Khasi jongngi la buhai thma pyrshah ïa ki ka thma beh dkhar/khynra mynder da ki seng bhalang shane kan poi ki jop ne ki rem? Ngam tharai shuh ban dang lah ban beh ka daw ka long namar la trai khlieh ïa ngi da ki khyllah jait. Ka kam khaïi pateng (business) hangne ka ri jongngi ka long ba la khlieh da ki khyllah jait ngi ki Khasi pat ngi dei tang ki daju bad ki shakri bapoh tam ha khmat jong ki la katta nga la lap bad iohi da la ki jong ki khmat bad hangne la kyndit bynriew bad peiphang ïa kawei ka ktien kaba u myllung Soso Tham u ong Ha kawei ka sngi sa kylla long ki nong tong um jongno re jongno.Kine ki dak ba kongsan ba ka ri jongngi kan sa duh sa dam bad sa jah noh na la ka pyrthei haba ïa ka ri jongngi la bat da u khyllah jait ïa “U Thiedsnam” Ngim tip un khet pyndkut ne un leh kumno ngi ap sa tang ïa ka por. Ka ri Khasi ka dei ka ri kaba u Blei u kyrkhu kyrpang hapoh kane ka ri ngi im laitluid ngim don jingkhuslai la ha ka liang ka ioh ka kot (economy) ka mariang ba phylla, ka dustur ba nylla (Culture) ka ri u soh u pai mynta lei sha u Uranium kaba ka sorkar India (India Govt) ka phai ki khmat tang sha ka ri Khasi jongngi ban thaw lad kumno kan ioh lad ba thikna ban khlong mardor ïa utei u marpoh khyndew, ki par ba laiphew jait (natural source) ki don lut ha ka. Kumta ki dohlieh mynshuwa (British Government) ki wan knieh tang namar ka dei ka ri bap da ka spah ka ri ba la kyrkhu kyrpang da u Blei khamtam ïa ka ri Khasi baieid jongngi kaba ha ka juk shai jongngi ki khot ieid da ka ktien phira ne ktien sarong, “The Scotland of the East”.Kum ka jaidbynriew lada ngi dang don kata ka mynsiem pyrkhat pyrdaiñ ïa ka pateng pakit ba sdang sah ba dang wan ngim lah klet shuh ia ki matta ki longshuwa kum u Tirot Sing Syiem u Kiang Nangbah Babu J.J.M.Nichols Roy kiba la buh ïa ki dak jingkynmaw ha ka pateng bynriew jongngi kaei ba ngin leh khnang ba ngin ym jah rngai noh ne hiar ka jingheh kum ki kynja that ba shit kyrang ka sngi ka dei ïa ngi ruh ba ngin ieng ïaleh ym da ka stieh ka wait ne ka thma hynrei kum kiba lashai ba la ioh ka jingnang ka jingstad ka dei ïa ngi ba ngin long kum kiba stad.Ban lait na ki kti ka jinglong mraw ha la ka jong ka ri ka kamram ka dei shuwa na la rympei la jong khnang ba ki khyllah jait ne ki bun paid kin ym tyllep ïa ngi ki Khasi rit paid ki durbar shnong kin sdang ka jingstad ban ym ailad ïa ki khyllah jait ba kin ioh bynta ha ki durbar khasi, nga pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew sarong ïa ka durbar shnong Sarin kaba la pynbna ïa ka riti synshar shnong kaba u khyllah jait um ioh bynta ha ki kam shnong kam permit baroh ki kam ‘Durbar Khasi’ ne ka (Khasi National Durbar) ba kum kane ka rukom leh ka ïada ruh ïa ki kynthei ban ïa shongkha khyllah jait (non-tribal married).Kyntang ïa wai ban lait na tyrsim ka jingjot bad ka khlam ba shyrkhei ngi dei ban husiar ha ka rukom ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat ki MLA, MDC, MP bad kiwei kiwei ha ka synshar paidbah ngim dei ban pyrkhat tang ïa kawei ka sien ai ne ioh pisa hynrei kumba ki nongmihkhmat mynta lada ngi bishar bha jan man la ki Constituency ngi iohsngew kim ju leh eiei nga tharai ba lehse ki shim ram shuwa ka election bad ynda ki la jop ki sa pyllait noh ïa ka ram namar kim ju leh eiei.Haei pat kata ka kam pynroi haba ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap la shah knieh lut. Mynta ngin kyndit bynriew noh kum ki paradoh parasnam ka bri u Hynñiewtrep pyrkhat thymmai wat pyrkhat tang ïalade shimet pyrkhat shuwa ïa ka jaka ka puta sa pyrkhat hangno yn leh ïa kita ki kam pynroi. Lada khlem ki jaka ki puta yn ym ioh lad ban pynroi ne leh ïa kita ki Development ha ka roi ka par.Tienphira: “Sa shisien kin khih ki khlaw sa shisien kin win ki maw” Soso Tham.)
title: Shuwa Ba Ka Ri Khasi Kan Jah Noh Na Sla Pyrthei Aiu Ngi Dei Ban Leh?
