Ha u snem ban wan, haba ka India kan pynlong ïa ka G20 Summit, ngi wanrah ka kabu kaba biang ban pyni lynti bad ka jingryntih hapdeng ka jinglah kyrshan hi dalade ha kaba ïadei bad ka teknikal bad ka jingthied mar nabar ri. Ka kamram jong u Myntri Rangbah duh kalong ban pynkup bor ïa ka jingthmu jong ka ri, ha kaba ki Myntri Rangbah Duh kiba mynshuwa ki la ai jingpynshlur ha kaba ïadei bad ka Jai Jawan, Jai Kisan bad Jai Vigyan.U Myntri Rangbah duh, u Modi mynta u la kynthup sa ka Jai Anusandhaan ha kane ka thup. Ka Science bad ka jingwad bniah ba thymmai ka la long kaba kongsan bad ka dei kaba iaineh bad kaba pdiang lang ia baroh. Kane kalong kaba biang bha namar ym pat don kano kano ka ri kaba la kiew ha ka ioh ka kot ryngkat bad ka rukom im kaba pura khlem da donkam ban pynlut bun ha ka jingbei tyngka ha ka science bad ka rukom R&D kaba shim ïa ka science na laboratory sha ki briew. Ka jingshah synshar jong ngi ha ki phareng ka la pynslem ïa ka jingiaid lynti jong ngi ban long ka ri kaba lah kiew ha shuwa ki 150 snem ha kaba ïa dei bad ka thaiñ sepngi bad kaba ïa dei kumba 30 snem bad ka China. Ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki jingthmu jong ngi na ka bynta ki 25 snem ka dei kaba lah ban urlong – hynrei kane kan long tang haba ngi pynkhreh bad pyntreikam da kaba peit sani bha.Ha ka liang ka jingkheiñ, ka long kaba suk ban iohi ba ka jingkiew kaba 7.8% ha ka GDP mynta u snem, ka thong ban don ka ioh ka kot kaba $ 5 trillion ka dei ka ban urlong shuwa u snem 2026-27 (lait noh lada ki don ki jinghiar jingkiew kiba heh ha ka dor umphniang). Da ka jingdon lad ban kylla na ki fossil fuel sha ki rukom pynmih bording kiba lah ban pynthymmai, ngi lah ban kyrmen ïa ka ioh ka kot kaba $9 trillion shuwa u snem 2031-32 kaba kot sha ka $40 trillion shuwa u snem 2047, ha kaba ngin don ha ki lai kyrdan kiba halor tam jong ka pyrthei ha kaba ïa dei bad ka pisa pilain bad ym tang ha ki jingkhein PPP.Kaei kaba ngi dei ban leh ban kot sha ka thong 2047? U R. Jagannathan bad Ashish Chandorkar ki la thoh ha ka Swarajya kaei kaba ngi dei ban peit bniah. Shuh shuh, nga kwah ban ong ba ka pule puthi, ka koit ka khiah ha ryngkat ki dawai dashin bad ka koit ka khiah jong ki longkmie, da kaba peit ïa ki jingthut hapdeng ki jingdonkam bad ki jingpynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam, ki bam ba tei met ha ryngkat ki dawai sboh, ka um ha ryngkat ki jingwad bniah na ki duriaw bad ki jaka thah, ka jingkylla ka mariang, ki genomics, ki tiar kiba katkum ka juk mynta kiba kynthup ruh ïa ki nanomaterial, robotics, ki kali ba iaid da ka bor solar bad ka bording elektrik, ki drone, ka haw haw, bad IT, ki dei ki kam kiba kham kongsan ha kaba ka rukom treikam katkum ka jingstad science da ki riew tbit ki dei kiba hap ban kylla sha ki teknoloji ba lah ban ïaleh bad kiwei kiwei ha baroh kawei ka pyrthei. Ki karkhana ki dei ban don ka bynta kaba kongsan ha ka jingkiew kyrdan jong ngi sha ka ri kaba la don ka roi ka par ha kaba ka Sorkar ka don ka bynta ban plié lad. Baroh kine ki dei kiba hap peit katkum ki lad pynkit mar ha kylleng ka pyrthei namar kane ka la kylla sha ka atiar jong ka jingialeh hapdeng ki ri – kaba ngi lah ban khot ïa ka thma kaba khluit ha ki jaka ba khriat.Namar ka jingbuh por 25 snem, ngim lah ban lait na ki jingpynbeit ba wanrah nabar ri ha kaba iadei bad katto katne ki jingeh. Kane ka mut ba ka India ka dei ban peit bha ïa ka jingïadei bad kiwei kiwei ki ri da kaba kynmaw ïa ki jingthmu bad ka jingbha jong ka ri bad da kaba buh lad ïa ka ri ba kan long ka paralok, kaba hapdeng lane ka nongshun katkum ka jingdonkam. Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka ioh ka kot, ïa ki kam teknikal dai ban pynïahap bad ka jinglah ban pyniar, ka jingkyntiew ïa ki sap, ka blockchain technology, artificial intelligence, bad ki jingduna ha ki lad pynpoi mar – kaba long ka thup kaba iar bha.Ki kam kiba lait na ka teknoloji bad ka science ruh ki long kiba donkam bad dei ban peit bha ïa kine namar ki lah ban pynsuki ïa ka roi ka par ha ki kam teknikal. U Jagannathan u ong ka ki don hynniew jait ki kam kiba donkam ka jingpeit mardor: ki jingpynkylla ha ki kam aiñ bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki kam ka aiñ; ki jingpynkylla ha ki kam ai jingsynshar; ka jingpynkylla ha ki kam ïada ri namar mynta ngi lah ban iohi ïa kine ki ‘thma ba khluit ha ki jaka ba khriat’ bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka AI ha ki thma; ki jingpynkylla ha ka Riti Synshar kiba donkam ia ka constituent assembly; ki jingpynkylla ha ki kam elekshon ban pynduna ïa ki jingbamsap; ki jingpynkylla ha ka rukom im, ka jingpynïasoh jong ka jingkhie im ka India ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jinglong jong ka ri bad; ka jingphiah ïa ki bor hapdeng ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ki Sorkar Jylla. Ki don napdeng kine kiba kham ktah ia ka jingkylla ha ki kam science ha India bad baroh ki dei kiba kongsan.Kumno ngin leh lut ïa kine katkum ki jinglong jong ki rukom ai jingsynshar bad ki rukom pyniaid kam jong ngi? Ka bynta kaba donkam bha na ka bynta ka roi ka par ka dei ka jingpyniaid bha ïa ka pule puthi. Naduh ka por ba ka India ka la ioh jinglaitluid, ki Sokar kiba la wan ki la plié lad na ka bynta ka jingioh jingpule ïa baroh. Ki jaka pule kiba ha ki kyrdan kiba kham heh — ki IIS, IIT bad IIM ki la pyni khyndiat ïa ka pyrthei kaei ba ka India ka lah ban leh. Hynrei wat la kine baroh, ki dang bun ki kam kiba dang hap leh ban pynkylla ïa ki rukom ai jinghikai jong ngi katkum ka juk mynta bad ruh ïa ki jingdon jingem kiba ïa dei bad kane. Mynta ngi hap ban peit bniah bha ha ka jingkyntiew ïa ka jingtbit ha ki skul bah shimet. Khlem ka jingtbit ha ki kam science, ngim don lad ban kylla sha ka ri kaba la kiew.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane, kaba kongsan ka dei ka jingbei tyngka. Mynta ngi pynlut kumba 0.8% jong ka GDP jong ngi ha ka pule puthi bad ka jingwad bniah. Ia kane dei ban kyntiew kumno kumno da 3-4% jong ka GDP. Ka China ka la sdang ïa kum kane ka jingbei tyngka kaba heh ha ki snem 1990: ki jingioh jingmyntoi na kane ki dei kiba paw shai mynta lyngba ki kam science kiba la kiew bha ha katei ka ri. Katkum ka jinglong jong ka ioh ka kot kaba dang khie im biang jong ngi, ka bynta kaba ka Sorkar ka dei ban bah ka dei kaba heh palat. Ka bynta jong ki briew bad ki kynhun shimet ha ki kam pule puthi ka long kaba donkam bad ka dei ban long kaba kongsan hapdeng ki kyndon kiba bniah.Ka don sa kawei ka bynta ba dang hap peit. Namar ka jingbuh por 25 snem, kano kano ka jingpynkylla ha ki kam pule puthi kin ai jingmyntoi hadien 15 snem ei ei bad kumta ngi donkam ka rukom treikam kaba pyndonkam ïa ki jingdon jingem ha ka rukom kaba ïa hap. Ha kane ka por, ka Sorkar ka dei ban sdang ban pynduh ïa ka jingpyniaid ïa ki jaka pule ban iohnong ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingbei tyngka, ka jingioh lad ban pule bad ka jingpyniaid ïa ki kam. Ki jingïapher hapdeng ki skulbah jong ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ki Sorkar Jylla ki dei kiba hap ban weng noh namar kiba bun ki samla pule ki dei kiba ioh jinghikai ha ki skul bah jong ki Sorkar Jylla.Bun na ki kam teknoloji bad ki kam wad bniah ki dei ban wan na ki laboratory Sorkar ki bym don bynta ha ki kam ai jinghikai bad na ki laboratory jong ki kompani kiba ïa trei land bad ki laboratory Sorkar. Ngim lah ban shaniah ha ki IIT ba kin pynbeit ïa ki jingeh ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpyniar, ka jingshim ïa ki lad ha ka ioh ka kot bad ka jingpyniaid ïa ki kam kiba ïa dei bad ka jingpynpoi tiar. Ki kam jong ki IIT ki dei ban long haduh ka kyrdan jong ki start-up kiba biang hynrei kim lah ban pynbiang ïa ki kam ba ka India 2047 ka donkam. Ka USA ka la kloi ban kynriah ïa ki kam ïada ri sha ka Vannevar Bush dispensation ha ki snem 1950 namar ka jingïahap hapdeng ki riewshemphang, ki kompani bad ka Sorkar. Ka China mynta ka dang leh ïa kane ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingïadei hapdeng ki riew paidbah bad ki kynhun ïada ri. Ngi ruh ngi dei ban don kum kane ka thong.Ka tnat Atomic Energy ka dei ka nuksa kaba biang bha kumno ban pyniaid ïa ka tnat science jong ka Sorkar, bad ruh ki kam kiba ïa dei bad ka pule puthi. Naduh ki snem 1950 ngi la don ki jingtehlakam ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingwanrah ïa ki mar poh khyndew uranium ban shna U-235, kiba donkam bha ha ka jingshna ïa ki tiar nuclear. Ka India ka la plié hi ïa la ki lad lyngba u thorium ba ioh na ki khappud duriaw monazite. Ka India ka don bun tam u thorium ha ka pyrthei, hynrei u uranium ba ioh hangne um dei uba bha. Ka India ka thmu ban pyndap 30% ka jingdonkam bording elektrik lyngba u thorium shuwa u snem 2047. Ki kam jong ngi kiba ïa dei bad ki atiar bad ka bording ki donkam ïa ka jingkyrshan lyngba ka jingkiew shaphrang ki kam wad bniah ha ki teknoloji thorium. Kane baroh ka la jia namar la ailad ïa ka DAE ba kan treikam da kaba jied ïa ki stad science (bad tang katto katne ki samla pule ba ai jingsiew). Ia kane dei ban leh ha baroh ki laboratory ki bym ïa dei bad ka science bad ki jaka pule kiba bahkhlieh ïa ka jingpynkylla ïa ka science sha ka teknoloji, ka jingshngaiñ bad ki mar bad ki jingai jingshakri.Haba la batai lut ïa kine mynta, ngi donkam ïa ka jingtreikam na ki kynhun saiñ pyrthei ban wanrah ïa kine ki jingkylla khnang ba ngin lah ban long kiba sarong ïa la ka jong shuwa u snem 2047 kum ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri kaba la ioh ïa ka roi ka par.Ngi ai khublei ïa u Deekhit Bhattacharyya uba la ïarap ha ka jingpynkhreh ïa kane ka article.U Gautam R. Desiraju u don bad ka Indian Institute of Science, Bangalore bad u long u dkhot jong ka S20 Engagement Group jong ka Sorkar India.Sharan Setty u dei u Associate Editor ha Swarajya.
title: Ka Science ha India ha ka 100: Ka jinglong ka ri kaba lah kiew

content: Ka ophis jong u ‘Commissioner for Persons with Disabilities’, ka sorkar jylla ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ‘State Resource Centre on Disability Affairs, Shillong’, ka la rakhe ïa ka ‘International Day of Persons with Disabilities’, ha ‘U Soso Tham Auditorium Hall, Shillong, bad ka phang ha kane ka sngi ka long; “Transformative Solution for Inclusive Development: the role of innovation in fuelling an accessible and equitable world”. U myntri jong ka sorkar jylla ba dei khmih ïa ka tnad Social Welfare, u Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la long u kongsan ha kane ka sngi.Ha ka jingkren kum u kongsan, u Bah Shylla u la ong ba ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi man la u snem ka long ban pynsngewthuh ïa ka jinglong jingim bad ka jingïaid lynti jong ki briew kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met. U la ong ba baroh ngi dei ban sngew ba ngi ïalong kawei kum ki parabriew, ‘ngim dei ban don ka jingsngewïapher haba ngi ïashem ïa kine ki para kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met’.U Bah Shylla u la kyntu ruh ïa baroh ba ki dei ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ïarap ïa kine ki para briew ban ïateilang ïa ka jingïalong kawei ha ka imlang ka sahlang.U la ïathuh ba katkum ka juk mynta, ki don ki kor, ki bor kiba ïarap ïa kine ki briew ba ki lah ban ïoh ïa ki jingnang jingstad khnang ba ki lah ban ïashim bynta ha kiba bun ki kam kiba ïadei bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ka imlang sahlang bad ha ka ïoh ka kot.U Bah Shylla u la ban jur halor ka jingkyntiew ïa kine ki briew kiba duna ha ki dkhot met bad ban aibor ïa ki da kaba ïathuh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la sdang ïa ki prokram ki bapher bapher ban pynlah ïa kine ki briew ba kin ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat.Ki prokram kum ka ‘Accessible India Campaign’, ha kaba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynkiew ïa ka bai pension, nangta ka jingai kam ai jam bad ka jingkyrshan pisa ïa ka jingpule na ka bynta kine ki briew. U la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka la pynmih ïa ka ‘Meghalaya Signbank App’, kawei na ki app kiba ïarap ïa kine ki briew kiba don ka sap kyrpang ba kin lah ban ïoh jingïarap pisa ban pynroi ïa ka sap ka phong kaba ki don bad ban pynïajan ïa ki bad kiwei ki para briew.Ha kane ka prokram, u Bah Shylla u la pynkup burom ïa kine ki briew kiba duna ha ki dkhot met, kiba la ai ka jingshakri sha ka imlang sahlang. Kumba 12 ngut na ki, ki la ïoh ïa ki kor jingïarap bad arngut na ki, ki la ïoh ïa ki UDID card.
title: Ym dei ban don ka jingsngewpher lada ïashem bad ki briew kiba kyrpang : Kyrmen Shylla

content: Ka Hill State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) Youth Wing mynta ka sngi ka la lum ïa ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalangbah ban ïatai halor ka phang, ‘Khasi Jaiñtia State” kaba la long ha Dinam Hall, Jaïaw Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi la wan ban pynshai ïa kane ka phang da u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin (Advocate bad Social Activist) bad u Dr. L.S Gassah (Retired Professor), u Bah K.P. Pangniang (President HSPDP Central Body) bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, na ka liang u President ka HSPDP u Bah K.P Pangniang u la ong ba kane ka dei ka por, ban buh ka jingkynmaw ïa ka jingdap 60 snem ka party, ‘watla ka dang dap 55 snem mynta; khnang ba ki briew kin tip ba kane ka jingdawa ka dei ka lynti ïaid ka party na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew’.“Ha ka por ba ka party ka la dap 35 snem, ki la don ki khep ba u maieid Hopingstone Lyngdoh, bad ki nongïalam na rilum Garo ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang hapoh ka jingïalam u Clifford Marak ha Tura, da kawei ka sur ki la pule ïa ka dorkhas ha ka 29 tarik u Risaw, ban dawa ïa la ka jong ka jylla, kaba la soi da u Bah Hopingstone Lyngdoh bad u Clifford Marak ban phah sha ka sorkar pdeng,” la ong u Bah Pangniang.U la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong, “Kane ka jingïalang ka don ïa ka jingthmu kaba hapoh ka jingtyllep jong kiwei ki nongïalam. Hato kata ka jingphohsniew ïa ka Khasi-Jaiñtia State ka dei kaba phohsniew mynmiet ne mynsngi, don ba kylli ïa ngi.”U la ïathuh ruh ba ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai, ki dkhot jong ki jylla, kiba don ha ki thaiñ shatei lammihngi, “Kiba don kajuh ka jingdawa ïa ka jylla thymmai hapoh ka lama jong ka ‘National Federation of New State’, kiba dei ki nongïalam jong ka Karbi Anglong na Assam, ki nongïalam ka Kukiland na Manipur, ki nongïalam na ka jylla Tripura bad ki nongïalam ka Bodoland kin wan sha ka jylla Meghalaya, ngin pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Mawphanlur.”Katba ha ka sngi ba bud, kata ha ka 13 tarik, ki 18 tylli ki kynhun kiba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka ‘National Federation of New State’, kin ïaleit lang sha New Delhi ban dawa ïa ki jylla thymmai. “Ngin leit sha Delhi ban dawa ïa ka Khasi-Jaiñtia State hadien ba ngi la pyndep ïa ka jingbishar bniah na la ka jylla,” la bynrap u Bah Pangniang.
title: Sha Delhi yn leit ka HSPDP ban dawa ïa ka Khasi Jaiñtia State

content: Ha ka 6 tarik Nohprah, ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la pynbna paidbah ïa ki kyrteng jong ki 32 ngut ki kyrtong ki ban ïakhun ha ka elekshon ïajied nongmihkhmat sha ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla, ha u snem 2023.Ki kyrteng kiba pawkhmat ki dei ki MLA ba mynta bad ruh ki myntri sorkar kiba kynthup ïa u bah Kyrmen Shylla (Khliehriat), u bah Lahkmen Rymbui (Amlarem), u bah Brolding Nongsiej (Mawthadraishan), u nongïalam ka UDP bad uba long ruh u Lamphang ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla, u bah Metbah Lyngdoh (Mairang), u Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u bah Titos Chyne (Sohra), u bah Balajied Synrem (Shella), u bah Pius Marweiñ (Ranikor), bad u bah Nujorki Sungoh (Mookaïaw).Kiwei pat ki kyrteng kiba pawkhmat ki long u Dr. Aman War (North Shillong), u bah HDR Lyngdoh (Sohiong), u bah Remington Pyngrope (Mawkynrew), u bah Anthony Kongwang (Pynursla) bad u bah Moonlight Pariat (Jowai).Kiwei pat ki kyrteng thymmai ki kynthup ïa u bah Dawan Lyngdoh (Nartiang), u bah Baiahunlang Makdoh (Mawhati), u bah Bathok Nongmalieh (Jirang), u bah Sunshine Makri (Umsning), i Dr. Osaphi Jyrwa (Mawryngkneng), u bah Mitchell Wankhar (Mylliem), u bah Olan Sun (Mawsynram), u bah Polestar Nongsiej (Nongstoiñ), u bah Paul Lyngdoh (West Shillong) bad u bah Jemino Mawthoh (Nongthymmai).U Luderberg Ch. Momin (Kharkutta), u Subroto G. Marak (Mendipathar), u Tapash D. Marak (Resubelpara), u Rakman Ch. Marak (Bajengdoba), u Andreas G. Momin (Rongjeng), u Ronald Rikman Sangma (Salmanpara), u Kennethson R. Sangma (Dalu) bad u Ashahel D. Shira (Rajabala) ki dei ki kyrtong ki ban ïakhun na Garo Hills.Kine ki long ki kyrtong baroh kiba la pdiang da ka elekshon komiti jong ka seng UDP hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: Pynbna ka UDP ïa ki kyrteng jong ki 32 ngut ki kyrtong ki ban ïakhun ha ka elekshon 2023

content: Katba nangmih ki sngi la ïohi ba ka seng saiñ pyrthei ka Bharatiya Janata party (BJP) hapoh ka jingïalam jong u kyrtong uba dang pan tiket na ka BJP, u Bah L Michael Kharsyntiew, jong ka 17-North Shillong konstitwensi ka la nangkiew da ka jingsdang mih bun ki nongkyrshan.Ha ka jingleit ban pynshai ïa la ki jong ki nongrim ha kiba bun ki jaka la ïohi ba bun ki nongthep vote ki la ïamih ban sngap ïa kaei kaba une u kyrtong u don ban ong.Dang ha kine ki sngi ha ka jingïalang jong une u kyrtong hapoh Riatsamthiah, ki nongthep vote ki la ïamih ban leit shim bynta. Katba ha ka sngi U Blei ka 4 tarik Nohprah, ha ka jingïalang ha Oakland bad Bivar; ka jingïalang ka la long kaba heh ha kaba la wan ban synranlang da u MLA ka South Shillong konstitwensi na ka seng BJP, u Bah Sanbor Shullai bad u MDC barim na Jaïaw u Bah Martamlin Pyrbot ryngkat ki nongseng jong ka BJP Meghalaya.Ha ka jingkren, u Bah Sanbor u la kyrpad ïa ki nongthep vote katei ka thaiñ ba kin ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ïa ka BJP na ka bynta ki kam pynroi kiba heh.“Mynta bun ki briew kiba ong ba tang shu poi ha Jorabat katno ka jingibynnud ban peit ïa ki surok suiñ ne ‘fly over’ kiba ka sorkar Assam ka la lah ban tei bad katno ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la theh ha ki kam pynroi ha kane ka jylla ba marjan. Kumta lada kwah bun ki kam pynroi ba kin wan beit na Delhi sngewbha jied ïa ka BJP,” kyntu u Bah Sanbor da kaba ai khublei ïa ki nongshong shnong kiba la ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalang ba la pynbeit da ka BJP 17-North Shillong konstitwensi.U Bah L Michael Kharsyntiew uba dang pan tiket na BJP ban ïakhun na 17 North Shillong konstitwensi u la ai khublei ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong, ki nongkyrshan, kynthup ïa ki nongkitkam ba halor ka BJP kynthup napoh ka jylla bad ryngkat ki dkhot ka BJP kiba wan na ka nongbah Delhi.“Kumba ong u Bah Sanbor Shullai, dei ban jied beit ïa ka BJP namar lada jied ïa kiwei ki party hap ïaid lyngba ki peon lada donkam leit sha Delhi, hynrei lada jied ïa ka BJP ïoh ïakynduh beit beit ïa u Modi; kumta da pyrkhat bha arsien bad pynshong nongrim bha haba phi ñion ïa u budam ha ka sngi thep vote,” la ong u Bah Kharsyntiew.Ha kawei pat ka liang kiba bun na ki nongkren ba kynthup ïa ki nongïalam napoh ka State BJP bad na Delhi ki la kyntu ïa ki nongkyrshan bad ki nongshong shnong ba kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla bad ki la ong ba ka BJP haduh mynta kam pat shym la pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ha ka jylla bad khamtam na ka bynta ka 17 North Shillong konstitwensi.“Ki don kiba la pynsaphriang bad kam ruh ba ki la ïoh lypa ïa ka tiket BJP napoh ka 17 North Shillong konstitwensi, hynrei kane ka bym shisha naba ïa ka tiket ba la pynbeit da ka Elekshon Committee jong ka BJP, ym don ba lah ban tip naba ka long kaba eh bha ban lait tuh kum ki jingkylli ha ka por ïaleh eksam ki khynnah,” la ong ki nongïalam ka BJP haba kren ha ka jingïalang.Na ka liang u Bah Kharsyntiew u la ai khublei ïa ka Kong Sumie Laloo kaba long ka BJP National Executive member bad Mahila incharge nangta ka Kong Unis Khyriem kaba dei ka State Vice President Mahila, u Bhagwati Geonka, Senior BJP member, u Dolan Chakraborty, u rangbah shnong ka Oakland bad Bivar road u J K Das, ki dkhot ka Oakland bad Bivar Welfare Committee bad khamtam ïa baroh ki dkhot polling booth ba kongsan bad ka kynhun ki seng kynthei BJP, ba ki la trei shitom ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang kaba jop.
title: Jied ïa ka BJP ba phin ïakynduh beit ïa u Modi: Sanbor Shullai

content: U MLA ka Mawkynrew konstitwensi, u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, u la aiti ïa ka ïing kaba u la synñiang pisa ban shna sha kawei ka longkmie kaba don ruh lai ngut ki khun kiba dang khynnah bad kaba shem jynjar, kaba sah ha ka shnong Maw u Sam.Katei jingpynshna ïing da u MLA na ka bynta katei ka longkmie ka dei hadien ka jinglap jong u, ha ki bnai kiba la dep ïa ka jingjot palat ka ïing ba ka shong khamtam na ka bynta ki khun jong ka.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh u la ong, “Kane ka dei ka sngi kaba kyrpang tam kaba ngi la ïoh ban leh, bad bun tylli ki ïing ngi la dep ban pynshna kum kine kiba ym shym la pynpaw pyrthei. Peit sha kato kawei ka ïing kaba ki sah, ynnai peit sha kane ka ïing ba la shna thymmai, haduh katno ki shem jingeh.”“Nga isynei ban peit, nga pang ka dohnud namar ba u kpa u la khlad noh, ki khun lai ngut, ka ïing ha kaba ka kamra shet ja bad ka kamra thiah, ka don hajuh. Nga isynei bad nga sngewthuh ba hapoh ka konstitwensi jong ngi dang bun kiba long kumne,” u la ong.“Ka long kyrpang noh ha kane ka ïing, namar u kpa uba trei shitom uba ju ksaid ban pynbiang bad um ju kwah ban pynsngewsih ïa la i lok bad ki khun. Hynrei ha ka jingjia ka bym poi pyrkhat, ha kaba u dang leit sha lum bad ki jingri jingdup hynrei u la shu ngam pynban ïalade,” la ïathuh u Bah Banteidor.U la ong ba ki don bun tylli ki ïing kiba u la pynshna da kaba pynlut na ka tulop bad na pla lajong na ka bynta ki longïing kiba shem jynjar ha kylleng ka konstitwensi bad u la ong ba un dang ïai bteng ban leh ïa kum kine ki kam leh isynei na ka bynta kiba duk ba jynjar.“Ngin leh aiu ka spah ka phew haba kut, haba ngi ïap na kane ka sla pyrthei ngi hap ban leit thylli, kam don jingmut hynrei ngi dei ban don ka mon ban ïarap,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ba u la dep wat jingtip na man la ki shnong bad dang bun kiba dang donkam kum kane ka jingïarap. “Donbok ba U Blei Trai Kynrad un dang ibit bad ngin ïoh ban jop biang ha u snem 2023, na ka bynta kine ki ïing, kiba duk ngan ym pynshna shuh kumne hynrei ngan leh da kawei pat ka skhim kaba man ki jaka ngin shna da ki apartment ban ai na ka bynta ki bym lah ban thaw ïing thaw sem ïalade,” la ïathuh u Bah Banteidor.“Nga ïohi ïa ka jingjynjar, nga ruh nga wan na ka longïing kaba duk bad ba jynjar, nga la shong ha khmat ka dpei bad la ïa pyrkhat kumno ban leh haduh katne eh ka jingjynjar; hynrei ngi phai sha U Blei ban isynei bad U Blei u sngap ïa ka jingduwai jong ngi,” u la ong.Na ka liang u MLA u la kular ba un don ryngkat bad ka ïing ka sem bad ruh bad kiwei ki baduk ba kyrduh jong ka thaiñ, bad kino kino ki jingeh kiba ki ïakynduh un don ryngkat lang bad ki baroh.“Phim dei ban duh jingkyrmen, ngin ïaidonryngkat bad phi, haba ngi trei ïa ka kam, ngi dei ban trei hok ba kan long ka jingkyrkhu na ka bynta kiba duk kiba jynjar,” u la ong.Na ka liang kane ka longkmie ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingai khublei kyrpang ïa u MLA uba la phai khmat ban ïarap ïa ka, ha ka jingeh kaba ka don, da kaba ïathuh ruh ïa la ka jong ka jingshem jynjar.“Ka jingjia ba kyndit, ha kaba u kpa u khlad noh sha um ban leit pynsum ïa u masi bad uwei na ki khun. U lyoh badum u la kah ïa ka ïing ka sem jong ngi,” ka la ong.Ka la bynrap da kaba ong ba da ka jingkylluid mynsiem ka jong u MLA, u la kloi ban ïarap ïa ka riew kynthei. Ka kitbok kit rwiang ruh ba U Blei un dang theh ïa ki jingkyrkhu ba un dang lah ban trei na ka bynta kiba shem jynjar baroh.La sakhi lang ïa kane ka sngi da ki bahaïing jong katei ka longkmie bad ki khun, ki nongïalam shnong, ki nongkitkam bad nongïatreilang bad u Bah Banteidor, ki dkhot bad bor pynïaid ka Balang Presbyterian Maw u Sam, kiba la ai jingrwai ainguh sha U Blei bad ki jingduwai.
title: Pynshna ïing ei u Bah Banteidor ïa ka longkmie baduk

content: Ka jingburom ïa kiba halor ne kino kino ki  bor pynïaid, ka jingbiang por, leh bad kohnguh naduh dohnud da ka jingïatip lem, ka long shisha kaba kongsan tam ha baroh ki liang. Khlem ka Discipline ne jing-long ryntih, ym don kano kano ruh ka kam kaba rit ne kaba khraw ka ban ïaid beit ïaid ryntih. Dei tang lada don ka Discipline ba lah ban pynïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha ka rukom kaba dei bad itynnad.Dei na kata ka daw ba la pynrung bad pyn-sngewthuh ïa ka nongrim jongka naduh ba dangrit naduh na ïing na sem, ha skul, ha dong ne shnong, ha ïingmane, ha ki kynhun ne seng bhalang, ha jaka trei, khamtam eh ha ki jingïalehkai. Lada iaid beit kano kano ka kam, kata, dei ba ki lah ban bat ïa ka Dicipline. Ha ki khynnah skul, ki pulit ne shipai lei, ym long ïakren khlem ka Discipline.Ka ktien ki ‘riewstad ka ju ong,’ Nang ban kohnguh khnang ban nang ban synshar’. Don ruh ki kyn-tien kiba thoh, ‘Ki Boss barabor kim ju leh bakla’. Ki briew kiba kiew sha kliar lum jong ka Nam barabor, ki dei ki briew kiba ju bat pyrkhiang bha ïa ka Discipline.Ki shipai ne pulit lei, wat la ki tip ba ka bakla, ki kloi ban pha la ka jingim khlem da saitlah ïa ka Discipline. Baroh kiba long nongialam naduh ki kmie ki kpa, ki nongïalam shnong, ki nongïalam Niam, ki nongïalam seng bhalang, ki nonghikai skul kham-tam ki nongïalam paidbah kum ki MLA/MDC/MP ki dei ban long ki nuksa ne nongmuna jong ka Discipline.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la dep, kaba sngewsih bad ijli eh ka long ba, don napdeng ki nongïalam  kum ki MLA ne MDC ba donburom kiba ki paidbah ki ju  khmih lynti ba kin long maki ki nonghikai bad ki nongmuna, ki nongpyni bad nong-sneng  ïa ka Discipline hakhmat ki paidbah, ki pyni bad pynpaw pyr-thei pynban ïa ka raibi kaba sniew tam ym tang ïa ka constituency ba ki mihkhmat hynrei ïa ka ri hi baroh kawei. Kim don shuh kata ka raiñ ka rem ban kren kop kren beiñ ïa ka seng ba la ai tiket MLA ïa ki ha kito ki snem ba la dep. Kim salia shuh te, hynrei shu saidlah beit plak katba mon. Ki dei ki MLA ‘Laitlan’ ym dei shuh ki MLA lait-mon ne laitluid.Ym don riti synshar ne Riti Treikam shuh jong ki seng saiñ pyrthei hakhmat jongki kiba lah ban teh ne pynkohnguh ïa ki.Lada kim treh kohnguh shuh ia ki kyndon ka riti treikam jong ka seng, kim donkam shuh ban ïaleh Elek-shon na kano kano ka seng kaba don la ki jong ki riti treikam. Ka kham ïahap ïa ki ban shu ïaleh Inde-pendent, leh katba mon bad kren ruh katba sngewbit, biang beit. La ïohi ba ki MDC ynda ki la jop ki leit kyrshan kat shaba mon kim salia ïa ka seng kaba ai tiket ne ba pynjop namar ki ong bym pat don aiñ ka ban teh ïa ki. Hynrei mynta pat, wat ki MLA kiba don ka aiñ kaba biang  ban teh ïa ki ruh, mynta ki leh bad phet katba mon. Hangno shuh don jingmut ki seng sain pyrthei ban ai tiket khlem lah ban teh bad pyn-kohnguh ïa ki party men bym salia ïa  ka Discipline ka seng?.Tang kane kawei ka jingsneng ïa baroh ki seng saiñ pyrthei ba ki dei ban husiar bha shwa ban ai tiket ïano ïano, ïoh ngat ei ha ki bseiñ ki ban puh kylla ia ka seng haduh ban da jem jai ynda ki la syaid ha rympei ïing ka seng. Kin pynjot ïa ki nongkyrshan radbah jongki seng ha man la ki constituency hadien ba ki ïoh tiket. Lah ki nongshun kiba paw ban ïa ki lok kiba ym tang ba ki shet kylla hynrei ki shet syrwa syndon hadien habud.
title: U lok bad u nongshun ba paw

content: U Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, u la ong ba ka jingdawa ïa ka Khasi–Jaiñtia State ka dei ka jingdawa kaba don hok, ‘namar ba ka jaitbynriew Khasi ka don la ka jong ka rukom im, la ka jong ka riti dustur, la ka jong ka ktien ka thylliej, la ka jong ka rukom bat khyndew, ka shyiap ka rukom im, ka ïapher’.Haba kren ha ka sngi ba ka HSPDP Youth Wing ka la pynlong ïa ka seminar ban ïatai halor ka mat Khasi Jaiñtia State, u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, u la ong ba ka jaitbynriew Khasi Jaiñtia bad Garo ka dei ban ïatreilang ban phiah ïa ka jylla ha ki ar bynta, ‘namar ki don ïa ka nongrim bad lada ka Parliament jong ka Ri India ka dang burom ïa ka Constituent Assembly, ka dei ruh ban burom ïa ka resolution jong ka Khasi National Making Dorbar jong u snem 1949, khnang ba ka jingïadei bad ka Ri India kan pynbha’.“Ka mat Khasi-Jaiñtia State ka dei ka phang kaba khia bad ka dei ka jingïateh bad ka Ri India. Khlem kane kam don ka jingïadei bad ka Ri India. Ki nongshong shnong ha Ri Khasi Jaiñtia ki la ïasoi bad ka sorkar pdeng bad ka la ithuh ïa kane bad kam dei shuh ka jingdawa, kaba thymmai, ka jingsdang ïa ka jingthrang la ka bor ban synshar, kaba la long naduh u snem 1917, kaba dang hap ha ka jingsynshar ka Ri Bilat,” la ong u Bah Kharjarin.U la bynrap da kaba ong ba ha kato ka por ka don ka jingkwah ban wanrah ïa ka synshar khaddar kaba  “ki la wanrah ïa ka Government Act 1909 ter ter, ha shuwa ban mih ka ‘Constitution of India’, ka don kata ka kaiphod kaba ka sorkar Bilat ka dang pynkhreh ïa ka synshar khaddar bad dei ha kane ka por ba la sdang ban bet ïa u symbai jong ka Khasi Jaiñtia State bad dei na ka jingphylliew jingmut jong ki riewrangbah na ka bri u Hynñiewtrep ba ka mih ka Khasi National Dorbar  ha ka 14 tarik Nailar 1923, bad kane ka dei kaba la sdang ba ki la thaw da ka jingangnud ban ïada ïa ka riti durtur, ka snap ka jaitbynriew.”“Ha ka jingshynshar ka Ri Bilat ki la wanrah sa ïa ka  Simon Commission ka ba la thung ha u snem 1929, ban ïakren ban ïa phylliew jingmut ban wanrah ïa ka shynshar khadar ka ba kham biang, bad hapoh ka jingai jingmut jong u S.G Nangle u Plidar u ba la ai jingmut, ba lada ki Khasi Jaintia State and non-state ki dei ban don ha kawei ka bor shynshar. Ha kato ka por ka don ka State bad non-state ka ba la shynshar da ki syiem bad ki ba la shynshar da ki phareng,” u la bynrap.“Ki sngewdonkam ïa ka jingïatreilang ban ioh ïa ka bor shynshar bad ka la ïaid ka jingïakren bad ha u snem 1947 ngi la ioh ïa ka jinglaitluid bad ka ba la wanrah ïa  ka India independent Act,  ha u snem 1947 ngi la ioh ka jinglaitluit ka ba tang ar lane laibnai shwa ban soi ïa ka standstill Agreement , ki syiem jong ngi baroh ki la dei ki riewlaitluid namar ngim don shuh ha ka shynshar phareng bad ngim pat dei ki nongIndia bad dei ha kane ka Stanstill Agreement ka sdang ban phalang  biang ïa ka jingïatylli hapdeng ki non-state bad ki khasi state,” u la bynrap.“Kaba kongsan eh ka dei ka jingïateh hapdeng jong ngi bad ka sorkar India ka long ba ha ka por ba ngi ïa pynbeit ban snoh sha ka Ri India, hapdeng kata ka jingphylliew jingmut ka sorkar India ka wanrah noh ïa ka IOA ,ka ba la shuh khot ïa ki syiem bad la phah soi jubor ïa ka IOA bad kane kam dei ka lynti ka ba ngi ïa hun lang bad ka India ka la ai ka jingkular hadien kane ka jingïasoi ka long ba ha ka 29 /4/1949, ba u Dominion  HM ka Khasi state ha ka jingïadon ryngkat u lat ka Assam ban shna ïa ka Khasi National Making Dorbar ka ba long ka ingdorbar ba nyngkong duh jong ka jylla ka kamram jong  ka long ban tyrsat ïa ki jingdawa jong ngi,” u la ong.“Hynrei ha kane ka dorbar ka la mih ka jingïapher jingmut hapdeng ki ar kynhun, ka ba la ïalam da u JJM Nicholas Roy ,bad kawei ka kynhun ka ba lamkhmat da ka Federation of Khasi State , ka ba kawei ka Resolution ka long ba baroh ki khasi State kan don hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka Assam ka  ba la lam khmat da u JJM Nichlas Roy bad ka wei pat ka ba ong ba  dei ban don ha kawei ka jingshynshar ka ban kynthup lang ïa ki State bad ki non-state ka ban kynthup ïa ka Jowai Division of Khasi and Jaintia Hills ka ban ym dei lyngba ka Assam hynrei kum ka jylla la ka jong,” la bynrap shuh shuh.“Hynrei ha kata ka jingïathep vote ka resolution jong u JJM Nocholas Roy ka la shah rem noh bad ka jop ka resoluition ka ba ong ba dei ban ïa snoh kum ka jylla ba pura bad ka Ri India bad ïa kane la aiti ha poh Constituent Assembly , bad kat ba ngi dang rai hynrei kane ka  Bordaloi Committee ka la nangïaid shakhmat bad ka la urlong,” u la ong.
title: Dei ban ïatreilang bad ki Garo ban ïaphiah ïa ka Jylla: Robertjune

content: Ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Border Area ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingthmu ka sorkar jylla ban buh ïa ki Border Outpost ha ka shnong Thadrang, Tyrso kiba hap hapoh ka thaiñ Ri-Bhoi bad khappud Assam. Kane ka kynhun ka la ong ba kim sngewdei ban buh ïa kine ki outpost ha kine ki artylli ki jaka namar ba ki long ki jaka ba suk ba saiñ bad kiba lait na ka jingïakajia pud bad na ka jingshong syier. Kane ka kynhun ka la ong pat ba kam pyrshah ïa ka jingbuh ïa ki outpost, ‘hynrei dei ban buh ha ki jaka ba donkam.’Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi, u President ka SKRS Border Area u Bah Blickstar Sohtun u la ong ba ka kynhun ka la dawa ïa ka sorkar Meghalaya ba ka dei ban buh ïa kine ki outpost ha Ummat bad Umtlieh, kiba long hapdeng jong ka thaiñ Mawlasnai, ki shnong kiba ïa jngai kawei na kawei pat, kumba 20 km bad kiba shongsyier.Une u rangbah u la ong ba um sngew ïahap jingmut ïa kata ka jingong jong u symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad kumjuh na u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma ba ym lah ban buh ïa ki Police Outpost ha ki jaka ba ïakajia pud namar ba na ka liang ka Assam ka la dep ban buh haduh 5 tylli ki outpost ha kitei ki jaka ba don ki jingïakajia pud.Une u rangbah u la ïathuh ba ki la pyllong da kawei ka jingïalang bad ki lai tylli ki Raid kynthup ka Raid Tryso, ka Raid Thadrang, ka Raid Nongtung bad ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Border Area bad la shim ka rai ban dawa na ka sorkar jylla ba kin buh ïa kine ki Outpost ha Ummat bad Umtlieh bad la ai sngewbha ruh ki jaka ban buh ïa kine ki Outpost ha kitei ki jaka. U la ong ba ki nongshong shnong ha kitei ki shnong ki don haduh 24 tylli ki shnong.Une u rangbah u la ong ba hashwa ba ka sorkar kan pynbeit biang ïa u pud hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad jylla Assam ha kane ka sien kaba ar, ka sorkar kadei ban ai ka jingïada khnang ba ki nongshong shnong kitei ki jaka kin lait na ka jingrit bad jingñion beiñ ha ka jylla Assam.Une u rangbah u la ïathuh ba ha u snem 1994 ka jylla Assam ka la buh ktem jong ki shipai Battalion ha Sabuda bad ynda la beh ka lyer ban pynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam, ka jylla Assam ka la buh sa kawei ka Outpost ha Umru ha u snem 2021. Ha u 2022 ruh kane ka jylla Assam ka la buh biang ïa ka Outpost ha ka shnong Umlaper bad ka buh ruh sa kawei ka Outpost kaba shipor ha Madanumwang bad mynta ki dang pynkhreh sa kawei ka Outpost na ka bynta kane ka jaka ha Umtlieh kaba ki khot ka kyntoit ka Umsarang.U rangbah Blickstar u la ong, “Haduh mynta ka jylla Assam ka don haduh 5 tylli ki Outpost te balei pat na ka liang ka jylla Meghalaya kam nud ban buh ïa ki Outpost ha kitei ki jaka”.Ha kawei pat ka liang u MDC ka Mawhati Konstitwensi u la buh ka jingkylli, “Balei ba ka jylla Assam ka lah ban buh ïa kine ki outpost katba ka jylla Meghalaya pat kam lah ban buh”. U la ong ba kane ka pyni ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka long kaba tlot haduh katta katta.Kane ka kynhun ka la ai ka dorkhas ha Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Khasi Hills District Autonomous Council khnang ba un lah ban pynsngew ha ka Regional Committee kaban ïapynbeit biang ïa u pud u sam hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam ha kane ka sien kaba ar, kaba ïadei khamtam eh bad ka Block-2.
title: Pyrshah ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong ban buh BOP ha Thadrang

content: Ka Khasi Disabilities Association ka la pynrem jur ïa u kyrtong ka seng Congress u ban ïa aireng na Sohïong, u Bah S. Osborn Kharjana halor ka jingkren jong u kaba la ktah matïong ïa ki briew kiba duna ka dkhot met, bad ki la dawa ba u dei ban panmap na ki hapoh ka 24 kynta.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ha ka 2 tarik Nohprah, ha ka jingïalang paidbah ha Mawmaram, une u kyrtong uba dei u ophisar barim jong ka tnad Custom, uba la bat ha ka kyrdan Superintendent, u la ong ba ka jaidbynriew ka nym jied ïa u nongmihkhmat uba don ka jingduna ha ka dkhot met.“Hato phi jied rangbah shnong ïa uba matlah, ïa u bym lait kren? ïa uba kyllut? Em! Namar balei? Ngi tip ba um lah ban synshar,” u Bah Kharjana u la ong ïa kine ki kyntien ha kane ka jingïalang. Kane ka jingkren jong une u kyrtong ka la pynsngewsih shikatdei eh ïa ki briew kiba duna ha ka dkhot met.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, ki dkhot ka Khasi Disabilities Association (KDA) ki la ong ba kane ka long pynban kum ka jingpynduh mynsiem ïa ki, bad ka ban ïalam bakla ruh ïa ka imlang sahlang, haba beiñ ba khoh ïa ki.Uwei na ki dkhot ka KDA, u Bah Benister Kharpor u la ong ba ka jingsngewsih palat ka long namar ka jia ryngkhat ba hadien 10 snem, ki briew kiba duna ha ka dkhot met ki la shah beiñ, shah khoh biang ha ki nongïalam bad u la ong ba kane ka pynpaw ïa ka jinglong ba jyndong ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki nongïalam ka jylla.U la kynthoh da kaba ong ba wat ki MLA baroh kim dei kiba stad namar kim nang wat ban thaw ïa ka aiñ ‘hynrei kumno ki dang nud pat ban kynthoh ïa kiwei’.Na ka liang ka Kong Bertina Lyngdoh kaba dei ruh kawei na ki nongthoh ha ki lad pathai khubor bad ha kiwei kiwei ki rynsan, ka la ong ba une u kyrtong ïalade ruh u dang don hapdeng ka jingduna ha ka bor pyrkhat ha kaba u dang kheiñ ba kiba duna ka dkhot met kim lah ban ïashimbynta ha ka imlang sahlang.“Lada phi shu kren khlem da pyrkhat ïano kan pynmong, ka pynpaw shai ba ma phi ruh phi dang don hapdeng ka jingduna ha ka bor pyrkhat,” la ong ka Kong Bertina.Ka la ong ba kane ka jingkren jong une u kyrtong khlem da tip shuh ïano kan pynmong, ka dei tang ka jingkren khunlung bad ka la ong ba u la pynkheiñ ruh ïa ka aiñ ‘Right of Person With Disabilities Act 2016’.“Kane ka aiñ ka aibor ïa ngi ban ïadonbyntalang ha ka imlang sahlang, hynrei lada une u kyrtong u kren kumne, ka pynrem ïa ngi,” la bynrap ka Kong Bertina Lyngdoh.U President ka seng ‘Federation of Person with Disabilities’, u Bah Sterwin Kharjana u la ong ba namar ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka RPWD ACT 2016, “ka District Social Welfare ka la ai bor bad thung ïa ki briew kiba duna ka dkhot met ha man la ki shnong bad ka la pyntip ba dei ban don beit uwei uwei ha ki committee jong ka shnong,” la ong u President ka seng.U la kynthoh da kaba ong ba kane ka jingkren jong une u kyrtong ka la pynrem pynban ha kaba u la ong ba kiba duna dkhot met kim lah ban ïatreikamlang ha ki kam shnong kam thaw.
title: Phah pan map ka KDA ïa u kyrtong Congress na Sohïong

content: Ka kynhun ialehkai jong ka ri Croatia ka la ïoh ban rung sha ka Quarter jong kane ka World Cup ba la pynlong ha Qatar hadien ba ka la pynliem noh ia ka Japan da 3-1.Ka Japan kadei kawei na ki khynhun ba khlaiñ kaba don ha Asia bad la sakhi ia kane ha ka jingiakhun ba ki la pynduh buit noh ia ka Crotia lyngba ka jingsted bad ka rukom (system) ialehkai jong ki.Ka Japan ka la pynliem ruh ia ka Germany ha ka 23 Naiwieng 2022 kaba dei ruh ka jingiakhun ba nyngkong jong ki, ka Germany kaba dei ruh ka khynhun ba khlaiñbor ha pyrthei bad ka la ïoh ruh ban rah haduh 4 sien ia ka lahduh jong ka World Cup hynrei ha kane ka snem ka khlem lah ban poi tang ha thup jong ki 16 ruh.Haba phai ha kane ka jingïakhun ka Crotia ka la kham khlaiñ bad kham ñion naduh ba sdang ka kylla step bad ka la pyrshang katba lah ban ïoh pynkhih jar nyngkong hynrei ka Japan ka la ïoh ïa ka kol ba nyngkong ha ka minit ba 43 lyngba u Daizen Maeida hynrei ka Crotia ka la ïoh ban pynphai noh ha ka minit ba 55 lyngba u Ivan Perisic.Hadien ba ka Crotia ka la ïoh ban thep ïa kane ka kol  ka jingïalehkai ka la kham kylla bad la kham itynnad shuh shuh namar ka Japan ka la ïakhun ban tur shakhmat ban ïoh biang sa 1kol, hynrei haduh ban da kut ka minit ïalehkai ba la buh baroh 2 kine ki kynhun ki khlem ïoh shuh ban thep kol bad hadien ka extra time ruh ba ki la ïoh baroh 2 liang kine ki khynhun ki la pynkshem ïa la ka kynhun bad ka jingïalehkai ka la kut noh bad la hap ban pynïakhun lyngba ka penalti.Kumta lyngba kane ka kabu ka Croatia ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Japan da bad ïoh syndon ban rung sha ka Quarter jong kane ka lympung.
title: Lyngba ka Penalti rung ka Croatia sha ka Quarter

content: Ka seng saiñ pyrthei ka Trinamool Congress (TMC) ka la ong ba ka kompeni kaba ai kyrteng ka ‘Meghalayan Age Limited’ (MAL), kaba la pynïaid mynta da u Commissioner ba dei peit ïa ka tnad Tourism jong ka sorkar jylla, u Dr. Vijay Kumar D (IAS), ‘ka la pynum ïa ka pisa jong ki paidbah ka jylla haduh 632 klur tyngka. Kane ka pisa ka dei kaba lah mang na ka bynta ki kam pynroi ba radbah kiba ïadei bad ka ‘Meghalaya Ecotourism Infrastructure Development Project (MEIDP)’.U nongaiktien jong ka TMC, u Saket Gokhale u la ong, “Kane ka jingbamsap ka la jia hapoh jong kane ka kompeni MAL, kaba la seng da u nongïarap ba jan tam jong u myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Dr. Vijay Kumar.”U Gokhale u la ong ba kane ka kompeni MAL ka dei kaba la seng da ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA), hapoh ka jingïalam u myntri rangbah ka sorkar jylla, u Conrad Sangma, ha u snem 2020 bad ka don ïa ka jingkitkhlieh ban pyntreikam ïa ki projek jong ka tnad Tourism, ‘ha kaba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ram haduh 632 klur tyngka na ka New Development Bank (NDB) ban pyntrei ïa ki projek bapher bapher kiba hap hapoh ka ‘Meghalaya Ecotourism Infrastructure Development Project’ (MEIDP)’.“Na kane ka MEIDP, kiba bun ki projek kiba rit hynrei kiba lah kot da ki klur tyngka, lah dep ban pynbna da ka sorkar ba kan pyntrei noh. Kiba bun ki tender ruh lah dep pyllait; hynrei kaba sngewthamula ka long ba ïa kine ki tender la pyllait lyngba kane ka kompeni MAL, ym da ka tnad Tourism ne kiwei kiwei ki tnad treikam jong ka sorkar jylla. Kane ka mut ba baroh ki tender kiba ïadei bad ki kam hapoh jong ka tnad Tourism ne kiwei kiwei ki tnad, la pynïaid da kane ka kompeni MAL; namar ki paidbah ki khlem don jingtip ei ei bad ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kontraktor kiba pyntrei ïa kine ki projek ruh, kane ka kompeni ka la buhrieh,” la ther tyngeh u Gokhale.Ha ka kyrwoh ba u la phah sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Gokhale u la ong, “Kiba bun ki surok kiba dei ban shna, kiba hap hapoh jong kane ka projek kaba heh, ka MEIDP, kiba ha ka jingshisha la dei ban pyntrei da ka tnad PWD; hynrei lalap ba la pyntrei ïa kine ki surok da kane ka kompeni MAL.”Ym tang katta, u Gokhale u la ong ba kane ka kompeni MAL ka khlem la siew ne ai ïa ki jingkheiñ jingdiah halor ka jingtreikam jong ka, sha ka tnad ‘Ministry of Corporate Affairs’, naduh u snem ba la seng ïa ka.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka ophis jong u Commissioner bad ka tnad Planning, ha ka 5 tarik u Nohprah, ka la kyntait ban pdiang ïa kine ki jingkynnoh u Gokhale bad ka la ong ba u Gokhale um don jingtip ei ei shaphang kine ki projek.
title: Haduh T. 632 klur ka pisa paidbah, pynum ka kompeni jong ka sorkar MDA: TMC

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya ka la ïohi ïa ka jingkiew ha ka ïoh, ka kot bad ka kamai, ka kajih ha u snem 2021-2022.Ki tyllong khubor ki la ïathuh ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la kiew kumba 8.2% ha ka snem 2021-2022, ha ka ïoh ka kot. Ha ka jingkheiñ ha ki shiphew snem mynshuwa, ka ïoh ka kot jong ka jylla na ka bynta u snem 2011-2012 haduh 2017-2018 ka long ha trai duh, haba ïanujor bad kiwei kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri. Hynrei ka jylla ka la kiew stet bha ha ka ïoh ka kot naduh u snem 2018-2019 haduh 2020-2021. Na ka jingdon ha trai duh sha ka jinglong ba 19 ha ka kyrdan jong ki jylla ka ri, kiba kiew bha ha ka ïoh ka kot, ha ki san snem.Kane ka jingkiew ka kamai ka kajih ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka lah ban long na ka daw ka jingtheh pisa ba jur jong ka sorkar jylla. Naduh u snem 2018, ka sorkar jylla ka la pynlut arshah; kata ka mut ba ka jingpynlut jong ka sorkar jylla ha u snem 2017-18 ka long tang T. 9,858 klur; katba na ka bynta u snem 2022-2023 ka la kot haduh T. 18,881 klur.Ka la don ka jingkiew ha ka jingpynlut pisa jong ka sorkar jylla haduh arshah tang ha u snem 2022-2023 na ka daw, ka jingtheh pisa jong ka ha ki jingshna ki bapher bapher bad ka jingsam ïa ki skhim sha ki paidbah ha une u snem 2022-2023. Kane ka pynpaw ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka ïabeh ïa ka roi ka par ka ban ïaryngkatdor bad kiwei ki jylla ba radbah jong ka ri bad sa kawei ka thong ka long ba ka sorkar jylla, ka don ïa ka jingthmu ban pynïoh ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka kyrdan jong ki jylla ‘Top Ten’, ha ka ri. Ki jingkheiñ ki pyni ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka duna ha ka ïoh ka kot ha ki snem 2013- 2018.Katkum ka jingpynmih jingkheiñ da ka RBI halor ka ïoh ka kot jong ki jylla ka ri India, ka jingkiew jong ka ïoh ka kot ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka long tang 2%, ha u snem 2011-12 haduh u snem 2017-2018. Hynrei hadien u snem 2018, ka jylla Meghalaya ka la ïohi ïa ka jingkylla ha kaba ka ïoh ka kot ka la kiew stet bad ka la pynlong ba kan wan shakhmat hapdeng ki jylla baheh jong ka ri India.Dang shen ka Reserve Bank of India (RBI) ka la pynmih ïa ka kaiphod jong ki 33 tylli ki jylla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkiew ka ïoh ka kot na ka bynta u snem 2020-2021 bad 2021-2022 bad ka Meghalaya ka la paw ba ka lah kiew stet bha ha ki jingpynlut kiba ïadei bad ka roi ka par bad kane ka la pynlong ïa ki briew ba kin pynlut khambun ha ka thied ka pet bad ka la pyni ruh ba ki la lah ban kynshew pisa khambun namar ba ka kamai ka kajih jong ki, ka kiew.
title: Paw ka Meghalaya ha ki kot ka RBI ba kiew sted ha ka ïoh ka kot

content: Ka Ri-Bhoi United Football Club, ka la ïoh ban rah ïa ka namlahduh, ha ka lympung ïalehkai phutbol kaba la pynlong da ka Nongpoh Sports Association (NSA), kata hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh pyrshah ïa ka Blue Bombers FC ha ka jingïakhun phainal kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Madan NSCA Pahamsyiem.Khyndiat haba phai sha katei ka jingïakhun phainal, ka la long ba baroh ki ar kylla jong ka jingïakhun, ki la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid kaba ym don kiba ïoh pynkhih jar, kumta na ka bynta ban rai ia ka namjop-namrem, ki nongpynïaid ki la rah noh sha ka Tie Breaker bad dei hangtei ba ka Ri Bhoi United FC ka la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka Blue Bombers FC.Haba phai sha ki khusnam, ka Ri Bhoi United FC kaba la ïoh ban rah ïa ka namlahduh, ka la ïoh ban khur ia ka song pisa kaba T. 1 lak lem bad ka trophy bad ka Blue Bombers FC kaba la rem haka jingïakhun phainal haka khur ïa ka song pisa kaba long T. 50 hajar lem bad ka trophy.Kiba la sakhi lang ha katei ka sngi ïakhun phainal, ki kynthup ïa u Bah Mayralborn Syiem MLA ka Nongpoh kum u kongsan, u Bah Aibor Khongjee uwei na ki rangïalehkai ba paw ka Jylla kum u symbud kongsan, nangta u Bah Balajied Ranee MDC ka Nongpoh, ki heh nongïalam seng na Ri Bhoi lem bad shibun kiwei.
title: Rah nam lahduh ka Ri-Bhoi United ha ka NSA ha Pahamsyiem

content: Ka Meghalaya High Court ba donburom ka la pynmih ïa ka rai kaba biang ha ka por ban pynduh pyn-dam noh pyrshah ïa ka rai bym shongnia ne shong nongrim jong kane ka sorkar Meghalaya Demo-cratic Alliance (MDA) kaba don lang 7 tylli ki seng saiñ pyrthei hapoh ka jingïalong Captain ka NPP bad Vice Captain ka UDP, halor ka jingïashim bynta ki nonghikai bym dei sorkar (govt. aided teachers) ha ki kam saiñ pyrthei. Kane ka rai jong ka Kashari ba heh duh jong ka Megha-laya ym tang ba ka pynkhie im bad ai mynsiem biang ïa ki nonghikai bym dei sorkar hynrei ka dei ruh ka rai kaba la pynim biang ïa ka hok bad ka jingangnud ban shakri ne trei jong ki nonghikai ban ai lem ki jinghikai, ki jingpynsngewthuh paidbah ha ka kam saiñ hima-sima baroh.Shwa ban mih  kane ka sorkar MDA, baroh ki nonghikai bym dei sorkar  ki  lah ban shim bynta lait-luid ha ki kam politik katba ki mon ha ki party bapher bapher. Naduh ka por ba long Myntri Rangbah u (L) Capt.W.A Sangma, (L) D.D Pugh, (L) B B Lyngdoh, (L) P.A Sangma, u S C Marak, (L) Dr.F.A Khonglam, Dr. DD Lapang, (L) JD Rymbai, (L) Dr.Donkupar Roy, Dr.Mukul Sangma, kam ju pynwit pynthut satia ïa ki nonghikai ba kin don bynta ha ki kam politik. Hynrei ha kane ka sorkar MDA ha u snem 2018 hapoh ka jingïalam u Conrad K Sangma jong ka NPP, la sdang ban bishni bad pihuiñ da kaba teh bad khum da ki kyndon ba leh pyrshah ia ki nonghikai bym dei sorkar.  Ym tang ba ki shun thlong mluh thlong sying ïa ki nonghikai hynrei ki da leh sat ruh ïa ki da kaba pyndik bad pynslem kai ïa ka tulop jongki haduh ban pynthiah miet syndon ha surok Secretariat bad wat ban  siat lyer pynsat khmat ruh ïa ki nonghikai kiba pli. Ym tang katta, u Myntri Rangbah bad Symbud Myntri Rang-bah lei lei jong kane ka sorkar MDA ki la kren kop sarong lypa ïa ki nonghikai ba kim lah shuh ban pyllait ba kin shim bynta ha ka kam politik bad lada ki kwah, ki ai jingmut pylleiñ pylleiñ ban leit sha ka ïing Kashari. Dei tang kane ka sorkar kaba shan khmat eh ïa ki nonghikai ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher.Ka rai jong ka Meghalaya High Court ba donburom ban pynduh pyndam noh pyrshah ïa ki jingkwah rhah jong kine ki nongïalam ka sorkar MDA ia ki nonghikai bad ban ailad biang ïa ki ba kin ïadon bynta laitluid  biang ha ki kam politik kumba mynshwa katkum ka jing-sngew tynnad jongki la dei ban ai ka jingïaroh bad jingsngewnguh sngew burom shi katdei eh. Kito ki kynhun jong ki Nonghikai College kiba la rai kut khlem kyn-tiang dien ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa kum katei ka rai donbor bad ban beiñ  ruh dei ban ai ka jingïaroh bad ka jingpyrto junom la junom. Hynrei, dang don  bun bah ki jing-donkam ba dei hok  ba ki nonghi-kai bym dei  sorkar ki dei ban ïoh. Lada ka sorkar  kam shah shkor ne leh bym suidñiew, imat, donkam shisha ia ka Kashari ba kan tuklar  lem sa ïa kiwei kiwei ki Hok ba ki nonghikai ki dei ban ïoh kum ka bai nong jong ka jingshakri hok jongki ban ai jingstad  ïa ki samla pule haduh ba kin da nang da stad ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher.
title: Ka jingpyllait ka High Court ia ki nonghikai

content: Ki nongïalam ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP) Pahamsyiem Unit, ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah ki la leit ban khynra Labour License na kito ki nongtrei nabar jylla, kiba la wan ban trei bylla hapoh ka shnong Pahamsyiem bad ha katei ka jingkhynra jong ki, la lap ba bun na ki nongtrei nabar kim don ïa ka Labour License.Ïa katei ka kam ban leit khynra Labour License ïa ki nongtrei bar jylla hapoh katei ka shnong, la ïalam da u Samla Banbuddien Suting, President ka FKJGP Pahamsyiem Unit lem bad ka jingdon ki dkhot ka seng. Ka jingkhynra Labour License da kitei ki nongïalam seng ka long ban tip ïa ka jingshisha la kitei ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba wan trei bylla ki la ïaid ne em katkum ki kyndon aiñ.Lyngba katei ka jingleit khynra Labour License bad haba kitei ki nongïalam ka FKJGP ki la lap ba ki don shibun ki briew nabar kiba la wan bylla khlem da pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla, ki la buh ïa ka jingmaham kaba tyngeh ïa kitei ki briew nabar bad ki la ai por shi taïew ba ki dei ban pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla, lym kumta kaba mut ba ka seng kan leh ïa kaba donkam ne ban leit kyndang ïa kitei ki nongtrei bar jylla kiba la wan ban trei bylla ha ka jylla khlem ki kot ki sla kiba biang.
title: Khynra Labour License ka FKJGP ha Pahamsyiem, lap bun ki bym biang kot

content: Ha ka jingkheiñ jong u Bah Macmillan Byrsat u MLA ka NPP na Nongstoiñ Constituency, ka jingïakhun ïa ka elekshon 2023 ha Nongstoiñ Constituency, kan long tang hapdeng ka National People’s Party (NPP) bad ka Congress bad kan ym don kiwei kiwei ki party ki ban buh jingeh ïa u.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah, u Bah Macmillan u la kam ba ha Nongstoiñ Constituency, ka NPP ka la ïaid shakhmat bha hynrei ka jingïakhun ha kane ka elekshon kan long beit hapdeng ka NPP bad ka Congress namar ka Congress ka dei ka party kaba la kham rim bad  kaba la don naduh mynshwa.“Ha ka elekshon 2018, nga la pynkhreh elekshon tang ar bnai bad nga la jop, kane ka jingjop jong nga ka dei ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah na Nongstoiñ Constituency, kiba la dep ïohi lypa ïa ka jingtreikam jong nga kum u Lyngdoh ka Hima Nongstoiñ”, u la ong.“Ha u snem 2015, ka ïing Kashari jong ka High Court ka la pynmih ïa  ka hukum ba ki rangbah shnong kin ym lah shuh ban ai ïa ka syrnot ïano ïano ruh hynrei ka Hima Nongstoiñ ka lait na kane ka rai, kane ka long namar ha u snem 2003, ka Hima ka la pynkhreh lypa ïa ka Nongstoiñ Syiemship Act kaba ai bor ïa ki rangbah shnong ba kin ai  syrnot”, u la bynrap.“Ha ka elekshon 2018, nga la lah ban pynkohnguh ïa ki paidbah na ka bynta ka jong ki bad ki la pyni ïa ka jingshaniah ïa nga kaba la pynshlur ïa nga ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon nga ïohi ïa ka jingdonburom ki nongshong shnong ka Nongstoiñ bad kum ba ong ka ktien ba ki dei ki paidbah ki ba ngi lah ban shaniah”, u la ong.“Ha ka elekshon 2018, ka don ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa ka party hangne hangtei hynrei kine ki jah noh namar ba ka dei ka jingkynnoh ba khlem nongrim bad ki paidbah ki la jied ïa nga namar ba kham khraw ka jingshaniah ban ïa kita ki jingkynnoh”, u la bynrap.U Bah Macmilan u la ong ka elekshon 2023, u la trei bha na ka bynta ka Nongstoiñ Constituency bad u la lah ban wanrah ïa shibun ki kam pynroi la ka dei ha ki surok, ka umbam um dih, ka bording, ki jaka sumar, ki jaka pule, ki jaka  jngohkai pyrthei, ki ba  mynshwa kim ju don.U la bynrap, “Ka Nongstoiñ College ka dei ka jaka pule kaba la jan ka rta bad nga, ka dei ka jaka pule kaba la heh bha bad ki nongpule ki la kot sha ka 3000 ngut, hynrei kam ju don kano kano ka jingïarap na ka sorkar hynrei mynta ki la ïoh sanction ïa ki 15 tylli ki post na ka bynta ki nonghikai”.U la ong ba ha kane ka elekshon ka ban wan, kan ym dei bad kano kano ka party hynrei ka jingïakhun kan long ban ïoh ka jingshaniah jong u paidbah bad u kyrmen skhem ïa ka jingshemphang u nongshong shnong ka Nongstoiñ.
title: Ha Nongstoiñ ka jingïakhun tang hapdeng ka NPP bad ka Congress

content: U President ka Khasi Student’s Union (KSU) u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar u la ong ba ka jingkhot hajir ka National Investigation Agency (NIA) ïa ki nongïalam ka Hynñiewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ka long kumba ka sorkar pdeng ka khublei da ka mon, dung da ka kti ka diang.Haba kren ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah, u Bah Lambokstarwell u la ong ba um da don shibun ban kren namar ki trai jong ka kam kin kren khambha, hynrei kum u riew paidbah u ïohi na shabar ba ka jingleh jong ka sorkar India ka long kum ka jingleh arsap.“Baroh shi katta ki khot ban wan noh sha ka miej jingïakren, ban ïaid ha ka lynti kaba shai, ban sangeh noh ki jingïaumsnam ban sangeh noh ki jingrahtiar, ka la sdang ka jingïaid shakhmat jong ka jingïakren bad ka kynhun HNLC bad ka sorkar ruh kila leh ïa katta, hynrei kumba ka long ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, ngi ïohi ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ka sorkar India ka khublei da kamon bad ka dung da ka diang,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “Ka rukom leh ha kane ka rukom kam ïalam sha ka jingbha ka lah ban ïalam sha kawei pat ka lynti kaba bakla bad ka lah ban kham sniew arshah”.U President ka KSU, u la kyntu ïa ka sorkar India ba lada ka don ïa ka jingthmu ban leh ha ka rukom kaba dei, wat leh arsap, wat ong ban wan bad haba kila wan, phi pyrshang ban leh da kumne kumtai. Ka don ruh lehse ba haba kila wan ki lah ban shim ruh wat ïa ka jingim, kum kita ngim kwah ban kan jia.“Ai ba ki paidbah jong ka jylla kin bishar bha bad peitngor ïa kane namar kiba bun balang ki don ka jingthmu ba kane ka kynhun HNLC kan wan sha ka miej jong ka jingïakren ïasuk bad pynbeit ïa ki mat jingdawa bad ka sorkar India,” u la ong.Lada ka long ha kane ka rukom i kumba ka pynartatien ïa u ba bun balang ïoh lehse kane ka jingïakren kan bakla lynti pynban.
title: ‘Ka jingkhot ïakren ïa ka HNLC ka long kumba khublei da ka mon, dung da ka diang’

content: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) kam ju ïoh Myntri Rangbah shuh la 13 snem eiei mynta naduh u (L) Dr. Donkupar Roy u la ïalam ïa ka sorkar Meghalaya Progressive Alliance (MPA) ha u snem 2008-09 hadien ba u la shah pynkhyllem noh ha ka Congress.Ha katei ka snem, ka MPA kaba ïalam ka UDP ka don 11 ngut ki MLA, la kyrshan lang ka Nationalist Congress Party(NCP) kaba don 14 ngut ki MLA, ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HPDP) kaba don 2 ngut ki MLA, ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) uwei u MLA, ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) uwei u   MLA bad 2 ngut ki MLA shimet.Ha ka elekshon 2014, ka UDP kam lah thaw pyrthei hadien ba ka la jop tang 6 ngut ki MLA bad ka la shong ha ka liangpyrshah baroh san snem bad kumjuh ha u 2018, kam lah ban shimti ïa u shabuk synshar namar ba ka jop tang 7 ngut ki MLA bad ka la hap ban shu kyrshan ïa ka sorkar hapoh ka lama ka Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) kaba la ïalam da ka NPP.  Ha u snem 2014, la synshar ka Congress hapoh ka jingïalam u Dr. Mukul Sangma kum u Myntri Rangbah kaba neh haduh san snem bad mynta ïa ka sorkar MDA la ïalam u Conrad K Sangma kaba neh baroh san snem.Naduh ba la ïoh ïa ka jylla Meghalaya, kam pat don satia ka samoi ba ka sorkar kaba la ïalam da ka seng riewlum kan neh san snem kynthih hynrei ka la khyllem noh shiteng por.Ha ka elekshon 2023 kaban wan, ka la don ka jingsawa na ki nongkyrshan ka UDP ba ka UDP ka la dei ban shimti ïa u lakam ka bor synshar ban ïalam sorkar ha kaba ka shuki Myntri Rangbah kan leit sha u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, kum u President ka party ne kiwei pat ki nongïalam ka party.
title: Hato yn ïoh Myntri Rangbah ka UDP hadien 13 snem?

content: U Lamphang sha ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah, u la plie pyrda ïa ka 2nd Living Root Bridge Festival 2022 ha shnong Tyrna.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki jynkieng jri namar ki don bun jingmyntoi lyngba ka jingdon jong ki. U la ong, ka jingdon ki jynkieng jri ka ai jingmyntoi naduh ïa ka jingpynïasoh ïa ki shnong ki thaw, ka jingwanrah ïa ka jinglong kawei bad kaba kongsan kadei ruh ba ki ai ka jingkyrkhu ha ka ïoh ka kot ïa ki nongshong shnong ha ka liang ka kam jngohkai pyrthei.Kane ka tamasa ha ka kyrteng ki jynkieng jri la pynlong ha ka shnong Tyrna kaba hap hapoh Sohra Civil Sub-division, East Khasi Hills District.Ïa kane ka tamasa la pynlong ar sngi kata ka dei ha ka 7 bad 8 tarik Nohprah, 2022 ha ka shnong Tyrna kumjuh ruh la pynlong ïa ka Village Tourism Festival kaba la pynïaid da ka Indian Tourism Shillong ryngkat ka jingïadonkti lang ka Special Purpose Vehicle Society bad ka tnad Tourism.Ha ka jingkren jong u kum u kongsan, u Bah Metbah u la ong u dap da ka jingsngew kmen ba kane ka shnong haryngkat rakhe ïa ka jingdap 125 snem jong ka shnong.U la ong ba kaei kaba u kwah ban pynsngew lyngba ka jingwan jong u bad ban pdiang ïa ka jingkhot sngewbha sha kane ka tamasa ka dei ïa ka jingsngew kaba u don halade haba u peit ïa ki jynkieng jri kum ka nuksa jong ka jingdon ka jingtylli hapdeng ki thied dieng kiba ïatylli lang kawei kaba lah ban kit ïa u bynriew haba u ïaid u ïeng bad ruh ban ai ka jingïohnong da kaba pyni sha ka pyrthei ïa ka jingitynnad ka jongki bad ban khring ïa ki nongwei ha ka liang ka kam jngohkai pyrthei.Ha katei ka sngi la ïadonlang ruh u MLA ka Shella konstitwensi, u Bah Balajied Synrem kum u symbud kongsan ryngkat u MDC ka Shella konstitwensi u Bah Teiñwell Dkhar.Na ka liang u Bah Metbah u la ai khublei ruh ïa ki kam jong u Dr Donkupar Roy (uba la khlad noh) uba la lah ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ Shella bad ki briew kiba shong ha ka.Nalorkata u la ong, ba u Bah Balajied Synrem u khun jong u Dr Donkupar u long u khun uba tipsngi bad kohnguh sneng bad uba la lah ban buddien ïa ki dienjat u kpa ban ïalam ïa ki paidbah.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Metbah u la ai khublei ïa ka sorkar ha ki kam pynroi khamtam ban pynbha ïa ka surok naduh Mawmluh shaduh Tyrna ym kumba ka surok ka long mynshuwa ba ka sniew bad pynmong ïa baroh kiba leit kiba wan.Shuh shuh u la ong, ba u sngew sarong ban ïarakhe lang ïa kane ka tamasa namar kane ka tamasa ka pyni ïa ka jinglong tynrai jong ngi khlem da bud tynneng ïano re ïano.Ha kajuh ka por u la kyntu ïa ki nong shong shnong kiba shong basah ha Tyrna bad ki shnong kiba marjan ban pynduh jait noh ban pyndonkam ïa ki plastik namar ki pynjot ïa ka mei mariang.
title: Lyngba ki jynkieng jri, ngi ïoh ruh ïa ka nuksa jong ka jinglong kawei: Metbah

content: :Ka phlim “Kaei Ka Jingieid” kaba la shna da u I B Thim bad la pynmih da ka Diana M Marbaniang, ka la dep pyllait paidbah myn ha ka 11 tarik 2022.Ha katei ka phlim, la shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki puron jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u Larry Suchiang, Weljohn Nongspung bad ka Diana M Marbaniang, kum ki kongsan.Katei ka phlim ka dei shaphang ka khana jingieid bad jingïashoh ïa dat.
title: Ka phlim “Kaei Ka Jingieid” kaba la dep pyllait paidbah mynta u snem

content: U MLA ka 17- North Shillong Constituency u bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba ka jingdonkam mynta ïa ka jylla ka long ban pynbeit shwa ïa u pud u sam hapdeng ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya ban ïa kaba phiah ïa ka jylla namar ba mynta dang ïaknieh jaka tang bad ka jylla  Assam hynrei hadien ka jingïaphiah jylla ïoh hap ïaknieh jaka bad u Garo.Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah, u bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba ka jingdawa ban phiah ïa ka jylla ka long tang ka jingpyrkhat kaba jngai namar ba kaba donkam tam mynta hi ka long ban  pynthikna shwa ïa u pud u sam ha pdeng ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya .“Ngim kwah ban mad ïa kiwei pat ki jingeh kumba ngi mad hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam, lashai ïoh ngi ïatyngkhuh para riewlum hapdeng u Khasi bad u  Garo, mynta ngi dang ïaknieh jaka tang bad ki Assam lashai ïoh hap ban ïaknieh sa bad ki Garo”, u la bynrap.“Ka jingdawa Khasi-Jaiñtia State,  ki don la ka jong ka jingsngewthuh ka jingpyrkhat hynrei kaba kongsan hi ka long ban kem ïa ka sim kaba don hajan ym ban beh ïa ka sim ba her sha jngai kaba mut donkam ïa ka State Reservation Policy ban ïa ka Khasi-Jaiñtia State”, la ong u bah Nongrum.U la kdew ruh ba lyngba ka jingwan ka Roster System la dang paw shuh shuh ïa ka jingdkoh ka Reservation Policy, kaba donkam ka long ban shimkhia na ka sorkar jylla ban wanrah ïa ka jingbishar bniah bad ban pynthymmai ïa kane  ka policy ka ba la slem bah.“Ngam kwah kren eiei ïa ka jingsngew kiwei hynrei ha nga ka State Reservation policy ka dei ka ba donkam tam bad kane kam dei ka ba isih ïa ki jaitbynriew Garo hynrei ka long namar ba la khia palat sha ki jaitbynriew Garo bad da ka Roster lei ka la pynduh nong shuh shuh ïa ki Khasi Jaiñtia”, u la ong.“Khnang na ngin ïohi ïa ka jingmyntoi ym tang ïa ki jaitbynriew Khasi ne Garo hynrei ka jylla ka la ïaid 50 snem bad ka dang sah khyllung khynnah ha kaba ngi don tang ki politishian hynrei ngim don ïa ki nongïalam”, u la bynrap.
title: Mynta dang ïaknieh bad ka Assam lashai ïoh hap ïaknieh sa bad ki Garo: Adelbert

content: Ka Kong Rephica Becky Pde kaba la tip kum ka “Ultra Queen” jong ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi, sa shisien pat ka la wanrah ïa ka nam ka burom ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka 18 tarik Nohrpah ha kaba ka la wan ba nyngkong ha ka jingmareh “Guwahati Stadium Run” kaba la long hapoh nongbah Guwahati ba la pynlong da ka Neepco.Ka kong Rephica ka la mareh ha kane ka jingïakop mareh kaba haduh 6 kynta ha kaba ka la lah ban mareh haduh 51km ha ki 6 kynta.Ha kane ka jingïakop “Guwahati Stadium Run” kaba la long ha Assam la wan ban ïashim bynta da kumba 300 ngut tam ki nongmareh na kylleng sawdong jong ka ri.Watla ka Kong Rephica ka dei kaba trei has Excise Department, hynrei hapdeng ka kam, ka dei ka briew kaba ïaleh ban pynlait por ban kilan met manla ka sngi na ka bynta ka jingmareh jong ka namar ba ka jingangnud jong ka ïa kane ka jingmareh kam long tang na ka bynta ka kam ne ka kamai jakpoh, hynrei ka long ruh ïa ka koit ka khiah.
title: Wanrah burom ka Rephica Becky Pde ha ka jingïakob “Guwahati Stadium Run”

content: Ka sorkar jylla mynta ka sngi ka la pynbna ba ka la ïoh ban kheit sa ïa uwei pat u soh ha ka liang jong ki jingtei ïa ka jaka ïalehkai ha ka histori jong ka jylla ha kaba ka la plie paidbah ïa ka jaka ïalehkai ba la ai kyrteng ka P.A. Sangma Sports Complex ha Tura West Garo Hills District ha ka 16 tarik Nohrpah, 2022 .Ïa kane ka stadium la shna nyngkong eh ha u snem 2006 da u P.A. Sangma bad ka ai kyrteng ïa kane ka madan ïalehkai da ka M.P. Stadium. Kane ka madan ïalehkai ka la long shisha ka jingkyrkhu ïa ki nongïalehkai ha kaba ka ïohi ïa kiba bun jait ki jingïalehkai la pynïalehkai ha kane ka madan kum ka phutbol, athletics, bad kiwei kiwei de ki jait jingïalehkai.Ha kane ka madan la ïoh ruh ban pynlong ïa ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Tura Football League bad ïa ka Subroto Cup naduh ba la tei ïa ka. Kane ka madan ka la long ruh ka madan ba ju pynlong ïa kiba bun jait ki jingïalang kiba ym ïadei bad ka sports ruh hynrei khamtam ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka Republic Day bad ïa ka Independence Day.Ka.jingtei ban shna pynbna ïa kane ka madam la shimti da ka sorkar jylla ïa kaba la bei tyngka ruh da ka Ministry of Minority Affairs bad ka sorkar jylla. Kane ka madan ruh ka long kata ka madan kaba heh duh ha ri India kum ka pre-engineered composite football stadium kaba lah ban ngiam haduh 9500 ngut u briew.Ha ryngkat ka jingtei ïa kane ka stadium ka P.A. Sangma Sports Complex sa don sa artylli ki indoor halls kiba dang shna mynta kiba kynthup ïa ka 25m x 20m swimming pool, badminton hall kaba don haduh 6 tylli ki courts, Table Tennis hall, 4 Squash Courts, Cafeteria, office bad ka administrative spaces.Ka jingtei ïa kane ka complex ka la sdang naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkot jong u snem 2021, bad wat hapdeng ka jinglyngshop jong ka khlam, ka State Sports Council jong ka jylla bad ka kynhun jong ki nongshna ki la lah ban tei pyndep ban shna ïa kane ka stadium hapoh 2 snem.Ha kane ka complex baroh kawei ka don lang ïa ka madan football stadium bad artylli ki indoor halls, kaba ka jingtei baroh ka la kot sha ka 127.7 Crore.Ka sorkar ka kwah ba ki paid nongshong shnong shajan kane ka madan ba kin ïoh ban ïalehkai ha u phlang ba iaryngkat kyrdan bad kiwei ki ri ka pyrthei  bad u paidbah hi baroh u la lah ban pyndonkam ïa kane ka madan hadien ka jingplie ïa ka.Ha kane ka sngi plie pyrda la don ruh ka jingïalehkai phutbol kaba la long hapdeng ka Meghalaya State team bad ka kynhun ïalehkai kaba la phah da ka North East United Football Club. La wan ban ïadon lem ryngkat da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K. Sangma kum u kongsan, u James Sangma, Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka jylla kum u Symbud kongsan.Ka sorkar ka la buh ruh ïa ka thong nam pynbha ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ki jaka ïalehkai ha kylleng sawdong jong ka jylla. Ka jingpynheh pynbha ïa ka madan JN Stadium (Polo Ground, Shillong) yn sa pyndep ha u bnai Lber jong u snem 2023.Ka jingtei ïa ka indoor stadium kaba paka bha katkum kane ka juk kaba mynta kaba don ruh ïa ka jaka ïalehkai shooting range, badminton court, bad basketball court. Ka Wahiajer Stadium kaba don hajan Jowai kaba long kawei pat ka madan kaba ka sorkar mynta ka dang shna kaba yn sa pyni ha u bnai Kyllalyngkot 2023.Naduh ba la thaw ïa ka Meghalaya Sports Policy ha u snem 2019, ka tnat Sports bad  Youth Affairs ka la trei borbah na bynta ban pynbit pynbiang ki jaka ïalehkai kiba paka bad ka jingkyntiew ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai jong ka jylla. Kane ka kynthup ruh ïa ka jingïatreilang ka sorkar jylla bad ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association, kaba la kyntiew shibun bah ïa ka jingïalehkai sports hapoh ka jylla.Ka jingpynlong biang ïa ka Meghalaya Games hadien 16 snem kaba la ai mynsiem ïa ki jylla bapher bapher ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalehkai ha ka state-level multi-sports events. Ka lympung ïalehkai ba dang shu kut dang shen ka 2nd North East Olympic Games ka la long shisha ka jingjop ïa ka jylla, hadien ba ka ïohi ïa ki nongïalehkai ka jylla kiba la ïalehkai bha.Ka sorkar ka la pyshlur ruh ïaki nongïalehkai ka jylla da kaba ai sha ki ïaka khusnam ba kin nang ïai trei shitom ban pyntbit pynnang shuh shuh ïalade ban kynjoh sha kata ka kyrdan kaba kham shaneng lyngba ki song pisa tyngka bad ki skhim baibam ruh. La kumba 4 Klur tyngka eiei ka sorkar jylla ka la dep phah sha ki nong ïoh bynta ha une u snem ba mynta.Ka sorkar jylla ka lah sdang ruh ïaka STAR Talent Identification Program haka jingïateh lok bad ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association ha kaba 200 ngut eiei ki khynnah na kylleng ka jylla ki lah shah jied kum ki nonglehkai athlete kiba kham tbit ha kaba ki lah shah jied lyngba ka leh test ha ki rukom science. Kine ki kynnah lehkai kin sa nang hap ban leit lyngba ki training kiba pher bapher ban pynbha shuh shuh ïaka rukom lehkai jong ki.Ïa kine ki program lane ki skhim la pynurlong da ka Department of Sports and Youth Affairs da ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïaka jinglehkai sport kaba pura ka ban wanrah ïaka jingjop sha ki kyrdan ïalehkai ban ïakhun shapoh ka ri bad ruh ka jingjop sha ki jinglehkai ba shabar ri ruh kumjuh.
title: Ka P.A. Sangma Sports Complex ha Tura kan long jingkyrkhu ïa ki paidbah

content: Ka Meghalaya Aero and Adventure Sports Association (MAASA) ka la plie pyrda ïa ka lympung her parachute ka Open Paragliding Championship mynta ka sngi ka 7 tarik bad kan neh haduh ka 10 tarik Nohprah.Lyngba kane ka jingïalehkai ka MAASA kan sa jied ruh ïa ki nong her paragliding kiba tbit ban mihkhmat sha ka rynsan Asian League Qualification ka ban sa long hapoh ri Thailand ha une u snem ban wan.Ka MAASA ka la pynlong ïa kane ka jingïakop her paragliding hapoh madan Rapleng kaba hap hapoh ka Mawkynrew Constituency kaba jngai kumba 28km napoh nongbah Shillong.Ha kane ka lympung her paragliding mynta ka sngi la wan ïashim bynta da kumba 103 ngut ki nongïalehkai paragliding na kylleng ki ri jong ka pyrthei ha kaba kane ka long ruh ka sien ba nyngkong ban pynkheiñ ïa ka world rekord da kaba tam ïa ka 100 ngut ngi ki nong ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai.U Samla Jovial Andre Laloo ba shong ba sah ha Mawprem un long ruh tang ma u marwei nangne napoh ka jylla ka jong ngi uba la long tbit bad ïoh ïa ka lad (qualified) ban ïashim bynta ha ka kane ka jingïalehkai paragliding.Ha kane ka lympung pynïaher parachute ki don ruh kiba la shu wan shong sngewbha (joy rides) ha kaba ki paidbah kiba wan sakhi ïa kane ka jingïalehkai ki lah ruh ban shong pynbyrngia  ïalade, ka don ka Hot ai ballon, paragliding bad Para Motor kaba ki nongwankai ki lah ban shong ha kaba ka MAASA ka la buh kyrpang ïa kine na bynta u paidbah.Ha ka jingïakren bad ka Kong Alvie kaba dei ka nongtrei jong ka Meghalaya State Skills Development Society (MSSDS) ka la pynshai ba kane ka jingïalehkai kadei kaba la pdiang (host) da ka MASA bad kaba dei ruh ka seng kaba dang thymmai hangne hapoh Meghalaya.“Ka jingïalehkai paragliding kadei ka sien ba nyngkong ba ïoh pynlong ha kane ka jylla bad ka long ruh ka kabu na ka bynta ka Jylla Meghalaya namar ngi don ki lum bad ki jaka kiba heh bad itynnad kiba ïahap ban pynlong kum kine ki jait jingïalehkai” ong ka Kong Alvie.Ka la ong ruh ba ka don ka training ïa kane ka jait jingïalehkai na ka bynta 30 ngut na kylleng jong ka jylla kiba hap ha ka Scheduel Tribe (ST) bad Schedule Caste (SC) bad hadien ka training ka don ruh sa kawei pat ka jingpyntbit shuh shuh ban ïaid shaphang  na ka bynta ban poi jngai ha kane ka jingïalehkai hynrei yn jied tang 10 ngut ki nongïalehkai kiba la lah pyndep bad lehbha ha ka training ban long pat kum ki nonghikai ban ai training ïa kiwei pat kiba don ka jingsngewtynnad ïa kane ka jingïalehkai ïa kane ka training la wan lyngba ka ka Sceme na ka sorkar pdeng ka Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship (MSDE), ka Skills Acquisition and Knowledge Awareness for Livelihood Promotion (SANKALP) lyngba ka Meghalaya State Skills Development Society (MSSDS).Ha ka jingïakren u Kynjatshai bad u Bah John Sawian Event Director jong ka MAASA u la batai ba kino kino ki nongïashim bynta kiba jop ha kane ka lympung ba mynta ka MAASA kan sa jied ïa ki na bynta ban leit ïalehkai pat sha ka Asian League Qualification ka ban sa long hapoh ri Thailand ha une u snem ban wan.U la ïathuh ruh ba don ki nongïashim bynta kiba la wan na ri Indonesia, Singapore, Thailand , Nepal bad kiwei kiwei de ki ri ba marjan bad ngi, kynthup ruh ki shipai jong ka Indian Army, Indian Navy, bad na Assam Rifles kiba la wan ban ïa shim bynta.U khot u wer sngewbha ruh ïa ki paidbah ba kin wan ban ïadon lem ryngkat bad ki bad kane kam nym dei ka sien ba nyngkong bad ka sien ba khatduh namar nangne shakhmat kin sa don shuh shuh kum kine ki jait jingïalehkai bad ha ka liang  jong ka jingwan tuid jong ki nongjngoh kai pyrthei ruh kan nang kiew hapoh ka jylla ka jong ngi.
title: Pynlong ka MAASA ïa ka Paragliding ba saw sngi ha Rapleng

content: Ka Argentina ha kaba khatduh ka la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka FIFA World Cup lyngba ka Penalty, wat haba u Kylian Mbappe jong ka France u la ïoh Hat-Trick ha ka jingïakhun kaba jwat ha ka miet Sngi U Blei. Ka Argentina ka la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka World Cup haka sien kaba lai hadien 36 snem.Ha kane ka jingïalehkai, u Messi u la sdang ban thep kol nyngkong ïa ka Argentina bad u Di Maria ruh u la ïoh shi kol haba ka Argentina ka la bat ïa u nam tam tad haduh ba u Mbappe un ïoh ban pynphai kylla bad ka jingïalehkai ka la kut noh da 3-3 kol hadien ka Extra Time.Ka Argentina ka la sdang lehkai bha. Ha ka minit kaba lai, ka bol na u Di Maria ka la poi sha u Alvarez uba la khyrwit sha kol, hynrei namar ba ka suki palat, u Hug Lloris, nongap kol ka France u la ïoh ban kem da kaba suk.U Alexis MacAllister u la khyrwit sha kol, hynrei ka la poi beit sha u Lloris ha ka minit kaba san. U Albice-leste u la bteng ban khyrwit ïa ka kol ka France bad ïa ka bol u De Paul la ïoh ban pyndei salit u Varane.Dei tad haduh ka minit kaba 13 ba ka France ka la sdang ban ñion, haba u Mbappe u la rah naduh pdeng madan. Ka Argentina ka dangbteng ban ñion sha kol ka France bad u Di Maria u la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban sdang thep kol, hynrei u la kynjat pynban sha suiñ bad ka bol ka la poi sha ki paidbah.Hadien kane, u Griez-mann u la phah ïa ka bol sha u Giroud, hynrei ka bol kaba u kynjat ka la kiew sha jrong.U Dembele u la shah ai penalty ha ka minit kaba 21 haba u la kum wohkjat ïa u Di Maria. U Messi u la mih shakhmat ban kynjat hi bad khlem bakla eiei u la ïoh ban pynkhih ïa ka jar jong ka France ban pyntam ha ka minit kaba 23.Ka Argentina ka la ïoh sa ïa ka kol kaba ar hadien ba u Messi u la ïoh ban rah ïa ka bol bad phah sha u Alvarez. Une u nongïa-lehkai khmat u la phah sha u MacAllister, uba la phah kylla sha u Di Maria bad ïoh ban khyrwit sha kol ka France.Ka kylla step ka la kut haba ka Argentina ka dangbat ïa u namtam.Ha ka kylla miet ka Argentina ka la jan ïoh ïa ka kol kaba lai. U De Paul u la khyrwit sha kol ha ka minit kaba 48, hynrei la ïoh ban kem suk da u nongap kol ka France.Ha ka minit kaba 58 u Alvarez u la khyrwit biang sha kol, hynrei u Lloris u la ïoh ban ïada. Ha ka minit kaba 60, u Di Maria u la pynshad ha syndah kol bad phah pat sha u Messi, hynrei ka jingthawlad ban khyrwit sha ka jar kam shym la urlong namar la ïoh ban ïada noh.Ha ka minit kaba 62, ka Argentina ka la thom biang sha kol ka France haba u MacAllister u la khyrwit ïa u Lloris, hynrei u Upame-cano u la ïoh ban knieh haba une u nongïalehkai madan ka Argentina u la kyllon.Ka la shimpor haduh ka minit kaba 70 ïa ka France ban thawlad biang ban thom sha kol.Ka France ka la ïoh ïa ka kabu ksiar ha ka minit kaba 79, haba u Nicholas Otamendi u la shah pynkyllon ha u Kolo Mauni ha syndah kol. U Mbappe u la mih shakhmat ban kynjat hi ïa ka Penalty bad u la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol kaba hynriew jong kane ka lympung.Ha ka minit kaba 81, u Mbappe u la ïoh biang sa kawei ka kabu ban pynïakhaid da 2-2 kol.Haduh kaba kut jong ka kylla miet, baroh arliang ki la ïakhaid bad thep mar 2-2 kol.Ha ka kylla step jong ka Extra Time, ka France ka la ïaleh ban thom ïa ka kut iada ka Argentina.Ha ka kylla miet jong ka Extra Time, u Messi u la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol kaba lai jong ka Argentina.Hynrei ka France ka la ïoh ban pynïakhaid noh ha ka minit kaba 117 haba u Mbappe u la kynjat hi ïa ka Penalty ban ïoh syndon ïa ka Hat-Trick.Haduh ba kut ka Extra Time, ka jingïalehkai ka dangïakhaid da 3-3 kol.Ha ka kynjat Penalty, ka France ka la sdang ban ïoh mynsiem haba u Mbappe u la ïoh ban thep kol, hynrei u Albiceleste u la ïoh ban pynïakhaid da 1-1.U Coman uba mih hadien u khlem lah ban thep kol. U Dybala u la ïoh ban pyntam ïa ka Argentina da 2-1.U Tchouameni uba bud u la kynjat sharud haba ka Argentina ka la kyrmen lypa ban ïoh ïa ka jingjop. U Parades u la pyntam shuh shuh ia ka Argentina da 3-1 kol ha ka penalty.U Kolo Mauni u la ïoh ban thep na ka bynta ka France ban pynhiar ïa u namtam da 3-2 kol. U Montiel u la pyntam da 4-2 kol bad ïoh syndon ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka World Cup ha ka sien kaba lai hadien 36 snem.U Messi uba la dep ïakhun haduh 20 snem ha ka World Cup hynrei ha ka snem ba u la rai ban shongthait syndon u Messi bad ka kynhun jong ka Argentina ki la ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop kaba donburom na ka bynta jong u bad  ka Argentina.Ïa ka nam golden boot lane u rangïalehkai ba la ïoh ban thep kol bun kol la rah da u Mbappe uba dei ruh u rangïalehkai uba la rah ïa ka nam young player ha ka World Cup 2018 ha Russia.
title: Rah biang ka Argentina ïa ka namlahduh FIFA World Cup

content: Haba ngi phai dien katkum ki khana barim kiba long pateng la pateng bad ki dak ki shin ba paw tyngkreiñ ha ki. Kine ki longshuwa jongngi ki kren bad pyni lyngba ki dak ki shin tyngkreiñ ha snieh jong ka Mei Mariang ka long shisha kaba lyngngoh ha ngi ki longdien. Namarkata hato kine ki long tang ki puriskam mo ha ngi ne hato ki dei ki pharshi ne tang ka jingïanujor ne ki dei ki thymmei jong ka tipbriew tipblei ne ki dei tang ki thymmei ïalehkai tamasa, ne ki dei ki thymmei jingleh danda ki long shuwa ka bieij ne dei ki thymmei ban pyntieng pynsmiej ha ngi ki longdien ne ngi dei ki bieij tasam ban shu ïa bud ïa ka philosophy ba thoh ki nong Egypt, America, Nong Greece ne nong Bilat, nong Spain bad Portugal ne ki jingthoh jong ki nong Hebru, kumjuh ka Latin bad kiwei ki nongthoh.Haba nga shim ïa ka pyrkhat briew lada biej pule ne stad pule la sngewthuh ba ngim ïa kot shuh ban sngewthuh ïa kaei kaba ki longshuwa ki la pyni bad ai jingïathuhkhana la ki dei kiba don jingmut ne skhem jingmut ruh. Ha ki biej pule bad bieij pule ko la dum ngiew ngiew ngaw ngaw ban ïoh ïa ki dak ki shin la sngew pynban kum ki kam thamula. Katba ha ki stad pule kim ïohi shuh ïa ki khana pateng bad ka dak ki shin la shu ïa compare tang kita ki riewstad pyrthei bad ïa ka philosophy jong ki. La kheiñ dewthala lut ïa ki khana u barim bad ki dak jong ki. U mynhyndai u biej pule hynrei u stad Blei u long katkum kaba wan ha u nongbuh nongthaw sha ka dohnud briew ha pyrthei. Haba nga thoh ïa kine nga thwet ban lap dien ïa ki khana ryngkat lang kine ki dak ki shin. Kumta haba nga thwet nga wad jingtip bad phai noh sha ki paralok ban ai jingmut lem ba ka pyrthei kan shai ha la ïing ym ban wanrah jingshai ne pan kylliang sha kiwei.Lyngba ka jingdum tliw khlem ioh jingmut ka wan mih ka jingkylli ba ki lok ruh kin ïa tynrong lem ïa kiwei:-1.Balei la wan mih ka niam ieid Blei ha pyrthei.2.Ka mut aiu ka niam tipbriew tipblei ha pyrthei.3.Balei ïa ki shyieng la buh shi jaka hapoh ka longkur.4.Ka mut aiu ka maw thep shyieng.5.Ka mut aiu ki mawlynnai.6.Haba ong Mawbynna don lai tylli kiba jrong uba hapdeng u kham jrong bad don ka mawkynthei ka mut aiu?7.Ka mut aiu ka thang lynter?8.Ka mut aiu pat ka thang phur ka siang (pep bah)?9.Haba phur yn leh kumno?10.Ka mut aiu ka ksiang bad mei rang (pliang) ryngkat ka bisli iam briew haba phur?11.Kumno yn tang ksiang haba phur?12.Balei la tem mei rang (pliang) haba phur?13.Katno tylli ki jait ksiang yn tem haba phur? Bad yn tem ha kano ka rukom?14.Shuwa ban dum ki ksiang, pliang bad bisli, yn tem ban wad mynsiem balei?15.Hangno yn ioh mynsiem?16.Kumno yn tem bad put haba wad mynsiem?17.Daei la shna tyngshop ban thep mynsiem shuwa ban thang.18.Ka mut aiu ka thep shyieng bad shano?19.Mano ban pdiang ïa kita ki shyieng haba la wanrah?20.Don pat sa kata ka niam let ka mut aiu kane ka let?21.Hapoh ka let hap thung da u mawbynna bad hangno yn thung ïa uta u maw bad yn pynphai shano?22.Ka mut aiu kur?23.Ha kano ka dur la pynlong ïa ka kur?24.Hapoh ka kur mih ka kpoh phur bad kpoh Lyngdoh balei?25.Balei mih kine ki law Lyngdoh?26.Kumno yn leh niam ïa ki law Lyngdoh?27.Mano ban leh niam ha kita law Lyngdoh?28.Daei yn leh niam? Bad kumno yn leh niam?
title: “Ki Dak Ki Shin Bad Ki Khana Barim”

content: Ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ka la neh san snem kynthih naduh ba la thaw ïa ka ha u 2018 hapoh ka jingïalam u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma, na ka parti NPP. Ha kane ka sorkar, ki don lang ka UDP, PDF, HSPDP, BJP, NCP, KHNAM bad ki MLA shimet.
