Ka Congress ka shong ha ka liangpyrshah hynrei hadien ka la twa noh hadien ba ki 12 ngut ki MLA kila mih ban leit ïasoh sha ka TMC bad mynta baroh ki 5 ngut ki MLA ka Congress kiba la shah sospon kila khreh mih lut na ka parti hadien ba kila shah pynshitom ha ka parti namar ba ki leit ïasoh lang ha ka sorkar MDA.Ka Congress ka dei kaba sniew bok ha kane ka snem kaba mynta namar ba ka hap ban duh lut khait ïa ki MLA na ka 21 ngut sha ka jiro katba ka TMC ka dei kaba bha bok tam namar ba na ka jiro ka ïoh 12 ngut ki MLA ha kane ka jylla.Ka sorkar MDA ka dei kaba lai ha ka jylla Meghalaya kaba neh baroh san snem, kaba nyngkong ka dei ka sorkar Congress kaba ïalam u Salseng C Marak ha u snem 1993-1998, kaba ar ka sorkar ka dei ka sorkar u MUA kaba ïalam u Dr. Mukul Sangma bad kaba lai ka MDA. Baroh kine ki sorkar kiba neh beit triang haduh san snem, ki dei ba ïalam Myntri Rangbah na ka jaitbynriew Garo, katba kiwei ki sorkar ba ïalam ki Khasi, kim ju neh baroh san snem bad ka khyllem noh tang shipor. Ka jaitbynriew Garo ka pynmih Myntri Rangbah san ngut kynthup u (L) Capt. Williamsong A Sangma, (L) u Purno A Sangma, u Salseng C Marak, Dr. Mukul Sangma bad u Conrad K Sangma, katba ka jaitbynriew Khasi ka pynmih Myntri Rangbah hynriew ngut hi, kynthup u (L) DD Pugh Diengdoh, (L) BB Lyngdoh, DD Lapang, (L) EK Mawlong, (L) Dr. Donkupar Roy bad u (L) Dr. FA Khonglam. Napdeng kine ki Myntri Rangbah Khasi, ym ju don uwei ruh uba lah ban neh ka sorkar haduh san snem hynrei ki khyllem noh shipor. U Salseng u la pynneh ïa ka sorkar san snem kum u Myntri Rangbah ha ka por ka Congress, bad kumjuh u Dr. Mukul Sangma katba u Conrad u la pynneh san snem jong ka NPP, bad baroh ki dei ki sorkar ba ïalam ki seng national parties katba ki sorkar ki seng riewlum kim lah ban neh haduh san snem.Ka la don ka jingkynnoh na ki paidbah ba ka jinghiar ka jingjop MLA ki seng riewlum ka dei namar ba ki ïamih bun palat kumba mih ki tit lyiur haduh ba u paidbah u king baïong ban jied ïano bad kane ka la pynpharia ia ka vote jong ki. Kane ka dei kawei ka daw kaba lah ban long kumta hynrei ha ka synshar paidbah, ym lah ban khang iano ïano lada kwah ban seng parti thymmai wat u riew shimet ruh bun kiba jop elekshon, khamtam ha kane ka jylla ha kaba ki briew kim ju peit parti than hynrei ki peit ïa ka jingleh bha jong u briew.
title: Neh ki sorkar baroh san snem ba ïalam u Garo

content: U nongïalam ka Trinamool Congress Meghalaya uba dei ruh u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah ha ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla, u Dr. Mukul Sangma, u la ong ba ka jingïarung ïamih na kawei ka seng saiñ pyrthei sha kawei pat kan don beit.U la ong ba ha kine ki bnai ki ban wan, kum kine ki jingjia kin sa paw khambun bad u la pynkynmaw ba ym tang na kawei ka seng saiñ pyrthei hynrei na kiwei ruh kin ïohi ba ki MLA jong ki kin phet sha kawei pat ka seng.“Hadien ba ngi la shim ïa ka rai rangbah, ngi ïohi ïa ka jingthrang jong ki paidbah ïa ka jingkylla,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong, “haba ïadei bad ka jingthaw ïa ka sorkar ha u snem 2023; kumba ka long mynta ka paw shai ba ka don ka jingthrang ha kaba ki paidbah ki wan ban ïashim bynta bad kumba ka long mynta, nga kular ba kum ka seng saiñ pyrthei ha ka jylla, ka dei tang kane ka seng TMC ka ban lah ban shimti ïa ka jingsynshar, ba ïaid beit, ïaid ryntih.”Na ka liang u Dr. Mukul u la ong ruh ba dei ki paidbah kiba wad ïa ka jingkylla. U la ong ba kumba ka long mynta, ka TMC ka kiew bha da ka jingwan ban ïashim bynta jong ki paidbah sha ki jingïalang bapher bapher jong ka seng.Haba ïadei bad ka jingmih noh jong ki MLA ka seng bad ka jingpynïasoh jong ki sha kiwei pat ki seng; na ka liang u Dr. Mukul u la ong, “ngam kwah ban jer kyrteng mano ba leit shano; kine ki dei kiba lah don jingmut lypa naduh nyngkong bad ki lah dep shim ruh ïa ka rai.”“Ngi tip ïa kane bad ngi ruh ngi don la ka jong ka bynta kumno ban leh; kumba ngi ong uwei ne ar ne lai ki nongmihkhmat ki don kiba kwah ban kynriah ym tang na ka TMC hynrei na kiwei ruh,” la bynrap u Dr. Mukul Sangma.“Ngi lah tip katno ngut ki MLA na ka TMC kin rai ban leit pynïasoh sha kiwei pat ki seng, na ki daw bapher bapher. Ki don ki daw kiba na ka liang ka TMC ruh ka la rai ban wad da kiwei pat ki kyrtong, namar kam lah ban long ba baroh ki MLA kin ïoh ïa ka tiket na ka seng, bad ban jop ngi dei ban shai halor kane,” la ong u Dr. Mukul Sangma.“Baroh ki MLA kin ïakynduh jingeh bad hap ban trei shitom ban ïoh jingjop biang; kata ka dei ka jingshisha. Katno ngut kiba long MLA kim shym la lah shuh ban jop ha u snem 2018. Dei halor kine ba na ka liang ka seng ka la shim ïa ka rai ha ki katto katne ki konstitwensi ba ngi hap ban shim da kiwei ki lad bad ban buh da uwei pat u kyrtong,” u la ong.Shuh shuh u Dr. Mukul u la ïathuh ba ka TMC ka lah dep don ki kyrtong ha kito ki konstitwensi ba lah dep mih noh ki MLA jong ka bad u la ong ba kine ki kyrtong kin jop suk ïa ka elekshon ha u 2023.
title: Ym baroh ki MLA TMC kin ïoh tiket ban ïakhun ïa ka elekshon ha u 2023: Dr. Mukul Sangma

content: Ka jaitbynriew ka dei ka kynhun u khun bynriew kaba mih na kajuh ka tynrai ne ka thymmei longïing longsem, longdoh longsnam. Ka jingnangroi nangheh nangiar parum pareh jong ka longïing kiba na kajuh ka thymmei long bynriew ka pynsan ia ki suki pa suki ban long ka jaidbynriew. Kumta ngi shem ki briew kiba dei na kajuh ka ktien ka thylliej, ki don kajuh ka deity, ki juh ki riti ki dustur ka niam ka rukom bad kumta ter ter.Ia uwei pa uwei la kha ha ka jaitbynriew bad kata ka jaidbynriew na kaba u hiar long bynriew ka dei ka doh ka snam bad ka jait ka kynja jong u hi, ha kaba u ïa im ïa shong lang ha kajuh ka ri.Ka kamram bad ka jingkitkhlieh jong uwei pa uwei na ngi ïa la ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew kam shym ïa pher eiei ruh em na ka ka kamram bad ka jingkitkhlieh kaba ngi don na ka bynta ïalade bad ïa ka ïing ka sem. Khlem ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka long rynieng bad ka long bynriew jongngi shimet ka long lehnohei, kam donbor bad ka kut noh tang ha haw haw. Hangne ngan wanrah katto katne ki bynta kiba long kiba kamram kiba ngi dei ban leh ha ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew bad kita ki long:-Ka jingieid ïa la ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew kam shym ïa pher na kaba ieid ïalade bad ïa la ka ïing ka sem namar ba ka jaitbynriew ka dei hi ka doh ka snam bad ka jait ka kynja jongngi hi. Lada ngim ieid ïa la ka ri. Hato kata kam dei ka jingisih ïalade hi? Lada ngi kwah ban sngewthuh kham bha ïa ka jingieid ri, ngi dei ban thew da u dieng pruh jong ka jingieid ïalade bad ïa la ka ïing ka sem.Ka ïing ne ka longïing ka dei ka jingsdang jong kiei kiei baroh. Kaba bha baroh ka sdang na ïing. Ha kajuh ka rukom ka jingieid ïa la ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew ka sdang na ki rympei ïing. Kane ka kynthup ïa ka jinghikai jong ki kmie ki kpa ne ki longkmie longkpa ïa la ki khun ki kti ha ka liang ka jingkitkhlieh, ka jingieid ïa la ka jong ka iing kata ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban leh bha, ban pynbha bad ban tei ïa la ka ïing ka sem ha ki liang baroh.Ka jingieid kaba ngi don ïa la ka ïing ka sem ka pynmih ia ka sap jong ka jingieid ïa la ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew. Kata ka jingieid kaba ngi don ïa la ka ri ka kyrsoi bad pynlong ïa ngi ban don ïa la ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban pynbha bad ban tei ïa ka. Yn ym lah ban don ka jingieid ïa la ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew khlem ka jingieid ïa la ka jaidbynriew bad ïa la ka ri. Kine baroh ar ki ïa iaid ryngkat namar ba ki dei ki juh kiei kiei kiba mih na kajuh ka sap tynrai jong ka longbriew manbriew.Ka jingsngew bad ka jingkhim mynsiem kaba tang ha nga bad tang ma nga ka long kawei na ki dawbah kaba pynran dien bad kaba pyntroiñ ïa ka jaitbynriew. Ka jingsngew bad ka jingpyrkhat tang na ka bynta la ka jong ka met ne na ka bynta ïalade marwei kam lah ban tei jingbha eiei ruh em. Hynrei ka ïalam sha ka jingpyntroin bad ka jingpynjot ïa ka jaitbynriew. Hooid ka long kaba shisha bad kaba dei eh ba ngin pyrkhat na ka bynta ïalade, hynrei wat ai ba kata ka jingsngew kan poi palat ïa u pud jong ka. Ngi dei ban don ka mynta bad ka jingpyrkhat na ka bynta ka jingbha bad ka jingbiang jong kiwei pat kiba ha ïing ba ha sem na ka bynta ki para doh para snam ha ka jylli jong ka jaitbynriew. Wat lada dei ban duh noh ïalade na ka bynta ka jingbha lang jong baroh.Ka mynsiem ban ai bad shakri ka dei ka kamram ba kongsan tam jong uwei pa uwei baroh na ngi na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew jongngi. Ka jingkhraw ka shong ha ka jingkhraw mynsiem jong ki briew jong kata ka jaitbynriew hi bad kata ka jingkhraw mynsiem ka dei ka jingkloi ban ai bad ban shakri.Kane ka kynthup ïa ka jinglen lade, ka jingaiti, kaba ai da ki jingai kaba trei da ki kam, na ka bynta ban tei ïa la ka jaidbynriew. Ka jinglen lade bad ka jingaiti ïalade na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka long ka jingieid ri kaba khraw bad ba kynsai tam. Ka mynsiem jingaiti lut bad ka jinglen lade ka long kaba kordor katta katta bym lah ban ïa nujor bad ka ksiar ne rupa lane bad kano kano ka spah ba kynja pyrthei. Don ha ka, ka burom bah kaba pynsah nam bad pynim kyrteng ïa ki riew len lade jong ka jaitbynriew jong ki kiba kum kita ki ioh ïa ka jingïaroh bad jingpyrto junom la junom.Ka kamram bad ka jingshakri ïa la ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka don ka dor kaba khraw bad kaba khia katta katta. Ha ka jingshisha ka jingtheh lut bad jingaiti lut ïalade na ka bynta ka jingbha bad ka jingbit jong ka jaitbynriew, ka dei u thied snam jong ka jingim bad jingsam jong ka. Khlem kane ka mynsiem kano kano ka jaitbynriew kam lah ban im slem bad iai sah ha sla pyrthei namar ba kim don lane ba ki duna ka mynsiem jingshakri bad jingaiti lut. Ka jingshakri ïa la ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ka dawa ïa ngi ba ngin leh eiei kaba bha ïa la ka jaitbynriew, kumno ban tei ia ka ha ka jinglong jingim ka burom ka akor ka tipbriew tipblei ka ioh ka kot ka man bha bad ka roi ka par na ka bynta ka jingbit bad jingkhlaiñ jong ka ha ki liang baroh.Namarkata ai ba ngin long kiba khraw mynsiem da ka jinglah kloi ban ai ïalade sha ka jingshakri jaitbynriew. Ia ngin thom pyrshah ïa ka jingkhim mynsiem jong ka jingsngew ne jingpyrkhat shimet ba tang ïalade.
title: Ka jingshakri ïa la ka ri bad ka Jaitbynriew ka dawa ïa ngi ba ngin leh eiei kaba bha na ka bynta ka ri

content: U President ka Hills Farmer Union (HFU), u Bah Commander Shangpliang hynnin ka sngi ka  29 tarik Lber, 2023, u la ïoh ban  plie pyrda ïa ka Annual School Sports Meet, 2023 jong ka St. Mary’s Higher Secondary School, Rangblang South West Khasi Hills District  kaba la pynlong ha madan ïakehkai jong kane hi ka skul.Ha Kane ka sngi hashwa ban sdang ïa ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher na ki khynnah skul la ïoh ban pynlong  ïa ka jingïalang ba lyngkot ha kaba u Bah Commander Shangpliang  kum u kongsan u la ïoh ruh ban pynher ïa ka lama jong ka skul. La ïoh ban pynsngew ruh ïa ka Jingrwai jong Skul (school anthem) , St. Mary’s Rangblang. Hadien la ïoh ban pynlong sa ïa ka March Pass ha kaba ki khynnah skul na la ki jong ki jong ki House  kiba  la wan ban ïashimbynta, bad ka jingbam smai ba la ïalam da ka Emierbahun Ïawphniaw ryngkat kiwei pat ki khynnah.Ha kajuh ka por  la ïoh ruh  ka jingkren lyngkot na u Parish Priest jong ka Rangblang Parish, u Rev. Fr. A. Rongrin bad kumjuh na u kongsan, Bah Commander, kiba la ai mynsiem ïa ki khynnah skul ba kin trei shitom bad buh ïa ka thong ha ka jingim khnang ba kin long kiba jop.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi  ba ka la long shisha kaba i shongkun bad kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntieh lyngba da ki jing ïashim bynta ki khynnah skul ha kiba bun ki jait jing ïalehkai ha ka jing ïa donlang ruh ka Headmistress jong ka skul, Kong Maria Swer, ki nonghikai bad kumjuh ki kmie ki kpa kiba la wan sakhi ïa kane ka tamasa ïalehkai ba shisien shisnem jong ki khynnah skul.
title: Plie pyrda u Bah C.Shangpliang ïaka Annual School Sport Meet 2023 ka St.Mary’s H.S.S Rangblang

content: SHILLONGKa Talent Identification program lane ka program kaba ïit ne wad ïa ki khynnah don sap kala ïaid sha ka wat kaba ar (Phase 2) kaba long ha ka 29 tarik March 2023, ha Little Flower School, Sahsniang, Laskien C&RD Block, West Jaintia Hills District, ïa kane ka program la pynbeit da ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association, Dept of Sports & Youth Affairs, Govt of Meghalaya, ha ryngkat ka kynhun MSOA – ArmsPT(Edge10) – Sportality Group ka la test kumba 312 ngut ki samla kynthup saw tylli ki skul, ka Little Flower HS School, Evershine Sec School, Kymprup HS School bad Shalom School.Ha kane ka sngi la lap katto katne ngut ki samla na kitei ki skul kiba ka bor mareh ka ïajan bad ka sap international global standard, kata ha ka jingmareh ha ka 20M sprint bad la mareh 3.1 sekhon katba ka global speed ka long 3sekhon bad la don ruh kiba ba la mareh 2.6 sekhon kaba dei ka international global speed ha ka 10M speed ladder run. La thew ïa kitei ki samla baroh da ki timing gates ki jump mats ki tiar na ri phareng kiba rem dor kiba la pyndonkam da ki nongïalehkai Olympics.Lyngba kane ka program la lah lap ïa ki sap kiba kyrpang na ka bynta baroh ki jait jingïalehkai sports. Kane ka rukom wad sap lah ruh ban sngewthuh kano ka jingïalehkai kan long kaba biang ïa ki samla ban pynkhreh khnang ba kin poi sha ka thong jong ka Olympics.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ka phase-1 la dep test ha u Naitung 2022 kumba 4541 ngut na baroh ki 12 distrik bad la shah jied kumba 200 ngut kiban sha hikai kyrpang ha ki briew kiba la tbit (expert) kumno ban nang pynbha ïa la ki jingïalehkai ban ïoh ban sei ïa ki sap kyrpang lyngba ka sap ki riewstad Olympic. Namar ka jingseisoh jong kane ka rukom wad ïa ki sap ka sorkar ka la phah ïa ka MSOA ban pynlong ïa ka program ha ki block bad la bthah ban test shiphew hajar ngut ki samla. Haduh kane ka sngi la dep test kumba 4300 ngut hapoh khasi jaintïa bad ka program kan dang bteng sha kiwei kiwei ki C&RD block ka jylla Meghalaya.Ki 200 ngut ki samla kiba shah jied ha ka phase-1 ki la nang ïaid ha ka jingshah hikai kaba kyrpang naduh u bnai February 2023 bad kin wan poi ha Shillong ha ka EPP Camp ka ban long hapoh NEHU SAI Campus, naduh 1tarik haduh 3  Ïaiong 2023 ha kaba ki ‘riewpaw jong ka Olympics kin sa don ban khmih bniah ïa ka jingshah hikai kitei ki samla ha ka jingïadonlang ryngkat ki longheh jong ka tnad Sports and Youth Affairs jong ka sorkar Meghalaya.
title: Jam ka jingïit sap  jong ka MSOA sha ka wat kaba ar

content: U nongïalam ka Trinamool Congress Meghalaya uba dei ruh u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah ha ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka jylla, u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong, “haba ngi peit ïa ki mat kiba ïadei bad ki kam lehnoh, ka donkam ban don ka jingïakren; ngi dei ban ïaroh ha kawei ka bynta, haba ka sorkar ka pyrshang ban don ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka seng HNLC”.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong, “ngi ruh ngi kwah ban ïohi ha ka por jong ngi; la ki nongïalam ka HNLC ki thrang shisha lane ka HNLC ruh kan long kumba ngi ïohi ïa ka ANVC. Ka sorkar kan shim por ban ïakren ïasuk namar kan hap ban peit bha.”“Ha ka por jong ngi ruh, ngi la pyrshang ban wanrah ïa ka HNLC, sha ka miej ban ïakren ïasuk hynrei ka shim por. Ka bha shibun ba mynta ki la sdang ban ïakren biang, hynrei kaei kaba ki leh; nga sheptieng ïoh kan wanrah ïa ka jingbymshaniah shuh na ka seng,” la ong u Dr. Mukul Sangma.U la bynrap da kaba ong, “ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban shimkhia bad ban pynpaw shai ïa ki mat jingdawa kiba la thoh khnang ba yn lah ban ïaid shakhmat ha kane ka jingïakren ïasuk.”U Dr. Mukul u la ong ruh ba katba ka jingïakren ïasuk ka dang ïaid, ka sorkar ka dei ban weng shuwa ïa baroh ki mokotduma kiba la ujor pyrshah ïa ka HNLC, ‘tad haduh ban da dep ban ïasoi ïa ka soskular’.“Nga sheptieng ba ïoh kine kin dei ka bynta ka ban pynlong ïa ka jingduh jingshaniah. Kumba donkam ïa ka jingshaniah wat ha ka ïing ka sem, kumjuh ruh ha ka imlang ka sahlang. Kumta ka sorkar ka dei ban don ka jingshaniah bad kaei kaba ki shim haba ïadei bad kano kano ka mat, ki dei ban shimkhia ban ïohi ïa u soh ka jingjop,” la bynrap u Dr. Mukul Sangma.
title: Dei ban weng shuwa ïa ki mokotduma katba dang ïakren ïasuk: Dr. Mukul Sangma

content: Na ka bynta kito ki nongpule kotkhubor ki bym smat lane ki bym pat shang kylleng kylleng ban ïohi, ban tip bad ban mad ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ki briew bad jingitynnat ka mariang ha ki shnong ki thaw jong ka Ri Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo, sngewdei ban ai jingmut ïa phi ban leit sha ki shnong jong ka thain War Jaiñtia, War Hima Khyrim, War Hima Sohra, War Hima Mawsynram, War Hima Maharam, War Hima Langrin bad ka thaiñ Nongtrai jong ka Hima Langrin bad ka thaiñ Nongtrai jong ka Hima Nongstoin, ha ka por Synrai. Ki shnong jong ka thaiñ Mawrok ha Hima Rambrai ruh ki long ki jaka kiba bitdor bad kiba itynnat bha ban leit jngoh kai, bam lyer bad ban tip ïa ki jinglong jingman jong ki briew.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka bynta, une u Nongthoh u la leit jurip ïa ka shnong Mawpon. Kane ka shnong ka don kumba 15 km shathie na Nongstoin bad ka hap hapoh ka Hima Nongstoin Syiemship, West Khasi Hills District. Lada leit sha kane ka shnong (Mawpon) na Nongstoin hap ban leit da ka Kali Bolero Pick-up na Nongstoin sha Nongpyndeng, sha lad Nongsba, sha Risiang, kam ïa ka Wah Umiang sha kadiang ban poi ha Nongmynraw, nangta sa poi ha Mawpon.Ki pud sawdong jong Kane ka shnong jong kane ka shnong ki long; Shatei ïa khap bad ka shnong Nongmynraw, shathie ïa khap bad ka wah Kynshi, Mihngi ïa khap bad ka wah Kynshi bad ka shnong Sangriang, Sepngi ïa khap bad ka shnong Maweitksar. Ki shnong kiba ïa jan bad ka shnong Mawpon ki dei ka Maweitksar, Mawlangriang, Nongmynraw, Nongriangpoit, Nongthymmai, Mawpharduh, Mawkynjoin bad Sangriang.Kane ka shnong Mawpon, kaba la kynjoh 100 snem, ka don 70 tylli ki tnum ïing bad ki khlieh briew ki don  240 ngut ki shynrang bad 280 ngut ki kynthei, baroh ki don 520 ngut. Ha shnong ki don ar tylli ki Balang (niam), ka Balang Presbyterian 29 tnum ïing bad ka Balang Katholik 41 tnum ïing. Ki skul ki don ar tylli, ka L.P deficit bad ka SSA U.P, ha baroh ar ki don 59 ngut ki khynnah skul bad ki nonghikai ki don 6 ngut. Kiba la pass B.A ki don 2 ngut bad kiba la pyndep ïa ka Matrik ki don 35 ngut.La seng ïa kane ka shnong da ki lai kynthei, ka Niawni Puwein, ka Riwir Puwein bad ka Laipyrdi Puwein kiba la kam ïa ka khyndew bah ba la khot ka Khyndew Puwein. Hadien la wan mih pateng sa ka Niewshong Marshra, ka Pahshong Puwein, ka Liarksan Sohphoh, ka Monpah Puwein, ka Laipyrdi Puwein bad ka pharmuit Marshra bad hadien shuh shuh la wan hiar pateng sa ka Perimai Puwein, ka Helina Puwein bad ka Iawni Puwein, kiba dang im haduh mynta mynne, lait noh ka Niawni Puwein kaba la khlad noh ha ka snem 2011.Lait noh tang 2 tnum ïing kiba kamai ha ki kam khaïi bad trei sorkar, kiwei ki 68 tnum ïing ki dei ki BPL lane kiba duk bad kyrduh bha. Ka kam jong kiba bun ki long ïing ka dei ka kam rep. Ki rep riewhadem, Phanmungor, Phankaro, Phandieng, Shriew, Sying, Sohngang, Sohkhia, Pathaw, Nei, bun jait ki Sohmynken,  Tyrso, Sohjew, Sohñiamtra, Sohpriam, Sohiong, Kait, Sohkynphor bad kiwei, tangba ki jait soh kim da man bha ba bam khniang bad iaptram ki diengsoh. La kham bun tylli ki snem ki mar rep kim da long namar ba la ktah ka mariang bad ha ka snem ba leit namar ba jur u slap ki jingkheit ki la julor palat.Nalor ba rep ïa ki mar rep, ki don  kumba, 5 ngut ki nongri masi, khyndiat ruh kiba ri blang, Jan baroh ki ri syiar khasi mar mar 9-12 tylli shi tnum ïing ban bam doh bad ban die, ki don kumba 4 ngut kiba nang ban ai kynbat puh bseiñ, dait ksew, dait miaw bad kiwei ki mrad lane  lada don ka proi, mynsaw, kem prum, ur bad kheiñ shyieng, don 2 ngut ki nongpynkha khun, don ruh 3 ngut kiba tbit ban thaiñ khoh, star, kriah, shang, ruh, shylliah thri ban shoh kba, thain knub, prah, mula, shylliah siej, shylliah tyra, shylliah thiar kiba bad kiwei kiwei, suh jaiñ tang 1, shnong dukan ha Nongstoiñ kumba 10 ngut bad ki nongkhwai dohkha ha Wah Kynshi kiba ioh dohkha shibun ban bam bad ban die ha iew Nongstoin. Ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong ki la ïathuh ha une u nongthoh khubor ba ha ki khlaw ba kham pajih na shnong, kynthup ha ki khlaw ha ranab bad ki riat jong ka Wahkynshi, ki dang don ki sniang khlaw, ki syiar khlaw, ki ñiuhrei, ki Sim babun jait bad ha ki katto katne ki jaka dang don ki Khiat ruh. Ki la ïathuh ruh ba ha ka snem 2009 ka la don ka jingphuh syntiew ki siej bad la wan mih shibun ki khnai kiba bam ïa ki syntiew siej bad ki la pynjot ruh ïa ki jingthung jingtep ba la wanrah ïa ka jingduh ka ba jur ha ki nongrep.Haba kren halor ki jingiarap jong ka sorkar ki rangbah bad ki longkmie jong ka shnong ki la ïathuh ba ka don kawei ka Anganwadi bad ka Anganwadi Helper kiba ïarap ïa ki khynnah ha shnong ban pynkmen bad pynsngewthuh katba lah halor bun kiei kiei bad ban sam ïa jingbam tei met. Halor ka koit ka khiah jong ki khynnah bad ki kynthei ba dang armet bad dang aibuin ym don Asha ha shnong ban ïa khmih lem. Ki khynnah ba 6 bai haduh, 3 snem ki don 35 ngut bad kiba 3 snem haduh 6 snem ki don 45 ngut. La jar katta ruh ki don tengkhat ki ANM ki wan ban ai injek ha shnong, la ïathuh ki rangbah bad ki longkmie. Ki la ïathuh ruh ba ka Sub-Centre ka don ha Mawkadiang kaba jngai kumba 15 km da ka kjat na shnong bad kumba 18 km da ka kjat sha Civil Hospital kaba ha Mawïaban.Haba phai biang sha ka jingkner ne khlem kner ka sorkar, ki la ïathuh ba ka PWD kam pat ai surok ïa ki, ka PHE ruh kam pat leh ei ei ïa ka shnong, ka Agriculture, Horticulture, Soil bad Water Conservation, Water Resources, Forest, Veterinary, Sericulture, Fishery bad kiwei kiwei ki tnat sorkar kim pat pynjaw ei ei ïa ka shnong. Tang ka Education, Social Welfare, ka ICDS bad ka C& RD ki la kham kner da ki skhim bapher bapher.Kaba sngew sangsot ïa ki nongshongshnong hangne ka long ba shiteng na ki, kim don khyndew lajong hynrei ki dei ki Nongshongsap lane ki nongshongthap. Kine ki dei na ka kur Marshra, Marshillong, Iawlar bad  Sohphoh. Tang ka kur Puwein kaba long ka trai khyndew ha Mawpon. Kaba sngewsih jur ka long ba hapoh kane ka Kur, ka don hapdeng ka Mokutduma ba ïa knieh ïa ka jinglongtrai halor kane ka khyndew kur. Ki nongshongshnong ki la ïathuh ba kane ka la sdang naduh 1992- 1993 bad ka dang bteng haduh mynta , kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingïakynat ka ba jur ha shnong ha thaw bad ka la ktah ruh wat ïa ka jingpalei mynsiem jong kiwei ki kur.Ki jingeh kiba ka shnong Mawpon ka dang ïa kynduh haduh mynta ki long halor ka kam Sordar lane ka kam Rangbah shnong. La kynnoh ba u Sordar shnong u ba mynta um kit satia ïa ka khia ka shon jong ka shnong bad bun ki jingmyntoi kiba ka shnong ka dei ban ioh, ka la duh non bad bun ki kam shnong ki la pulom noh namar um ju don ha shnong hynrei u sah lynter ha Nongstoin ba u hap ban korbar ïa ka business lajong. Bun bah ki kam kiba ïa dei bad ki bor sorkar ha ki kam pynroi pynsan jong ka shnong, ka shnong la shu duh ei. Bun ki briew jong ka shnong ki la ong ba ka la bha shibun ïa u ban resign noh na ka kam ban ym long ka diengpyngkiang ïa ki kam shnong.Ki jingeh kiba kham kongsan jong ka shnong ki long ka jingbym don surok PWD. Mynta ka don tang ka surok jong ki trok four-wheel ba kit dieng supply bad rnga ha ki snem kiba mynshuwa.Mynta tang ki Bolero Pick-up (four-wheel) kiba lah ban poi sha shnong lyngba Kane ka surok khlaw, kata ruh ba la ïarap da ka skhim 100 sngi (NERGS) hangne hangtai. Ka skhim umbam umdih na ka PHE ruh kam don satia ha shnong katta ruh la 48 snem naduh ba ioh jylla lajong. Ia mynta ki nongshongshnong ki ioh um na ki katto katne ki wahduid kiba tyrkhong noh ha ki bnai tlang. Don ruh ki tnum ïing kiba shu ioh um ma dei mata na ki tyllong um na ki lawbniap kiba pajih bha.Ha ki bnai  slap pat (April – September) ka shnong ka ïoh umslap. Sa kawei pat ka jingeh ha shnong ka dei ka ding ilektrik. Ki Post ilektrik ki la don, ki sainar ki la dep teh pynpur ka Transformer ruh la dep pyndait hynrei ka ding ilektrik kam don namar la sniew ka Mashin (Transformer). Ki paidbah jong ka shnong  ki kyntu ïa ka MeECL ban wan ai noh ïa ka ding ilektrik ban lait na ka jingshong dum. Na ka  liang jong ka koit ka khiah ruh ki paidbah nongshong ki la ud bha namar kim don ki lad jingiarap kiba jan ban ioh ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah. Kumta ki kyrpad jur ïa ki bor sorkar ban buh noh ïa ka PHC ha Risiang lane ha thaiñ ba kham jan ban ioh jingmyntoi lem kiba ha ka thaiñ Nongtrai. Ki jingpang kiba kynrei ha shnong jong ki dei ka Flu, prie-pynhiar, Suhot, Malaria, ka bampong ha ki khyndiat ngut. La ïathuh ruh ba bun ba bun ba la kha khun ha hospital.Na ka liang ki nongmihkhmat ki MP, MLA, MDC, ki rangbah bad longkmie ki la ïathuh ba baroh ki MP Kim shym la ïarap skhim ei ei ruh. U MLA u la ïarap 5 kg u khaw shi ïing bad u MDC 2 kg. Ha ka jingai rashon la ai khaw AAY tang shi ïing, khaw PHH 42 ïing bad u khaw non-NFSA 29 ïing. Ka shnong ka khlem ioh ei ei shuh lait noh tang u khaw. Ki la kynnoh ruh ba wat ha ka jingai khaw ruh ki nongmihkhmat ki leh politics. Ki la ïathuh ruh ba u MLA ba mynta um pat wan jngoh ïa ka shnong jong ki wat hadien 3 snem ruh.Ha ka liang ki Mobile service pat kane ka shnong Mawpon ka ioh network na ka Jio Tower ha Mawlangriang bad ha Sangriang bad nangta na ka Cell One Tower ha Mawnar, Nongpyndeng bad Umdohlun.Ki kur kiba don ha kane ka shnong ki dei ka Puwein, Marshra, Iawlar, Sohphoh bad ka Marshillong.Kane ka shnong ka long kawei na ki shnong Nongtrai. Ka long kawei na ki shnong Nongtrai kaba itynnat bha ha ka mariang. Ka shnong ka don hajan tmier jong ka riatbah kaba noh sha Wah Kynshi ha kaba la mut ban den ïa ka Kynshi Stage-I Hydel Project jong ka kompeni Athena bad kaba khlem seisoh ei ei.Ka area naduh shnong shaduh phang sepngi bad shaduh phang shatei ka long ka pyntha phlang ba ka pynitynnat shuh sbuh da ka jingdon ki wahduid kiba don dohthli bad shalynnai bad hateng hateng ki lawlynnong bad ki lawbniap. Namar ba ka long padun kum ka jin kulai bad kaba kynjang, nangne lah ban iohi ia bun ki bynta jong ka Ri Lyngngam, ki syntai lum jong ka South West Khasi Hills kum u Kohtyllaw, u Kubuit, Kubah, u Niangram, syntai lum Wahkaji-Umjarain, u Kyllailyngsngun bad u syntai lum Ngundilang. Lah ruh ban iohi ïa u lum Mawthadraishan bad bun ki bynta jong ka West Khasi Hills. Oh ka dei ka jaka kaba paka tam ban wan kai ki nongshang pyrthei  lane ka jaka ba shnong ki blei.
title: Ka Shnong Mawpon, Nongstoiñ Syiemship, West Khasi Hills “Jingtip ngi wad sawdong pyrthei, jingtip la shnong ngim tip eiei”

content: Ki nongshong shnong ka Mawbah, Mylliem Syiemship kiba la palat 18 snem ka rta kynthup kynthei bad shynrang ki la jied ïa u Bah Aresstone Thabah kum u Rangbah Shnong ba thymmai kane ka shnong lyngba ka elekshon ba la pynlong ha ka 03 tarik u Jylliew, 2023 ha Tender Child Secondary School katkum ka Rule 10 (3) jong ka Administrative of Mylliem Syiemship Rules, 2015 of the KHAD( Appointment and Succession of Syiem, Deputy Syiem, Electors and Rangbah Shnong of Mylliem Syiemship) Act, 2007.Ka jingjied ia u Rangbah Shnong ba thymmai ka la ïaid beit ïaid ryntih wat la kala don ka jingïa nia hapdeng ki arkynhun, hynrei tang hadien kato katne por la lah ban tem ia ka bad ka jingthep vote ka la bteng biang.Ki arngut ki kyrtong kiba mih ban ia khun ia ka  kam Rangbah Shnong ki dei u bah Aresstone Thabah bad u bah Kishan Nongkynrih.Hadien ba ka jingthep vote ka la dep ki la pynlong da ka jingianiew vote ha kaba ki arliang mamla ki la don bynta lang  bad ha kane ka jingïañiew vote u bah Thabah u la ïoh 218 vote katba u ba la ïakhun pyrshah na ka bynta kane ka kam Rangbah Shnong u Bah Kishan Nongkynrih pat u la ioh 126 vote. Ia ka result la pynbna da u Rangbah Shnong barim u bah David Syiemlieh.Haba kren sha ki paidbah hadien ba ki la dep ban ñiew ia ka vote u bah Kishan u la ai khublei ia ki paidbah kiba la kyrshan ia u wat la um shym la ioh ka jop hynrei kin ia treilang na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ka shnong ka thaw.Na ka liang u Rangbah Shnong bathymmai u bah Aresstone Thabah haba kren sha ki paidbah u la ong kane ka jingjop ka dei ka jingjop jong u paidbah, u la kyntu ia baroh ba kin ia treilang kum ki nongshong shnong.“Ngi don la kajong ka liang hynrei haba ngi kyrshan ïa la ujong u briew uba ngi kyrshan hynrei kane kam mut ba ngin ia leh pyrshah sah, ngin ia treilang na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka shnong ka thaw,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ba ma u bad u bah Nongkynrih kin ia trei ryngkat ryngkat ban kyntiew ia ka shnong ka thaw la ka dei ha kano kano ka bynta.Na ka liang ki paidbah ki la pynkup burom ia u Rangbah Shnong ba thymmai bad ïaid saw dong ka shnong ka thaw ha ryngkat ka put ka tem.
title: Da u Bah Aresstone Thabah jied ki nongshong shnong kum u Rangbah Shnong ba thymmai ka DS Mawbah

content: Ka Khliehiongriang ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka 3 poiñ ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Luti Tuber SW na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai. Ïa kane ka jingïalehkai la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ïa ka kol na ka bynta ka Khliehiongriang la ïoh ban thep da u Same Dkhar haka minit ha ka minit ba 50 bad 90+1, u Arwan Dkhar haka minit ba 73 bad u Founder Passah ha ka minit ba 79.Katba na ka bynta ka Luti Tuber SW la ïoh ban thep da u Ribait Lhuid ha ka minit ba 9 bad u Baiahluti Dhar haka minit wa 15.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 30 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Moosalyngkat pyrshah ïa ka Wahiajer ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi.
title: Pynliem ka Khliehiongriang ïa ka Luti Tuber da 4 kol

content: Ka jingïalehkai jong ka lympung Super Division ka Amlarem Sub-Divisional Sports Association ka la ïaid mynta sha ka shi ba hynñiew ha kaba ka Seinbhalang Shkentalang FC ka la pynliem ïa ka Dongmihsngi Mupyut da 1-0, ïa kane ka lympung la pynïaid da ka West Jainta District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai.Ka Seinbhalang Shkentalang ka la khur ïa ka 3 poiñ ha kane ka jingïakhun ba nyngkong jong ki mynta ka aiom lyngba ka kol jong u Isac Surong uba la thep mar syn sdang ka jingïalehkai, kata ha ka minit ba 2.Ka jingïakhun na ka bynta kane ka lympung yn bteng biang ha ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ka Amlarem SC kan ïa aireng pyrshah ïa ka Umladkhur SC.
title: Super Division Amlarem: Da shi kol liem ka Mupyut ha ka Seinbhalang lyngba ka shi kol jong u Isac

content: Naduh ki nongmareh kai step haduh ki khynnah skul, ki nongtrei ophis haduh ki nongleit thied jingthied, ki nongleit nongwan ha kane ka jylla ki la mad jingeh na ka daw jong ka jingsniew palat ki surok.Baroh kawei ka sor Shillong, bad khamtam ha ki jaka kum ha Nongthymmai, Garikhana bad Demseiniong, ha kaba ki nongleit nongwan ki mad jingeh haba ki ïaid na surok; ha kaba da ki pulit pynïaid ïa ki kali(traffic policemen) ki hap shimkhia hi ban maramot ïa ki surok ba bun ka thliew.Na ka bynta kane, u vice president ka jylla na ka seng BJP Meghalaya, u Bah Wankitbok Pohshna u la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar jylla ba kan shimkhia mar mar, khnang ba ki nongshong shnong kin lah ban pynleit jingmut ha ka ban leit la ki jingtrei jingktah jong ki ha ka jaka ba kin tuklar ïa ki surok ba long thliew ha ki shnong jong ki.U Pohshna u la ong kumne, “Ngi sngewthuh ba ha kum kane ka jylla kaba la mad ïa ka jingjur u slap ha ka pyrthei, ha kaba ka jingmaramot ïa ki surok ka long ka kam ba eh.”“Hynrei, lem bad ka jingthmu ba biang na ka bynta ban maramot mar mar ïa ki surok, kane ka jingtuklar jong ki paidbah ka lah ban pynduna bad kan pynkut noh ïa ki jingeh baroh. Ngi ngeit ba dei ban don ka pisa noh synñiang la ka jong na ka bynta ban maramot mar mar ïa ki surok kiba la julor na ka por sha ka por ne ha ka jingshah lynshop ha ka mariang. Ka long kaba kyndit ba wat haba biang lut ki tiar ki tar, hynrei ka tnad ba dei peit ka dang don jingthmu ban pynbiang, ha kaba kum ka jingmaramot ba malu mala ïa ki surok kan trei mar mar bad ka jingpynslem ka lah ban pynsangeh noh ïa ka jingmaramot ïa ki surok ban pyntreikam. Lada ym pyntreikam ïa ka jingmaramot barit baria jong ki surok, te ka jingeh kan nang jur, ha kaba ka jinglut jingsep na ka bynta ban maramot ïa ki surok kan sa khia ïa ka pla ka tyngka jong ka sorkar,” ong u Pohshna, uba la pynkynmaw kawei ka jingong ba ong kumne, lada peit ïa ka kam ha ka por ba biang, ka lah ban pynduna ïa ka jingeh.“Kum ka nongkyrshan jong ka sorkar MDA, ka BJP ruh ka kloi ban pynkhreh ban ïatreilang bad kiwei pat ki paralok na ka bynta ban pynïoh ïa ka Meghalaya ka jylla ba biang. Lem bad ka jingtrei shitom, ngi lah ban pynthikna ba yn nym don kano kano ka thliew ha ki surok khnang ba ki paidbah kin lah ban rakhe ïa ka Khristmas,” ong u Pohshna.
title: Kynthoh ka seng BJP halor ka jingsniew ki surok ha ka jylla

content: Ka Mawkriah West  SC ka la ïoh ban jam sha ka semi final jong ka lympung SSA 4th DIVISION Football League 2023, lyngba ka jingpynliem ïa ka Mawkasiang ha ka jingïalehkai quarter final ba 3.Katei ka jingïoh lad ka Mawkriah kadei hadien ba ka jingïakhun ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid da 0-0, kumta lyngba ka jingïoh kabu da ka penalty, ka Mawkriah ka la jam sha ka semi final lyngba ka jingjop da 4-3.Da katei ka jingjop, ka Mawkriah ka la kylla long ka kynhun ba lai ban ïoh rung (qualified) sha kane ka lympung, kata hadien ka Kharang SC bad Ïatyllilang SC.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi kan long hapdeng ka Madan SCC bad Lamlynti FC ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: 4th Division : Rung ka Mawkriah West sha ka semi final

content: U Chief Secretary ka jylla Meghalaya, u Bah DP Wahlang, ha ka 14 tarik Ïaïong u la ïathuh ba ka Wahumkhrah bad ka Wah Umshyrpi ha Shillong ki dei ki wah kiba hap ha ka thup jong ki 45 tylli ki wah kiba jakhlia tam ha ka Ri, kumba la pynrung da ka National Green Tribunal (NGT).U Bah Wahlang u la ong ïa kane ha ka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha Yojana Bhawan Shillong halor ka jingpynthymmai bad ka jingpynbha ïa ki wah kiba kongsan ka Shillong kiba kynthup ïa ka Wahumkhrah, ka Wah Umshyrpi bad ka Wah Umkhen, ha kaba la ïadon ryngkat u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma bad ki dkhot jong ki dorbar shnong, bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki seng ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ban pynbeit ïa kane, u Bah Wahlang u la ong ba kane ka kam kan long kaba shim por bad yn ym lah ban buh por ïa ka jingpyndep ïa ka jingpynkhuid ïa kine ki artylli ki wah hynrei u la ïathuh ba la shim ïa ki sien jam kiba donkam da kaba ïatrei lang bad kiwei kiba don bynta lang khnang ba kane ka kam kan long kaba jop.
title: Rung ka Wahumkhrah bad ka Umshyrpi ha ka thup ki 45 tylli ki wah ba jakhlia tam ha Ri India

content: Ka East Khasi Hills district administration myn ha ka sngi palei ka la dep phah da ka jinghukum halor ka jingmaham bam lum pisa beaiñ na ki dukan shimet bad kiwei pat ki building ha kane ka district.Ka la hukum ruh ïa baroh ki nongdie dukan ba kin buh da ki CCTV ha k dukan jong ki.“…lem bad ka jingkhmih bniah ban lait na kum kine ki kam beaiñ, katei ka administration ka la mana pyrshah ban lum pisa beaiñ na ki dukan bad kiwei bad yn pynshitom mar mar lada lap,” hukum u Deputy Commissioner, u R M Kurbah.“Ki nongdie dukan ki la shah hukum ban buh da ki CCTV ha ki dukan jong ki ha ki jaka ba biang na ka bynta ban ïoh jingïada bad ban lap ïa kum kine ki kam beaiñ ha ki dukan jong ki,” katkum katei ka jinghukum.Ha katei ka jinghukum, la ong ruh ba la don ka jingpynpaw ka jingsngewsih pyrshah ïa kum kine ki jinglum pisa beaiñ na ki nongdie dukan, nongseng kam lajong ne kiwei kiwei halor ka jingpan na ka bynta ka jingnoh synñiang ne kiwei kiwei kaba la pynsheptieng ïa ki trai dukan jong ki kam bapher bapher.Ha katei ka jinghukum, la ong ba kano kano ka jinglum pisa ha kylleng ka East Khasi Hills district ka bym pat ithuh da ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, Shillong ne kiwei pat ki bor ba dei peit jong ka sorkar kaba long beaiñ.Kano kano ka jingïoh jingbit kaba la ithuh da ka bor ba dei peit ka long kaba biang na ka bynta ka kam ba dei bad hapoh ka por ba la ai, katkum katei ka jinghukum.
title: Maham ka EKH ban lum pisa beaiñ ha kylleng ka East Khasi Hills district

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad Sangma, ha ka 14 tarik Ïaïong u la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban ïatai halor ki jingduna kiba kongsan bad ban pynkhreh ïa ka rukom treikam bad ka lynti kumno ban pynthymmai bad pynbha ïa ki lai tylli ki wah kiba kongsan, kita ka Wahumkhrah, ka Wah Umshyrpi bad ka Wah Umkhen, da kaba shim ruh ïa ka jingai jingmut jong ki dorbar shnong.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka donkam ban don ka jingïaryngkat hapdeng ka mariang bad ka ïoh ka kot bad u la bynrap, “Ka jingïalang kaba ngi la pynlong mynta ka sngi ka long shi bynta jong ka mat kaba kham heh jong ka sorkar jylla ban don ka jingïaryngkat hapdeng ka kamai ka kajih, ka ïoh ka kot bad ka mariang, khnang ba lada la pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ha ka ïoh ka kot, la ri sumar ïa ka mariang ruh na ka bynta ki pateng ki ban wan.”La pynlong ïa kane ka jingïalang ha Yojana Bhawan, ha kaba la ïashim bynta u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u Myntri sorkar u Bah AL Hek, u Chief Secretary u Bah DP Wahlang, ki heh ophisar, ki dkhot jong ki dorbar shnong bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki seng ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Chief Secretary u la ïathuh ba bun ki kam ban pyntrei yn shimti ha ki jaka jong ka municipal hapoh ka AMRUT 2.0, bad u la bynrap ruh ba ha kaba ïadei bad ka NGT T.110 klur la mang ban pynkhuid ïa ka Shillong bad ïa ki sawdong sawkun jong ka.
title: Da ka jingïalang pynlong u Myntri Rangbah ban ïatai halor ka jingpynbha ïa ki wah ba kongsan

content: :U dkhot ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Ain ka Meghalaya, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban pynthikhna ba kam dei ban don kano kano ka jingpynthud pynwit ïa ka jingshna ka surok Shillong-Dawki da ki ‘riew khwan myntoi shimet. U Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh uba long u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah u la ïathuh ruh ba ka Ïing Bishar Meghalaya High Court ka la kdew ba ym dei ban don kano ka jingpynwit ïa ka jingshna ka surok Shillong-Dawki, kaba kynthup ruh ïa ka jingshna ïa ka surok kaba lah ban ïaid saw tylli ki kali ha ka juh ka por na Umshyrpi sha Hynñiew Mer Upper Shillong.Ha kaba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh ula ong ba ka jingpynthud ïa ka jingshna ïa katei ka surok bah ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih bad kane ka ktah ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng bad ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah. “Nga la ong ïa ki nongpynïaid jong ka National Highways and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited (NHIDCL), ba la da don kino kino kiba pynthud ïa ka jingtrei jong ka jingtei ka surok ki dei ban pyni lem sha ka khnang ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ba kan ym don ka jingpynthud ïa katei ka jingtrei.Shuwa jong kane, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong, uba dei peit ïa ka tnad PWD u la ïathuh ba ka jingsangeh jong ka jingtrei ïa katei ka surok ka long namarba u Kontroktor ula ieh noh shiteng ïa katei ka kam bad dei na kane ka daw ba la hap ban khot Tender biang. U Bah Ronnie ula ithuh ba ki don ki dak ki shin jong ka jingshna biang ïa kane ka surok nambar ba ka Sorkar ka la lep leh lut ïa baroh ki bynta ba donkam. Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka jingeh, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan buddien ïa kane ka kam bad ki kontraktor bad ïa ki nongpynïaid jong ka ban pynsted ïa kane ka kam, khnang ba kane ka ym buh jingeh ïa ki paidbah. “Kumba ka long mynta, ki nongleit nongwan, kynthup ïa ki nongshong shnong shilynter jong ka Shillong bad Upper Shillong, ki mad ïa ka jingdheng kali da ki bun bun kynta.
title: Kyntu u MLA Ronnie V. Lyngdoh ba ym dei ban pynthud ïa ka surok bah Shillong-Dawki

content: :U Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar uba dei u MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency mynta ka sngi jong ka 15 tarik Nohprah 2023 u la ïoh ban plie ïa ka ïingdorbar Hall jong ka shnong Nongbri Nongdom kaba hap hapoh South West Khasi Hills District ha ka jingïadon lang ki ophisar jong ka Block Mawkyrwat ki Myntri shnong lem bad kiwei kiweiLa tei ïa kane ïingdorbar Hall ha ka jinglut kaba long T. 35 Lak shiteng lyngba  ka skhim MGNREGS ba la ïoh na ka  Mawkyrwat Block T. 33 Lak bad  T. 2 Lak shiteng na ka MLA skhim.Haba ai jingkren kum u kongsan ha kane ka sngi u la kyntu ïa ka ophis jong ka  Mawkyrwat Block ba ka dei ban phai khmat kham bun sha kine ki thaiñ shiliang um namar ba kin kham kiew ha ka ïoh ka kot namar ki paidbah jong kane ka dong ka thaiñ ki kham im ha ka rep ka riang ban pylleit jingmut  ha ka ïoh ka kot tang ha ki kam  rep. Namar kumba long mynta ka thaiñ shiliang um ka don jingkyrmen ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka kam rep kam riang.Na ka liang jong ka kong Madona Nongsiej kaba dei ka Additional Project Officer jong ka Mawkyrwat Block ka la kyntu ïa ki paidbah jong ka dong ka thaiñ ba ki dei ban leh khnang ïa u Aadhar Number namar lada ym don Aadhar Number shi bun ki jingmyntoi na ka sorkar ki lah ban duh noh ïa ki jing myntoi ki jong ki.
title: Ïoh ka shnong Nongbri Nongdom da ka ïingdorbar Hall kaba T. 33 Lak

content: MAWKYRWAT:Ka Umjaraiñ Hot spring Sports Club kala ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol ha kaba ha baroh ki kynhun ïalehkai ka PLSK Umjaraiñ bad ka Shi Dust na Shillong kila long ki kynhun ïalehkai kiba la poi sha ka phainal mynta ka sngi ka 15 Tarik u Nohprah 2023 kaba la pynlong ha Madan Jajiar Umjaraiñ South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi kut jong ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol la wan pynhap pyrda noh da u bah Johnfilter L. Marshillong President NPYF SWKHD u la long kum u Kongsan ha ryngkat ka jing ïa donlang u bah H.S.Diengdoh President NPP Mawkyrwat Block ki Myntri shnong naka shnong  Lawble bad Umjaraiñ ha ryngkat ki paidbah kiba la wan ban sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi.Ha pdeng ka jing ïalehkai ka PLSK pyshah ïa ka Shi Dust Na shillong kala long shisha kaba itynnad ha baroh ar tylli ki kynhun ha kaba haka kylla step ka Shi Dust na Shillong kala ïoh ban pynkhih nyngkong ïa ka jar bad haka kylla miet ka PLSK kala ïoh ban pynphai 1 kol.Ha duh ba kut jong ka jingïalehkai baroh ar tylli ki kynhun kila long mar ïa khait da kaba kila ïa ioh mar 1 kol. Dei tad ha dien ba ki Officail nong pynïaid kila pynïalehkai noh da ka Tie Breaker ha kaba ka PLSK kala ïoh ban tam noh shi kol ïa ka Shi Dust na Shillong bad ka PLSK ka la long ka lahduh ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai ha Ryngkat ka song pisa kaba  T.50 hajar tyngka bad ka Shi Dust na Shillong kila la ïoh T. 20 hajar tyngka.Ha kane ka sngi la pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh shuh da ka jingshad, ki jing rwai bad ka jing tem DJ na ki samla na kane ka thaiñ.
title: Lah duh ka PLSK ha lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol jong ka Umjaraiñ Hot spring SC Ryngkat T. 50 hajar

content: Ka jingïakhun ba ar sngi ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka 29th State Karate Championship 2023 ka la sdang bad ïa shim bynta da ki shiphew tylli ki district jong ka Meghalaya. Ki district kiba la ïa shim bynta ha kane ka jingïaknieh ïa ka nam lahduh ki long ka  East Jaintia Hills, West Jaintia Hills, East Khasi Hills, West Khasi Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, South West Khasi Hills, Ri Bhoi, West Garo Hills, North Garo Hills bad South Garo Hills.Ha kane ka jingïalehkai Karate ban ïa knieh ïa ka nam lahduh, la ïoh ïa ka jingsei ïa ki sap bapher bapher jong ki nongïalehkai. Ha kane ka jingïalehkai la wan ban ïashim bynta da ki 372 ngut ki nongïashim bynta. Napdeng jong ki 182 ngut ki dei ki kynthei bad 90 ngut ki dei ki shynrang ki ban ïaknieh ïa ka nam lahduh.
title: Sdang ka jingïakhun jong ka 29th state Karate Championship 2023 ha Meghalaya

content: :Kum shi bynta ka jinglehkmen Christmas u Bah Pyndap, u Bah C. Phawa, u Bah H. Sungoh ha ryngkat ki paralok bad u Bah Dawan Lyngdoh u MDC ki la wan ban ai sngewbha da ki kymbor ne ki nep kup thiah sha ki paidbah nongshong Shnong ka Shnong Thangrong.Ha shwa ban ai ïa kine ki kymbor ne ki nep kup thiah la don ka jingïalang ba lyngkot ha kaba la pdiang sngewbha ïa ki da u Chairman Shnong u Bah Kwit Khyrwang ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki rangbah, ki longkmie bad ki hep barit.La ïoh ïa ka jingkren na u Bah P. Shadap, u Bah S. Phawa, u Bah L Sungoh bad na u Bah D. Lyngdoh MDC. Haba ai jingkren ki la ong ba kum ka dak ka jingleh kmen Christmas ngi shim ïa kane ka lad ban ïarap da kine ki jingai barit sha phi kum ki paradoh parasnam kiba sah sha ki thaiñ khappud kiba la mad shibun ki jingeh ha ka jingim ba man la ka sngi, kumta ngi la shim ïa kane ka sien jam ban ïa leh kmen lang bad phi.U Bah Dawan Lyngdoh uba dei u MDC u la ai mynsiem ïa kine ki paradoh para snam kiba don ha kane ka thiañ ban long kiba sian bad ban ïa tylli ha kino kino ki kam.Ha shwa ban sam ïa ki jingai sngewbha la ïoh ïa ka jingduwai na u Bah W. War bad la ai ïa ki jingai sngewbha da kine ki rangbah kiba la don bynta lang ha kane ka sngi.
title: Da ki kymbor ne ki nep kup thiah ai sngewbha u Bah Pyndap Shadap bad ki paralok sha ki nongshong shnong ka Thangrong ha ka ktien pnar ha ki Karbi Jrilaskor

content: U Additional Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaintia Hills, u Bah D.V. Lyngdoh ha ka jingïadon lang u Director ka jong ka Mihmyntdu Community Social Welfare Association, u Dr. JN Shullai, District Social Welfare Officer, u Ripaya Passah bad kiwei, u la plie ïa ka jaka ïa kynduh lang Drop In Centre jong ka Mihmyntdu Community Social Welfare Association kaba don ha Faith Academy Campus ha Moosalyngkat Salaroh, Jowai.Kane ka Drop In Centre ka long kham kyrpang na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong kiba la rangbah, ha kaba ki lah ban ïakynduh lang bad pynlut ïa ka por jong ki ha ki jingïalehkai, ha ka dro jingdro, ka rwai ka siaw bad kiwei ki jingpynbyrngia ki ban pynkmen pynsngewbha ïa kito kiba la noh ka rta.
title: Plie u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaintia Hills ïa ka Drop In Centre ha Jowai

content: Ar ngut ki samla pule na Assam Don Bosco University, Sonapur ki la khlad noh hashen ha ka jingjia aksiden ha surok ha ka jingkieng Urania flyover ha Jorabat myn ha ka 15 tarik, Nohprah.Katei ka jingjia, kaba la jia ha ka por 3 baje janmiet, ka la don ka jingïa takhuh hapdeng ka ar shaka kaba don ïa u nombar AS 01EJ 7870, kaba kit lai ngut ki samla pule kiba la wan na katei ka jaka pule ban leit sha Guwahati bad ka trok ba pynïeng kaba don u nombar NL 01AE 1887.Ha katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih, ka la don ka jingïa takhuh, ha kaba la don ka jingkhlad jong ki ar ngut ki samla pule bad uwei uba la mynsaw.Ha katei ka jingjia, la wan ki pulit traffic jong ka Jorabat kiba la leit ai jingïarap kloi kloi bad pynkit noh ïa ki sha GMCH Assam na ka bynta ka jingsumar ba mar mare. Watla ka jingtrei shitom, ka kynhun sumar ka la pynbna ba ar ngut ki samla pule ki la khlad noh ha ka por ba don ha katei ka hospital.Kane ka jingjia ba sngewsih ka la pynsha ïong hi ngaiñ ïa ka Assam Don Bosco University. Katba ka jingtohkit halor katei ka jingjia ka dang ïaid shakhmat naba ki heh ba dei peit ki la trei shitom ban sngewthuh bad pynlait na ka jingma baroh ban jia kum kitei ki jait jingjia ha ka lawei ban wan.
title: Khlad hashen ar ngut ki samla pule na Assam Don Bosco University, ha ka jingjia aksiden ha Urania flyover Bridge, Jorabat

content: Ka NSDC & Bajaj Finserv ryngkat ka AICTE & Bajaj Finserv ki la īasoi ar tylli ki Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) ha ka jingïadonlang u Dharmendra Pradhan, u Myntri Sorkar India ba dei peit ia ka tnad Education bad Skill Development & Entrepreneurship; u Atul Kumar Tiwari, Secretary, ka tnad Skill Development & Entrepreneurship; u Prof. Rajive Kumar, Member Secretary, AICTE; Ved Mani Tiwari, CEO, NSDC bad MD, NSDC International bad u Sanjiv Bajaj, Chairman & MD ka Bajaj Finserv. Ha kane ka jingialang īasoi la ia donlang da u Kurush Irani, President Group – CSR and Pallavi Gandhalikar, National Head – CSR ka Bajaj Finserv.Ka AICTE, (hapoh ka tnad Higher Education) bad ka National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC), (hapoh ka tnad Skill Development bad Entrepreneurship), kaba lam khmat saindur ia ka Skill Ecosystem ha ka Ri ka la iateh lok mynta ka sngi bad ka Bajaj Finserv Ltd., kawei na ki Financial Services Group ba paw khmat ha ka Ri India ban pynkhreh ia ki samla ban ïoh kam ha ki bynta ban ai jingshakri lyngba ka kam pisa tyngka.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u Dharmendra Pradhan u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen halor ka jingiasoi MoU hapdeng ka jong ka NSDC bad AICTE ryngkat ka Bajaj Finserv ban pynkhreh ia ki samla ban ïoh kam ha ki bynta ban ai jingshakri lyngba ka kam pisa tyngka bad ka jingsdang ia ka Certificate Program ha ka Banking, Finance, bad Insurance. Ka jingiateh lok kan kyntiew sha khmat ha ka bynta treikam ba ia dei bad ka pisa tyngka bad kan ai bor ia ki samla ban ia shim bynta ban pynkylla ia kiei kiei kiba don ha ka kam pisa tyngka bad ki kor ki bor ka juk jingstad mynta, u la ong.U Prof. T.G. Sitharam, Chairman, AICTE u la ong ba ka jingiasoi MoU kan nang nang pynbha shuh shuh ha ka pule puthi bad ka jingiasnoh bad ka jingtreikam. Kan pynkhlain ia ka thong treikam ka AICTE ban pynïasoh ia ka pule puthi bad ki jingtreikam da kaba ai ki lad ki lynti ha ka jingpule, ka jingshah hikai pyntbit ha ki kam kum ka Banking, Finance bad Insurance.U Ved Mani Tiwari, CEO, NSDC and MD, NSDC International u la ong ba ka kam pisa tyngka ka Ri India ka la nang iai kiew ha ki snem kiba dang shen bad donkam ka jingpynshlur ia ki samla. U Sanjiv Bajaj, Chairman & Managing Director, Bajaj Finserv Ltd., u la ong ba ka jingiatreilang hapdeng ka NSDC bad ka tnad Education kan wanrah jingkylla ki ban lam sha ka jingjop. U la ong ba kan kyntiew ia ka ïoh ka kot ha ryngkat ka phang treikam Kaushal Bharat, Kushal Bharat.Hapoh kane ka jingïatreilang, ka Bajaj Finserv kan sdang ia ki lad jinghikai sha palat 20,000 ngut ki samla lyngba ka Certificate Program ha ka Banking, Finance & Insurance (CPBFI), ka Prokram ba 100 kynta da ka jinghikai ki riewtbit ha ki kam bapher bapher naduh ka pule puthi, ka koit ka khiah bad kiwei pat. Ka CPBFI ka pyniaid mynta haduh palat 350 tylli ki kolej ha 23 tylli ki jylla, 100 tylli ki district bad palat 160 tylli ki jaka sor ban kyntiew ia ki samla pule bad kiba kwah pule MBA bad pynlong ia ki ban ioh ka lad ha ki kam ba ia dei bad ka pisa tyngka.Ka jingiateh lok bad ka NSDC kan pynkhlain ia ka Skill India Digital (SID)— ka lad ioh jingtip sha ki prokram ka Sorkar na ka bynta ban hikai pyntbit bad pynlong ia ki samla pule ban ym nang tang ha ka thoh ka pule hynrei ha ki kam ki jam.Lyngba ka jingïatreilang yn lah ban pynrung kam ha ki Bank, ki jingtreikam kiba ia dei bad ka pisa tyngka, ki insurance company ban kyntiew ia ki samla. Kane kan long kum ka jingpyniajan hapdeng ki kamra class bad ki jingdawa ki jingtreikam bad wanrah ka lad ban ioh ia ki jingtrei jingktah.Ha kaba ia dei pat bad ka jingai jinghikai bad ki jingtip, ka jingiatreilang kan pynkhlain ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat ki samla lyngba ki jinghikai bad ki jaka trei. Haduh mynta ka CPBFI ka la dep hikai bad ai jingmyntoi palat 40,000 ngut ki samla na ki jaka sor bad khap sor.
title: Ka Ri India kum ka jaka pdeng ha ka ïew ban ai jingshakri na ka kam pisa tyngka: Dharmendra Pradhan

content: Uwei na ki Myntri jong ka Sorkar synsop Meghalaya Democratic Alliance, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ki paidbah ki kham noh mynsiem sha ki seng sain hima sima ‘riewlum hangne ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills ha ka ban jied ia ki MP jong ka Iing Ddorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary Assembly.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula pynpaw ia ka jingartatien jong u ba ka Congress kan leh bha ha kane ka jingjied nongmih khmat. “Lada ngi peit ha kane ka jingjied ia ki dkhot jongka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ka Meghalaya, ka UDP jop 12 , VPP ka jop 4 tylli bad HSPDP 2 tylli bad kane ka pyni ba ki paidbah ki noh sha ki seng sain hima sima riewlum.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula iathuh ba ka UDP ka don ka jingiatei bad ka HSPDP bad kane kan pynkhlain shuh shuh ia u kyrtong MP ia uba yn pynieng da kine ki seng sain hima sima riewlum. U la ong ruh ba kane kan shong eh ha u kyrtong jong ka seng uba lah ban khring ia ki paidbah.
title: Noh mynsiem ki paidbah sha u kyrtong MP ka seng riewlum

content: Kum shi bynta jong ka Assam Rifles’ National Integration Tour (NIT) programme, ban tehsong ia ki samla jong ka ri bad ban pynpaw paidbah ia ki kam pynroi, 24  ngut ki kynthei na  Nagaland ryngkat bad ki nonghikai ki la ia kynduh ia u Lat ka Meghalaya, u Phagu Chauhan, ha Raj Bhavan ha Shillong.Ha kane ka jingiakynduh jong ki ia u Lat ka Meghalaya, la ioh ban iakren shaphang ka bynta kaba khraw ba ki samla jong ka ri ki nohsynniang na ka bynta ka jingiatylli bad ka jingtei ia ka ri India. U Lat Phagu Chauhan u la pynshlur ia ki bad ka kyntu ruh ba ki pynurlong ia ki jingangnud ki jong ki.Kane ka kynhun ka la poi sha Shillong ha ka 13 tarik u Nohprah bad kan leit phai pat haka 17 tarik u Nohprah. Ha kane ka jingwan jngoh jong ki, ki la lah ban iohi ia ka jingriewspah ka larity jong ka Meghalaya.
title: Wan jngoh ka kynhun ki samla Nagaland ïa u Lat ka Meghalaya

content: Ki shipai khappud Border Security Force jong ka Meghalaya, East Khasi Hill District ki la ioh ban kurup ia ki iit khmat kiba shongdoh haduh 50 lak tyngka na ki khappud jong ka Meghalaya bad Bangladesh.Ki khubor ba la pathai da ki shipai Meghalaya BSF ki iathuh ba ki trai jong kine ki iit khmat ki mut ban khaii tuh ia ki sha Bangladesh. Ki BSF ki la iohi ba kane ka kali ka iing harud surok ha ki khappud jong ka East Khasi Hills District bad Bangladesh.Ki la leit ban tohkit ia kane bad ki la shem ba ha kawei ka song ka baheh ha kaba la buh ia kine ki iit khmat kiba shongdor haduh 50 lak tyngka. Ki BSF ki la kylli bad u nongniah bad u nongbuh jong u kim shym la leh ban pyni ia ki kot ki sla bad kim shym la lah ruh ban iathuh ia ka daw jong ka jingrah ia kitei ki iit khmat kiba kat kiti.Hadien kane, ki BSF ki la leit ban aiti ia kitei ki arngut bad ia kitei ki iit khmat sha ki pulit jong ka Dangar Police Station ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: Ioh kurup ki shipai khappud Meghalaya BSF ïa ki ïit khmat ba shongdor sanphew lak tyngka

content: Ka St Paul Marbisu Higher Secondary School, Marbisu ka la ïoh jingkyrshan na ka sorkar da kaba kan sa ïohpdiang da ka pisa haduh T. 45 lak kum ka jingai jingïarap na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka ïing maw ba thymmai ne building na ka bynta ka science stream na ka bynta ka klas XI bad klas XII.La ai ïa katei ka jingïarap da ka sorkar jylla, ha kaba ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bad u MLA jong katei ka jaka, ki la dep pynbna shaphang katei ha ka por ba don ka jingïakynduh lang shisien shi snem ka jong ki khynnah pule barim bad ba thymmai jong kane ka skul kaba la dep pynlong ha ka sngi thohdieng kum shi bynta jong ka jingpyn khreh na ka bynta ka jingdap 75 snem jong kane ka skul.U Symbud Myntri ka jylla ba dei peit peit ïa ka kam poh ïing, u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la dep pynbna haduh T. 20 lak kum ka jingai jingïarap na ka sorkar katba u khlieh jong ka KHADC, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la pynbna ban ai jingïarap haduh T. 20 lak na ka council bad T. 5 lak kumba la kular da u MLA ka Mawphlang, u Bah Beyondstar Kurbah.Haba kren shaphang katei, u Tynsong u la ong ba katei ka skul ka la wan ha kajuh ka kyrdan kum ki skul ha Shillong bad ïa katei, la sakhi ha ka por ba don ka eksam SSLC kaba la dep pynlong da ka MBOSE.U Tynsong u la kyrpad ïa ki khynnah ba kin nym shah ïalam bakla ba ka pule puthi kam mut ban ïoh kam sorkar hynrei u la kyrpad ïa baroh ba kin bud ïa ki jingphohsniew jong ki bad ki dei ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat bad ban ai jingïarap ban tei ïa ka imlang ka sahlang.“Don ki kmie ki kpa kiba la ngeit ba ka pule puthi ka lah ban ai jingïarap ïa ki khynnah ba kin ïoh kam sorkar, hynrei nga kwah ban pyntip ïaphi ba ha ka shi snem, ka lah ban don haduh 2000 tylli ki kam ba lait hynrei ha ka shi snem, la don palat 36,000 ngut kiba la pyndep ïa ka pule puthi jong ki” ong u Tynsong.U Tynsong u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynkhreh ban wanrah da ki skhim bapher bapher bad ki projek, kum ki kam ai jinghikai ha ki bynta bapher bapher naba kane ka lah ban pynïoh kam pynïoh jam ïa ki ha ki kam bapher bapher wat la ka dei ka kam sorkar ne kam shimet ba kin sdang ïa la ka jong ka kam.
title: Yn ïoh ka skul Marbisu haduh T. 45 lak na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka ïingmaw ba thymmai

content: U nongai ktien jong ka seng BJP na Meghalaya, u Bah Mariahom Kharkrang myn ha ka 15 tarik, Nohprah u la pynkhring ïa ki paidbah baroh shajan ka seng BJP kum ka jingjied jong u Vishnu Deo Sai, uba dei u riewlum, kum u Myntri rangbah jong ka Chhattisgarh bad ong ba ka dei na kane ka daw ba ki paid riewlum ha kylleng ka ri, khamtam ka jylla North East, ka dei ban vote sha u Myntri rangbahduh ka India ha kane ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha.“Kane ka ri ka dei kaba bun ki paid riewlum kiba la saphriang ha kylleng ki jaka ba bun, lem bad bun kiba ki dei na ka jylla Northeast kiba bun ki riewlum. Tad haduh mynta, ka sorkar pdeng kaba la ïoh jingjop ka la leh kiar ïa ka jingangnud jong ngi la don mynta 70 snem. Wan rung ka sorkar BJP ba ïalam da u Narendra Modi ha ka Centre bad baroh la kumba ka kylla dur lut. Naduh u riewlum ba nyngkong uba dei u President jong ka Indian Union haduh u Myntri rangbah ba nyngkong uba dei u riewlum jong kiwei pat ki jylla, ka jingpynkup bor ïa ki paid riewlum kumba la kular da u Myntri rangbahduh ka la jia shisha. Ngi, ki paid riewlum jong ka India, ngi lah ban pynurlong ïa ki jingphohsniew jong ngi.”“Lem bad ka seng BJP kaba la pynkhreh ban pynïar ïa ka jingsam ïa ka seat ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha bad u Myntri rangbahduh, u Narendra Modi uba sa shisien un ïakhun biang ha kane ka ilekshon, ngi lah ban khmih lynti halor ka jingpynkup bor ka bakhraw bad pynïar ïa ki skhim pynroi na ka bynta ki paid riewlum,” pynkut u Kharkrang.
title: U Modi u la pynkylla dur ïa ki riewlum, ong u dkhot ka BJP jong ka jylla Meghalaya

content: Ka Department of English, NEHU ryngkat bad ka jingiatrei lang bad ka  ICSSRNERC ki la pyllong ia ka jingai jingkren da u Prof. Ranjan Ghosh uwei na ki nonghikai bapaw khmat ha pyrthei, uba long ruh u nonghikai jong ka North Bengal University.U la kren shaphang ka kot jingiathuh khana novel kaba ula thoh kaba u la ai kyrteng “Plastic Turn” bad pynmih da ka London. Prof. Ghosh u la kren shaphang ka theory, ka jingiadei hapdeng ki jingthoh, ka history jong ka philosophy, ka thoh ka pule, ka larity bad shaphang ki plastic.U Prof. Ghosh u la thoh haduh khadhynniew tylli ki kot bad ia ki artikyl babun bah jong u la pynmih ha ki makasin bapawnam jong ka pyrthei. Ia kane ka jingai jingkren la saindur da u Dr Suranjana Choudhary of the English Department bad pyniaid da u Prof. Jyotirmoy Prodhani, Head jong ka English Department.U Dr. Prodhani, ha ka jingkren jong u la iaroh ia u Prof. Ghosh kum uwei na ki radbah ka thoh ka pule ha pyrthei. U Prof. Bhagirathi Panda, uba long u Honorary Director, ICSSR-NERC bad u  Dr. Bathsheba G. Pyngrope, Consultant, ICSSR-NERC ki la ia shim bynta ha kaba pynurlong ia kane ka prokram.
title: Ka jingkren u Prof. Ranjan Ghosh halor ka novel Plastic Turn ha NEHU

content: U nongthaw aiñ jong ka seng UDP na Mawsynram, u Bah Olan Sing Suin myn ha ka 15 tarik, Nohprah u la ong ba la dep tyrwa haduh T. 86 klur na ka bynta ban pynthymmai ïa ka surok Weiloi-Trongpleng ba jngai haduh 33-kilometer sha ka surok ba biang kaba dang ap ïa ka jingbei tyngka na ka sorkar jylla.“Nga la dep phah ïa ka jingtyrwa haduh T. 86 klur sha ka jylla sorkar na ka bynta ban pynthymmai ïa katei ka surok kaba long kaba kongsan ha kane ka konstituensi,” ong u Suin ha ki nongthoh kot khubor.U la ong ba ïa katei ka mat, la dep rah sha u Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka PWD (Roads), u Bah Prestone Tynsong na ka bynta ka jingkhmih jong u.Utei u MLA u la ong ba ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam ba dang sah teng na ka Trongpleng shaduh Lad Bagli, ki engineer jong ka tnad ki dang pynkhreh ïa ka kaiphod jong ka jingbatai bniah.Shuh shuh, u Suin u la pyntip ba ka jingpynthymmai ïa ka surok pdeng jong ka Mawphlang-Weiloi ka dang ïaid shaid shaid. Hynrei, ki kontraktor ki donkam ban trei stet stet ïa ki kam kum ha kiwei pat ki jaka, ha kaba ki la sdang ban khlong ïa ka khyndew.U Suin u la pyntip ruh ba la dep bei haduh T. 48 klur na ka bynta ban pynthymmai ïa ka surok ba sah teng jong ka Mawphlang-Weilai sha ka surok pdeng kaba jngai kumba 30 km bad ki kontraktor ki la shah kyrpad ban pyndep ïa katei ka projek ha u Kyllalyngkot 2025.“Wat lada ki kam ki dang ïaid shaid shaid, hynrei ka donkam ban pynstet ka rukom treikam naba nga la dep ïakren bad u Chief Engineer bad ki kontraktor ban pynthikna ba ïa katei ka projek, dei ban pyndep ha ka por ba biang” ong u Suin.Haba la kylli jingkylli, utei u MLA u la ong ba ka jingpyndep ïa ka projek ban shna surok kan sa pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah jong kane ka jaka khamtam ki nongrep ha kaba ïadei bad ka leit ka wan jong ki kiba rah ïa ki mar rep jong ki da ki kali bad kan sa ai jingïarap shibun ïa ka Mawsynram konstituensi, kum kawei na ki jaka jngoh kai pyrthei.
title: Ap ka surok Weiloi-Trongpleng ïa ka jingnoh synñiang na ka sorkar

content: :Ha ka jingtrei shitom ban pynkiew ïa ka pule puthi halor ka global art bad ka cultural exchange, ka Positive Energy Art Foundation ka la dep soi da ka Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) lem bad ki hynñiew tylli ki jaka pule jong ka Thailand ha ka 16 tarik, Nohprah.Katba ki jaka pule ba la ïashim bynta lang ki kynthup ïa ka Faculty of Decorative Arts, Silpakorn University; Faculty of Fine and Applied Arts, Thammasat University; Faculty of Fine and Applied Arts, Suan Sunandha Rajabhat University; Faculty of Fine and Applied Arts, Bangkokthonburi University; Office of Arts and Culture Phuket Rajabhat University; Faculty of Fine Arts, Bunditpatanasilpa Institute of Fine Arts; bad ka School of Informatics, Walailak University.Kane ka jingmynjur jong ka jingïatreilang ka thmu ban pynkylla dur ïa ka rukom kylla ka jingnang jingstad bad kiwei kiwei, lem bad ka jingkut jingmut ban ïatreilang ha ka ban pynmih bun ki nongtrei ba tbit ha ki bynta bapher bapher ha ka imlang ka sahlang.Ïa ka MOU, la dep soi mynta ka sngi, ha ka Faculty of Decorative Arts, Silpakorn University, Thailand. Ïa katei ka jingrakhe, la ïashim bynta da ki kongsan, kynthup ïa u Prakash Kishore, Founder and Director of Positive Energy Art Foundation; u Dr Nawat Lertsawaengkit, Assistant Professor ha ka Faculty of Arts, Silpakorn University (ba bat kam kum u Honorary Director of Positive Energy Art Foundation); bad u Dr Thanatorn Jiarakun, Dean jong ka Faculty of Decorative Arts, Silpakorn University. Ki Deans bad ki nongmihkhmat na kiwei pat ki jaka pule ba ïatreilang ki la don bynta lang ban rakhe ïa katei ka tamasa.Ka Positive Energy Art Foundation, ka long kaba noh mynsiem ban ïatreilang hajan bad ki jaka pule ha India bad shabar ka India bad kiwei pat ki kynhun, ha kaba ka la thmu ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka imlang sahlang jong ki bynta bapher bapher ha ka ri bad kumjuh ki bynta jong ka jylla. Lem bad ka jingïohi jngai ban pynbha ïa ka imlang ka sahlang, katei ka kynhun ka la kut jingmut ban don bynta ha ki katto katne ki kam ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki paralok jong ki ba ïadei kam na katei ka shnong, ri bad shabar ri.Ka Headquarter kaba don ha Shillong, ka Positive Energy Art Foundation ym tang ba ka la trei minot ban ïatreilang ha kylleng ka pyrthei hynrei ka kut jingmut ban pynkiew ïa ka imlang ka sahlang jong ki paid riewlum.
title: Soi ka Positive Energy Art Foundation ïa ka MOU bad hynñiew tylli ki jaka pule jong ka Thailand

content: Ka seng Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) myn ha ka sngi thohdieng ka la ïoh ka lad ban leit ïakynduh ïa ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, ban ïakren halor ka mat ban shah ïa ki jaka ïakhun eksam shabar ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ki nongïakhun eksam ba na katei ka shnong na ka bynta ban pynrung ha ka post Group B bad C ha North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health & Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS).“(Ngi) kyrpad ïaphi ba phin khmih kloi kloi ha kaba ïadei bad ka post Group B & C ha NEIGRIHMS ha kaba la ïoh jingtip ba ki paidbah jong kane ka shnong kiba ïakhun eksam na ka jylla ba kin ïoh jingbit ban thoh ïa ki eksamin jong ki ha ki jaka thoh eksam ne ki examination centre ha ki jaka ba jngai shabar jong ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u general secretary ka seng KSU, u Bah Donald V Thabah ha katei ka shithi sha ka Lyngdoh.U la pyntip ba ka seng KSU ka la thmu ban leit ïakynduh ïa katei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah hynrei kam shym la don hangne ha Shillong da kaba bynrap ba la kumno kumno ki la ïoh ban ïakren bad ka hapoh ka phone.U Thabah u la ong ba ka Lyngdoh ka la pynthikna ha ka seng KSU ba ma ka lem bad u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma kin sa shimkhia halor kane ka mat ha New Delhi, ha ka sngi saitjaiñ.“(Ka la pynthikna ruh ma ki) kin sa pyrshang ban ïakynduh ïa ki heh ba dei peit jong ka tnad Union Health Ministry na ka bynta ban pynlait na kane ka jingeh bad ban kyrpad ba baroh ki nongïakhun eksam jong katei ka shnong kin ïoh jingbit ban leit thoh ïa ki eksamin jong ki ha ki jaka thoh eksam hapoh ka jylla,” ong u Thabah ïa ka Kong Ampareen.U Thabah u la ong ba ka seng KSU kan sa shimkhia halor katei ka mat ban ïakren bad u Myntri rangbah na ka bynta ban khmih kloi kloi halor katei.Ïa mynta, ka seng KSU ka la dep thoh ruh sha u Director jong ka NEIGRIHMS, u Dr Nalin Mehta, na ka bynta ban pynlait ïa kine ki jingeh ba la mad da kitei ki nongshong shnong ban ïakhun eksamin.“Katei ka kynhun ka don ka jingmut ba baroh ki bynta ba ïadei bad ki jaka thoh eksamin dei ban khmih noh mar mar bad ba ki nongïakhun eksam na katei ka shnong ki dei ban ïoh jingbit ban shah ïa ki ba kin thoh eksam hapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya,” katkum katei ka shithi ba la thoh sha u Mehta.Katei ka shithi ka la pynkynmaw ba u Mehta u la dep pynbna da lade ïa katei ka kynhun ha ka por ba don ka jingïalang kaba la ong ba ka dei shaphang ka jingpynlong ïa ki eksamin na ka bynta ban pynrung kam pynrung jam. Shuh shuh, ki kynhun nongïalam jong kane ka seng ki la ïoh jingtip ba kumba saw tylli ki jaka ki la shah jied kum ki jaka thoh eksamin, ba la tip kum ha Shillong, Guwahati, Jorhat bad Delhi.
title: Leit kynduh ka seng KSU ïa ka Ampareen na ka bynta ban ïakren halor ka mat ban ai jingbit ïa ki nongïakhun eksam jong ka NEIGRIHMS

content: Ki seng sain hima sima jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP), kiba la ia mynjur ban iatrei lang ha ka jingjied nongmih khmat ha ka dur jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), kin sa   ia shong pyrkihat ha kane ka taiew ban wan ban jied ia u kyrtong ia mon lang u ban ia khun na ka bynta ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency.Ki thymmei khubor ki iathuh ba kane ka jingialang ban jied ia u kyrtong ia mon lang jong ka RDA kan long ha ka 19 tarik u Nohprah. La iathuh ba na ka liang jong ka HSPDP kam don kyrtong ban tyrwa bad kane ka shong sa tang ha ka UDP ia uno u kyrtong ba ka kwah ban pynieng. Ki khubor ki iathuh shuh shuh ba ka kyrteng jong u nongialam seng bhalang, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin ka wan hakhmat duh kum u kyrtong uba biang jong ka RDA.Shuwa jong kane ka HSPDP ka don ka jingthmu ban pynieng ia u kyrtong jong ka bad ba un ia khuh na ka shap jong ka bom. Hynrei, mynta ka la pynpaw ba kam don kum kita mynta. Kumba ka paw na ki dak ki shim, u kyrtong jong ka RDA un long na ka UDP bad un ia khuh na ka shap jong ka bom.Ha shuwa jong kane, u President jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society (KAS) president, u Dr. DRL Nonglait u la pynpaw ba u don ka jingthmu ban iakhun ia ka shuki MP na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency, hynrei mynta ula randien noh.
title: Lah ban rai ka RDA ïa ka kyrteng u kyrong MP ha 19 tarik u Nohprah

content: Ka 7 Wasa United FC kaba dei ruh ka lahduh jong ka aïom ba lah dep jong kane ka lympung Super Division ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) ka la bat biang ia ka nam kum ka lahduh mynta ka samoi lyngba ka jingpynliem ia ka Ladthadlaboh FCKa jingiakhun phainal jong kine ki ar kynhun ka long kaba i shong khia bad kaba jwat, baroh ar kynhun ki la iakhun ban pynkhih jar hynrei haduh ban da kut ka kylla step ym don ba lah ban thep kol. Dei ha ka minit ba 58 ka 7 Wasa ka la ioh ban thep kol lyngba u Civility Khongmalai bad lah ban ong lyngba katei ka kol, ki rangïalehkai ka Wasa ki la ioh mynsiem bad thep sa shi kol tang hadien 1 minit lyngba u Pynshai Lathong.Ym lah len ruh ba ki 2 kol ba ka Wasa ka la ioh ka long ruh kum ka jingpynskuin na ka bynta ki rangïalehkai ka Ladthadlaboh bad lynga ka jingiai iakhun ki la ioh ban pynphai shi kol ha ka minit ba 86 Sanki Langstang. Hadien katei ka minit ruh bun ki kabu ki la thaw hynrei haduh ban da kut ka minit ïalehkai ba la buh ki khlem ioh shuh ban pynurlong ia ka jingangnud jong ki, kumta ka jingiakhun ka la kut noh da 2-1.Ka 7 Wasa kaba dei ruh ka kynhun ba la ioh ban rah bun tam ia ka nam lahduh jong kane ka lympung ka la khur ruh ia ka song pisa kaba long 50,000 kynthup ka trophy katba ka Ladthadlaboh ka la ioh 30,000 tyngkaIa ka khusnam Man of the Match la ioh da u Dashngain Sukhlain na ka 7 Wasa, ia ka nam Best Goalkeeper la ioh da u Pynshngainlang Tyngkra naka 7 Wasa, ia ka nam Top Scorer la ioh da u Banteilang Shylla uba ioh ban thep 7 kol na ka bynta ka Ladthadlaboh bad ia ka nam Player of the Tournament la ioh da u Risanlang I Dkhar u rangïalehkai ka 7 Wasa.
title: Bat ka 7 Wasa United ia ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung Super Division ka WJDSA

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba long ruh u Myntri ki kam pynroi Sor u la pyllong ia ka jingbishar bniah ia ki saw ki tylli ki project kiba hap hapoh ka Smart City project.Kine ki saw tylli ki project ki dei ka Integrated Command, Control Centre (ICCC),Smart Elements bad Retrofitting, kynthup ruh ia ki jingpynbha ia ki lai tylli ki jaka pynieng kali ha Shillong, ka jingshna iaka Commercial Complex ha Polo bad jingpynbha shu shuh ia ka iew Laitumkhrah Municipal Market.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ula liet peit ia kitei project ha ka jingiadon lang jong ki heh Sorkar.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ula pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia jingmut namarba ka jingtrei jongka ICCC project la lah ban pyndep tang 75 na ka 100 bad ha ka jingshisha, kane ka project la dei ban pyndep ha u Lber 2023 ha ka jinglut kaba T.212.86 klur.Ka Sorkar ka la dep siew sha u kontraktor T.139.12 klur sha ka Nice Infotech kompani. Ka jingpynbha ia ki jaka ieng kali ka la dep tang 22 na ka 100. Ka jinglut baroh ka long T.46 klur bad ka jingsiew sha u kontraktor ka long T.6.27 klur.Ha kitei ki jaka lah ban pynieng 257 tylli ki kali, 87 tylli ki bos bad 65 tylli ki trok bad ka thong ban pyndep ka long ha u Lber 2025. Ka jinglut na ka bynta ka jingshna ia ka Polo Commercial Complex kan long haduh T.100.33 crore. Ka thong ban pyndep ka dei ha u Jylliew 2025.
title: Sngewkhia u Myntri Sniawbhalang Dhar ba suki ban pyndep ïa ki project

content: Ka Army Public School, Shillong ka la shah pynbna kum ka skul ba jop ha ka National Level AWES English Debate Competition 2023. Ha katei ka kynhun, la mihkhmat da u Dhruv Sharma jong ka klas XII Sc, Shaakshi Rai jong ka klas XII Com bad u Subhodeep Dey jong ka klas XI Sc. Ka bynta jong katei ka jingïakop ïa tai nia ne Debate ka dei halor ka “Ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka Artificial Intelligence – kaba long ka jingma ba ap na ka bynta ka ïoh kam ïoh jam ne kaba ktah ïa ka ïoh ka kot”. Ïa katei ka jingïakop, la pynïaid da ka Army Public School ha Dhaula Kuan, New Delhi.Ha katei ka jingïakop, la kynthup ïa ka jingïakop ba shongshit napdeng ki skul Army Public jong ka ri hapoh ki jinghukum bapher bapher. La don haduh hynriew tylli ki nongjop jong ka command-level kiba la ïashim bynta na ka bynta ka khusnam.Ha ka jinglong ka nongjop jong ka command level, ka APS Shillong ka la mihkhmat na ka Eastern Command ha ka phainal. Katba ki kynhun kiba la mihkhmat na ka bynta ki san tylli kiwei pat ki command ki kynthup ïa ka APS Jabalpur II (Central Command), APS Devlali (Southern Command), APS Akhnoor (Northern Command), APS Ratnuchak (Western Command) bad APS Ganganagar (South West Command).U Dhruv Sharma jong ka APS Shillong u la long u nongbishar kum uba tbit ban kren pyrshah ïa ki nongïakop ne motion bad u Subhodeep Dey jong ka APS Shillong u long kum u nongïasaid nia ba tbit ne interjector.Ha katei ka jingïakop, la pynïaid hapoh ka jinghikai jong u principal, u Rajeevan P.Katei ka jingïakop, ka la long ka jingshem ba shongshit na ka bynta ki samla ba ïashim bynta ha ka ban ïa tasi nia naba ka ai lad ïa ki ban pynpaw halor katei ka rynsan ïa ki jingsngew jong ki bad ka pynïar ïa ka rukom kren jong ki.
title: Jop ka Army Public School ha ka jingïakop ïa tai nia(Debate)

content: U nongaiktien jong ka Meghalaya BJP, u Bah Mariahom Kharkrang u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia u Myntri Rangbah Modi bad ia u Myntri ki kam lynti syngkien, u Nitin Gadkari na ka bynta ka jingmang pisa shuh shuh sa T.1,241 klur  ban pynheh shuh shuh ia ka Phulbari-Tura National Highway 127 (B).Kane ka jingpynheh surok double lane, kan iarap ia ka jingpoi suk jong ki kali sha Tura bad sha kiwei ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya, kum ka Tura-Dalu side) bad Tura-Jengjal-Rongjeng-Nongstoin-Shillong.“Ka India ka la ioh ia ka jinglaitluid mynta la 76 snem bad ka Meghalaya ka la ioh ia ka jylla bapura mynta la 50 snem bad ki Sorkar kiba la leit noh ki Sorkar kiba mynshuwa ki la klet lut ia ka jingkongsan jong ki surok.“Ngi iaroh ia ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba la kloi ban weng lem ia kine ki jingeh jong ka Meghalay“Ngi iaroh ia ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba la kloi ban weng lem ia kine ki jingeh jong ka Meghalaya”, la ong u Bah Kharkrang  bad bteng shuh ba dei ban kyrshan ia u Myntri Rangbah Modi ba ka Sorkar jong u kaba don ka jingiadei bad ki paidbah, ki dei ban nang bteng.
title: Iaroh ka Meghalaya BJP ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ba pynheh ïa ka surok Phulbari-Tura

content: U nongrwai Pop ba pawnam ba dei u nong Jamaica bad America, u Sean Kingston, uba la pawnam ha ki snem 2000, ha ki jingrwai ba kynthup ïa ka “Beautiful Girls” bad “Fire Burning,” u la pynkhreh ban leit rwai ha ka sngi ba rakhe ïa u snem thymmai ha Tura ha ka 30 tarik, Nohprah.Ha katei ka tamasa, yn sa dap da ka jingshongshit ha ka por janmiet lem bad ki jingrwai ba sngewtynnad. La tip ïa utei u nongrwai kum u Kisean Anderson ïa uba la kha ha ka 3 tarik, Rymphang 1990, u Sean Kingston u long u nongrwai ba nongrwai ba pawnam bad uba kiew ha ka kam rwai, uba la dep rwai haduh saw tylli ki jingrwai studio album, 21 tylli ki jingrwai bad san tylli ki music video ha ki arphew snem ba la dep.La pynithuh da ka kompeni Sony imprint Epic ha ka aïom pyrem jong u 2007 lem bad ka jingrwai “Colors 2007,” ba la rwai lang da ka kynhun Game and Rick Ross, u Kingston u la kloi ban kiew ha ka kam rwai jong u. Ha ujuh hi u snem, u la ïohrah ïa ka khusnam Best Reggae Ever Acts na ka bynta ka jingrwai “Beautiful Girls” ha ka jingsam ïa ka khusnam MOBO. Katba kiwei pat ki khusnam ki dei kiba la bteng bad ka jingbun ka jingjop jong u ha ki jingrwai reggae, kaba la pynlong ïa u ba un pawnam ha ka kam rwai. U Kingston u la dep ïohrah ruh ïa ka khusnam Outstanding New Artist ha u snem 2008.
title: Yn leit rwai u Sean Kingston ha Tura

content: Uwei na ki khraw pyrkhat jong ka ri Greece, u Heraclitus u ïathuh ïa ngi, ba kiei kiei ki jong kane ka pyrthei, kim neh kum juh bad ki ïakylla man ka la khyllip mat. Ïa kine ki kyntien jong une u khraw pyrkhat, ngi lah ban ong ba ki ïahap bad ka jinglong jong ka Government Fruit Preservation Centre kaba mynta kaba don Fruit Garden, Shillong. Kane ka Centre kam shym la neh kum juh. La sdang ïa ka ha ka snem 1955 kum ka Fruit Processing Factory ba nyngkong ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ha Fruit Garden ha ka jaka jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya.Ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ka por, ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka la pynmih sa ïa ka tnad kaba ïa dei bad ka rep soh rep pai bad tip kum ka Horticulture Department. Wat la kane ka Centre ka dang long hi ka bynta jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang bad ka bha ka miat ki nongriang; hynrei, mynta ka la hap hapoh ka jingpynïaid jong ka Directorate Food Processing bad jingpynïaid jong u Assistant Director jong ka tnad Horticulture. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka Centre ka long ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep soh rep pai, ha kaba ka Sorkar ka ïarap ïa ki nongrep kumno ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki soh bad kumno ban leh ba kin ym pyut.Ha kine ki sngi ka Government Fruit Preservation Centre ka ïoh ïa ka nam ka burom namarba ka ai jinghikai ïa ki nongrep kumno ban shna umsoh na ki sohniamtra, sohtrun, sohiong, soh phie, carambola, strawberry, shophan, sohmanir, sohbrap bad kiwei. Kane ka Centre ka pynmih ïa ka jam sohtrun, sohïong, strawberry, sohphan, sohplom, sohphareng, mixed fruit bad kiwei. Kane ka Centre ka pynmih ruh ïa kawei ka jait jingbam Marmalade na ki soh bad snep sohniamtra. Kane ka Centre ka pyni ïa ki soh kiba la ot rit ba them ha ki tin. Ïa kine ki soh ba la ot rit bad thep ha ki tin ki long kiba ïaid ïew bha ym tang hangne ha jylla hynrei shabar jylla ruh. Kane ka Centre ka pynmih ruh ïa u ashar sohmynken, ashar lungsiej, ashar sohpieng jyrngam bad ashar sohphan. Haba kheiñ kyllum, ka jingpynmih jam bad umsoh na kane ka Centre ka long haduh 30 metrik ton shi snem.Kane ka Centre ka ai jinghikai ïa ki nongrep bad ïa ki briew shimet na kawei ka por sha kawei pat baroh saw aiom, la ka long kumno ban shna umsoh, ban pynmih jam bad kiwei ki jait jingai jinghikai kiba ïa dei bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki kor ki bor pynmih um soh bad shna jam kiba ïa dei bad kane ka juk kaba mynta. La ïathuh ba ki nongrep jong ka Mizoram ki la wan sha Government Fruit Preservation Centre ban twad jingmut na kane ka Centre kumno ban pyndonkam ïa u soh Dragon Fruit uba mih kynrei ha katei ka jylla. Ki nongrep ka Mizoram ki la wan, ki la shah hikai bad ki la leit phainoh sha la ka jylla da ka khmat baphuh samrkhie ba mynta ki la nang ban shna ïa ka jam kaba bang na u soh Dragon Fruit.Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ka por, ka la pynhap ïa ka jingpeit Government Fruit Preservation Centre hapoh ka jingpeit jingjngoh jong ka tnad Agriculture & Farmers’ Welfare Department jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya. Ym tang katta, ïa ka jingtrei kam jong ka pat la peit da ka Directorate of Food Processing hapoh ka jingpynïaid jong ka Office of Assistant Director of Horticulture (Food Proccessing). Ka jingthmu jong kane ka Centre ka long ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep soh rep pai ha kaba ka Sorkar ka kyrshan ïa ki nongrep kumno ban kyntiew ïa ka jingthung diengsoh bad ïa ka rep soh rep pai bad kumno ban leh ba kin ym pyut.Ka Government Fruit Conservation Centre ka la ïoh ïa ka nam ka burom ba ka ai ïa ki jinghikai kiba bha bad ïoh ïaroh ïa ka jingkhuid ka jingsuba, ym kum kiwei pat ki karkhana Sorkar kiba da ki jakhlia. Hynrei, ngi klet pat ba la don kito ki nongtrei Sorkar kiba la buh ki mawnongrim ïing kiba khlaiñ ba kane ka Centre kan lah ban shna ïa ki jingeh bapher bapher na ka daw jong ka jingkylla jong ka por. Kawei napdeng kita, kiba ngi la dei ban kynmaw, hynrei ngi la khum klet noh, ka dei ka Annada Gohain, kaba la long ka nongprat lynti banyngkong ban seng ban buh ïa ka Fruit Processing Factory jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka Sorkar Assam ha Fruit Garden, Shillong.Ha kine ki bnai ba la dep, ka nam ka burom jong ka Annada Gohain ka la saphriang sha ki saw lyer jong ka pyrthei, ïa kaba ma ngi hangne ha Meghalaya, ngi la klet noh ban kynmaw burom ïa ka. Ha u Nailar, 2023, ka University of New South Wales kaba don ha Sydney, Australia ka la pynkup burom ïa kito kiba la pule ha katei ka University. Kane jingpynkup burom ka dei na ka bynta kito kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingpule na katei ka University bad kiba la noh ïa u synñiang ban kyntiew ïa ka rep soh rep pai kham tam na ka bynta ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki kor ki bor ka juk mynta ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki rep soh rep pai. Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane, ka University of New South Wales, Australia ka la ai kyrteng ïa kawei ka Hall “Go6” ba kynmaw burom ïa ka Annada Gohain kaba long ka kynthei ba nyngkong ba pyndep ïa ka jingpule na ka University South Wales School of Chemical Engineering, Sydney, Australia.
