Ym tang namarba ka la pyndep ïa ki jingpule jong ka na katei ka University.Hynrei, kham tam eh ïa u synñiang ba ka la noh ban kyntiew ïa ka rep soh rep pai bad ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. Kane ka longkmie ka la long ka nongprat lynti ba nyngkong ha kane ka liang ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. La kha ïa ka ha North Guwahati, Assam. Haba ka la pyndep ïa ka jingpule ïa ka B.Sc ha ka subject Chemistry, ka la leit ban trei noh ha ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka Sorkar Assam, ha Shillong ha ki snem 1950 bad ka la long ka nongseng nongbuh ïa ka Fruit Processing Factory ha Fruit Garden ha ka snem 1955. Hadien kane, ka la leit ban pyntbit shuh shuh ïa ki jingpule jong ka ha liang ka Food Processing Technology kaba hap hapoh ka Colombo Plan Programme jong ka University of New South Wales. Haba ka la pyndep ïa ka jingpule ha ka kyrdan M.Sc na katei ka University ha ka snem 1959, ka la wan trei biang hapoh ka tnad ka rep ka riang ha Shillong, kaba long ka nongbah jong ka Assam ha kata ka por.Ki jingtrei jong ka ha katei ka por ka long ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki soh ki pai kiba don ha kine ki jaka ki jong ngi, kum ki sohniamtra, sohphareng, sohphoh bad sohplom kiba soh kyrhai. Kine ki jingtrei ki jong ka, ki la wanrah ïa ka jingseng jingbuh ïa ka Food Processing Factory ha Fruit Garden kaba nyngkong ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. Ka jingpynmih ïa ki umsoh bad ka jam na kane ka jaka, ka la kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki nongrep ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. Ïa ki umsoh bad ka jam ba pynmih nangne, la pynïaid ïew da ka kyrteng, “Meg Fruit” bad mynta la pynïaid ïew da ka kyrteng, “Meg”. Haba ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ïa la ka jong ka jylla bapura ha snem 1972, ka Annada Gphain ka la dei ban leit phai noh sha Assam. Hynrei, ka la bteng ïa ka jingtrei jong ka ha ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka dur jong ka deputation haduh ka snem 1979.Ka la leit phai noh sha Assam bad trei ha ka tnad ka rep ka riang. Ka la shong thait kum ka Additional Director jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka Sorkar Assam. Hadien ba ka la shongthait bad wat lada ka la don hapdeng ka jingpangmat bad jingktha shyieng, ka la pyllut ïa ki sngi jong ka ha kaba thoh ïa ki jingthoh kiba ïa dei bad ka rep soh rep pai bad kiwei ki jingshem jong ka halor kane ka liang. Ka la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei ha ka snem 2021 hadien ba ka jingpang ka la bat ïa ka la kham slem. Ki matti ki jong ka ki dang ïai bteng haduh kine ki sngi bad ka Government Fruit Preservation Centre ka nang suhsieng iwbih bad pynïeng la ka rasong.
title: Nang kiew ka jingtrei kam ka Government Fruit Preservation Centre

content: Ki khun u Hynniewtrep ryngkat bad ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei ki la rakhe ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba phraphew lai jong u Myllung bakhraw, u Soso Tham. Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane, u Lat ka Meghalaya, u Phagu Chauhan bad kum juh ruh u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K. Sangma u la ki la phah ïa ki kyrwoh kitbok kit rwiang sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka jylla. Ki kyrwoh ba kine ki khlieh nongsynshar jong ka jylla ki la phah sha ki nongshong shnong, ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingkynmaw tympang ïa ka jingnoh synñiang jong u Myllung Soso Tham sha ka thoh ka pule bad kham tam eh ha ka liang ka poitri. U Myllung Soso Tham ula thoh ïa ka kot Duitara Ksiar, Ki Sngi Barim U Hynniewtrep bad kiwei.Ha ka jingphah kyrwoh, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïaroh ïa u Myllung Soso Than ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka ktien Khasi bad kham tam eh ïa ki poim jong u, kiba long ka ïit khmih jong ka mynnor bad ki jingsneng jingkraw ban pynneh pynsah ïa la ka larity bad ka jinglong tynrai jong ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep. Ha kane katei ka sngi, ka Khasi Authors’ Society bad kiwei ki seng ki la tuid sha tyngkong jong ka State Central Library ha Shillong ban leit buh syntiew ha u mot sah kynmaw jong u.
title: Rakhe ki khun Hynniewtrep ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap u Myllung Soso Tham

content: :U President jong ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council, u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la pynsngew ïa ka jingdonkam ban pyntrei kam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP)  Meghalaya. U Bah Synrem u la ïathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka angnud ïa ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka ILP. U Bah Synrem u la ïathuh ruh ba u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u khlem shongthait ha kaba pyrshang ban pyntrei kam ïa ka ILP ka Meghalaya bad ba ka la don bun sien ka jingïakren hapdeng ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ka Sorkar Pdeng halor kane ka bynta.Haba kren na ka liang ka imlang sahlang bad ruh na ka liang jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong, u Bah Synrem ula ong ba ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka ILP ka long kaba donkam haduh katta katta ha kane ka por kaba mynta. Une u nongïalam jong ka HYC u la ïathuh ba ka seng kan pyrshah ïa ka jingwan ka rel sha Meghalaya.
title: Yn pyrshah ka HYC ïa ka jingwan ka rel sha Meghalaya

content: U MDC ba shu thung ha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council, uba long ruh u nongïalam barim ka United Democratic Party (UDP) u Bah Bindo M Lanong mynta ka 18 Tarik Nohprah, 2023, u la pyntip ba kum u MDC, un ai noh ka jingkyrshan bapura sha ïa ka kynhun  ba ïalam ïa ka KHADC ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front (KHDF) ba la ïalam da ka National People Party.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ïa u Bah Bindo M Lanong la jied kum u MDC ba la shu thung na ka Party UDP, ha ka 28 tarik Jylliew 2019.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Bindo M Lanong u la kdew ba kane ka rai kaba u la shim ban ai noh ka jingkyrshan sha ka party ba ïalam ïa ka KHADC ka long hadien ba na ka liang ki nongïalam ka UDP ki la leh bym suidñiew ïa ka jingdon jong u ha ka party UDP.“Wat hadien ba ka UDP ka la kyntait ban ai ka tiket ban ïakhun ïa ka MLA election, ruh nga la phah da ka shithi ban pynpaw ïa ka jingkwah ba ngan ïa khun ïa ka MP election na ka UDP bad kyntu ïa ki ba kin klet noh ïa kaei kaba la jia hynrei haduh mynta kim pat shem la jubab eiei” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh ba ” ki nongïalam ka UDP, wat ha ka jingïalang ka General Council ka party ruh kim shym la khot bad pyntip eiei shuh ïa nga, u nongseng ïa ka UDP kumta ngam banse shuh ban shim noh ïa lade kum u briew ba khlem seng shuh”.U Bah Bindo u la ong ruh haduh mynta um pat ju kyrtiap seng hynrei ka jinglong jingman bad ka rukom leh ki ïalam ka UDP ka la pynlong ïa u ba un long marwei bad shim ruh ïa ka rai ban ai noh ka jingkyrshan ba pura sha ka kynhun ba ïalam ïa ka KHADC hapoh ka jingïalam u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.U la pynshai ruh ba haduh mynta ym pat shim kano kano ka rai ban pynïasoh sha kano kano ka party hynrei hadien ba u la shah ïeh marwei na ka party UDP, u la ñiew ïalade kum u MDC shimet bad rai ban ai noh ka jingkyrshan ba pura sha ka kynhun ba ïalam da u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kum u CEM ka KHADC
title: Ka jingleh ki nongïalam ka UDP ka pynlong ïa nga ban phai khmat noh sha ka kynhun u Bah Pyniaid ha KHADC: Bindo

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, u la kyntu ïa ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka jingpeit ka KHADC ban ai ïa ki jaka na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki Resource Recovery Center (RRC), khnang ban lah ban pynduna noh ïa ka jingkhia jong ka jaka bret ñuit ha Marten, kaba don ha Mawlai .Myn ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2023, u CEM ka KHADC u la aiti ïa ka Trok kit ñuit kaba la mang na ka Chief Minister Development Fund jong u snem 2022-23 ha ka jinglut kaba la kot sha ka T.23 lak, sha ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah.Ha ba kren ha kane ka sngi u bah Pyniaid u la ong ba ka jingpynlait ïa ki skhim bapher bapher ha kaba ïadei bad ka Solid Waste Mangement kane ka long hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jingïatai halor ka jingwanrah ïa ka khuid ka suba ha Ri Khasi, bad na ka liang ka Council ka la ïoh ruh ban wanrah ïa kawei ka aiñ kaba la tip kum ka Solid Waste Management Act 2020, ka ba la mynjur da u Lat ka jylla bad lyngba kane ka aiñ, ka Council ka la ïoh ka lad ban ïa trei lang bad ki Hima ki nongïalam shnong ban wanrah ïa ka khuid ka suba.“Haba kdew halor ka khuid ka suba, lada ngi phai sha ka shnong Mawlai kaba don ïa ka jaka ban buh ïa ki ñuit na ka Nongbah Shillong, ka Marten katno ka long kaba sngewsynei ban peit namar baroh ki ñuit ngi leit buh shatei”.“Kumta kum ka District Council ka ban ïa trei lang bad ki bor shnong, kan ym dei tang ban aiti ïa ki kali  kit ïa u ñuit na ki shnong  hynrei ka kwah ban pyrkhat ruh ban  wanrah da ki  Resource Recovery Center (RRC) ha man ki shnong ki thaw ha Ri Khasi”, u la ong.U la bynrap, “Ka RRC ka long na ka bynta ki shnong kiba don ki jaka ban pynsaphraing ïa ki ñuit ha ka rukom kaba dei, bad kan long ruh kum ka jaka ban ai jingshai sha ki paidbah ba ka RRC kan long kum ka lad ïohkam ïohjam bad ka jingkha pisa na ki ñuit” .U Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba “ngi  kyntu ïa ki shnong kiba don ïa ki jaka ba kin ai ïa ki jaka na ka bynta ban buh ïa ki RRC khnang ban ym donkam shuh ban leit buh ïa ki nuit sha duh marten hynrei ban  lah ban pynbit pynbiang tang ha ki shnong hi” .“Ka jingthmu ba ha khmat ka District council ka long ban ai ka jingïarap na ka bynta ki jaka ïew ki shnong ki jaka paidbah ban ïoh ban ai jingïarap lyngba kine ki skhim bapher bapher”.Ha kane ka sngi ka na ka liang ka Dorbar Shnong Rynjah ka la ai khusnam ruh ïa ki nongtrei ASHA bad Aganwadi ban ai jingithuh ïa ka jingshakri jong ki ha ka imlang sahlang.Ha kane ka jingïalang la don lang ruh u  MDC u Bah Bindo Lanong, u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem, u Rangbah Shnong, ki longkmie, ki nongshong ïew bad ki paid nongshong shnong.Na ka liang u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem ula pynbna ban synñiang da ka song pisa sha ka Dorbar Shnong.
title: Ym tang ki kali kit ñuit hynrei ai ki jaka sha ka KHADC ba kan ai da ka jaka bret ñuit ha man ki shnong: Pyniaid

content: U Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban pyndonkam bha ïa ki aiñ kiba don mynta ban ïada ïa ka jingwanrung kyrthep jong ki bar jylla sha Meghalaya. U Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ong ba dei ban pyndon kam pyrkhing ïa ki aiñ kiba don mynta katba ka jylla ka dang ap ïa ka jingpyntrei kam jong ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) da ka Sorkar Pdeng. U Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki aiñ kiba don mynta ki dei ka Land Transfer Act, Trading by Non-Tribal Regulations Act, Labour Act bad kiwei ki long ki stieh jingïada ïa ka jingwan rung jong kiwei ki jaitbynriew sha Meghalaya.Dang shen, ka tnad ki kam pohïing jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la kyntait ïa ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security (Amendment) Bill, 2020 ka ban long ïa ka jingïada ïa ka jingwanrung jong kiwei pat ki briew sha Meghalaya. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ong ba kam dei tang ka kamram jong ka Sorkar ban rah ïa kine ki jingdonkam hakhmat jong ka Sorkar Pdeng, hynrei, ka dei ruh ka kamram jong uwei pa uwei u nongshong jong ka Meghalaya. U Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka MRSSA ïa kaba la mynjur da ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ jong ka Meghalaya ban ïada ïa ka jingwan ruh jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew sha Meghalaya, kan ym don kano kano ka jingpynthud pynwit bad ka jingktah ïano ïano. U Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh uba long ruh uwei na ki nongïalam jong ka seng saiñ hima sima, ula ong ba lada pyntrei kam bha ïa ka aiñ Trading by Non-Tribal Act, kane ruh ka ïarap shibun ban khang lad ïa ka jingwan jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew sha kane ka jylla.Une u rangbah ula ong ba ka jingïoh lad jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew ban rung sha Meghalaya ka long ha ka dur jong ki nongshongwai bad lada kitei ki aiñ ki trei kam bha, kane kan ïarap ban tehlakam ïa ka jingwanrung jong kiwei pat ki briew. Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingtieng jong ki paidbah ïa ka jingwan jong ka rel sha Meghalaya, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ha ka jingsngewthuh jong u, ym dei ban tieng shaphang kane, lada kine ki aiñ kiba don mynta ki trei kam bha. Une u rangbah ula ïathuh ba lada ka rel ka wan sha Meghalaya, kan don ka jinghiar jong ka dor jong ki mar ki mata. U la ai nuksa ba ka jingshalan jong u sohniamtra na Meghalaya sha kiwei pat ki jylla ruh ka jyn da la hiar shibun bad ka ïoh ka kot jong ka jylla ruh kan neh hi hangne ha Meghalaya.
title: Dei ban pyntrei kam bha ïa ki aiñ badon mynta ban khang lad ïa ka jingwan ki bar jylla: Ronnie V. Lyngdoh

content: :Ki Dkhot ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People (FKJGP) Sohryngkham Circle, ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2023 ki la dawa na u Sordar ka Sohryngkham u Bah Donbor Kharmujai ban khot da ka dorbar ba kyrkieh ban pynshai halor ka jingailad ban thied jaka ïa kawei ka longkmie ka ba ïoh lok da u bar jylla.Na ka liang u President ka FKJGP Sohryngkham Circle, u Bah Wanlambok Kharmalki u la ong ba ka seng kan ym lah ban pdiang ïa ki longkmie Khasi ki ba ïoh lok da u bar jylla ba kin ïoh ban thied ïa ka jaka ka puta ha Sohryngkham.“Ngi kyntu ia u Sordar ba u dei ban khot da ka Dorbar bad un pynshai ia ka nongrim halor ka jingïoh thied jaka kane ka longkmie ka ba ïoh lok bar jylla ha Sohryngkham bad kane kan long ruh ban khanglad ïa u Sordar ba un leh la ka jong ka mon khlem da pyntip ïa ka EC ha ka shnong ka thaw”.U la bynrap ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ngi la dep ban ujor sha u Paiem Balajied Sing Syiem sha u CEM ka KHADC bad kumjuh sha ki bor ba dei peit ban ujor halor ka jingleh mon u ne u Sordar hynrei haduh mynta kam pat shem la don kano kano ka jubab na ka liang jong ki”.Na ka liang u Bah Rocky Kharduit General Secreatary u la ong ba na ka liang ka FKJGP ka pynpaw ïa ka jing sngew pyrshah jur ïa u Sordar ka Sohryngkham halor ka jingsoi ïa ka dulir sha kawei ka longkmie ka ba la ïoh lok da u bar jylla ha kane ka shnong.“Kane ka long ba u la ïaid lait ïa ki kyndon ka shnong ka ba la pynmih ha ka 3 tarik u Naitung 2002, kaba la mana pyrshah ban khang lad ïa kano kano ka briew ka ba ïoh lok bar jylla ba kan ïoh ban thied jaka ha ka shnong Sohryngkham” u la ong.
title: Halor ka jingïoh thied jaka ka longkmie ba ïoh lok barjylla ha Sohryngkham pan jingshai ka FKJGP na u Sordar Shnong

content: :Ki nongïalam ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2023 ki la pynlong da ka jingïalang ban kynmaw burom ïaka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba 83 snem jong u Myllung Soso Tham ha phyllaw ka Soso Tham Auditorium Shillong.Na ka liang ka HYC ha ka jingïalam u president rangbah, u Bah Roykupar Synrem, u nongïalam barim ka u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin lem bad ki dkhot na kylleng ki unit kila pynlong ka jing ïabuh syntiew ha khmat u Mot-Dur u Soso Tham.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi u president ka HYC u Bah Roykupar Synrem u la pynkynmaw ïa ki kam ba ratbah ki ba u Myllung Soso Tham u la leh na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew.“Ki kam ki ba u Myllung SoSo Tham u la leh ka pynlong ïa ki longdien ba dei ban pyndonburom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap jong u Myllung ka Jaitbynriew. U Myllung Soso Tham u dei u nonghikai, u ba la ai ka jinghikai ym tang ha ki skul hynrei u ai ka jinghikai ïa ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew halor ka akor ka burom bad kumno ban poi sha kliar lum jong ka man” u la ong.U la bynrap, ”hynrei haba phai sha ki jingeh jong ki nonghikai ha ka jylla mynta, ka jingkylli ka long ba kaei ba ka sorkar ka ai sha ki nonghikai jong ngi?”.“Dang shen ki nonghikai bala shongthait kila pynpaw ba wat la ki la ai ka jingshakri la 30 snem ruh hynrei kim pat ïoh satia ïa ka bai bam tymmen, hynrei ki MLA ki ba tang 2 snem ki la ïoh ïa ki Baibam tymmen, ”u la ong.U la kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba ka dei ban ai ïa ka burom sha ki nonghikai kum ba ki dei ban ïoh ym ban shu pyndon burom ïa ki tang ha ka sngi kyrpang jong ki.U la ai jingmut ruh sha ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban pynthikna ba baroh ki nonghikai ha ki skul kin shah kynthup haka juh ka thup rukom siew tulop.“ka Sorkar ka dei ban kyntiew ïaki nonghikai ka Jylla da ka ba wanrah da ki  Policy ki ban ïarap ban ban ai burom ïaki nonghikai ka Jylla” u la ong.Haba ïadei bad ka jingthmu ka Sorkar ban wanrah noh daki kot NCERT ha ka jylla, u Bah Roykupar u la kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba ka dei ban bishar bha shwa ban pynurlong ïa kane.U Bah Roykupar u la ong baka Sorkar Jylla kadei ban pynthikna ba kot NCERT ki ban pyndonkam haki skul kidei ban pynneh ïaka thymmei jong ki trai ri ka Jylla Meghalaya khamtam haba ïadei bad ka jingsynñiang ki riew khraw thohkot ki ba dei ki trai Ri ha ka Jylla.Ha kane ka sngi la sam ruh ïa ki khusnam sha ki nong jop jingai jingkren lyngkot kaba la pynlong da kane ka seng halor ka mat ‘Jingma Ka Jaidbynriew namar ka Jingai Jaitkpa’ bad ka jingthoh Essay halor ka phang pdeng ‘Khulom Ksiar’ ïaka bala pynlong daka Socio Cultural Cell.
title: Ha ka sngi kynmaw burom ïa ka sngi ïap u Myllung Soso Tham: kyntu ka HYC ïa ka sorkar ban burom ïa ki nonghikai ha ka jylla

content: :U Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, u MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency ha ka jingjurip ba kyrpang ne surprise inspection ïa ka jingtei ïa ka jaka sumar nongpang  ka Sub Center kaba don ka shnong Pyndenlyngdoh, South West Khasi Hills District u la ong ba ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad ka koit ka khiah shen kan sa ïoh ban plie noh ïa ka khnang ba ki paidbah jong ka san shnong area kin ïoh jingmyntoi.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ka jingplie ïa kane ka jaka sumar kan long ruh kum ka dak jong ka jingaisngewbha Christmas ïa ki paidbah jong ki san tylli ki shnong.Lah ban kdew ruh ba ïa ka Sub Center ha Pyndenlyngdoh la pyntrei ha ka jingmang pisa kaba T. 50 lak tam ei ei bad ka ban sa pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa ki san tylli ki shnong kata ka Shnong Manad, Mawbidong, Lummawbah, Pyndenlyngdoh bad Pyndensohlang.Ha kane ka sngi la synran ruh da ki riew rangbah jong ki san tylli ki shnong.
title: Da ka Health Sub Center yn ïoh ki 5 tylli ki shnong ha shwa ka Christmas: Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar

content: Kawei ka ïing tap shilliang kaba la shna ha jrong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank ha Lumshatsngi, Laban ha ka step jong ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2023 ka la shah bam duh ha ka ding.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por kumba 11 baje mynstep bad la suba ba kane ka jingkem ka ding ka lah ban dei na ka jingklet ban pynlip ïa ka gas shet jingshet .Kane ka ïing tap shilliang  ka dei ka ïing  jong u Munna Ahmed kaba la shna da ki lyntang bad ki tin na ka bynta ban ai sah shipor ïa ki bar jylla kiba wan ban bylla sha kane ka thaiñ.Na ka liang ki pulit pynlip ding ki la ïoh ban poi kloi sha kane ka jaka bad ïoh ban tem  ïa kane ka jingklang ka ding .Na ka liang u MLA ka South Shillong Constituency u Bah Sanbor Shullai mynta ka step u la hiar ban jurip ïa kane ka jaka kaba la shah bam duh ha ka ding.Na ka liang ki nongpynïaid shnong ki la kyntu ïa ki bor ba dei peit ba kin leh ïa ka ba donkam pyrshah ïa une u trai ïing namar ka jingshna khlem da bud ïa ki kyndon ban shna ïa ki ïing namar ka rukom shna ïa kine ki ïing ka long ka bym ishngain eiei.
title: Pluh ka ïing tap shiliang ka ba la shna ha jrong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank ha Laban

content: :Ha ka step jong ka 27 tarik Naiwieng 2023, kawei ka ïing kaba la shna da ka lyntang kaba ju pyndonkam ban buh ïa ki tiar ba la rim ka la ingkhong lut na ka daw ka jingbam shngiam ha ka ding. Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 6 baje eiei ha ka por mynstep ha ka dong Sngithiang Lower Mawprem.Kane ka dei ka ïing jong ka Kong Lawaniar Kharmalong, kaba la aiwai sha kawei pat ka longïing bad ka bynta kaba ing ka dei ka jaka ba ju pynlang ïa ki tiar ba la rim. Ha kane ka jingjia ym shem la don mano mano ba mynsaw lane kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.Kat kum ka jingïathuh ki basah marjan la ong ba kane ka jingjia ka lah ban dei na ka jingthud ha ka bording elektrik.
title: Ingkhong ka ïing dieng ba buh tiar ha Mawprem

content: :Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la ïakynduh ïa u chief secretary myn ha ka 27 tarik, Naiwieng bad ka la phah da ka dorkhas(memorandum) ha kaba ka la pan ïa ka kaiphod ba la shna da ka Expert Committee halor ka State Reservation Policy (SRP).“Ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ka Expert Committee, kaba la dei ban khreh ïa ka State Reservation Policy (SRP), ka la ïakynduh myn ha ka 23 tarik, Naiwieng. Kin sa pynlong biang ha ka 6 tarik, Nohprah bad pynbeit da jingïalang ba lai sien ha nongbah Shillong. Kaba bud da katei, ka Expert Committee kan sa ïohpdiang ïa ki jingtyrwa na baroh ki party saiñ pyrthei bad ki party ba don jingmut, ong u president jong ka KHNAM, u Thomas Passah sha ki lad pathai khubor.U Passah u la ong ba ïa katei ka mat, la pynslem palat bad ba ka jingpynkylla ïa ka polisi ba don ar sla, ym dei ban pynslem.
title: Ïakynduh ka KHNAM ïa u CS ban ïakren halor ka kaiphod jong ka State Reservation Policy

content: U Myntri ka thoh ka pule jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Rakkam A. Sangma ula iathuh ba kawei na ki jingeh ki bakhraw ha kaba buh ia ki sawphew tylli Eklavya Model Residential School hapoh jylla ka dei ka jingeh ban ioh jaka. U Rakkam A. Sangma u la iathuh ia kane ha ki nongthoh kotkhubor bad lad pathai khubor hadien ba ula pyllong ia ka jingbuhdien ia ka jngshna ia ki Eklavya Model Residential School.U Myntri u la iathuh ba yn sa don ka jingshna ia kito katto katne tylli kine ki Residential School. U la iathuh don padeng jong kine ki skul kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh ia ki Detail Project Report, don katto katne ki skul kiba la Sorkar ka la dep mang pisa, ki skul kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingkhot Tender bad don kiwei pat ki skul ha kaba ka Sorkar ka don don hapdeng ka jingpynshang ban ioh jaka.U Rakkam u la ithuh ba ka jingeh kaba khraw ha kaba buh ia kine ki Residential School jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka long ba ka Sorkar jylla kan hap ban ai jaka haduh khadsan akar khlem kano kano ka jingsiew. U la iathuh ba ki trai jaka kim treh ban ai ia ka jaka ei ia ka jaka jong ki.Hynrei, na ka liang jong ka Sorkar jylla kan iai buddien ia kane ka kam ba kan iaid sha khmat bad ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah nongshong jong ka jylla. U Myntri Rakkam A. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka don ka jingtuyrwa ai kam na ka jingai jaka ban shna ia kitei ki Residential School hapoh ka jylla.
title: Shem jingeh ka Sorkar jylla ban ïoh jaka ban shna ïa ki Eklavya Model Residential School

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la ai por hynriew phew sngi ia uwei u Consultant bathymmai ba un ai ia ka kaiphot jong u ha kaba ia dei bad ka jinglut ban shna ia ka lynti ban hiar liengsuin ha Kad Liengsuin Umroi ha Ri Bhoi District. U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la iathuh ba ha shuwa jong kane, ka Sorkar ka la ioh ia ka kaiphod na uwei u Consultant ba ka jinglut na ka bynta ban shna ia ka lynti ban hiar liengsuin, kynthup ruh ia ka jingpom ia u lum ka long haduh 7,000 klur tyngka.U Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba long ruh u Myntri ba dei peit ia ki lynti ki syngkien, ula iathuh ba ka Sorkar kan pat shym leh pat leh ieie halor kane ka kaiphod namarba ka la shem ba ka jinglut ka long shaba palat. U la iathuh ba dei na kane ka daw, ka Sorkar kan dang hap ban ap ia kane ka kaiphot na une u Consultaant uba thymmai. Ha shuwa jong kane, ha ka 30 tarik u Risaw, ka Iing Bishar Meghalaya High Court, ka la bthah ia ka Sorkar jylla bad ia ka A Airports Authority of India (AAI) ba ki dei ban pyndep noh ia ka jingtohkit kaba ia dei bad ka jingpynheh ia ka lynti ban hiar liengsuin ha Kad LiengsuinUmroi bad na ka liang jong ka Sorkar pat lah ban ai jubab na ka daw jong kane ka jingeh. Kane ka jingpynheh ia ka lynti ban hiar liengsuin kan iarap ia ka jinglah ban hiar jong ki liengsuin kiba kham heh ha Kad Liengsuin Umroih ka Ri Bhoi District.
title: Ym pat lah ban ai kaiphot ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban shna ïa ka lynti hiar liengsuiñ ha Umroi

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la plie ia ki surok ha East Garo Hill, kiba kynthup ia ka surok hapdeng Nengmandalgre  bad Daribokgre (Mandalgre) kaba  35 kms, L042 Cherangre to Sisobibra (Nengmandalgre to Gitokgre) kaba 7.820 Km, ka jynkieng bajrong haduh 51.68 mitar halor ka Wah Rongon bad ia ka jynkieng kaba 51.68 mitar halor jong ka Wah Rongre ha ka jingialang kaba la pyllong ha madan Nengmandalgre. Kiba la ia don lang ha katei ka sngi ki long u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u MLA Marcuise N Marak bad ka dkhot jong ka Iing Dorbar Lok Sabha ka Agatha K Sangma. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba ka jingplie ia ki surok ka long kawei na ki lad ki lynti ban wanrah ia ka jingroi ha ka dong ka thain.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh  ia ka Agatha K. Sangma kaba la don ka bynta kaba khraw ban pynioh ia ka jngshan ia kitei ki surok lyngba ka MPGSY skim jong ka Sorkar Pdeng. U Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka thong jong ka Sorkar jong u ka long ban pynioh surok ia baroh, ban pynioh iing ia baroh, ban pynioh jingtip ia baroh, bad ban pynbiang um ia baroh.U la iathuh ba ha ka snem 2023-2024 la don ka jingmang pisa haduh 1,600 klur tyngka na ka bynta ka jingshna ia ki 1,500 tylli ki iing bad u la iaroh ruh ia ka Agatha K. Sangma na ka bynta jong kane. U la ithuh ruh ba kumno ka Sorkar ka trei shitom na ka bynta ka jingioh kami oh jan jong ki samla bad kiwei ki jingpyntrei kam na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki samla.Ha kaba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka jingdon jong ki surok ka wanrah ia ka jingsuk ha ka leit ka wan, ka pynioh ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah bad ka plie lad plie lynti na ka bynta ki samla pule ba kin lah ban ioh ia ka jingnang jingstad.U Bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka don ka jingthmu ban shna ia ki surok ha ka jingjngai kaba 1,200 Km hapoh jong ka jylla. U Bah Prestone Tynsong ula pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewburom ia ki khlieh nongsynshar jong ka Garo Hills kiba la kloi ban iatrei lang bad ka Sorkar ha kaba shna ia kine ki surok.
title: Plie surok u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ha East Garo Hills

content: Ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) kan sa pynlong ia ka ‘Trial Camp’ lane ka jingjied ia ki nongïalehkai haka 08-12-23 na ka bynta ka West Jaiñtia Hills District ia kaba kin sa leit ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Games 2024.Ha ka liang jong ki shynrang shynrang (Under-23) : 100 Meter, 200 Meter, 400 Meter, 800 Meter, 1500 Meter, 5000 Meter, 10,000 Meter, High Jump, Long Jump, Javelin Throw, 4×100 Meter bad ka Mixed Relay.Katba ha ka liang jong ki shynrang (Under-23) : 100 Meter, 200 Meter, 400 Meter, 800 Meter, 1500 Meter, 3000 Meter, 10,000 Meter, High Jump, Long Jump, Javelin Throw, 4×100 Meter bad ha ka Mixed Relay.Kane ka jingpyrshang lane ka jingjied nongïalehkai kan long kyrpang na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ West Jaintia District.Kiba thmu ban wan ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingpyrshang ki dei ban ym palat ia ka 23 snem bad ban ym duna ia ka 16 snem.Ki nongïalehkai kin donkam ruh ban wanrah ia ka Aadhaar Card, ka Birth Certificate (Original) ha katei ka tarik ba la kdew haneng por 7 baje mynstep.Na ka bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah lah ban phun ha u nombor : 9856109222, 9862274201.
title: Yn pynlong ka WJDSA da ka ‘Trial Camp’ na ka bynta ban jied ïa ki nongïalehkai Meghalaya Games

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la pynlong ka jingleit jngoh kaba kyndit halor ka kam khaïi, labour license bad ka professional tax ha baroh ki dukan ha Laitumkhrah jong kane ka nongbah, myn ha ka 27 tarik, Nailur.Ïa katei ka jingleit jngoh, la pynlong da ki pulit jong ka enforcement wing jong ka council ha baroh ki kam khaïi ba pynïaid da ki bar jylla naduh Fire Brigade haduh ka ïew Laitumkhrah.Katei ka kynhun, ba la lam da u executive member (EM), u Land Teibor Pathaw bad u MDC jong ka Laitumkhrah konstituensi, u Fantin Lakadong, ha kaba ki la lap ba bun ki dukan kim don ki kot ki sla ba biang halor ka professional tax. La don bun ki jingtei kiba la shah phah ban khang noh tad haduh ban da biang ki kot ki sla jong ki ban phah sha ka district council.Haba la kren sha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Lakadong u la pyntip ba ka executive committee (EC) jong ka KHADC dang shen, ka la rai ban sdang pynlong ïa katei ka jingleit jngoh khnang ba kito kiba dei trai jong ka dukan, khamtam ki bar jylla, ki dei ban bud ïa ka Trading by Non-Tribals Regulations act.“Palat 80 per cent jong ki dukan ha Laitumkhrah ki bud ïa ki kyndon jong ka district council naba bun na ki kim don ïa ka lisen khaïi bad labour hynrei bun na ki, ki la pulom ban pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla halor ka professional tax” ong u Lakadong.
title: Leit jngoh ka KHADC ïa ki dukan jong ki bar jylla

content: U Myntri ka liang pyrshah bad u kliehduh ka MP jong ka Congress na Shillong, u Ma Vincent H Pala myn ha ka nyngkong u la ong ba ka sorkar kam shym la thmu shisha shaphang ka jingïakren ïasuk ban sa ïaid bad ka seng Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) katba u la kyrpad ba ïa ka jingkynnoh ba dang shen da katei ka seng, dei ban pynsangeh noh.Katkum ka jingkren jong u, ka Centre, ka sorkar jylla bad ka seng HNLC ka donkam ban don jingmut shisha ban ïakren ïasuk ha kaba kut ka jingïakren. U la ai jingmut ruh ba ka sorkar ka la pyndonkam da u chairman barim jong ka HNLC, u Julius Dorphang, uba dei u nongthaw aiñ barim jong ka Mawhati, ba un wanrah ka jingsuk jingsaiñ ba shi junom.U Dorphang u la shah kem bad shah set phatok hadien ba u la shah kynnoh halor ka jingbatbor ïa ka khynnah rit.“Ka sorkar ka dei ban thmu shisha. Ka sorkar ka hap ban peit ba kumno ka jingpynrung kam thymmai ka dei ban pynsangeh noh bad ki paidbah kiba don shabar ka ri ki dei ban wan noh sha ka jylla lajong. Kam dei ba phi hap kren ïa u general secretary bad phim kren shuh bad u chairman (jong ka seng),” ong u Pala.“Nga sngew ha nga ba ka sorkar ka la pyrshang, hynrei kam thmu shisha ban khot ïakren,” ong u Pala.Katkum ka jingkren jong u, ka mat halot ka jingïakren bad ka HNLC ka la don mynta arphew laiphew snem.U la bynrap shuh shuh, “U chairman barim jong ka HNLC u dei u MLA bad mynta u don hapoh phatok, te ma ki (sorkar) ka lah ban pyndonkam da u ha ka jingshisha ne ki lah ban pyndonkam da kiwei pat ki kynhun.”Da kaba kren halor ka jingeh ba ïasyriem ba la mad da ka jylla Nagaland, Assam bad kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka jaka, u Pala u la ong ba u la dep ïohi ba ka sorkar pdeng kam thmu shisha shaphang ka jylla North East. U la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban wad bniah halor ka daw jong ka jingjur ka kam lehnoh bad kiwei kiwei ki jingeh kiba ïadei bad ka kam lehnoh namar ba wat haba la dep ïasoi bun ki jingmynjur bad ki kynhun ne ki seng bapher bapher, hynrei dang bun ki seng ba thymmai ba dang mih.Halor ka jingdawa jong ka HNLC na ka bynta ka jingïakren ïasuk ka ban ïaid shakhmat, une u rangbah u la ong ba ka aiñ ka la dep kren shai halor kane. U la ong ba u nongïalam jong ka ULFA u la long u MP haduh ar sien bad u nongïalam jong ka HNLC u dei u Myntri bad u chairman u dei u MLA, te lada ka HNLC ka lah ban teh lakam ïa ki briew lajong te kam eh eiei ruh em na ka bynta ka sorkar ba kan pynïoh jingsuk hapoh ka jylla.“Nga la dep ïohi ïa ki ba ki la pyrshang ïakren, hynrei dei ban don ka jingthmu ba shisha halor ka bynta jong ka HNLC, dei ban don ka jingthmu shisha halor ka bynta jong ka sorkar ruh kumjuh bad ka sorkar pdeng ka dei ban long ka kongsan ha ka ban shimkhia ïa katei, namar dei ban don ka rukom synshar ba biang kaba dei ban ïaid hapoh bad shabar jong ka jylla naba ki la dep ïasoi bun ki jingmynjur bad ka Bangladesh bad kiwei pat ki ri hynrei ka sorkar jylla ka la pynduna ki bor synshar ba dei halor ki ehrang kiba don shabar jong ka jylla,” ong u Pala.
title: Thrang u Pala ïa ka sorkar ba kan ïakren ïasuk bad ka seng HNLC

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO) South West Khasi Hills District, ha ka jingïalam u Bah Paul Thyrniang uba dei u President bad u Bah H.M Ramsiej u General Secretary ha ryngkat bad ki wei de ki dkhot jong ka seng mynta ka sngi ka 19 tarik u Nohprah 2023 ki la leit ïa kynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka South West Khasi Hills District Bah T. Lyngwa ban kyrpad ban pyllait noh ïa ka Result jong ka District Selection committee (DSC) hadien ka jingud jingnam jong ki khun samla wad kam na South West Khas Hills halor ka jingslem ka result jong ka DSC naduh u snem 2022 ha kaba haduh mynta u snem 2023 kim pat ioh ïa ka Result jong ki.Hadien ba ka seng ka la leit ïa kynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner South West Khasi Hills District Khasi haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor ki ki la ong na na ka liang jong u DC u la ïathuh ba dei namar ka jing pynslem jong ki tnad ophis bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka distrik namar kata ka seng ka la kyrpad ïa ki tnad ophis ba pher bapher kiba don hapoh ka distrik ki dei ban pynkhreh lypa namar na ka liang seng ha kano kano ka por kan sa leit wad bniah na ka bynta kine ki (Vacancy post ) ki kam kiba thylli ha ki ophis sorkar.Shuh shuh ki la buh ruh ka jingmaham ïa ki ophisar ha baroh ki tnad ophis hapoh ka distrik ba kin sangeh shwa ban thung-kam tad haduh ban da pyllait shwa ïa ka Result jong ka DSC khnang ba ki khun samla wad kam napoh ka district kin ym sah ka jinglynngoh bad ka kyrwoh na ka liang ka seng ba na ka liang ki ophisar bad ki bor distrik lada kin dang pynsahteng na ka liang ka seng kam banse ba kan hap ban shim da kawei ka sienjam ban khot ïa ki samla wad kam ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih ong u Bah Paul Thyrniang u President HITO South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Leit kynduh ka HITO ïa u DC SWKHD kyntu ban pyllait noh ïa ka Result DSC

content: U nongïalam ka liang pyrshah bad u nongthaw aiñ ka Congress na Mylliem, u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka seng ka la pyrshang ban wanrah biang da ki nongïalam barim.“Ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa baroh ki rangbah barim jong ka seng Congressmen sha ka seng namar ba ngi dei na ka seng ba ïatylli lang,” ong u Lyngdoh sha ki nongthoh kot khubor.“Ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa baroh, kiba thrang ban wanphai biang sha ka seng na ka bynta ban shimkhia ïa ka jylla bad ki paidbah,” bynrap u Ronnie.Haba kylli jingkylli, u Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka seng ka dang ap ïa ka kaiphod na ka president, ka Deborah Marak ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingleit kynduh ïa u Myntri rangbah barim ka jylla Meghalaya, u Mukul Sangma.“Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbym ïoh jingtip tad haduh mynta, namar ba ïa katei, la dep ïakren bad ka Deborah. To ngin kyrmen ba kan sa ai ïa ka kaiphod sha ka seng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïakren bad u Dr Mukul Sangma,” ong u Lyngdoh.Ha u Naiwieng 2022, u Mukul lem bad kiwei pat ki MLA kiba la mih lang bad ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC) hashwa jong ka ilekshon 2023 Assembly. Ka la don ka jingïasuh buit ïa ka Congress ha ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: Pyrshang ka Cong ban wanrah biang da ki nongïalam barim: Ronnie

content: Ha ka jingthmu ban pynhusiar napdeng ki nongshong shnong na nongkyndong shaphang ki skhim bapher bapher jong ka sorkar, la wanrah da ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra Campaign da ka Central Bureau of Communication and Broadcasting ha Nongpoh ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah.Ha katei ka tamasa, kaba la dep pynlong ha Nongpoh jong ki dukan die jingdie, la ïohi bun ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ka Central Bureau of Communication and Broadcasting bad ki tnad jong ka Ri Bhoi district.Ha katei ka prokram, la ïashim bynta da ka nodal officer, ka Sofia Dkhar, urban officer, u Bah L Langstieh, bad u capacity building specialist, u Wansalan Passah, ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka jaka.Ka jingthmu jong katei ka kampeiñ ka long ban pynlong da ka jingphah eksamin ïalade ba lait ei ne free medical check-up, ha kaba lah ban ong hangne ba katei ka prokram ka la pynleit jingmut ha ka ban pynduh jait noh syndon ïa ka jingpang Tuberculosis(TB), lyngba ka Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyan.Shuh shuh, la don ki kali Urban LED ha katei ka jaka, kiba la pynpaw ïa ka jingthmu ban pynïar ïa ka jingïoh jingmyntoi na kine ki skhim na ka bynta ki nongïoh jingmyntoi bad ban pynhusiar ïa ka jingpynïar ki kam pynroi ha kane ka ri, lyngba ki prokram thymmai.
title: Yn wanrah da ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra Campaign ha Nongpoh

content: U nongthaw aiñ ba la jop haduh lai sien na Gambegre, u Saleng A Sangma bad ka nongthaw aiñ barim jong ka Williamnagar, ka Deborah Marak, ki dei napdeng ki nongïakhun na ka bynta ka seng Congress ban ïoh tiket na Tura Parliamentary konstituensi.Katba u nongïalam jong ka Congress Legislature Party (CLP), u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ïathuh ha ki lad pathai khubor ba kumba saw haduh san ngut ki briew ki la leit kynduh ïa katei ka seng na ka bynta ka tiket, hynrei ka seng shen, kan sa khot ban aplai na ka bynta kajuh ka phang.U la pyntip ba u Saleng A Sangma u dei uwei na ki nongïakhun na ka bynta ka tiket. “Ma u (Saleng) u la pynpaw ka jingdon jingmut ha ka ban ïakhun ha ka ilekshon MP.”Ong u Lyngdoh, “Hooid, hooid, ka (Deborah) ka don jingmut ban ïakhun, namar katei, ngim pat rai eiei ruh em. Katkum ki jingbatai bad kumno ngi ïoh ïa ki hadien kane, ngin sa khot aplikashon.”Ma u, lehse, u la ong ba ka seng kan sa khmih ha baroh ki mat bad kan sa rai shaphang ki kyrtong ba biang.Haba kylli jingkylli, utei u nongïalam jong ka CLP u la ong, “Ka shong ha ki paidbah jong ka Ri Lum Garo (ba kin bishar) ba lehse ka nongïakhun (Agatha K Sangma) ka la ïaid katkum ka jingkhmih lynti jong ki paidbah ne em, kata ka shong ha ki. Ym dei ka seng, dei ki paidbah, kiban sa rai ba lehse kan ïaid katkum ka jingkhmih lynti jong ki paidbah ne jingthrang jong ki te yn sa rai hi da ki paidbah.”U la ong ba ka seng ka shaniah ha ka ban pynïakhun ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong parliamentary seat, kaba la mihkhmat da u president jong ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC), u Ma Vincent H Pala.U Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka seng Congress ka dang pynkhreh na ka bynta ka ilekshon ban wan na ka bynta ar tylli ki autonomous district council (ADC) – KHADC bad JHADC.
title: Na Tura Seat : Yn bishar ka  Congress ban ai tiket ïa ka Debora lane u Saleng

content: :Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC), Jaiñtia Hills ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew halor ka jingbym lah ban poi ha ka por ba biang jong ki nongtrei sorkar ha ki tnad bapher bapher ha West Jaiñtia Hills.Ka HYC kaba hapoh ka jingïalam jong u vice President, u Yoodahunki Shylla, Organising Secretary, Phaitki Suna kiba la leit jngoh ha kawei na ki tnad treikam jong ka PWD South Division Jowai ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah ha ka por 11 baje mynstep bad lap ba ym don nongtrei ne ki ophisar ban don bad thylli ki shuki ha kaba la don tang ar ngut ki nongtrei ba wan trei.“Ngi la rai ban ban pynlong noh da ka jingleit jngoh ba kyndit kyndit hadien ba la ïoh ka jingujor na ki paidbha”, katkum ka HYC.Ka HYC ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong ka halor ka rukom wan rukom leit trei jong ki nongtrei sorkar, kaba la ktah ïa ki paidbah baroh haba ki donkam ban pyndep ïa ki kam jong ki.Ka HYC ka la kyrpad ruh na ki nongtrei sorkar ha baroh ki tnad ba kin poi ha ka por ba biang sha ki ohpis jong ki na ka bynta ka jingïoh jingmyntoi jong ki paidbah.
title: Pynpaw ka HYC JH halor ka jingthylli ki ophis sorkar bad bym don nongtrei

content: Ka Additional Director of Health Services, Civil Hospital, Shillong, ka la pyntip ba uwei u nongpang ba thiah pang ba la tip kyrteng kum u Banteilad Lyngdoh Peinlang, ba la don 29 snem ka rta, ka jaka sah jong u dei ka C/o Nongpoh, Donggate, uba la don hapoh C.C.U. myn ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah 2023 ha ka por 4 baje 14 minit, u la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei ha ka 1 tarik, Nohprah 2023 ha ka por 12:30 mynstep.La kyrpad ïa baroh ki bahaïing ha sem jong uba khlad ba kin wan kam noh mar mar ïa katei ka met jong u na ka kamra ba buh metïap jong kane ka hospital hapoh lai sngi ne katkum ka por ba la buh naduh ba la pynmih ïa katei ka jingpynbna jong ka General Notice, ha kaba lada ym don nongwan kam, yn aiti noh ïa katei ka met sha ka Shillong Municipal Board ban pyndep ïa ki kam baroh.
title: Ym don ba wan kam ïa ka metïap ba la buh sah ha Civil Hospital, Nongpoh

content: Ki nongïalam ka Mawphlang PHE Worker Union (MPWU) mynta ka 19 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ki la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan pynlait noh ïa ka tulop jong ki nongtrei Muster Roll Category bad ki Work Charge Category ki ba trei ha kane ka tnad.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor ha Shillong Press Club, u Bah Nepoleon S Mawphniang u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ki nongtrei jong ka tnad PHE ki ba dei ki Master roll bad ki Work Charge mynta la ar bnai, kata u bnai Risaw bad Naiwieng.U la ong, “Ha ka ba ïadei bad kane na ka liang ka union ka la dep ban phah da ka shithi sha ki ophisar kane ka tnad bad kumjuh sha u Myntri ka tnad u Marcuis N Marak ruh hynrei ym shem la ïoh ïa kano kano ka jingkular hynrei ki la shu ong ba kin pyrshang bad kane kan shem pynhun ïa kine ki nongtrei “.U la bynrap ruh, “Kane ka jingong u Myntri ka wanrah jingeh ïa kine ki nongtrei namar ba mynta la jan ka Christmas kumta ki kyntu na ka sorkar ba kan pynlait noh ka tulop ha shwa ka jingrakhe Christmas”.Na ka liang ka Union ka la kyntu ruh naka sorkar ba kan pynlait ym tang ka tulop jong u bnai Risaw bad Naiwieng hynrei ban pynlait ruh ïa ka Advance Christmas mynta u snem .
title: Dawa ka MPWU ban pynlait noh ka tulop ki nongtrei PHE ha shwa ka Christmas

content: :Ka kynhun jong ki shipai BSF Meghalaya ki la ïoh ban pyllait im haduh 37 tylli ki masi na ka khappud Meghalaya myn ha ka 18 tarik, Nohprah 2023, kiba la thmu ban khaïi na India sha Bangladesh.Ha katei ka jingleit kem jong ki shipai ïa kiba khaïi ïa ki masi, ka kynhun jong ka BSF Meghalaya ha ki jingpyntreikam bapher bapher ki la ïoh kurup haduh 37 tylli ki masi katba dang thmu ban leit khaïi ïa ki sha ka khappud da ki nongkhaïi tuh ïa ki masi. Halor ka jingleit kem ki shipai BSF ïa ki nongkhaïi tuh, ki la phet krad noh na katei ka jaka da kaba iehnoh shadien ïa ki masi. Ki nongkhaïi tuh ki ju pynrieh ïa ki masi ha ki jaka ba long khlaw bad thmu ban pynïaid lyngba ïa ki na ki kynroh bym pat ker sainar ha ka por shiteng synñia.Ïa kitei ki masi ba la ïoh kurup, la aiti noh sha ka thanad pulit ba dei peit na ka bynta ban leh ïa kaba donkam. Ka kynhun BSF ka la buh da ka jingmaham ha ki jaka khappud na ka bynta ban ai jingïada na baroh ki jait kam sniew ba ïadei bad ka khappud.
title: Ïoh kurup masi ki shipai BSF ka Meghalaya na khappud Meghalaya ba thmu khaïi sha Bangladesh

content: :Ka synjuk ki barikor na jylla Meghalaya, ka Ri Academy of Visual Arts ka la pynlong ïa ka lyngwiar thoh dur jong ki barikor ha ICSSR, NEHU ba la plie da u Kher Rangbah ka tnat sorkar Mattithaw bad Deiriti, u Bah Frederick Roy Kharkongor. La iasnoh kti lang da ka Santiniketan Kala Bhavan Praktoni, ka synjuk ki barikor rangbah na Santiniketan na ka bynta ban sei pyrthei ïa ki sap kyrpang jong ki samla ka jylla kiba angnud ban trei bad kyntiew ïa lade kum ki barikor batbit.La aiti sahnam ïa kane ka lyngwiar thohdur ha ka kyrteng jong u Myllung Soso Tham, kum ban sot na ki snap jingstad jong ka saiñ pyrkhat jong u na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka imlang sahlang. La nguh burom ïa u Myllung Soso Tham da baroh kiba ïa don ryngkat naduh ki kynrem ki lyndan haduh ki paidbah da ka ba thoh shun ha ka sladur ba la mang lypa na ka bynta ka jingthmu.U kongsan ha kane ka lyngwiar thohdur, u Bah F R Kharkongor u la pyrto ïa ka thoh ka tar ka ba la kyrsoi na ka janor bad dohnud jong u Myllung Soso Tham ha kita ki snem kiba ka imlang sahlang ka dang don ha ki latlat jong ka synshar donbor ka sorkar Bilat bad haba dang sdang seilung ka thoh ka tar Khasi. U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka snap tynrai Khasi ka shong tynrai ha ka khyndew, ka kur bad ka ktien, ha ka ba donkam ban pynneh pynsah na ka bynta ka lawei jong ka imlang sahlang.Ka jinglong dukha jong ki barikor ha ka lynti jingim ka long ka phang ka ba la phalang lyngba ka jingkren jong ki kynrem lyndan ha kane ka sngi, ba kynthup ïa u khliehduh ka ICSSR u Prof B Panda, bad u Dr Jank Jhankar Narzari, u khliehduh jong ka Santiketan Kala Bhavan Praktoni. U Dr Janak Jhankar Narzari u la bynñiaw halor ka jinglong jingman ha ka thaiñ shatei lam mihngi kaba la sahdien ha ka liang jong ka thohdur, wat lada ka mynsiem shitrhem jong ki samla ka ïai kyrsoi bad na ka por sha ka por ki sap nylla jong ki barikor ki dang ïai shylluit man la ka por.U nongïalam rangbah jong ka synjuk ki barikor ha jylla, u Bah Raphael Warjri u la kubur ïa ka jingkren jong kita ki kynrem lyndan bad u la ban khia halor ka jingdonkam ban mih ki shlem hikai shlem pule ha ka liang ka kam thohdur thohdar ha jylla na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ki samla kiba angnud ban kiew irat ha kane ka liang. Kum shibynta ban kyntiew ïa ka thohdur thohdar ha jylla bad ban ban plie lynti ïa ki barikor na jylla, ka Santiniketan Kala Bhavan Praktoni ka la ïa soi ïa ka dorkhas soskular bad ka Riti Academy of Visual Arts, Shillong na ka bynta ban sam kylliang ïa ki jingtip bad jingstad shaphang ka thohdur da ki lympung ki ba yn pynkhreh markylliang ha Shillong bad sha kiwei kiwei ki jaka ha Ri India.Ha ka Lyngwiar Thohdur kaba dang ïaid shitrhem mynta ha ICSSR, salonsari NEHU kan don ruh ka jingïaphylliew jingmut jong ki barikor na baroh arliang ha ka ba pyninam ïa la ki sap ki phong bad ban batai ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka Thohdur ha la ki jylli lajong. Kumta ki don ki mat ïatai kiba yn sa pashat jingmut da ki barikor na Shillong bad na shabar ka jylla ba kynthup ïa u Prof. Janak Jhankar Narzari, Soumitra Chatterji, Rathin Kanji, Prof. Niaz Majumdar, Falguni Mukherji, Shamita Goswami, Ketaki Choudhury, Mario Pathaw bad Raphael Warjri, halor ki phang ba ki ïa tyngkhuh ha la shimet bad kiba ïadei bad ka lyngwiar thohdur ha ka imlang sahlang.
title: La aiti sahnam ïa ka lyngwiar thohdur ha ka kyrteng jong u Myllung Soso Tham

content: Ka Meghalaya ka la sakhi ia ka jingplie ia ki 10-Bed ICU Project bad Tele ICU Hub ha State Convention Centre, Shillong. Ha kane ka prokram, u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la long u kongsan bad ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la long ka symbud kongsan.Ha ka jingpathai khubor, lyngba ka “X” ia kaba la tip mynshuwa kum ka Twitter, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen jong u ha kaba plie ia kine project kiba ia dei bad ka jingai jingsumar ia ki nongpang.“Nga sngewkmen bap lie ia kine ka10 Bed ICU Project ha ki 12 district hospital bad 2 tylli Tele ICU Hubs ha Meghalaya.”. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba kine ki lad ai jingsumar na jngai, ki long ka jingiarap kaba khraw ia kito ki nongpang kiba shong basah ha kine jaka nongkyndong ha kaba kim ioh lah ban leit shah sumar ialade ha ki hospital. U la iathuh kane ka lad ai jingsumar mynta ka la urlor dei na ka daw jong ka jingpyndonkam ia ki kor ki bor sumar nongpang ba kane ka juk shai ka la lah ai sha ka imlang sahlang
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ïa ki jaka sumar nongpang Tele ICU Hub￼

content: Ka Central Silk Board, P-3 Unit, MESSO, Rompara, Meghalaya ka la pyllong ia ka farmer’s field dayRompara, Resubelpara, Meghalaya Dr. K. Indirakuma, Scientist – C, MESSO, P-4 Unit, Tura. Ia kane ka prokram la pyniaid da u K. D. Sangma, uba long u Senior Technical Assistant, P-3 Unit, Rompara. Ia kane la prokrama la plied a u Dr. Vikram Kumar, Scientist-C and kren halor ka jingkongsan halor ka jingpynmih ia ki jain ryndia, kaba long ruh ka jingpynphalang ia ka larity jong kato ka jaitbynriew.U Shongknor, u Dr. Saicharan, Scientist- B, SSPC, Kaliabari u la batai shaphang ka jingtrei kam jong ka jingpynmih ia ki jain muka, kham tam lei lei ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyndonkam ia ki kor ki bor jong kane ka juk kaba mynta. Haduh 60 ngut ki la ia shim bynta na North Garo Hills ha kane ka prokram. Ha kane ka prokram ka la don ka jingiaphylliew jingmut kaba ioh jingmyntoi hapdeng ki saiantis bad ki nongrep.
title: Pyllong ka Central Silk Board, P-3 Unit, MESSO, Rompara, Meghalaya ïa ka farmer’s field day Resubelpara

content: Ka klob Shillong Lajong kaba dei ruh ka klob kaba mihkhmat ia ka jylla sha ka lympung I-league mynta ka aïom ka la sdang ia ki jingiakhun da ka jingjop bad khlem mad ia ka nam rem, kata na 8 tylli ki jingiakhun hynrei ma kine ki 2 tylli ki jingïalehkai ba lah dep, kane ka kynhun ka la liem noh bad hiar ha ka kyrdan ba 5 na ka kyrdan ba 3.Ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong ka klob Shillong Lajong kiba la wan ban ai mynsiem ia kane ka klob naduh ba sdang haduh ba kin da mad ia ka nam rem, ki don ia ka jingkhmih lynti bad ka jingngeit ba kane ka kynhun kan ai sngewbha (gift) Christmas ia ki da ka jingjop don burom ha ka jingiakhun ba khatduh mynta ka samoi ha ka jingïalehkai pyrshah ia ka Namdhari ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi ha madan SSA, polo Shillong.Ka Mohammedan SC ka dang iai bat ia ka kyrdan ba nyngkong mynta ka samoi da ka jingioh 24 poiñ na 10 tylli ki jingïalehkai katba ka Lajong kaba la hiar kynsan sha ka kyrdan ba 5 ka la ioh 16 poiñ.
title: Kyrmen ki nongkyrshan ba ka Lajong kan pynkut ïa u snem da ka jingjop pyrshah ia ka Namdhari

content: U Myntri ka tnad ri jingri jingdup, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek u la plie ia ka jaka ot doh Bi- Species Abattoir (Slaughter House) ha shnong Demthring ha West Jaiñtia Hills. Ia kane ka prokram la pyniphuh iphieng da ka jingiadon lang jong u MLA ka Amlarem MLA, u Lahkmen Rymbui and u MLA ka Jowai, u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, kiba la sakhi ia kane ka prokram kum u Symbud Kongsan bad nongshah khot kyrpang, kynthup ruh ia u  S.C. Sadhu, uba long u Secretary ka tnad jingri jingdup.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Deputy Director (Planing), u Dr. WMW Kongwir u la iatuh ba ka jingshna ia kane ka jaka ot doh la bei pisa da ka NABARD ha ka jinglut kaba 7.83 klur tyngka bad ka tnad ka la ioh pdiang haduh mynta 7.10 klur tyngka. Ia ka pisa kaba sah yn sa pdiang hadien.Ha kane ka jaka ot doh lah ban pyniap haduh haduh 50 tylli ki masi bad 100 tylli ki sniang shi sngi. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ka tnad ri jingri jingdup, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek, u la ong ba ka jingplie ia katei ka jaka ot doh, ka dei ka jingai sngewha Khristmas na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong jong ka Demthring.U Bah Alexander Laloo Hek u la ong ba kane ka shnong ka lah ban khring ia ki nongjngohkai pyrthei lada ka seng ki nongot doh, ki khlieh nongsynshar bad ki dorbar ki lah ban pynneh ia ka jingkhuid jingsuba, namarba kane ka long ka shnong kaba itynnad.U MLA jong ka Jowai, u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla u la ong ba ki nongshong shnong kim dei ban duh jingkyrmen bad ia kiwei ki jingdonkam yn sa nang pynbiang shuh shuh ha ki por kiba ban sa wan. U MLA u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui u la ong ba ka jingplie ia kane ka project, kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ia ki nongot doh jong katei ka don bad ka thain, ha kaba ki paidbah nongshong kin ioh ban bam ia ka don kaba khuid.U la kyntu ruh ia ki nongri jingkren ban ki dei ban pynsonkam ia ki skim bapher bapher ba ka Sorkar ka tyrwa na ka bynta jong ki.
title: Plie u Myntri ka tnad jingri jingdup Bah AL Hek ïa ka jaka ot doh ha West Jaintia Hills

content: SHILLONG:Myn ha ka 19 tarik Nohprah 2023, u MDC ka Nongkrem Constituency u Bah Lambor Malniang u la pynbna ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa ka kynhun ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front (KHDF) ba la ïalam da u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ha ka 18 tarik Nohprah 2023, u Bah Bindo M Lanong u la shim ïa ka rai ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa ka kynhun ba ïalam da u Bah Pyniaid hapoh ka KHADC bad ha ka sngi ba bud u Bah Malniang u la ai ka jingkyrshan ïa kane ka kynhun hapoh ka Councl.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Malniang u la ïathuh ba kane ka rai ban kyrshan ïa ka EC ba ïalam da u Bah Pyniaid ka long namar ka jingtrei bha kane ka kynhun hapoh ka jingïalam u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ka ba la khring ïa u ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa kane ka kynhun.U Bah Malniang u la pynshai ba kane ka jingkyrsan kam shem dei ba un leit ban pynïasoh sha kano kano ka party hynrei ka long tang ban ïoh ka lad ban ai ka jingshakri ba pura sha u paidbah .U la ong, “Hadien ka jingshimti u Bah Pyniaid kum u CEM, nga ïohi ïa ka jingpyntyllun sted ïa ki kam jong ka Council khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka bha ka miat ka jaitbynriew da kaba wanrah ïa ki Bill ba kongsan kynthup ïa ka Clan Bill ka ba donkam tam na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew “.Ïa u Bah Malniang la pdiang sngewbha da u CEM ka KHADC ha ka ophis treikam jong u kaba la long myn ha ka 19 tarik Nohprah 2023.
title: Hadien u Bah Bindo khring ki kam u Bah Pyniaid sa ïa u Bah Lambor

content: U President ka United Democratic Party (UDP) u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, myn ha ka 19 traik Nohprah 2023, u la ong ba ka party ka la aiti ha u nongïalam ki MDC ban bishar halor ki MDC ka UDP kiba la leit ban kyrshan ïa ka Liang shynshar ha KHADC khlem da pyntip sha ka party.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ki ar ngut ki MDC ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ki ba kynthup ïa u Bah Bindo M Lanong u MDC ba shu thung bad u MDC ka Nongkrem Constituency bad u Bah Lambor Malniang ki la rai ban leit kyrshan noh ïa ka Executive Commitee jong ka Khasi Hills Democratic Front (KHDF) ba la ïalam da u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha KHADCHalor kane, na ka liang u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ba na ka liang jong u ym shem la ïoh kano kano ka jingtip hynrei u la shu ïohi lyngba ki lad pathai khubor kumta ka party ka la rai ban aiti ïa kane ka kam ha u nongïalam ki MDC u Bah Titos W Chyne ban bishar ïa kane ka kam .Halor ka jingkynnoh u Bah Bindo M Lanong u President u la ong, “ngam kwah ban kren eiei ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingkynthoh hynrei kum ka party hi ka burom ïa u Bah Bindo kum u nongïalam ba la rangbah ha ka party”. U la kyntait ruh ba ka party UDP ka la ïehnoh marwei ïa u Bah Bindo M Lanong bad ong ba na ka por sha ka por ki ju don ka jingïakren halor kiba bun ki mat jong ka party.Na ka liang u Bah Titos W Chyne u nongïalam ki liang pyrshah ha KHADC u la ong ba kane ka jingleit ai jingkyrshan jong ki ar ngut ki MDC ka UDP ïa ka kynhun ba la ïalam da u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem kam dei kaba phylla namar ka la don lypa la slem.“Kane ka jingleit ai jingkyrshan jong ki, kam dei ka ba phylla namar ba tang shi kynta ba la shah pynkhyllem ka EC ba ïalam ma nga ruh ki la leit ban kyrshan ïa ka EC u Bah Pyniaid, te ka la don lypa ka jingkyrshan kaba la slem na ka liang jong ki,” u la ong.
title: Tang shikynta ba shah pynkhyllem ka EC, ruh ki la tuid ban kyrshan ïa ka KHDF; kam dei kaba phylla hynrei ka la don lypa: Titos W Chyne

content: Ha ka janmiet jong ka tamasa ïa rwai bad ka jingdon sap ki khynnah kaba la pynlong ha Lariti Performing Centre ha Mawdiangdiang, Shillong, naba ki khynnah skul jong ka Persara Piano ka la leit halor rynsan na ka bynta ka jingkren jong ka Beatles Piano. U Commissioner & Secretary Arts & Culture, u Bah F.R Kharkongor u la ïaroh da kaba thab kti ïa ka jingnoh synñiang jong ka Persara Studio haduh ka jinglah ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingdon sap ki khynnah samla.Haba kren shaphang jong katei ka tamasa, u Bah F.R Kharkongor u la ong ba katei ka jingkren ka la pynsah jingkynmaw ïa ka jingdon bynta ki paidbah ba ïashim bynta ha ka ban rwai ha katei ka rynsan ba dang plie shen jong ka Lariti Centre, kaba la tip kum ka “Little Black Box”, kaba dei ka rynsan ba biang na ka bynta ki nongrwai ba kin pyni ïa ka sap ba ki don.U la ai jingïaroh ruh ïa ka Persara Studio na ka bynta ka jinglah ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka kam rwai, ha kaba ki samla ba don sap ki lah ban pyni ïa ka sap jong ki hapoh ka jingïoh jinghikai jong ki nonghikai ba tbit. U la pynïanujor ïa katei ka studio sha ka “nursery” ha kaba ki sap ba hiar pateng ki la seisoh bad biang lut.Une u Commissioner & Secretary Arts & Culture, u la pynpaw ka jingsngew nguh ïa ki kmie ki kpa kiba la pynshlur ïa ka jingthrang jong ki khun jong ki, da kaba ithuh ïa ka bynta jong ki ha ka ban oh shrong bha ïa kine ki samla kiba la ïoh jinghikai bha ha ki bynta bapher bapher.U la pdiang shuh shuh da kaba ïaroh ïa ka tynrai jong ki jingbuh jingsat jong ki jingtem jong ka Shillong bad Meghalaya, da kaba ban jur ba ka kam rwai kan nym duh jait ha kane ka jaka. U la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong u shaphang ka jingangnud jong u ban ïoh jinghikai ban nang tem hynrei u la kren biria da kaba phla ba u nang ban pyndonkam da ka “radio” tad haduh mynta.U Commissioner & Secretary Arts & Culture, u la kular ba ka tnad kan bteng ban kyrshan na ka bynta ka jingsdang ïa ka tamasa kum ka Persara Studio, kaba la thmu ban pynïoh ïa ki rynsan na ka bynta ki samla ba don sap ba kin pawnam bad pynïoh burom na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya.Katba ki samla ba tem piano kiba la pynshongshit ïa ki paidbah, ki kynthup ïa ki jingrwai Beatles classics, jazz pieces bad kiwei kiwei ki jingrwai.
title: Pynlong tamasa rwai ha Lariti Performing Centre ha Mawdiangdiang, Shillong

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) myn ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah, ka la dawa ba ïa ka jingtei ha Motphran, dei ban pynbna kum ka jaka jong u mot jingtei.Ha ka dorkhas kaba la dep phah sha u director jong ka urban affairs, ka kynhun HANM ka la ong ba ïa ka jingtei ha Motphran, la pynïeng ha ka jingkynmaw burom ïa ka jingdap 26 snem jong ka Khasi Labour Corps kaba dei peit hapoh ka sorkar British ha France ha ka por don ka thma bah ba nyngkong ne World War I.Ïa katei ka dorkhas kaba la dep plie ha u snem 1927 ka long ka dak ka shin na ka bynta ban kynmaw ïa ki nongkit tiar ha ïew jong ka 26th Khasi Labour Corps kaba la kit ïa ki mar ki mata bad kiwei ki tiar ba donkam na ka bynta ki shipai England ha ka por ba jia ka thma bah ba nyngkong ne First World War, ha kaba ïa katei ka jingtei sah nam, la plie ha u snem 1927.Katkum katei ka dorkhas, la ong ba, “katei ka kynhun ka pynpaw ka jingsngew ba ïa kane ka jingtei mot, dei ban ïada da ka aiñ khnang ban kynmaw ïa ka jingïai shah jong ki paidbah ka Ri Lum Khasi ha ka por ba jia ha thma bah ba nyngkong, te kumta ïa katei ka jingtei, dei ban pynbna kum ka jaka ba don dur mot bad dei ban ai jingïada hapoh ka Meghalaya Heritage Act, 2011 bad Regulation 2012. “
title: Kwah ka HANM ban pynïoh shap na ka bynta ka jingtei ha Motphran

content: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) myn ha ka 19 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ka la  pynbna ïa ka kyrteng jong u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin  ban long kum u Kyrtong ka RDA ban ïa khun ïa ka Lok Sabha election na Shillong seat .Ka  Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), kaba kynthup ïa ka United Democratic Party (UDP)  bad ka Hill Sate People Democratic Party (HSPDP) ki la rai ban ïakhun lang  ïa ka Lok Sabha Election, kum shibynta ban pynthikna ba ka Seng riewlum kan ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka election.U Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uba dei u President barim ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council bad u la pynïasoh sha ka UDP ha u bnai Naiwieng .Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ba kum ka RDA ka sngewkmen ba ka jingïatai ban jied ïa u kyrtong ka RDA, tang kawei ka kyrteng kaba long jong u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin ka mih bad kane ka paw ïa ka dak ka jingïatylli hapdeng ka UDP bad ka HSPDP hapoh ka RDA .“Ka RDA kan ïatrei lang na ka bynta ka MP election bad kumjuh ruh na ka bynta ka MDC election ka ban sa long shen, bad ka RDA kan dang pynlong ruh ïa ki jjngïalang ban dang pynbit pynbiang ha kiba bun ki mat,” u la ong.Haba kylli u la ong, “ha ka election MP kaba la dep ka la don ka jingïatrei lang bad baroh ki party na ka bynta ban kyrshan ïa u kyrtong ka UDP hynrei mynta ka kynti, kat kum ka jinglong jingman ha ka saiñpyrthei, ngi sngew donkam ban don ka jingïatrei ang hapdeng ka UDP bad ka HSPDP bad ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka RDA”.Ha kane ka jingïalang la wan ban shim bynta da u President ka UDP u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, u President ka HSPDP u Bah KP Pangniang, u Myntri Sorkar u Bh Shakliar Warjri, u Minister u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u General Secretary ka UDP u Bah Jemino Mawthoh, u nongialam ka liang pyrshah ha KHADC u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne, u MLA u Bah Lahkmen Rymbui, bad kiwei kiwei.
title: U Robertjune Kharjarin kum u kyrtong ka RDA u ban ïa khun ïa ka LS election na Shillong seat

content: MAWKYRWAT:Ka kynhun ki nongñiah ar shaka ba la tip kum ka The Ultimate Legend Bikers Association (TULBA) myn ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka 16 tarik Nohprah 2023 hadien ba ka la ïoh ban aiti ïa ka ïing ha kawei ka longïing ba duk ha Wah Mawpat Raid Sawsymper East Khasi Hills District ka la ïoh ruh ban pyllait thymmai ïa ka Logo jong ka seng TULBA da u Bah Lamphrang Kharbuli bad ïa kane Logo jong ka seng la pynwan dur da u Bah Ophel Nath Kharthangmaw bad ha kajuh ka por ki la ïoh ruh ban ai sngewbha da ki jaiñkup thiah sha ki katto katne ki long ïing ba duna ha ka ïoh ka kot kum ka dak ka jingaisngewbha khrismas bad ruh ban pyllait ïa ka Almanak jong ka TULBA Sohryngkham Unit.Ha kane ka sngi ha shwa ban aiti ïa ki jaiñkup bad ruh ban pyllait ïa ka Logo jong ka seng la ïoh ka jingduwai na u Pastor Rev. Ïaidbiang Marweiñ ha kaba la ïoh ruh ban ai ka khubor Khrismas da kaba shim na ki katto katne ki dkhot na ka Bible ban ai jinghikai shaphang ka jingwan long briew u Jisu khrist ba kum ki khristan ha kylleng ka pyrthei ki ju rakhe ïa ka sngikha u Jisu ha ka 25 tarik, Nohprah man la u snem.
title: Da ka Logo ba thymmai pyllait paidbah ka kynhun ki nongñiah ar shaka ka TULBA

content: Ka Ïing Bishar Meghalaya High Court ka la bthah ïa ka Sorkar ba dei ban pynkynriah noh ïa u heh pulit Superintendent of Police jong ka East Jaintia Hills District sha kawei pat ka jaka. Kane ka jingbthah jong ka Ïing Bishar ka long na daw jong ka jingbym lah ban tehlakam ïa ka jingtih bad khaïi beaiñ ïa u dewïong ha katei ka district.Ïa kane ka jingbym lah ban tehlakam ïa ka jingtih bad jingkhaïi ïa u dewiong, la lah ban sngewthuh na ka kaiphod 19interim report, la ong ki nongbishar jong ka Meghalaya High Court ba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice H.S. Thangkhiew bad ïa u nongbishar W. Diengdoh ha ka jingpynmih hukum ha kaba ïa dei bad ka mukotduma Public Interest Litigation. Kane ka hukum ka la ong ruh ba utei u heh pulit u la don ha East Jaintia Hills naduh ka snem 2021 bad u la dei ban tip lut ïa ka jinglong jingman bad kaei kaba jia ha katei ka district.Ka kaiphod 19interim report ïa kaba la ai da ka Committee ba la khlieh tang da uwei u nongbishar ka ong ba ka paw ba u Superintendent of Police un trei kam bha bad kane ka wanrah ïa ka jingmih jong ki kam beaiñ. Ka Ïing Bishar ka la bthah ruh ïa ka tnad tnad Home Department bad ïa u Director General of Police ban shim khia ïa kane ka jingbthah jong ka Ïing Bishar. Ka kaiphod 19th interim ka kdew shai ïa ka jingshem jong ka jingtheh dewiong ha syndah jong ka Don Bosco College ha Byndihati. Ka Ïing Bishar ka la ong ruh ba ka Committee kam pdiang ïa kita ki jingaidaw jong ki bor district ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingtheh dewïong ha Mindihati. “Wat lada ka la don ka jingpdiang ïa kane bad ka jingtohkit bad ka jingpdiang ïa ka jingujor da ki pulit ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingtheh dewïong ha Myndihati, ka kaiphod ka kren shai ba ka artatien ïa ka jingshim khia jong ki bor district halor kane ka phang. Ka Ïing Bishar ka la ïathuh ba na ka liang jong u Advocate General jong ka Meghalaya u la pan por ban jubab ïa ka kaiphod, hynrei na ka liang jong ka, kam banse ban pynmih ïa ki hukum ban tehlakam ïa ki jingmih jong ki kam beaiñ. Ka Ïing Bishar ka la byrngem ruh ban pynmih da ka hukum pyrshah ïa ki bor district ban pyni ïa ka jingialeh ban pyntrei kam ïa ki jingbthah jong ka Ïing Bishar. Ka Ïing Bishar ka la bthah ruh ban siew 3 lak tyngka sha u nongbishar Katakey nalor kiwei pat ki jingsiew kiba u la pyllut.
title: Bthah ka Ïing Bishar High Court ban pynkynriah ïa u heh pulit ka East Jaintia Hills

content: La pynwai noh ïa ka jingïalang jong ka 26th Society of Operations Management (SOM) 2023 Conference ba la pyllong da ka IIM Shillong, halor ka phang “Sustainability and Resilience in Operations Management bad ïoh jingkyrshan ruh na ka Indian Council of Social Science Research, Emerald Publishing, EBSCO bad TLS Group.Ha kane ka jingïamir jingmut jong ka SOM 2023 la ïoh ban pdiang haduh 258 ki jingthoh ba ka thoh da ki 513 ki nongthoh na ki 89 ki jaka ai jinghikai. Kine ki jingthoh la ïoh pdiang ka 21 IIM kiba don ha ri India  na ki 137 ngut ki nongthoh, 88 ngut ki thoh kot jong ka IIT, 21 ngut ki nongthoh kot jong ka NIT, 113 ngut ki nongthoh kot na ki B-schools jong ka, 89 ngut ki thoh kot ki University, 28 ngut ki nongthoh kot na ki karkhana, 37 ngut ki nongthoh kot jong ka pyrthei international la ïoh ban pdiang ha ka jingïalang jong ka SOM 2023 conference.
title: La pynwai ïa ka jingïalang jong ka 26th Society of Operations Management 2023 Conference

content: U Myntri ka liang pyrshah jong ka seng UDP na Nongkrem konstituensi, u Bah Lambor Malngiang myn ha ka sngi ba ar, u la kyrshan pura ïa ka NPP executive committee (EC) ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) na ka bynta ka bha ka miat.Ïa ka jingkyrshan jong u Malngiang, la pdiang sngewbha da u CEM jong ka KHADC, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.Kane ka la jia hadien ba u nongïalam ba la rangbah jong ka seng UDP bad u MDC, u Bah Bindo Lanong uba la kyrshan lang ïa ka EC ba lam khmat da u Syiem.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Malngiang u la ong ba ka jingrai jong u ban kyrshan ïa u EC ba lam khmat da u Syiem kam shym mut ba un ïasnohkti bad kano kano ka seng saiñ hima sima ha KHADC.U la bynrap da kaba ong ba jingrai jong u ban kyrshan ka long ka mat ba ïadei halor ka jingshimkhia da ka EC ba dang shen, khamtam ha ka ban pynleit jingmut halor ka jingsngewtynnad jong ki paidbah bad pynskhem ïa ka district council.“Hadien ba al shimti kum u CEM jong ka district council, u Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la long uba kitkhia ha ka ban shimti ïa ki mat baroh kiba long kiba kongsan na ka bynta ka jingbit jong u paid riewlum jong ka imlang ka sahlang, khamtam haba ïadei bad ka Clan Bill,” ong u Malngiang.“Hadien ba la ïohi ïa ki kam ba la trei da ka EC, ka long ka kamram jong nga ban kyrshan ïa ka EC khnang ban pynthikna ba lahbiang ban bteng ka jingtrei kaba long ba donkam na ka bynta ki paidbah bad ka district council,” bynrap u Malngiang.Ha ka 19 tarik, Jylliew, mynta u snem, ka seng NPP ka la shah pynrem ha katei ka seng ba la neh lai snem mynta, ka United Democratic Party (UDP)-led United Democratic Alliance (UDA) EC ha ka KHADC. Kumba khathynñiew ngut ki MDC ki la kyrshan ïa ka no-confidence motion kaba la pynkhih win da ka seng NPP pyrshah ïa ka rukom treikam jong u dkhot barim ka executive, u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne.
title: Kyrshan u Lambor ïa ka NPP EC ha KHADC

content: :Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council ka la pdiang ïa ka jingbuh ïa ka Khasi Traditional Medicine Commission. Kat kum ka kaiphod ba la pynkhreh da ka Executive Committee bad wanrah da u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha ka sngi ba nyngkong jong ka Dorbar Tlang jong ka Council, ïa kane ka Commission la ithuh da ka KHADC (Protection and Promotion of Khasi Traditional Medicine) Act, 2011.Ïa kane ka Commission kaba don 12 ngut ki dkhot yn khlieh da u Chief Executive Member jong ka KHADC kum u Shnongknor bad u Secretary jong ka Executive Committee, u Bah A. Nonghuloo kum u Secretary. Kiwei pat ki dkhot jong ka Commission kin long ki saw ngut ki stad nongai dawai kynbat bapawkhmat, kum u Dr D.L. Nongspung, Dr Alka Kharsati, Dr. Boss Myrthong bad Dr. Dlas Rani, saw ngut ki dawai kynbat kum u Dr. J.P. Lyngdoh bad Dr Sparstarlin Nongrem, kynthup ruh ïa ki saw ngut ki ‘riew shemphang na ka imlang sahlang, kum u Dr. P.S. Nianglang, Dr. Fabian Lyngdoh, Kitboklang Nongphlang bad R.S.  Wanniang.
title: Pdiang ka KHADC ïa ka Khasi Traditional Medicine Commission

content: Ha ka jingïaid shakhmat jong ka district council ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha, ka seng National People’s Party (NPP), Ri Bhoi District, ka la pynlong da ka jingjied da ki nongïalam ba kongsan ha ka CFC Hall, Umsning, myn ha ka sngi balang.Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah bad kyrtong jong ka seng NPP ka ban sa ïakhun ha ka ilekshon Shillong Lok Sabha seat, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Hamlet Dohlieng, uba dei u State Working President jong ka seng, u la dei peit ïa ka jingthung ïa ki nongïalam ha kylleng ki blok bapher bapher jong ka Ri Bhoi district.Ha kane ka por, ki nongïalam ba kongsan ki la shah thung na bynta ki kam ba kongsan, kynthup ïa u Sothenes Sohtun uba la shimti na ka bynta ka kam Block President jong ka Jirang Konstituensi, u Jason Mawlong na ka bynta ka Umsning Block, Damanbait Lamare na ka bynta ka Umroi Block, Shemphang Lyngdoh na ka bynta ka Mawhati bad u Henry Nongrum na ka bynta ka Nongpoh Block.Kito kiba don ha katei ka jingïalang napdeng kiwei, ki kynthup ïa u Prof. Donkupar War, Secretary jong ka NPP Meghalaya Unit, u Samlin Malngiang, Secretary In-charge Ri Bhoi, Clement Mawlong, NPP President of Ri Bhoi bad ka Macdalyne Mawlong, MDC jong ka Umsning.
title: Thung nongïalam ka NPP na ka bynta ka Ri Bhoi dist

content: Ka kynhun Myntri myn ha ka 19 tarik, Nohprah ka la shah ïa ki 115 ngut kiba la heh ka rta ban ïakhun eksamin na ka bynta ki post ba lait hapoh ka tnad Textiles.Haba la ïoh kren sha ka lad pathai khubor, u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba na ka 196 ngut ki nongïakhun eksam, yn don haduh 115 ngut ki nongïakhun ki bym lah ban ïakhun na ka bynta ki eksam namar ba ki la heh ka rta.“Te kumta, kum ka mat ban khmih ïa kane ka bynta bad namar ki daw bym lah kiar, ka kynhun Myntri ka la rai ban mynjur ban nym don jingthut halor ka rta na ka bynta kiba la heh rta ki ban ïakhun ha ki eksam,” ong u Conrad katba dang bynrap ba watla ym don jingkyrmen ba kin ïoh kam, hynrei yn shah ïa ki ba kin ïakhun ha ki eksam.U la ong ba naduh u snem 2015, ym don kano kano ka jingpynlong ïa ka eksam ha kane ka tnad. Ha ka jingshisha, bun ki briew kiba la kyrshan ha kaba ïadei bad ka stipend ba la ai da ka sorkar bad ki nongïakhun, kiba la pyndep ïa ki jingpule bapher bapher jong ki bad ka jingshim interview ïa ki.U la ong ba kane ka donkam ban don da ki kaiphod ba biang bad naduh u snem 2015, ki briew kim shym la shah khot ha ki interview bad ym don ka jinglait kam lait jam namar ba ym don ka jingpynshai kaba long ba donkam. Katei ka mat ka la shu sah teng noh la slem bha bad namar kata, la rai ban pynlong da ki eksam ha kaba ki nongïakhun ki lah ban aplai bad ïakhun eksam bad kan shong ha ka jingjied ban khot interview ïa ki.Haba la kylli, utei u Myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka jingpynskhem beit beit ïa ki kan nym lah ban long na ka bynta ka sorkar namar ba dei ban don ka jingjied ïa ki nongïakhun eksam.“Dei ban pyntreikam naduh u snem 2015. Ngam don hangne ban kynnoh ïano ïano ruh namar ba ka rukom treikam ka la pynsah teng bad ka jingpynrung kam, kam shym la jia ha kato ka por ba bun ki briew ki la heh ka rta. Te kumta, ka long ka mat ba kulmar hynrei ki kyndon kiba hap ban bud bad kumta ngi la pyrshang ban pyntreikam katba lah hynrei kan nym lah ban long ïangi ba ngin pynskhem beit beit ïa ki nongtrei ba la trei lypa namar ba ym don ka jingpyntreikam halor ka jingjied ïa ki nongïakhun eksam,” ong u Conrad.
title: Shah ban ïakhun eksam ïa kiba la heh rta na ka bynta ka kam hapoh ka tnad Textiles

content: Ka Adventure Tour Operators Association jong ka India ka la sam khusnam ïa ki briew kiba la lah ban noh mynsiem ha ka jingban pynkiew ïa ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei ha ki bynta bapher bapher kum ka Spirit of Adventure, Sustainability Champion, Trailblazer Award, Pathfinder Award na ka bynta ki jingtei ba thymmai bad ka Lifetime Achievement award.Ïa katei ka jingsam khusnam, la ai da u Myntri rangbah ka Arunachal Pradesh, u Pema Khandu, u Milind Sonam, Mike Druce, Ajeet Bajaj bad kiwei kiwei.U nongïohrah ïa ka khusnam Trailblazer Award, ba dei ka city-based Duia Trailblazers, ha ka jingkren jong ki, ka la ong, “Ngi da sngewnguh ban ïohpdiang ïa kane ka khusnam, ka “Trailblazer Award” ha ka jingithuh ïa ka “Path Breaking New Adventure Tourism Products” na ka Adventure Tour Operators Association of India. Ngi sngew donbok ban don bynta bad ka ATOAI Family, sngewnguh ban ïakynduh ïa ki nongïalam bakhraw ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei. Ha ka jingsngap ïa katei, khreh bad don napdeng jong ki, kynthup ïa u @milindrunning @pemakhandu_bjp @slalomcoach @ajeetbajaj8848 @okentayeng , ki heh Army, ki nongseng kam lajong bad ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei. Sngewnguh shi junom!U Gerald Samuel Duia, u nongshem bad trai jong ka Duia Trailblazers, u dei u nongleit jngoh kai pyrthei bad uba la tbit ha kane ka kam la palat 10 snem. U la sdang kum u nongpynïaid ne u tour guide bad kum u nongshondur.
title: Ïoh khusnam u nongpynïaid ïa ki nongjngoh kai pyrthei

content: U MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency, u Bah Renikton L Tongkhar u la leit jurip kyndit ïa ka jingkieng ïaid kali kaba dei ban pynïasnoh ïa ka shnong Sohma sha ka shnong Jashiar South West Khasi Hills District kaba kam lyngba ïa ka wah Rilang ha kaba u la lap ba kane ka jingkieng ka dang sah khongreng wat ki nongtrei kim shem la don satia.Halor kane ka bynta haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Renik u la pynpaw ka jingsngew khia ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka jingkieng u la ong ba kane ka jingkieng ka dei kaba don kam tam ïa ki paitbah jong kane ka dong ka thaiñ ba kin ïoh ïaid noh na kane ka jingkieng, hynrei kumba long mynta kane ka jingkieng ka dang don tang shiliang u païa katba shiliang yn pat leh eiei, u la pynkynmaw ruh ba ïa kane ka jingkieng la mang tyngka na ka World Bank ban pyntrei kaba long 4 klur shiteng ei ei.Kumta u lah kyntu ïa u kontraktor u ba pyntrei ïa kane ka jingkieng ba un sngew bha ban pyntrei noh kham kloi lane ban sdang noh biang ïa ka jingtrei ba ym dei ban pynsah kut noh kumne namar ka aiom ruh ka dei ka aiom ban trei, shwa ban wan ka aiom lyiur la kumno kumno kane ka jingkieng ka la dei ban dep noh ba ki briew kin dup suk ban ïoh shibun ki jingmyntoi lyngba kane ka surok kaba pynïasnoh ïa shibun tylli ki shnong ha kane ka thaiñ.
title: Sngewdiaw u Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar naba sah khongreng ka jingkieng ba T. 4 klur tam

content: U Deputy Chief Executive Member ka KHADC, u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem myn ha ka sngi balang u la pyntip ba ka border committee ba la pynïaid da ka Council ka dang don ha ka jingïakren bad ka regional committee na ka bynta ban ïakren ïasuk halor ka jingïakajia bad ka khappud Assam.Haba la jubab ïa ka jingkylli kaba la kylli da u Myntri ka liang pyrshah, u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne, u Syiem u la pyntip ba tad haduh mynta ki regional committee jong ka Meghalaya bad Assam kim pat leit jngoh ïa kito k jaka ïa kajia na ki daw bym lah kiar.Katba u Chyne u kwah ban tip ba ka jingmih na kane ka jingïalang kaba ka pynlong hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam naduh ba la don ki dkhot jong ka House kiba long ruh ki dkhot jong ka regional committees, ha kaba u Syiem u la pyntip kumne, “Ka jingïalang hapdeng jong ki chairman jong ki regional committee jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam bad ym don jingïakren eiei ruh em halor ba kumno ban pynkhreh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jaka kaba ngi la dep leit jnogoh hynrei ha ka jingïalang, ïa ka tarik, ym pat pynthikna na ka bynta ka jingleit jngoh ïa ka jaka”.
title: Dang ïakren ka KHADC bad ka regional committee

content: Ka ïing dorbar jong ka KHADC myn ha ka 20 tarik Nohprah 2023, ka la pdiang ïa ka Official Resolution ban dawa na ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynkylla (Amend) ïa ka Constitution (Scheduled Tribes) Order, 1950  kane ka long ban khanglad ïa kiwei ki riewlum na kiwei ki jylla  kiba ïoh jingithuh  Schedule Tribes (ST) ban ïoh jingmyntoi kum ki trai jylla.Ha ka dorbar tlang jong ka KHADC kaba la sdang  myn ha ka 20 tarik Nohprah na ka liang ki MDC na baroh ar liang ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia ba kiwei ki riewlum na kiwei ki jylla, ha jylla Meghalaya ki ïoh ki juh ki jingmyntoi kumba ïoh ki trai jylla  lyngba ka jingïoh syrnod Schedule Tribes (ST).Haba ïadei bad kane u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ha kane ka sngi u la wanrah da ka Official Resolution ban dawa na ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynkylla (Amend) ïa ka Presidential Order 1950.U la ong, “Ka jingthmu ban wanrah ïa kane ka resolution ka long hadien ba ïohi ïa ka jinglong jingman  hapoh  ka Ri Khasi, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïoh jingmyntoi  kiwei pat ki riewlum na shatei lam mihngi na ka ST Status na Meghalaya, haba leit pat sha kiwei ki jylla ki trai jylla Meghalaya kim ïoh ïa ka jingmyntoi kum ba ïoh kiwei ki riewlum ha ka jylla jong ngi bad kane ka long ka jingduhnong ha baroh ki liang.”“Kumta ngi donkam ban wanrah noh da ka Resolution ban kyntu na ka Sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban shim khia ban pynsngew sha ka sorkar India ban wan rah noh ïa ka jingpynkylla ha ka Constitution (Scheduled Tribes) Order, 1950, da kaba ithuh noh thik tang ki trai paid riewlum kum ki Scheduled Tribe ha Meghalaya,” u la ong.Haba kyrshan ïa kane ka Resolution, u Nongïalam ka Liang Pyrshah u Bah Titosstarwel Chyne u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ma u ruh ula dep ban aiti ïa ka Private Member Resolution halor kane kajuh ka kam ha ka 4 tarik u Nohprah, u la ai khublei ïa ka EC kaba la sngewthuh ïa ka jinglong kongsan kane ka Resolution bad ban wanrah ïa ka mynta ka sngi hapoh ka Ïingdorbar ban ïoh ïatai bad ai jingmynjur.U Bah Titos ula ong ba kane ka Resolution ka long kaba kongsan bha bad ka dei ka jingkyrsiew thiah ïa baroh ba kin ïeng ïada ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ki nongshong shnong. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka Resolution ka long ban kdew ïa ka jingshisha ba ki la don bun bha ki paid riewlum (kat kum ka thup ST) kiba ïoh ïa ki juh ki jingmyntoi kumba ïoh ki trai paid riewlum jong ka jylla”.“Ka jingsngewkhia jong nga ka long ba kine ki riewlum na kiwei ki jylla, ki lah ban thied jaka katba ki mon ha ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei ki nong Meghalaya pat kim lah ban thied jaka ha ki jylla jong ki,” u la bynrap.Halor kane ka Resolution la ïashim bynta lang ban ïatai da ki MDC kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, u Bah Bajop Pyngrope, u Bah PN Syiem, u Bah Jambor War, u Bah Latiplang Kharkongor bad kiwei kiwei .
title: Pdiang ka ïingdorbar ka KHADC ïa ka Resolution ban kyntu na ka sorkar India ban pynkylla ïa ka Constitution (Scheduled Tribes) Order, 1950

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union lyngba ka Education Cell hadien ba ka la ïoh ïa ka jingujor na ki samla pule ka jylla ki ban ïakhun ïa ka examine CSIR NET exam 2023 ka ban long ha ka 26, 27 bad 28 tarik u Nohprah 2023, kiba hap ban leit ïakhun ïa kane ka exam shabar jong ka jylla kum sha Jorhat bad Dibrugarh. Ka seng mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Nohprah 2023, ha ka jingïalam u Samla Richest Malngiang bad u Samla Shelkitbok Kharbani Assistant  Education Secretary  CEC ka la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u Education Minister jong ka sorkar jylla u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka ophis treikam jong u ha Secretariat. Ha kane ka sngi la don ryngka ruh u Adviser to the education Minister, Government Meghalaya u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang.Ka seng ha kane ka jingïakynduh ka la ïoh ban ïakren bad pynpaw halor kane ka jingeh jong ki samla pule ki ban ïakhun ïa kane ka examine, hadien ka jingïakren bad ki nongïalam iong ka seng, na ka liang jong u Minister u ba dei khmih ïa ka pule puthi u la kular ba un shimkhia mardor ïa kane ka kam, bad ha khmat jong ki nongïalam ka seng hi u la phone sha u senior Director NTA ban khmih bniah ïa kane ka kam bad ban pyntikna ba ki samla pule ka jylla ki dei ban ïoh thoh ïa kane ka examine hapoh ka jylla la jong.
title: Leit kynduh ka KSU ïa u Rakkam A Sangma ban ïakren halor ka jingeh jong ki samla pule ki ban ïakhun ïa ka examine CSIR NET exam 2023
