content: :U Myntri ka tnad  Food Civil Supply and Consumer Affair, u Bah Comingone Ymbon ha ka 28 tarik Naiwieng, 2023 u la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shong ha ka jylla ba kim dei ban khuslai jingmut halor ka jingbyrngem ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) ban sangeh wanrah petrol ha ka jylla da kaba kdew ba ka sorkar ka dang wad ïa ki lad ban pynbeit ïa kane ka jingeh.Kane ka long shisngi hadien ba na ka liang ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union ka la rai ban sangeh  ban wanrah ïa ka umphiang petrol jong ka IOCL ,BPCL bad HPCL sha ka jylla Meghalaya, na ka liang ka Sorkar Jylla ka la khot ïa ka jingïalang kaba kyrkieh bad ki Union ha Nongpoh ha ka 29 tarik Naiwieng ban pynbeit ïa ka mat jingdawa  jong ki.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Myntri ka tnad Food Supply and Consumer ka Sorkar Jylla, u Bah Comingone Ymbon u la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka sorkar ka la dep ban khot ïa ki Union na ka bynta ban don ka jingïalang ha Shillong hynrei ki la kyntait kumta la pynbeit noh ban don ka jingïalang ha Nongpoh Ribhoi District.Na ka liang u Myntri u la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla ba kim dei ban sngewthuh bakla halor kane ka mat namar na ka liang ki nongdie petrol ha ka jylla ki dang pahuh ka petrol kum ba ka long mynta.Ngi dang pahuh ka petrol ha ka jylla na ka bynta 2-3 sngi, bad lada ka jylla ka shem ba ka duna petrol ka sorkar kan sa bthah ïa ki Deputy Commissioner  ba kin shim khia ban tyngkai ha ka jingdie ïa ka petrol.
title: Halor ka jingbyrngem ka NEPMU, kyntu u Bah Comingone Ymbon ïa ki nongshong shong ha ka jylla ba kim dei ban khuslai jingmut

content: Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la dawa haduh 80 per cent ïa ki kam ba lait na ka bynta ki paidbah Ri Lum Khasi ha ki private bad organised sector.Ha ka shithi sha u Chief Secretary, u DP Wahlang, uba dei u president ka KHNAM, Pyndapbor Saibon uba la ong ba ka party ka la phah da ka jingtyrwa ba tam na ka bynta ban kynthup hapoh ka State Reservation Policy (SRP) lem bad ka jingpynshai.“(Ngi la kyrpad ba) ïa ka reservation jong ki 80 per cent ki kam ba lait ha ki private sector/organized sector, dei ban ai na ka bynta ki paidbah Ri Lum Khasi jong ka jylla Meghalaya,” ong u Saibon.Da kaba ai da ka jingpynshai, utei u president jong ka KHNAM u la ong, “Haba peit shaphang ka jingkyrduh ka ki samla hapoh ka jylla, ngi sngewthuh ba ka kam sorkar marwei kan nym lah ban pynbiang, te kumta, lada ki kam shimet(private sector) ki lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka SRP, ka lah ban ïarap ban pynmih kam na ka bynta ki samla jong ka jylla.”“Shuh shuh, ka tarik ba la buh, kata ha ka 18 tarik, Jylliew 1973 ka laiñ ba 7.2 ka la dep kynthup lypa ïa ki kam paidbah, ha kaba ka sorkar ka la ïarap ïa ki jaka pule bad ki kontraktor ha ka SRP. Te kumta, ngim ïohi eiei ruh em ban don jingeh ha ka ban pyn kynthup ïa ki kam shimet bad kiwei kiwei ki organized sector ha ka SRP,” bynrap u president ka KHNAM.Ka party ka la dep phah lypa ïa ka mat treikam jong ka jingtyrwa sha ka SRP, 1972 bad ka Office Memorandum kaba la pynmih na ka por sha ka por katkum ka shithi ba la buh tarik, kata ha ka 31 tarik, Jymmang 2023.“Ngi kwah ban pynpaw ka jingsngew jong ngi na ka daw jong ka jingpynslem ha ka ban rai ïa ka jingpyntreikam bad ngi kwah ban kyrpad ïa ka sorkar ba kan buh ïa kane hakhmat na ka bynta ka rai ba khatduh,” ong u Saibon.
title: Dawa 80 percent ka KHNAM ïa ka quota ha ki kam ba lait jong ka private sector

content: Ka Meghalaya Human Rights Commission (MHRC) ka la ai por haduh 15 sngi ïa u chief secretary ban phah ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingbym lah ban siew tulop ïa ki hynriew ngut ki nongtrei kontrak jong ka tnad transport.Kawei ka jingthoh ba la pynmih da u secretary jong ka MHRC u la ong ba la Commission ka la shim ïa ka suo motu cognisance ban pynïoh ïa ka hok jong kito ki hynriew ngut ki nongtrei kontrak ki bym shym la ïoh tulop ba trei ha ka tnad transport ha South Garo Hills District.Katkum ka jingïathuh na ka lad pathai khubor, kumba hynriew ngut ki nongtrei kontrak jong ka tnad transport ha South Garo Hills ki dei ki bym shym la ïoh tulop la don haduh ar snem lem bad uwei u nongtrei uba la khlad noh bad ka pisa kaba dang sah sa kumba 20 bnai kaba u dei ban ïoh. Ka la ong ba ka Commission ka la dep pynmih da ka jingtip sha u chief secretary ba un phah da ka kaiphod ba biang sha ka Commission hapoh 15 sngi.
title: Pan kaiphod ka MHRC halor ka jingbym lah ban siew tulop

content: :Ka Khasi Students’ Union myn ha ka 28 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Samla Eric Nongkynrih, Sport Secretary ka Seng ka lah ïoh ban ai jingïarap ïa ki Samla ki ban mih khmat sha ka National Youth Champion League ka ban long ha ki tarik 8-10 jong u Nohphrah 2023 ba lah pynlong da ka Pro MMA League hapoh Priyadarshini Youth Complex, Malund West, hapoh ka nongbah Mumbai.Ka Seng ha kane ka sngi ka lah ïoh ban noh synñiang lang sha ki 4 ngut ki samla ki ba mih khmat lyngba ka Shlem School of Martial Arts kaba don hapoh Mawlai Iewrynghep.U Samla Eric ha ba ai jingkren u la kyntu kynpham bad ba kitei ki samla ki ban mihkhmat ba kin trei shitom ban ïoh ïa u soh ka jingjop ha ka jingïakhun ka jong ki bad kumjuh ban ïai kyntiew lem ïa ki para samla namar ka jingïalehkai sports ka dei ka wei ka lad ka lynti ka ban pynjngai ïa ki samla na ki jingdih pynbuaid kiba kyrni kum u drok u ba lah kynrei bha hapoh ka jylla jongngi.Kumjuh u la pynkynmaw ruh ïa ki sienjam kiba ka Seng ka lah shim ha kaba ka la plie ïa ka Maitshaphrang MMA and Fitness Team hapoh ka shnong Nongthymmai kum kawei na ki shlem ban ai jinghikai ïa ki Samla ha ka liang ka kilan met bad kumjuh ban ban kyntiew ïa ki Samla ha ka kam ïalehkai.
title: Kyntu Kynpham ka KSU ïa ki Samla ki ban mih khmat sha ka National Youth Champion League

content: U Myntri ka thoh ka pule ka Meghalaya, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka la shim ia ka rai ba kan don ka jingpule kaba kyrpang ia ka Sixth Schedule jong ka Riti Synshar jong ka Ri India, ia ka Larity bad ia ki matti u mynbarim na ka bynta ki samla pule ka jylla. Kine ki jingpule ki sa long na ka bynta i khynnah skul Primary, Upper Primary bad Secondary.U Myntri Rakkam A. Sangma ula iathuh ia ki nongthoh kot khubor ba ki samla pule ki dei ban tip ia Riti Synshar jong ka ri India, kaba kynthup ruh ia ka Sixth Schedule, ka jingriew spah jong ka larity bad ia ka rukom im jong ki ‘riewlum jong ka Meghalaya. U Rakkam A. Sangma ula iathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka don ka jingthmu ba kan don la ki jong ki kot pule bad pyrshan ruh ban ioh jingbit na ka NCERT.U Myntri u la iathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar jylla kan sa shong pyrkhat bad ka Khasi Authors’ Society, kynthup ruh ia ka Achik Literature Society, ki akhia bad khlieh nongsynshar ia kiba kiba kum kino ki jait jingpule yn pule ha ka kyrdan Elementary, Primary, Upper Primary bad Secondary.
title: Thmu ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynrung ïa ka jingpule ha Sixth Schedule ka Riti Synshar ka Meghalaya

content: :U Bah Lakmen Rymbui, uba dei u Chief Adviser Government of Meghalaya u ba dei ruh u MLA ka Amlarem Konstitwensi ha ryngkat da ka jingïa donlang u Bah Pius Marweiñ MLA ka Ranikor Konstitwensi mynta ka sngi u la ïoh ban ot ïa u ribon bad plie pyrda noh ïa ka Indoor Stadium ha shnong Nonghyllam South West Khasi Hills District  ha ryngkat da ka jingïa donlang ruh u Bah T.Lyngwa Deputy Commissioner SWKHD, u Bah Avin Warbah jong ka BADO ka C&RD Block Ranikor, u Bah G.D.Kharwanlang, Supritendent of Police SWKHD bad kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar.Ïa kane ka Indoor Stadium Nonghyllam, la pyntrei lyngba ka Under Additional Scheme SCA (BADP) 2019- 2020 Border Area Development Department Government of Meghalaya ha ka mang tyngka kaba T. 60 lak. Ha kane ka sngi, la pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh shuh lyngba ki jing rwai bad ruh ka jing pyni nam ïa ki Marrep ki soh bad ki jhur jyrngam bad ki umsoh bala shna hi na kane ka dong ka thaiñ ha ryngkat da ka jingïa donlang ki riew rangbah bad ki paidbah jong kane ka thaiñ.Naka liang u Ma Lakmen Rymbui, haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la ai ka jingïaroh ia U Bah Pius Marweiñ, u MLA ka Ranikor Konstitwensi ba kum u nongmikhmat naka ne ka thaiñ u la leh bha shibun ban wanrah shibun ki jing myntoi naka bynta ki shnong lyngba da ka jingïia trei lang bad ki ophisar bapher bapher da kaba kitbok ba kin nang ïai pyn tyllun ïa ki kam hapoh ka Konstitwensi. Ka jing don kane ka Indoor Stadium ha Nonghyllam kan long ka jingkyrkhu ïa ka shnong Nonghyllam bad ki shnong ba Marjan ban ïoh pyndonkam ha kino kino ki bynta khamtam ha ki kam ïalehkai Sports da kaba kyntu ba kin sumar khuid da kaba pyndonkam hok ïa kane Indoor Stadium khnang ba kan long ka jing kyrkhu ïa kane ka dong ka thaiñ hi baroh kawei.
title: Ïoh ka Nonghyllam ïa ka Indoor Stadium kaba T.60 lak

content: Ka School of Humanities jong ka North Eastern Hill University ka la rakhe ia ka “Bhartiya Bhasha Utsav-2023, kaba ia dei bad ka jingdon jong ki jait ktien bapher bapher ha India.  Ia kane ka prokram la Multi Use Convention Hall jong ka NEHU at Umshing in Shillong. Ha kane ka program, la ia shim bynta da ki nonghikai jong ka NEHU kum juh ruh ki nonghikai college bad samla pule. Ha kane ka prokram la don ruh ka jingiaphylliew jingmut Panel Discussion halor ka phang, “Ka jingstad teknoloji bad ki ktien lyngba ka Bhartiya Bhasha.Ka jingrakhe ia ka Bhasha Utsav ka long ban sam sha ki samla pule ia ki jingtip kiba ia dei bad ki ktien bapher bapher ha India. Ban sngewkmen ia ka jingdon jong ki ktien bapher bapher, kiba wanrah ia ka jingiatylli, ka jinglah ban ia sngewthuh jingmut iwei ia iwei pat.Ka jingrakhe ia ka  Bhartiya Bhasha Utsav-2023 ka long kham tam eh ban pynsngew sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba ki ktien bapher bapher ki wanrah ia ka roi ka par hapoh ka ri bad ia ka jinglong kawei jong ka ri India.Kane ka prokran ka la sdang da ka jingthang sharak bad pynbud pat sa da ka jingrwai ieid ri “Mei India”. Ka Chairperson jong ka Bhartiya Bhasha, ka Prof. Streamlet Dkhar ka la pdiang sngewbha ia ki nong shim bynta.Kane ka prokram ka la sdang da ka jingai jingkren da u Myntri jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Alexander Hek. Kiba la ia shim bynta ha kane ka Panel Discussion ki long u Prof. Buddha Chandrasekhar ka AICTE, New Delhi, Prof. P. Mahanta ka NIT, Shillong; u Dr. A.K. Maji of Information Technology ka NEHU, Shillong bad Dr. Abir Suchiang ka English and Foreign Languages University, Regional Campus, Shillong. Ia kane ka panel discussion la pyniaid da u Prof. S.K. Singh from the Department of Linguistics, NEHU Shillong.
title: Rakhe ka School of Humanities ka NEHU ïa ka Bhartiya Bhasha Utsav-2023

content: Kum shi bynta ban pynmih fund iaka Club naka bynta ka 1st Division Football League bad 1st Division Cricket League, ka Malki SC kan pynlong iaka Penalty Shootout haka 1 tarik bad 2 tarik December 2023 ha madan Malki naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep.Haka 1 tarik December ki ba jop kin ioh iaka song tyngka 10,000 tyngka bad kiba wan ba ar iaka song tyngka 5000 tyngka. Ka bai rung ha katei ka sngi kan dei 500 tyngka. Haka 2 tarik December kiba jop kin ioh iaka song tyngka 15,000 tyngka bad kiba wan ba ar kin ioh 10,000 tyngka. Ka bai rung ha katei ka sngi kan long 700 tyngka. Kino2 ki kynhun kiba kwah ban iashimbynta kin sngewbha ban poi noh ha madan Malki haka por 10 baje mynstep.Nalor ka Penalty Shootout ka Club kan pynlong ruh iaka Fete haka 1 tarik bad 2 tarik December ha kaba ka Bumper Prize jong ka Housie kalong 50,000 tyngka haka 1 tarik December bad 1,00,000 tyngka haka 2 tarik December 2023. Ka Housie kan sdang naduh ka por 6 baje janmiet.
title: Yn pynlong ka Malki SC ïaka Penalty Shootout bad Fete haka 1,2 tarik December

content: Ka jingialang jong ka Expert Committee kaba ia dei bad ka bhah thungkam thung jam kan long ha ha ka 6 tarik u Nohprah. Ia kane la iathuh da u Chief Secretary ka Meghalaya, u Bah D.P. Wahlang ha ki dkhot ong ka  Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ba ki la iakynduh ha Main Secretariat, Shillong. Ia kane ka kynhun la iathuh da u General Secretary, u Bah  James M.A. Neng hadien ba u la ioh ban ia kynduh ia u Chief Secretary, u Bah D.P. Wahlang. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, u Bah Neng ula ong ba ka seng kam banse ban leit iakynduh ia u Chief Secretary ban tohkit shaphang ka jingtrei kam jong ka Expert Committee namarba ka seng ka iohi ba kane ka kam kam shym la iaid shaphrang. Ia kane ka Expert Committee kaba don san ngut ki dkhot, la khlieh da u nongbishar ba la shongthait jong ka Iing Bishar Madhya Pradesh High Court, u Mool Chand Garg.
title: Yn ïakynduh ka Expert Committee bhah thungkam ha Nohprah

content: Ki nongpyniaid jong ka Hotel Polo Towers Group ha Shillong ki la pathai ia ka jingbeh jong ki lyer lehkmen lehsngewbha, kum ka jingwan jong jong ka Khristmas bad kiwei ki sngi lehsngewbha da kaba pynlong ia ka jingot ia u Cake uba khia haduh 50 Kg. Ka jingshet ia une u Cake ba kyrpang ka kynthup ia ka jingkhleh ia ki soh, ki budam, ki musli musla, ka wan bad ka ngap ba la wanrah kyrpang na Sohra.
title: Pathai ka Hotel Polo Towers da ka jhingot cake ïa ka jingwan ki sngi leh sngewbha

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la pynbna ba ka Chigitchakgre kaba hap hapoh jong ka Gambegre Block ha West Garo Hills District kum ka shnong ki nongri ngap. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh na ka Sorkar jylla ka pyrshang kaba lah ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki paidbah da kaba pyntrei kam ia ki skim kum ka  CM Elevate bad YESS Meghalaya na ka bynta jong ki samla.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka jingithuh ia kane ka shnong kum ka shong jong ki nongri ngap ka ba ka Sorkar kan lah ban ai ia ki jingiarap bapher bapher ia ki nongri ngap jong katei ka shnong.U Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ba kine ki jingai jingiarap ia kine ki nongri ngap, ka kynthup ia ka jngai jingiarap pisa ia kane ka shnong kaba 10 lak tyngka. Nalor kane ka pisa, ki nongri ngap ki ioh ruh ia ki tiar ri ngap, kum ki ksing ngap, ki jaka ri ngap, ki jaka ai jinghikai ba ia dei bad ka jingri ngap, ka jingplie lad plie lynti bad kiwei ki kam kiba ia dei bad ka jingri ngap.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ula ioh ruh ban iakren bad ki paidbah hadien jong katei ka prokram.
title: Pynbna u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ïa ka Chigitchakgre kum ka shnong ki nongri ngap

content: U Myntri sorkar bad u nongïalam jong ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP), u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la rai ban nym ïakhun biang na Jaiaw konstituensi ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), ka ban sa pynlong la shem snem.U Lyngdoh u la ong ba un nym ïakhun ha kane ka ilekshon na ka bynta ban ai lad ïa u kyrtong jong ka kynhun Khasi Students’ Union (KSU), uba dei u general secretary barim, u Auguster Jyrwa na kane ka konstituensi.“Ngi la ai da ka kyrteng jong u Auguster Jyrwa kum u kyrtong jong kane ka seng na Jaiaw,” bynrap u Paul.Ha ka 20 tarik, Risaw 2022, u Jyrwa u la mih noh na ka seng Congress bad leit ïasnoh bad ka UDP kaba bud da ka ilekshon Assembly jong u snem 2023. U Jyrwa u la ïakhun pyrshah ïa u Paul Lyngdoh, uba dei ruh u president barim ka KSU, ha ka ilekshon MDC jong u snem 2019.
title: Yn nym ïakhun u Paul ha ka ilekshon MDC

content: :Ka MP jong ka Lok Sabha na Tura, ka Agatha K Sangma ka la leit sha South Garo Hills myn ha ka sngi ba ar bad ka la long ka shongknor na ka bynta ka District Development Coordination and Monitoring Committee (DISHA) ha new Circuit House Conference Hall ha Baghmara.Ha katei ka jingleit jong ka, ka Sangma ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong ka halor ki bor ba dei peit ïa ki district jong ki tnad bapher bapher na ka bynta ka jingseisoh ka jingïalang bad ka la ong ba kano kano ka jingïakren kaba la dep ïakren mynta ka sngi, yn sa rah noh sha ki bor ba dei peit na ka bynta ban pynbha shuh shuh bad shimkhia ïa kaba donkam. Ka la ong shuh shuh ba ka la shimkhia halor kaei kaei ka jingkylla ban wan kaba ka lah ban wanrah.Ha ka jingpdiang sngewbha ïa ka Agatha, u Deputy Commissioner jong ka South Garo Hills district, u S Awasthi u la pynpaw ka jingsngew nguh ïa katei ka MP ba don burom, ka Agatha K Sangma na ka bynta jong ka jinglah jong ka ban pynlong ïa katei ka jingïalang bad ong ba ka dei la lad kaba ka district ka lah ban pynbiang halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka jingpyn poi ïa ki tiar(delivery service) bad ban shimkhia halor ki katto katne ki mat bad ki jinglah ha ka ban sdang ïa ki scheme bad ki projek.
title: Leit ka Agatha sha South Garo Hills

content: :Ha ka miet jong ka 28 tarik, Naiwieng 2023, kumba 10 baje mynmiet, kawei ka trok (kaba don ka kali nombar WB 91 8529) ka la leit tynrah ïa ki lai tylli ki dukan bad noh shapoh riat ha Shangbangla. Katba u nongniah ïa katei ka trok u la mynsaw jur bad u nongïarap u la khlad noh hashen.Ki nongshong shnong jong ka Shangbangla ki la pyntip ïa katei ka jingjia sha ki pulit bad ka NHAI. Ïa u nongniah jong ka trok, la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh na ka bynta ka jingai jingsumar. Ïa mynta, ka trok bad ka met jong u nongïarap, la lap da ki pulit jong ka thanad Nongpoh bad ka NHAI.Ki nongsakhi ki la ïathuh shaphang katei ka aksiden ba la don ka jingbym lah teh lakam jong u nongniah ïa ka trok kaba u la pynher stet bad haba poi ha ka jaka ba khun, ha kaba ka jingkit mar ba bun jong kane ka trok, kaba ïaid na Shillong sha Guwahati.Hapoh ka jingkylli ïa u nongdie dukan, la ong ha kawei ka lad pathai khubor ba katei ka dukan ka dei kaba khang ha kato ka por ba jia katei ka jingjia, lem bad ka jingym don briew hapoh. Hynrei, katei ka dukan ka la shah pynjulor noh ha katei ka trok.Kum ka jingpyntip, ka jingjia ki aksiden ha kane ka jaka ka ju jia khah khah jan man ka taïew na ka daw jong ka jingkhun ka surok bad ka jingpynher stet ki kali, khamtam ki trok bad ki bos, kiba ap jingma ïa kiwei pat ki kali, dukan bad ki briew kiba pyndonkam ban ïaid na kane ka jaka.
title: Noh ka trok shapoh riat ha Shangbangla

content: Ha ki jaka theh umphniang petrol ha Shillong, la lum da ki paidbah ba bun ha ka janmiet jong ka 28 tarik, Naiwieng, kaba bud da ka rai jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) ban sangeh ban ai petrol ïa ka jylla Meghalaya naduh ka 29 tarik, Naiwieng.Ka long ka jingjia ba jia kyndit kyndit kaba la sakhi ha kane ka jylla, lem bad ki jaka theh petrol kiba la pyrshang ban teh lakam ïa ka jingbun jong u paidbah naduh 6 baje shaneng naba ki kali kiba la ïeng laiñ ki la phylliew petrol ha ki kali jong ki.Watla ka sorkar ka la pynthikna ïa ka jylla halor ka jingbym don petrol mynta lai haduh saw sngi, hynrei ki paidbah ki la sheptieng lypa shaphang ka jingeh kaba kin mad na ka jingïakhih bad yn sa don ka jingtyrkhong umphniang hapoh ka jylla ha ki sngi ban wan.
title: Ïalum ki paidbah ha ki jaka theh umphniang(Petrol Pump) ha Shillong naba ka Oil Union ka la pynsangeh ban ai naduh mynta ka sngi

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi, u la leit jngoh ïa ka 7th Elite Men’s National Boxing Championship kaba dang ïaid ha SAI, NEHU naduh ka 25 tarik, Naiwieng haduh ka 1 tarik, Nohprah 2023.Haba kren shaphang katei ka jingïalehkai, u Myntri rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma, u la ong ba ka long ka burom na ka bynta ka jylla ban pynïaid ïa ka National Boxing Championship. “Ka la don ka jingban jur da ka sorkar ban don ka jingïalehkai hapoh kane ka jylla da ki katto katne ki kynhun ba kyrshan lang, kiba pynmih bun ki jingai jinghikai, ka jingpynmih bun ki jaka ïalehkai, ka jingithuh ïa ki nongïalehkai ba pawnam bad da kaba pynïaid bun ki tamasa ïalehkai,’’ ong u MR. U la ong ba katba dang pynthikna ba ka Sport ka la long kaba pynkhring da ka sorkar, hynrei la don k jingïakhun hynrei u la bynrap da kaba ong kumne, “Ngin sa pyrshang ban pynbiang na kine ki jingïakhun kiba ngi mad ha ka lynti jong ngi bad kyrmen ban pynïaid ïa ki tamasa ïalehkai,” ong u Conrad. U la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ban don sap ki samla ïalehkai ha ka rta kaba dang biang bad ong “Lada ngi kwah ba ki samla jong ngi kin wanrah burom ïa ka ri da kaba ïohpdiang ki takma, ngi hap ban ithuh ïa ka sap ba ki don ha ka rta ba dang khynnah, ban ai ïa ki ka jinghikai ba biang khlem ap ba un da dap 10 haduh 15 snem ka rta.”U Conrad u la ong shuh shuh ba ki samla ki donkam ban ïoh ka hok jong ki bad ka jingdon jingmut jong ki ha ki jingïalehkai ne jingrwai kaba dei ban kin ïoh jinghikai. “Ka dei namar kane ba balei ngi la pynlong ïa ki prokram bapher bapher na ka bynta ki samla jong ka jylla khnang ba ka jingthrang jong ki bad jingdon jingmut jong ki, kan nym long leh noh ei,” bynrap u Conrad.Shuh shuh, ha kane ka por, dei ka Director, Sports and Youth Affairs, ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, IAS bad u S K Shandil, u Technical Delegate bad ka Member Boxing Federation of India.
title: Leit jngoh u Myntri rangbah ïa ka National Boxing Championship ba dang ïaid

content: :U District Magistrate ka West Khasi Hills u bah Garod LSN Dykes u la pynbna ban pynjari da ka kyndon 144 CrPC ban mana bad khang pyrshah ïa ka jingtih bad jingshalan beaiñ ïa u dewiong ha baroh ka West Khasi Hills District bad shabar ka District.Kino kino kiba ïaleh pyrshah yn pynshitom katkum ka aiñ bad kane ka hukum ym pyntreikam noh mardor tad haduh ban da pynbeit da kumwei pat.
title: Da ka kyndon 144 CrPC pynjari u DM ka WKH ban mana shalan beaiñ ïa u dewïong

content: :Ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union (NEPMU) mynta ka 29 tarik Naiwieng, 2023 ka la pynbna ban pynsangeh noh ïa ka jingthmu ban ïakhih hadien ba la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Nongpoh Ribhoi District.Lah ban kdew hangne ba na ka liang ka North East Petroleum Mazdoor Union ha ka 27 tarik Naiwieng 2023 ka la phah da ka shithi sha u myntri ka tnad Food Civil Supply and Consumer, u Bah Comingone Ymbon halor ka jingthmu ban sangeh wanrah petrol sha ka jylla Meghalaya da kaba kdew ba ki shah pynthud ha ki pulit ka jylla Meghalaya.Mynta ka sngi na ka liang u General Secretary  ka NEP Mazdoor Union, u Ramen Das u la ïathuh ba ka jingïakhih ngim pat sdang hynrei ka la saphriang ka shithi kaba ngi la phah sha u Myntri ka tnad Food Civil  Supply ka sorkar Meghalaya, kumta ka la don ka jingsngewthuh bakla .“Hynrei hadien kane ka jingïalang kaba la  pynlong mynta ka sngi ha Nongpoh, Ri Bhoi District na ka liang ka Union ka la shim ïa ka rai ban ym ïakhih shuh bad ki kali kiba dei ban pynpoi ïa ka petrol kin wan kumba ju long” u la ong.Na ka liang u Bah Kennedy Khyriem, u President  ka Petroleum Dealers Association, Meghalaya,  u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingïalang ka long kaba seisoh ha kaba na ka liang ka Mazdoor Union ka la rai ba kan ym ïakhih shuh .U la bynrap  “Ha kane ka jingïalang ngi la ïoh ruh ban ïa kren ruh halor ka jingeh ka ba ki nongñiah kali bad ki nongïarap ïa ki nongkit umphiang ki mad, kumta ngi la rai ban sa pynlong jingïalang ha kawei ka sngi ban weng ïa kine ki jingeh “.Ha kane ka jingïalang kaba la long mynta ka sngi la wan shim bynta da u Pravin Bakshi, u Commissioner Secretary ka tnad Food Civil Supply ka Sorkar Jylla, ki dkhot ka Petroleum Dealer Assiociation, ki bor district bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Sangeh noh ka NEPMU ïa ka jingïakhih ban wanrah petrol sha ka jylla Meghalaya

content: :U MLA ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) u Bah Sanbor Shullai mynta ka 29 tarik Naiwieng, 2023 u la kynthoh ïa u Member of Parliament (MP) ka jylla u Bah Vincent H Pala, da kaba kdew ba u dei u MP u ba khlem trei eiei baroh san snem.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Shullai u la ong ba ka jingpynjop MP ïa u Bah Pala ka dei ka jingduhnong kaba khraw na ka bynta ka jylla namar ba u Bah Pala u khlem leh eiei na ka bynta ka jylla baroh san snem.“Ngam don eiei pyrshah ïa u Bah Pala hynrei ym tang ma nga hynrei wat ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla ruh ki sakhi ïa ka jingduhnong ba ki pynjop ïa u Bah Pala kum u MP namar baroh san snem u khlem leh eiei ” u la ong.U la bynrap “ka long ka ba sepei ïa ka jylla namar kum ba ka long la san snem hi u Bah Pala u la shu shong ha kyndong, bad lada ha kato ka por ki pynjop ïa nga, katta nga la wanrah da ka dud bad ka ngap na ka bynta ka jylla.”“Kumta nga kyntu ïa ki paidbah ha ka jylla ba mynta ka kynti ki dei ban pynjop ïa u kyrtong ka BJP namar ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng yn ialam da ka sorkar BJP te kan long ka jingmyntoi ïa ka jylla” u la ong shuh shuh.Halor ki khubor ba u Dr Mukul Sangma bad u Bah VH Pala ki lah ban pynïasoh bad ka BJP u la ong, “ka thong jong ka BJP hi ka long ban punkhlaiñ ïa ka party bad ka dei ka kamram ki dkhot ka party ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ba kin wan ban pynïasoh sha ka BJP, kumta lada u Bah Pala bad u Dr Mukul kin wan ngin pdiang sngewbha ïa ki”.Halor ka khubor ba u Bah Hek u pan tiket MP, u la ong ba na ka liang ka party hi lada ka rai ban ai tiket ïano ïano ruh kin pdiang bad kin trei shitom lang ban pynjop ïa u kyrtong ka BJP.
title: Lada ki pynjop ïa nga, katta nga la wanrah da ka dud bad ka ngap hynrei ki pynjop ïa u Bah Pala u shu shong ha kyndong: Sanbor Shullai

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya kan pynlut haduh 50 million US dolar ka pisa na ka bynta ban shana ia ki 273 tylli ki Aganwadi Centre kiba tymmai bad ban moramot pat ia ki 2200 anganwadi centre kiba ri ha kylla jong ka jylla. Ia kane la iathuh da u Myntri ka tnad Social Welfare, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh haduh ka jingpyllong ia ka jingialang baar sngi.Ha kane ka jingialang la ioh ruh ban iakren shaphang ka jingthung ia ki briew kiba don ka jingtbit kiba ia dei bad kane ka tnad trei kam. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Bah Paul ula iathuh ba kawei ka jingduna trei kam jong kane ka tnad Sorkar ka dei ka jingduna jong ki briew kiba don ka jingtbit bad jingjanai jong ki ha kane ka kam.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ruh ia ka jingdon kam ban buh ia ki nongtrei Sorkar kiba lah ban don ka jingiadei bad ki tnad Sorkar bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar Pdeng khnang ba yn lah ban pyntrei kam khan bha ia ki skim jong ka Sorkar Pdeng hapoh jong ka jylla bad ban pyndep ia ka jingtrei kam jong ki ha ka por kaba la buh.Na ka liang jong u Pricipal Secretary, Sampath Kumar u la iathuh ba ka jingshna ia kitei ki Aganwadi Center kiba thymmai bad ka jingmoramot ia ki Aganwadi barim ha kylleng ka jylla kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki hynriew lak ki khynnah.U Sampath Kumar ula iathuh ruh ba kane ka jingmang pisa kaba haduh 50 million US dollar, ka long ha ka dur jong ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka Asian Development Bank project nalor ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka skim MGNERGS.U Sampat Kumar u la iathuh ba la shim ruh ia ka rai ban pynkhlain shu shuh ia ka jingtrei kam ki ICDS sa ha kiwei pat ki 14 tylli ki Block da kaba thung ia kaCDPO bad kumba ka long haduh mynta ka Meghalaya ka don haduh 41 tylli ki ICDS kiba trei kam ha ki 55 tylli ki Block jong ka jylla. Une u heh Sorkar u la iathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka la bthah ia ki Deputy Commissioner ban kin ai jingmut ban buh ia ki Aganwadi Center kiba thymmai ha ki 1.500 tylli ki shnong kiba ym pat don ia ki ICDS.U Sampat Kumar u la iathuh ruh ba ha katei ka jingialang la ioh ruh ban ia kren shaphang ka project DREAM kumno ban pynlong ia ka jylla Meghalaya kaba lait na u drok.
title: Yn pynlut 50 million US dolar ban shna bad moramot ïa ki Aganwadi Centre ha Meghalaya

content: :Ka ophis jong u Block Development Officer Mawkyrwat C&RD Block ha ryngkat da ka jingïatrei lang bad ka Line Department jong ki tnad ophis bapher bapher hapoh ka District mynta ka sngi ki la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka “Hamara Sankalp Viksit Bharat” hapoh jong ka M3K Resource Centre Mawpharkhrew Mawranglang Laikyntoit South West Khasi Hills, ha kaba ka Kong Caralyn Khongwar Deshmuk, ka IAS Additional Secretary, Rural Development Government of India ka la long kum ka kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u Bah T. Lyngwa, u Deputy Commissioner SWKHD, u Bah I. Lawrynniang, u BDO Mawkyrwat Block bad kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar bad ki paidbah kiba la wan ban sngap ha kane ka prokram ba kyrpang.Ka kong Caralyn Khongwar Deshmukh ka la pynshai paidbah halor kane ka sngi ba kane ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra ka long kum shi bynta kumno ban pyntip paitbah ïa ki skhim bapher bapher ba ka sorkar India ka la ai lyngba ki ophis sorkar bapher bapher kiba don hapoh ka jylla bad ki District na ka bynta ki jingmyntoi ki riewshimet, ki paidbah ha ki ïing ki sem bad ha ki  shnong ki thaw  bad ïa ka thaiñ baroh kawei. Ka sorkar India ka la pynbiang lut ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki briew da kaba phiah ïa ki skhim bapher bapher ha man la ki tnad ophis sorkar da kaba bhah kyrpang ban kyntiew da ka jingthmu kumno ban wanrah ïa kata ka jingim kaba long mar katjuh bad ki briew da kaba ka la ai ïa ki skhim shna ïing, ki  surok, ki mar rep, ban seng kam seng jam la jong lyngba ki Self Help Group bad ki Society bad kumjuh ruh ha kaba ïa dei bad ka koit ka khiah bad ruh ha ka pule puthi.Shuh shuh ka la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kala leh bha shaba palat ïa ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka Ri India ha kaba ym don shuh ki jingduna naduh ka ïing, ka um, u khaw, ki mar rep, ki dawai da shin bad ruh ki kot skul namar kata ka la kyntu ba baroh kine ka sorkar ka la bthah ba ki paidbah ki dei ban pynbiang ïa ki kot jingdonkam kumjuh ruh ki dei ban don ïa u Aadhar Card bad ïa ki Bank Account.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ka jingkren na u bah T. Lyngwa, u Deputy Commissioner SWKHD bad ruh ki jingkren lyngkot na ki briew kiba la ïoh jingmyntoi bad ki jingïarap lyngba ka skhim  NRLM, PMAY-G , MGNREGS bad kiwei kiwei de.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ka jingpynkup burom ïa ki nong seng kam la jong bad ruh ïa kiba la ïoh jingïarap na ki skhim sorkar bad ka jingai ïa ki Work Order sha ki longïing  na ka bynta ki Skhim PMAY bad kiwei kiwei de.Ïa kane ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u Bah. L.T Tariang MCS bad ka jingkren pdiang na u Bah R. S Marweiñ, u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawranglang Laikyntoit bad ka jingkhublei na u Bah I. Lawrynniang, u BDO Mawkyrwat Block.
title: Ka Sorkar ka la pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ki paidbah lyngba ki tnad ophis sorkar: Caralyn Khongwar Deshmukh

content: Ha ka jingjia kaba ym pat ju iohsngew koit mynno mynno ha ka history jong ka Garo Hills Autonomous District council, ha ka Sngi Nyngkong ka GHADC kam shym ailad ba kan don kano kano ka jingpathai khubor ka dorbar jong ka Council. Ha kane ka jingjia, ki bor jong ka GHAC kim shym la shah ia ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor ba kin wan lum khubor ia ki jingiakren hapoh jong ka Council.Ki kot khubor bad ki lad pathai khubor ki la ong ba kim lah ban sngewthuh kaba la pyllong ia ka GHADC ban ym shah ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor ban pathai khubor ia ki jingiatainia hapoh jong ka Council. Kiwei ki khubor ki ong ba kane ka jingleh jong ka GHADC ka long ba kam kwah ba ki paidbah kin tip ia ka jingshah thad ia ki jingduna trei kam jong ka Executive Committee synrop hapdeng ka National People’s Party bad BJP ha ki dkhot ka liang pyrshah
title: Ym shah ban pathai khubor shaphang ka dorbar ka GHADC

content: U Chief Executive Member jong ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council u Bah Madonbai Rymbai, u la ong ba ka jingbym lah ban lum ia ka khajna kaba thikna na ka liang jong ka Sorkar jylla na ka daw jong ka jingkhaii beain ia u dewiong, ka la wanrah ia ka jingduhnong ia ka Meghalaya.U Bah Madonbai Rymbai u la ong ba kane ka jingbym lah ban lum bha ia ka khajna da ka Sorkar jylla, ka la pyllong ia ka ban ym lah ban pyllait ia ka khajna dewiong sha ka Jaintia Hills Autonmous District Council. Une u rangbah u la ong ba kane pat ka la pyllong ia ka JHADC ban ym lah ban siew ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei jong ka Council mynta la shiphew bnai. U Bah Madonbai Rymbai u la iathuh ba ki nongtrei jong ka Council ki la ia kynduh ia ki jingeh kiba khraw namarba ki ioh ia ka tulop kaba thikna naduh ka snem 2019.Une u nongmihkhmat u la kynthoh ia ka seng sain hima sima National People’s Party kaba bat ia ka jingsynshar hapoh ka jylla bad ia ka BJP kaba bat ia ka jingsynshar jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ba kim lah ban weng ia kane ka jingeh. U Bah Madonbai Rymbai u la kynthoh jur ruh ia ka jingtrei kam jong ka NPP Executive Committee jong ka JHADC hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah Thombor Shiwat, uba ym shym la lah ban weng ia kane ka jingeh.U Bah Madonbai Rymbai u la iathuh ki nongtrei jong ka JHADC ki ioh tulop tang shi bnai bad ar bnai ha ka jaka ba kin ioh shiphew bnai.
title: Kynnoh u CEM barim bym ïoh lum khajna thikna ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council

content: Ia ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep la tip kum ka jaitbynriew tipbriew tip Blei. Ia kane ka jaitbynriew la tip ruh kum ka jaitbynriew ha kaba ki kynthei ki ioh na ka nam ka burom, ym tang haiing hasem bad ha ka imlang sahlang. Namarba kane ka jaitbynriew ka shim jait na ka kmie, kiwei ki jaitbynriew ki shim beit ba ki kynthei ki long kiba khlain bad kiba bat ia ka bor ka iktiar ha ki longing longsem jong ki. Kiwei ki jait bynriew ki sngewthuh bakla ba ki kynthei ki long kiba donbor namarba dei maki, kiba bat iaka pla pisa haiing hasem. Dei ma ki kiba leit thied leit pet bad kumta ter ter. Ia kane ka jaitbynriew la tip ruh ka jaitbynriew kaba tip ia ka akor ka burom. Hynrei, kane kam dei baroh ka jingshisha. Kane ka long namarba ka don pat sa kawei ka jingshisha bad kata ka long ba ki kynthei ki long kiba tlot. Ki jingtip kiba ngi lah ban lum ki iathuh ia ngi ba bun ki kynthei jong kane ka jaitbynriew ka jong ngi, ki shah leh bein leh khoh, ki shah byrngem byrsit, ki shah shoh shabat bad ki shah ieh khunrei. Kine ki dei kita ki jingeh bad ki jingjaw ummat, ba ki longkmie jong ka jait bynriew jong ngi ki mad jar jar ha kine ki longing longsem ki jong ngi. Kiba kum kine ki longkmie bad jong ngi, kim nud ban iathuh iano iano. Lada ki iathuh ki lah ban shah mad arshah ki jingeh. Lada ki iathuh ia kita ki jingeh jong ki, mano ba ai jingiada ia ki. Ki don ki khep ha kaba ki longkmie ki jong ngi, ki shah byrngem byrsit bad shah dawa pisa na la ki jong ki kurim. Kine ki dei ki jingshisha jong ka jingim. Kawei ka jingshah thom bor jong ki longkmie ka long ba ki hap ban pyndem ha la u jong u kurim lada ki mon lane kim mon. Nalor ka jingbym biang ha iing hasem, ka kynthei kan hap ruh ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban ri ban sumar bad ban pynbiang ia kito ki khun babun jong ki. Ki don kiba ong ba ki kynthei kiba ia kynduh ia kine kum kine ki jingeh ki lah ban ieh noh ia kita ki lok jong ki. Hynrei, kane ruh ka long kaba eh. Lada ka phet noh da uta u lok jong ka. Kan hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh halade ban ri ban sumar ia kita ki khun babun jong ka. Kawei ka jingshisha ka long ba ain, ka khang bad ka pynshitom ia ki kurim shynrang kiba leh bein leh khoh ia ki kurim ki jong ngi. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka jingeh, ki longkmie ki jong ngi, kiba iakynduh ia ki jingeh ki jong ki ha ki longiing longsem ki jong ngi, ki lah ban leit wad jingiarap na ki One Stop Center ba ka Sorkar ka la buh ha ki jaka ai jingsumar. Kine ki One Stop Center ki lah ban ai jingmut ym tang ia ki kynthei kiba shah leh bein leh khoh. Hynrei, ia ki kurim shynrang ki jong ki, khnang ba kin lah ban wan sha ka jingsngewthuh jingmut bad ba kin lah ban ia imsuk im sain kum shiiing shisem. Kine ki longkmie ki dei ruh ban tip ba ka ain Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, kam teh tang ia kito kiba la iathoh shongkurim kat kum ka ain, la ka long ha Iingmane lane kat kum ka ain jong ka Sorkar. Kane ka ain kateh ruh ia kito kiba shu iashong kha kumto khlem da pyndep kat kum ki kyndon iathoh jong ka ain. Kane ka ain ka kren shai kdar ba ki kurim shynrang ki dei ban ai ia u bai bam na ka bynta ki khun lada kim iashong shuh bad ki kurim ki jong ki.
title: Ka aiñ Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act ka khang ïa ka jingleh beñ ïa ki kurim kynthei

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union, Umsning Circle kan sa pynlong noh shen ia ka Football Tournament na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 14 snem ha madan Umsning Town Dorbar Pyllun.Kino kino ki kynhun kiba don jingthmu na ka bynta ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung ki lah ban phah noh ia ki phom ha shwa ka 20 tarik Nohprah mynta u snem.Na ka bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah lah ban phun ha u nombor 609927372,6909948239,9366347391
title: Da ka phutbol yn pynlong ka KSU Umsning na ka bynta ki khynnah 14 snem

content: :Ka kynhun Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC), myn ha ka 29 tarik, Naiwieng, ka la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar ban weng noh ïa ka shithi ba la pynmih da u ophisar jong ka tnad social welfare na ka bynta ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997.Haba la kren sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien jong ka jingïalang bad u Myntri ka tnad Social welfare, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u president jong ka HYC, u Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong kumne, “Ngi kyrpad ïaphi ba phin pynmih da ka jingshim khia ba biang na ka bynta ban phah weng noh ïa ka shithi hapoh ka jingong jong phi.”U la ong ba katei ka shithi jong ka tnad social welfare ka la ong kumne, “Shuh shuh, hangne la ong ba ka Lineage Act, 1997 kam ai jingbit ban pynmih ïa ki syrnod ST sha ki nong aplai, kiba la ai bad ka jait jong ki lehse na ka jait kpa ne kmie bad kane ka jingpyrshang ban ai da ka jait jong u kurim da ki bym dei ki Khasi ruh la ïoh jingbit”.“(Ka HYC) ka la dep thoh da ka shithi sha ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), Shillong, kaba la pan jingpynshai ba lehse ka aiñ ba la thaw da ka KHADC ba la tip kum ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997 ka ai jingbit ban pyrshang ïa ka jingpynmih ïa ki ST. Kata ruh, ka shong ha ka jingujor jong ngi, naba ka Registration Authority, KHADC, Shillong na ka shithi Letter No. DC.II/RA/24/2023/2 kaba hap ha ka 8 tarik, Jymmang 2023, Shillong, ka la thoh sha u Under Secretary sha ka sorkar jong ka jylla Meghalaya, Social Welfare Department, ba kan pynshai halor kane ka mat bad kyrpad ïa ka Concern Authority(s) ba kan nym pynmih kino kino ki syrnod ST ha kaba ïadei bad ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997 bad ka aiñ kaba la dep thaw,” ong u Synrem katba dang bynrap kumne “Katkum katei ka shithi ba la phah sha u Under Secretary sha ka sorkar jong ka jylla Meghalaya, Social Welfare Department, ka long kaba beaiñ bad ka long kumba leh pyrshah ïa kitei ki jingpyrshang ba dei rukom bad ha kaba long ka jingpyrshah ïa ka aiñ kaba dei ka KHAD (Khasi Social Custom of Lineage) Act, 1997 bad ki aiñ ba la thaw. Te kumta, dei ban phah weng noh ïa ka shithi mar mar.”
title: Kyrpad ka HYC ïa ka sorkar ban weng ïa ka shithi halor ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka Khasi Lineage Act

content: U Myntri ki kam korbah ri u Amit Shah mynta ka sngi Thohdieng u la ïoh ban ïa don lang bad ki Lat, ki Myntri Rangbah bad heh Sorkar jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ha ka jingïalang jong ka 71st Plenary of North Eastern Council ha State Convention Centre ha Shillong.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingïalang jong ka North Eastern Council ka long ban ïakren shaphang ki kam pynroi jong kane ka dong bad ka thaiñ. Ha kane ka jingïalang la pdiang sngewbha da u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma ryngkat bad ki Lat ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi.
title: Shim bynta u Amit Shah ha ka jingïalang ka NEC

content: Ka prokram ban wanrah ïa ka kampeiñ ‘Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra’ ha South Garo Hills District, la dep pynlong ha Malikona, Baghmara, myn ha ka 29 tarik, Naiwieng.Ïa katei ka prokram, la pynïaid da ka District administration bad ki khlieh jong ka district bapher bapher ha ka jingdon lang jong ki na ka bynta katei ka jingwanrah ïa kane ka kampeiñ.Ha ka por ba don katei ka prokram, ki ophisar ki la kren shaphang ki scheme bapher bapher bad ki prokram jong ka GoI, kiba dang sdang mynta lyngba ki tnad ba dei peit.La pynïaid ruh da ki kali IEC naduh na Malikona kum shi bynta jong ka ‘Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra’. Katei ka kali ne art mobile van, ka la don da ki jingpyni da ki video, ka jingïakren bad ki tiar ki tar ban ïoh ïakren phone bad ki paidbah bad ban pynhusiar ïa ki halor ki sheme bapher bapher bad ki prokram. La don haduh phra tylli ki kali IEC kiba la ïaid na ka bynta ka South Garo Hills, kiba napdeng kitei ki kali, la pynïaid ar tylli sha ki saw tylli ki C&RD block hapoh katei ka District.Don na kitei ki scheme na ka bynta ka Rural Awareness, ki dei kiba la pyndonkam ha kane ka kampeiñ, kynthup ïa ka Ayushman Bharat – PMJAY, PM Garib Kalyan AnnaYojana, Deendayal Antyodaya Yojana, PM Awas Yojana, PM Ujjwalla Yojna, PM Vishwakarma, PM Kishan Saman, Kisan Credit Card (KCC), Har Ghar Jal – Jal Jeevan Mission, Jan Dhan Yojana, Suraksha Bima Yojana, Atal Pension Yojana bad kiwei kiwei.Sa kiwei pat ki scheme, ki kynthup ïa ka Sickle Cell Anaemia Elimination Mission, jingpynrung kyrteng ha ki skul Eklavya Model Residential, Scholarship schemes Forest Right Titles kiba kynthup ïa ki jaka shimet bad jong ka imlang ka sahlang, ka Van Dhan Vikas Kendra kaba la pynïaid ïa ki Self Help Groups bad kiwei kiwei.
title: La wanrah ïa ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra ha South Garo Hills

content: Ka Australian Consul General, ka Ms Rowan Ainsworth, myn ha ka 29 tarik Naiwieng, 2023 ha ka por 5 baje janmiet ka la ïakynduh bad ka kynhun Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) Podium Finish Committee ban ïa syllok halor ki jingtreikam ka Talent Identification Program (TID), Ka Elite Pathway Program (EPP) bad ka Super Elite Pathway Program (SEPP).Ha katei ka jingïasyllok la ïa don lang u Bah John F Kharshiing u Working President, ka Kong Matsiewdor War Nongbri, IAS, Vice President, u Bah P Laloo, Joint Secretary, bad u Bah Dipshon Rynthathiang u Chairman Podium Finish Committee, MSOA. Kiba la ai jingpynshai bniah halor ki rukom treikam kitei ki prokram da ka jingïarap ki Olympian na Australia bad da ka jingkyrshan borbah na ka tnad Department of Sports and Youth Affairs Government of Meghalaya.Ka Australian Consul General ka la pynpaw ka jingkmen ban ïoh sngew ïa ka jingmaitphang ka MSOA da ka jingkyrshan ka tnad DSYA ha ka ban pyndonkam ïa ki Olympian na Australia ban sei ïa ki rangkynsai ha ka sport bad ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la jam shakhmat kumba leh kiwei ki jylla hapoh Ri India. Ka la ong ruh ba ka Ri Australia ka dei ka Ri ha kaba ki paidbah ki da ïa shim bynta bha ha jan baroh ki jingïalehkai sports.La pyntip ruh ïa kane da ka longheh, ha kaba ka SEPP prokram ka don ruh ka bynta ban ïalam ïa ki 12 ngut ki nongïalehkai SEPP bad ki katto katne ngut ki Coach sha Australia ban ïa shim bynta ha ki Tournament sha ri jong ki kum shi bynta ban tynjuh bad ban ailad ba kin mad ïa ki rukom long ha ki jingïalehkai shabar ri ne International.Hadien kane ka jingïakynduh katei ka longheh ka la ïoh lad ban ïa kynduh lang bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma ban ïa syllok shuh shuh halor kumno ban pynïajan ïa ka Australia bad ka Meghalaya bad India ha kiba bun ki kam.
title: Ïakynduh ka Australian Consul General ïa ka kynhun MSOA

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba la dep pyllait paidbah kaba kyrteng ka “Da jingkmen”, ka dei kaba la rwai da u Eibanroy Langsteh, Agent Langstieh bad ka Phiba Lyngdoh bad la pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka kompeni Eibanroi Langstieh Visuals.Katba u Director Editing dei u Elvest Thabah, Asst Director : Wanstar Thabah, Asst. Anthonius Thabah, Nathan Thabah John Nongrum Rudolf Malngiang Ibalahunshisha wahlang. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki puron jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u Keebor Kurbah ( Marangbah ) bad ka Medaaihun Basaiawmoit ( Kongbih ). Ka Make Up Artist dei ka Suzan_kharsaiot Jenevivekhyriem jong ka SV Make-Up Studio, katba ïa ki Costume, la shimti da ka Ladiangarti Thabah Mebica Thabah, nonghikai shad dei u Mebha dondor k wanlang, Light & Decor : Rupert Pathaw & Ban Dancers : Drew syngkrem, Gracymai Pala, Damian Shyrngap, Larijanai sutnga, Adele Zachary Nongrum, Daiarisa Wahlang, Daphisa wahlang, Iaridashisha sutnga, Wanpynshai nongrum, Banshailang nongrum, l Bobby wahlang, Shirlena A. Lyngdoh Nongbri, Shanaya lyngdoh, Prakash thapa, Ibanylla lamin, Sujal kuri, Deibanda. R. Natep, Jessica malngiang, Ibaiasuk malngiang, Liza Mary kharkongor, Sherya basaiawmoit, Deimaphishisha shangpliang, Banylla rynjah, After khongngai, Erisha thabah, Witney Marbaniang, Sara Malngiang, Lovelin syiemlieh, Liza Mary Kharkongor, Shreya Basaiawmoit, Gracymai Pala, Larijanai sutnga, Daiarisa Wahlang, Daphisa wahlang, Iaridashisha sutnga, Wanpynshai nongrum, Adele Zachary nongrum, Damian Shyrngap, Hedi Drew Myrthong, Dadaaihun mawblei, Rinesca mawblei, Gloryza mawblei.Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa u Fairson L.Nongbet, M.Lyngdoh, C.R Kurbah, B.B.Lyngdoh, A.Lyngdoh, Pynshngain Kurbah, Pynbha Lyngdoh, Naphilahun L. Nongbet, Balbareen Kurbah, Andy Rapsang, Batdon Sohtun, Sainkupar Sun bad ka jaka kaba ki la leit ring ïa katei ka jingrwai ka dei ha La Nicholas bad Dei kine Resort.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Da jingkmen”

content: Uwei u briew u la shah kem ha ki pulit ha ka Sngi Thohdieng katba u dang pyrshang ban phut ïa ki tyllai ba buh dak na ka bynta ka jingiamareh thong jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games kaba dang ïaid shaid shaid mynta ha madan Pa Togan Nengminja Athletics stadium in Tura, West Garo Hills District.Ki nongialehkai bad kum juh ruh ki nongwan peitkai ki la kyndit ban ïohi ïa ka jingshah pynsniew jong kine ki tyllai buh dak. Kane ka la jia ha bakut jong ka stadium haka por 10 baje mynstep.Man la ka sngi da ki hajar ngut ki nongpeit ki ïa tuid sha katei ka stadium, kham tam lei lei ban peit ïa ki nongïamareh thong. Ka jinglah ban pynbiang ïa ka madan ïalehkai kaba la ïaryngkat kyrdan bad kiwei ki jaka ïalehkai jong ka pyrthei, ka la khring iïa ki paidbah ïa kito kiba ieid ïa ki jingïalehkai bad kum ruh ruh ïa ki hajar ngut ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya kiba ïa tuid sha Pa Togan Nengminja Athletics stadium ha Tura, West Garo Hills District man laka sngi.Ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba une uba la shah kem, u dei uwei na ki bashong basah shabar jong ka stadium.
title: Kem ki pulit ïa u briew ba pyrshang ban pynsniew ïa ki jingbuhdak mareh thong

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi kaba kyrteng ka “Wat pynleh noh ei”, ka dei kaba shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki purom jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u Micheal Pyngrope, Wellborn Mynsong, John Rani, Sanmilian Mawrie, Medaaihun Basaiawmoit, Rishisha Mynsong.Ha katei ka jingrwai, la rwai da ka Sunmisha Nongbet, Beststar Kharsahnoh, katba la ring da ka Camera da u Skhem L Tron, la pynmih bad shna ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Mike Denzil jong ka Khasi Studio, DJ Banshan Studio Nongpoh Studio Mawlai. Ki nonghikai shad ïa katei ka jingrwai dei u Phrang sngi L Mawphlang bad ka Parvi Rongrin. Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa u MLA, u Charles Pynrope, Zi Mawlong, Donald Mylliem Umlong, Asha Lynda Pyngrope, Robinsius Lyngdoh, Rihun Biam, Rishalsius Pyngrope bad ïa ki nong subscribe baroh jong kane ka kynhun.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Wat pynleh noh ei” ba la rwai da ka Sunmisha Nongbet bad u Beststar Kharsahnoh

content: :Ha ka jingkhynra kaba la pynlong myn ha ka 18 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka kynhun shipai jong ka BSF Meghalaya ka la ïoh kurup ïa ka shini ba khia palat 17,000 kilo na ka khappud Meghalaya kaba la thmu ban khaïi tuh sha Bangladesh.Ha katei katei ka sngi, ka kynhun BSF Meghalaya ka la pynlong da ka jingkhynra ba jur, kaba la lam sha ka jingïoh kurup ïa ka shini ba bun na ki khappud district bapher bapher jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Ïa katei ka shini ba la ïoh kurup, la aiti noh sha ka ophis Customs na ka bynta ban shimkhia halor katei.
title: Ïoh kurup ki shipai BSF jong ka Meghalaya palat 17,000 kg ka shini

content: :Ka phlim Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Mano ban tip?” ka dei kaba la shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki puron ka Khasi, kynthup ïa ka Ibaniewkor L Mawnai(Jenny), Banmanbha Marwein(Nick), Ribhanylla Thangkhiew(Lydia), Bahunglang Nongneng, Rishan Kharsyntiew, Meena Khongain, Catherine A Kharsati.Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa ka longïing Kharsati (Mawpdang).
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka phlim “Mano ban tip?”

content: :Ka kynhun jong ka Officer Club South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi kila ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Ranikor Beach Festival ha rud wah Kynshi kiba la khot Pamdaba River Beach kane kalong kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ïa ki kam tourism hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills DistrictÏa kane ka Ranikor Beach festival ki la sdang mynta ka sngi ka 19 tarik kan kut noh ha ka 20 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024. Ka jing pynlong ïa kum kine ki Festival ka dei ka sien kaba 3 kata hadien bun bun snem ym shem la lah shuh ban pynlong ïa kane ka tamasa dei tad mynta u snem la ïoh biang ban pynlong ïa kane ka Ranikor Beach festival.Ha kane ka sngi la long kongsan da u ma Kyrmen Shylla Minister jong ka Social Welfare jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ryngkat da ka jing ïa donlang u MLA ka Ranikor bah Pius marwein, u DC ka SWKHD bah T. Lyngwa, U SP ka SWKHD bah G .D Kharwanlang.U Ma Kyrmen Shylla haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ai ka jing ïaroh ïa u MLA ka thaiñ kata ïa u bah Pius Marweiñ bad ïa ki ophisar sorkar jong ka District ba ki la ïoh biang ban pynlong kum ïa kane ka tamasa leh kmen hangne ha kane ka jaka ban kyntiew ïa ka thaiñ ha ki kam jngohkai pyrthei. Kane ka long ruh kum shibynta ka jingkha arsien ïa kane ka Festival kata hadien bun snem kim ïoh shuh kum kane ka kabu ban pynlong biang mynta u snem bad ngeit skhem ba nangne shakhmat naka liang ka Officer Club South West Khasi Hills District kin dang ïai bteng ban pynlong kum ïa kine ki tamasa lehkmen ha kane ka thaiñ.U bah Pius Marweiñ haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong ba lada ma ngi, ngi nang ban sumar ïa ka mei mariang halor katne ka jing itynnad jongka ka mariang ar shah kan ai ka jing kyrkhu ïa ngi ki briew.Ha kane ka sngi la pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh da ki nongput nong tem ki nongrwai kiba paw napoh ka jylla Meghalaya bad ruh la pyn i phuh i phieng shuh da ki jingïalehkai sport bapher bapher, ki jingshad tynrai khasi, garo banggali, lyngngam, ki jingput jingtem naki group bapher bapher lem bad kiwei kiwei de.
title: Ban kyntiew ha ki kam jngohkai pyrthei da ka Ranikor Beach Festival pynlong ka Officer Club SWKHD

content: :Hadien ba la ïoh ka jingujor na ki paidbah, ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front Patharkhmah Circle myn ha ka 19 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka la leit jngoh ïa ka surok naduh na Patharkhmah shaduh Umpyrtha bad shaduh Warmawsaw (9 KM) kaba la dep shna hapoh ka Scheme Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana lem bad ka jingbei tyngka kaba haduh T. 4.66 klur.Ïa katei ka jingleit jngoh, la lam khmat da u Bah Pynkhraw Makri, u President jong ka HNYF Patharkhmah Circle ha ryngkat ki dkhot jong ka seng HNYF. Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingleit jngoh, ka HNYF ka la lap ba ïa ka jingsiang ïa katei ka surok rong ka long kaba la shu tap tang nalor bad kaba lah ban khlong ïa ka da ka kti.“Kum kane ka jingshna ïa ka surok, sa tang katno sngi ngin lah ban pyndonkam ïa ka?’’ kylli jingkylli ka seng HNYF ïa ka PWD.Ka seng HNYF ka la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar bad ka PWD ba kan wan hi ban peit bad dawa ban shna biang ïa katei ka surok, “Ka surok ka dei u shyieng budlum jong ka roi ka par, hynrei kum kane ka jingshna ïa ka surok, klet noh ka roi ka par, ngi donkam ban phah shna biang ïa ka surok man la ka taïew.” pynkut u Makri.
title: Leit jngoh ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front Patharkhmah Circle ïa ka surok na Patharkhmah shaduh Umpyrtha bad shaduh Warmawsaw

content: :U Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tyngsong u la kyntu ïa ki nongïalam ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ba kin wan biang ban bteng ïa ka jingïakren ïa suk bad ka Sorkar, da ka ba pynshai ruh ba ka jingkyrpad ka sorkar jylla ban phah wan ïa ki nongïalam ba hakhlieh duh ka seng ka long namar ba ki nongïalam ba pynkup bor da ka seng ban pynïaid ïa ka jingkren ïa suk kim lah ban shim rai eiei khlem da phah ktien sha ki nongïalam ba ha khlieh duh ka Seng.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 19 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 u bah Tynsong u la ong ba ka jingweng ka HNLC ïa ka jingïakren ïa suk ka dei ka khubor ka ba la pynkyndit ïa ka Sorkar jylla bad ka Sorkar pdeng namar ka jingpynïaid ïa ka jingïakren ïa suk ka la long ka ba ïaid beit shait shait.U bah Tynsong u la ong ruh ba halor ka jingdawa ka HNLC ban weng ïa baroh ki mokotduma pyrshah ki dkhot ka seng, ha ka jingïalang ka ba nyngkong ka sorkar ka la dep ban pan ïa ki kyrteng jong ki dkhot ka seng ki ba don ïa ki mokotduma.U la ong shuh shuh ba halor ka jingpan ïa ka safe passages na ka liang ka Sorkar ka la dep ban mynjur ïa kane bad ki dkhot ka seng ki la ïoh ban wan bad leit phai suk sha ka jaka ba ki don mynta. U la ïathuh ruh “Ki la dawa ruh ba ka Sorkar pdeng ka dei ban weng noh ïa ka jingkheiñ beaiñ ïa ka seng HNLC halor kane na ka liang ka sorkar ka la ong sha ki ba haba ki ong kren ïa suk kamut ban poi sha kata ka thong bad hap ban ïaid kyndon pa kyndon”.“Ka jingkynnoh jong ki ba ka sorkar jylla kam shim khia ka dei ka ba bakla namar ka sorkar jylla ka da thrang ban pynurlong ïa ka jingïakren ïa suk bad ka HNLC”, u la ong.
title: Ngi khot ïa ki nongïalam ba halor ka HNLC namar ba ki nongïalam ba pynïaid ka jingkren ïasuk kim lah ban shim rai eiei :Tynsong

content: :Tang ha ka rta kaba 21 snem ka samla Phyrnai Kyndait, ba shong ba sah ha East Jaintia Hills bad kaba dang pule ha ka 4th semester Bachelor of Arts, ka la tyngshain ha ka jingïalehkai niah cycle ha ka lympung jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games ha Tura.Ka jingieid jong ka Phyrnai ban niah cycle ka la mihpaw naduh ba dang rit ha ki por ba ka dang niah tang da I cycle lai shaka bad nangne in sa kiew ha ka jingïalehkai. Ha u snem 2022, I la ioh ïa ka lad ban ïakhun nyngkong eh ha kawei ka lympung ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaintia Adventure Cycling Association ha Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung, ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop bad ka la lah ruh ban poi ha ka thong niah cycle na Jowai shaduh Amlarem bad kam sangeh tang hangne hynreo ka la kiew ruh ha ki kyrdan ba shajrong wat ha Mawkyrwat ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cycling Association.Ka la ïoh ban mihkhmat ruh ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka jingïakop jong ka MTB Tawang National CFI kaba la pynlong ha Tawang, bad hangne I la ïoh ban khur ïa ka takma ksiar. Ka jingïaid lynti jong ka samla Phyrnai Kyndait na I nongniah cycle ba paw tang ha shnong, da ka jingtrei shitom I la long ruh I nongniah cycle wat ha satlak ka pyrthei.Ha u snem ba ladep, ka la ïakhun ha ka 4th Meghalaya Games bad ka la jop ha ka kyrdan ba ar, bad mynta u snem ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games, ka la ïoh syndon ban khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka jingïakhun jong ka XCO women open category/Mass start.Ka samla Phyrnai ka la ai khublei ia ki kmie ki kpa, bahaïing hasem khamtam ïa u hynmen uba ju ai mynsiem ïa ka ha ka jingïaid lynti kum ka thei ïalehkai. U hynmen jong ka, uba dei ruh u nongniah cycle, u long u païa baskhem na ka bynta ka samla Phyrnai bad dei lyngba ka cycle u hynmen ka sa jop ïa ka thong.Ka samla Phyrnai kam ju phai dien na ki jingeh bad jingjynjar bad haba ai jingkren ka la ong ba lada ka leit shabar ban ïakhun ha ki rynsan, ka ju kynduh ïa kiwei pat ki para nongïalehkai ba kham tbit, bad lada ïanujor, ki kham biang ki tiar ki tar ban ïa ki cycle ba na shane bad haba ka wan na ka longïing kaba sngewrit, ka long ka jingeh ïa ki ban ïoh ïa ki cycle kiba biang ki tiar ki tar namar ki la kham rem.Khlem kano kano ka jingshah hikai, ka ju ïaid marwei ha ka jingim kum ka thei ïalehkai niah cycle bad ka ju niah kai tang bad ki paralok, bad man la ka step ka ju mareh step kumba 5-10 kilometer bad ka ju niah cycle man ka step bad por janmiet kumba 2 kynta eiei.
title: Khlem jingshah hikai, khur jingjop ka samla ba dang 21 snem ha ka ïakop niah cycle

content: :U Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong, u la kyntait ïa ka jingdawa ka Voice of People Party (VPP) halor ka jingthung biang ïa ki ophisar ki ba la shah wengkam na Lokayukta da ka ba ong “Ngim treh ban thung biang ïa ki”.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 19 tarik kyllalyngkot 2024, u bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka sorkar ka ïaid kat kum ki act bad ki rule.“Ka jingthungkam ïa ki ha ki por mynshwa ka long namar ba duna ki ophisar ha Lokayukta kumta ngi la thung da ki ophisar ki ba la shongthait ban pynïaid ïa ka jingtrei kam ka Lokayukta”, u la ong.“Hynrei lada phai sha ka act jong ka Lokayukta ka kdew ba dei ban thung da ki ophiser ki ba dang trei bad ka sorkar ka leh ïa kata hi mynta”, u la bynrap. U bah Tynsong u la ong “Ngam tip ba ka VPP halor kaei bad balei ki dawa ban thungkam biang ïa ki ta ki ophisar, haba mynta ngi la dep ban thung da ki ophiser ki ba pura bad ngi la weng ïa ki ophiser ki ba la thung contractual”.U la bynrap “Ngi la ïoh ïa ka shithi na ka VPP bad ngi la dep pynshai baroh ki jingsngewthuh bakla jong ki hynrei ngam tip balei ki kwah ban mih surok”.U Bah Tynsong u la ong halor kane ka jingdawa ka VPP ngan kren shai ba ka sorkar kan ym treh ban thung biang ïa ki. Halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka jingwengkam ïa kine ki lai ngut ki ophisar ka dei namar ba ki la sei ïa ka jingbam sap ha GHADC, u bah Tynsong u la ong” lada don ka jingshisha ha kata ka jingkynnoh la dei ban weng kam shwa ïa u heh duh ka Lokayukta ym ïa ki lai ngut ki nongtrei ki ba trei hapoh u Lokayukta”.
title: Ngim treh ban thungkam biang ïa ki ophisar ka Lokayukta :Prestone

content: :Kawei na ki jingïalehkai kaba lehse kaba ym juh bna koit ba kan paw ne ban ïalehkai pura ïa ka, pynban dei ha ka lympung kaba mynta jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 kaba la long ha sorbah Tura, ka Volleyball, lehse ka dei kawei na ki jingïalehkai kaba ki samla na kane ka jylla khamtam lei lei ki shynrang ki don bha ïa katta ka sap ba kin ïalehkai.Kumba ka kyntien ki riewtymmen ka ong “baroh u briew ba stad mano ba lah ban len, lada khlem da plie ka lad da kumno un lait ban kren”. Da kumta haba phai sha kane kawei na ki jingïalehkai kaba la long ha kawei ka madan shyiap ba don ha kut jong ka shlem pule ka Tura Law College, la shem bad ïohi ba ki sap ïalehkai ba nylla ki khun samla, khamtam lei lei ha ka liang ki khynnah shyrang, ka dak jong ka jingkyrmen ka don ïa ka jylla ha ka liang jong ka volleyball.Haba phai sha ki jingïakhun jong ki semifinal kiba la long mynta ka Thohdieng jong ka taïew, ki rang ïalehkai jong ka West Garo Hills ki la lah ba kin pynliem noh ïa ka ïa ka South Garo Hills da 25 – 22, 22 – 25,25 – 23, Set 4 : 25 -16).Katba ha ka jingïakhun ïa ka semifinal kaba ar pat ka kynhun ïalehkai ka South West Khasi Hills ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ïa ka North Garo Hills da 25-21, 17-25, 23-25, 25-17, 17-15, lada yn ïa phai pat sha ka jingïakhun hapdeng ki kynthei, ki thei ïalehkai jong ka South West Khasi Hills District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka East Khasi Hills da 25 – 14, 20 – 25, 25 – 18, 25 – 18.Ha ka jingïakhun ïa ka semifinal kaba ar pat, ki thei ïalehkai jong ka South West Garo Hills District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka West Garo Hills District da 25 – 09, 25 – 15, 25 – 23. Hadien kane, ka la don pat ka jingpynïakhun ïa ka kyrdan kaba lai (bronze medal match) kaba na ka liang ki kynthei, ka kynhun ka East Khasi Hills ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka West Garo Hills District da 25 – 14, 25 – 11, 25 – 20.Katba ha ka jingïalehkai ki shynrang ka jingïakhun ka dang bteng ban jam shakhmat.
title: Lyngba ka Meghalaya Games kaba ha Tura, paw ka sap ba nylla ki samla ha ka liang ka Volleyball

content: :Ka jingïalehkai jong ka jingïakhun kti kam lah khlem da pynhun hi jrut ïa ki paidbah nongpeitkai ha Don Bosco Junior College Indoor Arena. Ka jingïakhun kti ka long kaba shongkun ha ka final ha kaba ki nongshim bynta ki la sei la ka buit ka bor ban jop ha kane ka lympung.Hadpeng ka jinglehkai, ka East Khasi Hills bad South-West Khasi Hills ki la wan hakhlieh duh ha ka jingïakheiñ point da kaba khur mar artylli ki takma ksiar katba ka West Khasi Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, West Jaintia Hills bad East Garo Hills ki la ïoh mar kawei ka takma ksiar.Ha ka jingïakhun jong ki kynthei hapoh ka jingjia 55 kg, 60 kg bad 60 kg shajrong, ka kong Pynsuklang Lyngdoh na Eastern Wet Khasi Hills, Olivia Dkhar na West Jaintia Hills bad Rikka Ch Marak na East Garo Hills ki la sei la buit ka bor ka jong ki bad ki la ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop. Na ka liang ki shynrang, u Brandon Tariang na East Khasi Hills u la jop ha ka jingkhia 85 kg, u Mebansan Sangma na South-West Khasi Hills u la jop ha ka jingkhia 85 kg.Na ka bynta ka nam Champion of Champions, la ïoh ban khur da u bah Pynskhemborlang Marngar na West Khasi Hills ha ki kyrdan jong ki shynrang ha ka jingkhia kaba 75 kg bad na ka liang ki kynthei la ïoh ban khur da ka Olivia Dkhar na West Jaintia Hills ha ka jingkhia kaba 60 kg.U Deputy Commissioner, u Jagdish Chelani, IAS, u la ong ba ka long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ba ka arm wrestling ka la rung ha ka thup jong ka Meghalaya Games bad ka Meghalaya Games ka la wanrah shibun ki jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki nongïalehkai, ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai.
title: Paw bad tyngshaiñ ki rang bad ki thei ïakhun kti na East Khasi Hills ha ka 5TH Meghalaya Games

content: :Ka jingïalehkai jong ka Wushu ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba san ka la lah ba kan jam noh sha kaba kut hynnin ka sngi palei jong ka taïew.Ha kaba kut jong kane ka jingïalehkai, ka kynhun jong ka East Khasi Hills ki la lah ha kaban bat ïa ka kyrdan kaba halor duh jong ka miej khur takma, hadien ba kane ka kynhun ka la lah ba kan kur haduh 10 tylli ki takma ksiar 5 tylli ki takma Rupa bad 3 tylli ki takma Rnong, ka district kaba wan ban bat ïa ka kyrdan kaba ar dei ka Ri-Bhoi District kaba la lah ba kan khur 5 tylli ki takma ksiar bad 2 tylli ki takma Rnong, katba ka District kaba la wan ban bat ïa ka kyrdan kaba lai dei Noth Garo Hills kaba la ïoh ba kan khur 2 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 tylli ki takma Rupa bad 1 ka takma Rnong.Na ka liang ki bor ba dei khmih, ki niew bad shim ba ka jingïalehkai Wushu ha kane ka lympung ka kren shai kdar ïa ka jingsdang ba kan kiew bad ruh ban suthied bha ha kane ka jylla, ka daw bah kaba la pynlong ïa ki ban ong kumne ka long ba lada khmih bha ïa ka jingïoh ban khur takma, la lap bad shem ba nalor kitei ki lai tylli ki district kiba la kdew haneng, kiwei kiwei ruh ki samla ba la wan ïashim bynta na kiwei pat ruh ki district kim shym la leit phai thylli sha la ïing namar ba la don ki rang ne ki thei ïalehkai kiba la ïoh ban khur lemNa ka liang ki bor ba dei khmih, ki niew bad shim ba ka jingïalehkai Wushu ha kane ka lympung ka kren shai kdar ïa ka jingsdang ba kan kiew bad ruh ban suthied bha ha kane ka jylla, ka daw bah kaba la pynlong ïa ki ban ong kumne ka long ba lada khmih bha ïa ka jingïoh ban khur takma, la lap bad shem ba nalor kitei ki lai tylli ki district kiba la kdew haneng, kiwei kiwei ruh ki samla ba la wan ïashim bynta na kiwei pat ruh ki district kim shym la leit phai thylli sha la ïing namar ba la don ki rang ne ki thei ïalehkai kiba la ïoh ban khur lem ïa la ki takma ki jong ki.
title: 18 tylli ki takma khur ki nongïalehkai Wushu ka EKH ha ka Meghalaya Games ha Tura

content: :Ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ka la lah ban sei shisha ïa ki rang bad ki thei kiba snar kiba la ïakhun ha ka weightlifting bad ha kane ka jinglehkai, ki nonglehkai ki la wan poi na kylleng ki district ban ïakhun ban rah ïa ka namjop. Ka Ri Bhoi ka la sei ïa ki nongjop ha ka jingïakhun da kaba khur haduh hynriew tylli ki takma ksiar katba ka East Khasi Hills, West Garo Hills, bad South-West Khasi Hills ki la ïoh mar kawei ka takma ksiar.Ka Ri Bhoi ka la long ka lahduh ha ka weightlifting, da kaba khur 6 tylli ki takma ksiar ha kaba na ka liang ki shynrang ba ïakhun ha ka 73 kg, u Anasthasius Ryndongsngi, u la ïoh khur haduh 107 points bad ha ka sienjam ba ar da 112 points kaba la pynbiang pura ïa u ban ïoh khur haduh 219 point. U Wanbhabianglang Thabah, Laikmenlang Kharkongor bad u David Lyngdoh ki la long ki lahduh ha ka 61 kg, 55 kg bad 40 kg.Na ka liang ki nonglehkai ka East Khasi Hills ka la ïoh khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka kyrdan 81 kg lyngba u Edegar Benneth Jana uba la ïoh khur 140 points.Na West Garo Hills ha ka jingïakhun ha ka kyrdan 67 kg, u Raksil N Sangma, u la ïoh khur 142 point bad ïoh ïa ka takma ksiar katba na South-West Khasi Hills ka la don tang uwei ba ïoh ban khur ïa ka takma ksiar.Ka jingjop Jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 ka dei ka sakhi Jong ka jingkiew ki Kam ïa lehkai bad kilan met kaba ka lawei ba phyrnai ïa ka jylla.Haba ïa kren bad u Wei na ki nongïalehkai rah nar ba paw ka pyrthei, u ba dei ruh u ba la jop ïa ka takma Rupa Jong ka Olympics bad ka takma ksiar jong ka Commonwealth Games u Robert Kabbas u ba dei ruh u nonghikai bad nongai mynsiem Jong ka Meghalaya Elite Pathway program u la ong, “ba ka rukom pynïaid ïa ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 ka long kaba paka bha. Nga ai khublei ïa ki nongïalehkai baroh. ka Weightlifting ka dei ka jingïalehkai kaba biang bha ha ka Jylla ba ka jingdon ryngkat lang jong u ka ban pynpoi ïa kine ki khynnah sha ka thong, bad ngi kyrmen shisha ba kin poi sha ka thong,” u la bynrap.
title: Meghalaya Games 2024: 6 tylli ki takma ksiar, khur ka Ri Bhoi na ka Weightlifting

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la ïathuh ba un sa pynlait paidbah ïa ka State Anthem ha ka sngi ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap 52 snem ka jingïoh ïa ka jylla ba pura.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangna hadien ka jingïalang ki kynhun myntri ka ba la long ha ka 19 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha Secretariat, u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalang ki kynhun myntri la ai ka jingmynjur na ka bynta ka State Anthem ka ban sa pynlait ha ka sngi ban rakhe ïa ka Meghalaya Day ka ban long ha ka 20 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha Tura.U Sangma u la bynrap ba kan long ka jingsarong ka ba khraw na ka bynta ka jylla ban ïoh la ka jong ka state anthem, namar ka jylla kam don ïa ka state anthem, naduh ba ïoh ïa ka jylla ba pura.U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalang ki kynhun myntri la ïakren bad mynjur ruh ïa ki kyrteng jong ki briew ki ban ïoh ïa ki khusnam The Meghalaya Day Award — ka ban kynthup ïa ka khusnam U Tirot Sing Award na ka bynta ka arts and literature, ka Pa Togan N Sangma Award na ka bynta social services bad U Kiang Nangbah Award na ka bynta ka sports and games.Ha ka jingïalang ki kynhun myntri la ïa ruh ïa ka jingmynjur ïa ka draft bill ban padam ïa ka Meghalaya Civil Task Force Act 1974. Halor kane na ka liang u Myntri rangbah u la ong “Kat kum kane ki lai tylli ki post ki ba ju pynlait yn pynlong ki lai tylli ki post ba ju don, yn pynlong noh kawei kaban long shirta ban khmih da ka office u Chief Inspector of Boilers & Factories”.U Myntri rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ha ak jingïalang ki kynhun myntri la ai ruh ka jingmynjur ïa ka Contingency Fund of Meghalaya (Amendment) Ordinance 2024, kaba long ka sienjan ba shipor ban kyntiew ïa ka Contingency Fund of Meghalaya na ka ₹500 klur sha ka ₹1000 klur.
title: Yn pynlait paidbah u Myntri rangbah ïa ka State Anthem ha ka sngi rakhe ïa ka Meghalaya day

content: :Ha ka jingïakop siatkhnam (Archery) ki jingïalehkai ki la jam sha ka final ha ka Meghalaya Games ha kaba ïa baroh ki jingïakhun na ka bynta ban ïaknieh ïa ka nam lahduh yn pynlong lashai ka sngi ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha Montfort Centre of Education School, Tura.Ki kynhun kiba la jam sha ka final ha ka Indian Round jong ki kynthei ne Women Team Event ki long ka West Khasi Hills District bad ka East Khasi Hills District. Katba ha ka jingïalehkai kynhun jong ki shynrang ne Men Team Event ki long ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka Mixed Team jong ka Revurve ki long ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka West Jaintia Hills. Katba ha ka Indian Round (Mixed Team) ki long ka East Khasi Hills District bad ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ïa ka takma rnong ha ka Women Team Event kaba la long hynne ka sngi, la khur da ka Ri Bhoi hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka South Garo Hills District. Ka West Jaintia Hills District ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka Men Team Event hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka West Khasi Hills District.Ka Ri Bhoi ka la khur ruh ïa ka takma rnong ha ka Mixed Team Event hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District. Ha ka Indian Round Mixed Team, ka West Khasi Hills District ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka Ri Bhoi District.
title: Lashai yn ïakhun final ki kynhun ha ki jingïakop siat khnam ha ka Meghalaya Games

content: :Hadien ba la dep lum ïa u kba u khaw kum ka dak ka jingainam ïa u nongbuh nongthaw na ka liang ki khun ki hajar ka Raid Marwet hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Syiem ka Raid Marwet, u Pa’iem Ken Syiem lem bad ki Longsan , Lyngdoh, Pator bad kiwei de mynta ka sngi ki la pyndep noh ïa ka kñia ka khriam bad ka jingduwai phirat jong ka jinglehniam Sohjer kaba la pynlong ha Baridua, Ri Bhoi District.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi ruh da ka jingïadon ryngkat ruh u Bah Nathaniel Thangkhiew, Basan Nongkseh ka Hima Mylliem, u Syiem ka Raid Marngar, u Jeremy Lyngdoh, Pa’iem Richard Syiem, ki Myntri ka Hima Mylliem, ki Longsan Mansan, Lyngdoh bad Pator ka Raid Marwet nalor kiwei kiwei de ryngkat ki khun ki hajar ka Raid Marwet.Ha kane ka sngi la pyndep ïa ka jingkñia ha ryngkat ka shuid ka shor kaba la pyndep kat kum ka jinghikai u men barim ban pynneh la ka Tynrai kaba la ai da u syiem ka Raid marwet ha ryngkat na Hima Mylliem kiba la ai ïa ka nguh ka dem ïa u Trai nongbuh nongthaw u ba la ri sumar bad u ba la ai ka jingseisoh haka khyndew ka raid bad kiba la buh da ka jingduwai na ka bynta ka ka jingseisoh bad ka bha ka miat jong u khun u hajar ka raid.Haiden ba la dep kñia da ka ba suid ïa ka um luta bad ka jhur kpu la bud pat sa ka jingïadih ïa ka ka kyiad um kum ka Dak ban ai nguh ïa u nongbuh nongthaw bad ki men barim ban ïoh ka jingkyrkhuh kyrdoh na ki.
title: Ha ryngkat ka nguh ka dem la pyndep ïa ka leh niam Sohjer ka Raid Marwet

content: Hadien shi snem ba u lah pynmih ïa ka phlim “Khat Saw Phra 14/8” uwei napdeng ki nongshna phlim ba tbit na ka jylla, u Bah Kenny Lyngdoh, u lah pynkhreh ban wanlam biang sha ki paidbah ïa ka phlim ka ban pynïapbiej ïa ki bad ka ban pynsah ïa ki paid nongpeit ha ka jinglyngngoh (suspense thriller).Kum ban shu pynkynmaw u Bah Kenny u lah don bynta ban pynmih ïa ka phlim Gangs of North East (2017) bad ban shna ïa ka phlim AHOR (2022).Ha ka phlim ‘Unveiling Shadows (RNGAI)’, lah ak da kawei napdeng ki puron ba pawnam ka Regina Lamo.Kane ka phlim ka don ïa ka khana shaphang ka jingban khia ka jingsngewsih jong ka hadien ka jingshahpynïap ka kmie bad kiba ïa dei shipara bad ka. Ha kum kane ka jingshem lanot jong ka, ka don ka jingthmu ban wad ïa ka tynrai bad ka daw jong ka jingshah pynïap ki baïeid bathoiñ jong ka. Ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ka ban wad ïa ka jingshisha, ka shem ïa kiei kiei kiba pynher syrngiew ïa ka.U Bah Kenny Lyngdoh haba kren halor katei ka phlim u la ong, “Kane ka phlim ka pyni ba, ïa kiei kiei baroh kam long kumba ngi mut ne ïohi nabar. Kane ka phlim ka ïathuh khana ïa ka jingïaid lynti jong ka puron bad jingshem jong ka ïa bun ki jingpynthame, ki jingartatien.”Ka puron Regina Lamo kan ïatrei lang bad u nongshna phlim u Kenny Lyngdoh.Ha kane ka phlim ngin ïohi ruh ïa kiwei kiwei ki tyngshop ki puron kiba paw kum Jeremy Khongjee, Banatimon Mawlong, Mangkara Khongthohrem, Brandon Sunn, Phidalin Kharsyntiew, MewanpynbhalangTham bad kiwei kiwei ruh. Ka ‘teaser’ jong kane ka phlim lah dep pyllait ha YouTube Channel bad ïa ka phlim yn pyllait ha u bnai Rymphang.
title: Da ka phlim RNGAI, yn khring paidbah biang u Bah Kenny Lyngdoh

content: :Ha kawei ka jingjia ba la jia ha ka por miet, la don ki nongtuh kiba la thew beit ban leit tuh na ka State Bank of India ATM kiosk ha Rongram, kaba jngai kumba 15 kilometar na Tura, ha kaba ki la ïoh ban tuh haduh T. 30 lak, da kaba pyndonkam da ki jingot ïa ka tyndong lyer ban lah ot ïa ka synduk bad ka synduk ba thep pisa.La lap ïa katei ka jingjia ha k step jong ka 21 tarik, Nohprah, ha ka por ba ki nongsei pisa ki la pyrshang ban leit sei pisa bad ki la lap ba la don ki ding hapoh ka kiosk. La khang noh ïa ka shutter jong ka ATM, lem bad ka jingpynduh noh ïa katei ka mashin.U Superintendent of Police jong ka West Garo Hills, u Abraham T Sangma, u la ong kumne, “ki heh jong ka Bank ki la don ha katei ka jaka bad ka kynhun pulit jong ngi. Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ka bank, la suba ba la shah lute haduh 30 lak ka pisa na katei ka ATM. Ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit ban lap ïa ka jingshisha jong ka jinglut ka pisa.”Ki heh ba dei peit kim shym la shimkhia halor ka jingdonkti jong ka kynhun riewsniew. Ki nongtuh kiba la pyndonkam da ki jingtbeh ding ban ot ïa ka synduk ba thep pisa. Ki riewsniew ki la pynduh pyndam ïa ki CCTV camera hapoh kane ka jaka da kaba synreit da ka rong ïong khnang ban nym ïohi ïa ki ba ki leh kam sniew.Ki ATM kiba la kdew, ba don habar jong ka Rongram Indian Oil petrol steshon, ka la don ki CCTV camera ha katei ka steshon bad ka showroom ba markhap bad katei ka ATM. Ka CCTV camera, kaba dei jong ka showroom, ka la shah pynjulor na ka jingsynreit ha ka rong ïong.Ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka por Khristmas, la don ka jingai jingïada ha ki surok bad la suba ba kine ki riewsniew ki la ïoh ka lad ban ïaid lang bad kitei ki nongrakhe ïa ka aïom Khristmas, da kaba leh mynleh ïalade ba ki dei na katei ka kynhun ba rakhe lang. Haba ki la ïohrung hapoh katei ka ATM, ki la khang ïa ka jingkhang ne shutters jong ka ATM bad lute ïa ka pisa.
title: Lute ki riewsniew ïa ka ATM haduh 30 Lak

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la shim ia ka rai ban ai por ia ki lai tylli ki Regional Committee kiba peit ia ka jingpynbeit ia u pud u sam ha Meghalaya bad Assam ba kin ai ia ki kaiphod jong ki haduh ka 31 tylli ki u Nohprah.Ka Notification ba la pynmih da u Chief Secretary, u Bah D.P. Wahlang ha ka 13 tarik u Nohprah, ka ong ba kane ka dei ka jingpynbuh ia ka rai jong ka jingialang jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam ha ka 30 tarik u Nailur.Ha ka 24 tarik u Lber, ka Sorkar jylla ka la buh ia ki lai tylli ki Regional Committee ban peit ia ki jingeh khappud bad ba ki dei ban ai ia ki kaiphod jong ki bad kito ki shnong bad ki jaka kiba don ka jingiakam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam.  Kine ki long ka Langpih ha West Khasi Hills District; Borduar, Nongwah-Mawtamur, Deshdoomreah, Block-II ha Ri Bhoi District; Block- I, Psiar – Khanduli ha West Jaintia Hills District.U Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u  Bah Prestone Tynsong u peit ia ka Ri Bhoi district bad u Symbhud Myntri Rangbah Sniawbhalang Dhar  u peit ia ka West Jaintia Hills district bad u Myntri  Paul Lyngdoh u long Shongknor jong ka  Regional Committee jong ka West Khasi Hills District. Ha ka 7 tarik u Nohprah, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba ka jingialang jong ki lai tylli ki Regional Committee ban iapynbeit ia u pud u sam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam kan bteng biang ha ka snem ban wan.
title: Yn ai kaiphod ki Regional Committee pynbeit pud ha shuwa ka 31 tarik u Nohprah

content: Ki khynnah National Cardet Crops (NCC) jong ka Sngap Syiem College South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Nohprah 2023, ha ka jingïalam u Bah Pilastar Nongsiej u badei u National Mountaineer u Nongkiew ba la paw hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District u ba dei ruh u nongseng  ïa ka Kynrewmyllah Adventure Training Centre & Eco-Tourism Mawranglang  mynta ka sngi ki la pynlong ïa ka Trekking Adventure  ha kaba ki la sdang naMawranglang Viewpoint shaduh sha Shnong  Domsiejiong  South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki khynnah NCC ki la dap da ka jing sngewkmen namar ba ki la ïoh shibun ki jingmyntoi na ka jingïoh jinghikai na u Bah Pilastar Nongsiej ym tang katta mar sien poi ha kine ki lum ba jrong la ïohi shai kdar ïa ki jingitynnad ki lum ki wah ha kaba ym shem poi pyrkhat ba kane ka jaka ka long kaba itynnad haduh katta katta watla hapdeng ka jingiaid lynti kaba la shim por kumba 2 kynta tam eiei hynrei mar sien poi ha kane ka jaka kim ïoh sngew shuh ïa ki jingthait jingjrem ka la pynkmen shibun ïa ka mynsiem jong ki.U Bah Pilastar Nongsiej u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong u ban ïalam ïa ki khynnah NCC ban leit Trekking ha kane ka jaka ka long khnang ba ki khynnah kin dup tip kumno ban kiew ïa ki lum kiba jrong bad ruh ka jingïaid lynti ka long ruh kum ka wei ka bynta ka jingkilan met ka ban lait na ki jingpang jingshitom khnang ba ka met ka phad kan long kaba koit ba khiah bad kaba  khlaiñ bha.U Arthemeius Lyngdoh Senior NCC Sngap Syiem College u la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong ba ngim dei ban pynjot ïa ki khlaw ki btap bad kumjuh ngi dei ban leh khuid katne ka jingitynnad ka mariang ïaleh ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki  hikai ruh ïa ki khynnah, ki khun ki kti kumno ban tyngkai ïa ka Mei Mariang khnang ba ka pateng ban wan kan ïoh ka jingïaroh ban sah ruh ka nam.Ha kane ka sngi ki la don kumba 19 ngut ki khynnah NCC kiba kynthup ïa ki kynthei bad shynrang kiba la ïoh ban ïa shim bynta ha kane ka Trekking Adventure.
title: Ïalam u Nongkiew Lum ïa ki khynnah NCC Sngap Syiem College sha ki Lum ba itynnad tam ha SWKHD

content: :U nongïalam jong ka seng Congress, u Saleng Sangma u la kynnoh ïa ka sorkar na ka bynta ka jingjur ka jingpep skul ki khynnah ha ka jylla Meghalaya, kaba la pynlong ïa ka tnad pule puthi ba kan long ka daw bah jong kane.“Ka long ka jingbym lah ban teh lakam jong ka bor ba dei pei bad kiwei kiwei. La i kumba ka sorkar jong ngi kam shimkhia halor katei. Ka jingjur ha ka jingpep skul ka mut ba ka la don ka jingjur ha ka jingduna ka ïoh kam ïoh jam,” ong u Sangma ha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 21 tarik, Nohprah.Da kaba ong ba kijuh ki khynnah kin don bynta ha ki jingjia ba laiphew har jait jong ki kam sniew, u Sangma u la kdew hangne ïa ki prokram bakhraw jong ka sorkar katba ka dang kiar ïa ki bynta ba kongsan.U Sangma u la ong ba ka jingpep skul ka long ka mat ba kongsan bad dei ban pynbna shaphang kane, da kaba ong ba ki khynnah pule ki long ka lawei jong ka jylla.“Ka sorkar ka hap ban pyrkhat shaphang ka rukom jong ka pule puthi khnang ba ki khynnah kin nym lah ban iehnoh ïa ka pule puthi. Ka sorkar ka hap ban pynthikna ba ki nonghikai ruh dei ban ai jinghikai bha, dei ban tei bha ïa ki skul,” ong u Saleng.Da kaba pynhusiar ïa ka sorkar, u la ong ba ka jingjur ka jingpep skul ki khynnah ka lam sha ka jingduna ka ïoh kam ïoh jam bad kiwei kiwei ki jingai jinghikai.
title: Kynnoh u Saleng ïa ka sorkar na ka daw jong ka jingjur ka jingpep skul ki khynnah ha Meghalaya

content: :Wat hapdeng ka jingkiew ka jingpang JN.1 ba dei jong ka khlam COVID kaba la wan lynshop ha kane ka ri, ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh myn ha ka 21 tarik, Nohprah ka la ong ba la wan u khniang jingpang ba thymmai u bym don jingma ïa mynta.Ka Lyngdoh ka la pyntip ba katei ka jingïalang, la pynlong da katei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ha kaba ki jylla ki la pyntip ba ka jingwan ba thymmai jong ka jingkylla jong ka khlam Covid kam dei kaba da don jingeh haduh katta katta, da kaba bynrap ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka biang ki jingthiah ICU, ki jingai ïa ki oxygen bad kam shym la batai bniah shaphang katei ka jingeh.“Ngim shym la ong ba kane ka long ka jingeh bakhraw kumba dei ha kito ki por jong ka jingwan ka khlam Covid 19. Une u khniang jingpang na ka jingsngewthuh jong nga u long u bym don jingma khamtam na ka bynta ki briew ba duna ka jingkhlaiñ bor ka met. Te kumta, kum ka jingïada, la ai jingmut ba kito ki bym khlaiñ ka met ka phad, ki dei ban phikir bha ïalade,” ong ka Kong Ampareen.
title: U khniang jingpang ba thymmai jong ka Covid, u JN.1 um don jingma: Ampareen

content: Kum ka jingpynkhreh ia ka jingpynlong iaka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024, ka Wrestling Association West Garo Hills District Committee ka la iakynduh ia u Bah John F. Kharshiing, uba long u Working President ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association.Kane ka jingiakynduh ka long shaphang ka jingpynkhreh jong ka Wrestling Association West Garo Hills District na ka bynta ka 5th Meghalaya Games ha Tura.Ka 5th Meghalaya Games kan long naduh ka15tarik haduh ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024. Ka jingpynlong ia ka 5Meghalaya Games ha Tura ka dei ka sien banyngkong ban pynlong ha ki ri lum Garo.Ia kane ka jingialang la pyniaid da u Bah Johnsonbon kum u President bad ka Sofia D.
