content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) myn ha ka sngi palei, ka la dawa ban pynshitom pyrshah ïa u executive engineer jong ka NEHU, u Jose Cherian, uba la shah kynnoh ha ka CBI na ka bynta ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka tender.Ha ka jingthoh, u education secretary ka HYC, u Enlang Sawian u la ong kumne, “(Ngi) dawa ba ïa ka jingthoh ba shisha, dei ban phah na ka bynta ban eksamin ïa ka Forensic bad ka order pyrshah ïa u Jose Cherian, katba ka mat ba la kdew hangne ka long ha thmit ka ïap ka im. Ha ka por ba pynsah teng ïa katei ka jingkynnoh, la dei ban shah ïa u ba un shimti ïa ka kam hapoh ophis, naba u lah ban pynkiew jingbitar bad pyntieng ïa ki nongtrei ba hapoh jong ophis jong u. U Vice-Chancellor u dei ban sdang shim da ka jingban pynshitom ïa utei u ophisar katkum ka rai ba la dep shim da ka University’s Executive Council.”U la ong ba hadien ba ka CBI ka la kynnoh ïa u Jose Cherian halor ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon ba dei halor ka tender, ha kaba u ka shah ban bteng ban leit trei da u Prabha Shankar Shukla, uba dei u Vice-Chancellor jong ka NEHU.“Ha ka jingbym shimkhia na ka liang ka CBI ha ka ban shem ba u Jose Cherian u la pynduh nong ïa katei ka jaka pule, hynrei utei u Vice Chancellor u la i kumba um lah ban bud ïa katei ka rai jong katei ka jaka pule ha ka ban sdang shimkhia ban pynshitom kaba la rai da ka Executive Council jong katei ka jaka pule,” ong u Sawian.U Sawian u la ong ba ka Executive Council hadien ba ka la leit lyngba ka kaiphod jong ka jingtohkit na ka CBI kaba la hukum ïa katei ka jaka pule ban daiñ kuna ïa u Jose Cherian bad ruh, ïa ka kaiphod jong ka University level inquiry committee, kaba la lap ba u Jose u la pynduh nong haduh T. 10 lak ïa katei ka jaka pule, kaba la mynjur da ka Executive Council ba la pynïaid da u Shukla, hynrei tad haduh mynta, ïa ka rai jong ka Council ban ai ïa u da ka chargesheet bad hadien sa weng kam shipor ïa u, tad haduh ba ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa u kim pat phla da u vice-chancellor.“Ha ka jingshim ïa ka lad ba biang halor ka jingpulom jong u Vice Chancellor, ha kaba u Jose Cherian u la bteng ban don hapoh ophis bad ha ka jingdon jong u, ka la pynlong ïa ka jingpynduh pyndam ïa ki kot donkam kiba dei bad ki kam shna jingshna,” ong u Sawian.
title: Dawa ka HYC ban pynshitom pyrshah ïa u engineer jong ka NEHU

content: Na ka sor rit na Upper Wadanang kaba don ha West Garo Hills District la paw pyrthei  ka Samla Ringchi K Sangma ka Samla kaba tbit ha ka jingïalehkai ïa lympat ne ka Wrestling. Kane ka Samla ka la pynïasoh bad ka Wrestling Association dang kumba shibnai eiei bad ka dang shu ïoh  jinghikai kaba malu mala tang kumba hynriew sngi eiei. Hynrei kane ka Samla kaba dang 19 snem ka rta ka la lah ban pynpaw ïa ka jingtbit  jong ka ha kane ka Meghalaya Games kaba san da kaba ka jop ïa takma rupa ha ka Free Style Wrestling.Ka Ringchi ka dei ka nongïalehkai  kaba nyngkong eh na ri Lum Garo kaba ïa khun ha kane ka jait jingïalehkai. Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor halor kane ka jingjop jong ka, ka Ringchi ka la ong ba ka dang shu pynïasoh bad ka Meghalaya Wrestling Association dang shen bad ka dang ïoh jinghikai dang hynriew sngi.“Nga sngewkmen palat namarba nga dei ka kynthei kaba nyngkong eh na Tura ban ïoh ïa ka takma rupa, nga ai khublei ïa ka sorkar Meghalaya kaba la pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games hangne ïa kaba nga la ïoh ïa ka lad ban ïa shim bynta lang, nga ai khublei ïa ka sorkar ba ka la lah ban pynbiang ïa ka bam ka dih kaba biang bad ka jaka sah kaba paka,” ong ka Ringchi.Ka jingjop jong ka Ringchi ha kane ka Meghalaya Games ka dei ka jingaimynsiem ïa ki nongialehkai Wrestling ha West Garo Hills bad ka ri Lum Garo baroh kawei bad kane ka jingjop jong ka kan nang pynshlur shuh shuh  ïa kiwei pat ki nongïalehkai Sports ha ka jylla.”
title: Wat tang 6 sngi ba ïoh jinghikai, khur takma ka Ringchi K Sangma ha ka jingïalehkai Wrestling

content: Ka jingïakop siat khnam jong ka 5Meghalaya Games kaba la poi sha kaba kut ha ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 hynne ka sngi ha Monfort Centre for Education School, Danakgre, TuraHa ka jingïakhun final jong ka Indian Round (Team Event) ki kynthei, ka West Khasi Hills District ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka East Khasi Hills.Ha ka Indian Round (Team Event) ki shynrang, ka South West Khasi Hills District ka la lah ba kan khur ïa ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka East Khasi Hills.Ha ka Recurve Mixed Team, iïa ka takma ksiar la khur da ka West Jaintia Hills hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka South West Khasi Hills, kaba la khur ïa ka takma rupa.Kumjuh ha ka Indian Round Mixed Team, ka  East Khasi Hills District ka la lah ban khur ïa ka takma ksiar hadien ba ka la jop ïa ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Ha kine ki jingïakhun final la wan sakhi lang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K. Sangma, kumjuh u Myntri ka tnat Sports & Youth Affairs u Bah Shakliar Warjri, u MLA ka Jowai Constituency u Bah Wailadmiki Shylla, u Chief Secretary ka Jylla u Bah D.P Wahlang, u DGP ka Jylla u Dr. LR Bishnoi, ki dkhot ka Archery Association of Meghalaya bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Rah ka WKH, SWKH, WJH & WJH ha ka Archery

content: Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) ka synjuk jong ka UDP bad ka HSPDP kan pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban pynithuh paidbah (official introduction) ïa u kyrtong jong ka RDA na ka bynta ka ilekshon sha ka lok sabha na ka 1 st Shillong (ST) Parliamentary Constituency bad kumjuh ruh ban sdang ïa ka jingïalap election (launching of the campaign) na bynta ka Election MP 2024.Ïa ka jingïalang yn pynlong ha ka 23 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha ka ophis jong ka UDP ha Bomflye Road, Laitumkhrah Shillong ha ka por 11baje mynstep. Ka RDA ka khot sngewbha ïa baroh ki MLA & MDC jong ka UDP & HSPDP, ïa baroh ki Dkhot ka sengkmie (Central Body), ïa ki President bad Secretary jong ki District, President bad secretary na ki Circle / Constituency, ïa baroh ki Nongïalam jong ka UDP bad HSPDP bad kumjuh ruh ïa ki dkhot ka Women Wing & Youths Wing jong ka UDP bad HSPDP ban wan sha kane ka jingïalang.
title: Yn pynlong ka RDA ïa ka jingïalang pynithuh paidbah ïa u kyrtong na ka bynta ka election MP 2024

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la ïaid lynti mynta la 50 snem, kam pat biang pura ha ka jingpynbiang ïa ki tiar ki tar ïakehkai, lait noh ha Shillong, bad katto katne ki madan lehkai football ha Tura kim pat long kita ki stadium kiba shongdor.Na ka bynta ka sorkar jylla hapoh ka jingïalam u Conrad K. Sangma, ka jingpynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games ha Tura ka long ka kabu ban pynkiew ïa ka kam lehkai ha ka jylla bad ka jingmut u Conrad ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalehkai Olympic ha ki jaka bapher bapher kiba don ha ka jylla, ka la nang pynskuiñ ïa ki nonglehkai ba watla kim pat lah ban sei ïa ka sap, hynrei ki ïoh ïa ka lad ban ïakhun ym tang ha ka jylla, hynrei wat shabar ka jylla.Ha kine ki sawtylli ki Meghalaya Games ba ladep, la pynlong ha ka nongbah ha kaba ki kam lehkai ki la nangkiew bad wat ki tiar lehkai ki la biang bha, bad kane ka mut ba ka District ka nang bteng ban nang pynbha shuh shuh ïa ki jinglehkai Olympic.Ka bynta kaba 5 jong ka Meghalaya Games ka la long kaba heh bha ïa kaba haduh 23 tylli ki jinglehkai Olympic la pynlong sawdong ka sor Tura bad palat 3000 ngut ki la wan shim bynta, bad haba phai sha ka bynta kaba saw jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba la pynlong ha Shillong, la pynlong 19 tylli ki jinglehkai bad kumba 2500 ngut ki la poi ban shim bynta.Ka jingrah ïa ka Meghalaya Games sha Tura ka la plie ïa ka jingkhang ki kam lehkai bad ka la kyntiew ruh ïa ka kam lehkai ha kane ka jaka kaba dei ka jingkwah bad jingphohsniew jong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla.Shibun ki jinglehkai kum ka siat khnam, ïa kura bad jingmareh ki kham kiew bha ha ki khynnah lehkai na ri lum Khasi – Jaintia namar ki la biang ka jaka kilan met.Ka jingïakren halor ka Meghalaya Games la ka long ha ki rynsan social media ne ki khubor ka long tang ka jingsngew ki paidbah, hynrei la dei ban ai jingïaroh ïa ki nongpynïaid kiba la kit la bah ïa ka lyngkor ban pyntyllun ïa ki jinglehkai namar ki la beh ha baroh ki 17 tylli ki jaka pynlong jinglehkai bad ai jingtip halor ki jinglong jingman ha ka por kaba biang.Ban tip thikna shuh shuh ïa ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih ki jinglehkai, ka la bha shibun ban peit lyngba ki lad pathai khubor, namar ha ki por mynshuwa kam don kano kano ka jingpynbit pynbiang ba pura hynrei mynta, baroh ki la kylla lut bad kaba kylla bha ka long ba ïa ki Medal Tally la pynmih lang tang hadien ki jinglehkai.Ïa ki nonglehkai ba wan na kylleng ka jylla, ki la shah pynbiang nadon shadong ïa ki jingdonkam baroh tang mar ïa poi ha Tura, bad wat ïa ka bam ka dih la pynbiang bha bad kam shym la don kano kano ka jingkynthoh na ki nonglehkai.Ïa ki jinglehkai, la ïohi shisha ba ki kynhun na Khasi – Jaintia ki la wan shakhmat ha kaba ka East Khasi Hills (EKH) ka la wan ha ka kyrdan nyngkong, bad sa ka Ri-Bhoi, West Jaintia Hills bad South West Khasi Hills ha ka kyrdan kaba saw, bud sa ka West Garo Hills, West Khasi Hills, East Jaintia Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, North Garo Hills, East Garo Hills South Garo Hill bad ka South West Garo Hills.“Ka jingthmu jong ngi ban pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games ha Tura ka la long ba seisoh bad ngi kmen ba palat 3000 ngut ki nongïalehkai kim don kano kano ka jingkhñium ha kine ki hynriew sngi bad ka la long kaba jop. Da kine ki jingseisoh ban wanrah ïa ki tiar ki tar kiba biang, ngi ngeit ba ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai jong ngi kin kiew sha jrong bad ban khur ïa ki takma kiba bun,” ong u rangïalehkai na Tura, u AM Marak.“Kane ka long ka sien banyngkong ia ka Tura ban pynlong ïa kine ki rynsan ryngkat ki jinglehkai Olympics, bad kum u nongïalehkai, nga lah ban ong ba ka Tura kan sa pynkiew ïa ki riew donsap bad ngi kloi ban pdiang ïa kane. Ngi la don ki tiar ki tar ba biang bad kine hi kin ai mynsiem ïa ki samla ban wan shakhmat ban pyni ïalade ba ki lah shisha ban kiew ha ka kam lehkai. Nga kwah ruh ban ai khublei ïa ka sorkar jylla bad kito kiba trei nadien kiba la lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingjop,” ong u MLA barim u Billykid A Sangma, uba la jop ruh ïa ka jingïakhun Golf  ha kane hi ka rynsan jong ka Meghalaya Games.”
title: Ka 5th Meghalaya Games ha Tura, ka rynsan na ka bynta ban pynkiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai sport

content: Ka East Jaintia Hills District ka la bat ïa ka kyrdan ba hakhlieh duh napdeng ki district ha ka jingïakop ñiah Cycle jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba 5 kaba la long ha Tura.Ha kane ka jingïakop kaba la long naduh 17 haduh 19 tarik ha Rongkhon bad Darechikgre, ka EJH ka la la lah ban kan khur haduh 12 tylli ki takma kiba kynthup ïa 5 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 ki takma rupa bad 3 ki takma rupa.Ka Eastern West Khasi Hills ka la ïoh ba kan khur 7 tylli ki takma, kynthup ïa 3 tylli ki takma ksiar, 3 tylli ki takma rupa lem bad kawei ka takma rnong. a ka kyrdan balai la ïoh ban bat da ka South West Khasi Hills kaba la khur 8 tylli ki takma, kynthup ïa 2 tylli ki takma ksiar, 3 tylli ki takma rupa lem bad 3 tylli ki takma rnong.Ka North Garo bad ka West Garo Hills ki la khur mar kawei ka takma ksiar. Katba ka East Khasi Hills ka la khur 2 tylli ki takma rupa bad 2 tylli ki takma rnong.
title: Bat ka EJH ïa ka kyrdan ba ha khlieh ha ka ïakop niah Cycle ha Meghalaya Games

content: Ka Ranikor Area Farmers Association ha ryngkat ki nongrep na ka thaiñ jong ka shnong  Nongnah, Nongïohijngai, Dirang, Mawlangbah, Shnong 18 Mile bad kiwei de ki shnong ba marjan myn ha ka sngi saitjaiñ kata ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah ha Shnong Phodkroh bad shnong Nongnah South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ki la shim ïa ka rai ban leit hiar thma noh ban pynïap shi syndon ïa ki Hati khlaw kiba sah la slem ha kine ki thaiñ kaba la pynlong ïa ki nongrep ba kim nud shuh wat tang ban leit lum leit lang ïa ki mar rep ki jingthung jingtep jong ki khamtam ha kine ki sngi ka la dei ka por ban lum ban lang ïa u Synsar, Kwai, Tympew, Sohmarit, ki Kaid, ki Sla Tyrpad, u Phandieng, ha kaba kine ki Hati kiba don ha kine ki thaiñ la kumba ar snem ei ei mynta, ki ju kthong kylla ïa ki briew kaba pynlong ïa ki nongrep haduh ba kim nud shuh ban leit peit ïa ki mar rep ha ki lyngkha jong ki.Haba haba kren u Bah Kermen Ryja ba kum ki nongïalam jong ka Ranikor Area Farmers Association bad ki nongrep halor kane ka bynta ba na ka liang jong ki, ki la dep ban leit ujor sha ki bor sorkar kata sha ka tnad jong ki Wildlife bad ruh ha u Deputy Commissioner South West Khasi Hills District wat la ki la kular ban shim khia halor kane hynrei haduh kine ki sngi ki jingkular ki kut tang ha ka ktien hynrei ka kam pat ngim ïohi haduh mynta, kumta na ka liang ki nongrep bad ka Association ki la shim ïa ka rai mynta ban leit pynïap noh shi syndon ïa kine ki mrad kiba pyndik bad kiba la pynjulor ïa shibun  ki mar rep jong ki ha kaba ka rai ba khadduh ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki paidbah kila ïa mynjur da kaba rah kti ba kumba kine ki Hati ki la pyntieng pynsmiej da kaba pynjot ruh ïa ki mar rep ym banse ngin hap ban thom wat ïa ka sang ban kput ban leit pynvap noh  ïa kine ki Hati kiba don ha kine ki jaka rep.U la ong shuh shuh ba ha u snem 2023 ka la long shaba palat bad la bunsien ruh ki la ju leit ban ïa kynduh ïa ki bor ba dei peit ba ki dei ban leh ei ei halor kane ka bynta hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba kane ka jingleit pynsngew kam shym la urlong satia kumba ki la kular.Namarkata, na ka liang ka Ranikor Area Farmers Association (RAFA) mynta ka sngi ki la shim ïa ka rai ba khadduh la ha kano ka bynta kin leh ïa kita ki Hati khlaw kiba la wan ban pynjot ïa ki mar rep jong ki. U la ong ruh ba ha kiwei pat ki jaka la ju ïohi ba ki bor ba dei peit jong ka tnad Wild Life ki don ka jingkhang pyrshah ban pynïap ïa ki mrad khlaw bad ka don ruh ki aiñ kiba khlaiñ bha kumno ban ïada ïa ki mrad khlaw hynrei lada kine ki mrad khlaw ki pynjot ïa ki mar rep pat kum ki nongrep kim shym la ïohi ïa ki dak ki shin ba ki wan ai ki lad jingïarap kumba ka la jia ha kine ki thaiñ jong ka Nongnah.Ki nongïalam jong ka RAFA ki la ong ruh ba ngi nujor bad ki nongtrei kam sorkar ki lah mo ban leit sha ki lum ban rep kumba leh ki nongrep kiba ju im kyndoi ja kpoh ha ka kam rep kam riang ba ki dei ban shim khia ïa ka kam. Wat ka jingim briew ruh haduh mynta na ka liang ka sorkar kam shym lah ban ai ki lad jingïarap na ka bynta jong ki nongrep kumta ka rai na kane ka jingïalang ka long ba ngin ym shah shuh ïa ka jingwan pynjot jong kita ki mrad khlaw namar ym banse ba lada ki bor sorkar ki phah kem ruh ngin ym salia namar kum ki nongrep ki la ïa kynduh bun bah ki jingeh ba wat tang ban leit rep ruh kim nud shuh bad da ei pat ngin bam bad hato kata ka sorkar ka lah mo ban ai ïa kita ki lad jingïarap ne ai tulop ïa ki nongrep ba ma ki kin shu shong ïing noh? U la buh jingkylli.Hato lada ngim lah shuh ban rep ngi lah mo ban im? Kumta ki la shim ka rai ba khadduh ba kin leit wad bad pynïap duh noh ïa kita ki mrad khlaw kiba wan pynjot ïa mar rep jong ki.Ha katei ka jingïalang la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren kiba  kynthup ïa u Bah Kermen Ryja Secretary Ranikor Area FarmersAssociation , u Bah Micheal Lyngdoh,  President, u Bah Apualus D. Sangma bad u Bah  Romoland Paliar ha ryngkat da ka jingsakhi lang ki paidbah nongrep na kane ka thaiñ.
title: Byrngem pynïap ki nongrep ïa ki Hati khlaw lada ym wan shimti noh ka tnad Wildlife

content: Kan dei ka janmiet jong ka jingkmen ka bym lah shu ban batai ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai baroh kawei jong ka Ri-Bhoi District hadien ba ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai phutbol ki jong ka, ki la lah ban ïoh rah ïa ka nam lahduh ne khur syndon da ka takma ksiar ha ka jingïalehkai jong kiba 18 snem ka rta kynthei bad shynrang.Ha lyndet ka jinglah ban ïoh rah ka kynhun napoh Ri-Bhoi District lah ban ong ba ka dei namar ka jingshim khia bad kitkhlieh lang da baroh katta naduh ki khynnah, ki kmie ki kpa, nangta sa ki skul ba ki khynnah ba ki leit ban pule, ki dkhot Ri Bhoi District Sports Association kaba juh trei borbah ban saiñ dur ne ban pynmih ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai kiba kynsai.Ha ka jingïakhun ïa ka phainal kiba la long ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew ha P.A Sangma Stadium, Tura, na ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Ri-Bhoi ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ïa ka East Khasi Hills lyngba ka tie breaker da 3-2, katba ïa ka takma rnong ne kyrdan kaba lai na kane ka jingïakob ka leit sha ka kynhun ki thei ïalehkai jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District hadien ba ki la lah ban pynliem noh lyngba ka tie breaker ïa ka South West Khasi Hills District.Haba phai pat sha ka jingïakhun jong ki samla shynrang, ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Ri-Bhoi District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka West Jaintia Hills District da 1-0 bad ïa kane ka shi kol ba kordor tam ïa ka Ri Bhoi la thep ïa ka da u Riskhem Syiem.Ka East Khasi Hills District mynta ka kynti ka la hun ba kan  bat iïa ka kyrdan kaba lai ne khur da ka takma rnong kaba la wan hadien ba ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ïa ka West Garo Hills da 3-1.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingïakhun baroh u Freddy Jyrwa ka East Khasi Hills uba la ïoh ban thep 4 kol, u la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam Top Scorer, katba na ka liang u Kitboklang Buam ka West Jaintia u la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam Best Goalkeeper, katba u Tiros Kyndait jong ka West Jaintia Hills u la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam Best Player.Haba phai sha ka liang ki kynthei, ka nam thei ap kol kaba kynsai ne Best Goalkeeper ka leit sha ka Nibari Maring jong ka Ri-Bhoi, kaba la mih paw na ka daw ka jinglah ka jong ka ba kan kyrda (save)  ïa ki artylli ki penalty ha ka por ba la shut ïa ka tie breaker, katba ka Inrilaidor Khongthaw jong ka East Khasi Hills ka la ïoh ba kan khur haduh artylli ki khusnam kaba  kynthup ïa ka nam Top Scorer  hadien ba ka la lah ba kan thep haduh 15 tylli ki kol bad  kumjuh ïa ka nam Player of the Tournament.”
title: Khur takma ksiar ki rang bad thei jong ka Ri-Bhoi ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol ha ka Meghalaya Games

content: :Ka Apex Council jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Association ka la ai khublei ïa u Lakhan Singh Nahar na ka bynta ka kam jong u ban shimti kum u nongïalehkai cricket jong ka jylla hadien ba utei u nongkawang bol ba stet ne fast bowler u la pynbna ba un shongthait noh na ka jingïalehkai cricket ha kaba kut jong ka samoi.U Lakhan uba la dep ïakhun haduh 17 tylli ki match na ka bynta ka kynhun ba la rangbah jong ka Meghalaya ha ki jingïakhun jong ka BCCI, kaba long ka sien nyngkong ban ïakhun bad ka jylla Mizoram ha u Nailur 2020. U la ïoh haduh 22 tylli ki wicket ha katei ka jingïalehkai.Hashwa ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan long ka dkhot ba pura jong ka BCCI, ka jylla ka la don bynta ha ka cricket napdeng kiwei pat ki kynhun bad ki kynhun ïalehkai. U Lakhan u la dep ïalehkai na ka bynta ka Meghalaya U-19 side ha kum kine ki tournament ha u snem 2016 bad u la dep shah jied kum shi bynta jong ka kynhun ïalehkai bad ïatreilang ne ka joint affiliate bad associate team U-19 ha uto u snem.U Lakhan u la mihkhmat ïa ka jylla ha ka U-23 level kumjuh ruh u long u kongsan ba pawnam ha ka klob cricket ha ka nongbah Shillong ha ki snem ba la dep, lem bad ka jingtrei shitom bad jingkut jingmut na ka bynta ka kynhun, u dei uwei napdeng jong ki para ba ïalehkai lang uba ki paidbah kin sah jingkynmaw.Ka Apex Council jong ka MCA ka la ai khublei ïa u Lakhan halor ka jingshimti jong u ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka jylla ha ki bynta bapher bapher ha ki snem ba la dep. “Ngi ai khublei ïa u hadien ka jingshongthait naba un sa shimti ruh kum u coach, nonghikai, umpire, bad kiwei kiwei,” ong ka MCA mynta ka sngi.
title: Ai khublei ka MCA ïa u Lakhan Singh hadien ba la shongthait kum u fast bowler

content: Ka Ranikor Beach Festival ba la pynïaid da ka Officer Club ka la kut noh ha ka miet jong ka 20 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024, ha kane ka sngi kut jong ka Ranikor Beach Festival la ïa don lang da u Myntri jong ka tnad Tourism, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u Myntri jong ka Revenue and Disaster Management jong ka Sorkar Jylla u Bah kyrmen shylla, u MLA ka Ranikor u Bah Pius Marweiñ lem kawei kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar.Kane ka Tamasa lehkmen ka la long kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih naduh ka sngi sdang haduh ka sngi kut  nalor ki nongput nong tem bad ki nongrwai la pynshong shit shuh shuh ïa kane ka Ranikor Beach Festival daki jinglehkai bapher bapher kiba napoh ka jylla, bad  ban pynshongshit da ka jingtem DJ kaba na ka ri Russia. Kane ka jingpynlong ïa ka Ranikor Beach Festival ka long ruh kum shibynta ban rakhe lehkmen ïa ka Meghalaya Day jong ka jingdap 52 snem naduh ba la ïoh ïa ka jylla Meghalaya kaba pura.
title: Ïaid beit ïaid ryntih haduh ba kut ka Ranikor Beach Festival wan sakhi u Bah Paul Lyngdoh

content: Ka Jaintia Students’ Union (JSU) myn ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, ka la pynpaw ka jingdiaw halor ka jingpulom jong ka sorkar ban pyn kynthup ïa ka ktien Pnar ne Jaintia ha ka Meghalaya State Anthem kaba la dep pyllait ha ka sngi rakhe ïa ka jingdap 52 snem jong ka jylla.“Ngi diaw ba ka sorkar ha ka jaka ba kan pyn kynthup ïa ka ktien Pnar ne Jaintia, hynrei ka la pynïaid ïew pynban ïa ka ktien phareng ne English ha ka State Anthem. Kane ka la pynmong ïa ki paidbah jong ka ri lum Jaintia,” ong ka kynhun JSU.“Ka sorkar ka dei ban long husiar ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la ïoh la ka jong ka jylla da kaba phiah ar tylli ki district, kynthup ïa ka United Khasi and Jaintia bad Garo Hills, kaba hap shabar jong ka jylla Assam. Te kumta, ngi dawa jur ïa ka sorkar ba kan shimkhia mar mar ha ka ban pynbiang pynbit lut,” ong ka JSU.Ka la dawa ruh na baroh ki MLA jong ka ri lum Jaintia ba kan pynsngew shaphang ka jingkyrpad jong ki ban pyrshah ïa katei bad pynthikna ba dei ban pyb kynthup ïa ka ktien Jaintia ha ka State Anthem.“Ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban pyn kynthup ïa baroh ki lai tylli ki ktien jong ki ri lum Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo hapoh ka State Anthem ha ka jaka ba kan pynkiew ïa ka ktien phareng,” ong ka JSU.
title: Diaw ka JSU halor ka jingbym pyn kynthup ïa ka ktien Pnar ha ka State Anthem

content: Ki nongïalam jong ka Voice of People Party (VPP) mynta ka 22 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 , ki la shim ïa ka rai ban pynsangeh shwa shipor ïa ka jingïakhih jong ki ban dawa ban thung kam biang ïa ki ophisar ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Kane ka rai ba la shim da ka VPP ka long hadien ba na ka liang ka ki nongïalam ka VPP ki la ïoh ban ïa kynduh bad ka Myntri ka tnat Aiñ ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkular ba halor kane ka mat kin ïoh ban ïakren bad u Myntri  rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma.Ha ka Step jong ka lah sngi u Blei ki nongïalam ka VPP, hapoh ka jingïalam u President, u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ki la tur sha Secretariat na ka bynta ban pynbor ïa ka Sorkar ba kan thung kam biang ïa ki lai ngut ki ophisar kiba la shah wengkam ha Lokayukta.Hynrei na ka liang ki bor District bad ki Pulit, ki la pynjur bha ïa ka jingpahara ha ki jaka ba marjan ka Secretariat bad kane ka la pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu ka VPP bad pynlong ïa ki dkhot ka VPP ba kin shong kyllaiñ mongor katto katne por ha Parking Lot jong ka Additional Secretariat.Hadien katto katne por ba ka VPP ka la sdang ïa kane ka jingïakhih na ka liang ka Myntri ka tnad Aiñ ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la khot ïa kynduh bad ki nongïalam ka VPP bad hadien kane ka jingïakynduh na ka liang ka VPP ka la mynjur ban pynsangeh shwa shipor  ïa ka jingïakhih.
title: Halor ka mat Lokayukta: Sangeh shipor ka VPP ïa ka jingiakhih

content: Ka Smile Train, kaba dei ka kynhun NGO bakhraw tam ha ka pyrthei ba ai jinghikai bad noh synñiang, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka University of Science and Technology Meghalaya (USTM) na ka bynta ban pynhusiar ïa ki khynnah pule bad ka prokram noh synñiang. Ha katei ka jingïatreilang, la kynthup kumba 2000 ngut ki samla pule hapoh ka jaka pule USTM, lem bad ka jingdon lang ki riewpawkhmat, kynthup ïa u Mahbubul Hoque, Chancellor USTM, Prof GD Sharma, Vice Chancellor USTM bad ki katto katne ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Smile Train, Woodland Hospital, bad ka National Health Mission.Ha katei ka prokram Meghalaya Smiles, la don ki jingpynïa lehkai kum ki quiz bad ki jingïalehkai ba la pynïaid da u RJ Baio na ka Red FM, ka jingrwai Phawar halor ka jingdonkam ka durkhmat ba phuh samrkhie, ka jingak drama bad ka jingpyni paidbah ïa ka phlim ba la dep ïohrah ïa ka khusnam Oscar, ka ‘Smile Pinki.’ La dep wanrah ïa ka kampeiñ noh synñiang, kaba la kyrpad ïa ka kynhun USTM ba kan kyrshan ïa ka Smile Train, lem bad ka jingïashim bynta jong ki samla pule jong ka USTM.U Mahbubul Hoque, u Founder Chancellor, USTM, u la ban jur halor ka jingthmu jong katei ka jaka pule ban kut jingmut halor ka jingban pyn ïapher jingmut hapdeng ki jaitbynriew bad ka jingpyn kynthup lang ha ki kam ki jam, ha kaba u la pynpaw ka jingkyrmen ba katei ka kampeiñ kan sa pynhusiar na ka bynta ka rukom treikam ba kongsan jong ka Smile Train. Katba ka Anjali Katoch, kaba dei ka Head jong ka Communications and Business Development ha ka Smile Train India, ka la ai khublei ïa kane ka jaka pule bad ki samla pule, da kaba pdiang ïa ka jingïahap jingmut bad jingkyrshan na ka bynta ka imlang ka sahlang.Ha India, kumba 35,000 ngut ki khynnah, la kha ïa ki da ka shyntur ba don dak pait man la u snem, kaba long ka jingmad ïa ka jingeh na ka daw jong ka jingbym lah ban phah phah sumar da kaba phah puid bad ka jingsumar ba kyrpang. U Dr. Werlock Kharshiing, uba dei u Partner Surgeon jong ka Smile Train bad Chairman jong ka Woodland Hospital, u la kren shaphang ka jingïadei paralok ba la neh haduh 17 snem, kaba long ka jingthmu ban pynbit pynbiang shuh shuh ïa ka jingpyn husiar bad ban ai ka jingsumar ba jingsumar ba biang na ka bynta ki khynnah ba shitom na ka jingpait doh ka shyntur.Ka kynhun Smile Train ka pynkup bor ïa ki doktor jong ka shnong bad jong ka pyrthei baroh kawei na ka bynta ban tyrwa ïa ka jingpuid ei ïa kiba pait shyntur bad ka jingsumar ba paka. Naduh u snem 2000, ka Smile Train India ka la dep kyrshan haduh 700,000 na ka bynta ban pyn puid ei ïa kiba pait shyntur ha kylleng ka India lyngba ka network ba treikam jong ki 150 tylli tam ki hospital. Na ka bynta ka jingsumar ïa kiba pait shyntur, khnang ban ïoh jingtip ne jingkyrshan, lah ban phone ei ha u don u nombar 1800 103 8301.
title: Ïatreilang ka Smile Train bad ka USTM na ka bynta ka ka prokram pynhusiar

content: Hynnin ka jan miet jong ka sngi u Blei myn ha ka 21 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka Khasi Hills Students Union KSU Mawkyrwat Circle ha ryngkat ka Synjuk Seng Samla Shnong (SSSS) ki la pdiang sngew bha ïa ki samla jong ka District kiba la wan poi na nongbah Tura sha Mawkyrwat na ka bynta ban leit ïa shim bynta haka 5th Meghalaya Games kaba la long ha nongbah Tura ha kaba ka KSU ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew kmen shi kat dei ïa ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai ba ki la ïalehkai bha ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher jong ha kaba ki la ïoh ban khur shibun ki medal, ha kaba ki la ïoh ban khur 16 tylli ki Gold Medal, 18 tylli ki Silvers Medal, bad brown 18 tylli, baroh ki khusnam ki long 52 tylli.Ka KSU bad ka SSSS haba ai jingkren ha kane ka miet ki la ong ba ki la dap da ka jingsngew sarong ïa ki samla jong ka District kiba lah ïoh bun ki Medal ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta ban ïa thew ha ki snem kiba ladep ka jinglehkai bha jong ki samla ka la long ka burom ïa ka dong ka thaiñ baroh kawei.Haba ai jingkren u Bah Moonlyrooi Lyngdoh uba dei u Assistant Secretary jong ka SSSS u la kyntu kynpham ïa ki samla ba kin nang ïai pynkhreh shuh shuh khnang ba ha ka Meghalaya Games ka ban wan kin nangwan rah shuh shuh kham bun shah ban ïa une u snem 2024 bad kyrmen skhem ba kan long ka burom ym tang ïa ki shimet hynrei ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ïa ka District hi baroh kawei.
title: Pdiang burom ka KSU bad ka SSSS ïa ki samla kiba la wanrah nam bad burom ïa ka District naka 5th Meghalaya Games

content: :Ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 52 snem jong ka jingïoh ka Meghalaya la ka jong ka jylla, ha kaba u Lat ka jylla, u Phagu Chauhan mynta ka sngi u la plie ïa u dur mot ba thoh ‘Ki Mawbynna” ne ki maw sah nam shabar jong ka phalor Raj Bhavan, Shillong ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 150 snem jong ka Raj Bhavan.Ha katei ka jingrakhe, u Lat ka jylla u la plie pyrda ruh ïa ka ïing dieng ba itynnad ba la tei hapoh ka phyllaw phlang jong ka Raj Bhavan, kaba la pyn iphuh iphieng ïa ka Raj Bhavan.Ha katei ka jingplie pyrda, la sakhi da ki heh ophisar bad ki nongtrei jong ka Raj Bhavan ba la lam khmat da u Commissioner bad Secretary jong u Lat, u Dr. B D R Tiwari.La bna kyrteng mynshuwa kum ka Government House, ka Raj Bhavan ka dei kawei na ki ïing ba nyngkong ba la tei ha ka nongbah Shillong. Ka dei ka ïing ba ju pynsah ïa ki ophisar ba kongsan jong u Deputy Commissioner ba peit mynshuwa, u Colonel Henry Stuart Bivar, la tei, shna bad pynitynnad ïa kane ka ïing na ka bynta ban pyni ïa ka jingsynshar jong ka sorkar phareng ne ka British Colonial Rule. Ha u snem 1874, ha ka por ba ka nongbah Shillong ka long ka Headquarter jong ka ïing Bivar ba dei ka jingtei jong ka jylla Assam, ha kaba la shna pynkylla dur ïa ka ïing Bivar ne Bivar house sha ka Chief Commissioner’s Residency.Katei ka Residency, ka la julor noh na ka daw jong ka jingbym lah ban maramot na ka daw jong ka jingkhie u jumai ba jur ha ka nongbhah Shillong ha u snem 1897. Katba ka ïing ba mynta, la dep shna na ka jingsah ki tiar lyngkhot jong katei ka Residency bad la sah briew ha u 1903-04.Ïa ka Government House, la ai kyrteng da ka “Raj Bhavan” ha ka 6 tarik, Nohprah 1951.Hadien ka jingïoh laitluid ka India, kane ka dak jong ka British Raj, ha ka jingpyn kylla dur, ka la long ka dak jong ka jingsynshar paidbah bad naduh katei, ka la long ka jaka sah jing ki Lat jong ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: Plie u Lat ka jylla ïa u dur mot “Ki Mawbynna” ba la pynïeng shabar ka phalor jong ka Raj Bhavan

content: Palat hajar ngut ki paidbah na kylleng ka jylla myn ha ka 22 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ki la hiar sha ka Them Ri Bhoi na ka bynta ban pdiang burom ïa u nongïalam ka Congress u Rahul Gandhi, uba la wan ban ïuh kjat ha ka jylla Meghalaya na ka bynta ka Bharat Jodo Nyay Yatra.U Rahul Gandhi, myn ha ka sngi nyngkong u la poi ha ka jylla Meghalaya ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ki MLA bad ki nongkit kam ka Congress ban rah ïa ka khubor halor ka Bharat Jodo Nyay Yatra, kum shi bynta ban pyrshah ïa ka jingshynshar donbor ka Sorkar BJP ha baroh ki liang.Ka Bharat Jodo Nyay Yatra ha ka jylla hapoh ka jingïalam u Rahul ka la sdang naduh Jorabat da ka jingaiti ïa ki nongïalam ka Congress ïa ka lama ha kti ki nongïalam ka Congress ha ka jylla.Ha kane ka sngi la ïohi ïa ki paidbah kiba la ap bad ïeng ap harud surok  ban ïoh ban peit ïa u Rahul Gandhi bm uba la wan da ka kali naduh Jorabat haduh DTO ophis  Nongpoh.Ynda u la poi ha DTO ophis Nongpoh, u Rahul Gandhi ha ryngkat ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïaid kjat haduh ka madan kaba don ha Pahamsyiem Nongpoh bad pynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah hakane ka jaka.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u Rahul Gandhi u la pynshai paidbah ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Bharat Jodo Nyan Yatra da kaba kdew ïa ka jingshah ñion beiñ ki pai driewlum ha ki RSS.“Ka sur na ka jylla Meghalaya, Manipur Arunachal Pradesh ym don ba sngap, ka don ka jingshah ñion beiñ ïa ka riti dustur ka rukom im ha ki RSS,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “ïa ka jylla Meghalaya la shynshar na Delhi, ym dei shuh na ka Sorkar jylla bad kane ka dei ka bym lah ban pdiang da lei lei ruh.”U la ong shuh shuh, “ka Ri ka mad ïa ka jingkyrduh ka kam ka jam, ka ba khraw bha haba ïa nujor bad ki 40 snem kiba la dep.”“U Home Minister ka Sorkar pdeng dang shen u la khot ïa ka jylla Meghalaya da ka jylla ba jur tam ka jingbamsap hynrei tang hadien katto katne por ki la mareh ban ïatrei lang bad kane ka Sorkar,” u la ong u Rahul.U la bynrap, “Ha ka jylla Meghalaya phi ïohi bad ïohsngew halor ka jingbamsap la ka dei ha u dewïong, ha ka jingtwa ka tnum ka ïingdorbar bad kiwei kiwei.”U Rahul u la ong ruh ba 22 tylli ki jaitktien ka Sorkar India ka la dep ban kynthup hapoh ka khyrnit ba phra ka Riti shynshar hynrei ïa ka ktien Khasi Garo kim lah.“Ka BJP ka la sdang ban pynjot lut ïa ka riti dustur, ka tynrai ki paid riewlum bad sdang ban knieh wat ïa ka bor ka District Council ruh,” u la bynrap.U Rahul u la ong ba kaei ba ka Congress party ka la leh ban pynkup bor ïa ki nong Meghalaya mynta ka Sorkar BJP ka la pyntlod lut.“Kine kin long ki mat kiba ngan rah ha kane ka Bharat Jodo Nyay Yatra bad ka jingthmu ba kong san ban ïa kren ban sngap bad ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh ki khun samla ki nongrep, ban wad ka lad ka lynti, bad ban kham jan bad ki nongshong shnong,” u la ong.Ha kane ka jingïalang ha Nongpoh la ïadonlang u President ka MPCC u Bah Vincent Pala, u nongïalam ka seng Congress u Jairam Ramesh, ki MLA, ki MDC, ki nongkitkam ka seng Congress bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Ka jingthmu jong ka Bharat Jodo Nyay Yatra ka dei ban sngap bad sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh ki nongshong shnong: Rahul

content: Ka seng ka JSU Sengkmie ka la ïa kynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma bad ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ka sngi plie ïa ka Stadium ha Wahiajer bad ka seng ka lah ai da ka dorkhas halor ar tylli ki mat ban pynrung ïa ka thup jingrwai Jaintia hapoh ka Anthem bad ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka Railway ha Ri Jaintia.Ka seng ka la pynsngew sha u Myntri Rangbah bad sha u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba ka Jaintia ka dei ban paw lang ha ka thup State Anthem kat kum ka dorkhas la ong ba ka Jaintia National Dorbar la thaw ïa ka naduh u snem 1900 ban ïakhun ban dawa Hill State ha kitei ki por bad ka lah ong ruh ba ïa ka jylla ruh lah ïoh na ka Assam ha u snem 1972 dei ba lah shim na ar tylli ki District ka Assam ka United Khasi and Jaintia Hills bad ka Garo Hills.Ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh markhmat bad u CM halor ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka Railway, ba ka sorkar da lei lei kam dei ban wan rah shapoh ri lum Jaintia namar ka ktah ïa ka jingbuhai shnong ki mynder namar ïa mynta ka jylla kam don aiñ kaba biang ban pyrkhing ïa ka jingrung kyrthlep ki mynder ri bad ki nongïalam ka seng ki la ong ïa u CM ba dei ban wanrah shuwa ïa ka aiñ ILP bad sa ïa peit pat ïa ka jingpdiang ïa ka railway hapoh ri lum Jaintia.Na ka liang u CM u lah ban khia halor kane ka jingdawa ka seng bad un sa pynsngew lang sha ki para Myntri hapoh ka Cabinet jong u.
title: Ïa kynduh ka JSU ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad Symbud Myntri Rangbah halor ka State Anthem bad ka Railway

content: Ka jingialang ba shi sngi, kumno ban saindur thymmai ban pynkiew ia ka jingthain jain ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi la pyllong da ka  APJ Abdul Kalam Centre for Policy Research & Analysis, IIM Shillong.Ia kane ka program la kyrshan da ka Development Commissioner (Handloom), Ministry of Textile, Government of India and National Institute of Fashion Technology. Ia kane ka program la plie da u AtulC. Kulkarni, u dkhot jong ka Board of Governors, IIM Shillong, ha kaba la don lang u Prof. D. P. Goyal, Director, IIM, Shillong.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Dr. Sanjeev Ningombam, uba long u Centre Coordinator of theKalam Centre, u la iathuh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingialang ka long ban shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban weng ia ka jingeh jong ki nongthain jain khnang ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki nongthain jain ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. Ha kane ka jingialang la ioh ban iakren shaphang kumno ban pynitynnad shuh ia ki jain thain, la ka long ha ka aiong airup, ohshrong ohshrup, ka jingpyniaid iew ia ki jain bad jingai jingmut markylliang.Ha kane ka jingialang la ioh ban iashim bynta da ki 150 ngut ki nongpule ha kaba ioh ruh ban ai ia ki jingkren da kito kiba la pyntbit ialade ha ka kam thain jain. Ki nongai jingkren ki long ka Lovely Baruah, ka Jesmina Zeliang, ka Mitrani Kakti, u Koijan Mantri, uYangoijam Maxwell, u Zosangliana Hangzo, u James Evantis Dkhar bad C. Lalthlenmawia. Ha kane ka jingialang la ioh ban pynsngew ba ki jain bathain hi da ki trai muluk ki trai jaka ki pynphalang ruh ia ka larity jong kato ka jaitbynriew.La pynsngew ruh ba ka jingpyndonkam ia ki design barim ryngkat bad ki design bathymmai ia ki jain thain hi kan kham pyniaid iew shuh shuh ia kine ki tain. Ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ka don haduh 14.6 lakh unit ha ki san tylli ki jylla.Wat la ki nongshnong jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ki long ki briew kiba sngewtynnad ban pyndon kam ia la ki jong ki jain bathain hi, hynrei, ka dang ka jingeh ha kaba pyniaid iew ia ki. La ioh ruh ban iakren ia ka jingdonkam ban don shibun ki Cooperative Society, khnang ba yn lah ban pyniaid iew ia kane ki jait jong ba pynmih ki nongshong shnong jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. Ki nongiashim bynta, ka la kular ruh ban ki nang ia trei land hapdeng jong ki ban nang pynkiew shuh ia ka jingpynmih ia ki jain bathain hi na ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi.
title: Pyllong ka Abdul Kalam Centre IIM Shillong ïa ka jingialang thain jaiñ ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi

content: U heh shipai ryngkew General Officer Commanding in-Chief jong ka Eastern Army Command, u Lieutenant General R.C. Tiwari, uba dang shuh kiew kyrdan, u la leit jngoh ia u Lat ka Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan ha Raj Bhavan, Shillong. Ha kane ka jingiakynduh jong ki, ki la ia kren shaphang ka jingshong shngain ha Meghalaya bad ruh ia ka jinglong jingman ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi
title: Iakynduh u heh shipai Lt.General R.C. Tiwari ïa u Lat Phagu Tiwari ka Meghalaya

content: Kawei ka jingjia aksiden ha ka shnong Rangblang Sahsniang, South West Khasi Hills district, ha ka 24 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, ka la jia ha ka por 6:00 baje mynstep, ha kaba la lam sha ka jingkhlad jong uwei u briew.Ha katei ka jingjia aksiden, la kynthup kawei ka kali Maruti kaba don u nombar ML 10-7040, ba la niah da uba la khlad noh, u Bah Petar Sohphoh (40 years old), uba dei u nongshong shnong jong ka Thadwang, Pyndengrei, West Khasi Hills.Ha katei ka jingjia, la ong ba katei ka kali ka la kylla khongpong ha surok bad ka la leit hap hapoh ka nala ba don hajan jong katei ka surok, kaba lam sha ka jingmynsaw jong u nongniah ïa katei ka kali bad u la khlad noh hashen ha katei ka jaka.Katba u SI R Rymbai uba la tohkit halor katei ka jingjia, u la pynlong da ka jingtohkit ba bniah bad kyrpad ban rah noh ïa katei ka met sha Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat, na ka bynta ban eksamin post-mortem. Ki bahaïing ha sem mynta ki dang ap ïa ka kaiphod jong ka post-mortem bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat da u SI R Rymbai.
title: Khlad uwei ha ka jingjia aksiden ha Rangblang Sahsniang, SWKH

content: :Ha ka jingsngew sarong na ka bynta ka jylla, u nongïalam ba la rangbah jong ka seng BJP bad u Cabinet Minister jong ka Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Department, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek, u la ïohpdiang da ka khusnam Dadasaheb Phalke. Ïa katei ka khusnam, la aiti da u Myntri ka sorkar pdeng, u Ramdas Athawale ha katei ka jingrakhe ba i shongshit kaba la pynlong ha ka NDMC Auditorium, Jantar Mantar, New Delhi ha ka jingdon lang ki riewpawkhmat ba kongsan.U Bah Hek u la ïohpdiang ïa katei ka khusnam kum u Myntri ba biang bad uba trei mon sngewbha ha ka jingithuh ïa u kum uwei na ki Myntri bym shongthait ban trei shitom na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jingnoh synñiang na ka bynta ka ri baroh kawei.Katei ka khusnam kaba u Bah Hek u la ïohpdiang ka dei na ka daw jong ka kam kaba u la trei met bad mynsiem, ha kaba u Bah A.L. Hek u long uwei na ki Myntri ba biang tam na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ki nongshong shnong ki lah ban khmih lynti na u na ka bynta ka jinghikai, ka jingïoh jingmut bad kiwei kiwei, kaba long ka sakhi jong ka jingïoh biang sa shisien ban leh bha ïa ki paidbah ha ka kam saiñ hima sima jong u kaba la neh arphew snem mynta. La ithuh ïa u na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong u ha ka ban wanrah ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah bad ka kam pynroi.Haba la ïoh lad ban kren ïa u Bah Hek, u la ong, “Ka khusnam Dadasaheb Phalke ka long ka burom bakhraw kaba la ktah bad ka pynskhem ïanga ba ngan trei shitom shuh shuh na ka bynta ka jingïoh jingmyntoi ïa jylla bad ka ri.”
title: Ïohpdiang khusnam u Hek da ka Dadasaheb Phalke ha New Delhi

content: Ka ophis jong u Sub-Divisional Officer (Election), Amlarem Sub-Division, Amlarem, mynta ka sngi ka 25 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024, ka la rakhe ïa kahalor ka theme, ha kaba U Dr. Abhiskek Saini, IAS, SDO (Election) u la long u Kongsan ha kane ka programme.Ïa kane ka programme la pynïaid da u u G.L.C Mylliem, MCS, Asst. Commissioner, bad u la ai ruh ïa ka jingkren pdiang bad jingaikhublei ïa baroh kiba ïa don lang ha kane ka prokram.Ha kaba sdang jong ka prokram la ai jingkren da u u M. Sangma, BLO supervisor. Ha ka jingkren jong u, u la ong  ba u kum ki BLOs ki la pyrshang katba lah ban leit sha ki shnong bad ki ïing ki sem jong ki nongthep vote ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki shaphang ka jingthep vote bad ka rukom thep vote khamtam ïa kito kiba dang thymmai. La ai jinghikai bad pynshai shaphang ka EVM machines bad shaphang ka “Vote from Home”. U la kyntu ïa ki rangbah shnong, ki rangbah niam ba kim dei ban leh shongshit ne ïashah liang ha ka por Election namar kane kan ktah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ki shnong ki thaw.U Luckystar Pamthied, u President of Association of Challenged People, Amlarem Block, u la ai jingkren ha kaba u la ïaroh bad ai khublei ïa ka Sorkar ïa ka jinghikai ba ka la ai na ka bynta ki ba duna ka dkhot met da kaba wanrah ïa ka “Vote from Home” kaba la ïarap bad pynlah ïa ki ba kin pyndep ïa ka hok ban vote bad ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat.U Kongsan ha ba ai jingkren u la ai khublei “National Voters Day” ïa baroh. U la ong ruh ba la rakhe ïa kane ka sngi manla u snem kum ka Foundation Day jong ka Election Commission. U la kyntu ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong kiba la dap 18 snem shaneng ba kin kheiñ kordor ïa ka vote jong ki la ha kano kano ka niam ka jait ka rukom im ne ka ktien ba ki don. U la kyntu ban vote katkum ka jingsngewthuh bad ka mon la jong bad ym dei ban ngop ha ka jingkren pynbieit jong kiwei. U la kyntu ba dei ban don ka mynsiem ban ïarap ban pynsngewthuh lem ïa kiwei ki bymsngew thuh khamtam ïa kito ki bym lah ban leit sha ki jaka thep vote, namar mynta ka sorkar ka la pynbiang ïa ki machines ba kin lah ban thep vote na ïing.Ha kane ka prokram la sam ïa ki EPIC sha ki nongthep vote kiba thymmai, la pule ïa ka Voters Pledge ha ka jingïalam ka F.M. War, ASE. La pynkup burom ïa ki BLO u  Dapki Shylla, BLO-4-Iongnoh, u Savio Myrchiang, 21-Amlarem A bad u Jacinthson Passah, 23-Pdengkarong, na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong ki.La sam ruh ïa ki khusnam sha ki nongjop ha ka Painting Competition ba la long ha ka 23tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024 bad ïa ka Run For Democracy kaba la long ha ka 24 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024.La pynkut ïa ka jingïalang da kaba u J. Tongper u la ai ïa ka jingkren khublei.
title: Rakhe ka ophis u SDO, Amlarem Sub-Division ïa ka “14th National Voters Day”

content: U Samla Bisharlang Pyngrope na ka shnong Mawlyngngad kaba hap hapoh ka East Khasi Hills District bad u ba la trei teng kum u Principal jong ka T.M.T Higher Secondary School bad uba trei mynta ha St. Michael’s Higher Secondary School, Umsning, u Convenor jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka kynhun jong ka All India Education Forum (AIEF) bad u ba bat ruh kum u General Secretary jong ka Mawlyngngad Sports Social and Cultural Club u la shah thung kum u Secretary  jong ka phutbol jong ka jylla ha ka Talent Search Sports Development Association, India ban ïatrei lang bad kane ka kynhun ha kaban wad bad kyntiew ïa ki rang ialehkai naduh ki rta ba dang rit kiba tbit bad kiba don ka sap ka phong ha ka liang ka phutbol. Їa kane la pynbna paidbah da ka Director jong ka TSSDA, India, ka Nidhi Kumari ha ka 29tarik u Nohprah 2023.U Samla Bisharlang Pyngrope u dei ruh u nonghikai u ba la ïoh pdiang ïa ka Bharat Shiksha Ratan Award ha u snem 2014, District Teacher’s Award 2015 na ka tnat jong ka pule puthi, ka sorkar Nagaland, Indira Gandhi Priyadarshini Award 2015, Best Indian Educationist Award 2016 bad State Level Teacher’s Award 2016 na ka tnat jong ka pule puthi, ka sorkar Nagaland. Nalor ka kam hikai u dei ruh u briew u ba la ïarap shibun ïa ki samla jong ka jylla jong ngi ha ka ban kyntiew ïa ka sap ka phong ka jong ki ha ka phutbol. U dei u briew u ba ju kyrshan khamtam ïa ki rang ïalehkai kiba ju wan na ka long ïing long sem kaba duk. Bun na ki rang ïalehkai kiba u ju kyrshan ki la sdang ban paw. U dei ruh u nongpeit jong ka Stadium FC Bangalore, Shillong Centre ïa kaba un sa plie shen hangne ha Nongbah Shillong.
title: Shah thung u Samla Bisharlang Pyngrope kum u Secretary jong ka Phutbol ha ka Talent Search Sports Development Association, India

content: Ban kynmaw burom ia ka jingdap 127 snem ia ka sngi kha jong u nongialeh laitluid jong ka ri India, u Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose bad tip ruh kum “Ka Sngi Jong ka Jingshlur”, u Lat ka Meghalaya, u Phagu Chauhan u la pyndonburom ia u Netaji Subash Chandra Bose da kaba pyndeng syntiew ia ka dur jong u ha Raj Bhavan ha Shillong. Ki ophisar ryngkat bad nongtrei Sorkar jong ka Raj Bhavan ki la ia don lang ban pyniphuh iphieng ia katei ka sngi.
title: Kynmaw burom ka Raj Bhavan Shillong ïa lyngkhuh sngi kha u Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose

content: Ka Mawkyrwat Arm Wrestling Association (MAWA), South West Khasi Hills District ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis jong u District Sports Officer, South West Khasi Hills District myn ha ka 29 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïakop ïa-khun kti kaba nyngkong hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District  ïa kaba la tip kum ka “1st Mawkyrwat Arm Wrestling Championship 2023” ha kaba ki la phiah ha ki ar tylli ki bynta kata na ka bynta ka Armature bad ki Pro Category ha  kaba ki la pynlong hapoh jong ka Dorbar Hall Mawkyrwat.Ïa kane ka lympung ïa khun kti la ïasnohktilang ruh da ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association (MAWA) ba la bei tyngka da ka Directorate of Sports and Youths Affairs, Meghalaya, Shillong ha kaba ki la don kumba 77 ngut kiba la ïa shimbynta kiba  kynthup ïa ki shynrang bad ki kynthei.Ha kane ka sngi la long kongsan da u Bah Junestar Kharbani, President jong ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association (MAWA) ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki nongshah khot sngewbha kata u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uwei na ki riew rangbah ka dong ka thaiñ, ki nongkitkam ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat ryngkat baroh ki nongwan ïashim bynta.Ki nongjop ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai ia Khun kti ki long: – Men’s Amateur 50-60 Kg la ïoh u Dapkmenlang Lyngdoh. 60-70 kg la ïoh rah da u Jymmyson Marweiñ, 70 – 80 kg la ïoh rah da u Baniaineh Mawlieh bad 80 kg shajrong la ïoh da u Mebanson Sangma bad na ka liang ki kynthei Amateur 55 kg la ïoh nam lahduh da ka kong Pyndaplin Shabong bad 55 kg shajrong la ïoh da ka Kong Kiewdorlin Nongrum na ka bynta ki Women Pro 55 kg la ïoh da ka Kong Airikmenlang Shabong bad na ka bynta 55 kg shajrong la ïoh da ka Wandalin Syiemiong.Na ka bynta ki Mens Pro 70 kg la ïoh nam lah duh da u Pyrkhatlang Mylliem Umlong,70 kg shajrong la ïoh da u Alansun Marbaniang bad na ka bynta ka Champions of Champions Amateur jong ki kynthei la ïoh rah da ka Kong Kiewdorlin Marweiñ bad na ka bynta ka Champions of Champions Pro jong ki shynrang  la ïoh da u Alansun Marbaniang bad jong ki kynthei ka Kong Wandalin Syiemiong.U Bah Junestar Kharbani haba kren kum u kongsan u la ai ka jingkitbok kitrwiang ïa ki samla na kane ka dong ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat ba kin ym kut tang ha kum kine ki rynsan hynrei kin nangkiew haduh ha ki State Level bad ruh ha ki National bad International Level bad ka burom kan leit ym tang ha ki hynrei kan wanrah ïa ka burom ha ka dong ka thaiñ bad ïa ka Ri khasi hi baroh kawei.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ban ïoh ïa ka nam bad ka burom ngi donkam ban trei shitom ban don ka mynsiem ban buh ïa ka thong sha khmat watla shibun ki jingeh kin don hynrei lada ngi thrang bad ïai minot ha kawei ka sngi ngin ïoh kheit ïa u soh u ba thiang ban kynjoh ha kliar ka nam bad ka burom.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban ai sngewbha ïa u samla Aiboklang P. Wanniang uba la mihkhmat ïa ka Ri India ha ka 44th World Arm-Wrestling Championship 2023 bad uba la poi ha ka kyrdan kaba 11 napdeng kiba 60kg Category.
title: Ha ka sien ba nyngkong pynlong ka MAWA ïa ka Arm Wrestling Championship 2023 ha Mawkyrwat, SWKHD

content: Ki Samla pule kiba don hapoh ka lama jong ka North Eastern Hills University Student Union (NEHUSU), ha ryngkat ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) mynta ka 3 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ki la pynlong da ka jingïakhih ha khmat ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE) ban pynsngew sha ka Sorkar jylla ba kan pynlait noh ïa ka Scholarship kaba dang sah teng jong ki samla pule ha ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Samla Banpynbiang Riang, u General Secretary ka NEHUSU u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingïalang mynta ka sngi ka long ban pynsngew sha ka Sorkar halor ka jingpynslem ban pynlait ïa ka Scholarship ki samla pule jong u snem 2023.“Ka Scholarships hi ka dei ka bhah jong ki samla pule, kane ka jingiarap pisa ki samla pule ki ïoh ban siew ïa ka bai klas ka bai hostel bad kiwei kiwei hynrei na ka jingpynslem ka Sorkar ki samla pule ki mad ïa ka jingeh ka ba khraw” u la ong.U la bynrap ba na ka liang ka NEHUSU kan ai por 10 sngi sha ka sorkar ba kan pynlait noh ïa ka Scholarship jong baroh ki samla pule lem kumta ki samla pule kin pynkhreh da ka jingïakhih kaba tyngeh ban ïoh ïa la ka hok.“Hadien ka 10 sngi lada ka sorkar kan dang pynslem ban pynlait noh ïa ka Scholarship ki samla pule, ka NEHUSU kan lum ïa ki samla pule bad kan sdang da ka jingïakhih ba tyngeh pyrshah ïa ka sorkar,” u la ong.Na ka liang u Samla Mandor Diengdoh Swer, u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta hi ka Sorkar ka la shu pynleit jingmut tang ha ki tamasa bad leh matlah ïa ki jingeh ki samla pule ha ka jylla.“Ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar ban pynleit jingmut tang sha ki tamasa ka la pynlong ïa ka jylla ba kan wan ha ka kyrdan ba khatduh eh ha ka pule puthi bad duh noh ïa ka nam kum ka Education Hub bad la tip tang kum ka Festival Hub bad ka long ka jingleh raiñ ba ki nonghikai bad ki samla pule kin hap mih madan tang ban ïoh ïa la ka jong ka hok,” u la ong.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Roykupar Synrem, u President  ka HYC u la ong ba kane ka jingwan jong ka HYC ban kyrshan ïa ka NEHUSU ka long ban kyntu sha ka sorkar ba kadei ban pynlait noh ïa ka Scholarship ki samla pule. Ka Sorkar jylla kam dei ban ap ïa ka pisa ba kan wan na ka Sorkar pdeng hynrei ka la dei ban wad shwa da ki lad ki lynti ban pynbiang shwa ïa ki khun samla .Ka HYC kan snohkti bad kan ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura sha ki samla pule ha man ka lynti ba kin shim khnang ba kin ïoh ïa ka hok jong ki.
title: Shiphew sngi aipor ban pynlait ïa ka Scholarship, lem kumta da ka jingïakhih ba tyngeh byrngem ki samla pule

content: U Myntri sorkar bad nongkren jong ka sorkar, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh myn ha ka sngi balang, u la ong ba ka sorkar kam shym la peit dur ïa ka seng Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) kum ka “nongshun.” Katba ka jingkren jong u ka long ha ka jingjubab jong u ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynbiang pahara na ka bynta ka sngi rakhe ïa ka Republic Day, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka rai ba dang shen jong ka seng HNLC ban weng ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka sorkar.Kaba bud da ka jingïalang ki Myntri sorkar kaba la dep pdiang ban kren ha ka sngi Republic Day, u Lyngdoh u la dep pyntip sha ki nongthoh kot khubor ba yn sa pynbiang ka jingap pahara katkum ki kyndon. U la pynthikna ba ka jinglong jingman jong ka aiñ bad ka hukum hapoh ka jylla ka long kaba la i hun jrut bad ba suk, kaba lah ban kdew ba ym donkam sa kiwei pat ki kyndon.U Lyngdoh u la ong ruh ba u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma bad u Symbud Myntri, u Prestone Tynsong, uba dei peit ïa ka kam poh ïing, ki la ai dak ai shin ba ka jingïakren bad ka seng HNLC ka dang plie. U la ong kumne, “Ki jingkhang ki dang plie na ka bynta ka jingïakren bad ka HNLC, bad kata ruh, yn sa pyntip ryntih ha ka sngi ba ai jingkren ha ka Republic Day.”Haba la kylli shaphang ka jingpeit jong ka sorkar ïa ka kynhun HNLC, u Lyngdoh u la ong, “Ngim shym la peit khmat ïa ka HNLC kum ka seng nongshun jong ngi ne ki paidbah kiba ngi hap ban husiar, kaba la long ka daw bah ba balei ngin sa ong ba ka jingkhang ka plie lad na ka bynta jong ki ban ïakren bad kan sa jia kumta kumba long, ha ka jingshisha ngin sa pyntip ha ka sngi rakhe ïa ka Republic Day.”
title: Ym dei ban peit khmat ïa ka HNLC kum ka nongshun, ka jingïakren ka dang plie lad: Paul Lyngdoh

content: Ka Parish Nativity of Our Lord Mawkyrwat myn ha ka sngi u Blei ka 31 tarik u Nohprah 2023, ka la ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka Jubili ksiar ne ka Golden Jubilee jong ka ha kaba ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban pynkyntang Lyngdoh Sohblei ruh ïa ki ar ngut ki Dikon da u Most. Rev Wilbert Marweiñ D.D, u Bishop jong ka Nongstoiñ Diocese. Kata u Dikon Marshall Wahlang na Mawkyrwat Parish bad ïa u Dikon Phrangsngi Lyngkhoi na Rangblang Parish.Ha kane ka sngi kut jong ka Jubili Ksiar  da ki hajar ngut ki paid riewngiet ka balang ki la wan ban sakhi ïa kane ka sngi bakhraw.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi u Bishop Wilbert Marweiñ D.D, u Bishop jong ka Nongstoiñ Diocese u la  pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkmen ban ïohi ba ka Parish ha kine ki sngi ba mynta  ka la kiew shi bun ki bynta khamtam ha ka jingim  mynsiem. U la ong ruh ba kum ki paid riewngiet ki don kam ban peit sha khmat khamtam mynta u snem jong ka jingpynkut ïa ka Jubili ksiar jong ka Parish da kaba  ngim dei ban klet ïa kaei kaba ngi la ïaid lynti hynrei mynta ka la dei ka por ba ngin ïaid bad peit sha khmat, mynta ka sngi bad ha ki sngi ki ban wan, kumno ngin leh ban pynkhlain ïa ka jingim mynsiem ban shakri bad ban ai nguh ïa u Blei trai kynrad.Haba kren halor ka jinglong Lyngdoh Sohblei u Bishop Marwein u la ong ïa ki Lyngdoh bad ki riewniam la jied ban long ki nong duwai, kane ka dei ka kamram kaba nyngkong eh jong ki riewniam, man ka sngi ki pyndep ïa ki jingduwai na ka bynta ki paid jong u Blei. La jied ïa ki ban long ki Nongïalam, kynmaw ba phi la poi ha ka duwan ban long ki nongïalap, la jied ïa phi ban leit ïalap, ban pynbna ïa ka khubor jong ka jingpynim. Ha ka ktien jong u Blei don ka jingim bymjukut, u Blei u la khot ïa ngi ban long ki nongïalap naduh ba ngi ïoh ïa ka Baptisma hynrei kyrpang ïa ki Lyngdoh bad ki riewniam.La jied ïa ki riewniam ban long ki nonghikai, ym dei ban hikai tang ha skul hynrei ki long ki nonghikai ha ka lynti ka hok la sot bad ïalam ïa ki briew sha u Blei.Ha kane ka sngi la pynhiar ïa ka Lama Jubili da u Bishop Marwein kum ka dak ba la pynkut noh ïa ka Jubili ksiar jong ka Parish bad ruh pyllait ïa ka Souvenir jong ka lynti ïaid jong ka Parish ha kine ki san phew snem ba la dep.
title: Rakhe ka Parish Nativity of Our Lord Mawkyrwat ïa ka Golden Jubilee, pynkyntang ïa ar ngut ki Lyngdoh Sohblei

content: Ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council ka la pynbna ba ka la shim ïa ka rai ban weng noh ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka sorkar pdeng bad kumjuh ruh na ka sorkar jylla.Kane ka seng ka la ong ba ka jingweng noh ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk ka long na kadaw jong ka jingbym shim khia jong ka sorkar ïa ki jingdawa jong ka, kiba kynthup ïa ka jingweng noh ïa ka jingkheiñ be-aiñ ïa ka HNLC, ka jingweng noh ïa ki jingmudui pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam bad ki dkhot jong ka seng, ka jingshah ïa ka jingwan ki nongïalam, ka jingthung ïa u nongmihkhmat ha kane ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ki jingpyllait noh ïa ki dkhot jong ka HNLC kiba la shah kem bad shah set byndi.Ka HNLC ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kthang halor ka jingbym leh eiei jong ka Sorkar halor kitei ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng. Ka seng ka la ong ruh kan ym lah ban shim ïa ka jingkitkhlieh lada ka Sorkar kam plie ïa kita ki lad ki lynti kiba lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingsuk.Ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewnguh jong ka ïa ki ksiang jong ka seng, ki seng bhalang bad ïa ki nongkyrshan. Hynrei, ka bynñiaw pat ïa ka jingbym lah jong ka sorkar ban pdiang ïa kitei ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng.Na ka liang u General Secretary jong ka HNLC, u Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw, u la ong ba lada ka Sorkar kam sngap ïa ka sur jong ka seng, ki kam pyntriem kin sa long kiba yn ym lah ban kiar.
title: Weng noh ka HNLC ïa ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka sorkar da kaba kdew ïa ki jingbymbiang ka sorkar

content: Ka Seng Ri Khasi Sepngi Federation (RKSF) ha ryngkat ki nongïalam Shnong jong ka thaiñ Rambrai mynta ka sngi kila leit ban jurip ïa ka jingpyntrei ïa ka surok PMGSY na Mawrang haduh Rambraibah hadien ka jingïoh pdiang ïa ka jingujor na ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Ha kane ka jingjurip ka Seng ka la lap ba ka jingpyntrei ïa katei ka surok ka long kaba torti bha bad na ka liang jong ka Seng ka la kynnoh ruh ba kadei ka jingpyntrei torti da u kontraktor u ba pyntrei ïa katei ka surok kata naduh ka jingsiang ïa ka rong kam long katkum ka Detail Project Report (DPR) bad ka Seng ka la lap ruh ba don ki bynta jong ka surok ba dang shu sdang siang rong ha kine ki khyndiat sngi kala lah da khoh bad pra noh.U Bah Mawkordor Kharsyiemlieh uba dei u President ka RKSF u la dawa na u kontraktor ba u dei ban trei bha bad siang bha ïa katei ka surok lem kumta ka Seng kan hap ban shim da kiwei pat ki sienjam kiba kham tyngeh bad u la ïakren ruh bad u Executive Engineer (EE) ka tnad PWD halor katei ka bynta ha kaba na ka liang jong u EE u la kular ban shim khia bad ban sa phah ïa u SDO ban leit jurip ïa katei ka surok.
title: Ha ka jingjurip lap ka RKSF ba trei torti u kontraktor ïa ka surok PMGSY na Mawrang sha Rambraibah

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Nongmynsong Unit mynta ka 3tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka la ïoh ban sam jingïarap sha ki katto katne ki longïing hapoh ka shnong da ki Kymbor Syaid bad kiwei ki tiar donkam.Ha shwa ban sam ïa kitei ki jingïarap ka KSU ka lah ïoh shuwa ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalang ba lyngkot kaba la pynlong hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Shnong Nongmynsong, Shillong ha ka jingïadon ryngkat lang u Rangbah Shnong u Bah Phrang Warjri bad u Secretary Shnong barim u Bah Ananias Nongdhar, ki nongïalam ka KSU Sengkmie kiba kynthup naduh u Samla Cleanstar Shabong bad u Samla Eddie Malniang ki Asst. Organising Secretary, u Samla Alerick Khajana  u Asst. Office Secretary  bad u Samla Sonstar Nongkhlaw u President ka KSU Shillong Mihngi Circle bad kiwei ki dkhot na ki Unit bad ki Circle.
title: Da ki spah tylli ki longïing sam jingïarap ka KSU Nongmynsong Unit

content: U snem 2023 u la wan bad shen shen u la leit noh. Mynta ngi la ïoh pat ïa u snem 2024. U snem 2023 na ka bynta jong ki babun, u lah ban long u snem uba ïaid sted haduh katta katta. Hynrei, na ka bynta jong kiwei, u lah ban long u snem uba suki haduh katta katta. Haba don hapdeng jong ka jingbit jingbiang, haba don hapdeng jong ka jingkyrhai ka jingpahuh, haba don hapdeng ka spah ka phew, haba don hapdeng ka jingshait jingkhlaiñ bad haba don hapdeng ka jingkmen ka jingsngew ka jingsngewbha ka por ka ïaid sted haduh katta katta. Hynrei, lada kiei kiei, ki long da kumwei pat, ka por ka neh hajuh. Lada u briew um don hapdeng ka jingpang ka jingshitom, lada u don hapdeng ka jingduk bad jingkyrduh, ka por na ka bynta jong u kam ïaid bad ka neh hajuh.Ka jingïaid sted bad jingïaid suki jong ka por, ka shong ha ka jingïohmad jong u briew shimet. Lada u snem 2023, u long uba sted lane uba suki, mynta u la leit shaba sep ka sngi bad um wan phai shuh. Ka snem 2023, kan sa shu long tang ka history ne ki jingsah jingkynmaw.Bun napdeng jong ngi, haba wan u snem thymmai, ngi shim ia ki jingkular bad jingrai kut ba ngin pyndep bad ban leh bun kiei kiei ha une u smen thymmai. Hynrei, tang hadien katto katne bnai ngi klet noh ïa ki. Haba ngim lah ban pynurlong ïa kita ki jingkular bad jingrai kut ki jong ngi, kane ka pyllong ïa ngi ba ngin duh jingkyrmen ha ka jingim ka jong ngi. Ngi poi sha ka jingsngewraitoi bad jingim rit mynsiew haduh ba ngim lah shuh ban khie khlieh ban leh ïa kiei kiei kiba myntoi ïalade bad ïa ka imlang sahlang. Lada kit ki jingrai kut ki jong ngi ki long kiba ngim lah ban pynurlong, ka bha ba ngim ym buh ïa ki ha ki jingmut jingpyrkhat ki jong ngi.Ki ‘riewstad kiba pynlong ïa ki jingwad bniah bad ki jinglum jingtip jong ki, ki la lap ba ki babun kim lah ban pynurlong ïa kita ki jingrai kut ki jong ngi. Lada ka jingim ka long ha kane ka rukom, ka bha ba ngin shim tang katto katne tylli ki kiba ngi lah ban pyntrei kam. Ha kaba jaka ba ngin kren sniew kren siat ïa kiwei, ngin pyrshang ban kren noh ïa ki jingbha ki jong ki. Lehse, ki don don ki ban ong, mynta, ka snem ngan ym pyndonkam mobile shuh. Kane ka mobile, ka long ka sniew na ka bynta jong nga. Kane ka mobile ka long kaba ktah ïa ka thiah ka dem bad ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah ka jong nga. Ka jingrai kut kaba kum kane ka long kaba ym lah ban long. Ki don ki briew kiba ym lah ban im wat tang shi khyllipmat khlem ka mobile. Kiba kum kine ki jait briew kin ym lah ban pyntrei kam ïa kita ki rai ki jong ki. Kan jyn da la bha ba kin shim tang ïa ka jingkut jingmut ba kin pynlip noh ïa ka mobile jong ki hadien ka shiteng synñia tang arsien ha ka shi bnai. Kane ka jingkut jingmut ka long kaba lah ban pynurlong. Lada lah ban pynurlong tang arsien ha ka shi bnai, nangta lah ban nang pynbun shuh ïa ki sngi pynlip mobile bad suki ngin sa lah ban pynduna ïa kane ka jingsniew pyndonkam mobile khlem sangeh wat tang shi khyllip mat. Kan poi ka por ha kaba ngin sa lah ban pynduna ïa kane ka jingsniew. Kane ka long tang kawei ka nuksa. Ka jingmut jong kane ka long ban pynsngew ba ngin shim ïa ki jingkut jingmut kiba ngi lah ban pynurlong ha ka jingim ka jong ngi, ngin nai da ïa khmih lynti eh ïa ki kambah kiba khraw kiba ngim lah ban leh. Ïa kane ka jingai jingmut, ngi lah ban pyntrei kam ha kiwei pat ki bynta kiba ma ngi shimet shimet ngi tip kham bha, kumno ban tei ïa la ka jingim kaba bit ba biang bad kaba kham bha.
title: Shim ïa ka jingkut jingmut bad ïa ka raikut  ha u snem thymmai – 2024

content: Ka ka la pynlong ia ka tamasa ba shitaiew pura ha Nongpoh ka ban kut 9 tarik u Kyllalyngkot. La plie ia kane ka tamasa lehkmen da u  MDC ka Jirang, u Bah Victor Rani, bad la iadon ryngkat u President Anias Rani ka Western Ri Bhoi Dorbar, u rangbahshnong u  Petalman Thangkhiew Patharkhmah, bad ki nongialam jong katei ka shnong. Ha kane ka jinglehkmen yn sa don u nongrwai ba pawnam, u Bah Wanjop Sohkhlet. Yn pynkut ia kane ka jingialehkai da ka jingsam ia ki certificate na ka bynta ki jingjop bapher bapher.
title: Pyllong ka Patharkhmah Youth Club ïa ka tamasa lehkmen

content: Ka University of Science and Technology Meghalaya (USTM) ka la pyllong ia ka Association of Indian Universities (AIU) East Zone Inter University Chess Tournament 2023-24 na ka bynta ki khynthei bad shynrang. Kane kan bteng haduh ka 11 tarik mynta u bnai.Ka New Delhi, USTM ka pynlong ia kane ka jingialehkai  ha kawei ka seng jong ka Association of Indian Universities (AIU) kaba la don ki nongiashim bynta jong ki 30 tylli ki skulbah na kawei kawei na ka  East zone da ki manager bad ki coach kiba la registar ialade na ka bynta kane ka jingialehkai. San ki nongpyniaid kynthup ia ki nongbishar  ba pawnam kum u Biswajit Bharadwaj bad Monimala Sinha, ryngkat lang bad u Golap Chandra Gogoi, Homen Chandra Rabha bad Paresh Rajbongshi, ki ban peit ia kane ka jingialehkai.La plie ia kane da u Dr. Balendra Kumar Das, Pro Vice Chancellor of USTM, bad Dr. RK Sharma, Advisor, USTM. Kane ka jingialehkai jong ki kynthei ka la sdang naduh ka 3 tarik haduh ka 6 tarik u Kyllalyngkot bad ki shynrang kan sdang naduh ka 8 tarik haduh 11 tarik u Kyllalyngkot.Ki nongiashim bynta na ki skulbah ki ban iashim bynta ha kane ka Inter-university chess ki kynthup ia ka Jadavpur University, Chhattisgarh Swami Vivekananda Technical University, M.G.K.V.P. University, M.S.C.B. University, Berhampur University, Calcutta University, KIIT University, S.M.K.V., University of Burdwan, Adamas University, Manipur University bad Banaras Hindu University.
title: Pyllong ka USTM ïa ka jingialehkai Chess

content: Ka President jong ka Ri, ka Droupadi Murmu ka lah ban wan plie pyrda ïa ka lympung ïalehkai ba heh tam ha ka Jylla kaba la tip kum ka Meghalaya Games  ha ka 15 tarik bad 16tarik mynta u bnai bad ruh ban buh mawnongrim na ka bynta ban shna ia ka ropeway project.Haba ai jingkren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Myntri ka tnad Tourism ka sorkar jylla, Bah Paul Lyngdoh ba dei ruh u nongai ktien ka sorkar MDA u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla  ka dang iai ap ia ka jingpyntikna na ka ophis jong ka President.Kane ka jingialehkai kan sa long ha Tura West Garo Hills district naduh ka 15 tarik haduh ka 20 tarik mynta u bnai.Kumba 3,000 ngut ki nongïalehkai kiban aireng ha ki 22 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai. Na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ruh ka la pynkhreh ban pynlut haduh kumba 23 klur na ka bynta katei ka  ka jingialehkai Meghalaya Games  . Lada ka President ka Ri ka pyntikna ba kan wan, yn  pyntikna ha ki 24kynta ban wan, ngin sa lah ban khot lang ïa ka ban buh ïa u mawnongrim na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka Shillong Ropeway Project  la ong u bah Paul.
title: Lah Ban Plie Ka President Murmu Ïa Ka Meghalaya Games

content: U vice president jong ka seng BJP bad uba dei peit ïa ka jylla Meghalaya, u M Chuba Ao, myn ha ka sngi palei, u la ong ba u la ban jur ban ïakhun haduh 400 seat ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha, da kaba ong kumne, “Ka jingthmu jong ngi mynta ka long ban leit sha baroh ki jaka kiba ngim pat leit ha ki snem ba la dep.”Ha ka jingkhmih ïa jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka ilekshon ha ka jylla Meghalaya, u Ao u la ong ba ka jingpynshlur jong ka seng ka dang ïaid shakhmat bad pdiang ba don ki seat bad ki jaka ba tlot. U la ban jur halor ka jingleit ban kynduh ïa ka kynhun grassroots, da kaba ong kumne, “Ngin sa pynlong ïa ki paidbah ba kin sngewthuh ïa ka rukom treikam ba thymmai.”Ha kaba ïadei bad ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na ka bynta ki seat Shillong bad Tura, u Ao u la batai kumne, “Ngin sa ïakren bad ka jylla bad ki kynhun jong ka jylla, kiba kynthup ïa u Myntri rangbahduh bad u Myntri ka kam poh ïing, da kaba pynthikna ba ki kyrtong kin dei kiba biang na ka bynta ki paidbah.”Halor ka jinglah ban pynïaid da u nongthaw aiñ jong ka Pynthorumkhrah, u Bah AL Hek, u Ao u la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam na ka bynta ka jingïkren ba shimet hashwa kino kino ki jingrai, da kaba pynthikna, “Ngin sa jied ïa ki kyrtong kiba dei napoh ka seng, da kaba pynlong kongsan da ki kynthei ban ïakhun kum ki kyrtong katba dang pynthikna ïa ka jingïoh jingbit na ka konstituensi.”
title: Thmu ïakhun ka BJP 400 tylli ki seat ha ka ilekshon jong ka Lok Sabha

content: Ha ka miet jong ka 2 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, la don ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha kaba la don haduh saw ngut ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) kiba la mynsaw ha ka jingaksiden kali.Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por ba ka trok battalion jong ki, kaba la ïaid sha ka khappud jong ka jaka ha Maheskola jong ka South Garo Hills, ka la takhuh ïa u lum barit, ha kaba la lam sha ka jingkylla khongpong jong kane ka trok.Katrei ka trok BSF ka dei jong ka 1st Battalion jong ki shipai BSF, kaba don ka headquarter ha Tura. Hapoh katei ka trok, la don lang kiwei pat ki shipai bad ki mar ki mata, kiba la thmu ban leit sha khappud, ha kaba katei ka trok ka la khlad lynti na ka sor Baghmara na ka bynta ban leit sha ka outpost jong ka Maheskola kaba don hajan South West Khasi Hills district ha ka sngi ba ar.Katkum ka kaiphod, katei ka jingjia aksiden ka la jia naba u nongniah um lah shuh ban teh lakam ïa ka kali, na ka daw jong ka jingphiel ka brake, kaba la lam sha ka jing leit tynrah ïa u lum barit bad ka la kylla khongpong.Ha katei ka jingjia aksiden, kitei ki saw ngut ki shipai ki la ïoh jingsumar bad la rah ïa ki sha Baghmara Civil Hospital na ka bynta ka jingsumar. Hadien ba la pyllait ïa ki, ki la leitphai noh sha Tura.
title: Mynsaw ki shipai BSF ha surok ha GH

content: :Ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance-II ka dei ka Sorkar kaba trei kam bad kaba la wanrah ruh ia ki jingkylla bad ki jingtrei kam bathymmai ha baroh ki liang, ong u Myntri ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka khubor snem hymmai jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance-II ka long ban aiti met bad mynsiem na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi kiba kham bad bad ban ruh ia ka jingshakri kaba kham biang ia ki paidbah.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar MDA-II ka la pyrshang ban bha ia ki kam jngohkai pyrthei bad kane ka la iarap shibun ban khring ia ki nongjngohkai pyrthei la ki long nangne na India bad na kiwei ki ri jong ka pyrthei.U Myntri u la ong ruh ba ka jingpynlong ia ki tamasa, ka la long ka jingiarap kaba khraw ban kyntiew ia ki kam jngohkai pyrthei bad kito kiba la wan jngoh ia ka Meghalaya, ki la ai ka jingiaroh ia kane ka jylla.U la iathuh ba kawei na ki jingjop jong ka Sorkar MDA-II ka dei ka jingpynioh bynta ia samla ha ka CM Elevate programme. Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba lyngba kane ka prokram haduh 20,000 ngut ki samla kin ioh ia ki jingmyntoi bapher bapher ha kaba kut jong u Lber 2024.Ha kaba ia dei bad ki jingeh kiba ia dei bad u pud u sam hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula iathuh ba ka jingiapynbeit pud hapdeng jong kine ki artylli ki jylla bamarjan, ka la long ka jingjop kaba khraw.U Myntri u la iathuh ruh ba ka jingpeit pyrman jong kine ki artylli ki jylla, ka la iarap shibun ban pyllait ia ki jingiakajhia maja.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingialeh pyrshah ia u drok, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u Myntri ka tnad Social Welfare, u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka ialeh pyrshah ia ka jingkhaii drok da kaba pynlong ia ki jingleit khynra khah khah bad ba ka Sorkar ka la lah ruh ban pyntreikam ia ki kam ia ki ain kiba pyrkhing.U la iathuh ruh ba ki pulit ki la la ban pynshisha ia ki nongkhaiing drok, wat haduh ban set byndi ia ki. Ka Sorkar lyngba ka tnad pulit, ka la lah ban thung kam haduh 3,000 ngut ki pulit ha ka kyrdan Constable ban pynkhlain ia ka jingtrei kam jong ka tnad pulit.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka don ka jingkiew ha ka rep ka riang bad ha ka tnad Arts & Culture.
title: Ka Sorkar MDA ka dei ka Sorkar kaba trei bad wanrah jingkylla:Paul Lyngdoh

content: U vice president jong ka BJP, u Dr M Chuba Ao myn ha ka sngi palei u la ong ba um ïohsngew khubor na ka liang jong u Myntri rangbah barim ka jylla Meghalaya, u Mukul Sangma ba un ïasnohkti bad katei ka seng.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Ao u la ong kumne, “Ym ïohsngew khubor eiei ruh em na ka liang jong u (Mukul Sangma). Ka shu lah ban dei tang ki jait briew kiba kren tang ha haw haw.”U la ong ba ki nongïalam jong ka seng BJP kim pat ïoh ïakynduh ïa u Mukul Sangma ban ïakren halor ka jingleit ïasoh bad kane ka seng.“Ym pat don eiei ruh em namar ba ka shong ha u ba lada u sngew bit ban ïasoh bad ka seng, u lah ban wan, lada um sngewbit ïa kaei bu leh, kata ruh ka shong ha u ym ha ka seng BJP,” ong utei u rangbah jong ka Meghalaya Incharge.Katba u Myntri rangbah barim jong ka jylla, u Dr, Mukul Sangma u la mih noh na ka seng Congress ryngkat bad ki 11 ngut ki nongthaw aiñ bad ïasoh bad ka All India Trinamool Congress (AITC). Hynrei, ka AITC ka lah ban jop tang san tylli seat ha ka ileskhon 2023 Assembly.
title: Kyntait ka BJP halor ka jingïoh dak na u Mukul Sangma ban leit ïasoh bad ka seng

content: Ka South West Khasi Hills District Swimming Association kum shi bynta ban pdiang sngewbha ïa u snem thymmai kumjuh ruh ban burom ïa ka mei mariang ban nym pynjakhlia ïa ki um ki wah kum ka jingbret pathar ïa ki plastik bad kiwei kiwei ha ka 31 tarik u Nohprah 2023 ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïajngi miet ha ka por 11: 45 PM ha Phot Mawpon, Mawkyrwat South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka jingïajngi miet la ïalam da u Bah H. S. Diengdoh u President jong ka SWKHDSA ha kaba la wan ban ïashim bynta haduh 18 ngut ki samla kynthei bad shynrang bad la ïoh ruh ban ot ïa u cake jong u snem Thymmai bad jingdwai.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng ka ai khublei snem thymmai basuk bakmen da kaba kitbok kitrwiang bad ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ïa ki 27 ngut ki nongjngi napoh ka South West Khasi Hills District ki ban sa leit ia shim bynta ha ka Meghalaya Games ka ban sa long shen ha u ne u snem 2024.
title: Shiteng synñia pdiang sngewbha ka SWKHDSA da ka leit jngi sha Phod Mawpon

content: Ka wei ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha kaba ka ding kaba la klang ka la bam duh ïa kawei ka ïing jong ka kong Merlinda Thyrniang kaba don ha ka shnong Rangblang Sohsyniang South West Khasi Hills District.Kat kum ka tyllong khubor ba la ïathuh da ki nong shong shnong ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 1 baje jong ka step 4 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024. Halor kane ka jingjia ym shem la don mano mano ki briew  ba mynsaw namar ba ki trai ïing kim shem la don ha ïing, ba ki dang leit donkam ha ïing jong kiba ha ïing ha sem.Na ka liang ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la pyrshang ban theh um ban pynlip ïa ka ding hynrei kim lah leh eiei shuh ha kaba ka ding ka la bam duh noh ïa baroh ki jingbuh jingsat ha ïing ha sem bad ka jingjulor kane ka ïing ym duna ia ka T. 2 lak ei ei.
title: Bam duh ka ding ïa ka ïing ha Rangblang Sohsyniang SWKHD

content: :Mynta ka sngi, ka prokram ba kongsan, ka District Level ka la pyntip shaphang ka Special Summary Revision jong ka Photo Electoral Rolls, kaba la pynlong ha ka 1 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024, kum ka tarik ba la buh bad ka jingpynbna ba khatduh jong ki Electoral Rolls, kaba la pynlong ha ka Conference Hall jong ka ophis jong ka DC, Nongpoh.Ha katei ka prokram, ka shongknor dei ka Kong B.K Ranee MCS, Addl. Deputy Commissioner, ha kaba la don lang da ki AERO, ki nongmihkhmat na ki seng saiñ pyrthei bapher bapher bad kiwei kiwei ki kongsan. Ha katei ka prokram, ka Addl. Deputy Commissioner, ka Kong B.K Ranee ka la aiti noh ïa ka jingpynbna ba khatduh jong ka jingrai ne ka Final Publication jong ka Electoral Roll sha ki nongmihkhmat jong ki seng saiñ pyrthei bapher bapher, kynthup ïa ka INC, UDP, VPP, NPP bad kiwei kiwei. Shuh shuh, ka la kyrpad jur ïa ki paidbah ba la kot sha ka 18 snem shaneng ka rta ba ki pynrung kyrteng noh ïalade na ka bynta ka Electronic Photo Identity Card (EPIC).
title: Pynlong ïa ka District Level prokram ïa ka Electoral Rolls ha Nongpoh

content: :Ka Ophis jong U District Election Officer, West Khasi Hills District, ha ka 5 tarik U Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram ha ka Conference Hall, jong ka ka ophis U Deputy Commissioner, West Khasi Hills, District na ka bynta ban sam ïa ka Final Publication of Electoral Rolls ne ki kyrteng bad ki jingdon jong ki nongthep vote kiba hap hapoh jong ka 32 Nongstoin (ST) Assembly Constituency, 33 Rambrai Jyrngam (ST) Assembly Constituency bad 34 Mawshynrut (ST) Assembly Constituency ïa kane la sam da ki lai ngut ki Electoral Registration Officer kiba dei khmih ïa kitei ki lai tylli ki Assembly Constituency kiba kynthup ïa I Bah H.K. Thabah, MCS, Electoral Registration Officer, 32- Nongstoin (ST) Assembly Constituency, Bah V. Swer, MCS, Electoral Registration Officer, 33- Rambrai Jyrngam (ST) Assembly Constituency bad I Bah M.A Challam, MCS, Electoral Registration Officer, 34- Mawshynrut (ST) Assembly Constituency. Ha kane ka programme la ïadon lang da kiwei pat ki ophisar sorkar bad ki briew na ki seng saiñ hima kiba pher kiba dei na kine ki lai tylli ki Assembly Constituency.Ka jingdon briew hapoh West Khasi Hills, District ka la kot sha ka 200350 ngut bad napdeng kine, 128021 ngut ki la bit ban long ki nong thep vote kaba kynthup shynrang bad kynthei, ka number jong ki nongthep vote kiba thymmai kata hapdeng karta kaba 18 haduh 19 snem,  haduh ka 5 tarik U Kyllalyngkot 2024 ka long 4978 ngut. Kine ki lai tylli ki Assembly Constituency ki don 193 tylli ki Polling Station, hynrei mynta, la dep ban thaw sa lai tylli ki Section kiba thymmai na ka bynta ka  32- Nongstoin, kata ka long ka Pyndendiloin kaba hap hapoh jong ka Khliehmawlieh PS, Mawpharbah hapoh ka Jaidoh PS bad Pyndensohphoh hapoh ka Marshan Namlang PS kumjuh ruh sa lai tylli ki section kiba thymmai na ka bynta ka 33- Rambrai Jyrngam  la dep ban thaw kaba kynthup ïa ka Mawblang bad Umriang kiba hap hapoh jong ka Nongspung PS bad Thangkuli B hapoh ka  Mawsmai PS.Shuh shuh, ki Electoral Registration Officer jong ka 32- Nongstoin (ST) Assembly Constituency, 33- Rambrai Jyrngam (ST) Assembly Constituency bad 34- Mawshynrut (ST) Assembly Constituency ki la pyntip sha ki paidbah ba thup na ka bynta ka draft electoral roll jong kitei ki lai tylli ki Assembly Constituency la leh da kaba pynshong nongrim katkum ka 1 tarik U Kylllyngkot, 2024 kaba dei ka tarik ban pyntikna la ka rta jong ki ka lah bit ne em ban long ki nong thep vote, kumjuh ruh katkum ka  Registration of Electors Rules, 1960. La dep ruh bah buh copy halor kane ka electoral roll bad kiba kwah ban wan peit ki lah ban wan ha ka ophis jong ki Electoral Registration Officer, kiba don ha ka Ophis U Deputy Commissioner West Khasi Hills, District.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka Final Publication jong ka Electoral Rolls ha ki 3 Constituency ka WKH

content: Ki nongshong shnong jong ka Garo Hills ki la ud na ka daw jong ka jngiakynduh jingeh namarba ka jingbym trei kam ka Internet. Kine ka jingbym trei kam jong ka Internet ha Garo Hills ka la jia mynta laarsien. Kane ka jingbym trei kam jong ka Internet ha Garo Hills ka la pynlyngngoh ia ki nongshong jong katei ka thain namarba u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma dang shen ula pynbna ban pynioh ia ka HighSpeed Internet ha Garo.Ha ka 4 tarik u Kyllalyngkot ka la don ka jngduh Internet ha Garo Hills ha ka por 4.00 baje janmeit bad ka BSNL ka la pyrshang ban biang ia ka Internet. Kane ka jingbym ioh Internel ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingpynheh ia ki surok ha Goalpara ha Assam ha kaba ki sainar Internet ki la dkut lut ha kane ka jingpynheh surok.Kane ka jingpynheh surok, ka la mih hadien ka jingpynbna ba ka President jong ka ri India, ka Droupadi Murmu kan leit jngoh ia kitei ki jaka. Kane ka jingduh Internet ka la wanrah ia ka jingdkoh ia ka jingtrei kam jong ki Bank bad kiwei ki jaka trei kiba ia dei bad ki kam pisa pilain bad kiwei ki jingpynlut pynsep ha ki san tylli ki district jong ka Garo hills.
title: Iakynduh jingeh ki nongshong shnong ka Garo Hill namarba ym trei kam ka Internet

content: Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills, ka Kong R.M. Kurbah ka la kyntu ia ki samla shynrang bad kynthei ka Meghalaya, kiba pynkhreh ialade na ka bynta ka kam shipai Agniveer, ba kin long kiba la pynkhreh na ka bynta katei ka kam ban shakri ia la ka jong ka ri ki.Ka Kong Kurban u la ong, kam shipai kam long kaba suk bad dei na kata ka daw ba kito kiba angnud ban rung sha katei ka kam, ki ban long kiba met bad mynsiem. Ka Kong Kurban ka la ong ruh ki samla ka jylla, ki dei ban tip ba ki lah ban ia khun ia ki kam shipai ha ka kyrdan ophisar hadien ba ki la pyndep ia ka Bachelor Degree bad ba ka mnaks jong ki ka dei ban long 50 na ka 100 shaneng.Haba kren kum ka Kongsan ha ka jingplie ia ka jingai jinghikai ia kito kiba pynkhreh na ka bynta ka kam  shipai Agriveer ba la pyllong da ka Office jong ka Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills Distrcti, ryngkat bad ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Zila Sainik Welfare Board ha Synod College, Shillong, ka Kong Kurbah ka la pynsngew ruh ia ka jingdonkam ban pynlong ia ki jingai jingpynshai ha ki skul ia ki kam bapher bapher, khnang ba ki samla pule ruh ki long kiba la pynkhreh ban ialeh na ka bynta kitei ki kam.Ka Kong Kurbah ka la pynkynmaw ruh ia ka jingaiti jong u Capt. Clifford Nongrum ia la ka jong ka jingim ha ka thma pyrshah ia ka Pakistan ha Cargil. Ka la ong ba ka jingaiti jong u ia la ka jong ka jingim, ka la long ka burom kaba khraw ia ka Meghalaya bad ia ka ri India baroh kawei. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Group Commander jong ka NCC Meghalaya Group, u Brig. V. Mahadik ula kyntu ia ki dkhot ka NCC ba ma ki ruh ki lah ban rung sha ka kam shipai Agniveer, namarba ma ki, ki la long lypa kiba la pynkhreh.U Director jong Zila Sainik Welfare Board, u Colonel ba la shongthait, u G.K.
