Lah ban long ba la weng noh ïa kito ki dak ba ym donkam ha ka ktien Khasi khlem da bishar ïa kiwei kiwei ki ktien na ki thaiñ ha kylleng ka Ri Khasi. La kumno kumno ka ktien Khasi ka la nang san nang mer haduh kumba ka long mynta, hynrei la buhteng ban suitñiew ïa ka ba yn kynthup biang ïa kino kino ki dak ki ba dawa ha ki ktien shnong na ki katto katne ki thaiñ. Kumta ka la poi shaduh u pud ba la mih syndon da ki dak thoh ktien Jaintia.Kaei ka ba la phiah u phareng ha ka snem 1890 lyngba ka kpait treikam ban phiah bad synshar (divide and rule policy) ka la dei ba yn pyrshang tehsong biang, ha ka jingshisha. Tang na ka daw ba ka sorkar Bilat ka la dep kam trai pura ïa ka thaiñ Jaintia ba kynthup ruh ïa ki elaka ba don mynta sha Karbi Anglong jong ka jylla Assam naduh u snem 1935, kumta ka phiah na ka Hima Khyrim ba dang synshar ki syiem bad dorbar Hima Khasi. Hangta la pynlong ïa ka Raijbah Khasi & Jaintia Hills (United Khasi & Jaintia Hills District) na ka bynta ban pynbiang ha ka rukom synshar khadar. Ka ba phylla mynta ka long ba ki paidbah Pnar na kita ki elaka ha Karbi Anglong bad na them Barak jong ka jylla Assam, kumjuh ruh ki paid Ri-War na shathie ka jylla Meghalaya haduh kito ki ba sah sha Raijbah Sylhet ha Ri Bangladesh ki dang ñiew bad tip ïa lade kum ki Khasi, ki dang pule kot Khasi bad kim bna eiei shaphang kita ki dak thoh Jaintia. Ka ba kham lyngngoh shuh shuh ruh ka long ba ym don shuh u ‘ng’ la bujli da uwei pat, u ‘ï’ la bujli da u ‘y’ ha kita ki dak thoh ktien Jaintia. Kane ka lah ban pynkulmar ïa ki paid nongthoh khamtam ki khynnah skul. Nalor kata, u dak ba la bujli ha ka jaka u ‘ng’ u dei u dak-thoh-sur (phonetic alphabet) ba la buh thup ha kata ka thup ba ki khot kaka ba dei tang ïa ki dak Latin ba la pynkhreh ha ka spah snem ba khat khyndai ban pynbiang ryntih ïa ki sur jong kita ki dak thoh. Kata ka mut ba u dei u juh hi bad u ‘NG’ tangba shu kwah pynpher, hynrei ki dak thoh tynrai ba synlar (elementary alphabet) ki neh hi tang kito ki dak thoh naduh A haduh Z. Lada khmih ïa ki ktien shnong na ki thaiñ bapher ha Ri Khasi, ka ktien Amwi bad ktien Lyngam ka donkam sa u dak ‘cj’ katkum ka sur ba dei ban pule ïa ki kyntien. Lehse, lah ban don sa kiwei kiwei ruh ki ban donkam dak u ba biang thik katkum ka sur bad kata kan ym kut shuh lada shna thymmai.Na kata ka daw ha ka jaka ban shna thymmai ïa ki ktien shnat ne tien shnong, la dei pynban ban bynrap ha ki dak thoh ktien Khasi nalor ki ba la don A haduh Y. katkum ba la tih bniah na ki katto katne ki riewtbit ha ka ktien bad ka deiriti Khasi ki la ai jingmut ban kynthup ïa u ‘C’, ‘Cj’ bad ‘Oo’  ban kham biang bad lehse lah ban weng noh ïa u ‘G’ namar ba la biang da u ‘K’ ha manla ki kyntien. Ym lah ban batai ha ka ba ïadei ïa u C bad Cj namar lah ban ïeh ha kito ki riewtbit na ki trai shnong ba kren ka ktien Amwi bad Lyngam lane kiwei kiwei pat ki thaiñ. Kat kum ba la ïa syllok na Amwi ki don kum I Bah H H Mohrmen bad Bah Mankular Lamin Gashnga bad ym artatien ba dang byllai kiwei kiwei kiba tip. Ha thaiñ Lyngam kum I Bah Witting Mawsor bad khlem artatien byllai kiwei kiwei ruh.
title: Ki Dak-thoh-ktien Jaintia

content: Ka Khasi Students Union Mawkyrwat Circle mynta ka sngi ka 2 tarik u Nohprah ki la ïoh ban Pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka 1st Maitshaphrang under 16 Football Tournament 2023 kaba ki la pynlong ha Madan MDSA Nonglang South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u Bah Lambokstar Marngar uba dei u President ka KSU Sengkmie u la long kum u Kongsan bad u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem kum u Symbud Kongsan.Ki kynhun ïalehkai kiba la poi ha kaba kut jong kane ka lympung ïalehkai ki long ka Youngest boy FC pyrshah ïa ka Sakwang SC ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la i tynnad shisha ha kaba ka Youngest Boys FC kala long ka lah duh da kaba ka la ïoh ban thep 1 – 0 kol pyshah ïa ka Sakwang Sports Club. Ïa kane ka kol jong ka Youngest Boys FC la ïoh ban thep kol lyngba u Donal K. Kharai uba phong da ka jersy no 13 kata ha ka 22 Minutes.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ka jingkren kyntu kynpham bad ai mynsiem ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai da u Kongsan u Bah Lambokstar Marngar, u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem bad kumjuh na u bah Forwardman Nongrem u President ka KSU South West Khasi Hills ha ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang ki dkhot KSU Mawkyrwat Circle bad ki paidbah kiba la wan ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai jong ki baroh ar tylli ki kynhun.Ha kane ka sngi ka Youngest Boys FC kala ïoh khur ïa ka song pisa kaba T. 29 hajar ha ryngkat bad ka trophy bad ka Sakwang SC T.18 hajar ha ryngkat bad ka trophy.
title: Lahduh ka Youngest boy FC ha ka 1st Maitshaphrang under 16 FT 2023 jong ka KSU

content: U Dkhot ka liang pyrshah bad uwei na ki nongialam ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) na North Shillong u bah Adelbert Nongrum u la kyntu ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan pyndonkam noh ia ka jingkieng rim nar kaba don ha Umiam n a ka bynta ka jingiaid jong ki kali.U Bah Adelbert u la ong ba ka sorkar ka lah ban pyndonkam ia kane ka jingkieng nar kaba la rim na ka bynta  ban pyllait ia ka jingdheng kali namar mynta ka jingkieng Umiam ka dang hapdeng ka jingmoramot.UBah nongrum u la ong ba ha ki por ba mynshuwa ki kali ki ju iaid na shillong sha Guwahati lyngba katei ka jingkieng nar. Ha ka shithi ba une u nongmihkhmat u la thoh sha u Myntri ki kam pynmih bor ding iletrik u A.T Mondal u la iathuh ba u la leit jngoh hi dalade ia katei ka jingkieng rim hynrei u la ong namar ba ma u u dei uwei na ki riew paidbah bad ka long kaei kaei kaba eh ban ong eiei shaphang katei ka jingkieng bad kyntu ia ka MePGCL ba kin phah ia ki engineer jong ka ban pynlong ka jingwad jingtip shaphang katei ka jingkieng lada lah ne em ban pyndonkam ia ka.Une u nongmihkhmat u la ong ba ki paidbah ki la iakynduh ia ka jingeh kaba khraw khamtam ki nongpang bad kiwei ki nongleit jingleit kiba iaid lynti lyngba ka jingkieng Umiam ba mynta. Une u nongmihkhmat  u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ka rai kaba tyngeh  ban weng noh ia kane ka jingdheng kali lyngba ka jingkieng Umiam da kaba pyndonkam noh da kane ka jingkieng nar kaba rim.
title: Kyntu u bah Adelbert Nongrim ïa ka sorkar ban pyndonkam ïa ka jingkieng nar Umïam

content: Ha ka jingkhynra kaba la pynlong myn ha ka 1 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ki kynhun BSF ka Meghalaya ki la ïoh ban bat ïa kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u Registration Number ML 04 C 5133 kaba kit ïa ka pla shini kaba la buhrieh bha bad la thmu ban shalan ha ka dur bu ju shalan mar ka NBCC.Ïa kane ka trok la shah pynsangeh da ka kynhun Mobile Check Post (MCP) na Sonapur kaba thmu ban ïaid na ka surok Lumshnong – Sonapur pyrshah sha ka surok Lailong – Harai ha Harai ha East Jaintia Hills, Meghalaya.Ha ka jingtalasi ba la pynlong da ka MCP la lap ba kane ka trok ka la kit ïa ka pla shini kaba la buhrieh bha bad ba la thmu ban shalan ha ka dur ba ju shalan mar ka NBCC. Ka kynhun jong ka MCP ka la pynlong ïa ka jingwad bniah kaba la lam ruh haduh ban da lap bad ïoh kurup ïa ka pla shini kaba la buhrieh bha. La kem noh ïa u draibar jong kane ka trok na kadaw ba um don ki kot ki sla kiba biang.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra, ka kynhun BSF jong ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ban kurup ïa ki katto katne kiba kynthup ïa shibun ki mar kiba la thmu ban shalan be-aiñ bad kiba shongdor T. 28 Lak, da ka jingthmu ban shalan sha Bangladesh. Ïa kine ki briew kiba la ïoh kem bad ïa ki mar ba la ïoh ban kurup la aiti noh sha ka PS-Umkiang na ka bynta ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.
title: Ïoh kurup ki BSF ïa ka shini ba thmu shalan be-aiñ sha Bangladesh

content: U Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Jaintia Hills u la iathuh ba ki bor district kin pynlong ia ka jingpynshai paidbah halor ka jingpyndonkam ia ki kor thep vote EVM ha ki saw tylli ki constituency jong ka West Jaintia Hills District naduh ka 13 tarik  u Kylla lyngkot. U Deputy Commissioner u la iathuh ruh ba ki bor district kin pyndonkam ia kawei ka kali na ka bynta ka jingai jingpynshai paidbah ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyndonkam ia ki EVM, bad kane kan sdang noh shen.U DC u la ong ba ki paidbah kiba kwah ban ioh jingtip shaphang kane ki lah ban wan sha ka ophis jong u DC naduh ka 10:00 AM haduh  1:00 PM ban ioh ia ki jingpynshai ba bniah ia kiba yn ai ia ki BLO bad ki nongtrei jong ka ophis DC.
title: Yn ai jingpynshai ka WJHD kumno ban pyndonkam ïa ki kor EVM

content: La rakhe ia ka ka sngi jong kiba duna dkhot met shityllup ka pyrthei-2023. Ka phang pdeng jong kane ka sngi ka long ban ia trei lang ban kot sha kata ka thong ban iarap ia kiba duna dkhot met.Ia kane ka prokram la pyllong ha  Bhoi Rymbong C & RD Block Hall, Bhoirymbong. Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u BDO, Bhoirymbong u Bah P. Mukhim, u la iaroh ia ka seng ba ka la lah ban pynlong ia kane ka programme ban pynpaw ia ka jingailad ia kiba duna dkhot met ba kin wanrah ia ka jingpynshai paidbah ban pynsngewthuh ia kito kiba duna dkhot met ba ki don ia ka hok ha baroh ki bynta ym dei ban shah leh bein ne ibein bad leh klet noh ia ki.
title: Rakhe ka Bhoi Rymbong C & RD ïa ka sngi kiba duna dkhot met ha pyrthei-2023

content: Ka seng sain hima sima Hill State People Democratic Party kaba la rim duh ha Meghalaya, ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynkhlain bad pyniar ia ka jngtrei kam jong kane ka seng, ym tang ha Khasi Hills.Hynrei, ha Jaintia Hills ru kum juh. Ha kaba dei bad kane, ka HSPDP ka la pynlong ia ka jngialang ha Orchid, Thadlaskein ha West Jaintia Hills District, la jied ia u Bah Wanshwa Nongtdu kum u President bad ia u Bah One Way Talang kum u General Secretary jong ka HSPDP jong ka Jaintia Hills.U President jong ka HSPDP ha Meghalaya, u Bah  K.P. Pangniang u la iathuh ba ia kane ka seng sain hima sima la seng ha ka snem 1968, shuwa ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan ioh la ka jong ka jylla bapura. U Bah Pangniang u la iathuh ba kane ka seng ka dei ba peit ia ka bha ka miat jong ki riew lum.
title: Sdang  pynkhlaiñ ka HSPDP ha Jaiñtia Hills

content: U nongmih khmat ka BJP na Shillong constituency bad uba long ruh u chairman of the Meghalaya Tourism Development Corporation (MTDC) Sanbor Shullai u la pynpaw ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ki skim ha la ka constituency.Haba kren bad ki nongthoh khubor u Shullai u la iathuh ba lyngba ka Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT) skim ki briew jong ka South Shillong yn sa lah ban pynpoi um ha ki ing jong ki lyngba ka PHE bad Shillong Municipal Board.U Shullai u la ong ba kane ka jingslem ban pyntreikam ia kane ka skim ka dei na ka daw ba slem ban ioh ia ka no objection certificate (NOC) na ka tnad khlaw Forest department khamtam haba ki la leit peit ki la lap ba ka tyllong um ka don hapdeng khlaw.U Shullai u la iatuh ruh ba ia ka pisa ba long haduh 34 crore la dep ban bei na ka bynta kane ka project kaba hap hapoh ka tnad PWD khamtam  lada ka dei ban maramot lane shna ia ki surok rim ha Lumparing, Kenches Trace bad Rilbong.
title: Yn ïoh um shuh ka South Shillong na ka Scheme AMRUT: Sanbor Shullai

content: Ka tnad Krishi Vigyan Kendra jong ka KVK Imphal kaba don ha  jong ka South Garo Hills,  ka la pynlong ia ka jingaijinghikai ban pyndonkam ia ki kor ki bor ka juk mynta ban pyndonkam ha pdeng ki jylla bapher jong ka ri India.Ia kane ka jingaijinghikai la lam khmat da u Dr Rupam Bhattacharjya uba la pynjanai ia lade ha ki kam ri jingri jong ka KVK South Garo Hills, haduh ka College of Veterinary Sciences, AAU, Khanapara, Assamand Assam Livestock and Poultry Corporation (ALPCo), Guwahati, Assam ba la kyrshan pisa da ka NABARD kaba pyntreikam ia ka skim Capacity Building for Adoption of Tecnology(CAT).Ka jingthmu jong kane ka programme ka long ban iarap ia ki nongiashim bynta na kylleng ka ri India ba kin ioh ban ia phylliew jingmut hapdeng jong ki, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyndonkam ia ki kor ki bor jingstad kiba mynta ha ka liang ka rep ka riang bad ka ri jing ri.
title: Ai jinghikai ka tnad KVK ha South Garo Hills

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union Laban Circle ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Free Medical Camp mynta ka 2 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ha Kynjat Phutbol kaba la sdang naduh 10 baje mynstep haduh 3 baje nohphai sngi.Ha kane ka sngi, la ïoh ban ai jingsumar ïa ki 198 ngut ki briew kiba kynthup ïa ki khyllung, longkmie bad rangbah kiba la wan sha kane ka Medical Camp ba la pynïaid da ka Seng.Ki doktor kiba la ïa don ryngkat ha kane ka sngi ka kynthup ïa i Dr. L. Rynjah na Laban Dispensary, Dr. B. R. Garod, na Lumparing UPHC, Dr. K. Nongbri (Pediatrics) na Children Hospital, Dr. A. Dkhar (ENT) na Robert Hospital, Dr. T. Syngkon bad Dr. A. Lyngdoh (Dentist) na Titanium Dental Health Care bad ki doktor napoh Bansara Eye Clinic.Ha kane ka sngi la don ryngkat lang ruh ki Lab Assistant na ka Dr. Lal Path Labs kiba la ïarap ban test shini (diabetes), cholesterol, thyroid, uric acid bad kiwei kiwei ki test kiba ki paidbah ki donkam.Ka Seng ka pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh kaba khraw ïa baroh ki doktor, ki nurse, asha, pharmacist, lab technician, ANM, DEO kiba la ;adon ryngkat ha kane ka sngi ban ai ïa ka jingshakri kaba pura sha ki paradoh parasnam ha kaba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah.
title: Haduh198 ngut poi ki paidbah sha ka Medical Camp ba la pynïaid da ka KSU Laban Circle

content: Ka National Stock Exchange, kaba ka Headquarter jong ka dei na Mumbai ka la pyllong ia ka jingiaphylliew jingmut halor ka phang Financial Market ha Vivanta Hotel ha Shillong. Ha kane ka jingiaphylliew jingmut la ioh ban iakren bad batai shaphang ka share market, stock, bonds bad kumno ban ia shim bynta ha kane ka phang.
title: Pyllong jingïamir jingmut ka National Stock Exchange ha Shillong

content: Ka Khasi Students Union Mawkyrwat Circle mynta ka sngi ka 2 tarik u Nohprah kila ioh ban Pynhap pyrda noh ia ka 1st Maitshaphrang under 16 Football Tournament 2023 kaba kila pynlong ha Madan MDSA Nonglang South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u bah, Lambokstar Marngar president KSU Sengkmie u la long kum u kongsan bad u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem kum u symbud kongsan.Ki kynhun ialehkai kiba la poi ha kaba kut jong kane ka lympung ialehkai ki long ka Youngest boy FC pyrshah ia ka Sakwang SC ha ka jing ialehkai kaba la i tynnad shisha ha kaba ka Youngest Boys FC kala long ka lah duh da kaba ka la ioh ban thep 1 — 0 kol pyshah ia ka Sakwang Sports Club .Ia kane ka kol jong ka Youngest Boys FC la ioh ban thep kol lyngba u Donal K.Kharai jersy no 13 ka ta ha ka 22 Minutes.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ka jing kren kyntu kynpham bad ai mynsiem ia ki khynnah ialehkai da u Kong san bah Lambokstar Marngar, Bah Kitborlang Nongrem bad kumjuh na u bah Forwardman Nongrem President KSU South West Khasi Hills ha ryngkat da ka jing ia donlang ki dkhot KSU Mawkyrwat Circle bad ki paidbah kiba la wan ban ai jing kyrshan ia ki khynnah ialehkai jong ki baroh ar tylli ki kynhun.Ha kane ka sngi ka Youngest Boys FC kala ioh khur ia ka song pisa kaba T.29 hajar tyngka ha ryngkat bad ka trophy bad ka Sakwang SC T.18 hajar tyngka ha ryngkat bad ka trophy.
title: Lahduh ka Youngest boy FC haka 1st Maitshaphrang under 16 FT 2023 jong ka KSU.

content: U khlur ïalehkai phutbol ba paw na ka jylla uba la mih khmat ruh ia ka India sha ki rynsan bapher u la ioh ia ka kabu ban plie pyrda ia ka shlem ai jinghikai phutbol ha ka jingiatreilang ka “El Elyon Institute & Nangkyrsiew Thiah Player Youth Club” ka Ri Bhoi Football Coaching Centre (Academy) ha ka jingiadon lang u Bah Mayral Born Syiem, MLA Nongpoh Constituency, RB Shadap President ka RBDSA, Wanphrang Sumer Assistant Rangbah Shnong Pahamsyiem ki paidbah lem bad ki dkhot jong ka El Elyon Institute.Ha ka jingkren lamphang na ki nongialam jong ka El Elyon, ki la pynshai ba ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia kane ka shlem ka long ban sei bad kyntiew ia ka sap jong ki khynnah ryngkat ka jingiarap jong ki coach.Ha kane ka shlem la phiah h ki 5 bynta, kata ha ka thup U-16, U-14, U-12, U-10 and U-8 kynthei bad shynrang.Na ka liang u MLA, u la ai ka jingiaroh halor ka jinglah ban pynurlong ia kane ka thong da ka jingshimkhia lyngba kine ki 2 tylli ki kynhun “Kane kan wanrah ia ka rukom ïalehkai phutbol sha kawei pat la kyrdan namar lada phi hikai naduh dang khynnah kin iaid ha kato ka lynti bad bud ruh ia ki kumba ka long. Nga kyrpad ia ki coach ba kin ym hikai tang ban ïalehkai phutbol hynrei hynrei ia ka rukom im kaba beit ba kin bud ia ki man ka sngi kum ki nongïalehkai bad ban ym klet ruh ia ki jingpule”.Kum u kongsan, na ka liang u Bah Eugeneson u la pynpaw ia ka jinglong la kloi ban kyrshan bad iarap ia ki khynnah ha ka kam ïalehkai phutbol “Nga lah ban iohi ia ka lawei ba phyrnai ha ka kam ïalehkai phutbol ha kane ka jylla jong ngi hynrei ki nongïalehkai ki dei ban pynleit jingmut bad trei shitom bad ba yn ym don mano mano ban pynbakla noh.“Ngi don shibun ki rangïalehkai na kane ka jylla kiba la ïalehkai shabar jylla ha ka rta kaba 16 snem shapoh hynrei tang 3 ngut kiba la ïoh ïalehkai na ka bynta ka ri India (Senior), namar kata donkam bha ban pynleit jingmut ha ka jingthmu jong phi bad ban aitilut ialade na ka bynta ka lawei kum u nongïalehkai phutbol” ong u Bah Eugene.
title: Plie u Bah Eugeneson Lyngdoh ïa ka shlem phutbol na ka bynta ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi

content: Ka Meghalaya State Weightlifting Association kaba khmih ruh ia ka kam ïalehkai rahnar lane Weightlifting ha ka jylla, ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakob rah nar ba shi sngi, kata ha ka 02 tarik Nohprah ia kaba la tip kum ka 2nd State Weightlifting Championship ha madan NSCA Pahamsyiem, Nongpoh.Ha kane ka lympung la wan ban ïashim bynta da ki kynthei bad shynrang na kylleng ka jylla ha ki thup bapher bapher.U President ka Ribhoi Youth Federation, Bah Bipul Thangkhiew, u la wan ban plie pyrda ia kane ka lympung katba u Bah Tongper (ADC Ri Bhoi District) u la wan ban pynhap pyrda ia kane ka jingïalehkai. Kiwei pat kiba la ia don lang ki kynthup ia u Bah Ferdynald Kharkamni, President KSU-NKHD, Bah Markus Marten, President HNYF Northern Region, Bah FK Kharwanlang, Vice President Meghalaya Weightlifting Association, Bah Donald Rymbai, President MWA, Bah Ryntathiang, Chairman PFC, MSOA bad kiwei kiwei.Ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ban sam ia ki takma bad ki thup sah kynmaw na ka bynta ki nongjop ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher. U Bah Anantasius Ryngdongsngi uba dei ruh uwei na ki nongïalehkai ba paw ka jylla u la khur bun tylli ki khusnam bad lah ruh ban rah haduh 120 kilo.
title: Paw ki sap lyngba ka jingpynlong ïa ka State Weightlifting Championship ha Nongpoh

content: Ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la pynkhreh ban phla ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura parliamentary seat mynta u bnai.Ka jingïakren ba dang ïaid ha ka jingïalang bad ki nongïalam na ki district bapher bapher jong ka Ri Lum Khasi bad Jaintia, ka la don ka jingthmu ban pynleit jingmut ïa ki lai ngut ki nongïakhun kum ki kyrtong, kynthup ïa u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, u dkhot barim ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC); u Bah DLR Nonglait, u President jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society (KAS); bad u Bah PT Sawkmie, uba dei u nongthaw aiñ barim ka Mawlai.Ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingïakren na ki nongïalam jong ki district, shen, yn sa phah sha ka state election committee (SEC), kaba yn sa rai halor ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura parliamentary seat.U Jemino Mawthoh, uba dei u general secretary ka seng UDP, u la ong ba ïa ka jingïakren ban pynkut ha ka jingïalang, yn sa pyndep noh ha ka taïew ban wan. U la ong ba ka SEC kan sa khmih na ka jubab ban ïoh na ki nongïalam jong ka seng hashwa ban shim ïa kano kano ka rai ba khatduh.“Ïa ka kaiphod jong ka jingïakren ha katei ka jingïalang bad ki nongïalam jong ki district bapher bapher, yn sa phah sha ka SEC,” ong u Jemino katba dang bynrap, “Ngim lah ban shim rai ïa kaei kaei halor kane, ïa mynta, hynrei ka SEC kan sa khmih ïa ki jingpeit bad ka jingai jingmut jong ki nongïalam ka seng bad ban sa shim ïa ka rai.”Katba dang peit halor kitei baroh, u Mawthoh u la pynthikna ba ka seng kan sa pynbna hi ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka ilekshon Lok Sabha hapoh une u bnai.Kaba bud da ka jingïalang jong ka SEC, ka jingthmu jong ka seng UDP ban ïakren shaphang ka jingtyrwa bad ka seng Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) hapoh ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA). Baroh ar tylli kitei ki seng ki long kiba ïatreilang ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ka ilekshon LS.U Mawthoh u la pynshai ba ka HSPDP ka la pynsah teng ïa ka jingjied ban pynmih ïa katei ka jingtyrwa bad ka rai ba la dep lum, kaba yn sa pynpoi lang da kine ki ar tylli ki seng ba jied ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong parliamentary seat.
title: Pynkhreh ka UDP ban phla shaphang ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura seat mynta u bnai

content: :Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia Garo People’s  FKJGP  South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi haba ai jingkren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ophis treikam jong ka seng  ha Mawkyrwat ki la ai ka jingkhublei bad  jingsngewnguh ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah jong ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u ba dei ruh u Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnad PWD kumjuh ruh ïa u Deputy Commissioner South West Khasi Hills u Bah T. Lyngwa, u MLA ka Ranikor Bah Pius Marweiñ bad ïa ki ophisar jong ka tnad PWD bad jong ka NHIDCL ba myn ha ka 30 tarik u Naiwieng ,2023 ki la leit jurip hi da la ki jong ki khmat ïa ka Surok 2-Lane na jingkieng Borbasing Ranikor kaba don 4 kms kaba la shna pynrit noh sha ka Intermediate Road.Halor kane ka bynta na ka liang u Bah Kenesjune L. Nonglait uba dei u President ka FKJGP South West Khasi Hills District ba hadien ba ki la ïohi ha ki lad pathai khubor halor ka jingleit jurip ïa katei ka surok kim pat sngew hun ban ïohi ïa ki jingkular tang  ha ki lad phathai khubor da kaba kyntu ba ïa kaei ba ki la dep jurip bad kular ha katei ka sngi ba ïa kane ka surok dei ban shna noh da ka 2-Lane ym shuh da ka Intermediate Road. Kyrmen skhem ba kan urlong shisha bad na ka liang ka seng kan ïai budien halor kane ka surok kumba u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la kular.Ha kane ka sngi  la ïa donlang ruh u Bah Cambel Jyrwa uba dei u Assistant General Secretary, u Bah Enborsing Sing Syiemiong uba dei u Information Secretary ka FKJGP South West Khasi Hills bad kiwei kiwei de.
title: Sngewnguh ka FKJGP ïa u Bah Prestone Tyngsong ban pynkylla 2-Lane ïa ka surok na Borbasing sha Alikwareng

content: U Nigel Hopkins P Marak, uba dei u nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya, u la pyndep ïa ka 145th course na ka National Defence Academy (NDA) ha ka 30 tarik, Naiwieng 2023, u la dep ïashim bynta ha ka jingïaid parade ba la pynlong da ka military grandeur bad uba la pynkhreh ban bat ïa ka kyrdan kum u Lieutenant ha ka Indian Army ha u Nohprah 2024.Ka President jong ka India, ka Droupadi Murmu, ka la don ha ka Passing Out Parade kum ka nongshah khot sngewbha bad ka reviewing officer. Katei ka parade ka long kum ka bynta jong ka prokram ba dei shaphang ka training ba lai snem ha NDA Khadakvasla.Ha ka jingithuh halor ka jingjop jong u ha kane ka kyrdan pule, u Nigel Hopkins P Marak u la pyndep ïa la kyrdan pule jong ka B.Sc na Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU). Kane ka la bud da ka training ba la neh shi snem ha ka Indian Military Academy (IMA) ha Dehradun.
title: Yn bat ïa ka kyrdan Lieutenant ha ka Indian Army u samla na Meghalaya

content: Myn ha ka 26 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024 la rakhe ïa ka jingdap 75 snem ka jingïoh Republic ha South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u Myntri ka tnad Revenue & Disaster Department jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la pynher ïa ka Lama ka Ri bad shim ïa ka Rashtriya Salute jong ka kynhun parade kaba kynthup naduh ki pulit,  ki NCC haduh ki khynnah skul ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 75 snem jong ka Republic Day ha ka rukom kaba ishongkun ba la pynlong ha phyllaw Ïingskul jong ka Nativity Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat.Ha kane ka sngi ki la don  kumba 6 tylli ki skul ki la ïashim bynta ha ka March Past bad 8 tylli ki Department ki la ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakop pyni ïa ki Tableau.La pynshongshit shuh shuh ïa kane ka sngi da ka Cultural Programme, ka jingsam jingbam da ka Officers’ Club, Mawkyrwat sha ki khunswet jong ka Hope Orphanage.Ha kane ka jingrakhe la wan ban ïa sakhi lang da ki nongtrei sorkar, ki khynnah skul ryngkat ki nongshong shnong jong ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block.
title: Wan pynher Lama u Kyrmen Shylla na ka bynta ka 75 Republic Day ha Mawkyrwat

content: Ha ka sngi rakhe ïa ka sngi laitluid ka ri ne ka Republic Day kha ka 26 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ka la don ka jing jia accident kaba i shyrkhei ha Pahamrioh, Ri Bhoi District, ha kaba  kawei ka trok kaba don ïa u Registration Number AS 01 MC 8136 kaba la pynher stet bha  ka la leit tynrah ïa ar tylli ki kali, kawei ka Auto kaba don ïa u Registration Number ML 10 C 9558 bad kawei ka Eco kaba don ïa u Registration Number ML 10 B 8800.Ha katei ka jingjia u nongñiah ka Eco, uba la tip kyrteng kum u Anshu Kumar, uba la don 20 snem karta u la ïap hashen, katba u nongñiah ka Auto u la mynsaw jur bad la pynkit noh ïa u sha Shillong. Katba u nongñiah jong ka Trok u la phet krad noh na katei ka jaka.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïoh la ong ba kane ka Eco bad ka Auto ki dang ïeng ha ka jaka sait kali kaba don hapdeng ka surok NH 6, katei ka trok kaba la wan na Shillong ban leit sha Guwahati ka la leit ban tynrah ïa kitei ki kali.Ki pulit ka Nongpoh ki la shim khia halor katei ka jingjia bad ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit halor kane.
title: Ïap uwei, mynsaw uwei na ka jingtynrah kali ha Pahamrioh

content: Ki  Shnong 18 Mile kaba hap hapoh jong ka  South West Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat bad ka Seng longkmie ki la ïa mih paidbah  ban pynkhuid ïa ki wah kiba don ha shilynter jong ka shnong bad ruh ïa ki pung shnong kum ki jaka sum ha kaba ki la lap shibun ki plastic, ki bilor ba naka liang ki paidbah kiba  leit ba wan ha shilynter kane ka surok ki ju mlien ban pret pathar ïa ki plastic, ki bilor bad kiwei kiwei kiba pynjakhlia bad don ruh ki  briew kiba ju wan bam khana ha kine ki jaka.Namar kata na ka liang ki bor shnong lyngba u Bah Fronstar Mawlein uba dei u Myntri shnong ka 18 Mile ha ryngkat ki seng longkmie ka Kong Diana Rngaid  ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew diaw halor kane ka bynta ba la lap shibun ki bilor, ki plastic na ka jingbym patiaw ki briew ban bret klumar ïa ki jakhlia bad khnang ban lait na ki jaboh ka Mei mariang, ka shnong, ka thaw, ki wahduid kiba don hapoh shnong ki la buh ka jingmaham ba tyngeh ba nangne shakhmat kin ym shah shuh ïa kino kino ki briew kiba wan bam khana, sait kali ne ban bret jakhlia ha kine ki wah hapoh jong ka shnong 18 Mile bad ïa kane la shim ïa ka rai  hadien ba ki la dep ban pynkhuid noh ïa kine ki wah da kaba ki la thoh ruh da ki jingmaham  bad lada ka shnong kan dang lap ïa ki briew kiba dang pynkheiñ ka shnong kan sa pynshitom kat kum ki kyndon aiñ jong ka shnong, ong u Bah Frontstar Mawlein.
title: Maham ka shnong 18 Mile ïa ki briew kiba ju wan bret bad leh jakhlia ha ki wah

content: U nongmihkhmat jong ka South Shillong Constituency, u Bah Sanbor Shullai u la buh ia ki mawnongrim na ka bynta bun tylli ki project ia kaba yn pyntrei kam hapohka General State Scheme 2022-23 on January 27, 2024. Ia kine ki project la ai jingmut da u Bah Sanbor Shullai bad pdiang ruh da ka tnad PWD bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya. Kine ki project kin kyntiew ia ka roi ka par jong katei ka constituency.Kawei na kine ki project ka dei ka jingshna pynheh bad jingsiang rong ia ka surom hapdeng  Rilbong Community Hall bad Umshyrpi Bridge in Rilbong, Shillong ha ka jinglut kaba T.4,35,56,000/-. Kawei pat ka project ka dei ka jingshna ia ka surok ka ban pyniasnoh ia ka surok PWD lyngba ka Mynsain Forest Road sha iingshong iingsah jong u Deb Das Chakraborty ha Upper Lumparing,Shillong, ha ka jinglut kaba T. 1,38,70,000. Additionally, a motorable feeder road from the existing PWD Road via the residence of Dr Merybell up to the residence of Rolet Rynjah and others at Madan Laban, Shillong, has been sanctioned with an amount of Rs.1,77,83,000/-. Kawei pat ka project ka dei na ka bynta ka jingroi ia ka Lumoparing ha ka jinglut kaba T. 82,81,000/- Kane ka kam pynroi ka kynthup ia ka jingshna ia ka surok, ka jingshna ia ka kynroh jong ka Sanbor Shullai Road bad kiwei.Kawei pat ka project ka dei ka jingshna shuh shuh ia ka surok PWD maduh Top Um shaduh Block (A), Kynjat Phutbol ha ka jinglut kaba T. 63,13,000/- . Kawei pat ka project ka dei ka jingshna ia ki muri lyngba ka surok PWD na Glorymai (Laban) sha St. John’s, Madan Laban ha ka jinglut kaba T. 55,29,000/-. Kawei pat ka project ka dei ka jingshna ia ka surok PWD ban iaid kali nalor ka wahduid naduh ka kshaid jong u  (L) Q. Kharwanlang shaduh ka jingkieng PWD ha Lower Lumparing (Dhobi Ghat) ha ka jinglut kaba T.1,14,41,000.Kawei pat ka project ka dei ka jingshna ia ka muri ha Kench’s Trace Road na Bishnupur Taxi Stand sha Bathesda Hospital, Upper Kench’s Trace ha ka jinglut kaba T. 2,41,50,600/- Kawei pat ka project ka kynthup ia ka jingshna ia ka rurok nakhmat jong ka Art & Culture ha Rilbong sha Umshyrpi PWD Road, Rilbong ha ka jinglut kaba T. 1,98,30,700. Nalor kitei ki project, kawei pat ka jingshna ka long ka jingshna ia ka surok dewbilat ban iaid kali na Keating Road sha ki bynta jongka Lady Kean college ha ka jinglut kaba  T. 14,18,200/-. Ki jinglut baroh jong kine ki jingtei ka kot sha ka T.15,21,72,500/- bad ioh ruh iaka jingmang pisa na ka Sorkar.
title: Buh mawnongrim u Sanbor Shullai ïa ki project ba T.15,21,72,500/- ïa ka South Shillong Constituency

content: Ban pynsngewthuh paidbah ia ka lyngkot jong ki shipai para khappud, ka Border Security Force Meghalaya ka la pyllong ia ka prokram ai jingiarap ia ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha ki khappud jong ka Meghalaya bad Bangladesh, kynthup ruh ia ka jingai jingsumar ia ki nongpang bad ka jingai dawai ei.Ia kane ka prokram la pyllong jong ki jaka khappud jong ka Meghalaya bad Bangladesh ha kaba kine ki shipai ki don ki jaka pahara jong ki. Ia kane ka prokram la pyllong hapoh ka jingpeit jong u BSF Commandant, u Vinod Kumar Thapliya. Ha kane ka prokram, ki doktor jong ka BSF Meghalaya, ki la pyllong ia ki jingeksamin ia ki nongpang bad jingaidawai ei ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Laijori, Kuliang and Sankhat.Haduh 300 ngut kine ki nongshong ha ki khappud jong ka India bad Bangladesh ki la ioh ia ki jingsumar khlem kano kano ka jingsiew. Ha kane ka prokram la ioh ruh ban ai ia ki 11 tylli ki kor suhjain ia ki nongshong shnong kynthei jong ka Umkiang, Dona, Laijuri bad Huroi kiba hap hapoph ka East Jaintia Hills district jong ka Meghalaya. Ha kane ka prokran la ki shipai pahara khappud jong ka BSF Meghalaya ki la ioh ruh ban sam ia ki tiar jingialehkai sha ki khynnah skul. Ka BSF Meghalaya ka shim ruh ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban trei na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki paidbah nongshong ha ki jaka khappud jongka Meghalaya bad Bangladesh.
title: Ai jingsumar bad dawai ei ki shipai paraha khappud BSF Meghalaya

content: Ha kawei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih, uwei u samla briew u la khlad noh hashen hadien ba u la hap shapoh ka riat bah riat san kaba don da ki spah phut shapoh, katba u dang ïa leit leh sngewbha bad la u paralok hapoh kawei ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei kaba la bna nam bha kaba don ha ka shnong Mawmluh, Sohra.Katkum ka jingtip ba la ïoh lum, la ïathuh ba kane ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ka la jia ha ka por kumba 4 baje eiei jong ka janmiet ka 28 tarik Kyllalyngkot, ha kaba u wei u samla ba la tip kyrteng kum u Bankynmaw Lyngdoh Mairang, 23 snem karta uba shong basah ha Nongmynsong East Khasi Hills District, u la khlad noh hashen hadien ba u la hap shapoh ka riat bah kaba don ha ka shnong Mawmluh ha Sohra.La ïathuh ruh, ba u ne u samla uba la khlad noh u dei uba trei bylla sngi hapoh kawei ka Resort kaba la tip kum ka Pala Resort, bad ha kane ka sngi ba la jia kane ka jingjia kaba sngewsih, u la leit kai lang bad u wei u paralok jong u da ka thuk thuk sha katei ka jaka jngohkai kaba don ha Mawmluh, Sohra.La ïoh jingtip ruh, ba tang mar ïa ïoh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia, na ka liang ki nongshong shnong ha ryngkat ki nongïalam shnong ka Mawmluh ki la leit mareh bran bran sha katei ka jaka bad ban pyntip sha ki bor pulit ka Sohra SDPO kiba marmar ki la hiar sha kane ka jaka ha ryngkat ki bor pulit ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Dei hadien ka jingïakhun kaba la neh katto katne kynta, namar ka jingjylliew ka riat bad ki jingeh ban hiar sha katei ka riat ki bor pulit ka Sohra bad ka jingïarap lang na ki bor pynïaid shnong ki la lah ban sei ïa ka met jong une u samla uba la khlad noh bad ban rah sha Sohra CHC ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit halor kane ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.
title: Ïap hashen u samla hadien ba hap shapoh ka riat bah ha Mawmluh, Sohra

content: U nongialam rangbah jong ka BJP bad Myntri ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek u la ioh pdiang ia ka khusnam Dadasaheb Phalke Award.U Bah Hek uba long u Myntri ka tnad jingri jingdup jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u la ioh ban pdiang ia kane ka khusnam na u Myntri Khynnah jong ka tnad Social Justice, u Ramdas Athawale ha ka jingpynkup burom ba la pyllong ha NDMC Auditorium,Jantar Mantar, New Delhi ha kaba la don lang kiwei ki heh Sorkar. Iakane ka khusnam la ai ha u Bah Hek, kum ka jingithuh ia u synniang ba une u nongmihkhmat ula noh ban shakri ia ki nongshong shnong jong kaMeghalaya bad ia ka ri hi baroh kawei.U Bah Hek uba la kyndit ban ioh pdiang ia katei ka khusnam kaba long ka burom kaba khraw ia ka Meghalaya, ula ong ba kane ka jingioh pdiang ia ka khusnam ka long kaba burom kaba khraw na ka bynta jong u bad kane kan nang ai mynsiem shuh shuh ia u ba un nang trei kham bha shuh na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ka Meghalaya bad jong ka ri hi baroh kawei. U Bah Alexander Laloo Hek la long u nongmihkhmat mynta la arphew snem kynthih haduh kine ki sngi.
title: Ioh pdiang u Myntri AL Hek ïa ka khusnam Dadasaheb Phalke Award

content: U nongïalam ba rangbah ka BJP, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek uba long ruh u Myntri ka tnad jingri jingdup, u la ïoh pdiang ïa ka Dadasaheb Phalke Award.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, u Bah Hek u la ïathuh ba ïa kane ka khusnam la ai tang ïa ki kompani ba pynmih phlim. Hynrei, ïa kane ka jingai khusnam la nangpynïar shuh shuh da kaba ai ruh ïa kiwei Myntri bad ki dkhot jong ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ bad ïa ki nongmihkhmat jong ki Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ na ka bynta ka jingnoh synñiang na ka bynta ka imlang sahlang.U Bah Hek u la ïoh ban pdiang ïa katei ka khusnam na ka bynta ka jingtbit jong ka jinglong Myntri bad ruh kum ka jingithuh ïa u Bah Hek uba la noh ïa u synniang baradbah na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya bad jong ka ri hi baroh kawei.Ïa kane ka khusnam la ai ïa u Bah Hek da u Myntri Khynnah jong ka Sorkar Kmie uba dei peit ïa ka tnad Social Justice, u Ramdas Athawale ha ka jingpynkup burom kaba la pyllong ha NDMC Auditorium, Jantar Man, New Delhi
title: Ïoh pdiang u Bah Hek ïa ka khusnam “Dadasaheb Phalke Award”

content: Ki nongshong shnong ki la ud pyrshah ïa ka jingshah ïaid ïa ki trok ki bakit palat pud lyngba ka surok Umrit kaba pynïasoh bad ka shnong Pahammawlein bad Umling lyngba ka jyngkieng Lailad. Ki nongshong shnong ki la ong ruh ba ki sngewkhia jingmut la kane jyngkieng ka lah ban shan ïa ka jingïaid jong kitei ki trok kiba khia bad i kum ba kan kylla.La ong ruh ba ka jingïaid jong kine ki trok ki bakhia bad suki haduh katta katta ha ka por mynmiet, ka la pynlong ïa ki nongshong shnong ban don ka jingsuba jur ïa katei ki trok tip kan jia aiu.Don napdeng jong ki, kiba la ong ba kin hap ban leh eiei ïa kane. Ki nongshong shnong jong kitei ki jaka ki la ong ruh ba ka jingsawa kaba mih na ka jingïaid jong kine ki trok ha ka por mynmiet, ka la pynthud ïa ka thiah ka dem jong ki nongshong shnong. Kine ki nongshong shnong ki la ong ruh ba lada kane ka jyngkieng kan julor, ka jingeh bakhraw ka ban ap kan long ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Ri Bhoi Sepngi.Ki nongshong shong ki la ong ruh ba wat lada ka surok kaba lam sha Patharkhmah ka long kaba bha, hynrei ki don pat ka jingsheptieng bad ka jingshong syier ïoh ba ka jyngkieng Lailad  kan julor noh lada shah ïa ki trok ban ïaid ryngkat bad ki jingkit kiba khia tang 9 ton namar kane ka jingïaid jong ki trok ki bakit palat pud.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka jingeh, ki nongshong shnong ki la kyntu ïa ki bor Sorkar Districtban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit bad ban khang noh ïa ka jingïaid jong ki ha ka por mynmiet.
title: Sngewkhia ki nongshong ba ïaid ki trok ba kit palat pud lyngba ka jyngkieng Laidlad

content: Ki rangbah ka Seng Khasi ki la ïoh ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïalang ba phra jong ka “International Conference of World Elders” ha Dibrugarh, Assam ha kaba la pynlong da ka ICCS naduh ka 28 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024 bad ban pynkut pat haduh ka 1 tarik u Rymphang, 2024.Kane ka jingïalang ka long ban kyntiew ïa la lariti bad ka jingïatrei lang hapdeng ki rangbah nian bad kiwei ki rangbah ba ïa wad lad wad lynti kumno ban pynneh ïa ka bha ka miat. Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïa shim bynta da ki 300 ngut ki riew rangbah bad nongïalam niam na ki 33 tylli ki ri jong ka pyrthei kumno ban pyndonkam ïa ka jingstad jong ki longshuwa manshuwa ban wanrah ïa ka jingshongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ka jingïaburom markylliang ha pyrthei.Ka Seng Khasi ka la long kaba donbok ha kane ka bynta, ha kaba ka ïoh ban pyni sha ka pyrthei ïa ka jingngeit tynrai jong ka jaitbynriew, ka jingdon ïa la ka jong ka lariti da kaba pyni ïa “Ka Shad Thma” ha kaba la shim bynta da ki samla jong ka Seng Khasi Seng Kmie
title: Shim bynta ki Rangbah ka Seng Khasi ha ka “International Conference of World Elders”

content: Ka Dorbar Shnong Umbuda ka la pynkup burom ia ki dkhot jong ka kiba la ai ia ka jingshakri jong ki haduh 25 snem. U Rangbah Shnong bamynta bad u Chief  Executive Member ba mynshuwa jong ka Khasi Autonomous District Council, u Bah C.B. Syiem u la long uwei na kiba la shah pynkup burom ha ka Sngi Saitjain. Ha kane ka jingpynkup burom la ia shim bynta ruh da u Bah Raynold Kharkamni uba long u Vice-Chairman jong ka Meghalaya State Planning Board kum u Kongsan ha kaba la don lang ruh u Bah B.B. Makdoh uba long u Shongknor jong ka Synjuk Ki Dorbar Shnong Ri Bhoi ryngkat bad ki nongialam jong ka KSU, FKJGP, HNYF bad kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi la don ruh ia ka jingiakynduh lang bad ka jinglehkmen Snem Thymmai, kaba kynthup ia ka rwai ka siaw, ka put ka tem bad jingshad. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Rangbah Shnong ka Umbuda, u Bah C.B. Syiem u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia baroh kito kiba la ia shim bynta. Ia  ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong la seng la buh bad trei kam naduh ka snem 1998. Kiba bun na ki dkhot jong ka ki dang dei ki dkhot haduh mynta bad ki dang iai bteng ia ki jingshakri jong ki ia ka shnong, la iathuh u Bah C.B. Syiem.
title: Pynkupburom ka Dorbar Shnong Umbuda ïa kiba la shakri arphewsan snem

content: U nongïalam ka BJP bad uba dei ruh u Myntri sorkar, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek myn ha ka 29 tarik kyllalyngkot 2024 , u la pynpaw ïa ka jingkloi ban ïakhun ïa ka MP election na Shillong Parliamentary Seat , ka ban sa long shen na ka party BJP.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u bah Hek u la ong “Ngam ong ban nga dei tang ma nga uta u kyrtong uba biang ban ïakhun na Shillong parliamentary seats hynrei lada ka party ka kwah ba ngan ïakhun, ngan nym ong em ha kane ka kynti,” .U la ong ruh ba don bun kiba kwah ban ïakhun ha kane ka election MP 2024 na Shillong Parliamentary Seat, kynthup u President barim ka Meghalaya BJP, u Bah  Ernest Mawrie bad ka Kong Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait nalor kiwei kiwei.Wat la katta, ïa ka rai kaba khaduh yn sa shim da ki nongïalam ba ha khlieh duh, u la bynrap.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Bah Hek u la ong ba um don jingtip eiei halor ka ka jingmih shakhmat jong ki briew na Tura ban pan ticket na ka bynta ban ïakhun ha ka electipn MP na Tura constituency.Naka  liang ki nongïalam ka BJP ki la kyntait ba ka don kano ka no ka jingïapher jingmut hapdeng ki dkhot ka party.“Ngam shym la ïoh sngew kano kano ka jingïapher jingmut ha ka Party. Ngi don u President uba thymmai bad baroh ngi ïatrei na ka bynta ka jingbha ka Party, ki paidbah bad na ka bynta ka jingbha ka jylla,” kam u Bah Hek.
title: Lada ka Party ka kwah, nga kloi ban ïakhun na Shillong parliamentary seat

content: :Ka “Ngin Ïaikynjoh Music School Rangthong” South West Khasi Hills District myn ha ka 27 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024, ki la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakop rwai ne ka Singing Competition kum shibynta ban sei ïa ki sap ki phong bad ban  pyni sha ka pyrthei ïa ki sap jong ki samla ki khynnah na kane ka dong ka thaiñ Rangthong bad kumjuh ruh ban pynshlur ïa ki samla ban long kita ki rang kynsai bad ki thei kynsai ban wanrah ïa ka burom ha ka shnong ka thaw bad ïa ka ri baroh kawei.Watla kane ka shlem ai jinghikai halor ka rwai ka put ka tem ba la tip kum ka “Ngin Ïaikynjoh Music School Ranthong” kam pat dap snem kata naduh ba la seng ïa ka da kaba ki la buh ruh  ïa ka  phang ” Pyrshang mynta, ban Nangkiew ha ka Lashai ” ka la long shisha ka nuksa kaba bha tam ban kyntiew  ïa ki briew kiba don ïa ka sap ba la kyrkhu kyrpang da u Blei ha kaba ha kane ka jingïakop rwai  ki la don kumba 17 ngut kiba la wan ïa shimbynta  bad kane ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong jong ki ban pynlong kum ïa kine ki rynsan ïa kop rwai.Ha kane ka sngi la long konsan da u Bah, Kitborlang Nongrem Myntri shnong Ranthong bad u Bah, Forwardman Nongrem u President ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District  kum u Symbud kongsan ha ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang u Bah Wellbond Syiemlieh u Secretary jong ka Ngin Ïaikynjoh Music School, Rangthong ki nongkitkam bad ki paidbah kiba la wan ban sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi.U Bah Kitborlang Nongrem haba kren kum u kongsan ha kane ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jingïaroh ïa ki nongseng ïa ka “Ngin Ïaikynjoh Music School Rangthong” ba ki la lah ban pynlong kum ïa kine ki rynsan ïakop rwai kata watla hapdeng shibun ki jingeh ha ki lynti ïaid jong ki.Shuh shuh u la pynpaw ka jingsngew sarong ban ïohi ïa shibun ki samla kiba la ïoh lad ban pynpaw ïa ki sap ki jong ki ha kane ka rynsan ïakop Rwai. U la ong ruh ba ki sur jingrwai ki don ka bor kiba lah ban pynum ïa kiba eh ka dohnud, kiba pyntngen ïa ki jing sngewsih, bad shibun kiei kiei kiba pynktik ïa ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki briew. Ka jingrwai ka lah ruh ban pynïatylli ïa ki briew ha kino kino ki bynta ban poi sha ka thong. Ki Ri jong ka pyrthei ki don la ki jingrwai ieid Ri kumjuh ruh kane ka Ri Khasi ba ieid jong ngi, namar kata u la ai mynsiem shibun ïa ki samla ka thaiñ kiba don ïa kane ka sap ba kyrpang ba u Blei u la ai ha ki ba ki dei ban pyndonkam hok ïa ka khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi bad ka rah ïa ka nam bad ka burom ïa ka shnong bad ka thaiñ hi baroh kawei.U Bah Forwardman Nongrem haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la kyntu ïa ki samla ba kim dei ban lehraiñ ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa ki sap ba ki don, da kaba ai nuksa ïa ka Shakira kaba dei kawei ka nongrwai ba pawnam  ha ka pyrthei ha kaba nyngkong ki briew ki ïa rkhie beiñ ba ka sur rwai jong ka ka long thik kumba pah ka blang hynrei da ki jingtreishitom ha ryngkat da ki jingthrang ka mynsiem mynta ka la long ka nongrwai ba pawnam tam ha ka pyrthei baroh ka wei. Kyrmen skhem ba ki samla na kane ka thaiñ kiba mih na kane ka shlem ai jinghikai “Ngin Ïaikynjoh Music School”, Ranthong kin sa sei shibun ki nongrwai kiba pawnam ym tang hangne hapoh ka shnong hynrei kin sa ïoh lad ban pyni sha ka pyrthei ïa ki sap ba ki don.Ki nong jop ha kane ka Singing Competition 2024  ïa ka nam lahduh la ïoh da ka Shipara Melody Mawthynrew, bad ïa ka kyrdan kaba ar la ïoh da ka Baiamonlang Marbaniang na ka shnong Mawlangwir bad ïa ka kyrdan kaba lai da u Bah Shanbor Lyngdoh na ka shnong Mawten ha kaba ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka song pisa ha ryngkat ki  Certificate bad ïa kane ka jingïakop Rwai la pynlong ha Dorbar Hall Ranthong South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Ban pynshlur ïa ki samla ka thaiñ, da ka Singing Competition pynlong ka “Ngin Ïaikynjoh Music School Rangthong”

content: Hadien ba la mih ka jingujor na ki nongleit nongwan bad ki riew paidbah ba ki don ki khynnah samla shynrang bad kynthei bad ki don ruh ki samla pule ha ka uniform kiba ju shong ha surok kaba don mar syndah bad ka jaka pule jong ka skul bah University of science and technology Meghalaya kaba don ha Jorpul Ribhoi District ki ju ïa shongkai bad ka muja ïadih kyaid dih kynja khlem kheiñ shuh wat ha ka por mynsngi kaba la buh jingeh pat ïa ki paidbah kiba pyndonkam ïa kane ka surok namar ym i don jingshngaiñ shuh.Na ka liang ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council Ribhoi District lyngba u General  Secretery, u Samla Tony Shylla ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang bad u Bah RC. Thangkhie u Vice President, u Bah Warnes Lamin u Vice President bad ki dkhot, u la buh da ka jingmaham kaba tyngeh ïa ki briew khlem akor kiba ju mlien ban leh ïa kine ki kam jaboh ha kane ka jaka ba kim dei ban mlien nangne sha khmat namar mynta ka sngi ki shu sneng da lap sa shisien kin ai da kaba tyngeh. Na ka liang ka seng ki la buh ruh da ka jingkyrpad ïa ka bor pulit ba ki dei ban peit pyrman bha ïa kum kine ïoh mih kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngew sih hadien habud
title: Beh krad ka HYC ïa ki samla pule kiba ïa dih kyiad bad kynja ha jan USTM

content: Ka National People’s Party (NPP) myn ha ka sngi Nyngkong ka la thung ïa u MLA ka Sohra uba la jop ar samoi, u Bah Gavin M Mylliem Monday kum u President jong ka Party, East Khasi Hills District.Ka jingthung ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai ka la long hadien ka jong ka jingïalang jong ka District Executive Committee (DEC) jong ka party kaba la long ha Shillong Club.U MLA ka Mawkynrew u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh bad u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ki la shah thung kum ki Working Presidents, Ka MDC ka Nongshken ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, u MDC ka Mawphlang u Bah Lamphrang Blah bad u MDC ka Mawsynram u Bah Alvin Khyriem Sawkmie bad u Bah Sherbor Mawlong ki la shah thung kum ki Vice President.Kiwei pat ki kynthup ïa u Bah Aibor Tynsong, u Bah Jansing Tynsong, u Bah Malcolm R Mylliemngap bad u Bah Wonderson Dkhar kum ki General Secretaries bad u Bah Auspicious L Mawphlang kum u Treasurer.Ka party ka la thung ruh ïa ki 10 ngut ki Secretary kiba kynthup ïa u MLA barim ka Mawhati u Bah Dasakhiatbha Lamare, Firstborn Dkhar, Alan West Kharkongor, K Beni Warjri, Richeal Wankhar, Bhaboklang Ryntathiang, Rito Sing Syiem, Kistoles Marbaniang, Traibor Nongkhlaw bad Iantly Jurwa bad la thung ruh ïa u Bah Jiedsing Kurbah kum u Adviser nalor ki 26 ngut ki Executive Members.
title: Thung ka NPP ïa u Bah Gavin M Mylliem kum u President ka Party

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) South East Central Circle, Pynursla, ka la ïoh biang ban pynthymmai ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai myn ha ka 27tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024 na bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-27 da ka jingïathep vote la panbit pynbiang bad la pynïaid hi da ka Election Committee jong ka KSU-CEC kata da ka jingïathep vote ha kaba u Samla Cleenstar Shabong, u Secretary jong ka Committe bad uba long ruh ha kajuh ka por u Assistant Organising Secretary ka KSU-CEC u la long u Nongpynïaid bad nongkhmih bniah ïa ka jingïaid ryntih kane ka jingjied Nongkitkam.Ha kane ka sngi ki dkhot ka KSU South East Central Circle, Pynursla na ki 8 tylli ki Unit ki la jied bad pynkhamti ïa kine harum ban long ki Nongïalam ba thymmai jong kane ka Circle:-1. President: Samla Wallam Jingshngaiñ Suting2. Vice- President Samla Basuklang N Khongwar3. General Secretary: Samla Vorrozislov Sohklet4. Assistant General Secretary: Samla Sanlang Vennhanan Diengdoh5. Organising Secretary: Samla Jestice Kharbyngar6. Education Secretary: Samla Riskhemlang Lyngdoh7. Sports Secretary: Samla Mewanteiskhem Mawïong8. Environment and Cultural Secretary: Samla Thawthymmai Suting9. Office Secretary: Samla Pynskhemborlang Nongrum10. Publicity and Information Secretary: Samla PynkiewbiangHa kane ka sngi hadien ba la dep pynbna ïa ka result jong kane ka election la pyndep ruh ïa ka jingshim jingkular jong kine ki Nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka Circle da u Samla Raymond Kharjana, Chairman ka Election Committee bad uba long ruh u Organising Secretary ka KSU-CEC. Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ïa ka jingkren kaba lyngkot na u Samla Raymond Kharjana ha kaba u la pynkynmaw ïa ki Samla ba haba ki long kum ki nongïalam ne dkhot jong ka Seng, kim dei ban khmih lynti jingmyntoi na ka Seng naba ka Seng hi kam ju ïoh eiei ban ai ne siew tulop ïa ki kumba long kiwei kiwei pat ki nongtrei ïa kiwei kiwei ki kam. Hynrei ka KSU ka don tang ban ai ïa ki jinghikai  ïa ki Samla bad ki paradoh para snam kumno ban ieid ïa la ka ri  ka Jaidbynriew bad ban pynshlur ruh ïa ki samla ba kin long kiba trei shitom khamtam eh haba ki ïaleh ïa kino kino ki mat ba ka Seng ka shim ban ïaleh. Shuh shuh une u Samla ula ong ruh ba ha kine ki sngi kum ki dkhot ka Seng ngi dei ban long kiba peitngor bad kiba husiar bha ïa ka jingkren bad jingkynshoit ki katto katne ngut kiba pyrshang ban pynpait pynpra ïa ka Jaidbynriew halor ka nongrim jong ka jingsngew pher thaiñ, jingsngew pher niam bad ka jingpynïapher Jaidbynriew halor ka ktien ka thylliej ba ngi kren ha ki shnong bad ki dong bapher bapher jong ka Ri-Hynñiewtrep.La ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren ha  kane ka sngi na u Samla Melajied Khongbuh, u Assistant Publicity & Information Secretary KSU-CEC bad uba long ruh u nongpeit nongkhmih ïa ka Seng ha kane ka thaiñ. Une u Samla u la ong ba kum ki nongïalam ba thymmai ka Circle ki dei ban long kiba kloi ban bah ïa ka lyngkor kaba khia na ka bynta u paidbah paidlang jong kane ka dong ka thaiñ bad ba kin ïai pyntyllun shakhmat ruh ïa ki shalyntem jong ka Seng da kaba pyndep ïa ki kam ba dang sah ha ka samoi treikam jong ki nongïalam barim jong ka Seng.Shuh shuh u Samla Ksanborlang Thabah, u General Secretary barim jong ka KSU haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ki dkhot jong ka Seng kiba na ki 8 tylli ki Unit kiba hap hapoh kane ka Circle kiba la shimkhia ban pyndep ïa la ka jong ka kamram da kaba ïa poi ryntih ban jied ïa ki nongïalam kane ka Circle. Kyntang ïa wai u la ai ka jingkyrkhu kitbok kit rwiang ïa ki Nongïalam ba thymmai ka Circle ba kin nangïai lah ban trei kham bha shuh shuh lyngba ka KSU  na ka bynta ka bit ka biang bad ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ jong ki paradoh para snam kiba don ha kane ka thaiñ.La ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren lyngkot na u Samla Wallamjingshngaiñ Suting, u President ba thymmai jong kane ka Circle, uba la ong ba um don eiei ban kren kum u President ba dang shu shimti ïa ka kam Nongïalam. Hynrei u la kyrpad ïa baroh ki Nongkitkam ba thymmai bad ïa ki dkhot ka Seng ba kin ïa snohkti lang kawei ban ïa treilang ryngkat bad u kum u President khnang ba kin lah ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ki shalyntem jong ka Seng. Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba um don shibun ban kren, hynrei u don ban ong tang kawei ba ai ba ka jingkren nangne shakhmat kan dei beit da ka kam, ym shuh tang da ka ktien.La pynïaid ïa kane ka jingïalang ba lyngkot jong ka lympung pyntian smai ïa kine Nongkitkam ba thymmai da u Samla Cleenstar Shabong, u Secretary Election Committee KSU-CEC ha ryngkat ka jingïadon ryngkat ki dkhot ka KSU napoh Shillong kiba la wan ban ai mynsiem bad ban pynshngaiñ lang ha kane ka Lympung ong ka kyrwoh na u Samla Pynkiewbiang Khonglein, u Publicity & Information Secretary ka KSU South East Central Circle, Pynursla.
title: Jied bad pynthymmai ka K.S.U South East Central Circle, Pynursla ïa ki Nongkitkam ba thymmai na bynta ka samoi treikam 2024-2027

content: Ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah 108 Emergency Services hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union ki la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ban ym ai ïa ki Ambulance 108 sha kiwei pat ki tnad Sorkar na ka bynta ban pyndonkam ba kyrkieh ïa ki hapoh ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka MEMRIWU u Bah Roipar Kharaswai u la ïathuh ba hadien ba ka kompani kam treh ban pynïaid shuh ïa ka 108 Emergency Services, ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka la pan por lai bnai ba kan wad noh da kawei ka kompani ban pynïaid ïa ka Emergency Services, hynrei haduh mynta kam pat lah. Kumba ka long haduh mynta, ïa kane ka kam la peit da ka National Health Mission.U Bah Kharaswai u la ïathuh ba ïa ka Emergency Services ha Meghalaya la peit da ka Sorkar jylla mynta la shi snem shiteng khlem kano kano ka jingïarap na ka Sorkar Pdeng. U Bah Kharaswai u ong ba ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka dei ban pynïaid noh ïa ka 108 Emergency Services da lade na ka National Health Mission.  U la ïathuh ruh ba ka seng ka sngewkhia shibun ba kam shym la lah ban aiti ïa ka jingpynïaid ïa ka 108 Emergency Services shano shano. U la ïathuh ruh ba kane ka jingbym treh jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ban shim noh ïa ka jingpynïaid ïa ka 108 Emergency Services da lade, ka la buh ïa ka jingeh kaba khraw ïa ki nongtrei jong ka Emergency Service, ha kaba kine ki nongtrei kim ïoh shuh ïa ka jingpynkiew tulop ba shisien shi snem, ka jingbym shngaiñ ka trei ka ktah, ka jingkiew kam bad kiwei ki jingmyntoi.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kine ki jingeh jong ka Union,  ka jingïakren bad ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah jong ka Meghalaya kam shym la sei soh bad kan sa don biang sa kawei ka jingïakren ha ka 6 tarik u Rymphang ban ïa wad ïa ki lad ki lynti kumno ban weng ïa kine ki jingeh.
title: Kyntu ka Meghalaya EMRI Workers Union ban ym ai ïa ki Ambulance sha kiwei ki tnad Sorkar

content: Kum ka jingrakhe ïa ka National Girl Child Day, ka District Legal Services Authority (DLSA), South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat, myn ha ka Sngi Nyngkong ka la pynlong ïa ka prokram pynshai paidbah halor ka “Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO) Act-2012 & Early Marriage” ha Photjaud, South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka prokram la ïa shim bynta da ki khynnah skul bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki shnong. Ïa ka National Girl Child Day la rakhe man la ka snem ban pynshai paidbah ïa ki hok jong ki kynthei bad kiwei ki jingbym biang jong ki ha ka imlang sahlang.Ka Kong S.M. Wanniang, kaba long ka Judicial Magistrate, First Class, South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat, ka la ïathuh ba ka aiñ POCSO Act, 2012 ka ai jingïada ïa kikhynnah kiba hapoh ka 18 snem ka rta na ka jingpynïathoh khynnah ïa ki, ki jinglehbeiñ lehkhoh bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki dur khlem akor jong ki khynnah. Ka la ïathuh ruh ba kane ka aiñ ka pynshitom ïa kito kiba pynkheiñ ïa ki hok jong ki khynnah.Ka Kong S.M. Wanniang ka la kyntu ïa ki nongïashim bynta ba kin ujor sha ki bor jong ka aiñ, pyrshah ïa kito kiba pyrshang ban pynthoh bria ïa ki khynnah ha ki longïing longsem ki jong ki.Ka Kong S.M. Wanniang ka la pynsngewthuh ruh ba jingshongkha shongman kat kum ka aiñ ka dei ban long 21 snem ka rta na ka bynta u shynrang bad 18 snem ka rta na ka bynta ka kynthei. Ka la ïathuh ba ka long be-aiñ ban ïa shongkha shuwa jong katei ka por bad ka aiñ ruh ka pynshitom ïa kiba kum kita.
title: Rakhe ka South West District Legal Services Authority ïa ka National Girl Child Day

content: Ka Screening Committee jong ka All India Congress Committee (AICC) ka la pdiang ïa ka kyrteng jong u MP na Shillong u Bah Vincent Pala ban ïakhun biang na ka bynta ka jingjied ïa u MP jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency. Ka Screen Committee ka la pdiang ruh ïa ka kyrteng jong u dkhot ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Ain ka Meghalaya, u Saleng A. Sangma ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka jingjied ïa u MP jong ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency.Ïa ki kyrteng jong u Bah Vincent Pala bad u Saleng A. Sangma la ai da ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC) ha ka jingïalang ba la pynïaid da u Shongkinor jong ka Screening Committee u Rana K.P. Singh, uba la long mynshuwa u Lamphang jong ka Punjab Vidhan Sabha speaker ha Rajiv Bhavan, Guwahati.Haba ïa kren bad u Bah Vincent Pala lyngba ka phone, u la ïathuh ba kiba pan ticket na ka Congress ban ïakhun ïa ka jingjied MP na ka bynta ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency ki long tang ma u, kaba mut tang u Bah Vincent Pala bad na ka bynta ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency dei tang u Saleng A. Sangma.
title: Pdiang ka AICC Screening Committee ïa ka kyrteng u Vincent Pala bad u Saleng A. Sangma ban ïakhun MP

content: SHILLONGKi nongpyniaid jong ka IIM Shillong  ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew burom ia ki nonghikai u Shri Kashish Sharma, SaagarikaBhasker Panyam, bad ia uwei u samla pule Sampada Dubey kiba la ioh ia ka khusnam 2024.Ka IIM ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewnguh Aditya Birla kaba la ai ia katei ka khusnam na ka bynta ban pynshlur ia ki jingpule. Ia kane ka kynhun la seng 1999, Kine kiba la ioh ia kane ka khusnam ki la iaroh ruh ia kane ka kynhun ia ka jingshlur jong ka ban kyrshan khlem sahngeh da kaba ai ia ki scholarship na ka bynta kito kiba angnud ban pule ha ki kyrdan kiba kham shalor.
title: Pynkup burom ki nongpynïaid ka IIM ïa kiba ïoh khusnam 2024

content: NONGPOHKa Office of Project Director, Meghalaya AIDS Control Society (MACS), ha ka jingiatreilang bad ka ophis Deputy Commissioner of Ri Bhoi District bad ki tnad ka sorkar  ki la pynlong  ia ka jingai jinghikai kaba iadei bad ka jingkoit jingkhiah bad pynkut mynta ka sngi ha Nongpoh. Kane ka jingaijinghikai ka la sang naduh ka 17 tarik u September,2023 bad ka jingpynkut ia kane ka jingaijinghikai la pyniphuh iphieng da ka jingdonlang sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi jingpynkut da ka jingiadon lang jong u MLA u Mayralborn Syiem, Chairman of Meghalaya State Health Advisory Board.Dr. B Decruse, Project Director of MACS, Dr. L Myrthong, Deputy Director – Medical at MACS, Dr. D Mlah, Addl. DM & HO of Ri Bhoi District, Dr. E Kalwing, District AIDS Control Officer jong ka Ri Bhoi District,ryngkat lang bad ki ophisar na ka tnad sorkar bapher bapher bad na ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.Lah ban pynkynmaw hangne ba ka Ri-Bhoi ka long kawei na ki District kaba la shah jied ha ka sorkar kum ka an Aspirational District, ka ban long ka district ka ban ioh lad ban pyntreikam ia ki kam pynroi kiba kyrpang na ka bynta kane ka district.
title: La pynkut noh ïa ka jingai jinghikai ka koit ka khiah IHC ha Ri Bhoi District

content: SHILLONGKi nongpyniaid bad nongtrei jong ka ICAR Research Complex for NEH Region mynta ka sngi ki la rakhe ia ka jingdap 49 snem ia kaba la seng la buh ia ka da ka sorkar India.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka program Dr. B.C. Deka u Vice Chancellor, ka skulbah Assam Agricultural University, Assam, kane kam pat biang na ka bynta ki saiantis jong ka rep ka riang ba kin pynmih ia ki jingshem jong ki ha ki jingthoh ha ki kot khubor bad ki magazine. Hynrei u la ong ba ka jingshem jong ki saiantis ki dei ban long kiba lah ban pyndonkam da ki nongrep khnang bal ah ban kyntiew ia ka rep ka riang ha India .U la ong ruh ba ki kor ki bor ba la pynmih da ka ICAR ki dei ban long kiba lah ban pyndonkam da ki nongrep. La ong lada kine ki jingshem ki lah ban pyndonkam da ki nongrep kane kan sa long ka lad bah ban kynyiew ia ka rep ka riang bad ia ka ioh ka kot ki nongrep.
title: La rakhe ïa ka jingdap 49 snem ka ICAR

content: U Myntri ka Tnad ialehkai ka Jylla Bah Shakliar Warjri mynta ka sngi u la ai dongmusa jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha madan SSA Stadium shillong.Ia u dongmusa yn rah sha Tura West Garo Hills kaba long ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka kane ka lympung naduh ka 15 tarih haduh ka 20 tarik u Kyllalyngkot.Haba ai jingken u Myntri u la pynsngew ia ka jingkmen jong u ba la lah ban pynlong ia kane ka 5th Meghalaya Games da kaba pynmeh ia une u dongmusa bad aiti ha ki nongpyniaid ia kane ka lympung.U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingialeh ka dei kawei na ki lympung ialehkai kaba hehduh ba la pynlong ha kane ka jylla.U bah Warjri u la ong ruh ba lyngba kane ka rynsan ka long ruh ka lad ka lynti ba kito kiba ialehkai kin nang tyngshain bad kiew haduh ba ki lah ban iashim bynta ha ki kyrdan jong ka ri bad ki lah ban poi shaduh ka Olympics. U la ong ruh ba ki kam ialehkai ka long kawei ka lynti ban khanglad na ki kam sniew kam dih drug,kumta ka  Meghalaya Games ka long kawei ruh na ka jingialehkai kaba lah ban pynkiew ia ki samla ha ki kam ialehkai.
title: Khaweh lama u Myntri ïa ka jingïaid lynti ka dongmusa na Meghalaya sha Tura

content: U Acting Syiem jong ka Hima Langrin Syiemship, u Bah B.H. Syiemiong myn ha ka 9 tarik u kyllalyngkot 2024, u la ïoh ban lum ban lang ïa ki khun ki hajar hapoh ka Hima Langrin ban pynlong ïa ka dorbah bah jong ka Hima ha kaba ïa kane ka jingïalang ki la pynlong  ha ka Shnong Phlangdiloiñ South West Khasi Hills District  ha kaba ha kane ka sngi da ki spah ngut ki paidbah ki la wan ha kane ka Dorbar kiba kynthup ïa ki Sordar Shnong ki Myntri ki Lyngdoh ki rangbah bad ki samla kiba la kot 18 snem shaneng ka rta.U Bah B.H. Syiemiong, u Acting Syiem jong ka Hima Langrin u la ong ba ka jinglum ïa kane ka Dorbar ka dei hadien ba ma u la shimti kum u Acting Syiem jong ka Hima Langrin u la lap ïa shibun ki jingduna bad ki jingbakla ha ka rukom synshar khadar hapoh ka Hima Langrin ïa kane u la kren hadien ba la kut ka Dorbar ba u la pynshai ha ki lad pathai khubor  ba ha kane ka  Dorbar  ba mynta ka sngi shibun ki la ïoh ban ïakren ïa ki mat kiba la wanrah da ka jingïa mynjur lang da ki paidbah da kaba rah kti bad ka la long  kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih na ka bynta  ban wanrah ïa ka synshar khadar kaba khuid  hapoh ka Hima Langrin.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh ba ha ki snem ba la dep ïa ka Dorbar Hima la pynlong tang da ki Sodar, Secretary shnong ki Myntri ki Lyngdoh khlem da ïoh bynta lang ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima, hynrei ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ha ka jinglong jong u kum u Acting Syiem la wanrah thymmai ba ha ka Dorbar jong ka Hima dei ban ïadon bynta lang baroh ki shynrang kiba la kot 18 snem shaneng ka rta. U la ong ruh ba mynta ka sngi ki paidbah ki la pynpaw ba kim kwah shuh ban dang long Syiem biang u Syiem Nangtei syiemiong u ba la shah weng Syiem shipor kum u Syiem jong ka Hima Langrin.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban ïakren ha kaba ïadei bad ki jaka ki puta kumno ban pynwandur na ka bynta ka bhah tyngka ïa ki jingmih napoh kane ka Hima kiba dei hok ban ïoh pdiang hapoh ka Hima Langrin bad shibun kiwei de ki rai kiba la lah ban ïa mynjur da ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima kiba la wan ha kane ka Dorbar mynta ka sngi da kaba ki ïasoi kyrteng  ïa ki kyrteng jong ki baroh kum ka dak ba ki la ïa mynjur ïa ki mat ba la ïa kren mynta ka sngi.
title: Da ka Dorbar bah lum u Acting syiem ïa ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Langrin Syiemship

content: Ka seng FKJGP – Khliehriat Circle ka pynrem jur ïa u Train Phawa halor ka jingthombor bad pynmynsaw ïa ki arngut ki nongïalam shnong ka shnong Tuber Kmai Shnong East Jaintia haduh ban da poi sha ka jaka sumar bad shah suh haduh 5 ksai. Kine ki nongïalam shnong kiba la shah thombor ki dei u Micky Lyngdoh uba dei u Waheh Shnong ka Shnong Tuber bad u Denis Lyngdoh uba bat ïa ka kam Secretary IVCS bad ha kajuh ka por uba dei ruh u Chairman ka Seinraij Tuber Kmai Shnong. Kine ki nongïalam shnong ki la shah thombor myn ha ka miet jong ka 3 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha ka por kumba 11 shiteng.Katei ka jingjia kadei tang namar ba ha katei ka miet ka don ka jingïa huri hura hapoh shnong hapoh thaw ha kaba kitei ki nongïalam shnong ki ïoh jingtip ïa katei ka jingïa huri hura, kitei ki nongïalam shnong da ka jingthmu ban leit tem ïa katei ka jinghuri hura hynrei ynda ki la wan ki shah thombor pynban bad pynmynsaw da u sdie ha u Train Phawa. Halor kane, ka seng ka sngewkhia ba ha kine ki sngi ki briew kim burom shuh wat ïa ki nongïalam shnong ruh.Ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka jingjia la dep ujor da ka FIR da u para jong u Waheh Shnong u Chelang Lyngdoh. Katkum ka jingtip jong ka seng ba u Train Phawa u la dep ïoh ïa ka Interim Bail ka ban kut haduh ka 12 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka kyrpad jur ïa u Public Prosecutor uba na ka liang ki nongujor ban pynkhlaiñ ka jingïakhun hapoh kashari khnang ba hadien ka 12 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024, utei uba shah kynnoh um dei shuh ban lait na kti ka aiñ bad ha ka juh ka por ki pulit kim dei ban ailad ïa kum kitei ki briew ban ïoh Interim Bail biang namar ba lada ailad kan long kum ka jingpynshlur ïa kiwei pat ban leh kam sniew pynkut ka kyrwoh na ka Seng FKJGP.
title: Pynrem jur ka FKJGP-KC halor ka jingshah shoh ki nongïalam shnong ka Tuber Kmai Shnong

content: Ka Mawpait Tlongpleng Sports & Cultural Club myn ha ka 8 tarik u Kyllalyngkot  2024, ka la pynlong ïa ka jinglehkmen ban pdiang ïa u snem thymmai bad ki hep kiba rit kata hapoh ka shnong da ki jingïalehkai kiba pher bapher kiba kynthup kum ka Run for Fun, Penalty Shootout, Hit the Tin Sack Race, Corrom  Board, Sweet meat Game ,In & Out Game bad ka Tug of War ha kaba ïa kitei ki jingïalehkai la phiah da ki House kum ka Sngap Sing Syiem House, Tirot Sing Syiem House, Wickliffe Syiem House bad ka Kiang Nangbah HouseLa sdang ïa ka jinglehkai da ka Run For Fun ha ka por mynstep da ka jingduwai ba la ïalam da u President ka MTS & CC, u Kromlin Shylla. Ïa kine ki jingïalehkai pyn byrngia la pynhap pyrda da u Myntri, u Bah Donboklang Kharlyngdoh uba la pyrto ïa ka MTS & CC kaba la ju pynlong ïa kane ka jinglehkai man la u snem da kaba u la sneng la kraw ïa ki hep kiba rit ba kin long kiba smat kiba sting khamtam ha ka pule puthi, kiba kohnguh ïa la ki kmie ki kpa bad kiba tip ruh ïa u Blei Nongbuh Nongthaw kumjuh ruh u la hikai ba kin long ruh kiba lehkhuid ïa ki sawdong sawkun bad ïa la ka shnong ka thaw.Ha kane ka Sngi u Myntri u la ïoh ban ai ka jingai sngewbha sha ki longkmie jong ka shnong da ki tapmoh khlieh, kumjuh ruh sha ki hep kiba rit kiba pass bha ha ka Examination jong u snem 2023.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ka jing ai sngewbha da ki Trophy bad ka song pisa sha u Captain ka Kiang Nangbah, u Mangkara Snaitang da u Myntri bad ïa ka kynhun kaba ar ka Sngap Sing Syiem la aiti da ka song pisa kaba rit eh, sha ka Captain ka Mawlynnai Snaitang.
title: Ha ryngkat ki khynnah rit lehkmen ka Mawpait Tlongpleng & Cultural Club

content: U Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnad Urban Affairs, u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, myn ha ka sngi ba ar, u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynlong da ka rai ban ïakren bad ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) ba kan rai khatduh halor ka jingtyrwa ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 ngut ki bahaïing ba sah ha Sweepers’ Colony ha Them Iew Mawlong.U Dhar u la pyntip sha ki nongthoh kot khubor kumne, “Katba ka tarik na ka bynta ka jingïalang ban wan, yn sa pyntip mar syn leitphai u Symbud Myntri sha katei ka jaka.”Da kaba kular halor katei, u Dhar u la ban jur ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka Sweepers’ Colony ki dei ban mih na ka Them Iew Mawlong.Ha ka 7 tarik, Nohprah, ka sorkar jylla ka la pyndep ka kamram ban pynïoh tam haduh 1.4 akar ka jaka na ka bynta ki 342 tylli ki longïing na Them Iew Mawlong.Ïa katei ka rai, la pynlong ha ka por ba don ka jingïalang bad ki kongsan jong ka HPC, kiba la mynjur ba ïakren biang ha ka taïew bar jong u Kyllalyngkot.Da kaba pynpaw halor ka jingpyni ïa ka shon shap ne blueprint ba la pynthymmai biang da ka sorkar jylla ha ki jingïalang ba la dep pynlong, ka HPC ka la dep hun halor katei.Katkum ka jingkyrpad jong ka sorkar jylla kaba la mynjur ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing na Them Iew Mawlong sha ka jaka ba heh haduh 2.14 akar ba dei trai da ka Shillong Municipal Board. Ha ka jingjubab ïa katei ka jingkyrpad, ka sorkar ka la rai ban ai tam haduh 1.4 akar na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa kitei ki nongshong shnong.U Gurjit Singh, u Secretary jong ka HPC, dang shen, u la dep ong ba ki la mynjur bad katei ka blueprint jong ka sorkar hynrei u la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ban ïakren shaphang ki katto katne ki mat bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Sweepers’ Colony.“Te kumta, ka HPC kan sa pynlong biang da ka jingïalang bad baroh ki nongshong shnong jong ka Them Iew Mawlong ban ïakren halor ka jingïalang ba mynta hashwa ban ïakynduh ïa ka sorkar jylla,” bynrap u Gurjit Singh.
title: Yn ïakren ka sorkar jylla na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa ki Sweepers’ Colony bad ki HPC

content: Ka jingstad ia ka jingai ia ki jinghikai ha kaba ia dei bad ka koit ka khiah khlem ka jingshna ia ki jaka ai jinghikai Medical College kan long kaba eh ban urlong. Ha u ‘Nailar jong ka snem ba la dep, ka kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka la shim ia ka rai ban sdang noh ia ki lai tylli ki Medical College, kane ruh kam shym la urlong wat lada san tylli ki bnai ki la iaid lait.Haba kylli shaphang kane, ka Sorkar ka ong ba dang peit biang ia kane ka kam. Haba kylli shaphang ki kyndon kiba ia dei bad ka jingsdang ia ki Medical College,ki thymmei khubor ki iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban siew sha ka National Medical Commission (NCM), kaba long ka nongpeit ba ha khliehduh ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingbuh ia ki Medical College  ha India.Hapoh jong ka National Medical Commission, ki don saw tylli ki Autonomous Board ba kynthup iaka Undergraduate Medical Education, Post Graduate Medical Education, Medical Assessment & Rating, Ethics bad Medical Registration. U “Nailar jong u snem ba la dep, ka Kynhun Myntri ka la pdiang ia ka jingmait phang ia ka jingsdang noh ia ki Medical College ha Shillong, Tura bad Ri Bhoi District.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingstad iaka Shillong Medical College, ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka la pyllong ia ka jingwad lad wan lynti halor ka jingdon jong ki Specialist Doctor bad kiwei ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Civil Hospital bad Ganesh Das, ha kaba yn lah bad ban shim ia ki na ka bynta ka jingsdang ia ka Shillong Medical College.Ka jingsdang ia ka Tura Medical College ka la nang iaid shakhmat bad ka tnad ka koit ka khiah kan hap ban pyndep ia ki jingiateh soskular ha kaba ka jingtrei kan long ha ka dur jong ka jingiatrei lang jong ka Sorkar bad ‘riew shimet ha ka dur jong ka PPP Model. Kane kane ka jingiateh kan long bad ka Medical College bapawkhmat hapoh ka ri, khnang ban sdang noh ia ka Tura Medical College. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingsdang noh ia ka P.A. Sangma International Medical College ha Ri Bhoi District, kaba yn pyniaid da ka skulbah shimet jong ka USTM, kane ka skulbah ka la phah sha ka Sorkar ia ki jingtyrwa jong ka, ba ka jingsdang ia kane ka College kan long ha kata ka rukom, ha kaba ka jingmyntoi ka long ia kaSorkar bad ka USTM kum juh.Kane ka jingtyrwa ka long ba kan don ka jingailad ban pule khlem shim pisa ia ki katto katne ki samla pule bad ba kan don ruh ka jingshim duna ia ka jingsiew ia ka bai pule jong ki katto katne ki nongpule jong ka jylla, kynthup ruh ia ka jingshah ban shim ram bad ban siew ruh ia ka ram hadien ha ka dur jong ka Swiss Challenge Mode.
title: Dang shim por ban sdang ïa ki Medical College ha Meghalaya

content: :Ka kynhun jong ka Ri Bhoi People Council (RBPC), ba la lam khmat da u President Jayson Nongrum, ka la leit jngoh ïa ka 20th Mile Village hynnin ka sngi na ka bynta ban pdiang burom ïa ki san ngut ki nongïa kura kiba la ïohrah ïa ki takma ha ki bynta bapher bapher ha ka National Kick Boxing Championship kaba la pynlong da ka Kick Boxing Federation of India ha New Delhi.Kitei ki sng ngut ki nongïa kura, kiba hap hapoh ka jinghikai jong u Bah Thomas Rongthaluh, uba shimti ruh kum u President jong ka Meghalaya Marshal Arts Federations, kynthup ruh ïa u Rimanbha Syngkli ha ka 59 kg category, uba la ïohrah ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka Point Fighting, u Wanlamkupar Syngkli ha ka 71 kg category, u la ïohrah ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka Low Kick bad ka takma rupa ha ka Point Fight, u Hynrai Khymdeit, uba la ïohrah ïa ka takma rupa ha ka Kick Light, u Kyrshan Lyngdoh ha ka 54 kg category ha ka jingïohrah ïa ka takma rupa ha ka Low Kick bad u Francis Klein ha ka 63 kg category uba la ïohrah ïa ka takma rupa ha ka Low Kick.Katba u Coach Bah Thomas Rongthaluh, uba lam ïa katei ka kynhun jong ki san ngut, u la trei shitom ha ka ban pynïakhun ïa ki, khamtam ha ka jingleit jingwan. U la ban jur halor ka jingduna ka jingpynbiang ka jinghikai, da kaba batai ba ki nongïalehkai, kynthup ïa kiwei kiba u la ai jinghikai, ki la hap kilan met hapoh ka jaka ba long madan, da kaba pyndonkam da ki tiar jong ki ba la shna hi da ki lyntang bad ki siej. U la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ban pynbiang nadong shadong ïa ki tiar kilan met, da kaba ong ba da kaba pynbiang baroh kine, kan lah ban pynïoh jingïarap ïa ki nongïalehkai ba kin lah ban ïaid shakhmat, ban ïa kaba pynïanujor bad kiwei ki jylla.
title: Pdiang burom ka kynhun jong ka RBPC ïa ki nongïa kura ha 20th Mile Village

content: Ha kine ki sngi, kat shaba ngi iaid ngi ieng, kat shaba ngi leit ngi wan, ngi iohsngew ia ki briew ba ki ong, ba kim don por. Haba ka por ka dei ka jong ngi, ha kano ka rukom pat ba ngi ong ba ngi don por. Don tang artylli kiei kiei kiba pynlong ia ngi ban ym don por.Kawei ka lah ban long ba ngi shu pynsep ei ia ka por bad kawei pat ka long ban ngin nang ban bate ia ka por. Kawei ka lah ban long ba ngi la kwah pat ban pyndep lut ia baroh ki kam ki jong ngi tang hapoh arphewsah kynta kynta. Dei na kane ka daw ba ngim don por shuh ban leh ia kiwei pat ki jait kam kiba ia dei bad ka imlang sahlang ka jong ngi. Dei na kane ka daw ba ngim don por shuh ban ia kynduh ia ki paralok, ki ba haiing hasem ki jong ngi, ia ki ki kur ki kha ki man ki jong ngi. Te, haba kumta, ngin ialeh shuh kumno mo. Ki stad ka thoh ka pule bad ki stad ka pyrkhat pyrdain Psychologist ki ai jingmut ia ngi ba ngi lah ban jop ia kane ka jingeh ka long ba ngi dei ban nang ban bate ia ka por. Ka jingnang ban bate bad ban tehlakam ia ka por ka long kaba donkam ia baroh. Hynrei, kane ka jingthoh ka long kham kyrpang ia ki samla pule kumno ban nang ban bate ia ka por ka jong ki. Ka dei ban don ka thong ha kaba pyndonkam ia ka por. Ka thong na ka bynta ki samla pule ka long ba, ha kata ka por dei ban pyndep ia kita ki jingpule. Dei ban pyndep noh ia ki khlem buhteng. Nangta shuh shuh, ki samla pule kiba mynta, kin hap banpule bun kynta khnang ba kin lah ban pass bha ha ki jingpule ki jong ki. Ha ki por kiba mynshuwa, kiba bun, ha ba ki leit peit ia ki result jong ki, ki sdang shuwa na na shatrai. Ki sdang da kaba peit na tdong na ka Thrid Division bad kiew ter ter shaneng. Hyniei, mynta ka la poi ka por ba ka jingpeit ia ki result ka sdang na ka jingioh Position bad jingioh distinction. Lada ym ioh Position lane pass ha ka thup General List lane Tribal List, ki samla pule ki peit pat, sha kata kaba kiong, katno tylli ki Subject ki ioh Distinction. Lada ym pass bha, ym lah ban ioh jaka pule ki babha, la ka long hangne ha Meghalaya lane shabar jylla. Ha kane ka juk jong ka jingiakop ban pass bha bad ban wan nih shakhmat, ka jingbuh teng ka long kaei kaei kaba ym dei ban don hapdeng ki samla pule.Ka jingbuh teng, ka wanrah ia shi bun ki jingeh bad jingbabe.Ka jingbuhteng, ka pynlang thup ia ki jingpule ka buh ia ki samla pule ha ka jingeh bad jingjynjar jingmut. Te, namarkata, baroh ki Assignment dei ban pyndep ia ki tang shu ioh na skul, college ne univetsity. La la buh teng ia ki, ki lah ban lang kat u lumbah bad ha kaba khatduh, yn ym lah ban pyndep shuh ia ki. Lada pyndep ia ki ha ki minit kiba khatduh, ki lah ban ktah pat ia ka por pule ia kiwei pat ki subject. Kane ka jingpyndep ia kitei ki Assignment ha ka minit kaha khatduh, ka long ka jingpyndep kyrkieh bad ka ban ym janai. Da kaba ong ia kine kiei kiei, kata kam mut ba ngim dei shuh ban sngap jingrwai, ngim dei ban peit TV, ngim lah shuh ban leh ia kita ka Face Book. Ngi lah ban leh ia kine ki eiei baroh tang ba ngim dei ban pyllut pat ia ka por jong ngi tang ha kine kiei kiei baroh. Haba ngi la dep ia ki jingpule jong ngi, ngi lah ban peit TV bad kumta ter ter ban pynpyngngad ia ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ngi. Da kaba leh kumta, ngin lah ban bteng biang ia ki jingpule ki jong ngi ha ka rukom kaba dei bad kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih bad kaba wanrah ia ka jingmkyntoi. Ka jingpyndon ia ki mobile bad kiwei ki kor ki bor, ki long kiba ngim lah kiar ha kane ka juk kaba mynta. Hynrei, ngi dei pat ban sngewthuh ba ngim dei pat ban pynsep ei ia ka por bakordor jong ngi, ka ban long ia jingbet ia u symbai ia u symbai babha bad uba ngi lah ban khmih lynti ban kheit ia u soh bathiang ynda la dei ka por.
title: Ka jingbate ïa ka por bakordor

content: Ka ïing bishar u Special Judge POCSO Nongstoiñ myn ha ka 5 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 kala rai pynrem noh ïa u Pynshailin Sangriang da kaba phah set along haduh 7 snem ha ryngkat ka kuna ba un siew haduh 20 hajar tyngka.Ka jingrai pynrem ïa u Pynshailin Sangriang kadei hadien ba ka ïing bishar ka la lap lyngba ki sakhi sabut halor ka jingdon kti ka jong u ban thombor ïa ka longrynïeng jong kawei ka heprit kaba dang 13 snem ka rta bad ka ïing bishar ka la pynngat ruh ïa u tei u runar ha ka kyndon 4 jong ka POCSO Act.Lah ban kdew hangne ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka 25 tarik u July 2018 ha kaba ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ ki la ïoh pdiang ïa ka ejahar na kiba ha ïing jong katei ka Heprit halor ka jingthombor ka jong u ïa katei ka Heprit ha kaba ki pulit ki la kem noh ïa utei u briew bad register ïa ka case katkum ka case number 61(07) 2018 u/s 7/8 POCSO Act bad la charge Charge sheeted ïa ka case da ka Investigating Officer hapoh ka kyndon 3(A)/4 POCSO Act.
title: Hynñiew snem ha along ryngkat ka kuna shah rai pynrem uba thombor ïa ka Heprit 13 snem

content: AMLAREM:Ka Office jong ka District Social Welfare Officer, West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai mynta ka 4 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ha ka por 10 baje mynstep ka la pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka International Day of Person with Disabilities 2023. Ïa kane ka prokram la pynlong ha Syiem Jingsuk Secondary School, Lai Lyngdoh Hall, Amlarem Sub-Division bad la pynïaid ïa kane prokram da u Bah E. Kyndait, LDA jong ka Office DSWO, ha kaba U Bah H. Pohthmi, MDC War West, Deputy Chairman JHADC u la long u kongsan. La ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren ai khublei na ka Kong N. Sutnga, ka UDA DSWO, Jowai.Ka Theme jong ka International Day of Person with Disabilities 2023 ha u ne snem ka long “United in Action to rescue and achieve the SDGs for, with and by persons with disabilities”.Ha katei ka prokram, la ai ka jingkren pdiang da ka Kong R. Passah, DSWO ha kaba ka la pynshai shaphang kane ka sngi ba kane ka sngi kadei ka sngi kaba la leh burom ha baroh shityllup ka pyrthei na ka bynta ki briew kiba don jingduna ha ka dkhot met. Ka la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka don ki skhim ba kyrpang na ka bynta ki ba duna ha ka dkhot met, kumta ka la kyntu ïa ki kmie ki kpa ba lada don   ki khun kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met jong ki, ki dei ban leit sha ki Nodal Hospital khnang ba kin ïoh ïa Disability Certificate ban leit mih sha ki Office sorkar  ban ïoh ïa ka jingïarap na ka sorkar.La ïoh jingkren run na ka Kong Aidiam M. Kassar, Psychologist Manager, DRCDA halor ka Scheme & Services for persons with Disabilities, na u Bah L. Khonglah, Advocate Jowai Bar Association halor ka Right of Persons with Disabilities, na ka Kong P. Chyrmang, Office Assistant, ICDS, bad na ka Kong M. Lapasam, Mukhya Sevika, BDO Office.U kongsan ha ba ai jingkren u la kyntu ïa kiba duna ha ka dkhot met ban long kiba shlur bad kiba trei shitom wat la ki don ka jingduna ha ka dkhot met. U la kyntu ruh ïa ki longkmie longkpa kiba don ki khun kiba duna ka dkhot met ba kim dei ban lehraiñ,  hynrei ki dei ban mih shakhmat  ban ïalam sha ki ophis sorkar ba kin ïoh jingïarap na ki Scheme sorkar ki bapher bapher.La pynkup burom ïa ki arngut kiba don jingduna dkhot met da kaba ai ïa ki Momentus. Ïa kine ki arngut kiba la ïoh pdiang ïa ki Momentus ki long u Bah Kalvin Suting, Moosakhia Village bad ïa u Bah Nicholas Khonglah, Lai Lyngdoh.Ha kane ka jingrakhe la don ka Medical Checkup (General) bad la pynlong ruh  ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta kine kiba duna dkhot met kum ka Musical Chair, Spoon Marbel Race bad kiwei kiwei, ha kaba la sam ruh ïa ki Price ïa kiba ïashim bynta.
title: Rakhe ka District Social Welfare Officer, WJHD, Jowai ïa ka International Day of Person with Disabilities 2023
