content: :Myn ha ka 3 tarik, Nohprah 2023 kumba 4.15 baje janmiet, ka la don ka jingjia aksiden ha Mawlangwir Saidsnat kaba don hajan jong ka Rowel Lyngdoh Stadium, ha kaba kawei ka ar shaka kaba don ïa u nombar AS 01 MB  5259 (KTM) ba la niah da u Nangpyndapbor Kharlyngdoh ba la don 17 snem ka rta, uba dei u khun jong u Bah Tishingroy Shylla jong ka shnong Nonglang lem bad u Badatipskhem Snaitang, 17, uba dei u khun jong u Bah Roshanroy Lyngdoh na Nonglang, katba ki dang ïaid na Mawkyrwat ban leit sha Nonglang, ki la ïatakhuh pyrshah ïa kawei ka kali ba don u nombar ML 12 1474 kaba dei ka kali Alto, ba la niah da u Bah Dirling Khalyngdoh na Nonglang. Katba la ïoh jingtip ba u nongniah jong ka Alto u la poi sha ka lynti ba khun ha ka por ba u nongniah jong ka ar shaka u la takhuh bad katei ka kali bad hadien, u la mynsaw katba uwei pat uba shong shadien jong ka ar shaka u la mynsaw bad la rah noh sha hospital. U SI, u Bah R. Rymbai u la leit ha ka PO bad u la khmih bniah halor katei ka jingjia. Katba ïa katei ka mukotduma, la dep registar katkum ka kyndon jong ka aiñ bad dang ap ban ai da ka FIR.
title: Aksiden kali ha Mawlangwir Saidsnat

content: Ka ïing bishar u Special Judge POCSO Nongstoiñ myn ha ka 3 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 ka la rai pynrem ïa u Slander Mawleiñ da kaba phah set along haduh 10 snem ha ryngkat ka kuna kaba 30 hajar tyngka hadien ka jinglap ba u dei u ba donkti ban thombor ïa ka longrynïeng jong ka Heprit ba dang 10 snem ka rta.Na ka liang jong ka ïing bishar u Special Judge POCSO ka la pynngat ruh ïa utei u runar ha ki ar tylli ki kyndon kata ka kyndon 6 jong ka POCSO Act bad kumjuh ha ka kyndon 506 Part-1 IPC kaba yn shah pynsaja biang sa 1 snem ha along ryngkat ka kuna kaba 5 hajar tyngka. Katei ka jingjia kadei kaba la jia naduh ka 7 tarik u Nohprah 2018 ha kaba kiba ha ïing jong katei ka Heprit ki la leit ban ujor sha thanad Nongstoiñ ha kaba la register ruh ïa ka case hapoh Nongstoiñ Police Station katkum ka case Number 99(12)2018 u/s 506 IPC R/W 5(m)(n)/6 POCSO Act, bad la Charge sheeted ïa katei ka case da ka Investigating Officer hapoh ki kyndon 506 IPC R/W Sec 5(m)(n)/6 POCSO Act.
title: Shiphew snem ha along shah rai pynrem uba thombor ïa ka longrynïeng jong ka Heprit

content: Ka Synjuk ki Nongshynshar Shnong Nongmynsaw Syiemship mynta ka sngi ka 10 tarik u Kyllalyngkot ki la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka WKH u Bah Garod LSN Dykes halor ka jingkynjah jong ka jingïakren pynbeit pud na ka bynta ka thaiñ Langpih.Na ka liang jong ka Synjuk kala pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew lynga hadien ba kim ïohi dak shuh ïa ka, ki sien jam jong ka Sorkar ba kan shim halor ka kam ïa pynbeit pud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam kaba long ka mat kaba la sah slem eh haduh katta katta kaba kum ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba shong ha ki thaiñ Khappud ki la thrang bad angnud dik dik ïa ka jingpynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam.Kumta na ka liang jong ka Synjuk ka wan ban buh ïa ka jingthoh khnang ba u DC un pynkynmaw ïa ka sorkar bad ïa u Chairman ka Regional Committee ban thaw ki lad ki lynti ban pynkloi noh ïa kane ka kam kumba ka Synjuk ka la ju thoh la bunsien ïa ki mat jingdawa ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka Langpih Sector hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: Ba la kynjah ka jingïakren pynbeit pud leit pynkynmaw ka SNSNS sha u DC ka WKH

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, myn ha ka 3 tarik, Nohprah, u la ai khublei ïa ka seng Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) na ka bynta ka jingjop ha ki lai tylli ki jylla jong ka Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan bad ka Chattisgarh.“Ka long kaba kyndit bad ka lynti ba bha kaba long ha Madhya Pradesh. Nga ai khublei ïa u Shivraj Singh Chauhan ha kaba watla u la don ha kane ka sorkar la don mynta da ki bun bun snem, hynrei u la lah ban ïakhun ïa ki jingeh baroh, baroh ki jingsniew kiba la ban halor jong u bad u la lah ban ïakhun baroh ki jingeh lem bad ka kynhun jong u ban jop ha kane ka lynti,” ong u Sangma ha ki lad pathai khubor.U Sangma u la ai khublei ruh ïa u president ka seng BJP, u JP Nadda na ka bynta ka jingjop jong kane ka seng ha ki lai tylli ki jylla, kynthup ha Rajasthan bad Chattisgarh.
title: Ai khublei u Myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya halor ka jingjop ka seng BJP ha Madhya Pradesh, Rajasthan bad Chattisgarh

content: Ka seng sain hima sima Meghalaya Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka la leh kmen na ka daw ba ka la ioh ia ka jingjop ha ki lai tylli ki jylla na ki saw tylli ki jylla ha ka jingjied ia ki nongmihkhmat sha ki Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ki jylla ha ri India.Ia kane ka jingjop la pynbna ha ka Sngi U Blei. Kane ka jingjop jong ka BJP ha kitei ki jylla, kan ai mynsiem ruh ia ka BJP ha Meghalaya kaba don mynta hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh ban ia khun na ka bynta ki artylli ki shuki MP na Meghalaya ha ka snem, 2024.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u nongialam ka BJP u Alexander Laloo Hek u la ong ba kane ka jingjop, ka pyni ia ka dak jong ka jingkyrmen ba ka BJP kan sa sar ha MP elekshon, 2024. U Bah Hek u la ong ba wat lada ka BJP kam shym la jop ha Mizoram bad Talangana, hynrei kam trei shitom ban jop pat ha ka elekshon MP. Haba kren shaphang ka jong wan jong ka election Lok Sabha, u Bah Hek u la iathuh ba ka shong eh ha ki nongialam ba ha khlieh jong ka BJP iano yn ai tiket ba kin ia khun ia ki artyll ki shuki MP na Meghalaya.
title: Kmen ka BJP Meghalaya ba jop ka seng ha ki lai tylli ki jylla ha India

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya kan sa buh ia ka iew jong ki nongrep ha ki bynta baher baher jong ka jylla khang ban lah ban shah ia ki nongrep ba kin don la ka jong ka kynhun ba ki lah ban pyniaid iew bad pynbeit hi ia ki jindonkam baroh. Haba iathuh ia kane u myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad Sangma u la ong ba kane kan pynlait ia ki na ka jingshah tukar da kiwei pat bad ba kin ioh ia ka mon laitluid. Ia ki nongrep yn sa ai bor ba ki lah ban pyniaid iew hi kumba ka dei. Kane ka long ka sien jam ba khraw bad ngin nang iai bteng ban pynheh ia ki iew, ki la don na ki katto katne kiba la sang bad ngin nang pynbha shuh shuh ia ki.
title: Yn plie lad ka Sorkar ïa ki nongrep ban pynïaid ïa ki iew jong ki: Conrad K. SAngma

content: NKa kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Blue Bomber’s FC na Shillong kala ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop ha ka jingïakhun kaba la long mynta ka sngi ka 4 tarik u Nohprah ha ka lympung Invitation Knockout Football Tournament bala pynïaid da ka New Nongstoiñ Sport Social Cultural Club (NNSSCC).Ka jinglah jong ka Blue Bomber’s FC ban khur ïa ka jingjop kadei hadien ba kala lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka KMC FC na Sonapur d 2 kol la 1 kol ha ka jingïalehkai hapoh ka madan New Nongstoiñ bad lyngba katei ka jingjop ka Blue Bomber’s kala ïoh ban bsuh khlieh ïa lade sha ka quater final jong katei ka lympung.Haba phai sha katei ka jingïalehkai hapdeng kitei ki ar tylli ki kynhun kala long shisha kaba itynnad haduh katta katta ha kaba ka KMC FC kala ïoh pynkhih jar nyngkong eh ha ka minit kaba 13 lyngba u Robert Khongjoh hynrei ha ka minit kaba 25 ka Blue Bomber’s kala ïoh ban pynphai lyngba u Basuk Bina bad dei sa ha ka minit kaba 33 lyngba u Stephan Pale ka Blue Bomber’s kala ïoh ban pynkhih sa ïa ka kol kaba ar.Na ka liang jong ka KMC FC kala ïakhun tyngeh sa ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka kylla miet ha kaba kala ïoh ruh ïa shibun tylli ki kabu ban ïoh pynïakhiad biang hynrei kitei ki kabu kila shu sepei noh namar ka jingbym lah ban pynrung ïa ka bol shapoh jong ka kol bad kala hap ban mad noh ïa ka nam rem.Ïa ka nam man of the match ha katei ka sngi la ïoh da u Stephan Pale na ka Blue Bomber’s FC bad ka jingïalehkai ka ban bud ha katei k lympung kan long sa ha ka 12 tarik u Nohprah ha kaba ka 7 Wasa FC kan ïakynduh pyrshah ïa ka Peerless FC na Kolkata.
title: Pynliem ka Blue Bomber’s ïa ka KMC FC ha madan New Nongstoiñ

content: Ka jingpynïoh da u optical fibre cable ha kylleng ka jylla khnang ban ïoh ka network ba biang wat sha ki jaka ba jngai ruh, yn sa sdang naduh u Lber la shem snem.Da kaba pyntip shaphang kaeti hadien jong ka jingïalang ba la khmih bad ki heh jong ka tnad IT ha ka sngi nyngkong, ha kaba u Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la ong, “Ngi la dep rai ban ïaid shakhmat bad u maw jam ba khatduh ha ka ban pynïoh ïa ka network ba biang hapoh ka jylla da kaba pynïoh da ki optical fibres. Ngi don ka jingïakren ba bniah bad ka telecom wing jong ka Powergrid ha kaba ngi la ïaid shakhmat mynta ban sdang pynïoh da ki optical fibre cable ha kylleng ka jylla lyngba baroh ki block.”Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u, la don ka da ka road map kaba la dep pynmih bad ïa katei ka projek, yn sdang ha ka por ba biang.“Ngi khmih lynti ba ka kam kan sa sdang noh shen ha u Lber la shem snem bad ngi khmih lynti ba hapoh 12 haduh 15 bnai ba la ïoh por, ka mut ha u snem 2025 ha u Jylliew bad Naitung, baroh ki block ha ka jyla bad ha baroh sub division bad kumjuh baroh ki district, yn sa pynïoh da ki optical fibres,” ong u Sangma sha ki lad pathai khubor.“Bad ym tang kata, naduh ban sa sdang treikam halor u optical fibre cable, yn sa pynïoh ha ki jaka pule, ki kynhun bapher bapher, ki hospital ruh kin sa ïoh ka network ba biang bad ngin sa bteng ban pynïoh ha baroh ki jaka bapher bapher,” ong u Sangma.Shuh shuh, utei u Myntri rangbah u la ong ba katei ka projek ka long kaba kongsan ha ka ban buh ha ka jingmut ïa ki projek e-Governance ba la bei tyngka ha ka dor baheh bad ba ka sorkar ka dang pyrshang ban pynbiang ïa ka e-Governance katkum ka jingkwah jong u paidbah.Haba la kylli jingkylli ïa u Sangma, u la ong ba katei ka projek ka long kaba la khleh lang namar ba ka jingïoh jingmut ka long ban biang ka network. Ïa katei ka projek, la tyrwa hapoh ka NESID bad ha kiwei pat ki jaka ka ban sa noh synñiang da ka sorkar jylla.
title: Yn ïoh optical fibre cable ha kylleng ka jylla ha u snem 2025

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba ka jingailad ban shah ia ka jingiaid jong ki rel kit mar kit mata bad kit jingbam kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor ha ka Dorbarbah ki nongrep ha Convention Hall ha Shillong, u Myntri Rangbah K. Sangma u la ong haduh mynta, um pat shym la lah ban ai jingmut ia ka Sorkar India ha ka wanrah ia ka rel sha ki bynta jong ka Khasi Hills na ka daw ba kane ka don don hapdeng ka jingiakren hapdeng jong ka Sorkar bad kito kiba don ka bynta bad kane ka jingiaid jong ka rel.
title: Ka jingwan ka rel kit mar kit mata ka long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw: Conrad K. Sangma

content: Ka Kisan Morcha jong ka BJP ka la pynlong da ka jingïalang ban rakhe ïa ka 3rd Farmer’s Day bad ruh ha katei ka jingïalang, ka la long kum ka rynsan na ka bynta ka jingïamir jingmut lang ki paidbah na ka bynta ka lawei ba phyrnai jong ka kam rep riang ha ka jylla Meghalaya, ha ka ophis jong katei ka seng kaba don ha Bivar Road ha ka sngi nyngkong.Haba kren shaphang katei ka jingïalang, u Chief guest ha kane ka sngi u dei u Bah John F. Kharsiing uba la ong ba ka ri ka don ar tylli ki atiar, ka khyndew bad ki nongrep. Khlem kine ki ar tylli ki atiar, ngin nym ïoh bam.‘Bun na ki briew ha ka jylla Meghalaya, ki dei ki nongrep’, ong u President jong ka BJP Kisan Morcha, u Ralden Bryan Shabong.‘Lada ka imlang ka sahlang kan sdang treikam lang sha ka bynta kaba ngi phohsniew, ka long kaba kongsan ba ka kam rep kam riang, yn kyrshan ban noh synñiang da ka pisa, jingstad saïan bad kiwei kiwei khnang ban lah ban tei ïa ka lawei ba lashai. Katei ka seng kan sa mih ban pynthikna ba ka kam rep kam riang kaba don jingthmu ban pynïoh ki scheme jong ka sorkar pdeng da ka BJP, kan sa pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa u paidbah riewshimet ruh’.Khnang ban pynthikna ïa ka jinglaitluid ha ka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ bad ka jingpynmih ïa ka jingai jingmut halor ki bank, katei ka seng ka la wanrah lang ïa ka ïing ba long kawei ban ïatylli, ki nongseng kam lajong jong ka imlang ka sahlang, ki nongïalam ba dei ki nongrep ba kongsan, ki stad saïan jong ka kam rep kam riang, ki nongthaw polisi jong ka lawei ba lashai bad ki riewshimet kiba don jingtbit ha ka ban rep ban riang.Ha ka ban pynkut noh ïa katei ka prokram, u Bijit Khongsit, uba dei u General Secretary ka BJP Kisan Morcha, Meghalaya Pradesh, u la pynkynmaw ba ka jingwan jong u Myntri rangbahduh ka India, u Modi Ji u la ong kumne, “Ki saw tylli ki jaitbynriew ha kane ka ri ki long ki bym ïoh bym kot, ki samla, longkmie bad ki nongrep; ngi hap ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ki.
title: Rakhe ka BJP ïa ka 3rd Farmer’s Day

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka jngtrei kam jong ka Sorkar synrop Meghalaya Democratic Alliance-II kam long shuh kumba mynshuwa. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ha ki por kiba mynshuwa, ki kam pynroi hapoh Meghalaya, ki long beit da kaba pyntrei kam skim bapher bapher jong ka Sorkar. Haba kren kum u Kongsan ha ka Dorbarbah ki nongrep, Third Meghalaya Farmers’ Parliament ha Convention Hall, Shillong, u Myntri Rangbah ula ong ba ka Sorkar ka la pynlla ia ka rukom trei kam jong ka da kaba ia trei lang bad ki paidbah.U la ong ba ka Sorkar ka la shem ba paidbah ki pyntrei ka da ka jngshitrhem ia ki skim jong ka Sorkar na ka daw ba ki sngewthuh ia ka jingeh ka jong ki bad ba ka ia trei lang bad ki khlem kano kano ka jingtehlakam.U Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ba dei na kane ka daw ba ki ba ka jylla ka la roi bun bun shah. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka pyntrei kam ia ki skim hadien ba ka sngewthuh nadong shadong naduh tynrai bad da ka jngiatrei lang jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ruh ba barooh ki skim pynroi, ki dei kiba la sain dur bha bad ka Sorkar pynshlur ia ki paidbah ba kin seng ia ki kam la jong bad ki trei ia ki kam la jong ha ki kam bapher bapher ryngbad bad ka jingpynshur bad jingkyrshan jong ka. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad Sangma u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la buh ia ki Start up ban btin lynti ia ki nongseng kam seng jam bad ki Mission bapher bapher khnang ba ki jingpyntrei kam ia ki kam pynroi jong ka Sorkar kin long kiba jop.Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, ula iathuh ba ha ka sdang ba ka Sorkar ka pyntrei ka ia ka FOCUS, la don tang 1,000 ngut ki nongrep kiba pynpaw ia ka jingangnud jong ki na ka bynta ban iohi ia ka ram kaba khlem sut, ka jinghikai ban pynkylla powder ia u synrai Lakadon bad kumno ban pyniaid iew ia u. U Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ban mynta kiba buh ia ki application jong ki, ki don haduh 15,000 ngut ki nongrep ha Meghalaya.U la iathuh ruh ba ki Processing Unit mynta ki la nang buh hapoh jong ka jylla. U la iathuh ba ka jingiohnong jong ki paidbah mynta ka long da ki bun bun shah. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpynjyrngam ia ka mariang, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma da kaba pyntrei kam ia ka Meghalaya Rejuvenation, ki paidbah ki la wan shakhmat ban pyntrei kam ia kane ka skim ha kaba ki trai khyndew bad trai jaka, ki la long kiba la kloi ban pynneh pynsah ia ki khlaw, ki tyllong bad ki wahduid ha kaba ka Sorkar ka la kloi ban pynlut haduh 4,000 klur tyngka. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ki kam ri jngri, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek, u la kyntu ia ki nongrep bad nongri jingri ba ha kano kano ka kam kaba ki leh, ki dei ban shim ruh ia ka jingkitkhlieh khnang ba ki kam pynroi ki iaid shaphrang.Ha kaba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ki kam ka rep ka riang, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Nongkynrih ka la kyntu ia kito kiba la biang ka jingnang ka jingnang jingstad ba kim dei ban shu shong shuh sah hangne ha Sor, hynrei ba kin leit phai biang sha ki shong ban iarap ia ki kmie ki kpa nongrep, khnang ba kin lah ban pynkiew ia ka ioh ka kot jong ki. Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ryngkat bad ki myntri jong u ki la sam ia ki Cheque sha ki nongioh myntoi jong ka skim, Rejuvenation bad FOCUS
title: Pynkylla ka Sorkar MDA-II ïa ki skim barim ban long kiba jop: Conrad K. Sangma

content: SHILLONG:Ka ding ba klang kaba la bam duh ia ka jaka tylliat atta ,suji,besonbad moida kaba kyrteng Magic Cook ha Lukiar road Shillong.Kane ka la jia ha ka meit sngi thohdieng ha ka por 11 baje mynmeit. Ka ding ka la bam duh lut ia ki kor tyllait jingbam bad ia u kew uba don da ki spah kwintal ha katei ka jaka.Ki marjan kiba la iohi ia kane ka jingjia, ki la iathuh ba la phone sha ki pulit pynlip ding mar ia pluh katei ka jaka. Hynrei ym shym la ioh ban pyntip ia ki pulit.La iathuh ruh ba ki pulit ki la slem ban wan ban pynlip ia katei ka ding. Ka jingpynlip ia kane ka ding ka la bteng haduh ka por 12 baje shiteng sngi sngi saitjain.Ki khubor ki iathuh ba u trai jong ka Magic Cook u dei u Sanjeev Bajoria.
title: Bam ka ding ïa ka jaka tyllait atta Magic Cook ha Lukiar road Shillong

content: U Bah Elkin Rynniaw u President ka Meghalaya Liberation Association of Visually Impaired u la pynbna ba na ka liang ki dkhot, kane ka association ki la shim ïa ka rai ban pynduh pyndam noh ïa ka kyrteng ka MLAVI bad ha ka jaka jong kane yn tip noh da ka Naitional Inclusive Society.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 4 tarik Nohprah 2023 ha Shillong Pressclub u Bah Elkin Rynniaw u la ong ba kane ka long kum shi bynta ban tehlakam ïa ka jingshim kabu jong ki briew ban pan ka jingïarap pisa ha ka kyrteng jong kane ka Association.U Bah Elkin Rynniaw u la ong “ha ka jingïalang ba la long ha ka 9 tarik Risaw 2023, la shim ïa ka rai ban pynduh pyndam noh ïa ka kyrteng jong ka Meghalaya Liberation Association of Visually Impaired bad ha ka jaka jong kane ïa kane ka seng yn tip noh da ka National Inclusive Society.U la ïathuh ruh ba kumba ka long mynta hi kane ka seng, ym lah shuh wat ban register ruh namar kin bun ki kam ki jam ki ban hap pyndep lada kwah ban pynim ïa kane ka seng bad namar ki ba bun ki jingeh kumta la rai ban pynkha noh da ka National Inclusive Society.Ha ba kren ban ai ka jingkhublei kyrpang ïa ki para dkhot halor ka jingrakhe ïa ka World Disability Day 2023 kaba dei ha ka 3 tarik Nohprah 2023. U Bah Beningstar Kharpor u la kdew ba da ka jingmih bun ki sengbhalang ki ba ïarap kyrpang ïa ki briew ba duna ka dkhot met ha ka jylla, ki la ïoh ïa ka lad ka lynti ban tur shakhmat ha ki ba bun ki liang ha ka imlang sahlang.U Bah Kharpor u la kyntu ruh ïa ki nongmih khmat ba kim dei ban kyntait ban ïa kynduh bad ki briew ba duna dkhot met, namar kum ki briew hi ki don bun ka jingduna ka ba ki donkam ban pynsngew sha ki nongïalam jong ki.
title: Ba bun ki ba shim kabu rai ban pyndam noh ïa ka kyrteng ka MLAVI bad pynkha noh da ka NIS

content: Ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board ha ryngkat ka Bor District ka la pynlong da ka jingpynsngew paidbah hadien ba la mih katto katne ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingpan jingbit biang jong ka “Uranus Stone Product and Co” kaba dei ka kompani kaba ju pynmih ïa ki maw Boulder kaba don ha ka shong Umduba na ka bynta ka Environmental Clearance.Ha kane ka sngi jong ka jingpynsngew paidbah, la lam khmat da u Bah S. Syiem u Engineer ka MSPCB ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang da ka Kong Balakyntiew Ranee  ka ADC , u Erik Dkhar  u BDO ka Umling Block, ki Rangbah Shnong bad ki Nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ kiba la ïoh ban sngap bad ban sakhi ïa ka jing pynsngew na ka liang jong ki paidbah la ki kwah ne em ba ka quarry kan ïoh biang ïa ka jingbit ban tih maw ha kane ka jaka.Hadien ba la sngap na ki nongkren pyrshah bad bym pyrshah kiba kynthup ïa ka seng HYC ba la ai jingkren da u Vice president ka Ribhoi District u Bah RC. Thangkhiew u la ong ba na ka liang ka seng kam kyrshan ïa kane ka kompani, ka seng ka sngap ïa ka sur ki paidbah bad lada don ka jingujor na ka liang ki paidbah bad ki paidbah ki mad jingeh ka seng kan sa leit ban kynduh ïa u E.M jong ka District Council uba dei peit ïa ka tnad Forest nangta ïa u DC ka Ribhoi bad ïa u MLA jong ka Jirang Constituency ban ïa kren bha halor kane.Haba phai pat ban sngap na ka liang ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong kiba don kynthup ïa u Nikthil  Marak u President jong ka All killing na ka liang ka jong ki, ki la kren shai ba ka jingdon jong ka quarry hangne ka shnong ka la ai jingmyntoi mynta ïa kiba bun ki ïing ki sem bad ki la kren shai ba kim pyrshah ïa ka “Uranus Stone Production and Co”.Ban pynshai halor kane sha ki paidbah na ka liang ka “Uranus Stone Production and Co” ka la pynshai paidbah halor ka rukom trei kam ka jong ka khnang ban lait don kano kano ka jingktah ïa kane ka shnong. La ong ba kane ka company kan ai kam aijam ïa ki nongshnong shnong, kan thung ruh ïa ki dieng ha ki jaka ba long khyndew hadien ba la dep khlong ne tih ïa ki maw, ïa ki jaboh ba mih kin buh bha shi jaka, lada la dep pyndonkam ïa ka jaka ka company kan shna da ka pung dohkha bad kiwei kiwei de.Hadien ba kam don kano ka jingpyrshah na ka liang ki paidbah, na ka liang jong ki nongpynïaid ki la batai ba ka la don ruh haduh 158 tylli ki shithi ba kim don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ïa kane ka company bad ïa ka kaiphod ba ki ïoh lum mynta ka sngi kin sa aiti sha ka Sorkar Jylla bad yn sa ap pat ïa ka rai hadien ba la dep khmih bniah da ka Sorkar Jylla.
title: Haduh 158 tylli poi ka shithi bym pyrshah ïa ka Quarry Maw ha Umbuda

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union ka la kyntu ïa ki bor Sorkar jong ka tnad ka thoh ka pule ba dei ban pynshitom ïa u nonghikai Lower Primary School, u Bah Wikiru Shylla na ka daw jong ka jingbym kitkhia jong u ban hikai ïa ki khynnah skul.Ha ka shithi ba la thoh sha u Myntri ka tnad pule puthi jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Rakkam A. Sangma, u President jong ka KSU-WJHDU, u Bah Laitphar Syngkrem u la ong ba ka jingbym wan hikai skul thikna jong u Bah Wikiru Shylla ka la ktah shibun ïa ka jingpule jong ki khynnah skul bad kylla long ruh ka jingban khia ïa kiwei ki nonghikai.Ha kane ka shithi, u Bah Laitphar Syngkrem u la ïathuh ba wat lada utei u nonghikai um ju wan hikai, hynrei u ïoh pat ïa ka tulop kumba long kiwei ki nonghikai kiba kitkhia ïa la ka jong ka kamram.U Bah Hababiangki Biam u la ong ba kane ka jingleh jong une u nonghikai ka long ka jingleh bym dei bad ka bym shonghok. U nongïalam jong ka seng ki samla pule u la pynpaw ruh ba u Wikiru Shylla u la wan hikai skul ha ka 4 tarik u Naitung, 2013 bad hikai tang 33 sngi ha ka snem 2013 bad hadien kane um shym la wan hikai shuh bad u la wan hikai biang 23 sngi ha ka snem 2014. Na ka daw jong kane ka jingleh jong u, une u nonghikai u la shah sospon kam ha u Lber 2017 haduh u Naiwieng 2019.La shah biang ban bteng ïa u ban hikai ha u Nohprah 2019 bad u dang ïai bteng ban leh biang kumjuh bad um shym la wan tikna.
title: Kyntu ka KSU WJHDU ban pynshitom ïa u nonghikai bym wan hikai skul thikna

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka la long kaba la kloi ban pynlut na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka thoh ka pule kham tam lei na ka bynta ki jingpule ha ki kyrdan kiba kham shaneng ha ka liang ka Higher and Technical Education hapoh jong ka jylla.Haba kren ha ka jingplie ïa ka Sohra Government College ha East Khasi Hills ha kaba la don lang ruh u Myntri ka thoh ka pule u Rakkam Sangma bad ka Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar kan theh lut na ka bynta jong ki samla bad kaei kaba wan ha khmat jong ka Sorkar ka long ban kyntiew ïa ka thoh ka pule hapoh jong ka jylla. U Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ha ka por ba u Bah Lahknem Rymbui u dang bat ïa ka kam myntri ka tnad pule puthi, ka Sorkar ka la shim ïa ka rai kaba tyngeh ban kyntiew ïa ka thoh ka pule kham tam ha ka kyrdan Higher and Technical Education.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ka Sorkar jylla ka la lum ïa ka khajna Cess la bun bun snem khlem da pyndonkam ïa ka bad kane ka Sorkar ka la shim ïa ka rai bad sdang ban pyndonkam ïa kane ka pisa ban kyntiew ïa ka thoh ka pule.“Dei da ka jingpyndonkam ïa kane ka pisa kaba mih na ka khajna Cess ba ngi la sdang ban shna ïa ki jingtei bathymmai bad sdang ban pynbha ïa ki skul bad ki college kiba la rim”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma.U Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba kane ka Sorkar jylla kaba mynta ka la shna pynbha ïa ki 2500 tylli ki Lower Primary School ha ka jinglut kaba 500 klur tyngka. U la ïathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar jylla kan pynrung ruh ïa ki kot jong ka NCERT na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE), ha kaba ka jingpule ïa ka jingkheiñ bad Science kan long lang ha pyrthei.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka National Education Policy-2020, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba baroh ki Government College hapoh jong ka jylla dei ban don ïa ka jingpule ïa ka Science bad Commerce. U la ong ba kane ka dei ka rai kaba eh jong ka Sorkar namar ba kane kan ktah ïa ka pla pisa jong ka Sorkar. Hynrei, wat la katta ruh ka Sorkar kan ïaid shaphrang ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingthmu. U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla mynta ka kynti ka la mang haduh 2000 klur tyngka ban pynlut na ka bynta ka thoh ka pule bad kaneka dei ka jingpynlut kaba heh tam na baroh ki tnad jong ka Sorkar.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ka tnad pule puthi u Rakkam Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la ai ka jingkyrshan barad bah ïa ka thoh ka pule hapoh jong ka jylla.Kiba la kren ha katei ka sngi ki long ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Chief Advisor jong ka Sorkar jylla u bah Lahkmen Rymbui, u MLA jong ka Shella, u Bah  Balajied Kupar Synrem bad u MLA ka Sohra u Bah Gavin Mylliem.Ïa ka Sohra Government College la tip ïa ka mynshuwa kum ka Sohra College bad pynbna kum ka College jong ka Province ha ka snem 2009. Ka jingkyntiew ïa ka Sohra Government College sha ka Provincialised College ka la wanrah ïa ka jinglut kaba haduh 12 klur tyngka ha ka snem 2020. Da ka jingbeit pisa jong ka Sorkar kane ka College Sorkar ka don ki jingtei kiba biang, kiba kynthup ïa ki Class Room, Library, Laboratory, Boys’ Hostel & Girl Hostel bad kiwei ki jingdonkam kiba biang.
title: Kloi ka sorkar jylla ban pynlut bad ban kyntiew ïa ka thoh ka pule: Conrad K. Sangma

content: :Ha kawei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih, uwei u briew u la duh noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka daw jong ka jingshah bat ha ka bording elektrtik ha Jynkieng Umiam kaba hap hapoh Mawlai Police Station.Kane ka la jia myn ha ka Sngi U Blei ha ka por 5.30 baje janmeit. Kat kum ka khubor ba la ïoh lum, une uba ïap la tip kyrteng ïa u, u Rishanlang Muktien uba dang 25 snem ka rta bad ka shnong jong u ka dei na  Ladlasharai jong ka Ri Bhoi District. U dei ruh uwei na ki nongtrei jong ka Jynkieng Umiam kaba don mynta hapdeng ka jingmoramot.Une u nongtrei u la shah bat bording elektrik katba u dang leit ban lum diengïap najan jong u Transformer jong ka ITD Cementation India Limited ha Umiam. La rah ïa u sha Shillong Civil Hospital bad ki doktor ki la pynbna ba u la ïap na katei ka jingmynsaw.
title: Ïap u nonglum diengïap ba shah bat bording elektrik ha Jynkieng Umiam

content: :Uwei u nongñiah Auto u la duh noh ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha ka Sngi Nyngkong ha ka jingïatyngkhuh jong bad kawei ka trok ha Jynkieng Umlew ha National Highway-44 Shillong Bypass Road. Ka kyrteng jong utei u nongñiah Auto, ka dei u Dhiren Chandra Barman uba na Umling, Ri Bhoi District.Kat kum ka jingïathuh jong ki pulit la ong ba une u nongñiah ïa ka Auto u la leit ban tynrah ïa ka trok ha ka jingïaid jong u na Umroi sha Toll Plaza. Ki pulit ki la ïathuh ba kane ka jingïatyngkhuh kali ka la jia namar ba u nongñiah ïa ka Auto um lah shuh ban teh lakam ïa ka kali kaba u ñiah kaba wan na sha ka liang pyrshah.Ha kane ka jingjia, arngut kiba shong ha ka Auto ki la mynsaw bad la pynkit noh ïa ki da ka kali Ambulance sha Bhoi Rymbong ban ai jingsumar. Ïa ka met jong uba ïap la aiti noh sha ki bahaïing hasem hadien ba la pyndep ïa ka Post Mortem.U nongñiah jong ka trok u la phet krad noh na katei ka jaka hadien jong katei ka jingjia.
title: Ïap u nongñiah Auto ha ka jingïatyngkhuh bad ka trok

content: Ki shipai pahara khappud Border Security Force jong ka Meghalaya kiba la pyllong ia ka leit pahara ha kiba bun ki jaka, ki la ioh ban khang lad ia ki jingkhaii martur na Meghalaya sha Bangladesh. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, kine ki shipai pahara khappud, ha ka Sngi Nyngkong ki la ioh ban kurup ia ki dawai Phensedyl bad shini na ki khappud jong ka Meghalaya bad Bangladesh katba ki nongkhaii ki dang pyrshang ban khaii tuh ia kine ki mar sha Bangladesh.Ia kine ki mar la leit ban aiti noh ia ki sha ki bor jong ka ain. Ki shipai pahara khappud jong ka 172 Battalion Meghalaya BSF ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 190 bitor ka dawai Phensedyl katba dang pyrshang ban khaii tuh na ki khappud jongka East Jaintia Hill jong ka Meghalaya sha Bangladesh. Ha kawei pat ka jingjia, kawei pat ka kynhun shipai khappud jong ka 172 Battalion Meghalaya BSF ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 18,000 Kg ka shini na kiwei ki districts khappud jong ka Meghalaya bad Bangladesh. Ia kine ki dawai phensedyl bad shini la ai ban aiti sha ki heh Sorkar jong ka Custom bad pulit jong ka Meghalaya ban pyndep ia ki kyndon jong ka ain.
title: Ioh kurup dawai Phensedyl bad shini ki shipai pahara khappud Meghalaya BSF

content: Ka lympung ïalehkai phutbol ba la tip kum ka Night Football Knock-Out Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Tbeh Jingshai Umroi Football Association kala sdang hynnin ka miet ha madan Umroi hapdeng ka jingshongkun bad shongshit kaba dei ruh ka sien ba nyngkong ba la pynlong ïa ka jinglehkai phutbol ha ka por mynmiet.Ïa katei ka lympung ïalehkai phutbol la wan ban plie pyrda da u Bah Damanbait Lamare MLA ka Umroi kum u kongsan, ha ka jingdonlang u Bah Shalan Sylliang President ka TJUFA, Lover Roy Lyngdoh Secretary, Bah PB Sylliang Rangbah Shnong Umroi Umdohbyrthih bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah.Ka jingïalehkai plie pyrda ha katei ka sngi ka la long hapdeng ka Bhoi Zone pyrshah ïa ka Clarissa ha kaba ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba shongshit bad itynnad bala wan ban sakhi ruh da ki spah ngut ki paidbah watla ka dei haka por mynmiet ban ai jingkyrshan ïa la ka jong ka kynhun bad hapdeng ka jingïakhun kaba jur naduh ba sdang ka kylla step haduh ka kylla miet ka Bhoi Zone kala lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka Clarissa da 2-0 kol ban rah ïa ka jingjop ba nyngkong jong katei ka lympung.
title: Shongshit ka phutbol miet ka TJUFA ha madan Umroi, pynliem ka Bhoi Zone ïa ka Clarissa ha ka sngi sdang

content: U nongïalam ka NPP bad uba dei ruh u Myntri Sorkar, u Rakkam A Sangma, myn ha ka 30 tarik, u la kam ba ka seng liang pyrshah ka Congress ka la long ka party ka bym donbor shuh ha ki thaiñ Garo Hills.Ha ka jingkitbok kit rwiang ïa u nongïalam uba la jop mynta la lai sien na Gambegre, u Saleng A Sangma na ka bynta ba u la ïoh ka ticket na ka bynta ban ïakhun na Tura parliamentary seat, u Rakkam u la ong, “Nga ai ka jingkitbok kitrwaiang ïa u hynmen baheh jongnga u Saleng uba la ïoh ïa ka ticket na ka bynta ban ïakhun ïa ka election Lok Sabha. Nga ai ka jingkitbok kitrwiang kaba bha na ka bynta ka jong u hynrei lada jop ne rem ka long kaei kaei kaba pher naba ka lah ban long ka jingphoh sniew na ka bynta jong u  hynrei ngim dei ban kheiñ troiñ ïano ïano kumba ka election ka dei beit ka elction.”“Hynrei ïa kaba mynta, nga kwah ban pyntip ïa baroh ba ka lawei jong ka Congress bad ka jingïakhih jong ka Congress kam donbor shuh,” bynrap u Sangma.“Ngam tip ba u Saleng haduh katno un lah ban wanrah ka jingkylla ha i por ba lyngkot dang ha ka shibnai mynta u dang ïa kynduh ïa nga bad ngi dang ïa kren halor kane ka mat, u la ong ba yn ym ïakhun hynrei ngam tip, u dei u ba donbok shisha ba u la ïoh ïa ka tiket ban ïakhun bad nga kit bok ïa u,” u la bynrap.Haba la kylli ïa u Rakkam, u la ong, “ka Congress ha Garo Hills  mynta ka la don u nongmih khmat, dei? Ki duna haduh 19 ngut na ka 20 ngut ki MLA ha Garo Hills. Te kumta, ka long kaba eh na ka bynta jong ki ban ïa khun ha ka election LS ka ban wan.”
title: Ka Congress kam donbor eiei ha Garo Hills: Rakkam A Sangma; Ai jingkitbok kit rwiang ïa u Saleng

content: Ki samla ryngkat ki khynnah skul na Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi ki la shim bynta shitrhem ha ka jingïakop dro kaba dei shibynta shuwa ka jingrakhe ïa ka International Water Conclave shaphang ka jingkordor jong ka um ban tyngkai bad ban pynneh-pynsah ïa ka na ka bynta ka lawei khamtam eh ha kine ki jylla ri lum jong ngi ba la pynlong ha District Library ha Nongpoh.U Bah MB Tongper uba dei u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka Ri-Bhoi District u la pyntip ba kane ka dei ka bynta ba nyngkong haka District Level ha kaba yn sa jied ïa ki nongdro kiba tbit tam ki ban ïoh pat ban leit shim bynta ha ka State Level. Shuh shuh kin sa don ruh kiwei ki jingïakop naduh ka Quiz, Public Service Announcement, Slogan Writing bad kiwei kiwei ha ka 3 tarik Rymphang, 2024, naduh ka por 11 baje ha Science Hall.U la ong ruh ba katei ka jingïakop ka dei shibynta jong ka prokram International Water Conclave 2024 ka ban sa long ha nongbah Shillong ha ka 9 bad 10 tarik Rymphang ha kaba ïa ki 3 ngut ki nongjop ha katei ka competition yn phah sha ka State Level bad ïa ki nongjop yn ai buskit T.20,000/-, T.15,000/- bad T.10,000/- ïa u ba wan nyngkong, ba-ar bad ba-lai.
title: Shim bynta ki samla bad khynnah skul ha ka ïakop dro ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka International Water Conclave ha Ri-Bhoi

content: U Director ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health & Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS), u Dr. Nalin Mehta u la hap ban mih na ophis trei kam jong u, ban panmap na ki nongïalam ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) kiba la byrngem ban khang tala ïa ka NEIGRIHMS, hadien ba u Director u la kren tohmet ïa ki nongialam ka seng ha ka jingialang ka ba u la khot ban pynlong mynta ka sngi.U Director ka NEIGRIHMS u Dr. Nalin Mehta, ha ka 31 tarik kyllalyngkot 2024, u la khot ïa ki nongïalam ka HYC ban ïa kren halor ki mat jingdawa ka seng, ki ba kynthup ïa ka jingpynlong eksamin thungkam Nurse ha NEIGRIHMS, halor ka mang 80% na ka bynta ka Group C bad D da ki trai jylla, bad kiwei kiwei ki mat.Hynrei kane ka jingïakynduh ka la poi sha ka jingbitar bad mih jyndat ki nongïalam ka HYC    hadien ba u Director ka NEIGRIMHS u la sdang ïa kane ka jingïakren da ka jingkynnoh ba ka seng ka la wan tang ban pynkulmar, kaba la pynlong ïa ki nongïalam ka seng ba kin bitar bad mih da ka jingdom na kane ka kamra.Na ka liang ki nongïalam ka seng ki ba la wan sha ka jingïalang tang 5 ngut ki la khot ïa ki dkhot jong ka seng ban wan sha NEIGRIMHS na ka bynta ban khang tala noh ïa ka NEIGRIMHS lada u Director um mih ban pan map na ki nongïalam ka seng.Dei hadien ba la wan mih ki Magistrate kiba la leit ban ïa kren ïa u Director, kaba la pynlong ïa u Director ba un wan mih shabar bad panmap na ki dkhot ka HYC bad kular ban pynlong biang ïa ka jingïalang ha ka sngi ba mynjur ki dkhot ka seng.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi u President ka HYC u Bah Roykupar Synrem, u la ong ba kane ka jingkynduh ka la pynbitar na ka daw ba u Director ka NEIGRIMHS u la sdang ïa ka jingïakren da kaba kynnoh ba ki la wan tang ban pynkulmar.“U Director u la khot hi ïa ka jingïalang hynrei u la sdang ïa ka jingïakren da kaba pyrshang ban kren ñiewbeiñ ïa ki nongïalam ka HYC, bad u khlem kren halor ki mat jingdawa, u la kynnoh ba ngi wan da ka jingmut ban pynkulmar,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “Kane ka la pynbitar ïa ngi bad ngi la mih da ka jingbitar bad ngi la phah ïa uba u dei ba un panmap shwa na ki nongïalam ka Seng bad dei da ka jingwan ki Magistrates bad ki bor pulit kiba la leit ban ïakren ïa u bad pynlong ïa u ban wan ban panmap ïa na ngi.”U Bah Synrem u la ong ruh ba kane ka dei ka khubor sha baroh ki Director kiba dei ban peit ïa ki tnad treikam ka sorkar pdeng ba haba ki wan ha ka jylla ki dei ban burom ïa ki trai jylla.“Ka seng kan dang buddien ïa ki tnad trei kam ba ka dei ban thungkam ïa ki trai jylla bad ki dei ban burom ïa ki briew ba dei ki trai jylla bad ka jingïalang hi ngin sa pynlong ha kawei ka sngi,” u la ong.
title: Ba kren lap lah u Director ka NEIGRIHMS bitar ki HYC: Hap hiar panmap u Director na ki nongïalam ka Seng

content: U Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka Home (Prisons), u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, myn ha ka sngi ba ar, u la pyntip ba ka sorkar shen, kan sa buh ïa ka jaka na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka central jail.U Dhar dang shen, u la ong ba la tyrwa ban shna ïa ka central jail ha Shillong township ba thymmai. Katkum ka jingkren jong u, la don ka jingïateh kaba la dep soi hapdeng ka tnad home (jail) bad ka tnad urban affairs department na ka bynta ka jingpynkynriah ïa ka Shillong District Jail sha ka Shillong township ba thymmai.“Hynrei, ngi la rai ban wad da kawei ka jaka naba don kiba la ai jingmut ïangi ba ngi dei ban ïoh da ka jaka ba long kynjah bad hato ka biang ne em ba ngin shna da kawei ka phatok ba thymmai, ki paidbah kin sa pyrshah. Te kumta, shen ngin sa rai halor ka jaka ba biang, kaba dei ban jngai na ka sor. Kan bha kata,” ong u Dhar.Ka jingïalang hapdeng ka Urban Affairs Department bad ka Home Department kaba la dep pynlong haduh lai sien. La mynjur ba ka Urban Affairs Department kan sa shimti halor ka jaka (ha kaba la don lypa ka Shillong district jail) ha ka jingpyn kylliang na ka bynta ka jaka ba thymmai jong ka Shillong Township ba thymmai.U Dhar, uba dei peit ïa ka tnad urban affairs, u la ong ba ka phatok na thymmai jong ka Shillong kan dei ka central jail standard, ha kaba ki koidi bad ki koidi ba hap hapoh ka jingshah kylli jingkylli, kin sa shah buh la ka long ka jong. Donkam ka jaka ba don haduh 25 akar na ka bynta ban shna ïa ka phatok ba thymmai.Haba la kylli, utei u Myntri u la ong, “Ngin sa pynheh ïa ka jaka ha Jail road hadien ba la pynkynriah ïa ka Shillong district jail.”U Dhar u la pyntip ba u la kyrpad ban pyndep noh ban shna ïa ka phatok ha Nongstoin Jail ban lait na ka jingkhap niah ha Shillong district jail.Shuh shuh, utei u Myntri u la pan ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingdonkam ban pynskhem ïa ka jingap pahara ïa ki phatok, kynthup ïa ka Jowai district jail na ka bynta ban ïoh jingïada na ka jinglait phettuh ki koidi na phatok.“Hadien ba nga la shimti ban peit ïa ka phatok, nga la pan da ka kaiphod halor ban pynskhem ïa ki nongap pahara hapoh ki phatok da kaba buh da ki CCTV bad ki briew ba don bor ban peit ïa ka phatok. Ngi la phah da ka jingkyrpad sha ka tnad bei tyngka ba kan pynbun shuh shuh ki nongtrei ban lait na ka jinglait phet tuh ki koidi,” ong u Dhar.Kum kiwei pat ki jylla, ka jylla Meghalaya shen, kan sa don la ka jong ka central jail.Ïa mynta, ka jylla ka don haduh san tylli ki district jail, kynthup ïa ka Shillong, Williamnagar, Jowai, Tura bad Nongpoh bad ka lah ban pynrung haduh 595 ki koidi shynrang bad 55 ngut ki koidi kynthei.
title: Pynslem ka jylla Meghalaya halor ka jaka ban shna ïa ka Central Jail

content: Kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap 10 snem jong ka Seng mynta u snem 2024 naduh ba la seng ïa ka ha u snem 2014, ka Blood Donation Cell jong ka HYC:CEC mynta ka sngi ka 31 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024, ka la pynlong ïa ka Prokram “Blood Donation Camp” ha Community Hall, NEHU, Shillong ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Transfusion Medicine & Blood Centre, NEIGRIHMS, Shillong, ka Meghalaya AIDS Control Society bad ka Meghalaya State Blood Transfusion Council.Ha katei ka prokram da ki phew ngut ki dkhot jong ka Seng ki la wan ban noh synñiang ïa ka snam kaba kordor ka jong ki ha kane ka Prokram kum shi bynta ban ïarap ïa kito kiba donkam ïa ka snam ha ki jingpang jingshitom ki jong ki.Na ka liang ka Blood Donation Cell jong ka Seng ka la ai khublei ïa baroh ki dkhot ka Seng kiba la wan ban ïa shim bynta ha kane ka Prokram bad ngi ngeit skhem ba lyngba kane ka jingai snam ka jong ki kan long ka jingkyrkhu ïa kiba bun ki mynsiem briew kiba kordor kiba lah ban ïoh ïa ka jingïarap lyngba kane ka snam.“Ngi ai khublei ruh ïa ki Doktor, ki Counsellor bad ki nongtrei napoh ka Hospital NEIGRIHMS kiba la wan ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam baroh na bynta kane ka Prokram bad lyngba ka jingïatreilang ngi la lah ban pynlong ïa ka Prokram kaba jop,” ka jingkhublei ba la ai na ka liang ka Blood Donation Cell jong ka seng.
title: Kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap 10 snem, pynlong ka Blood Donation Cell ïa ka Prokram “Blood Donation Camp”

content: Ki dkhot ka BJP, kynthup ïa ka Mahila Morcha Presidents na Meghalaya, Sikkim, Nagaland bad kiwei pat ki jylla northeast, ki la ïoh kynduh ïa i Kong Sylbi Passah, iba dei i nongïohpdiang ïa ka khusnam Padmashree hapoh ka ïingsah jong i. I Kong Sylbi i la ïohpdiang ïa katei ka khusnam, ha ka jingdon lang jong u nongkren ka BJP, u Bah Mariahom Khrakrang bad u Vice President ka jylla, u Gagan Jain.I Kong Sylbi Passah, iba dei i nongrwai ïa ki jingrwai tynrai, i la ïohpdiang katei ka jingithuh na ka bynta ka jingnoh synñiang jong i. Ha ka kam kaba i la trei, i Kong Passah i la ïoh nam da ki khusnam ba kynthup ïa ka Sangeet Natak Akademi, Indian Chamber of Commerce for Affirmative Action Front-Liners, Prasar Bharati appreciation bad ka Meghalaya Day.U Mariahom Kharkrang u la ong, “I Kong Passah i la pynshongshit ïa ki paidbah da ki jingrwai tynrai. I Kong Passah iba la ïohrah ïa ka khusnam Padmashree da ka sorkar ba synshar u Myntri rangbahduh, u Modi, i la wanrah ïa ka riti jong ki jingrwai tynrai bad pynpawnam ha India, kaba la paw hangne ba tang ka seng BJP ka lah ban ai nam ïa ka jylla Meghalaya.”Ka president jong ka Meghalaya BJP Mahila Morcha, ka Kong Susuki Pariat ka la ong, “Ka sorkar u Modi ka la ithuh ïa i Kong Passah kum ka riewlum na ka jylla Meghalaya kaba long ruh ka sakhi jong ka ‘sabka saath, sabka vikaas, sabka biswas’, kaba mut ba la kyllum lang ïa baroh, tei ha ka kam pynroi na ka bynta baroh bad jop ha ka jingshaniah.”
title: Ïoh i Kong Sylbi Passah da ka khusnam Padmashree ba la ai da ki dkhot ka seng BJP

content: Ki pulit ka Garo Hills ki la pynlong ïa ka jingleit wad ha ki khlaw jong ka Bolkinggre ha East Garo Hills kaba don sha shiliang jong ka Wah Simsang hadien ba ki la ïoh jingtip ba ka la don ka jingwan hap jong kawei ka tiar ba phylla na jrong ka suiñ bneng bad kaba ïa syriem ïa ka Parachute. Kane ka tiar ka dei na ka bynta ban thew ïa ka jinglong jong ka suiñ bneng.Ki pulit jong ka Anti Insurgent ki la pynlong ïa ka jingleit wad ha Bolkinggre hadien ba ki la ïoh jingtip ba la don ba ïoh tam ïa kawei ka tiar ba phylla ha Asiragre kaba hap hapoh jong ka Williamnagar Police Station. Ha kane ka jingleit wad la don lang ruh ki nongpynlip bomb ne ki Bomb Disposal Squard. Kane ka jaka ba la pynlong ïa ka jingwad, shisien ka la long ka jaka rieh tngen jong ki riew kiang atiar bad na katei ka jaka la shem ïa ki tiar pynbthei bad tiar pynmynsaw briew ba bun jait.Haba ki pulit ki la pynlong ïa katei ka jingwad bad jingtohkit, ki la shem ba uwei u briew uba kyrteng u Silnang R. Marak jong ka Arisagre kaba hap hapoh jong ka Williamnagar Police Station, East Garo Hills, u la ïoh tam ïa kawei ka tiar “Meteomodm PS-20 bad kawei jaiñ Parachute rong saw kaba ïa dei bad ka jingthew ïa ka jinglong ka suiñ bneng.Ïa kane ka tiar la shna da ka France. U Silnang R. Marak u la lap ïa katei ka tiar na kper jong u bad hadien kane u la rah noh ïa ki shapoh ïing. Ki pulit ki la shimti noh ïa kine ki tiar na une u briew bad pynbna ba kane ka tiar ka dei tang na ka bynta ban thew  ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka suiñ bneng bad ba ki paidbah kim dei ban sheptieng.
title: Lap ki pulit ka Garo Hills ïa ka tiar thew jinglong suiñ bneng

content: Kum shibynta ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ka projek “Green Economy Meghlaya” Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC ) ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka Meghalaya Basin Development Authority (MBDA) ka sorkar jylla, ha ka 31 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 ka la  pynlong jingïalang ha State Convention Center.Ka Green Economy Meghalaya ka dei ka projek ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki khlaw ki btap, ba ka Council kan ai da ka jingïarap pisa ïa ki nongrep kiba ïada ïa ki khlaw.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem, u CEM ka KHADC, u la ïathuh ba kane ka project kan long ka jingïatrei lang hapdeng ka KHADC, MBDA  bad ka jingïasnohkti lang da ka Rabo Bank Acorn bad ka Iora Ecological Pvt Ltd kiba na ka nongbah Delhi ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingthmu.“Ka jingïalang kaba la khot da ka KHADC ha ryngkat  ka Meghalaya Basin Development Authority (MBDA) ban ia kren halor ka Projek “Green Ecomony Meghalaya” kaba long ka jingthmu ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki khlaw ki btap da kaba kan ai jingïarap shi ki nongrep kiba thung dieng, kynthup ïa ki dieng latyrpat, ki dieng sohmarit, ki dieng kwai,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “Ka council kan ai ruh ïa ka jingïarap sha ki khlaw kyntang, ki khlaw ka Hima, ki khlaw kur, halor kane ngi la dep ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang bad mynta ka sngi ngi la khot jingïalang bad ka JHADC bad GHADC, kaba ki khlem wan, hynrei la wan shim bynta da ki nongïalam Hima.U la ong shuh shuh, “ban ïada ïa ki khlaw ki btap ki don ki aiñ na ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla hynrei kane ka sienjam ka long ban ïarap ïa ki nongrep kiba ïarap ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki khlaw da kaba ai da ka jingïarap pisa hapoh kane ka projek.”U Bah Pyniaid u la ïathuh ba haduh mynta la don haduh 28 ngut ki nongrep kiba la dep ban register ïa lade na ka bynta ka ne ka projek.“Kine ki 28 ngut ki nongrep kiba la dep ban register ha KHADC na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki khlaw kin long ki nuksa na ka bynta kiwei pat ki nongrep ba kin wan sha khmat ban shim ïa ka sienjam ban sumar sukher ïa ki khlaw ki btap,” u la ong.
title: Lyngba ka Green Economy Meghalaya, 28 ngut ki nongrep ba pynneh khlaw kin ïoh ka jingïarap pisa na ka KHADC

content: U Myntri  ba dei peit ïa ka tnad pule puthi, u Rakkam A Sangma myn ha ka sngi Baar u la ong ba baroh ki skul ki donkam ban pyndonkam ïa ki kot ba la ithuh da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBoSE).U la pyntip ruh ba ka sorkar ka dang khmih bniah halor ka jingïoh jingmyntoi bad ka jingbym ïoh jingmyntoi jong ka jingkyrpad ba la ïoh pdiang na ka Catholic Schools Association (CSA) kaba la kyrpad ban shah ïa ki ban bteng ban pyndonkam ïa ki kot pule lade.“Na ka bynta kane ka jingtyrwa, ym tang kito ki skul kiba hap hapoh ka CSA, hynrei ngi shah tang mynta u snem ban pyndonkam ïa ki kot pule lade namar ba ha u snem ban wan kata ha u 2025, baroh ki skul ki dei ban pyndonkam da ki kot pule ba la ithuh da ka MBoSE,” ong u Sangma.“Shuh shuh halor ka jingkyrpad na ka CSA, ka sorkar ka la plie ki lad ban ïakren halor kino kino ki mat. Ngin sa thung ïa ki komiti ban pule bniah ïa baroh kine khnang ba baroh ki kot ngin lah ban pule bad peit bniah, yn sa phah peitbniah ne examine bha shwa ha ki riew shemphang (experts) bad hadien kane ngin sa shim rai kumba ka long. Ka jingai jingmut  jong baroh ka long kaba biang tam,  ka rukom hikai kaba bha bad ki kot pule ba biang ki dei ban pule da ki khynnah pule hapoh ka jylla,” u la ong.U la ong ba ka la donkam ban don noh ïa ka rukom hikai kaba long ryntih la ha ki kot pule ne ha ki jinghikai ha baroh ki skul bad u la ong ruh ba ka tnad pule puthi ka la sngewthuh ba don ki skul ki don ha la ki jong ki kot pule lyngba ki nongpynmih (publishers) hynrei ka long kaba kongsan bad ba donkam kum ka jylla ban don noh ïa ka jinghikai kaba long ryntih bad katjuh lang ïa baroh, ha kaba lah pat ban pyndonkam da kiwei ki kot ïa ki supplementary sobjek hynrei ia ki major sobjek ka dei ban long ryntih (uniform).Ka sorkar jylla dangshen ka la pyllait ïa ki kot pule NCERT na ka bynta ka MBoSE ha Teachers Initiation Conclave kaba la long ha Tura.U Myntri u la pyntip ruh ba ka sobjek English bad ka Mathematics yn sa ïoh naduh ka 5 haduh 10 tarik Rymphang ha katba ka Science NCERT Meghalaya Edition yn sa ïoh naduh ka taïew ban wan.“Ka Cabinet ka la dep ban shim ïa ka rai ba ki kot pule MBoSE yn sa pyndonkam ha baroh ki skul kiba ïadei bad ka Board. Hynrei, na kadaw jong ka khapngiah por, bun ki skul kiba la dep ban thied (order) ïa ki kot pule kiba dei ban pynmih naduh mynshem snem, kumta ngi shah ban bteng mynta u snem. Naduh u snem ban wan ngin sa sdang pyntrei kam noh da ka kot pule ba la ithuh da ka MBoSE,” u la bynrapÏa mynta, u Myntri u la pyntip ba ka sorkar jylla kan sa pynlong da ka jingïalang ban ïakren la shem bnai bad kiba riew shemphang (experts) bad baroh ki nongïashim bynta bapher bapher (stakeholders) na rilum Khasi bad Garo na ka bynta ka jingpynroi ban pynwandur ïa ka State curriculum.Ka jingïalang kan sa ïakren ruh ha kano ka rukom ban ïaid shakhmat na ka bynta ban ïoh pynrung lang ïa ki riti ki distur, ka riti treikam jong ka khyrnit kaba 6 (six schedule) ka put ka tem tynrai, ki jingïalehkai tynrai ka ktien ka thylliej ha ka pule puthi, ong u Sangma.
title: Naduh u 2025 baroh ki skul ki dei ban pyndonkam noh da ki kot NCERT: Rakkam A Sangma

content: :Ki pulit ka Khanapara myn ha ka 9 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024, kumba 08:30 mynstep ki la ïohpdiang ka jingtip ba uwei u nongtrei jong ka MePTCL ba la tip kyrteng kum u (L) Bah Paimon Khongkrom uba dei u kurim jong ka Kong Keldaris Mawlong, u la bthat jubor ïa la ka jingim lade da kaba phasi da ka pla ïew ha ka jingkhang hapoh kamra jong u jong ka jaka ba u sah ha MePTCL kaba don ha Bara Killing Ri Bhoi District kaba hap hapoh ka thanad Khanapara.Ïa katei ka metïap, la dep weng noh hapoh ka jingpoi jong ki pulit lem bad ki bahaïing jong u. Ïa katei ka metïap, la lap da ki nongsakhi. Katba ki bahaïing ha sem bad ka kurim jong u ki la kyrpad na ka bynta ban phah leh ïa ka post mortem, naba kim suba sniew ne ïoh don kaei kaei kaba sniew bad ka kurim jong u ka la ong ba u kurim jong ka u don jingshitom ha ka liang ka pyrkhat pyrdaiñ, kumta ki la phah da ka jingkyrpad ïa u ADM Nongpoh bad hadien, u Bah Eric ADM Nongpoh u la dep phah da ka jinghukum na ka bynta ban pynïaid shakhmat da ka post mortem bad ïa katei ka met, la aiti noh sha ka kurim na ka bynta ban pyndep don burom khatduh.
title: Da ka pla ïew, dkhat u rangbah ïa la ka jingim ha Bara Killing

content: Ka South West Khasi Hills District Vollyball Association mynta ka sngi ka 11 tarik u kyllalyngkot 2024, ki la ïoh ban kitbok kitrwiang da ki jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ïa ki Rang bad ki Thei ïalehkai Vollyball jong ka District kata ha shwa ba kin leit ban ïashim bynta ha ka Meghalaya Game ka ban long ha Nongbah Tura.U Bah Elevenson Wanniang uba dei u President jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Vollyball Association u la ong ba kane ka  dei ka sien ba nyngkong ban ïoh ïashim bynta ban mih khmat napoh ka district sha ka Meghalaya Games wat la ha ki por ba la dep ki la don ki samla napoh ka District kiba don ka sap kiba la paw ha ki kam ïalehkai Vollyball.Namar kata ha kane ka kynti ba mynta ngi kitbok bad ngi don jingkyrmen skhem ba lyngba kine ki Samla kin sa wanrah ïa ka nam jingjop bad ka burom kan leit ym tang ha ki hynrei ïa ka District bad ïa ka Jylla hi baroh kawei. Shuh shuh u la kyntu ruh ïa ki ba kin trei shitom ban don ka mynsiem ïaleh bad kynmaw ruh ban long ki briew  kiba bud ryntih ïa ki kyndon ha ka  akor ban pyni  sha ka pyrthei ba kum ki Samla kiba la nang la stad kiba don ïa ka akor bad ka burom.Na ka liang u Bah Edilbert Ïawphniaw bad u Bah Sherbok Marbaniang kum ki riew rangbah jong ka thaiñ kiba ju ai mynsiem ha ki kam ïalehkai ki la  kitbok kit rwiang ïa baroh ki ban sa leit ïashim bynta ban kin lait na ki jingpang jingshitom ban ïoh ïa ka met kaba koit kaba khiah lyngba da ka jingdon ryngkat u Blei haduh ba kut jong ka jingïalehkai bad kyrmen ba ki samla kin sa wanrah ïa u soh jong ka jingkmen.Ha kane ka sngi la ïa donlang ruh ka Kong Balutmon Nengnong napoh ka District Sports Officer DSO Mawkyrwat u Bah Edilbert Iawphniaw, u Bah Sherbok Marbaniang kum ki riew rangbah, u Bah Elevenson Wanniang uba dei u President jong ka SWKHDVA bad kiwei de ki nongkitkam jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Vollyball Association ha ryngkat ki 18 ngut ki Rang bad ki Thei ïalehkai Vollyball.
title: Ha shwa ban leit sha Tura kitbok ka SWKHDVA ïa ki Rang bad Thei ïalehkai Vollyball ban wanrah nam jingjop ha ka Meghalaya Game 2024

content: Ka Byrnihat kawei na ki jaka sor jong ka Ri Bhoi District ha Meghalaya, kaba la paw pyrthei kum kawei na ki sor ha Meghalaya kaba buntam ki karkhana bapher bapher, mynta ka kynti ka Byrnihat ka la paw sha khmat kum kawei na ki jaka ka shnong kaba dap da ki lyer jaboh ki pum-pum bad kaba jaboh tam hapoh ka Ri India ha u snem 2023. Ïa kane la iathuh da ka kynhun ki ‘riew shemphang ha ka jingpynmih ïa ka kaiphod jong ki.Katkum ka kaiphod kaba la tip kyrteng ka “Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air”, ka la ong ba ka sor Begusarai ha Bihar bad Greater Noida ha Uttar Pradesh ki long ki sor kiba jakhlia bad ba jaboh tam. Kane ka kaiphod ka la ïathuh ruh ba ka Byrnihat ha Ri Bhoi District ka wan hadien jong kitei ki artylli ki sor.Katei ka kaiphod ka la ïathuh ruh ba ka Nongbah Delhi ka long kaba jur bha ka tdem jakhlia ha ka por tlang bad ka wan baphra napdeng kiwei ki sor jong ka ha Ri India.Uwei na ki dkhot jong ka CREA, uba dei ruh u na ki nongwad bniah jong ki shnong kiba don ha ki bynta ba shathie jong ka Dewbah Asia, u Sunil Dahia u la ïathuh ba kane ka kynhun ka la lah ban pynmih ïa kane ka kaiphod hadien ba ka la pynlong ïa ka jinglum jingtip halor ka jingdon jong ka tdem jakhlia ha ki 227 tylli ki sor jong ka Ri India ha ka snem 2023.Haba la pyrshang ban ïakren bad ki nongshong shnong bad ki nongshong dukan ha kane ka thaiñ ki la kubur ba naduh ba ki dang khie haduh da thiah ki hap ban ring mynsiem da kane ka lyer ba jaboh kiba mih na ki karkhana ba don ha kane ka thaiñ, ym tang katta hynrei ki jaiñ ki nep ki jaboh lut bad ki jingthung jingtep ki sniew lut, na ka liang jong ki kum ki riew paidbah ki la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar ba kan leh eiei halor kane na ka bynta ka bha ka miat bad ka koit ka khiah u paidbah
title: Ka Byrnihat ka dei ka shnong kaba jaboh tam hapoh ka ri India ha u snem 2023

content: U President jong ka Meghalaya NPP, u Marcuise N. Marak u la iathuh ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya ki shaniah ha ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma na ka daw jong ka jingtrei kam bha jong ka Sorkar, Meghalaya Democratic Allinacce-II ba  lam khmat da ka seng sain hima sima NPP.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingkynnoh jong u dkhot ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha, u Bah Vincent Pala ba ka Sorkar MDA kam shym la leh eiei, u Marcuise N. Marak u la ong ba kata ka jingkynnoh ka long kaba khlem nongrim. “Ladaka Sorkar MDA kam shym la leh eiei, kumno pat ka lah ban long ba ka NPP ka dang jop haduh kattei ha ka jingjied ia ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jongka Meghalaya ha ka snem 2023.Kane ka pynshisha ba ka Sorkar MDA ka trei bah hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma. Halor ka jingkam jong ka seng Congress ba kan jop ia ka Tura bad Shillong Parliamentary Assembly, u Marcuise N. Marak u la ong ba ha kaba ia dei bad ki kam sain hima sima, ki seng sain hima sima ki lait sha ka paidbah ban pan jingkyrshan bad ki paidbah ki ai ia ka jingkyrshan ka jong ki ia kito kiba seng kiba trei na ka bynta jong ki.Ka NPP ka la trei met bad mynsiem na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot bad ka bha ka miat jong ki paid bad kamk artatien ba ki paidbah kin ai jingkyrshan ia ka NPP. Une u nongialam jong ka NPP uba long ruh u Myntri jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya u la ong ba um i don kano kano ka jingkyrmen ia ka seng Congress, la ka long na ka bynta ka Sorkar Pdeng lane Sorkar jylla.
title: Ki nongshong shnong ki shaniah ïa ka NPP na ka jinglehbha ka Sorkar MDA: Marcuise N. Marak

content: Ka donmusa jong ka lympung ialehklai 5th Meghalaya Games mynta ka sngi ka la wan poi ha West Jaintia Hills District da ka jingpdiang sngewbha da U ophisar jong ka District Sports u bah K Passah ha ka jingiadon ryngkat jong ki samla ki ban leit iashim bynta ha katei ka 5th Meghalaya Games ka ban long mynta u bnai ha Tura. Ia kane ka dongmusa la aiti ha u Marlangki Suting uba long u nongialehkai football bad rah ban pynpoi ha Ummulong CHC.Ia kane ka dongmusa la rah sha Jowai da kaba iaid lyngba ki shnong bapher bapher.Ka jingrah ia ka dongmusa ka long lyngba ka Mihmyntdu lad college, Moorlong, Ladthadlaboh surok bah, Marian Hills higher Secondary School bad pynkut ha Ummulong Taxi Stand, Iawmusiang, Jowai. Kiba la rah ia kane ka dongmusa ki long u Deilang wa o Nongpluh, (Badminton), u Honda-ohi Pappang (Taekwondo), Ferdinand Suchiang (Wushu), Wankishwa Mawlong (Judo), kong Happiness Phawa (Athletic) bad  Marso Kyndiat (Athletic).Ia kane ka programme la pynlong ha Ummulong Taxi Stand, Iawmusiang   ha ka jingiadonlang u MLA Wailadmiki Shylla u Deputy Commissioners u B. S Sohliya, IAS, Superintendent of Police u C. Syrti, MPS, Nongstoin District Sport officer, East Jaintia Hills DSO, bad West Jaintia Hills DSO ki la iadong lang ha kane ka programme.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u Wailadmiki u la kyntu ia ki nongiashim bynta ba kin aiti lut met bad mynsiem ha katei ka jingialehkai.U la ong ba ki nongialehkai ki dei ban pyrshang bha bad pynleit jingmut khnang ba kin long kiba bit ban kheit ia u soh jong ka jingjop.
title: Poi ka dongmusa jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ha Jowai

content: Ka seng sain hima sima Congress ka la pynbna ba kan ym ia shim bynta ha ka jingplie ia ka Ram Temple ha Ayodhya.  Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor ha Congress Bhavan ha Shillong, ka nongaiktien jong ka AICC Spokesperson, ka Wing Commander ba la shongthait, ka Anuma Acharya, ka la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingtrei jong ka kum ka Wing Commander ha ka kam shipai liengsuin, ka la ioh ban leit jngoh ia ki jaka mane Blei, kum ki temple, ki Mosque.Mandir, Gurudwara bad ki Iingmane bad pynpaw ba ka jingngeit ka dei na ka bynta shimet bad ba kam dei ban iakhleh lang bad ka sain hima sima. Ka Acharya ka la ong ba kum ka Hindu Bramin ka sngewdei ban ong ba dei ban pyndep pura ia ka jingshna ia ka Ram Temple bad nangta sa plie pat ia ka. “Ka jingtei ia ka Ram Temple kam pat dep haduh mynta namarba ka jingpyndep ia ka bynta bashajrong duh ka dang sah bad kumno yn pynlong ia ka lehniam pranpratishtha.”, la ong ka Acharya bad bteng shuh shuh ba kane ka jingplie kyrkieh ka dei na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ka kam sain hima sima.Ka la ong ruh ba ka jingplie ia kane ka temple ka dei ban long haduh ka sngi jong ka jingrakhe ia ka Ram Navmi, kaba long ka sngi kha jong u Lord Ram. Ka Acharya ka la ong ba kane ka jingbymtreh jong ka Congress ban ia shim bynta ha ka jingplie ia ka Ram Temple ka long ka dak jong ka jingpyrshah jong ka Congress ban pynkylla ia ka kam niam sha ka kam sain hima sima jong ka BJP.
title: Pynbna ka Congress ban ym ïashim bynta ha ka jingplie ïa ka Ram Temple ha Ayodhya

content: U Myntri ka tnad ka thoh ka pule jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka jingpynlait paidbah ia ki kot NCERT Text Books kan long ha ka 25 tarik u Kyllalyngkot. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma un pynlait ia kine kot da kaba sdang na Tura bad sa pynbud pat na Shillong.U Rakkam A. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka jingpynlait ia kitei ki kot ka la dei ban long ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai, hynrei la hap ban pynkynriah noh sha katei ka tarik na ka daw jong ka jingwan jngoh jong ka President jong ka ri India ia ka Tura bad ia ka Shillong. Ka jingpyndonkam ia ki NCERT Text Books kan long ha ka English, Maths bad Science.U Myntri u la iathuh ba baroh ki jaka pule ki dei ban pyndonkam ia ki kot ba la bthah da ka MBOSE ban pyndonkam.
title: Yn pynlait paidbah ïa ki kot NCERT Text Books da u Myntri Rangbah Conrad Sangma

content: U Myntri ka tnad ka thoh ka pule, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka dang ap ia ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynlait ia ka pisa kaba ia dei bad post-matric scholarship jong ki samla pule.Ia kane la iathuh da u Myntri Rakkam A. Sangma ha ki nongthoh kot khubor.Ha Meghalaya ki don haduh 67,000 ngut ki samla kiba dei ban ioh ia katei ka scholarship. Napdeng jong ki, la don haduh 37,000 kiba la ioh ia katei ka scholarship.U Myntri u la iathuh ba u Sorkar ka dep ai ia ka Utilization Certificate sha ka Sorkar ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingioh pdiang ia katei ka pisa kaba ia dei bad ka scholarship.U Myntri u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ba ka Sorkar jylla ka la ioh pdeng 34 klur tyngka na ka pisa kaba ka dei ban ioh haduh 163 klur tyngka bad ia katei ka pisa kaba ka la ioh la dep ai sha ki samla pule.
title: Ap ka Sorkar Meghalaya ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynlait ïa ka post matric scholarship

content: Ka ophis jong u Block Development Officer, Mawkyrwat C&RD Block, South West Khasi Hills District bad ka Different Line Departments myn ha ka 11 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka “Janjatiya Gaurav Divas Campaign” halor ka “Hamara Sankalp Viksit Bharat Yatra” ha Upper Primary School, Pyndenumjarain Village, South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi la wan pynshai da u A. K. Tiwari, IRS, Deputy Secretary, Government of India u ba long u Designated District Prabhari Officer jong ka South West Khasi Hills District. Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïa don ryngkat ruh u Block Development Officer, Mawkyrwat C&RD Block, u Bah I. Lawrniang, MCS, bad kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar.Ha kane ka sngi la sdang ïa ka prokram lyngba ka jingkren u Myntri Rangbahduh jong ka Ri India lyngba ka Screen pynbud sa ka Hamara Sankalp Viksit Bharat Yatra Pledge Administered da u  Block Development Officer, Mawkyrwat C&RD Block, u Bah I. Lawrniang, MCS.Ha ba kren ha kane ka sngi u A. K. Tiwari, IRS, Deputy Secretary, u la pyntip ba ka sorkar India ka la pyllait ïa shibun ki skhim da ka jingthmu ban ïoh jingmyntoi ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Ri India baroh kawei.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban ai sngewbha da ki Certificate ïa ki nongseng kam seng jam la jong Self-Help Group (SHG) kiba la trei bha ha ki kam jong ki, kata ïa ka Kiewshaphrang Self Help Group (SHG) Pyndenumjarain Village bad kiwei de lyngba ka National Rural Livelihoods Mission (NRLM), Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana- Gramin (PMAY-G), Ha kane ka sngi ka la don ruh ka jingpynshai paidbah na ka bynta ki skhim ka sorkar pdeng na ka ophis  u Public Health Engineering PHE , Deputy Commissioner (Supply), District Medical and Health Officer, National Rural Livelihoods Mission (NRLM), na ka ophis u Superintendent of Fisheries bad na ka  Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) kumjuh na ka Bank’s shuh shuh la don ruh ka jingpynrung kyrteng ei na ka bynta ka LPG gas bad kiwei kiwei de.
title: La pynlong ïa ka “Janjatiya Gaurav Divas Campaign, Hamara Sankalp Viksit Bharat Yatra” ha Pyndenumjarain, SWKHD

content: Ka sor Tura mynta ka don hapdeng ka jingkhreh pynkhrum ban pdiang sngewbha ïa ka jingwan jngoh jong ka President Proupadi Murmu ïa ka Garo Hills. Ha kane ka jingwan jngoh, ka President Droupadi kan plie ruh ïa ka jingïalehkai 5th Meghalaya Games. Ka President Murmu kan sah tang shi miet ha Tura bad kan leit phai noh ha ka sngi babud. Ki bor Sorkar District ki la ïa bun kam, la ka long ha ka jingpynbiang ïa ka jingshongsuk shong shngaiñ lane ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynitynnad ïa ka sor Tura.Ka jingwan jngoh jong ka President Murmu kan long ka ban pynsah jingkynmaw ïa ka nongsynshar ba ha khliehduh jong ka India bad ruh ïa ki nongïashim bynta ha ka 5Meghalaya Games ha Tura. Ki paidbah jong ka Tura ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen kaba khraw ïa ka jingwan sah miet jong ka President Murmu ha Raj Bhavan Complex ba thymmai ha Tura.
title: Pynkhreh ka Tura ban pdiang ïa ka President Murmu

content: Ka Umpyrshin kam dei ka shnong hynrei ka dei tang ka kyntoit dong, kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih da ka shnong Huroi. Ïa kane la ong da u Bah Golden Marbaniang uba dei u Rangbah Shnong jong ka Shnong Huroi ïa ka Seng Kur Suchen.U Bah Golden Marbaniang hynne ka sngi u la pynshai paidbah halor ka khubor kaba la pynmih na ka Dorbar Kur Suchen, ba kan don ka Dorbar Kur jong ki ha ka 20 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha shnong Umpyrshin, u la pynshai paidbah ba ha kaba ïadei bad ka Dorbar Kur Suchen kan ïaid beit shakhmat ha katei ka sngi, hynrei ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynpaw kyrteng jong ki ïa ka jaka ha ka shnong Umpyrshin ba kin pynlong ïa ka Dorbar Saw Kur jong ki, na ka liang u Rangbah shnong jong ka shnong Huroi u la ong, ba ka umpyrshin kam dei ka shnong hynrei ka dei tang ka kyntoit dong Umpyrshin, Huroi kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka shnong Huroi. kumta u la ong ba ka Saw Kur Suchen ka dei ban pynbeit bha ïa kane ka jingbakla jong ki ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpynmih khubor jong ki.Kane ka dei ka jingpynshai na u Rangbah shnong jong ka shnong Huroi.
title: Ka Umpyrshin kam dei ka shnong hynrei ka dei tang ka kyntoit dong: Golden Marbaniang

content: TURA:Ka President jong ka ri India, ka Droupadi Murmu kan wan ban plie ïa ka jingïalehkai 5th Meghalaya Games ha ka janmeit  jong ka 15 tarik u Kyllalyngkot ha  P.A. Sangma Stadium ha Tura. Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka jingïalehkai, ka jingwanrah ïa ka dongmusa sha katei kajaka ïalehkai na Shillong mynta ka dang don ha shiteng lynti. Kane ka dongmusa kan tbeh jingshai na ka bynta san sngi.Ki bor Sorkar District ki la shna ïa ki jingker ïa ki jaka ïaid kjat shilynter jong ki surok ha Tura bad la don ruh ka jingwan ïa ki jingshai ding elektrik bad ka jingpynkhuid ïa ka sor Tura ban pdiang sngewbha ïa ka President Droupadi.Katkum ki tyllong khubor la ïathuh ba ka jingrah ïa ka dongmusa na Shillong sha Tura ka la poi ha Nongstoin ha 12 tarik u Kyllalyngkot bad shimti ïa kane ka dongmusa da u Deputy Commissioner bad District Sports Officers jong ka West Khasi Hills District. Ïa kane kajingpdiang ïa ka dongmusa la pynlong ha Anderson Higher Secondary School Upper New Nongstoin. Ha katei ka prokram, u Deputy Commissioner, u Bah Garod LSN Dykes, Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills u la shimti ïa ka dongmusa na u nongïalehkai Beningstar Lyngkhoi.Shuwa jong kane ka dongmusa la rah da lai ngut ki nongïalehkai, kita ki dei u Banjoplang Wanniang, u Aibanpynshailin Nongbri bad u Donald Nongtnger bad ïaid lyngba ki shnong jong ka  Nonbah Junction, Nongstion Market Complex bad pynkut pat ha NRL Petrol Pump New Nongstion. Ïa kane ka dongmusa yn rah sha Williamnagar bad hadien kane, yn pynpoi sha Tura.
title: Yn plie ka President Murmu ïa ka jingïalehkai 5th Meghalaya Games ha Tura

content: U President ka Khun Hynniewtrep Awakening Movement (KHNAM), u Bah Thomas Passah haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor myn ha ka 11 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, u la pyntip ba ha ka MP election ka KHNAM kan ai jingkyrshan ïa ka party ka bym don jingïadei eiei bad ka Bhratiya Janata Party (BJP) namar ngim hun ïa ka jingshynshar shilliang khmat ka BJP hapoh ka Sorkar Pdeng.Na ka liang u Bah Thomas u la ong ba haba ka party ka la rai ban treh ban ïakhun ïa ka MLA ka MP election lei kam don jingmut, bad ngin shim khia tang na ka shlem ka District Council namar ka KHNAM la thaw thik tang na ka bynta u Hynniewtrep, bad ngim kwah ban leit sha Garo Hill ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka KHNAM, hynrei ka seng kan sa shim rai ïano kan kyrshan ha kane ka election MP.“Kum ka Seng saiñ pyrthei kan long kaba bakla ban shu shong khlem kyrshan ïano ïano hynrei ka KHNAM hi kum ka kyrteng kan ym treh ban kyrshan ïa kano kano ka Party kaba don bynta bad ka BJP, ngi la ïohi ka jingshynshar shilliang khmat ka BJP kumta ngim kwah shuh ba ka BJP kan jop biang ha ka sorkar kmie ngi kwah ba kan wan da kawei ka party,” u la ong .Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka MDC election, u Bah Thomas Passah u la ong ba, “ngi la ïoh ban pynthymmai ïa ka Election Committee hapoh ka jingïalam u Bah James MA Neng, bad ngi la ïoh pdiang ki ïa ba wan ban pan tiket na ki constituency bapher bapher hynrei kim pat dep ban bishar lut kumta ngi dang ap.”U la bynrap, “Ka jingthmu ka KHNAM ka long ban pynïeng 29 ngut ki kyrtong na ka KHNAM hynrei haba ong ban pynïeng 29 ngut kam mut khlem da bishar bha ïa ki kyrtong namar ka Dsitrict Council  kam don ïa ka Anti Defection Law, kumta ngi kwah ban bishar bha ïa ki kyrtong namar ngi kwah ban ïoh da kiba ïaid shah bad ïaineh khnang ba lada ngi jop ngin lah ban pyndep hok ïa kaba ngi kular sha u paidbah.”U Bah Thomas u la ong, “Ha ka election MLA la don 9 ngut kiba pan tiket hynrei ngi la rai ban ym pynïeng kyrtong ha MLA, hadien ba ngi la pyrkhat bha u paidbah u tip ba kiba bun hi ïa ka District Council ki ju pynlong kum ka jaka shong shipor ban jop MLA bad ngi ong ka Autonomous District Council hynrei ka jinglong laitluid ka District Council pat ka duh noh namar ka party kaba don ha ka bor ha ka jylla ka dei ka juh ka party kaba shynshar ha District Cuncil te ka don ka jingtuklar na ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka party kan don ka jingtuklar iïa ka rukom trei kam ka DC.”U la bynrap, “ka KHNAM 20 snem ka la ïaid lynti ka ïaid da ka nongrim ba skhem khlem pisa wat la ki ong ba ka dei ka party kaba tlot, kaba duk ka dei hynrei kum ka Movement ka pynhun ïa ka seng namar na ka por sha ka por ngi ju rah ïa ki mat ki jura la don election ne ym don bad ngi tur sha khmat na ka bynta ka bha ka miat ka jaitbynriew.”U Bah Thomas u la ong ba, “ka KHNAM kam kwah ban shakri ar kynrad kumta ka la rai ban ym pynïeng MLA bad kan shakri tang ïa ka District Council, namar ban ïoh hi ban shakri pura ïa ka jaitbynriew kan dei ha District Council. Kumta ngi kwah ba ki paidbah kin ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka KHNAM namar baroh ki party ki la don bynta ha ka sorkar jylla kumta lada ki kwah ban peit ba ka District Council kan don bor marwei ai ka jingkyrshan ïa ka KHNAM.”
title: Ha ka MP Election Ka KHNAM kan ym kyrshan ïa ka party ba don bynta bad ka BJP

content: Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) myn ha ka 11 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ki la leit ban ïa kynduh bad u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ban pynsngew halor ki lai tylli ki mat kiba ktah ïa ka jaitbynriew, kynthup ban pynkylla noh ïa ka 128 (I) AD Rule.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u President ka KHNAM u Bah Thomas Passah u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingïakynduh bad u CEM ka KHADC na ka liang ka KHNAM ka la ïoh ban ai jingmut sha ka Council halor ka jingap jingma na ka jingbym wanrah ka jingpynkylla ïa ka 128 (I) AD Rule.“Naduh 2016 ngi la ïakynduh bad ki CEM na ka bynta ban ïa kren halor ka 128 (I) AD Rule, kaba kren halor u briew uba donhok ban thep vote ha District Council bad ngi la dep ban thoh ban phah pynkylla halor kane namar ka dei ka aiñ kaba ap jingma ïa ka jaitbynriew,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “Kumta ngi la dep ban thoh sha ka District Council ba ka dei ban pynkylla bad pynskhem noh halor kane ka aiñ bad dei ban kdew shai ba  dei tang u Khasi uba don hok ban thep Vote ha District Council;  khnang ba lada don ba ujor sha ïingkashari kane ka aiñ kan ym ïap.”Haba batai halor kane ka 128 (I) AD Rule, kaba kdew ba uno uno u briew uba ïoh ban thep Vote ha District Council u dei ban long u nongshong shnong ka Ri India, u dei ban long uba la kot 18 snem ka rta, u dei ban don ha ka met ba koit ba khiah bad jingmut kaba beit, ym dei ban long u briew ba la shah pynrem ha ka ïing kashari lane ha kano kano ka aiñ, bad wat la ym dei u Khasi hynrei u dei u nongshong shnong u ba la sah 12 snem.“Halor kane ka bynta ngi la ïoh ban ïakren bad u CEM bad ngi la ai jingmut ba dei ban pynkylla noh ïa kane da ka bsuh lang ïa ka kyndon ba thymmai kaba kdew shai ba u, ba lah ban thep vote ha District Council, u dei ban dei na ka jaitbynriew Khasi bad pyndam noh ïa ka jingkdew ba un dei u nongshong shnong ba pura ka jylla,” u la ong .“Ha ka jingïakynduh bad u CEM u la ong ba kane ka dei ka ba donkam bha kum ka District Council bad u la kular ban shim khia ïa kane bad ka dei ka kam kaba dei ban leh noh marmar bad ngin sa ïakynduh bad u DCA Minister ruh khnang ban ym don kano kano ka jingma ïa ka jaitbynriew.”Ka KHNAM ka la ïakynduh ruh bad u CEM na ka bynta ban ujor halor ka jingshim dor ka Hima haba ki nongshong shnong ki leit ban shim ïa ka dulir Pynskhem na ka bynta ban register ïa ki jaka puta ha KHADC.“Kiba ktah ïa u paidbah halor ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Regulation and Administrationof Land Act 2021 kaba dei ka aiñ kaba ailad ïa ki trai jylla ban register ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap hapoh ka KHADC hynrei halor kane na ka liang ka KHNAM ka la wan ban jingujor halor ka jingshim dor haba ki leit ban shim ïa ki kot donkam na ki dorbar ki raid ka Hima ban register hapoh ka KHADC.”U la ong, “ka don ka jingbym ïaid beit namar kane ka aiñ ka batai ba katno ki dei ban shim ïa ka dor. Kino kino ki ba shim ïa ki dulir pynskhem kaba hap ïoh na ki Hima bad kane ka aiñ  ka kdew ïa ka dor ba donkam ban shim kat kum ka jingheh ka jaka. Hynrei ka jingujor hi ka long ba haba shim ïa ka dor na ka liang ka Hima ka shim ïa ka dor kaba heh kat kum ka Sq.ft. kane ka pynjynjar ïa ki paidbah.”U la bynrap, “Haba ym pat don kane ka aiñ na ka liang ka Hima ka ju register ïa ka jaka bad mynta ba la wan kane ka aiñ, hato ka Hima ka shim ïa ka dor ban register ne ban ai dulir pynskem kane kam shai. Namar kane ka aiñ ka kdew ba ka Hima kam lah shuh ban register ïa ka jaka hynrei hap beit ban register tang ha District Council namar lada u juh u briew, ka juh ka jaka un hap ban register ha ka Hima bad ha DC bad lada ka long kumne kan wanrah jingeh namar ka jingheh ka dor bad ka jingdon ki jyrwit jyrwat lehse kiba bun ki paidbah ki lah ban leit register noh sha DC ophis te kane ka aiñ kan ïap noh.”Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane na ka liang u Pyniaid Syiem u la kular ban shim khia bad un sa pynbeit bad ki bor ba dei peit.Kawei ka mat ka ba la pynsngew da ka KHNAM ha khmat u CEM ka long halor ka Trading Laisen kat kum ka Section 10 (2) United Khasi Jiantia Hills District Trading by Non-Tribal Regulation Act 1954, bad na ka liang ka KHNAM ka la kyntu ïa u CEM ban kyntu ïa ka Council ban sangeh noh ban ai trading laisen ïa kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew.“La ka dei ha Iewduh, Khanapara, Umsning, Nongpoh bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka kiba i donkam ban yn ym ai trading laisen shuh sha ki bar jylla khang ba ki Khasi hi kin ïoh ïa ka lad ka lynti ban leh ïa ki kam khaïi ha ka jylla.”
title: Ka 128 (I) AD Rule ka buh jingma ïa ka jaitbynriew donkam ban pynkylla noh, ong ka KHNAM

content: Ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka sngi kala pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbym don u Block Development Officer ba pura ha Umsning C&RD Block ba la buh jingeh ïa kiba bun ki Rangbah Shnong ban pyndep ïa ki kam ki jam khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka pisa ka pilaiñ.U Bah BB Makdoh uba dei u Chairman ka Synjuk ki Rangbah Shnong Ri-Bhoi District ha ka jingdonlang ki Rangbah shnong jong ka Ribhoi u la ong ba kum ka Synjuk ki pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia ba tang ha ki 5 bnai haduh 4 ngut la pynkylla ïa ki BDO ha Umsning C&RD Block. Kaba la buh jingeh shi katdei ia ki paidbah kane ka thaiñ halor ka jingbym don u BDO ba pura ban shimti īa ka shuki ban íaid beit ki kam  ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam pisa khamtam ba kum ki Rangbah Shnong na kylleng ki shnong ki la donkam ïa ka pisa ha kaba ïadei bad ki skhim bapher bapher naduh ka SRWP, MP skhim bad kumjuh ruh ka skhim MNREGA ba dei ban íoh naduh shuwa ka Khristmas.Na ka liang  ka Synjuk ka la dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban thung mardor da u BDO ba pura uba lah ban trei pura bad thikna ïa ma kam ba la bynshet ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah kiba leit donkam ha katei ka ophis treikam sorkar.
title: Sngewkhia ka Synjuk ki Rangbah shnong bym don BDO ba pura ha Umsning Block

content: U Myntri ka tnad jong ka koit jong ka Sorkar Pdeng, u Dr. Mansukh Mandaviya u la plie bad aiti na ka bynta ka jingpyndonkam jong ki paidbah ïa ka National Institute of Pharmaceutical Education and Research ba thymmai ha Guwahati bad buh ruh ïa u mawnongrim jong ka NIPER Hyderabad bad NIPER Raebareli da kaba pyndonkam ïa ki kor ki bor lad pathai khubor ka juk mynta.U Dr. Mansukh Mandaviya u la plie bad buh ruh ki mawnongrim na ka bynta ki jingtei badki project kiba ïa dei bad ka koit ka khiah ha Arunachal Pradesh, Assam, Manipur, Meghalaya, Mizoram, Nagaland bad Tripura.Ha kaba ïa dei bad kane, ka Myntri jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la plie ïa ka Integrated Public Health Laboratory (IPHL) hapoh ka jingtrei kam jong ka PM-ABHIM ha Pasteur Institute, Shillong.Hapoh jong ka PM-ABHIM jong u snem 2021-2026, ka Myntri ka la ïathuh ba ka jingshna ïa ka Critical Care Block (CCB) bad Integrated Public Health Laboratory (IPHL) kan long ha ki hynñiew tylli ki district jong ka Meghalaya.U Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Dr. Himanta Biswa Sarma, u Myntri Rangbah ka Tripura u Manik Saha bad u Myntri Khynnah jong ka tnad Chemicals & Fertilizers and New & Renewable Energy jong ka Sorkar Pdeng u Bhagwanth Khuba ki la ïa don lang ha katei ka prokram.
title: Plie bad buh mawnongrim u Dr. Mansukh Mandaviya ïa ki jaka ai jingsumar ha ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi

content: SHILLONG:Ki samla pule jong ka Meghalaya kiba don da ki hajar ngut mynta ki la ïoh ban pynhiar mynsiem hadien ba u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ai ïa ka jingmynjur jong u ban pyllait noh ïa baibam jong ki samla pule, ïa kaba la tip kum ka Post Matric Scholarship.Haba pyntip lyngba ka lad pathai “X”, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pyllait ïa ka pisa basah jong ka Post Matric Scholarship bad ba ka Sorkar jylla kan pyllait kloi noh ïa kane ka pisa sha ki samla pule katba lah.
title: Pynbna u Myntri Rangbah ba la pyllait ka Sorkar Pdeng ïa ka Post Matric Scholarship

content: Ka Bharatiya Janata Party’s (BJP) East Jaintia Hills Mandal ka la pdiang sngewbha ïa ka arngut ki riew pawkhmat bad kyrtong MLA 2023 jong ka seng Congress. Kita ki dei ka Jhanika Siangshai bad u Rangbah Shnong barim jong ka Tuber Kmaichnong bad uba dei ruh  u nongïalam jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP), u Bah  Jiedlang Sana.Kitei ki ar ngut ki la wan ban pynïasnoh ïalade bad ka BJP mynta ka 12 tarik u Kyllalyngkot. Ha kane ka jingpdiang ïa ki dkhot bathymmai, la don lang ruh u State President u Rikman G Momin, ki President barim, kum u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh bad Moina Sing Phyllut. Kiwei kidkhot jong ka BJP na ki district bapher bapher ki la ïa don lang ha katei ka sngi.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u State President Rikman G Momin u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka jingwan rung seng jong kine ki dkhot ba thymmai. Ki nongïalam ka BJP ki la pynpaw ba ka jingïatrei lang hapdeng jong ki kan wanrah ïa kiba bun ki jingmyntoina ka bynta ki paidbah.
title: Rung BJP ki dkhot ka Congress bad UDP

content: U Myntri ka tnad pule puthi ha ka jylla, u Rakkam A Sangma, mynta ka 12 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, u la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka Sorkar Pdeng lyngba ka tnad Tribal Affair ka la dep ban pyllait ïa ka Scolarship na ka bynta ki samla pule ha ka jylla bad ha ka taiew ban wan ka Sorkar kan sa pynlait noh ïa kane ka pisa.Haba kren sha ki u Myntri u la ïathuh ba ha ki khyndait bnai ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la ïoh ban pyllait ïa ka 1st instalment Scholarship na ka bynta ki 37,000 ngut ki samla pule bad mynta ka sngi ka la pynlait sa ïa ka 2nd instalment na ka bynta ki 67,000 ngut ki samla pule ha ka jylla.U Myntri u la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pyllait ïa ka Scholarship kaba long T. 41, 25, 00,000/- na ka bynta u snem 2022-23.Na ka liang u Myntri u la pynpaw ka jingkhublei sha ka Sorkar Pdeng bad kumjuh sha ki samla pule kiba la ïai shah ha kane ka bynta.
title: La ïoh ka Sorkar ïa ka Pisa bai bam ki samla pule, ha ka taiew ban wan yn pynlait noh ïathuh u Myntri

content: U Myntri ka tnad pule puthi ha ka sorkar jylla u Rakkam A sangma, haba pynshai halor ka jingkynnoh  Ka Akhil Bharatiya Vidyarthi Parishad (ABVP), Meghalaya, u la ong ba ka jingjied ïa ki nonghikai ka dei kat kum ka rai ki nongshim interview bad ka Sorkar kam don bynta eiei ha kane ka bynta.Lah ban kdew hangne ba na ka liang ka AVBP myn ha ka 11 tarik kyllalyngkot, 2024,  ka la phah da ka shithi sha u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ban dawa ban pynsangeh bad tohkit halor ka result ba la pynbna halor ka jingthung kam Assistant Teacher ha ki skul Lower Primary ka Sorkar kiba hap hapoh ka Dadenggre Sub Division, West Garo Hills hadien ba napdeng ki 34 seat 33 seat la ïoh da kiwei ki jaitbynriew ym ki paidriewlum . Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Myntri u la ong ba ka jingjied ïa ki kyrtong ka dei katkum ka jingbishar ki nongshim interview hadien ba la dep ban bishar kat kum ka jingleh bha jong ki kyrtong, bad ka dei ka Unreserved Category bad ka dei ka rai ki nongshim interview ym jong ka Sorkar.
