title: La jied ïa ki nonghikai kat kum ka jinglehbha jong ki ha ka interview

content: Tang hadien ba mih ka kaiphod jong u snem 2023 lyngba ka Centre for Research on Energy and Clean Air (CREA), ba ka Byrnihat ha Ri Bhoi District ka hap ha ka kyrdan kaba nyngkong eh hapoh ka ri halor ka jingjaboh jong ka lyer, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la shim khia ban teh lakam halor kane ka jingjaboh ka lyer, kaba lah ban ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah ki paidbah.Ban shim khia halor kane ka bynta ban pynduna ïa ka jingjaboh ka lyer ha katei ka thaiñ ba bun ki Karkhana ha Ri Bhoi District, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la thaw syndon da ka Committee kaba kyrpang na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka National Clean Air Programme (NCAP) ban khlieh da u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi na ka bynta ban ïa khun pyrshah ne pynduh halor kane ka jingïohnam halor ka jingjaboh bha ka lyer ha ka ri India baroh kawei.Ka sorkar jylla haba shim khia ban ïakhun pyrshah na ka bynta ban pynduna ïa ka lyer jaboh ha Byrnihat ka la pynmih syndon da ka jingthoh kaba dei katkum ka Vide Notification No. Env.2/2018/436 Dtd. 07/09/2021, ban thung kyrpang ïa katei ka Committee na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka National Clean Air Programme kaba long ka thong ban pynduna ïa ka lyer jaboh.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da ka sorkar jylla, haba pyntreikam ïa ka National Clan Air Programme kin sa pyntreikam ha ki bynta bapher bapher ban shim bynta lang na baroh ki liang khnang ban lah ban jop halor kane ka thong ban pynduna ïa katei ka jingjaboh jong ka lyer ha ka thaiñ Byrnihat.La pynpaw ruh lyngba ka NCAP, ka sorkar kan shim khia ruh ban pyntreikam na ka bynta ban pynduna ïa ka lyer jaboh da kaba pynbha ïa ki surok ha ka thaiñ EPIP ba bun ki Karkhana, ban ïaleh ban pynjyrngam ïa katei ka thaiñ da kaba ïada ïa ka mei mariang bad ruh ban shim khia na ka bynta ban tehlakam ïa ki Karkhana kiba pynmih bun ïa la lyer jaboh.Kaba kham kyrpang, ka sorkar haba pyntreikam ïa katei ka National Clean Air Programme, ka sorkar lyngba ka Committee kin sa pynlong ruh ïa ki prokram ai ïa ki jinghikai bapher bapher ïa ki paidbah ryngkat ki trai Karkhana bad kiwei kiwei ba ïa trei lang da ka bor sorkar na ka bynta ban pynduna ïa ka jingïoh nam ba ka Byrnihat ka dei kaba jur tam ka lyer jaboh hapoh ka ri India.Shuh shuh, ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board kan sa shim khia ruh ban wad bniah bad ban thaw ïa ki lad ki lynti na ka bynta ban bishar bniah halor kane ka jingjaboh ka lyer kaba la ïoh nam syndon ha ka ri India ba ka dei ka thaiñ ba jaboh bha ka lyer, ha kaba ha kane ka jingïakhun ban pynduna ïa ka lyer jaboh yn ïa treikam lang ruh naduh ka Center for Science & Industrial Research-National Environmental Engineering Research Institute (CSIR-NEERI) ban peit ban khmih halor kane ka jingmih ka lyer jaboh ha ka thaiñ Byrnihat.
title: Yn shim khia ka Sorkar Jylla ban teh lakam ïa ka jingjaboh ka lyer ha Byrnihat

content: Hadien ka jing mih ka kaiphod na ki stad wad jingtip ba ka Byrnihat ka dei ka shnong kaba ha khmat eh ha baroh ka wei ka Ri india ha ka ban pynmih ïa ka lyer jaboh kaba mih na ki karkhana kiba don ha ki bynta jong ka Assam bad Meghalaya kaba la wan rah syndon ïa ka nam ba ka Byrnihat kum ka wei na ka shnong kaba hakhmat ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingdon ka lyer kaba jaboh, kaba la wan rah shibun ki jingeh ïa ki riew paidbah bad ki nongleit nongwan ha kane ka jaka namar ka jingbym lah shah ka jong ki ha ka ban ring mynsiem, khamtam ïa ki trai shnong kiba shong basah ha ka ne ka thaiñ kiba hap ban im ryngkat bad ka lyer jaboh da ki phew snem.Mar ïa ïoh ïa ka khubor halor kane na ka liang ka Hynniewtrep National youth Movement  Ribhoi District hapoh ka jingïalam u President, u Samla Donald Muktieh mynta ka sngi ha ryngkat ki dkhot jong ka seng ki la buh da ka dorkhas ha khmat jong u ADC, u Bah M.B Tongper ban pynsngew ïa ka jingsngew khia kaba jur halor ka jingmih ka khubor ba ka Byrnihat ka shnong kaba rit eh hynrei ka wan ha khmat duh halor ka jingdon jong ka lyer kaba jaboh ha baroh ka wei ka Ri India.Na ka liang jong ka seng mynta ka sngi lyngba ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner Ribhoi District ka la buh da ka jingdawa ba ka State Pollution Control Board ka dei ban khmih bad ban shim khia bad peit bniah ïa kine ki karkhana kiba don ha ka thaiñ Byrnihat ba ki dei ban leh eiei halor kane khnang ba ki paidbah ba shong ha kane ka thaiñ kin ïoh biang ïa ka lyer kaba khuid.
title: Ka Byrnihat ka shnong kaba rit hynrei kaba jaboh tam ha baroh kawei ka Ri India

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, myn ha ka 4 tarik, Nohprah, u la pynlong da ka jingïlang bad ki heh jong ka NHIDCL, Deputy Commissioners, baroh ki tnad ba dei peit bad ki kontraktor ban khmih ïa ki projek ba dang ïaid ba la sdang da ka NHIDCL hapoh kane ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u MR u la pyntip ba ki kontraktor ki la shah bthah kam ban ai por ban pyndep ïa kine ki projek bad ban ïakren halor kino kino ki mat bad ki DC bad ki Department.Ha ka jingbiang ban tei ïing ha kane ka por tlang, ki heh ba dei peit ki la ïoh jingkyrpad ba kin shna la ki jong ki momentum bad pynthikna ba dei ban pyndep ïa ki projek ha ka por ba biang.“Ngi la dep peit lut ïa ki projek ba kongsan kiba la sdang da ka NHIDCL hapoh ka jingïalang bad kyrmen ba kito ki projek kin seisoh bad pyndep ha ka por ba la buh,” ong u Sangma.Haba la kylli shaphang ki jingeh ba ka sorkar ka mad ban sdang tei ïa kum kine ki projek, u Sangma u la ong ba la don ki jait jingeh bapher bapher kum ka jingshim ïa ka jaka, pynkhuid ïa ki khlaw ki btab, ka jingpynkynriah ïa ki tiar ki tar bad kiwei kiwei kiba la sorkar ka dang pyrshang ban ïakren.
title: Leit jngoh u MR ïa ki projek ba dang ïaid jong ka NHIDCL hapoh jylla

content: U Myntri ki kam pynmih bording elektrik, u A.T. Mondal u la leit jngoh ia ka jingtrei kam jongka Umiam Stage-I Dam ban peit ia ka jingtrei pynbha Dam Rehabilitation and Improvement Project. Ia u A.T. Mondal la synran da u Sanjay Goyal, uba long u Commissioner & Secretary ka tnad pynmih bording bad uba long ruh u Shongknor bad Managing Director  jong ka MeECL, ryngkat bad u Bah Moonstar Shangpliang, Director Distribution bad Incharge Director (Generation) kynthup ruh ia ki heh Sorkar jong ka Ri Bhoi District.Kane ka jingleit jngoh ka long ban peit ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka Umiam Stage-I Dam bad ruh ia ki artylli ki jingkieng pyllait um bad ban peit katno ka kam jong ka DRIP ka la iaid. U A.T. Mondal u la ioh ruh ban ia kren bad ki  ongmihkhmat jong ka M/S ITD Cementation India Ltd.Ha kaba ia dei bad jingshna ia katei ka bynta kat kum ki kyndon ba la buh da ka Sorkar. Ka Umiam Stage-I Dam kam dei tang ba la shna ia ka da ka dewbilat bad ki nar. Hynrei, ka tyllong bah ha kaba pynbiang bording ia ki karkhana bad ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya.
title: Leit jngoh u Myntri ki kam pynmih bording elektrik, u A.T. Mondal ïa ka Umiam Stage-I Dam

content: :Ka Sorkar Meghalaya ka la pdiang ïa ka Laboratory Test ba pyndep ha Assam kaba la pynthikna ba ki dawai kuli wieh” kim long kiba biang ban ai na ka bynta ki khynnah skul jong ka Meghalaya. Kane ka long namarba kine ki dawai kim kot sha kata ka kyrdang jong ki dawai babha kumba la buh da ki stad ka koit ka khiah. Ïa kine ki dawai la sam sha ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad ai ruh ïa ki khynnah skum ba kin dih na ka bynta ka jingpang wieh. Ïa kine ki dawai kuli la dep sam ruh sha ki Aganwadi Centre bad Hospital.Ka shithi ba kane ka lad pathai khubor ka ïathuh ba u Drug Inspector u la bthah ïa baroh ki hospital ba kim dei ban ai shuh ïa une u dawai wieh bad ba ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah kim dei ban pdiang shuh ïa kine ki dawai “Albendazole” hadien ba la dep pynshisha da ka Laboratory Test jong ka Assam ba une u dawai um pat biang ïa kata ka kyndon ba la buh. Ïa ka jingbym biang jong une u dawai la pyntip naduh ka 6 tarik u Naiwieng, hynrei ïa kine ki dawai la dep ai sha ki khynnah skul jong ka jylla jong ka Meghalaya naduh u Risaw.Kane ka jingeh ka la mih namarba ka Meghalaya kam don la ka jong ka Laboratory ba tei ïa ki dawai bad ïa kane la hap ban shaniah ha ka Assam bad ha ka juk ka por, ïa une u dawai la nangai ïa ki khynnah skul, katba ka test ka dang ïaid. La ïathuh ba ïa kine ki dawai la dep ai ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hill bad la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur ba kum kane ka jingjia, ka lah ban ktah ïa ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki nongpyndonkam. Ïa une u dawai M/S Maxtar BIOGENEICS at Khasra No.725, Malku Majra, Nalagarh Road, Baddi district Solan jong ka Himachal Pradesh. Ym tang katta, la ïathuh ruh ïa ka pisa kaba thied ïa u dawai Albendazole ruh la dep siew lut bad kane ka jong ka jingduhnong ïa ka jylla Meghalaya da ki klur tyngka. Kiwei ki jingkylli kiba mih ki long, kumno mo ka tnad ka koit ka khiah kan phah dih ïa kita kitei ki dawai kuli ban ïada ïa ka jingpang wieng khlem da pyndep ïa ka Test kaba thikna bad kaba lah ban pynshishai ba utei u dawai u long uba biang ban dih.
title: Pynsangeh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa u kuli dawai wieh

content: :U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ïa ka nam ka burom bad ka jingbun kyrdang na ka Geographical Indication (GI) ïa ka jingbha jong u shynrai Lakadong uba pynmih na Meghalaya. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma la ïathuh ïa kane ha ka jingkren jong u ha ka Dorbarbah ki nongrep Meghalaya Farmers’ Parliament ba la pyllong ha Convention Hall ha Shillong.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba saw snem mynshuwa ym don mano mano ba ithuh ïa ka jingbha jong u shynrai Lakadong. Hynrei, mynta ïa une u shynrai la ithuh da ka Geographical Indication ba u dei u shynrai uba bha, kaba don ka bor pynkhiah. U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ka jylla ka lah ban kot shaduh kane ka kyrdan, ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingbtin lynti jong ka Sorkar ban ïarap ïa ki nongrep jong ka jylla ban pynïaid ïew ïa ki mar ki jong ki, ym tang hangne ha ri India, hynrei sha kiwei ki ri jong ka pyrthei ruh.
title: Ïoh kyrdan Geographical Indication u shynrai Lakadong ka Meghalaya

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynsangeh pyntrei kam ïa ka Members of Parliament Local Area Development Scheme (MPLADS) ym tang ïa ka Tura, hynrei ha baroh kawei ka ri. U Chief Minister Conrad K. Sangma u la pynshai ïa kane hadien ba u President jong ka BJP ha Meghalaya u Rikman G Momin u la kynnoh ba ka Tura MP, ka Agatha K. Sangma kam shym la leh eiei ha kaba pyntrei kam ïa ka MP Skim ha Garo Hills. Haba ïada ïa ka Agatha K. Sangma, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh na ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynsangeh ïa ka MP skim hadien ba ka India ka la shah lynshop lynsher ha ka jingpang Covid-19. “Ym tang ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency kaba la shah ktah, hynrei ka ri hi baroh kawei”, la ong u Conrad K. Sangma.Nangta shuh shuh, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingpynsangeh ïa ka MP Skim ka dei da ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar Pdeng NDA ïa kaba la lam khmat da ka bad ba u Rikman G Momin u dei ban buh ïa kane ka jingkylli ïa u President jong ka BJP. U Conrad K. Sangma ka la pyndep ïa la ka jong ka kamram kum ka dkhot jong ka Ïing Dorbar Lok Sabha kaba mih khmat ïa ka Tura Parliamentary Seat, ha kaba ka la lah ban ïakynduh ïa ki myntri jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ha kaba pynïoh bad pyntrei ïa ki skim jong ka Sorkar India. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba dei lyngba jong ka Agatha Sangma la ïoh ban pyntrei kam ïa ki project jong ka MPGSY bad ïa ka ïa ka skim pynbiang Jal Jeevan, kaba kynthup ruh ïa ka jingpynneh pynsah ïa ki tyllong.
title: Ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynsangeh ïa ka MPLADS ha baroh kawei ka ri: Conrad K. Sangma

content: Ki nongleh bha ki la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa kawei ka dkhot rong lieh baphylla bad kaba ym ju ïohi koit na uwei u diengkseh ha Golk Link, Shillong. Ki khubor ki ïathuh ba kane ka dkhoh ka la sahkut ha utei u diengkseh haduh saw sngi na ka daw ba ka la shah kyllaiñ bad sohkyrdot hapdeng ka jingsangsot ha ki ksai kot kudi. Kine ki briew kiba la pyrshang ban pyllait im ïa ka dkhot, ki la ïathuh ba ki la ïohi ïa kane ka jingjia bad pyrshang ban pyllait ïa kane ka dkhoh. Hynrei, na ka liang jong ki, kim shym la lah namarba kane ka sim ka la shah sdien ha kliar jong utei u dieng. Da ka jingïarap jong uwei u khynnah la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa kane ka dkhoh. La ïathuh ruh ba, ïa kane ka dkhoh, yn sumar shuwa na ka daw ba la don ki dak jingmong na ki thapniang bad yn sa pyllait pat ïa ka sha khlaw.
title: Pyllait ki nonglehbha ïa ka dkhoh phylla rong lieh ha Golf Link Shillong

content: :Ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih, ha kaba la lap ïa ka metïap jong uwei u briew kaba la thiah ha ka ïew ha Mawkyrwat ha ka 5 tarik, Nohprah.Ïa utei uba ïap, la ithuh ïa u kum u Tyngshainlang L. Marshillong (30) uba na Pyndenspar, Jakrem.Katba ïa ka met jong u, la pynlong da ka jingtohkit bad la rah noh sha CH, Mawkyrwat na ka bynta ban pyndep ïa ka post-mortem.Haba la kylli sha ki bahaïing jong uba khlad noh, la ong ba ka kmie jong u ka la ïathuh ba u la dih bun ka kyiad ha kine ki sngi ba la dep bad khlem bam eiei naduh ka 2 tarik, Nohprah. U la mih na ïing ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi nygnkong bad la ïohi khatduh ïa u ha katei ka ïew ha ka sngi ba ar ha ka por 11 baje ha ka jingbym tip briew, katkum ka jingïathuh na ki pulit.
title: Lap metïap ha Mawkyrwat

content: :Hynriew ngut ki ophisar bad khyndai ngut ki pulit jong ka Meghalaya Civil Defence & Home Guards ki la ïoh ïa ka khusnam jong ka Commendation Disc bad ka syrnod na u Director General, Civil Defence, Ministry of Home, New Delhi hapoh ka jingrakhe ïa ka 61st Raising Day of Civil Defence and Home Guards.U M K Sangma, Joint Director jong ka Civil Defence, u R P Khongwar, Joint Commandant General jong ka Home Guards, B Mukhim, Senior Staff Officer, Directorate jong ka Civil Defence & Home Guards bad u B Kharkongor, Commandant, Central Training Institute, CD & HG, ki la ïohpdiang ïa ka khusnam DGCD Gold Disc, katkum ka jingïathuh na u Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards.U PH Shylla, Divisional Commandant of Home Guards, Shillong bad u G Kharumnuid, Junior Staff Officer, Directorate of Civil Defence & Home Guards, ki la ïohpdiang ïa ka khusnam DGCD Silver Disc.Kumba khyndai ngut kiwei pat ki pulit, kynthup ïa ki ministerial bad ki pulit ba phong uniphorm, ki la ïohpdiang da ka khusnam DGCD Bronze Disc.La dep sam haduh 225 tylli ki Commendation Discs bad ka syrnod.
title: Ïoh khusnam ki ophisar jong ka Civil Defence & Home Guards

content: Ka ophis jong u District Social Welfare Officer ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis jong ka District Legal Services Authority, Mawkyrwat myn ha ka 5 tarik Nailar, 2023 ki la pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka sngi jong ki briew kiba duna dkhot met ha Hall jong ka Maharam Higher Secondary School,Mawkyrwat ha kaba u Bah I Lawrynniang, MCS, Block Development Officer C&RD Mawkyrwat u la long u kongsan.Haba kren kum u kongsan ha kane ka sngi u Bah Lawrynniang u la ong ba ïa kane ka sngi la ju rakhe ha kylleng ka pyrthei ha kaba ïadei bad ki briew kiba don ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met bad ha kajuh ka por u pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ban ïa don ryngkat bad ki ha kum kane ka sngi kaba kyrpang. Ha kajuh ka por u la pynkynmaw ba kum ki briew ngim biang ha baroh ki liang, ngi biang hawei bad ngi duna hawei bad namar kata wat lada ngi don hapdeng ki jingduna ngim dei ban don ka jingsngewrem ne sngewpoh namar ba u Blei u la ai ha ngi ïa la ka bhah ryngkat ki sap ki phong kiba kyrpang kiba ngi dei ban pyndonkam na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jongngi hi. Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki don shibun ki riewkhraw ha ka pyrthei kiba hapdeng  ki jingduna ha ki dkhot met pynban ki paw hakhmat ka pyrthei da kaba pyndonkam hok ïa ki sap ki phong kiba u Blei u la mang kyrpang na ka bynta jongki. Namar kata u pynshlur bad ai mynsiem ïa ki ban ym pynsngew ïa ki jingduna hynrei ban ïaid shakhmat bad ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti kiba ka sorkar ka ai lyngba ki skhim bad kiwei kiwei ki jingïarap ba la mang kyrpang na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka jingim kaba pura ka ban ïa ryngkat  bad kiwei pat ki para briew bad ban poi sha ka thong kaba ka phang ka long ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla nangne shakhmat. Namar kata u la wer bad khot ïa ki ban weng noh ïa baroh ki jingsngew briew hynrei ban rai bad kut jingmut ban kiew shakhmat ban ïa kito kiba biang pura bad ban long ki khlur bad nongmuna ïa ka ri bad jaidbynriew baroh kawei.Ka kong Nosmi Hashah, kaba dei ka Advocate, Chief Legal Aid Defence Counsel ka la batai kham bniah halor ka Rights of People with Disabilities Act 2016 bad ban pynthikna ba ki PWDs ki dei ban ïoh ïa ka hok kaba mar ïaryngkat bad kiwei bad ban peit ba kim dei ban shah ñiew shiliang khmat ne duh noh ïa ka hok kaba ki dei ban ïoh bad ban ai ki jingïarap bad jingïada ïa kito kiba donkam ka jingïarap ha ki jingïatyngkhuh bad  ka aiñ khnang ba kin ym shah ïehnoh beiñ bad ban ïada ïa ki na ka jingshah  ïuh roit bad thombor. Ha kajuh ka por ka la wer bad khot ïa kito kiba donkam ka ïarap bad ïakynduh bad ki bor jong ka aiñ ba kin wan sha ka ophis jong ki da kaba pynsngew bad ba ka ophis jong ki ka kloi ban ïarap bad ai jingmut halor kita ki bynta.U Bah R. J Wahlang uba dei u Incharge UDID, u la ai ka jingpynshai halor u UDID (Unique Disability  Identification ) kumno ban aplai bad halor ki skhim ne ki lad jingïarap kiba kito kiba don ïa utei u UDID ki lah ban aplai bad donhok ban ïoh.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingrwai bad jingshad kyrpang na ki briew ba don ki jingduna ha ki dkhot met bad ka jingsamïki jingai sngewbha sha baroh kiba la ïawan ha katei ka sngi.U Bah E Tariang, uba dei u District Social Welfare Officer, South West Khasi Hills District u la ai ka jingkren lamphrang halor ka jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi.U Bah S. Lyngdoh, u MRW ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block, South West Khasi Hills District u la ai ïa ka jingkren pdiang sngewbha katba ka Kong B. Wanniang kaba drei ka Supervisor, District Social Welfare Office, South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat ka la ai ïa ka jingkren khublei.
title: Rakhe ka District Social Welfare Officer ryngkat ka District Legal Services Authority ïa ka sngi jong kiba duna dkhot met ha SWKHD

content: U Director General of Police (DGP) jong ka jylla Meghalaya, u L R Bishnoi, u la pyntip ba la don haduh 2.5 lak ngut kiba kyrni ha u drok hapoh kane ka jylla jong ngi.Haba kren shaphang ka jingwanrah ïa ki projek DREAM and BUILD ha ka sngi ba ar, u Bishnoi u la ong ba ka tnad Union jong ka social justice bad jingpynkup bor, ka la pynlong da ka jingwad bniah halor ki paidbah ha kane ka ri baroh kawei kaba kynthup lang kiwei pat ki jylla bad kiwei ki jaka ba hap shabar India(Union territories).“Ha u snem 2019 katei ka tnad ka la pynbna ba la don haduh 7.5 klur kiba pyndonkam ïa u drok hapoh kane ka ri jong ngi bad haduh 2.5 lak dei na Meghalaya,” ong u Bishnoi.U Bishnoi u la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka don ïa ka dak Golden Triangle, kaba kynthup lang ïa kiwei pat ki jylla, kum ka Myanmar, Thailand bad ka Laos, ha kaba la khaïi ïa ki drok.U la bynrap da kaba ong ba ka Meghalaya ka long ka jylla kaba lah ban wan rung wan mih ki bar jylla, mynta, pat ka la long ka jaka jong ki nongkhaïi drok.Utei u DGP u la kam ba ka jingkyrni ïa u drok ka lah ban lam sha ki kam sniew kum ka jingïakajia ha ïing ha sem bad ki jingjia aksiden.“Phin sa lyngoh ba tang ha Shillong, la don 4 haduh 5 tylli ki mukotduma halor ka kam ïa kajia ha ïing ha sem kaba la lap man la ka sngi ha ki thanad bad kumba 3 haduh 4 tylli ki jingjia aksiden kiba la jia tang ha ka nongbah Shillong bad haba ngi la tohkit, ka dei beit na ka daw jong ka kyiad ne u drok,” ong u Bishnoi.
title: Don haduh 2.5 lak kiba kyrni ha u drok ha ka jylla: DGP

content: :Ki EM In Charge ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) mynta ka 6 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ki la hiar ban khynra Trading bad Labour License ïa ki dukan jong ki bar jylla kiba don hapoh Ïewduh. Kane ka jingkhynra ka la jia hadien ba la mih ka jingujor na kawei ka seng ka ba la ai kyrteng kum ka Khun kynthei U Hynniewtrep Association.Na ka liang ka Khun Kynthei U Hynniewtrep Association ka la phah da ka shithi kaba khlem kano kano ka jingsoi sha ka KHADC bad sha u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem ban ujor halor ka jingkynrei ki dukan bar jylla ki bym biang ka Trading License, ka jingbym don Labour License, ka jingpyniaid be-aiñ bad ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa kawei ka Trading License na ka bynta ki ar lai tylli ki dukan bar jylla ha Ïewduh.Na ka liang u EM In Charge ka Trade, u Bah Gigur Myrthong ha ryngkat ka jingsynran u Bah Fantin Lakadong, u Bah Gabriel Wahlang, u Syiem ka Hima Mylliem u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem, ki ophisar ka KHADc bad ki pulit Enforcement ka KHADC, ki la leit ban khynra ïa ki kot ki sla na ki dukan ki bar jylla bad lap ba don na ki katto katne ki dukan ki bym biang ki kot ki sla. Kumta na ka liang ka Council ka la phah khang noh shwa ïa kine ki dukan bad ba kin bud ïa ki kyndon jong ka Council kum ba la buh.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor na ka liang u Bah Gigur Myrthong u la ïathuh ba kane ka jingkhynra la pynlong hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jingujor na ka seng Khun Kynthei U Hynniewtrep Assiociation, hynrei kaba sngew sih ka long ba na ka liang kine ki dkhot kane ka Association ki khlem wan mih sha kane ka jaka.“Wat la na ka liang ki dkhot kane ka Association ki khlem wan ban don lang ha kane ka jingkhynra laisen hynrei na ka liang ka Council ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra license bad lap ba don na ki katto katne ki dukan bar jylla kim don ïa ki kot ki sla kiba biang bad don na ki, kiba khlem pynthymmai ïa ki license, kumta ngi  bthah ïa ki, ba kin khang noh ïa ki dukan bad ban bud ïa ki kyndon ka Council” u la ong.U la buh ruh ka jingkyntu ïa kano kano kano ka seng kaba wan ban  ujor sha ka Council ba ki dei ban pynshisha ïa ka jingdon ka seng da kaba soi lane ai da ka mohor ka seng lane ba kin wan ban don lang namar lada ki phah ka jingujor khlem kano kano ka jingpynshisha ka Council kan ym treh shuh ban shim khia ïa kane.Na ka liang u Bah Fantin Lakadong, u la kyntu ïa ki para khasi kiba don ïa ki dukan ha ïew ba ki dei ban kiar ban ai wai dukan sha ki bar jylla, bad ki dei ban ïaleh ban seng hi da ki dukan.U Bah Gabriel  Wahlang u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingleit khynra ïa ka license na ki dukan bar jylla ka Council ka la bthah ruh ïa ki trai dukan bar jylla ba ki dei ban buh uwei u nongïarap trai jylla ha ki dukan jong ki. Kane ka long ruh kum shi bynta ban ai kam aijam ïa ki khunsamla trai ri.
title: Kino kino ki seng kiba wan buh ïa ka jingujor ha KHADC ki dei ban soi ne ai mohor ka seng: KHADC

content: :Ka Tyngnger District Presbyterian Church of India ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Skill Development Programme ba la pynïaid da ka SELD Committee Tyngnger District hapoh  ka Balang Presbyterian Nongtrai East Khasi Hills District ha kaba u Bah Lamphrang War Block Coordinator Deen Daya Upadhyaya Grameen Kaunshalya Yojana (DDUGKY) Mawsynram C& RD Block  u la ïoh ban pynshai paidbah halor kane ka skhim sorkar  ban ai jinghikai ei ïa ki samla  khamtam ïa ki long ïing kiba duna ha ka ïoh ka kot  kaba ki la pynlong hapoh ka Dorbar Hall Nongtrai East Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi la ïa donlang ruh u Bah Olland Singh Suin MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency, u Tbn T.S Buhroy bad la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u  Bah A.P Donshiew bad la ai ïa ka jingkren khublei da u Tbn L.D Donshiew.Ka jingpynlong ïa ka ne ka Skill development Programme ka dei ka sien kaba 3 kiba kynthup ïa ki 9 tylli ki balang happoh jong ka Tyngnger District ha kaba la ïoh ruh ban ïa shimbynta lang bad ki samla jong ka Balang Catholic.U Bah Suin ha ba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la ong ba ka jingpynlong kum ïa kine ki prokram ka long shisha ka jingmyntoi ïa ki khun samla jong ka balang da kaba ai khublei ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Balang Presbyterian naduh ki pastor ki tymmen basan bad ki nongkitkam ba kum ka Tyngnger District Presbyterian Church ka don ïa ka jing kitkhlieh ban pynlong ïa kane ka Prokram na ka bynta ka Skill Development ban kyntiew ïa ki samla ha ki kam ïoh kam ïoh jam.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ha man la u briew ngi don ha la ki jong ki sap ki phong bapher bapher hynrei ngi donkam pat ban pynbha ïa kata da kaba trei shitom ym tang katta, dei ban hikai lem ïa kiwei ruh khnang ba ngin lah ban kiew ha ki liang baroh  ban lah ruh ban seng kam seng jam ban kyrshan ha la ki jong ki kjat ban buh ki kharkhana shna kali, Furniture, suhjaiñ bad ban trei ruh ha ki  Company paher bapher bad kiwei kiwei de.Ka DDU-GKY ka kyrteng ba pura jong ka ka dei ka Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana ka dei ka skhim jong ka Ministry of Rural Development (MoRD) jong ka sorkar India kaba la bynshet ha ka jylla ka jong ngi lyngba ka State Institute for Rural Development (SIRD) bad la pyntreikam ha man ki Block Offices jong ki District bapher bapher. Ka DDUGKY ka ai jinghikai pyntbit khlem da shim jingsiew ei ei (Free Skill Training) bad pynrung kam (Job Placement) ia ki samla wad kam kynthei bad shynrang na ki thaiñ nongkyndong (Rural Areas) kiba dei na ki longïing ba duna ka jingïoh jingkot (BPL Family) kiba hapdeng 18 haduh 35 snem ka rta na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki longïing bad ban ïarap ban pynurlong ïa ka jingthmu jong ki samla ban ïeng ha la ki jong ki kjat.Haba batai u Bah Lamphrang uba dei u War Block Coordinator DDUGKY u la ong ba la sdang pyntreikam ïa ka skhim DDUGKY hapoh India ha ka 25 September, 2014 ha ka sngi rakhe ïa ka jingdap 98 snem jong ka sngi kha jong u Pandit Deen Dayal Upadhyaya. Hapoh Meghalaya pat la pyntreikam ïa ka skhim DDUGKY naduh u snem 2017 da ka State Institute For Rural Development (SIRD) kaba don ha Nongsder, Ri-Bhoi District. La pyntreikam ruh ïa kane ka skhim ryngkat ka jingïasnoh kti lang bad da ka jingïateh soskular jong ka Sorkar bad ki Project Implementing Agency (PIAs) kiba ai ïa ki jait training bapher bapher.Ka jingthmu jong ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Skhim DDUGKY ha kane ka jylla ka jong ngi ka long ban pyntbit ïa ki khynnah samla kynthei bad shynrang  kiba wan na ki longïing ba duna ka ïoh ka kot bad ban ai ruh ïa ki ïa ka kam ka jam ha ka jingsiew ba man la u bnai ha ka dor kaba biang, kaba mut ka dor jong ka jingïoh tulop ruh ba la buh da ka sorkar khnang ba kan nym long than kaba rit. Lyngba ka jingdon jong kane ka Skhim Ka Ministry of Rural Development ka shim ïa kane ka kabu khnang ba kan lah ban rat dyngkhong ïa ka jingkyrduh kam bad ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot ha ka imlang sahlang khamtam eh ha ki thaiñ nongkyndong.
title: Ban pynshlur ïa ki samla wad kam ai jinghikai ka SELD Committee Tyngnger District

content: :Kawei ka ïing kaba Don ha Mawpat kaba hap ha ka Dong Mot Circle 1 ka la kem ding mynta ka step jong ka sngi Balang ha ka por 8 duna eiei.Kane ka ïing ka dei jong ka Kong Virginia Nongkynrih, kaba la ai shong wai sha kiwei pat. Kane ka ïing ka don haduh lai kynrad ki nongshongwai.Ha shwa ba ki pulit pynlip ding kin wan poi ha kane ka jaka, ki shipai BSF ki la ïaleh katba lah bad trei shitom na ka bynta ban tem ïa ka jingklang jong ka ding.Ka daw jong ka jingkem ding kane ka ïing la suba ba ka dei na ka jingthut ka bording ilektrik.Ka ding ka la bam duh ïa ka jingdon jingem baroh jong ka ïing bad ha kane ka jingjia ym shym la don kano kano ka khubor kaba sngewsih.
title: Kylla dpei ka ïing ha Mawpat na ka jingkem ding

content: Ka Meghalaya State Watershed & Wasteland Development Agency jong ka Soil & Water Conservation Department t ka la pyllong ia ka jingiadie ia thied Self Help Group Mela kaba hap hapoh ka Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana Watershed Development Component  ha tyngkong jong ka State Central Library, Shillong.U Marcuise N Marak, uba long u Myntri ka tnad Soil & Water Conservation Minister u la long u kongsan. Haba plie ia kane ka prokram, u Marcuise N. Marak u la ong ba ka jingtrei borbah jong ki Self Help Group ka sakhi ia ka jingjop jong ka  PMKSY.U Marcuise N. Marak u la ong ba ka jingpyni ia ki mar ki mata lyngba ki basa bapher bapher ka pynshisha ba ki nongrep bad ki Self Help Group kiba kiba iaishah bad kiba skhem jingmut ha ki jingtrei ki jong ki. U la ong ba kane ka jinglah jong ki, ka pyni ba ki nongrep bad ki Self Help Group ki lah ban ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat, ym eh tang kata ka jingkyrshap pisa ia kid a ka Sorkar.U Myntri u la kyntu ia ki ba kin iai bteng ia ka kam jong ki, khnang ba kane ka long ka jingkyrshan ia ka jingim ka jong ki, ka jingpynneh pynsah ia ki tyllong um bad ka jingwanrah ia ka roi ka par jong ki nongshong shnong. Ha kane ka jingiadie ia thied, la don ka jingbuh ia ki hynriewphew tylli ki basa bapher bapher, kiba pyni ia ka jingpynmih ia ki jhur kiba khlem pyndonkam ia ka sboh dawai, ki jain bad ki tiar ba shna hi da ki nongshong shnong jong ka jylla.La don ruh ka jingpyni ia ka, ki ashar, ki musli musla, ki jingbam thiang, ki jhur, ki tiar ba shna bad kiwei.
title: La pyllong ïa ka SHG Mela ha State Central Library, Shillong

content: U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba kawei na daw jong ka jingbym lah ban sneng ban kraw ia ki khun ha ka por kaba dang biang, ka long kawei na ki daw kaba ialam sha ka jingdih ia u drok. U Conrad K. Sangma u la kren ia kane haba u la plie ia ki artylli ki prokram, kata ka DREAM bad BUILD ha Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong. Ka jingthmu jong kine ki artylli ki prokram ka long ban rat siengkhong ia u drok bad ban ai jngsumar ia kito kiba la ngop ha ka jingdih drok.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka la pyntrei kam ia kiba bun ki skim, kum ha ka liang ki jingialehkam, ka tem ka put bad ka rwai ka siaw bad ka jingtrei ia la ki jong ki kam khnang ba ki lait na ka jingduh drok.U Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ruh ba shi sien ki nongshong shnong ki buh ia ka thong ha khmat jong ki, kin ym phai dien shuh shane shatai. U la iathuh ruh ba lyngba ka prokram CM Elevate, ka Sorkar ka don ka jingpyrkhat kaba kyrpang na ka bynta kito ki seng kiba im sngi ban ialeh pyrshah ia u drok bad ruh na ka bynta kito kiba la lait na ka jingdih drok.U Myntri ka tnad Social Welfare minister u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Ampareen Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Mawkyrwat, u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh, Director General of Police, u L.R. Bishnoi bad kiwei ki.Ha kaba kren shaphang ka prokram jong ka BUILD, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya, ki long kiba kloi ban ia trei lang kum ka jaitbynriew bad na ki khlieh nongshong shnong ki don ka bynta kaba khraw ban kyntiew ia ka imlang sahlang. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ka tnad Social Welfare minister Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka ialeh katba lah la ka buit ka bor ban pynduh jait ia u drok na ka jylla.U la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ki seng trei mon sngewbha, ki seng bhalang, ki dorbar shnong, ki balang, kirangbah shong bad kiwei ki khlieh nongsynshar kiba la shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynduh ia u drok hapoh jong ka jylla.Ha shuwa jong kane, u Director General of Police, u L.R. Bishnoi ula iathuh ba ki pulit ki iatrei lang bad ki shnong ki thaw ban ialeh pyrshah ia u drok.Une u khliehduh jong ki pulit, u la iathuh ba ha kane ka jingialeh pyrshah jong ki pulit ia u drok, ki la ioh ban kurup ia u drok uba shongdor haduh 361 klur tyngka. Ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ula sam ia ka Chuaque kaba hynriew lak tyngka ha ka Mawlai Dorbar na ka bynta ka drug rehabilitation.
title: Ka jingbym biang ka sneng ka kraw ïa ki khun ka ïalam sha ka jingdih drok:Conrad K. Sangma

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la kular ba siew noh ia ka tulop jong ki nongtrei Emergency Contractual Workers jong ka Directorate of Health Service (DHS) kaba dang sah sa hynriew bnai. Uwei na kine ki nongtrei u Kasparlin Iawphniaw ila iathuh ia kane ka hadien ka jingiakynduh jong ki katto katne ngut ki nongtrei ia u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, kine ki nongtrei ki la iathuh ba kin burom ia kata ka jingkular jong u Myntri Rangbah ba ka Sorkar ban pyndep noh ia ka jingsiew ia ki tulop basah jong ki haduh ka 10 tarik u Nohprah. Kine ki nongtrei ki la iathuh ruh ba lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban pynurlong ia katei ka jingkular jong ka, ki lah ban pynlong ia ki jingiakhih da kaba shah thngan.  Shuwa jong kane, ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka la thung haduh 180 ngut ki nongtrei Contractual Workers ha ka por ba ka jylla ka la shah syllad ha ka jingpang Covid-19.Ka Sorkar ka la pynsangeh noh ia ka jingtrei jong ki ha ka 31 tarik u Lailur. Kine ki nongtrei ki la iathuh ba ha shuwa jong kane, ka la don ka jingkular na ka liang ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ba ka Sorkar kan siew noh ia kane ka tulop na dang sah hapoh ka artiew. Hynrei, kata ka artiew ka la iaid lait, hynrei kata ka jingsiew kam pat don.Haba kdew shaphang ka RTI ba la shem da u Bah  Disparsing Rani, U Bah Kasparlin Iawphniaw u la iathuh ba ka u Bah Disparsing Rani u la shem lyngba ka RTI ba ka Sorkar India ka la dep mang ia ka pisa haduh 43 klur tyngka bad kaei kaba la pynlyngngoh ia ki nongtrei Emergency Contractual Workers, ka long ba ka Sorkar kam pat shym la lah ban siew dep ia ki tulop ka jong ki.U Bah Kasper Iawphniang u la iathuh ba lada ka Sorkar kam lah ban siew lut ia ka tulop ba dang sah jong ki haduh ka 11 tarik u Nohprah, kine ki nongtrei kin pynlong ia ka jingiakhih jong ki ka jingshah thngan naduh ka 15 tarik u Nohprah
title: Kular ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban siew lut ïa ka tulop Emergency Contractual Workers

content: Ka klob Shillong Lajong kaba dei ruh ka klob ba mih khmat ia ka jylla ha ka lympung I-league mynta ka samoi 2023-24 ka la ioh biang ia ka jingjop ha la ïing hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem ia ka Churchill Brothers da 2-0 ha ka jingiakhun ba la pynlong ha madan SSA, Polo Shillong.Ka Lajong bad Mohammedan ki dei ruh ki klob ba khlem pat mad ia ka nam rem haduh mynta, kata hadien ba la dep mar 8 sien ki jingïalehkai.Haba phai ha katei ka jingïalehkai, la sakhi ba ki rangïalehkai ka Lajong ki ioh mynsiem shibun ban ïalehkai ha la ïing na ka jingieit ki paid nongkyrshan bad katkum ka jingioh jingkheiñ ki nongwanpeit kai ki la poi 6000 tam ha katei ka sngi.Ka jingiakhun ka long kaba itynnad bad baroh arliang ki la ïakhun ban pynkhih jar, dei ha ka minit ba 44 ka Lajong ka l khmat da ka shi kol jong u L. Bohham.Hadien ka kylla step, ka jingïalehkai ka la kham noh shiliynad ka Lajong ka la ioh shibun ki kabu ban pynkhih jar bad tang hadien 6 minit ba la bteng ka kylla miet, u rangïalehkai ka Brazil, u R. P. de Souza u la thep sa shi kol na ka bynta ka Lajong lyngba ka penalty.Lyngba katei ka jingjop ka Lajong ka la neh biang ha ka kyrdan ba 3 jong kane ka lympung I-league da kaba ioh 16 poiñ.Kane ka kynhun ba na kane ka jylla kan bteng biang ia ka jingïalehkai ha la ïing pyrshah ia ka Aizawl FC ha kane ka sngi U Blei, kata ha ka 10 tarik Nohprah ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: I-league: Khlem pat mad ka Lajong ïa ka nam rem, pynliem ïa ka Churchill Brothers da 2-0

content: Ka rep krai, ka dei kawei na ki jingrep kaba longdoh longsnan hapdeng hapdeng ki nongrep jong ki khun u Hynniewtrep Hynniewskum naduh ki por kiba mynhyndai hynthai. Ka rep krai kam long kaba shitom haba ianujor bad ka jingrep ia ki kiwei ki jynthung. Kane ka jaitbynriew jong ngi, ka la sdang ban iehnoh shadien ia ka jingrep krai hadien ba ki nongshong ki la dang ban ioh ban bam ia u khaw rashon. U krai u blad khyndiat ka jingmad haba ianujor bad kiwei pat ki jait jynbam. Hynrei, ngim pat ban klet ia ka bor teimet kaba u don ia ngi ban ai. Ki stad ka koit ka khiah, ki iathuh ia ngi ba ki bor pynkhiah bad bor teimet ba u krai u don ban ai ia ngi ki long ka ka Carbohydrate, Calsium, Iron, ka jngiada na ka jingpang klong snam, jingpang shini, jingpang Blood Pressure,  jingplang bampong, jingpang sniew, dap lyer, jingpang dohnud, pynduna khlein bad kiwei. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, u Myntri Rangbahduh ka India, u Narendra Modi u la pynsngew sha ki saw lyer jong ka pyrthei halor ka jingdonkam jong ka rep krai. U la ong namarba ka rep krai ka long kaba suk, lah ban thiar ia u krai bad lah ban pyndonkam ia u lada jia ba ka don ka jingkyrduh bam lane lada wan lynshop lynsher ka ‘nem sniew ha pyrthei. U Modi ula ai jingmut ia ki ri jong ka pyrthei ba ki dei ban phai khmat sha ka rep krai, kham tam ha kane ka por ba ka pyrthei ka don hapdeng ka jingkyrduh bam bad ka jingkylla syndet jong ka mariang. U krai u long ruh u jynthung, uba lah ban ialeh pyrshah ia ki jingkylla jong ka mariang, la ka long ka jingshit lane ka jingdaitthat jong ka mariang. Ka India hapoh ka jinglam lynti jong u Myntri Rangbahduh Narendra Modi mynta ka kynti ka rakhe ia ka snem 2023 kum ka snem jong ka jingrep krai. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka long ban pynsngew sha ka pyrthei baroh kawei halor ka jingmyntoi babun kiba ngi lah ban ioh na ka bynta ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ngi na kaba bam krai. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, ka Kong Suklin Dohling, kawei na ki nongrep jong ka shnong Nongtraw jong ka Khadar Shnong kaba hap hpoh ka Laitkroh C.D.Block, East Khasi Hills District   ka la nang jam kham shakhmat ban ia kiwei. Ka Kong Suklin Dohling ka la long tang ka nongrep krai, hynrei mynta ka la kylla long ka nongpynmih bad ka nongdie ia ka jingdih tei bormet ba ka pynmih na u krai. Ka jingsdang trei kam banyngkong jong ka ka long ban shu sdieh, shu tylliat bad ban bam ia u krai. Hynrei, lyngba ka jingioh jinghikai na ka Krishi Vigyan Kendra, Upper Shillong bad na kiwei, mynta ka la lah ban pynmih ia ki jingdih teimet na u krai. Ka Kong Suklin Dohling ka ai kyrteng ia une u jingdih Figner Millet Mall bad pyniaid iew ia u da ka kyrteng “Marbin Food” ban pynneh pynsah ia ka kyrteng jong i mei jong ka, i Kong  Martha bad i kpa iba kyrteng i Bah Binson. Ka jingdie ia une u jingdih teimet ka pat long paidbah. Kiba lah ban ioh ki dei tang kito kiba shu order. Hynrei, ka Kong Suklin Dohling, ka angnud ban pyniaid paid ia une u jingdih teimet hadien habud. Ka Kong Siklin Dohling ka la ruh ban pyni paidbah ia une u jingdih jong ka ha kawei na ki basa jong ka Meghalaya Collectives ha ka World Food India-2023 ba la pyllong da ka tnad Food Processing Industry jong ka Sorkar Pdeng  ha Prakgati Maidan ha New Delhi.
title: Ka jingdih teimet Figner Millet Mall ka Kong Suklin Dohling

content: :U Bah Renikton L.Tongkhar MLA ka Mawkyrwat Konstitwensi mynta ka sngi u la leit ai da ka shithi Sha u Chairman ka Meghalaya Rural Bank U Ashish Yadav naka bynta ban kyrpad ban ïoh pynkha shnad trei kam ne ban ïoh plie biang ïa ki Branches ba thymmai ha ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat namar la ju sakhi bun ki jingeh ba ki paidbah ba ki hap ïeng da ki lain da ki bun kynta hapoh jong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank mawkyrwat South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi la synrang lang u Bah Jest Nongsiej Vice president jong ka UDP Mawkyrwat Circle Bah Polan Sohphoh bad u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.
title: Namar ki jingeh ki paidbah ïakynduh u MLA, U Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar ïa u Chairman ka MRB

content: U Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka jinglum khajna, u Bah Kyrmen Shylla, myn ha ka 30 tarik, Kyllalyngkot, u la ong ba ka tnad ka dang khmih bniah halor ka jinglah ban lum khajna na ka kyiad.U Bah Kyrmen u la ong ba kane ka kynthup ïa ka jingpeit thuh halor ka jinglait ei ka khajna khamtam na ka jingdie ïa ka kyiad lyngba ki kor ki bor komputar khnang ban pynbiang ïa ka jingkheiñ jingdiah halor ka jingbuh rekod ïa ki khajna, ong u Shylla.U Shylla u la pynshai dang shen, ba ym par don ki sakhi satar halor ka jinglait tuh ka jinglum khajna. U la ban jur ba lyngba ki kor ki bor komputar, yn lah ban tip ïa kano kano ka jinglait ei ka khajna bad kan pynsngewthuh ïa ki halor ka jinglum ïa ka khajna.“Da kaba pynithuh da ki kor ki bor komputar, lada don kano kano ka jinglait ei, ngin lah ban lap bad ruh ngin sngewthuh ïa ka jinglum khajna,” ong u Shylla.Da kaba pdiang ba katei ka jingtyrwa ka dang sah teng na ka liang ki Myntri sorkar ban ai lad bad donkam ka jingkyrshan ha ka liang ka pisa, u Shylla u la pynpaw ba u shaniah ba, lada khlem kano kano ka jingkynrum kynram, ka jingpyntreikam kan nym seisoh.Da kaba pynpaw halor ka jingthmu jong ki ban pynkiew bad kyrshan man la u snem ïa ka financial year, u Shylla u la ong kumne, “Ka jingïohi jngai jong ngi ka long ban pynkhyllie ïa ka jinglum khajna.”Da kaba kren halor ka jingrai ka sorkar ban shah ban shna ïa ka waiñ ha ïing lajong, u Shylla u la ïaroh ba ka long kum ka jingpynïoh jingmyntoi na ka bynta jong ki nongshna waiñ hapoh jylla. U la ong ba ka jingïohpdiang ka jingïaroh bad pynthikna ba ka jingkut jingmut jong ka sorkar ban kyrshan halor ka jingpynmih ïa ka waiñ, lem bad ka jingïohi jngai ban long ka jylla ba kongsan ban khaïi waiñ ha India.U Shylla u la bynrap, “Ka sorkar kan sa pynsuk ïa kito kiba don jingmut ban shna waiñ, da kaba pynbiang ïa ki da ki lisen bad ki kot ki sla ba biang.”
title: Lyngba ki kor ki bor komputar, buh u Kyrmen ban lum khajna na ka kyiad

content: U Myntri ka rep ka riang(Agriculture and Farmers Welfare), u Kailash Choudhary myn ha ka 30 Kyllalyngkot, u la leit jngoh ïa u “U Lum Sohpetbneng” (kaba mut u Lum ban kiew sha bneng) uba don ha Ri Bhoi district.Utei u Myntri u la kren shaphang ka jingdonkam jong une u Lum bakhuid, khamtam ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingngeit jong ka riti ka dustur jong kiba dang long Khasi ne Niam Khasi (kaba mut ka jingngeit jong ki riewlum paidbah Khasi ha u Hynniew Trep Hynniew Wasa) da u vice chairman, u Bah Paia Synrem bad u secretary, u Bah Sanjo Bareh jong ka Lum Sohpetbneng Committee, Seng Khasi Kmie.Halor ka jingtip bniah shaphang jong katei ka jaka, u Choudhary u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah jong ka jylla bad ka pyrthei baroh kawei ba kin wan jngoh ïa u Lum Sohpetbneng bakhuid na ka bynta ban shem ïa ka jingrakhe jong ka jinglah ban pynneh pynsah ïa une u Lum.
title: Leit jngoh u Myntri ka rep ka riang ïa u Lum Sohpetbneng

content: Uwei na ki nongïalam jong ka National People’s Party u Marcuise N Marak uba long ruh u myntri ka sorkar jylla u la kren shngaiñ ba ka NPP kan jop da kaba suk ïa ka Tura Parliamentary constituency bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka Shhillong Parliamentary Constituency. U  Marcuise N Marak u la ong ïa kane hadien ba ka Congress ka la pynmih ïa ki khubor jong kaba don jingkyrmen ban jop ïa ka Tura bad Shillong Parliamentary Constituency.Ha shuwa jong kane u kyrtong jong ka Congress na ka bynta ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency u ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka MP ba mynta ka Agatha Sangma, u la ong ba ka Congress kan ai reng tyngeh ban knieh ïa kane ka constituency na ka NPP. “Ngi ïohi ïa ka jingkhlaiñ jong u MLA Saleng Sangma bad ka NPP ka la long kaba la pynkhreh ban ïakhun ïa kane ka jingjeid nongmihkhmat sha ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ Lok Sabha na Tura. Ka NPP ka long kaba la pynkhreh ban ïa aireng ïa kino kino ki kyrtong wat la ki khlaiñ ruh,” la ong u Marcuise N Marak. Ha kaba iadei bad ka Congress, u Marcuise N Marak u la ong ba u artatien ba ka Congress ka lah ban thaw pyrthei. Kane ka long namar ba ka seng mynta kam don shuh ki nongïalam kiba khlaiñ. U Marcuise N Marak u la ong ruh ba ka Congress ka dei ka seng saiñ hima sima ba tlot ha ka dong shatei Lammihngi ha kine ki sngi ba mynta.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka BJP u Marcuise N Marak u la ong ba ka jingdon jong kane ka party kam ïahap dur ïahap dar bad ka jinglong jingman jong ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya bad ïa kane la lah ban ïohi ïa ka jingbym leh bha jong ka BJP ha ki election kiba ka dep.
title: Kyntait ka NPP ïa ka jingkam ka Congress ban jop ïa ka Tura MP

content: Kum shi bynta banpynlong ia ka jinleit jingwan kaba shngain bad kaba lait na ka jingtyngkhuh kalai, ka Reliance Industries Limited ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynshai paidbah niah kali  naduh ka 11 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 aduh ka 31 tarik u Kyllalyngkot ha ka dong shatei Lammihngi. Kane ka jingpynshai paidbah ka kynthup ia kiba b un ki jingai jinghikai da kaba wah ia ki jingthoh ha ki surok, ka jingsam ia ki kot jingpynshai bad kiwei kiwei ha ki 13 tylli ki  JCs (Jio Centers).Ka jingpynlong ia kine ki jingpynshai paidbah la pynlong ha Shillong, Dimapur, Kohima, Dharmanagar, Passighat, bad Aizwal JCs.Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingaijinghikai kaba iadei bad ka jingniah kalai kaba shngain bad kaba lait na ka jingiatyngkhuh kalai,bad khamtam eh ba ki nongniah kali ki dei ban don ka jingkit khlieh ha ka por ba ki niah kalai.Ia kane ka jngaijinghikai la ai ha ki nongngiahkalai,ki engineer ki nongpyniaid kalai ki nongdie kali  bad ia ki nong shna kalai ha ka thain shatei Lammihngi.
title: Ai jinghikai ka Reliance Industries Limited halor ka jingñiah kali kaba lait na ka jingtakhuh kali

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Mawkyrwat Circle myn ha ka 31 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024, ka la ïoh ban pynthymmai ïa ki nongkitkam na ka bynta ka samoi treikam jong u snem 2024-2027.Mynta ka sngi ka KSU Mawkyrwat ki la pynlong ïa ka jingjied ïa ki nongkit kam thymmai   da ka jingïathep vote ba la panbit pynbiang da ka Election Committee jong ka KSU-CEC Shillong ha ïing Dorbar Hall Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi la don haduh 19 ngut ki dkhot jong ka seng kiba la mih shakhmat ban ïakhun ïa kane ka election ban ïoh bat kum ki nongïalam ka seng na ka bynta ka Samoi treikam jong ka seng kaba 3 snem.Ha kane ka jingjied nongkitkam thymmai jong ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle ki la don kumba  34 tylli ki Unit ba ki la jied bad ban pynkhamti  nongïalam ba thymmai. Na ka bynta ka Kyrdan President ym shem la don kiba mih khmat ban ïakhun (Un-contested) kumta ïa ka kam President la ïoh da u Bah Rutherford Lyngdoh.Katba ïa ka kyrdan Vice President la jied ïa u Bah Puljonhstar Wanniang, General Secretary la jied ïa  u  Bah  Plosbor KharJahrin, Assistance General Secretary la jied ïa u  Bah  Shiningstar Lyngdoh, Organising Secretary la jied ïa  u Bah Teiborlang Kharwanniang, Education Secretary  la jied ïa u Bag Amos Kharjahrin, Publicity Secretary la jied ïa u Bah Pynshailang Snaitang,  Environment Secretary la jied ïa u Bah Brightstarland Khardewsaw,  Sports Secretary la jied ïa u Bah Shanborlang Kharbani bad ïa u Bah Marbilos Kharjahrin la jied kum u Office Secretary jong ka Mawkyrwat Circle.Ïa ki Nongkitkam ba thymmai jong ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle jong u snem 2024-27  la wan ban pyntian smai da u Samla  Lambokstarwell Marngar u President KSU Sengkmie ha ryngkat ha ka jingïadonlang ki rangbah shnong, ki seng samla shnong bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot sngewbha, ki dkhot ka seng KSU bad la pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh shuh ha kane ka sngi da ki jingrwai na ki samla ka thaiñ shuh shuh  na ka liang ka KSU Mawkyrwat Circle ka la ïoh ruh ban pule ïa ki mat trei kam kata naduh snem 2019 – 2023.Ha ba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang U Bah Lambokstar, u la ong “ka jaidbynriew u hynñiewtrep ka la shah pynpharia ha ki dohlieh ha ki por ba la leit, hynrei  hato ngi hun kum ki samla ha kane ka juk ba mynta ba  ngi la shah hiar thma sa ha ki dohïong?”“Ka jingjot ka jaidbynriew jong ngi mynta ka long ba ngi ïa tan tyllai para jaitbynriew, shibun ki mat ki jura ngi hap ban ïaleh bad shibun ki kam ngi hap ban pyntyllun ban wanrah ka jingkylla, ha ka shynshar khadar bad ha kiba bun tylli ki kam ba ngin hap ban ïaleh, ka KSU kam don  Suloi ban ai ha ki dkhot jong ka seng hynrei da ka jinglen lade ban aiti na ka bynta ki jingbha ka Ri bad ka jaidbynriew baroh kawei,” u la bynrap.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ka jingkren kyntu kynpham bad ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ïa ki nongkitkam ba thymmai da u Bah Kynpham Kharlyngdoh, u Bah Forwardman Nongrem u President KSU South West Khasi Hills District bad na u Rutherford Lyngdoh u President ba Thymmai jong ka Mawkyrwat Circle.
title: Ka KSU kam don Suloi ban ai sha ki dkhot hynrei tang ka jinglen lade na ka bynta ka Ri: President Rangbah ka KSU

content: Kum Shibynta jong ka International water Conclave 2024, pynlong ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner South West Khasi Hills District ryngkat ka jingïatreilang  ka Department of Arts and Culture, Government of Meghalaya, Shillong bad ka Department of Water Resource, Government of Meghalaya, Shillong ïa ka “District Level Painting Competition” halor ka phang pdeng “Water, Life and Future” ha ka Hall jong ka Maharam Government Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat, South West Khasi Hills District.Kumba 37 ngut kiba kynthup ïa ki khynnah skul kumjuh ruh ki riew shimet ki la wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka Painting Competition bad la lah ban ïohi ïa ki sap bad ka talent jong ki nongïashim bynta kiba la airong bad dro ïa ki dur halor ka phang pdeng.U Bah I. Lawrynïang, MCS, BDO ka Mawkyrwat C&RD Block u la ong ba ïa ka Painting Competition la pynlong ha shibynta jong ka International Water Conclave 2024, bad ban wanrah ïa ka jingsngewthuh sha ki nongïashim bynta halor ka jingdonkam ban sumar ïa ka um bad ïa ka mariang.Shuh shuh u la ong ba kane ka jingïakop kam long tang ka rynsan kaba ki nongïashim bynta kin pyni ïa ka sap ka phong ha ka ban dro dur bad airong hynrei kadei ban ai jinghikai bad jingpyntip ïa ki paid nongshong shnong bad ki para khynnah halor ka jingkordor ban sumar ïa ka um bam um dih kumjuh ïa ka mariang khnang ban im ym tang na ka bynta ba mynta hynrei na ka bynta ka lawei jong ngi.U BDO u la pyntip ruh ba ki nongjop ha kane ka District Level Painting Competition kin ïoh ka lad ban mih khmat na ka bynta ka District ha ka State Level ka ban long ha nongbah Shillong.
title: Haduh 37 ngut kiba wan ïa shim bynta ha ka International Water Conclave 2024 ha Mawkyrwat

content: U Myntri rangbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma myn ha ka sngi balang, u la ong ba ka jingweng noh ïa ka mukotduma pyrshah ïa ka seng Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) kan shong ha ki jait pa ki jait ki mukotduma.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u, u la ong ba um lah ban pynkylla ïa ki kyndon bad ki aiñ naba baroh ki long kumjuh ïa ki kynhun ehrang.Ka seng HNLC kam kwah shuh ban ïakren ïasuk bad ka sorkar, da kaba kynnoh ba katei ka seng ka la pulom ban kren shaphang ki san tylli ki jingdawa ba kongsan, kiba kynthup ïa ki mukotduma ba la weng noh pyrshah ïa ki nongïalam bad kiwei kiwei ki nongïalam jong kane ka seng.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Sangma u la ong ba ka mat ba ïadei bad ka jingweng ïa ka mukotduma pyrshah ïa kine ki ehrang, la dep ïakren halor ka jait pa ki jait mukotduma.“Don ki katto katne ki mukotduma(cases) kiba dei shaphang ka jingsniew. Te baroh, yn sa teh lakam la ka jong hynrei ym lah ban ïakren shaphang kine baroh, naba katkum ka hukum, la ong ba baroh ki mukotduma, la dep weng noh, katba ka shong ha ki jait pa ki jait ki mukotduma,” ong u Sangma.Utei u Myntri rangbah u la bynrap da kaba ong, “Don ki katto katne ki kyndon kiba dei na ka bynta baroh bad lada ngi pynkylla ïa kito ki kyndon na ka bynta kino kino ki kynhun, te kan eh ban don da kawei pat ka rynsan ba beit ryntih ka ban biang na ka bynta baroh ki kynhun, namar ba ym lah ba pynkylla ïa ki kyndon bad ki aiñ. Te, kano kano ka kyndon bad ka aiñ kaba ngi la pyndonkam bad buh na ka bynta kiwei pat ki kynhun, kajuh la buh na ka bynta ban ïakren ïasuk bad ka seng HNLC.”Haba la kylli, u Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la dep peit ïa kla shithi ba la phah da ka HNLC kaba la rai ban ïakren ïasuk ka ban dang bteng. “Namar kane, ngi la kyrpad ïa ki (HNLC) ba peit don bun ki jingïaleh jingeh, yn sa don ki katto katne ki jingjia kiban sa lam sha ka jingeh bad hynrei ka jingthrang ban ïoh jingsuk ka dei kaba kongsan bad ba donkam,” ong u Sangma.La bun bun sien ba ka sorkar ka dang plie ka lad ban ïakren bad ka HNLC, u Myntri rangbah u la kyrpad ïa katei ka seng ban shim rai bad bteng ban ïakren ïasuk. ““Ngi plie ka lad ban ïakren bad ïamir jingmut bad ngi kyrpad ïa ki ba ki dei ban bteng bad ka jingïakren ïasuk,” ong u MR.
title: Ka shong ha ki jait mukotduma lada weng ïa ka mukotduma jong ka HNLC: MR Conrad K Sangma

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Conrad K Sangma myn ha ka sngi Balang u la ban biang sa shisien ba ka sorkar ka long kaba la kloi ban ïakren ïa ka mat halor ka Meghalaya Lokayukta.Haba kren sha ki nonglum khubor, u Sangma u la ong ba baroh kynthup ruh ka seng liang pyrshah ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ki lah ban wan ban ïa kynduh bad ja sorkar ha kano kano ka pur ban ïakren halor katei ka mat.“Nga pyrkhat ba kane ka sorkar ka dei kawei na ka sorkar kaba plie lad plie lynti ban ïakren halor kino kino ki mat.  Ngim don jingeh baroh ki lah ban wan bad ban kynduh ïa ngi,” ong u Conrad.Na ka bynta ban pyrshah ïa ka jingshaweng kam, ka VPP dangshen ka la weng shipor ïa ka jingïakhih ban dawa na ka bynta ban thung kam biang ïa ki ophisar kiba la shah weng na ka kam hapoh ka Meghalaya Lokayukta hadien ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynthikna ban pynlong ïa ka jingïakren bad ki halor kane ka mat.
title: Halor ka Lokayokta: Ka Sorkar ka kloi ban ïakren bad ka VPP

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma myn ha ka sngi balang u la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya bad Assam kan bteng ka jingïakren ha ka sien ba ar halor u pud u sam na ka bynta ban khmih ïa ki hynriew tylli ki jaka ba dang sah.“Ngim tip lano yn pynbna ïa ka ilekshon hynrei ka jingïakren kan bteng katba lah. Hooid haba la pynbna ba ka ilekshon kan long kum ka diengpyngkiang na ka bynta baroh, hynrei ngin bteng ka jingïakren,” ong u Sangma sha ki lad pathai khubor.U Sangma u la pyntip ba u la dep ïakren shaphang kane ka mat khlem ka jingïoh jingbit na kiba halor bad u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Assam, u Himanta Biswa Sarma ha ka por mynstep myn shem taïew.“Kumba phi la bna, kum kine ki jingïakren, ka shong ban ïakren bad kiba halor bad ka shong ruh ha ki bym dei kiba halor. Don ki por ba nga bad u, ngi shong bad ïakren halor ki mat ba kongsan, te kane ka jingïakren jong ngi kan bteng bad ki jingïalang ba biang ki long ki bynta ba kongsan hynrei don ki jingïakren ba malu mala kiba…la jia khlem kino kino ki jingïalang ba malu mala, te kumta, baroh ki jingïakren, yn sa bteng,” bynrap u Sangma.
title: Yn bteng ka Meghalaya bad Assam da ka jingïakren ha ka sien ba ar halor u pud u sam

content: Ka sorkar jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka la rai ban khmih biang ïa ka Meghalaya Residents, Safety and Security (Amendment) Bill khnang ban pynthikna ba kan ïakren halor ka mat ba ïadei bad ka jingwan bun ki briew ha ka jylla kiba dei ki jaitbynriew bapher bapher bad ki aiñ ki kyndon ba la buh da ka sorkar.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Myntri rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma, myn ha ka sngi balang u la ong, “Ngim pat poi sha u pud jong ka jingbatai bniah, hynrei ngi la dep ïakren shaphang kane. Ngi la buh thong ban ïadon bynta lang bad ki nongïashim bynta bapher bapher, te ngim pat rai tad haduh mynta. Hynrei, ngin sa khmih bin pa bin halor kane ka mat bad kyrmen ban seisoh ka jingïakren jong ngi. Ngi buh thong ban poi sha kaba ngi thmu bad ngi burom ïa ki kyndon ba la buh da ka sorkar bad kiwei kiwei.”Myn shem snem, ka Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA) ka la pynphai noh ïa ka MRSSAB, 2020 bad la kdew hangne ba ka jingthmu ban buh da ki jaka ba biang lut nadong shadong ne ki facilitation centres ne ki check gates ba hap hapoh ka Bill kan sa ktah ïa ka jingïakhih jong ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya, kaba dei ka jylla ba lah ban ïaid lyngba ban pynpoi ïa ki mar ki mata.
title: Yn khmih biang ka sorkar ïa ka Residents’ Bill wat hapdeng ka jingwan bun ki briew bad kiwei kiwei ki jingujor

content: Ka Jaitbynriew kam dei ka nongkynti jongno jongno ne jong kano kano ka seng ne ka Political Party namar kata wat ïalehkai politics bad ka jaitbynriew. Khlem da kynthoh ïano ïano ne ïa kano kano ka Seng ne ka Political party nga kren kyllum lang ïa baroh. Haba phi don shisha ka mynsiem ban kyntiew ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew mano ban khang bad ban beiñ ban kynthoh lada phi ïeng ha ka jingshisha hynrei kumba ka long mynta ym don uwei ruh uba ieit hok ïa ka jaitbynriew. Bun ki mih ki kren shongshit tang ha surok ban pynpaw ba ngi nangbha ban kren. Hynrei ngim lah ban leh ban pyni ïa ki kam teng teng ngi kren shongshit tang shipor ka jingïaleh ne ka jingkren kam pat poi sha ka thong la kynran dien noh bad la sngap noh jar. Kaba nyngkong eh ngi dei ban sngewthuh kaei ka jaitbynriew bad kaei ba ngi dei ban leh na bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew. Baroh ngi ju ïa kren ïa kata ka phang bad bun kiba pyrkhat ba dei tang kita kiba kren ha surok kiba ieit ïa ka jaitbynriew.Kum ban shu comments ïa ka jingmih pyrthei jong ka VPP bun kiba pyrkhat ba dei satang ka VPP kaba ieit ïa ka jaitbynriew hynrei ka jingshisha kane ruh kam dei kaba ieit ïa ka jaitbynriew hynrei ka ieit tang ïa ka party la jong ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka party ym ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka jaitbynriew. Ka VPP ne ka UDP, HSPDP ne ki National Party ngi dei hi ki Khasi u Ardent, u Prestone, u Metbah, u Paul ki dei hi ki Khasi. Kam mut ba tang ba ngi leit pynïasoh bad kiwei ki Party la ki Seng Riewlum ne ki National Party ruh ba ngim dei shuh ki Khasi lane ba ngi leit die ïa ka jaitbynriew. Ka jaitbynriew kam dei ka nongkynti jongno jongno ngim lah ban thied ne ban die ïa ka. Ban ieit ne ban kyntiew ïa ka jaitbynriew ka shong ha ngi shimet shimet kumno ba ngin kyntiew ïa ka imlang sahlang ban trei mon sngewbha na bynta jong u paitbah na bynta jong kiba duk kiba jynjar bad ki khunswet bad ban kyntiew ïa ki riew donsap.Kawei pat ka bynta ba kongsan ban pynpaw ba ngi dei shisha ki riew ieit ri ngi dei ban don ka mynsiem ban ieit ïalade bad ban burom ïa kiwei. Ban ieit ïa U Blei ngi dei ban ieit nyngkong ïa ki parabriew ba ngin don ka mynsiem ban pynïatylli. Ban pynïatylli ïa ka jaitbynriew dei ban ïatylli ne ïasngewthuh jingmut lang nyngkong eh para nongïalam. Lada para nongïalam ki don ka mynsiem ïa bishni iwei halor iwei kumno ngin khmieh lynti ban pynïatylli ïa ka jaitbynriew. Lada para Nongïalam ngim don ka mynsiem ban ïatreilang kumno keiñ ngi lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingsuk ha ka jaitbynriew. Ka jingïakawang ktieh por election ai kan kut tang hapor election hynriew ynda kut election ngin ïatreilang ban kyntiew ïa ka jaitbynriew. Lada ngi ïaleh na bynta jong ka jaitbynriew ka jingjop kan nym long tang na bynta jong ngi kiba ïaleh ne tang na bynta jong kata ka seng ne ka party ba ngi mih khmat. Hynrei ka jingjop kan long ïa ka jaitbynriew hi baroh kawei la ïa kiba kyrshan ne ki bym kyrshan ruh. Haba ngi don shisha ka mynsiem ban ïaleh na bynta la ka jong ka ri bad ka jaitbyriew ngin ïeh shadien ïa ka jingsngew Party kam pher lada ngi dei na kano kano ka party ruh.Katba ngi dang don ka jingsngew party ka jingïatylli kam don namar ym baroh kiba ieit ne ki ban jied tang ïa kawei ka Party. Ngi don ka hok ban jied ïa kano kano ka Party katba ngi mon hynrei la ngi don ha kano kano ka party ngin kyrshan ïa ki issues jong ka jaitbynriew ym ïa ka party. Khatduh eh kam mut ba lada nga leit sha ki National Party kaba wan na bar ba ngan duh noh ïa ka jinglong Khasi bad ngan klet ba nga dei u Khasi.Kum u samla uba don ka jingieit ïa ka jaitbynriew la nga don ha kano kano ka Party ngan kren ïa ki issues jong ka jaitbynriew ngan kren ha ka kyrteng jong ka jaitbynriew ym ha ka kyrteng jong kano kano kano ka seng ne ka Party. Kyntang ïawai ngim dei ban leh politics ïa ka jaitbynriew tang na bynta ka jingmyntoi shimet ne tang ban myntoi ka Seng ne Party ba ngi don.
title: Wat leh politic ïa ka jaitbynriew

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka la pan jingpynshai na ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL) halor ka jingbym pynlong ia ka personal interview na ka bynta ka kam assistant engineer (electrical/mechanical) wat lada ki saw snem ki la iaid lait. Ha ka shithi ba la thoh sha u Director ka MeECL (Corporate Affairs), u Shongknor jog ka KSU Employment Monitoring Cell, u bah Reuben Najiar u la kyntu ia ka MeECL ba kan pynlong noh ia katei personal interview na ka bynta katei ka kam kaba ym shym la lah ban pyndap haduh kine ki sngi. Kiba la poi shaduh ka personal interview ki long 24 ngut bad ka MeECL ha ha ka Notification  No.MeECL/CA/PER/Recruitment/137/2019/239 ka la shu pynsangeh jyndat ia katei ka personal interview.
title: Pan jingshai ka KSU na ka MeECL halor ka jingpynsangeh ïa ka personal interview

content: Ka kynhun ki thei ïalehkai phutbol ka East Khasi Hills District ka la jam sha ka semi final ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 hadien ba ki la sei madan ïa ka buit ka bor ïalehkai kaba khlaiñ tam na ka bynta ban pynliem haduh 18-0 pyrshah ïa ka South West Garo Hills District ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la long ha madan Chandmari, ha Tura, mynta ka sngi.Ka nam tam napdeng ki thei ïalehkai jong ka East Khasi Hills District dei ka Inrilaidor Khongtham kaba marwei ka la ïoh ba kan thep haduh 8 tylli ki kol, bud pat sa ka Ibashembha Khongsit, Makrisha Songthiang, Ideibanrishisha Kharpan bad ka Daiaijingsuk Basaiawmoit, kiba la ïoh ban thep mar ar kol, katba ka Philakyntiewshisha Nengnong lem bad ka Cynthia Mylliemumlong, ki la ïoh ban thep mar shi kol.Ka Inrilaidor ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen halor ka jinglah ban ïoh ban thep haduh 8 kol ïa kaba ka la kam ruh ba ka la thep haduh 9 tylli ki kol hadien ba ka thei apkol jong ka liang pyrshah kam shym la lah ban kyrda (save) ïa kawei pat ka kol kaba la ïaid lyngba ki ksangkti jong ka.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ka Inrilaidor ka dei ka thei ïalehkai kaba la mihkhmat ïa ka Jylla ha ka lympung ïalehkai Subroto Cup ha u snem 2022 bad 2023, nangta ha ka Natioal School Games 2023 kaba la long ha Bhopal.Kane ka khynnah kaba dei na ka shnong Lapalang kaba na Pynurla, East Khasi Hills District bad kaba pule ha ka klass-X ha ka skul Iewrynghep SS kaba ha Mawnianglah, Upper Shillong.Kham hashwa ka East Khasi Hills ka la lah ban pynliem ruh ïa ka South West Garo Hills haduh 13-0 kol.Ha kawei pat ka jingïakhun ki thei ïalehkai jong ka Ri-Nhoi District ki la lah ban pynliem da 8 ïa ka West Jaintia, ïa kine ki kol la thep ïa ki da Imaia Shylla ka la ïoh ban thep saw kol bud pat sa ka Daiamon Makhroh kaba la ïoh ban the par kol, katba Susiemery Lyngdoh Peinlang bad Rimika Khongkai ki la ïoh ban thep mar shi kol.Katba ki thei ïalehkai jong ka Easten West Khasi Hills ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka East Garo Hills District da 3-0, bad ïa kine ki lai tylli ki kol la thep ïa ki da Isha Warjri kaba la ïoh ban thep haduh artylli ki kol bud pat sa ka Rympeibasuk Syiemlieh kaba la ïoh ban thep shi kol. Ha kawei pat ka jingïalehkai, ki thei ka West Khasi Hills District ki la lah ban ïakhaid da mar shi kol pyrshah ïa ka South West Khasi Hills, ïa ka shi kol ka West Khasi Hills la thep da ka Philaniewkorshishs Lyngkhoi katba ka shi kol ka South West la thep da ka Joviality Lyngdoh.
title: Jam ki thei ïalehkai ka East Khasi Hills sha ka Semi Final

content: Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka Meghalaya ka don bun ki jingeh ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingsdang ia ki Medical College ha Meghalaya. Ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka jingeh kaba hakhmatduh ka dei ka jingbym don jaka.Ka la ong ba kaba bud na kata ka dei ka jingbymdon ia kito kiba don jingtbit ha ka kam, ka jingbym treh jong kito kiba don ka jingtbit ban wan sha Meghalaya, ka jingeh jaka shong jaka sah bad jingbym don ia ki nongtrei technical bad kiwei.Ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ruh ba wat ka NEIGHRIMS ruh ka shim por bun snem ba kan wandur kumne. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka Tura Medical College, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ki kam ki iaid shaid shaid, hynrei ki kam ki la dkoh noh na ka daw jong ka jingwan lynshop jong ka jingpang Covid-19.Haba kylli shaphang ka Shillong Medical College, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka Sorkar ka ba buh biang ia ka jingtyrwa Expression of Interest bad ym dei ban randien tang na ka daw ba don kine ki jingeh.
title: Ka Meghalaya ka don shibun ki jingeh ban sdang ïa ki Medical College

content: U Myntri ka tnad jingri jingdup jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek u la pynsngew da kaba ong ba ka Meghalaya ka lah ban pyndonkam ia ki rel kiba rit, kumba leh ha Darjeeling, West Bengal.U Bah Hek u la ong ba lah ban pyniaid ia ki rel kiba rit ha Meghalaya namarba ka jinglong jong ka jaka ha Meghalaya kam iapher na ka jinglong ka jaka ha Darjeeling. Une u nongmihkhmat u la ong ba ka jingpyndonkam ia ki rel kiba rit kan kyntiew ia ka kamai ka kajih jong ki nongshong shnong bad kum juh ruh ia ka jingroi jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi.Une u nongmihkhmat u la pynsngewruh ba ka jingwan jong ka rel ka long ka jingplie lad  plie lynti na ka bynta ka jingioh kam ioh jam jong ki nongshong shnong. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyrshah jong ki seng bhalang ba ka jingwan jong ka rel kan ktah ia ka jinglong jong  ka mariang, u Bah Hek u la ong ba dei ban don ka jingpynbiang lang ha kaba ki kam pynroi ruh ki dei ban iaid shaphrang bad ha ka juh ka por, ka Sorkar kan peit ruh ba ka jingwan jong ki kam pynroi kin ym dei ban ktah ia ka mariang.Une u nongmihkhmat u la iathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar Pdeng kaba lam khmat da ka BJP ka angnud ia ka jingpyniaid ia ka rel sha Meghalaya bad ki jingjurip halor ka jingpyniaid ia ka rel ha Meghalaya ruh ka dang iaid shaphrang.
title: Angnud u Bah Alexander Laloo Hek ïa ka jingpyniaid ïa ki rel rit ha Meghalaya

content: Ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka jingplie ïa ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ka la ïaid shakhmat ha kaba baroh ki nongïashim bynta ki la wan poi ha nongbah Tura ha ka step jong ka sngi U Blei.Ïa kitei ki nongïalehkai la pdiang sngewbha da ki dkhot ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) lem bad ki bor pynïaid District jong ka West Garo Hills ha ISBT, Tura na ka bynta kane ka lympung ka ban neh baroh shi taïew lynter.Kane long ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ban pynlong ha ri lum Garo Hills ha kaba yn ban plie ka President ka ri ka Droupadi Murmu ha PA Sangma Stadium kaba ha Tura.Kumta kane ka jingwan poi jong ka khliehduh jong ka ri, kan nangpynsah jingkynmaw shuh shuh ïa kane ka lympung bad kumjuh ïa u paidbah jong ka ri lum Garo.Lada poi ban ïuhkjat mynta ha Tura, ka shnong ka thaw bad ki kyntoit ki la kup ïa ka rong kaba itynnad hadien ba manla ki lad la wah ïa ki banner ne poster kiba heh bad kiba rit kumjuh ban pynpaw ïa ka dak ba kum ka sor ka la khreh ban pdiang bad ban pynlong ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai baheh ka Jylla bad ka ban ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.Haba pdiang sngewbha ïa ki nongïalehkai ha ISBT, Tura, la pynlong ïa ka put ka tem da ka kynhun tem jong ka Meghalaya Grassroots Music Project ha kaba ki jingrwai ki long na ka bynta kane ka lympung bad ki ban ai mynsiem ïa ki nongïalehkai ba kin ïalehkai bha.Shuh shuh la pynbiang ruh ïa ki lad ai jingsumar ha ISBT na ka bynta ki nongïalehkai kiba don hapdeng ki jingmynsaw.Ha ka por janmiet pat ki nongïalehkai ki la poi lut ha PA Sangma Stadium na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ïa ki prokram bapher bapher jong katei ka jingplie bad ruh ba kin hap ban bud ïa ki kyndon na ka bynta katei ka jingwan iuh kjat ka President jong ka ri.Ha kane ka lympung yn ïashim bynta da kumba 3000 ngut ki nongïalehkai na kylleng ki District bapher bapher ki ban ïashim bynta ha ki 23 tylli ki jingïalehkai ki ban pynlong ha ki 16 tylli ki jaka kiba don ha ka nongbah Tura.Lada ngin ïa kyrtiang dien sha kane ka lympung kaba la long ha u snem 2022, watla ha kaba sdang ka la don ka jingduna ha kiba bun ki liang, pynban hadien ba la lah ban weng ïa ki jingeh bad la pynbit pynbiang ka lympung ka la ïaid shakhmat ha ki 19 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha ki 13 tylli ki jaka bad ïashim bynta shitrhem da ki 3000 ngut ki samla.Ïa ki jingïalehkai la pynlong ha Laban Indoor Stadium, Shillong Club, Madanrting Indoor Hall, Assam Regimental Centre, NEHU, Mawlai Mawroh Community Hall, Mawlai Madan Heh, Crinoline Swimming Pool, Khlaw Malki, Shillong Golf Course, NEIGRIHMS bad ha Sports Authority of India (SAI) Training Centre.Ha kane ka lympung kumba 700 tam ki takma la lah ban sam sha ki samla ïalehkai ba la ïoh ban khur ïa la ki nam jop ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher.Dei ha ka sngi pynhap pyrda ïa ka lympung la ïoh ruh ban sakhi ïa ka jingpyni ïa ka rukom ïalehkai jong ka gymnastic ba la ai da ki khynnah barit jong ka Gymnastics Association of Meghalaya.Ka jingpyni sap ki heprit ka la pynshohbiej ïa baroh kiba la wan ban sakhi ïa kane ka sap kaba ki don.
title: Ka Meghalaya Games 2024: Kyndeh ka sor Tura ban pynlong noh ïa ka Meghalaya Games

content: Ka Ri Lum Garo baroh kawei ka long kumba kyndit na ba thiah, hadien ba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ïa ka sien jam ba ha ka sien kaba nyngkong, ka lympung bah ïalehkai kaba heh tam hangne ha ka jylla, katta ka 5th Meghalaya Games kan sdang naduh lashai ka sngi ka 15 tarik u Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha sorbah Tura.Kum ka dong bad ka thaiñ jong ka jylla Meghalaya, ki samla na ri lum Garo, kim dei satia kiba da duna lada ïa nujor bad kiwei pat ki khun samla jong ka jylla ha ka liang ka sports, hynrei ïa katta ka sap kaba nylla ka jong ki, ym lah satia ban sei na ka bynta ban pynpaw pyrthei na ki daw kiba bun.Hynrei ka jingwan ban pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games, kaba don baroh 23 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai bad ïashim bynta da kumba 3000 hajar ngut ki khun samla, khlem pep kane kan ktik bad kyrsiew thiah lang ïa baroh ban khreh na ka bynta ban phai lem noh la ki khmat sha ka kam ïalehkai.Haba ïadei bad ka jingpynlong ïa ka Megalaya Games ha Tura, la ïoh ïa ka lad ban ïashem bad ïa kynduh ïa ki kato katne ki briew ban twad jingmut lem na ki, ba haduh katno ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka lympung kan khreh ban pynkylla ïa ka dur ka dar jong kane ka dong ka thaiñ ha ka jylla.“Kane kan dei ka sien ba nyngkong ba ka Tura kan lah ban pynlong ïa kum kane ka lympung kaba don baroh ki jingïalehkai ba dei jong ka Olympic, bad kum uwei na ki riew ïalehkai ngam artatien ba ki nongshong shnong ka Tura kin kmen lang bad ban ïasnoh kti ha ka ban pynïaid beit pynïaid ryntih ïa ka, katno tam lei lei haba ka jingwan ban pynlong ïa kum kane ka lympung ka wanrah ruh ïa ka jingroi ha ka liang ka jingtei ïa kiba bun ki  madan ne ki jaka ban ïalehkai, kaba nang ai mynsiem ïa ki khun samla.Wat la katta ruh, ki paidbah Garo ki long pat ki briew kiba ieit bad ba sngewtynnad bha ban peitkai ïa kino kino ki jingïalehkai, tang kum ka nuksa, dang ha u bnai ba la dep da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la ker tawiar ïa ka madan phutbol baroh kawei tang ban ïoh ban sakhi lem ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol hapdeng ki ar kynhun ha ka shnong Phulbari, nalor kata ka ju don ruh kawei ka lympung ïalehkai  hapdeng ki kur ba juh tip ïa ka kum ka Mahari Tournament, kaba hangne ruh ka jingïamih shakhmat ban ïashim bynta da ki kur ka long kaba jur bha.“Mynta ka kynti, kane ka ban sah nam pateng la pateng, namar kan dei ka sien ba nyngkong ba ka President ka ri  kan wan ba kan ïuh kjat bad ban plie ruh ïa ka pyrda jong kane ka lympung, kane khlem pep kan ai mynsiem ïa ki samla ba ïalehkai, halor kane, nga sngew ban ai khublei ïa ka sorkar jylla ba kan lah ban wanrah ïa kane ka lympung namar kan pynlong ïa ka Tura kum ka sorbah kan don mynta ïa ki jaka ne madan ba lah ban pynïalehkai wat ïa ki lympung bah jong ka ri” la pynpaw u Nag.Kyntang ïawai kane ka sien jam ba la shim da ka sorkar jylla ban pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Gams hangne ha Tura yn nym lah da lei lei ban beiñ ïa ka, namar kane ka jia long na ka jinkren jong u Myntri Rangbah u Conrad K Sangma u la kular ïa ki khun samla ba nangne shakhmat ïa ka sharak bad ïa ka mynsiem jong ka jingieit ïa ki jingïalehkai ne sport kan ïai tbeh bad  rhem ha baroh ki bynta jong ka jylla bad ban long ruh man la ka snem.
title: Haduh katno ka jingpynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games kan kyrsiew thiah ïa ka ri lum Garo

content: Ka janmiet ban sah kynmaw pateng la pateng hadien ba ka President jong ka ri ka Droupadi Murmu ka la plie pyrda ïa ka lympung ïalehkai 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ha PA Sangma Stadium kaba Tura, West Garo Hills District.Watla ka janmiet ka long kaba khriat hynrei kane kam shym ka theh um pjah satia ïa ka mynsiem ki 3000 ngut ki khun samla kynthei bad shynrang na baroh kylleng sawdong jong ka Jylla kiba la ïalum lang ban sei madan ïa ki sap ba nylla ka jong ki.Haba kren kum ka kongsan, ka President ka pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ba kan ïoh ïa kane ka kabu ksiar ban plie pyrda ïa kane ka lympung kaba la ai kyrteng ha ka nam bad ka burom ka jong u PA Sangma, uba la long u Myntri Rangbah bad kumjuh kum u Speaker barim jong ka Lok Sabha bad uba kylla long u Speaker ba nyngkong eh na ka thaiñ shatei lammihngi.Ka President ka la ban jur ïa ka jingdonkam ban kyrshan bad ban ai mynsiem ïa ki samla riewlum ba don sap khnang ban saiñdur ïa ka jingim ïalehkai kaba pura ka jong ki.Kumta ka kyrmen ba ka lympung Meghalaya Games kan long kaba ai mynsiem ïa ki khun samla nangta ban phrang ïa ka mynsiem ïakhun bad ruh ban wanrah ïa ka jingkiew jong ki sport ha baroh ki liang.Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ai khublei ïa ka President kaba la lah ban ïadon lang ha kane ka janmiet ban plie pyrda ïa kane ka lympung kaba long ruh ka sien kaba nyngkong ba kat ka nongïalam ba hakhlieh duh jong ka ri ba kan ïuhkjat ha sorbah Tura na ka bynta ban plie syndon ïa kane ka lympung ba heh tam ha ka Jylla.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ka jingpynlong ïa kum kane ka lympung ym dei ba la shu pynlong hynrei ka dei kaba ka sorkar ka bet ïa u symbai ha ki pateng ki ban wan da kaba plie lad ïa ki ba kin sei madan ïa ka sap kaba ki don ha ka liang jong ki sport.“Ha kine ki ar samoi ka jinglong Myntri Rangbah ngi la lah ban tei ïa kiba bun ki jaka ïalehkai bad ngi khmih lynti ha kine ki san snem ki ban wan ngin dangïai bteng ban pynurlong ïa ki jaka ïalehkai bapher bapher ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei.”“Nga ai khublei ïa baroh ki dkhot jong ki komiti treikam  bapher bapher kiba la duh dem duh thiah tang namar ban trei shitom ban pynlong ïa kane ka lympung kaba jop.”Ha kawei pat ka liang u Myntri ka tnat Sports and Youth Affairs, U bah Shakliar Warjri u la ong, “Nga ïeng hangne hakhmat jong phi kum u Myntri jong ka tnat Sports, da ka mynsiem kaba rhem ban ïohi ïa ka jingsdang jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games, kaba ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka, ka la wan na ki jingïatrei lang jong baroh ki shnat treikam sorkar, ki volunteer bad ki khynnah ïalehkai kaba long kum ka dongmusa jong ka Olympics kaba tehsong ïa baroh ki kynhun jait bynriew na ka bynta ban tehsong ïa ka Jylla baroh kawei.”Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïoh ïa ka kynrtien pdiang burom na ka MP ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency ka Agatha K Sangma, ka jingkren na u Lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan.Hadien kane ka la don ka jingïaid ban pynithuh ïa lade da ki samla kynthei bad shynrang na baroh ki District jong ka jylla ba la wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung bad bynrap da ka jingshad tynrai jong ki paid Garo, Khasi bad Jaintia ne ka shad Wangala, shad Mastieh, shad pliang.
title: Hapdeng ka jingiphuh iphieng, plie ka President ka India ïa ka 5th Meghalaya Games 2024 ha Tura

content: :Ha ka jing rakhe ïa ka Republic Day, u District Magistrate jong ka West Jaintia Hills u la dep pynbna da ka Dry Day ha ka 26 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024, kaba kynthup ïa baroh ka jaka jong ka West Jaintia Hills District.Kumta, baroh ki lisen Indian Made Foreign Liquor (IMFL), kiba kynthup ïa ki dukan die lang bad ki jaka ïa dih ïa bam, canteen, kiba pynpoi ïa ki kyiad sha ïing briew bad ki Country Spirit Shops, kynthup ïa baroh ki dukan die kyiad, ki la shah hukum ban khang ha kane ka tarik ba la buh.
title: La pynbna Dry day ha WJH ha ka R-Day, yn khang ki dukan die kyiad

content: Ka kynhun ki rang ïalehkai phutbol ka Ri-Bhoi bad ka West Garo Hills District ki la ïoh ban khur ïa la ki nam jop ki jong ki, ha ka phutbol ki shynrang ha ka lympung ïalehkai  jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games ba la long ha madan Chanmari, Tura.Haba phai sha ka jingïalehkai, ka kynhun ïalehkai ka Ri-Bhoi ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka  East Jaintia Hills da 3-0.Ïa kine ki lai tylli ki kol ka Ri-Bhoi la ïoh ban thep ïa ki da u Riskhem  Syiem Jefree Kyrsain bad u N Syngkli.Haba phai pat sha kawei ka jingïalehkai, ka kynhun jong ka West Garo Hills ki la lah ha ka ban pynliem noh ïa South Garo Hills da 7-1.Na ka liang ka West Garo Hills, ki player ba la ïoh ban thep ïa kine ki kol ki long u Baltimas K Marak, Nangrim M Sangma, u Dimsrang Ch Sangma u R. D Sangma bad u  Kim Kim D Sangma kiba la ïoh ban thep mar ar kol.Da kane ka jingjop kine baroh ar kynhun ki la jam artad sha ka semifinal jong kane ka lympung, katba sa artylli pat ki kynhun kin dang ïaknieh lashai pat ka sngi.
title: Khur jingjop ki rang ka Ri Bhoi bad West Garo Hills ha ka phutbol ka Meghalaya Games

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ka la pan jingmut na ka President jong ka India, ka Droupadi Murmu na ka bynta ka jingpyn treikam mar mar ïa ka inner line permit (ILP), ka jingpyn kynthup lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka Eighth Schedule jong ka Constitution bad ha ka ban ïakren ïasuk na ka bynta ka jingïa kajia ha u pud u sam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam.Ha ka dorkhas kaba la dep phah biang sha ka Murmu, ka HANM ka la ong kumne, “(Ngi) la dep phah biang ïa ka kajuh ka dorkhas kum ka jingpyn kynmaw bad kyrpad ïaphi ba phin shimkhia halor kane ka mat kaba long ba donkam na ka bynta ka jingïada ïa ka jaitbynriew riewlum jong ka imlang ka sahlang jong ka Meghalaya ban lait na ka jingshah ban beiñ ha kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew…”Ka HANM ka la ong ba ka sorkar jong ka India ka dei ban pyntreikam da ka Eastern Bengal Frontier Regulation Act, 1873 ha Meghalaya kumba la pyntreikam ha ki jylla kynthup ïa ka Arunachal Pradesh, Nagaland, Manipur bad Mizoram.Ka la ong ba ka sorkar India ka la jubab ïa ka jingdonkam ki paidbah jong kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka North East, ka dei ban pyntreikam ruh ïa katei ka Act hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya khnang ba ka jaitbynriew jong ka jylla Meghalaya kan ïoh jingïada.ka HANM ka la ong shuh shuh, “Ka imlang sahlang jong ka Khasi bad Garo ka long ka jaitbynriew bym da roi jong ka jylla North East, kaba don la ka jong ka kyntien kaba ki kren bad thoh bad tar ha ki jaka pule haduh ka kyrdan PhD ha ka central university level. Na ka bynta ban ai jingïada ïa kine ki ar tylli ki kyntien, katei ka kynhun ka la ai jingkyrshan ha ka ban phah ïa katei ka dorkhas da ka State Assembly bad ngi kyrpad ïa ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pyn kynthup noh ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo ha ka eighth schedule jong ka riti ka synshar jong ka India(Constitution of India).”Ha ka jingïaroh ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ki Myntri rangbah jong ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya ha ka ban ïakren ïasuk halor ka jingïa kajia halor u pud u sam, ha kaba katei ka kynhun ka la ong, “…ïa ka MoU, la dep soi ha ka 29 tarik, Lber 2022 (ha ka jingdon lang jong) u Myntri ka sorkar pdeng, u Amit Shah.”“…phi bna ba da ka jingsoi ïa ka MoU hapdeng ki ar ngut ki Myntri jong ki ar tylli ki jylla kan nym don jingktah tad haduh ba ka sorkar India kan shimkhia, ha ka ban peit ïa kano kano ka jingïa kajia halor u pud u sam jong kano kano ka jylla kaba long kaba donkam ïa ka sorkar pdeng,” bynrap ka HANM.
title: Phah dorkhas biang ka HANM sha ka President na ka bynta ka ILP bad jingpyn kynthup lang ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo

content: Ka jingïalehkai jong ka Badminton kaba dei na ka bynta ka lympung jong ka 5th Meghalaya Games la sdang ïa ka naduh ka lah sngi u Blei kaba la long ha Tura Indoor Hall, Hawakhana.Haba phai sha ki jingïakhun kaba para marwei jong ki shynrang, u Mewanlamkupar ka Eastern West Khasi Hills u la lah ban pynliem noh ïa u Hunbait S Manner ka West Jaintia 18-21, 21-11 bad 23-21. Ha kawei pat ka jingïakhun, u Stephan Marwein ka East Khasi Hills u la lah ban pynliem noh ïa u Biswajit Ghosh ka West Garo da 21-18, 20-22, 22-20.
