Katba u Civilo Ch Momin ka South West Garo Hills u la lah ban pynliem noh ïa u Nangkiewshaphrang ka Eastern West da 23-21, 21-19.U Gaurav Dutta  ka West Garo Hills u la lah ban jop da kaba suk ïa u Jefrryford Lyngdoh ka  West Khasi Hills District da 21-16, 21-11, Enrique Syiem ka Ri-Bhoi la pynliem noh ïa  Banshanlang Pariong West Khasi da 21-12, 21-10, Raynel Kharbuki East Khasi Hills u la lah ban pynliem noh ïa u Banshanbor Lamare West Jaintia Hills District 21-9, 21-14, katba ka Dabiangsakani West Jaintia Hills ka la lah ba kan pynliem noh ïa ka Baphishisha Marshillong  West Khasi Hills da 21-18, 21-12.
title: Sdang ka jingïalehkai Badminton ka 5th Meghalaya Games

content: U Bah Debanskhem Lyngkhoi 36 snem ka rta u ba dei u  khun nyngkong  jong ka kong Panora Lyngkhoi uba shong basah ha shnong Mawkyrwat South West Khasi Hills District uba dei u Samla rangbah  uba don ïa ka  jingpang ring ha ka met jong u  hynrei watla hapeng ka jingpang  kam shem la lah ban khanglad ïa kaei ba ka sap ba u don ha kaba u la pyndonkam hok ïa kaei ba u Blei u la bynta ha ka jingim jong  u  ha kaba une u Samla rangbah u shong dukan Arts Decoration hajan U  Mawkyllud, Mawkyrwat  ban pynwan dur i tynnad ïa ki kali, ki ar shaka ne ki bike ym tang katta u don ruh ka sap ban rwai bad ruh ban pynitynnad ha ki jaka ïathoh, ki Khrismas Decoration bad kiwei kiwei de.Haba ïakren bad une u samla uba dei la ïathuh ba kane ka jingpang ring ka la ban ïa u naduh ba u dang rit ka rta watla kiba ha ïing ki la pyrshang ban wad ki lad ki lynti ban leit phah sumar hynrei haduh kine ki sngi kam shem don ka jingïarap ban pynkhiah ïa kane la jingpang, namar kata u la ong ba nga hun ka mynsiem ba u Blei u la bynta ha u bad ngeit skhem ha kawei ka sngi ngan sa ïoh ka jingkoit lada u Blei u i mon bad ibit ïa u ban long kum kiwei ki para briew ong u Bah Debanskhem Lyngkhoi.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingpang ba u don ka long kaei kaei kaba pynthud haba u trei ïa kino kino ki kam hynrei watla kata um shem la ailad u la  ïaleh shitom ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam ba  ki briew ki phah ban trei ha ryngkat da ka jingïarap jong u wei u paralok uba ïajan tam bad u.Shuh shuh u la ong ba watla nga don ka sap ban rwai hynrei baroh ka shu kut noh tang ha lade hi na ka daw ba ngam don ka lad ka lynti kumba kiwei ki lah, watla lada nga thrang ha ka jingim jong nga.U la ong ruh ba nga kwah ruh ba kane ka kam ba nga trei mynta kan long kum kawei ka lad ban ai kam ai jam ïa kiwei de ki para samla khamtam ha kum kine ki juk hiran kam bun ki samla kiba la pass ïa ki kyrdan bapher bapher hynrei bun kim ïoh kam ïoh jam watla la ki la pyndep ïa ki jingpule ki hap ban shong ïing, namar kata lada ka Sorkar ka don kano kano ka lad ka lynti nga da thrang ban kane ka kam jong nga kan kiew shaphrang bad kyrmen ruh ba ngan lah ban ai kam ai jam ïa ki kiwei ki para samla hapoh shnong hapoh thaw.
title: Wat hapdeng ka jingpang ym ai lad u samla Debanskhem Lyngkhoi ban trei hok ïa ka sap ba u don

content: U Deputy Commissioner bad Chairman jong ka District Level Committee halor ka Ground Water Resources ha West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai, myn ha ka 16 tarik, Kyllalyngkot u la pynmih da ka jinghukum ba donkam ban register ïa baroh ki pung shimet bad ki pung ba pynmih um lyngba u pipe.Katkum katei ka jinghukum, ki trai jong kine ki pung kiba hap hapoh kane ka district, kynthup ïa ki riew shimet bad kiwei kiwei, ki donkam ban register ha ka Office jong u Executive Engineer (WR), West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai. Ha ka jingpulom ban leh ïa katei kaba hap hapoh ka jinghukum, yn sa pynshitom katkum ka kyndon.Katei ka jingthmu ka long na ka bynta ban pynbiang ïa ki pung ha ka ban pynmih ïa ka um bad ha ka ban ïoh pyndonkam ïa kine ki pung. Katba ki form ban aplai, lah ban ïoh na ka ophis jong u Executive Engineer, ha kaba dei ban phah lyngba ka form ba la buh. Kane ka long ka lynti ba kongsan na ka bynta ban pynthikna halor ka jingshimkhia jong ki trai bad ka jinglah ban pynbiang ïa ka jingpynïoh um hapoh kane ka jaka.
title: Phah ka WJH ban register ïa ki pung shimet

content: U MLA barim ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Process T Sawkmie, myn ha ka 12 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024,  u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingtrei kam ka  District Council mynta, namar ha ka jaka ban ïakren ïa ki mat  ban ïada ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew, ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki kolshor, ki it ki hima, hynrei ki la shu ïa kren pynban tang halor ki skhim.Na ka liang u Bah Process u la  pynpaw ba ka bynta jong ka District Council ka long na ka bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew, ban ïada ïa ka kolshor, ïa ki jingithuh tynrai u Khasi, ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ki it ki hima, ki khaïi pateng, ki riti synshar ha ki hima, ha ki dorbar shnong, ha ki syiem bad ban pynthikna ba ka mynsiem ieit jaitbynriew ka dei ban rung ha ki khun Khasi Khara,  ym ban kren ne ban sam skhim.U la ong, “ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtrei kam ka District Council mynta, ngi ïohi ïa ka jingsynjor jong ka kolshor jong ngi, kumta ngi donkam ban ïada bad ban pynskhem. Ka  bynta  jong  ka District Council ka dei ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka khyrit ba hynriew ka riti shynshar namar ha kine ki sngi ki don kiba kwah ban  pynkylla noh ïa ka bynta jong ka District Council”.“Hooid ngi donkam ïa ki skhim bad ki kam pynroi, ka sorkar jylla ka don ban peit ïa kata, bad  ka District Council kumba ka long mynta ka ïatrei ryngkat bad ka sorkar jylla,” la bynrap u Bah Sawkmie.
title: Ka District Council kam dei na ka bynta ka skhim, hynrei na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew: P T Sawkmie

content: :Ki nongïalam jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP) na Ri Bhoi ki la leit jngoh ïa kawei ka jaka ba kam trai da ka Meghalaya Mineral Development Corporation Limited (MMDCL) ha ka shnong Mawsmai. Ki la lap ba ïa katei ka jaka ba dei jong ka sorkar, la tih ha ka jingdon jingthmu ban pyndap ïa katei ka jaka bad ban tei ïa kiwei ki jingtei da ka kynhun shimet.Haba kren bad ki nongïalam jong ka FKJGP, kynthup ïa u Bah Luistar Lyngdoh, President bad u Bah Lumlang Mawnai, Senior Vice President, ki la ong ba kim bna eiei shaphang katei ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar halor ka jingtei ïa katei ka jaka. Na ka bynta katei, ki la ïoh ïakren bad u rangbah shbnong jong ka Mawsmai na ka bynta ka jingpynshai.Halor ka jingïoh ïakren bad utei u rangbah shnong, ka FKJGP ka la shem ba ka shnong ka la ïoh da ka No Objection Certificate (NOC) na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka Petrol Pump bad Resort hapoh katei ka jaka jong ka MMDCL. U Bah Luistar Lyngdoh, ha ka jingïoh ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u la pynpaw ka jingdiaw halor ka jinglap jong u ba u briew uba ïoh jingbit ban pyndonkam ïa katei ka jaka u dei na ka jylla Assam. Ka FKJGP ka la pyrshah ïa kane, da kaba ban jur ba ïa katei ka jaka, yn pyndonkam da ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka jingpynpaw jong ki, u Bah Luistar Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban ai jingbit ïa uno uno u briew uba dei na kawei pat ka jylla ban pyndonkam ïa katei ka jaka. Ka FKJGP ka la ai jingmut ba lada ka sorkar ka thmu ban pyndonkam ïa katei ka jaka, ki dei ban tei da ki jaka pule ne hotel, khamtam naduh ba la tyrwa ban tei da ka Petrol Pump bad Resort kiba don hajan ka hospital.Ka FKJGP ka la ong ba kin nym shongthait halor kane ka mat bad lada don ka kam ba leh buhrieh ne bakla, kin nym ran dien ha ka ban shimkhia ban pynshitom katkum ki kyndon.
title: Leit jngoh ka FKJGP jong ka Ri Bhoi ïa ka jaka ba kam trai da ka MMDCL ha Mawsmai

content: U President jong ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP), u Metbah Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ka jingsngew shaniah jong u ha ki Regional Parties kiba la trei shitom ban jop ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha (LS).“Te, ngi don ïa ka Democratic Alliance (RDA) bad ngi hap ban pynthikna ba ngin don ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ba biang bad ngi lah ban ïoh ïa ka lad ruh ba biang,” ong u Lyngdoh ha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 6 tarik, Nohprah.Haba la kylli halor ba balei ba ki paidbah ki vote ïa ki Regional Parties, ha kaba u Lyngdoh u la ai nuksa halor ka ilekshon ba shit rhem jong ka Shillong Parliamentary seat kaba la jop da ka regional party.“Ngi ïohi ba bun ki regional party ba la kynthup lut, kin sa jop mynta ka kynti,” ong u Lyngdoh.
title: Sngew shaniah u Metbah ban jop ha ka ilekshon jong ka RDA Shillong LS

content: :Ka tnad Home Guard and Civil Defence ha ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka 6 tarik Nohprah 2023, ka ïoh ban rakhe ïa ka “All India Home Guard and Civil Defence Raising Day 2023” ha headquater parade ground ha Mawdiangdiang, Shillong ha ka jingdon ryngkat u Myntri ka tnad Civil Defence and Home Guards u Bah Comingone Ymbon kum u kongsan.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri ka tnad Civil Defence and Home Gaurds, u Bah Comingone Ymbon u la ong ba kine ki ar tylli ki organisation ki dei ki ba la ai ka jingshakri ka ba pura tam sha ka imlang sah lang khamtam ha ka por ba ka jylla ka mad ïa ki jingeh la ka dei na ka jingwan lyngshop ka bor mariang lane kano kano ka jingjia ka ba la mih na ka jingbakla ki briew.U Bah Ymbon u la ong ba kine ki shnat trei kam ka sorkar jylla ki dei ruh ki ba la ai ka jingïarap sha ka civil administration bad sha ki tnad pulit la ka dei ban tehlakam ia ka suk ka saiñ ha ka jylla, ban pahara ïa ki jingïalang ba la pynlong da ki tnad ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri ka Civil Defence and Home Guards u la ong ruh ba kane ka shnat trei kam ka la ïoh ruh ka jingshakri sha ka imlang sahlang da ka ai jinghikai ïa ki Home Guard volunteer bad pynlong ruh ïa ka jingai jinghikai halor ka Civil Defence subject ka ba kynthup ban ai jingïada ha ka por ba jia kano kano ka jingjia ba sngewsih.“Nga kwah ban ai ka jingaijingmut sha ka tnad ba kan shim ïa ki sien jam ban ïatrei lang ryngkat bad ki nongïalam shnong kum ki Dorbar, ki Nokmas bad kiwei kiwei khnang ban lah ban tur ïa kano kano ka jingeh ka ban wan,” la ong u Bah Ymbon.Haba kdew ïa ka kamram jong ka State Disaster Response Force, u la ong ba ka SDRF ka dei ka shnat trei kam ka ba la tbit tam ban pynlong ïa ki operation, kum ban wad bad ban pynlait ïa ka jingim ki briew haba wan kano kano ka jingjia ba sngew sih na ka jingwan lyngshop ka bor mariang ha ka jylla.Ka Director General of Civil Defence and Home Guards (DGCD&HG), ka Kong I. Nongrang ka la ong ba wat la ka don ka jingduna ha ki briew hynrei kum ka organization ki la ju ïatrei lang hajan bad ki bor ka district bad ki bor ka jylla ban pynthikna ban pynpoi ïa ka jingïarap sha ki paidbah ha ka por ba biang.Ha kane ka sngi ha ryngkat ka Parade ka ba la shim bynta da ki pulit ka SDRF, ka Border Wing Home Guards Battalion, ka Combined District Contingent bad ka Home Guard Volunteers Contingent, ïa kane ka jingrakhe ka Raising Day, la pyni paidbah ruh ïa ka rukom ai jinghikai da ki SDRF rescue operation lada wan ka jingjia kum ka jingkhie jumai.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban ai khusnam sha ki 22 ngut ki ophiser bad ki pulit Home Guard, kum shibynta ban ai ka jingithuh ïa ka jingshakri jong ki da ki khusnama kum ka President Home Guard & Civil Defence Medal, ka Director General of Civil Defence, MHA, Dis & Commendation Gertificate bad ka Director General, Civil Defence & home Guards Meghalaya Commendation Certificate.
title: Rakhe ka Home guards and Civil Defence ïa ka Raising Day 2023 ha Mawdiangdiang

content: :Ka myntri jong ka koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh mynta ka sngi ka la wan ban jurip ïa ka Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat bad don ka review meeting bad ki staff, doctor jong kane ka hospital ha ka jingïadonlang i Kong YR Mawlong, Additional Deputy Commissioner ka South West Khasi Hills District, i Dr. H.C Lyndem, Director, D.H .S (MI), Dr. Wanbudmi Sutnga, Medical Superintendent ka Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat, i Dr. FR Lartang, District Medical & Health Officer bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen ban ïohi ba wat ha i por iba lyngkot kane ka hospital ka la lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba biang bad pura sha u paid nongshongshnong jong kane ka dong ka thaiñ. Ha kajuh ka por ka la ïaroh ba hapoh ka jingïalam jingtrei jong u Dr. W Sutnga, Medical Superintendent la lah shisha ban ïohi ïa ka jingkylla sted hapoh kane ka hospital da kaba niew ba kane ka la dei ka Model hospital. Shuh shuh, ka la pyntip ba ki don haduh kumba 79 tylli ki shnong ki bym lait kali ha kane ka dong ka thaiñ bad namarkata ka sorkar ka la sngewdei ban rah ïa ki Sub Centres lane ki Health & Wellness Centres sha kiba kum kita ki jaka na ka bynta ban ai jingshakri ïa u paidbah. Ka la ïathuh ruh ba ka sorkar ka la don jingthmu ban pyntreikam ïa ka Drone Technology na ka bynta ban rah ïa ki dawai sha ki jaka kiba shitom ban poi kali, nangta ka la ïohi ïa ka jingdonkam ban ai training ïa ki nongpynkha khun (DAIs) bad ban siew dor ïa ki.Haba pynpaw ïa ka jingbynniaw ïa ka jingshem jingeh halor ka jingduna ka jingshim tika jong ki khyllung hapoh ka 1000 sngi jong ka jingim ka jongki ka sngew ïa ka jingdonkam ïa ka jingïatreilang jong ki kmie ki kpa jingïatreilang ryngkat ki Ashas. Namar kata ka la khot ïa ki Sengbhalang bad Seng Trei Mon Sngewbha ban ym peit tang ïa ki jingduna hynrei ban wan shakhmat ban ai ka kti kamon ka kti ka diang ban ïatreilang bad ka sorkar na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka koit ka khiah ha kane ka thaiñ bad ban ïakren halor ki High Risk Pregnancies, ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingdonkam ban ai pisa bad pynsted wut wut ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Blood Bank unit jong kane ka hospital. Ha kajuh ka por ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingdonkam ban donkam ban phai khmat sha ki Non Communicable Disease kiba long ki dawbah jong ka jingduh noh jong ki mynsiem kum ka High Blood Pressure, Diabetes, Cancer, Tuberculosis da kaba kyntu ïa baroh ki nongtrei ban trei shitom bad ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha na ka bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka koit ka khiah bad ban wanrah ïa ka roi ka par ha kane ka dong ka thaiñ.
title: Ai jing ïaroh ka Dr. Ampareen ïa Ka Hospital 100 jingthiah Mawkyrwat la kum ka Model Hospital

content: :Ki dkhot ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) ha ka 7 tarik Nohprah 2023 ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban kynmaw burom ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ba 29 jong u President barim ka Seng u Bah Bull N Lyngdoh.Mynta ka sngi ka seng ka la pynlong da ka program bad buh syntiew ïa u mot sah nam jong u bah Bull N Lyngdoh ha Malki, Shillong, ha ka jingïadon lang ki bahaïing u bah Bull Lyngdoh bad ki dkhot ka KSU.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u General Secretary ka KSU u Bah Donal V Thabah, haba kynmaw burom ïa u bah Bull N Lyngdoh u la ong ba kum u nongïalam u Bah Bull u la shim shi bun ki sienjam ban pynthikna ïa ka jingshngaiñ jong ka Ri bad ka jaitbynriew.“Ha u snem 1987 ha ka jingïakhih pyrshah ki Nepali bad ha u snem 1989 ka jingïakhih ban pyrshah ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka lynti rel hapoh Khasi Jaintia, u Bah Bull u la mad shi bun ki jingshah pynshitom naka bor ka aiñ haduh ba ka met jong u ka la khrew lut” u la ong.“Hynrei u la shah shitom namar u tip ba kaei ka ba u leh ka long wanrah ka jingshngaiñ na ka bynta ka lawei ban wan, lada u Bah Bull ym ïakhun ha kato ka por bun na ki shnong khasi kum ka Mawlai, Mawprem bad Nongmynsong ka la kylla sha ki shnong Nepali” u la bynrap.U Bah Bull u la shim ïa ka sien jam ban ïakhih da ka jingïakhih ka ba neh da ki snem haduh ba ki Nepali ki hap ban phet na ki shnong Khasi”.Na ka liang u Bah Donal V Thabah, u la kyntu ïa ki para dkhot ba kin pyrto ïa ki kam ki ba kum ki nongïalam ba rim ki la prat lynti na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka Ri bad ka Jaitbynriew.
title: Kynmaw burom ka KSU ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap u President barim ka seng

content: Kumba hynriew tylli ki dukan ki la shah khang tala noh da ka enforcement wing jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) hadien ba la lap ba ki trai jong ki dukan ki la pynïaid ïa ki dukan jong ki, khlem ka trade license ha ka por ba don ka jingkhynra ba kyndit kyndit ba la pynlong ha Ïewduh ha ka step jong ka sngi balang.Ïa katei ka jingleit khynra ba kyndit kyndit, la lam da u executive member in-charge Trade, u Bah Gigur Myrthong, uba la synran lang ïa u da ki MDC, kynthup ïa u Gabriel Wahlang bad u Fantin Lakadong, u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem, u Ainam Manik Syiem bad ki and district magistrate.U Myrthong u la ong ba kumba hynriew tylli ki dukan ki la shah khang tala noh da ka enforcement wing hadien ba la lap ba ki la pynïaid ïa ki dukan jong ki khlem ka trading bad ka labour license, da kaba bynrap ba don na ki kim shym la pynthymmai biang ïa ki kot ki sla jong ki.U EM ruh kumjuh u la pynpaw ka jingsngew diaw jong ha ka Khun Kynthei U Hynniewtrep Association na ka bynta ka jingbym lah ban don lang ha ka por ba don ka jingkhynra ba kyndit kyndit halor ka trading bad labour license, kaba dei ka jingkhynra ba ïadei bad ka jingujor sha ka district council.U la byrngem ruh ba ka council kan nym shimkhia pyrshah ïa kitei ki jingujor ba la ujor da katei ka association namar ba ki la kyntait ban don bynta lang ha katei ka jingkhynra watla dep pyntip ïa ki ruh.
title: Khang tala ka KHADC haduh hynriew tylli ki dukan ha Ïewduh

content: Ka nongbah Shillong, kaba don ha Meghalaya, ka la don ka jingpynkut noh ïa ka tamasa Hills Festival – Spirit of Meghalaya, ha ka sien ba saw ha ka 1 bad 2 tarik, Nohprah kaba la pynlong ha wah Umiam jong ka shnong Umbir. Ïa katei ka tamasa kaba la pynïaid da ka HYPE – Helping Young People Entertainment, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Meghalaya Tourism, ka la don ka jingkhmih lynti, ka pyni ruh ïa ka kolshor jong ka Meghalaya, jingput jingtem bad ki jingshet ki tiew.Katei ka tamasa kaba la pynlong ha Meghalaya, ka Hills Festival, ka la dep long teng ha u snem 2018. Katei ka tamasa ka la pynkhih jingmut na ka daw jong ka jingïashim bynta shit rhem jong ki paidbah, ka jingpyni ïa ka lariti bad ka jingplie lad plie lynti ïoh kam ïa ki samla, ha kaba ka la pynkhring ïa ki nongwan jngoh kai ïa katei ka tamasa ha Meghalaya.Ïa kane ka tamasa, la pynshongshit da ki nongtem nongput bad nongrwai, kynthup ïa u Nikhil D’Souza, Anoushka Maskey bad u nongjop jong ka MTV EMA, u Tsumyoki. U nongrwai Rap na Canada ba dei u nong Tamil, u SVDP, katba sa kiwei pat ki nongrwai ba don sap ki kynthup ïa u Reble, Dappest xadL, McLivin, bad ki nongrwai ba don sap, u Adiel Massar bad u Dappest kiba na Shillong.Ha ka sngi ba ar jong ka tamasa, la pynshongshit da ka Anoushka Maskey, Rudy bad ka Kool Kats, B4shan, Dappest & aDL, Tsumyoki, bad kiwei kiwei kum u Electric Stage da u Emes, Nishant B2b Demiurgic,Arpan, Varun, Nida, bad u Blot!Kane ka tamasa ka la pynhun jrut da ki jingbam bapher bapher na kylleng ka jylla kum na Ri Lum Jaintia, kynthup ïa ki jingbam doh thad, jadoh bad kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka tamasa, la don ruh ka jingïakop bam doh sniang ne ka Pig Out Affair, ki jingïalehkai na ka bynta ki khynnah bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Kut ka Hills Festival 2023 ha Meghalaya – ki jingrwai jingtem, kolshor bad ka shet ka tiew

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) ka la ong ba kan ym shah ia ka jingwan jong ka rel sha Meghalaya, katba ka Sorkar India kam pat pyntrei kami a ka Inn Line Permit ha Meghalaya. U General Secretary jong ka KSU, u Bah  Donald V Thabah u la ong ba ka KSU kam pyrshah tylli tyllan ia ka jingwan jong ka rel sha Meghalaya, hynrei dei pat ban don shuwa ki ain ki khlain ki ban iada ia ka jait bynriew na ka jingshah tyllep jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew. ‘Ka Sorkar ka dei ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka jingiaid jong ka rel kit mar sha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills”, la ong u Bah Thabah ba ka seng ka la ioh sngew na kawei ka por sha kawei pat ki myntri ki ong ba ka rel kit mar kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ka jylla.Hynrei, kane ka dei tang ka buit ban pyniaid ia ka rel sha Khasi bad Jaintia Hill bad suki suki ka Sorkar kan sa pyniaid ia ka rel ba shong ki nongleit nongwan. “Ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka ILP ka dei kaba biang duh ban teh lakam ia ka jingwanruh ki bar jylla sha Meghalaya.Une u nongialam jong ka KSU, u Bah Thabah u la ong ba ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewlyngngoh ba ka Sorkar India ka sngap jar jar ia ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka Inner Line Permit ha Meghalaya.
title: Sngap jar jar ka Sorkar Kmie ïa ka jingpyntrei ïa ka ILP ha Meghalaya:KSU

content: Ka tnad Sorkar Kmie, Ministry of Home Affairs ka la iathuh ba ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban buh ia ki khyrdop rung bad khyrdop mih jong ki kali, kat kum ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security Amendment Bill (), 2020, kan pynthud ia ka iaid ka ieng bad ka leit kawan jong ki nongleit nongwan.Ka Sorkar Kmie ka la pynbha noh ia ka MRSSAB, 2020 sha ka Sorkar jylla dang shen. U Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pyni ba ki ain jong ka MRSSAB ki iatyngkhuh bad ki ain ba la ithuh da ka Iing Dorbar Parliament.Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, ka Sorkar Kmie ka la ong ba kine ki ain jong ka Meghalaya ki ktah ia ka leit ka wan bad ia ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah namarba ka Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla ba ki kali ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ki iaid lyngba.U Bah Tynsong u la iathuh ba ka MRSSAB ka iapher na ka Inner Line Permit. U la ong ba ka ILP ka dei ka ain bathaw da ka Sorkar Kmie. U Bah Tynsong u la ithuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka dang iai buddien bad ka Sorkar Kmie ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka ILP ha Meghalaya.
title: Ka jingbuh ïa ki khyrdop rung kyrdop mih kali kan pynthud ïa ka leit ka wan ka Dong Mihngi

content: Uwei u longkpa uba ym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng u la iathuh ba ula ia kynduh jingeh bad kawei ka skul private ha Tura. U la iathuh ia ki nongpyniaid jong katei ka skul prive ba u kwah ban pynkynriah noh ia uwei na ki khun jong u sha kawei pat ka skul private.Haba u la leit kyrpad kumta, ki nongpyniaid skul ki la ong ia uta u kpa uba dang kham khynnah ba namarba u kwah ban weng ia uwei na ki khun jong u na katei ka skul, u dei ruh ban weng lut ia ki khun jong u.Une u long kpa u la iathuh ba kane ka jingle jong katei ka skul, ka dei ka jingpyni bor bad kane ka bun jingeh shibun ia ban wan skul na ka bynta jong kiwei pat ki khun jong u. Une u longkpa u la ithuh ba ki jingjia kiba kum kine ki bun bha ha ki skul Private ha Tura.U la iathuh shuh shuh ba la don kawei ka skul private ha Garobadha, ha kaba ki nongpyniaid jong katei ka skul ki la pynmih ia kawei ka jingpynbna, “Lada phi weng skul ia uwei u khun, phin hap ban weng skul ia baroh ki khun jong phi”. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, uwei u Headmaster jong kawei ka skul ha Tura, u Tyrone D’Brass u la ong ba ki rai kiba kum kine ki long pyrshah ia ka thoh ka pule.U la ong ha ka jaka ban ai ia ka jingpule kiba bha, kine ki jaka jinghikai ki pynibor pynban. U Tyrone D’Brass u la ong ba ka Sorkar ka dei ban pynbeit ia kane ka jingleh jong kine ki skul private. La iathuh ruh ba kawei pat ka jingeh kaba ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul ka long, ka jingbym shah ban thoh ia ki eksamin bad ban ioh result lada ki lah ban siew ia ki bai skul bad ia ki bai thoh eksamin.Hynrei, la ong ba ka jingshisha ka dei ban long ba ki nongpyniaid ki dei ban sha ia ki khynnah skul ban thoh ia ki eksamin wat lada ki kmie ki kpa kim pat lah ban siew ia ki bai skul. Ha kawei ka skul private, ki khynnah skul kim lah ban ioh ia ki Admit Card namarba ki kmie ki kpa kim pat lah ban siew ia ki bai skul.Uwei u nongthoh u Dilip Mukerjee jong ka Buzan Centre, kaba shaphang ka jingnang jingstad, ula iathuh ba bun ki khynnah skul ki shah beh na skul bad ym shah ruh ia ki ban thoh ia ki eksamin tang na ka daw ba kim long ban siew ia ki bai skul.
title: Duh thoh eksamin ki khynnah skul private bym lah siew baiskul

content: :Ki nongtrei jong ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous Destrict Council (JHADC) kiba khlem ïoh tulop la slem bha, shen, kin sa ïoh jingïarap na ka sorkar jylla halor ka jingrai ban pyllait noh ïa ka pisa ba dei ka tulop jong ki ba la sah teng haduh phra bnai bad kaba kot sha ka T. 50 klur.“Ngi la peit thuh bha ha ka ban lah ban ïarap ïa ki nongtrei jong ka JHADC na ki jingeh baroh, kaba lam shaduh ka T. 50 klur ba dei ka pisa ba sah teng, ba dei jong ki nongtrei jong ka council,” ong u Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka District Council Affairs (DCA), u Bah Prestone Tynsong.“Hynrei haba nga la ong ba ngan ïarap ïa ki ka mut ba ngin lah ban pynbiang ïa ka pisa jong ki lai tylli ki kynhun jong ka ADC, kynthup ïa ka KHADC, JHADC bad GHADC,” ong u Tynsong katba dang bynrap “Mynta, ka tnad ka ïoh ka kot ka dang trei shitom na ka bynta ban ai jingïarap ïa ki (JHADC).”Haba kylli jingkylli, u Tynsong u la ong, “Ym tang ka tnad ka ïoh ka kot, hynrei sa kiwei pat ki tnad kum ka mining bad geology, forest bad kumjuh ruh ka transport kaba la peit bniah ïa kiba dei ban peit ha kaba ïadei bad ka hok jong ka JHADC, KHADC bad GHADC kaba ka dei ban ïoh. Mar syn dep kane, ngin sa pyllait lut ki fund sha ki ADC.”Dang shen, u khlieh jong ka JHADC, u Bah Thombor Shiwat u la ong ba ka executive committee jong u ka pyrshang katba lah ban wad lad wad lynti bad ban pyllait noh ïa ka pisa ba sah teng. Katkum ka jingkren jong u, ïa ka tulop ba man la u bnai bad ka pension bill, ka la kot haduh T. 6 klur.“Lada ka sorkar ka ai ïangi haduh T. 50 klur, ngi lah ban pyllait noh ïa ka tulop ba sah jong ki nongtrei,” la ong u Shiwat.Utei u khlieh jong ka JHADC u la pyntip ruh ba ka Council shen, kan sa ïohpdiang ïa ka pisa ba la lum na kaba dei na ka bynta une u snem jong ka financial year.“Ngi la ïoh jingtip ba ka sorkar ka don jingthmu ban pyllait ruh ïa ka pisa ba sah (sha ka JHADC) kaba kot haduh T. 36 klur,” ong u Shiwat.
title: Yn ïarap ka JHADC ban siew lut ka tulop ba sah teng

content: Ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh Myntri ka koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya hynnin ka sngi ka 7 tarik u Nohprah 2023 ha  ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang u Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar uba dei u MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency, u bah I. Lawryniang BDO ka C&RD Block Mawkyrwat, u Dr. F.R. Lartang DHMO, u bah Kitborlang Nongrem u State President NPYF bad kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar ki la hiar sha ka shnong Mawkhyrwang South West Khasi Hills District ka shnong ka bym shem la don ïa ka surok kali da kaba ki hap ban kiew ban hiar ïa ka lynti ïaid kjat kaba khohruh khohram hapdeng u slap ha kaba ka la shim por ha duh 3 kynta eiei haduh ban da poi ban ïoh ban plie ïa ka Mawkhyrwang Health Sub-Centre.Ka Dr. Ampareen haba kren ha kane ka sngi kala ong ba ka sorkar MDA II ka la pyrshang ban wanrah shibun ki kam pynroi hapoh ka jylla ban pynsuk ïa ki paidbah khamtam ban pynbun ïa ki jaka sumar ban plie ïa ki Health Sub-Centre ha ki kyndong kynshrot khnang ba ki paidbah kin dup suk ban ïoh ka ka jingsumar kaba bha tam ha ka koit ka khiah, la bynrap ruh da kaba ong ka jingleh khuid ka long kaba donkam tam hynrei ka jingjaboh bad ka jing bym lehkhuid ka dei ka wei ka pop.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ki dawai da shin yn sa pyndonkam da ki drone ban pynpoi ïa ki dawai sha kane ka Mawkhyrwang Sub-Centre kaba don kumba 6 tylli ki shnong. Shuh shuh kala ong ba hapoh shi bnai nga kwah ban ïoh i ba kane ka Sub-Centre kan ïoh ban pynkha khyllung bad la bthah ïa ki Nurse ban phah ïa ka dur jong i khyllung ba pynkha nyngkong ha kane ka Sub-Centre.
title: Hapdeng u slap bad ka lynti khohruh khohram 3 kynta ïaid kjat ka Dr. Ampareen ban leit plie ïa ka Mawkhyrwang Sub-Centre SWKHD

content: Ka Kynhun jong ka ANTF myn ha ka miet jong ka 7 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra. Ha kane ka jingkhynra kane ka kynhun ka la ïoh ban bat ïa kawei ka kali kaba don ïa u registration no ML04A 6941 bad ka la ïoh ban kem ïa 2 ngut ki suba.Katei ka kynhun ka la ïoh ruh ban kurup ïa u Heroin uba khia 4.05 gram, 237 tylli ki Nitrozepam Tablet bad 45 tylli ki thyrnia (Syringes) na ki suba ha ryngkat ka pisa kaba T. 17,090 .Ïa kitei ki ar ngut ki suba la tip kyrteng kum u Chwamiki Lyngdoh, 32 snem karta, uba dei u khun jong u Ganesh Ryngkhlem uba shnong basah ha Chutwaku, Jowai bad u Exeuben Lavie Kympat, 24 snem karta, uba dei u khun jong u P Dkhar uba shnong basah ha Moosalyngkat, Jowai.Hadien katei ka kynhun ka la leit ban talasi ïa ka ïing shongwai u Chwamiki Lyngdoh bad ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa u Heroin uba khia 24.47gram.Baroh ar ngut ki suba ki la shah kem bad la ujor da ka mukotduma pyrshah ïa ki.
title: Ha ka jingkhynra ïoh kem ka ANTF ïa ar ngut ki suba ryngkat ka pisa kaba T. 17,090

content: :Ka KSU lyngba ka Education Cell mynta ka 8 tarik u Nohprah 2023 ka la ïoh ba kynduh ïa u Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnat pule dangle u Rakkam Sangma ha ïing sah jong u hapoh ka jingïalam u Samla Shelkitbok Kharbani Assistant Education Secretary KSU CEC ha ka jingïasynran lang u Samla Shiningstar Kharbihkhiew Environment secretary KSU CEC. Ha ka jingïakynduh bad jingïathir halor artylli ki mat kata ki long ka baibam (Scholarship) bad halor ka MTET na ka liang u myntri u la pynsngew ba ïa ka baibam Scholarship na ka liang ka fund ba dei ban ïoh na ka sorkar kmie kam pat poi satia haduh mynta hynrei ïa mynta ka don tang khyndiat ha ka sorkar jylla bad ïa kane ruh ka sorkar jylla ka la nang pyllait naduh mynin ka sngi, u Myntri u la kular ruh ha khmat ka seng ba ha kane ka taïew ban wan khmih lynti ba kan poi noh bad ka sorkar kan ïoh noh ban pyllait lut sha baroh ki samla kiba donkam. Ka seng ka la kyntu ruh sha ka Department ba dei khmih ba kum kine ki jingpynslem ïa ka scholarship kam dei shuh ban dang ïai jia ha ki snem ki ban wan.Halor ka kynrum kynram haba ïadei bad ka MTET Exam kaba la long ha ka 1 tarik u Nohprah 2023 na ka liang u myntri ba dei peit u la pynpaw ba ki jubab ba ki thoh kiba dei hi kin dei beit kumba ki long bad ïa ka Answer Key ba mih bakla bad ba la pynklumar kan ym ktah ïa ki. Shuh shuh u la ong ba ïa ki nongthoh (Candidates) lada don ka jingbym hun ki lah ban ujor bad  ban phah correct biang ïa ka answer jong ki wat hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka result shuh shuh lada ki  dang khuslai ki lah ban file da ka Application sha ka ophis ka DERT ruh ban pynbeit bad ban pan jingpynshai.Ka seng ka la pynsngew ruh ba ka jingkynrum kynram ha kaba ïadei bad ka MTET exam kam dei ka sien ba nyngkong kumta ka seng ka la kyntu sha u ne u Myntri ba un pynytikna ba ka dei ban ïaid beit ïaid rynti khnang ba kan nym buh jingartatien ne sah um dum ïa kiba ïakhun ïa ka ne ka examine, na ka liang jong u ne u Myntri ruh u la kular ha khmat ka seng ba ka sorkar kan sa peit bniah bad kan sa shim ïa ka rai kaba biang khnang ba kan long ka ban pynhun ïa baroh bad kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.
title: Kynduh ka KSU ïa u Rakkam Sangma ban ïathir halor ka baibam ne ka Scholarship

content: :Ha ka jingkhynra ba shi miet shi miet da ka Pillanghata OP bad ka Umiam PS jong ka Ri Bhoi district, ka law enforcement ka la ïoh kurup ïa ki tiar siat, tiar pynbthei bad ki katto katne ki tiar ba ju pyndonkam beaiñ ha ka ban sait mrad na uwei u briew ba shong ba sah ha 9 mer jong ka Baridua kaba don ha Ri Bhoi district, myn ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah.Ïa utei uba suba, uba dei na ka jylla Mizoram, mynta u la don ha kti jong ki pulit.Ki tiar ki tar kiba ki pulit ki la ïoh kurup, ki kynthup ïa kawei ka bniat ba shapoh jong u mrad khlaw, hynñiew tylli ki reng sier, kawei ka khlieh jong ka sier, ki tiar siat 1052 AK-47, 7 LMG 7.62, 14 INSAS 5.56, ka pistol 30 .32, lai tylli ki song thylli, uwei u tyndong tear grenade, uwei u hand grenade, kawei ka suloi magazine INSAS ba thylli, 3 tylli ki suloi AK47 ba thylli bad 34 tylli ki stamp seal jong ki tnad bapher bapher jong ka sorkar.Ïa ka jingtohkit, la pynlong ha ka jingdon ryngkat jong ka Military Intelligence Unit of Eastern Command.La ujor ïa katei ka mukutduma hapoh ka thanad jong ka Khanapara ha ka case number 52(12) 23 US 120 B / 468/405/420/380 IPC RW sec 27 arms act bad RW sec 51 Wildlife Protection Act.
title: Ïoh kurup ki pulit ka Ri Bhoi ïa ka 1052 AK-47, ki reng jong ki sier Lapalang, bniat bad ka shonshap jong ka sorkar

content: Ka Khasi Students Union Warsanlyngdoh Circle South West Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat bad ki Nongshong Shnong jong kane ka thaiñ ki la pynpaw ka jingngew bynñiaw halor ka jingpynslem ka sorkar ïa ka jingkhot tender biang ïa ka surok na Pyndenumjaraiñ haduh Mawphanrang da kaba kila leit jurip ïa kane ka surok ha ka 7 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ha ka jing ïalam u Bah Donbor Marshra uba dei u President ka KSU Warsanlyngdoh Circle ha ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang u Bah Onder Marthong u riew rangbah jong ka Shnong Pyndenumjaraiñ bad ki dkhot jong ka KSU.U Bah Donbor Marshara haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha kane ka surok ka dei naduh u Snem 2017-18 ba la pyntrei lyngba ka scheme PMGSY hynrei ngim lah ban tip na kaei ka daw la pynslem ïa ka jingpyntrei ïa kane ka surok. Dei tad hadien ba ka Seng ka la wad jingtip, la lap ba u kontraktor ba pyntrei ïa kane ka surok u la Sangeh (Surrender) noh ban pyntrei ïa kane ka surok. Namar kata ka Seng ha kine ki bnai ba la dep ka la leit ïa kynduh ïa u Chief Engineering jong ka tnad PWD bad ruh ïa u Minister In charge ka PWD u Bah Prestone Tynsong bad ki la kular ban khot tender biang ïa kane ka surok ha kine ki bnai ba la dep hynrei haduh mynta kim pat leh ei ei ïa kane ka surok.
title: Bynñiaw ka KSU bad ki nongshong shnong ba sangeh trei kam ka Surok PMGSY naduh u snem 2017-18 ha Pyndenumjaraiñ SWKHD

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma ha ka sngi balang, u la ong ba ka jingrai ban ïakren kloi halor ka Dorbar mang tyngka jong ka State Assembly ka la jan ynda la dei ka ilekshon Lok Sabha.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Sangma u la ong ba ka jylla kan nym lah ban ïakren shaphang ka Dorbar mang tyngka lada la pynbna shaphang ka ilekshon.“Lada pynbna shaphang ka ilekshon, ngin hap ban pynïaid da ka Vote on Account, kaba mut kan sa ktah ïa baroh ka jinglut jingsep ha baroh ki liang jong ka jylla ha u snem ban wan jong ka financial year bad khnang ban lait na kane, ngi la khot kloi kloi ban ïakren halor ka Dorbar mang tyngka, khnang ba ngin lah ban phah ïa ka mang tyngka bad ngim donkam ban jied ïa ka Vote on Account bad kan nym pynthut ïa ka jingthmu jong ka financial na ka bynta ka financial year ban wan,” ong u Sangma.Yn sa sdang ïakren halor ka Dorbar mang tyngka jong ka State Assembly ha ka 16 tarik, Rymphang.Katba ka jingïalang jong ka Business Advisory Committee (BAC), yn sa pynïaid da u Lamphang jong ka Assembly, u Thomas A Sangma ha ka sngi palei na ka bynta ban rai halor ka tarik na ka bynta ban ïakren shaphang ka Dorbar mang tyngka.
title: Yn sa ïakren shaphang ka Dorbar mang tyngka ynda la jan ka ilekshon Lok Sabha: MR

content: Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Counci (HYC), Ri-Bhoi Sepngi mynta ka sngi ka la pynkup burom ïa uwei na ki rang ïalehkai phutbol jong ka Ri-Bhoi uba la don bynta ha ka ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka 5Meghalaya Games kaba dang shu dep long shen ha Tura ha kaba ki rangïalehkai phutbol na Ri-Bhoi kiba la wanrah ïa ka nam lah duh ha kane ka lympung.Ïa une u samla ba la tip kyrteng kum u Stephan Ranee la pynkup burom ïa u da ka HYC hapoh ka ïingdorbar jong ka Patharkhmah ha kaba la pynkup burom ïa une u samla da u Vice President ka Ri-Bhoi District u Bah RC. Thangkhiew ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang da u Sordar shnong u Petalman Thangkhiew, u Secretery ka shnong Patharkhmah u Bah Sintalis Sankli bad u President ka Patharkhmah Youth Club u Remington Syngkli.Na ka liang ka seng ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew sarong ban don kum kine ki samla don sap kiba ju wanrah nam ïa ka shnong ka thaw bad ïa ka District bad ka la kitbok kit rwiang ruh ïa une u samla ba un dang kiew shaphrang bad ïai paw ha ka kam ïalehkai phutbol ka jong u, na ka liang ka seng HYC Ri-Bhoi Sepngi ka la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka RBDSA bad ïa u President u RB Shadap  kiba la ailad ïa une u samla ban mih khmat na Ri-Bhoi District ha ka Meghalaya Games kaba san bad na ka liang ka seng ka la ai khublei ruh ïa ki coach bad ki nongtrei (staff) jong ka RBDSA bad kyrmen ba shakhmat ruh kin dang ïoh sei shuh ki khlur ïalehkai ki ban wanrah nam burom ïa ka Ri-Bhoi District.
title: Shah pynkup burom u Samla ka Western Ri-Bhoi ha ka HYC uba wan shim bynta ha ka Meghalaya Game ha Tura

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma mynta ka sngi Palei u la aiti ïa ka jingpynïaid ïa ki kali kit ñiut ka “Waste Collection Electric Vehicles” na ka bynta ka jingpyndonkam jong ki Block jong ka East Jaintia Hills, Eastern West Khasi Hills, East Khasi Hills bad West Jaintia Hills. Ïa kane ka jingaiti ïa kine ki kali kit ñiut la sakhi da ka jingïadonlang jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Myntri jong ka PHE, u Marcuise N Marak bad u MLA ka Umroi, u Bah Damanbait Lamare, kynthup ruh ïa ka jingïadonlang jong u MDC ka Umroi, ki heh Sorkar jong ka PHE bad Shillong Municipal Board.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka jingthmu jong ka Swach Bharat Mission (Grameen), kaba long kawei na ki jingtrei kam jong ka Sorkar India ka long ban pynlong ïa baroh ki shnong kiba la lait na ka leit-bar sharud shakiar. U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya kiba la don la ki jong ki jaka leit-bar bad ki paiñkhana ki don haduh mynta 84.33 na ka 100.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka Meghalaya ka la lah ban kot shaduh katei ka thong, ka long na ka daw jong ka jingtrei shitom jong ka Sorkar ryngkat bad ki tnad Sorkar. U la ïathuh ba ka jingsam jong ka Sorkar ïa ki kali Electric sha ki nongshong shnong bapher bapher jong ka jylla, ka long ba ka Sorkar ka kwah ban kan don ka jingïatrei lang bad ki. “Shisien ba ka don ka jingïatrei lang hapdeng ka Sorkar bad ki nongshong, dei hangne ba ngi ïohi ruh ïa ki dak ki shin jong ka jingroi jong kitei ki shnong ki thaw,” ong u Myntri Rangbah.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba naduh kane ka 1 tarik u Ïaiong, 2024, ka don shisien man la ka lai bnai kane ka jingai jingkular ba ka Sorkar, ki District, ki Block bad ki shnong ki thaw ban pynlong ïa baroh ki shnong ki thaw, ki sor bad ki sorbah kiba khuid kiba suba. U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba ka jinglehkhuid ka long ka bynta bad ka rukom im jong ki riewlum bad kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong ba kin ïai bteng ïa kane ka jinglehkhuid ba ki la ong na ki longshuwa manshuwa. U la ong ruh ba ka long kaba donkam ban pynsngew ïa ka jingdonkam jong ka jinglehkhuid hapdeng ki samla bad ban pynlong ïa ki sawdong sawkun jong ki jaka shong jaka sah ki jong ngi kiba khuid kiba suba.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri Marcuise M. Marak u la ong ba ka jingsam jong ka Sorkar ïa kine ki kali kit ñiut ïa kaba yn pyndonkam da ka bording elektrik ne Wast Collection Electric Vehicles, ka pyni shai kdar ba ka Sorkar jylla ka kwah ban ïohi ba ka Meghalaya kan long kaba khuid bad kaba suba bad ka jylla kaba lait na ki jingpang. U la ïathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka don ka jingkut jingmut ba pynlong ïa kane ka jylla kaba lait na ka jingleit-bar sharud shakiar ha kaba kut jong ka snem 2025, ha kaba yn lah ban shna ïa ki 1,10,240 paiñkhana na ka bynta 1553 ki nongïoh myntoi hapoh ka skim PMAY.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka don ka jingthmu ban buh ïa kiwei ki jaka leit bar bad kiwei ki lad ban pynduna ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki plastic ha kylleng ka jylla.Ha katei ka sngi, la don ka jingsam ïa ki 207 tylli ki Electric Vehicle na ka bynta ki Block bapher bapher jong ka Khasi bad Jaintia Hills District. Yn sa don ruh ïa ka jingsam ïa kine ki juh ki kali kit ñiut ne ki Waste Collection Electric Vehicle na ka bynta ka Garo Hills.
title: Aiti u Myntri Rangbah ïa ki kali kit ñiut “Waste Collection Electric Vehicle” sha ki Block ka Khasi bad Jaintia Hills

content: :Ïa ka Scheduled Tribe Morcha jong ka BJP, Meghalaya Pradesh, la sdang seng ha ka 31 tarik, Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha ka ophis jong kane ka party ha Bivar Road. Katba u President jong ka ST Morcha President, u Thomas Marak u la wanrah ïa ka prokram ‘vocal for local’ ne ka prokram ‘pynsngew da kaba kren’, kaba long kum shi bynta jong ka gaon chalo abhiyan, kaba mut man ka shnong ba don ha ka jylla bapher bapher jong ka Meghalaya.Ïa ka ST Morcha, la seng da kane ka party na ka bynta ban pynthikna na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki nongshong shnong da ka seng BJP.Ha ka por ba don kane ka prokram, u president, u Rikman G Momin, u la pynkup burom ïa ki nongtrei jong ka ST Morcha, district president bad ka district committee bad pdiang sngewbha ïa ki sha kane ka seng BJP.Na ka bynta ka jingbha jingmiat jong ki nongshong shnong, ka ST Morcha, kum shi bynta jong ka prokram ba la pynlong na ka bynta ka jylla baroh kawei, kan sa pynsngew sha kiwei pat ki nongshong shnong ban pynhusiar shaphang ki skhim jong ka jingbha jingmiat ne welfare schemes jong ka sorkar pdeng bad kan pynthikna ban pynïoh bun ki jingmyntoi ïa ki paidbah nongshnong shnong. Ha ka por ba don kane ka prokram, utei u President jong ka BJP u la pdiang ba un kyrshan pura ïak kane ka seng na ka bynta ka ST Morcha.
title: La seng ïa ka Scheduled Tribe Morcha jong ka BJP, Meghalaya Pradesh ha ka 31 tarik, Kyllalyngkot

content: Ka ophis jong u General Manager, District Commerce & Industries Centre, Jowai ka khot sngewbha ïa baroh sha ka District Level Industrial Exhibition, ka Ïew pynitiar kaba ar sngi ka ban long ha ka 7 bad 8 tarik u Rymphang, 2024, ha Compound jong ka ophis u General Manager, District Commerce & Industries Centre, Mihmyntdu, Jowai.Ha kane ka sngi kan sa don ruh ka jingpyni paidbah bad ka ïa thied ïa die ïa ki tiar ki tar, ki marbam bad ki mar ba bun jait ba la shna da ki briew bad ki seng ba la seng da ki hi, kiba don hapoh ka District bad kumjuh ruh na kiwei ki District.Ïa katei ka ïew ba ar sngi yn sa plie ha ka 7 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 da u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaintia Hills District u Bah B. S Sohliya, IAS.
title: Khot sngewbha ka ophis u GM, District Commerce & Industries Centre, Jowai ïa ka ïew pynitiar kaba ar sngi

content: Ki nongïalam jong ka Hynniewtrep Border Disputed Redressal Forum myn ha ka 1 tarik u Rymphang 2024, ka la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ba kam dei ban ïasoi ïa kano kano ka MOU bad ka Sorkar Assam, lada ka Sorkar Assam kam treh ban pynphai ïa ka Block -I sha ka jylla Meghalaya.Mynta ka sngi na ka liang ki nongïalam jong ka Hynniewtrep Border Disputed Redressal Forum ki la wan buh da ka shithi ha ophis trei kam u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad ha u Chairman ka Regional Commitee ka Jaintia Hill ban pynsngew ïa ka rai jong ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ khapud.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Bah C Sungoh uba dei u Chairman ka Forum u la ong ba ka jingpynpoi sha ka sorkar da ka shithi ka long ban pynsngew ïa ka rai ki nongshnong shnong kane ka thaiñ halor ka jingpynbeit ïa u pud u sam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam.“Ha ka jingïalang kaba la long myn ha ka 14 tarik u Risaw 2023, ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ ki la shim ïa ka rai ban pyrshah ïa ka jingpynbna (Notification) kaba la pynmih da ka Sorkar Assam ha ka 13 tarik Ïaiong 1951, namar kine ki jingpynbna (Notification) la shu pyntreikam khlem ka jingmynjur ki nongshong shnong ha ka Block -1,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh, “ha ka jingïalang la shim ruh ïa ka rai ban pyrshah halor ka jingpynrung ka Sorkar MDA ïa ka Khanduli bad ka Psiar hapoh ki sector ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam.”U Bah Sungoh u la ong, “Naduh u snem 1952 ka jingiakren bad ka Sorkar Assam ka long ban pynphai noh ia ka Block -1 sha ka United Khasi Jaintia Hills Autonomous, kam don kano kano ka jingïakren halor ka Khanduli bad ka Psiar hynrei ka Sorkar MDA ka pynrung ïa kine ki ar tylli ki shnong ha ka sector pynbeit u pud u sam da ka jingthmu ban leit jurip ïa kine ki jaka hynrei lada ka Sorkar ka ktah ïa kane ka sector kan shem jingeh ban ïoh biang ïa ka Block -1.”U la bynrap, “ka Khanduli bad ka Psiar hi ki dei ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Block I kumta kam don jingmut ban pynbeit ïa kine namar ba ka Block -1 kan dei ban wan sha Meghalaya.”U Bah Sungoh u la ong ruh ba lada ka Sorkar Assam kam kohnguh ban pynphai noh ïa ka Block -1 sha ka Meghalalaya, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah um dei ban soi ïa kano kano ka MOU halor ka jingpynbeit ïa u pud u sam.
title: Lada kim pynphai ïa ka Bl-1, u Myntri Rangbah um dei ban soi ïa ka MOU pynbeit pud hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya

content: Kawei ka trok kaba kit coke kaba wan na ki Jaiñtia Hills kaba thmu ban leit sha ki bynta ka Byrnihat, ka la leit ban rat ïa kawei ka dukan die kwai die sikret kaba don harud surok bah NH-6 hamar ba poi ha ki bynta ka shnong Umryngksai, Ri-Bhoi District. Kane ka jingjia ka la jia hynne ka step phyrngap jong ka 2 Tarik Rymphang 2024.Kat kum ka khubor ba la ïoh lum, la suba ba utei u nongñiah jong katei ka trok u la shoh samthiah bha kaba um lah shuh ban kyrda ïa la ki khmat na ka jingsamthiah bad um lah shuh ban teh lakam ïa ka kali kaba u ñiah bad ka la pynlong ban leit ban rat beit beit ïa katei ka dukan.La ïathuh ruh kaba don bok ka long ba u trai dukan uba dang ïoh thiah lyngngai hapoh katei ka dukan ruh u khlem ïoh sngew ei ei ruh em halor katei ka jingshah rat ïa ka dukan ka jong u bad dei tad ynda u la kyndit thiah u sa tip ïa katei ka jingjia. Ka long kaba Donbok ba utei u trai dukan uba dang ïoh thiah lyngngai hapoh katei ka dukan u la lait salit na ka jingmynsaw ne na ka jingjia kaba  sngewsih ïa ka jingim jong u.
title: Naba samthiah palat, rat u draibar trok ïa kawei ka dukan rit kaba don harud surok bah NH-6

content: Ka jingwan rung i Bah Melam Rangad ba lah pyndep ïa ka Master Degree ha ka tourism na Laban ka nangpynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka party BJP Meghalaya. Ka party ka lah pdiang burom ïa i ha ka jingïadonlang u Nong ai ktien ka BJP u Bah M. Kharkhrang ryngkat i bah Gregory Shullai ba lah shongthait kum u IFS officer.Ka jing pynïasoh jong i sha ka party kan nang pynrhem bad ai mynsiem shuh shuh ïa kiwei ki samla ban rung sha ka party. U bah Rngad u dei u briew u ba ieid bad noh synñiang ha ka imlang sahlang bad uba dang bat ruh ïa ka kam secretary jong ka Thranghok Rngad Academic. Ha ka jing ai jing kren jong i bah M. Kharkhrang i lah ong ba u Bah Rngad u dei u pyrsa ksiew jong u nong ïalam ka BJP ba lah khlad noh u Bah Thranghok Rngad u ba ka BJP ka dang kynmaw ieid haduh mynta u lah ong ruh ka dei ka jing kmen ba khraw ban pdiang burom ïa u Bah Rngad sha ka party jong ngi.Ha ka jingai jing kren u Bah Rngad u lah ïaroh bad kynmaw ieid ïa la u jong u mama bad dei ka matti jong u mama ka ba lah ai mynsiem ïa u ban ïasoh bad kane ka party u lah bynrap ruh ba kane ka party ka lah dei lypa kum ka ïing jong nga bad ngan aiti ïalade na ka bynta ban pynkhlaiñ bad pynïar shuh shuh ïa ka party hapoh ka jylla jong ngi.Haba kylli ïa i Bah Rngad balei ba i jied ïa kane ka party i ong mano bym ïoh mynsiem na ki kam ba radbah jong u Myntri Rangbah ka Ri u Narendra Modi ha ka ban Kyntiew ïa ka roi ka pat jong u duk u suk. Ka dei ha kane ka rynsan jong ka party ba ngan ïoh ai ka jingshakri ïa ka imlang sahlang jong ka jylla bad ruh ka Ri hi baroh kawei.
title: Leit ïasoh BJP u pyrsa ksiew jong u TH Rangad, u Melam Rangad, lem bad ka jingpynleit jingmut halor ka bha ka miat jong ka imlang ka sahlang

content: Ha ka jingïaid lynti jong Ka Seng Samla Shnong Nongthymmai 14-15 Mile, Byrnihat naduh ba la seng ïa ka ha u snem 1999 mynta ka sngi kane ka Seng Samla Shnong ka la kynjoh sha u Mawmer uba 25 ha ka ban ai ïa ka jingshakri na ka bynta u paidbah ha ki kam shnong kam thaw.Kum ka dak ban rakhe ïa katei ka sngi ki nongïalam jong ka Seng Samla shnong kiba kynthup ïa u Samla Artison Khongstid uba dei u President lem bad ki dkhot ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka program rakhe ïa ka Jubilee Rupa ha kajuh kapor ki la pynlong ruh ïa ka taïew lehkmen.Ïa kane ka Jubilee Rupa bad ka taïew lehkmen jong kane ka Seng Samla Shnong la wan ban plie pyrda da ka myntri sorkar ba dei peit ïa ka tnat jong k koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka kongsan ha ka jingïadon lang u Bah Sosthenes Sohtun uba dei u MLA ka Jirang kum u symbud kongsan, u Bah Victor Rani u MDC ka Jirang Constituency, u Alin Suting u Rangbah Shnong jong ka shnong Nongthymmai 14-15 Mer, u Samla Artison Khongstid uba dei u President ka Seng Samla Shnong Nongthymmai 14-15 mile, Ki dkhot jong ka Seng Samla Shnong, ki khun samla, ki longkmie ki kongkpa lem bad kiwei kiwei.Kum ka dak ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew nguh na ka bynta u synñiang u bynhei ba ki nongïalam barim ki la leh ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam shnong. Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki nongïalam jong ka Seng Samla ki la ïoh ban pynkup burom ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Seng Samla kiba rim bad ïa ki nongïalam jong ka Seng Samla kiba la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei.Ha kane ka sngi ki la ïoh ruh ban pynkup burom ïa ki khun samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba long la kloi ban mih shakhmat ban aiti met bad mynsiem sha ka kam shnong ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam ïap kam im.
title: Kynjoh ka Seng Samla Shnong sha u Mawmer uba 25: Plie ka kong Ampareen ïa ka jingrakhe Jubilee Rupa ka Seng Samla

content: Ka North East Society for Agroecology bad ka Global Himalayan Expedition ryngkat bad ka TATA Communications Ltd. ki la ai ia ki kor ki bor pynmiding elektrk solar ia ki saw tylli ki PHE, kita ki long ka Jongksha PHC, Mawkynrew PHC, Jatah PHC (Mawkynrew Block) bad Wahsherkhmut PHC (Pynursla Block) ha ka prokram ba la pyllong ha Jongsha.U Rangbah Shnong jong ka Jongsha, u Bah Olet Kharsahnoh u la long u Kongsan ha ka jingiadon lang ki dkhot jongka NESFAS bad ki nongtrei jong kine ki PHC. Kawei kawei ka PHE ka la ioh ia ki kor ki bor pynmihding elektrik solar ka 7.7 KV. Kitei ki PHC ki la ioh ruh ia ki synduk ban rah ia ki injekshon, ki kor kjit um, ki jynthiah pynkha khun, ki jingshai na ka bynta ki jaka puid briew  bad kiwei.Ia kane ka jingbuh ia kitei ki kor ki bor la leh da saw ngut ki engineer, kynthup ia uwei u engineer na ka GHE bad kiwei ki lai ngut ki enginner ki engineer kiba na Garo Hills. Ka Dr. Lyndem kaba long ka AYUSH Doctor jong ka Jongksha PHC, ha ka jingkren ka jong ka, ka long ba kine ki tiar kin long ka jingiarap kaba khraw na ka bynta ban sumar ia ki nongpang. U Bah Pius Ranee, uba long u Executive Director, NESFAS uba la ong ba kaei kaba u khunbynriew u leh, ka dei ban long ha kataka rukom kaba yn ym pynsniew ia ka mariang.U la iathuh ba ki jingtrei kam jong ka Tata Communication bad ka GHE ka long ban pynioh ia ki kam pynroi khlem da pynsniew ia ka mariang. U la iathuh ba lyngba kane ka jingiatrei lang la lah ban ai ia ki kor ki bor pynmih ding elektrik solar sha ki 550 tylli ki long iing longsem bad ioh ruh ban sam ia ki tiar shet ja cookstoves. Haduh mynta kite ki kynhun ki la lah ban  pynbiang bording elektrik baroh arphewsaw kynta ia ki 12 tylli ki PHC.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Bah Khrawborlang Wahlang uba long u nongaibuit jong ka NESFAS u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ka TATA Cpmmunications Ltd na ka bynta kine ki jingiarap.
title: Ioh bording solar saw tylli ki PHC na ka NESFAS, GHE bad TATA Communitation Ltd

content: Ka Voice of  People Party (VPP) kaba long ka party liang pyrshah hapoh ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ka la byrngem ba kan ym treh ban shong dorbar lane sngap ïa ka jingkren plie jong u Lat ka Meghalaya ha ka jingsdang ïa ka Dorbar mang tyngka ka ban long naduh ka 16 tarik u Rymphang, lada u khliehduh jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u kren da ka ktien Hindi.Ka VPP ka dawa ba u Lat ka jylla u dei ban kren ha ka ktien Phareng bad lada um lah ban leh kumta, dei ban don u nongpykylla ia ka ktien Hindi sha ka ktien phareng.Lada kim leh kumta na ka liang Ka VPP kan ym treh ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren jong u Lat, lada u kren ha ka ktien Hindi.Ïa kane ka rai jong ka seng, la pyntip ruh sha u Lamphang jong ka Ïing Dorbar, u Thomas A. Sangma hadien ba ka seng ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang jong ka mynta ka Sngi Baar.Ha ka shithi kaba la phah sha u Lamphang, u Secretary jong ka VPP, u Bah Heavingstone Kharpran, u la ïathuh ba ka Dorbar mang tyngka ka long kaba kongsan bad kaba ktah ïa ka jylla baroh kawei.U la ong ba ka long kaba donkam haduh katta katta ïa ki dkhot jong ka Ïing Dorbar ba kin ïashim bynta bad ba ki dei ruh ban sngewthuh ïa kaei kaba jia hapoh ka Ïing Dorbar.U la ïathuh ba ka jingpynlong ïa ki dorbar ba la dep ka la long ïa ki dkhot jong ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ, ka Meghalaya kin hap ban sngap ïa ka jingkren jong u Lat ha ka ktien Hindi bad kane ka buh ïa ka jingeh kaba khraw ïa ki dkhot kiba ym sngewthuh ïa kane ka ktien. Ka ktien Hindi ka long ruh ba kane ka ktien Hindi kam dei ka ktien ba ka jylla ka kren.Ha katei ka shithi, u BahKharpran u la kyntu ruh ïa u Lamphang ba lada u Lat ka Meghalaya u kren ha ka ktien Hindi, dei ban buh ïa uwei u nongpynkylla na ka ktien Hindi sha ka Phareng, ha kaba u Lat u lah ban kren ha ka ktien Hindi bad ha ka juh ka por u nongpynkylla un kren sha ka ktien Phareng. U Bah Kharpran u la ong ba ka jingpynïaid ïa ka Ïing Dorbar ha ka ktien ha kaba baroh ki dkhot ki lah ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingtrei kam jong ka Sorkar kaba khuid kaba suba, kaba kynthup lang ïa baroh bad kan pynlong ïa ka synshar khadar kaba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih.
title: Yn ym shong dorbar ka VPP lada u Lat u kren da ka ktien Hindi

content: Ki nongshong shong ka Lady Veronica Lane ha ryngkat ki nongpynïaid ka Bethany Society, ka Bansara Eye Care, ka Mery Rice Center for Special Education, St. Edmund College bad ka Asian Confluence mynta ka 2 tarik Rymphang 2024, ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban pynkynriah  ïa ki nongdie madan na Laitumkhrah Main Road sha  Lady Veronica Lane.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor ka Kong Monalisa Wankhar, kaba dei ka nongshong shnong kane ka jaka ka la ong ba ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingpynbna na ka liang ka Myntri Sorkar ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh halor ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban pynkynriah ïa ki nongdie madan na Laitumkhrah Main Road sha Lady Veronica Lane  namar na ka liang ki nongshong shnong kim don jingtip eiei halor kane ka rai.“Kumba ka long mynta ka Lady Veronica Lane ka dei kaba khim haduh katta katta bad ka dei ka surok kaba ki briew kiba duna bor met ki ju pyndonkam ban poi sha Bethany Society bad Mery Rice Center for Special Education, sha ka Bansara Eye Care  ka ban buh jingeh ia ki,” ka la ong.Ka la bynrap, “Ka jingong i Myntri ba ynda la ai kane ka jaka sha ki nongdie madan ïa kane ka surok yn khang noh ban ïaid  lyngba kane ka surok, kane ka rai kan long ka ban wan rah jingeh ïa ki briew ba wan phah sumar sha kine ki jaka sumar namar bun ki bym lah ban ïaid da ka kjat. Halor kane ka surok ka la long lypa kaba khim, kane ka rai kan ktah ïa ki nongshong shnong bad ki khynnah skul, khamtam ïa ki ba duna ka dkhot met.”Ka la ïathuh ruh ba halor kane ngi la dep ban phah da ka jingthoh hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar kam shem la ai kano kano ka jubab.Na ka liang u Brother Carmo na Bethany Society u la ong, “ngim shem la don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ïano ïano ruh hynrei kane ka rai jong ka sorkar kan ktah jur ïa ki briew ba duna bormet kiba ju pyndonkam ïa kane ka surok ban lait na ka surok bah. Kumta ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban bishar bniah biang ïa kane ka rai jong ki khnang ba kan ym ktah ïano ïano ruh.”Ka Kong Bertha Dkhar ka longkmie kaba don ka jingduna ha ki bor ïohi, ka la ong ba ïa kane ka surok ym tang ba ngi pyndonkam ngi ki briew ba duna bor met hynrei la ju pyndonkam ruh da ki khynnah skul namar ka long kaba shngaiñ ban ïaid namar ba ka ïada na ka surok bah bad kane ka dei ka surok kaba khapniah bha mynstep ne mynmiet.”Ka la ïathuh shuh shuh ba ha ka por ba i Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh i la wan sha Bethany Society, i la ong ïa ngi ba ka jingshna ïa ki jaka ïaid kjat lane Foothpath kan long na ka bynta ban pynsuk bad pynshngaiñ ïa ki briew ba don jingduna dkhot met ba kin ïaid na kane ka jaka, hynrei mynta ki la thmu ban ai noh sha ki nongdie madan te haduh katno kane ka surok kan shngaiñ ïa ngi.”
title: Ha por ba shna ki ong ban pynsuk ïa kiba duna dkhot met, hynrei mynta ki thmu ban pynlong ïew ïa ka Lady Veronica Lane

content: :Kawei na ki jingïalehkai kaba baroh baroh ki ju sngewtynnad bad shongshit bha ban peitkai katta ka athletic ka la sdang ha ka lympung ïalehkai kaba 5 jong ka Meghalaya Games, kaba ha kane ka sngi kaba sdang jong kane ka jingïakop la mih paw arngut ki rang bad thei ïa mareh ba kynthup ïa u Renaldi Dhar ka West Jaintia Hills bad ka Angelina Jackson ym tang ba ki ïoh ban khur ïa ki nam jop hynrei ban da long ki nong ïa mareh ba sted tam ha ka ïakob ïa mareh kaba 100 m.Ha kane ka jingïakhun, na ka liang ka jong u Renaldi u la lah ban pyndep ïa ka thong 11.4s katba u Gracewin u la lah ban pyndep ha ka 11.6s bad u Pilo Ronghang u la wan ba-lai ban pyndep ïa thong ha ka 11.7s.Katba na ka liang jong ka Angelina Jackson ka la lah ba kan rah ïa ka nam jop hadien ba ka la pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 13.6s, ba wan ba-ar dei ka Savinity Jyndiang kaba la pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 14.2 jan ïa ryngkat lang bad ka Ibaiahun Kurbah kaba la lah lem ban pyndep ha ka juh ka por.Ha kane ka sngi kaba sdang kumba 6 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai la lah ha kaban pynlong ha ka sngi kaba sdang bad ïa kane ka kynthup ïa ka ïakob mareh jong ka 1500m ha kaba u Skehmlang Suba u la khur ïa ka takma ksiar hadien ba u la pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 4:04:7, bud pat da u Dabit Dkhar uba la wan ba-ar hadien ba u la pyndep ïaka thong ha ka 4:08:9, katba ka takma rnong ka leit sha u Banjoplang Wanniang hadien ba u la pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 4:09:0.Haba phai pat sha ka liang ki kynthei ha kane ka juh ka kyrdan ïakhun, ka nam jop ka leit sha ka Glorify Kurbah na Shillong kaba la pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 5:04:1s, katba ka takma rupa bad rnong la khur ïa ki da ka Daphlin Wahlang bad ka Balasiewdor Pathaw (SWKHD) kiba la pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 5:13:5s bad 5:20:3s.Ha ka High Jump jong ki shynrang ka takma ksiar la khur da u Primus Ronghi ka Ri-Bhoi hadien ba u la lah ban kynthih haduh 1.90M katba ka takma rupa bad rnong ka leit sha u Pringchang N Sangma ka Williamnagar bad Simeon Marak ka North Garo Hills.Katba na ka liang jong ki kynthei ki nongïalehkai ka Ri-Bhoi ki la pawbha shakhmat tad haduh ba kin da ïoh ban khur ïa ka takma ksiar bad rupa kaba ha kane ka kynti ba mynta la khur ïa ki da ka Rinalgi Ingti (1.55 M) bad Andrisha Klien (1.45M), ka takma rnong ka leit sha ka Roshni Ch Marak (Williamnagar).Kumta ha kaba kut jong ka sngi kaba nyngkong ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka Ri-Bhoi ki la ïoh ban khur haduh 3 tylli ki takma ksiar bad mar kawei ka takma rupa bad rnong, bud pat sa ka kynhun ïalehkai ka Shillong kiba la khur 2 tylli ki takma ksiar bad sa kawei ka takma ksiar la khur da ka West Jaintia Hills.Lada ïa phai pat sha ka jingïalehkai ka Wrestling ha ka Women Freestyle Wrestling jong ka jingkhia kaba 45kg, ka Ribhalang Sun na East Khasi Hills ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar, katba ïa ka takma rupa ka khur da ka Rikyntiew Nongrum kaba na East Khasi Hills.Ha ka Freestyle Wrestling jong ka jingkhia kaba 48kg, ka Scolastica Rymbai kaba na na East Khasi Hills ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar, katba ïa ka takma rupa la khur da ka Ibakordor Jyrwa na East Khasi Hills.Katba ka jingïalehkai jong ka badminton ka la lah ba kan pyndep ïa baroh ki jingïalehkai ba dei jong ka semifinal ha kaba Nitania Tariang (EKH) ka la jop ïa ka Sengte WD Shira (WGH)da 21-12, 21-8, ka Shimtihun Lyngdoh (WKH) ka la lah ba kan pynliem ïa ka Nihaka Lamare (WJH) da 21-12, 21-15.Ha ka jingïakhun jong ki shynrang u Raynel Kharbuki (RKH) u la lah ban pynliem noh ïa u Raymond Ronghang (RBD) da 21-10, 21-15, U Stephan marwein (EKH) u la jop ïa u Mewanlamkupar da 18-21, 21-19,21-14.Ha ka jingïalehkai ba shi jur ki kynthei ka Shimtihun Lyngdoh bad ka D Kharbani (WKH) ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa N.A Sangma bad SWD Shira (WGH) da 21-12, 21-10. Katba ka Nitania Tariang bad Carlynda Nongbri (EKH) ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa D Lyngdoh bad D. Ryngkhlem (WJH) da 21-8, 21-18.Haba phai pat sha ka jingïakhun ki shynrang u B Lamare bad L Suchiang ki la jop ïa u Gaurav Dutta bad u Biswajit Ghosh 21-19, 21-17, katba u Raynel Kharbuki bad P Mazumdar (EKH) ki la pynliem noh ïa u Babrian bad Raymond (Ri-Bhoi) 21-8, 21-11.
title: Sdang ka jingïalehkai athletic kylla rang bad thei mareh ba sted tam u Ranaldi bad ka Angelina

content: Ka Dr. Tamanna Bhuyan, kaba long ka Assistant Professor, Department of Applied Biology, University of Science and Technology Meghalaya (USTM), ka la ioh ia ka khusnam “National Level Women Scientist Award 2023” ia kaba la ai da ka  Microbiologists Society, India (MBSI).Ia kane ka khusnam la ai ha ka jingialang International Conference on Microbiological Research: Current Challenges and Future Perspectives, ba la pyllong da ka Bharathidasan University, Tamil Nadu ha Khanapara, Ri Bhoi District. Dr. Bhuyan ka la ioh pdiang ia kane ka khusnam na ka kti jong u Prof. Dr. M. Selvam, Vice-Chancellor of Bharathidasan University bad Prof. A.M. Deshmukh, President, MBSI.Ia kane ka khusnam la ai kum ka jingpyndonburom ia ka Dr. Bhuyan na ka bynta ka jingnohsynniang jong ka ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpule. Ka la ioh ia ka khusnam Best Ph.D Thesis Award 2020 hadien ba ka la ioh ia ka kyrdan Ph.D na ka IIT Guwahati. Dr. Bhuyan ka pynlut ia ka por jong ka ha kaba ia dei bad ki jingwad bnaih. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, ka Dr. Bhuyan ka la ong ba ka “The National Level Women Scientist Award kan nang rah shuh shuh ia ka kyrdan jong ki kynthei ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingwad bniah ia ka jingstad saian. Ka Dr. Bhuyan ka la ai jingkren ruh halor ka phang “Utilizing Biogenic Microswimmers in Microbiological Research” ka katei ka jingialang.
title: Ioh khusnam ka Dr. Tamanna Bhuyan ka USTM

content: Ha kawei ka jingjia ba kyndit kaba la jia ha West Garo Hills ha kaba u khun u la pynïap ïa la ka jong ka kmie da kaba khrai khlieh ïa ka.Katba ka kynhun pulit jong ka Babadam, kaba hap hapoh ka thanad Rongram, ki la ïoh jingtip ba uwei u briew ba la tip kyrteng kum u Sengjon Ch Sangma, 25 snem ka rta, uba shong ba sah ha ka shnong Chidaogre ba don hajan Babadam, u la shim kat katei ka lynti ban thombor ïa la ka jong ka kmie bad khrai khlieh da ka tiar nep hapoh ka ïingsah jong ki.Hadien ba u la dep leh ïa katei ka kam sniew, u la phet krad noh na katei ka jaka.Katba ka kyrteng jong katei kaba la shah pynïap ka dei ka Dijak Ch Sangma, 45 snem ka rta, kaba dei ka kurim jong u Jasin R Marak.
title: Khrai khlieh u khun ïa la ka kmie lajong ha Garo Hills

content: :Ka Seng Kur Dkhar Sawkpoh ka la rakhe ïa ka Jubilee Rupa jong ka ha ka 13 tarik u Kyllalyngkot, 2024 ha Maraikaphon, Sohra ha kaba hajar ngut ki kur ki la ïa wan sha kane ka Durbar naduh ki Rangbah na Ri Lum Jaintia. La plie ïa ka jingrakhe Jubilee da kaba pynher ïa ka Lama jong ka Seng da u President, Bah Taining Dkhar Ngapkynta ryngkat bad ki Rangbah kur, ki Longkmie bad ki Executive Member jong ka Seng.Lyngba ka Kyrwoh ba la phah da i Ma H. Arthur Sawian, Patron ka Seng  la pule ha ka jingïalang iba la ai ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ïa ka Seng bad ïa ki para kur ba kin nang kiew irat ha ka Tip-Briew Tip-Blei bad Tip-Kur Tip-Kha. I Kong Khasimon Phanbuh, Ex-General Secretary jong ka Seng, I Padma Shree Kong Bertha G. Dkhar Ngapkynta, iba la thaw ïa ka Braille code Grade I bad Grade II  bad I Bah Donavon Kharwanlang, u Kongsan jong ka Jingïalang, ki la ai jingkren halor ki “Mawbyrsiew” ba ki Kpa Tymmen jong ngi ki la tei bad pynshongrim ïa ka imlang sahlang ka longbriew manbriew bad ruh halor ka Tein Phira – “Ka Tip-Briew Tip-Blei bad ka Tip-Kur Tip-Kha”. Ha kaba sdang jong ka jingrakhe ïa ka Jubiliee Rupa, i Bah Taining Dkhar Ngapkynta I la pynkynmaw ïa ki longshuwa kiba la seng ïa ka Seng Kur ha ka snem 1999 bad ïa kito ruh kiba la shimti pateng ban ïa kit ïa bah ïa ki kam  jong ka Seng Kur haduh mynta. I Bah Peter A. Dkhar Sawian pat I la pynkynmaw bad pynsawa ïa u synniang ba la noh sha ka imlang sahlang naduh ka spah snem kaba 18 bad 19 da ki Longshuwa jong ka Kur ha ka liang ka pule puthi, ka seng-kam seng-jam, ka synshar ka khadar bad ka longbriew manbriew. La don ruh ka jingsam khusnam sha kito kiba pass bha ha ki jingpule bad jingïaleh kai sport Athlectic bad Karate. Hadien ka Durbar la don ka jingot ïa u cake jubili rupa da i Padma Shree Kong Theilin Phanbuh bad ka jingpynher ïa ki 25 tylli ki balloon jubili rupa.
title: Rakhe ka kur Dkhar Sawkpoh ïa ka Jubilee rupa

content: :U MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency Bah Olland Singh Suin ha ryngkat da ka jing ïa treilang bad ka 67 Battalion CRPF Polo Shillong mynta ka sngi u la lum la lang ïa ki samla naka thaiñ jong ka shnong  Lawbah  ban pynlong ïa ka  Awareness Programme halor ka Recruitment in CAPFs 2023-2024 (CRPF,BSF,SSB,ITBT,AR, NIA,  NCB & SSF) kum shibynta ban pynsngewthuh ban ai jing hikai ïa ki samla jong ka thaiñ naka bynta kumno ban ïohlad ban pynïoh kam ïa ki samla ha ki kam shipai bad kiwei de ha kaba ïa kane ka prokram kila pynlong hapoh jong ka Multi Facilities Centre Lawbah East Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka jing ïalang la pynïaid da u bah Reading Wahlang, Assistant Rangbah Shnong Lawbah, kren pdiang sngewbha na u bah Mightstar Lyngdoh, Co-ordinator Job Orientation Programme.Ki nongkren kiba la ai jing hikai ha kane ka sngi ki long u P. Haokip, Inspector jong ka CRPF, 67 Battalion Shillong polo play ground na u bah H. Thabah, OC jong ka Mawsynram bad na u O. Suin, MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency kum u kongsan ha ryngkat da ka jing ïa donlang kiwei de ki riew rangbah ki samla na kane ka dong ka thaiñ Lawbah shuh shuh ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban ai sngewbha ïa ka kot Pule shaki samla wadkam bad ka jing pynrung kyrteng ïa ki samla ka thaiñ.U bah O. Suin MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency haba kren kum u kongsan u ong ba kane ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong hapoh ha Mawsynram ban lum ïa ki samla ban ïoh ka jing hikai kumno ban plie lad plie lynti ïa ki samla ka thaiñ ban ïohlad ban shah hikai ha kaba ïa dei ban ïoh kam shipai ne pulit “kum u nongmikhmat nga dei hok ban ïalam ne ban btin lynti ïa ki samla khnang ba kin lah ban pynkhreh ïalade ban ki ïoh rung ha ki kam pulit bapher bapher. Shibun ki samla ki ju wan kyrpad ïa nga kum u nongmikhmat hynrei nga ngam lah ban ai ïa kata ka kam kat kum ki jingkwah jong ki da kaba u ai ka nuksa ” La da phi kwah ka um ban dih nga don hynrei lada phi kwah ïa ka um ba phin shet ha ïing ha sem ka don ka wah ba phin leit tong nangta lyngba da ka jing ïalam lynti jong nga” nga long tang kum u MLA ka dei hok ïa nga ba ngan thaw ki lad ki lynti ïa ki samla ba kin tip ha kano ka lynti ba kin ïa ïoh kam ïoh jam ha ki kam pulit bad kiwei de hynrei kaba donkam ïa ki samla ba ki dei ban long kiba la pynkhreh ban long kiba smat ba sting ha ki kam kilan met da kaba leit mareh step ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka met ka phad bad kumjuh ruh ban trei shitom ruh ban khreh kot ban pyn nep ïa ka jabieng namar lada wan kino kino ki kam kiba lait ha ki kam sorkar ne haki kam pulit kin ïoh ban long shakhmat, wat ap haduh ban da ïoh jingtip mynta lashai leit pyndep ïa ki ta ki jing donkam.U bah H. Thabah haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong ba ka jing ïoh rung ha ki Kam shipai ne ki kam pulit ka bynta kaba donkam tam ïa ki samla ban trei shitom ban pyn mlien ïalade haki kam kilan met bad ruh ban khreh kot bha Ka jing don bad ka jing bymdon pisa kata ka long kaba bakla hynrei ban ïoh ïa ka kam kam dei da ka pisa hynrei tang da ka jing trei shitom jong ki samla shimet.
title: Lyngba u MLA ka Mawsynram ïoh jing hikai ki samla kumno ban ïoh rung ha ki kam shipai/ Pulit

content: :Ka Sports Committee jong ka KSU hadien ka jingïoh ujor na kiba bun ngut ki nongïashim bynta ha ka Meghalaya Games bad ki kmie ki kpa ka pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jingbym kheiñ snep ka sorkar jylla ïa kitei ki nongïalehkai.Ka jingbym pynbiang ïa ka bam kum ka ja step bad ja sngi, ka jingai beiñ ki jingbam tad dor kum ki chips, ki shana khutia mutia bad ka jingleh sih pathar kan buh ïa ka koit ka khiah kitei ki nongïalehkai ha ka jingma. Ha ka jingshisha, ka sorkar ka la dei ban pynbiang da ka bam ka dih kaba tei met, kum ki ruti bad makhon, dud, kait bad kiwei ki jait jingbam ha ka por step bad pynbiang thikna ruh ka ja ka doh ha ka por sngi bad miet hynrei phewse ka la ai pynban ka bam kaba wat ki mraw ne ki koidi ruh kim bam.Ka Sports Committee ka KSU ka sngew ba lada ka sorkar jylla ka thrang shisha ban kyntiew ïa ka lehkai sports ha jylla khnang ba kan long kum ka lad kamai jakpoh bad kumjuh ruh khnang ba kin ïoh ïa ki takma bapher bapher ha ka National Games bad ki rynsan international, ka dei ban pynbit pynbiang bha naduh ki jaka sah, ka bam ka dih, ka transport lem bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdonkam ba kongsan ki nongïalehkai.Lada ka sorkar ka ïai bteng ban leh torti kumne ka mut kan pynduh mynsiem ïa shibun ki samla ba thrang ban kiew ha ka sports bad wat ki kmie ki kpa kin ym shlan ban pynshlur ïa la ki khun ki kti ban minot ha ka sports.Ka KSU ka kyntu ïa ka sorkar ban ym kheiñ dew thala ïa ka sports ha ka jylla hynrei ka dei ban pyni da ki kam ha baroh ki liang ban ïarap bad kyntiew ïa ki nongïalehkai sports ka jylla khnang ba ha kawei ka sngi kin lah ban wanrah nam bad burom ïa ka jylla baroh kawei.Khublei shibunEric NongkynrihSports SecretaryKhasi Students’ UnionCentral Executive Council.
title: La shu lehbeiñ ka sorkar jylla ïa ki nongïashim bynta ka Meghalaya Games

content: Ha ka jingthmu ki nongïalam ka Voice of People Party (VPP) ban leit ban ïa khih ha jan ka Secretariat na ka bynta ban pyrshah halor ka jingshaweng kam ki ophisar ka Lokayokta, na ka liang ki tnad pulit ki la trei borbah ban khanglad ïa ki nongïalam ka VPP.Ka jingkhang ka tnad pulit ïa ki nongïalam ka VPP ban shong ïa khih ha jan ka Secretariat ka long na ka jingpynjari ïa ka 144 CRPC ha ki jaka ba marjan ka Secretariat.Ki nongïalam ka VPP kiba la wan na ki thaiñ ka Kashari Point ki la shah bat ha ki bor pulit bad ka la don ka jingïania kaba da ki kynta namar ka jingbym shah ki Magistrate ban tur ïa ki nongïalam ka VPP sha Secretariat.Na ka liang ki nongïalam ka VPP ba la ïalam da u MLA ka Mawlai Constituency u Bah Brightstarwell Marbaniang ki la sdang ban ïaid jubor ha kaba ka la mih ka jingkhang lad na ka liang ki pulit bad mih ka jingkhluit na ka liang ki nongkit kam ka VPP da kaba ki la ong ïa ki pulit ba “Wat ktah kti u dei u MLA” hynrei na ka liang ki pulit bad ki Magistrate ki la pyneh triang ban ym shah ban ïaid na kane ka jaka.Kat haduh ba pynlait ïa kane ka khubor ki nongialam ka VPP ha ryngkat ki MLA ki dang don ha Kashari Point.
title: “Wat ktah kti u dei u MLA”: Ong ki nongïalam ka VPP ïa ki pulit ha ka sngi ba ïakhih

content: Hadien ba na ka liang ka tnad Tourism ka la pynban ban pynlong ïa ka Beach Festival myn ha ka 19 bad 20 Tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024 ha Ranikor,  na ka liang ka Khasi Student Union (KSU) Ranikor Circle, ka la  buh da jingkylli  sha ka Sorkar jylla halor ka jingshngaiñ ka wah Kynshi.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor myn ha ka 17 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ha Shillong Press Club, u President ka KSU Ranikor Circle u Bah Marconi Thongni u la ong ba wat la na ka liang ka seng kam kwah ban pyrshah ïa kano kano ka tamasa kaba ka sorkar ka thmu ban pynlong hynrei ka wah Kynshi ka la dei kawei na ki wah kiba la jaboh bha haduh ba kam don shuh tang ki dohum ruh ki ba lah ban im ha ka.U la ong, “Ngi ïohi ïa ka jingjaboh kane ka wah kaba la kylla sha ka rong jyrngam bad na ka liang ka seng ha ki snem ba la leit ka la kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba ka dei ban test ïa ka um jong ka Wah Kynshi ban tip la ka dang long ne em ka ba  shngaiñ ban pyn donkam.”“Hynrei na ka liang ka Sorkar ka la shu phah tang ïa ka Pollution Control Board ban wan test ïa kane ka wah bad haduh mynta khlem da ai ïa ka kaiphot,” u la bynrap.U bah Thongni u la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka Seng ka don ïa ka jingsuba ruh ba na ka jingjaboh kane ka um ka pynlong ïa ki ba bun ki longïing ha kane ka thaiñ ba kin ngat ha ka jingpang bampong.“Ngim dei kita ki stad ban batai ba ka jingkynrei ka jingpang bampong ha kane ka thaiñ kan dei na ka wah Kynshi ne em hynrei haba ki briew ki ju bam ïa ki dohkha, ki shet jingshet ki sum da kane ka um kaba jaboh, ka pynsuba ba bun kiba ïohpang bampong,” u la bynrap.U la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka Seng naduh u snem 2010 ka la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ ba kim dei ban pyndonkam ïa kane ka wah bad kane ka long hadien ka jingïap khah khah ki dohkha ha kane ka wah.“Kum ba ka long mynta lei kane ka wah kam don shuh ki doh um ki ban lah ban im ha kane ka wah bad ka um ka la kylla rong jyrngam kumta ka seng ka kyntu ïa ka sorkar ba ka dei ban leh ïa ka test ban pynthikna la ka wah Kynshi ka dang long ne em ban pyndonkam,” u la ong.U la ong ba ka Seng kam pyrshah ïa ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban pynlong ïa ka tamasa hynrei ka seng kam kwah pat ban buhrieh ïa ka jinglong jingman ka wah Kynshi namar kiba nabar kim tip ïa ka jingshish. Ka KSU ka la buh ruh ka jingkyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kumba ka shimkhia ban theh pisa ban pynlong tamasa kumta kan shim khia ruh ban pynbha noh ïa ki surok sha kine ki thaiñ.
title: Tang ki dohum ruh kim lah shuh ban im ha ka wah Kynshi: Hato kan shngain ban pynlong Tamasa: KSU

content: Ka lympung  ïalehkai kynjatbol ba la pynlong da ka Mawlangwir Sports Club mynta ka sngi ka la poi ha ka Quarter Final kaba ar kata  hapdeng ka jingïalehkai ka Langsning FC pyrshah ïa ka Golden Lion FC kaba la pynlong ha Rowell Lyngdoh Stadium Mawlangwir South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai kala long shisha kaba itynnad ha kaba ha ka Langsning FC ka la ïoh shibun ki kabu ksiar ban ïoh thep ïa ki goal jong ki  hynrei da ka jingtbit ki rang ïalehkai jong ka Golden Lion FC kim shem lah ïoh lad ban thep ïa ka goal ki jong ki ha kaba ka Golden Lion FC ka la ïoh ban thep 1 goal kata ha ka Kylla step lyngba u Hikai Bareh jersey no 15, kat haduh kaba kut jong ka jingïalehkai ka Langsning kam shem la lah ban pynphai wat tang shi kol ha kaba ka Golden Lion FC ka la ïoh khur ïa ka nam jingjop da 1- 0 goal bad ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ka Mawlangwir Sports Club ka la ïoh ban ai khusnam T. 5 hajar tyngka ïa u Hikai Bareh uba la ïoh ïa ka nam “Man of the Match”. Ka Quarter Final kaba lai kan long ha ka 2 tarik  Rymphang 2024 hapdeng ka MLP pyrshah ïa ka KMC Sonapur ha ka por 1 baje nohphai sngi.
title: Da 1- 0 goal pynliem ka Golden lion FC ïa ka Langsning FC ha Rowell Lyngdoh Stadium

content: Ki trai jaka na ka thaiñ Mairang kiba la dep ban soi bad ka sorkar jylla  na ka bynta ka  Project Climate Adaptive Community Based Water Harvesting Structure, myn ha ka 17 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2024, ki la dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban phiah ïa kane ka jingtrei ha ki bynta kiba rit khnang ba ki kontraktor barit na ka ne ka thaiñ kin ïoh ïa ka kam ka jam.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor na ka liang u Bah Apbor Mawlong, uwei na ki trai jaka, u la ong ba kane ka jingwan mih ki trai jaka mynta ka sngi ka long  hadien ba na ka liang ka sorkar na ka bynta kane ka  project ha East Khasi Hills ka la khot da ka tender ka ba heh dor bad kane ka wanrah jingeh ïa ki kontraktor kiba rit ba kim lah shuh ban pyntrei ïa kane ka project.“Haba ki trai jaka ki la ai ïa kane ka jaka sha ka Soil Department ban pyntrei ïa kane ka Project hynrei na ka liang ka Sorkar ka la khot da ka tender kaba poi da ki klur tyngka bad kum ki kontraktor kiba  rit kim lah shuh ban ïoh ka jingmyntoi na kane ka skhim bad kane ka khang lad ïa ki kontraktor kiba rit na ki thaiñ nongkyndong.”Na ka liang ki trai jaka myn ha ka 20 tarik Nohprah 2023, ki la leit ban kynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnad Soil ban kyrpad ban phiah ïa kane ka jingtrei, bad na ka liang u Myntri u la pynpaw ba ym lah ban leh ïa kata hynrei na ka liang jong ngi, ngi dang don ka jingkyrmen namar kumba ka long mynta ym pat khot tender na ka bynta ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District,” u la ong.“Ngi la buh ïa kane ka jingdawa sha ka sorkar ba ki kwah ban pynphiah ïa kane ka jingtrei khnang ba ki kontraktor na kane ka thaiñ ruh kin ïoh jingmyntoi lang na kane ka skhim,” u la bynrap.Haba kylli u la ong ba, “ngi kum ki trai jaka ngim ïoh jingmyntoi shuh na kane ka skhim namar ngi la dep ban ai ïa ka jaka hynrei ngi la buh da ka kyndon shwa ban soi ka MOU ba ki ban pyntrei ïa kane ka kam ki dei ban long ki kontraktor na kine ki thaiñ.” “Kumta lada ka sorkar kan khot biang ïa ka tender da ka dor kaba heh na ka liang ki trai jaka kin ym shah shuh ban pyntrei ïa kane ka project ha kane ka jaka jong ki,” u la bynrap.
title: Dawa ki trai jaka ba dei ban phiah ïa ka jingpyntrei ïa ka Project CACBWHS ha EWKH

content: Ki samla napoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District  kiba la leit ïa shim bynta ha ka jingïakop jngi um ne ka Swimming  ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games kaba la long ha Tura ka la ïoh ban khur haduh 3 tylli ki Gold  Medal, 5 tylli ki Silvers bad 3 tylli ki Bronz Medal ha kaba na ka liang u Bah H.S Diengdoh uba dei u President jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Swimming Association u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw ba watla ha pdeng ki jingeh kiba bun ban beh sha ka thong bad ka nam jingjop ha kaba mynta ka sngi ki la ïoh kheit ïa u soh ka jingkmen ba ki samla ki la ioh ïa ka nam ban ïoh khur haduh 3 tylli ki Gold, 5 Silvers bad 3 tylli ki Bronzes Medal bad ngeit skhem kane ka long ka jingburom ym tang ïa ki hynrei ïa ka Association bad ruh ïa ka dong ka thaiñ South west Khasi Hills District baroh ka wei.1. Badapjingkyrmen Thongni (50m backstroke)2. Pynkhlaiñbor Wanniang (100m backstroke)3. Alvinson Shylla (50m backstroke)1. Lastbornshine Kharlyngdoh (100m backstroke)2. Baiahunlang Thongni (100m butterfly)3. Khrawkupar Lyngdoh (50 m breast stroke)4. Khrawkupar Lyngdoh (200m individual medley)5. Medley Relay (4×100 m) – SWKHD Team6. Free Style Relay (4x100m) SWKHD Team1. James Anderson Kharlyngdoh (50m butterfly)2. Khrawkupar Lyngdoh (50m breast stroke) 3. Medley Relayed.
title: Khur ka SWKHD 3 Golds, 5 Silver bad 3 Bronze ha ka Swimming jong ka 5th  Meghalaya Games

content: Ki rang bad ki thei ïalehkai Taekwondo na East Khasi Hills district sa shisien biang, ka la khur da ki takma ksiar ha baroh ki jinglehkai Taekwondo kaba la pynlong ha Montfort Centre ha Tura.Ha ka kyrdan Junior Girls’ Kyorugi hapoh 46 kg, ka Ibapyhnun Kharmyndai na East Khasi Hills ka la pynliem noh ïa ka thei ïalehkai na South West Garo Hills’ Joynilla Ch Sangma katba ka Nokgrikchi G Momin bad ka Jheanchim B Marak ki la ïoh da ki takma rnong.Ha ka kyrdan Junior Girls’ Kyorugi hapoh 42 kg, ka Dayalanki Challan na West Khsi Hills ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Sritee Kumari na West Jaintia Hills bad khur ïa ka takma ksiar katba ka Aurialla Wasabi K Marak bad ka Jaksal Arimchi T Sangma ki la ïoh ïa ka takma rnong.Ha ka jinglehkai kaba khatduh ha ka kyrdan Junior Boy’s Kyorugi hapoh 45 kg u Ravi Kumar Rai na East Khasi Hills da kaba pynliem ïa u Areyo M Sangma na East Garo Hills bad ïoh syndon ïa ka takma ksiar katba u Kreangbeth A Sangma na West Garo Hills bad u Samir Chetri ki la ïoh da ka takma rnong.
title: Khur ki nonglehkai Taekwondo na East Khasi Hills da ki takma ksiar

content: Ka jingai mynsiem bad ka jingkmen ka la mih paw ha ka Meghalaya Games ha kaba ka kong Marbarisha M Pdah, 44 snem ka rta, ka la hap ban pynbit pynbiang ïalade ban ïakhun ha ka jinglehkai syndah lang bad ka khun kynthei jong ka, ka Toiaibha M Pdah ba dang 24 snem ka rta bad kine arngut kin ïakhun lang ha ka Senior Women’s Category ha ka 10 m bad 50 m Rifle Event bad kawei pat kan dei ha ka 10 m & 25 m Pistol event.
