Ka jingïaid lynti jong kine arngut ka pyni shai ïa ka jingkhlaiñ ka ïing ka sem ban ïaid ryngkat lang ban pynurlong ïa ka jingphohsniew ka jong ki.Kane baroh ka la wan long hadien ba ka kong Marbarisha ka sngew ïoh mynsiem na ka jinsngewtynnad ka khun ban siat pistol bad katba dang ïaid ki por, ka ju ïalam ïa ka khun ban shah hikai ha ka jaka ai jinghikai siat pistol bad ai mynsiem ïa ka khun.  Haba ïohi ba ka khun ka kiew ha ka kam ïalehkai ha ki jingïakhun bapher bapher, ka kong Marbarisha ka la sdang ban ïaid thymmai ka jingim jong ka ban mih shakhmat ha ki kam ïalehkai.“Haba nga ïohi ïa ka Toiaibha ba ka ïeng ha ka nongrim lade ban poi sha ka thong, kane ka pynskuiñ ïa ka mynsiem jong nga, bad nga sngewthuh ba kam pat dier ka por ban beh ïa ka thong bad ban bud ïa ka jingphohsniew,” ong ka kong Marbarisha, haba kren shuwa ban ïakhun ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games. “Ka Meghalaya Games ka ai ïa ngi ïa ka kabu ban mih madan lang bad ban wanrah burom ïa ka jylla.” Haba kren khyndiat bad ka Samla Toiaibha, ka la ong, “Kum ka khynnah skul, nga ju don bynta kum ka NCC Cadets, bad dei nangne ba nga sdang ban sngewtynnad ban siat suloi. I mei i ju ai mynsiem ïa nga ban leit sh ki NCC Camps bad i ju ai mynsiem ruh ba ngan ïaid beit shakhmat ha ki jinglehkai siat suloi. Ha u snem 2016, nga ïoh ïa ka call na ka paralok bad ka la wer ïa nga ban rung dkhot ha ka Shooting Association. Kadei ka jingkwah jong i mei ba ngan long ka nongïalehkai. I ju synran ïa nga da leit lehkai ha Assam Rifles kaba don ha Happy Valley, Shillong. Ha kaba nyngkong, i ju sngew artatien ban rung lang ban lehkai namar ka rta, hynrei i ju synran ïa nga sha ki State/National Championship.”
title: “Khana ai mynsiem”: Lehkai lang ki shi kmie shi khun ha ki jingïakhun ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games

content: Ka jingïalehkai jong ka Athletics ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Meghalaya Games kaba San ka ba la long ha Tura, West Garo Hills District, ka la lap ba poi noh sha kaba kut mynta ka sngi. Bad ha kine ki lai sngi jong ka jingïakhun u Skhemlang Suba  ka Ri Bhoi bad ka Glorify Kurbah ka EKH ki la ïoh ba kin rah ïa ka nam kum u rang ne ka thei ïalehkai ba kynsai (Best Athlete).Na ka liang u Skhemlang ka daw kaba la pynlong ïa u ba un ïoh ban rah ïa kane ka nam ïalehkai ba kynsai ka lympung ka la wan hadien ba u la lah ban pyndep kham sted ïa ka thong ha ka jingïakob mareh kaba 800M hadien ba u la lah ba un pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka 1:54.7 sec, kaba la biang pura ïa u ba un ïoh ban khur 897 poiñ, katba na ka liang ka Glorify Kurbah, ka la ïoh ba kan khur ïa kane ka nam hadien ba ka la lah ba kan pyndep ïa ka thong ka ïakob mareh kaba 800M da  ba kaba ka la lah ba kan pyndep ïa ka thong ha ka  2:21.5 sec bad khur 809 poiñ.Haba kheiñ kyllum pat ïa ka rukom ialehkai ha baroh ki lai sngi jong kane ka jingïalehkai,  ka kynhun jong ka West Jaintia Hills District kaba la ïoh ba kan khur 17 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 8 tylli ki takma ksiar, 4 ki takma rupa bad 5 ki takma rnong, ka kynhun kaba wan ba-ar dei ka Ri-Bhoi District hadien ba ka la ïoh ba kan khur 15 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 6 ki takma ksiar, 6 ki takma rupa bad 3 tylli ki takma rnong, katba ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka East Khasi ka la wan ban bat ïa ka kyrdan kaba lai hadien ba ka la ïoh ba kan khur 10 tylli ki takma ba kynthup 5 ki takma ksiar, 3 ki takma rupa bad 2 tylli ki takma rnong.”
title: Rah ka WJH ïa ka nam lahduh u Skhemlang bad ka Glorify kum ki nongïalehkai ba kynsai ha ka Athletics

content: Ka lympung ïalehkai Meghalaya Games kaba 5 kaba la ïaid shaphrang mynta ha Tura, West Garo Hills District la sakhi ïa ki lai tylli ki jait jingïalehkai tynrai (traditional games), kaba kynthup ïa ka Mawpoiñ (Khasi), Rah Moo Khrah (Jaiñtia) bad ka Wa’pong Sika (Garo).Ha ki jingïakhun kiba la pynlong ha Don Bosco School, Tura lada phai sha ki jingïakhun final jong ka Wa’Pong Sika, u Pangrak R. Marak ka West Garo Hills District u la long u lahduh, ba wan ba-ar dei u Lambai Challam na ka West Jaintia Hills District bad ba wan balai dei u Wanlamrhamiki Passah na ka West Jaintia Hills District.Katba ha ka jingïakhun jong ka Mawpoiñ jong ki kynthei, ka kynhun ïalehkai ka East Khasi Hills District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka West Garo Hills District. Katba ka kynhun ba wan ba lai ka dei ka West Jaintia Hills District.Ha ka jingïakhun jong ki shynrang pat ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka East Khasi Hills District ki la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka West Garo Hills District ha ka jingïakhun kaba itynnad bad kaba ïakhaid bha.Ha ka ïakop Rah Moo Khrah kaba para marwei ki shynrang, u Da Oo Hi Dhar ka West Jaintia Hills District u la long u nam tam ha ka jingïakhun, bud pat da u Me-U-Ru Suna na ka West Jaintia Hills District bad u Vincent Bareh na ka East Khasi Hills District u la wan ba lai. Katba ha ka ïakop ïalehkai kynhun sa shisien pat ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka West Jaintia Hills District ba la lamkhmat da u Baphin Nongrum, Shanlangki Lyngdoh, Callten Sari, Me-U-Ru Suna bad u Da OO Hi Dhar ki la long ki nongjop ha ka jingïakop da kaba pynliem ïa ka kynhun jong ka East Khasi Hills District ba la mihkhmat da u Janaising Marbaniang, Arkystar Kharkamni, Riangpor Kharkongor, Vincent Bareii bad u Arjun Thabah.”
title: Shongshit ki jingïalehkai tynrai Meghalaya Games, lahduh ka EKH ïa ka Mawpoin, WJH ïa ka Rah Moo Khrah bad ka WGH ïa ka Wa’Pong Sika

content: :Ka Indian Chamber of Commerce mynta ka 8 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ka la pynlong ïa ka Awareness Workshop halor ka Intellectual Property Rights (IPR) ha ka Aspirational Block ha SGSY Hall Umling C&RD Block, Ri Bhoi District.Ha kane ka prokram la don bynta lang u PK Bagchi, uba dei u Designated Intellectual Property Attorney, ICC- Intellectual Property Fecilitation Centre, Guwahati bad u G. Langstieh, uba dei u Functional Manager District Commerce and Industries Center Ri Bhoi District kum ki briew kiba la tbit bad ki nongseng kam la jong (Entrepreneur) na kylleng ka Block ki la wan ban shim bynta ha kane ka prokram ban ïoh jingtip ba kham bniah halor ka Intellectual Property Right.Haba kren ha kane ka jingïalang, u Bah G. Langstieh u la pynshai shaphang ka jingdonkam ka IPR ryngkat ki nuksa Coke Opener jong ka kompani Coca-Cola.“Ka dei ka lynti ba jingai bad kyllaiñ ha ka IPR hynrei ka long kaba donkam bha ha ka kam khaïi ban lait na ka jingpyrthuh bud ïa ka kyrteng. Tang Lada phi don IPR phi lah ban leit ïing bishar lada don kiba pyrshang ban pyndonkam bakla ïa ka kyrteng ka kompeni jongphi,” la ong u Langstieh.Katba na ka liang jong u Bagchi u la kren ruh shaphang ka bor sngewthuh kaba long kaba donkam na ka bynta u briew, kumta ruh ka jingsngewthuh ha ka kam ka long kaba kongsan na ka bynta ka jinglong kyrpang ki mar, “kiba bun ki MSME ki duna ka jingtip ïa ka IPR kaba pynlong ïa ki kompeni heh ban shim kabu ïa kane ka jingtlot jong ki”..U Bagchi u la pynshai ruh ïa ki kyndon jong ka IPR Registration bad ïa ka jingïohnong na ka bynta ki MSME.Ki mat ba kongsan kiba la ïakren ha kane ka prokram kaba la long mynta ka sngi ki long ïa ka Trademark Registration, Copyright Registration, Patent Registration, Geographical Indication Registration bad ka Commercialisation of Intellectual Property Right.
title: Pynlong ka Indian Chamber of Commerce ïa ka Awareness Workshop halor ka IPR

content: :Ka Dr. M. A Lyngdoh kaba dei ka Myntri jong ka tnat ka koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar Jylla Meghalaya ka la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki samla jong ka thaiñ Mawkhyrwang ba ki long shisha kum kita ki Human Ambulance na ka ki kam bah jong ki, ba ha kane ka thaiñ kam don ka surok lada jia ba don ki nongpang bad kiba armet ki thmu ban leit phah sumar hapoh ka Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat ki ju pyndonkam ban kit ne bah da ka khoh haduh ban da poi ha ka surok ba lait kali, ïa kane la sakhi ba kine ki samla ki la tyrwa sngewbha ïa ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ban kit ïa ka da ka khoh khnang ba ma ka kan ïoh ban tip ïa ka ei ba kine ki samla ki ju mlien ban long kum kita ki Human Ambulance ne ki briew kiba kit nongpang.Ban shu pynkynmaw kane ka thaiñ Mawkhyrwang ki don kumba 6 tylli ki shnong kiba ym pat poi surok na kadaw  jong ka jingjrong ki lum bad ki riat kiba eh ki hap ban ïaid da ka kjat.
title: Da ki Human Ambulance ai nam ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh ïa ki samla na ka thaiñ Mawkhyrwang SWKHD

content: :U nongïalam jong ka National People’s Party (NPP), u James Sangma, myn ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah, u la pyntip ba kum ka MP, ka Agatha Sangma ka la trei shitom na ka bynta ka ri Lum Garo bad ka seng ka la ïaid shakhmat halor ka jingïakhun hapoh kane ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u James u la pyntip ba la don bun ki bynta bad ki mat kiba la mih ha kane ka por ilekshon, hynrei, lem bad ka kam ba la leh da ka Agatha, kan nym ktah ïa ka jingjop.“Ka trei shitom ha ka ban leit jingleit bad shimkhia ïa ki mat ym tang ha ka Ri Lum Garo hynrei ha ka jylla baroh kawei. Ngi lah ban pynkynmaw ba dang shen, la don kawei ka jingjia halor ka ktien bad ka la leit sha New Delhi ban kynduh ïa u Myntri ka kam poh ïing. Te kane ka pyni ïa ka jingkut jingmut jong ka na ka bynta jong ki paidbah jong ka jylla,” ong u James.
title: Sngew shaniah u James ban jop ha ka ilekshon jong ka Tura LS na NPP

content: Kum shi bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingiadei kaba iajan bad ki paidbah kiba shong basah ha ki jaka khappud, ka pyrton ba 50 jong Border Security Force (BSF) Border Outpost (BOP) ka la pyllong kawei ha Bahadur ha Mahenderganj, ha South West Garo Hills.U S.H. Yuvraj Dubey, u Commandant  jong ka pyrton ba 50 jong ki BSF u la ong u Kongsan. Ha kane ka prokram, la don ka jingsan ia ki tiar badonkam sha ki 13 ki school, club bad ki nongshong shnong.Kane ka kynthup ia ka jingsan ia ki top up, ki jingialehkai Indoor Games, kum ki Carrom Board, Chess, Ludu, ki juti ialehkai phutbol,  ki tiar Volleyball, badminton bad kiwei.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Commandant Yuvraj Dubey u la pynsngew halor ka jingkongsan jong kane ka prokram.Commandant Yuvraj Dubey, u la iathuh ba ka jingai ia kine ki tiar kan long kum ka jingkyrshan ia ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka jaka.
title: Sam tiar ki shipai Meghalaya BSF ïa ki nongshong shnong Mahenderganj

content: :U Myntri uba dei peit ïa ka tnat Pule puthi, u Rakkam A Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ïashim bynta ha ka jingpynhap lama jong ka Nepali Secondary School hapdeng ka jingrakhe ïa ka Golden Jubilee Celebrations kaba khatduh ha Nongpoh District Library.Na pdeng u Rakkam, u Bah Mayral Born Syiem uba dei u MLA, u Manish Kumar  u ADC ka Ri Bhoi District, u CM Adhikari u Senior Advocate ka Nongpoh District Court, u Madhav Singh uba dei u President jong ka Nepali SS Managing Committee bad ka Principal Rina Mary Hynniewta ki la don bynta ha kane ka jingrakhe.Ha kane ka sngi u Rakkam A Sangma u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki nongseng jong ka skul na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong ki khlem da shong thait na ka bynta ban seng ïa ki jaka pule ban pynnang pynstad ïa ki khynnah jong ka shnong.U la ai ruh ïa ka jingïaroh ïa ki nongtrei jong katei ka skul na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom bad len lade jong ki bad u la kyntu ruh ïa ki khynnah pule ba ki dei ban trei shitom bad ïai minot na ka bynta ka jingpule, ba dei ruh ban don ïa ka thong ban wanrah nam bad burom ïa la ka jong ka skul.Kane ka jingrakhe ka la long kaba iphuh iphieng da kaba la pyllait ruh ïa ki jingbuh sah jingkynmaw jong ka skul, la don ruh ka jingrwai bad jingshad tynrai na ki khynnah skul bad la pynkut da ka jingsam prize sha ki nongjop kiba la shim bynta ha ki jingshim bynta bapher bapher ha ka jingrakhe ïa ka tamasa Golden Jubilee.”
title: Pynhap lama u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka jingrakhe ka Nepali Secondary School ïa ka Golden Jubilee Celebrations

content: :U nongïalam jong ka seng National People’s Party (NPP), u James Sangma, ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah, u la kyntait halor ki jingkynnoh ba ïa baroh ki projek jong ka kam pynroi ki dei na ka bynta ka Ri Lum Garo, da kaba ong ba ki kaiphod kim ïahap bad ki jingshisha.“Kam dei eiei ruh em. Lada phi peit ïa ka kam pynroi kaba la jia ha ka kylleng ka jylla, nga sngew ba ka long kaba biang bad ïa ka kam pynroi, la dep don jingthmu lypa,” ong u Sangma.U la ong ba ka Ri Lum Garo ka la shah hynñiew beiñ ha ki por ba la leit bad la don ki katto katne ki kam pynroi kiba la dep jia ha kato ka jaka.“Haba phi shem ba ka kam pynroi ka la jia stet stet ha Ri Lum Garo, ki paidbah ki sngewthuh bakla, hynrei kam dei eiei ruh em,” ong u Sangma.
title: Ka long kaba bakla ban ong ba baroh ki projek pynroi ki dei na ka bynta ka Ri Lum Garo: James

content: Ki dak ki shin ki la sdang paw ba imat ka Sorkar Kmie kan hap ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingshna ia ka surok Shillong Western bypass lada ka jingsiew ia ka jingshim khyndew ia ki jaka, ka tam ia ka jinglut jong ka project.Ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka Sorakr kylla ka la bthah ia ki Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ri Bhoi bad East Khasi Hills District ban peit biang ia ka jingbuh don ia ki ia ka jingshna ia ka surok Shillong Western bypas 38 Kms.U Myntri ka tnad P.W.D. u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba baroh ki kam la dep pynbiang nadong shadong na ka bynta ka jingshna ia katei ka surok ka ban lut haduh 600 klur tyngka, katba ka ka jingsiew ia ka bai shim jaka pat ka long haduh 1,200 klur tyngka kaba ym ia hap shuh.
title: Iakynduh jingeh ka Shillong West Bypass barem palat ka jingsiew shim jaka

content: :U nongïalam jong ka seng National People’s Party (NPP), u James Sangma, myn ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah, u la ong ba ka jingkynnoh jong ki nongïalam ka seng BJP pyrshah ïa ka MP jong ka Tura, ka Agatha Sangma halor ki scheme sorakr pdeng ka bym ïahap ka long ka bym shong nongrim haei haei ruh em.“Ngam tip mano uta u nongïalam jong ka seng BJP uba ong kumta, hynrei nga tharai ba u la ïoh ka jingtip ka bym dei shisha. Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsdang jong ki scheme ka sorkar pdeng, la don bun ki paidbah kiba la kynduh ïa ka,”ong u Sangma.U la ong ba da kaba kynnoh ïa kiwei ka long kaba suk bha, hynrei u Sangma u la ong ba ka jingkynnoh ka shong ha ka jingïoh jingtip ba shisha.“Ka long kaba sngewsih ba u nongïalam um shym la leh ïa ka kamram jong u, um shym la wad bniah hashwa ba un kynnoh. Nga tharai ba ym don kano kano ka jingpynslem ban sdang pyntreikam ïa ki scheme sorkar pdeng(central schemes),” ong u Sangma.
title: Ka jingkynnoh jong ki nongïalam ka seng BJP pyrshah ïa ka Agatha halor ki scheme sorkar pdeng ka long ka bym shong nongrim: James Sangma

content: U nongïalam jong ka seng National People’s Party (NPP), u James Sangma, myn ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah, u la pyntip ba kum ka MP, ka Agatha Sangma kaba la trei shitom na ka bynta ka Ri Lum Garo bad ba ka seng ka la ïaid shakhmat ban ïakhun kum ki kyrtong ha kane ka jaka.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u James u la pyntip ba la don bun ki bynta bad ki mat kiba la mih ha ka por ilekshon, hynrei, ki kam ba ka Agatha ka la trei, kan nym ktah halor ka bynta jong ka jingjop.“Ka la leit jingleit ha kiba bun ki jaka bad ka la shimkhia ïa ki mat ym tang ha ka Ri Lum Garo hynrei na ka bynta ka jylla baroh kawei. Ngi lah ban pynkynmaw ba dang shen, la don ka mat halor ka ktien bad ka la ïoh lad ban leit shaduh sha New Delhi ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri ka kam poh ïing(Union Home Minister). Te kane ka pynpaw ba ka long kaba kitkhia na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka jylla,” ong u James.
title: Ïaid shakhmat ka NPP sha Ri Lum Garo, yn shimti ka Agatha ïa ka Tura MP seat: James Sangma

content: Na ka daw jong khlam Covid-19 kaba wan ban lynshop lynsher ia ka pyrthei, ka ri India bad ia ka Meghalaya, ka Sorkar jylla ka la buh ia ka Corona Screening Center ha Byrni, Ri Bhoi District ban khmih ia nongleit nongwah ha katei ka por.Na ka daw jong ka jingrit palat jong kane ka jaka, la pynkynriah noh ia ka sha Umling, Ri Bhoi District namarba ka kham heh ka jaka.Kane ka jaka ka la trei kam bha ha katei ka por. Hadien ka jingjah noh jong u khniang jingpang Covid-19, ia kane ka jaka ka pynkylla sha ka jaka ai jingtip. Kane ka jaka ka la shu sah kumto bad mynta ka la kylla ka jaka theh niut bad lah ban kylla ka jaka dik drok bad kiwei ki kam sniew.
title: Lah ban kylla jaka dih drok bad jaka kam sniew ka Umling Corona Screening Center

content: U Myntri ka tnad bording ka Meghalaya, u Abu Taher Mondal  ula leit peit ia ka jaka pynmih ding elektrik  Purulia Pumped Storage Project (PPSP), ha West Bengal. Ia kane ka project kaba pynmih ding elektrik kaba 900 MW na ki saw tylli ki Turbine ne ki kor pynmih ding elektrik.Ïa u Abu Taher Mondal la synran da u Commissioner & Secretary, Power department, Meghalaya bad u Subhasankar Debsarma Biswas, Director (Generation) jong ka West Bengal State Electricity Distributor Company Limited.U Abu Taher Mondal u la iathuh ba ka jingleit jngoh ia katei ka project ka long kaba ioh jingmut haduh katta katta bad kane kan iarap shibun ia ka Meghalaya kaba don hapdeng ka jingkyrduh bording elektrik.
title: Leit jngoh u Myntri ka tnad bording Abu Taher Mondal ïa ka West Bengal Hydel Plant

content: Ki nongïalam jong ki 7 seng na ki Thaiñ Sohra kiba kynthup ïa ka UHM Riwar Sepngi, ka CRYF, FKJGP Sohra, HANM South East Sohra, HNYF South East Sohra, HYC bad FKGJP Riwar Zone ha ka 8 tarik Nohprah 2023, ki la ong ba ka HNYM ka leh shilliang haba ka kdew kti tang ïa ka Land Custom Station ha Majai halor ka jinglait ka khajna ka jylla bad ki la kdew ruh ba kane ka ktah mationg ïa kane ka dong ka thaiñ.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Corlos Kharmih uba dei u Working President ka FKJGP Sohra Circle u la kynnoh ba ka jingkdew kti ka HNYM ïa ka Hima Sohra ka dei kaba ktah mationg haduh katta ïa ki trai kane ka thaiñ.“Ngi kwah ban pynshai ba ngim wan tuklar halor ka jingïoh bhah ne duh bhah ki para doh ïa ka kamai kajih ha Majai hynrei ka jingwan jong ngi hi ka long ban pynshai halor ka jingktah mationg ka HNYM ïa ka dong ka thaiñ jong ngi” u la ong.U la bynrap, “Ka khubor sha ka HNYM ka long ban ym peit shiliang khmat tang ïa ka dong ka thaiñ jong ngi haba phi shim ïa ka mat phi dei ban peit lang ïa kiwei ki thaiñ ruh”.U Bah Kharmih u la ong shuh shuh ba “Ngi ruh ngi dei seng bhalang ngi trei na ka bynta ka jingbha jong ka dong ka thaiñ bad lada ki peit shilliang khmat kan long kaba sngewsih, namar ki kynnoh ïa baroh ka Hima Sohra” .“Ka Hima Sohra hi kam ju kyntait ïa la ki para doh para snam kiba wan ban trei kam ha kane ka dong ka thaiñ ka Hima Sohra, na ka liang jongngi, ngi sngewsih shisha bad lada ki don kum kita na ka liang ki seng kadei ban pynshai ïa ki kyrteng khnang ba ki seng na kine ki thaiñ kan sa shim khia lang”.U la bynrap ruh, “Hadien ka jingjia basngewsih ha Ichamati bad hadien ba la plie biang ka Export, na ka liang ki seng bhalang kane ka thaiñ ki la ïaleh ban wad da ki lad ki lynti ban ym ai bynta shuh ïa ki bar jylla ba kin khaïi pateng ha kane ka dong ka thaiñ da kaba ngi la bthah ïa ki Hima ki shnong ba kim dei shuh ban ai NOC sha ki barjylla bad kane ka la urlong shisha bad ki kali bar jylla ruh kim ailad shuh ban ïoh khaïi pateng, hynrei kaba sngewsih hi ka long ba ka mih kato ka jingïakren” .“Halor ka jingduh bylla ki 30 ngut ki para khasi na ka Hima Sohra ngim don eiei ban ong ïa kata hynrei ha kato ka sngi ki la wan hangne ban sei ki kot ki sla hynrei ngi la wad jingtip na ki nongpynïaid, ki la ong ba ki la buh por ar sien lai sien ban pynbiang ïa ki kot ki sla kumba long ka riti trei kam ha kane ka jaka” u la ong.U la bynrap, “Hynrei ki kot ki sla jong kito ki briew ngi khlem ïohi hynrei kiwei pat ki la wan ban phah ïa ki kot ki sla kumta nga kyrpad ïa ki ba kin leit ban submit ïa ki kot ki sla sha ophis treikam ban lah ban leh ïa kaba donkam”.U Bah Kharmih u la ong shuh shuh ïa ki nongïalam ka HNYM ba “Ynnai leh shiliang khmat tang ïa ka dong ka thaiñ jong ngi namar ha ka jylla ki don haduh 8-9 tylli ki Land Custom Station (LCS) bad lada ki kdew tang ïa ka Majai ka long kaba bakla bad haba ki sngew synei ïa ka Sorkar ba ka duh ïa ka khajna ki dei ban ujor da ka PIL ban tip lut ka jingduh khajna ka sorkar na baroh ki LCS”.Halor ka jingshim kabu ki Weightbridge kum ba la kynnoh, u la ong ba kane ka dei ka kamram jong ka tnad hi ba kan peit ïa kine ki jingkynnoh la ki dei ki ba shisha ne em.
title: Wat peit shiliang khmat tang ïa ka LCS ha Majai; ong ki 7 seng ïa ka HNYM

content: :Ka KSU Khliehriat Town Unit bad ka Ladrymbai Unit myn haka 8 tarik u bnai Nohprah ki la leit ïa kynduh bad u Additional SP ka East Jaintia Hills u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa uba dei ruh uba khmih ïa ka tnat pynïaid kali (Traffic) halor ka jingjur palat ka jingdheng kali ha ïew Ladrymbai bad ïew Khliehriat naduh ka por Mynstep, mynsngi haduh jan miet kaba la jan man ka sngi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka KSU EJHDU ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la dep ka la dep ban ai da ka dorkhas bad pynsngew sha u Myntri ka tnat kam poh ïing u Bah Prestone Tynsong ban wanrah da ka Traffic Branch hapoh District khnang ban lah ban teh lakam bha ïa ka rukom pynïaid kali ha district, hynrei sngewsih ba haduh mynta ka sorkar ka khlem leh eiei halor kane ka jingdawa ka seng. Halor kane haba ïakren bad Additional Deputy Superintendent of Police u lah pynsngew ba ïa kane ka mat na ka liang ka jong ki, ki lah ju dawa ruh ïa kane.Na ka liang ka seng lyngba u samla nongïalam u Chanky Shylla u General Secretary Ladrymbai unit bad u Samla Kyrshan Dkhar uba dei u President Khliehriat Town Unit ki la ai jingmut ïa ka tnad Traffic Cell ban teh lakam ïa ka jingjur palat ka dheng kali ha ka District Headquarter bad ïew Ladrymbai da kaba pynmih ïa ka Advisory Lane Order ka ban pynïaid  noh ïa ki trok thylli na ka Bypass Ladrymbai PWD khnang lait na ka dheng kali ba ha ka por mynsngi ha Ladrymbai bad Khliehriat kaba ktah shisha ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng ki paidbah bad ïa ki khynnah skul bad khamtam ïa ki kali Fire Brigade bad Ambulance ba kit nongbah na kawei ka jaka sha kawei pat kaba lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingjia ba sngewsih lada sah kut ha ka dheng kali. Ïa kane ka seng ka la ai jingmut ban leh shwa kum ka jingpyrshang bad ban peit kumno ka seisoh ne em.Ka seng ka ïai ban ba ka Traffic Branch ka dei ban don noh ha District khnang ba ki paidbah ka thaiñ kin nym shah ktah.
title: Ïaiban ka KSU halor ban ïoh noh ïa ka Traffic Branch ha East Jaintia

content: :Ka surok ba ïaid ki kali hapdeng ka South Garo Hills bad West Garo Hills kaba hap ha ka National Highway 62, ka la shah sahkut ha ka 9 tarik, Nohprah.Ka la don ka jingjulor ha katei ka surok jingkieng ba ïaid katei ka trok kit mar kit mata ha Mandanggre kaba hap hapoh ka blok Gasuapara.La don ka jingtrei shitom ban shna biang ïa katei ka surok jingkieng da kaba weng noh ïa katei ka trok ba la pynwit ïa ki nongleit nongwan bad yn sa maramot noh shen ïa katei ka jingkieng.
title: Julor ka jingkieng ha Garo Hills

content: Ha ka jingïakop shet jingshet kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingsngew sarong ha kane ka jylla jong ngi, ha kaba ka Nambie Jessica Marak, kaba la pawnam kum ka nongpynmih ïa ka channel jong ka ha YouTube, kaba la tip kum ka “Eat Your Kappa,” ka la lah ban poi sha ka kyrdan first runner-up ha ka jingïakop shet jingshet jong ka MasterChef India 2023.Ha ka sla official Instagram jong ka MasterChef India ka la dep pynbna kumne, “Ngi ai khublei ïa ka Nambie Jessica halor ka jinglah jong ka ban poi sha ka kyrdan 1st Runner Up ha ka MasterChef India! Ka jingïaid lynti jong phi ka la long ka jingshem kaba sngewtynnad ka jong phi. Ngi ai ka jingkhublei ïaphi ha ka jingwan ïashim bynta ha ka ïingshet ja jong ka MasterChef!”Haba kren shaphang ka Nambie Marak, ka dei na ka jylla Meghalaya, ha kaba ka la pyni ïa la ka jong ka sap shet sap tiew lyngba kane ka jingïakop shet jingshet, da kaba pynsah nam ban pynkhring ïa ki nongbishar bad ki nongpeitkai ruh kumjuh.Katba u Mohammed Aashiq na Mangalore u la ïohrah ïa katei ka nam MasterChef India 2023, ka Rukhsaar Sayeed ka la poi ha ka kyrdan second runner-up, ha ka jingpyndep ïa katei ka jingïakop shet jingshet.
title: Poi ka Nambie Marak na Meghalaya ha ka kyrdan first runner-up ha ka MasterChef India ’23

content: Ka Mawten Sports Club ka la ïoh ban khylliap pyrda ïa ka Mawten IV T20 Cricket Tournament 2023-24 myn ha ka 2 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 ha madan Mawpyllun Mawten ha kaba ka Royal challengers Mawsynram ka la jop ïa ka Nongpoh Town club da 5 wicket.Ïa kane ka Lympung la ïoh ban khylliap pyrda da u Bah Gideon kharkongor, kum u kongsan uba dei u Honorary Secretary jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Association ha ka jingsynranlang u Dhrubajyoti Takuria, Honorary Treasurer jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Association, ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki dkhot jong ka South West Khasi Hills District Cricket Association, ki nongtrei ka Sports Department Mawkyrwat ki riew rangbah jong ka shnong bad ka Dong ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat bad ki nongïalam jong ka Mawten Sports Club.Ha kane ka jingïalehkai phainal kaba la long hapdeng ka Royal Challengers Mawsynram pyrshah ïa ka Nongpoh Town Club, ka Nongpoh Town Club ka la jop ïa ka Toss bad ka la jied ban tied Nyngkong bad ka la ïoh ban buh ïa ka target kaba 113 runs na ki 16.5 overs bad hap noh baroh 10 tylli ki wickets. U nongtied uba la ïoh bun run tam u dei u Pushkar Raj uba la tied 27 run katba na ki nongbol ka Royal challenger u Andelbert shangpliang bad U Robin Chettri ki la ïoh ban khur mar 3 tylli ki wickets.Ha ka kynti ban beh ïa ka thong, ka Royal Challengers Mawsynram ka la lah ban kamai 115 run na ki 17.1 overs bad hap noh tang 5 tylli ki wickets. U nongtied ba la kamai bun u dei u Rudy Shangpliang uba la tied 52 run katba u Siraj Ali jong ka Nongpoh Town Club u la ïoh ban khur 3 wickets.Ka Royal Challengers ka la ïoh ban rah ïa ka song pisa kaba T. 40000 ryngkat bad ka trophy katba ka Nongpoh Town Club ka la ïoh T. 20000 bad ka Trophy.Ka khusnam Man of The Tournament ka leit sha u Bharat Gurung jong ka Nongpoh Town club, ka Man of The Match Final ka leit sha u Bah Rudy Shangpliang jong ka Royal Challengers, Ka khusnam Highest Run Scorer ka leit sha u Rohit Rai jong ka Donkin SCC bad ka khusnam Highest Wicket Taker ka leit sha u Robin Chettri jong ka Royal Challengers Mawsynram.
title: Pynhap pyrda noh ka MSC ïa ka Mawten IV Invitation T20 Cricket Tournament 2023-24

content: NONGSTOIÑ:U Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ïoh ban plie ïa u mawnongrim na ka bynta ban tei bad shna ïa ka madan artificial turf ha Riangdo, Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division jong ka WKHD bad ïa kane ka madan ka sorkar ka la mang pisa haduh 9 klur tam ïa kaba la khmih lynti ban pyndep hapoh 18 bnai.Haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingïalang u Conrad u la ong ba la 52 tylli ki snem ki la ïaid hynrei ka madan Riangdo neh sah kumjuh khlem da ïoh pdiang ïa ki lad jingïarap ban pynbha bad shna bha hynrei mynta ka kynti kan long ka jingsah kynmaw ha kaba kane ka madan shen kan sa kylla dur noh bad yn sa tei bad shna pynbha ïa ka.U la ïaroh ruh ïa u MLA ka thaiñ u Bah Methodius Dkhar bad kumjuh ïa u Myntri ka tnad Sport u Bah Shaklair Warjri ba ha ka 1 snem jong ka jinglong MLA bad Myntri sorkar ki la lah ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah ban ïoh noh ïa ka madan ïalehkai kaba bha bad kaba bit ba biang.Ym tang kata u la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kam dei ba ka pynbha bad theh ïa ki kam pynroi tang ha ki jaka sor kum ha Nongbah Shillong bad Tura hynrei kan theh ha manla ki District bad Sub Division khnang ban kyntiew ïa ki kam ïalehkai sport hapoh ka jylla.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi da ka jingïadonlang ruh u Myntri ka tnad Sport u bah Shaklair Warjri, u MLA ka thaiñ Bah Methodius Dkhar, u MLA ka Rambrai u R.G. Momin ki ophisar na ki tnad bapher bapher, ki riew rangbah bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Buh mawnongrim u MR ban tei ïa ka madan artificial turf kaba 9 klur ha Riangdo

content: Ha ka jingïalang ki kynhun Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla, myn ha ka 2 tarik Rymphang 2024, ka la  mynjur ban pynjlan ïa ka election MDC jong ka  Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) bad ka  Jaiñtia Hills Autonomous District Council (JHADC) haduh  6 bnai naduh u bnai Lber 2024.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ïathuh ba ïa ka jingïalang kaba la long mynta ka sngi, la wanrah ïa ka jingtyrwa na ka tnad District Council Affair (DCA) halor ka jingpynjlan ïa ka samoi trei kam ïa ka KHADC bad JHADC.“Ha u snem ba la dep na ka liang u Lat ka jylla u la ai jingbit ban thaw ïa ka Delimitation Committee, kane ka Committee ka long ban pynbeit ryntih ïa ki Constituency da kaba pynshong nongrim na ka jingdon ki nongthep vote,” u la ong.U la bynrap ba dang shen kine ki Autonomous District Council ki la phah ïa ka jingtyrwa sha ka Sorkar na ka bynta ban pynjlan shwa ïa ka samoi trei kam jong ka, namar ba kine ki Delimitation Committee kam pat lah ban pyndep ïa kane.”“Lah ban kdew hangne ba ka samoi trei kam jong ka KHADC bad JHADC ka la dei ban kut noh ha ka 5 tarik Lber 2024  bad kane ka rai ban pynjlan kan trei kam naduh ba kut u Lber na ka bynta 6 bnai bad ka sorkar jylla kan sa phah ïa kane ka rai sha u Lat ka jylla na ka bynta ban ïoh ka jingmynjur,” u la ong.U Bah Prestone u la ïathuh ruh ba mynta ka sngi  ha ka jingïalang la mynjur ruh ïa ka siemjam ba thymmai ba la shim da ka Sorkar ka ba la tip kum ka Meghalaya Program for Adolescent Wellbeing Empowerment and Resilience lane ka M-PoWER.“Halor kane ka sienjam ka Sorkar ka la thaw ïa ki agency kiba la tip kyrteng kum ka ‘State Human Development Council’ u ban khlieh da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, u Chief Secretary un long kum u Chairman kane ka  Project Steering Committee bad ki Deputy Commissioner kin khlieh ïa ka Executive Committees na ka bynta ban pyntrei kam ïa kane ka  program,” u la ong.Ha ka jingialang la shim ruh ïa ka rai ban mynjur ïa ka jingpynkylla ïa ka Meghalaya Telecom Infrastructure Policy (MTIP) 2024, “ kane ka policy ka la don lupa naduh u snem 2018, kaba la pynbeit lang bad ki policy ba la pynmih da ka Sorkar India, kumta mynta ka sngi na ka liang ka Sorkar India ka la pynkylla khyndiat ïa kane ka policy kaba na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ruh kan hap ban wanrah ïa ka jingkylla kumta ka kynhun myntri ka la mynjur ia kane,” u la ong.Ha ka jingïalang ki kynhun myntri la shim ruh ïa ka ban mynjur ïa ka  Meghalaya Forest Subordinate (Technical) Service Rules 2023 kaba la wanrah da ka tnad Meghalaya Forest.
title: Namar ba ym pat lah ban pynbeit ryntih ka Delimitation Committee ïa ki Constituency; rai ka sorkar ban pynjlan 6 bnai ïa ka Samoi trei kam ka KHADC bad JHADC

content: Ha kawei na ka jingjia kaba sngewsih bad kaba sngew triem bad kaba la pynpar ñiang khriat ïa kiba bun ba lang bad ïa ka shnong ka thaw hi baroh kawei, kawei ka long kmie kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Kong Wansaralin Wanniang, 26 snem karta ka la shah pynïap ha la u jong u kurim uba khlem ïashong ïasah ryngkat shuh.Katei ka lanot kaba shong basah ha Tiehsaw ka la shah mait da ka wait na ka khlieh ha u kurim u jong ka, uba ka khlem ïashong ïasah ryngkat shuh, uba la tip kyrteng u Biangkupar Nongsiej na Lawse, West Khasi Hills.La pyntip noh sha ki pulit ha ka por 7 baje jong ka miet 2 tarik Rymphang. Ki pulit ki la ïoh ban kem noh ïa utei u runar da ka jingïarap jong ki nongshong shnong bad kiba haïing hasem bad ïa ka tiar kaba u pyndonkam ban pynïap ïa ka lanot la ïoh kurup na kane ka jaka kaba don ka jingjia. La ujor da ka mukotduma pyrshah utei u runar bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid sha khmat.
title: Pynïap u kurim ba la ïashong khlad ïa la ka kurim da kaba mait da ka wait

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union ka la kyntuh ïa u Myntri ki kam pynmih bording elektrik jong ka Meghalaya, u Abu Tahir Mondon ba dei ban pyndap noh ïa ka post Assistant Engineer (Electric & Mechanical) kaba dang thylli bad ka Meghalaya Energy Corporation Ltd.Ka KSU ka la kyntu ruh ïa ki heh nongpynïaid jong ka MECL ba dei ban pynkut noh ïa kine ki kam bamsap bad kiwei kiwei ki jingtrei kam kiba ym shym la ïaid beit ïaid ryntih kiba don hapoh ka Corporation.Ha ka shithi ba la thoh da ka KSU sha u Myntri Mondal, u Reuben Najiar, uba long u Shongknor jong ka KSU Employment Monitoring Cell, u la pynpaw ïa ka jingbym sngewtynnad jong u ïa ka jingleh jong ka MECL kaba ym shym la treh ban pynlong ïa ka Personal Interview na ka bynta jong ka post Assistant Engineer, ïa kaba la Advertise naduh ka snem 2019.Ka KSU ka la ong ba kam lah ban pdiang ïa ka jingong jong ka MECL ba ka jingbym lah ban pyndap ïa katei ka post ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingbym don pisa.
title: Kyntu ka KSU ban pyndap noh ïa ka Post Assistant Engineer MECL

content: :Ha ka jingleit khynra kaba la pynlong myn ha ka 2 tarik, Rymphang 2024, ha kaba ka kynhun shipai BSF jong ka jylla Meghalaya, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Meghalaya Police, ki la lah ban kem ïa ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ka shini ha ka khappud jong ka Indo bad Bangladesh. Katei ka jingkhynra ka la jia ha ka khappud jong ka Maheshkhola kaba hap hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills district jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingkhynra ba la pynlong da katei ka kynhun jong ka 01 Bn BSF Meghalaya bad ki pulit jong ka Meghalaya, la ong ba la ïoh kurup haduh 50,000 kilo ka shini ba la thmu ban ban khaïi shaduh sha Bangladesh. Ïa katei ka shini ba la ïoh kurup, la aiti noh sha la thanad na ka bynta ban jingtohkit.Katei ka jingkhynra ka pyni ïa ka jingtrei shitom bad kut jingmut jong ka kynhun Border Security Force bad ki pulit jong ka Meghalaya, ha ka jinglah ban teh lakam ïa ki briew ba thmu khaïi tuh ïa ki mar bam bad kiwei kiwei sha ka khappud.
title: Ïoh kurup ki shipai BSF Meghalaya ïa ka shini lem bad ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit jong ka Meghalaya ha ka khappud Indo bad Bangladesh

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma ryngkat bad kiwei ki Myntri ki sa leit ban ïa shim bynta ha ka jingïaseng rakhe dap 150 jong ka jingpoi jong ka Balang Baptist ha ki Lum Achik ha kaba yn pynlong ha ka Sngi U Blei ha Bethal A.bri, ka bajngai kumba 34 Km na Tura.La ïathuh ba ka jingpoi jong ki bangeit sha katei ka jingïaseng rakhe jubili ka kot sha ka shi lak tam. Kiba ngeit ki ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïaseng jubili kin long na kylleng ka Meghalaya, Assam bad na ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi. Ha kane ka jingïaseng, u Rev Dr Raja Singh Elias, uba long General Secretary jong ka IEM, un ai ïa ka jngkren pynkut ha katei ka sngi.Na ka liang jong ka  President jong ka Garo Baptist Convention, u Sundarsingh A Sangma u la ong ba ka jingrakhe jong ka jingdap 150 snem jong ka Balang Khristan Baptist kam dei tang ka jingrakhe ïa ka history jong ka jingïaid lynti jong ka, hynrei ka dei ruh ka jingrakhe jong ka jingwan jong ka Balang kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingkylla ha ka imlang ka sahlang bad ruh ha kaba ïa dei bab ki riti ki dustur jong ki Achik. U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingrakhe ka dei kham tam eh ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Blei.Ka Garo Baptist Convention, ïa kaba la tip kum A’chik Baptist Dal’gipa Krima (ABDK) ha Garo, kaba la kynjoh mynta 150 snem, ka dei ka kynhun kaba kdup ïa ki Balang Baptist ha Meghalaya, Goalpara bad Kamrup districts jong ka Assam. Ka Garo Baptist Convention ka mih khmat ïa ki 2600 ki Balang kynthup ïa ki 309 ki Balang Kmie. Ki dkhot jong mynta ki don haduh 4,00,000 kiba la shah pynbaptis bad kumba 2,00,000 ki dkhot kiba ym pat shym la shah pynbaptist. Ïa ka Garo Baptist Convention la seng ha ka snem 1874.
title: Rakhe ka Balang Baptist ïa ka jingdap 150 snem

content: Ha ka 3 tarik Rymphang 2024, ha ka por kumba 12 baje mynsngi, uwei u rangbah  uba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Marshal Marwein 30 snem ka rta  u la jah klep hadien ba u ñiut ba la lum thup ha Marten u la twa bad ban ïa u.U Bah Marwein uba dei na ka shnong Mawkyrwat bad u shong u sah ha Mawiong ryngkat ka kurim jong u bad ar ngut ki khun.Hadien ba ka kynhun pyllait im ka la ïoh jingtip halor katei ka jingjia, ka la wan poi mar mar ha kane ka jaka bad ka dang pynlong ïa ka jingwad ïa une u rangbah. Kat haduh mynta, ym pat shym la lap ïa ka met jong u Bah Marwein.Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por mynsngi ha ka por ba ki ñiut kiba bun ki la twa bad hap halor jong u ha katei ka jaka theh ñiut. Une u rangbah u dei uba ju lum ïa ki ñiut ki ñier, ki jaboh ki jabaiñ na ka sorbah Shillong bad u dei ruh uba wad tinjot bad katba u dang wad tin jot kynsan kynsan ki ñiut kiba bun ki la twa bad tap lup ïa u.Kat kum ka jingïathuh ka kiaw jong  une u rangbah, ka kong Alma Lyngdoh Mawhlang, kaba don lang ha kane ka jaka haba jia kane ka jingjia, ka la ong, ba ka la ïohi ïa ka jingtwa ki ñuit ha kane ka jaka bad namar ba une u pyrsa jong ka u leit ban wad tinjot sha kane ka jaka ba twa, ki la wad ïa une u rangbah hynrei kim shem la ïohi shuh ïa u, kumta ki la pyrshang ban phone ïa u hynrei ka phone ka la switch off .Kumta ki la mareh ban leit ïathuh ïa ki bor peit ïa ka Marten bad hadien katto katne por la wan poi ki pulit bad la ïaleh ban wad ïa u da kaba tih da ki JCB hynrei haduh ba pynmih ïa kane ka khubor ym shem pat lap dien ïa une u rangbah
title: Jah klep u rangbah hadien ba u ñiut ba la lum thup ha Marten u la twa bad ban ïa u

content: Ka la don ka jingïasoi soskular ban pynlong ïa ka jingjurip shaphang ka jinglong jingman jong ka jaka hiar liengsuiñ ha Shillong Airport ha Umroi, Ri Bhoi District. Ïa kane la lah ban tip na ka jingpynmih hukum jong ka Ïing Bishar Meghalaya High Court myn ha ka sngi Thohdieng. Kane ka hukum ka ïathuh ba u Additional Advocate General ban buddien ïa ka hukum jong ka Ïing Bishar ba la pynmih ha ka 30 tarik u Risaw u la ïathuh ba ka la don ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingwad bniah ïa ka jinglong jingman jong ka Shillong Airport da kaba pyndonkam ïa liengsuiñ bad tip kum ka Aerial LiDAR Survey. Kiba don bynta ha kane, kynthup ïa u Dr N Mozika uba mih khmat ïa ka Airports Authority of India.U la ïathuh ba ka Ïing Bishar ba ka don ka khot tender na ka bynta ban leh ïa kane ka jingjurip. Ka Ïing Bishar ka la bthah ba baroh kine kiei kiei, kynthup ïa ka jingkhot tender dei ban phah bad pyntip ïa ka Ïing Bishar ha ka dur jong ka Affidavit hapoh lai taiew.Ka Ïing Bishar kan sa pynlong biang ïa ka jingbishar ïa kane ka kam ha ka 5 tarik u Lber, 2024.
title: Yn shong bishar ka Meghalaya High Court ia jingjurip ïa ka Shillong Airport

content: :Ka jingpyn byrngia bakhraw ne ka Mega Entertainment, kaba dei ka tamasa bakhraw jong ka jylla north east bad ka jingïakop pyni riam pyni beit, dang shen, ka la pynbna ïa ka ka tarik jong ka interview na ka bynta ka 13edition jong ka Set Wet Mega Mister North East. Lyngba kine ki interview, ki nongpynïaid jong kane ka jingpyn ïakop pyni riam pyni beit kin sa jied haduh 50 ngut ki nongïashim bynta ha kylleng jong ki phra tylli ki jylla northeast, ki ban ïaknieh na ka bynta kane ka nam jong kaKatba ïa ka interview ha Shillong na ka bynta kane ka jingïakop, yn sa pynlong ha Hotel Vivanta ha ka 10 tairk, Rymphang. Kaba ïasyriem bad kane, ka kynhun jong ka Mega Entertainment ka la pynlong ïa ka interview ha Kokrajhar, Kohima, Guwahati bad Agartala. Katba ïa ka interview ba khatduh, yn sa pynlong ha Gangtok ha ka 18 tarik, Rymphang ha Nar Bahadur Bhandari College.Lada uno uno u nongïashim bynta um lah ban leit sha kine ki jaka, ka kynhun Mega Entertainment kan shah ïa ki ba kin aplai online. Ki nongaplai kin donkam ban phone sha u nombar +91 84040 93938 na ka bynta ban registar bad ïaid shakhmat da ka interview.Ïa ka Mega Mister North East, la pynïaid da u nongpynwandur ïa ki riam ki beit, u Abhijeet Singha. La pynmih da ka Mega Entertainment bad la pynïaid ïew da ka Mega Activation. Yn sa don ki rang ban ïashim bynta na ki phra tylli ki jylla north east, ki ban sa leit sha Guwahati na ka bynta ka Grand Finale ka ba sa pynlong ha ITA Machkhowa ha ka 1 tarik, Lber.Ha katei ka rynsan, ka Mega Entertainment ka la pynthymmai ïa ka rukom pynïaid jong kane ka jingïakop pyni riam pyni beit, da kaba pynduh ïa ka jingmut jong ka jingai runners-up. Katba ki lai ngut kiba wan ha ka thup ba lai kum ki nongïashim bynta, kin kamai ban ïoh ïa ka nam Set Wet Mega Mister North East 2024. Ïa kane ka tamasa, la pynthikna ba man ki nongïashim bynta hangne kin ïoh kajuh ka nam bad ka burom. Ha kana ka jingïakop ban ïakhun na ka bynta kane ka nam, pyrshah ïa ki 47 ngut ki nongïashim bynta, baroh lai ngut ki nongïashim bynta kin sa sakhi, da kaba pyni ba ki long shisha kita ki nongjop da ka hok jong ki.Nalor jong ka khusnam song kaba la buh mar haduh T. 50,000, ki lai ngut ki nongjop kin sa ïoh ka lad ban long kum ki brand ambassador jong ka Set Wet. Shuh shuh, kin sa ïoh ka lad ban leit jingleit jngai, kin long ruh kum ki nongmihkhmat na ka Mega Entertainment, kin don bynta ha ka ban pyni ïa ki brand, ka jingleit shondur, kin ïoh mihkhmat ha ki tamasa jong ki samla bad ki jingpyni riam pyni beit bad ka jingdon bynta bad ki paidbah bad ka jingïatreilang bad ka agency Life’s Purple. Ïa katei ka jingïakop pyni riam pyni beit, la kyrshan da ka Title Sponsor – Set Wet, Style Partner – Killer Jeans, Fashion Partner – Butterfly Clothing and Accessories, bad ka Hospitality Partner – Hotel Daaysco Oley Allo.
title: Yn pynlong ïa ka interview na ka bynta ka Set Wet Mega Mister North East Shillong mynta u bnai ha Hotel Vivanta

content: Ki thei ïalehkai football jong ka Ri Bhoi District lem bad ka East Khasi Hills District ki la jam pat mynta sha ka phainal jong ka jingïalehkai phutbol ha ka lympung ïalehkai Meghalaya Games kaba san.Ha ka jingïakhun ïa ki Semifinal kiba la long mynta ka sngi ha PA Sangma Stadium, Tura, na ka liang ki thei ïalehkai jong ka Ri-Bhoi District ki la lah ha ka ban pynliem noh ïa ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District da 5-1.Ka nam tam ha kane ka jingïakhun dei ka Imaia Shylla kaba marwei ka la ïoh ba kan thep haduh 4 tylli ki kol bad sa shi kol la thep da ka Rimika Khongkai, katba ïa ka shi kol naka bynta ka Eastern West la thep ïa ka da ka  Rympeibasuk Syiemlieh. Katba na ka liang ki thei ïalehkai jong ka East Khasi Hills ki la lah ban pynliem noh da 5-0 ïa ka South West Khasi Hills, kaba hangne ka nam tam jong ka jingïakhun dei ka Inrilaidor Khongthaw, kaba la ïoh ban thep ar kol, bad ïa ki kol kiba sah la thep ïa ki da Melaribha Lyngdoh, Ibashembha Khongsit bad ka Ideibanrishisha Kharpan.
title: Jam ki thei ïalehkai football ka Ri Bhoi bad East Khasi sha ka phainal

content: :Kum shi bynta jong ka International Water Conclave 2024, ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner, West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai ka la pynlong da ka District level Quiz bad jingïakop dro dur bad ai rong ai rup myn ha ka 3 tarik, Rymphang ha Conference Hall, DC office, Jowai.Katba ki hynriew tylli ki kynhun, kynthup ïa ka Sokha Government Higher School, Sokha, Thomas Jones Synod College, Jowai, Kiang Nangbah College, Jowai bad ar tylli ki kynhun ba ïakop na ka Bharat Scouts and Guides ki la ïashim bynta ha ka Quiz Competition.Ha ka jingïakop dro dur, la don haduh 28 ngut ki nongïashim bynta.Katba ka theme na ka bynta katei ka jingïakop dro dur, ka dei shaphang ka jingtyngkai ïa ka um: kumno ban tyngkai ïa ka um khnang ban lah ban pyndonkam biang ïa ka(Water Conservation: Depict the essence of water conservation as sustainable utilization of water resources).Ka jingdon jingïadei ka jingim bad ka um:(Life and Water Connection:) To ngin ïa khmih ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng ka um bad ka jingim, da kaba ban jur ïa ka kam bah ba ka la leh ha ka mariang, ka jingkoit jingkhiah bad kiwei kiwei(emphasising its role in ecosystems, health and overall well-being).Ka jinglah ban pyndonkam ha ka lawei:(Future Sustainability): Ka jingbatai bniah na ka bynta ka jinglah ban pyndonkam biang ïa ka um lyngba ka buit ka bor, lem bad ka jingpynleit jingmut halor ka jingphikir bad sam ïa ka um ha ki jaka ba long lum.(Illustrate a vision for a sustainable and water- secure future through artistic interpretation, with a special focus on caring and sharing for water issues in hilly areas collectively).Ki ar tylli ki kynhun ba long ki nongjop ha ka Quiz competition ki dei ka Sokha Government Higher Secondary School, Sokha ba la mihkhmat da u Bah Gorge Donkupar Gassah bad u Bah Nangkhraw Kitbor Khonglah.Ka Thomas Jones Synod College, Jowai ba la mihkhmat da u Bah Mutbha Lapasam bad u Bah Quikly Pala.Ka Adittional Deputy Commissioner, West Jaintia Hills District, ka Kong B Blah, ka la pyntip sha ki nongïashim bynta ba katei ka jingïakop kam dei tang kum shi bynta jong ka International Water conclave 2024, hynrei ka long ruh kum ka jingpynhusiar halor ka jingmad jingeh ïa ka um. Ka la pyntip ruh sha ki nongïashim bynta ba ïa ki dur, yn sa phah sha Shillong na ka bynta ban khmih biang da ki nongbishar.Ka la bynrap da kaba ong ba ki nongjop ha kane ka jingïakop, kin sa mihkhmat na ka district ha ka state level.
title: La pynlong ïa ka jingïakop dro bad ai rong ha Jowai

content: U Myntyri ki kam korbar ri, u Amit Shah myn ha ka Sngi Palei u la plie ïa ka  Cyber Security Operations Centre ha Assam Rifles Headquarters ha Laitkor ha Shillong.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Amit Shah u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalam jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi, ka la kiew haduh katta katta ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ki kor ki bor komputor. U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar Pdeng ka don ka jingthmu ban pynthikna ba ka jingtrei kam jong ki kor ki bor komputor kin long kiba jop bad ban pynthikna ba ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka Internet kan long kaba shngaiñ bad kaba lait na ki jingeh na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri.U Amit Shah u la ïathuh ba ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar u Modi ka long ban ïada ïa ki kam sniew kiba mih na ki jingpyndonkam ïa ki kor ki bor computer. U la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew burom jong u ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ki shipai ka Assam Rifles ha kaba ïa dei bad ki jingtrei kam ki jong ka, kaba kong kat kum ka jingdonkam jong kane ka juk kaba mynta.U Amit Shah u la ong ba ka Cyber Security Operations Centre jong ka Assamkynhun haba pynlong ïa ki jingpeit pyrman ïa ki kam sniew kiba mih na ki komputor ha ka por kaba biang, ban pynduna ïa ki jingma kiba lah ban mih na kiwei pat ki ri bad ban ïada ïa ki jingpyrshang ban pynpulom ïa ki jingtrei kam jong ki shipai Assam Rifles ban ïaleh pyrshah ïa ki jingsniew kiba mih na ki komputor.
title: Plie u Amit Shah ïa ka Cyber Security Operations Centre ha Assam Rifles Headquarters ha Laitkor

content: Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ka la ïoh ka lad ban kynduh ïa u Myntri ka tnat pule puthi, u Rakkam A Sangma na ka bynta jingpynïoh ïa ka scholarship jong ki samla pule bad dang shen, kiba la pyndep ïa ka eksam MTET.Ha ka dorkhas ba la phah sha utei u Myntri, katei ka kynhun ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew diaw ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynslem ban pyllait ïa ki scholarship funds.Katei ka kynhun ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong ka ba ka jingktah jong kane ka jingpynslem ban pyllait ïa ka scholarship ka la pyndiaw ïa ki samla pule kiba la shaniah ha kine ki scholarship na ka bynta ba kin lah ban kyrshan ïa ka jingpule puthi jong ki bad ba kin lah ban ïoh ïa kaei kaba ki thrang.“Bun na ki samla pule kiba wan na ka longïing bym ïoh bym kot bad kiba shaniah ha kine ki fund khnang ba kin lah ban kyrshan ha ka pule puthi jong ki, kynthup ïa ki bai tuition, ki kot ki sla bad kiwei kiwei ki kot kiba donkam. Te, katei ka kynhun ka la kyrpad ba u dei ban shimkhia bad khmih halor kane ka mat bad pyllait noh ïa ka scholarship khlem pynslem shuh” ong katei ka kynhun.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka eksam ba dang shen jong ka MTET, ka KSU ka la pyntip ba la don katto katne ki nongïaleh eksam kiba ïa ki answer keys la ai na ka bynta ka Paper I (LP level) bad Paper II (UP level).Ka KSU ka la kam ba kane ka jingleh ka la pynlong ïa ki ba kin kulmar ka khlieh, bitar bad lynga napdeng ki nongïaleh eksamin kiba la pynlut ïa ka por, trei shitom bad khreh kot ha ka ban pynkhreh na ka bynta kane ka eksam.
title: Leit kynduh ka KSU ïa u Rakkam ban ïakren halor ka Scholarship ki samla pule

content: :Ha ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingkhynra, myn ha ka 8 tarik, Nohprah 2023, ka 4th Battalion jong ka BSF Meghalaya ka la lah ban ïohkem ïa ki runar ba thmu khaïi ïa ki dawai jyrhoh Phensedyl ba don haduh 375 bilor bad ka shini na India sha Bangladesh lyngba u khappud shabar ri ne International border jong ka East Khasi Hills, Meghalaya.Ha ka jingïoh jingtip ba bniah, ka kyhnun jong ka BSF Meghalaya ka la ïoh kurup bun ki borni shini jong ka India lyngba ka jingtreikam ba kyrpang ha ki jaka bapher bapher ha ki khappud International jong ka Meghalaya. Ïa kitei ki tiar ba la ïoh kurup, la aiti noh sha ka ophis custom na ka bynta ka jingtohkit ban dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: Ïoh kam ka BSF 4th Batallion ïa kiba suba khaïi ïa ki dawai jyrhoh Phensedyl

content: Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Meghalaya, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka duna bun ki doktor specialist.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka jylla ka donkam shibun ki doktor specialist, hynrei kiba don mynta ki long tang khyndiat.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingeh, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka Sorkar kam banse ban phah ia ki doktor ban leit shim bynta ha ki katto katne ki jingai jinghikai Certificate Course kiba tang khyndiat por khnang ba kin lah ban kin kham lah ban sumar kham bha ia ki nongpang.Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ruh ka donkam ia ki doktor kiba la pyntbit ialade ha ki kam puid briew bad ruh ia ki specialist ki ban sumar ia ki jngpang jong ki kynthei.Ka Myntri ka la iathuh ba wat hapdeng jong kine ki jingeh, ka Sorkar ka la shim ruh ia kiwei ki lad ki lyntri ban pyndiang ia kane ka jingdonkam bad dei na kane, ba ka Sorkar ka la kah ban ai ia ka jingsumar kaba kham biang ia ki nongpang jong ka jylla.
title: Duna doktor specialist ka Meghalaya: Dr. Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh

content: :Ha ka jingpynpaw ïa ka jingïatylli lang ban pyrshah ïa ka kam bam sap, ki nongtrei jong ka seng BJP ki la shong kyllaiñ myngor ha ka ban ïakhih myn ha ka 9 tarik, Nohprah, ha ka ophis jong katei ka seng BJP, ha kaba ka la pynrem ïa ka jingbam sap ba dang shen ba la donkti da u MP ka Rajya Sabha jong ka seng Congress, u Dhiraj Sahu.Katei ka jingïakhih ka don jingthmu ban pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar halor ka jingshah kynnoh ba la kot haduh T. 300 klur ka pisa ha ka por ba don ka jingkhynra ba dang jia shen ïa utei u nongïalam jong ka seng Congress.U Mariahom Kharkrang, uba dei u nongai ktien ba ha khlieh jong ka seng BJP, u la ïoh kren sha ka lad pathai khubor ha ka por ba don katei ka jingïakhih, da kaba thad madan ïa ka jinglam lynti jong kane ka seng bad ka jingai jingshlur shadien jong ka seng.U Kharkrang u la ong kumne, “Kane ka jingïakhih ka dei shaphang ka jingleit khynra kaba la dep pynlong. Nga tharai ka dei ha ka sngi balang, ha ka por ba ka ïingsah bad kumjuh ka ophis jong u MP ka Congress na Jharkhand bad la lap da ki spah tylli ki klur, ki bym lah shuh ban hynñiew.”Ha ka jingpynpaw shaphang ka jingbam sap jong katei ka seng, u Kharkrang u la ban jur ba donkam ban pynpaw pyrthei ïa kum kine ki jait kam, khamtam ha kaba synshar da ka seng Congress ha ki jylla. “Katei ka seng ka la ïoh lad biang bad sa shisien ban kren shaphang ka kam bam sap kaba la donkti ki katto katne ki seng bapher bapher, khamtam ka seng Congress ha ki jylla ba synshar da ka Congress. Bad kane ka long ka sakhi satar kaba ngi pyni hakhmat jong ki paidbah jong ka ri India. Te ngi la wan mihkhmat ban pynrem ïa kum kine ki jait kam,” pynbna u Kharkrang.U Kharkrang u la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong u ha ka jingpan jingkyrshan na u Myntri rangbahduh ka India, u Narendra Modi, na ka bynta ban pynduh jait ïa ka kam bam sap na kane ka ri. “Ka pisa kaba la ïoh kurup, kine ki spah tylli ki klur ki dei ki pisa jong ki paidbah jong ka jylla Jharkhand bad kumjuh ruh jong ki paidbah ka India. Te, ngi la don hangne ban pynpaw ïa ka jingïatylli jong ngi ban ïasyllok bad u Myntri rangbahduh, ba ka jingsuk kan bteng ban trei ïa ki kam ba bha bad ngi pynthikna ba ka India kan lait na ka bam sap,” pynthikna u Kharkrang.
title: Pynlong jingïakhih ki nongtrei BJP ha ka ohphis jong ki ha ka jingpynrem ïa ka jingbam sap jong u nongïalam ka seng Congress

content: UGeneral Secretary jong ka seng sain hima sima National People’s Party, U James K. Sangma uba la ong ba ka dkhot jong ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha, uba mih khmat ia ka Shillong Parliamentary Assembly, u Bah Vincent H. Pala un lah ban lait na ka jingshah tynjuh ha ka jingialeh elekshon. Ka jingpyrshah ia uno uno u nongmihkhmat ka long kaei kaei kaba yn lah ban kiar ha ka jingialeh elekshon, la ong u James K. Sangma.Haba phai pat sha ka kyrtong MP jong ka NPP, u James K. Sangma u la ong ba ka NPP kan pyrshan na knieh noh ia ka shuki MP na u Bah Vincent H. Pala ha kaba ka elekshon MP ka ban wan. U James K. Sangma uba long ruh u nongbah ia ka pla pisa jong ka NPP, ula ong ba ka jingsei jong ka sengi a ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka kyrtong MP, ka long ba kane ka Myntri ka don ruh kata ka jingioh jngai jong ka na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi.U James K. Sangma u la long ba ka NPP ka a iaid shaphrang ha kane ka elekshon bad ba seng kam kwah ban bein ban kynthah ia kiwei ki seng sain hima sima. Hynrei, ban peit sha khmat aiu ba ka seng ka lah ban leh ia kiei kiei kiba bha na ka bynta jong u paidbah.“Ngi la sdang ia ki jingleit ialap elekshon bad la shem ba ki paidbah ki pdiang ia ka NPP bad ngi khmih lynti ba kiei kiei ki long long kiba bha”, la ong u James K. Sangma bad bteng shuh shuh ba NPP kan sa knieh noh ia kane ka shuki MP na u Bah Vincent H. Pala, uba long u nongialang jong ka Congress, uba la bat ia kane ka shuki mynta la 15 snem.
title: Ka jingpyrshah ïa u nongmihkhmat Vincent H. Pala ka long kaba ym lah kiar: James K.Sangma

content: Ka Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kyntu ia ki dkhot jong ka Health Advisory Board ban ai ai ki jingmut jong ki ha kaba ia dei bad ki kam awria bad ruh ha kaba ai jingkyrshan ia ki nongsumar dawai kynbat jong ka Meghalaya. KaKong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh hadien ba ka la pyniaid ia ka jingialang ong ka Health Advisory Board ka la ong ba ki dkhot jong ka Board ki dei ban ai ia ki jingmut ki ha kaba ia dei bad ki kam awria khnang ban leh eiei ia kane ka jingeh ba ka imlang sahlang ka iakynduh ha kine ki sngi.Ka Myntri ka la kyntu ia ki dkhot jong ka Board ba ki lah ban pynlong ia ki jingwad jingtip kiba ia dei bad ka kam awria bad ka jingkiew jong ka jingpang HIV bad AIDS. Ka la ong ba ka Board kam dei ka jingai kam ia kito kiba don ka jingiadei bad ka sain hima sima.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Shongknor jong ka Health Advisory Board, u Bah Mayralborn Syiem u la kyntu ia ka Sorkar ba kan shah ia ki nongai dawai kynbat bad kin lah ban ia phylliew jingmut bad kito kiba la pynjanai ialade ha ki kam ai dawai bad sumar nongpang.U Bah Mayralborn Syiem ula iathuh ba ka la don ka jingai jingkyrshan ia ki ia ki nongsumar kynbat da kaba pyntrei kami a ki skim jong ka Sorkar India.
title: Kyntu ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ïa ki dkhot ka Health Advisory Board ban ai jingmut

content: Ka North East Students’ Organization (NESO) kan pynlong ia ka jingrah lama iong bad ia ka jingrah ia ki jingthoh ha baroh kawei ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ha ka 11 tarik u Nohprah ban pyrshah ia ka ain Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019, kaba long ka jingiuh roit ia ka hok jong ki trai muluk ki trai jaka jong kane ka dong ka thain.Ha ka khubor ba la pathai da u Shongknor ka NESE, u Samuel B Jyrwa u ong ba wat la ki trai muluk ki trai jaka jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ki la pyrshah ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Bill 2019, hynrei ka Sorkar kam shym la sngap ia kata bad ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Rajya Sabha ka la ai ia ka jingmynjur bad kane ka Bill ka la kylla ain kum ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019.U Bah Samuel Jyrwa u la ong ba kane ka jingpyrshah kan long ka jingphah khubor ia ka Sorkar ba ki trai muluk ki trai jaka jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi ki pat pdiang haduh mynta ia ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019 jong ka Sorkar India.
title: Yn rah lama ïong ka NESO ban pyrshah ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act

content: U MLA na Khliehriat na ka UDP u Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la pynbna ba kan don ka jingialang paidbah ha u Kyllalyngkot khnang ban iohsngew ia ka sur u paidbah ka East Jaintia Hills ha kaba iadei bad kajingthmu jong ka Sorkar ban wanrah ia ka lynti rel sha Meghalaya.U Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la iathuh  ba ia kane ka rai ba u la shim ryngkat bad ka MLA na ka NPP na Sutnga-Saipung ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla hadien  ba la ioh jingtip ba don kine kyrshan bad don pat kiba kyntait.U la ong ruh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingialang ka dei ban iakren halor ki jingktah jong ka lynti khnang ba ki briew kin ym shu ngiet matlah kumto.U Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la ong ba kane ka rai kam dei ban shim kyrkieh, hynrei ngi dei ban shim ia ka rai ha ka por ba biang bad ban shim ia ka jingshaniah jong u paidbah.
title: Yn pynlong jingïalang ka UDP halor ka jingwan ka rel sha Meghalaya

content: Uwei na ki nongïalam jong ka seng saiñ hima sima Voice of the People Party bad MLA ka North Shillong, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la wohdong ïa ka rai jong ka Sorkar jylla ban pynkynriah noh ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing longsem na Them Iew Mawlong sha kawei pat ka jaka. U Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba u sngew lyngngoh ïa kane ka rai jong ka Sorkar namar ba baroh kitei ki nongshong shnong kim dei ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board bad ruh jong kiwei ki tnad Sorkar.Ha ka jingpynmih jingthoh u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ïathuh ba na ka jinglum jingtip jong ka Sorkar la don tang 184 tylli ki household kiba dei ki nongtrei Sorkar. Napdeng jong ki, 128 ki dei ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board bad 36 pat ki dei ki jong kiwei ki tnad Sorkar. U Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba ki household mynta ki la kiew sha ka 342, kaba mut ba sa 158 tylli ki longïing longsem yn hap ban pynkynriah sha kawei pat ka jaka kaba thymmai. Ha ka 7 tarik u Nohprah ka Sorkar ka la pynbna ban buh ïa ki 342 ki longiing longsem jong ka Harijan Colony na Ïew Mawlong sha kawei pat ka jaka kaba heh 1.4 akar.U Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la khñium ruh da kaba ong ba balei ba dei ban ai jaka shuh namarba ki dei tang ki nongtrei. Une u nongmih khmat u la ong ba ka Sorkar kam dei ban pdiang ïa ka jingdawa jong ki nongshongwai. Une u nongmih khmat u la kynthoh ruh ïa ka Sorkar kaba la shim por haduh katne ban pyndep ïa katei ka jingeh. U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingai shuh shuh ka dei tang na ka daw jong ka jingbit jingbiang jong ka saiñ hima sima. U Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ruh ïa ka Harijan Colony, Punjabi Colony lane Sweepers, Lane ym dei ban khot Them Ïew mawlong.
title: Wohdong u MLA Adelbert Nongrum ba mih 342 ki longiing Them Ïew mawlong

content: :Ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawten (SSSM), South West Khasi Hills District myn ha ka 9 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ka la ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 25 snem jong ka jingïaid lynti ban ai jingshakri hapoh ka shnong ka thaw ha kaba u Ma Vincent H. Pala, MP ka Lok Sabha na ka Shillong Constituency u la long kum u kongsan ha ka jingïalang ba la pynlong ha madan Synrang Mawrin.Kiba ïa donlang ha kane ka sngi ki long u Bah Carness Sohshang, MDC ka Mawkyrwat Constituency bad kum u EM ka KHADC, u Bah Kynpham V. Kharlyngdoh, u Bah Lovingwell Lyngdoh, Myntri Shnong Mawten, ki nongkitkam jong ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawten, Mawlangwir, Mawkyrwat bad Nonglang bad kiwei kiwei de.Ha kane ka sngi ka la don ruh ka jingsam ïa ki khusnam kiba la jop ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher kata ha ka jingïalehkai kynjatbol, mawpoiñ, volleyball, marathon, jngi-um, corrom, tied-di-bet bad kiwei de ki jait jingïalehkai bad jingpynkup burom ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawten ha ki snem ba la dep bad kumjuh ruh ki nongïalehkai kiba la mihkhmat ha kiwei de ki jaka.Nangta, la ïoh ruh ki kyrwoh jingkhublei ne Greetings na ki Seng Samla Shnong kata Mawkyrwat bad Mawlangwir.U Ma Vincent H Pala haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka seng Samla shnong Mawten naduh ki nongkitkam jong ka seng Samla shnong ki rangbah shnong ba ha ka jingïaid lynti jong ka seng Samla ki la ïoh ban rakhe lehkmen ïa ka jing kynjoh mynta ïa u mawjam jong ka jing dap 25 snem  kane ka long ka jingsah jingkynmaw ba kum ki samla ki don ka  jingïatylli hapoh ka shnong ba lyngba jong ki ka don ruh ka jing kyrmen ïa ka lawei ba phyrnai.U la ong ruh ba barabor ki samla ki dei ki lawei na ka bynta ka jingbha ha ki shnong ki thaw ha ka imlang sahlang ngi kum ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei ki leit ki wan tang hapoh ka 5 snem namar kata lada ki samla  ka imlang sahlang bad ki paidbah ki bakla, ki nongïalam ha ka saiñ pyrthei bad haka shynshar khadar ka bakla bad lada ka ïing ka sem ka shnong ka thaw bad ki samla ki long kiba jop bad ki ba ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha ka imlang sahlang, ka niam ka rukom bad  ka riti ka  dustur ka im bad ka jaidbynriew ruh ka don ïa ka lawei jong ka jing kyrmen. U la ong ruh ba nga sngew tynnad ban ïohi ïa ki samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba mih sha khmat ban ïa shim bynta ha ka rwai, ha ka shad ka tem bad ha ki kam ïalehkai bapher bapher kane ka long kum shibynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki riti ki dustur jong kane ka shnong bad ka jaid bynriew jong ngi, kumta ngi donkam ban pynshlur ïa ki samla bad  kyrmen skhem ba ki samla nangne kin long ki nongïalam ïa ka shnong bad ïa ka jaitbynriew baroh ka wei bad naka liang jong nga ngan ïai don ryngkat bad u Bah Carnes Sohshang kum u MDC jong kane ka thaiñ la ha kino kino ki bynta ong u Ma Vincent H Pala.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh  ba  ai ba kane ka khrismas bad snem thymmai ka ban sa wan kan pynkylla thymmai ïa ki jingim jong ngi na ki ba sniew sha ka jingbha na ka bynta ïa lade bad ïa ka jaitbynriew khamtam ïa ki samla ban ai ka jingïarap ïa  ki briew ha ki jingeh jing jynjar ban pynkylla na ki jingsniew sha ka jingbha.La pynshit pynshngaiñ ïa kane ka sngi da ka jingshad bad jingrwai na ki samla kiba la jop ha ka jingïakop ba la pynlong ha ki sngi ba la dep kata na ka Badapjingkyrmen Nongsiej, ka Rikyntihun Lyngkhoi, ka Little Group bad na ka Labiang.Ka pynïaid bad jingkren pdiang sngewbha la ïoh na u Dr. K.K. Nongsiej, katba u Bah C.A.Lyngdoh, President ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawten u la pynbud da ka jingkren khublei.
title: Ki Samla ki rishot bad ka jing kyrmen ïa ka shnong bad ka jaidbynriew: Vincent H. Pala

content: :Ka North East Students’ Organisation (NESO) ka la kynmaw burom ïa ka 11 tarik, Nohprah kum ka Black Day ha ka jylla Northeast na ka bynta ban ïakhih ïa ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019. Ka NESO ka ngeit ba ka kane ka aiñ ka leh shiliang ïa ki riewlum jong kane ka jylla. Katba ha Shillong, ki dkhot ki la rah da ki placard ba thoh da ka jingthoh kum ka “peitthuh, pynduh pyndam, beh krad ïa baroh ki bar jylla kiba la wan naduh u snem 1971 ha ka jaka ban ai jaka sah ïa ki”U chairman ka NESO, u Samuel B Jyrwa, ha ka jingkren jong u myn shem taïew, u la pynkynmaw ba ki paidbah jong ka jylla North East ba ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah 2019, watla pyrshah na kane ka jylla na ki paidbah ka Ri Lum Khasi, hynrei ka sorkar India ka la leh kum bym patiaw ïa ki jingkyrpad bad ka la phah da ka Citizenship (Amendment) Act 2019 lyngba ka Rajya Sabha. Ka NESO ka la ban jur ba ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah, kan ïai kynmaw beit kum ka Black Day ha ka jylla North East.
title: Kynmaw burom ka NESO ïa ka 11 tarik, Nohprah kum ka Black Day

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, mynta ka sngi, u la pynkup burom ïa ki jongjop jong ka jingïakhun ha ka jingïalehkai Meghalaya Games 2024 bad ka Khelo India Youth Games 2024 ha ka prokram ba la pynlong ha U Soso Tham Auditorium, Shillong. Kumjuh ruh, la don lang ha kane ka prokram, dei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, Myntri sorkar bad kiwei kiwei, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Myntri ka Sports & Youth Affairs, u Bah Shakliar Warjri.Haba kren shaphang katei ka ka jingpynkup burom jong kane ka prokram, U Myntri rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma, u la ai khublei ïa ki nongjop da kaba ong ba ka jingjop bad ka jingïoh ïaroh jong ki ka la wanrah ïa ka jylla ba ka donkam ban rakhe ïa kane. “Une u taïew u long u taïew ba kongsan bad ngin sa rakhe ïa ki samla ha ka Sports, Entrepreneurship, Music bad kiwei kiwei ki bynta kiba ngin sa rakhe ha kane ka taïew kin dei halor ka jingdon bynta bad ki samla,” ong u Sangma. U la ong shuh shuh ba ka jingai jingmut jong kane ka jingpynkup burom bad pynithuh ïa ka jingjop jong ki samla, ka long ka jingban ithuh ïa ki kum ki nonghikai bad ki nongai mynsiem na ka bynta kiwei. “Nga kwah ban ong ïa ki samla kiba don hangne mynta ka sngi ba phi don ka jingkit khlieh bad ka bynta ba kongsan bad ym tang ba ka dei tang ka jingïoh khur ïa u medal ne takma ne ïohpdiang ïa ka khusnam hynrei ban long ka nuksa na ka bynta kiwei,” u la ong.Utei u Myntri rangbah u la pynpaw ka jingsngew nguh sha ka MSOA, kaba dei ka tnad sports associations bapher bapher bad ka Sports department na ka bynta ka jingnoh synñiang ha kane ka Meghalaya Games. “Don bun ki jingïakhun hynrei man la u snem, ngi la pynthikna ba ki jingïalehkai kin nang biang shuh shuh bad ngi lah ban jop ïa baroh ki jingeh,”bynrap u Sangma.Da kaba ai khublei ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol kaba la jop ha ka Khelo India Youth Games, une u Myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka kynhun ka la pynsngew sarong ïa ka jylla bad bynrap kumne, “Ki la long ki nongjop bad kane ka long ka sap kaba ngi don bad kaei kaba ngi lah ban poi ha ka thong lada ngi pynleit jingmut bad shaniah ha lade,” pynkut u Sangma.Dang shen, u Myntri jong ka Sports & Youth Affairs, u Bah Shakliar Warjri u la pynkynmaw ïa ki nongïalehkai ba kin pyndonkam da ka Cash Award na ka bynta ka sap bad kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ki ha ki Sports kiba ki la dep pyni sap. “Ngi kum ka sorkar, ngi pdiang ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong phi ha kaba phi la lah ban ïoh khur ïa u medal hynrei kam kut tang hangne, dei ban don ka jingthmu ban poi sha ka thong namar ba phi dei ka lawei jong ka jylla,” ong u Sangma. Hadien katei, kine ki riewpawkhmat ki la sam ïa ka Cash Awards sha ki nongïoh pdiang ïa ki medal ha ka liang bapher bapher.
title: Pynkup burom u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya ïa ki nongjop ha ki jingïalehkai

content: :Lai ngut ki rangbah ki la shah suba ba ki la donkti ha ka kam sniew, ha kaba la don ki paidbah jong ka shong kiba la bitar, ki la ïalum lang bad shoh bad dat ïa kine ki lai ngut bad kane ka la jia ha Rangsakona jong ka South West Garo Hills, kaba lam sha ka jingkhlad noh jong ki ar ngut kine ki rangbah ha ka miet jong ka sngi u Blei. Katba ki pulit jong ka Garobadha outpost, ki la husiar shaphang kane ka jingjia ba la don ka kynhun jong kine ki riewsniew kiba la kem ha kine ki nongshong shnong ha Jaluagre (Mangsanggittim).Ha ka poi ka kynhun jong ki pulit ha katei ka shnong, ki la lap ba lai ngut ki rangbah ki la shah shoh bad shah kem ha ki paidbah jong kane ka shnong. La rah noh ïa kine lai ngut ha ki pulit sha Garobadha primary health centre hospital hynrei ha ka por ba don ka jingsumar, la ong ba ar ngut ki la mynsaw jur.Katba ïa uba la khlad noh, la tip kum kyrteng ïa u kum u Balen G. Sangma (30 snem ka rta) uba dei u khun jong u Gurin Ch. Marak, uba la khlad noh, uba shong ba sah ha Skagre, PO – Rangsakona, bad u Sken D. Shira (30 snem ka rta), u khun jong u Jison B. Marak, uba shong ba sah ha Skagre, PO – Rangsakona, PS – Ampati, South West Garo Hills.Ïa uba don hapoh hospital mynta, la tip ïa u kum u Betuwel D. Shira (22 snem ka rta), u khun jong u Porindro Sangma, uba shong ba sah ha Arenggre, PO – Betasing, PS – Ampati,South West Garo hills. La rah noh ïa u sha Civil Hospital, Tura na ka bynta ka jingsumar ban dang ïaid shakhmat.Na katei ka jaka ba la jia katei ka jingjia, ki pulit ki la lap ïa kawei ka kali Maruti 800 kaba don u nombar B/R AS -15-7176 kaba la pyndonkam da kine ki lai ngut ki rangbah, kaba la bit da ka snam, ka mobile phone, ka tari Khukhri, ki katto katne ki identity card, ka pisa haduh T. 1700/-, Ka seal kaba hap hapoh ka kyrteng jong u Chairman, United Garo People Forum (UGPF), South Western Zone Ampati HQ Tura, ka kot thoh ba don ki kyrteng jong ki nongtrei jong ka United Garo People Forum (UGPF), Ampati Zone, South West Garo Hills.Katba ïa ka met jong uba la khlad noh, la pynkit noh sha Ampati Civil Hospital ha ka kamra ba buh metïap na ka bynta ban pyndep ïa ka Post-Mortem Examination.Ki pulit ki la dep ujor da ka Suo-moto case halor kane ka jingdonkti ki paidbah bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid shakhmat. Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki pulit, ar ngut na kine ki lai ngut, ki la donkti ha ka kam sniew bad la shah kem teng halor ka jingdonkti jong ki ha ki kam sniew bapher bapher ha kaba ïadei bad ka kam pynïap briew, rahbor na ka bynta ban dawa pisa, kam dawa pisa, ki tiar siat bad kiwei kiwei ha South West Garo Hills District.Ki pulit ki la dep pynbna ba lada don mano mano ba tip shaphang kine ki riewsniew ba donkti ha kane ka kam sniew, la kyrpad ïa ki ba kin pyntip sha ka thanad jong kane ka shnong mar mar bad yn nym pynithuh ïa ki bad yn ai da ka buskit ïa ki.Ki pulit ki la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin nym shim ïa ka aiñ hapoh ka kti jong ki bad sangeh ban donkti ha kum kine ki kam ïashoh ïa dat. Ki pulti ki lah ban shimkhia bad pynshitom ïa kiba donkti, maham ki heh pulit.
title: Shoh ki paidbah ïa lai ngut ki rangbah ha Garo Hills, lait im uwei

content: :Ka jingpyntrei ïa ka bynta jong ka surok na Jingkieng Borbasing, Ranikor shaduh Lad Alikwareng ka la ïaid beit shakhmat ha kaba u contractor bad ka NHIDCL kim shym la patiaw satia ïa ka jingbthah u Symbud Myntri, u Bah Prestone Tynsong ba dei ban shna pynheh kum ka 2-lane, bad ka jingshna ka la long hi kum ka single lane.Ban shu pynkynmaw ïa kane ka Surok 2 Lane naka liang ka Company NHIDCL kala shna pynkit noh ïa ka Surok haka jing jngai kumba 3 kms tam eiei bad naka liang ka Seng FKJGP South West Khasi Hills District kala leit ïa kynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner South West Khasi Hills District bad ruh haka naka liang ka Seng FKJGP ha ka 4 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 kala byrngem ban phah daka PIL lada kane ka company shna surok kam lah ban pyntrei daka 2 Lane kumjuh ruh watla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u ba dei u Myntri jong ka Tnad PWD jong ka Sorkar jylla u la leit jurip hi mar khmat ha ka 30 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 ha ryngkat ki ophisar Sorkar bad ruh la ïa donlang ruh u MLA ka thaiñ Bah Pius Marweiñ ha kaba ha ka tei ka jing leit jurip u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la kular ban phah pyn trei biang ïa ka Company NHIDCL daka 2 Lane ban pynheh shuh shuh ïa kane ka surok namar ka long kaba rit hynrei kane ka paw shai ba ka Company NHIDCL kam shem la patiaw ei ei ha kaba mynta kala pyndep ïa ka jing Siang ha baroh shi lynter kane ka surok bad ka long shisha kaba rit bad lada ïa kynduh kali heh ka long kaba shitom wat ïa ki kali rit ban ki ïaid na ki nala bad ïa ki jingker jong kane ka surok ki la pyntrei shait shait bad khlem ïoh i dak eiei ban tih ne ban pynheh ïa kane ka surok.
title: Ym patiaw ka NHIDCL ïa ka jingbthah u Symbud Myntri ïa ka surok na Jingkieng Borbasing sha Alikwareng

content: Ka Seng Khasi Kmie ha ka Sngi U Blei ba la dep, ka la pyllong ia ka Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng ka arphew san. Hakane ka leh niam Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng la ia shim bynta da ki khun u Hynniew ba kynthup ia u Khynriam, u Pnar, u Bhoi bad u War kiba dang bat ia ka niam tynrai ba la seng la buh da ki long shuwa manshuwa jong ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep.Ka Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng ka kynthup ka ia duwai ka phirat bad kiwei ki jinglehniam shuwa ban kiew sha kliar jong u Lum Sohpet Bneng uba don ha thain Umiam Khwan ban phyndep ka lehniam kaba kynthup ia ka duwai ka phirat bad ia ka sneng ka kraw kaba ia dei bad ka thymmei, ka nongrim bad ka larity jong ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep bad ban nguhlet ia u Trai Nongbuh Nongthaw bad u Nongpynlong ha kliar u u lum kyntang Lum Sohpet Bneng halor ka Duwan ka Dupat  Sohpetbneng.U Lum Sohpet Beng u dei u lum kyntang jong ka jait bynriew Hynniewtrep Hynniewskum namarba dei lyngba jong kata ka Jingkieng Ksiar Sohpet Beng ba ki khad hynriew trep ki khad hynriew ki ia hiar ia kiew shane ka pyrthei lyngba ka Jingkiew Ksiar Sohpet Bneng shuwa ba ki Hynniewtrep Hynniew Skum kin shongduh hangne ha sla pyrthei.Ka leh niam Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng ka kynthup ia ka jingai nguhlet ia u Trai Nongbuh Nongthaw uba la ri la sumar kyrpang ia ka jaitbynriew Hynniew Trep Hynniew Skum, uba la kyrkhu kyrpang ia kane ka jaitbynriew bad ka kyrpad ka kyrpon ia u Trai Nongbuh Nongthaw ban un nang kyrkhu ia kane ka jaitbynriew ba kan eh ka rngiew bad ka bok ka rwiang.Ha kane ka leh niam la don ruh ia ka jingsam ia u khaw pyneh rngiew bad ia ka um ba ka tong na ki tyllong um jong u Lum Sohpet Bneng. Ka leh niam Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng, ka pynkynmaw ruh ba ka jaitbynriew Hynniew Trep Hynniew skum ka don la ka jong ka niam tynrai, la ka jong ka pyrkhat ka pyrdain, la ka jong ka jinghikai ban kamai ia ka hok, ban ri ia la ka jong ka akor ka burom bad ban pynneh pynsah ia la ka jong ka larity hangne ha sla pyrthei.Ha kaba kum katei ka sngi, la kynmaw ruh ia ki katto katne ki rangbah jong ka Seng Khasi kum u Rangbah Sumar Sing Sawian (Bam kwai ha duwar u Blei), u Bah Mistin Tymthai, Bah Dipshon L Nongbri ki la long ki nongmait phang na ka bynta ka jingpynlong ia ka leh niam Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ia la ka jong ka niam tynrai bad kajingngeit da kane ka pateng kaba mynta bad ka pateng ka ban sa wan.
title: Pyllong ka Seng Khasi Kmie ïa ka leh niam Pyneh Rngiew Kiew Lum Sohpet Bneng

content: Kum shibynta ban lehlakam ia ka jingmih jong kiba bun ki karkhana beain shna mawit, ki bor Sorkar jong ka West Garo Hills ki la pynjari ia ka hukum hapohka Section-177 Cr.P.C. hapoh jong katei ka district.Kane ka jingpyntrei kam ia katei ka ain, ka long ba West Garo Hill District ka la mad ia ka jingpynjakhlia ia ka mariang na kadaw jong ka jingmih jong ki karkhana sha mawit beain kham tam lei leishilynter jong ka surok Damalgre-Garobadha.La iathuh ruh ba ka longkaei kaei kaba isaitmet ban iohi ba ki jaka rep ki jaka riang ki lasdang ban duh bad mih pat ha ki jaka jong ki da ki karkhana shna mawitbeain. Ia kane ka hukum la pynmih da u Deputy Commissioner jong kaWest Garo Hills Deputy Commissioner u Jagdish Chelani ban tehlakam iakane ka jingmih bein jong ki karkhana bad ban iada ruh ia kajingpynjakhlia ia ka mariang.Kiba pynkhein ia kane ka ain ki shahpynshitom la ong u Deputy Commissioner Jagdish Chelani.
title: Pynjari ki bor Sorkar WGH District ïa ka Section 144 Cr.PC

content: Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ka la kynnoh ïa ka sorkar jylla ba ka la pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka khyrnit ba hynriew jong ka riti ka synshar jong ka India da kaba tyrwa ïa ka jingpynjlan haduh hynriew bnai ïa ka samoi treikam jong ka KHADC bad JHADC.Ha ka jingkren myn ha ka sngi nyngkong, u President jong ka KHNAM, u Bah Thomas Passah u la ong ba ka jingtyrwa jong ka sorkar, ym tang ba ka pynkheiñ ïa ka khyrnit ba hynriew hynrei ka la knieh ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah ban jied biang ïa ki nongmihkhmat ha ka por ba biang. U Passah u la ong, “U Lat u dei ban shim ïa ka rai bad ngin sa phah ïa ki nongmihkhmat jong ngi sha u Lat, da kaba kyrpad ïa u ban pynthikna ïa ka kyndon jong ka Para 6A jong ka khyrnit ba hynriew ne Sixth Schedule.”U la pynshai ba ka KHNAM kan nym pyrshah ïa ka jingtyrwa jong ka sorkar jylla, lada ka ïaid katkum ka aiñ ka kyndon ba la buh ha ka Section 6A jong ka khyrnit ba hynriew. Hynrei, u la kam ba katei ka jingtyrwa ba dang shen ka la kylla na ka Section 6A.Da kaba pynpaw halor ka jingtuklar jong ka sorkar jylla ha ka jingtreikam jong ki council, u Passah u la kyrpad ba donkam ban pynthikna ïa ka jingtreikam jong kine ki council, da kaba ong ba ka la dei ka por ban leh ïa kaba donkam.
title: Kynnoh ka KHNAM ïa ka sorkar jylla halor ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka khyrnit ba hynriew

content: U MLA ka UDP bad uba dei ruh u Myntri sorkar, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh myn ha ka 5 tarik Rymphang, 2024, u la ong ba kam don kano kano ka jingbakla lada u Lat ka jylla Meghalaya un kren da ka ktien Hindi ha ka jingïalang mang tyngka ka ban sa long jong ka State Assembly.“Ngam ïohi ba kan don kano kano ka jingbakla lada u Lat ka jylla u kren da ka ktien Hindi bad ha kajuh ka por u lah ban kren ruh ïa ka ktien English. Kane kam long kaba thymmai. Lada phi ïohi ha Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ, ki ktien hapoh ka khyrnit kaba Phra la shah ban kren bad phi lah ban sngap ïa ki ktien kiba phi lah ban sngewthuh. U Lamphang u lah ban kren ïa ka ktien kaba u lait bha ban kren bad ki nongsngap ki lah ban sngap ïa ka ktien kiba ki lah ban sngewthuh,” kren u Bah Paul sha ki lad pathai khubor.U Bah Paul u la pynthikna ruh ba kine ki ar tylli ki ktien jong ka jylla kata, ka ktien Khasi bad Garo dei ban pynkylla “translated”.“Ym tang ka ktien English hynrei kine ki ar tylli ki ktien ka jylla dei ban pynkylla sha ki ktien jong ki. Ngi im ha ka pyrthei teknoloji, phi lah ban kren kino kino ki ktien bad mar mar phi lah ban sngewthuh ïa ki ktien kiba phi tip. Kumta ngam ïohi ba kan don kano kano ka jingeh,” u la ong.U nongaiktien ka sorkar MDA, u la ong lada u Lat u kren tang da ka ktien Hindi khlem pyn kylla ne “translation”, ka long ka mat bap her ha baroh ki liang.Dangshen, ka seng Liang Pyrshah VPP ha ka shithi ba la phah sha u Lamphang ka Assembly, u Thomas A Sangma, ki la byrngem ba kin nym shong ïa ka jingïalang lada u Lat u kren da ka ktien Hindi khlem don nongpynkylla sha ka ktien English.
title: Kyrshan u Bah Paul ban kren u Lat da ka ktien Hindi ha ka jingïalang ka ban sa long

content: Ka tnat Pulit jong ka jylla, myn ha ka 5 tarik Rymphang ka la pynmih ïa ka jingmaham ïa ki paidbah ka jylla halor ka jingmih ki kynhun tyrwa tiar kum ki FedEx. Kine ki kynhun ki ju thok ju shukor da ka ba leh kum ki agent jong ki nongtyrwa tiar kum ka FedEx .Ka jingthok ka kynthup lyngba ki phone call ban buh thong ïa ki paidbah da kaba shu kam thok ba ïa ka song tiar ka dei ha ka kyrteng jong ki kaba don ïa ki tiar khaïi be-aiñ bad ban pynngop ïa ki paidbah tang ban ïoh pisa.U SP ka nongbah, u Bah Vivek Syiem u la ong ba kum kitei ki riew shukor ki ju pyndonkam ruh ïa ki kyrteng ba ki dei na Central Law Enforcement Agencies kum ki Customs, CBI, NCB, bad kiwei kiwei. Kiba pyntip ba ïa ka kyrteng jong kine ki briew la pyndonkam ruh ha ki kam buhrieh pisa ba kamai be-aiñ bad pynbor ïa ki ban phah bun ka pisa sha ka Account kaba ki kam ba ka dei ka RBI Clearance.Ban pyntieng ïa ki briew kiba ngat, kine ki nongshukor ki ju byrngem ruh ban kem ha kiba bun ki mukotduma. Ki don ruh ki khep, ba ki bthah ïa ki lanot ban Register Online ïa ki jingujor lyngba ki Application kum ka AnyDesk, kaba lah pat ban shukor ïa ki briew ki bym bna eiei. U Bah Syiem u la ai jingmut ba kim dei ban download kino kino ki app ba la ïoh na ka jingkren phone bad kino kino ki briew bym shym la ithuh.La bthah ruh ïa ki paidbah ba ki dei ban pynthikna ïa kino kino ki phone call ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwanpoi ki tiar khlem da phah ban wanrah.La kyntu ruh ba lada don kum kine ki jingjia ba ki dei ban pyntip mar mar sha ki Police Station bad ba ki Pulit kin lah ban leh eiei. La ong ruh ba ïa kane ka kam lah ruh ban ai jingtip sha ka Cybercrime helpline number 1930 bad ruh sha ka Police Control Room, Shillong ha u 0364-2215427 bad 6009196479.
title: Maham ka tnat Pulit ïa ki paidbah ban long kiba husiar ban lait na ka jingshahthok

content: U Bah Kitborlang Nongrem uba dei u State President jong ka National People Youth Front (NPYF) u la pynshai sha ki lad pathai khubor ha Mawkyrwat da kaba u la ther tyngeh ïa u Nongaiktien jong ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ba u la kren lap lah khlem da tip ïa ki nongrim ha kaba ïa dei bad ka saiñ pyrthei bad kaba u la kynthoh ruh wat ïa ka kam shimet kum u nongïalam jong ki samla  na ka National People’s Youth’s Front (NPYF).U Bah Kitborlang Nongrem u la ong ba utei u nongaiktien jong  ka VPP u la kynnoh ba ka Sorkar ba bam sap bad la pynlong  ïa ki MLA kum ki nongrah bull kumjuh ruh halor ka Reservation Policy ba u la ïashah ïa ki jait bynriew Garo, uba dei ruh u ta u Balia Syiangsdih ngam sngewpher ïa ki jingshah kynthoh shah dait hano hano namar ba ïa u briew u ba kup ïa ka
