Musari wat u pyrjong ruh um ïoh lad ban dait hynrei ïa kiba trei ha ki lyngkha ki ri Sai da ki phew jait ki khñiang ki wan dait.“Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingkynnoh bam sap jong u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem ba u don ha ka liang jong ka Sorkar”, u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem u don ban ong ba hato baroh kiba don ha ka liang jong ka sorkar ki bamsap mo bad naduh mynno kata ka VPP ka don ïa kata ka jingpynshisha ba kata ka sorkar ka bam sap lane kata VPP ka lah mo ban long noh kum kata ka nongbishar ïa ka bamsap jongno jongno kynthup ïa u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem.Na kata ka daw u la buh ka jingkyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin da husiar na kiba kum kine ki nongïalam ki bymdon ïa ka dohnud bad mynsiem jong ka jingsngew synei ïa ki para briew, kata ka dei ka khubor ba u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem u kwah ban ai sha u Nongaiktien jong ka VPP.Kawei pat halor ka jingkynnoh jong uwei na ki nongïalam ne kum u nongaiktien jong ka VPP ba u la ïalam ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong u paidbah ne pynjaboh ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong u paidbah tang kum kita ki nongrah bull na ka ïing jong ki MLA lane pynhiar kyrdan ïa ki MLA tang kum ki nongleh isynei, halor kane u Bah Kitborlang u la ong ba i mat une u rangbah uba dei u Nongaiktien jong ka VPP um pat ju leh isynei ïa ki paidbah ba duk ba suk mynno mynno na kata ka daw i mat um da don kata ka jingsngewthuh ïa ka dor jong ka jingleh isynei ïa ki para briew.U la ong ruh ba hato nga lah mo ban die ïa ka Ri tang marwei haba ka jingdonbriew ha ka Ri India ka don kumba 160 klur hato marwei nga lah ban die ïa ka Ri, kumjuh ruh u la ong ba ngi sngew donbok ba u Prah  u jop  tang  saw ngut ki MLA lada jin da ki jop bun ki MLA tip ka ei ka ban jia ïa ki paidbah. Shuh shuh une u nongaiktien ka VPP ym pat sngewthuh ïa ka dor jong ka jingleh isynei ïa ki ba duk ba kyrduh namar ïa lade um  kwah ban  leh i synei ïa ki paidbah namar ba lada ma ngi ngi leh i synei ïa kiba duk, ïa ki paidbah ki ong ka long ba ka pynjaboh, hynrei ïa lade pat ngi ïohi shai kdar ha ka por ba ki pynlong jingïalang ki rah syndon da ka  borti bright ban khrong syndon na ki paidbah kumta husiar ki paidbah kum ïa kine ki jait briew ong u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem uba dei u State President ka NPYF.
title: Pynphai nia u State President ka NPYF ïa u Nongaiktien ka VPP

content: U Myntri ka Sorkar jylla uba long ruh u MLA u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u la ong ba ka jingshimrai k Sorkar jylla ban pynjlan  ïa ka samoi treikam jong ka KHADC bad GHADC na ka bynta 6 bnai kam dei ka sien kaba nyngkong bad kum kine ki rai la ju shim rai teng mynshuwa.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ha ki snem ba la leit noh ïa ka Garo Hills Autonomous Council la pynjlan haduh 2 snem ha ka por ba u Dr Mukul Sangma u dei u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, bad ka jingpynjlan kaba 6 bnai haba ïanujor bad ka jingpynjlan kaba 2 snem ka dei ka jingpynjlan kaba la slem bha.U la ong ruh ba ha u snem ba la dep, ki District Council ki la wan ban ïakren bad ka Sorkar Jylla  halor pan por shuh shuh na ka bynta ba Delimination Commitee kaba hap ban pynbeit bad phiah ïa ki Constituency kat kum ka jingdon ki vote.
title: Kam don jingphylla eiei halor ka jingpynjlan ïa ka samoi treikam ka KHADC bad GHADC: Paul Lyngdoh

content: U Symbud Myntri, u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, uba dei peit ïa ka Urban Affairs bad shimti kum u Chairman jong ka Regional Committee na ka bynta ka West Jaintia Hills District, u la pynbna shaphang ka jingïakren ban dang bteng ha kaba ïadei bad ka Block-I bad ka jingïateh ba dang sah teng bad ka Assam myn ha ka sngi nyngkong. U Dhar u la ban jur da kaba ong ba ka jingsoi ïa ka jingïateh bad ka Assam, kam long kaba mar mar naba ka mat halor ka Block-I, ka dang don ha ka jingïakren.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Dhar u la ong kumne, “Lada don kano kano ka jingïateh ka ban sa ïa soi, ngi hap ïakren tang bad ki nongshong shnong jong kato ka shnong bad ka jingkylli halor ka jingsoi noh mynta, kam pat mih naba ka jingïakren ka dang ïaid.”Ka jingkren jong u Dhar ka la wan hadien ba ka Hynniewtrep Border Disputes Redressal Forum (HBDRF) ka la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar jylla ba kan nym ïaid shakhmat bad kano kano ka jingïateh lada ka jylla Assam kam pat phah biang ïa ka Block I sha ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingïalang jong ka regional committee, u Dhar u la ong ba kin dang khot na ka daw jong ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha. U la ong ba ka kaiphod ba khatduh jong ka regional committee ka dang sah teng, naba ka district administration ka dang pynlong da ka jingtreikam ha ka khappud na ka bynta ka jingsam ïa k shnong hapdeng ki Khasi bad ki Karbi.Halor ka mat jong ka jingpynkynriah ïa ka Sweepers’ Colony na Them Iew Mawlong, u Dhar u la ong ba ka sorkar ka thmu ban pynlong sa kawei pat ka jingïalang bad ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) na ka bynta ban shim rai.U la pynthikna ba ka sorkar ka kut jingmut ban shim rai halor katei ka mat hapoh une u snem, katba la pynshlur da ka ïing kashari. U Dhar u la pynpaw ka jingkyrmen, da kaba ong ba baroh ar liang ki party shen kin sa ïashem na ka bynta ban pynbna halor kane ka mat.
title: Ym mynjur mar mar bad ka Assam halor ka Block-I naba ka jingïakren kan dang bteng: Symbud Myntri, Dhar

content: U Symbud Myntri, u Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, uba dei peit ïa ka Urban Affairs, u la pynmih da ka jingpynbna myn ha ka sngi nyngkong, ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtreikam ban dang ïaid shakhmat jong ki projek smart city hapoh ka jylla.U Dhar u la pyntip sha ki nongthoh kot khubor ba katba ïa ka bynta ba nyngkong jong ka smart road kaba dang ïaid shakhmat, ka la don ka jingshah pynthut na ka daw jong ka jingsniew ki surok bad ka jingdon jong ki pipe hapoh ki surok. U la batai kumne, “Don ki bynta kiba la dep tih, hynrei ngim lah ban pyntreikam beit beit na ka daw jong ka jingdon kine ki pipe, katkum ka jingïoh jingtip jong nga na ka kaiphod.”U Dhar u la ong ba ka jingïakren bad ka tnad Public Health Engineering (PHE) ka long kaba donkam, kaba yn dei ka daw jong ka jingpynslem ban pyntreikam.Na ka bynta ban pynstet ka pyntreikam ïa kane ka projek, u Dhar u la ong ba yn sa thmu pynlong da ka jingïalang na ka bynta ka taïew ban wan, kaba yn sa don bynta lang ka Public Works Department (PWD) bad ki heh jong ka urban.Shuh shuh, u Dhar u la ong ba la don katto katne ki projek smart city kiba la jan pyndep. Dang shen, la don haduh 17 tylli ki projek smart city kiban dang pyntreikam ha kylleng ka jylla.
title: Khanglad ki pipe ban pyndep ïa ka projek Smart city, yn pynlong da ka jingïalang na ka bynta ka jingrai

content: :Ha ka jingthmu ban pynhusiar ïa ki paidbah bad pynsngewthuh shaphang ka jingtreikam ka rukom thep vote hashwa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha, ka District Election Office (DEO) ka la wanrah da ka jingpyn sngewthuh lyngba ka mobile da ka kali Electronic Voting Machine (EVM) ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah.Ïa katei, la pynlong da u Bah RM Kurbah, Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills, ha rynkgkat ki heh ki haiñ jong ka election bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki seng bapher bapher.Ka jingthmu ba nyngkong shadien jong kane ka jingsdang ka long ban batai bniah ïa ki paidbah halor ka rukom treikam ban pyndonkam da ki EVM.Ka jingwanrah da ki kali EVM ka kynthup ïa ka jingleit jong ki sha ki steshon thep vote, kaba long ruh kum ka atiar ban ai jingnang jingstad ïa ki nongshong shnong ba kumno ban thep vote da ka EVM.
title: Wanrah ka District Election Office da ka EVM mobile demo van

content: Ka Meghalaya Peoples’ Human Rights Council ka la rakhe ïa ka International Human Rights Day, kaba long ka jingdap 75 snem ïa ka jingpynbna ïa ka Universal Declaration of Human Rights bad ka jingpdiang ïa ka ha ka snem 1948. Ka jingpdiang ïa kane, ka la pyllong ïa ki ri jong ka pyrthei ban burom ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew. Ka phang pdeng jong kane ka jingrakhe ka long ka jinglaitluid, ka jingïaryngkat kyrdan, bad ka jingai ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah.“Ha kane ka jingrakhe jong ngi ïa ka International Human Rights Day, ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar bad ïa ki nongmihkhmat bad ïa baroh kito kiba don ha ka bor ban pynthikna ba ka imlang sahlang ka long kaba lait na na ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ka ban bteng ruh na ka bynta ki pateng ki ban dang wan”, la ong u Dino D.G. Dympep uba long u Shongknor jong ka Meghalaya People’s Human Rights Council. U la ong shuh shuh, “Ngi burom ïa kito ki briew shimet, ki nongtrei mon sngewbha, ki nongïada ïa ki hok, ki nongïakhih da ka lynti kaba jai-jai, ïa kito kiba bat ïa ki kyndon jong ka aiñ, kiba kheiñduh ïa la ka jong ka jingim, kiba ïa khih na ka bynta ka hok jong kiwei bad ruh na ka bynta jinglailuid.Kane MPHRC ka la kyntu ïa baroh kito kiba don ha ka bor ban ïada ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ba ki jinglehbeiñ lehkhoh kin ym jia ha ka imlang sahlang hadien habud. “Ngi kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba kan tohkit ïa kito ki jingjia ha kaba la don ka jingkynnoh ba ka don ka jingpynkheiñ ïa ka hok longbriew manbriew bad ban pynshitom ïa ki nongleh kam sniew, ym tang ïa kito kiba mynta, hynrei ïa kito kiba mynshuwa ruh”, la ong u Bah Dino Dympep. Ka hok longbriew manbriew ka pynkup bor ïa ki paidbah bad ïa kine ki aiñ la kdew sha ha ka UN Declaration for Human Rights ka dang long kaba kaba donkam haduh kine ki sngi.
title: Ka hok longbriew manbriew ka dang donkam haduh kine ki sngi: Dino Dympep

content: :Ka Ïing Bishar ba ha khliehduh jong ka ri, ka Supreme Court ka la bthah ïa ka Election Commission jong ka ri India ban pynlong ïa ka jingjied nongmihkhmat jong ka Jammu bad Kashmir ha ka 30 tarik Nailur, 2024. Ka Ïing Bishar ba ha khliehduh ka la pynmih ïa kane ka hukum hadien ba ka sngap ïa kiba bun tylli ki mukotduma kiba la pyrshah ïa ka jingweng ïa ka Artikyl 370 jong ka Riti Synshar jong ka ri India, kaba ailad ïa ka jinglong jylla ba pura jong ka Jammu bad Kashmir.U nongbishar ba ha khliehduh jong ka Iing Bishar Supreme Court, u D.Y. Chandrachud, kaba kynthup ïa ki san ngut ki nongbishar Constitutional, u la ong ba ka jingjied ïa ki nongmih khmat ka dei ka hok jong ki paidbah bad ym dei ban pynslem ban ai ïa kata ka hok jong ki. Kane ka Ïing Bishar ka la ong, “Ngi bthah ba ka dei ban pynlong noh ïa ka jingjied ïa ki nongmihkhmat na ka bynta ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ Jammu bad Kashmir ha shuwa jong ka 30 tarik u Nailur, 2023 bad ban wanrah biang ïa ka kyrdan jong ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ Jammu bad Kashmir katba nang kloi nang bha.
title: Kyntu ka Ïing Bishar Supreme Court ban pynlong ïa ka jingjied nongmihkhmat ka Ïing Dorbar Jammu bad Kashmir

content: :U Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla, uba dei ban peit ruh ïa ka tnad kam pohïing ha ka sorkar jylla, u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la pyntip ba shen ka tnad pulit kan sa pynmih noh ïa ka jingpyntip halor ki kam ba lait ha ka tnad pulit.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, ha ka 11 tarik Nohprah 2023, u Bah  Prestone Tynsong, u la pyntip ba shen ka tnad kan sa pynlait ïa ki jingpynbna na ka bynta ki 3000 tam ki kam ba lait ha ka tnad pulit.“Ka jingpynbit pynbiang halor kane ka la jan dep bad ka jingpynbna na ka bynta ka jinglait kam ha ka tnad pulit yn sa pynbna shwa ban kut une u snem ne ha u snem thymmai” u la ong.U la bynrap ba ka jingpynrungkam pulit ïa ki samla kan long na bynta ki kyrdan bapher bapher ki ban kynthup ïa ka kyrdan kam ha ki sub inspector, ka kyrdan armed branch constables, ka kyrdan unarmed branch constables kynthup ruh ïa ki pulit pynlip ding bad ki MPRO operator.
title: Shen ka sorkar kan sa pynmih noh ïa jingpynbna na ka bynta ki kam balait ha ka tnad pule

content: Ka Athletics Committee jong ka MDSA(Mawkyrwat District Sports Association) ka khot Selection trails na bynta ban jied ia ki khynnah ban leit ia shim bynta ha ka MEGHALAYA GAMES ka ban long ha TURA.Ki snem ki long kumne 16snem shaneng bad 22snem shapoh ki khynnah ba wan trail kin wan rah ki Documents, Kum Aadhar card, Birth certificate, ka trail kan long ha Sakwang Playground ha ka 16th/12/2023 ha kapor 8:00AM ki players kin wan rah hi ia ki tiar ia lehkai bad kumjuh ruh haba ia dei bad ka BAM ki Events ki long :Shynrang –100M, 200M, 400M, 800M, 1500M, 5000M, 10000M, High Jump, Long Jump, Javelin Throw, 4X100M,  4X400 Mixed relay.Kynthei –100M, 200M, 400M, 800M, 1500M, 3000M, 5000M, High Jump, Long Jump, Javelin Throw, 4X100M,  4X400 Mixed relay.
title: Yn jied nongïalehkai ka MDSA na ka bynta ka Meghalaya Games ha Tura

content: :U Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong ha ka 11 tarik Nohprah 2023, u la ther tyngeh ïa ki nongïalam ka VPP da ka ba kynnoh ba khlem da tip ïa ka jingshisha ki la pyrshang ban ïalam bakla va ki paidbah halor ka mat ban pynkynriah ïa ki jaitbynriew harijan na Them Ïewmawlong sha ka jaka ba don ka ophis jong ka Shillong Municipal Board.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka jingkynthoh ki nongïalam ka VPP halor ka rai ka sorkar ka dei tang ka jingleh politik ka ba khlem don ka jingshisha.U la ong “ki pyrshang ban leh politik ïa kane ka mat khlem da tip ïa ka jingshisha ka don jingma ïa ki nongshong shnong ha katei ka jaka, bad halor kane ngam kwah ban ong eiei ne ban pynlut por ïa lade ha kum kine ki jingkynthoh bym don nongrim”.U la bynrap, “Haba ka sorkar ka ong ba ka donkam ïa ka jaka ba 1.5 akar kam dei ba ngin pynlong trai ïa ki Harijan hynrei ïa kane ka jaka yn aiti sha ka Shillong Municipal Board”.U Bah Tynsong u la ong ïa ki nongïalam ka VPP ba wat pyrshang ban leh politik ïa kane ka mat bad haba kwah ïa ka jingshisha ki la dei ban wan kylli na ka sorkar ba kan ïoh ban pynshai ïa ki.U la ong “nga ïoh ïa ka jingkren jong ki ba ki kynnoh ba ka sorkar kan ai ka jaka sha ki harijan hynrei kane kam dei ka jingshisha namar ïa ka jaka yn long trai da ka SMB.“Hana nga ïohi ki ong lada ym lah ieh noh ïa ka VPP kan pynbeit, kan leh aiu kata ka VPP? Haba kim tip tang u ‘A’ u ‘B’ halor kane ka mat hynrei ki pyrshang ban ïalam bakla ïa u paidbah nga kyntu ïa ki nongïalam ka VPP ba kin wan ban pan jingshai na ka Sorkar.Lah ban kdew hangne ba na ka liang ka VPP ka la phah da ka kyrwoh ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah jur halor ka rai jong ka sorkar ban ai jaka shuh shuh sa 1.5 Akar nalor ka jaka ba don 2.4 Akar sha ki jaitbynriew harijan, ka VPP ka la kdew ba kane ka jingpyrshah kam dei ïa ki nongtrei ka Municipal hynrei ka dei ban ai jaka ïa baroh ki harijan ba sah ha Them Ïewmalong namar bun na ki kidei ki ba shu sah beaiñ ha kane ka jaka.
title: Halor ka mat Harijan: Kyntu u Bah Prestone ïa ki nongïalam VPP ba wat ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah

content: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya kam don jingthmu ban pynjlan shuh ia ka jingtrei jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad ruh ia ka Jaintia Hills Autonomous District Council.  Ia kane la iathuh da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Prestone Tynsong.  U la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar kan ym lah ban pynjlan ia ki Autonomous District Council khlem ki daw kiba biang.U Bah Prestone Tynsong u la iathuh ba ka jingpynjlan ia ka jingtrei kam jong kine ki Council ka dei na ka daw jong ka wan lynshop lynsher jong u khniang Covid-19 ia ka jylla Meghalaya bad ia ka pyrthei hi baroh kawei. U Symbud Myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar mynta ka dang pynbeit pynbiang ia ki shnong ki thaw ba kin hap sha kine ki constituency.Ka jingjied ia ki nongmih khmat jong kine ki artylli ki Autonomous District Council kan long ha ka snem ka ban wan 2024. Dang shen, u Chief Executive Member ba mynshuwa jong ka Jaintia Hills Autonomus District Council u la kynnoh ba ka jingpynbit pynbiang ia ki shnong ki thaw jong ki constituency ka long ban pynjlan ia ka por trei kam jong kitei ki Council.Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, u Bah Tynsong u la ong ba kane ka jingkynnoh ban pynjlan ia ki Council ka long ka khlem ki nongrim kiba biang.
title: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya kan yn pynjlan shuh ïa ki Autonomous District Council

content: U nongïalam jong ka seng Congress, u Saleng A Sangma u la kynnoh ïa ka jingdon bynta ka pisa pilaiñ halor ka daw jong ki nongïalam ba tbit ba kin ïasnohkti bad ka kam politik ha Meghalaya.“Ngi tip ba ka pisa ka long kaba kongsan, khamtam ha ka jylla Meghalaya. ym tang ha Meghalaya wat ha kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka India. Lada ki paidbah ki sngewthuh ba bun, da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah kin thrang ban wan shakhmat na ka bynta ka ilekshon Lok Sabha, ym tang na ka seng Congress,” ong u Saleng sha ki lad pathai khubor ha ka sngi nyngkong.Lada ki paidbah ki pyrkhat shaphang ka jingkylla ym tang na ka Congress, hynrei don shuh kiba da ki spah ki biang ban ïangi ruh, kiba nang ba stad ba ïangi, kiba kiew kyrdan ban ïangi, kin jin da mihkhmat hynrei ki sheptieng ïa ki paidbah ïoh ki shet kylla ïa ki hadien kin sa die ïalade na ka bynta ka pisa bad uba lah ban thied ïa ki, namar kane, ka ri jong ngi kam don jingkylla, ka Meghalaya jong ngi kam don jingkylla. Ym dei ki heh ki haiñ seng saiñ hima kiba leh politik, hynrei dei ki paidbah ba leh. Dei namar kane ngi hap ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingshisha, ka jew ban ïathuh ïa ka hok,” ong u Saleng.Haba donkam ban pynsngewthuh ïa ki paidbah ba kin kylla ïa ka jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki, u Sangma u la ong, “ngam shym ong ba da ki spah ngut ki paidbah ( ki beh ïa ka pisa) hynrei watla lada don 20 ne 40 per cent na ki, ka dang eh na ka bynta kito ki paidbah ba kin ïasnoh bad ka kam politik,” katba u dang bynrap “shu mutdur phi kum ha kane ka por mynta phi ïohsngew beit ba ki nongïalam jong ka balang ki la pynïa phiah ïalade na ka kam politik hynrei kim dei ban leh kumta. Ka dei ban don kata ka jingïatylli lang bad dei namar kata ki briew ba bha kim kwah ban mihkhmat naba don bun ka politik ym napdeng jong ki noingseng saiñ hima sima shimet hynrei napdeng ki paidbah hi.”Haba kren shaphang ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha, u la ong ba ka seng kan sa rai halor ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Tura parliamentary seat.“Ngim pat ïakren shaphang kata (ki kyrtong MP na ka bynta ka Tura) bad u president jong ngi. Ka seng Congress kam pat shym la rai ym tang shaphang ka Tura hynrei wat ha kiwei pat ki jaka jong ka ri India ruh,” ong u Sangma.U Sangma u la kyntait ruh ban jubab halor ka jingkylli ba ïa ka kyrteng jong u la bna ba un long u kyrtong na Tura.“Ïa mynta, ngam lah ban jubab halor kane. Watla nga dei u MLA, nga dei ruh u nongïalam ba kit khlieh, te nga hap peit sa ïa kiwei pat ki kam jong ka seng bad hadien na ka bynta ki paidbah ïa mynta,” ong u Saleng.Haba la kren shaphang kiwei pat ki seng saiñ hima sima, kiba la dep pynbna lypa ïa ki kyrtong MP jong ki na Shillong bad Tura, u Sangma u la ong, “Ym dei ka jingpyn slem hynrei lada ka seng ka la dep pynbna lypa ïa ki kyrteng na ka bynta ka Tura bad Shillong kam mut ba kiwei pat ki seng kin hap bud lang, ka don la ka jong ka bynta bad ka stai lajong.”“(Hynrei), ka seng Congress ka dang sngap jar (halor ki kyrtong MP na ka bynta ka Tura). Kum ka seng jong ka India, ka Congress ka la dep pynïaid sa kiwei pat ki seng kum ka BCC, PCC bad ki district…,” bynrap u Saleng. Katkum ka jingkren jong u, katei ka jingtreikam ka la sdang mar mar hadien ba ka lap ïa ki kaiphod jong ka ilekshon 2023 Assembly.Halor ka jingkam jong ka NPP kaba ba kan sa knieh ïa ka Shillong parliamentary seat na ka seng Congress ha kane ka kynti, utei u nongthaw aiñ jong ka Gambegre u la ong, “Baroh ki seng saiñ hima sima ki kren shaphang ka jingshaniah ha man ki ilekshon.”U la ong ba ka shong ha ka jingjied jong ki paidbah, ong u Sangma ba ki paidbah ki dang shaniah ha ka Congress.“Nga tharai ba ki paidbah ki shaniah ha ka Congress watla ka la shah shet kylla ha kiwei pat ki nongïalam hashwa ka ilekshon, hynrei ngam tharai ba ha kane ka kynti kan leh ïa kajuh namar ba ki paidbah ki shaniah ha ka Congress bad hooid kin sa wanphai biang sha ka Congress,” ong u Saleng.
title: Ka don bynta ka pisa halor ka jingpynsangeh ïa ki nongïalam ban ïasnoh bad ka politik: Saleng

content: Ka Ïing Bishar jong ka Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi nyngkong ka la hukum ban pynduh noh ïa u dewïong ba sah ba don haduh 5.50 lak metric ton ha kaba kut jong une u bnai.Ha katei ka jinghukum, na ka liang jong u Chief Justice (Acting), u HS Thangkhiew bad u Justice W Diengdoh u la ong, “La ong ba ïa u dewïong ba sah, uba khia haduh 5,50,000 MT uba dei ban shalan bad lilam da ka kompeni Coal India bad katkum ka jinghukum jong u Single Member Committee of Justice, u Katakey, u la ong ba yn sa pyndep ïa kajuh hapoh u Nohprah 2023. La khmih lynti ba yn sa leh ïa kaba dei ban leh bad ïa u dewïong ba sah, yn sa pynduh noh ha kaba kut jong une u snem.”U Superintendent of Police (SP) jong ka East Jaintia Hills, uba la don hi ha kane ka sngi, u la dep phah da ki lad lynti kiba dei ban shim ban pynbna halor kine ki mat bad ba ïa u dewïong kumba la hukum katkum ka jingbatai ha ka kaiphod jong ka 18th interim kaba kot haduh 4800 MT, la dep pynsangeh shwa.U Advocate General u la ong ba ïa kane ka jingpyntreikam baroh ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingtreikam ba mar mar kumba la ong ha ka kaiphod jong ka 18th interim ka dang sah ha u Justice BP Katakey (ba la shongthait noh), uban sa pynmih ïa ka kaiphod ban sa bna.Ka ïing kashari ka la pynbna ba khlem ka kaiphod bad thymmai, yn nym don kano kano ka jinghukum kaba lah ban phah ha kane ka por. Ka la phah da ki kyrteng jong ki mat halor ka 19 tarik, Nohprah, ban ap ïa ka kaiphod jong u Justice Katakey halor ka kaiphod kaba la dep phah na u Deputy Commissioner bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ha kaba ïadei bad u dewïong katkum ka kaiphod jong ka 18th interim.Ka ïing bishar ka la ong ruh ba ka jingwan hi jong u Superintendent of Police, East Jaintia Hills ha kato ka por bad dang ap kiwei pat ki jingpynbna halor kane ka mat.Ha kaba pynkut noh ïa kane, na ka liang jong ka Court Master, ka la dep pynbna ba ka kaiphod jong ka 19th interim, la dep ïohpdiang na u Single Member Committee.“Ha ka jingpeit ïa ki shuti ban dang wan bad ki sngi, na ka liang ka ïing bishar, to ai ba ka kopi jong ka kaiphod kan saphriang kaban sa peit da ki party jong ka Registry ha kane ka sngi. La khmih lynti ba ha kawei pat ka sngi, yn sa phah da ka jingpynshai ha kane ka kaiphod,” katkum ka jinghukum.
title: Hukum ka Ïing Bishar High Court ban pynduh ïa u dewïong ba sah ha kaba kut une u bnai

content: Uwei u samla u la shah kem ha ki briew, hadien ba u la thmu ban rung tuh ha ka 11 tarik, Nohprah, katba u dang rung ha kawei kawei ka ïing kaba radbah ka phalor.Kiba ïohi ki lap ba utei u samla u la thmu ban rung tuh hapoh katei ka ïing bad ki la pyntip sha u pulit.Katba dang ap ban wan ki pulit, la ong ba utei u samla u la injek thyrnia ïalade, kaba la pynlong ïa u ba un ïapler hajan ka madan Polo.Ïa katei, ïa utei u samla, la rah noh da ka kali kit nongpang bad dang ap ïa ki jingtip baroh.
title: Shah kem u samla hadien ba rung tuh hapoh ïing briew, ïapler hadien ba injek ïalade

content: Uwei u nonghikai na ka Rangsapara Secondary School u la duh ei ïa la ka jong ka jingim katba uwei pat u nonghikai u la mynsaw jur hadien ba ki la shah thombor bad shah tuh pisa ha ki runar ki bym shym la ithuh dur khmat myn ha ka 11 tarik Nohprah, 2023.Ïa kitei ki ar ngut ki lanot la tip kyrteng kum u S Chetri 49 snem karta bad u T R Sangma 48 snem karta.Katkum na ka liang ki pulit, u S Chetri bad u T R Sangma katba ki dang ïaid na Nongstoin pyrshah sha Rangsapara da ka ar shaka, ki la shah pynsangeh ha ki katto katne ngut ki runar ki bym shym la ithuh durkhmat ha ka shnong Mynniar. Kine ki runar ki la thombor ïa kine ki lanot.La pynkit noh ïa ki sha Nongstoin Civil Hospital na ka bynta ka jingsumar. Katba u Sangma u la khlad noh naba jur palat ka jingmynsaw. La ithuh ruh ba kine ki lanot ki la shah tuh ïa ka pisa kaba ki rah, ong ki pulit.Yn pyndep ïa ki jingdonkam baroh bad ïa ka post-mortem mynta ka sngi. Yn pynlong ruh ïa ka jingthwet ïa ki runar kiba donkti.
title: Ïap uwei u nonghikai, mynsaw uwei na ka jingshah thombor ha ki runar

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla, uba dei ruh ban peit ïa ka tnat PWD jong ka Sorkar jylla myn ha ka 11 tarik Nohprah, 2023 u la lum ka jingïalang na ka bynta ban wad ka lad ka lynti ban shna ïa ki surok na Nongbah Shillong bad na New Shillong Township (NST) ki ban pynïasoh bad ki surok bah, kum shi bynta ban pynduna ïa ka jingdheng kali ha Nongbah Shillong.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Tynsong u la ong, ” nga la khot ïa ka jingïalang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingwad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban shna ïa ki surok na Nongbah Shillong bad ha New Shillong Township bad pynïasoh bad ki surok bah”.U la ong “nga la lum ka jingïalang bad ki ophisar ka Central Division PWD, ka Bypass Division PWD ka National Highway Division ha ka jingïadon ryngkat ki ophisar ka tnad Revenue bad ka tnad Forest, ki Deputy Commissioner”.U la bynrap, “kane ka jingïalang ka long ban ïa kren ban pyrshang ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban shna da ki surok ki ban lah ban pynduna ïa ka jingdheng kali”.U Myntri u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka pyrshang ban wad ïa ki surok ban lah ban pynïasoh sha ki surok bah la kan dei sha Shillong Bypass Lane ïa ka Shillong Jowai National Highway – ngin pyrshang ban pynïasoh bad ki surok ha Shillong bad ha NST.U la pyntip ruh ba na ka bynta kane ka jingthmu ban pynurlong ïa kane ka Project na ka liang ka sorkar kan pan ka jingïarap na ka sorkar kmie. U la bynrap ba kine ki surok kin ym dei ki Four Lane hynrei ngi don ka jingthmu ban don ki surok ban pynduna ïa ka jingdheng kali ha Shillong.
title: Lum u Myntri da ka jingïalang ban wad lad lynti ban pynduna ka jingdheng kali ha Shillong

content: U Chief Executive Members (CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem mynta ka 12 tarik u Nohprah 2023, u la pynlait paidbah bad aiti ïa ka kali kit ñiut, sha ka Hima Khyrim ha ka jingïalang kaba la long hapoh Ïingsad Smit.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC u la ong ba ka kam ram jong ka KHADC ka long ban thaw ïa ki aiñ, ban pynneh ïa ka riti hynrei mynta ka kynti ka Council ka la shim ruh ïa ka sienjam ban wanrah ïa ka khuid ka suba ha ki shnong ki thaw.U la ong,” kum ki nongïalam ha ki shnong ki thaw ka jingeh kaba khraw tam ha ki shnong ki thaw ki long ha ka um bam um dih bad ki ñuit bad lada bakla ha ka jingpynbeit ïa kine ki jingeh kin shah weng kum ki nongïalam shnong”.“Kumta na ka liang ka KHADC ka ïohi shai ïa kine ki jingeh kumta ka Council ka la wanrah da ka aiñ kaba la tip kum ka Solid Waste Management Act 2020 ka ba mynta ka la ïoh ruh ka jingmynjur na u Lat ka jylla”, u la bynrap.U Bah Syiem u la ong hapoh kane ka aiñ ka Council ka la wanrah ïa shibun ki kyndon ban lah ban teh lakam ïa ka jingbret pathar ïa ki ñuit ki ñier, kane ka long kum ka jingshim ka council ïa ka nongkit khlieh ban wanrah ïa ka khuid ka suba.Kane ka kali kit ñiut ka dei kaba la ai sngewbha lyngba ka Skhim Chief Minister Special Development Fund, ha kane ka jingïalang la ïa don ryngkat u Syiem ka Hima Khyrim u Paiem Dr Balajied Sing Syiem, ki Lyngdoh, ki Myntri ki MDC bad ki nongïalam shnong.
title: Aiti u CEM ka KHADC ïa ka kali kit ñuit ha Smit

content: Hadien lai sngi ka jingwad ka ba khlem sangeh, mynta ka sngi ka 6 tarik Rymphang 2024, la lap ïa ka met ba sah jong u Bah  Marshall Marwein uba la jah hadien ka jingtwa u ñiut ha Marten.Naduh ba jia kane ka jingjia, na ka liang ka Municipal ha ryngkat  ka kynhun ka SDRT bad ki briew kiba  ju tam tin jot lang ha Marten ki la pynlong ïa ka jingwad ïa u  Bah Marshall Marwein .Kane ka jingjia ka la jia myn ha ka ka 3 tarik Rymphang 2024, ha ka por kumba 12 baje mynsngi, ha kaba u Bah Marwein u la leit ban wad tin jot ha katei ka jaka bret ñiut hynrei kynsan kynsan na ka jingbun u ñiut uba la lum thup ha kane ka jaka u la twa bad ban ïa une u Rangbah.Hadien katei ka jingjia na ka liang ka kynhun pyllait im ka la leit mar mar sha katei ka jaka bad ka la pynlong ïa ka jingwad ïa une u rangbah naduh katei ka sngi.U Bah Marwein uba dei na ka shnong Mawkyrwat bad u shong u sah ha Mawiong ryngkat ka kurim jong u bad ar ngut ki khun.
title: La lap ïa ka met jong u Bah Marshall uba la shah tap ha u ñiut ha Marten

content: SHILLONG:Ka Sorkar Meghalaya kan hap ban bud ïa ki nongrim jong ka aiñ Lokayukta Act bad kan ym ïaid lait na ka.“Kat kum katei ka aiñ, ngin ym lah ban pyndonkam ïa ki nongtrei Sorkar ba la shongthait. Kane ka long ba kane ka aiñ ka kdew shai ba ki nongtrei Sorkar ba la shongthait ki long kiba ym don bor bad ki nongtrei Sorkar kiba ym pat shongthait ki long kiba donbor, “Ngim lah ban ïaid lait na katei ka aiñ”, ong uMyntri bad nongaiktien jong ka Sorkar, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.Ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingdawa jong ka party Voice of the People Party (VPP) ba dei ban thung biang ïa kito ki nongtrei Lokayukta, u Bah Paul u la ong ban pynkylla kam saiñ hima sima ïa katei aiñ Lokayukta Act ka long ka bym dei bad ka long tang ka jingpynthame ïa u paidbah bad ban ïaid lait na ki jingeh kiba dei ban ïaleh.
title: Ka Sorkar kan ym ïaid lait na ka aiñ Lokayukta Act: Paul Lyngdoh

content: :Ka National People’s Party  NPP mynta ka sngi ka 6 tarik u Rymphang 2024 ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka jing ïa kynduhlang naka bynta ki dkhot jong ka NPP Ranikor Block Committee ha ka jing ïa donlang u Bah Hamletson Dohling State Working president Meghalaya Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh MLA Minister jong ka jylla Meghalaya I ba dei ruh I kyrtong ban ïa khun ïa ka M.P naka Shillong Parliamentary Seat kum ka kong san ha ryngkat da ka jing ïa donlang u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem State President NPYF Bah MacMillan Byrsat MLA barim ka Nongstoin Konstitwensi kiwei de ki nongkitkam jong party naka Ranikor Block Committee bad da ki hajar ki paidbah kiba la wan ha kane ka jingïalang kaba kila pynlong ha Rangthong Community Hall South West Khasi Hills District.Ha kane ka sngi naka liang ka party NPP kala ïoh ruh ban jied ïa ki Nongkitkam jong ka Executive Committee jong ka Ranikor Block Committee haba la ïoh ban jied president ïa u Nelbi T.Sangma bad Working president ïa u Mandilos Nongbri ha ryngkat ki 34 ngut ki Executive Members ha kajuh ka por la ïoh ruh ka jing pdiang burom ïa u Bah Mandilos Nongbri ha ryngkat bad ki kynhun kiba la wan pynïasoh ïalade bad ka party NPP.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh shibun ki jing kren naka Dr.Ampareen Lyngdoh kum ka Kyrtong ka ban sa ïa khun ïa ka  MP naka Shillong Parliamentary Seat naka party NPP ban pynshai ïa ki kam ba naka liang ka party NPP kala leh ha kine ki snem ba ladep naduh ka Sorkar MDA-I haduh kane ka MDA-2 kumjuh ruh la ïoh jingkren na u Bah Hamletson Dohling Bah MacMillan Byrsat MLA barim jong ka Nongstoin Konstitwensi bad ki wei de ki riew rangbah ha ryngkat da ka jing ïa donlang ruh ki nongkitkam ba ha khmat jong ka party NPP kumjuh ruh naki dkhot nongkitkam jong kitkam ba ha khmat naka Ranikor Block Committee bad da ki spah ngut ki paidbah kiba la wan sakhi lang ha kane ka sngi.
title: Tuid ki paidbah ha ka jingïalang ka NPP ha Rangthong jied nongkit kam thymmai na ka bynta ka RBC

content: U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ha ka Sngi Baar ryngkat bad u Myntri ka thoh ka pule jongka Sorkar Meghalaya, uRakkam A. Sangmaki la sam ia ki shithi thung kam ia ki346 ngut ki Lower Primary School Teachers ha ka prokram ba la pyllong ha State Convention Centre, alongside Education Minister Rakkam A Sangma. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba kane kam dei ka por tang na ka bynta ban sam ia ki shithi tung kam, hynrei ka por ba ki nonghikai bad ka Sorkar kin iatrei lang ban pynurlong ia ka thong jong ka Sorkar.Haba pdiang ia kine ki nonghikai bathymmai, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba ki nonghikai ki don ka bynta kaba khraw ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla bad ban saindur ia ka jinglong jong ki khynnah.Ha kaba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ka thoh ka pule, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la iaroh ia ka jingaiti jong ki nonghikai na ka bynta pynnang pynstad ia ki nongpule. U Rakkam A. Sangma u la byrngem ruh ia ki nonghikai ki bym leit hikai da kaba buh pateng ban hikai na ka bynta jong ki.Kum shibynta jong kane ka prokram, u Myntri Rangbah ryngkat bad kiwei ki heh Sorkar kiba la don lang ha katei ka sngi, ki la pyllait paidbah ia ki tiar ai jinghikai Teaching Learning Materials Kit, na ka bynta ki khynnah skul kiba dang shu sdang leit skul. Kine ki tiar ai jinghikai, kin wanrah ia ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta 35,000 ki khynnah skul kiba dang rit.
title: Sam shithi thung kam u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma

content: U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare Minister, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pyntip ba haduh mynta ka Meghalaya State Commission of Women (MSCW ) ka la ïoh ban pdiang ïa ki 6 tylli ki kyrteng  na ka bynta ka post Chairperson bad kane yn sa shim rai shen .Ha ba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ,” 4 ngut ki kyrteng ba la jied da ka kommiti na ka bynta ka Post jong ka Chairperson jong ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women (MSCW) bad mynta  sa ar tylli ki applications la ïoh pdiang biang bad shen ïa kane  yn sa pyntip ruh ïa ka rai kaba khatduh hapoh kine ki taïew”.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban khmih biang sa shisien jong ka tnad, myn ha ka 5 tarik Rymphang, 2024, u la ong ba ka jingjied ïa ka Chairperson  ka MSCW ka tnad ka kwah ban pynlong da ka lynti  kaba khuid ba suba bad kum shibynta ban ai ka lad na bynta baroh ki ïaid palat ïa ka kyrteng kaba la kdew da ka Search kommiti dei na kane ka daw ïa ki application la khot lyngba ki jingpynbna  na ka bynta ki kyrtong kiba kwah bad halor kane sa ar tylli ki application la wan pynpoi sha ngi”.Lah ban kdew hangne ba Ka Meghalaya State Commission for Women (MSCW) mynta kam don Chairperson naduh ba ka Phidalia Toi ka la ïehnoh ïa ka kam naduh u bnai Jylliew myn shem snem.
title: Hynriew tylli ki kyrteng ki ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka Chairperson ka MSCW

content: U Working President ka United Democratic Party, uba long ruh u Myntri jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewskhem ba mynta ka kynti ïa ka MP Election yn jop da ka party riewlum.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Bah Paul  u la ong ba ka jingphai khmat jong ki paidbah sha ki seng  riewlum, kan sa pynkylla khongpong ha kane ka jingjied ïa ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Ïing Dorbar Lok Sabha na ka bynta ka Shillong  Parliamentary Constituency.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ïathuh ba ki kyrtong MP ki tip kumno ban kren ïa ki mat elekshon jong ki hadien ba ki seng saiñ pyrthei  ki la dep jied ïa ki kum ki kyrtong ka MP.U la ong shuh shuh ba mynta ka kynti ki paidbah ki angnud ban ïohi  ïa ki nongmih khmat jong ka Ïing Dorbar Lok Sabha ban dei na ki seng  riewlum bad ka jingïatreilang jong kine ki artylli ki seng ‘riewlum ka UDP bad HSPD hapoh ka RDA kan wanrah ka jingjop ïa u kyrtong jong ki.Haba kren halor ka jingmih surok ki nngmihkhmat  ban rah ïa ki mat ïa kren sha surok u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki paidbah ki long ki nongjied ïa ki nongmih khmat na man la ka constituency bad kawei kawei ka constituency ka don hapdeng 30,000 bad 50,000 ngut ki nongthep vote kiba jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat bad lada ki nongmihkhmat ki rah ïa ki jingeh jong ki paidbah da kaba kren ha ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkien, ka jingjied nongmih khmat ruh ka kylla long lehnoh ei namar ba ki nongmih khmat ki dei ban kren ïa ki jingeh jong ki paidbah hapoh jong ka Ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ.
title: Kyrmen u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ban jop ki kyrtong riewlum ha ka election Lok Sabha

content: Ka Mawten Sports Club myn ha ka 6 tarik Rymphang, 2024 ka la ïoh ban pynkut noh ïa ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol phainal kaba la tip kum ka 3rd Above 40 Football Tournament 2023-24 ha kaba ka Sumer Veteran Football Club ka la rah ïa ka nam jop ha ka jingïalehkai ha madan Mawpyllun, Mawten, South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka jingïakhun ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka kylla step, ka Sumer Veteran FC bad Evergreen SC Nongjri ki la ïa khaid khlem da ioh ban ïa thep wat kawei ka kol ruh.Haba wan biang ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka kylla miet, ka Evergreen SC, Nongjri ka la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol ba nyngkong ha ka minit kaba 44 na u Bah Madanlar Hahshah, katba ka Sumer Veteran FC ha kane ka kynti ruh ka la ïoh ban pynphai ïa kol na u Kit Kharkongngor ha ka minit kaba 62.Kumta ka jingïalehkai hapdeng ka Sumer Veteran FC bad ka Evergreen SC Nongjri ka la kut noh da ka Tie Breaker ha kaba ka ka Sumer Veteran FC ka la jop da 5 – 4 kol pyrshah ïa ka Evergreen SC Nongjri.Ha kaba kut jong ka jingïalehkai, la sam ïa ki khusnam sha baroh ar tylli ki kynhun kata sha kaba jop ka la rah ïa ka khusnam ryngkat ka don pisa kaba 65 hajar bad kaba shah rem noh 25 hajar.U kongsan uba la wan ban pynhap pyrda ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 3rd Above 40 Football Tournament 2023-24 u dei u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin uwei na ki kyrtong sha ka MP Election.
title: Lahduh ka Summer Veteran FC da 5-4 Kol ïa ka Evergreen SC Nongjri ha ka 3rd Above 40 FT 2024 ha Mawten

content: Ka Ri-Bhoi Tourism and Environmental Development Forum (RBTEDF) kaba dei kawei na ki kynhun kaba ju kyntiew ïa ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha Ri-Bhoi District mynta ka kynti ka la shim ïa ka sienjam ban pynlong da ka jingïaid kjat (Trekking) na Pahambirlum sha Pnah Kyndeng ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai kaba jngai kumba 5km kaba dei ka lawkyntang ba don ruh ka krem lymbit ba pawnam kaba don haka shnong Pahamskhen jong ka Raid Nonglyngdoh ha Ri-Bhoi District.Kum ban shu pynpaw hangne ba ka Pnah Kyndeng ka dei kawei na ki lawkyntang jong ka Raid Nonglyngdoh bad ha katei ka lawkyntang kaba rben bad kup da ki dieng ki siej ka don ruh kawei ka krem kaba pawnam ba shong ki lymbit ba lah ruh ban sakhi ïa ka jingitynnad jong ka mei mariang.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Bah Plielad Tiewsoh u Chairman ka RBTEDF u la ong ba na ka liang ka kynhun kan pynlong ïa katei ka jingïaid kjat shibynta ban pynpaw pyrthei bad ban nang kyntiew ïa katei ka jaka kum kawei na ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei, watla ïa katei ka krem lymbit la plie paidbah ïa ka dang ha kine ki khyndiat snem ba la leit.Ha katei ka sngi kin don ruh ki prokram bapher bapher ban pynbyrngia ïa ki paidbah, ha kaba kum ka kynhun ka la khot bad wer ïa ki paidbah ba kwah ban shim bynta ha katei ka jingïaid kjat ba kin leit ban ai kyrteng ha ki nongïalam jong ka RBTEDF ha ophis treikam jong ka lane ban kynduh ïa ki nongïalam, ha kaba u Myntri ka tnad jngohkai pyrthei u Bah Paul Lyngdoh un sa ban wan ban shim bynta kum u kongsan ha katei ka sngi.
title: Yn pynlong ka RBTEDF  ïa ka jingïaid kjat na Pahambirlum sha Pnah Kyndeng

content: Ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka NPP Mawkyrwat Block Committee, ha ka jingïalang ba lyngkot ka la don ka jingïathir ïa tai kumno ban pynïaid shaphrang ïa ki kam hapoh jong ka party bad kumjuh ruh ban ïa ai jingmut kumno ban sa pdiang ïa ki briew kiba wan pynïasoh thymmai ha kaba la ïoh jingkren ryngkat ki jingbatai na ki riew rangbah kata naduh u Bah Hamletson Dohling, State Working President, u Bah MacMillan Byrsat, MLA barim jong ka Nongstoiñ Constituency, bad kumjuh ruh na u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang, MLA barim jong ka Mawsynram Constituency.Hadien ba kut jong ka jingïalang, u Bah Kitborlang Nongrem, State President ka NPYF haba kren ha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka long kaei kaei kaba pynkmen ïa ka party NPP hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District namar myn ha ka 6 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 kum ki nongïalam ki la ïoh ban ïa kynduh ïa baroh ar tylli ki Block Committee kawei ha ka Ranikor Block Committee bad kawei ha Mawkyrwat Block Committee ha kaba da ki hajar ngut ki briew ki la ïa wan ban sakhi.Shuh shuh u la pynsngew ba hapoh ka Mawkyrwat Block Committee haduh mynta ym pat lah ban pynthymmai ïa ka komiti ba pura hynrei u Adhoc President u don ban pynïaid ïa ki kam bad lehse shen ki jingkylla hapoh kane ka Mawkyrwat kin sa don bad ka rai jong ki kum ka party ha ka jingïalang ka long ban ap ïa kata ka por namar la sngewthuh ba kin bun bah na kiwei de ki political party ki don jingthmu ban wan pynïasnoh sha ka NPP. “Watla kum u nongïalam u don hapdeng ki jingshah kynthoh na kiba bun ki liang hynrei u don pat ka mynsiem jong ka jingkmen namar ki jingkylla kin sa wan,” ong u bah Kitborlang Nongrem.U la pynshai shuh shuh ba tang da ka komiti kaba rim, kum u nongïalam u sngewthuh shai ba ki kam kin nym poi shano shano bad dei ha kata ka nongrim ba kum ki nongïalam ba la don lypa ki don ka jingpyrkhat ba lada don kino kino ki kynhun kiba wan ban pynïasoh kum ki nongïalam barim ki long kiba la kloi ban pdiang sngewbha.Ha kaba kren halor ka jingthmu ban wan pynïasnoh u Bah Carness Sohshang sha ka NPP, u bah Kitborlang ula kren da kaba shai ba hooid ka la don ka jingïakren ba ma u bad ka kynhun kin sa wan sha ka NPP ban long noh ki nongkyrshan ba pura jong ka. Namarkata, kum u nongïalam u don beit ba mynsiem ba lada don kino kino kiba wan pynïasnoh thymmai, u long uba la kloi bad pdiang kylluit mynsiem ïa kum kita ki briew.
title: Ai ksai u Kitborlang Nongrem lah ban pynïasoh noh u Bah Carnes Sohshang u MDC ka Mawkyrwat sha ka NPP

content: Lai ngut ki briew ki la shah kem ha ki pulit myn ha ka 6 tarik Rymphang hajan ka jingkieng Lawmali ha kaba ki pulit ki la ïoh ban bat ïa kawei ka kali Hyundai i20 rong ïong kaba don ïa u Registration No. AS01 AT0888.Napdeng kitei ki lai ngut kiba la shah kem 2 ngut ki dei kiba la kham rangbah bad uwei uba dang khynnah, ha kaba une u khynnah la tip ba udei u khun jong uwei napdeng kine ki ar ngut.Na kine ki briew, ki Pulit kila ïoh kurup 2.10-gram u Heroin, 8 tylli u dawai kuli Nitrazepam, 2 tylli ki Spasmo Proxyvon, 10 IV tylli ki thyrnia injek, 6 tylli ki mobile phone, ka tari, bad T. 9710 ka pisa, kawei ka ar shaka kaba don ïa u registration No kali ML05-R-8293, 10 tylli ki tin duma, 66 tylli ki bilor plastic rit ba bit heroin bad kawei ka mobile phone ba sniew.La ong ba kitei ki ar ngut ki rangbah ki dei kiba la don dak sniew ha ki kam thok kam shukor.
title: Shah kem lai ngut ki suba khaïi drok hajan ka jingkieng Lawmali

content: Ki bor ba dei peit jong ka East Jaintia Hills district ki la khang pyrshah ïa ka jingïakhih jong ki paidbah ha ka khappud India bad Bangladesh ha Bangladesh ne ban wan iuh kjat hapoh u pud u sam jong la India.Ïa katei ka order, la pynmih da u District Magistrate, u A Baranwal myn ha ka sngi ba ar ha kaba u la ong ba kano kano ka kam khaïi tuh, ki kam khaïi tuh ïa ki masi ne ki song tiar mar tiar ba bha, kum ki kwai, kha tyrkhong, biri, sikret, slasha ruh yn nym shah.“Ka jingwan iuh kjat jong ki briew da ka kjat ne kali ne kali kit nongleit nongwan ba hap hapoh 5 kilometar jong kane ka khappud naduh ka por 6:00 baje janmiet haduh 5:00 baje janmiet (la khang pyrshah),” ong ka order ne jinghukum.Katei ka order ka la ong ba kumba la pyntip da ki BSF, ka AOR jong ka 172Bn ka jur ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki masi ne is song tiar ba bha bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar kum ki kwai, kha tyrkhong, biri, sikret, slasha bad kiwei kiwei.Ka la bynrap ba ïa ka kaiphod, la ïohpdiang na ki shipai BSF ha kaba la ong ba ki nongkhaïi tuh bad kiwei pat ki la wan lum bun hajan u khappud ha ka por mynmiet na ka bynta ban khaïi tuh ïa ki mar bha na India sha Bangladesh bad kumta ter ter.Ha katei ka order, la ong ba ki dkhot jong ki kynhun lehnoh bapher bapher bad ki Rohingya ruh ki lah ban iuh kjat hapoh u pud u sam jong ka India ha ka por miet, kaba lah ban ktah jur ïa ka jingap pahara jong ka jylla katba la bynrap ba la don bun ka jingshah pynïap jong ki nongshong shnong ha Umkiang ha ki nong Bangladesh da kaba ïaid lynti hapoh u khappud jong ka India.Katkum ka jingong jong u district magistrate, kum ki kam khaïi tuh, kam sniew, dei ban ïoh jingïada khnang ban lah ban ïoh jingsuk bad jingshngaiñ ha ka District.
title: Buh ka EJH da ka jingpyrkhing na ka bynta ban teh lakam ïa ki kam khaïi beaiñ

content: Ha ka jingïalang ba la pynlong da ka National People’s Party (NPP) myn ha ka 6 tarik u Rymphang 2024, ha Rangthong, ka MLA bad kaba dei ruh ka Myntri jong ka jylla ka ban sa ïakhun ïa ka MP na ka Shillong Parliamentary Seat, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ka la ong, “ngan wad ïaphi, ngan sngap ïa ki jingud ki jingnam ki jongphi bad wat lada phim don u MLA na kane ka party NPP, kheiñ ba nga dei ma nga kata ka MLA jongphi.”Ka la ong ruh ba ha ki kam kiba bun ka ju ïatrei ryngkat bad u MLA u Bah Pius Marwein bad  ka ju pyni ïa i ruh ba halor kane ka synshar ka khadar jong ka MDA 2. “Ka jingiasyllok lang ka jong ki bad ngi ki nongïalam ka NPP ngi la pyrshang katba lah ban pynbit pynbiang ïa ki dong, ki shnong ki thaw bad ïa ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ ngin ïai bteng ïa kane ka kam kaba bha”, ong ka Kong Ampareen.Ka la Ong ruh, “lada phi hap ban jied ïa ki MP ki jongphi jied ïa ka MP ba la pynïeng da ka NPP kaba dei trai jong kane ka sorkar MDA 2.”Ka kong Ampareen ka la ai ïa  ka jingkitbok kit rwiang watla kane ka dang dei tang ka sien kaba nyngkong, da kaba ka la Ong ruh, “ma phi ki dei kita ki khohsiew, ki kpoh ki jongngi hapoh kane ka ïing ka sem jong ka jinglong jingman jong kane ka party NPP”.Shuh shuh ka la bynrap da kaba ka la ong, “leit sha ki shnong mynta ka sngi leit da ka mynsiem kaba shitrhem leit da ka jingmut kaba skhem ba ngin kner ïa la ki jong ki kti  jongngi ban ïarap ïaphi ha ki kam ba phi sngew donkam ban ïarap bad lada phi la kyrshan lem ngeit ba ngan sa wanphai bad kumba nga leh ïa la ka jong ka  constituency ha Laitumkhrah, ngan pynkiew, ngan trei shitom bad ngan pyni ïaphi ïa ka jinglah jongnga kum ka kynthei shibor  ba ngan lam khmat ïa ki jingdawa bad ki jingdonkam ki jong phi.”Haba kren halor ka jingjied jong kane NPP ïa ka kum ka MP, ka Kong Ampareen ka la ong, ba ka sngew sarong ba ka NPP ka la kloi ban pynkup bor ha ïa ka, kaba dei tang ka riew kynthei shi bor. Watla hapdeng kita ki nongpan ticket kiba bun kiba kham khrawbor ban ïa ka. Ka la ong ruh, “ngan leh katba nga lah ba ngan pynsoi ïa kane ka jingjied jong ki da ka shibor bad ngan trei bor bah ha ki kam jongnga baroh. Ka kam MP kan ym lah ban leh da ka party, ka kamram u MP ne ka MP ka dei ka jinglah jong ka jylla ka jongngi ha ka jingïalam jong ki nongïalam u Myntri Rangbah, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah, ki Cabinet, ki MLA, ki jongngi ban ïasyllok bad ka jingsynshar khadar jong ka ri India.  Phi la ïohi ïa ki kam pynroi, ki kam ban pynkiew. Khie leit kylli na Constituency  kumno nga trei bha bad lada phi la ïoh ïa ka certificate kaba bit kaba biang kyrshan ïa nga, phi ka UDP kyrshan ïa nga, phi ka BJP kyrshan ïa nga, phi kita kiwei kiwei ki party sharum shaneng kat shaba phi don kyrshan tylli shisien kum ki Khasi Jaintia ïa nga, pyni seh shisien ïa ka pyrthei ba ngi lah ban ïatylli haba hap ban ïa jied MP.”Ka la ong ruh ba ki khun samla jongngi kim pat ju ïoh kum ka jingithuh la ki dei ki nongïaleh sports, ki nongkhaii pateng , ki nongrep, ki nonghilai,  ki Nurse ki Doctor,  bad kumta ter ter.“Ka party jongngi ka la wallam ïa kane ka synshar kaba bha kaba bit kaba biang bad nga don ha syndah bad ki nongïalam kiba ithuh ha Delhi.  Kam don jingmut ban phah da ki MP na kiwei kiwei ki party,” bynrap ka Kong Ampareen.
title: Wat la phim don ïa u MLA na ka party NPP, kheiñ ba nga dei ma nga kata ka MLA jongphi: Ampareen

content: Ka KSU myn ha ka 9 tarik u Nongprah 2023 ka la ïoh ban pynthymmai ïa kawei ka shnat treikam ka jong ka kaba shabar ka jylla bad kata ka long ka Dehradun Unit ha nongbah Dehradun.Hane ka sngi lah don lang ruh u samla Pynkmenlang Sanmiet, u ban dei u Education Secretary ka seng, u Samla Iashanborlang Mukhim u ba dei u Assistant Finance Secy ka Seng, u Samla Nicholas Chyrmang uba long u Nongïalam ka KSU Delhi Unit.Lah rakhe ruh ïa ka Freshers Meet  ba lah pynbeit da ka KSU Dehradun Unit, ha kaba u Samla Lambokstarwell Marngar u lah long Kum u Kongsan bad ka Kong Mily Rabon, kum ka Symbud Kongsan.La wan ïa shim bynta ha kane ka Freshers Meet da ki samla Khasi kiba pule ha ka Nongbah Dehradun bad kumjuh ruh lah wan pynshngaiñ lem da ki samla pule na kiwei pat ki Jylla jong ka Thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi kiba kynthup ïa ki samla na Mizoram, Nagaland bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Pyntyllun ka KSU Dehradun ïa ki mat lyngba ki nongkitkam ba thymmai

content: :U MLA ka South Shillong Constituency u Bah Sanbor Shullai mynta ka 12 tarik Nohprah u la hiar ban jurip ïa ka jaka ban shna ïa ka Urban Primary Health Center ha ka shnong  Lumparing Shillong .Ïa kane ka project kan dei ka ban bei tyngka da ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka jinglut ka ban kot sha ka 4, 99,00,000 (4 klur 99 lak).Kane ka jaka sumar yn tei ha ka jaka ba 6 akar tam bad kan dei ka jaka sumar ka ban down 10 tylli ki jingthiah bad ia kane ka Health Center yn pyndep noh ban shna hapoh ka 30 bnai.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u Bah Sanbor Shullai, u la ong “ban ïoh ïa ki skhim ha ki shnong ki thaw kam dei ka ba suk, bad ban shu shong shi jaka ym lah ban ïohï ki skhim hynrei hap durut hap ban leit buddien haduh ban da ïoh”.U la ong “Na ka liang jong nga ban pynurlong ïa kane ka skhim nga la hap ban buddien ïa kane naduh ka kyrdan u Myntri Rangbah”.U la bynrap, “kane ka jaka sumar kan ai jingshakri ïa kiba bun ki nongshong shnong ban ïoh ka jingsumar kaba kyrkieh”.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïadon lang u DMHO u Dr S. Lyngdoh, ki nongïalam shnong kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Doncaster Shabong u Rangbah Lower Lumparing,  u Bah HB Wahlang u Rangbah Shnong ka Upper Lumparing, u Bah Shaipbar Wahlang u Rangbah Shnong ka Riat Laban Kynjat phutball, ki seng samla bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Ban ïoh ïa ki skhim kam dei kaba suk hap durut ong u Bah Sanbor

content: :Ka Seng Kynthei Jaïaw Langsning ka la pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka jubili ksiar jong ka jingïaid lynti ha kaban snohkti lang ban synniang hapoh ka shnong.Ïa kane ka jingrakhe la pynlong baroh shisnem naduh ka 12 tarik Nohprah 2022, bad ha shilynter ka jingrakhe la pynlong ruh ïa ki jingïakob bapher bapher na ka bynta ki khynnah, ha kaba la sam ïa ki khusnam ha kane ka sngi kut.Ha kane ka sngi la don lang u MLA ka thaiñ uba dei u Myntri ha ka Sorkar, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh bad kumjuh u MLA ka Mawkynrew, u Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh kum ki Kongsan bad i kong B Kostimai Jyrwa kum ka Symbud Kongsan.Na ka liang u Bah Banteidor haba kren ha kane ka jingrakhe u la pyrto ïa ki kam ba ka seng Kynthei bad ki longkmie jong ka shnong ki la leh na ka bynta ka burom jong ka shnong.U Myntri ka tnat Social Welfare kum u Kongsan u la kren jam ha kane ka sngi ïa ka jingdonkam ka kti ka diang ka kti ka mon ki longkmir na ka bynta ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa u drug, ba kin don bynta lang ha ka awareness and de-addiction programme. U la ong ba kane ka kam kam long shuh ban ïalehkai namar ka la rung ruh sha ki kyndong kynshrot bad sha nongkyndong, bad bynrap ba kam don jingmut ban ai ïa ki jingtei namar kin sepei lut lada klet ban tei ïa ki briew lajong kiba la ngop ha u drug.U Bah Paul u la wer ia ka seng kynthei ban wan shakhmat ban pynthikna ba ka kyrteng jong ka shnong kan ym shu jah noh tang na ka jingsniew na u drug.Ha kane ka sngi ki Kongsan bad i Symbud Kongsan ki la pyllait ruh ïa ka jingbuh thup lane ka souvenir jong ka seng bad la pynkut pat da ka jingpyhap noh ïa ka lama jubili.
title: La pynhap pyrda ïa ka jubili ksiar ki kynthei ha Jaïaw Langsning

content: Ki shipai India jong ka 101 Area bad ka Rajya Sainik Board,ki la pynlong ia ka jiniakynduh lang jong ki shipai ba la shongthait ba la tip kum ka Mega Ex Servicemen (ESM) ha Tura. Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ka  dkhot jong ka ïing dorbar ,Lok Sabha ka Agatha K Sangma kaba long ka nongmih khmat ia Tura Parliamentary constituency ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ka jinglah jong kine ki shipai ban ai ia ka jingshakri jong ki na ka bynta ka ri.Ka la ong ba bun ki shipai kiba la shongthait ha ka rta ba dang kham khynnah kumta ka sorkar ka la buh ia ki skim na ka bynta jong ki bad kine ki skim ki long kum ka CM Elevate and Promotion and Incubation of Market Driven Enterprises ( PRIME ) ia kaba kine ki shipai kiba la shongthait ki lah ban pyndonkam ia ki na ka bynta ki jingtrei jong ki bad ia kiba haing hasem jong ki. Ka Sangma ka la iathuh ruh ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka don ka jingthmu ban buh ia ka skul Sainik Board ha ka jylla. Ka Sangma ka la iaroh ruh ia ka  Gorkha Training Centre bad ia ka Assam Regiment Centre kaba la pynshlur ia ki shipai kiba la shongthait na ka kam da kaba iarap ia ki ba kin ioh ia ki pension jong ki khnang ba ki shipai ba la shongthait kin ym iakynduh jingeh ban kin ioh ia ki pension jong ki.U Director of the Rajya Sainik Board Meghalaya u Colonel Gautam Rai  u la ong ba kane ka jing pynlong ia ka jingiakynduhlang jong ki shipai kiba la shongthait kiba shong ba sah ha Garo Hills kan iarap ban pynduna ia ki jingeh ba kine ki shipai ki iakynduh. U Colonel Gautam Rai  la ong ba na ka liang jong u un ialeh katba lah ban pyntikna ba ki shipai ba la shongthait bad ki ba haing ha sem jong ki ba kin ym iakynduh ia kino kino ki jingeh ha ka jingim ka jong ki.
title: Iakynduhlang ki shipai ba la shongthait ha Mega Ex Servicemen ha Tura

content: Ki pulit ka West Khasi Hills District ki la pynlong ia ka  jingwad ia u nongpyniap jong u uwei u nonghikai skul uba la  shah pyniap bad ia uwei ruh uba la mynsaw  kiba la hikai ha ka skul Rangsapara Secondary School kane la jia ha ka 11 tarik  mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Mynniar . Ka pulit  ryngkat bad ki ksew  na shillong ki la poi ha katei ka jaka ha Mynniar ban bud dien ia ki nongleh kam sniew.U Superintendent of Police, West Khasi Hills District, u Bikram D. Marak u la pyntikna ba kane ka dei ka kam pyniap briew bad ki pulit ki la registar ia kane ka jingjia. U ne u heh pulit u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ba lada ki don kino kino ki jingtip shaphang kane ka jingjia kin pyntip sha ki pulit.U T.R. Sangma u long uwei na ki nonghikai uba la iap na kane ka jingmynsaw ha kane ka jingjia bad ia ka met jong u la pynkit noh sha Nongstoin Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban leh ia ka post-mortem.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia haba  kine ki nonghikai ki la shah thombor ha ki briew kiba ym lah ban ithuh ha ka por ba ki dang wanphai na ka jinghikai sku na  Nongstoin.Baroh ar ngut kine ki nonghikai  katba ki dang iaid da ka motorbike bad haba ki la poi ha Mynniar ki la shah kdong ha ki briew bym ithuh.Kine ki ar ngut ki la shah shoh ha kine ki briew ki bym lah ban ithuh.   Kine ki riewsniew ki la pynmynsaw ia u S. Chetri bad u T.R. Sangma uba la shitom jjur bad iap noh. Ia u S. Chetri la pynkit mar mar sha Nongstoin Civil Hospital ban ioh ia ka jingsumaar. Ki khubor ki iathuh ruh ba kine ki riewsniew ki la tuh ia ka pisa na kitei ki briew .
title: Iap uwei u nonghikai, mynsaw uwei ha ka jingshah lute ha Mynniar

content: Ha ka kam ba lah ban ai jingïaroh, ha kaba ki heh pulit Traffic ki la leh ïa ka kam ba bha myn ha ka 12 tarik, Nohprah, ki la don bynta ha ka ban maramot ïa ka surok hajan Lumdiengjri.Da kaba pyndonkam da ka kali pulit, kitei ki heh pulit ki la shim ha ka kti lade ïa katei ka mat, da kaba pynbna halor ki mat jong ka surok ha ka por mynsngi mynshai.
title: Maramot ki pulit Traffic ïa ka surok hajan Lumdiengjri

content: :Ka Organising Committee jong ka KSU Mawlai Circle myn ha ka 12.12.2023, ka la pyllong ka jingkhynra ïa ki mynder ba wan bylla ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka shnong Mawlai.Ha katei ka jingkhynra na ka liang ka seng na ki thaiñ Mawiong, Nongkwar bad Ïew Rynghep ka la lap ïa shibun ki mynder kiba wan ban trei ïa ki kam ñiat rong, tah tiles bad kiwei ki kam trei misteri ki bym biang bad bym don kino kino ki kot ki sla khamtam ka work permit, na ka liang ka seng, hadien ba ka la lap ïa ki mynder ki bym don ki kot ki sla kiba biang ka la pynher krad lut bad pynphai sha ka jaka kaba ki wan bad ka la maham tyngeh ba kim bit ban dang wan trei wan ktah hapoh ka shnong Mawlai bad ha Ri khasi hi baroh kawei.Na ka liang ka KSU Mawlai Circle ka sngew ban kyntu ïa baroh ki trai ïing, Contractor bad sha baroh ki para ri ba ki dei ban kiar na ka jingaikam aijam ïa ki mynder namar kane kan nang pynkharoi shuh shuh ïa ki mynder ri hangne ha ri jongngi bad kan buh jingma ïa ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew hi baroh kawei, namar ba lada ki mynder ki wan sha ka ri jongngi lada kim ïoh ki kam ki jam ba kim im bad kamai ja kpoh kin nym lah ban shong bad ban sah hangne ha ri jong ngi.Kyntang ïawai ka seng ka ïawer ïa baroh ki para ri ban sangeh noh ban ai kam ïa ki briew ba na bar bad ban sdang ai kam para khasi kum shi bynta ba ngin ïaleh pyrshah bad ïada ïa ka jingsdang ban wan buhai shnong ki mynder ri hapoh ka ri baieid jong ngi.Ïa kane ka kyrwoh la pyllait da u samla Macdonald Jitem uba dei u Assistant General secretary KSU Mawlai Circle.
title: Pynher krad ka KSU Mawlai ïa ki mynder ba wan trei bylla be-aiñ ha ki thaiñ Mawlai

content: u nongthaw aiñ na ka seng Voice of the People Party (VPP) na North Shillong, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum myn ha ka sngi ba ar u la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar jylla ban hukum ïa kiwei pat ki tnad ba ka phikir ïa ki nongtrei jong ki, kiba dei ruh ki nongshong shnong jong ka Them Ïew Mawlong, na ka bynta ban kiar ban ai haduh 1.4 acre ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa ki.Ha kawei ka jingthoh, u Nongrum u la ong ba u la mynjur bad u Symbud Myntri, u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba hynnin ka sngi u la ong ba ïa ka jaka, yn nym ai sha ka longïing kaba don haduh 342 ngut.“Nga la ai jingïaroh ïa ka sorkar jylla(ba kan pynkynriah noh ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ka Them Ïew Mawlong) hynrei ka jingkylli ka mih ba balei donkam ban ai tam ka jaka ïa ki. Phi la rai ban pynkynriah noh ïa kine ki nongtrei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) sha ka jaka SMB, shabas. Hynrei balei ba phim kylli ïa kiwei pat ki tnat ba kin ai da ki quarter sha ki nongtrei jong ki, kiba dei ki nongshong shnong jong ka Them Ïew Mawlong, khnang ban lah ban kiar ban ai ïa ka jaka haduh 1.4 acre kaba dei kaba tam na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa ki,” ong u Nongrum.Halor ka jingkyrpad jong u Tynsong sha ka seng VPP ba kan nym kren politik halor ka mat pynkynriah ïa ki, ha kaba utei u nongthaw aiñ ka North Shillong, u la ong, “Nga kwah ban pynkynmaw ïaphi ba ka VPP kan nym ïalam bakla ïa ki paidbah jong ka jylla. Ka jingmih jong ka VPP kam dei na ka bynta ka politik hynrei na ka bynta ki polisi. Ka jaka ka long ka jingim bad ngi hap ban pyrkhat shaphang ka lawei ban wan jong ki nongïoh pateng.”“Shuh, shuh, lada maphi(Tynsong) kum u chairman jong ka High Level Committee (HLC) phi la ong ba phim don por (ban ïatai nia halor kane ka mat) te mano ban ai ïa ka por,” ong u Nongrum.U Nongrum shuh shuh, u la pynthikna ïa ki paidbah ba un bteng ban pynlong da ka follow-up halor kane ka mat, wat haba ka dei shabar ne shapoh jong ka Assembly.“Kam shym mut ba nga dei uba isih ïa kitei ki nongshong shnong hynrei ha ka jingshisha nga isynei na ka bynta jong ki bad ka rukom im jong ki, kaba la i sait met. Ka long ka kamram jong nga kum u khlieh jong ka konstituensi ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka hok jong ki ban pynkynriah ïa ki,” bynrap u Nongrum.Ka sorkar jylla ha ka shon shap jong ka(blueprint) ka la tyrwa ban ai tam haduh 1.4 acre ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 longïing naba ka jaka ba la don lypa jong ka SMB kam pat biang ban pynsah ïa ki.
title: Thrang u Adelbert ba kiwei ki tnat kin pynïoh quarter ïa ki nongtrei

content: :Myn ha ka 12 tarik, Nohprah 2023, kaba la long ka jingkhmih halor ka jingïoh jingtip ba paka, ha kaba ka kynhun jong ka 193rd Battalion jong ka BSF Meghalaya ka ïoh lad ban kem ïa kawei ka kali hajan ka khappud Dulainala kaba hap hapoh ka East Khasi Hills district jong ka Meghalaya. La lap ïa katei ka kali ba ka la kit palat pud da ki jaiñphong ba shongdor haduh T. 35 lak, kiba la thmu ban khaïi sha Bangladesh.Katba u nongniah jong katei ka kali u la shah kem noh, naba u la pulom ban pynbiang ki kot ki sla na ka bynta ka jingsoi ïa ki jaiñphong. Kitei kiba shah kem bad ïa ki tiar ba la ïoh kurup, la aiti noh sha ka Police station Danger na ka bynta ka jingtohkit ban dang ïaid shakhmat.
title: Ïoh kurup ka BSF Meghalaya ïa kiba suba khaïi ïa ki jaiñphong, shah kem uwei ha ka khappud International

content: :Ka Hynñiewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Tyrsad Circle kum shibynta ban pynshlur bad ban kyntiew ïa ki khynnah skul bad ki skul kiba don ha ka thaiñ, ka la pynlong ïa ka jingpynkupburom ïa ki samla pule kiba wan shakhmat ha ka SSLC bad HSSLC kiba pule ha ki Secondary bad Higher Secondary School kiba don ha ka thaiñ bad ka jingai khusnam kyrpang ïa i Jubansuk Hynñiewta iba wan shakhmat duh ha ka B.Sc ( Mathematics) La pynlong ia kane ka jingpynkupburom ha ka 12 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ha ïingdorbar ka shnong Mawlum Tyrsad.Ha ka jingkren jong u Bah Enlang Sawian u Education Secretary ka HYC Sengkmie kum u Kongsan u la ban jur ba ki samla pule ka jaidbynriew ki dei ban don ka mynsiem ïakhun ne competitive spirit namar ka mynsiem ïakhun ka duna palat ha ki samla pule ka jaidbynriew. U la pynpaw ruh ba ki samla pule kim dei ban khmih lynti than tang ïa ki kam sorkar hynrei ban phaikhmat ruh sha ki kam kompeni bapher bapher kiba ka jingsiew ka kham heh ban ïa ki kam sorkar ruh.U Bah Staising Kharbteng ha ka jingkren jong u u la kyntu ïa ki khun samla ba ki dei ban don ka jingthrang ne aims ha ka jingim jong ki khnang ba kin nang ban pynkhreh ban ïoh kheit ïa u soh ka jingjop bad ban kiar ïa ki diengpyngkiang kiba lah ban ktah ïa ka lawei baphyrnai jong ki.La ïoh ruh ïa ka jingkren na u Bah Shanlang Khongsit u Rangbah Kur ka Kur Khongsit, ka jingkren ai khublei na u samla Bansharai Sawkmie Asst. General Secretary HYC Tyrsad Circle bad la pynïaid ïa ka jingïalang da u Bah Phrangsngi Rangslang u General Secretary ka circle. La ïadon ryngkat ha kane ka sngi u Bah Shanlang Marwein dkhot CEC, kong Banisha Nongsiej dkhot HYC Women’s wing,Bah Bhaboklang Sohshang President ka circle, ki dkhot ka seng, ki kmie ki kpa bad kiwei kiwei.La pynshitrhem ruh ïa kane ka jingpynkupburom lyngba ka jingrwai na u Samla Vicky Kharshiing bad la sam ïa ki Momento bad kiwei kiwei ki jingai sngewbha da u kongsan bad kiwei kiwei kiba ïadon ryngkat ha kane ka sngi.
title: Pynkup burom ka HYC Tyrsad Circle ïa ki samla pule SSLC bad HSSLC

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, myn ha ka 7 tarik, Rymphang, u la sam da ki cheque sha ki 120 tylli ki Self-help Groups (SHG) bad ki nongïoh jingmyntoi jong ka Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY-WDC 2.0) ha ka State Convention Centre, ha ryngkat u Myntri jong ka Soil and Water Conservation of Meghalaya, u Marcuise N Marak.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Sangma u la ong ba watla ka jylla ka la shah kyrkhu da ki jingdon jingem jong ka mariang, hynrei ka long kaba eh ban pynbiang ïa ka um.“Te kumta, ki tnad bapher bapher ki la trei shitom na ka bynta ban pynbiang um bad ka PMKSY WDC 2.0 lyngba ka jingtreikam na ka bynta ka jingpynbiang um bam um dih(Watershed Management), ka jingpynïoh um na ka mariang(Natural Resources Management) (kum na ki dam barit baria, pung, nan, bad kiwei kiwei), Ka jingthung ïa ki dieng, ka prokram ban pynbha ha ka rep ka riang bad ka jingpyntreikam na ka bynta ban im ja kpoh bad ïoh bai ja kpoh, kaba yn long ka maw jam ba kongsan ha ka ban pynbiang um bam um dih hapoh ka jylla,” ong u Conrad.“Nga pynshlur ïa ki dkhot jong ka SHG ba kin pyndonkam ïa ka tynrai jong ka pisa khnang ban ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ka prokram,” ong u Myntri rangbah.
title: Sam cheque u Myntri rangbah sha ki SHG, nongïoh jingmyntoi jong ka PMKSY-WDC 2.0

content: U Myntri ka tnad Bording u Abu Taher Mondal myn ha ka sngi Ba-ar, ula pyntip ïa ka jingeh ban ïoh jaka na ka bynta ban pyntrei ïa ka Pumped Hydro Storage Project (PHPs) hapoh ka jylla kaU Mondal ula ong, “ka jingïoh jaka ka dei ka jingeh namar kata, ngin sa ïakynduh ïa ki briew bad ngin sa buddien ïa ka mat bad ngin phaikhmat mynta sha ki jaka bym don ba shong briew mano mano ruh.”Ka National Thermal Power Corporation (NTPC) kala phah ïa ka Pre-Feasibility Report sha ka Tnad bording halor ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingwad bniah ba ka la leh ha kawei ka jaka ban pyntrei ïa ka Pumped Hydro Storage Projects.Ka Diengsong ha East Khasi Hills district ka dei kawei ka jaka kaba la thmu na ka bynta kane ka project.Haba kylli, u Mondal ula ong, “Ngi dang bishar ïa baroh ki kaiphod ba la ïoh pdiang namar kan shong ruh ba ha kano ka rukom ngin lah ban pyntrei ïa ki PHPs namar kane ka donkam ka jinglut ka ba bun bad ngi dang wad ïa ki lad ki lynti mynta.”U la pynshai shuh shuh da kaba ong ba haduh 4 tylli ki jaka la lah ban ithuh bad jied na ka bynta ban pyntrei kam ïa ka PHPs, ka jingthied khyndew ka ïai long kaba kongsan.U Mondal u la batai ruh halor ki jingdonkam jong ka PHPs da kaba kdew ba ka jingdonkam na ka bynta ban don jaka shuh shuh na ka bynta ban shna dam ha ki wah bad ha ki jaka riat. U la batai shai ruh da ka a ong ba ha ka (Off – Peak Hours) lane ka por kaba bun tam ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka bording, yn shim ïa ka um kaba lah ban donkam ïa ka bor, ka dor ka lah ban kiew katba ka jingïoh bording ha ki por ba donkam kan long ka jingmyntoi.
title: Ïa tyngkhuh jingeh ka jylla ban pyntreikam ïa ka Pumped Hydro Storage Projects na ka daw jong ka jaka: Mondal

content: U S.C Sadhu, uba long u Secretary barim  jong ka tnad Community & Rural Development (C&RD) and Forest Environment un wan shimti kum u Deputy Commissioner bathymmai jong ka East Khasi Hills District .Katkum Ka notification ba la pynmih na ka liang jong ka ka Tnad Personnel & AR (A)  ha ka 6 tarik Rymphang 2024, la pyntip ba ïa ka Kong R.M Kurbah, ka IAS (SCS: 2010) Deputy Commissioner, East Khasi Hills District, Shillong la shah pynkynriah bad ha ka jaka long ka un wan da u SC Sadhu .Katba ïa ka kong RM Kurbah la  thung kum ka Secretary ka Tnad Community & Rural Development, Fisheries, Water Resources, A.H & Veterinary Department bad kumjuh ruh kum ka Director ka Community & Rural Development (C&RD). Ka Kong R.M Kurbah kan shimti ïa ka kam naduh ba la pynkhamti ïa ka.
title: Yn wan shimti u S.C Sadhu kum u DC ba thymmai ka EKHD

content: U Myntri jong ka tnad bording ilektrik, u AT Mondal myn ha ka sngi ba ar u la ong ba yn sa pynbna ïa ka tarik na ka bynta ban khang ïa ka jingkieng Dam.“Ha ka sngi ban khang noh ïa kane ka jingkieng, ngin sa pyndep ban khang noh shi syndon bad pynthikna ba yn nym shah ban ïaid kali lyngba kane ka jingkieng na ka bynta saw haduh phra kynta,” pynbna u Mondal.U la ong ba ka tnad kan sa ïakren bad ka coordination committee, kaba kynthup ïa ka MeECL, PWD, Transport department, district administrations (East Khasi Hills bad Ri Bhoi) bad ki pulit, na ka bynta ban rai halor kane ka mat.“Hadien ka jingïalang, ngin sa pynbeit ïa ka tarik ba biang ynda ngi la khang (jingkieng Dam) na ka bynta ban pynïaid kali na shawei sha jaka,” bynrap u Mondal, da kaba ai jingmut ïa ki kali ba kin pyndonkam ban ïaid na kawei pat ka surok khnang ban kin poi sha ka jaka ba ki thmu ban poi.U Mondal u la ong ruh ba ïa ka jingshna ïa ka jingkieng dam,kan sa shimpor kumba 3 haduh 4 bnai ban pyndep.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpynïaid ïa ki kali, u Mondal u la batai kumne, “Ïa mynta, ki kali yn nym shah ban ïaid ïa ki kali heh, naba yn shah tang ban ïaid tang ïa ki kali rit na kane ka jingkieng Dam. Hynrei, ha ka sngi ban khang ïa kane ka jingkieng Dam, ngin khang naduh saw haduh ohra kynta. Hadien ba la plie ïa kane ka jingkieng Dam, yn sa buh da ki lynti ïaid narud surok na shiliang sha shiliang jong ka jingkieng, kaba yn shah ïa ki kali rit ba kin ïaid (ym palat ïa ka 4 Metric Ton) bad ïa ki kali kit nongpang ruh kumjuh. Ha ka sngi ba ngin pyndep ban shna ïa kane ka jingkieng Dam, yn nym shah ban ïaid kali lyngba kane ka dam.”
title: Yn sa pynbna ïa ka tarik ban khang ïa ka jingkieng Dam, ong u AT Mondal

content: U Myntri ka tnad bording ilektrik, u AT Mondal u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah Meghalayan myn ha ka sngi ba ar, da kaba phah ïa ki ba kin jied ban buh noh da ki smart meters.Da kaba pynbna halor ka jingsdang ban pyntreikam da ki projek smart metering, u Mondal u la ong ba bun ki briew ki dang don jingthut ban buh da ki smart meters. U la ban jur halor kane ka jingïoh jingmyntoi, da kaba ong kumne, “te kumta, ngi la kyrpad ïa man ki nongsiew bill light ba katba lah ka bha ban buh da ki smart meter, namar ba kane kan nym pyn kulmar jingmut ïa ki ha ka ban siew bill light. Lada don kano kano ka jingkulmar khlieh na ka MeECL halor ka jingkiew ka bai light, baroh ka jingkulmar khlieh kan sa jah.”U Mondal u la ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ïa ki smart meter, ka dang ïaid shakhmat, lem bad don kiba la dep buh ïa ki bad ki jngthmu na ka bynta ban buh ïa kim ka dang ïaid shakhmat. U la pynthikna kumne, “Don kiba la buh ïa ki smart meter bad ngin bteng shuh shuh ban buh da ki smart meter.”
title: Kyrpad u Myntri ka tnad bording ilektrik ïa ki paidbah Meghalayan ban buh da ki smart meter

content: U Myntri ka tnad bording ilektrik, u Abu Taher Mondal myn ha ka sngi ba ar u la ong ba ka jylla ka kyrmen ha ka ban ïoh light tad haduh mynta, katba shem jingeh ha ka laiñ bording, watla ka jylla ka shaniah ha ki projek hydropower.“Ka pateng jong ngi ka long kaba shaniah ha ki projek hydropower bad na ka bynta jong ka central generation, kaba la don lypa hynrei ngi dang biang ka jingïoh bording,” ong u Mondal sha ki nongthoh kot khubor.“Hynrei, ngi la khmih biang(ïa ka jinglong jingman ka bording ilektrik) man la ka taïew bad ngi dang pyrshang ban peit haduh katno ngi lah ban pynduna bad kumno ngin peit ha ka liang jong ka jingpynlip light ne load-shedding,” ong u Mondal.Utei u Myntri u la pynbna ba ïa ka projek 3-megawatt hydel power ha Riangdo, West Khasi Hills, la sdang pyntreikam khnang ban lah ban pynïoh tam ka bording ilektrik.“La don ka jingai jingmut na ka liang jong kiba la tbit ba ngi lah ban pynkylla ïa kane ka projek sha ka 6MW bad ngi dang khmih biang halor kane ka mat (hashwa ban shim rai),” ong u Mondal.U Mondal u la ong ba ka detailed project reports (DPR), la dep pynbiang na ka bynta ban sdang pyntreikam sa kiwei ki projek mini hydel power. “Mynta ngi dang khmih ïa ka jinglah ban pyntreikam bad kumjuh ruh ka jingbei tyngka,” ong u Mondal.Utei u Myntri u la pyntip ba la dep buh da ka tender na ka bynta ban pyntreikam ïa ka Chief Minister’s Solar Mission.“To ngin ïapeit kumno ka jubab ka long. Kane kan nym dei ka solar park ne solar plant. Man la ki thliew ïing jong ki briew, kin sa ïoh da ki solar panel halor sad ïing jong ki. Katba long, ki paidbah kin shim hynrei lait noh tang ha Shillong bad ha kiwei ki jaka, kiwei pat ki jaka kiba ïoh sngi bha,” bynrap u Mondal.
title: Don jingkyrmen ka jylla ha ka laiñ bording watla shaniah ha ki projek hydropower: AT Mondal

content: :Ka International Water Conclave kaba la dep pynlong ha Shillong, kaba la don lang u Myntri ka Meghalaya’s Water Resources Minister, u Coming One Ymbon, kum u chief guest. Ha kane ka prokram, ka la don ka jingthmu ha ka ban tyngkai ïa ka um, da kaba pynlong da ki jingïalehkai, kum ka jingdro dur, quiz bad ki jingïakop shondur.U Sakhil Ahmed, Additional Chief Secretary jong ka Meghalaya, u la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ban tyngkai, da kaba kyrpad ïa ki samla ban don ka jingmut ban pynleit jingmut halor ka jingsumar ïa ka mariang bad tyngkai um. U la ban jur halor ka jingkit khia na ka pateng sha ka pateng, ha kaba u la kren halor ka jingdonkam ban pyndonkam da kijuh ki jingdon jingem jong ka mariang na ka bynta ka lawei.U Myntri, u Ymbon u la pdiang ba ka jingïoh um ka Meghalaya ha ka por ba jynjar, da kaba pynshlur ïa ki samla ba kin tyngkai bad ïada ïa ka mariang, ha kaba u la ban jur ba ka um ka long kaba kongsan ha ka kolshor jong ka jylla bad ka riti ka dustur. Watla ïoh jingkyrkhu na ka bor mariang, hynrei ka pyrthei ka dang shem jingeh ha ka ban ïoh um naba jur ka jingduna um bad jaboh ka lyer.Kane ka prokram ka long kum ka rynsan ban pynbna ïa kum kine ki jingeh, da kaba wanrah baroh kiba la tbit bad ki heh nongtrei ba kin khmih ha ka ban tyngkai ïa ka um. Katba katei ka prokram ka dang ïaid shakhmat, ki nongïashim bynta ki la khmih lynti ban noh synñiang ha ka ban pynwandur ïa ka rukom long ka mariang na ka bynta ban lah ban tyngkai um bam um dih ha ka lawei ban wan.
title: La pynlong ïa ka International Water Conclave ha Shillong ha ka jingdon lang u Myntri ka Water Resources, u Coming One Ymbon kum u chief guest

content: Da ki spah ngut ki nongshong shnong ka Tiehsaw, Nongstoiñ ki la ïamih paidbah na ka bynta ban pynlong ka jingïakhih ïaid kjat mynta ka 7 tarik Rymphang, 2024, na ka bynta ban dawa ïa ka jingbishar hok halor ka jingshah pynïap ka Kong Wansaralin Wanniang, kaba dang ar met ha la u jong u kurim uba ka la ïshong ïa khlad, u Biangkupar Nongsiej myn ha ka 2 tarik Rymphang, 2024.Kane ka jingïakhih la pynlong da ka Dorbar Shnong Tiehsaw, kaba la sdang da ka jingsngap jar kaba 1 minit ha ka madan ïalehkai ha Tiehsaw na ka bynta ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewlem na ka bynta katei ka lanot.Ki nongshong shnong ki la pynlong da ka jingïaid kjat naduh ka madan ïalehkai ha Tiehsaw  pyrshah sha Non-Bah, bad pynkut ha ka ophis trei kam ka Deputy Commissioner WKHD. Ki nongïakhih ki la pynrem jur ha ka jingleh donbor utei u runar u bym don shuh ïa ka mynsiem ïatip lem bad ki la ruh ïa ka lama ïong ryngkat ki placard kiba thoh ïa ki ktien pynrem jur halor katei ka jingjia.U MLA ka Nongstion bad ki nongmihkhmat na ki katto katne ki dkhot ka NGOs ki la ïasnohkti bad ki nongshong shnong ha kane ka jingïakhih.  Kine ki nongïakhih ki la pyrta ïa ka slogan ban dawa da ka jingpynshitom kaba tyngeh ïa u runar.Ka Executive Committee jong ka Dorbar Shnong ka la leit ban ïakynduh ruh ïa u Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills bad u Superintendent of Police, bad ki la ai ruh ïa ka dorkhas na ka bynta ban dawa ba dei ban ai da ka jingpynshitom kaba tyngeh pyrshah u runar.
title: Da ka ka jingïakhih ïaid kjat pynlong ki nongshong shnong ka Tiehsaw halor ka jingshah pynïap ka Kong Wansaralin

content: Ha kine ki juk ba mynta ka dei ka juk ba ki briew ki la shai ym shuh kum ha ki por ba la dep  lada  ïa nujor ha ki jingnang jingstad ha ka khuid ka suba ngi lap shibun ki jingkylla ha ki shnong ki thaw bad kumjuh ruh haba phai ha ki jinglehkhuid wat ha ki ïing ki sem ne ha kum ka sem ka riam ka beit.Hynrei haba phai pat ka ki jaka ba long ïew ki juh ki briew kiba wan na ki shnong ki thaw kiba la nang la stad kiba tip ïa ki jinglehkhuid kaba pyni jaboh bad kaba i sait met ka long ba la lap tyngkreiñ ba ki briew imat ki nang tang ban leh khuid tang ha ïing ha sem hynrei ha ki jaka ba long ïew wat lada la don lypa ki jaka theh ñuit ba la shna kyrpang ban theh ne buh bha ïa ki jakhlia ki plastic ki kot jot ki bilor bad shibun kiei kiei lap ha rud jong ka Ïew Mawkyrwat ka la long shisha kaba i sait met shisha ki jingjaboh bad ki jingjakhlia.Namar kata hato kine ki pynjaklhia mano ban wan bret ha to ki dei ki nongshong dukan ne nongshong ïew hapoh ka ïew Mawkyrwat ne dei ki briew kiba wan ïew kiba leh khlem akor haduh katne? Hato ka jing lehkhuid tang ha ki tyngkong ïing jong ki ka wanrah  mo ïa ka koit ka khiah ne ïa ka khuid ka suba. Lada ka long kumne kam myntoi ka jinglehkhuid tang ha ki kamra shet ja ne tang ha ki ïing la jong khlem da ñiewkor pat shabar ka ïing ne shabar ki shnong ki thaw. Lada ki paidbah kim pat sngewthuh ïa ka jingkordor jong ka jinglehkhuid tang hapoh ïing  hato ka wan rah mo ïa ka koit ka khiah lada shabar ngi klet pat ban lehkhuid.
title: Wat la don ka jaka theh ñuit dang leh khlem akor ki paidbah da kaba bret pathar ïa ki jakhlia ha jan Ïew Mawkyrwat

content: Ki nongïalam ka JAC Khun hajar ka Hima Sohiong, myn ha ka 8 tarik Rymphang 2024, ki leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Symbud CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem, ban bud dien ïa ka jingdawa haka ba ïadei bad ka Hima Sohiong.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u Bah Purningstar Shabong u Chairman ka JAC u la ong ka kane ka jingïakynduh ka long ban pynkynmaw halor ka jingdawa ban weng noh ïa u Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdohship Hima Sohiong. Ka jingkyrpad ban ai ka kaiphot halor  ka Inquiry Report halor ka jingtohkit pyrshah ïa u Bashemphang Thabah halor ka jingdawa jong ka JAC bad  Ka jingdawa ban pynlong da ka Election ban jied ïa u Lyngdoh ba pura jong ka Hima Sohiong.“Na ka liang ka Joint Action Committee naduh u snem 2019 ka la dep ban ujor pyrshah ïa u Bashemphang Thabah halor ki kam be-aiñ be-riti jong u bad ka la dawa ban weng noh ïa u na ka khet Lyngdohship Hima Sohiong. Kane ka jingdawa ka la ïai bteng ter ter haduh mynta ha kaba ka JAC ka la kynduh bun bun sien bad aiti da ka shithi jingdawa ha ka KHADC bad ka la ïai bud dien ïa kane ka kam na ki por sha ki por,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “halor kane  na ka liang ka Executive Committee kaba rim ka la shim khia hadien ka jingdawa kaba jur na ka liang ki khun ki hajar ka Hima Sohiong ha kaba ki la tur paidbah sha KHADC hapoh ka jingïalam jong ka JAC bad ka KHADC ka la weng shipor  ïa u Bashemphang Thabah bad ka thung  ïa u Bah A.E. Gatphoh ban tohkit halor ka mat jingdawa jong ka JAC.”U Bah Shabong u la ong ba mynta ka sngi ka long ban  dawa  ban pynsted noh ïa kane ka kam bad ban weng noh mardor ïa u Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdohship Hima Sohiong uba dang don mynta ha poh ka jingshah weng kam shipor.“Lada na ka liang ka KHADC ka dang ïai pynslem ban weng  noh ïa u Bashemphang Thabah na ka khet Lyngdohship jong ka Hima Sohiong, na ka liang ka JAC ha ryngkat ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Sohiong kan hap ban wan tur paidbah biang sa shisien sha KHADC ha kano kano ka por bad ha kum kata ka por, na ka liang ha KHADC ka dei ban shim ïa ka jingkit khlieh halor ka jing pynslem bad ka jingkuman jong ka,” u la bynrap.Ka JAC ka dawa ruh ban ai ia ka kaiphot jingtohkit ka ba na  ka liang u Inquiry Officer ula dep ban phah sha ka Executive Committee, ïa ka Inquiry Report halor ka jingtohkit pyrshah ïa u Bashemphang Thabah kat kum ka jingdawa jong ka JAC, kumta ngi kyrpad rit ha khmat jong phi ba phin sngewbha ban ai copy lang sha ka JAC ïa ka tei ka Inquiry Report khnang ba na ka liang ka JAC kan ïoh jingtip ban peit bniah.Hadien ba la dep ban weng noh ïa u Bashemphang Thabah, ka JAC ka la dawa ruh ba ka KHADC ka dei  ban pynkloi noh ruh ïa ka Election ban jied ïa u Lyngdoh ba pura jong ka Hima Sohiong khnang ba ka shynshar khadar ha poh ka Hima Sohiong kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih noh nangne sha khmat.“Ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih ha ka shynshar khadar trai Ri trai muluk hapoh ka Hima Sohiong ka dei ka jingthmu bad ka jingangnud jong ka JAC bad ki khun ki hajar jong ka Hima Sohiong hi baroh kawei,” u la bynrap.
title: Byrngem ban tur biang ka JAC sha KHADC lada dang pynslem ïa ka jingdawa ka Hima Sohiong

content: Ka KSU Mawlai circle myn ha ka 8 tarik Rymphang, 2024, hapoh ka jingïalam u Samla Edie Malngiang (General secretary) bad Samla Sam Lyngdoh Nonglait (Education secretary) ka la leit ban ai da ka jingujor sha i principal jong ka Sacred Hearts Boys Higher Secondary, i Fr T.
