Kharsyntiew halor ka jingthoh bakla ïa ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawlai ha ki sweater jong ki khynnah School Sacred Heart Boys, kat kum ka jingthoh ha ki sweater ha ka jaka ban thoh ‘Mawlai’ la thoh pynban ‘Mawali’.Kane ka jingbakla ka ban thoh ïa ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawlai ka la ktah bad wanrah ka jingsngewdiaw ïa kiba bun ki paidbah nongshong jong ka shnong Mawlai kumjuh ïa ki khynnah skul ba pule ha katei ka skul, kumta na ka liang ka seng ka la ïoh ban pynsngew sha i principal ba in khmih bad phah pynbeit noh ïa kane ka jingthoh bakla bad ban ai noh da kiwei ki sweater kiba biang bad ba beit ka jingthoh bad spelling kaba dei jong ka shnong Mawlai.Na ka liang i principal i la pyntip sha ka seng ba na ka liang ka school ka don ka jingïateh bad ka H.B Textiles (School Uniform Embroidery Dealership) na ka bynta ban pynbiang ïa ki Uniform skul jong ki khynnah skul bad ka don ka jingleh bakla na ka liang ka H.B.Textiles bad mar sien ïoh jingtip ba ka don ka jingprint bakla ha ki sweater i lah phah pynbna ha Assembly ban phah lum lut baroh ki sweater jong ki khynnah ba don ka jingbakla ka jingthoh i la pyntip ruh ba ki sweater kiba ba don ka jingbakla ka jingthoh ki dei na ka size 26 bad 38 bad ym baroh jong ki khynnah school bad i principal i la pynpaw ruh kum ka skul hi baroh kawei ki don jingngewsih ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingprint bakla ïa ka kyrteng jong ka shnong Mawlai namar kane ka jingbakla ka la ktah ïa ka school bad ka shnong Mawlai hi baroh kawei bad i la pyntip ruh na ka liang ka school ka la shim khia bad ba kan nym dei shuh ban dang jia kumne ha ki por ban sa wan.
title: Ujor ka KSU Mawlai Circle sha u Principal ka Sacred Heart Boys halor ka jingthoh bakla ha ka sweater Skul

content: Hadien ba ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District (Regulation and Administration of Land) Bill 2021 ka la long aiñ na ka liang ki nongïalam ka United Hynniewtrep Movement (UHM) myn ha ka 8 tarik Rymphang 2024, ki la leit ban ïa kynduh bad u Symbud CEM ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem ban kyntu ïa ka Autonomous Council ba ka dei ban pynregister ei ïa ki jaka ha ki thaiñ khappud.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor u President ka UHM u Bah Chalie J Rani u la ïathuh ba kane ka mat ban pynregister ei ïa ki jaka ki puta jong ki nongshong shnong ha ki thaiñ khappud ka dei kaba la shim khia da ka seng naduh u snem 2018.“Ka seng ka dawa na ka Sorkar ba ka dei ban register ei ïa ki jaka ki puta jong ki nongshong shnong ha ki thaiñ khappud, namar ba ka Sorkar Assam ka la tyrwa ban register ei ïa ki jaka jong ki, hynrei ki nongshong shnong kim kwah ban register sha Assam kumta ki la wan ban kyrpad na ka seng ban kyntu ïa ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kan register ei ïa ki jaka jong ki,” u la ong.U la bynrap, “halor kane na ka liang ka seng ka la pynlong ruh da ka jingïakhih ha u snem ba la dep ban pynurlong ïa kane ka jingdawa, ha kaba na ka liang u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la khot ïa kren bad pyntip halor ka jingpdiang ka District Council ïa ka Land Bill bad phah sha ka tnad DCA bad na ka tnad DCA la phah biang sha DC ban bishar biang bad hadien la lah ban ai jingmynjur ban long aiñ bad kumta ngi wan ban bud dien ïa kane.”U Bah Rani u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingïakynduh bad u Dy CEM u la ïathuh ba ka don la ka jong ka jingpynbeit ïa ka dor bad ha ki thaiñ khappud ka duna bha ka dor, hynrei na ka liang ka seng ka la kyntu ba ka Autonomous District Council ka dei ban pynlait ei ïa ka jingregister ïa ki jaka ha ki thaiñ khappud. Na ka liang u Bah PN Syiem u la kular ban shim khia ïa kane ka jingdawa bad shen ka Executive Council (EC) kan sa khot da ka jingïalang ban ïa kren halor kane ka mat.
title: Bud dien ka UHM halor ka jingdawa ban register ei ïa ki jaka ha ki thaiñ khappud

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Rimuliang Circle, ka la phah ïa ka jingujor sha ki bor pynïaid jong ka West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi halor ka jingshah thombor jong ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Langpih ha ki pulit ka Assam.U Bah Diatasbor Wanniang, uba dei u President of HYC Rimuliang Circle, u la kam ba ki pulit ka Assam man ka por ki ju bat ïa ki kali bad talasi ïa ki kali kiba ïaid lyngba ka surok na Kamphoduli sha Langpih khlem kino kino ki daw, ki ju daiñ kuna ruh ïa ki kali kiba kit mar na ka bynta ka kam khaïi shimet.“Kaba sngewphylla ka long ba myn ha ka 6 tarik Rymphang, uwei u pulit Assam u la pynsangeh ïa ki kali shimet kaba lam shaduh u pud ka jingïania ha kaba ki pulit ka Assam ki la bat noh ïa kine ki kali. Ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ ki la hap ban pan jingïarap na ki pulit ka Meghalaya ban lait na ki,” bynrap u President.Ka HYC ka la kyrpad na ka bor pynïaid jong ka West Khasi Hills District ban leh eiei halor kane bad ban ïakren bad ki nongpynïaid jong ka Kamrup District ha Assam na ka bynta ban ïada ïa kino kino ki jingïakajia ne ki jingjia bad ban lah ban teh lakam ïa ka jingshongsuk shongsaiñ ha ki thaiñ khappud.Ki la dawa ruh na ka Sorkar Jylla ba kan pynstet noh halor ka jingïapynbeit pud hapoh Langpih Sector.
title: Ujor ka HYC halor ka jingshah thombor ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Langpih ha ki pulit ka Assam

content: :U Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency myn ha ka sngi ka 13 tarik u Nohprah ha ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang u Bah I. Lawrynniang BDO ka C&RD Block Mawkyrwat ki la ïoh ban plie paidbah noh ïa kawei ka jaka jngoh kai pyrthei kaba itynnad kaba la tip kum ka Urnar Viewpoint kaba don ha shnong Mawrap South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ïa kane ka Urnar Viewpoint la shna lyngba ka skhim Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act ( MGNREGA) jong u snem 2022-23 ha ka mang tyngka kaba T.9 lak tam ba la pyntrei da ka VEC Mawrap bad kumjuh ruh na ka skhim CMSDF ha ka mang tyngka kaba 2 lak sanphew hajar tyngka bad ïa kane ka Urnar Viewpoint la pynïaid da ka  Sharailang Tourism Cooperative Society LTD Mawrap South West Khasi Hills District.U Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa ki paidbah jong kane ka shnong ba ki don ka mynsiem ban ïa trei lang ban kyntiew ha ki kam jngohkai pyrthei da kaba u la ïa wer ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei na kylleng napoh ka Ri khasi jong ngi bad kumjuh ïa kiba nabar ka jylla  ban wan sakhi hi da la ki jong ki khmat ban wan peit ïa shibun ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei kiba itynnad tam kiba don hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District. Ha kane ka sngi la ïa don ryngkat naduh ki rangbah shnong ki paidbah jong ka thaiñ bad la pynshit pynshngaiñ shuh shuh lyngba da ka jing rwai na u Bah Amnis Shangdiar.
title: Ka Unar Viewpoint kan sa khring ïa shibun ki nongJngohkai pyrthei na ka jing itynnad jong ka: Renikton L. Tongkhar

content: Ka North Garo Hills District Commerce & Industries Centre ka la pynlong ïa ka ‘District Industrial Exhibition 2024’ kaba 2 sngi ha Industrial Estate in Babupara, Mendipathar naduh  ka miet jong ka sngi Palei bad haduh ka miet jong ka sngi Thohdieng. Ha kane ka Exhibition la don haduh 30 tylli ki basa, ha kaba la ïoh ban pyni ïa ka mar ki mata kiba kynthup ïa ki jaiñ ba la thaiñ hi da ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya, ki tiar ba shna hi da ki kti, ki jingbam bapher bapher, kynthup ïa ki ashar bad kiwei kiwei. Ïa kine ki tiar baroh ba la pyni hangne ki dei kiba la shna da ka kynthun Society and Self-Help Group.Ki bor Sorkar ki la iathuh ruh ba ha kane ka Exhibition la ïoh ruh ban pyni kyrpang ïa ki jingdeng, kum ki khoila, ki jingdeng ryndang bad ki sati ba la shna da ki kynthei jong ka jylla. La ïathuh ba kine ki mar ki dei ki ba la shna na ki siej bad ka shken.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u N.R. Marak, uba long u Functional Manager, District Comm. & Ind. Center, NGH, Resubelpara u la ïathuh ba ka don ka jingai jinghikai ha Mendima kumno ban shna ïa ki jingdeng na ki siej bad ki shken, kiba long ki tiar kiba lah ban ïoh na ka mariang. U la ïathuh ba kine ki kynthei kiba la wan sha kane ka jingai jinghikai ki la ban pyndonkam ïa ki siej kiba ki lah ban ïoh na ki lum jong ka Garo bad kane ka jingdie ïa kine ki tiar kan ïarap ban kyntiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki.U la ïathuh ruh ba kane ka jingai jinghikai la pynlong da ka kompani bapaw khmat kaba na Guwahati, Assam. U N.R. Marak ula ïathuh ba kane ka tnad Sorkar kan pynlong ruh ïa ka jingïateh bad ka jylla Maharashtra ha kaba kan thied ïa kine ki jingdeng bashna na ki siej.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka Pesina K Sangma kaba na Chandmari, Tura ka la ïa shim bynta ha kaba pyni paidbah ïa ki jingbam bad umsoh ba ka pynmih bad ai kyrteng  ASAME Food and Beverages.  Ka Pesina ka la long kaba la pyntbit bha ïalade ban shna waiñ bad ka waiñ kaba ka pynmih ka long na ki soh ba lah ban ïoh na Garo. Kumba ka long haduh mynta, ka Pesina ka pynmih ïa ki waiñ na u syiem, u soh mongkarnet, u soh trun bad na ki syntiew kiba kyrpang jong ka Garo bad tip ïa ki kum ki Me.Gong flower ne ki syntiew-dieng kiba lieh bad na kiwei ki jingthung ba lah ban ïoh na ka mariang. Ka la sdang ban pynmih ïa kine ki waiñ naduh ka snem 2002.
title: Pynlong ka NGH District Commerce & Industries Centre ïa ka ‘District Industrial Exhibition 2024’ ha Mendipathar

content: :U kpa jong u Manoranjan, uba dei uwei na ki saw ngut u la shah kem na ka daw jong ka jingdonkti jong u ha ka ban kawang da ki tyndong pynmih tdem ne smoke canister ha ka Lok Sabha myn ha ka 13 tarik, Nohprah, da kaba ong ba u khun jong u un shah phasi lada lap ba u donkti shisha ha katei ka kam.Katba ki briew ba donkti ha kane ka jingjia, la ithuh ïa ki kum u Sagar Sharma bad u D Manoranjan(35), lem bad ka Neelam Devi(42) bad u Amol Shinde(25).U kpa jong u Manoranjan u la ong kumne, ‘Lada u la leh ïa kawei kaba la pynduh ïa ka hok jong ka imlang ka sahlang, um dei hi ruh u khun jong nga. Lada u bakla, ai u mat shah phasi noh. Ngim don bynta eiei ruh em bad kano kano ka seng saiñ pyrthei.’Katba ka jingtohkit halor katei ka jingjia kan dang ïaid shakhmat.Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka jingdap 22 snem jong ka jingshah thombor ki pulit ap pahara ha ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ jong u 2001 ha ki ehrang Pakistan bad kaba lam sha ka jingkhlad jong ki khyndai ngut ki mynsiem briew, kynthup ïa ki pulit ap pahara.
title: Shah kem u kpa jong u Manoranjan halor ka jingdonkti ban thombor da ki tyndong pynmih tdem ha ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ

content: :U Myntri rangbahduh, u Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar, u chairman ka Lok Sabha, u Om Birla, Kharge, Sonia Gandhi, nongïalam jong ka seng Congress ha ka Lok Sabha, u Adhir Ranjan Chowdhury bad u nongïalam jong ka Trinamool Congress, u Derek O’Brien, ki la kynmaw burom ïa ki pulit ba la kyllon ïap ha ka phyllaw jong ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ.Ka President jong ka Imdia, ka Murmu bad u Modi ki la kren shaphang ka jingshlur bad ka jingïai shah jong ki pulit ap pahara, kiba la ïakhun pyrshah ïa katei ka jingshah thombor jong ki ha ki ehrang. U Kharge u la pynpaw ka jingkynmaw bad ka jingsngewnguh jong u, da kaba ong ba ka ri India ka ïeng ïatylli pyrshah ïa ka kam lehnoh.Ha ka jingshah thombor jong katei ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ jong u snem 2001, kaba la leit thombor da ki ehrang Lashkar-e-Taiba bad ki Jaish-e-Mohammed, kaba lam sha ka jingkhlad jong ki khyndai ngut ki briew, lem bad ka jingkyllon ïap ki ehrang ruh kumjuh kiba la shah siat ïap ha kitei ki pulit ap pahara.
title: Kynmaw burom ka Droupadi Murmu, Narendra Modi, Amit Shah, Mallikarjun Kharge bad ka Sonia Gandhi na ka bynta ki pulit ba la khlad ha ka jingshah thombor ha ka Parliament ha u snem 2001

content: U Myntri jong ka Animal Husbandry and Veterinary, u Bah AL Hek, myn ha ka 13 tarik, Nohprah, u la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong u halor ka jingjur ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki masi sha Bangladesh lyngba ka jylla Meghalaya.U la ong ba kum kine ki jait jingjia kiba u la ïoh jingtip halor ka jingkhaïi tuh, ha kaba u Hek u la ong ba ki heh ba dei peit ïa ka tnad veterinary ki dang bteng ban ïatreilang bad ki pulit jong ka Border Security Force (BSF) bad ki pulit jong ka jylla ban teh lakam ïa kum kane ka jait kam khaïi tuh masi.U la ong ba ka tnad ka shimkhia bad phikir ïa ki masi ba la ïoh kurup tad haduh ban da dei ka por lilam.Haba la kylli ba ka tnad ka dang ïoh ne em ïa kum kine ki kaiphod halor ka kam khaïi tuh, u Hek u la ong ba teng teng la ïoh ïa kum kine ki kaiphod bad la phah sha ka tnad.
title: Sngew khia jingmut u Hek halor ka jingjur ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki masi sha Bangladesh kaba ap jingma na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya

content: SHILLONG:Ka tnad pulit pyn ïaid kali (Traffic Police) ha ka jylla mynta myn ha ka 13 tarik Nohprah 2023, ki la ïoh ban pynpra noh ïa ki 181 tylli ki tyndong pynsawa ki ba la ïoh ban kurup na ki ar shaka bad ki kali.Ïa kine ki tyndong pynsawa la ïoh ban pynpra noh ha phyllaw ka Police Reserve Shillong, da ka ba tylliat da ka road roller ha ka jingïadon ryngkat u Superintendent of Police u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger, u S.P (City) u Bah Vivek Syiem, u K Prasad u SP (traffic) bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Superintendent of Police u Bah Sylvester Nongtnger, u la ong ba “na ka liang ka Shillong Traffic Police ka la trei shitom ban kurup ïa kine ki tyndong sawa na ki kali bad ki ar shaka kaba la sdang naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkot haduh mynta ka kynti ha kaba la ïoh ban kynrup haduh  320 tylli ki tyndong pynsawa  bad haba ngi la ïoh ban kem ïa ki ngi la kyntu ïa ki trai kali ba kin wengnoh da lade hi hynrei haba ngi shem ba ki dang pyndonkam hi ïa kane kumta ngi la kurup biang bad mynta haduh 181 tylli ki ba ngin  sa pynjot noh mynta”.U la bynrap “Na ka liang ka STP kan dang bteng ïa kum kane ka jingkynra na ka bynta ban khang lad ban pyndait ïa kum kine ki tiar ki ba long be-aiñ bad na kine ki jingïohkurup la ïoh ruh ban daiñ kuna haduh T.12 Lak tam tang mynta u snem bad ïa kane la aiti sha ka sorkar jylla.”Ha ba kylli u la ïathuh ba bun ki tyndong pynsawa kiba la ïoh ban kurup ki dei na ki ar shakar bad ki don na ki kali ruh, bad ka jingdaiñ kuna ka long T. 5000 kum ba la buh da ka tnad .U la ong ba kane ka dei ka khubor sha ki nongñiah kali ba kim dei ban pyndait ïa kum kine ki tiar ha ki kali jong ki bad dei ban pynneh kumba ka long.U Bah Nongtnger u la ïathuh shuh shuh ba na ka liang ka tnad kan dang ïaid shakhmat ban talasi ïa ki kali bad kumjuh ban sa talasi ruh ïa ki kali ba tah ïa ki ït ïong.Na ka liang u Bah Vivek Syiem u la ïathuh ba ka jingkurup jong ka tnad ïa kine ki tyndong pynsawa ka long hadien ba don ka jingud na ka liang ki paidbah kaba  la pynthud ïa ki khyllung khynnah ki tymmen.“Ki kali bad ki ar shaka kaba ju pyndait ïa ki tyndong pynsawa  ka ju pynmih ïa ki jingsawa ki bym lah ban shah, na ka ta ka daw na ka liang ki nongshong shnong hi kiba la pyntip ïa kane bad kum ka tnad ka shim khia ïa kane” .U la bynrap,“Na ka liang ka tnad ka dang khynra ïa ki briew kiba ñiah  khlem akor ïa ki kali bad ki ar shaka bad ki pulit ka SPT ka ju buh ïa ki na ka bynta ban peitngor ïa ki samla kiba ju mlien ban dih kyiad bad ñiah kali bad ïa ki bym don laisen bad ban the lakam ïa kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih”.
title: Pynpra ka tnad STP ïa ki 181 tylli ki tyndong pynsawa bad dait kuna T.12 lak tam tang hapoh shisnem

content: SHILLONG:U CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la ïathuh ba ha ka dorbar tlang ka Executive Committee (EC) kan wanrah ïa ka Khasi Jaintia Autonomous District Fishery Amendment Bill 2023, bad kane ka long ban pynkup bor ïa ki dorbar shnong na ka bynta ban pynneh ïa ki wah, bad ki um bam um dih kham tam ïa ki doh um.Haba kren sha kilad pathai khubor u Bah Syiem u la ong ba, “kane ka dei ka PrincipalAct jong u snem 1954 hapoh ka KHADC, kaba ai bor ïa ki shnong ban ïatrei lang bad ka Council ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki  wah, ki um bam um dih bad khamtam ïa ki doh um, kane ka ACT 1954 ka ai bor  ban khang lad ïa ki briew ban pynïap ïa ki doh um doh wah”.U la bynrap, “haba wanrah ïa kane ka Bill kan pynjanai shuh shuh ïa ka jingpyntreikam jong ka EC lyngba ki Policy jong ka hapoh kane ka Bill bad kane yn lah ban pynurlong tad yn da la ïoh jingmynjur na u Lat ka jylla”.U la ong shuh shuh, “kane ka Bill kan long ka Bill ka ban wanrah ïa ki jingtreikam kaba janai ban pynneh ïa ka khuid ka suba ha ka mariang”.
title: Ban ïada ïa ki doh um yn wan rah ka KHADC da ka Bill

content: :Ha ka jingïalang jong ka Executive Committee, kaba la long myn ha ka 13 tarik Nohprah 2023, la shim ïa ka rai ban wan rah ïa ki katto katne tylli ki Bill ha ka Dorbar Synrai ka ban sdang ha ka 20 tarik Nohprah 2023, ka ban kynthup ruh ïa ka Administration of Clan Bill ïa kane la pyntip da u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Bah Pyniaid u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingïalang la shim ïa ka rai ban wanrah bad  ban pdiang ïa ka Bill hapoh ka Dorbar Tlang, ka ban long naduh ka 20-22 tarik Nohprah 2023.“Ha kaba ïadei bad ka Clan Bill ha ka Dorbar kyrpang, ka EC ka la  ïoh ban wanrah ïa kane ka Bill hynrei na kiba don ki jingduna ngi la rai ban thaw ïa ka Special Committee ban bishar bniah bad kane ka Draf Clan Bill, bad na ka liang ka Committee ki la dep ban bishar bad ïa kane ka Bill mynta ka kynti” u la ong.U Bah Pyniaid u la ong lada la ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur ban pyntrei kam ïa kane ka Bill kan weng ïa ki jingeh kiba mih ha kiba bun ki kur, namar ka  jingthmu kane ka Bill hi ka long ban ïoh ban tehsong ban pyntylli ïa ki kur bapher bapher khamtam ban pynbeit ryntih ïa ka rukom trei kam ki Seng Kur ha Ri khasi.Haba kylli u la ong ba “Ka jait bynriew Khasi  nalor ka synshar khadar tynrai, ka kur ka jait ruh kadei kawei kaba ngi ju bud na u men barim bad kane ka ai jait kaba ngi bud sha ka kmie ka pher na ki wei ki jaitbynriew.“Ka Khasi Social Custom Lineage Act ka shu batai ban ai Khasi Tribe hynrei ban pyntylli tehsong bad pynjanai ïa ka rukom treikam ki kur bad ïa ka jingithuh ïa ki kur kan long lyngba ka Clan Bill” u la ong.Haba kylli u la ong ruh, “Ïa ki khasi ki ba shim jait kpa kat kum ka Lineage Act, kam don ka jingithuh bad nga kyntu ïa ki nongïalam ka Syngkhong Rympei Thymmai ba kin wan ban ïa kynduh ban pynbeit thymmai ïa kane namar ba kane ka jingbud ban shim jait na u Kpa kan sa tyngkhuh ha ka shongkha sang”.U la bynrap “Ki don la ka jong ka jingsngewthuh, ki ong ai jait kpa kan biang kan bit,  ka jingai jait kmie kan pynsynjor ïa ka jaitbynriew kane ka long kaba bakla namar ka shong ha ka jait ïing namar ka jingbym lah ban tehsong ha ka longïing kaba wanrah ka jingsynjor ka jaitbynriew bad tang ba ai jait kmie kan synjor kam dei” .“Ka jingaijait kpa ka dei kaba be-aiñ namar da ngim ong ruh ka long hi namar kim ïaid kat kum ki jingbud u khasi” u la bynrap.
title: Pynkhreh ka EC ban wanrah ïa ka Administration of Clan Bill ha Dorbar tlang: ka jingai jait kmie kam dei ka daw ba synjor ka jaitbynriew: CEM

content: Ka Myntri sorkar bad ka kyrtong jong ka seng NPP na Shillong parliamentary seat, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingïaid kampeiñ ha u Kyllalyngkot, la shem snem.“Ngan sa pynlong da ka jingïaid kampeiñ ha ka 8 bad 9 tarik, Kyllalyngkot,” ong ka Lyngdoh ha ki lad pathai khubor.Da kaba ong ba ka la pynkhreh na ka bynta ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka LS, katei ka nongthaw aiñ jong ka East Shillong ka la ong, “Haba ka seng ka i biang i bit ïanga ba ngan long ka kyrtong ba kongsan ha ka MP, nga hap ban pynthikna ba nga dei ban leit rung ha man ki thliew ïing briew ha ki sngi ban wan. Ngi don por tang haduh u bnai Ïaïong ban pynkhreh ïalade naba ka ECI shen, kan sa pynbna ïa ki tarik jong ka ilekshon.”“Nga la trei shitom na ka bynta kane ka ileskshon, ba ngan long ka MP jong ka Shillong parliamentary seat jong ka jylla jong ngi. Lada ki paidbah ki i bit ïanga, kin sa vote ïanga. Ngan sa pyrshang shitom na ka liang jong nga,” ong ka Kong Ampareen.Ka la kyntait ruh ban ïathuh bniah bad ong kumne, “ha ka politik, ngi ju buhrieh ïa ki jingthmu jong ngi hynrei ngin sa pynpaw ïa ki ha ka por ba sdang kane ka kampeiñ.”Ka Lyngdoh ka kyrmen ruh ki paidbah kin mynjur ïa ka kum ka kyrtong naba kane ka dei ka sien nyngkong ba kum ka kynthei briew, ka ïoh lad ban long ka kyrtong na ka Shillong parliamentary seat.“Ym pat don kawei ka kynthei ruh ban shah jied na kane ka konstituensi. Lada ki paidbah ki ibit ïanga ban long ka nongai ktien kum ka MP, te nga la pynkhreh ïalade,” ong ka Kong Ampareen.
title: Yn ïaid kampeiñ ka Ampareen naduh u Kyllalyngkot na ka bynta ka ilekshon LS

content: SHILLONG:U CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalang jong ka Executive Committee ka Council kaba la long myn ha ka 13 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pyntrei kam ïa ka Welfare Skim na ka bynta ki nongtrei ka KHADC kiba don 800 ngut.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Pyniaid u la ong ba  na ka liang ka EC kan mang ïa ka jingïarap ban long kum ka Medical Allowance na ka bynta ki nongtrei jong ka KHADC.“La 70 snem ka jingdon jong ka District Council, bad haba phai sha ki jingdonkam ki nongtrei ka Council kam don ka ka jingïarap pisa haba ki pang ki shitom kane ka buh jingeh ïa ki nongtrei jong ka,” u la ong.U la bynrap “Ha ka jingwan ka EC mynta  tang san bnai hangne ngi la ïohi ba don ki nongtrei kiba la hap ban mad ka jingeh haba ki mad ïa ka jingpang jingshitom khamtam ka jingshitom kaba hap ban sumar shabar ka jylla”.U Bah Pynïaid u la ong ba ka District Council, kan ïatrei lang bad ka SBI Bank ka ban ai da ka Special Group Insurance Medical Package  ka ban long ka jingïarap ïa ki nongtrei jong ngi .U la bynrap, “kane ka premium yn bei da ka EC ka KHADC bad ka jingmang kan long kat kum ka rta ki nongtrei, ka ban long T. 3 Lak haduh T. 7 Lak shisnem kat kum ka rta”.
title: Ka Medical Allowance kaba T. 3 Lak haduh T. 7 Lak na ka bynta ki nongtrei ka KHADC: CEM

content: SHILLONG:U CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la pyntip paidbah ba ïa ka Tamasa Mawbynna lane ka Monolith Festival jong ka KHADC yn pynlong ha ka 1 tarik haduh 3 u Rymphang 2024.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Pyniaid u la ong halor ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka tamasa Mawbynna lane ka “Monolith” Festival, hadien ka jingwan jngoh arsien ngi la buh ïa ki tarik hynrei na ka daw bym lah ban kiar la hap ban pynkynriah noh”.U la bynrap ” hynrei  hadien ka jingpynbeit bad ka sorkar jylla hadien ba la ïoh ban ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah  la shim ïa ka rai ban pynlong noh naduh  ka 1 tarik haduh ka 3 tarik Rymphang, 2024 ha Khasi Heritage Village Mawphlang”.
title: Naduh ka 1-3 tarik Rymphang yn pynlong ïa ka “Monolith Festival” ha Mawphlang

content: :U MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency u Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar myn ha ka 13 tarik Nohprah, 2023 ha ryngkat ki katto katne ngut ki rangbah ka thaiñ u la leit jurip hi ïa ka surok ba la pyntrei lyngba ka PMGSY skhim ba la pyntrei da u wei u Contractor uba la sangeh noh ban trei  ïa kane ka surok,Halor kane ka bynta haba ai jingkren ha ki lad phathai khubor u la ong ba na ka liang jong u, u la dep ban ïa kynduh ïa u Myntri jong ka sorkar jylla ba dei peit ïa ka tnad PWD Roads ban kyrpad ïa u ban ïoh mang pisa thymmai (sanction) biang ïa kane ka surok kaba la sah teng ban pynpoi ha ki 6 tylli ki shnong kata ha ka thaiñ Mawkhyrwang shaduh Nongnam  kaba yn duna ïa ka 16 km tam eiei kiba don haduh 6 tylli ki shnong kiba la shem lanot shisha na kadaw ba kim don ïa  ka surok kali da kaba ki hap ban ïaid da ki kjat kumba 3 kynta ei ei.Halor kane ka bynta u la ong ba u Myntri jong ka tnad PWD u la kular ban mang pisa thymmai noh bad ngi dang ap sa ïa ki kot ki sla na ki trai jaka kiba hap ban ïaid lyngba kane ka surok  ha kine ki thaiñ bad ha dien kata na ka liang ki Engineer jong  ka tnad PWD kin sa leh ïa kaba donkam.  Kyrmen skhem ba kane ka surok kan ym don shuh kino kino ki jingpynthud bad ba kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntih ban pynpoi surok noh ha kine ki shnong kiba don ha duh 6 tylli ki shnong.
title: Jurip u Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar ïa ka surok ba la sangeh trei u Contractor na ka skhim PMGSY

content: Ïa ka jingap kaba la slem bha ban pyndep tei ïa ka Ïew Laitumkhrah hapoh ka projek Smart City, la thmu ban pyndep ha u Rymphang 2024.Da kaba pyntip halor kane, hadien ba la dep pynlong ka jingleit jngoh ïa katei ka ïew ha ka 13 tarik, Nohprah, u Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka Urban Affairs, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la ong, “nga kmen ban ïohi ïa ka jingtreikam kaba dang ïaid shaid shaid ha ka rukom kaba biang. Kyrmen ba ngin lah ban pyndep ïa katei ka projek ha kaba kut taïew jong u Rymphang 2024.La dep pynlut ïa katei ka projek haduh T. 38 klur. La synran lang ïa u Dhar da ka Myntri sorkar bad ka nongthaw aiñ jong ka East Shillong, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad kiwei kiwei ki heh sorkar.U la ong ba ka tnad ka kyrmen ba lah ban aiti ïa katei ka building ban pyndep shna ha ka taïew ba nyngkong jong u Lber.“Mar syn pyndep shna, ngin sa leit pat sa kawei ka bynta jong ka projek,” bynrap u Dhar.Haba la kylli ïa u, u Dhar u la ong ba ka por ban pyndep shna ïa katei ka ïew, la pynjari noh na ka daw jong ka jingwan lynshop lynsher ka khlam Covid. Katkum ka jingkren jong u, kumba la ïoh ïa ka kaiphod jong kane ka projek, katei ka ïew ka don haduh 183 tylli ki dukan bad ka jaka pynïeng kali kaba lah ban ïeng ki kali haduh 100 tylli.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka la kmen ba u Symbud Myntri u la tuh ïa ka por jong u ban leit jngoh ïa kane ka projek da kaba bynrap “Ngi la hun ka mynsiem halor ka jingtreikam ïa kane ka projek”.Ha ka jingkren halor kane ka projek ka ban sa long kaei kaba ki paidbah jong ka Laitumkhrah kin sah jingkynmaw ha ki snem ban wan, ha kaba ka la ong kumne, “Kane ka long ka burom jong nga na ka bynta i pa jong nga, i Bah Peter Garnette Marbaniang iba la khlad noh. La don arphew hynñiew snem ba im don lang shuh bad ngi, ngi wanrah ïa kane ka projek na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka Laitumkhrah.”Katkum ka jingkren jong ka, kane ka building kan pynbiang lut na ka bynta ki nongdie dukan, ka jaka pynïeng kali bad kan pynsuk ïa ki nongthied jingthied.Ka Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka jingmyntoi nyngkong kan dei na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka Laitumkhrah bad kane ka long kaei kaei kaba kim lah ban ïakren ïasuk.“Ngi dei ban pynkup bor ïa ki spah ngut ki samla kiba don ka kam lajong bad ka jingmut jingpyrkhat ban seng kam lajong naba baroh ki lah ban don bynta ha ka kam lajong. Ngin sa don da ka rukom treikam ban khmih bniah kaba yn dei katkum ka jingdonkam. Ngin sa peit ïa kaei kaba ngin lah ban leh ban pyndonkam ban pynbiang baroh,” ong ka Ampareen.Shuh shuh, katei ka nongthaw aiñ na East Shillong ka la ong ba ka bynta ba ar jong katei ka projek ka dang ïar shuh shuh naba ki dang peit sa ïa ka jingdon bynta jong ka jaka jong ka dorbar.“Ïa mynta kaba ka dorbar ka don mar khap bad katei ka Ïew, hynrei ngi dang peit ban wanrah na ka bynta jong ki ïa ka jingtei ba biang ha ka imlang ka sahlang kaban kynthup ïa ka ophis jong ka dorbar, ophis na ka bynta ki seng samla, ophis na ka bynta ki seng longkmie, ka jaka na ka bynta ka jingïalang ne meeting, ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynïeng kali bad kan sa biang lut kumne. Ngin ïatreilang bad ka sorkar,” ong ka Kong Ampareen.Haba la kylli ïa ka Lyngdoh, ka la ong ba ki paidbah kin klet ïa ki por ba jynjar kaba ki mad halor ka jingpyndep ïa kane ka projek.“Kane ka projek kan dei kaba biang tam eh na ka bynta ka shnong Laitumkhrah bad ka nongbah Shillong bad nga kyrmen ba kan sa dei ka jaka kaba ngin lah ban pynïoh ïa ka jingkmen bad ka lad pynïoh kam pynïoh jam. Yn sa jia kiei kiei kiba bha ha kane ka Ïew,” bynrap ka Ampareen.
title: Yn pyndep ban shna ïa ka Ïew Laitumkhrah ha u Rymphang 2024

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma uba ha ka 13 tarik, Nohprah, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la kut jingmut ban pynïar ïa ka kam pynroi hapoh ka jylla bad ban nym don bynta ha “kam pynïar ba shu jied.” Ha ka jingleit plie jong u ïa ka Nongkseh Indoor Stadium ha Nongkseh kaba hap hapoh ka Mylliem konstituensi, u Sangma u la ban jur ba ka jingdonkam jong ka jingban shimkhia ïa man ki paidbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya, watla ki don ki jingïasnoh ki kam seng saiñ hima.Katba na ka Mylliem konstituensi, la mihkhmat da u MLA ka liang pyrshah na ka seng Congress, u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, hynrei u Sangma u la ong ba shisien ba la shah jied, yn nym don kano kano ka jingpynïapher hapdeng ki konstituensi synshar bad ki konstituensi liang pyrshah. U la pynkynmaw da kaba buh da u maw nongrim na ka bynta kane ka lympung madan ïalehkai ne ka indoor stadium la don ar snem shiteng mynta bad u la pynpaw ka jingkmen ha ka jingleit plie jong u ïa ka.U Sangma u la ong ba katei ka indoor stadium kam dei ka building hynrei ka long kum ka jingnoh synñiang na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki samla ka jylla Meghalaya. U la kyrpad ïa ki samla ba kin pyndonkam na ka bynta ki prokram ai jinghikai, ki jingïalehkai, ki jingput jingtem bad ha ka ban pynïoh kam pynïoh jam. Une u Myntri rangbah u la ban jur halor ka jingkyrshan na ka liang ka sorkar ïa ki nongseng kam lajong lyngba ki prokram kum ka CM Elevate.Da kaba pynbna shaphang ka jingbei tyngka kaba la kot haduh T. 2.1 klur na ka bynta ka madan ïalehkai phutbol ha Nongkseh, u Sangma u la kren shaphang ka jingpeit ïa ka jingtyrwa ban pynkiew ïa ka health center hapoh kane ka jaka. U la pyntip ruh shaphang ka jingïakop halor ka jingwanrah ïa ka skhim pynïoh um kaba kot haduh T. 15 klur.Halor ka jingkren shaphang ka jingjop jong ka sorkar, u Sangma u la ong ba haduh T. 40,000 klur la dep pynlut ha ka ban tei ïa ki building ha ki san snem ba la dep. Haba pynïanujor ïa kane bad ka bai lut bai sep hashwa jong u snem 2018, u la ong ba la ïohi ïa ka jingïar ba kiew stet stet, da kaba kdew kti hangne ba ka jingtreikam ba stet stet ba la shimti da ka sorkar MDA. U Sangma u la kren ruh shaphang ka jingdonkam ban noh synñiang na ka bynta ki samla, da kaba pynbna ïa ki ba ka long ka atiar ba heh bad ka jingbiang ki tiar ki tar ha Meghalaya.“Ngi la pynlut kumba 7000-8000 klur man la u snem ha ki kam pynroi, te lada phi pynlut 7000-8000 klur ha ki projek pynroi man la u snem bad lada ngi kheiñ, ka la kot haduh T. 40,000 klur ka pisa kaba ngi la dep pynlut ha ki san snem ba la dep ha kaba ïadei bad ki kam pynroi bapher bapher ha ka ïoh ka kot bad ki projek kiba dang ïaid hapoh kane ka jylla jong ngi,” ong u Sangma.“Hashwa jong u 2018 ka la kot sha ka 2500-3000 klur bad mynta ka la kot haduh 7000-8000 klur man u snem. T. 2500-3000 klur ha ki khatsan snem ba la dep ka la poi haduh T. 40,000 klur kaba mut ba kaei kaba ngi la dep pynlut ha kine ki san snem ba la dep ka long kaei kaba ngi la dep pynlut ha ki arphew san snem hashwa ka jingwan synshar ka sorkar MDA. Ngam shym la ong ba ki la pynlut duna bad ngi la pynlut kham bun, hynrei ka jingpynïanujor ka long kaba donkam ban ïathuh ha phi ïa ka rukom pynïar ha ka kam pynroi kaba dang ïaid mynta,” bynrap u Sangma.
title: Plie u Myntri rangbah ïa ka Nongkseh Indoor Stadium

content: U Addition Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills District, u Bah Peter Passah u la ïathuh ba ka jingïakren hapdeng ki bor synshar district bad ki dkhot ka North East Petroleum Masdor Union ka la long kaba seisoh bad ki dkhot jong ka tei ka kynhun ki la sngap ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad mynjur ban bteng noh biang ïa ka jingwanwah ïa ka petrol sha Meghalaya. Ïa kane ka jingïakren la pyllong ha Circuit House ha Ri Bhoi District bad ïa shim bynta da u Additional Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills, u Bah Peter Passah bad u Additional deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi, u Bah M.B. Tongper bad ki dkhot jong ka Petroleum Association of Meghalaya ïa kaba la ïalam da u President, u Bah Kenney C. Khriam.Ïa kane ka jingïakynduh lang la pyllong ban ïa poi sha ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut lang ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingsangeh wan rah petrol sha Meghalaya. Ha kane ka jingïakren, na ka liang jong ki dkhot jong ka North East Petroleum Mazdor Union ki la dawa ka ba Sorkar Meghalaya ka dei ban pynlait noh ïa kito kiba la shah kem ha ki pulit ka Meghalaya, kiba long ki dkhot jong ka khlem kano kano ka jingbuh kyndon, wat la ki la donkti ha katei ka jingleh bakla kaba ka ïa dei bad petrol.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor hadien jong katei ka jingïakynduh lang, u Bah Peter Passah, u la ïathuh ba ka jingpynpoi petrol biang sha Meghalaya kan sa bteng biang. Hynrei, ha kaba ïa dei bad ka jingdawa ban pynlait ïa kito kiba la shah kem, U Bah Peter Passah u la ong ba na ka liang jong ka Sorkar kan ym lah ban leh eiei halor kane bad ka shong sa tang ha ka Ïing Bishar ba kan ai ïa ka rai mano uba pynkheiñ aiñ bad uno u bym shym la pynkheiñ aiñ.
title: Yn pynpoi biang ïa ka petrol sha Meghalaya: Peter Passah

content: :Kawei ka longkmie ka la mynsaw jur bad khyndiat ka la don ka jingjulor ïa ka ïing ka sem jong ka hadien ba ka kynhun jong ki hati khlaw ki la leit rung hapoh ka phyllaw ïing jong ka ha South West Garo Hills district kaba hap ha ka khappud Bangladesh.Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka step ha ka shnong Kawahagra.Katkum ka jingkren jong ki heh nongtrei, la ong ba la don ki hati khlaw haduh 7-8 tylli kiba la ïaid lyngba na Bangladesh sha India kumba 5 baje mynstep ha ka sngi palei ha Kamarpara.Kumba 7 baje mynstep, ki hati ki la leit rung hapoh ka shnong Kawahagra ha ka jingleit wad bam wad dih jong ki bad ki la leit thombor ha ka ïingsah jong ka Wajing Momin.Katba ka khun jong ka, ka Faidila Momin kaba dang pynkhreh bam hapoh ka ïing shet ja ka la mynsaw ha katei ka jingshah thombor bad la rah noh ïa ki sha Ampati civil hospital na ka bynta ka jingsumar.“Katkum ka jingïoh jingtip na ki nongshong shnong, katei ka kynhun hati kaba don haduh 7 8 tylli ki dang don ha katei ka jaka bad ka kynhun jong ka tnad wildlife lem bad ki pulit ki la leit sha katei ka jaka,” pyntip u Deputy Commissioner, u R P Marak.Lem bad ka jingtyrkhong ka mariang, la don da ka kynhun jong ki hati kiba la ïaid lyngba hapdeng ka Bangladesh bad India, lyngba ka Ri Lum Garo, ha ka jingwad bam jong ki bad ha ka jingkulmar jingmut ki la thombor ïa ki briew. Mynta u snem, la don haduh saw ngut ki mynsiem briew kiba la shah thombor ha ki hati ha ka Ri Lum Garo, kynthup ïa u shipai BSF uba la duh noh ïa la ka jingim.
title: Mynsaw ka longkmie ha ka jingshah thombor ha u hati ha Garo Hills

content: U Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District  Mawkyrwat u Bah T.Lyngwa u la kyntu bad maham ï a baroh ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka District ba kin sngewbha ban peitngor bad sumar bha lada wan  ka erlang thari  ne eriong ki ba lah ban wanrah ki jingpynmynsaw ne pynkhyllem kum ïa ki ing ki sem, ki Bording electric, ki dieng ki siej bad kiwei kiwei de.Namar kata u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin husiar bad peit bha ïa la  ki jong ki ïing jong ki, ba kin long kiba skhem lada don kino ki dak ki shin ba ka ïing jong ki ki la sator ki dei ban pynskhem ïa ki, kum juh ruh  ïa ki  jingkhang kin sngewbha ban shna pynbha bad pynskhem ïa ki, kumjuh ruh la da don ki dieng ne ki  tnad dieng kiba la pyut ne ïap stai noh  ki dei ban pom bad khet noh kum ïa kita ki tnad dieng kiba jan ïa ka ïing jong ki, weng noh ruh ïa ki tin sop ïing kiba la sator bad kiwei de ki jingtap kiba sting ba ka lyer la lah ban rong ïa ki, ki bym skhem shuh bad kiwei de kiba wanrah ki jingmynsaw lada ka lyer ba jur kan rong ïa ki kan wanrah ka jingmynsaw ïa kiwei de.Shuh shuh la buh ruh ki jingmaham ban peit thuh  lada don ki ïing ba la sator ha ki marjan ïing jong ki. Ha ka por ba wan ka eriong ki briew kim dei ban mih shabar ki dei ban shongkhop hapoh ïing ïoh wanrah kano kano  ka jing mynsaw ne ka jingjia kaba sngewsih. Ki briew ki dei ban pynlip ïa ka bording bad ym dei ban mih shabar ïoh wan kino kino ki jingpynmynsaw.
title: Kyntu u DC ka SWKHD ïa ki paidbah ban husiar lada wan ka erïong

content: Ka jingïalang jong ka International Water Conclave 2024 kaba la sdang mynta ka sngi ka 9 tarik Rymphang ha Shillong bad ka ban kut lashai ka sngi ka 10 tarik Rymphang.Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïoh ban ïashim bynta da u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma bad kiwei ki Myntri kum ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh, u Bah A.L. Hek, u Comingone Ymbon bad kiwei ki heh Sorkar.Ha kane ka sngi, la don ruh ka jingsam ïa ki prize sha ki nongjop ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la pynlong ha ka por mynstep shuwa ban pynlong ïa kane ka jingïalang. Ka jingpynlong ïa kane ka jinglehkai ka long ban pashat khubor sha ka pyrthei halor ka jingdonkam ban pyndonkam ïa ki kor ki bor Techno-social, managerial, ki jingsdang ïa ki kam lajong ban jop ïa ki jingeh bapher bapher ba ka pyrthei ka ïakynduh bad ka jinglong jingman jong ka um.Ka phang ba kongsan ha kane ka jingïalang ka long ban ïakren ka  long shaphang kumno ban pyndonkam ïa ka um, kumno ban tyngkai ïa ka um, kumno ban pynlang bad ban pynkhuid biang ïa ka um khnang ban yn lah ban pyndonkam biang ïa ka, ka jingpynjakhlia ïa ka um, bad kum ki nongshong shnong ki dei ban nang ban pyndonkam ïa ka um.Kiba la jop ha kane ka jingïamareh thong ha ka thup shimet ka dei ka Team Spirit kaba la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam nongjop ba nyngkong. Ka Snehalt24 ka la ïoh ïa ka nam nongjop ba-ar bad ka  Dani.ce21 ka la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan nongjop ba-lai.Ha ka thup Institutional Category, ka Jerrasawamynathan ka la rah ïa ka nam nongjop ba nyngkong bad bud pat sa ka Meghalaya Institute of Governance ha ka kyrdan ba-ar bad ka GreenUmtung ka la wan ba-lai.Ka prize ha ka kyrdan Individual ka long T. 1,00,000 tynga na ka bynta ka 1st Prize, T. 75,000 na ka bynta ka 2nd prize bad T. 50,000 na ka bynta ka 3rd prize. Ha ka Institutional Entry ka long T. 2,00,000 na ka bynta ka 1st prize, T. 1,50,000 na ka bynta ka 2nd prize bad T. 1,00,000 na ka bynta ka 3rd prize.
title: Sdang ka jingïalang jong ka International Water Conclave 2024 ha Shillong

content: Ka Federation of Khasi-Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP), South West Khasi Hills District myn ha ka 7 tarik jong u bnai Rymphang 2024 ki la hiar jurip ïa ka Surok 2-Lane kaba la pyntrei da ka Company NHIDCL na ka jingkieng Borbasing Ranikor sha Alikwareng kaba don 3 km tam ei ei kila pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ba dei peit ruh ïa ka tnat PWD (Roads), u Bah Prestone Tynsong na bynta ka jingshimkhia jong u halor ka jingdawa jong ka seng ban pynheh sha ka surok bah 2-Lane  na  Ranikor-Nongjri.U Bah Kenes Nonglait, Federation of Khasi-Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP), South West Khasi Hills District u la ong ba ka seng hi ka sngewnguh ïa u Bah Prestone uba la lum jingïalang haduh 3-4 sien ïa ki ophisar ka tnat PWD bad NHIDCL na ka bynta ban pynheh ïa kane ka bynta jong kane ka surok bah, bad shen kan sa leit ïakynduh ruh ïa u na ka bynta ban ïakren halor kane ka mat.Ka FKJGP ka la maham ruh ba kan ïai peitngor halor ka jingshna ïa kane ka surok, bad lada ka Sorkar Jylla kam lah ban shna da ka surok bah 2-Lane ïa ka kaba ka Company NHIDCL ka la shna pynduna tang da ka Single-lane kata na Jingkieng Borbasing kaba don 3 km tang shaduh sha lad Alikwareng namar kata ka seng hi kam salia, hynrei kan ïaid beit da ka PIL hapoh Ïingbishar na ka bynta ka hok jong ki paidbah. Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kin ïai ap  haduh ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai, la yn pyntreikam ne em ïa ka kular, ong u Bah Kenesjune L. Nonglait President FKJGP, South West Khasi ha ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang u Bah Belsi Kharbani General Secretary bad kiwei kiwei de ki dkhot jong ka seng.
title: Halor ka jingkular u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ïa ka jingshimkhia halor ka surok Ranikor-Nongjri dang buddien ka FKJGP jong ka SWKHD

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma myn ha ka sngi thohdieng, u la pynbna ba ka sorkar jylla ka la pynmih da ka tender na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki footpath bad ki nala ha Ïewduh.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u Sangma u la ai khublei ïa ka NEC na ka bynta ka jingbei tyngka haduh T. 10 klur ha ka ban shna pynthymmai biang ïa ka Ïewduh.“Ngi la kmen ban pynbna ba ka sorkar jylla ka la thmu ïa kane ka jingpyntreikam bad haduh T. 5 klur kaba dei ka tender ba la dep pynmih na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki ‘nala’ bad footpath ha Ïewduh. Ka la sdang bei tyngka ka NEC, lada la sdang ka jingtreikam, kan long ka jingïarap na ka bynta jong ngi,” ong u Sangma.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan sa ïoh ïa ka jingnoh synñiang na ka jingïarap ba kyrpang halor ka jingbei tyngka baheh na ka bynta ka jingshna biang ïa ka Ïewduh ba la rim ha kane ka jylla.“La dep pynmih ïa ka tender ba nyngkong shwa. Ngi dei ban phah sdang trei noh ha kane ka taïew ban wan ne shiphew sngi kumba la ai por bad kyrmenba ka jingshna ïa ki footpath bad ki ‘nala’, yn sa sdang ha Ïewduh. Katba ïoh jingkyrshan na ka NEC, ngin kmen ban ïoh pyndonkam ruh,” bynrap u Sangma.
title: Pynbna u Myntri rangbah ïa ka tender na ka bynta ban shna ïa ki footpath bad nala ha Iewduh

content: Kum shibynta ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka tamasa kaba pyni paidbah ïa ka jingriewspah ka riti dustur u khun ka Bri u Hynniewtrep ka “Monolith Festival”, ka KHADC myn ha ka 9 tarik Rymphang 2024 ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai bad kumjuh ïa ka kali ka ban leit ban pynbna halor kane ka Tamasa ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha District Council.Ïa kane ka jingrwai jong ka Monolith Festival bad ïa ka Media Campaign Vehicle la pyllait paidbah da u Deputy CEM ka KHADC u Bah PN Syiem hynnin ka sngi Thohdieng ha ka jngïadon lang ki Executive Member, kynthup ïa u Bah Gigur Myrthong, Bah Victor Ranee, Bah Teibor Pathaw, Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, Kong Macdalyn Sawkmie Malong, Bah Rangkynsai Kharbuki, Bah Fanton Lakadong ki nongtrei bad kiwei kiwei kiba la shah khot kyrpang.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang halor kane ka Tamasa Mawbynna lane ka Monolith Festival u bah PN Syiem u la ong ba ka tamasa kan long ka tamasa kaba pyni ïa ka jingriewspah u khun ka bri u Hynniewtrep ha ka jinglong tynrai, ka rwai ka siaw, ka tem ka put, ka bam bad ka riam tynrai.Ka Monolith Festival kan long na ka bynta lai sngi ka ban sdang ha ka 22 tarik bad kut ha ka 24 tarik u Rymphang 2024, ïa kane ka tamasa yn pynlong da ka jingïatreilang ka KHADC ryngkat  bad ka tnad Tourism jong ka sorkar jylla.
title: Ïaid shait shait ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka Monolith Festival: Pyllait ka KHADC ïa ka jingrwai bad ka kali ban pynbna paidbah

content: Ka KSU Phlangdiloiñ Area Unit ka la ïoh ban pynkup burom ïa ki 14 ngut ki  Samla pule jong ki saw tylli ki shnong jong ka thaiñ Phlangdiloiñ katta Shnong Rngimawpat, Rangkhiat, Pyndensynnia bad ka shnong Phlangdiloiñ kiba la wan sha khmat ha ki jingpule bad ha ki kyrdan bapher bapher naduh kiba pass ïa ka  matric shaneng kaba la pynlong hapoh ka ïing Dorbar Shnong Phlangdiloiñ.Ha kane ka sngi la ïa don lang ki Nongïalam ka KSU South West Khasi Hills District naduh U Samla Plosbor Kharjahrin (Environment & Cultural Secretary KSU SWKHD) U Samla Everwell Robin Thongni (Office Secretary KSU SWKHD) u Samla spaidarwell Thongni (Asst. General Secretary KSU Umdohlun Circle) u Syiem khynnah ka Hima Langrin, ki riew rangbah ka Shnong Phlangdiloiñ, ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah, ki Nongïalam jong ka KSU Umdohlun Circle ki Nongïalam bad ki dkhot ka KSU Phlangdiloiñ Area Unit.
title: Pynkup burom ka KSU ïa ki samla kiba la leh bha ha ki eksam

content: :Ka khubor ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïada na ki kam sniew ha ka khappud India bad Bangladesh, ha kaba ki shipai Border Security Force ki la pyrshang ban teh lakam ïa ki kam sniew, kynthup ïa ka kam khaïi tuh bad kiwei kiwei ki kam beaiñ ha une u khappud, Ha kaba ïadei bad ki jaka khappud ha West Jaintia Hills District ki bym don jingker sainar, ki jur bha ki kam khaïi tuh, kynthup ïa ka jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki masi ne mar bha bad kiwei kiwei ki mar kum u kwai, dohkha tyrkhong, biri, sikret, slasha bad kiwei kiwei.Katba ha kaba ïadei bad ki kaiphod ba la ïohpdiang na ki shipai BSF, la ong ba ki nongkhaïi tuh bad kiwei kiwei ki briew bym dei na kane ka jylla, ki la ïalum lang shi kat dei hajan u khappud ha ka por mynmiet na ka bynta ban khaïi ïa ki mar na India sha Bangladesh.“Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, nga kren ïa kine baroh ba kum kine ki kam sniew kam beaiñ, dei ban ïada khnang ban wanrah ka jingshong shngaiñ bad jingsuk ha ka District, jylla bad ka ri baroh kawei.”“Mynta, kumta, manga, u B.S. Sohliya, IAS, District Magistrate, West Jaintia Hills District, Jowai ha ka jingshimti ïa ka kam kumba la ïoh jinghukum ba hap hapoh ka kyndon 144 Cr. P.C. nga buh kyndon kine harum”:-1. Ka jingleit jong ki paidbah ha u khappud lem bad ka jingthmu ban ïaid lyngba na une u khappud jong ka Bangladesh ne ban wan ha u pud u sam jong ka India.2. Ka jingleit iuh kjat jong uno uno u briew ne da ki kali ha ki jaka paidbah ba hap hapoh 5 Kilometar jong une u khappud naduh ka por 6.00 baje janmiet haduh ka 5 baje mynstep.3. Ka jingbym ïoh jingbit ne ka jingleit khlem don kyndon jong ki san ngut ki briew ne bun ngut bad ka jingrah tiar pyn mynsaw ne kiwei kiwei ki tiar kiba lah ban pyndonkam kum ki tiar pyn mynsaw kynthup ïa ki dieng bad ki maw ha kane ka jaka ba jngai kumba 5 kilometar na u khappud Indo Bangladesh.4. Ka jingkhaïi beaiñ. ki kam sniew, jingkhaïi tuh ïa ki masi ne mar bha, kwai, tympew, dohkha tyrkhong, biri, ki sikret, slasha bad kiwei kiwei.5. Ka jingpynlong ïa ki ïew Haat, ïew, die dukan hapdeng ka por 8.00 baje janmiet haduh 6 baje mynstep ba hap hapoh 1 Kilometar na ka khappud Indo Bangladesh.Ha ka jingpeit halor kane ka mat ba kyrkieh, la dep phah da kane ka order bad yn sa pyntreikam noh mar mar bad tad haduh da ïoh da kiwei pat ki jinghukum ha ka por ban wan. Nga pynmih ïa kane ka order naduh ka 9 tarik, Rymphang 2024.
title: Pynmih kyndon u District Magistrate ha ka ban teh lakam ïa ka kam sniew ha ka khappud India bad Bangladesh

content: Ha ka jiangïalang ki kynhun Myntri kaba la long myn ha ka 9 tarik Rymphang 2024, ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pdiang ïa ka jingpynkylla ïa ka Meghalaya Building Bye Laws 2021, na ka bynta ban pynkhlaiñ ïa ka roi ka par ha ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba kane ka jngpynkylla ka long kat kum ka kyndon jong ka sorkar pdeng, na ka bynta ban wanrah ïa ka jingshngaiñ ïa ki jingtei ban wanrah ïa ka jingpyndonkam hok ki trai jaka ïa ka jaka kaba rit bad kiwei kiwei.Ka kynhun myntri ka la pdiang ruh ïa ka Shillong Urban Mobility Policy 2024 kat kum ka jingbtah na ka sorkar pdeng ban pynbiang ka rukom ïaid ki kali bad ki briew, ka jaka pynïeng kali bad kiwei kiwei.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba kine ki jingpynkylla bad ki policy la shim na ka bynta ba ka jylla kan lah ban ïoh ïa ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta ka Special Assistance halor ka Capital Investment na ka bynta ka Urban Areas Scheme.Ka Sorkar India ka la mang T. 15000 klur na ka skim kat kum ki kyndon bad ki policy. Ngi la buh ha ka jingtyrwa na ka bynta T. 619 klur ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad na ka ne T. 500 klur la ïoh ka jingmynjur bad ka sorkar ka dang khmih lynti ïa ka T. 100 klur ka ban ïoh pdiang hadien ki jingpynkylla ïa ka policy. Ha ka jingïalang ka kynhun Myntri ka la pdiang ruh ïa ka rai ban pynduh ïa ka Meghalaya Engineering (Public Works Department) Service Rules, 1995 bad wanrah da ka “The Meghalaya Engineering (Public Works Department) Service Rules, 2024.”
title: Ka rai jong ka kynhun Myntri ka sorkar MDA

content: :U Myntri ka thoh ka pule, u Rakkam A. Sangma ryngkat bad u Myntri ki kam pynmih bording, u A.T. Mondol ki la sam ïa ki 192 tylli ki shithi thung kam ïa ki nonghikai Lower Primary (LP) School jong ka Dadenggre Sub-Division ha ka jingïalang Teacher’s Initiative Conclave ba la pyllong ha District Auditorium ha Tura. Ha kane ka prokram la ïashim bynta da u James P K Sangma, uba long u Shongknor jong ka MIDC, u Arbinstone Marak, uba long u MLA jong ka Selsella Constituency, Ambrose Marak, uba long u Secretary jong ka Education department, u Jagdish Chelani, uba long u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Garo Hills, Tura bad kiwei. Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la ong ba ka Teacher’s Initiative Conclave kam dei tang na ka bynta ban sam ïa ki shithi thung kam ïa ki nonghikai.Hynrei, kham tam eh ban pynsngew sha ki paidbah ba ka Sorkar ka jingïohi jngai bad kum juh ruh na ka bynta ki nonghikai kiba dang shu ïoh ïa ki shithi tungkam jong ki. U Myntri Rakkam A. Sangma u la kyntu ruh ïa ki nonghikai ba kin aiti met bad mynsiem ïa kam hikai ka jong ki. U la ong ruh ba ka Sorkar kan ym shah ïa ki nonghikai ba kin phah hikai ha kiwei pat ha ka jaka jong ki. U Myntri ka thoh ka pule u la ong ruh ba ki samla pule jong ka jylla ki dei ban long kiba la pynkhreh namar ba ka Sorkar mynta ka la sdang ban pyntrei kam ïa ki kot jong ka NCERT.U Myntri ki kam pynmih bording, u A.T. Mondol u la ïaroh ïa ka jingïohi jngai jong ka Sorkar bad kyntu ruh ïa ki nonghikai ha ki jaka nongkyndong ba kin aiti met bad mynsiem na ka bynta ka kam hikai. Ha katei ka sngi, u Shongknor jongka MIDC, u James P.K. Sangma u la ïaroh ïa kane ka jingsam ïa ki shithi thungkam ïa ki nonghikai bad ong ruh ba kane kan ïarap ban pynïoh ïa ka jingai ïa ka jinghikai kaba bha tam na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki khynnak skul.U District School Education Officer, u R T K Sangma, u SDSEO ka Dadenggre, u  E.D. Sangma, bad kiwei ki heh Sorkar jong ka Education Department ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka prokram.
title: Sam shithi thung kam u Rakkam A. Sangma ïa ki nonghikai Lower Primary

content: :Kum ka jingrakhe bad ka jingpynshlur ïa ka jingtrei bad jingseng ïa ki kam la jong, ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka Sngi Thohdieng, ka la sam ïa ki Cheque sha ki nongseng kam lajong bad kum juh ruh ïa kito ki kynhun kiba ïatrei lang kum ka kynhun bad ruh ïa kiwei ki seng jong ki shong ki thaw ha kylleng ka jylla hapoh jong ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka CM-ELEVATE program.U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewburom halor ka jinglah jong ka Sorkar banpyntrei kam ïa ka CM-Elevate Program ym tang ban kyntiew ïa ka jingtrei bad ka jingseng ïa ki kam la jong, hynrei ba kan kyntiew ruh ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ka jylla.Lyngba kane ka prokram, ka Sorkar ka don ka jingthmu ban ïarap pisa ïa ki 20,000 ngut ki trei bad seng ïaki kam la jong hapoh ka jylla. Kane ka jingïarap pisa kan long hapdeng 30 na ka 100 bad 75 na ka 100 jong ka jingpynlut ha kaba pyntrei kam ïa ki project bad kane kan long na ka bynta san snem. Ka jinglut jong kane kan kot sha ka 300 klur tyngka. U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba kane ka long ruh ka lad jingïoh kam ïoh jam jong ki samla jong ka jylla.
title: Sam Cheque u Myntri Rangbah ïa ki nongseng kam la jong

content: Ka Shillong ka la nang kiew ha ka jingpynmih Umsoh bad Waiñ myn ha ka sngi Thohdieng da ka jingplie ïa ka Microbrewery bad ai kyrteng ka “Yeastern Civilization,’ kaba don ha Laitumkhrah, kaba long ka shnong kiba bun ba ïaid ba ïeng bad ba leit ba wan hangne ha sor Shillong.Ha kane ka prokram la ïashim bynta da u Myntri Rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma, u Myntri ka tnad Excise, u Kyrmen Shylla bad kiwei kiwei.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ba u sngewktah shibun ka mynsiem ïa ka jingplie ïa katei ka Microbrewery, kaba pyni shai kdar ïa ka mynsiem ba trei bad ban seng la ki kam ki jam la jong hapdeng jong ki samla. Ka jingdon jong kiba kum kine ki jaka ban die ïa Umsoh bad ka Waiñ kan long ruh ïa ka jingpyni ïa ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei sha Meghalaya ba ki don kiba kum kine ki jingdih kiba don la ka jong ka jingmad kaba kham pher ban ïa kiwei. Don bun ki jaka pynmih Umsoh bad pynmih Waiñ ha pyrthei. Ka jingdon jong ka “Yeastern Civilization” kan ai mynsiem ruh ïa kiwei.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Myntri ka tnad Excise, u Bah Kyrmen Shylla u la ïaroh ïa ka Yeastern Civilization bad ka jingaiti met bad mynsiem jong ka bad mynta ka la kylla long ruh ka lad ai kam ai jam ruh ïa kiwei.
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka Microbrewery “Yeastern Civilization”

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma myn ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, u la plie ïa ka MeghFarm Processing Hub bad ka Tikrikilla PRIME Hub ha Khamari, Tikrikilla, West Garo Hills, ha ka jingdon lang u Myntri ka tnad bording, u A T Mondal, Ka MP jong ka Lok Sabha, ka Agatha K Sangma, MLA, Raksamgre, Limison Sangma, MLA, Salamnapara, Ian Botham K Sangma bad u MLA, Selsella, Arbinstone Marak.Haba kren shaphang katei ka prokram, u Myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka jingpyn leh noh ei ïa ki bam, ka la lam sha ka jingduh nong ïa ki nongrep ha kylleng ka Ri Lum Garo. “Ka MeghFarm Processing Hub lem bad ka jinglah ban pynbiang naduh 80 haduh 100 ton, kan sa pynthikna ba ka jingmih na ki jingrep, la pynneh pynsah ha ka rukom ba dei, ha kaba ki jingrep kin sa im sah bad lah ban pyndonkam biang sa shisien bad kane kan sa pynmyntoi ha ka ban pynïoh nong ha ïew ha hat,” ong u Conrad bad pyntip ba ïa kane ka projek, la bei tyngka haduh T. 14.5 klur.U Myntri rangbah u la pyntip ba lyngba ka jingkyrshan jong ki riewpawkhmat, ka sorkar ka thmu ban pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa ki nongseng kam lajong. “Kum ka jingïoh jingkyrshan bad ka jinghikai ïa ki nongrep bad ki nongseng kam lajong, yn sa pynïoh ha ka PRIME Hubs,” ong u Conrad. U la pyntip ba ka jingtei ïa ka MeghFarm ha kane ka jaka, kan sa don ka jingkylla ha ka jingim jong ki 10,000 ngut ki nongrep.“Ka MeghFarm lyngba ka jingtreikam jong ka, nalor jong ka jingtreikam bad kiwei kiwei ki bynta ban pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa ki nongseng kam lajong, kan sa long kum ka ophis ba ïakren shaphang ka pule puthi, ka jaka ai jinghikai, ka ophis na ka bynta jong ki samla ba seng kam lajong, ka ophis tourism bad construction,” ong u Conrad. U la bynrap ba baroh kine ki bynta ba hap hapoh kawei ka tnum, kan sa pynïoh ïa ka jingdonkam jong ka imlang ka sahlang ha ka ban pynïar ïa ka kam bad k jingpyn kup bor ha ki.U la ong ba ka jingbuh ïa ki jhur hapoh ki jingbuh jingsat(cold storage) ban im ki jhur ki jhep bad ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka rukom ai jinghikai halor ki jingthung ha ki jaka nongkyndong, kan pynïoh ïa ki nongrep ka lad ban ïoh jingmyntoi ïa ki na kine ki jingrep jong ki da kaba pynduna ban leh noh ei ki jhur ki jhep. “Kine ki jingpyntreikam lem bad ki teknoloji ba biang kin ïaid lyngba ki bording jong ki solar ne solar power ha kaba kan sa ïarap ha baroh ki liang,” ong u Conrad.“Ngi la thmu ban buh da ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka 50 MeghFarm bad ka PRIME Hubs ha baroh ki Block ha Meghalaya, kaba long ka jingpyn kynmaw ïa ka jingkylla ka rukom rep riang hapoh ka jylla”, bynrap u Conrad bad ong ba ki soh trun, sohphan bad ki soh niamtra kiba mih bha ha Ri Lum Garo kin pynïoh nong naba ki long ki soh ba ïaid ïew bha ha ka ïew die lang. U la bynrap da kaba ong ba ka jingithuh na ka jingjop bad ka jingtrei shitom jong kiba ïatreilang ha ka jylla, ka sorkar kan sa buh ban pyntreikam da ki 300 mini processing bad ki mini cold storage ha kylleng ka jylla. ‘Kane kan sa pynïoh jingmyntoi ïa ka imlang ka sahlang jong ki ïatreilang kiba trei bha ha ki kam jong ki,” ong u Conrad.Ha ka por ba don kane ka prokram, u Myntri rangbah bad kiwei kiwei ki riewpawkhmat ki la ai khusnam ïa ki Cooperative ba hap hapoh ka Tikrikilla block na ka bynta ka jingtrei bha jong ki ha ka Cooperative Movement and Farm Activities. Hapoh ka Community Investment Fund, ka pisa ba kot haduh T. 1.23 klur, la aiti sha ki hynriew tylli ki Village Organisations.
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka Megh Farm Processing Unit bad ka Tikrikilla Prime Hub

content: Uwei na ki samla ka thaiñ Ri Bhoi District uba la ju mih sha khmat ban kren na ka bynta ka khia ka shon bad ka jingeh ha ka imlang ka sahlang jong ka thaiñ bad ka jylla hi baroh kawei, haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor mynta ka sngi ha Nongpoh, u la kyntu jur ïa ka sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban buh noh ïa ki jaka pule kiba biang ban pynsuk na ka bynta ki samla pule ka thaiñ. Ïa une u samla la tip kyrteng u Albert Maring uba dei na ka shnong Umdap.Utei u samla u la ban jur ba kumba long mynta, bun na ki samla pule ka jylla ki hap ban shaniah ha ki jaka pule shabar ka jylla ban pyntbit ha ki kyrdan ba kham shalor bad kane u la ong ba ka la buh jingeh shikatdei ïa ki paidbah khamtam kito kiba wan na ki longïing ba duna ha ka ïoh ka kot.U la ong ruh ba bunsien ki kmie ki kpa haba ki phah ïa la ki khun ki kti shabar ban leit pule da ka jingkyrmen ba kin wanrah ïa ka nam ka burom ïa ka ïing ka sem, pynban ki wanphai da ka synduk metiap da kaba ai nuska ïa ki katto katne ki jingjia kiba la ngat ïa ki samla ka Ri Bhoi bad ka jylla hi ruh, kaba la wanrah pynban ïa ka jngsngewsih kthang ïa ka ïing ka sem bad ka shnong ka thaw.Une u samla u la ong ruh ba ka por ka la dei ïa ka sorkar ba kan shim khia ban buh noh ïa ki jaka pule kiba biang kum ha ka laiñ Engineering, Architect, Skill Development bad kiwei kiwei de ki Professional Course na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki samla pule ka thaiñ da kaba bynrap ba ka jingdon jong kum kine ki jaka pule kan pynduna ïa ka jinglut jingsep, kan wanrah jingshngaiñ ïa ki samla pule, kan wanrah ïa ka ïoh kam ïoh jam bad ban kyntiew ruh ïa ka shnong ka thaw hi baroh kawei.
title: Ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban buh noh ïa ki jaka pule kiba biang na ka bynta ki samla pule ka thaiñ: Albert Maring

content: :Ka seng FKJGP-Khliehriat Circle hapoh ka jingïalam u president u Bah Michal Chyrmang ryngkat ka jingdon lang ka FKJGP-Jaintia Zone bad Ialam da u Bah Marhok kynti Marboh Vice President bad ka FKJGP-East Jaintia hills mynta ka sngi ngi la wan ban khynra trading Licence, labour Licence ha ki thaiñ Ladrymbai bad Dkhiah west, ‘ngi na ka liang ka seng na ka por sha ka por ngi la dep buh jingthoh sha ka JHADC ban khynra trading Licence ïa ki bar jylla hapoh East Jaintia namar ba kadei ka kamram jong ka council ban leh hynrei ka council kam juh leh eiei dei halor ka jing bym leh ka council ba ngi na ka liang ka seng ngim bamse ban leh hi da mangi.Ha ka jingkynra jong ka seng mynta ka sngi ngi ïohi shibun ki bar jylla kiba don trading Licence hynrei kham bun hi na ki dukan kim don pat ïa ka Labour Licence haba ïa dei bad ki teer counter pat kiba bun ki don ïa ki Licence na ka liang ka seng ba ïa kito ki dukan ki bym biang ki kot ki sla ka seng ka la ai por hapoh ar taïew ban pynbiang bad hadien ka ar taïew ka seng kan sa wan khynra biang bad lada ka seng ka lap biang ba kim biang ka seng kan sa leh ïa kaba donkam bad kaba pyn sngewsih bad sngewkhia ïa ka seng ngi shem ruh ba ka council ka ai licence pathar ïa ki bar jylla khlem da pyrkhat ïa ki trai jylla bad ha ka jing peit jong ngi lada wan da mano mano ruh, tip na Pakistan ne na bangladesh ne, ka JHADC ka ai thurmur beit ïa ki Licence khaïi kane ka jingleh ka JHADC ngi lah ban ong ba ka pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon ka council hi namarba katkum ka aiñ section 10(2)(iv) jong ka United Khasi Jaintia hills District (trading by none-tribals ) Regulations,1954 ka khanglad ban ai trading Licence ïa ki bar jylla lada don ki trai Ri trai muluk kiba lah ban trei ïa ka juh ka kam katkum katei ka aiñ ka JHADC kam lah ban ai Licence khaïi sha u bar jylla lada ïa kita ki jaitkam kiba lah ban leh hi da ki trai jylla peit nuksa kum kine ki dukan die jaiñ, die juti, dukan die waidong bad dukan khapshñiuh kum kine ki jait kam balei ki trai jylla kim lah seh ban trei lada ha kane ka rukom ngi lah ban ong ha ka jaka ba ka council kan ïada ïa ki trai Ri trai muluk hynrei ka ïada pynban ïa ki bar jylla da kaba ai trading Licence bad ngi na ka liang jong ka seng ngi kyntu ïa ka District council ban sangeh noh ka ai trading Licence sha ki bar jylla khnang ban im ki paradoh para snam sa shisien ka seng kan kren da kaba shai kane kam dei ka jingsdang lane ka jingkut hynrei ngin ïai bteng ban khynra sha kiwei ki thaiñ ruh ha kine ki sngi ban wan.Khadduh ka seng ka ai khublei naduh ka police department, ki Media ki ba ïadon lang bad ngi ha katei ka jing khynra bad khamtam ïa ki Dorbar Shnong Ladrymbai kiba ai ka jing ïatreilang bad seng ha katei ka sngi.
title: Khynra trading Licence, labour Licence bad teer Licence ka FKJGP ha Ladrymbai bad Dkhiah west, hapoh artaiew ai por ka seng ban pynbiang kot

content: Ka Amlarem SCC ka la ioh ia ka kabu ban rung sha ka phainal jong ka lympung Super Division ka East Jaiñtia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA) ia kaba la tip ruh kum ka 3rd Kyrmen Shylla Contribution Trop lyngba ka jingpynliem ia ka Jarain SCC da 1-0.ka jingiakhun phainal kan long ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 2 baje janmiet.
title: Super Division EJHDFA: Yn ïaknieh nam lahduh hapdeng ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah bad Amlarem SCC

content: U nongïalam jong ka seng BJP, u Bah A L Hek myn ha ka sngi palei u la ong ba ka rai jong ka seng ba lam khmat da ki nongïalam ka central kin sa pyntip ba lehse un ai jingmut ban ïakhun ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha.Ha ka jingjubab jong u ïa katei ka jingkylli halor ka jingïakhun jong u ha ka ilekshon LS, u Hek u la ong ba u shu ai jingmut ba ka seng kan ai lad ïa ki kynthei ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura parliamentary seat.“Hangne kam don kano kano ka jingran dien. Ka long tang ka jingai jingmut ban pynthikna ba ka seng kan ïoh da ki kyrtong ba biang,” ong utei u nongthaw aiñ ba la dep jop haduh san sien na Pynthorumkhrah sha ki nongthoh kot khubor katba u la bynrap “Ka rai halor (ba lehse ban ïakhun ne ym ïakhun) ka shong ha ki nongïalam ba ha khlieh. Lada ki nongïalam ba ha khlieh ki ong u A, B ne C (ban ïakhun), ngi hap ban trei shitom ban pynjop na ka seng BJP.”U Hek uba long u nongthaw aiñ na Pynthorumkhrah u la ong ba u la ai ka jingtyrwa ba kyrpang ba ka bha na ka bynta ka seng BJP lada ka ai lad ïa ki kynthei ba long ki kyrtong na kitei ki ar tylli ki parliamentary seat. “Ka jingai jingmut jong nga ka hap halor ka 33 per cent reservation na ka bynta ki kynthei,” bynrap u Hek.Shuh shuh, u Hek u la ong ba ka jingtyrwa jong u kam don eiei ruh em bad kiwei pat ki seng saiñ hima sima haba kylli ba lada ka jingai jingmut ban pynïakhun da ki kynthei ka long ka rai jong ka seng ba synshar, ka National People’s Party (NPP), kaba la dep pynbna ïa ki kyrtong ba dei ki kynthei, kynthup ïa ka Ampareen Lyngdoh (Myntri sorkar) bad ka Agatha K Sangma (sitting MP) na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura parliamentary seat kumjuh.“Kam don bynta eiei ruh em bad kiwei pat ki seng saiñ hima sima. Ngim don eiei ban leh, naba ka seng BJP ka dei ka ka seng saiñ hima sima bad ka pyrshang shitom ban jop ha ki ilekshon,” ong u Hek.Sa kawei pat ka jingkylli, ha kaba u Hek u la ong ba u ïohi tang ha ka kot khubor ba ka Kong Fenela Lyngdoh Nonglait, ka bym dei na ka dkhot na ka seng BJP, ka la pan tiket na ka seng na ka bynta ka Shillong seat.“Nga la dep ïoh pule ha ka kot khubor hynrei ngam pat ïakren halor kane ka mat bad u president ka jylla,” ong u Hek katba u la bynrap ba ka jingkwah ïa ki tiket ka long ba nyngkong ki dei ban ai kyrteng shwa ïalade kum ki dkhot jong ka seng BJP.Ïa mynta, u Hek u la kyrpad ïa ka seng BJP ba kan pynbna ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta baroh ar tylli ki seat saw bnai hashwa ka ilekshon LS.“Nga mynjur ïa kaei kaba phi ong. Lada ka BJP ka dang rai ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura LS seat, kim dei ban ap tad haduh ka minit ba khatduh; ki dei ban pynbna ïa ki kyrtong hashwa ka saw bnai jong ka ilekshon,” ong u Hek.“Nga hap ban kyrpad ïa u presideng ka jylla ban khot da ka jingïalang bad ka shim ïa ka rai, ngi hap ban phah da ka minute jong ka jingïalang sha ka Centre ba ngi la ïakhun na ka Shillong bad Tura, ngi dei ban pynbna ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong hashwa ka ilekshon, ym ha ka minit ba khatduh,” bynrap u Hek.
title: Thrang u Hek ban pynïakhun da ki kynthei na ka seng jong u

content: :Ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health & Medical Sciences (NEIGRIHMS), myn ha ka 14 tarik Nohprah 2023, ka la plie paidbah ïa ka Catheterization Laboratory jong ka tnad Cardiology kaba la buh ïa ki tiar sumar kat kum ka juk mynta na ka bynta ban sumar kham janai ïa ki nongpang Klongsnam.Kane ka Catlab kaba thymmai kan kynthup ïa ki tiar sumar kum ka Infra Cardiac Echocardiography bad ka 3D Electrophysiological Mapping na ka bynta ban kham pynjanai ïa ka rukom sumar ha ka ba ïadei bad ka jingpang Klongsnam bad kane ka jaka sumar kan sdang trei kam hadien ka 10 sngi naduh ba la plie ïa ka.Lyngba ka jingdon kine ki tiar thymmai ha kane ka Hospital kan ïarap ïa ki doctor ban ai ka jingsumar ïa kiba bun ki jingpang Klongsnam. Ki nongpang kin ïoh jingmyntoi ha ki jingsumar ki bapher bapher kat kum ka juk mynta.Ka HoD Cardiology ha ryngkat ka jingsynran u Director of NEIGRIHMS ki la trei shitom ban wanrah ïa kiba bun ki jingsumar bad ki Administrative SOPs ki policy na ka bynta ki nongpang ban ïoh ïa ka jingsumar kaba binag bad kaba lah ban kot dor.Ha kane ka jingïalang la wan ban shim bynta da u Director ka NEIGRIHMS u Prof (Dr) Nalin Mehta, u Senior Prof Animesh Mishra ka HoD Cardiology Department, u Prof. Manish Kapoor bad u Dr Amit Malvia.
title: Ïoh ka NEIGRIHMS Hospital ïa ka Catlab kaba biang ki tiar sumar na ka bynta ki nongpang Klongsnam

content: U Deputy Commissioner (Supply), East Jaintia Hills District, Khliehriat, mynta ka 12 tarik Rymphang 2024, u la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna paidbah halor ka dor thymmai jong ka  S.K Oil. Kane ka dor thymmai ka dei kaba la pynkiew  naduh u bnai Kyllalyngkot 2024 .Kane ka dor ba thymmai ka long na ki Wholesale bad ka dor die ha Sonapur Oil Agency la buh T. 72.50/- bad T. 78.20/-, ka Wholesale bad ka dor die ha Jaintia Service Station la buh T. 72.30/- bad T. 74.20/-  bad ka Wholesale bad ka dor die ha Sutnga Sub-Depot la buh T. 76.30/- bad T. 74.40/-.Ka dor die na ka bynta ki Center jong ki Fair Price Shop (FPS) kiba jngai ïa ka 5KM na ka jaka die Wholesale hapoh Sonapur Oil Agency yn buh da ka committee ka ban khmih bniah. Kane ka hukum kan treikam noh mardor tad ynda la pynbeit da kum wei pat.
title: Pynbna u DC ka EJHD ïa ka dor thymmai ka SK Oil

content: U MDC ka BJP na Tura, u Bernard N Marak myn ha ka sngi u Blei u la kyrpad ha u Myntri ka pule ka puthi, u Rakkam A Sangma halor ka jingeh ba la mad da ki khynnah pule jong ka Rongara-Siju konstituensi.Ha ka shithi sha u Sangma, u Marak u la ong ba u la leit kynduh ïa une ka konstituensi jong une u Myntri myn shem taïew bad lap bun ki jingduna ha ki katto katne ki skul sorkar, lem bad ka jingduna kum ki tnum, ka jingbym biang ki jaka leit um pynjhieh kum ka jingkhuid jingsuba bad ki jingpynbiang ha ka um bam um dih. Shuh shuh, don sa kiwei ki tiar donkam kum ki jingkhang, blackboard bad ki ben kim don, lem bad ki katto katne ki skul kiba la shah pyndonkam ha ka ban pynrieh ïa ki blang.U Marak u la pyntip ruh ba ki khynnah pule jong kane ka jaka ki la ujor shaphang ka jingeh kaba ki la mad ha ka por slap naba ki jingkieng kiba ki ju ïaid ban ïoh jam na shiliang sha shiliang, ki la shah kie noh ha u slap ha ka por ba jur slap ba jur ha u snem 2022.“Ym lah ban shna ïa kine ki jingkieng tad haduh mynta kiba la pynlam jingeh ïa ki khynnah skul jong kane ka jaka ha ka por slap,” ong u Marak katba dang bynrap kumne “Ki paidbah ki la kam ba kum kine ki jingleh kiar, kan sa lam sha ka jingduh noh ka jingim jong ki khynnah skul kiba la hap ban jngi na kylleng ki wah da kaba pynap jingma ïa ka jingim jong ki na ka bynta ban poi sha skul ne hap pep skul ha ki aïom slap.”Da kaba ong ba ka pule puthi ha ki jaka nongkyndong ka la biang lut, ha kaba u Marak u la ong, “Nga kwah ban kdew hangne ba watla ai bam ja sngi ïa ki khynnah skul lyngba ka PM Poshan midday meal, ka long ka bym da biang ha ki katto katne ki skul kaba long ka daw bah ba dei ban shimkhia.”“Nga kwah ban kyrpad ïaphi ba phin peit bha bad leh ïa kaba donkam khnang ban lah ban pynbiang ïa ka jingdonkam jong ki khynnah skul kumjuh rih ki nonghikai. Nga kwah ban kyrpad ïaphi ba phi dei ban pyllait noh ïa ka tulop jong ki nonghikai ha ka por ba biang. Kane kan pynmyntoi ïa ki khynnah skul jong kane ka jylla bad ki skul sorkar kin biang lut nadong shadong,” bynrap u Marak.Shuh, shuh, une u MDC u la kynnoh ba ka la don ka jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ka scholarship jong ki khynnah skul, kaba ym pat shym la peit haduh mynta bad u la kyrpad ïa une u Myntri ba un pynlong da ka committee ban shimkhia halor kane ka mat bad ban ïarap ïa ki khynnah skul ba kin ïoh kloi ïa ka scholarship katba lah naba ka jingïoh jingïarap lyngba kane ka scholarship, ka dei na ka bynta ki khynnah skul ba duk kaba long kum ka jingïarap na ka bynta jong ki ba kin ïoh pynlut ha ka por ba ki leit college.“Ha kaba khatduh, nga la hap ban pyntip ba ïa ka kontrak ban shon ïa ki kot pule ba thymmai, la aiti sha kawei pat ka party ka bym shym la don la ka jong ka ophis pynmih ïa ki kot. Lada kane ka dei shisha, ngan jin da la kwah ban sngap ïa ka jingkren shai jong phi da kaba thoh, ka kam pule puthi kam dei ka kam ban ïakren ïasuk hadien ha bud,” bynrap u Marak.
title: Kyrpad u MDC ka BJP ïa u Myntri ka pule puthi ba un sngap ïa ka jingeh jong ki skul nongkyndong

content: Ka Ri-Bhoi Tourism and Environmental Development Forum kawei na ki seng kaba ju kyntiew ïa ki kam jngohkai pyrthei ha Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi ka la pynlong da ka jingïaid kjat sha Pnah Kyndeng kaba dei ka Law Kyntang kaba don ruh ka Krem Lymbit ha ka shnong Pahamskhen ban dang kyntiew shuh shuh ïa katei ka jaka kum kawei na ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei ha Ri-Bhoi District khamtam ka jingdon jong ka mei mariang bad ki sawdong sawkun kaba itynnad.Ïa katei ka jingïaid kjat la sdang naduh ka shnong Pahambir haka jingjngai kumba 5 km eiei ba la snohkti lang ruh ha ka jingïaid kjat da u Bah Bansynsharlang Khongwir u Tourist Officer ka Ri-Bhoi District, ki nongïalam ka RBTEDF naduh u Bah Plielad Tiewsoh Chairman, ki nongthoh khubor, ki nongïalam shnong ryngkat ki paidbah na kylleng ki jaka.Na ka liang u Bah Bansynsharlang Khongwir District Tourist Officer ka Ri-Bhoi kum uwei na ki nongshim bynta ha katei ka jingïaid kjat bad katto katne ki riew paidbah ki la pynpaw ba katei ka jingïaid kjat ka long shisha kaba sngewtynnad ban poi sha kum katei ka jaka kaba ka mei mariang ka la ai sha u bynriew ha katei ka thaiñ.Hadien ka jingïaid kjat la ïa shim bynta lang ban leit jngoh ïa ka Krem Lambit bad ha ka jingïadon lang da u Myntri ka tnad ka kam jngohkai pyrthei u Bah Paul Lyngdoh kum u kongsan bad  u MLA ka Nongpoh u Bah Mayralborn Syiem,  haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki nongkren ki la kyntu ïa ki paidbah ba kin long kiba jemnud khnang ba ki nongwan shang pyrthei kin shngaiñ bad kin juh haba ki wan kai sha ki jaka jong ki bad kan long ruh ka lad kamai ja kpoh khamtam hakum kane ka pyrthei kyrduh kam  khamtam ka jingdon ruh ka Law Kyntang kaba ki paidbah ki dang pynneh pynsah haduh mynta bad nalor ka jingdon jong ka Krem Lymbit ha katei ka jaka kaba lah ban khring ïa ki nongjngohkai pyrthei bad kum u ophisar ba dei peit ïaka tnad jngohkai pyrthei ha Ri-Bhoi u la kyrpad ruh sha ki paidbah ba ki dei ban pynneh pynsah ïa katei ka jaka bad ban pynduna ka jingshna ïa ki ïing building kiba lah ban pynsniewdur ïa katei ka jaka.
title: Haduh 5 km ïaid kjat ki paidbah bad ka RBTEDF ban poi sha Krem Lymbit  kawei na ki jaka ba itynnad ha Ri-Bhoi

content: Uwei u Ophisar ka Veterinary Dispensary ha Muktapur, Amlarem myn ha ka 11 tarik Rymphang u la kynnoh ba u la shah byrngem byrsit  ha ki shipai  ha ka por ba u dang thmu ban  leit khwai.Katkum ka jingïathuh utei u ophisar u la ong, “katba u dang ïaid lynti ban leit khwai kynsan kynsan ki BSF kiba dei ki ba ju ithuh ithaw bha, bad u ki la bat bad tohkit ïa u, kumba leh ïa ki khar Bangladesh.”U la bynrap ba, “nga ruh ha kata ka por ha ka jingsngewsih nga kum kylli ïa ki haba ïa ki khar Bangla kiba ju wan hangne man ka por balei kim ju tohkit kim ju bat ïa ki, ki masi ruh ki don hangne ha khmat balei ïa ki kim kem.”U la ïathuh shuh shuh ba ha kum kane ka por nga la shim ïa ka mobile bad sdang ban shondur bad ban ring video ïa ki masi  bad ïa kine ki shipai BSF bad haba kine ki shipai ki la ïohi ba  nga ring video  ki knieh kynsan ïa ka mobile  bad ki la ong ban tan beit ïa nga  sha Zero Point  bad ban siat ïap beit ïa nga bad ki la ong ruh ba  ïa kito ki masi ruh sa leit kem hi ma me ngim treh kem.”“Ha kum kata ka por na ka liang jong nga, nga la  pyrta briew ban ïarap ïa nga bad ha kata ka jingpyrta jong u, ar ngut ki longkmie kiba khwai dohkha bad  kiba dang ïabam ja  haba ki la ïoh sngew ïa kane ka jingpyrta jong nga ki la wan ban ïarap ban ïakren bad ki BSF” u la ong.U la ïathuh ruh ba don bun ki briew kiba ïoh sngew ïa ka jingpyrta jong u hynrei imat ki sheptieng kim wan ban ïarap.Une u ophisar u la kynnoh ruh ba  kine ki BSF, ym tang ba ki byrngem byrsit ïa u hynrei ki la thmu sa ban pynlaw sa ïa ka patlun bad pynlaw lyngkhuid ïa u, da ka ba ong ba u  dei ban panmap na ki da kaba nguh ha ki kjat jong ki”.Na ka liang u ophisar u ka kynnoh ruh ba namar ba u la kyntait ïa ka jingong jong ki ban map da kaba nguh ha kjat jong ki, kumta ki la knieh ïa ka mobile jong u, bad ïaleh beit ban tan ïa u sha  Zero Point.Une u ophisar u la ïathuh ba kine ki BSF kiba byrngem byrsit ïa u, ki dei uwei u ba la  tip kyrteng kum u Rajendar Kumar bad  uwei pat um shym la kynmaw kyrteng.
title: Shah byrngem byrsit u ophisar ka Veterinary Dispensary ka Muktapur ha ki BSF

content: :Ka Ri-Bhoi District Badminton Association (RBDBA) ka la pynkhreh ban pynlong da ka jingpyni sap jong ki samla ba don jingmut ban ïalehkai badminton lem bad ka jingïalehkai ban wan jong ka “Open to All Badminton Tournament.” Kane ka jingïalehkai ka ban sdang naduh ka 14 haduh 17 tarik, Rymphang 2024, ha State Sports Council Meghalaya Indoor Stadium, Umlyngkdait, Nongpoh, ka dei ka tamasa ba thmu ban pynïoh ïa ka rynsan na ka bynta ki nongïalehkai ba pawnam.Ha kaba pynbna shaphang kane sha ki lad pathai khubor, u President jong ka RBDBA, u Bah Franky Lyngdoh, ha ka jingsynran lang jong u Secretary, u Bah Anant Swet bad kiwei ki dkhot, ki la ban jur halor kane ka jingmut jong kane ka tournament ha ka ban pynsan ïa ka sap jong ki samla ba don sap. kumban shu pynkynmaw, kane ka tournament ka la weng noh ïa ki nongïakhun ba pawnam jong ka jylla, da kaba kren shaphang ka jingkut jingmut ban ai lad na ka bynta jong ki nongïalehkai ba thrang. Lem bad ka jingkut noh ka jing registar ïa ki nongïakhun ha ka 14 tarik, Rymphang, kane ka tournament kan sa don haduh lai bynta ne categories: Men’s Singles, Men’s Doubles, bad Veteran Doubles (ha ka rta kaba 40 bad shaneng). Ka RBDBA ka la kner kti ban khot sngewbha ïa ki samla bad kiwei ki riew rangbah ba kin ïashim bynta ryntih lang.Shuh shuh, ki nongpynïaid jong kane ka tournament ki pynshlur ïa ki samla ba ïakhun ba ki donkam jaka sah, khamtam kito kiba wan na jngai, na ka bynta ban pyntip sha ki ïa ka jingïoh jingïarap jong ki ha ka ban ïoh jaka sah.
title: Pynlong ka Ri-Bhoi District Badminton Association ïa ka “Open to All Tournament”

content: Ka Meghalaya Cancer Conclave 2024, ba la ai kyrteng da ka “Close the Care Gap”, ka la sdang mynta ka sngi ha Shillong. La pynlong da ka sorkar jylla, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Apollo Telemedicine Networking Foundation (ATNF), ha kaba ïa katei ka conclave, la pynïaid da ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, Myntri ka koit ka khiah bad Family Welfare.Da kaba wanrah lang ïa ki doktor ba sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong, stad wad bniah, ki nonghikai, NGO, ki nongïalam jong ki karkhana, ki nongtrei sorkar bad ki lad pathai khubor, ha katei ka jingïalang la thmu ban pynbna shaphang ki jingeh bad ban pynmih ka buit ba thymmai ha ka ban sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong.U Principal Secretary jong ka Health and Family Welfare, u Sampath Kumar, IAS, u la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam na ka bynta ka buit ha ka ban sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong. U la kren halor ka jingdonkam ban shimkhia ïa kane ka ban sa pynmyntoi hadien ha bud. “Ryngkat lang, ngi ïohi jngai ïa ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba man ki briew ki lah ban ïoh jingmut shaphang ka jingsumar ïa ka jingpang bampong bad kane ka jingïalang kan long ka maw jam ba kongsan,” ong u Sampath.U Ram Kumar S, IAS, Secretary jong ka Health and Family Welfare Department, u la ban jur halor ka jingthmu ban pynbiang ïa ki tiar ki tar ban sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong bad ka jingmih jong ka. “Ka jingpang bampong ka dei ka jingpang ba shun bad ban teh lakam ïa kane, donkam ka jingïatreilang ba ryntih. Ka jingïohi jngai jong ngi halor ka system ban sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong ka ïahap bad ka jingthmu jong ka Meghalaya Cancer Conclave 2024. Kane ka jingïatreilang jong ka jingtrei shitom ka pynpaw ïa ka jingkut jingmut jong ngi ha ka ban pynmih ïa ka teknoloji, jingpyntreikam ba thymmai bad kiwei kiwei kiba lah ban pyni ïa ka jingtrei bha ha ka ban pynwandur ïa ka rukom sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong,” ong u Ram Kumar.U Prem Anand, Chief Business Officer jong ka Apollo Telemedicine Networking Foundation, u la pynpaw ka jingsngew sarong ha ka ban kyrshan ïa kane ka jingsdang. U la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam jong ka jingïatreilang ha ka ban pynwandur ïa ka rukom sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong.Ki mat ba kongsan ha kane ka jingïalang kan kynthup ïa ka jingtip kloi shaphang ka jingpang bampong, ka jingtip shaphang ka rukom sumar, ka jingtip shaphang ka jingpang bampong, ki teknoloji ban ïohi shaphang kane ka jingpang ne technology-enabled screening, ka jingsumar ba don bad ka jingkyrshan, jingwad bniah bad ka jinglait im na kane ka jingpang.Ka Meghalaya Cancer Conclave 2024 ka dei ka projek ba pynmih hapoh ka ‘Meg Can Care’ ha u 2023 da u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, kaba long ka jingthaba jong ka jingthmu ha ka ban lap kloi ïa kane ka jingshitom.Katba ki riewpawkhmat kiba kynthup ïa kiba la shemphang ha kane ka jingïalang, ki dei ki heh nongtrei na ka sorkar jylla jong ka Meghalaya bad ka Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Government of India.Kane ka jingïalang ka dei ka maw jam halor ka jingïaid shakhmat ha ka ban pynbiang ïa ka rukom sumar ïa ka jingpang bampong ha kane ka jylla, da kaba ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ka jingïatreilang ryngkat bad ka buit ban ïa sam lang ha kane ka jingthmu ban pynthymmai ïa ka rukom sumar ïa kane ka jingpang ha kylleng ka jylla.
title: Sdang ka Meghalaya Cancer Conclave ’24 mynta ka sngi da kaba pynkynduh lang ïa ki nongshem ba tbit sha ka “Close Care Gap”

content: :Ha ka step jong ka 12 tarik Rymphang 2024 , ka la mih ka jingïania hapdeng ki nong die madan ha Viewpoint bad ki nongïalam shnong ka shnong Mawïongrim. Kane ka jingïania ka long hadien ba ki katto katne ngut ki nongdie madan ki la wan ban plie ïa la ka dukan ha kane ka jaka.Katba na ka liang ka Dorbar shnong ka shnong Mawïongrim ki la khang namar ba na ka liang ka Dorbar shnong Mawïong rim ka la shim ïa ka rai ban ym shah shuh ban die dukan ïano ïano ruh ha kane ka jaka namar ba ka jingdon kine ki dukan ki pynjaboh ïa kane ka jaka jngohkai kaba paw.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki nongshong dukan ha kane ka jaka haba ki ïakren bad u Rangbah Shnong ka Shnong Mawïongrim u Bah Sorbar L Nongpiur, ki la pynpaw ba ka jingkhang ka shnong ïa ki ban die jingdie ha kane ka jaka ka la buh ïa ki ha ka jingeh kaba khraw namar ba kim shem la ïoh shuh ban bylla naduh ba ki la shah pynsangeh.Ki la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingbym sngew ïa hap ïa ka rai ka Dorbar shnong ba ïa ki briew ba die jingdie mynshwa ha kane ka jaka ki ba dei na bar ka shnong Mawïongrim yn shu pynkhalai nusip, halor kane na ka liang u Rangbah shnong u la ong ba kin sa shim ka rai da ka Dorbar shnong.Haba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor U Bah Sorbar u la kam ba ka jingdon ki nongdie madan ka la pynjaboh palat ïa kane ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei kaba don ha kane ka shnong, bad dei namar kane ba na ka liang ka Meghalaya High Court ka la pynmih syndon da ka hukum ban nym shah shuh ban buh dukan ne die jingdie ha kane ka jaka.U Bah Sorbar u la kynnoh ruh ba kine ki nongdie madan ki la wan hi ban die dukan ha kane ka jaka khlem da kynjoh ktien eiei ïa ka Dorbar Shnong, bad lada ki wan sha ka Dorbar shnong kum u Rangbah Shnong u kloi ban shim ki lad lynti ban wad jaka shawei ban ai lad ïa ki ba shong die jingdie.U la bynrap ruh ba kum ba ka long mynta hi na ka liang ka shnong kan ym shah ïano ïano ruh ba kin wan ban die dukan ha kane ka jaka kat ba ym pat pynmih da kumwei pat ka jingbthah.
title: Halor ban shongdukan ha Viewpoint: ïa nia ki nongdie madan bad ki nongïalam shnong ka Mawïongrim
