content: Ha ka jingleit jngoh u Myntri jong ka Sorkar Jylla ba dei peit ïa ki kam jngohkai pyrthei u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka jingïasynran lang u MLA ka Nongpoh u Bah Mayralborn Syiem bad u Director ka tnad Tourism u Bah Cyril Diengdoh bad u ophisar ka tnad Tourism Ri Bhoi District ïa kawei ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei kaba la tip kyrteng u Lum Wortoh kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Raid Nongpoh, na ka liang jong ki nongïalam raid ki don ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa kane ka jaka kum kawei na ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei.Haba ai jingkren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Pual Lyngdoh u la ong ba u dap da ka jingsngew hun haba wan jngoh ïa u ne u lum u ba lah ban ïohi lut ïa ka Nongpoh lem bad kiwei kiwei ki shnong kiba para marjan. U la ong ruh, hadien ka jingwan jngoh ïa kane ka jaka, la ïohi ba kane ka jaka ka don hok ban ïoh ïa ka jingithuh na ka sorkar jylla ha kaba ïadei ban kyntiew ïa ka kam jngohkai ha ka District bad ha ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ka tnad Tourism kin sa leh ïa ka survey na ka bynta ban pynurlong ïa ka jingthmu jong ki nongïalam ka Raid Nongpoh.Na ka liang ki nongïalam jong ka Dorbar Raid Nongpoh ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkmen kaba khraw halor ka jingshimkhia jong u Myntri ka tnad jngohkai pyrthei, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba la wan ban jurip da lade ïa kane ka jaka jngohkai pyrthei kaba dei ruh ka jaka leh niam jong ka Raid Nongpoh.Haba kren halor utei u lum, u Bah Linus Lyngdoh, uba dei u Lyngdoh jong ka Raid Nongpoh u la ïathuh ba une u lum u don ruh ïa ka khana ka pateng kaba bun ha kaba ki kmie ki kpa tymmen mynshwa ki shong ki sah halor une u lum bad hadien ka jingnang roi ki la hiar shapoh u ne u lum ha kaba la mih ka kyrteng Nongpoh bad kiwei kiwei ki khana ki pateng bad na ka liang jong ka Raid ki da angnud eh ba ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka tnad Tourism kan theh ïa ki lad jingïarap ban kyntiew ïa kane ka jaka kum kawei na ki jaka jngohkai pyrthei kaba paw hapoh Ri-Bhoi District.
title: Ha ka jingïuh kjat u Myntri ha u Lum Wortoh, angnud ki Nongïalam Raid ban pynkylla jaka jngohkai

content: Ki nongïalam ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People, Nartiang Area Unit, myn ha ka 12 tarik Rymphang 2024, ki la wan ban kynduh ïa ka Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ban pynsngew halor ki jingdonkam ki jaka sumar ha kane thaiñ.Na ka liang ki nongïalam ka FKJGP Nartiang ki la kyntu na ka Myntri ban kyntiew kyrdan noh ïa ka Nartiang PHC sha ka CHC lane ban pynbiang da ki Doctor ki nurse ba pura.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Bin Raliang uba dei u President ka FKJGP, Nartiang Unit, u la ong ba hadien ba la kyntiew ïa kane ka jaka sumar sha ka PHC ha u snem 2001 ki don bun ki jingduna kiba la pyndkhot ïa ka jingai jingsumar sha ki nongshong shnong.Kumba ka long mynta, kane ka PHC ka dei kaba ai ka jingshakri sha ki 34 tylli ki shnong, kiba ym palat ïa ka 37,000 tam ki nongshong shnong, hynrei ka jingbym don ki Doctor ki Nurse ki ba pura ka wanrah jingeh ïa ki nongshong shnong ha kane ka thaiñ.U la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingiakynduh, na ka liang ka Myntri ka la kular ban shimkhia da ka ba shen kan sa phah ïa ki ophisar ka DMHO ban leit jurip ïa kane ka PHC khnang ba ka sorkar kan leh ïa kaba donkam.U Bah Kitboklang Nongphlang, u nongïalam ka FKJGP, Central Body uba dei peit ruh ïa ka FKJGP, Jaintia Hills, u la ong ba kane ka jaka sumar ka la shakri ïa ki paidbah kane ka thaiñ la 70 snem mynta bad hadien ba la pynkiew sha ka PHC don bun ki jingdkoh ha ka rukom trei kam na ka jingbym don ki nongsumar.“Ka FKJGP, ka kwah ba ka sorkar kan shim khia ïa kane ka jingdawa namar ba kane ka jaka sumar ka dei kaba donkam tam na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong kane ka thaiñ, namar mynta kane ka PHC kam pat long kaba biang wad tang ban sumar ïa ki longkmie kiba ïoh khyllung ruh bad bun na ki longkmie ki hap ban leit shaduh Ialong ban kha khun,” u la bynrap.
title: Pynsngew ka FKJGP ïa ki jingdkoh ka PHC Nartiang ha ka Myntri

content: Ka kynhun shipai ïada Ri jong ka BSF Meghalaya myn ha ka 11 tarik Rymphang, ki la ïoh ban pyllait im ïa ki Muid ha khappud ka Meghalaya. Ïa kine ki Muid la thmu ban shalan sha Bangladesh lyngba ki thaiñ khappud ka West Jaintia Hills District, Meghalaya.Ki kynhun ka BSF jong ka 4 Battalion ki la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra hajan ka khappud, hapdeng kane ka jingkhynra ka BSF ka la ïoh ban pyllait im haduh 37 tylli ki Muid kiba la buhrieh ha khlaw bad kiba la thmu ban shalan tuh sha Bangladesh. Ïa kine ki Muid ba la ïoh kurup la aiti noh sha ka police station ba dei peit na ka bynta ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Ha kawei pat ka jingkhynra ba la ïatrei lang da ka 181 Bn BSF bad ki pulit ka Meghalaya, ki la ïoh ban kurup kumba 12,000 kilogram ki suba shini kiba la thmu na ka bynta ban shalan sha Bangladesh lyngba ka khappud ka South Garo Hills, Meghalaya.
title: Ïoh pyllait im ka BSF ïa 37 tylli ki Muid ba thmu ban shalan be-aiñ

content: Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la pynrem jur halor ka jingleh donbor jong ki shipai BSF pyrshah ïa u ophisar jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, uba trei ha ka tnat Veterinary bad Animal Husbandry  Department, Muktapur kaba hap ha ka Block Amlarem.Kat kum ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u General secretary ka UDP u Bah Jemino Mawthoh u la pynpaw ïa ka jingpynremjur halor ka jingleh donbor ki BSF ïa u ophisar ka Vetinary ha Muktapur  mynha ka 11 tarik Rymphang 2024.“Hadien ka jingsaphriang ka khubor ba la mih ha social media, u ophisar u la shah leh donbor, shah tohkit  bad la phah ïa u ban law ïa ki jaiҌ phong. Shuh shuh ki shipai BSF ki la byrgnem ban siat ïa u ha Zero Point kaba dei ha khappud jong ka Ri India bad Bangladesh. Kane ka jingleh jong ki shipai BSF kiba dei ban ïada bad ai ïa ka jingshngaiñ ïa ki briew kiba sah ha ki thaiñ khappud, ka la buh ïa kane ka kynhun ha ka jinglehraiñ” la ong ka kyrwoh.U la bynrap, “kane ka jingleh khlemakor jong ki shipai BSF  ka long kaei kaei kaba ym lah ban pdiang satia bad na ka liang ka UDP kan ym shim sting ïa kane ka kam bad  kan thoh sha u Director General BSF bad ka BSF Vigilance Department ban tohkit halor kane  ka jingjia bad kan dawa  ruh ban pynshitom ïa kito kiba donkti kiba leh donbor bad pynmynraiñ ïa kat u  ophisar jong ka tnat sorkar jong ka jylla.”U la ong shuh shuh,”ha ka jingshisha, kum kine ki jingjia la dei ban kiar khnang ba kiba shong ba sah ha ki thaiñ khappud kin don ka jingsngew shngaiñ.”
title: Pynrem ka UDP halor ka jingleh donbor ki BSF pyrshah ïa u ophisar sorkar

content: Halor ka jingshah thombor u ophisar ka tnat Veterinary, ha Muktapur kaba hap ha ka Block Amlarem ha ki BSF myn ha ka 11 tarik Rymphang, na ka liang ka Ka Jaiñtia National Council (JNC) WESTERN ZONE hapoh ka jingïalam u Bah Leo Ferdinand Dhar uba dei u President ka WZ myn ha ka 12 tarik Rymphang ka la hiar sha ka shnong Muktapur.Ha ka jingleit hiar jong ka seng ryngkat ki nongsakhi (Eye witness) ha katei ka jingjia bad ruh ryngkat ki trai shnong ka seng ka la ïoh ban tip ïa ka jingshisha ba ka jingleh donbor ki BSF sha kitei ki thaiñ ka long kaba la palat ha kaba na ka por sha ka por ka ïai jia bad ka pynthut ruh ïa ka ïaid ka ïeng ki nongshong shnong katei ka thaiñ na ki kti ki BSF.Halor katei ka jingjia ka seng ka lah ïoh ruh ban ïakynduh markhmat bad u SDO ka Amlarem ha kaba na ka liang jong u SDO ka Amlarem u lah pynlong da ka jingïalang mynta ka sngi ha ka jingdon ryngkat u Waheh Shnong ka Muktapur, ki nongshong shnong, u Incharge ka BSF bad ki nongïalam ka JNC-Western Zone ban ïashong pyrkhat halor ka jingshah leh donbor jong utei u doctor ha ki BSF, bad da kawei ka sur ha kane ka jingïalang lah rai ban buh noh da ka Independent Inquiry bad lah buh ruh ïa ka por ba dei ban pyndep hapoh 2 taïew ban tohkit bniah ïa katei ka jingjia.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka phah ka kyrwoh kaba shai ba ka jingtohkit kan long kaba hok bad kaba khlem leh shiliang khnang ba yn ïoh ka jingbishar kaba hok bad lah kyntu ruh ïa kiba dei bor ban peit ba kin leh da kaba tyngeh ïa kita kiba donkti ban leh donbor ïa ki paradoh parasnam lym kumta lada  jia shi ïai jia kumne kan sa wanrah ka jingbitar kaba eh bad kan ïalam ruh sha ki bynta ki bym ïahap bad ka imlang ka sahlang. Na ka liang ka seng ka ai ka kti ka mon bad ka diang ban ïai don ryngkat bad ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ ha ka ban ïengïaleh ïa ki nongshun kiba thmu ban ïuh roit ïa ka hok jong ngi ki trai ri trai muluk.Khatduh ruh ka seng ka kyntu jur ïa ki bor Sorkar ba ka dei ban tuklar mardor halor katei ka jingjia bad ka dei ruh ban ai kata ka jingïada kaba paka kaba shongsuk shong shngain khamtam ha kito ki thaiñ khappud namar kum katei ka jingjia ka wanrah ka jingtieng ka jingsyier ïa ki nongshong shnong bad khamtam ruh ïa ki khynnah kynthei bad ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ hi ka thaiñ, pynkut u Bah Leo Ferdinand Dhar.
title: Halor ka jingshah thombor u ophisar ka Vertinary ha ki BSF, hiar ka JNC WESTERN ZONE sha Muktapur

content: U Robertjune Kharjahrin u kyrtong monlang jong ka Regional Democractic Alliance (RDA) jong ka party UDP bad ka HSPDP u ban sa ïa aireng ha kane ka Election MP na Shillong Parliamentary Seat u la sdang ban leit ïalap election napoh ka South West Khasi Hills kaba dei ka Constituency ba u shong u sah na ka bynta ban pynsngew thuh ïa ka thong kum u samla rangbah  ban ïawer ïa ki paidbah  ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïa u ba un jop don burom ha kane ka election MP ka ban sa long shen ha kine ki bnai ban sa wan. Ïa kane la sakhi da ka jingpynlong ïa ka jingïalang paidbah mynta ka 13 tarik Rymphang, ha ki lai tylli ki jaka kata ha  Ïew Mawkhan  Pyndenumsaw,  Ïew Rangblang, bad ha Umjaraiñ South West Khasi Hills District.U Robertjune Kharjahrin haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong, “ka kam ban jied nongmihkhat hapoh ka Parliament sha Delhi kam dei ka kam kai ka dei ka kam ïap kam im ban ïa said na ka bynta ka jaidbynriew ha ka shynshar khadar khamtam ïa ngi ki paid riewlum hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya. Ka India ka dei kawei ka Ri kaba khraw ha ka pyrthei kaba khlaiñ bad kaba lah ban knieh noh ïa ka jingbun briew na ka Ri China ha kine ki snem ban wan, namar kata nga dei u briew u ba donbok tam ba nga ïoh lad ban mih khmat na ka party Riewlum kaba heh duh happoh ka jylla Meghalaya ha ryngkat da ka jingïatrei lang ka party UDP bad ka HSPDP wat la shibun ki briew kiba la nang la stad ki riew rangbah na kine ki ar tylli ki seng saiñ pyrthei bad napdeng ki kyrtong ki ban sa ïa aireng ha kane ka Elekshon MP na kiwei pat ki party nga dei u ba dang samla tam na pdeng kita. Bun ki paidbah ki buh jingkylli ïa nga balei phi ïaleh ïa ka MP election ba phim sdang shwa da election MDC ne MLA, ka jubab kaba shai ïa ki paidbah ba nga kwah ban ïaleh election MP ka long ba shibun ki sohkyrdot, ki mat jingdawa jong ka jaidbynriew kum ka ILP, u pud u sam, ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka Syrnat kaba 6 (Six Scheduled),  bad shibun kiei kiei ba ki na ka liang ki sengbhalang, ki MDC bad MLA ki la rah ïa kane, hynrei haduh mynta ki dang sahkut hapoh Delhi ha Parliament dei na kata ka daw ba nga kwah ban pynurlong ban ïa kine kiei kiei baroh”, ong u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.Shuh shuh u la ong, “ngam shem la long kum kiwei kiba biang ka spah ka phew hynrei nga wan na ka longïing kaba duna ha ka ïoh ka kot bad  shwa ba ngan mih ha ki rynsan politik nga la shah phrang ïa lade  ban long kum u nongïalam na ka seng bhalang, kumta kam long shuh kaba thymmai, nga la tip lut ïa ki jingeh ki mat ki jura jong ka jaitbynriew, ha baroh ki liang namar kata ka la dei ïa nga ba kane ka jingshakri ïa ka jaitbynriew bad ïa ka Ri Khasi kan ym kut tang hangta da kaba kwah ban long kum u nongïasaid sha ka dorbor bah jong ka Ri India kata happoh ka Parliament sha Delhi.”“Ha kane ka election MP ngim dei shuh ban sngew marthain, sngewniam ne sngew  party  ka la dei ka  por ba ka  Bri u Hynñiewtrep Hynñiewskum kin jied bad phah tang ïa u wei u MP uba pyntikna ba u ta u MP un dei u ba trei u ba mihkhmat na ka bynta ka Ri bad ka jaidbynriew uba kynsai bad uba janai tam, ngi la ïoh mad ha kine ki 15 snem ba la dep kaei ba kine ki MP ki la leh ngam kwah ban batai ne bishar ki paidbah ki la ïohi ïa kaei ba ki la leh. Ha ka riti shynshar jong ka Ri India ka long kaba laitluid ha kano kano ka jingeit uwei pa uwei u briew khlem da don kano kano ka kyndon ban khang ban mane ha kino kino ki kynhun niam, hynrei ha kine ki sngi ba mynta ki la don ki riew shitniam kiba sdang ban leh donbor ïa ki paid khristan kata ngi ïohi kaei kaba la jia hangne hapoh ka Ri India jong ngi’” La bynrap u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.Ka jinkwah jong u ka long ruh ban wanrah ïa ka shynshar khadar kaba khuid bad pynduh ïa ka bamsap bampong da kaba unkwah ba baroh ki paidbah bad ki nongshongshnong ha baroh ki District jong ka Jylla ngin ïa tip lang ïa baroh ki skhim MP ba ki paidbah ki dei ban ïoh, u la pynshai ruh ba ïoh don ki briew kiba ong ba ka UDP, HSPDP kiba don haka sorkar synrop MDA bad ka NPP, BJP kin sngewthuh bad shah ïalam bakla ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingmane Blei laitluid, da kaba u buh jingkylli, Naduh mynno ka party UDP bad HSPDP ka la khang pyshah ban leit mane Blei ne pynshit niam?  ka UDP bad ka HSPDP ki dei ki party kiba ïada ïa ka jinglong trai ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap, ha ka riti shynshar khadar, bad ka ai ïa ka bor ban mane laitluid ha kino kino ki jingngeit shimet shimet. Namar kata ngi donkam ban ïa tylli ka ka jingïalong kawei ha baroh ki liang.Ha kane ka sngi la ïa synran lang da ki riew rangbah jong ka RDA kata  na ka party UDP bad HSPDP ha ryngkat ki paidbah kiba la wan sngap ïa kane ka jingkren jong u Robertjune Kharjahrin ha ryngkat kiwei de ki riew rangbah ban pynshai ïa ka thong bad ïa ki mat ki jura jong ka jaidbynriew.
title: Na ka konstitwensi lade sdang leit ïalap election u Robertjune Kharjahrin na ka bynta ka MP Election

content: Myn ha ka 12 tarik u Rymphang, 2024 ki nongtrei ka party congress ki la mih noh bad ka long kaei kaei ka jingduhnong kaba khraw ïa ka Congress Party ha South West Khasi Hills District bad ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee.U President ka District Congress Committee, u Bah K.K Nongsiej, haba ïathuh halor kane u la ong ba u la ïehnoh ïa ka jinglong kum u nongkitkam jong ka Congress party na ki daw shimet jong u.Ha kajuh ka por ym tang kata, u Babu Valentine Thyrniang kum u President jong ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee naduh katei ka tarik bad la sngewthuh ba hadien ka jingïehnoh kam na ka Block, u Babu Valentine Thyrniang u la pynshai paitbah ba un nym treh shuh ban long nongïalam ha kane ka party Congress.Nalor kitei ki ar ngut ki nongïalam rangbah jong ka party, la ïoh ruh ban sakhi ïa ka jingiehnoh kam ka Dr. B. Marweiñ na ka kam kum ka President jong ka Mahila (Women’s Wing) hapoh ka Mawkyrwat Block kumjuh ruh ïa ka jingiehnoh kam u Bah Valdo Lyngdoh kum u District Youth President.Shuh shuh katkum ka jingïoh lum jingtip ba ha ka juh ka sngi nalor kitei ki nongïalam, la ong ruh ba bun ki nongtrei jong ka Congress Party kiba don hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District bad ka Mawkyrwat Bock ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïehnoh kam paidbah (Mass Resignation) halor ki daw shimet shimet jong ki.
title: Mih noh ki katto katne ki nongïalam jong ka Mawkyrwat Block Congress Committee

content: Ka Young Mind kaba dei kawei na ka seng trei mon sngewbha jong ki samla ka thaiñ Ri-Bhoi bad kaba ju peit ju khmih ban ai ïa ki jingïarap ba ha rukom ïa ki long ïing kiba kham duna ka jingïoh, mynta ka kynti kum ka dak ka jingburom ïa uwei u riew khraw jong ka Ri-Bhoi uba la wanrah bun bah ki jingkylla hapoh ka Ri-Bhoi District, uba la long teng ruh kum u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla bad mynta u dei u Chief Adviser jong ka Sorkar jylla u Dr. DD Lapang uba ki paidbah ka Ri-Bhoi ki ju tip ruh kum u kpa ka Ri-Bhoi mynta ka sngi na ka liang ka Young Mind ka la lah ban pynïeng da u statue jong u Maheh Lapang hapoh ka madan jong ka Ri-Bhoi College ha Nongpoh.Ka jingpynïeng ïa une u statue kaba la ïoh bor na u Dr. DD. Lapang bad la wan ban plie pyrda ruh da u maheh Lapang hi ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang da u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba dei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, u Bah Mayralborn Syiem u MLA ka Nongpoh, u Bah Charles Marngar u MLA ka Mawhati bad kiwei ki riew rangbah ki riew pawkhmat jong ka Ri-Bhoi District.Ha kane ka sngi la pdiang sngewbha ïa baroh da ka jingrwai tynrai ba la shim bynta da ki khynnah pule ka Ri-Bhoi College ha ryngkat ki jingpynkup burom ïa u DD. Lapang kum u kongsan, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Bah Prestone Tynsong kum u kongsan, Mayralborn syiem kum u symbud kongsan bad kynthup ruh ïa baroh ki nongshah khot sngewbha ha kane ka sngi kaba kyrpang jong u Maheh Lapang.Haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki nongkren ki la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka Young Minds kaba don ka jingmut kaba jngai ha kaba ka la lah ban buh ïa ka jing kynmaw ka ban neh junom ha ka ban sah jingkynmaw ïa u riew khraw uba wan rah shibun ki jingkylla bad ka roi ka par hapoh ka Ri-Bhoi District bad kum ka seng kaba ju don kata ka mynsiem ban ïarap na ka bynta u duk u suk bad ka don kata ka mynsiem trei mon sngewbha ki kit bok kit rwiang ïa kane ka seng ba kan kiew shaphrang bad kin neh ka juh ka rukom trei jong ngi ban ïarap ïa ki ba donkam, khlem da lah ban klet na ka liang ki nongkren ha kane ka sngi kiba la kynthup lang ïa ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei, ki seng bhalang bad na ka liang ki nongthoh khubor na Ri-Bhoi ki la ai ïa ka jingkhublei bad ka jingsngewnguh ïa u Maheh DD Lapang halor ka kam kaba un trei bad ka jingshakri ka jong u  na ka bynta ka Ri-Bhoi District kumba ka long haduh mynta.Na ka liang jong u Maheh DD. Lapang haba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u la ai khublei kyrpang ïa ka Young Mind kaba la kynmaw burom ïa u da kaba buh syndon da u mot dur jong u kum ka dak ban ai burom halor ki kam shakri paidbah kiba u la noh mynta da ki phew snem.U la ai ruh ïa ki kyntien kyntu kynpham sha baroh kiba la shim bynta lang ha kane ka sngi da kaba pynkynmaw ïa ki kyntien kiba u la jied ha ka jingim jong u da kaba ong ba la kha ïa ngi ban shakri lane “we’re born to served” kumta u la kyntu ïa baroh ban ïaineh ka mynsiem jingkitkhlieh ban shakri para mynsiem briew na ka bynta ban kyntiew bad pynroi ïa la ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong ka Young Mind ka la pyni paidbah ruh ruh ïa ka jingrwai kaba la rwai da ka kynhun jong ki ban batai lyngkot shaphang ki kam bad ka jingshakri paidbah jong u Maheh Lapang ïa ka District bad ka jylla baroh kawei.
title: Da ka statue u Dr. D.D Lapang  pynïeng ka Young Mind ha Ri-Bhoi College kum ka dak ka jingburom ïa ki kam jong u

content: Ki katto katte ngut ki samla pule ka St Anthony’s College ha ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ka NEHU Student Union (NEHUSU), myn ha ka 13 tarik Rymphang 2024, ki la leit ban ai  da ka shithi ha u Pricipal  kane ka jaka pule u Rev Br Dr Albert Dkhar ban pyrshah halor ka jingbthah ïa ki samla pule kane ka College ban phong da ki Uniform haba wan sha class.Ki samla pule kane ka College khamtam ki khynnah ka Fourth Samester, ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor kane ka rai jong ki nongïalam College ka long halor ka nongrim ba kane kan pynlehnohei ïa ka pisa namar kane kan long ka snem ka ba khatduh ba kin pule ha kane ka College.Kumban shu pynkynmaw, na ka liang ki nongpynïaid ka St. Anthony’s College, Shillong ha ka 29 tarik Naiwieng 2023, ka la pynmih da ka jingbthah ïa ki samla Pule, ba mynta u snem ki samla pule ha kane ka College ki dei ban  ban phong noh da ki Uniform.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, na ka liang u samla Arman Malngiang ula ong ba ka jingdawa ki samla pule kane ka College ka long ban  dawa na u Principal ban shah ïa ki samla pule Fourth Semester ban wan class khlem da phong uniform.“Ngi la pynsngew ba kam ïahap ïa ki samla pule kiba la jan dep ïa ki jingpule jong ki satang mynta u snem bad kan long ka jingpynleh noh ei ïa ka pisa namar ka dor ka uniform ka long T. 5,800, kumta ngi la dawa na u Principal ban yn ym pynshitom ïa ki samla pule Fourth Semester namar ka Class kan sdang haka taïew ban wan,” u la ong.U la bynrap ruh ba ha kane ka jingïakynduh na ka liang u Principal u la ïathuh sha ki, ba halor kane ka jingdawa na ka liang jong u, un sa rah ban pynsngew sha ki bor ba halor ban pynbeit ïa kane ka jingeh.”U samla Arman u la pyntip ba na ka liang ki samla pule ki la dawa ruh na u Principal ba halor ka rai ban phah phong uniform, na ka liang ka College ka dei ban thoh shai ha ki Prospectus bad ki Form, ba ka long ka ba donkam ban phong Uniform hapoh ka College.
title: Halor ka rai ban phah phong uniform; pyrshah ki samla pule ka Fourth semester ka St Anthony College

content: Myn ha ka janmiet jong ka 12 tarik Rymphang 2024, ha ka por 6 shiteng eiei ki nongshong jong ka Mawkyrwat South West Khasi Hills District  ki la ïoh ban bat ïa uwei u nongtuh katba u dang pyrshang ban tuh ïa ki taïar kali na kawei ka ïing jong kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Mawkyrwat kat kum ka jingïathuh ki nongïalam jong ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat ba  ïa une u briew la tip kyrteng kum u Stevenson Tongwah.Katkum ka khubor ba la ïoh lum la ïathuh ba une u nongtuh katba u dang pyrshang ban tuh ïa ki taïar kali uwei u khynnah samla dong u la ïohi bad u la peit siar bha tad ynda u la ithuh ba dei u nongtuh u la hylla briew bad kumne ki samla dong ki la mih bad bat noh ïa une u nongtuh, hadien ba la ïoh bat la pyntip noh sha ki bor shnong, na ka liang ki nongïalam shnong ki la aiti noh sha ki bor pulit bad na ka liang ki bor pulit ki la shimti noh ïa une u nongtuh bad ka jingtohkit ka dang ïaid sha khmat ban lap shuh ïa kiba don kti, la ong ba une u briew u dei uba la ju mlien bha ha ki kam tuh bad u la ju poi patok ruh la bun bun sien na ki kam tuh jong u, ong u Bah S. Nongrum uba dei u Vice-President ka Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat.
title: Jyllei ki kam tuh, ïoh kem nongtuh ki Seng Samla Shnong Mawkyrwat

content: U Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka PWD (Roads), u Bah Prestone Tynsong, u la pynbna myn ha ka sngi ba ar ba ïa ka surok na Lad Umroi sha Malidor, lem bad ka National Highway-6 ha East Jaintia Hills District, yn sa pynheh ïa ka surok sha ka saw lane.“Ïa katei ka projek, la aiti noh sha ka National Highways and Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited (NHIDCL), bad dang shen, ki la pynlong da ka survey bad la don ka jingïatreilang bad ki deputy commissioner ba kin ithuh ïa ka jaka,” ong u Tynsong.ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingshna biang ïa ka NH-6, u Tynsong u la ong ba dang shen, u la kynduh ïa une u secretary ka Myntri ka Road Transport na ka bynta ban ïakren halor ka jingsniew ka surok highway, khamtam naduh Lumshnong shaduh Umkiang.“Katba ïa ka jingpynbiang bad ka jingshna ïa ka surok, la aiti sha ki kontraktor jong ka NHAI, naba kane ka hap hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka NHAI bad ka NHIDCL,” pynshai u Prestone.Da kaba ïakren shaphang ka mat halor ka jingtwa khyndew ha ka surok khyndew jong ka Sonapur, u Tynsong u la ong ba u secretary ka Ministry jong ka Road Transport u la pynpaw ka jingdon jingmut jong u bad pynthikna ban khmih ïa kane ka surok khyndew.“Ngim don kano kano ka jingrai kaba mar mar ïa mynta. Katba ki nongshem ba tbit kiba la phah da katei ka Ministry, ki lah ban trei halor ka jingai jingïada ïa katei ka surok khyndew tad haduh ban da ïoh ïa ka survey ba biang na ka bynta ban pyndep ïa ka surok saw lane,” ban jur u Tynsong.U la ong ba ka jingpyndep ïa ki safety audits bad ka jingtreikam ban pyndait da ki nar ha ka jingkieng Sonapur, kaba long ruh ka jingpyn thikna halor ka jingai jingïada.
title: Yn pynheh ïa ka surok NH-6 sha ka 4-Lane ha East Jaintia Hills: Symbud Myntri

content: :Ka kynhun shipai BSF myn ha ka 11 tarik, Rymphang 2024, ha ka por shiteng synñia ka la leit sha ka khappud jong ka Indo-Bangladesh ha Hawaitila, ki la lap ïa uwei u briew uba dang ïaid shakhmat bad shajan jong kane ka khappud ne International border (IB). Hapoh ka jingpyn sangeh ïa u da ki shipai BSF, u la pynpaw ka jingbym sngewtynnad bad shim ïa kane ka mat kum ka kam shimet naduh ba kam ba u dei u doktor Veterinary na kato ka shnong. Ha ka jingpyn sangeh ïa u da ki shipai BSF, u la sdang ban rekod da ka video jong katei ka khappud bad kumjuh ruh ki BSF Jawan kiba don ha ka duty.Watla don ka jingkyrpad ba ki shipai BSF ba kin sangeh ban ring video, utei u briew um pyn sngap ïa katei ka jingkyprad jong ki. Hadien katei, utei u briew ba kam ïalade kum u doktor veterinary u la leit noh na katei ka jaka katba u la byrngem ïa kine ki shipai BSF kiba don duty ba kin sa mad jingeh ba jur. Hadien katto katne por, u la wanphai bad kiwei ki nongshong shnong, da kaba hylla ïa kine ki shipai BSF bad rekod da ka video khnang ba un ïoh ban pynthohbria ïa ki.Katba ka jingkynnoh jong une u briew uba la ong ba ki shipai BSF ki la byrngem ban siat ïa u bad pynlaw lyngkhuit ïa u, kaba dei ba shu thok suda bad ba shu kynnoh lamler pyrshah ïa ki shipai BSF. Ki shipai BSF kiba la poi ha katei ka khappud, ki la don hangto ban ai jingïada ïa ki paidbah kato ka shnong kiba shong ba sah ha kato ka khappud. Kum kine ki jingkynnoh bym shoong nongrim, ym tang ba ka pynmong ïa ko shipai BSF kiba trei shitom ha ka por jingeh hynrei ka pyn khuslai jingmut ruh ïa ki. Ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa ki Border Security Force, ka long ka byn shong nongrim bad bym ïahap.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ba jia ha ka 12 tarik, Rymphang 2024 ha ka por 4 baje mynstep, la don ka jingïalang kaba la pynlong ha ka ophis jong u SDO (Civil) Amalarem ba la pynïaid da u Dr Abhishek Saini, IAS ha ryngkat u SDPO Amalarem Sub- Division, Dr Seiboklang Buam, SHO PS- Muktapur bad ki heh shipai BSF. Ha ka por ba don kane ka jingïalang, ka mat ba ïakren (halor ka jingshah kynnoh ki BSF), la pynbna bad hadien katei ka jingjia, la dep ïakren ïasuk.Sa kawei ka jingïalang kaba hap ha kajuh ka sngi ha ka por 5 baje mynstep kaba la dep pynlong, la don lang bad u MLA jong kato ka shnong, u Sh Lahkmen Rymbui, u nongai jingmut sha ka sorkar Meghalaya, Additional Home Secretary Government jong ka Meghalaya, IG Law & Order ( Meghalaya Police), IG Border bad ki IG BSF Meghalaya ba kin ïakren shaphang katei ka jingjia bym poi pyrkhat. Katba u Inspector General jong ka BSF Meghalaya, hadien ba u la khmih shaphang ka jingshisha jong kane ka jingjia, u la pynthikna ba ki shipai BSF ki la kut jingmut ban ap pahara ha katei ka khappud, wat haba wan ka jingeh ruh. Ki shipai BSF kim ju shongthait ha ka ban pahara na ka bynta ka ri.
title: Pynshai ki shipai BSF ka Meghalaya halor ka jingbym ïa sngewthuh jingmut halor ka khappud ha West Jaintia Hills

content: Kawei ka longkmie ka ba la tip kyrteng kum ka Edwina Lyngdoh Lyngkhoi 52 snem ka rta, na ka shnong Umran Dairy, ka la khlad ha shen hadien ba ka la shah bat ha ka bording elektrik .Kane ka jingjia kaba ishyrkhie ka la jia myn ha ka 13 tarik Rymphang 2024, ha ka por ba kane ka longkmie ka la shah lymbat ha ka bording electrik ha kawei ka jaka khlaw kaba kham pajih na ka shnong katba ka dang leit wat jhur na katei ka jaka ha ryngkat bad la ka khun.Kane ka longkmie ka dei kaba sah  bad ka khun bad ka dei  kaba ju im ruh ka jingim da kaba leit wat ïa ki jhur na ki khlaw ki btap ban pyndap pynbiang ïa la ka ïing ka sem, hynrei ha katei ka sngi katba ka dang leit ban wat ïa ki jhur khlaw ha ryngkat bad la ka khun ka la kum leit ïuh ïa utei u sainar light uba la dkut bad thiah lyngktar ha madan bad ka jingkhlaiñ jong ka bording electrik ka la lympad ïa katei ka longkmie haduh ba kan duh ei ïa la ka jingim.Ka khun jong katei ka longkmie  ka la ïathuh ba katba ka dang don ha katei ka jaka ka la ïoh sngew ïa ka jingsawa bad ka la mareh ban peit bad ka la lap ba ka kmie jong ka, ka la shah bat ha ka bording electrik bad kumta mar mar ka la ïaleh ban pyrta bad ban wat jingïarap na ki briew kiba marjan ban pan jingïarap bad ban pynlip ïa ka light. Hadien ba poi ki para Shnong ki la pynkit noh ïa ka met sha Civil Hospital ban leh ïa kaba donkam.Naka liang u Rangbah Shnong ka Umran Dairy u Bah Lambor Mukhim Bina, u la ïathuh ba mar ïatip ïa katei ka jingjia ki la leit bak bak sha katei ka jaka bad ki la lap ba katei ka longkmie kaba la shah bat ha ka ding electrik ka dei halor kadaw ba utei u sainar light u la dkut bad u la hap ha madan, bad u la pyntip ruh ba na ka liang ki bor pulit ki la pynkit noh ïa katei ka met sha Civil Hospital ban leh ïa ka post Morten.Katkum ka jingïathuh u Rangbah Shnong u la pyntip ruh ba utei u sainar light lehse um dei uba la dkut slem, namar kam shem la don kano kano ka jingthud ha ka light hapoh ka Shnong.Na ka liang ka u Rangbah Shnong u kyntu ïa ki bor ba dei peit ïa ka bording electrik ba kin peit pyrman bha ha kaba ïadei bad ki sainar light bad ban ot tikna ruh ïa ki dieng ki siej kiba mar jan bad ki sainar, namar bun ki jingjia kiba sngewsih kiba kum kine ki shait jia namar ka jingia tyngkhuh ki dieng ki siej ïa ki sainar light.
title: Khlad ka longkmie na ka jingshah bat ha ka bording elektrik

content: Ka Lamlynti Border Farm Society ka la pynlong da ka tamasa ha ka shnong Lawbah ha ka Multipurpose Hall kaba hap hapoh ka Mawsynram C&RD Block, East Khasi Hills District, na ka bynta ban pynshai shaphang ka jingshna ïa ki snieh.Katei ka tamasa ba la pynlong da kane ka shnong, la don ki briew ba don bynta lang, kynthup ïa u M. Ram, State Director jong ka KVIC Shillong, O.S. Suin, MLA jong ka Mawsynram Constituency, A. Malngiang, General Manager jong ka DCIC Office, bad ki Gram Panchayat Heads, ha ryngkat ki executive member jong ka Lawbah village Dorbar. Kumba 100 ngut ki nongshong shnong ki la ïashim bynta ha kane ka tamasa.U R. Marwein, uba dei u rangbah shnong jong ka shnong Lawbah, u la pynbna sha ki nongïashim bynta, da kaba ban jur halor ka jingdonkam jong kane ka prokram. U Embhah Rymbai, President jong ka Lamlynti Border Farm Society, u la kren da ka kyntien pdiang sngewbha na ka bynta ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa katei ka prokram. U O.S. Suin, MLA jong ka Mawsynram Constituency, u la ithuh ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ka Lamlynti Border Farm Society ha ka ban shna pynmih ïa ki arecanut plates bad u la pynshlur ïa ki nongshim bynta ba kin sangeh ban peit ïa ka lad na ka bynta ka jingïoh jingkot.U State Director jong ka KVIC Shillong, u Mange Ram, u la kren shai halor ka scheme Gramodyog Vikas Yojana (GVY) bad kiwei ki scheme ba la tyrwa da ka KVIC, DCIC, bad KVIB na ka bynta ban kyrshan ïa ki nongseng kam lajong bad ki samla bym ïoh kam. U A. Malngiang jong ka DCIC Shillong u la kren shaphang ki scheme bapher bapher, kynthup ïa ka Home Stay bad kiwei ki manufacturing unit bad ki jingthmu ba la pyntip na ka bynta ban pynlong da ka training centre ha Mawsynram.U Neville D. B. Nongrang u la kren halor ka PMEGP Scheme, kaba la kynthup lang ïa ka service bad ki manufacturing sector. U M. Lyngdoh u la ban jur shaphang ka jingdonkam jong ka GVY Scheme na ka bynta ban pynïaid ïew ïa ki karkhana shnong bad kyrpad ïa ki nongïashim bynta ba kin sangeh ban peit ïa ka lad na ka bynta ka jingïoh jingkot.U M. Iangjuh, uba dei u nongai ktien jong ka Lamlynti Border Farm Society, u la ai kyrpad ïa ki nongïashim bynta ba kin pynkut ïa kane ka prokram da kaba ïashondur.
title: Ka tamasa Community ha shnong Lawbah ka pynshai ïa ka karkhana shna snieh

content: Ka Mawlangwir Sports Club South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi kala ïoh ban plie pyrda noh ïa ka 16th Invitation Tournament 2023-2024 kaba heh duh ha ka thaiñ SWKHD ïa kaba la pynlong ha Madan Rowell Lyngdoh Stadium Mawlangwir SWKHD ha kaba u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit MLA ka Nongkrem Constituency u la long kum u kongsan ban wan pynher ïa ka lama jong ka Mawlangwir Sports Club kum ka dak ka jing plie ïa kane ka Lympung ïalehkai ha ryngkat da ka jing ïadonlang ki nongkitkam jong ka Mawlangwir Sports Club u Myntri shnong bad ki wei de ki riew rangbah.Na ka liang u Bah Ardent ha ka jingai jingkren u la ïaroh bad ai mynsiem na ka bynta ka Mawlangwir kaba la pynlong ïa kane ka lympung kaba heh. U la kitbok ruh ba kin nang ïai bteng ban pynlong ïa kum kine ki jait jingïalehkai ban kyntiew ïa ka sap jong ki khynnah kiba ieit ïa ka jingïalehkai. “Nga ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura na ka bynta ka Mawlangwir SC ba kan nang lah ban pyntyllun ïa ki kam bad ba kan nang lah ban sei shuh shuh ïa thei bad rangïalehkai na ka thaiñ. Nga ai khublei ruh ïa ki nongkitkam jong ka Mawlangwir kaba la pynbeit ïa kane ka lympung. Nga tip kam long kaba suk ban pynïaid ïa kane ka tournament” ong u Bah Ardent.Kane ka long kaba lympung kaba 16 hynrei nga ngeit kadei ka sienjam ba nyngkong ban jam bam pat sha uwei pat u mawjam ban pyni ïa ka jingshlur bad ka jingkut jong phi”.U Bah Ardent u la ai ruh ka jingïaroh na ka bynta ka Mawlangwir kaba la pynbeit ban ai ïa ka khusnam (prize) kaba heh kaba dei kawei na ki khusnam ba heh tam ha ka jylla.Ka North East United FC bad ka Shillong Lajong FC kila long ki kynhun kiba ïalehkai sdang ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol ha kaba da ki hajar ki paidbah ki riew ieid phutbol kila ïa wan tuid ban wan sakhi da la ki jong ki khmat hapdeng ka jingïalehkai jong kitei ki artylli ki kynhun ïalehkai kiba la paw bha hapoh ka thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi (North East India) bad ruh ha ka Ri India hi baroh kawei.Ka jingïalehkai kala long shisha kaba itynnad kaba la pynhun jrut ïa ki khmat nong peit kai lyngba daka jingtbit ki rangïalehkai ha kaba haka Kylla step ka Shillong Lajong FC kala ïoh ban pynkhih nyngkong ïa ka jar ha ka minutes kaba 12 lyngba u Wandajied Ryngkhem bad haduh ba kut ka jing ïalehkai ka North East United kam shym la lah ban pynphai ïa katei ka shi kol ba la thep da ka Lajong, kumta ka jingïakhun ka la kut noh da 1-0.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban sam ïa ka khunsam Man of the Match sha u Wandajied Ryngkhem naka Shillong Lajong FC ryngkat ka pisa kaba long T. 5 hajar tyngka.
title: Kmen ki nongshong shnong ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat ban sakhi ïa ka jingïalehkai ka Shillong Lajong bad North East

content: Ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol jong ka Meghalaya ka la sdang ïa ka jingïaid lynti ha lympung National Games ba 37 da ka nam rem sha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Manipur hynnin ka sngi ka 31 Risaw ha Goa.Ka jingïakhun jong kine ki ar kynhun ka long kaba kham ïakhaid bor bad ka Meghalaya ka ïoh shibun ki kabu ban thep kol hynrei na ka jingbym lah ki ‘rangïalehkai khamat ban thaw lad la duh noh ban khur poiñ.Ha ka jingïakhun kaba jwat, ka Manipur ka la pynliem ïa ka Meghalaya da 2-1. Ha ka kylla step baroh 2 kynhun ki khlem ïoh ban pynkhih jar hynrei hadien ka kylla step ka Manipur kaba la kham ïoh buit na ka minit ba sha khmat ka la ïoh ban thep kol nyngkong lyngba Thiyam Chingkeinganba.Hadien ba la shah thep shi kol, ka jingïakhun ka la kham ïakhluit bad u Fullmooon Mukhim u la ïoh red card, kumta ka Meghalaya ka la duna ‘rangïalehkai bad ka Manipur ka la kham ïoh kabu. Watla katta ruh ki ‘rangïalehkai ka Meghalaya ki khlem kynran dien bad ïai ïakhun da ka jingthmu ban ïoh pynphai ïa katei ka kol.Katba ka jingïalehkai ka dang bteng, ka Manipur ka la ïoh ban thep sa shi kol ha ka minit ba 83 lyngba u Phijam Meetei.Lashai ka sngi ka Meghalaya kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Maharashtra katba pyrshah ïa ka Kerala kan long ha ka 4 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: Da ka nam rem mad ka Meghalaya ha ka jingsdang ïa ka 37t National Games

content: Ka ophis jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills Deputy Commissioner ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis District Sports Officer ka la pynkut noh ïa ka jingïakob mareh ba la tip kum ka ‘Fit India Freedom Run 4.0 bad ka National Unity Day Run (Rashtriya Ekta Diwas)’ na ka bynta ki kynthei bad shynrang hynnin ka sngi 31 tarik ha Jowai. U Bah Khroobok uba dei ruh u District Sports Officer u la wan ha kane ka sngi ban kaweh ïa ka lama.Ïa kane ka jingïakob la sdang na ka khyrdop jong ka Kiang Nangbah Stadium ha ka por 6 baje mynstep. Ka jingmareh ka long lyngba na Ladthadlaboh Main Road –  Jowai Public School – Gate Polytechnic – Kshaid Rymphum – Salaroh – Dulong Poh-hali Road – Dulong – Pamhadem – Panaliar (Civil Hospital) – Iongpiah -Mission Compound – H.K.Singh School – D.C Office – New Hill – National Highway bad la pynkut biang ha Stadium.Ïa kane ka jingïakob la pynlong kyrpang na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong jong ka West Jaintia District.Ha ka thup jong ki kynthei ka Happines Phawa ka la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan ba nyngkong katba ïa ka kyrdan ba ar bad ba lai la ïoh da ka Monlangki Kyndait bad Mini Kyndait, na ka shnong Mihmyntdu.Ha ka liang jong ki shynrang, u Teiboklang Biam u la khur ïa ka kyrdan ba nyngkong, u Dasaman Kyndait ïa ka kyrdan ba ar bad Daemiryntihki Pakma ïa ka kyrdan ba lai.
title: Khur u Teiboklang bad ka Happiness ïa ka kyrdan ba nyngkong ha ka ‘Fit India Freedom Run’ Jowai

content: Ka jingïalehkai jong ka lympung NEHU Inter College Football Tournament ba la pynlong da ka skul bah NEHU, Shillong ka la ïaid mynta ha ka sngi ba ar. Ïa kane ka lympung la pynlong kyrpang na ka bynta ki kynthei ha Madan jong kane ka skul bah kaba don ha Mawlai Mawkynroh.Ha kane ka sngi la don 4 tylli ki jingïakhun, ka jingïakhun hapdeng ka NEHU Shillong bad Nongstoin College ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid, da 0-0, ka jingïakhun hapdeng ka Lady Keane College bad St. Anthony’s College ruh ka la kut ha kajuh ka rukom, kata da 0-0, katba ka Sngap Syiem College, Mawkyrwat ka la pynliem ïa ka Nabon Synod College Shilong da 5-0 bad ka Shillong College ka la pynliem ïa ka St. Edmunds Shillong da 3-1.
title: Ïakhaid ka NEHU bad Nongstoin College, khur jingjop ka Sngap Syiem College

content: Ka jingïalehkai jong ka lympung Super Division ka Amlarem Sub-Divisional Sports Association ka la ïaid mynta sha ka sngi ba shiphew ha kaba ka Sailung Ïalong ka la pynliem ïa ka Nangbah Mulang da 4-1, ïa kane ka lympung la pynïaid da ka West Jainta District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai.Ïa ki 4 kol na ka bynta ka Sailung la ïoh ban thep da u  Arwan Rymbai haka minit ba 16, u Bachan Pale haka minit ba 50 bad 69 bad u Casper Lhuid haka minit ba 90+4, katba na ka bynta ka Nangbah la ïoh ban thep da u Albert Lyngdoh ha ka minit ba 77.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 1 tarik Naiwieng kan long hapdeng ka Mynthong pyrshah ïa ka Ladthadlaboh ha ka por 2:00 baje noh phai sngi.
title: Pynliem ka Sailung Ïalong ïa ka Nangbah Mulang, 2 kol khyrwit u Bachan Pale

content: :Na ka bynta ban pynbna shaphang ka jingkiew ka jingdheng kali ha Jowai, khamtam ha ki jaka ha Lawmusiang, u Superintendent of Police(SP), West Jaintia Hills(WJH), u la pynlong da ka jingïalang ba kongsan bad ki nongmihkhmat ba na ka Tympang Dorbar Shnong (Tympang Club), Mission Compound bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Pohshnong ha ka 2 tarik, Naiwieng. Katei ka jingïalang, kaba la bud da ka jingkhmih bniah jong ka Lawmusiang bad ki jaka jong ka mission compound, ka la pynlong da ka jingteh lakam ban pyndonkam da ki buit thymmai na ka bynta ka jingdheng kali.Mar mar, la buh noh da ka dak “No-entry” na ka bynta ki kali heh bad kiba biang naduh ka 7 baje mynstep haduh ka 8 baje mynmiet. Katba ki kali rit kali ria, kum ki trok rit, ki trok Bolero pick-up bad kiwei kiwei ki kali kit mar kit mata bad ki bam ki dih, yn sa pyrkhing ba kin ïoh jingbit ban pynïeng ha Lawmusiang bad ki jaka mission compound hapdeng ka por 8 baje mynstep bad 7 baje da miet. Katba ki kali ba bym kit mar kit mata bad ki kali kit palat pud kin shah ïaid hashwa ka 8 baje mynstep ne 8 baje da miet. Ha kawei pat ka liang na ka bynta kiba pynïeng ïa ki kali, kin ïoh jingbit ba kyrpang na ka ophis treikam jong u SP, WJH.
title: La pynbna ban shim khia halor ka jingteh lakam ïa ka jingdheng kali ha Jowai

content: Ka Sabahmuswang ka la lah ban pynliem da kaba suk ïa ka Moosyiem Shangpung ha ka jingïakhun na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai. Ïa kane ka jingïalehkai la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka jingïakhun u Chare Mulieh u la khyrwit da ka hat-trick, kata ha ka minit ba 85, 89, bad 90+2, u Wanmiki Lyngdoh u la ïoh ban thep 2 kol ha ka minit ba 79 bad 81 bad u Needful Shylla u la ïoh ban ïarap shi kol ha ka minit ba 74.Ka Moosyiem ka la ïoh ban pynphai tang shi kol lyngba u Shickel Langbang.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 1 tarik Naiwieng kan long hapdeng ka Mookyndur pyrshah ïa ka Demthring ha ka por 12 baje shiteng sngi.
title: Shiteng dorjon pynbam ka Sabahmuswang ïa ka Moosyiem Shangpung ha ka 1st Division WJDSA

content: :La ïoh kem ïa uwei u nongkhaïi drok lem bad 920 tylli ki kuli dawai nitrazepam ha jingkieng Umshyrpi ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi palei, pynbna u SP ka ri, u Vivek Syiem. Ha katei ka jingshah kem jong u, la ïoh kurup ïa ka mobile phone, phra tylli ki kot khubor ba song ïa ki song dawai bad la bek kieng ruh kumjuh, la ïoh na utei u briew ba la don 45 snem ka rta, ong u Vivek. La dep ujor da ka mukotduma hapoh ka kyndon NDPS Act na ka bynta ka jingkhaïi ïa ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid pyrshah ïa u hapoh ka thanad Lumdiengjri.
title: Ïoh kem ïa u nongkhaïi drok ha jingkieng Umshyrpi

content: :Ka tamasa ba la pynlong man la u snem, ka Shad Nongkrem, kaba dei ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingpyni ïa ka sap ka phong jong ka kolshor ki Khasi, dang shen, la dep pynlong ha Ing Sad Smit bad la pynkut noh ïa ka ha ka 2 tarik, Naiwieng. Katei ka tamasa, ka dei ka jingpyndon burom ïa ka niam tynrai ki Khasi kaba la pynlong da ka jingshad Khasi bad pan jingkyrkhu na u Blei na ka bynta ka jingseisoh ka ri.Ïa katei ka tamasa kaba riewspah ha ka kolshor, ka Shad Nongkrem ka la wanrah lang ïa ka imlang ka sahlang jong ki Khasi ha ka jingbun ki rong ki rup bad ka jingkmen jong ka niam tynrai jong ki. Katei ka tamasa ka la pynïoh ka lad kabu ksiar na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong bad ki paidbah ba sakhi ha aktei ka por ba kin ïoh peit ïa ka riti ka dustur jong ka kolshor ba riewspah ki Khasi.Ha katei ka tamasa ba la dep pynlong mynta u snem ka la don bun ki nongïashim bynta haduh 288 ngut ki nongshad, kynthup ïa 118 ngut ki rang kynsai bad 170 ngut ki thei sotti, lem bad ka jingdon lang ki nongshah khot sngewbha bad ki kongsan, kynthup ïa u Symbud Myntri, u Prestone Tynsong, Director General of Police (DGP), u LR Bishnoi bad u Chief Secretary, u DP Wahlang. Katba u Deputy Commissioner, u R.M. Kurbah, Chief Executive Member (CEM), u Pyniaid Sing Syiem, dkhot jong ka District Council (MDC), u Fantin Lakadong, Grace Kharpuri, Lamphang Blah, P.N. Syiem, MLA, u Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit abd u Shakliar Wajri, ki la don lang ha katei ka tamasa ba iphuh iphieng.
title: Ka tamasa Shad Nongkrem: Ka jingpyni ïa ka sap ka phong jong ka kolshor bad ka dustur ki Khasi

content: AWKYRWAT:Ka Hynñiewtrep Achik National Movement  South West Khasi Hills District kum  ka dak ka jingïasnoh kti lang bad ka HANM  Sengkmie kaba la leit ban dawa ha khmat ka sorkar ha Nongbah Delhi na ka bynta ïa ki 3 tylli mat jong ka jylla, ban pynrung noh ïa ka ktien khasi bad Garo haka khyrnit kaba phra jong riti shynshar jong ka Ri india, ban pynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam ha pdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam, bad  ban ai noh ïa ka ILP hangne hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya.Kumta ka HANM,  SWKHD mynta ka sngi kala pynlong ïa ka jing teh ïa ki  banner ha kylleng ki jaka  ha Mawkyrwat bad ban wer ruh ïa ki pait jong ka Bri u 7trep khamtam ïa ki paitbah jong ka South West Khasi Hills District  ban ai ka jingkyrshan ba pura ïaka seng HANM khnang ba ha ka jingdawa jong ka seng kan long kaba jop ong u Bah  W. Lyngdoh, Secretary ka HANM South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Ai jingkyrshan ka HANM ha SWKHD ïa ka Sengkmie halor lai tylli mat jingdawa ha Delhi

content: Ka Supreme Court Collegium ha ka 2 tarik u Naiwieng ka la ai jingmut ban thung ia u nongbishar S Vaidyanathan  jong ka Madras High Court ban long kum u nongbishar jong ka jylla Meghalaya High Court. Kane ka jingthmu ban thung ia u Vaidyanathan Ka long hadien ba u Sanjib Banerjee  nongbishar u la shongthait noh kum u Chief Justice ka Meghalaya High Court.Hadien ba ka Collegium ba la lam khmat da u Chief Justice of India (CJI) DY Chandrachud la ai jingmut ban thung  ia u Justice Vaidyanathan kum u Chief Justice ka Meghalaya.
title: S Vaidyanathan kum u Chief justice ka Meghalaya High Court

content: :Ka All Souls Day ka dei ka sngi ba la rakhe da ki paid bynriew Katholik ha ka lum jingtep jong ka Katholik, Laitumkhrah, Shillong, ha ka 2 tarik, Naiwieng. La bun ki paid bynriew kiba la kynmaw pyndon burom na ka bynta kiba la khlad bad ki la pynlong da ka jingduwai ha ki lum jingtep jong ki.Kum ka dak buh jingkynmaw na ka bynta jong ki, ki bahaïing ha sem bad ki paralok para jor ki la pynlong jingduwai bad pynwandur ïa ki lum jingtep da kaba buh da ki syntiew bad ki bombati. Ha katei ka jingrakhe, la pynlong da ka mass ba kyrpang da u Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh hapoh katei ka lum jingtep.Ha ka All Souls’ Day, ki paidbah ki la kynmaw bad duwai na ka bynta ki baieid bathoiñ jong ki kiba la khlad noh na kane ka pyrthei khnang ban ïohpdiang ïa ka jingsuk ba shi junom bad mynta ka dang ïaid shakhmat da ka jingkhuid.
title: Rakhe ïa ka All Souls’ Day ha ka lum jingtep Katholik ha Laitumkhrah

content: Ka Meghalaya kala ïasnohkti ha ka Under2 Coalition, bad da kane kala long ka jylla ba 7 ka India ban iadonbynta ha ka jingïatreilang ki jylla bad ki sorkar ha ka pyrthei ban poi sha ka thong ban ym pynmih shuh da leilei ia ki lyer bih kat ha ka snem 2050 kaba kloi eh.Ka Meghalaya kan iadonbynta bad kumba 170 kiwei pat ki kynhun ban pynkhlain ia ki kam ban ialeh pyrshah ia ka jingkylla ka suinbneng. Hapoh ka Under2 Coalition, yn pynkhih ia ka jingiaioh jinghikai ba mar kylliang para sorkar, ban ia ai jingtip bad ban aibuit ia ki mat treikam ba donkam ban pynsted ia ki kam. Wat hapdeng ka jingrit ka jaka, ka jylla ka shim ia ki sienjam halor kiei kiba dei ban leh bad ka dei kawei na kiba nyngkong ki jylla ba don khlaw ha Asia ban bud ia ka rukom treikam bala tip kum ka ‘Environment State’ ne kiba ka ioh ka kot ka shong ha ka mariang; ki kam pynroi ki shong ha ka jingioh na ka mariang ne kata ka ‘nature banking’ bad ‘nature markers’ bad ka jingthmu ka long ban don ka ioh ka kot ba pynneh ia ki jingdon ka mariang.U myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad Sangma ula ong ba kane ka jingiasnohkti: “Ka dei ha ka por ba pynshong nongrim ha ka mariang, ha kaba ka long kaba kongsan ia ki sorkar bad ki thain kum ka Meghalaya ban iatreilang, ban ioh jinghikai bad iatreilang bad kiwei ki thain ba shaniah ha ka mariang na ka bynta ka ioh ka kot. Ka Under2 Coalition ka dei ka rynsan ban iatreilang para phang sepngi khnang ban lah ban iasam jingtip.”Ka Meghalaya kala plie ia kiba bun ki lad ban leh eiei na ka bynta ban pynbha ia ka jinglong jingman ka suinbneng. Kawei na kine ka dei ka jingbuh ia ka programme bala tip kum ka conservation basic income programme ha kaba ia 14,000 ngut ki samla la ai jinghikai.  Kane ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong ban don kum kane. Ka jylla kala buh ruh ia ka unique climate change museum bad la leh ia kane na ka bynta ki paidbah ha ki jaka sor ba kin ioh iakren shaphang ka jingkylla ka suinbneng.La sdang ruh ia ka ‘Biodiversity Heatmap’ ban pynshongdor ia ki jingdon ka mariang kiba la rim ha ka jylla bad ka Payment for Ecosystem Services (PES) Pilot ban iarap ha ki kam pisa ban pynneh ia ki jingdon ka mariang. Ka jylla kan iasam ia ki jingioh jinghikai na kine ki programme bad ki kynhun ba iatreilang.Ha kawei pat ka liang, u Sampath Kumar, CEO ka Meghalaya Basin Development Authority bad Principal Secretary ka tnad ka koit ka khiah bad Convener ka State Climate Action Council, ula ong: “Ka Meghalaya ka don ia ka jingmynjur ka sorkar bad ki paidbah ban buh ia ka lad ka ioh ka kot bym pynsniew ia ka suinbneng.” U/Ka Dr Divya Sharma, India Executive Director ha ka Climate Group, la ong: “Ngi pdiang sngewbha ia ka Meghalaya sha ka Under2 Coalition. Lyngba kane, ka Meghalaya kala ïasnohktilang bad ki thain kiba kloi ban leh eiei na ka bynta ka jingkylla ka suinbneng. Ka jingiashimbynta jong ka kan pynsawa ia ka sur ba khlain ha ka phang shathie, bad kan pyni ia kaei kaba ka Meghalayaka don ban ai.”Kiwei ki dkhot na India ha ka Under2 Coalition ki dei ka Chhattisgarh, Maharashtra, Punjab, Telangana, Tripura, West Bengal bad Jammu & Kashmir. Da ka jingkynthup ia ka Meghalaya, kine ki 8 tylli ki mihkhmat palat ia ka 29% ka jingbun briew ha India bad ki noh synñiang kumba 30% sha ka GDP ka ri.
title: Ka Meghalaya ka long ka jylla ba 7 ka India ban ïasnohkti ha kaba leh eiei ha ka jingkylla ka suinbneng.

content: :Ha ka jingjam sha kawei pat ka lynti na ka bynta ban pynkiew ïa ka kam khaïi ïa ki soh jong ka jylla Meghalaya, ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la ïohrung hapoh ka Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) bad ka kompeni Lulu Group na ka bynta ban tei ïa ka jingïadei paralok na ka bynta ka jingkiew bad jingpynithuh ïa ka ka rep kam riang na Meghalaya ha ki ri jong ka GCC. Ka MoU ka la thmu ha ka ban pynïasoh ïa ki nongrep bad kitei ki kompeni na rii phoreiñ na ka bynta ki tiar ki tar na kane ka jylla bad pynithuh ïa ki khnang ban lah ban pynmih ïa ka bainong ne pisa baheh.Kum ban shu pynkymmaw, kane ka la wan hadien ba ka jylla ka la ïoh ïa ka dak Geographical Indication (GI) na ka bynta ki soh niamtra Meghalaya Khasi Mandarin bad u soh Kew Pineapple ha ka Gulf Market. Ha ka jingtrei shitom ban pynïohnong ïa ki nongrep, ka sorkar jylla ka la lah ban khaïi ïa u shynrai Lakadong bad u sying sha ki ïew Europe ha kine ki snem ba la dep.
title: Pynkiew ka ri da kaba khaïi da ki Kew Pineapples, ki soh niamtra Khasi Mandarin sha ka kompeni Lulu Group

content: :Ka Myntri sorkar, ka Amareen Lyngdoh ha ka 3 tarik, Naiwieng ka la plie pyrda ïa ka Meghalaya pavilion ha ka tasmasa ‘World Food India 2023’ kaba la dep pynlong ha Pragati Maidan ha New Delhi. Ka Lyngdoh, kaba la synran da ka Secretary jong ka tnad Community and Rural Development, ka Isawanda Laloo ha katei ka jingplie pyrda, ka la pyntip ba ha ka pavilion, la pynïaid haduh 31 ngut ki nongseng kam lajong na kylleng ka ri bad ka ai ka lad kabu ksiar ba kin pyni ïa ki tiar ki tar jong ki sha ki paidbah. Ïa katei, la khot da ka ‘Meghalaya Collectives’, katei ka pavilion kan sa pyni ïa bun ki tiar ki tar na kane ka ri.
title: Plie pyrda ka Ampareen ïa ka Meghalaya Pavilion ha ka tamasa ‘World Food India’ ha Delhi

content: :Ka tnad bording ka la kyrpad ïa ka tnad transport ba kan bishar biang ïa ka hukum da kaba pyrkhing ïa ki kali baheh ba kit palat pud ïa ka 15 MT bad ban ïaid na ka jingkieng Umiam. Ha ka shithi sha u Commissioner & Secretary Transport ha ka 1 tarik, Naiwieng, ka Under Secretary jong ka tnad bording ka la phah da ka kaiphod halor ka jingïoh jingïada jong katei ka jingkieng Umiam kaba dei ka dam ba la dep tei na IIT, Guwahati.“Katei ka kaiphod ka la ong ba “ym dei ban shah ïa ki kali ba kit palat pud ba kin ïoh jingbit ban ïaid na katei ka surok ba dang treikam ki nongtrei (kynthup ïa ka jingteh ïa u bim bad ka deck slab) bad ba dei ban ai jingbit ban kit tang 15 MT haba ïaid na katei ka jingkieng,” thoh ha katei ka shithi. “Ha kaba ïadei bad katei, la kyrpad ïaphi ba phin bishar biang ïa ka jinghukum jong ka tnad jong phi kaba la pyrkhing ban ai jingbit ïa ki kali kit palat pud ïa ka 20 MT haduh 15 MT. Ïa kane, la kyrmen ba phin kohnguh,” bynrap ka shithi.Ha ka 30 tarik, Risaw, u president jong ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) East Khasi Hills District, u Bless Dkhar u la shah kem na ka daw jingshah kynnoh ba u la dawa pisa beaiñ na ki trok kit mar kiba la ïaid lyngba ka jingkieng Umiam. U la shah kem na Pohkseh bad u Dkhar u la ïohlum haduh T. 1500 na man la ki trok ba kit mar kit mata palat pud, da kaba ai jingbit ïa ki ban ïaid na katei ka jingkieng.
title: Kyrpad ka tnad Transport ban pyrkhing pynkhih ïa ki kali heh hapoh jingkieng Umaim Bridge

content: :U Symbud Myntri ka jylla Meghalaya, u Prestone Tynsong, ha ka 3 tarik, Naiwieng, u la ong ba u Myntri rangbah un pynlong da ka jingïalang la shem taïew na ka bynta ban ïakren shaphang ka Meghalaya Residents Safety and Security (Amended) act, kaba la pynphai noh da ka sorkar pdeng dang shen bad ïa mynta, ka sorkar ka la sdang pyntreikam ïa ka MRSSA 2016 ha ki hynñiew tylli ki shnong hapoh Shillong.“Ka tnad jong ka kam poh ïing ka la pynphai noh ïa ka mat treikam MRSSA kaba la dep phah ha Assembly bad ngin sa pynlong da ka jingïalang la shem taïew ban ïakren shaphang ki mat ba kongsan kiba la buh shakhmat da ka MHA,” ong u Tynsong. U Tynsong u la ong ba ka Task Force Committee ka la don ha kajuh ka jaka bad baroh ki Deputy Commissioners’ ki la shah hukum ban sdang pyntreikam ïa ka MRSSA.
title: Yn pynlong jingïalang ka sorkar jylla naba la pynphai ïa ka Amended MRSSA da ka tnad ka kam poh ïing

content: :Ka Joint Action Commitee ( JAC) war Jaintia shen kan sa leit ujor sha ka ïingbishar Meghalaya High court pyrshah ïa ka Dhar Company halor ka jingpyntrei torti ïa ka surok National Highway (NH-206) ïa kane la ïathuh da u Chairman ka JAC u bah Yoodahunki Shylla ha ka jingïakynduh bad ki ladpathai khubor ha ka 4 tarik Naiwieng 2023. Ïa ka JAC, la thaw na ka bynta ban bud dien ïa ka surok NH206, ka ba dei na Nongtalang sha Dawki ka ba don 16 Km kaba la mang na ka bynta T.43 klur tam ka pisa bad ka dei ka surok ka ba la pyntrei da ka Dhar Company ka ba la sdang ban shna ha ka 9/9/2022 bad pyndep tang hapoh ka 12 bnai.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Yoodahunki Shylla u la ïathuh “haba ka Dhar Company ka la pyndep ban shna ïa kane ka Surok bad haba ka JAC ka la leit ban jurip ka la lap ïa ka jingpyntrei torti ka ba tang 2 bnai hadien ba la dep shna kane ka surok ka la sniew biang”. U la ong “Hadien ka jingleit jurip ka JAC ka la pan da RTI ban lap ïa ka jingtip bniah halor kane ka surok la lap ba na ka liang ki Engineer ki la dep ban pynlait pisa haduh T12 klur tam sha ki kontractor, khlem da leh ïa ka jingbishar bniah ba ka jingshna ïa kane ka surok la leh kat kum ki kyndon ka PWD ne em, ka ba paw ba ki kyndon ka PWD ki don tang ha ki kot”.“Na ka liang ka JAC ka la shong da ka jingïalang bad ki nongïalam shnong kine ki thaiñ bad shim ïa kawei ka rai ba kin leit ujor noh sha ka ïingbishar pyrshah ïa kane ka Dhar Company ka ba la pyntrei torti ïa kane ka surok ” u la bynrap. U la ong shuh shuh ba ka JAC ka dawa na u Chief Engineer ba u dei ban pynshai halor ka jingleh matlah jong ka tnad ïa ki jingpyntrei torti ka Dhar Company ïa kane ka surok namar tang 2 bnai hadien ba la dep shna kane ka surok ka la jot rathai biang.
title: Yn ujor ka  JAC War Jaintia sha ïingbishar pyrshah ïa ka Dhar Company halor ka jingpyntrei torti ïa ka surok NH-206

content: :U Vice Chancellor(VC) ka North Eastern Hill University (NEHU), u Prabha Shankar Shukla, ha ka 4 tarik, Naiwieng, u la ong ba u Rohit Prasad, uba trei kontrak kum u Technical Officer/Senior Consultant ha NEHU um lah ban shah weng kam mardor khlem kano kano ka jingkynnoh.“Hato kano kano ka bor pynïaid kam lah ban weng kam ïa u Rohit Prasad khlem kano kano ka jingkynnoh. Ki lah ban don ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa u, dei?  Ym don kano kano ka bor ba dei peit kaba don ha ka bor kan lah ban weng kam ïa ki nongtrei kontrak ne kiba trei la bun bun snem,” ong u Shukla.U Vice Chancellor u la ong ba dei ban don da ka kyndon bad lada ka JAC ka don kano kano ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa u Prasad, katei ka jaka pule ka la pynkhreh ban shim rai ban weng kam ïa u. Kumban shu pyntip, ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) dang shen, ka dang kynnoh ba ïa u Prasad, la pynrung kam beaiñ da ka NEHU, kaba la shah kynthoh na ki bynta ba bun halor ka jingdawa jubor jong ka JAC ban weng kam noh ïa u Prasad na ka ophis treikam jong u.
title: Ym lah ban weng ïa u Rohit khlem kano kano ka jingkynnoh: NEHU VC

content: :Uwei u nongkhaïi drok uba la don dak sniew mynshuwa u la shah kem noh ha ka 4 tarik, Naiwieng, katba u dang pyrshang ban die drok hajan Police Point Laitumkhrah. Katba ki paidbah kiba la suba sniew ïa utei u nongkhaïi drok, ki la ujor ïa katei ka jingjia sha ka thanad jong ka Laitumkhrah, kaba lam sha ka jingleit kem mardor ïa u da ka Anti-Narcotics Task Force (ANTF). Yn tohkit bad pynshitom ïa u da ka ANTF kaba la ïoh kurup ïa ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid, kynthup ïa ki shiphew tylli ki drok Heroin, ba khia haduh 10.97 gram, kawei ka plastik ba rong ïong ba don 35 tylli ki tyndong drok ba la thylli, kawei ka mobile phone bad ka pisa ba haduh T. 6,310.
title: Shah kem u nongkhaïi drok ba thmu die drok ha Laitumkhrah

content: Ban wanrah ia ka jingiaid beit iaid ryntih ha ka jylla ka Shillong Traffic Police (STP) ka la wanrah ïa ki katto katne ki jingpynkylla ha ka rukom ïaid jong ki kali ha ki surok ka ban treikam pura naduh ka 6 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023. Kitei jingpynkylla ki kynthup ia ki thaiñ Madanrting bad Polo ha ki bynta jong ka Polo, yn ym shah ban rung na 4th Furlong ïa ki kali kiba thmu ban leit sha Polo, hynrei ki hap ban phai noh na ki bynta jong ka CS, Pinewood, B.K Bajoria. Yn ym shah shuh ban phai sha ka liang kamon ha Matri Mandir ïa ki kali kiba thmu ban leit sha ïew Polo hynrei ki hap ban leit beit sha 4th Furlong. Yn ym shah shuh ban phai ha ki bynta jong ka Green Hills ïa ki kali kiba wan na ki thaiñ jong ka surok Polo Towers bad kiba thmu ban leit sha 4th Furlong, hynrei ki hap ban leit sha ka liang kamon kata sha Ïew Polo bad nangta sa leit sha 4th Furlong. Ka surok na Lumbasuk shaduh sha National Law University (NLU) kan dei noh ka ‘One Way’ bad  ki kali kin hap ban ïaid tang na ka surok Lumbasuk sha NLU. Ka surok naduh na surok Demthring Petrol pump shaduh sha Madanrting Presbyterian kan dei ka ‘One Way’ bad ki kali ki lah ban ïaid tang na Demthring Petrol Pump bad leit sha ka surok Madanrting Presbyterian. Ka surok na ka Ïew Madanrting shaduh Demthring Petrol Pump kan dei ka ‘One Way, bad ki kali ki lah ban ïaid tang na Ïew Madanrting bad leit sha Demthring Petrol Pump.
title: Ka rukom ïaid kali thymmai na Polo bad Madanrting kan treikam naduh ka 6 tarik u Naiwieng

content: Ka tnad Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery (CTVS ka North Eastern Indira Gandhi Regional Institute of Health and Medical Sciences, NEIGRIHMS ka la ioh ia ka jingjop ha kaba ka la lah ban pyndep ia ka  jingpuid ia ka jingpang klongsnam ba la tip kum ka Vieussens’ Ring ryngkat bad ka  Coronary Artery Disease.Kane ka jingpang klongsnam Vieussens ka long kaba kham pher bad kham niar ban shem  bad ka  kane ka jingpang ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingthut jong ka rukom treikam jong ki thied snam  ki ba don sha ka mon bad sha ka diang jong u klongsnam.Ia kane ka jingpang la sumar da u   da u Dr. Amit Malviya (Additional Professor Cardiology) and Dr. Donbok Lynser (Additional Professor Radiology). Kine ki jait jingpang la lap haduh mynta ba ki don tang  56 ngut kiba la ioh ia kane ka jingpang ha baroh kawei ka pyrthei.U Prof C Daniala uba long u Medical Superintendent, NEIGIRHMS u la ai khblei ia ka tnad  sumar Cardiothoracic bad VascularSurgery  na ka bynta ka jinglah jong ki ban sumar ia kane ka jingpang kaba kham jwat bad u la ong ruh ba kane ka jingpuid ka pyni ia ka jingtbit jong kane ka kynhun jong ngi.
title: Ioh jingjop ka tnad Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery ha kaba puid ïa ka jingpang klongsnam

content: Ka Myntri ki kam ka rep ka riang, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pynbna ba la leh kmen ka leh sngwebha tlang, ia kaba la tip kum ka “Winter Tales” kan long hapeng 14 ba 16 tarik u Nohprah, 2023 ha Nan Polok, Shillong. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka long ban pyni sha ka phyrthei ia ka sap ka phong ong ki nongdro, ka jingpyni ia ka die ka thied ia ki tiar bashna hi, ka rwai ka siaw bad ka put ka tem bad jingpyni ia ka shet ka tiew bad jingbam kiba ba na Meghalaya. Ka jingpynbna ia kane katamsa la pynlong ha Meghalaya Age Store, New Dehi ha kane ka sngi lah Sngi Palei.Kan sa long ruh ka sngi ka ban sah jingkynmaw ia ka Meghalayan Age Store, New Delhi kaba la dap mynta ar snem.Ha katei ka sngi, la ioh ruh ia ka jingpyni ia ka Video Cliping kaba ia dei bad ka jingiaid lynti jong ka Meghalaya Age Store, kaba lon g ka jaka ha ba pyni ia ka dur ka dar jong ka Meghalaya sha ka pyrthei, ha kaba ia dei bad ba larity jong ki jaitbynriew Khasi Pnar bad Achik jong ka Meghalaya.Ha kane ka jaka, lah ban iohi ia ka jingbuh ia ki ksing, ki duitary, ki jait bathain hi ki nong Meghalaya, ki tiar ba shna hi da ki kti bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalatya bad ruh ia ki kot kiba ia dei bad ka larity jong ki jait bynriew ka Meghalaya, ha kaba ki paidbah i lah ban thied ia ki. Ha katei ka sngi, ka Myntri ka tnad ka rep ka riang, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, ka la pyllait paidbah ruh ruh ia ka Amlanak ka jong ka Meghalaya Age Store ha kaba la buh ia ki jingdro baitynnad jong u Bah . Kharlukhi.U Bah P. Kharlukhi u la long uba sngewtynnad ia jingshondur bad dor jingdro naduh ba u dang khynnah. Ha kane ka jingiaid lynti jong u kum nongdor u la ieh noh ia ki shipor namarba u hap ban pyndei ia kiwei pat ki jingtrei kiba u hap ban pyndep ha ka jingim jong u.Hynrei, haba ka Meghalaya bad ka pyrthei hi baroh kawei ka la shah la shah lynshop bad lynsher ha a khlam Covid-19, kaba kynthrup ia ka jingkhang ia ka leit ka wan bad ia ka trei ka ktah bad ia ka iaid ka ieng, u Bah Khalukhi u la sdang biang ban dro jingdro. Kine ki sngi dur ba la pynmih ha kane ka Almanak-2024 jong ka Meghalaya Age ki dei ki matti jong u P. Kharlukhi. Kine ki jingdor ki pynphalang ia ka jingtynnad jong ka mariang hapoh ka Bri u Hynniewtreip Hynniewskum.Ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingpynihuh iphieng ia katei ka da ka jingrwai na Ka Curator jong ka Meghalaya Age na ki san ksai jong ka jyntep Guitar. Ia kane ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingai mynsiem jong ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, kaba long ka Chief Executive Office jong ka STEM. Haba kren ha katei sngi kum ka Kongsan, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya, ki long kiba ieid ia ka mariang. Ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewburom ia ka Meghalaya Age kaba don ha nongbah Delhi ban pathai lem ia ka larity ong ki jaitbynriew jong ka Meghalaya.
title: Yn pynlong ïa ka leh kmen Winter Tales ha Nan Palok Shillong

content: :U Myntri rangbah jong ka jyllla Meghalaya, u Conrad Sangma, u la plie pyrda ïa ka tamasa jong ka North Eastern Region Car Rally ha Shillong, ha ka 6 tarik, Naiwieng, kaba dei ka tamasa ba hap hapoh ka prokram ba la ai nam na ka bynta ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap 75 snem jong ka National Cadet Corps (NCC). Ka NCC, kaba la pyndon burom ïa ki nongïalam ïada ri, ki briew ba don ka jingïa tylli lang kawei bad ki riewshlur napdeng ki samla, ka la wanrah lang ïa ka jingdon bynta lang jong ki nongïashim bynta na ka bynta ka NER Car Rally, kaba la ïashim bynta haduh 277 tylli ki skul, 151 tylli ki college bad 44 tylli ki district na kylleng jong ki hynriew tylli ki jylla North East.
title: Pynher lama NER u Conrad kum shi bynta jong ka jingrakhe ïa ka jingdap 75 snem ka NCC

content: :Ka hotel ba remdor hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya, ka Courtyard by Marriott Shillong, ka la pynïaid ïa ka tamasa khleh cake ha ka 5 tarik, Naiwieng. Katei ka tamasa, kaba la pynlong ha ka jaka jngi kai jong katei ka hotel, ka long ka jingrakhe ïa u bnai shuti ban wan, kaba dei ka por jong ka jingïa kynduh lang ki bahaïing hasem bad ki paralok para jor kiban thaw ïa la ki jong ki tynrai jong ka jingshet. Ha katei ka tamasa, ki nongïashim bynta, kiba la phong da ki jaiñ apron bad ki glove, ki la wan lang hajuh ban ïa khleh ïa u cake ha kawei ka bowl ba radbah, na ka bynta ban khleh bun ki jingkhleh jong u cake.Ka jingkhleh cake ka dei ka tamasa ba la rakhe ïa ka tynrai shet jingshet jong ka jingsdang ïa ka jingpdiang ïa ka shuti, la ka dei ha u risaw ne ba sdang jong u Naiwieng. Ka long ka rukom ba dei ban bynrap ïa ki jingbam kum ki raisin, ki snep mit mit, ki soh cherry, almond, ki jingbam sat ba bun bad ruh theh bun ka kynja jingdih pynbuaid, ba kynthup ïa ka brandy ne ka rum, kaba ïarap ban im ki soh ki pai bad ban pynlong ïa u cake ba bun da ka jingbang.Mar syn khleh lang kitei ki jingbam baroh bad kumjuh ruh ka kynja jingdih pynbuaid, la ieh shwa na ka bynta ban kjit lut kitei ki jingkhleh baroh bad buh haduh da ki bnai ki bnai, da kaba ai ba ka jingbang jong u cake kan biang pura bad bang shuh shuh haba la dei ka por ban bam ïa u. Katba nang jan ka aïom shuti, kane ka jingkhleh ba la pynbiang bad pynkhreh, kan long ka met bad mynsiem jong u cake ba la biang pura, kaba yn sa long ka aïom jong ka jingkmen bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Rakhe ka Courtyard by Marriott Shillong ïa ka tamasa khleh cake ha ka jylla

content: :Ha ka jingïakynduh ha ka jingïalang hapdeng jong u Myntri rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma bad ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka 6 tarik, Naiwieng, ka la dpn ka jingbishar biang ïa ka rukom treikam jong ki Civil Hospital bad ki District Hospital ha kylleng ka jylla Meghalaya. Ha katei ka jingïalang, la don ka jingkhmih biang ïa ka rukom treikam jong kine ki tnad ka koit ka khiah khnang ban biang ka rukom trei rukom ktah.Katkum ka jingïoh lum na ka lad pathai khubor hadien jong katei ka jingïalang, ka Lyngdoh ka la pyntip ba ki jingdonkam ba kongsan hapoh kine ki hospital dei ka Human Resource (HR) bad u Myntri rangbah u la pyntip shaphang ka jingduna ki nurse, nongtrei jong ki hospital, specialist, doktor ba sumar, kaba long ka mat ba kongsan ba donkam kyrkieh ban bishar.Da kaba pyntip ba kane ka jingbishar ba la pyndep, ka long kum ka jingthmu ban pynthikna ba ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka dang pyrshang ban buddien ïa ka rukom treikam jong baroh ki hospital bad pynbiang lut nadong shadong, ka la ong a yn sa don sa kawei pat ka jingïalang ka ban sa long ha kine ki sngi ban wan na ka bynta ban ïoh peit sa sha kiwei pat ki jaka bad kaei kaba donkam ba ka sorkar kan shimkhia khnang ban pynthikna ba ka rukom treikam kan biang.“Ngi la ai buh por ïalade kumba 24-36 bnai bad ngin bishar bin pa bin. Ngi la shim rai ba ka long kaba donkam na ka bynta jong ngi ban pynbiang ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah ha kylleng ka jylla na ka bynta ban pynthikna ki doktor ba kin sngew ïoh mynsiem ban trei ha ki jaka ba jngai,” ong ka Lyngdoh.
title: Bishar biang ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ïa ka rukom treikam ki Civil Hospital hapoh jylla

content: :Hadien jong ka jingtrei shitom ban wad ïa ka metïap jong u nongñiah ïa ka trok haduh 16 kynta, ki nongtrei jong ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI), ha ka 5 tarik, Naiwieng, ki la ïoh ïa katei ka metïap jong une u nongñiah trok uba la hap hapoh ka khap jong ka wahduit ha Umling. Ïa katei ka jingleit wad, la pynlong da ki bahaïing jong utei u briew ba la ïap.Haba ïakren shaphang katei ka jingjia, ka la jia ha ka por 9 baje mynmiet ha ka 4 tarik, Naiwieng bad ym pat lah ban tip ïa ka daw jong katei ka jingjia aksiden. Hynrei, don na ki lad pathai kot khubor ki la ïoh lum jingtip ba na ka daw jong ka jingpyn her stet jong une u nongñiah ïa katei ka trok bad ka jingkhun ka surok hapoh kane ka jaka, ka la pynlong ïa ka jingjia aksiden. Katei trok ka don ïa u nombar kali AP 07 TM7649.Katba u handyman uba la synran lang ïa katei ka trok, u la lait im noh bad u la mynsaw jur hadien katei ka aksiden bad u la shah rah noh sha Civil Hospital jong ka Nongpoh na ka bynta ka jingsumar. Ïa utei uba la khlad noh, la ithuh kum u Jamal Mia, ba la don 30 snem ka rta bad uba na Barpeta, katkum ka jingïoh jingtip na ka liang ki bahaïing ha sem jong u. Haba kren biang shaphang katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih, ka la jia ha ka 4 tarik, Naiwieng kumba 9 baje mynmiet, katba ïa ka met jong u nongñiah, la lap ha ka 5 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 ha ka por 1:30 janmiet da ki pulit jong ka Nongpoh bad ka National Highway Authority of India.
title: La lap ïa ka metïap jong u nongñiah trok hadien 16 kynta ba wad ha Umling

content: :Ka Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha ka sorkar jylla ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kyntu ïa ki nongtrei Ki  Accredited Social  Health Activist (ASHA)  ba ki dei ban sdang noh ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki, namar ba na ka liang ka Sorkar kan ym lah ban pdiang lut ïa baroh ki jingdawa jong ki.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ka kong Ampareen ka la ong ba “ki ASHA ki dei ki nongtrei mon sngewbha bad na ka liang ka Sorkar ruh ka ju siew da ka jingïarap pisa na ka bynta ka jingai jingshakri jong ki ha ka  tnad ka koit ka khia, ha ki khynniat bnai ka la don ka por ba ki la shah pynslem ka jingsiew hynrei na ka liang ka Sorkar MDA ka la shim khia ban siew ïa ki ASHA.“Kumba ka long mynta na ka liang jong nga kum ka Myntri ka tnad nga la ïoh ban ïathir halor ki jingdawa jong ki, ka ba kynthup ïa ka jingpynïoh jingsumar ei ïa baroh ki ASHA lada ki mat ïa ki jingshitom ,ha ka ba ïadei bad kane ka jingdawa na ka liang ka sorkar ka la kular ba kan ïarap ïa ki” ka la ong.Ka la bynrap “Hynrei ha ka ba ïadei bad ka jingshim ïa ka bor na ki dorbar shnong  lane ki Village Health Council (VHC) ban ym tuklar ïa ka jingthungkam bad jing weng kam ïa ki ASHA, na ka liang ka Sorkar kan ym pdiang ïa kane namar ba ki dorbar shnong ki dei ki bynta ki ba donkam tam namar ki khmih bad ïarap ïa ka sorkar na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ïa ki 6000 tylli ki shnong ha ka jylla”.Ka Kong Ampareen ka la ong shuh shuh ba ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ki ïoh ban ai ka jingshakri tang na ka bynta 2 snem bad hadien ka 2 snem hap ban ïalad sa ïa kiwei ba kin trei ïa kane ka kam bad halor kane ka kam ASHA ka donkam ban don ka jingbujli ïa ki nongtrei khnang ban don ka jingpynkhlaiñ ïa ka jingai jingsumar sha u paidbah.“Na ka liang ka tnad kan sa shim ïa ki sienjam ban dang pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ki lad jingïarap ha ka koit ka khia da ka ba ai jinghikai sha ki dorbar shnong bad ka sorkar kan bthah ïa ki dorbar shnong ruh ban thungkam noh ïa ki Nurse – ANM ki ba la ïoh jinghikai ban sumar ïa ki briew hynrei ki ba khlem ïoh ïa ki kam ki jam, kumta ka sorkar kan kyntu ïa ki Dorbar  shnong ba kin thung ïa ki Nurse ANM ha ki VHC jong ki.Ka Kong Ampareen ka la kyntu ïa baroh ki ASHA ba ki dei ban burom ïa ki dorbar shnong namar ba ka dei ka dorbar shnong ka ba kit khlieh ha ki shnong ki thaw lada ki mad ïa kano kano ka jingeh. Ka Myntri ka la kren shai ba na ka liang ka sorkar kan ym lah ban kular eiei ïa ki namar kan ktah ïa kiwei pat ki nongtrei mon sngewbha  na kiwei ki tnad. “Ki ASHA ki dei ki dkhot ki ba donkam tam ha ka tnad ka koit ka khia kumta nga kyntu ïa ki ba ki dei ban sdang noh ban trei kam namar u nongpang yn ym ap haduh ba kin sdang biang ka jingtrei kam jong ki” ka la ong.Ka Myntri ka la ïathuh ruh na ka liang ka sorkar kan ym lah ban pynkiew ïa ka jingiarap pisa kum ba ki dawa namar na ka liang ka sorkar ka  ju ai shibun ki jingïarap pisa sha ki ASHA kat kum ka jingtrei kam jong ki, bad lada ki ASHA ki sangeh trei kam kan ktah hi ïa ka tulop jong ki namar ba ka Sorkar pdeng lyngba ka NHM ka ju peitngor ïa baroh ki kam ha ka jylla.
title: Kyntu ka Myntri ïa ki ASHA ba kin sdang noh ka jingtrei kam: ka Sorkar kan ym pdiang ïa baroh ki jingdawa jong ki

content: :Ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA), ba dei jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP), ka la thmu ban khot da ka jingïalang ha ka 7 tarik, Naiwieng na ka bynta ban jied kyrtong ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha ha u snem ban wan. Ki lad pathai khubor ki la phla ba kine ki party ki la thmu ban jied kyrtong na ka bynta ka seat jong ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ, Shillong.Katba ka UDP, kaba don haduh 12 ngut ki dkhot jong ka Legislative Assembly (MLA) bad ka HSPDP, lem bad ar ngut ki MLA, kiba long ki kongsan hapoh katei ka Ïing Dorbar Thawaiñ ba don haduh 60 ngut ki dkhot bad kiba la kyrshan na ka bynta ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ba lam khmat da ka seng NPP. Katkum ka jingïoh lum na ka lad pathai khubor kaba bniah, ka seng UDP kan sa shimkhia na ka bynta ban jied ïa ki kyrtong katkum ka jingbit jong ki. Ha ka jingdon lang jong ki ha katei ka jingïalang jong ka RDA, ka election committee jong ka jylla jong ka seng UDP ka la thmu ban pynlong da ka jingïalang ha ka sngi ba ar.Ki lad pathai khubor ki la ïathuh ba ki kyrtong bym dei ki dkhot jong ka seng UDP, kynthup ïa u Dr. DRL Nonglait, President jong ka Khasi Author Society (KAS) bad u Robertjune Kharjahrin, President barim jong ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP), ki la leit mihkhmat sha ka seng UDP, da kaba pynpaw ka jingdon jingmut jong ki ha ka ban ïoh ïa ka tiket jong katei ka party.
title: Yn jied kyrtong ka UDP bad HSPDP na ka bynta ka Shillong Lok Sabha seat

content: :Kum shi bynta ban dang kham pynbha ïa ka jingshakri ha ki jaka sumar Sorkar na ka liang ka tnad ka koit ka khiah jong ka Sorkar Jylla ka la shim ïa ka rai ban bishar ïa ka jingtreikam jong baroh ki hospital Sorkar ki ban kynthup ïa ki Civil Hospital bad ki District Hospital ha ka Jylla ïa ka ne la ïathuh da ka Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khia ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh.Ïa kane ka rai, la shim ha ka jingïalang bala pynïaid da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u Conrad K Sangma ha ka jingïadonlang ka Myntri ka tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad ki ophisar ka Tnad ka Koit ka Khiah ha ka 6 tarik Naiwieng 2023. Haba ïakren sha ki lad pathai khubor ka Kong Ampareen ka la ïathuh ba kane ka jingïalang ka long ban bishar bnaih ïa ki jingtreikam jong ki Civil Hospital bad ki District Hospital hapoh ka Jylla. “Na ka liang ka  Sorkar jylla ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban shong bishar halor ka jingpynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa ka jaka sumar jaka sumar, ïa ka jingai shakri bad ki jingdonkam ban pynbha ïa ki jingtei.Ka la ong “Ngi la aipor ïa ka tnad kumba 24-36 bnai ban bishar ïa ki jingduna ban dang kham pynbha shuh shuh ïa ka jingtreikam ha ki hospital Sorkar kat kum ka jingïaid ka por”. Ka Myntri kala ïathuh shuh shuh, “mynta ka sngi ngi la pyntip sha u Myntri rangbah halor ka jingduna ki nongtrei ha ka tnad ka koit ka khiah (paramedical staff), ka  jingduna ki doktor specialist bad ki doctor medical ha ka jylla”.“Na ka liang ka tnad kan dang khmih lynti biang ban don sa ka wei ka jingïalang bad u Myntri Rangbah khnang ban dang bishar bniah shuh shuh sa ïa ki wei pat ki kam ki ba donkam ban shimkhia bad kaei ka jingïarap song pisa kaba donkam ba ka Sorkar kan ai khnang ban pynthikna ba ki jaka sumar jong ka sorkar kin long kiba kham biang” ka la bynrap.Ka Myntri kala pyntip ruh ba ka tnad kala aiti ïa ka jingtyrwa kaba bniah ba kumno yn pynthikna ïa ka jingwan jong ki doktor Specilist ban shakri ïa ka Jylla Meghalaya kum ki doktor Sorkar. “Na ka liang ka Sorkar jylla, shen kan sa wanrah ïa ka policy ban pynthikna ba baroh ki ba trei ha ka tnad ka koit ka khia ha ka jylla kin dei ban pdiang ïa ki jingbhah kam la ka dei sha ki jaka kiba jngai ruh.
title: Shong bishar ka Tnad Koit ka khiah bad u Myntri rangbah ban weng ïa ki jingeh ha ki hospital sorkar

content: :Ka Ri Bhoi Mihngi Presbytery ba hap hapoh ka Ri Bhoi Presbyterian Church Synod myn ha ka 6 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 ka la wan shakhmat ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih halor ka Cherry Blossom Festival ka ban sa long ha kane ka sngi u Blei ban wan kata ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 ha Madan Kurkalang Bhoirymbong.Haba ïakren sha u nongthoh kot khubor jong ka Ri Bhoi Mihngi Presbytery, u la ong kumne, “Ka Ri Bhoi Mihngi Presbytery kaba kynthup ïa baroh ki ïingmane jong ka Presbyterian na ki jaka ha Umshew, jaka ha Bhoirymbong, Kyrdem bad shaduh sha Umtlieh ba hap hapoh ka Block-2, ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih jong ki ha kaba ïadei bad ka tamasa Cherry Blossom kaba yn sa jia ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 kaba hap ha ka sngi u Blei bad ka dei ka sngi ba kyrpang na ka bynta jong ngi ki Khristan. Ïa ka jingpynkut ïa ka tamasa Cherry Blossom ha ka sngi u Blei kaba dei ka sngi leit jingïaseng jong ngi ki Khristan ka la ktah jur bad long kum ka jingi beiñ ïa ka ïingmane jong ngi hapoh ka District jong ngi bad kumjuh ruh ha ka jylla baroh kawei”.
title: Pynpaw ka Ri Bhoi Mihngi Presbytery ïa ka jingdiaw halor ka Cherry Blossom Festival

content: :U bah Disparsing Rani, u nongwad RTI ha ka jylla, u la buh ka jingkylli ïa ki nongpynïaid ka Civil Hospital, Shillong halor ka jingbym shim khia ban pynbiang ïa ki tiar sumar ki ba la duh ha kane ka hospital, wat la kane ka hospital Sorkar ka lah ban pynmih pisa haduh T.6 klur tam ha ki lai snem ïa kane u la kren ha ka jingïakynduh bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 6 tarik Naiwieng ha Shillong Pressclub. U bah Disparsing Rani, u la ïathuh ba u la wad da ka RTI halor ka jingpynmih pisa ka Civil Hospital na ka jingsiew ki nongpang ïa ki test bapher bapher ki ba la leh ha kane ka Hospital Sorkar, kine ki test ki kynthup ïa ka test Snam, CT scan, Scaning, MRI bad X-ray.U la ïathuh ba katkum ka RTI ka ba la ïoh la lap ba ka Civil hospital ka lah ban pynmih ïa ka pisa haduh T. 6 klur tam ha ki lai snem, ki ba kynthup ïa ka jingtest snam ka ïoh ban lum T 2 klur tam, na ka Xray, T. 4 lak tam, scanning T. 57 lak tam, CT Scan T. 2 klur tam bad MRI T. 26 lak tam. U bah Disparsing u la kdew ruh ba wat la ka Civil ka lah ban pynmih ïa ka pisa ka ba bun hynrei ka ba lyngngoh ka long ba shaei ki pyndonkam ïa kane ka pisa namar ba ka wei na ka MRI Machine ka ba la buh ha ka 25 tarik Nailar 2013 ha Civil hospital ka la duh noh 5 tarik Nailar 2022, hynrei haduh mynta ki khlem shimkhia ban pynbha ne ban buh thymmai ïa kane ka MRI ha kane ka hospital.U bah Disparsing u la wad ruh ïa ka RTI halor ka jingïoh pisa ka sorkar na Delhi ha ka ba ïadei bad ka jingtehlakam ïa ka Khlam Covid ha ka jylla, bad kane ka long hadien ba don na ki nongtrei ka tnad koit ka khiah ki la ud ba kim pat ïoh ïa ka jingsiew ïa ka jingtrei ka ba ki la dep haduh mynta. U bah Disparsing u la ïathuh ba kumba ha ki snem ba la dep ka sorkar ka la pyntip ba ka ïoh T. 76 klur na Delhi hynrei haba u la wad da ka RTI bad lap ba ka sorkar ka ïoh haduh T. 119 klur na Delhi bad kumba ka long mynta ka sorkar ka dang don sa T. 43 klur ka pisa ka ba ïoh na Delhi. U bah Disparsing u la kyntu ïa ka Sorkar ba ka dei ba siew ïa ki nongtrei Covid  ki ba  kynthup ïa ki 26 ngut ki Doctor, 100 ngut ki staff nurse, 85 ngut ki Paramedical bad kiwei kiwei.U bah Disparsing u la pan ruh ïa ka  RTI na ka tnad Social Welfare halor ka jingpynlut ban sumar ïa ki briew ba la kyrni ha u drug ha Nongbah Shillong, ha kaba lyngba ka RTI u la ïoh jingtip ba naduh u snem 2010 haduh u snem 2023, ki nongphah sumar na ka jingdih drug ha Shillong ki don 3180 ngut ki shynrang bad 32 ngut ki kynthei bad na ka liang ka tnad kam shem la pynlong ïa kano kano ka prokram pynhusiar(awareness program), ban tehlakam ïa ka jingdih drug ha kine ki snem bad ka jingpynlut ban sumar ïa ki 3,212  ngut ki nongdihdrug ha Shillong ka poi haduh T92, 890,556  (T. 9klur tam) ha ki 13 snem. Na ka liang u bah Disparsing Rani u la pyntip ba shen un sa wad bniah ba ka tnad ka pynlut haei bad kumno ïa kane ka pisa ka ba kot sha ka 9 klur tam tang na ka bynta ki nongphah sumar ki ba don tang 3000 ngut tam ha Shillong.
title: “Ha ka 3 snem T. 6 klur tam kamai ka Civil hospital na ki nongpang hynrei ka MRI ka ba la duh ym lah ban pynbha; Shaei jah ka pisa?” Disparsing

content: :Ka sorkar jylla ka la dep pynlut haduh T. 9.28 klur na ka bynta ban sumar ïa kiba kyrni ha u drok ha kine ki 13 snem ba la dep. Kane ka dei katkum ka jingïoh ïa ka jubab na ka tnad social welfare haduh ka jingïoh jingtip na u nongïakhih ka jylla, u Bah Disparsing Rani uba hap hapoh ka Right to Information Act (RTI), 2005.Da kaba ïathuh sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Rani u la ong ba ka tnad ka la dep pyntip ba ka bai lut bai sep baroh na ka bynta ban sumar ïa ki nongpang dih drok ha Meghalaya naduh u snem 2010 – 2023, ka long T. 9.28 klur. Ïa katei, ka sorkar ka la dep pynlut haduh T. 30,07,815 ha u snem 2010, T. 34,05,817 ha u 2011, T. 38,61,060 ha u 2012, T. 40,76,240 ha u 2013, T. 53,80,721 ha u 2014, T. 39,43,617 ha u 2015, T. 35,42,816 ha u 2016, t. 36,37,821 ha u 2017, T. 30,17,307 ha u 2018, T. 72,71,227 ha u 2019, T. 84,73,371 ha u 2020, T. 1,48,57,688 ha u 2021, T. 1,94,69,467 ha u 2022 bad T. 89,45,589 ha u 2023.U la ong ba katkum ka kaiphod, la pyntip ruh ba lad on haduh 3,216 ki shynrang ba dih drok bad 32 ngut ki kynthei ba la pyndonkam ban dih ïa u drok in Shillong, East Khasi Hills District. Haba la kylli halor katei, u Bah Rani u la ong ba ka tnad kam shym la ai kano kano ka jingtip ba biang ha kaba ïadei bad katno ka pisa ba la dep pynlut ban sumar ïa ki nongpang ba dih drok hapoh kane ka jylla.
