title: Pynlut ka sorkar T. 9.28 klur ban sumar ïa kiba kyrni ha ki drok

content: :Mynta ka sngi ka 7 tarik u Naiwieng 2023, na ka liang ka Seng Hynñiewtrep Integrated Territorial Organisation (HITO)  South West Khasi Hills District ha ka jingïalam u Bah Paul Thyrniang, u President bad Bah H. Marshal Ramsiej, u Secretary ka HITO SWKHD ki la ïoh ban leit  ïakynduh  ïa ka Branch Manager jong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank Mawkyrwat Branch ban leit pynsngew ïa ki jingeh jong ki paidbah kiba ju ïa kynduh ha kaba ïa dei bad katei ka Bank  ban kyrpad  ban nang pynbun  shuh shuh ïa ki nongtrei ha katei ka Bank bad khamtam eh ban pynkha shnat treikam shuh shuh ha kiwei pat ki jaka  hapoh jong kane ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat bad ruh ha ki thaiñ Ranikor  khnang  ba ki briew kiba ju pyndonkam ïa kane ka Meghalaya Rural Bank kin ym duh ïa ki sngi ki por ban wan pyndep ïa ki kam kiba ïa dei bad kane ka Bank namar ba bun ki briew kiba wan donkam hangne bunsien kim lah ban pyndep ïa ki kam tang ha ka shisngi namar ka la khapngiah shaba palat nakadaw ka jingbun briew, kane ka pynduhnong shibun ïa ki paidbah bad ka ktah ruh ïa ka leit ka wan khamtam ïa kiba jngai ki shnong.Halor kane ka bynta, na ka liang ka Branch  Manager   jong ka Meghalaya Rural Bank ka la kular ban ïa trei ryngkat bad kan sa phah ïa kane ka shithi jong ka seng sha u M.D/Chairman uba dei peit ïa kane ka Mawkyrwat Branch.
title: Halor ka jingeh ki paidbah leit ïa kynduh ka HITO ïa ka BM jong ka MRB Mawkyrwat Branch

content: SHILLONGU Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma mynta sngi pyllait ia ka jingpynshai paibah lyngba ki khynnah skul kumno ban tyngka, ban pynneh pynsah bad ban iada ia ki tyllong um. Ka Ia kane ka jingpynshai paidban pynneh um, la ai kyrteng “Water Smart Kids Meghalaya.Kane ka porkram, ka long shi bynta na ka jingpynbiang ia ka Meghalaya lyngba ka Jal Jeevan Mission tnad ka tnad  Ministry of Jal Shakti. Ka jingthmu jong kane, ka long ban ai mynsiem ia ki khynnah ba kin long kita ki nongkit ktien ha la ki jong ki shnong ki thaw ha kaba pynneh pynsah ia ka um, kaba long kaba kongsan haduh katta katta na ka bynta ka jong im jong u briew.Haba pathai khubor lyngba ka “X” ia kaba la tip mynshuwa kum ka Twitter, u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram ka long ban pynrung ha ki jngmut jingpyrkhat jong ki khynnah skul halor ka jingkongsan jong ka um bad kumno ban ri ban summar bad ban pynneh pynsah ia ki tyllong ong um. Kito kiba la ioh ia ka jingpynkumburom ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpynneh pynsa bad jingri jingsumar ia ki tyllong um ki long ka Lumshyiap Village Water and Sanitation Committee (VWSC) ha Ri Bhoi District, Darechikgre VWSC ha West Garo Hills District bad Dura Kantragre VWSC ha West Garo Hills District.
title: Pyllait paidbah u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ïa ka “Water Smart Kids Meghalaya”

content: U Deputy Commissioner jong ka Ri-Bhoi District u la obg ba kum shi bynta ban pynneh pynsah ia kam kaba ki jut rei lane ba la tip kum ka prokram kaba la mang kyrpang ia ka Ri Bhoi District kum ka Aspirational District ban kyntiew ia ki Self Help Group jong kane ka district ha kiba bun ki liang.Ki la don 10 ngut ki dkhot kiba dei ki nongri Syiar kha pylleng jong ka of Self-Help Groups (SHGs) bapher bapher kiba hap hapoh ki saw tylli ki C&RD Blocks jong ka Ri Bhoi ki la shah jeid bad ioh pdiang ia ka mar T.10 lak marwei na ka Sorkar ban ri ia ki syiar kha pylleng. U  Deputy Commissioner, u la pynbna ba kane ka jingiarap song pisa ka long ban kyntiew ia ki kam shimet jong ki dkhot ki SHG’s.Kawei na ki nongioh ha kane ka jingmang pisa ka kong Birit Nongrum kaba long ka ka dkhot SHG ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia ki bor pyniaid district kiba la phai khmat sha ka SHG bad ia ki dkhot jong ki lyngba kine ki skhim ba la mang kyrpang na ka bynta kito ki dkhot kiba dei ki longkmie ba kin lah ban ieng hala ki jong ki kjat.Ka la ong ruh, ba ia ki pylleng ba ju pynmih ki ju pynpoi 2 sien shitaiew sha ki jaka ba ai jingbam ba tei ia ki khyllung bad longkmie ba armet kiba ju tip kum ki ICDS ha ka dor kaba bit.
title: Ioh pdiang ki nongri syiar kha pylleng ka Ri-Bhoi mar T.10 lak ban pynroi ïa ka kam

content: Ka Khasi Students Union ha ka jingiatreilang bad ka KSU  Northern Border Areas  hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka jingujor jong ka jing bym treikam jong ka Mawlasnai Primary Health Centre ki la leit jurip hi da lade sha katei ka jaka.Ha kane ka jingleit tohkit jong kane ka seng ki la shem ba kane ka Mawlasnai Primary Health Centre ka don bun ki jingduna ha ka liang ban ai jingsumar ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Mawlasnai bad ruh ia kito kiba don ha ka Block-2  bad ki Marjan shnong kiba wan shim dawai na kane ka Primary Health Centre.Ia kane ka kynhun la lam khmat da u Banjop Maring uba long u the Education Secretary of KSU North Khasi Hills District Unit kynthup ruh ia ki ophisar bad dkhot jong ka KSU Raid Nongtung Circle bad ka  KSU Northern Border Areas. Kawei na ka jingduna kaba ki la lap ha kane ka hospital ka dei ka jingdun um,ka jingduna ki doctor bad ka jingbun palat ki nongshim dawai.Kine ki seng ki la dawa ia ia  ka DMHO ba ka dei ban pynbiang ia ki donkam ba kongsan jong kane ka hospital bad ban shna ia ki jingtei ba kongsan bad ban pynbiang ia ki dawai dashin na ka bynta ki paidbah. Ki la ong ruh ba ki dei ban thung shuh ia ki nongtrei bad ia ki doctor ha kane kaPHC.Kane ka seng kan sa kynduh ia Myntri ba dei peit ia ka tand ka koit ka khiah  khnang ban yn lah ban kyntiew ia kane ka Mawlasnai Primary Health Centre sha ka Mawlasnai Community Health Center khnang ban lah ban ai ka jingsumar ba kham bhai a ki nong shong shnong.
title: Jurip ka KSU ïa ka Mawlasnai Health Centre

content: :U nongïalam jong ka seng BJP bad Myntri sorkar, u Alexander Laloo Hek myn ha ka 6 tarik, Naiwieng, u la ong ba ka BJP ka don jingkyrmen ban jop ïa ka ileskshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha(LS) na Shillong bad Tura namar jong ka “jingbun ki nongthep vote”. U Hek u la ïathuh ha ki lad pathai khubor ba ka jingrai jong baroh ki paralok jong ka sorkar MDA kiban sa ïakhun kum ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka ileskshon LS ka long ka lad kabu ksiar na ka bynta ka BJP.“Ka seng BJP ka don la ki jong ki nongthep vote kiba bun. Kin nym leit shaei shaei ruh. Namar kane, ka BJP ka don shisha kata ka jingkyrmen mynta ka kynti namar ba la bun ki kyrtong ban ïakhun (kiba dei na ka seng National People’s Party (NPP), United Democratic Party (UDP), Trinamool Congress (TMC), Voice of the People Party (VPP) kiban sa ïakhun ha kane ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka MP bad ym kano kano ka seng saiñ hima kaban bun ki nongthep vote. Ki don ïa ki nongthep vote ba kyrshan bha ïa ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ilekshon,” ong u Hek. U Hek u la pyntip ruh ba ka BJP kaba dei ka seng bakhraw jong ka India, kan sa bun ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka seat Shillong bad Tura.Haba la kylli ba lehse un ïakhun na Shillong konstituensi, u Hek u la ong ba um dei ma u ban shim rai halor kane ka mat namar ba ki don bor tang ki nongïalam jong ka sorkar pdeng ban shim ïa ka rai. U la ong shuh shuh ba u President ka sorkar, u Rikman G Momin u la dep pyntip ba la don haduh lai ngut ki kyrtong kiba la ïoh tiket na Shillong.“Hynrei, utei u president shen, un sa pynkynthup ïa ki executive committee ka ri bad ki bor pynïaid jong ka ophis treikam ka sorkar. Mar syn pyndep ïa katei, yn sa pyntreikam ha ka ban jied ïa ki kyrtong ïakhun ilekshon,” ong u Hek da kaba bynrap kumne, “Ngam tip mano kita ki kyrtong. Ngam tip ba la pynkynthup lang ne em ïa ka kyrteng jong nga. Lada ki kynthup ïa ka kyrteng jong nga ruh bad lada kim kynthup ruh, ngin kyrshan ïa kino kino ki kyrtong.”“Long katba long. Ngam tip haduh katno nga pawnam hynrei nga don kane ka seng ka ban don la ka jong ka jingbishar te ngam don eiei ruh em ba tuklar bad ka jingshah bishar jong kane ka party,” bynrap u Hek. Shuh shuh, u Hek u la ong ba kane ka party kan nym leit ïakhun na ka bynta ka jingïoh ïakhun ban jop ïa ka ilekshon,” ong u Hek.
title: Yn jop ka BJP ïa ka ilekshon Lok Sabha na Shillong bad Tura ka BJP da kaba suk: Hek

content: Ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la ai bhah khajna jong ka Meghalaya kaba kot sha ka T.559.60 klur na ka bynta jong u ‘Naiwieng. Kane ka jingbha khajna kyrpang jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ia ka Meghalaya namarba kane ka jylla ka don mynta ha ka aioh lekkmen lehsngewbha.  Ka jingbhah khajna na ka bynta baroh ki jylla jong ka ri India, ka long haduh T.72,961.21 klur. Ka Sorkar kan pynlait ia kane ka pisa ha ka 10 tarik u Naiwientg, 2023. Kane ka jingleh jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka long ban ailad ia ka Sorkar Meghalaya ba kan lah ban pyllait ia kito pisa ha ka por kaba biang, khnang ba ka jylla kan lah ban leh kmen lehsngewbha ha kaba kum kane ka por.
title: Pyllait bhah khajna ka T.559.60 klur ka Sorkar Pdeng ia ka Meghalaya

content: Ka Myntri ka rep ka riang jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, ka Kong Mazel Apareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba don don na pdeng kiba trei ia ki kam la jong ha kaba ka kamai kajih jong ki kot sha ka ar bad lai klur tyngka shi snem.Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ia ka iathuh ia kane haba ka la plie ia ka thiar Meghalaya Collectives, kaba long shibynta jong ka jingpynlong ia ka “World Food India-2023 ha Pragati Maidan, New Delhi bad plie pyrda u Myntri Rangbahduh Narendra Modi. Ka Meghalaya Collectives jong ka Sorkar Meghalya, ka long ka jingpyni ia ki jingpynmih ia ki marbam ba pynmih ka Meghalaya kiba palat liam ban iawei ki marbam bapynmih kiwei pat ki ri jong ka pyrthei. Ha kane ka thiar ba la ai kyrteng Meghalaya Initiatives, ki don kum khadlai tylli ki basa ban pynisha ka pyrthei ba Meghalaya, wat lada ka dei ba jylla kaba don kham shadien ba ia kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri India, hynrei kane ka jylla ka lah ban pynmih ia ki jingbam kiba bha tam napdeng ki ri jong ka pyrthei.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh kot khubor, hadien ba la plie ia katei ka thiar Meghalaya Collective, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka dap da ka jingkmen kaba khraw ban iohsngew na ki katto katne ki nongnong pyniaid jong kane ki basa, ba don napdeng jong ki, ba ka trei ka ktah, ka kamai kajih bad ka die ka thied ka jong ki, ka long shaduh ka shi klur bad ar klur tyngka shi snem. Kane Myntri ka la ong ba kiwei ki phai khmat sha ka Meghalaya ba ki nongrem jong ka jylla ki pyndohkam ia ka sboh ba ki ioh na ka mraing, khlem da pyndonkam ia ka sboh dawai kaba pynsniew ia ka khyndew.Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka long ruh ba dei na kane ka daw ba ka pynshur ia ka nongshong shnong jong ka jylla ba kin ia leit phia biang ha ki kper ki phrah bad sha la ka jong ka rep ka riang namaba hangtei ruh ka don ka spah. Ka iathuh ruh ha kane ka juk kaba mynta, ka long kaba eh ban shu ap tang ia ki kam Sorkar. Ka la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shong, ba kin long ki briew kiba trei la ki jong ki kam ki jam bad seng ia la ki kam la jong. “Ki nongseng kam la jong ki kylla long ki kynrad ia ki kam ki jam jong ki bad ki kylla long ruh ki nongaikam ia kiwei”, la ong ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh.
title: Ki nongseng kam la jong ki long ki kynrad bad nongaikam ïa kiwei: Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh

content: SHILLONGU nongialam rangbah ka Congress ha Meghalaya, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka seng kan sa pynlong ia ka jingialang ban iapyrkhat bad ban iapyndet ia ki kam ki jam kiba ia dei bad ka jingjied ia ki nongmih khmat sha ka Iing Dorbar Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC).Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, u Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ym artatien ba ka seng kan nang lehbha shuh shuh. U la iathuh ba ha ka jingjied nongmihkhmat sha ka Iing Dorbar KHADC, ka Congress ka la jop haduh 10 ngut ki MDC bad kam shym la lah pat ba kan thaw ia ka Executive Committee namarba kam shym la ioh ia ka jingkyrshan jong kiwei pat ki dkhot jong ka Council.
title: Kyrmen ban lehbha shuh shuh ka Congress ha ka MDC elekshon

content: :U Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat u la pynbna paidbah kaba ba ka ophis u Director ka Higher and Technical Education, Meghalaya, Shillong ka khot aplikeshon na ka bynta ka 1. AICTE -Pragati Scholarship Scheme ïa kito ki khynnah kynthei kiba pule ha ka 1st year ne 2nd year ha ka Degree / Diploma course ha kano ma kano ka AICTE Institution kaba la ïoh jingmynjur ha kaba 2 ngut ki khynnah na ka juh ka ïing ki lah ban aplai. Ha kajuh ka por ki donkam ban ai ryngkat ka Income Certificate kaba la ai da ki bor kiba la ithuh kiba ka jingïoh kam dei ban palat ïa ka Rs 8.0 lak shisnem bad ïa ka scholarship yn pynthymmai na ka bynta u snem uba bud hadien ba ki la phah ïa ka renewal aplikeshon lyngba ka National Scholarship Portal bad ban phah ryngkat ka Promotion Certificate ba la ai da u khlieh duh jong kata ka jaka kaba ki pule. Ki khynnah ki bym shym la pass ne kiew klass kin duh ïa katei ka scholarship.Shuh shuh la pyntip ba ka don sa ka 2. AICTE -Saksham Scholarship Scheme na ka bynta kito kiba don jingduna ha ki dkhot met kiba pule ha ka 1st year ne 2nd year Degree / Diploma course ha kano ma kano ka AICTE institution kaba la ïoh jingmynjur bad tang kito kiba ka jingduna ha ki dkhot met kam duna ïa ka 40 % ki lah ban aplai. Ha kajuh ka por ki donkam ban ai ryngkat ia ka Income Certificate kaba la ai da ki bor kiba la ithuh kiba ka jingïoh kam dei ban palat ïa ka Rs 8.0 lak shisnem bad ïa ka scholarship yn pynthymmai na ka bynta u snem u ba bud hadien ba ki la phah ïa ka renewal aplikeshon lyngba ka National Scholarship Portal bad ban phah ryngkat ka Promotion Certificate ba la ai da u khlieh duh jong kata ka jaka kaba ki pule. Ki khynnah ki bym shym la pass ne kiew klass kin duh ïa katei ka scholarship. Nangta ka don sa ka AICTE – Swanath Scholarship Scheme ( Degree & Diploma ) ha kaba ki nong aplai ki dei ban long ki khun swet lane iwei na ki kmie ki kpa ne baroh ar ngut ki kmie ki kpa ki khlad na ka Covid 19 lane ki khun jong ki Armed Forces bad Central Paramilitary Force kiba ïap ha ka jingïaleh bad kiba ka jingïoh kam dei ban palat ïa ka Rs 8.0 lak ha u snem ba ki aplai ryngkat ka Income Certificate ba la ai da ki bor ba la ithuh. Ki nongaplai ki dei ban long kiba pule ha ki AICTE institution kiba la ïoh jingmynjur ha ka Degree / Diploma Course ha ka 1st / 2nd / 3rd / 4th year bad ki nong aplai kim dei ban long kiba la ïoh ïa kawei na ki Central Govt . State Govt AICTE Sponsored Scholarship. Ki khynnah ki lah ban aplai online lyngba kabad ki aplikeshon form ba la print bad ba la dep pyndap ki lah ruh ban phah sha ka jaka kaba ki pule ryngkat bad ki kot ki sla kiba donkam bad yn pdiang tang ïa ki online aplikeshon bad yn ym pdiang ïa kito kiba leh offline.
title: Khot aplikeshon u DC ka SWKHD na ka bynta ki AICTE Scholarship

content: SHILLONGKa seng saiñ hima sima United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) ki la pynim biang ia ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA) kumno ban pynkhreh lang ban sei ia u kyrtong MP na ka bynta ka jingjied ia u nongmihkhmat jong ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ Lok Sabha-2024. Na ka liang jong ka RDA ka angnud ban pynieng ia u kyrtong baiamon lang na ka bynta ka Shillong Parliamentary Assembly. Ha ka kynhun jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh un bat kum u Shongknor bad u President ka HSPDP, u Bah K.P. Pangiang un bat kum Secretary. U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ula ïathuh ba kine ki artylli ki seng saiñ hima sima ki la dep mynjur ia ka jingseng ia ka RDA naduh ka 30 tarik u Jymmang, hadien ba la dep pyllong iaka jingjied ia ki nongmihkhat sha ka ïing Dorbar Thaw Aiñ ka Meghalaya, 2023.
title: Pynim biang ka UDP bad HSPDP ïa ka  Regional Democratic Alliance

content: SHILLONGU President jong ka seng sain hima sima United Democratic Party (UDP), u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka seng ka la sdang ban pdiang ia ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong kiba kwah ban iakhun na ka bynta ka jingshah jied ia u dkhot jong ka Iind Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor mynta ka sngi, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong ba ia mynta um ym pat lah ban iathuh ia ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong bad un sa pyntip pat ia ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor hadien ba ka seng ka la ioh ban shong pyrkhat. Ki tyllong khubor ki iathuh ba la don saw ngut kiba la ai kyrteng na ka seng UDP bad arngut pat kiwei pat ki dei kiba ym dei na ka seng UND. Kine kiba ym dei na ka seng UDP ki long u jong ka President ka Khasi Authors Society, u Dr. DRL Nonglait bad u President bamynshuwa jong ka  HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin.Ki dkhot ka UDP kiba kwah ban iakhun na ka bynta ka MP ki long u Myntri ka Sorkar jylla, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u General Secretary ka UDP bad MLA bamynshuwa, u Bah Jemino Mawthoh, u  Vice President ka UDP bad MLA bamynshuwa, u P.T Sawkmie and u Chief Executive Member bamynshua jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council bad u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne.
title: Sdang pdiang kyrteng kyrtong MP ka seng saiñ hima sima United Democratic Party

content: :Ka Myntri kaba dei ban peit ïa ka tnad Koit ka khia ha ka jylla ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ha ka 6 tarik Naiwieng ka la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka sorkar jylla kan jied ïa ka company ka ba biang tam na ka bynta ban pynïaid ïa ka shnat treikam jong ka Emergency 108  lane ki kali kit Nongpang 108.Ïa kane ka la jubab hadien ba mih ki khubor ha ki katto katne ki ladpathai khubor ba ka sorkar kala thmu ban aiti noh sha kawei ka Company ban pynïaid ïa ki kali kit nongpang 108. Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pynthikna ba halor ka jingthep tender jong ki company ki ban pynïaid ïa ka  shlem treikam ka 108 kan ym don kano kano ka jingmushlia na ka liang ki Myntri ha ka Sorkar.“Ka sorkar, ka ban kynthup ïa u  Myntri Rangbah ka jylla lane baroh ki Myntri Sorkar kin ym tuklar haba ïadei bad ka jingthep Tender hynrei baroh ki kwah ba kano kano ka Company ka ban shimti thymmai, kadei ban pynthikna ba ka jingshakri ïaki paidbah kan dei kaba biang tam” ka la ong. Na ka liang ka Myntri ka la pyntip ba halor ka jingthep ïa ka tender la dep ban ai ti sha ka Tender Committee bad kala don ka jingïakhun kaba heh hapdeng ki para Company ba thep Tender namar baroh ki sngew ba ki long kiba biang tam ban pynïaid ïaki kali 108 ha ka jylla Meghalaya.Ka Kong Ampareen kala ong shuh shuh ba ka kamram kum ka sorkar hi hangne kam dei ban tuklar ïa ka jingthep tender jong ki Company bapher bapher hynrei kan long tang ban jied ïa ka Company ka ba biang tam na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong bad khamtam na ka bynta ka jingbha ka miat ki nongtrei 108.Ka Myntri ka tnat ka koit ka khiah ka la kyntu ruh  ïaki Company ban ujor sha ka Tender Committee lada ki don kano kano ka jingujor hynrei kim dei ban kren paidbah katba ka jingthep Tender kam pat kut. Ka myntri ka la kren shai ruh ba kano kano ka Company ka ban ïoh ban shimti ban pynïaid ïaki kali 108 ha ka jylla kadei ban ai ka jingshakri ha ryngkat ka jingïatrei lang bad ki trai jylla, ki nongtrei 108 kiba don mynta.
title: Pynthikna ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ban aiti ïa ki kali 108 ha ki Company ba biang tam

content: :Ki pulit ka Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills ha ka 8 tarik Naiwieng ki la ïoh ban kem ïa ka wei ka longkmie na Harijan Colony, halor ka jingdonkti ban pynïaid ïew ïa u drok ha G S Road hajan ka Bimola Junction, ïa kane la ïathuh da u bah Vivek Syiem, u Superintendent of Police, City ka East Khasi Hills, Shillong. Kane ka long shisngi hadien ka jingsaphriang jong ka wei ka Video hapoh ki rynsan social Media halor ki ar ngut ki long kmie bar jylla ba ki die ïa u drok sha ki katto katne ki briew ha GS Road hajan ka Bimola junction.Kat kum ka kyrwoh na u Bah  Vivek Syiem, Superintendent of Police, City ka East Khasi Hills, Shillong la ïathuh ba  na ka liang ka Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) East Khasi Hills ka la pynlong ïa ka jingkynrah ha Themmetor (Sweeper lane) bad la ïoh ban kem ïa ka wei ka long kmie ka ba 26 snem ka rta. Hadien ba la ïoh kem ïa kane ka longkmie, na ka liang ki pulit ka ANTF ki la pynlong ïa ka jingkhynra ïa ka ïing ba kane ka longkmie ka shong ka sah bad la ïoh ban kurup ïa ki 92 tylli ki klong rit (Vials) kiba thep ïa u drok  heroin, u ba khia 99.21 gm, 51 tylli ki klong rit  kiba thylli, 13 tylli ki synduk sabon ki ba song ïa u Herion, kawei ka mobile phone bad kawei ka Aadhar card.Kat kum ka jingpyntip na ka liang u SP City ka East Khasi Hills u la pyntikna ba kane ka longkmie kaba la shah kem ka dei ka long kmie ka ba la ïohi lyngba ki Video ki ba la shaphriang katba ka dang pynïaid ïew ïa u drug ha GS Road hajan  Bimola Junction. Na ka liang ki pulit, ki dang pynlong ïa ka jingthwet kaba jur sa ïa ka wei ka long kmie kaba la ïohi ba ka dei kaba donkti lang ban pynïaid ïew ïa u drok ha kane ka thaiñ. Halor kane ki pulit ki la dep ban register ïa ka mokutduma ha Sadar Police Station hapoh ka NDPS Act.
title: Kem ki pulit ka ANTF ïa ka longkmie ba khaïi drok na Themmotor

content: :Ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission & Rescue Mission ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis jong u Block Development Officer C&RD Ranikor Block myn ha ka 7 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Block Level Collaborative Convention on Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission & Rescue Mission halor la phang pdeng. “Ka jingsdang kaba skhem na ka bynta ka lawei kaba phyrnai” ha ka Hall jong ka ophis u Block Development Officer Ranikor C&RD Block ha kaba u bah T. Lyngwa IAS, Deputy Commissioner ka South West Khasi Hills District u la long u kongsan.Kiwei de kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ki long ka kong S. Kharsahnoh, District School Education Officer (DSEO), South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat kaba la kren halor ka Midday Meal bad ka NEP 2020, ka kong Mary M. Rynjah, Programme Manager ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission & Rescue Mission kaba kren halor ka jingthmu jong ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission & Rescue Mission (MECDM&RM), u bah Eson Kharrymmai, District Mission Manager, NRLM, u Dr. G. Nongsiej na ka tnad ka koit ka khiah, u bah E Tariang, District Social Welfare Officer, South West Khasi Hills District.Kiba la ïadonlang ha kane ka sngi ki long, ka kong Laura Khongsit, ka kong Nauna Warjri kiba long ki Programme Manager ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission & Rescue Mission, u bah O. Lyngdoh bad u bah B. Pariat, kiba long ki Civil Engineers ka Meghalaya Early Childhood Development Mission & Rescue Mission, ki nongkitkam shnong, ki Self Help Groups na ki shnong bapher bapher bad kiwei de. Kham ha shwa u bah S. Marweiñ, MCS, Block Development Officer (BDO) jong ka Ranikor C&RD Block u la ai ïa ki kyntien pdiang sngewbha bad u bah L.T. Tariang, MCS, Project Director ka DRDA, South West Khasi Hills District u la ai ïa ki kyntien khublei.
title: Pynshai ka MECDM&RM ban skhem ha ka jingsdang ïa ka lawei ba phyrnai

content: :Ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban khot sngewbha ïa ka kynhun Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) na ka bynta ban ïakren halor ka jingphah kynriah ïa ki nongshnong shnong jong ka Harijan Colony na Them Iew Mawlong ha ka 15 ne 16 tarik, Naiwieng. Ïa katei, la dep pynbna shwa ha ka Meghalaya High Court ha ka por ba don ka jingsngap halor kane ka mat ha ka 8 tarik, Naiwieng.Ha katei ka jinghukum, na ka liang jong ka miej ki nongbishar, kynthup ïa u Justice W Diengdoh bad u Justice B Bhattacharjee u la ong ba ka attorney general (AG) ka la dep phah da ka jingtyrwa kaba la wan na ka sorkar jylla, ka la khot ïa ki kongsan (HPC) na ka bynta katei ka jingïalang khnang ban ïakren ïasuk halor kano kano ka jingïa kajia hapdeng ki party bad kiwei kiwei. Ha kaba ïadei bad kateI, ka AG ka la dep ong ba katei ka jingïalang jingtyrwa ka son jingthmu ban pynlong ha ka 15 ne 16 tarik Naiwieng. La ong shuh shuh ruh ba lada kine kongsan kim lah ban don bynta ha katei ka jingïalang ha kito ki tarik ba la buh, ka lah ban tyrwa pat ha kiwei pat ki tarik na ka bynta ban ai jingbit ïa ki party ban ïakynduh bad ban ïakren halor ki mat ba bun. Na ka liang jong ka miej ki nongbishar, la ong ba ha kane ka kynti mynta, yn sa ïaid shaid shaid ka jingïakren hynrei yn ai jingbit ïa ki party ban ïakynduh kumba la tyrwa.“Ka jingkhmih lynti na kane ka jingïalang, kan long ban pynbna bad pyni hakhmat ka ïing kashari ha ka dur jong ka kaiphod. Na ka bynta katei, ïa katei ka mat, mynta, la dep buh ban pynsngap ha ka taïew ba sdang jong u Nohprah,” katkum katei ka jingtyrwa. Ha ka 29 tarik, Nailur, ka sorkar jylla ka la dep pynbna sah ka ïing kashari ba ka la dep mynjur ban pynheh ïa ka jaka katkum ka jingkyrpad da ki nongshong shnong jong ka Harijan Colony. Hangne la lah ban ong ba ka sorkar ha ka shap jong ka, ka la dep tyrwa ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing ba kin kynriah sha ka jaka kaba dei jong ka Shillong Municipal Board.
title: Tyrwa ka sorkar jylla ban khot ïakren bad ka HPC

content: :Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) jong ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad NEHUSU myn ha ka 8 tarik, Naiwieng, ka la byrngem ban pan jingmut na ka Meghalaya High Court halor ka jingkynnoh ba pynkheiñ ïa ki kyndon jong ka UGC Model CRR (Cadre Recruitment Rules) da u Vice-Chancellor jong ka jaka pule jong ka NEHU, u Prof PS Shukla. Da kaba pynbna ha ka lad pathai khubor, u chairman ka JAC, u Prof Lakhon Kma u la ong ba u VC u la pyrshang ban ïada ïa ka bym dei ban ïada.“Ka jingthung kam beaiñ ïa u Rohit Prasad (kum u technical officer/senior consultant) kam don kano kano ka jingkyrshan na ka liang jong ka NEHU bad ka dei ka jingpynkheiñ ïa kyndon jong ka UGC Model CRR,” ong u Kma. Ha ka 4 tarik, Naiwieng, u Prof Shukla u la kam ba katei ka jingthung ïa u Rohit Prasad ka la jia hadien ba la ïoh jingbit na ka executive council(EC) jong kane ka jaka pule. U Shukla u la ong ba u VC u dei u nongthung kam na ka bynta ki post shipor kynthup ïa ki Group A/Group B. Ka jingthung kam ïa u Rohit Prasad kam long kaba paka ne shi junom bad kane kan sa pyn ngat ïa utei u vice-chancellor ha ka jingeh.Katba u Prof Kma, u la ong ba ka jingkren jong u VC ka dap suda da ka “jingthok jingshukor” ba u la ïalam bakla ïa ki nongseng kam jong kane ka jaka pule bad ki paidbah ba bun ba ka JAC ruh ka lah ban leit kynduh ïa ka Meghalaya High Court na ka bynta ban pan jingmut halor kane ka mat. U Prof Kma u la kynnoh ba u VC u la pyndonkam da ka kyndon(clause) 6 (b) jong ka UGC Model CRR ban kam ba ka jingthung kam ïa u Prasad ka long kaba biang naba la dep ïoh jingbit na ka executive council jong kane ka jaka pule.“Ka jingkren ba la kren da u VC kam shong nongrim naba ka UGC Model CRR ka la pynpaw shai ba ka jingthung kam ka dei ban shimti da selection committee hadien ka jingpynmih ïa ka advertisement na ka bynta kajuh ka phang kaba la dep pyllait ha kot khubor (kaba ym shym la bud ïa ka kyndon ha kane ka mat),” bynrap u Kma. Shuh shuh, u chairman ka JAC u la ong ba ki la rai ban thoh sha u President of India bad u Lat jong ka Meghalaya na ka bynta ka jingïoh jingmut halor katei ka jingpynkheiñ kyndon jong ka UGC Model CRR da u VC. “Ka JAC ka la shong bad ïakren halor katei ka phang ha ka sngi palei halor ka jingïaid shaphrang bad kane ka mat bad rai ban tied jingkhang ha ka ïing kashari na ka bynta ban pynbna ïa katei ka jingleh jong u VC,” bynrap u Kma.
title: Byrngem ka JAC ban ujor ha ïing kashari pyrshah ïa ka jingpynkheiñ kyndon jong u VC ka NEHU

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, myn ha ka 8 tarik, Naiwieng, u la ai khublei ïa ka kynhun KC Lights Choir na Kiddies Corner School Shillong, kaba la long ka nongjop ha ka tamasa ba iphuh iphieng jong ka Malaysian Choral Eisteddfod (MCE), kaba la wanrah sha ïing haduh ar tylli ki takma ksiar ha ka bynta jong ka Children bad Folklore. Da kaba pynpaw ka jingsngew sarong jong u halor katei ka jingïashim bynta jong kane ka kynhun, u Conrad K. Sangma u la leit sha ka rynsan X da kaba ong, “Nga ai khublei ïa kine ki samla ba tbit ba rwai ha ka tamasa. To kin ïai bteng ban thaw ïa ki jingrwai ba sngewtynnad bad pynshongshit ïa ki paidbah ha kylleng ka pyrthei. Nga kitbok kitrwiang ïa katei ka kynhun rwai baroh.” Na ka bynta ka jingtip, kane ka jingjop ba sah jingkynmaw, ka dei ka jingïai bteng jong kane ka kynhun ban ïoh khur jingjop ha ki lympung shabar ri.
title: Ai khublie u MR ïa ka Kiddies Corner School Choir na ka bynta ka jingjop jong ka

content: :U Myntri sorkar ka jylla, u AL Hek, ha ka 8 tarik, Naiwieng, u la dep pynbna ba u president ba la dep shah jied ba thymmai jong ka Meghalaya BJP, u Rikman Momin u la don ha lynti ban leit sha Delhi lem bad ka kot ba la ïoh jingbit na ki nongïalam jong ka sorkar pdeng halor ka mat treikam jong ka Executive Committee (EC) ba thymmai. U la ong ba une u nongïalam ïa katei ka party un sa rai halor ka EC ba thymmai. Da kaba kren shaphang jong u kum uwei na ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka ilekshon MP, u Hek u la ong ba la don haduh lai ngut ki kyrtong ïakhun bad ka party kan sa rai halor u kyrtong ba biang na kine ki lai ngut ki kyrteng na ka bynta ka seat Shillong Parliamentary Constituency.
title: Pynbna ka BJP ïa ka Executive Committee ba thymmai jong ka jylla: Hek

content: U nongai ktien jong ka National People’s Party u Marcuise N Marak u la iathuh ba kam don kano kano ka jingiapher jingmut hapoh jong kane ka seng sain hima sima ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjeid ia u kyrtong MP na ka bynta ka Shillong Parliamenary Assembly. U Marcuise N Marak u la iathuh ba ha kano kano ka Party ki don la ki jong ki jong ki jingai jingmut bad kane ka long kaba ym lah kiar.U la ong ruh ba ka NPP kan bishar bniah ia ka jingjeid ia u kyrtong MP bad kan shim ia ka raid a ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut lang jong ka Party.  U la iathuh ba ka committee kan sa phah ia ka kyrteng jong ki kyrtong sha ki bor kiba ha khliehduh jong ka party ba kan shim ia ka rai kaba khatduh.Kane ka jingpynshai jong u Marcuise N Marak ka la mih hadien ba ka la don ka jingkynnoh na ka liang jong u synbud myntri rangbah u Sniawbhalang Dhar ba u kwah ban pynieng ia u pyrsa jong u, u Dasakhiat Lamare uba la long mynshuwa u MLA ka Mawhati ba un long u kyrtong MP jong ka shillong parliamentary Assembly.
title: Ym don jingïapher jingjingmut ban jeid ia u kyrtong MP : Marcuise N Marak

content: U Myntri ki kam pynmih bording elektrik ka Meghalaya, u Taher Mondal u la kyntu ia ki trai jong ki Mobile Towers ba kin siew lut noh ia ki Bill Elektrik jong ki. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor, u A.T. Mondal u la ong ba kito ki trai jong ki Mobile Tower ki dei ban siew dep noh ia ki Bill Elektrik khnang ba kin lait na ka jingshoh ot ia ka bording elektrik jong ki.U la ong ba kane ka jingkyntu ka long ban ym buh jingeh ia ki hadien habud. U A.T. Mondan u la iathuh ruh ba na ka liang jong ka tnad pynmih bording elektrik kam kwah ban buh kano kano ka jingeh ia ki trai Mobile Tower kiba pynbiang ia ka jingiaid beit iaid ryntih jong ki Mobile Phone. U Myntri u la iathuh ba don ki trai Mobile Tower kiba la dep siew lut ia ki Elektrik Bill jong ki bad don pat kiba dang pynsah.U la iathuh ba haduh mynta don 200 tylli Mobile Tower ha kylleng ka Meghalaya ba la pyniaid da ki company Mobile Phone bad dang don shuh sa kiwei ki kompani mobile phone kiba ban ai ia ka jingshakri jong ki sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya.
title: Kyntu u Myntri ki kam pynmih bording ïa ki trai Mobile Tower ban siew lut noh ïa ki Bill Elektrik

content: SHILLONGU myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma u la pynbna lyngba ka lad pathai khubor X ia kaa la tip kum ka Twitter ba ka jingialehkai jong ka 5th edition Meghalaya Games kan long naduh ka January 15 to January 20, 2024.U myntri Rangbah u la iathuh ba baroh kawei ka Meghalaya mynta ka phai khmat sha Tura na ka bynta ka jingpynlong ia kane ka jingialehkai ha ka sien ba nyngkong ha Rilum Garo.U Myntri u la iathuh ba kane ka jingpynlong ia ka Meghalaya Games ka long shi bynta jong ka jingrakhe dap 50 snem jong ka jingioh ia ka jylla ba pura.U Sangma u la iathuh ba la lah ban pynlong khatduh ia ka Meghalaya Games ha ka snem 2022 bad na kid aw bym lah ban kiar ym shym la lah ban pynlong mynta ka snem bad la rah noh ban pylong ha Tura ha ka snem 2024.
title: Yn pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games 2024 ha Tura

content: :Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la sdang plie pyrda ïa ka Rejuve Aesthetics, kaba dei ka state-of-the-art clinic ha Laitumkhrah, Shillong, ha ka 10 tarik, Naiwieng. La kam trai ïa katei ka kompeni da ka Dr Sharadee Shreemoyee bad ka la don ka jingïatreilang bad ka nongseng kam lajong na Shillong, ka Ragini Shadap. Kine ar ngut ki la plie katei ka jaka sumar lem bad ka jingïohi jngai jong ki ba ki paidbah na Meghalaya kim donkam ban leit sumar ïalade shaduh shabar jong ka jylla na ka bynta ki jingdonkam jong ki.Ha katei ka jaka sumar ka don ïa ki kor treikam teknologi hapoh ka liang jong ka jingsumar, kynthup ïa ka Hydrafacial, Oxygeneo facial, Hollywood laser, Photo Facials, Dermafrac, Pigmentation bad kiwei kiwei ki jait jingsumar kynthup ïa ka HIFU, microneedling, fillers, botox bad kiwe kiwei. Katei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka la ai khublei ïa katei ka kynhun Rejuve Aesthetics na ka bynta ka jinglah ban wanrah ïa kane ka jingtreikam ba paka na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka Shillong, kiba mynta, kim donkam ban leit shaduh shabar tang ban phah sumar ïalade na ka bynta ka sniehdoh bad u shñiuhkhlieh.Ka nongshem jong ka Rejuve Aesthetics, ka Dr Sharadi Shreemoyee ka la ong, “Ngi la pyntreikam ïa ka Rejuve Aesthetics ha Guwahati ha ki 18 snem ba la dep bad nga dei kawei na ki briew ba nyngkong ban pynithuh ïa ka jingmut jong ka aesthetic clinic ha Guwahati, ha kaba ka la long kawei na ki jingmut bym pat don ba tip ha ka bynta jong kane ka ri. Hynrei nga kmen ba ng ïohi ïa ka jingjop ha kine ki 8 snem ba ka dep na baroh ka jylla North East bad mynta ka la dei ka por ban leit noh sha Shillong bad ban shimti ïa ki paidbah jong ka Shillong lem bad kane ka bynta ba thymmai jong ka aesthetics.” Ka trai jong kane ka clinic, ka Ragini Shadap ka la ong, “Ngi pdiang sngewbha ïa ki paidbah jong ka Shillong ba kin ïoh ïa kane ka jingpyntreikam jong ngu bad nga kyndeh ka mynsiem ban ïoh ïatreilang bad ka Rejuve Aesthetics.”
title: Ïoh ka jylla ïa ka jaka sumar jong ka Rejuve Aesthetics

content: :Na ka bynta ban pynhusiar ïa ki samla jong ka shnong shaphang ka jingsniew jong ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid, kynthup ïa ka kyiad bad u drok, ha kaba ka Umkei Sports and Cultural Club ka la dep pynlong da ka Awareness Generation and Education Program halor ka Substance & Drug Abuse bad HIV & AIDS ha ka 10 tarik, Naiwieng 2023. Ïa katei ka tamasa, kaba la dep pynlong ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Meghalaya Police and Meghalaya Aids Control Society, ka la jia ha ka shnong Umkei hapoh madan ïalehkai.Ha katei ka prokram, la don bynta da ka Batemon Pamshong, uba dei u Clinic Psychologist jong ka Civil Hospital Nongpoh bad ka Zion Marweiñ, Assistant Director jong ka GIPA Meghalaya Aids Control Society, kum ki nongwad bniah. U Apol Mawñiuh, Reserved Inspector 4th Battalion MLP Sohpien West Khasi Hills District bad ki nongtrei jong ka Umkei Sports Club, khynnah pule bad ki nongshong shnong, kiba la don bynta lang ha katei ka prokram. Hashwa jong katei ka prokram pynhusiar, la don ka jingïakhun ïalehkai hapdeng ka Umkei Sports bad ka Cultural Club bad ka Police Training School Umran, kaba la pynlong na ka bynta katei ka shnong ba kan don bynta lang. Ka Umkei ka la kylla long ka nongjop ha katei ka jingïakhun da 4-0.Da kaba pynbna ïa ki paidbah kum briew ba wad bniah, ka Batemon Pamshong u la kren ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ban shimkhia kloi bad kitkhlieh ïa kiba shitom duna jingmut jingpyrkhat da kaba phikir. Ka la ong kumne, “Ka jingshitom duna jingmut jingpyrkhat ka long ka phang ba kongsan kaba dei ban shimkhia. Kito ki briew kiba don kane ka jingshitom, ki ju sheptieng ïa ka jingshah kyntait jong ki ha ka imlang sahlang bad ka jingshah kynthoh ha ki briew kaba long ka jingeh bakhraw kaba lah ban lam sha ka jingmut jong ki ban pynïap noh ïalade bad ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid. Ki briew kiba don kane ka jingshitom, ki ju dom biej wat ïa i daw barit ruh, ki shem ïa ka jingsngewsih ba junom bad ka jingsngewsih ba neh shi jingim ha ki.”“Ki briew kiba don jingsngewsih ki ju hap ha bun ki jingshah pynap shrip ha ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid. Kum ki dkhot jong ka imlang ka sahlang, ngim dei ban kynthoh ïa kito kiba ïakhun bad ka jingshitom duna ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat; ha ka jaka, ngi dei ban kyrshan ïa ki lyngba ka jingai jingmut ïa ki bad ïalong paralok bad ki namar ba ki sngew long marwei,” ban jur ka Pamshong.Ha kawei pat ka liang, ka Zion Marweiñ ka la kren ba kumno ki samla ki hap ha ka jingpynshoi ban pyndonkam ïa ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid, da kaba kdew ba ki jingshah ibeiñ bad ka jingshah ban beiñ na ka liang jong ki bahaïing ha sem. Ka la ban jur ïa ka bynta jong ki kmnie ki kpa ba ki dei ban tip ïa ki paralok jong ki bad pynleit jingmut ban ai por ban pynheh pynsan ïa ki ha ka lawei ban wan jong ki. Katei ka prokram ka bun da ki jingrwai ba kongsan bad ka jingshad da ki nongshong shnong jong ka Umkei.
title: Pynlong prokram ka shnong Umkei halor ka jingpyn husiar shaphang ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ki kynja jingdih pynbuaid

content: U Vice Chancellor of the North Eastern Hill University (NEHU), u Prof PS Shukla u la kyntu ia ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingthmu sangeh trei kam ba khlem buh por jong ka. U Prof. Shula u la ong ba ka JAC ka dei ban peitbniah shuwa ia ki jiingdawa jong ka shuwa ba kan pynlong ia ki jingiakhih jong ka khnang ba kan ym ktah ia ki samla pule. U Vice Chancellor ka NEHU u la pynsngew ruh ia ka Joint Action Committee, ba u Nohprah, u dei u bnai ba ka Univerisy ka buh kam, kynthup ia ka jingpynlong ia ka Examination bapher bapher.U Prof. Shukla ula ong ba kane ka jingpynsangeh ia ka jingthmu sangeh trei kam kan iarap ia ka Univeristy ba kan iaid beit iaid ryntih bad ba ka long ka jingmyntoi ia ki samla pule hadien ba la lah ban ia pynbeit da ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut ha kaba pyntrei kami a ka National Education Policy, 2020. Ha kawei pat ka liang ka Joint Action Committee kaba kynthup ia ka JAC, the NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad NEHUSU ba kan pynlong ia ka jingsangeh trei kam naduh ka 13 tarik u Naiwieng kum ka dak jong ka jingpyrshah ia u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU uba leh bym salia ia ki khyndai tylli ki jingdawa jong ka JAC.Ki jingdawa jong ka JAC ka long ban weng noh ia ka jingthum kam beain  technical officer, senior consultant, ka jingthung ia ki Statutory Officers bad University Engineer, ka jinghiar syndet ka University Health Centre, ka jingpynlait noh ia ki nonghikai bad nongtrei technical na ki ka ophis jong ka NEHU, ka buh biang ia ka NEHU ACT, Statutes bad Ordinance ha NEHU official website, ka jingpynlong ia ka jingpynkup burom nam la ka por ia ki samla ba pass jong ka NEHU bad kiwei
title: Kyntu u Vice Chancellor ïa JAC ban pynsangeh noh ïa ka jingthmu sangeh trei kam

content: Ka Khasi Students’ Union ryngkat bad kiwei ki seng ki la kynthah jur ia ka Sorkar synrop Meghalaya Democrac Alliance kaba ym shym la leh eiei na ka bynta ka jingbuh ia ki khyrdop rung bad khyrdop mih ha kylleng jong ka Meghalaya ban iada na ka jingwan rung kyrthep jong ki mynder ri sha kane ka jylla.Ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka jingeh, u khliehduh jong ka KSU, u bah  Lambokstarwell Marngar u la iathuh ia ki nongthoh kot khubor ba ka Sorkar ka la tyrwa ban buh haduh 18 tylli ki khyrdep rung bad ki khyrdop mih ban iada ia ka jingwan rung jong ki mynder ri sha kane ka jylla, kum shi bynta na ka jngpyntrei kam ia ka Meghalaya Residents Safety bad Security Act (MRSSA), 2016, Hynrei, kane ka la shu kut sa tang ha ki jingthoh.Une u nongialam jong ka KSU la iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la shna ia kawei ka kyrdop rung kaba ym shym la trei kam shuh ha kine ki sngi. Kane kane seng ka la ong ruh kam kam tip la jia aiu ia ka jingpynieng ia kita kiwei ki 17 tylli ki khyrdop rung bad khyrdop mih, wat lada na ka liang jong ka Sorkar jylla ka la pyllong ia ka jingjurip ia kitei ki jaka. U Bah Marngar u la iathuh ba ka KSU ka la buddien ia kane ka kam na kawei ka por sha kawei pat bad ka jubab na ka liang jong ka Sorkar ka long ba ka dang ap ia ka jingpdiang jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ia ka  MRSS (Amendment) Bill, 2020 bad ba rai jong ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Meghalaya ba dei ban pyntrei kam ia ka Inner Line Permit ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpeit jingjngoh jong ka Sorkar Pdeng.Kane ka seng ka la kyntu ruh ia ka Sorkar jylla ban kynthup ruh ia ki khlieh nongsynshar ba kin long ki dkhot jong ka Districtr Task Force khnang ban tehlakame ia ka jingwar rung ki mynder ri. Ka KSU ka la ong ruh ba ka jingpyntrei kam thikna ia ka MRSSA kan iarap shibun ruh bana tehlakem ia u drok bad kiwei ki jingsniew. Ha kawei pat ka liang, u President ka Hynnietrep National Youth Front, u bah Sadon K. Blah ba ka shong ain ba ka Sorkar kan pyntrei kam ia ka MRSSA.
title: Kynthah ka KSU bym trei kam ki khyrdop rung kyrdop mih ha Meghalaya ban tehlakam ia ka jingrung ki mynder ri

content: :Ka procession bakhuid jong ka Eucharistic kaba la dep pynlong ha Cathedral jong ka Mary Help jong ki Khristan ha Laitumkhrah, Shillong Archdiocese ha ka 12 tarik, Naiwieng, ka long ka tamasa, ba la pynlong da ka Archdiocese, ka la sakhi ba la don ka jingïashim bynta da ki paidbah ba bun jong ka balang Katholik. Ha katei ka procession, la rakhe da u Apostolic Nuncio, Most Rev. Archbishop Leopoldo Girelli, uba la pynïaid ïa katei ka tamasa ha ka jingdon lang jong u Archbishop Victor Lyngdoh jong ka Shillong Archdiocese. Shuh shuh, u Bishop Wilbert Marwein, Bishop jong ka Nongstoin Diocese, Bishop Ferdinand Dkhar, Bishop jong ka Jowai bad u Bishop Joachim Walder, Auxiliary Bishop jong ka Aizawl Shillong, kiba la noh synniang lang ha kane ka proscession bakhuid jong kane ka tamasa. Katba ïa ka mass bakhuid, la pynlong ha Cathedral Shillong Catholic Laitumkhrah, kaba la don bynta da ki phadar, sistar, brother bad kiwei kiwei ki nongbud bakhuid. Katei ka procession, ka dei kaba la pynsah jingkynmaw kum ka sawdong sawkun ka jingkhuid jinghok, kaba la pyni ïa ka dak jong ka jingpynpaw ïa ka jinglong hok bad khuid hapoh ka imlang ka sahlang.
title: Iphuh iphieng ka Shillong Archdiocese ha ka jingïaid procession Eucharist ha Laitumkhrah

content: Kawei na ki nongrep bad nongseng kam la jong ka na ka shnong Mupliang kaba hap hapoh jong ka Thadlaskein Block ha West Jaintia Hills, ka Kong Anumahasa Sna ka la iathuh ba kam ju poi pyrkhat ban na ka jinglong ‘riew kynthei kan kylla sha ka nonseng kam la jong. Ka Kong sna kam ju poi pyrkhat ba na ka jingim jong ka jingkut lad kut lynti, ban poi sha ka jingseng kam la jong bad ban aikam ruh ia kiwei. Ka Kong Sna ka la iathuh ba ka la lah ban pule tang haduh ka Klass-IX bad  ba ka don tang kawei ka jaka rep ka jaka riang kaba phra akar bad ki jingrep jong ka, ki long ia u Shynrai Lakadon, ki sla tyrpad, ki sohmarit bad kiwei.Ka Kong Sna kam ju poi pyrkhat mynno mynno ha ka jingim jong ka ba ka lah ban khaiing ki ki mar rep ki jong ki shaduh America. Ka Kong Sna ka la dang ban seng ia ka kam la jong da ka jingpynshlur jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) hapoh ka jingialam jong u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma lyngba ka tnad Industrial Policy & Promotion, Startup India, Government of India. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka long ban pynshlur ia ki nongshong shnong jong ka Meghalaya ban seng ia la ki kam la jong, ban don kata ka jingsngewthuh ban leh ia kitei kiei kin ban kham pher na kiwei, ki ban iaryngkat kyrdan ba kiwei ki ri jong ka pyrthei, ka jingseng ia ki kam la jong ki ban pynroi ia ka jingnang jingtip, ka ban pynkiew ia ka kamai kajih bad ka spah ka phew bad bad ai kam ruh ia ka imlang sahlang. Ka Kong Sna ka la shim ia ka jingtyrwa jong ka Sorkar jylla lyng ba ka Meghalaya Startup ha ka snem 2019 ba kan long ka nongseng kam la jong.Ka sien jan kaba nyngkong ba ka shim, ka long ka jingshim ia ka ram na ka Bank kaba ym don kano kano ka jingshim sut bad ia kiwei ki jingtrei kam ba ki ong ka Technology jong kane ka juk shai kaba mynta ban pynmih ia kine ki mar rep ki jong ka haduh ba kin da kylla long ki dawai. Ka Kong Sna ka la batai ruh shaphang ka bor pynkhiah jong u snep dieng dawai Cinnamon Stick kiba ka shalan shabar na Meghalaya. Ki stad ka koit ka khiah ki iathuh ia ngi ba ki Cinnamon Stick ki dei ki jait musla ba ki briew ki pyndonkam ha kaba shet jyntah.Hynrei, ha ki ki don bun tylli ki bor pynkhiah. Kiba bun ki briew ki pyndonkam ia ia ki Cinnamon Stick ba la pynlwet bha ban pynneh pynsah ia ki jynbam. Kine ki stad ka koit ka khiah ki iathuh ia ngi, ba ki Cinnamon ki don ka bor pynkhiah. Ki pynkhlain bor ia ki Cell. Ki ialeh pyrshah ia ka jingpang bampong kaba ngi ong ka jingpang Cancer. Ki iarap ia ka jingpang tyrha shadem bad kiwei. Ka Kong Sna ka pyniaid iew ia u Sohmarit bad musla Stone Flower, ‘latyrpad uba ka jingsma iwbih jong u, ka palat liam ia kiwei ki ‘latyrpad jong ka ri India. Uwei pat u mar rep jong ka, u dei u Synrai Lakadong. Ma ngi hangne, ngi pyndonkam ha ka shet jyntah.Don ruh kiba dih ia ka um Shynrai Lakadon na ka bynta ki jingpang jong ki. Ka Kong Sna ka pynthikna ba u Shynrai Lakadong uwei na ki dawai bah. Ka la iathuh ba ka die ia u Shynrai Lakadong jong ka na ka bynta ka jingshna ia ki dawai Ayur Vedic da ka MT Meru Medicine jong ka California State, America.Ka Kong Sna ka la iathuh ba katei ka kompani pynmih dawai, kam thied ia u Synrai Lakadong jong ka khlem da Test shuwa ia u. Ka Kong Anumahasa Sna ka pyniaid iew ia kine ki mar ki jong ka da ka kyrteng Braves Enterprise. Ka la ioh ban ia shim bynta ha kawei na ki basa jong ka Meghalaya Collectives ha ka World Food India ba la pyllong da ka Ministry of Food Processing Industries jong ka Sorkar India ha Pragati Maidai, New Delhi naduh ka 3 tarik haduh ka 5 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023.Ka Kong Anumaha Sna ka la jawummat da ka jingkren haba ka Myntri ki kam rep ki kam riang, ka Kong Mazel Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kylli ia sha ki jingtrei ki jingktah ki jong ka. Hapdeng ki ummat jong ka jingkmen, ka Anumahasa Sna ka la ong, “Ngam kaba ym pat biang ka thoh ka pule nga lah ban kot shaduh kane ka kyrdan”.
title: U Shynrai Lakadong ka Kong Anumahasa Sna u Iaid ïew shah duh America

content: :U MLA ka Mawkyrwat u Bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar mynta ka sngi ka 13 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 u la ïoh ban plie noh  ïa ka Girls Hostel ha Mawkyrwat ha kaba ïa kane ka Girls Hostel ka hap hapoh ka Social Welfare Department jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya bad la bei tyngka lyngba ka skhim Article 275(1) jong ka Constitution ka Ri India, Ministry ka Tribal Affairs ka Sorkar India. La pyntrei ïa kane ka project da ka ophis DRDA South West Khasi Hills ha ka mang tyngka kaba T.2.5 klur tyngka bad mynta ka sngi.  Na ka liang ka Ophis jong ka  DRDA  lyngba u DC Bah T.Lyngwa u ïoh ban  aiti noh ïa ka syrnot jong kane ka Girls Hostel sha ka Kong C.D. Lyngwa kaba dei ka Director jong ka ophis  Social Welfare bad hadien ba na ka liang ka ophis Social Welfare kala pynbiang lut ïa baroh  ki jingdonkam kan sa aiti noh sha ka Balang Presbyterian Mawkyrwat ban pyndonkam noh ïa kane ka Girls Hostel kaba la plie mynta ka sngi kaba don ha Mawkyrwat. Ha kane ka sngi nalor u kongsan la ïoh jingkren ruh u na  Bah T. Lyngwa DC SWKHD Kong C.D. Lyngwa Director jong ka ophis Social Welfare ha ryngkat da ka jingïadonlang kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar ki tymmen Basan jong ka Balang Presbyterian Mawkyrwat ki seng longkmie bad kiwei de ki riew rangbah jong ka thaiñ. La pynïaid  ïa kane ka jingïalang ba lyngkot  da  u Bah L.T. Tariang ADC South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Plie u Bah Renikton L.Tongkhar ïa ka Girls Hostel ha ka mang tyngka kaba T.2.5 klur ha Mawkyrwat

content: NONGPOH:Ka tnad Ri Bhoi Youth Federation (RBYF) Central ka la pynlong da ka tamasa pynkup burom ïa ki 26 ngut ki samla ba wan shakhmat ha ka eksam Secondary School Leaving Certificate (SSLC) na Ri Bhoi district ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ. Ïa katei ka tamasa, kaba la don da ki nongshah khot sngewbha ba pawkhmat, ka la pynkup burom ruh ïa ki samla pule ba ïakhun bha ha ka eksam Higher Secondary School Leaving Certificate (HSSLC) ba kynthup ïa ki samla ba pass bha ha kylleng ka Science, Commerce bad Arts.Ha katei ka tamasa pynkup burom, la don bynta da ki riewpawkhmat, kynthup ïa u Vincent H. Pala, Lok Sabha MP, Mayralborn Syiem, MLA Nongpoh, Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh, MLA Unsning,  Damanbait Lamare, MLA jong ka Umroi abd u Bipul Thangkhiew, President jong ka RBYF. La don lang ki nonghikai bad kiwei ki nongïalam ha katei ka sngi.Da kaba pynpaw halor ka jingïaroh ïa ka jingpynkup burom jong ka RBYF ha kane ka tamasa, ki nongkren ki la kren shaphang ka mat ba kongsan ha ka ban pynkiew ïa ka pule puthi hapoh ka district bad ka jylla baroh kawei. Katei ka jingpynkup burom ka ban jur halor ka jingithuh ïa ka jingtrei shitom jong ki samla pule kiba wan shakhmat ha ki eksam SSLC bad HSSLC.
title: Pynkup burom ka RBYF ïa ki samla pule ba wan shakhmat ha ka SSLC bad HSSLC

content: Ka Tyrso Valley Wildlife Protection Society da ka jingiatreilang bad ki kynhun shnong kin pynlong ia ka jinglehkmen jinglehsngewbha Amur Falcon Festival ha ka 14 tarik bad 15 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka shnong Tyrso ha Ri-Bhoi District. Kane ka jinglehkmen ka long ban rakhe ia ka jingwan jong kine ki sim Amur Falcon sha kane ka jaka man la ka snem.U Secretary ka TVWPS, Nongpoh ba kane ka jinglehkmen ka don ka jingthmu ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang bad ia ki mrad, ki sim bad ki dohkha. U la kyntu ia ki briew ba kim dei ban pyntieng ia ka jingwan jong kine ki mrad ba tang shipor. U la pynpaw ruh ba ka shnong ka thaw ka la lah ban leh ia kane naduh ka snem 2015 ban iada ia kine ki sim na ka jingma ha Tyrso bad Umru.Da ka jingwan poi bun kine ki sim ha kane ka jaka, u Alos u la pynpaw ia ka jingthrang jong kane ka shnong ban ithuh kum ka jaka jong ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei bad ban pynrung noh ia kane ka shnong ha ka map jong ki kam jngohkai pyrthei. U la pynpaw ruh ba kane ka kynhun TVWPS ka la wad lad wad lynti ban pynrung ia kane ka lehkmen ba la tip kum ka Amur Falcon Festival kum kawei ki jinglehkmen jong ka jylla bad ban pynlong man la ka snem.U Alos u la iathuh ba ka jingwan jong ki sim ka long ka jngiarap kaba khraw. Kane ka long ba kine ki sim ki bam lut ia ki khniang ki ksiah kiba pynjulor ia ki jingthung. U la maham ruh ba ki briew kim dei ban siat lane kem ia kine ki sim namarba kane ka long pyrshah ia ki kam shong bad ia ki ain jong ka Wildlife Department jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka lehkmen lehsngewbha Amur Falcon Festival, ka WVWPS la khot sngewbha ia ki paidbah ba kin ia shim bynta bad ban iohi hi da la ki jong ki khmat bad ban iohsngew da la ki jong ki skhor ia ka jingpah sngewtynnad jong kine ki sim kiba wan na kiwei pat ki ri bajngai jong ka pyrthei.
title: Yn pylong ïa ka lehkmen leh sngewbha Amur Falcon Festival

content: :Ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih, ha kaba la don ar ngut ki mynsiem briew ba la duh noh ïa la ka jingim na ka jingshah bat bording ha u wire ha ka 11 tarik, Naiwieng ha ka shnong Kpepsyiem, Ri Bhoi. Kitei ki lanot, ba la tip kum u Lal Lapang (65 snem ka rta) bad u Pian Namsaw (44 snem ka rta) na Umden La-ang, ki la khlad hajuh kumba katto katne kynta ha ka miet jong ka sngi Saitjaiñ. Katba ïa ka met jong ki, la lap noh ha ka step ba bud jong ka sngi u Blei kumba 8:30 baje mynstep. Katba ki daw ba jia katei ka jingshah bat bording, ka la shu pynsah ha ka umdum ïa ki nongtohkit kiba la kulmar shaphang ka daw jong ka jingkhlad kine ki lanot kiba la don hajan jong u wire ba heh voltage kiba la shimkhia na ka bynta ban ai ding sha ki jaka jong ka Patharkhmah. Halor jong ka jingïoh jingtip shaphang katei ka jingjia, ki pulit jong katei ka shnong ki la leit sha katei ka jaka, ki la lap ïa kitei ki metïap bad ki la pynbiang noh da ki kali ban rah ïa ka met jong ki sha Byrnihat CHC. Na katei ka jingjia, la pynlong da ka eksamin post-mortem, kaba yn sa pyllait da ka jingkyrpad jong ki bahaïing jong kine kiba la khlad noh.
title: Khlad ar ngut na ka jingshah bat bording ha Ri Bhoi

content: :Ki nongtrei jong ka Accredited Social Health Activist (ASHA)  South West Khasi Hills District kiba hap hapoh ka lama jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union mynta ka sngi ka 14 tarik u Naiwieng da ki spah ngut ki la ïamih paidbah ban pynlong ïa ka rally kaba jai jai ha ryngkat da ki jingthoh ha ki placard ha kaba ïa kane ka jingïaïaid paidbah ki la sdang na Lad DC ophis Laitlawsang bad pynkut ha Dorbar Hall Mawkyrwat kane ka long kum ka dak ban pynpaw ïa ka jingbym hun halor ka jubab jong ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh.Ka kong Travelness Paliar  kaba dei ka President jong ki ASHA South West Khasi Hills District ha shwa ban sdang ïa ka jingïaïaid paidbah ka la ong ba na ka liang ki ASHA South west Khasi Hills District katba ka Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka koit ka khiah bad ruh ïa ka sorkar jylla  Meghalaya kam pat lah ban pynshai  katkum ka jingdawa jong ki ASHA ngin nang pynjur ïa  ka jingïakhih khlem buh por bad  kan dang ïai bteng nangne shakhmat da kaba sangeh trei kam tad haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.Ka kong Sony Kharjana kaba dei ka Adviser jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union ka la  byrthen jur ïa ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ba ka klet ïa lade kum ka longkmie bad kaba dei ruh ka Minister jong ka koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ba kam pyrkhat shuh ïa ki jingeh jong ki longkmie kiba dei ki ASHA, ka la ong ruh ba balei ka Sorkar jylla ka lah ban pynlut bai dawai iïa kita ki nongdih drok kiba kwah hi ban pynjot ïa la ka jong ka met haduh 9 klur tyngka hynrei kam lah pat ban  pynbiang ïa ki ASHA kiba len lade naka bynta ki khun ki kti ha ki ba armet ha ki shnong ki thaw.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ka jingkyrshan na ki seng bhalang, ki riew rangbah bad ka jingkren na u Bah Polan Sohphoh uba dei u rangbah kur Rikhain lyngdoh Sakwang, u Bah Lambokstar Marweiñ u president ka HANM SWKHD, u Bah Arbok Kharjahrin u President ka HYC SWKHD na ka seng KSU u Bah Iengskhem Syiemlieh bad kiwei de ki riew rangbah bad na ki nongkitkam jong ki ASHA jong ka Thaiñ South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Ka kam shikhoh jingsiew shitroh pyrta ki ASHA ha ka Rally ha Mawkyrwat SWKHD

content: :Ka rynsan ka la pynkhreh na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya ban pynïaid ïa ka tamasa Shillong Cherry Blossom Festival 2023, wat haba ha ki surok bad ki lynti ïaid kjat, la dap da ki rong ki rup jong ka rong pink bad ki dieng ba rong lieh jong u Cherry Blossom. Ki nongjngoh kai pyrthei na India bad na shabar ri, ki la pynkhreh ïa la ki khmat jong ki sa shisien pat na ka bynta ban rakhe ïa katei ka tamasa jong ka mariang bad kiwei kiwei lem bad ki kyrteng jong ki riewpawkhmat jong ka kam rwai bad karkhana ak phlim.Ha ka jingïalang ki lad pathai khubor dang shen, u Myntri ka tnad jngoh kai pyrthei, u Paul Lyngdoh u la ong kumne, “Yn sa don haduh 30,000 ngut ki nongwan ha ka shi sngi kaba mut ba ha ka sngi ba kut jong kane ka tamasa, ngin sa ïoh haduh shi lak ki nongwan. Katba 90 percent jong kine ki nongwan, ki la khmih lynti ba kin dei kiba nabar, na India bad kumjuh ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei na sah ri phoreiñ.”Katei ka tamasa ka don ban tyrwa ïa bun kiwei pat ki bynta, naduh ki jingïakop ban riam kum ki tyngshop bad puron bad jingïakop ïaid thei bhariew haduh ka jingïashim bynta ha ka ban ïa rwai, ki jingwah ïa ki dur ki dar, ka jingïakop rwai karaoke, ka giant wheel ne Ferris wheel bad kiwei kiwei. Yn sa pylong ïa katei ka tamasa ha RBDSA Sports Complex ha Madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong, Ri Bhoi district.Ka Shillong Cherry Blossom Festival ka dei ka jingrakhe ïa ka kolshor bad ki jingrwai bad kane ka bynta ba mynta u snem kan long kaba yn sah jingkynmaw ïa ka jingwan rwai jong ki nongrwai Pop ba pawnam bad ki DJ. Katba ki nongrwai ban sa wan rwai ha ka sngi nyngkong ha kane ka tamasa, ha ka 17 tarik, Naiwieng, ki kynthup ïa u Sanam, Hybrid Theory, SURL, Kenny Musik, 4th Element, The Band Phantasm, DBRYN, Gwyneth, Dalariti, CYCO, Aminio, Dr Legend, Chevinia.Kine ki nongrwai kin sa pynkhreh ban pynshong shit ïa ki paidbah ha ka sngi ba ar, kynthup ïa u NE-YO, Meba Ofilia, Pink Panda, Snow White, Rahul Rajkhowa, Street Stories – Banjop, Empirical Tribe – Tenny, Zethan, Ricaa Stella, Banker Kharkongor. Katba ha ka sngi khatduh jong kane ka tamasa, yn sa ïohi ïa ka u nongrwai na ka kynhun barim jong ka Boyzone, u Ronan Keating, Jonas Blue, Lou Majaw, Blue Temptation, Da Minot, Nokpante, Rhem, Favian, Wanjop Sohkhlet, Banrap, Youngg Nate, Meban, Lamphrang, Toshan. Katei ka jaka ba don ha National Highway 40, ha kaba ka surok kan nym don blok ha ka por ba don ka Cherry Blossom Festival kaba yn sa don ha ka Guwahati Shillong Road, Mawiong-ISBT Bypass bad Mawdiangdiang Bypass.
title: Pynkhreh ka Meghalaya ban pynïaid ïa ka Shillong Cherry Blossom Festival 2023

content: :Ki nongtrei ASHA jong ka West Khasi Hills ASHA Association ha ryngkat ka jingïasnoh kti lang ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union mynta ka sngi kila pynlong da ka jingïaïaid rally kaba jai jai hapoh sor Nongstoiñ kum ka dak ban bteng ïa ka jingïakhih ka jong ki ban pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingbym hun ïa ka jubab jong ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Dr. Ampareen Lyngdoh halor ki mat jingdawa jong ki ASHA.Ïa ka tei ka rally ba jai jai la sdang na MCH Hospital Nongstoiñ bad ïaid ter ter ka ïew Nongstoiñ bad pynkut hapoh ka Market Complex bad bteng pat sa ka jingïalang paidbah ha kaba la sakhi da ki spah ngut ki nongtrei ASHA ha WKH kila wan ban ïashim bynta ha katei ka rally.Ka jingïakhih jong ki ASHA da kaba sangeh treikam kala ktah ïa ka kam shakri ïa ki paidbah ha ka koit ka khiah hapoh ka District hynrei na ka liang jong ki nongïalam jong ki nongtrei ASHA kila kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba kin ai jingkyrshan lem ïa ki khnang ba kin ïoh ïa ki jingdawa jong ki na ka sorkar kaba kila ïakhun la bun bun snem.Ka President jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union ka kong Mirajune Myrsing haba ai jingkren ha ka jingïalang paidbah kaba la long ha khmat ka Market Complex New Nongstoiñ kala ong ba ki nongtrei ASHA kidei kiba kongsam tam ban shakri ha ka koit ka khiah pynban ka sorkar kam ithuh bad niew bein ïa ki da kaba ai ka jingtrei kaba khia katba ka jingsiew ka rit na kiba rit tam.Shuh shuh kala ong ruh ba katkum ka jingkhang jong ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah kala ong ba ki nongtrei ASHA kidei tang ki nongtreimon sngewbha kiba lah ban trei tang 2 snem ha kaba katei ka nongïalam ki ASHA kala buh jingkylli ruh ïa ka Myntri sorkar kumno ka lah ban long ba ki ASHA kin trei tang 2 snem katba ka katkum ka National Health Mission (NHM) la ong ba ki ASHA kiba trei palat ïa ka 10 snem kin ïoh ïa ka khusnam golden handshake ryngkat ka song pisa kaba 20 hajar tyngka bad lyngba ka NHM kala pynshisha ba ki ASHA ki lah ban trei palat ïa ka 2 snem.Kumta katei ka nongialam kala dawa na ka sorkar ba kadei ban pynkiew ïa ka Bai ong ki nongtrei ASHA hapoh ka Jylla nalor kiwei de ki lad jingïarap ki ban ai jingmyntoi ïa ki nongtrei bad kala ong ruh ba katba ym pat ïoh ïa ki jingdawa ki  ASHA kin nym leit phai sha ki jingtreikam.Kiwei kiwei kiba la ai jingkren ha katei ka jingïalang ki kynthup ïa ka kong Linianci Marweiñ President Asha Workers Union Nongstoiñ, Kyntiewmon Nongshli, President Asha Workers Union Mawshynrut, Srally Rashir, Sordar of New Nongstoiñ nalor kiwei de.
title: Bym hun ïa ka jubab ka Myntri, ïaid rally ki ASHA ha Nongstoiñ, yn dang bteng ka jingïakhih

content: :Uwei u shipai BSF commandant jong ka 200 Battalion jong ka  Border Security Force (BSF), kaba don ha Praharinagar Tura, uba la ithuh kum u R N Mishra uba la ïaid shapoh jong ka Nokrek National Park ha West Garo Hills, u la jah rngai kumba phra kynta ha ka miet jong ka sngi nyngkong, la lap noh ïa u da ka jingthwet jong ka kynhun pyllait im. La don ka jingthwet na ka liang ka kyhnun hadien ba la jah une u commandant ha ka 13 tarik, Naiwieng.Katkum ka jingïathuh na ka khubor, la ong ba utei u Commandant u la rung shapoh katei ka national park kaba jngai bha lem bad ki nongap pahara jong u khlem pan jingïarap na ki nongbatai jong katei ka shnong. Katba ki kynhun ba wad ïa u bad kiba rah da ki jingtbeh ding ki la poi ha katei ka jaka naba ka khubor ka la saphriang shaphang ka jingjah rngai jong u ha kylleng ka Garo Hills. La lap ïa utei u commandant ba u dang im bad um lei lei hapoh katei ka Nokrek Park hadien katto katne por ha ka por 10 baje mynmiet. “La pyndon ka jingïakren bad u kumba 7 kilometar hapoh jong katei ka park ha kaba la lap ïa ka Matcha Nokpante ne ka jaka ba shong jah thait u khla”, la pyntip katei ka kynhun ba thwet ïa u sha kawei na ki lad pathai khubor.
title: La lap ïa u shipai BSF ha GH National Park

content: U dkhot ka ïing Dorbar jong ka Gro Hills Autonomous District Council, u Bernard N. Marak, uba long ruh MDC bamih khmat ia ka Tura, ula ong ba “Aadhaar um dei u 666 lane u Khrist-lamler. U dei tang u numbor bakyrpang kum u Mobile Number na ka bynta ka jingpynithuh ia u briew shimet.U Aadhaar u na ka bynta ka jingtrei kam kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih bad kaba lait na ka jinglehthok leh shukor bad na ka bynta ka jingtrei kam kaba khuid kaba suba ban ai ia ka jingshakri kaba bha tam ia ki paidbah. U Aadhaar um don jngiadei eiei ba ka jingngeit.U la iathuh ba ka jingpyndonkam ia u Aadhaar ka dei beit tang na ka bynta jong kito kiba dei ban ioh ia ki jingmyntoi na ka jingpytrei kam ia ki kim jong ka Sorkar, kham tam lei lei ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingsiew ia ki nongtrei lyngba ka Online Payment kaba don ka jingiasnoh jong u Aadhaar bad ki Bank Account jong ki. U Bernard N. Marak u la iathuh ba ka jingthmu jong ka jingpyndonkam ia u Aadhaar Number ka long beit ban khang lad kito ki nongtrei Sorkar ba kin ym ioh lad ban sam ia ki pisa jong ki nongtrei lane jong kito kiba dei ban ioh ia ki jingmyntoi pisa lyngba ka jingpyntrei kam ia ki skum Sorkar.U la iathuh ba ka jingthep beit ia ka jingioh bainong jong ki sha ki Bank Account, ka long namarba ba mynshuwa ka la don ka jingud na ki nongioh jingmyntoi ba ki ioh duna ia kata kaba bainong ba ki dei ban ioh. U la iathuh ruh ba ka long kaba sngewsih kaba khraw ba ka jingsiew bainong da kaba pyniasnoh ia u Aadhaar bad ki Bank ka long tang 50 na ka 100 ha kiba bun ki jaka.
title: U Aadhaar umdei u 666 bad um don jingiadei bad ka jingngeit: Bernard N. Marak

content: Ka seng saiñ hima sima United Democratic Party, ka la seng la buh ia ka State Election Committee ban jied ia ki kyrteng kyrtong ki ban iakhun na ka bynta ban long nongmihkhmat sha ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha bad ruh jong ki Autonomous District Council kiba long ha ka snem ka ban wan. U President ka UDP, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh haba kren hadien ka jingseng jingbuh ia ka State Selection Committee da ka Central Executive Committee jong ka UDP, ula iathuh ba kane ka kynhun kan jied ia ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ki ban ia khun naka bynta ka MP bad MDC elekshon.“Ngi la bynshet ha ka SEC na ka bynta ka jingjied ia ki kyrtong kiba kah ban iakhun ha kine ki artylli ki elekshon ki ban wan na ka seng sain hima sima jong ngi”, la ong u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh. Ka UDP ka la shim ia ka rai ba kan pynieng kyrtong na ka bynta jong ka Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary Assembly. Ia ka Shillong Parliamentary Constituency la mihkhmat da u Bah Vincent Pala bad iaka Tura Parliamentary Assembly la mih khmat da ka Agatha K. Sangma. U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka Central Executive Committee  kan pdiang beit ia ka rai ba shim ki nongialam jong ka UDP bad Hill State People’s  Democratic Party ba la shim ha ka 7 tarik u Naiwieng ban ia trei lang na ka bynta ban pyrshan ia u kyrtong jong ka Shillong Parlaimentary Assembly.U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka seng kan ieh ha ka SEC bad ha ki nongialam jong ka UDP Garo Hills ban rai ia ka kyrteng jong u kyrtong na ka bynta jong ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka jingjied nongmihkhmat, ka CEC ka la bthah ia ki District bad Circles ba kin iatrei shitom na ka bynta jng ki kyrtong MP bad ADCs. Ha kaba ia dei bad kawei pat ka jingkylli, u Bah Metbad kawei pat ka jingkylli, u Bah Metbah u la iathuh ba ha kaba ia dei bad u kyrtong jong ka Shillong Parliamentary Assembly, la shaniah ha ka SEC ba kan iaphylliew jingmut bad bad baroh kito kiba don ka bynta bad ban shim ia ka rai ryngkat bad ka HSPDP hapoh ka lama jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance.Ki khubor ki iathuh ba la don lai ngut kiba la pan tiket na ka bynta ka Shillong Parliamentary Assambly bad kine ki long u President bamynshuwa jong ka HYC, u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin,uba la long u dkhot jong ka seng ha kane ka Sngi U Blei, President ka Khasi Authors Society, u  Dr DRL Nonglait bad u MLA bamynshuwa ka Mawlai, u Bah  PT Sawkmie. U Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka RDA ka la kyntu ia kiwei pat ki seng riewlum ba kin iatrei land na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary Assembly.Haba la kylli lada ka UDP kan kyrshan ia ka NPP, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ia kane ka mat ym pat shym la iakren hapoh jong ka seng. U la iathuh ruh ba ka jingbun palat jong ki kyrtong, kan long ka jingmyntoi ia u MP Vincent Pala jong ka Iing Dorbar Shillong Parlaimentary Assembly. Haba kylli lada ka Voice of the People Party kan ktah ne em ia Lok Sabha Election, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la ong, “Ngim kwah ban ong eiei ha kaba kum kane ka por. Hynrei, ka UDP ka don la ka jong ka jingkhlain bad ki paidbah ki shaniah ha ka UDP. Nalor ki kam sain hima sima, ka Central Executive Committee ka la iakren ruh shaphang ka jingeh jong ki nongrep bad kyntu ruh ia ka Farmers’ Wingh ba ialam da u MLA ka Mawsynram u Bah Olam Singh Suin kum u President.
title: Buh ka UDP ïa ka SEC ban jied ïa ki kyrtong nongmihkhmat

content: :Ki pulit ha ka sngi nyngkong, ki la buh da ka jingmaham ban pynshitom pyrshah ïa kito kiba lap ba leh kam sniew hapoh bad kylleng ka lum jingtep bad ki khlaw ha Lawmali. La pynlong da ka jingïalang ha ka Police Reserve Conference Hall hapdeng ki pulit bad ki rangbah shnong bad ki dkhot rangbah jong ka Riatsamthiah, Wahingdoh, Jaiaw Shyiap, Jaiaw Mihngi bad Mawlai Phudmuri halor ka jingleh ïa ki kam sniew ha Lawmali, kaba la long ka mat ba dei ban shimkhia na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong ba jan bad ka Lawmali.Ha ka jingkren ba la ai da u SP (City) Vivek Syiem, u la ong ba la dep pynlong ïa katei ka jingïalang bad ba kum kitei ki kam sniew jong ka jingpyn jaboh ïa katei ka khlaw shapoh jong ka Lawmali, yn nym shah shuh bad lada lap ïa kino kino kiba leh pyrshah halor ka jingdonkti ha ka kam khaïi drok ne dih drok bad ka kyiad, yn kem bad shimkhia ban pynshitom ïa ki.“Lem bad ka jingïada na ka jingwan rung hapoh katei ka khlaw ha ka por mynmiet da ki nongïada ïa katei ka jaka kaba hap hapoh ka tnad forest, yn sa shimkhia ban ker noh da ki sainar bad tei da ka phalor ne gate lem bad ka tnad Forest Department,” ong u Vivek.U Syiem u la ong ba yn sa shimkhia halor kiwei pat ki phang, kum ka jingpyn ngat ha ka kyndon ïa kito kiba donkti ha ki kam sniew ha ka por mynmiet hapoh ne kylleng katei ka jaka ne lada lap ba dih kyiad ne drok hapoh ki kali ba ïeng ha ki surok, yn pynshitom katkum ka kyndon 110 jong ka Meghalaya Police Act bad ka NDPS Act, katkum ba dei ka mukotduma. U la ong ba ki pulit ki kwah ban pynpaw ka jingïaroh ïa ki dkhot jong ka Durbar Shnong na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong ki ban ïasnohkti lang ban teh lakam ïa katei ki jingeh baroh. Shuh shuh, yn sa shim da ki lad ban ai jingïada na ka jingdih ïa ki drok bad khaïi ïa ki ha Shillong, kaba la dep ïakren bad bun ki nongai jingmut da ki nongïashim bynta, bynrap u Syiem.
title: Maham ki pulit pyrshah ïa ki kam sniew ha kylleng ka khlaw Lawmali

content: :Ha ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki ri jong ka jylla, ka St Anthony’s Secondary School, Kharpati, ka la rakhe ïa ka Children’s Day lem bad ka jingpyndon burom ïa ka sngikha jong u Pt. Jawaharlal Nehru, uba dei u President jong ka ri India ba nyngkong. Katei ka skul, ha ka jingbynrap ïa ki tamasa, ka la plie thymmai ïa ka ïing skul ba thymmai bad ki jaka leit pynjhieh da ka sheme MLA, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki riew shimet ban ïarap ka bai lut bai sep. Katba u MLA jong ka Nongpoh, u Mayralborn Syiem, uba la shimti kum u nongshah khot sngewbha, u la plie ïa katei ka skul ba thymmai.Ha katei ka tamasa, la don bynta lang da u Robertus Rihon, Syiem jong ka Raid Kharpati, Jayanta Mudoi, Bank Manager HDFC Bank, Nongpoh, Anima CM, Headmistress jong ka School, Ibadahun Kharkongor na HDFC Bank, Nongpoh, lem bad ki nonghikai bad ki kmie ki kpa jong ki khynnah skul.
title: Rakhe Children’s Day ka St Anthony’s Secondary School Kharpati

content: :Ka Shillong Literary Festival 2023, kaba la dep plie ha ka 14 tarik, Naiwieng ha nan polok ne Ward’s Lake, kaba la pynlong da u nongshah khot sngewbha, u Paul Lyngdoh, uba dei u Cabinet Minister of Arts & Culture Department, Social Welfare Department, Textiles Department, bad Tourism Department bad ka nongshah khot sngewbha, ka Ampareen Lyngdoh, Cabinet Minister of Agriculture and Farmers’ Welfare Department, Health & Family Welfare Department, Information & Public Relations Department bad Law Department. Katba ha ka shiteng sngi jong ka jingplie ïa katei ka tamasa, kaba la ïashim bynta da ka Janice Pariat bad ka Cheryl Rynjah, kiba la ong kumne “Baroh ba ka jingshai ha thaba.”Ka Ward’s Lake, kaba la iphuh iphieng da ki rong pink na ki dieng cherry blossom bad ki pandal ba itynnad, ka la pyn ishongkun ïa ka mariang. Katei ka madan tamasa ka la dap da ki jingïalehkai, ki bam ki dih kiba la pynkhring ïa ki nongwan kai. Katba ka sngi jong katei ka tamasa ka la jan poi sha kaba kut, hynrei ka jingrakhe kan bteng shaduh ka por janmiet lem bad bun ki tamasa. Ki nongwan kin sa ïoh ka lad ban ïakren, pule ïa ki kot bad ka jingkyndeh ka jingwanrah da ki kot ïathuh khana. Katba ka rukom ïathuh khana bad ki jingrwai, yn sa pyn bynrap bad ka jingsngewtynnad, katba ha katei ka janmiet, yn sa don ki jingrwai na ki nongrwai, kiba la pyni ïa ka kolshor jong ka Shillong Literary Festival.
title: La sdang ïa ka Shillong Literary Festival 2023: La pyni ïa ki ktien bad ki jingrwai

content: :U nongïalam ka seng liang pyrshah ha ka KHADC, u Titosstarwell Chyne ha ka sngi nyngkong, u la ong ba shen, un sa ïakren bad ka executive committee halor ka jingpynthikna ïa ka jingïaid shakhmat jong ka jingphiah ïa ki konstituensi hashwa ki ilekshon, kiban sa long la shem snem. “Ngan sa ïakren bad ka EC ba ka jingphiah ïa ki konstituensi ba la pynlong da ka committee, dei ban don ka por ba biang na ka bynta jong ki nongseng kam lajong, kynthup ïa ki paidbah ne ki nongshong shnong ki lah ban phah ïa ki jingkren jong ki ha ka por ba biang,” ïathuh u Chyne sha ki lad pathai khubor.Halor ka jingthmu ban ïoh ïakren bad katei ka committee pynphiah konstituensi, u khliehduh barim jong ka KHADC u la ong ba kawei ka dei na ka jingkhmih lynti jong ka amendment jong ka Sixth Schedule sha ka riti synshar khadar jong ka India ne Constitution of India, kaba la kwah ban pynbun ïa ki seat bad ban leh noh ïa ka, la donkam ban pynbiang shwa ïa katei ka committee pynphiah(delimination) konstituensi.“Kaba ar, wat lada katei ka amendment kan nym jia, ka mut ba ka committee pynphiah kan sa pynlong biang da ka jingpynithuh biang ïa ki konstituensi naba la don ki konstituensi kiba la don ki nongthep vote haduh 50,000 ngut bad don kiba don haduh 20,000 ngut. Te yn sa don ka jingkhmih bniah ha ka ban pynbiang ïa kitei ki mat. Ngi la dep pynlong da ka jingtreikam ha ka ilekshon 2014. Katba ïa ka Umsning konstituensi, la dep tei bad ïa ka Laitkroh konstituensi, la dep pynduh pyndam noh,” ong u Titos.“Te kane ka dei ka rukom treikam kaba biang tam. Ngam don kano kano ka jingkynthoh hynrei ka shong ha ka EC ba kumno ba kan ai por ïa katei ka committee ba kan pyntreikam noh,” bynrap u Chyne. Shuh shuh, utei u nongïalam ka seng liang pyrshah u la ong, “Ngam tharai ba katei ka jingpyntreikam kan ktah naba kam mut ba phin nang pynbun ki nongïakhun ilekshon hynrei nga sngew ba ka jingwanrah biang ïa ki konstituensi, dei ban pyntreikam hapoh shi ne ar bnai.”
title: Thrang u Titos ïa ka EC ban pyndep ïa ka jingphiah ïa ki konstituensi hashwa ka ilekshon

content: :Ka Irene Dkhar, kaba dei ka Miss Meghalaya bad Miss Northeast barim, ka la ïohrung beit beit ha ka Grand Finale jong ka Miss Grand India 2024. Ka la pynkhring ïa ki nongbishar ha ka por ba don ka interview ha Shillong, kaba la pynlong ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Miss Meghalaya Organization.Ka Ridamaya Passah bad ka Tanvi Marak ki la lah ban poi sha ka preliminary round. Kin sa hap ïaid sa ka ar tylli ki interview na ka bynta ban poi sha ka grand finale. Kiba don ha ka por ka interview, ki kynthup ïa u Amjad Khan, Director of Glamanand Entertainment Pvt. Ltd., Daniella Shirley Majaw, Miss Teen Meghalaya 2022 bad ka Shweta Himatsingka, kaba dei ka nongai jingmut ïa ka bam ka dih ba pawnam jong ka ri.
title: Ïohrung ka Irene ha ka finale jong ka Miss Grand India 2024

content: Ka Shillong Lajong ka la ioh ban khur biang ia shi poiñ ha ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Sreenidi Deccan Football Club da ka jingïakhaid da 2-2 ha ka jingiakhun ba la pynlong ha madan Shillong Sports Association (SSA), Polo Shillong.Ka Sreenidi kaba dei ruh ka klob na Hyderabad ka long kawei na ki klob ba khlain ha kane ka lympung I-league mynta ka aïom bad la sakhi ba ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba itynnad bad kaba kham jwat ban ioh pynkhih jar.Ka Sreenidi ka kham ioh kabu khyndiat namar ka jingjeh ka met bad ka rynieng lada ianujor ia ki rangïalehkai Khasi hynrei namar ka jingioh kabu ban ïalehkai ha la ïing ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynphai ia kitei ki 2 kol.Ka Sreenidi ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong lyngba u Rosenberg tang ha ka minit ba 7 hynrei namar ka jingiai iakhun khlem aili ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynphai lyngba ka kol u Ronney ha ka minit ba 29. Tang hadien 5 minit ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar sa kawei lyngba u rangïalehkai ka Japan, u Takuto bad ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla step ka la kut noh da 2-1.Hadien ba bteng ka kylla step, ka Sreenidi ka la sdang ban pynpher ia ka buit ïalehkai, kata da kaba pynsted bad ïalehkai shiliang madan.Katba ka jingiakhun ka dang itynnad bad iakhluit, uwei na ki nongïalam (Dkhot) ka klob Sreenidi u la ioh da ka red card namar ka jingpyni ia ka jingbitar hapoh madan.U Rosenberg uba la ioh ruh ban thep kol ha ka kylla step na ka bynta ka Sreenidi, u la ioh ban thep sa shi kol na ka bynta katei ka kynhun ha ka minit ba 63.
title: ïoh mynsiem ka Lajong na ka jingwan kyrshan ki paidbah

content: :Ka kynhun Faith Foundation Shillong kan sa rakhe ïa ka Child Safety Week lem bad ka jingthoh ba thoh, ‘It’s Okay To Say No’ lane ‘Ka biang lada phi ong Em’. Ka taïew ai jingïada ïa ki khynnah ne ka Child Safety Week ka dei ka kampeiñ ba la rakhe lut hapoh ka ri kaba sdang naduh ka 14 tarik, Naiwieng haduh ka 20 tarik, Naiwieng na ka bynta ban khmih ïa ka jingdonkam ka jingïada ïa ki khyllung khynnah, lyngba ki jingïakren bad ki tamasa.Mynta u snem, ka jingthmu jong ka Child Safety Week ka long ban ïarap ïa ki samla ba kin sngewthuh ïa ka ‘It’s Okay To  Say No’ bad ban ïakhun ïa ka rukom ban ong ‘Hooid’, ha kaba la pynthikna ïa ka jingïada ïa ki khynnah. Ka jingthmu jong katei ka kampeiñ kan kynthup ïa ki prokram ban pynkiew ïa ka jingmut jong ki khynnah halor ka jingthombor ïa ki ne ka child sexual abuse (CSA) bad ka jingdonkam jong ka jingai jingïada ïa ki. Katba ki jaka ba rakhe ïa katei ka tamasa, ki kynthup ha:Street Play ha Iew Nongmensong bad Don Bosco Square, Laitumkhrah ha ka 16 bad 17 tarik, Naiwieng ha ka por 1 baje mynsngi, kan don ka jingniah da ki bicycle ha ka 18 tarik, Naiwieng ha ka por 8.30 mynstep bad ka jingdro dur ha Jaiaw ha ka 20 tarik, Naiwieng ha ka por 9 baje mynstep.
title: Rakhe ka Faith Foundation ïa ka taïew ai jingïada na ka bynta ki khynnah

content: :Ka sorkar jylla ka la pan jingïarap haduh T. 44 klur kum ka jingkyrshan pisa na ka sorkar pdeng na ka bynta ban pynskhem ïa ka rukom treikam ki kali pynlip ding hapoh ka jylla. Da kaba pyntip shaphang katei ha ka sngi ba ar, u symbud myntri ba dei peit ïa ka Home (Police), u Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba la shim ïa ka jingrai hadien ba jia ka jinging ding ba shyrkhei ha Khyndailad. “Ngi la dep phah da ka jingtyrwa ban pynskhem bad ban wanrah ïa ki tiar treikam ba biang. Katei ka jingtyrwa ka dei ïa ka T. 44 klur,” ong u Bah Prestone.U Tynsong u la ong ba u la dep ïakynduh ïa u secretary jong ka kynhun jong ka tad Home Affairs bad la dep kren ruh shaphang kine baroh. Katkum ka jingkren jong u, ka jingdonkam na ka bynta kai kali rit ba pynlip ding, la pynkynthup lang ha katei ka jingtyrwa. Ka sorkar jylla ruh dang shen, ka la dep rai ban wanrah da ka rukom treikam ban ai jingïada halor ka jingpynlip ding bad ki kyndon pynlip ding ne standard operating procedures (SOPs) hadien ka jingjia ing ding ba ishyrkhei ha kawei ka ïing maw ha Khyndailad, kaba la lam sha ka jingkhlad noh uwei u briew, ha ka 14 tarik, Risaw.Ïa utei u briew, la ithuh kum u Sampath uba la khlad na ka daw jong ka jingïap op. u la don hapoh kudam ban leit shim tiar na ka bynta ban pynpoi ïa ka tiar da ki kali trok barit. Katba katei ka kali trok barit ka la leit noh na katei ka jaka, u Sampath u la sahkut shadien bad u la shah ker kud ha katei ka ïing maw hadien ba jia katei ka jinging ding bad kumta u la ïap op bad lam sha ka jingkhlad jong u. Ki pulit pynlip ding ki la leit mar mar sha katei ka jaka mar syn ïoh jingtip, hynrei na ka daw jong ka jingsniew palat ka surok bad bun briew hapoh katei ka jaka, ka la pynlong ka jingeh ïa ki pulit pynlip ding ban poi ha katei ka jaka ha ka por ba biang.Shuh shuh, u Tynsong u la dep pyntip ba dang shen, u la dep ïakynduh ïa u secretary jong ka DoNER ban ïakren halor katei ka mat kaba dei shaphang ka jingpynslem ban pynmih ïa ka pisa synñiang na ka bynta bun ki projek haph ka jylla. “Kine ki dei kita ki projek, kum ka jingtei ïa ka science and commerce college ha Mawphlang ha kaba ki kontraktor ki la hap sangeh noh ïa ka kam ba ki trei na ka daw jong ka jingbym ïoh ïa ka jingsiew. Te sa kiwei pat ki projek, kynthup ïa ki projek shna surok, ha kaba ngim shym la ïoh ïa ka bynta(installment) ba ar ne bynta ba lai. La dep ïakren shaphang kitei ki mat,” ong u Tynsong katba bynrap ba u secretary u la dep kyrpad ban pynkloi ban pyllait noh ïa ka installment sha ki tnad bapher bapher jong ka sorkar jylla.
title: Pan jingïarap ka sorkar jylla na ka sorkar pdeng haduh 44 klur na ka bynta ban pynskhem ïa ka rukom treikam ki kali pynlip ding

content: :U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla bad uba dei ruh u President ka NPP ha ka jylla, u Bah Prestone Tynsong  myn ha ka 14 tarik Naiwieng u la pyntip ba ka sorkar ka dang ap ïa ka rai jong ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) na ka bynta ka jingkren ïasuk, bad ka sorkar kan leh ia ka ba bha tam ban shimkhia  ban pynurlong noh ia kane ka mat.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong, “Ngi kwah eh ban bteng ïa ka jingkren ïasuk bad ka HNLC khnang ba ka jingshongsuk shongsaiñ kan ïai neh shirta. Ngi dang ap ïa ka jingaiktien na ki HNLC namar ba ki nongïalam ba ha khlieh kim wan satia ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingialang ba dangshen.” U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh na ka bynta ka jingïakren lada ka seng HNLC ka kloi ban wan sha ka miej jong ka jingkren ïasuk.
title: Ka sorkar ka dang ap ïa ka jingaiktien na ka HNLC na ka bynta ka jingkren ïasuk: Prestone Tynsong
