content: :U Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi district, u Arpit Upadhyaya, myn ha ka 14 tarik Naiwieng, u la pyntip ba ka district ka la dep lut ban pynkhreh ban pynlong ïa ka tamasa Cherry Blossom Festival 2023, lem bad ka jingpynbiang na ka bynta kane ka tamasa kaba khraw ka ban neh 3 sngi kynthih ha Madan Kurkalang, Bhoirymbong, ka ban sdang naduh ka 17 tarik Naiwieng bad kan kut ha ka 19 tarik Naiwieng.Haba kren sha ki nonglum khubor ha ka nongbah, u DC u la ong ba la pynbiang  ruh ïa ki nongpahara na ka bynta ban peit ban khmih ïa ka jaka rung jaka mih bad  la buh ruh ïa ki nongpahara shnong ha ki jaka pynïeng kali khnang ba ki paidbah kin lait na kino kino ki jingeh bad kan lait ruh na ka jingdheng ki kali.Haba kren halor ka seng Joint Action Committee (JAC) kaba pyrshah ïa katei ka tamasa, u Superintendent of Police (SP), u Giri Prasad u la pyntip ba ki tnad ba dei peit bad ki shnong ki la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa ki dkhot jong ka seng JAC bad ki la pynsngewthuh bad pynshai ïa ki ïa ka por ba kane ka tamasa kan sdang hadien ba la kut ka jinglehniam ne ka jingshakri Blei.
title: Ka Ri Bhoi ka la dep pynkhreh na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka Cherry Blossom Festival 2023: DC

content: SHILLONG:Hadien ba kawei ka longkmie ka la duh ei ïa la ka jong ka jingim na ka jingshah tynrah ha kawei ka ar shaka ha ka nongbah, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la hukum ïa u Director General Police (DGP) bad ka bor district  ba kin ai da ka ka jingpynshitom kaba tyngeh ïa kino kino kiba ñiah khlem akor ïa ki kali ar shaka ne ki saw shaka bad pynngat ïa ki katkum ka kyndon aiñ.Kane ka jingkren jong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jia hadien ka sngi ba kawei ka longkmie ka la duh ei ïa la ka jong ka jingim ha ka jingshah tynrah ha ka ar shaka kaba la pynher sted katba kane ka longkmie ka dang thmu ban jam sha shiliang jong ka surok ha  Mawlai Mawdatbaki, bad kiwei kiwei ki jingjia ba la sakhi ha ki por ba la dep kaba lam sha ka jingïap.U Tynsong u la ong ruh ba ka bor district ka la shah hukum ba ka dei ban pynshitom ïa kito ki ba pyndait ïa ki tyndong sawa (Exhaust Pipe) ha ki kali bad ki ar shaka.
title: Kyntu u Bah Prestone ïa u DGP ban pynshitom ïa kiba ñiah khlem akor ïa ki kali ar shaka ne saw shaka

content: U Symbud Myntri Rangbah, u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba um shym la bna eiei shaphang ki nongïalam kiba la pynbor ïa ka National People’s Party (NPP) na ka bynta ban jied ïa u nongthawaiñ barim ka Mawhati, u Bah Dasakhiatbha Lamare kum u kyrtong ka seng na ka seat Shillong Parliamentary. Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor myn ha ka 14 tarik Naiwieng, u Tynsong u la ong, “Ngam shym la bna eiei na ei phi ïoh ïa kine ki kaiphod, hynrei na ka liang ka kaiphod jong nga ka long em.” U Tynsong u la ong ba ka NPP kan sa pynbna ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong bad Tura Parliamentary seats mynta u bnai. U la ong ba 5-6 ngut ki la wan kynduh ïa ka seng na ka bynta ka tiket.
title: Ym don jingshah pynbor ban ai tiket ïa u Dasakhiat: Tynsong

content: :Ka kyhnun nongrwai na South Korean ba pawnam, ka SURL, kaba dei ka kynhun ba don haduh saw ngut ki nongrwai kiba la bna na ka bynta ka jingpawnam jong ki ban ïa ki jingrwai British rock bad blues, ki la pynsngewsih ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ki da ka jingpyn sangeh jong ki ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka tamasa ban wan jong ka Cherry Blossom Festival kaba ki la pa kmang. Kitei ki nongrwai kiba la dei ban rwai ha ka sngi ba sdang plie ïa katei ka tamasa, kata ha ka 17 tarik, Naiwieng, ha kaba katei ka kynhun rwai ka la dep pynbna mynta ka sngi, ka 15 tarik, Naiwieng, lyngba ka rynsan Instagram account jong ki. Katei ka kynhun rwai ka la ai daw ba la don ka jingïakhun, kaba ki la pynsangeh noh ïa katei ka jingïashim bynta jong ki na ki tamasa jong ka India bad ki shuti sorkar, kaba la long ka daw bah jong kane ka jingpynsangeh.“Ngi pan mab ban pyntip sha phi ba ka kynhun SURL kan nym ïashim bynta ha ka Cherry Blossom Festival ha ka 17 tarik, Naiwieng. Na ki daw bym lah kiar bad ruh la don ka jingpynslem na ka daw jong ki tamasa ha India bad ki shuti sorkar, ym lah ban pynbiang ïa ka por. Ngi la pyrshang ban leh shitom ban ïoh ïashim ha katei ka tamasa, hynrei ngi sheptieng ba ngi hap ban pynsangeh noh ïa katei ka show,” thoh ha katei ka Instagram post.Katei ka kynhun, kumta ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih bad pan mab bad kyrmen ban kular hadien ha bud ban ïoh ïashim bynta ha kane ka tamasa. “Ngi pan mab ïa ki nongkyrshan kiba la ap kmang na ka bynta ban ïoh peit ïa ka jingrwai jong ngi ki SURL ba nyngkong ha India. Ngi kyrmen ban lah ban pynbiang ïa kane ha ka phang ba biang hadien ha bud. Khublei shibun ïaphi ïa ka jingsngewthuh jong phi,” bteng katei ka post.
title: La pynsangeh ka kynhun SURL ban ïashim bynta ha ka Cherry Blossom Festival

content: :Ha ka jingïatreilang ba la pynlong da ka Garo Students’ Union (GSU) bad ka Federation of Khasi-Jaintia and Garo People (FKJGP) na Rongara, South Garo Hills district ki la pynlong ka jingkhynra ïa ki dukan mynta ka sngi ha ïew Rongara na ka bynta ka jingdie be-aiñ ïa ki dawai kiba la palat tarik ba la buh (expired date) bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar.U President ka FKJGP, u Tengsu Marak u la ong la pynlong ka jingkhynra kaba kyndit kyndit ban buddien katkum ka jingujor na ki nongshong shnong ka Rongara. Halor kane ka jingkhynra, ki la lap ïa uwei u nongdie dukan uba la die ïa ki dawai kiba la palat ïa ka tarik kaba la buh (expired date) bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar. U President ka Rongara Circle GSU u la ong ba ïa kum kine ki tiar kiba la palat na ka tarik kaba la buh (expired date) ba kin nym dei ban die tang ha Rongara hynrei kumjuh ruh ha ki katto katne ki jaka kylleng ka Garo Hills. Na ka bynta ka jingtrei kam ba marmar, u la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ban shimkhia ïa ki mat ba kongsan ha Garo Hills.Halor katei ka jingkhynra, kitei ki ar tylli ki seng ki la thang noh ïa kitei ki mar kiba la ïoh kurup mynta ka sngi khnang ba kan ïada na ka jingma ïa ki paidbah.
title: Pynlong ka GSU bad ka FKJGP ïa ka jingkhynra ba kyndit kyndit ha Rongara

content: :U Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba dei peit ruh ïa ka tnad PWD, u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la pynlong ka jingïalang pyrkhat kam bad ka tnad Planning, Finance bad PWD (Roads) myn ha ka 14 Naiwieng ban pynbha ïa ka rukom treikam ka tnad PWD hapoh ka jylla, bad ban wanrah ïa ka Office Memorandum (OM) ban kren halor ka jinglong jingman ki surok ha ka jylla. “Mynta ngi don ym duna ïa ka 10,000 km ka surok ha ka jylla lait noh ki National Highway. Kumta, ngi la ïakren sani halor kane bad ka OM kan phiah ïa ki surok ha la ki jong ki jong ki bynta ban kham pynsuk” la ong u Bah Prestone. U la ong ruh ba ha kane ka jingïalang la ïakren ban phiah bynta ïa ki surok ha ki bynta bapher bapher Kum ki surok ba kham heh, ba kham rit, ki surok shnong bad ki surok kali kit mar, khnang ban lah ban pynbha ïa ki surok katkum ki bynta.
title: Pynlong u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ïa ka jingïalang pyrkhat kam bad ka tnad Planning, Finance bad PWD (Roads) ban pynbha ïa ki surok ha ka jylla

content: :Ha kawei na ka jingïakop khwai dohkha ba la pynlong ha Ira Lake, Tura myn ha ka 14 tarik Naiwieng, uwei u briew u la ïoh pynban da ka Dkar kaba heh bad kaba kham pher. U Rupankar Marak, uba dei u DFO u la pyntip ba ka kynhun pulit jong Wildlife ki la shimti noh ban rah ïa katei ka Dkar bad pyllait ïa ka ha ki jaka ba ka dei ban don. U la ong ruh ki Dkar ki ju pyndonkam ïa ki pung bad ki nan kum ka jaka sah jong ki.
title: Ha ka ïakop khwai dohkha ïoh pynban da ka Dkar ba kham pher

content: U President ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) u Bah Roy Kupar Synrem u la ong ba ka seng jong u ka la buh artlli ki jingdawa hakhmat jong ka Sorkar bad kata ka dei ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka bad lada kata kam long dei pat ban pdiang ia ka MRSSA Amended bill 2020.“Ngi sngewthuh ba ka Sorkar Pdeng kam mynjur ban pyntrei kami aka ILP, namarkatta, ngi kyrpad ia ka Sorkar jylla ba kan pdiang noh ia ka Amended MRSSA bill. “Ia mynta, ka Amendment Bill kan dang shim por sa katto katne namarba dang hap ban dang ai kren bad ba kan long kaba bit babian” la iathuh u Bah Synrem ia ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor hadien ba ula ia kynduh ia u Symbud Myntri Rangbah Prestone Tynsong.U la iathuh ruh ba kane ka donkam ia ka jingpynjania ia ka Amended MRSSA Bill namarba ka dang shen ka Ministry of Home Affairs jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ka la pynphai ia kane ka Bill. U Bah Synrem u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar kan sa khot ia ka HYC ha kata ka jingialang ka ban sa long ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ban ioh ia ki jingbatai ba kham bniah na ka liang jong ka HYC.
title: Kyntu ka HYC ïa ka Sorkar ban pyntrei kam ïa ka ILP bad MRSSA

content: U Myntri ba dei peit ia ki kam pynroi ha jaka khappud, u Rakkam A. Sangma u la kyntu ia ka Sorkarb an pyniasnoh ia ka Baghmara ha Garo Hills, Guwahati ha Assam bad ka Bangladesh lyngba ka jingyniaid ia ka lynti rel. U Rakkam uba long u nongmih khmat ka NPP na Rongara-Siju u la ong ba ka jingdon jong ka Meghalaya Land Transfer Act bad jingtrei kam jong ka Sixth Schedule jong ka riti synshar ka India, ka long ka jingiada bakhraw  na ka bynta ki riewlum,  ka kynhun kiba dang pyrshah ia ka jingwan jong ka lynti rel sha  ka thain Khasi-Jaintia kibaa tieng ia ka jingwan rungtuh jong ki mynder ri.U Myntri u la ong ba kane ka jingthmu ban anrah ia ka lynti rel ka la dei kaba la slem bha naduh ka por ba dang long myntri rangbah u Captain Williamson Sangma uba la kwah ban pyniasnoh ia ka Guwahati bad ka Bangladesh lyngba ka Banghmara lyngba ki lynti rel. “Ngan iai dawa ia ka jingwan jong ka lynti sha Baghmara namaarba kane kan long ka lynti rel kaba lah bteng sha kiwei pat ki bynta jong ka ri India. Ka jingwan jong kane ka lynti rel, kan wanrah ia ki lad ki lynti iohkam iohjam jong ki samla bad ba kan kyntiew ruh ia ka roi ka par jong ki nongshong shnong”, la ong u Myntri Rakkam.U Myntri u la iathuh ruh ba u la kyntu ruh ia ka Sorkar ia ka jingbuh ia ka khyrdop Integrated Check Gate ha Baghmara khnang ba kane ka pynsuk ia ka leit ka wan jong ki nong jngohkai pyrthei bad kiwei ki nongkhaii pateng shuwa ka jingwan jong ka rel. U la ong ba um sa kyntu ia ka Sorkar ban rah noh ia ka Shillong bad Byrni Railway Project sha Baghmara bad ba ka Sorkar kan pyniasnoh ia ka Baghmara bad ka Guwahati lyngba ka lynti rel.U Myntri Rakkam u la iathuh ba don haduh 20,000 ngut ki samla pule kiba pass man la ka snem ha ka kyrdan Graduate bad Post Graduate bad kiba ioh kam napdeng jong ki long tang kumba 1,200 ngut. U la ong ba ka jingwan jong ka rel, kan iarap ban pynduna ia kane ka jingkyrdum kam hapoh ka Baghmara Contituency jong u.  U la iathuh ba ki nongshong shnong jong ka Garo Hills ki hap ban leit thied jain na shaduh sha Manipur na ka daw ba ki tat.Haba kren shaphang ka jingwan jong ka lynti rel sha East Khasi Hill, u Myntri Rakkam u la ong ba ki paidbah ki dei ban peit ia ka jingioh bad jingduh jingmyntoi jong ka jingwan jong ka rel bad ban peit ruh kham tam eh na ka liang jong ka ioh kam ioh jam jong ki paidbah.
title: Angnud u Myntri Rakkam ïa ka jingwan ka lynti rel sha Baghmara ha Garo Hills

content: Ka Shillong Lajong kaba la mad ia ki jingïakhaid ha baroh 2 tylli ki jingïalehkai ha la ïing mynta ka aïom kan sa iakhun pyrshah ia ka Gokulam Kerala FC ha madan Shillong Sports Association (SSA), Polo Shillong ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ha ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Sreenidi Deccan Football Club ka jingïalehkai ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid da 2-2 ha.Ka Sreenidi kaba dei ruh ka klob na Hyderabad ka long kawei na ki klob ba khlain ha kane ka lympung I-league mynta ka aïom bad la sakhi ba ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba itynnad bad kaba kham jwat ban ioh pynkhih jar. Ka Sreenidi ka kham ioh kabu khyndiat namar ka jingjeh ka met bad ka rynieng lada ianujor ia ki rangïalehkai Khasi hynrei namar ka jingioh kabu ban ïalehkai ha la ïing ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynphai ia kitei ki 2 kol.Ka Sreenidi ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong lyngba u Rosenberg tang ha ka minit ba 7 hynrei namar ka jingiai iakhun khlem aili ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynphai lyngba ka kol u Ronney ha ka minit ba 29. Tang hadien 5 minit ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar sa kawei lyngba u rangïalehkai ka Japan, u Takuto bad ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla step ka la kut noh da 2-1.Hadien ba bteng ka kylla step, ka Sreenidi ka la sdang ban pynpher ia ka buit ïalehkai, kata da kaba pynsted bad ïalehkai shiliang madan.Katba ka jingiakhun ka dang itynnad bad iakhluit, uwei na ki nongïalam (Dkhot) ka klob Sreenidi u la ioh da ka red card namar ka jingpyni ia ka jingbitar hapoh madan.U Rosenberg uba la ioh ruh ban thep kol ha ka kylla step na ka bynta ka Sreenidi, u la ioh ban thep sa shi kol na ka bynta katei ka kynhun ha ka minit ba 63.Ka Lajong kan bteng ia ka jingïalehkai ha la ïing pyrshah ia ka Delhi FC ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: Kyrmen ka Lajong ban khur ïa ka jingjop ba nyngkong ha ka 19 tarik

content: Ka nam ka burom jong ka Ri Bhoi District ka Meghalaya ka la kiew irat haba ka   Senebi Syngkli kaba na shnong Lumdieng, Umden, Ri Bhoi District ka la shah jed ban ia shim bynta ha ka Asian Arm-Wrestling Cup ha Uzbekistan.Kane ka jingialehkai iakhun kti Arm Wrestling kan sdang naduh ka 17 tarik haduh ka 25 tarik u Naiwieng ban pyni ia ka sap ka phong jong ki nongialehkai jong ka pyrthei. Ka Senebi ka long kaba la paw ha ka jingialehkai Armed Wresling bad  ba la ioh khur ia ka Takma Ksiar bad ar tlli ki Takma Rupa ha ka 45National Arm Wrestling Championship 2023 kaba dang shu kut shen ha Jammu & Kashmir.Ka Meghalaya People’s Social Organization (MPSO) ka la ai pynkup burom bad ai jingiarap da ka pisa ia ka KongSenebi Syngkli. U President ka MPSO u BaH M. Wanniang bad u John Syngkli kynthup ruh ia u para jong ka Kong Senebi Syngkli ki la ai ki jingkyrkhu kyrdoh jong ki ia ka Kong Senebi Syngkli
title: Kiew irat ka nam ka Ri Bhoi District ba ïoh shim bynta ka Senebi Syngkli ha Asian Arm-Wrestling Cup

content: Ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union ha Ri Bhoi District, ha ka 16 tarik, Naiwieng, ka la pynlong da ka jingïaid paidbah ban ïakren ïasuk ne ka Peace Rally, da kaba kyrpad na ka bynta ka jingkhmih biang ïa ka bainong ban ïoh tam na ka tulop bad kiwei kiwei. Da ka jingkyrshan na ki rangbah shnong, seng bhalang, kynthup ïa ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council and Confederation of Ri Bhoi People, kumjuh ruh ki nongtrei ba bun jong ka ASHA, la sdang ïa katei ka jingïaid paidbah ha NSCA Playground Pahamsyiem, da kaba ïaid shakhmat lyngba ka Nongpoh Town shaduh ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner Ri-Bhoi District.Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingïaid paidbah, ki nongtrei jong ka ASHA ki la kyntait ïa ka jingkren jong ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ha kaba ïadei bad ki bainong ban dei ban ïoh tam, da kaba ka ong ba baroh dei a shu thok suda. Ka Kong Tildarika Wardkhar ka la ban jur halor ka jingbym shimkhia ïa ki nongtrei ASHA, da kaba ong ba ki la trei shitom na ka bynta ka kiot ka khiah jong ki paidbah. Ka la kyrpad ïa ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ba ym dei ban leh beiñ ïa ki bad dawa ïa ka hok jong ki bad pynkiew ïa ka tulop jong ki.Ka Kong Mirajune Marsing, ka President jong ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union, ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew bym ïahap jingmut bad katei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah halor ka jingkren bym shong nongrim jong ka, da kaba ong ruh ba donkam ka jubab ba biang ka ban seisoh na katei ka jingïaid paidbah. Ka Marsing ka la pynshai halor ka jingdawa jong ki na ka bynta ka jingpynkiew ïa ka tulop, da kaba kyntait ïa ka jingkynnoh jong katei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah halor ka tulop ba poi haduh T. 80,000, ha kaba katkum ki sakhi satar jong ka pisa ba shisha ba haduh T. 24,000 ba la ïoh man la u snem. Ka la kren ruh shaphang ka mat ba ïadei halor ka jingmynjur jong ki nongtrei ASHA kiba la dep soi na ka bynta ka kam, da kaba ban jur halor ka jingdonkam ka sorkar ban pynmih da ki ID na ka bynta ban lah ban ïoh ïa ki jingdonkam ba shu ïoh ei.
title: Ïaid paidbah ki nongtrei ASHA na Meghalaya na ka bynta ka bainong ba tam jong ka tulop

content: Da ki spah ngut ki samla pule, ki seng samla, ki nongshong shnong bad ki khlieh nongsynshar jong ka Garo Hills ba la tip kum ki nokmas ki la pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah ha Karkukol kaba hap hapoh ka Siju ha South Garo Hills ban pyrshah ia ka jingsniew palat jong ki surok kaba la ktah ruh ia ki kam jngoh pyrthei ha katei ka thain.Ia katei ka jingiakhih paidbah la pynlong da ka Garo Students Union ka Karukol ban dawa na ka sorkar ban shna biang ia kitei ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkieng kiba la shah pynjulor ha u slap bad ha ka jingshlei um kaba la shim ia ki mynsiem jong ki nong shong shnong.Kine ki nongiakhih ki la ong ba ka a national highway NH-62 ka long u budlum jong ka shnong Karukol. Hynrei haduh mynta la bun bun snem ka sorkar kam shym la leh ei ei banpynbha ia kane ka surok.Kane ka kynhun ka la pynpaw ia ka jing sngew khia kaba jur ba jingpyntreikam ia ka skim PMGSY-2 ban shna ia katei ka surok la shun iehnoh tang shi teng por ong u GSU general secretary  u France R Marak.U la ong ruh ba ki shnong kum ka Simsang Chijol bad ka Rongdik Chijol ki la shah dkhat noh ha ka jingiadei bad ka leit ka wan bad kiwei ki shnong na ka daw jong ka jingsniew palat jong ki surok bad ki lynti ki syngkien, u la iathuh ba kane ka la buh ia ka jingeh kaba khraw ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong katei ka thain.U GSU general secretary  u France R Marak un la iathuh ba ka thain Karukol Siju ka la long ka jaka kaba la khring shibun ki nong jngoh kai pyrthei hynrei mynta kine ki nong jngoh kai pyrthei kim wan shuh sha katei ka dong bad ka thain tang na ka daw jong ka jingsniew palat jong ki surok.
title: Pynlong jingïakhih ki paidbah ba sniew palat ki surok ha thaiñ Siju

content: Ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad NEHUSU hapoh ka jingialam jong ka Joint Action Committee(JAC) ka la pynpaw ba ka kloi ban iakren bad u Vice-Chancellor ka NEHU u  Prof PS Shukla halor ki jingdawa ba bun jong ki da kaba weng shuwa ia ka jingthung beain ia u technical officer bad senior consultant na katei ka skul bah.Ha ka jingpyllait khubor, u shong knor ka JAC u Prof Lakhon Kma u la ong ba kane ka kynhun ka long kaba la kloi ban iakren bad u VC halor ki jingdawa jong kane ka kynhun tangba na ka liang jong u VC ruh u dei ban shim khia bad ban pynurlong ia kine ki jingdawa jong ka JAC ha ka por ba la buh. Ha kawei pat ka liang  na ka liang u VC u la kyntu ia ki nongiakhih ba kin ym iaid sha khmat ia ka jingiakhih namar ba kane kan ktah ia ka jingpule jong ka skulbah kaba don mynta hapdeng ki jingpynkhreh ia ki jingdonkam ba bun ban pynlong ia ki examination.Ha kaba iadei bad kane u Prof Kma u la iathuh ba na ka liang jong u VC ka NEHU um shym la ai kano kano ka jingpynshai na ka liang jong u ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdawa jong ka JAC.U Prof Kma u la kynnoh ba wat hapdeng kiba bun ki kynrum kynram ba ka skulbah ka iakynduh hynrei na ka liang jong u VC u la shim shuti haduh ka 15 traik u Naiwieng. Kane ka pyni ia ka jingbym don ka jingkit khlieh na ka liang jong u khliehduh jong kane ka skulbah. Na ka liang jong u VC u la dei ban don hapoh jong ka University ban peit ba ki kam ki iaid beit iaid ryntih bad ban bishar bnaih ruh ia ki jingdawwa jong ka JAC bad dei na kane ka daw ba ngi la pynlong ia kane ka jingiakhih ba khlem buh por naduh ka 13 trarik u Naiwieng.
title: Pynlong jingiakhih ka JAC ban weng ïa ka jingthung kam beaiñ ka NEHU

content: :Ka sorkar jylla ka la shimkhia ban pyntreikam da ki lai tylli ki District Council (DC) jong ka jylla Meghalaya ba kan ïaid shakhmat da ka rukom pynthymmai ban pynshai ne digitalisation na ka bynta ka jingrekod ïa ki jaka ha ki shnong ba hap hapoh ka Sixth Schedule ha ka bynta ba nyngkong. Da kaba pyntip shaphang kane, hadien ka jingïalang bad ki dkhot jong ki lai tylli ki District Council, u Symbud Myntri ka jylla, u Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka jaka jong ka sorkar, jingbuh bynda ïa ki jaka bad ki jaka cantonment digitisation, yn sa shimkhia ha kawei pat ka bynta.U la ong ba ki jaka ba la dep register bad ka ophis treikam jong u Deputy Commissioner ne District Council, kin sa pyntreikam da ka digitisation ha kaba nyngkong bad na ka bynta jong ki jaka bym pat dep register, ki jaka puta ba ai pateng, ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner ne ophis District Council kin sa shimkhia ban treikam halor katei “Baroh ar tylli ki ophis treikam, kynthup ïa ka Autonomous District Council (ADC) bad ka District Collector (DC) kan sa pynthikna ba kan sa pynmih da ki kot ki sla ba biang jong ki jaka ïa ki riew shimet ne ki party ki bym shym la register ïa ki jaka jong ki, kaba bud da ka jingpynmih da ki kot ki sla, ha kaba kito ïa ki jaka, yn pyntreikam da ka digitisation,” ong u Tynsong.Haba la kylli shaphang ka jingpyndep ïa katei ka mat treikam, u Tynsong u la ong ba yn sa pyndep ha ka por ba biang mar syn biang ki rekod jong ki jaka, ha kaba ki jaka puta ba don jingïakajia, yn sa pynduna noh hapoh ka jylla.
title: Yn pyntreikam ka ophis jong ka District Council da ka digitisation na ka bynta ban rekod ïa ka jaka hapoh jylla

content: :Hadien ba na ka Ministry of Home Affair (MHA) ka la pynphai biang ïa ka Meghalaya Resident Safety and Security ( Amendment ) Bill 2020,  mynta ka sngi ki nongïalam jong ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC), ki la wan ban ïakynduh ïa u Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Bah Prestone Tynsong ban pan jingshai  halor ka jingpynphai biang ïa kane ka Bill .Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u President ka HYC u bah Roy Kupar Synrem ,u la ong ba na ka Ministry of Home Affair jong ka Sorkar pdeng ka la dep ban pynphai biang ïa ka MRSS Amendment Bill 2020 ,ka ba la pdiang da ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ ha ka jylla, bad na ka liang u lat u la phah sha MHA na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka jingmynjur .U la ong, “Na ka liang ka Seng ka la wan ban pan jingshai na u Symbud Myntri rangbah ïa ka daw ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la pynphai bad kiei jingkynthoh ki ba la pynpaw da ka sorkar pdeng ha kaba u bah Tynsong u la pynshai ba ka MHA ka la pynphai ïa kane ka Bill ha ryngkat ki jingbthah ban bishar biang ïa ki katto katne ki bynta ha kane ka Bill, khamtam ban pynthikna ba ki aiñ ka sorkar jylla kam dei ban ïa tyngkhuh bad ki aiñ ka Sorkar Pdeng”.“Kawei na kane ka long halor ka sorkar pdeng ka don ïa ka bhah ba kumno ka sorkar jylla kan buh ïa ka khyrdop ban rung ban mih sha ka jylla” u la bynrap.U Bah Synrem u la ïathuh, ba halor kane na ka liang ka sorkar jylla shen kan sa khot da ka jingïalang bad ki briew ba don bynta ban ïa kren bad ban pan jingmut ban jubab halor kane ka shithi kaba wan na ka MHA, kumjuh ruh ban thaw ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynthikna ba kane ka bill kan dei ban trei kam .Halor ka  jingpynslem ban ai jingmynjur ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) na ka liang ka seng ka la pan jingshai na u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ha kaba u la pynshai ba haduh mynta hi na ka liang ka sorkar pdeng kam pat jubab shai halor kane ka mat hynrei u la kular ba kum ka sorkar kan dang buddien ban pynurlong ïa kane ka mat.Ka seng ka la kyntu sha ka sorkar ba  ka dei ban lam khmat ban pynsngewthuh sha ka sorkar pdeng ba  ka jylla Meghalaya ka donkam ïa ka ILP.Haba kylli halor ka jingpyntrei kam ïa ka MRSSA 2016 , ha ki katto katne ki bynta ha Sor Shillong u la ong ba na ka liang ka seng kan ym hun ïa ka MRSSA 2016 namar ba ka dang dei ka aiñ kaba dang luiñ bad kan ym lah ban the lakam ïa ka jingrung kyrthep ki briew ba na bar jylla, kumta ka seng ka kwah ban pyntreikam beit ïa ka MRSSA 2020.
title: Pan jingshai ka HYC ïa ka daw ba shah pynphai biang ka MRSS Amendment Bill 2020

content: Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) kaba kynthup ïa ka NEHUTA, NEHUNSA bad NEHUSU ka la kohnguh ban leit ïakynduh ïa u Vice-Chancellor (VC) jong ka skul bah NEHU, u Prof PS Shukla, mynta ka sngi Palei, na ka bynta ban ïakren halor ki khyndai tylli ki mat jingdawa.Ka jingïakhih ba khlem buh por ba la khot da ka JAC ka la poi sha ka sngi kaba lai bad kaba la ktah ïa ka jingïaid beit ïaid ryntih jong ka rukom trei kam ha katei ka skul bah kynthup ruh wat ha ki kam kiba ïadei bad ka pule puthi ki samla.“Ka JAC-NEHU kan ïakynduh ïa u Vice-Chancellor (VC), Prof. P.S. Shukla mynta ka sngi ha Conference Hall jong u VC,” pyntip u Shongknor ka JAC, u Prof Lakhon Kma myn ha ka sngi Balang. “Nalor kane, kan don ruh ka ‘General Assembly’ jong ka JAC habar jong ka ophis treikam u VC hadien ka jingïalang ban ïasam sha baroh halor ka jingmih na ka jingïalang bad ki dkhot ka JAC, ha kajuh ka por ban rai ïa ka sienjam nangne shakhmat,” u la ong. Na ka liang u Kma u la pynbna ruh ba ka jingïakhih sangeh treikam kan dang ïai bteng tad haduh ban da la lah ban shim ïa ka rai.Ki khyndai tylli ki mat jingdawa ki long ban weng kam noh ïa u Technical Officer/Senior consultant ba la shu thung beaiñ, ka jingthung kam mardor ïa u Satutory Officer bad u University Engineer, ka jingpynbit pynbiang ïa ka University Health Centre, ban pynlait ïa ki nonghikai bad ki Technical Staff na kiwei pat ki jait kam ba bynshet da ka sorkar, ban Upload biang ïa ka NEHU Act, Statutes bad Ordinance ha ka Website jong ka NEHU, ban pynlong ïa ka Convocation kaba thikna man la u snem, ka rukom ai mark, ban kynthup ïa ki dkhot ka NEHUSU kum ki nongmihkhmat ha ka Academic Council bad ban peit biang ïa  ka Educational Backward Area Quota naduh ki Block Level haduh ki Village Level.
title: Ïakynduh ka JAC ïa u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU

content: :Ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement (KHNAM) ha ka 15 tarik, Naiwieng ka la dep pyntip ba ïa ki kyrteng ba nyngkong jong ki kyrtong ïakhun ilekshon na ka bynta ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), yn sa pyllait noh ha ka taïew ba sdang jong u Nohprah. U president ka KHNAM, u Thomas Passah u la ong, “Ngin sa pynbna ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ha ka ilekshon KHADC ha ka taïew ba sdang jong u Nohprah.”“Katba ha ka bynta ba ar jong ka jingai ïa ki kyrteng, kan sa jia ha kaba kut jong u nai Nohprah ne ha ka taïew ba sdang jong u Kyllalyngkot, la shem snem,” bynrap u Thomas. U Passah u la ong ba ka party ka la rai ban ïakhun tang ha ki ilekshon KHADC, da kaba bynrap, “Ngi la thmu ban pyndon da ki kyrtong na baroh ki 29 seat hynrei ka shong ha ka jingaplai jong ki kyrtong.”Shuh shuh, halor ka jingpynbna ba katei ka party kaba la dep ïohpdiang ïa ka aplikeshon na ki 15 bad 16 tylli ki konstituensi tad haduh mynta, ha kaba u la ong ba ka la don ka “jingbym hok” kaba la long ba donkam na ka bynta ban ai ïa ki tiket. “Ka election committee ka la pynkhreh ban khmih ïa baroh kine ki jingdonkam. Mynta, ngi peit ïa ka jinglong jingman na ka bynta ki kyrtong ba ki dei ban long kiba hok. Kane ka long kaba donkam na ka daw jong ka jingduh ban don ka aiñ ba pynshitom ïa ki kyrtong kiba iehnoh ïa ka party jong ki ban leit ïasnoh bad kawei pat ka party. Ngi kwah ban dei ki kyrtong ba dang samla,” ong u Passah.U Passah u la ong ruh ba ka party kan sa kyrshan ïa ka party saiñ pyrthei kaba dei halor ki mat ba ïasyriem ha ka ilekshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha, da kaba bynrap ba ka party ka la dep rai ban nym pynbiang ïa uno uno u kyrtong jong ka MP ha kane ka kynti. “Kane ka dei namar ba ha ka jingïalang jong ka general council, ngi la dep rai ba naduh mynta ka sngi halor ka KHNAM ba kan sa pynleit jingmut ban leh hok ïa ki paidbah lyngba ka district council bad ka MP kam don eiei ban kylli naba ngin sa pynkut ban ïasnoh bad kiwei pat ki party,” ong u Passah.Haba la kylli shaphang katei, u Passah u la ong ba ka party ka la rai ban kan sa kyrshan ïa ka party saiñ hima sima lem bad ki mat ba ïasyriem. “Watla, ïano ban kyrshan, ngin sa shimkhia halor kane ka mat hynrei ngi la shim ïa ka rai ba ngin nym shong ha ïing, ngin sa ïashim bynta ha ki ilekshon MP,” u la ong katba ban jur ba ka KHNAM kan nym kyrshan ïa ka BJP.Da kaba kren biang ba ka jingkyrshan jong ka party kan dei halor ki mat, ha kaba utei u president ka KHNAM u la ong kumne, “Ngin sa shimkhia ba lehse ngin kyrshan ne em ha kaba kan dei halor ki mat ba kongsan. Na ka bynta katei, ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) kaba naduh u snem 2002 ka dei ha ka bynta ba nyngkong jong ka mat treikam jong ka KHNAM bad ruh ïa ka jingithuh ïa ka ktien Khasi. Ngi la peit ruh ïa ka bynta ba ar jong ka jingïakren halor u khappud nalor ka jingphiah jong ka rukom treikam jong ki shipai Assam bad Meghalaya.” U la ong shuh shuh ba, ka KHNAM kan sa kyrshan lem ïa kano kano ka party kaba don kajuh ka jingeh ha kaba ïadei bad ki mat ba ïasyriem bad ka party.
title: Yn pyllait ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ba nyngkong ha ka taïew ba sdang jong u Nohprah: KHNAM

content: :Uwei u draibar jong kawei ka trok kaba ïaid na ka surok bah NH 6, u la ngat ha ka bor jong ka aiñ jong ka Umïam Dorbar Shnong, hadien ba la lap ïa u ba u la bret ïa ki ñiut jaboh sha ka wah Umïam. Kane ka trok kaba don ïa u Registration Number NL 01 AC 8978 ka la shah bat noh ha ka Executive Committee jong ka Umïam dorbar shnong.Haba kren sha ka lad pathai khubor, u dkhot ka Executive jong ka Umïam Dorbar Shnong, u Bah Sidra Basaiawmoit u la ong, “Ki nongshong shnong ki la pyrshang ban leh kaba bha tam na ka bynta ka jingkhuid jingsuba bad ban pynneh ïa ka jingitynnad jong ka wah Umïam bad ngi ju pynlong ruh ïa ka jingpynkhuid shnong na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingitynnad jong kane ka wah. Nalor kane, kane ka trok ka la wan bad ka la bret ïa kine ki jaboh harud surok kaba jngai tang khyndiat na ka wah Umïam. Kane ka jingwanbret ïa ki jakhlia ka lah ban tap ïa kane ka wah bad ka la wanrah ïa ka jingjaboh, ka jingjakhlia bad ka pynduh noh  ruh ïa ka jingitynnad jong kane ka wah bad na ka bynta kane ka jingjia, ngi khlem shym la pynmih kano kano ka jingpynshitom ha ka jaka jong kane, ki hap ban pynkhuid baroh ki jingjakhlia kum ka jingpynshitom khnang ba kin kynmaw shi junom bad kin nym mlien shuh ban leh biang sa shisien.’’Kum ka jingmaham na ka bynta jong kiwei ruh, u la bynrap, “To ai ba kane kan pynkyndit bynriew ïa kiwei pat kiba bret ñiut ha ki rud surok. Ka Umïam Dorbar Shnong kan sa peit thuh bad lada lap ïa kiba donkti, kin hap ban mad ïa ka jingpynshitom namar kane ka jingleh khlem akor ban bret ñiut ha ki rud surok ngin nym ailad khamtam ha ki jaka jngoh kai bad hajan ki wah.U Rangbah shnong ka Umïam, u Bah Steven Kharkrang u la ong, “Ngi la ïoh jingtip khyndiat ba kane ka trok ka lah ban wan na Shillong Civil Hospital na ka bynta ban pynpoi ïa ki mar ki mata bad haba ka la wan phai ki la bret ïa ki jakhlia hangne. Ngim don jingtip kaba bun hynrei baroh ngi tip ka long ba kane ka jingleh khlem akor jong ki ka pynjaboh ïa kane ka wah bad ka long ruh kum ka jingshah ñiewbeiñ bad shah ibeiñ na ka bynta jongngi namar ngi pyrshang ban leh kaba bha tam ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba katba kiwei pat kim kheiñ kor ïa kane ki la wan ban bret pynban da ki jaboh.”
title: Maham ka Dorbar Shnong pyrshah kiba bret jakhlia ha ka wah Umïam

content: :Myn ha ka sngi Balang, ka KSU Namdong Area Unit ha ka jingïalam u Samla Kitboklang Lamare uba dei u President, u samla Rimiki War u Finance Secretary bad katto katne ngut ki dkhot kila leit pynsngew bad ai da ka jingthoh sha ka ophis u DM&HO West Jaintia Hills halor ka jingleh matlah ka sorkar ïa ka Community Health Center Namdong.Na ki por sha ki por ngi na ka liang jong ka seng ngi lah ïai pynsngew sha kiba dei peit hynrei ym don ba sngew bad ym don ba pynsngap bad sa mynta ka kynti ngi la ïoh ban ïakynduh ïa u Additional DM&HO ngi la ai da ka jingthoh bad ngi pynsngew halor ki jingeh ba ki paidbah ki ïa kynduh haba ïadei bad ka jinsniew rathai jong u surok ba ïaid sha CHC.Ha ka jingïakren na ka liang jong u Additional DM&HO u la kubur ba ka surok CHC ka long kaba sniew bad ula kular ban pynsngew bad rah sha kiba halor.
title: Leit ujor ka KSU sha ophis DM&HO halor ka jingsniew palat ka surok ba ïaid sha CHC Namdong

content: Ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) Lai Lyngdoh Circle myn ha ka sngi Balang ka la leit ban ïa kynduh ïa u Executive Engineer jong ka Public Works Department (PWD) (Roads) Nongstoin, ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewkhia jingmut halor ka jingsniew ka surok Mawkaton-Nongstoin bad ka jingjulor ka jingkieng kaba don hapoh ka shnong Mawkaton.
title: Leit kynduh ka HYC ïa u Executive Engineer jong ka Public Works Department (Roads)

content: Ka sorkar jylla ka la ai kyrteng thymmai ïa ka Department of Labour kum ka Department of Labour, Employment and Skill Development. Ïa kane ka rai la mynjur da ki Myntri jylla mynta ka sngi ka 16 tarik Naiwieng.Haba kren sha ki nonglum khubor, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ka Labour Department ka peit ruh ïa kiwei ki mat jong ka jingïohkam ïohjam bad shibun ki mat jong ka rukom ai jinghikai.“Na kata ka daw, ngi sngewnguh ïa ka kyrteng jong ka tnad Labour kumjuh ruh ïa kiwei kiwei ki kam kiba dei ban pynkiew. Ka la don lypa ka lad ban kiew ïa ka rukom hikai kaba la shimti da ka tnad labour. Te kumta, ngi la rai ban pynkylla ïa ka kyrteng na ka Labour Department kum ka Department of Labour, Employment and Skill Development,” ong u Sangma.
title: Na ka Dept of Labour sha ka Dept of Labour, Employment and Skill Development ai kyrteng thymmai ka sorkar jylla

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, mynta  ka sngi u la pyntip ba ka National People’s Party (NPP) ka la shim ïa ka rai ban ai tiket ïa ki kyrtong na ka bynta ka ilekshon MP ha ka por kaba biang, bad u la pynshai ruh ba ka seng kat haduh mynta kam pat shym la shim rai ïano ïano..
title: Yn pynbna ka NPP ïa ki kyrtong na bynta ka MP ilekshon ha ka por kaba biang: Myntri Rangbah

content: SHILLONGKa kynhun myntri jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya mynta ka sngi ka la shim ia ka rai ba kan pyndonkam ia ki kot jong ka NCERT naduh Klass-I haduh Klass-X ha ka juh ka por kita ki kot pule ki dei ruh ban don ka jngiadei na ka larity, history, ka jinglong kyrpang jong ki jaitbynriew ka jylla khlem khlem kano kano ka jingkylla. Ka jingpdiang jong ka kynhun myntri ia ka jingpule ia ki kot NCERT ka long ba ki nongpule jong ka jylla kin iaryngkat bad ki nongpule jong kiwei ki bynta jong ka ri India.U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma u la iathuh ba ki kot NCERT ki long kiba lyngkot, hynrei kin pynnep pat ia ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki nongpule jong ka Meghalaya. Ka kynhun Myntri ka la shim ruh ia ka rai ban bun ia ka Education Recruitment Board ban pynsted ia ka jingpyndap noh ia ki kam kiba lait kiba doh haduh 187 tylli hapoh jong ka tnad ka thoh ka pule. Ia kane ka kynhun kaba don haduh 11 ngut ki dkhot jong ka, yn khlieh da u Chief Secretary lane da u Additional Chief Secretary lane da u Principal Secretary jong ka tnad ka thoh ka pule jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya.Ka kynhun myntri ka la shim ruh ia ka rai ban pynkylla ia ka Meghalaya fiscal responsibility and budget management act 2006. Kane ka jingpynkylla ia katei ka ain, kan ailad ia ka Sorkar ba kan lah ban shim ram tang  sa 5 na ka 100 na ka bynta ki kam kiba ia dei bad ka jingpynmih bording elektrik. Kawei pat ka rai ba ka kynhun myntri ka la shim mynta ka sngi, ka long ban pynkylla noh ia ka kyrteng jong ka Labour Department sha ka Department of Labor, employment and skill development.Kane ka long namarba ka kyrteng barim ka thew tang ia ki kam bylla. Hynrei, ka jingmut bashisha jong ka, ka kynthup ia ka kam bylla, ka ioh kam ioh jam, ka jingpynjanai ia ki jingtrei jingktah bad kiwei de.
title: Pdiang ka kynhun myntri ka Meghalaya ïa ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki kot NCERT

content: Ka Sorkar Assam bad kum juh ruh ka Sorkar Meghalaya kim pat aiti sha ka Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingtohkit iasiat ha Mukroh, la iathuh u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma ha ka Sngi Paleit. Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, u Conrad K. Sangma u la ong ba kine ki artylli ki jylla kin pat lah ban aiti sha ka CBI ia ka jingtohkit iasiat ha Mukroh kaba la jia ha ka 22 tarik u Naiwieng namarba ba hap ban bud ia ki kyndon shuwa ban pyntrei kam, ha kaba kine ki artylli ki jylla ki hap ban pyndep ia ka jingsoi ia ki kot ki sla kiba ia dei bad ka jingiakren jong kine ki arngut ki Myntri Rangbah halor ki jingiapynbeit buh hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya ba la pyllong haka 30 tarik u Nailur mynta ka snem.“Kane ka la shim por namarba hap ban leh biang pa biang khnang ba kan long kaba lait na kano kano ka jingbakla. Baroh arngut ki Myntri Rangbah jong ka Assam bad Meghalaya, ngi la dep soi ia kine ki kot ki sla jong katei ka jingialang”, la iathuh u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma. U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ula iathuh ruh ba namarba la pyndep ia kane ka jingiasoi, sa kawei ka jingtrei kam kan sdang. Kane ka dei pat sa kata ka jingpyntip ia ki Commission jong ka Assam bad Meghalaya, ba ka Sorkar Assam bad ruh ka Sorkar Meghalaya ki kwah ba kan don ka jingtohkit da ka CBI ia ka jingiasiat ha Mukroh. Hadien ka Sorkar India kan sa leh la ka jong ka bynta.U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ula iathuh ba ka Sorkar Assam bad Sorkar Meghalaya ki la shim ia ka rai ban weng noh ia ki bor pahara ha kiba bun tylli ki shnong ha ki khappud jong ka Assam bad Meghalaya
title: Ka Sorkar Assam bad Meghalaya kim pat aiti ïa ka jingtohkit ïasiat ha Mukroh sha ka CBI

content: Ka jylla ka la rakhe ia ka leh kmen leh sngewbha Jan Jatiya Gaurav Divas (Tribal Pride) ha U Soso Tham Auditorium ha Shillong ryngkat bad ka ri baroh kawei ban pynkup burom ia ki nongialeh laitluid ‘riewlum jong ka ri India.  U Myntri ka tnad Arts & Culture, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ba u Deputy Chief Executive Member, KHADC, P.N. Syiem ki la long ki Kongsan bad Symbud Kongsan ha katei ka program. Ia ka Jan Jatiya Gaurav Divas la rakhe man ka la snem ha ka 15 tarik u Naiwieng ba kynmaw ia ka sngi sngi kha jong u Birsa Munda, uba long u nongialeh laitluid bakhraw, u nongwanrah jingkylla bad u nongialam ‘riewlum bakhraw jong ka ri.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong u la ong ba ka jingrakhe ia ka taiew ki ‘riewlum ka long ka burom kaba khraw ia ki riewlum bad ki ‘riewlum ki dei ban sngewsarong ia la ka jong ka khyndew ka shyiap kaba long ka mynsiem na ka bynta ka jingim jong ki.Haba kren shaphang ka ri Bilat, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula iathuh ba ioh ban leit jngoh ia ki mawlong mawteh bad mawbynna jong ka ri Bilat bad kane ka la pynlyngngoh ia u ba kitei ki mawlong ki mawteh kim iapher mawlong ki mawteh bad ki mawbynna jong ka Meghalaya.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la iathuh ruh ba ka long ka burom kaba khraw ia ka Meghalaya namarba ia kane ka jylla la niew ruh kum ka Meghalayan Age kaba long ka jingkhein snem geological age kumba 4200 snem mynshuwa haduh ka snem 1950.  Kiwei kiba la kren ha katei ka sngi ki long u Bah P. N. Syiem bad Commissioner & Secretary, Arts & Culture, u Bah F.R Kharkongor  bad kiwei. Ha katei ka sngi la don ruh ia ka jingsam ia ki khusnam nongjop jong ka Inter School Traditional singing competition ha ka jingrwai marwei.Ka Meghalaya Police Public School ka la rah 1st prize, St. Edmund’s School 2nd prize bad Pariong Presbytery HSS the 3rd prize. Ha ka Duet category ia ka 1st, 2nd and 3rd prizes la rah da ka St. Mary’s HSS, Shillong, Meghalaya Police Public School and St. Edmunds School bad ha ka jingrwai kynhun, ka  St. Edmunds School, Seven Set HSS and Jowai Public School ki la rah 1st, 2nd and 3rd prize respectively.
title: Rakhe ka Meghalaya ïa ka leh kmen leh sngewbha Jan Jatiya Gaurav Divas

content: Ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) kaba kynthup ia ki nonghikai, ki nongtrei bad samla pule ka North Eastern Hill University ka la rai ban weng noh ia ka jingsangeh trei kam ba khlem buh por, hadien ba u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU u Prof. P.S. Shukla ula pynpaw ia ka jingkloi jong u ban iakren ia ki khyndai tylli ki jingdawa jong ka seng.Kane ka jingsangeh trei kam jong ki dkhot ka Joint Action Committee ka la sdang naduh ka 13 tarik u Naiwieng. U Shongknor jong ka JAC u Prof. Lalkhon Kma u la iathuh ba ka Joint Action Committee ka la rai ban pynsangeh shuwa ia kane ka jingiakhih. Hynrei, ki jingdawa jong kane ka kynhun ki dang iai bteng. Kane ka jingsangeh iakhih ka mut ba ki Klass jong ka NEHU ki sdang biang naduh ka 17 tarik u Naiwieng khnang ba ki jingpule ki iaid beit iaid ryntih.U Prof. Kma u la iatuh ba u Vice Chancellor ka NEHU u la kular ba un khot ia ka jingialang jong ka Academic Council ha ka taiew banyngkong jong u Nohprah, 2023. U Prof. Kma u la iathuh ruh ba u Vice Chancellor u la kular ban buh ia kawei ka Committee kaba bishar bniah ia ki jingdawa jong ka Joint Action Committee.Ki khyndai tylli ki jingdawa jong ka Joint Action Committee, ka kynthup ia ka jingweng ia ka jingthung kam ia u Technical Officer, Senior Consultant  bad ban thung noh ia ki Statutory Officers bad Engineer jong ka NEHU, ban pynbha ia ka jinghiar syndet jong ka HEHU Health Centre, ban pynlait noh ia ki nonghikai bad nongtrei Technical Staff na ki jingtrei ia ki kam ophis jong ka NEHU, ka jingbuh ia ka NEHU Act, Statuess bad Ordinance ha ki lad pathai jingtip jong ka NEHU Website, ka jingpynlong ia ka jingpynkup burom Convocation man la ka snem, ka rukom ai marks, ka jingkynthup ia ki dkhot ong ka NEHUSU hapoh ka Academic Council bad ka jingwad bniah ia ka shaphang ki shnong kiba dang sahdieng.
title: Weng ka JAC NEHU ïa ka jingsangeh trei kam ba khlem buh por

content: :Ka jingkmen jong ki nongrep ban ïoh ot bad kheit noh ïa u soh jong ka jingtrei shitom khamtam ki nongrep kba kadei ha kum u ne u bnai Naiwieng ha kaba ki pyntha kba ki dap bad sawa da ki nongrep ban lum ban lang noh ïala ki soh jong ka jingtreishitom baroh shi snem.Hynrei mynta ka kynti ki nongrep kiba na ka shnong Tiehbah Nongstoiñ kila dap da ka jingsngewsih kthang hadien ba kila ïakynduh ïa ka jingduhnong kaba khraw hadien ba u slap u la wan ther mynta ka janmiet jong ka 16 tarik u Naiwieng kaba la pynlong ia ka um ban kit lut baroh ïa u kba ba kila lum bha ha pyntha bad ia u bala shoh u la shu per lut ha sla um ha pyntha kba.Ki nongrep kba kiba la mad ïa katei ka apot ki kynthup ïa u bah Branli Marweiñ, bah Tholing Kharlyngdoh, kong Ispilian Mawlieh, bad Eldaris Thongni bad kiwei kiwei ruh bad ka ong ba ka jingjulor kala palat ïa ka 15 hajar ei ei u wei u wei u nongrep.
title: Ba ther kynsan u slap julor ki kba ha Tiehbah WKH, duhnong ki nongrep sa ki phew hajar

content: :Kum shi bynta jong ka ‘’Viskit Bharat Sankalp Yatra”, prokram kaba lah dep ban plie bad pyntreikam ha ka 15 tarik U Naiwieng 2023, da U Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri India, U Narendra Modi, mynta ka sngi, u Kartikeya Misra, Director, DFS, Ministry of Finance jong  ka Sorkar India, u ophisar uba dei khmih naka bynta ka West Khasi Hills District, halor katei ka prokram, u la wan sha, Nongstoin bad pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ha Conference Hall ka Ophis, U Deputy Commissioner, West Khasi Hills, District, ha ka jingdon ryngkatlang jong U Deputy Commissioners ka West Khasi Hills, District, u Bah, Garod L.S.N Dykes, I.A.S, bad kiwei pat ki heh sorkar jong ka district na ka bynta ban pynsgewthuh halor ka thong bad jingmut jong kane ka ‘’Viskit Bharat Sankalp Yatra” prokram.U Kartikeya Misra, u la pyntip bad pynshai ba ka thong bad ka jingmut jong kane ka prokram ka long ban pynshai paidbah, ban pyntip sha ki paidbah shaphang ki skhim sorkar kiba pher bad ki jingmyntoi lyngba kita ki skhim kiba la pyntreikam da ka Sorkar India na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong bad ban pyntikna ruh ba ki skhim ki dei ban poi sha kiba dei hok ban ioh.Une u heh ophisar ka sorkrar pdeng, u la ong ba ka ka kamram jong ka Bor Shynshar District na ka bynta katei ka prokram, ka long ba kidei ban leit sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad ban pynshai halor kane ka prokram, khnang ban ym don uwei ruh uban duh ïa ki jingmyntoi lyngba ki skhim sorkar kiba pher kiba ka Sorkar India ka la dep ban pyntreikam kyrpang na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong ka Ri India.U Deputy Commissioner bad ki ophisar kiba la ïadon ryngkatlang ha katei ka jingïalang kila pynpaw ïa ka jingkmen halor kane ka prokram bad ki la mynjur ruh ban trei shitrhem ban pynlong ïa kane ka “Viskit Bharat Sankalp Yatra”, prokram, ka prokram kaba jop bad kaba myntoi na bynta ki nongshong shnong jong ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills District hi baroh kawei.
title: Wanpoi u heh ophisar ka DFS, ka sokar kmie ha Nongstoiñ ban ïakren halor ka ‘Viskit Bharat Sankalp Yatra’

content: U national president ka seng National People’s Party (NPP) bad Myntri rangbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka sngi ba ar, u la pyntip ba shen, un sa pynlong da ka jingïalang national executive ka ban sa sdang ban pyntreikam na ka bynta ban khot ïa ki aplikeshon ïa kito kiba don jingmut ban ïakhun ha ka ilekshon Lok Sabha.“Ngin sa sdang ban pynlong da ka jingïalang national executive ha ka bynta jong ka national level ba ngin kyrpad ïa ki jylla ba kin sdang pyntreikam ban khot aplikeshon ïa kito kiba don jingmut ban ïakhun ha ka ilekshon bad hadien ngin sa rai mangi,” ong u Sangma ha ki nongthoh kot khubor.Haba la kylli ba lehse ka seng ka la dep ïakynduh ïa u MLA barim jong ka Umroi, u George B Lyngdoh na ka bynta ban ïakhun na Shillong seat, utei u nongïalam ka NPP u la ong, “Ngam kwah ban ong eiei shaphang mano ba la ïakynduh ïano, mano ba don kyrteng ha ka list ne ym don kata ka list, naba kum kine kiei baroh, ki pher bad kan ïai jia beit na ka por sha ka por.”Da kaba ong ba la don bun ki paidbah kiba don jingmut ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka tiket NPP, u Sangma u la ong, “La i kumba la don kiba don jingmut ha ka seng NPP. Ka pyni ba la don bun ki jingdawa na ka bynta kane bad ka long ka dak ba bha na ka bynta jong ngi … Kane ka dei kaei kaba nga ïohi.” U la ong ba ka seng kan khot lut ïa baroh bad kan sa shim rai hi ma ka halor ka Shillong parliamentary seat.“Nga la kut jingmut ba lada ngi la rai halor kaei kaei, ngi kwah ban khot lut ïa baroh. Ngi kwah ban shim ïa ka rai na ka bynta ki paidbah bad ngi kwah ban shim ïa ka rai ba biang, lada long. Baroh ki bynta kiba don, ngin sa khmih bniah bad peitthuh bha…. hynrei ha kaba kut jong ka sngi, yn don tang uwei u kyrtong bad ngin sa shim ïa ka rai ba biang ha ka por ba biang,” ong u Sangma.La don haduh hynriew ngut ki kyrtong ba kwah tiket. Katba u Sangma, u la ong ba kan nym lah ban ai tiket lada ym don ba ïasnoh bad ka seng. Utei u nongïalam jong ka NPP u la mynjur ba ki paidbah ki la don jingsngew haba une u Myntri rangbah u la shah kylli jingkylli shaphang ki katto katne ki nongïalam jong ka seng halor ka jingbym kmen jong ki ïa ka jingtyrwa jong u Dhar ïa ka tiket ban ai ïa u MLA barim ka Mawhati, u Dasakhiat Lamare.U la ong, “Ka la don ka jingbym sngewtynnad napdeng kiwei pat ki seng saiñ hima ruh. Ngan nym pynsngewsih ïano ïano ruh; ngan kam ba ka dei tang ka jingdon jingsngew. Ngan ong ba ki paidbah ki don jingsngew shaphang ki katto katne ki jingjia, ki paidbah ki la don jingsmgew shaphang ki nongïalam jong ki, ki kyrtong jong ki, kiba ki kyrshan ïa ki bad ka jia beit kumne bad ym don jingbakla eiei eiei ruh em bad ngi burom ïa kane.”Shuh shuh, u Sangma u la ong ba kum kine ki jingrai ki donkam bun ka jingmynjur ba bun rukom lada ka seng ka kwah ban ïakhun met bad mynsiem ha ki ilekshon ban wan. “Ki paidbah ki kwah ban pyndonkam da ka ktien ‘high command’ hynrei phi dei ban kynmaw ba ka seng ka treikam kumne. Ngi ngeit ba ngi don ka jingsngew jong ka jingskhem bad shisien ba ngi ïohsngew, ngi peit bad khmih bniah ïa kaei kaba ki paidbah ka jylla ki kwah bad ngi kwah ban shim rai katba lah halor ka jingtrei jong ki nongtrei grassroots bad ka kynhun seng bad kaei kaba ki paidbah ki kwah bad kaei ka jinglong jingman jong ka seng saiñ hima sima ha ka jylla. Te kumta, ka dei ka jingshim rai kaba donkam bun ka jingmynjur. Ngi hap leh ïa kata lada ngi kwah ban ïakhun tyngeh, te tang kane kaba ngi kwah ban leh,” bynrap u Sangma.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka Tura parliamentary seat, utei u nongïalam jong ka seng NPP u la ong ba ka MP, ka Agatha K Sangma ka don jingmut ban ïakhun biang. “Te kumta ka seng kan sa rai halor ki jingkhot aplikeshon,” ong u Sangma.
title: Yn pynsdang shen ïa ka jingïalang national executive jong ka NPP: Conrad

content: U myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma u la pyllait paidbah ia ka Mobile Ex-servicemen Contributory Health Scheme Polyclinic na ka bynta ka Tura ha Rhino Training Centre ha Shillong.” Ngi dap da ka jingsngewnguh ia ka jingshakri jong ki shipai bad ka Ex-servicemen na ka bynta ka ri. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka kali sam dawai ka long ban ai jingsumar na ka bynta ki shipai ba la shongthait Ex-servicemen ong u Myntri rangbah Conrad K Sangma”.U Sangma u la iathuh ruh ba ka sorkar kan iai kyrshan ban iarap ia ki shipai ba la shong thait. “ Ngi sngewkmen ruh ban ai jingkyrshan pisa 5 lak tyngka na ka CM’s Special Grant na ka bynta kane ka jingthmu.Nga kyrmen ba kane ka jingtreikam kan long ka jingmyntoi na ka bynta ki shipai ba la shongthait” ong u U myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma.
title: Pyllait paidbah U Conrad K Sangma ïa ka Ex-servicemen CHSP

content: Wat  hapdeng ka jingkhang jong ka tnad ka rep ka riang jong ka srkar kmie ban die ia ki dawai Glyphosate kiba pynheh pynsan ia ki jingthung,kine ki jait dawai lah ban ioh da kaba suk ha kylleng jong ka Garo Hills. Ka tnad ka rep ka riang ka la khang ia ka jingdie ia kine ki jait dawai namar ba ki pynsniew ia ka khyndew bad ki pynduh bor ruh ka jingsboh jog ka.Ki stad ka koit ka khiah ki iathuh ruh ba ka jingpyndonkam ia ki dawai Glyphosate ka buh jingma ruh ia ki nongbam ia ki jingbam ia kine ki jingthung ba la pyndonkam da ka Glyphosate bad ki lah ruh ban ioh ia ka jingpang ampong.Ki khubor ki iathuh ruh ba wat hapeng ka jingkhang jong ka sorkar, ka jingdie ia ka dawai Glyphosate ka long kaba lah ban ioh da kaba suk na kino kino ki dukan kiba don ha Garo Hills la ka log ha ki jaka sor lane ha ki jaka nongkyndong.La iathuh ruh ba kane ka jingdie ia kane ka dawai ka long khlem kano kano ka jingteh lakam wat ha khmat jong ka ophis jong  Deputy Commissioner jong ka Tura.Kane ka jingdie ka long kaba khlem kano kano ka jingteh lakam namar lah ban ioh ia kin a kano kano ka dukan ha Tura.Laiathuh ruh ban a ka liang ki bor sorkar kim shim la leh eiei ban khang ia ka jingdie ia kane ka dawai.Ki khubor ki iathuh ba ka Garo Hills ka long ka jaka kaba la kyrkhu kyrpang bad kaba seisoh.Hynrei don pat ki nongrep khwan myntoi kiba pyndonkam ia kane ka dawai ba kin ioh kloi ban kheit kloi ia ka rep ka riang hynrei kim salia pat wat lada kan don ka jingpynsniew ia ka khyndew bad ka ban ktah ia rep ka riang jong ki pateng ki ban dang wan.
title: Die paidbah ïa ka dawai Glyphosate ha  Garo Hills hapdeng ka jingmaham ka Sorkar pdeng

content: Ka sorkar ka dang khmih ïa baroh ki bynta na ka bynta ka jingdawa ban pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo kum ki kyntien ba kongsan jong ka Meghalaya.“Ngi hap ban peitthuh baroh kine ki bynta bad ngin sa shim rai,” ong u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma sha ki nongthoh kot khubor ha ka sngi palei. Shen u la ong ruh ba ka mat halor ka jingpynbna ïa ka jingdonkam kine ki kyntien ka shong ha ka jingbatai jong kaei ka ktien ba donkam. “Te kumta, la dep peitthuh ïa baroh ki bynta wat haduh mynta ruh,” ong u Conrad.Da kaba ong ba bun ki jingïakhun, u Myntri rangbah u la ong kumne, “Lashai ka sngi, lada don ki dak ha ka kot sorkar kiba lah ban leh ha ka ktien Garo, hato kan long ka mat ba kongsan ne em, kumno ngin teh lakam ïa ka. Lada don ka jingthoh ha ka ktien Garo, te ki paidbah kiba kren ha ka ktien Khasi bad English, kin nym lah ban kynthoh ne sngewthuh te ngi hap mad ïa ki jingeh ha ka rukom shakri ïa ki paidbah. Lada kito ki bynta ki shah kynthup lang lada ka long kaba donkam, te ngi lah ban ïaid lyngba ki jingeh ne lada ngi kwah ban weng ïa kato ka bynta bad ka jingpynbna na ka sorkar bad ki jingthoh hapoh ka kot, kin donkam ban dei da ka ktien Khasi ne Garo, te kan mut ka don jingmut jong ka jingdonkam.”“Te ngin sa ïohi ïa kito ki bynta bad hangta ngi lah ban rai kumno ba ngin ïaid shakhmat bad kane namar ba hooid, ngi kwah ban pyndon ïa kine ki ktien Khasi bad Garo kum ki ktien ba kongsan hynrei ka mut kaei bad kumno ngin teh lakam ïa kine ki bynta bad lada ki jingthoh hapoh ki file ki thoh ha ka ktien Khasi bad Garo bad kumno ki bor ba dei peit ki treikam bad kaei ka ban ktah ha ka jingshakri ïa u paidbah,” bynrap u Sangma.
title: Dawa ka sorkar ban peitthuh pynrung ïa ka ktien Khasi bad Garo

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka 16 tarik, Naiwieng, u la ong ba ka sorkar kan khot halor ka ilekshon KHADC bad JHADC katkum ki kyndon treikam.“Ngi la bud ïa ka kyndon bad ngi la ïaid shakhmat katkum ki kyndon khnang ba ha kano ka por ba ka tnad ka wanrah sha ka sorkar, kan sa rai kumno bad yn sa rai ïa ki tarik bad baroh bad kiwei kiwei,” ong u Sangma sha ki nongthoh kot khubor.Haba la kylli ba lada ka jingthep vote ADC kan sa pynkynriah noh ha ka jingpeit jong ka amendment jong ka Sixth Schedule jong ka riti ka synshar, u MR u la ong ba ym don kano kano ka kaiphod ka ban wan ha u ha kane ka mat.“Ngam shym ïohpdiang ïa kano kano ka kaiphod. Ym don kano kano ka kot ne file ha nga ha kaba ïadei bad kane. Tang haduh lada poi ki file ha ka kti jong nga bad sha u Myntri ka DCA, tang katta hi ngi la lah ban kynthoh halor ki kaiphod kiba wan na ka tnad,” bynrap u Sangma.
title: Khot ka sorkar halor ka ilekshon KHADC, JHADC katkum ka kyndon treikam: MR

content: U Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka 16 tarik, Naiwieng, u la ai khublei ïa ki para nongthoh kot khubor halor ka jingrakhe ïa ka National Press Day.“Nga kwah ban shim ïa ka lad ban pdiang ïa ka jingnoh synniang kaba la trei shitom da ki para ba thoh kot khubor ha kane ka riti jong ka jingsynshar ka khadar hapoh ka ri jong ngi bad ym tang na ka rukom treikam ka seng saiñ hima sima ne katkum ka jingsynshar ban shakri ïa ki paidbah hynrei wat haba ha bun ki bynta jong ka jingïalehkai, kolshor, jingrwai, ha kaba ki nongthoh kot khubor ki long kiba kongsan ha ka ban pynthikna ïa kaba ki lah ban wanrah ïa kine ki bynta bapher bapher kiba jia sha kiwei pat ki ri jong ka pyrthei baroh kawei,” ong u Sangma sha ki nongthoh kot khubor.“Te nga ïaroh bad nga pdiang ïa ka kam ba ki trei bad nga kwah ban ai khublei ïa ki na ka bynta ka jingnoh synniang ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpyn thikna ba baroh ki khubor bad ki jingtip ki paw pyrthei hakhmat ki paidbah ha ka rukom kaba biang,” bynrap u Sangma.Da kaba kyrpad ïa ki nongthoh kot khubor ban kin bteng ka jingtrei shitom jong ki, u Sangma u la ong, “Nga kyrmen ba hadien ha bud ruh ka Press kan ïai bteng ban trei ha kane ka rukom namar ba kane ka donkam ha kum kane ka ri, hapoh ka jylla kaba kuma ka jong ngi, kaba kongsan jong ka press ka long kaba donkam.Te nga ai khublei ïaphi baroh bad ka National Press Day ka basuk bakmen.”
title: Ai khublei u MR halor ka jingrakhe ïa ka National Press Day

content: Ka Mawhati Circle jong ka Ri Bhoi Youth Federation (RBYF) ka la pynpaw ka jngsngew diaw halor ka jingot pathar ïa ki dieng ha ka shnong Mawkynrong da ka tnad Forest. Katei ka tnad ka la dep ot ïa ki dieng hapoh katei ka jaka haduh 15,000 tylli, hynrei haba la shah ban ot tang 8,000 tylli ki dieng, kaba la aiti noh sha ka Dhar Company.Katei ka jingshim khia, kaba ïasyriem bad ka jingshim khia jong ka tnad Forest ban ïada ïa kane ka mariang, ka la pynkhih win shaphang ka jingktah ïa ka jingitynnad jong ka sawdong sawkun ka mairiang bad kan ktah wat ïa ka um bam um dih ha ki lum na katei ka jingot dieng beaiñ.Katba ka jingpdiang ïa ka jingdon bynta bad ki nongshnong shnong, ka RBYF Mawhati Circle ka la sangeh ban kynnoh ïa ki, da kaba ong ba ka jingithuh jong ki ba ka dei ka jingshim khia bad ka tnad Forest. Ka kynhun ka la pdiang ruh ban pynlong da ka jingtohkit ba pura bad lada ka lap ba ym donkti lang ki nongshong shnong, yn pynshitom tyngeh pyrshah ïa ka tnad Forest.Ha ka jingtrei shitom ban khmih halor kane ka jingpom pathar ïa ki dieng, ka kynhun ka thmu ban shikkhia ïa kane ka mat sha ka ophis treikam jong ka tnad Forest bad pynlong da ka jingïakhih.Katba u President, u Reynold Dkhar u la ban jur halor ka jingdonkam kyrkieh na ka bynta ka tnad Forest ba kan ap ka jingpynshai ba biang halor ka jingïoh jingbit na ka Dhar company ha ka ban pom ïa ki dieng. Katei ka kynhun, kaba la kyrshan da ki dkhot, ka la pynkhreh ban shimkhia, kynthup ïa ka jingleit peit ïa katei ka jaka, lada ka tnad ka pulom ban jubab ha ka por ba biang.Shuh shuh, ka Mawhati Circle ka la dep pynmih da ka jingpynbna ban ai por shi ne ar sngi na ka bynta ka tnad Forest ba kan pynshai lem bad ki kyndon bad kiwei kiwei, ka jingpyn husiar jong ka jingshimkhia ba dei hok, kynthup ïa ka jingujor da ka ejahar na ka ïing kashari, lada ym ïoh jingpynshai ba biang na katei ka tnad Forest.
title: Pynrem ka RBYF Mawhati ïa ka tnad forest halor ka jingïasoi ban ot dieng haduh 15000 tylli

content: Ki nongtrei jong ka Accredited Social Health Activist (ASHA) myn ha ka sngi thohdieng, ki la ong ba kin nym shongthait na ka jingïakhih jong ki, tad haduh ba ka sorkar ka la pynbiang ki jingdawa jong ki. Ki la pynlong da ka jingïaid paidbah ha ka jylla myn ha ka 17 tarik, Naiwieng, kum ka dak jong ka jingïakhih pyrshah ïa ka sorkar halor ka jingsngap mynthi pyrshah ïa ki jingdawa jong ki, ba kynthup ïa ka jingsiew ïa ka bainong jong ki.Da ki spah ngut ki nongtrei ASHA ki la tuid katba ki la ïashim bynta ha katei ka jingïaid paidbah, kaba la kylla long ka jingïaid paidbah ha madan Malki. Da kaba pynbna shaphang kitei ki nongïakhih, ka President jong ka Meghalaya Accredited Social Health Activist Workers’ Union (MASHAWU), ka Marajune Myrsing, ka la ong ba kin nym sangeh bad nym pyndem lada ka sorkar jylla ka pylom ban ai jingïarap halor ka jingdawa jong ki.Ki nongtrei ASHA ki la dawa ba ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban pynkiew ïa ka tulop jong ki naduh T. 2,000 haduh T. 5,000. Da kaba ong ba ki nongtriei ASHA ki don ïa ka hok ban dawa, ka Myrsing ka la ong kumne, “Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka la dep pynbna ba ka tulop jong ki nongtrei ASHA ka dei T. 5,000 hynrei ka tip ba ka sorkar ka siew ïa ki tang T. 2000 kaba mut ki ïoh tang T. 66 shi sngi.”“To ngin ïa pynkynmaw ba katei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ba ka sorkar jylla ka la kular ban ai ïa ka T. 2000 hadien ba ka la shim noh ïa ka jingïoh jingmyntoi na ka ABF/MBBS, ka bym pat shym la siew la da ki bun bun snem mynta,” bynrap ka Myrsing. Shuh shuh, ka Myrsing ka la ong ba katei ka kynhun kan sa ïashem biang lashai ka sngi na ka bynta ban shim ïa ka rai ba kumno ban shimkhia.“Ng la pynbna ïa kane ka jingïaid paidbah ba jai jai ha baroh ki district, kaba la pynkut noh mynta ka sngi bad naduh lashai ka sngi, kan nym dei shuh ka jingïaid paidbah ba jai jai, hynrei kan dei ka jingïaid paidbah jong ka jingïakhih. Nga kyrpad ïa ki dkhot jong ka EC ba kin leit ha katei ka jingïalang lashai ka sngi na ka bynta ban rai halor ka jingshim khia ban wan,” ong ka Myrsing.Ki jaka treikam jong ka koit ka khiah kiba don ha ki 7,000 tylli ki shnong ki la shah ktah ha ka jingpeit jong ka indefinite strike ba la pynlong da ki nongtrei ASHA ha kine shiphew sngi ba la dep.Ha ka 15 tarik, Naiwieng, ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la pyni da ka kot donkam ba dei halor ka jingsiew tam ïa ka pisa kaba dei ban ïoh ki nongtrei ASHA kaba la phla da kawei ka nongtrei ASHA na Kyrdem public health centre (PHC) kaba la ïohpdiang haduh T. 82,000 kum ka performance incentives bad ka tulop ba ka ïoh haduh hynriew bnai.Katkum katei ka kot donkam, kaba bun ki nongtrei ASHA ki la ïoh sei ïa ka pisa kaab kot naduh T. 23,000 haduh T. 82,000 ha ki hynriew bnai kaba dei naduh ka 1 tarik, Ïaïong haduh ka 30 tarik, Nailur 2023 kaba dei hapoh ka tarik jong ka bank payment credit. Ka Lyngdoh ka la ong ba kine ki volunteer ki la ïoh da ka pisa ba biang bha.Da kaba ong baq ka jingïateh bad ka ASHA ka long kaba shai naduh ka sngi ba nyngkong, kaba katkum ka kyndon, ka la ong ba khlem don ka jingkular ïa ka tulop ne kular ïa kano kano nalor ka bynta ba ki nongtrei ASHA ki la don ka jingïateh.Ka la bynrap ruh kumne, “Lada phi kwah ban wan ban ïakren, ka jingkhang jong nga ka plie beit. Nga la kyrshan ïa kane da ki paidbah, nga dei ka briew jong ki paidbah, ngan sa ïakynduh ïaphi hynrei wat wan pat da kawei pat ka jingkhmih lynti kaba ngam lah ban pynbiang.”
title: Bteng ki nongtrei ASHA ban ïakhih dawa sa kiwei ki mat

content: Ki nongïalam ba pawnam jong ka kynhun riew kieng atiar, ka Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) myn ha ka 17 tarik, Naiwieng, ka la pynpaw ïa ka jing kyntait jong ka ban ïashim bynta ha ka ban ïakren tad haduh ba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh ban weng noh ïa ki mukotduma ba sah teng baroh pyrshah ïa ki ne ka konktrak ba la dep ïasoi na ka bynta ka jingpyn sangeh ban ïasiat.Ha ka jingthoh, u chairman ka HNLC, u Bobby Marwein bad u general secretary-cum-publicity secretary, u Sainkupar Nongtraw ki la ong kumne, “Dang shen, la dep pynlong ïa ka bynta jong ka jingïakren hapoh ka jing kdew jong u vice-chairman barim jong ngi. Hynrei, ka sorkar ka la ban jur halor ka jingïashim bynta jong u Chairman bad u General secretary.”“Ngi la pynshai hangne ba tad haduh ba ym pat weng lut ïa baroh ki mukotduma pyrshah ïangi ne pyndep ïa ka jingïasoi na ka bynta ka jingpyn sangeh ban ïa siat, u chairman ne general secretary ka HNLC kin nym lah ban ïashim bynta ha kino kino ki jingïakren,” kam katei ka kynhun da kaba bynrap kumne “Ïa mynta, ngi la aiti ha u vice-chairman ba thymmai jong ngi, u Teimiki Laloo, lem bad ka jingpeit ïa ka rukom treikam bad kumno ka kam ka ïaid.”Kane ka la jia hadien ba u symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka kam poh ïing (Home), u Prestone Tynsong u la kren biang ba ka sorkar jylla ka dang ap ïa ka rai jong ka HNLC halor ka jingkyrpad ba dei ban don lang u chairman bad u general secretary ha ka bynta ba ar jong ka jingïakren ka ban sa jia noh shen. U Marwein bad u Nongtraw ki la ong ba ka HNLC ka la dep ïakren bad ka sorkar India halor ka jingtrei shitom ban pyndon jingsuk jingsaiñ hapoh ka jylla.“Ngi ngeit skhem ba ka jingsuk ha ka saiñ hima sima ka long kaba donkam na ka bynta ka jingïoh jingsuk. Te kumta, ka long kaba kongsan ba ka jingïa kren ïasuk kan nym dei katkum ki kyndon. Lada buh da ki kyndon, ki dei ban ïa mynjur lang na baroh ar liang ki party ban ïa kaba kren tang kawei ka liang marwei,” kam kine ar ngut.Da kaba ong ba ka jingïakren ïasuk ka la thmu ban pynïoh lyngba ka jingïakren bad ka jingtrei shitom jong ka sorkar, ha kaba kitei ki nongïalam ba pawnam ki la ong, “Hynrei, ka sorkar India ka la i kumba kan sa khmih biang ïa kine ki jingïakren kum ha ka dur jong ka jingwan pyndem wait ne khlem rah atiar.”“Ngi thrang ïa ka jingsuk ba khatduh kaba dei ban dei ka jinglait luid bad ka hok katba pdiang bad burom ïa ki jingsngew bad jingkwah jong ki paidbah ka Hynniewtrep kum kaba ïatylli kawei. Ngi pyrshah ïa kano kano ka jingai jingmut jong ka jingsuk ba tang shipor kaba lah ban buh jingma ïa ka jylla jong ngi bad ka hok jong ka jingshaniah ha lade,” pynkut katei ka kynhun.
title: Pynkhreh ïakren ïasuk ka HNLC hadien ba la weng ïa ka mukotduma

content: Ka jingrakhe ïa ka 70th All India Cooperative Week 2023 ka la sdang mynta ka sngi, ha ka 17 tarik, Naiwieng ha Baghmara Baptist Church Hall, ha kaba u Block Development Officer, u Shri Halley Marak u la wan ha katei ka jingrakhe kum u Chief Guest.U Marak ha ka por ba ai jingpynbna, u la kren shaphang ki jingdonkam ba ki Cooperative Societies ki long ki kongsan ha ka ban pynkiew bad pynkylla dur ïa ka lynti jong ka jingim jong ngi kaba la ïarap shisha ha ka ïoh ka kot jong ka jingsuk ka shnong nongkyndong. U la bynrap shuh shuh ba ki paidbah ki dei ban kyrshan ha ki bynta ba bun jong ka jingpynkiew kiba la sdang da ka sorkar katkum ha kaba bun ka liang kaba ki paidbah ki la peit ïa ka rukom treikam bad ki kam jong ka sorkar ha ka lynti ka bapher, kaba ha ka jingshisha, ka long ka jingmyntoi ïa ki hi. Te kumta, u la kyrpad ïa ki paidbah ba wan ha katei ka jingrakhe bad ban kyrshan iwei ïa iwei kaba lah ban tei ïa ka imlang sahlang ba biang.Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingrakhe, ka Siju Gangga ba hap hapoh ka Baghmara Block bad Silki Achak Chiring hapih ka Chokpot Block ka la ïoh nam kum ka best performing Societies hapoh ka District.
title: La sdang ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka taïew Cooperative ha Garo Hills

content: Ka Meghalaya High Court myn ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pan ïa ka kaiphod ba dang sah halor ki kam bymman pyrshah ïa ki MP ne ki MLA ha ka Jylla.Ïa ka suo-moto cases ba ai kyrteng, “In-re: Designated Courts na ka bynta ki MP/ MLA la rejistar katkum ka jingbthah jong ka Supreme Court ha ka 9 tarik, Naiwieng, 2023.Ka hukum ba la pynmih da u Chief Justice (Acting) HS Thangkhiew ka la ong, “ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingbtah ha ka Sl. (i), (iv) and (vi), la bthah ïa ki District and Session Judge jong ki district ban phah ïa ki kaiphod ha kaba iadei bad ki mukotduma ba dang sahteng ha ki Ïingkashakri jong ki. Shuh shuh, la ailad ïa ki Designated Court katkum ba la kdew haneng ha ka para 20 (iv) kumjuh ka para (vi). Ka jingbthah  ka kynthup ruh ha ka para (vii)  bad yn sa btah ia ka Computer Section ban shim khia ïa kane ka kamKat kum ka jingbthah jong ka Supreme Court, ka High Court ka lah ban donkam ïa ki Principal District and Sessions Judge ban shim ïa  ka jingkitkhlieh ha kaba bhah  ïa ki sobjek mukotduma sha kita ki Ïingkashari lane ki Ïingshari katkum ka jingidonkam. Ka High Court ka lah ban khot ïa u Principal District and Sessions Judge ban phah ïa ki kaiphod.Ka Supreme Court ka la bthah ruh ïa ki Ïingkashari ban buh shwa ha khmat, “ (i) kaba nyngkong eh ïa ki mukotduma kam sniew (Criminal Cases)  pyrshah ïa ki MP & MLA kaba ka jingpynshitom ka long da ka jingïap ne ka jingshah set along shi junom, nangta kaba (ii)  ki mukotduma ba la pynshitom da bad set along na ka bynta 5 snem lane bun, bad ban shong bishar (ii) ïa kiwei kiwei pat ki mukotduma. Ki ïing bishar ba kham hapoh kim lah ban pynsahteng ïa ki mukotduma lait noh tang lada don ki daw bym lah kiar.”Ka la ong ruh: “U Principal District and Session Judge un pynthikna ba baroh ki jingdonkam na ka bynta ka jingtrei ïa ki ïing kashari ba la thmu ban tei bad ban wanrah ruh ïa ki buit teknoloji namar kan ïarap ha kaba treikam ba ïaid beit jong ka ïing kashari.”Ka Ïing bishar ba hakhlieh duh ka la ong ruh ba ka Special Bench ka ban bishar ïa ka suo-motu case ka lah ban kdew ïa ki jingdonkam katkum ka jingsngewbit jong ka. Ka High Court ka lah ban ai ïa kum kine ki hukum lane jingbthah katkum ka jingdonkam na ka bynta ka jingïaid beit ka jingbishar ïa kum kine ki mukotduma. Ka Special Bench ka lah ban khot ruh ïa u Advocate General lane u nongïasaid aiñ na bynta ki paidbah ban ïarap ïa ka Court.“U Chief Justices u la lah ban buh sngi ïa ki mukotduma kiba la pynmih hukum ban pynsangeh ïa ka jingshong bishar ba la dep pynmih kham ha shwa da ka Special Bench ban pynthikna  ka jingpynmih ïa ka hukum kynthup ruh ka hukum ba la pynsangeh ban pynthikna ba kan long noh mardor bad ban pynkut noh ia ka jingbishar”, ka la ongShuh shuh ka Supreme Court ka la bthah ruh ïa ki High Court ban shna la ka jong ka tab ha ka website jong ki ban ai ki jingtip katkum ki district ha kaba ïadei bad ki jingtip ba bniah halor u snem ba ujor, ka jingdon ki mukotduma kiba sahteng bad kiba dang ïaid. “Ngi pynpaw shai ba katba dang peit ïa kine ki mukotduma, ka Special Bench kan ai ïa kiba Kum kine ki hukum lane ban ai ki jingbthah katkum ka jingdonkam ban pyndep kloi ïa kiba kum kine ki mukotduma” la bynrap ka ïing bishar.
title: Pan kaiphod ka HC ïa ki Criminal Case ba dang sahteng pyrshah ki MP/MLA ha ka Jylla

content: Ki nongïalam ba pawnam jong ka seng Hynniewtrep National Liberation Council (HNLC) ha ka sngi thohdieng, ka la pynpaw ka jingsngew bym lah jong ka ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren tad haduh ba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh ban weng noh ïa baroh ki mukotduma ba sah teng pyrshah ïa ki bad ka jingsoi ïa ka jingmynjur jong ka jingsangeh ïa siat.Ha ka jingthoh, u chairman jong ka HNLC, u Bobby Marwein bad u general secretary-cum-publicity secretary, u Sainkupar Nongtraw u la ong kumne, “Dang shen, la don ka jingïakren ba kongsan kaba hap hapoh ka jingïalam jong u vice chairman barim jong ngi. Hynrei, ka sorkar ka la ban jur halor ka jingïashim bynta jong u Chairman bad u General secretary.”“Ngi la pynshai hangne ba tad haduh ba ka sorkar kan weng noh shwa ïa baroh ki mukotduma ba dang sah teng ne ka jingïasoi jong ka jingsangeh ban ïasiat, u chairman jong ka seng HNLC ne general secretary kim lah ban ïashim bynta ha ka jingïakren,” ong katei ka kynhun da kaba bynrap kumne “Ha ka jingshisha, ngi la thung thymmai da uwei pat u vice chairman, u Teimiki Laloo, lem bad ka jingpeit jong u ïa ka rukom ïaid ka kam.”Kane ka la wan jia hadien da ki sngi ba u symbud myntri, u Prestone Tynsong uba la kren biang ba ka sorkar jylla ka dang ap ïa ka rai jong ka HNLC halor ka jingkyrpad jong u chairman bad u general secretary ba ki dei ban don lang ha ka bynta ba ar jong ka jingïakren ïasuk ka ban sa jia noh shen.U Marwein bad u Nongtraw ki la ongba ka seng HNLC ka la dep ïakren halor ka kam saiñ hima sima bad ka sorkar India ha ka jingtrei shitom jong ka jingpynïoh ïa ka suk ka saiñ.“Ngi ngeit ba ka jingïakren ïasuk ka long kaba kongsan na ka bynta ka suk ka saiñ. Te kumta, ka long kaba donkam ba ka jingïakren ïasuk kam dei katkum ki kyndon. Lada pynmih ïa ki kyndon, ki dei ban mynjur lang ïa ki ar liang ki seng ban ïa kaba kren tang na kawei ka liang jong ka seng,” kam kine ar ngut.Da kaba ong ba ka jingïakren ïasuk kaba la thmu ban pynïoh jingsuk lyngba ka jingtrei shitom jong ka jingïakren bad na ka liang ka sorkar, ong kitei ki nongïalam ba pawnam, “Hynrei, ka sorkar India ka la i kumba kan sa sdang biang ban khmih ïa kine ki jingïakren kum ha ka dur jong ka jingwan pyndem wait ne khlem rah tiar.”“Ngi thrang ïa ka jingpyn ïoh jingsuk kaba junom kaba dei ban don ka jinglait luid bad ka hok katba pdiang bad burom ïa ka jingkwah bad jingthrang jong ki paidbah Hynniewtrep kum ka ri ba ïatylli lang kawei. Ngi pyrshah jur ïa kano kano ka jingthoh jong ka jingpynïoh jingsuk ba tang shipor kaba lah ban ap jingma ïa ka ri jong ngi baroh kawei bad ka hok jong ka jingshaniah ha lade,” pynkut kine ki nongïalam.
title: Kyntait ki nongïalam ba pawnam ka seng HNLC ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ka sorkar

content: :Ka Hynniewtrep Achik National Movement (HANM) ka la shim ïa ka rai  ba kan sa leit ïakynduh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam, u Himanta Biswa Sarma bad ki Members of Parliament (MPs) jong ka North East halor ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Haba kren sha ki nonglum khubor, u President ka HANM, u bah Lamphrang Kharbani u la ong ba ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa kynthup ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP), ka jingpynrung ïa ki ktien Khasi bad  Garo ha ka  Eighth Schedule jong ka Constitution of India bad ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad Assam.U Kharbani u la ong, ba dangshen la pynbna ïa ka Dharna ha New Delhi  ha kaba ki donkam ïa ka jingkyrshan na u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad ki MP na ka thaiñ North East.U la ong ruh ba ka HANM kan sa ïakynduh ïa ki MP na ka thaiñ North East ban kyrpad ïa ki ba ki dei ban kren hapoh ka Parliament halor ka jingdonkam ban pyntreikam noh ïa ka ILP ha Meghalaya, ka jingpynrung ïa ki ktien Khasi bad Garo bad ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam.“Hadien ka Dharna ha New Delhi, ngi la ïakynduh ïa ki ophisar na ka Ministry of Home Affairs bad ki la pynthikna ban kin phai khmat halor kine ki lai tylli ki mat jingdawa ha kaba ka HANM ka la buh hashwa ka sorkar India,” ong u Kharbani.
title: Yn ïakynduh ka HANM ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad MP halor ki 3 tylli ki mat jingdawa

content: :Myn ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng, ka South Garo Hills GSU Chokpot Regional Unit ha ka sngi saitjaiñ ka la leit jngoh ïa ka jingshna thymmai ïa ka surok, kaba naduh Chokpot shaduh Baghmara. Ka kynhun ka la dep ong ba ka la dep ïohpdiang ïa ka jingujor shaphang katei ka mat na katei ka shnong, te dang shen, ki la leit ïakynduh ïa ki nongshong shnong bad lap ba la don bun ki tiar ki tar ba u kontraktor u la iehnoh bad um shym la pyntrei bha ban plastar ïa ka surok. Ka surok kaba la shah kylli ka dei na Chokpot shaduh Baghmara, ha South Garo Hills district. Katkum katei ka kynhun, kane ka jingshna thymmai ïa ka surok, ka la dei ba ai jingbit da ka kompeni CCL.Katei ka kynhun ka la kyrpad ïa ki bor ba dei peit ba kin khmih halor kane ka mat bad shimkhia ban pynshitom pyrshah ïa ki.
title: Leit jngoh ka South Garo Hills GSU Chokpot Regional Unit ïa ka jingshna ïa ka surok thymmai na Chokpot shaduh Baghmara

content: Ban pyni ia ka jingiadei hapdeng ka India bad ka Japan, u nongkit ktien ka Japan ka India, u Hiroshi Suzuki u la iakynduh ia u Lat ka Meghalaya u Phagu Chauhan, at Raj Bhavan, ha Shillong mynta ka sngi. Ha kane ka jingiakynduh jong ki, u Hiroshi Suzuki bad u lat ka Jylla u Phagu Chauhan ki la iaphylliew jingmut bad pynsngew ia ka jngdonkam ban don kane ka jingiadei kaba jan hapdeng ka Japan bad ka India bad ban kyntiew ia la larity jong kine ki artylli ki ri. Kine ki arngut, ki la iakren ruh shaphang ka jingdonkam ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot bad ban ialeh pyrshah ia kiba bun ki jingeh ba kine ki artylli ki ri iakynduh.
title: Ia kynduh u nongkit ktien ka Japan Hiroshi Suzuki ïa u Lat Phagu Chauhan ka Meghalaya

content: Ka seng sain hima sima Congress ka la kynthoh jur ia ka ia ka Sorkar Pdeng halor ka jingkhang khyrdep jong ki 40,175 tylli ki jaka pynmih tiar hadien ka jingwan lynhop lynsher jong ka khlaw Covid-19 ha India. Ka Congress ka la ong ba ka jingkhang khyrdep jong kine ki jaka pynmihtiar, kiba long u budlum jong ka ioh ka ioh ka kot, ka la ktah shibun ia ka roi ka par jong ka ri.Haba pathai khubor lyngba ka lad pathai khubor “X”, u General Secretary (Communication) jong ka Congress, u Jairam Ramesh u la ong ba ka jingkhang khyrdep jong kitei ki jaka pynmih tiar ka la pyntroin ia ka ioh ka kot jong ka India, katba u Myntri Rangbahduh Narendra Modi u bun kam ban kyntiew ia ki paralok bamarjan jong u bad haba ka leit ialap elekshon.Hadien jong ka jinglynshop lynsher jong ka klam Covid-19 arsnem kynthih, haduh 40,175 tylli ki jaka pynmih tiar ki la khang khyrdep bad u Myntri Rangbahduh Naremdra Modi um shym la leh eiei ban pynim ia ki, la ong u Jairam Ramesh. “Ki kompani kiba heh ki nang kiew bad ki karkhana kiba rit ki la nang jan. Kane ka pyni shai kdar ia kane ka jingpyni ka jong ngi”, la ong u Jairam Ramesh.U la ong ruh ba ka Congress ka iai kdew ia ka jingtrei kam jong ka Sorkar NDA ba la lam khmat da ka BJP ha kaba ia dei bad ka ioh ka kot jong ka ri. Ka Congress, kaba long ka seng sain hima sima kaba la rimduh ha India, ka la kynthoh jur ia ka Sorkar Pdeng halor ka jingiapher jong ka jingdon hapdeng kiba duk bad kiba ‘riewspah.U nongialam ba ha khliehduh bamynshuwa jong ka Congress, u Rahul Gandhi u la kren shaphang kine ki jngeh ka kata ka jingiaid lynti Bharat Jodo Yatra kaba 4,000 Km, ha ki jingialang paidbah bad ha ka jingiakynduh ia ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor.
title: Kynthoh ka Congress ïa ka Sorkar Pdeng ba khang khyrdep 40,175 tylli ki jaka pynmih tiar

content: Ha ka jing ialehkai kynjatbol ba mynta  ka sngi ka 18 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 hapdeng ka Langsning FC pyrshah ia ka Khlieh Mawlieh YC kaba la pynlong hapoh jong ka Madan Rowell Lyngdoh Stadium Mawlangwir South West Khasi Hills District kala long shisha kaba pynkmen ia ki riew ieid phudboll ha kaba ka Langsning FC na East Khasi Hills District kala ioh ban thep haduh 5 la 2 goal pyshah ia ka khlieh Mawlieh YC na west Khasi Hills District.Îa ki koll jong ka Langsning FC la ioh ban thep da u  Overkindness Mawnai  3 goals Marwei kata  haka minute minute ba 20 pynbud sa ha ka  , 49 bad 74  minute katba ia ki artylli kiwei ki kol la ioh ban thep da u A.  Marwein jersey  haka  minit kaba  41 bad u W Marbaniang minit 58.Ha ka kylla mit Ka Khlieh Mawlieh YC ka la ioh ban pynphai 2 goal  lyngba u R. Dkhar jersey no 11 ha ka minit ba 70 bad 91.
title: Pynliem ka Langsning FC 5-2 ïa ka Khlieh Mawlieh YC ha Mawlangwir

content: Ka Wahkaji S&CC ka la mad biang ia ka jingïakhaid ha ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Mawthong SCCO jong ka lympung 2nd Division ka Mawkyrwat District Sports Association (MDSA) ha madan MDSA Mawkyrwat.Lyngba katei ka jingjop ka Mawthong ka la ioh 4 poiñ na 2 tylli ki jingïalehkai bad ka Wahkaji ka la ioh 2 poiñ na 2 sien ki jingïalehkai mynta ka aïom.
title: Mar shi poiñ ïasam ka Wahkaji bad Mawthong ha ka lympung MDSA

content: U nongai ktien jong ka MDA, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, u la kyrpad ïa ki nongtrei ASHA ba kin wan shakhmat ban ïakren halor ki mat jingeh bad ka sorkar.“Naba kane ka dei shaphang jong ki, hynrei ngam tip ba balei ki (ASHA) ki hap leit sha surok bad pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew jong ki. Te ai ïa ki ba kin ïakynduh ïa ki Myntri bad ïakren halor ki jingeh,” ong u Paul ha ki nongthoh kot khubor.Utei u Myntri sorkar u la ong ha ka jingshisha ka jylla Meghalaya ka la leh ïa kaba bha na ka bynta ki nongtrei ASHA da kaba pynbiang ïa ki jingsiew jong ki, haba la pynïa nujor bad kiwei pat ki jylla North East.“Naduh ba la pynbiang ïa ka jingsiew, la khmih lynti ba ki nongtrei ASHA kin siew kylliang ïangi da ka jingai jingïaroh (sha ka sorkar),” ong u Paul. U la bynrap da kaba ong, “Ka long ka jinglong jong ngi ki briew ban khmih lynti shibun hynrei don u pud ïa kiei baroh.”U Paul u la ong ba ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la dep pynthikna ïa ki ban kynduh ïa ki nongtrei ASHA. Ki jaka ai jingsumar jong ka koit ka khiah ki la kulmar lut ha ki 7000 tylli ki shnong, hadien ba ki nongtrei ASHA ki la pynlong ïa ka indefinite strike ha kine ki khatar sngi ba la dep, pyrshah ïa ka jingpulom ka sorkar ban siew ïa ki ïa ka pisa haduh T. 5,000.
title: Ong u Bah Paul ïa ki nongtrei ASHA ba kin wan kynduh ïa u na ka bynta ban ïakren

content: :Ha ka sngi ba sdang jong ka tamasa Cherry Blossom, la ïohi ba u paidbah piadbhur uba la hylla pyrta jam ïa ka kyrteng jong u nongrwai R & B, u Neyo da kaba ong kumne “Ne-Yooooo, Ne-Yooooo”, kaba jia mar syn poi utei u nongrwai halor rynsan. Katba ka tupia ba u la phong, ka pynpaw ïa ka jingïap biej jong u. U Ne-yo u la sdang ban pyni ïa ka sap jong u, da kaba sdang ban rwai ïa ka jingrwai ‘So Sick’.Katba u paidbah nongpeitkai u la dep ïohi shwa ïa ka kynhun Hybrid Theory, tang hadien ba katei ka kynhun ka la rwai ïa kawei ka jingrwai ba la pyndon burom ïa uwei na kitei ki nongrwai ba la khlad noh ba la tip kum ka kynhun rwai, ka Linkin Park, kaba la ktah bha ïa ki, da kaba pynsngewsih ïa ki. Uwei na ki paidbah ha katei ka tamasa u la sngewsih bad u la jaw ummat.Da ka jingsngewtynnad palat jong u ïa katei ka kynhun, u la ong kumne, “Nga sngewtynnad ïa ki jingrwai jong ka kynhun Linkin Park bad haba nga don hangne, haba nga sngap ïa ki jingrwai jong ki, lyngba kane ka kynhun Hybrid Theory, nga sngew ba nga don halor sahit bneng. Ka la wanrah biang ïa ki jingkynmaw na ka bynta jong u Chester Bennington bad la long kaba kyrpang shisha.”Ka jinglong jingman hangne ka la khleh lang bad ka jingkynmaw ïa ki por ba la rim ba la jah, jingthrang bad ka jingktah hapoh mynsiem naba ki jingrwai ki la pynshongshit ïa ki bad pynkynmaw ïa ki por barim bajah.Haba la kynthoh halor ka jingshongshit jong ki paidbah nongpeitkai, u Ne-yo u la ong kumne, “Ka jingshongshit bad jingsngewtynnad jong u paidbah ka long kaba ym lah ban batai. Ka Shillong, lem bad ka cherry blossoms, ka la pynpaw shisha kata ka jingitynnad jong ka.”Katba ha ka miet ba sdang plie ïa katei ka tamasa – ka erïong erngit, ka Midhili kaba la pynthut ïa katei ka tamasa ba sdang plie ha ka sngi thohdieng, hynrei ha ka sngi saitjaiñ, ka long ka tamasa kaba la pynpaw ïa ka sap ka phong.
