Hashwa ban rwai u Ne-Yo bad u Hybrid Theory, la don kiwei ki nongrwai, kynthup ïa u Rahul Rajkhowa, Meba Ofilia, Snow White, Banjop, kiba dei ki nongrwai ba pawnam, ki la pynsah jingkynmaw halor rynsan, da kaba rwai pynshongshit ïa ki paidbah.Ym kum kiwei pat ki tamasa na ri phoreiñ, kum ka Lollapalooza, ka Cherry Blossom Festival kam shym la don tang kawei ka rynsan, ar tylliki rynsan, hynrei haduh lai tylli ki rynsan. Katei ka rynsan bakhraw ka la kylla long ka rynsan pdeng, kaba la pynlong ban ïalum u paidbah, lem bad ka jingïashim bynta ki nongrwai na India bad shabar India kaba la pynshongshit ïa ki paidbah. Ka rynsan Cherry Blossom ka pyni ïa ka sap ka phong ba pawnam, katba ka jingpynwandur ïa ka DOME ka la kylla long ka miet jingshad, da kaba pynkynthup ïa ka jingiphuh iphieng jong kane ka tamasa.Haba kren shaphang jong uwei na ki nongrwai Khasi, u Banker Kharkongor, uba long u nongrwai ba pawnam, u la pynshongshit ïa ki paidbah lyngba ki jingrwai jong u ha ka cherry blossom. Haba ïoh kren ha kawei ka lad pathai khubor, utei u nongrwai u la pynpaw ka jingsngew jong u ha ka jingïoh ïashim bynta ha kawei na ki tamasa bakhraw ha Meghalaya, da kaba ong, “Nga kyndeh ka mynsiem ban ïoh ïashim bynta ha ka sien nyngkong ha kawei na ki tamasa bakhraw ha Meghalaya.”Wat hapdeng jong ka jingitynnad katei ka mariang ha kane ka tamasa, la don lai ngut ki durkhmat ba la pynkhring ïa ki paidbah baroh. Ar ngut na ki, u Tenzin bad u Lee, kiba la wan na Arunachal Pradesh ki la ïohi da la ki jong ki khmat jong ki ïa ki jingrwai jong u Ne-Yo. Da kaba pynpaw shaphang ka jingkyndeh mynsiem jong ki, u Tenzin u la ong kumne, “Ngi la sngewtynnad na ka bynta jong u Ne-Yo, khamtam ka jingwai ‘So Sick’ bad ‘Miss Independent.’” bynrap sa u Lee, “Ka jingsah jong ngi ha Meghalaya ka long kaba sngewtynnad bad ngi khmih lynti ban ïoh wanphai biang shane.”Wat hapdeng jong ka jingshongshit ki jingrwai, la pynlong da ka jingïakop ïaid thei bhabriew, kaba la ai kyrteng da ka Mr Cherry Blossom bad Miss Cherry Blossom. La don haduh khatsan ngut ki nongïashim bynta kiba la ïaknieh ïa kane ka pansngiat. Katba u Trebok Talang u la ïohrah ïa ka nam Mr Cherry Blossom, u Aman Passah u dei u first runner-up bad u David Lalrinmawia u la ïohrah ïa ka nam 2nd Runner-up.Katba ha ka bynta jong ka Miss Cherry Blossom, ka nongjop ïa katei ka nam Miss Cherry Blossom dei ka Jollyne Lyngdoh Mawphlang bad ka Lily Kharthangmaw kum ka 1st Runner-up bad ka Hakani Phawa kum ka 2nd Runner-up.Da kaba pynlong ïa kane ka jingïa kop ïaid thei bhabriew, ka la pynshongshit bad pynshongkun ïa katei ka tamasa, kaba la rakhe man ki briew ha ka rukom ka bapher.U Myntri ka tnad jngoh kai pyrthei, u Paul Lyngdoh u dei uwei na ki nongpeitkai. “Ka Shillong Cherry Blossom Festival ka long ka dak jong ka jingïatylli bad jingrakhe, da kaba wanrah lang ïa ki paidbah baroh ba kin ïakmen ha ka jingitynnad ïa katei ka tamasa ba riewspah ha ka kolshor baroh kawei. Na ka daw jong ka jingpynthut u slap, ngi hap ban pynsangeh noh ïa ka sngi ba sdang plie ïa kane ka tamasa, da kaba phikir bha, ïa ka jingai jingïada na ka bynta jong ki nongleit nongwan ha kane ka tamasa. Hynrei, katba ngi duh nong noh, ngi lah ban sah jingkynmaw na kane, kum kaba duna, hynrei ngi thrang ïa kaba bha nangne shakhmat.”
title: Sdang ka Cherry Blossom Festival da ka jingpyn sangeh ha ka sngi nyngkong

content: :Ka kam sorkar lah ban ong ba ka dei ka thong jong manla kawei pa kawei ka longïing, khamtam kiba kham duna ha ka ïoh ka kot ki bymkot bor ban seng ïa ki kam lajong bad dei tang kane ka lad ba ki ïohi kaba lah ban pynlait ïa ki na ka jingduk kaba ban ïa ka longïing longsem bad dei ha kaba kum kane ka bynta ruh ba ki runar bad ki riewthok riewshukor ki shim kabu bha ban pynbiej ïa ka jinglong lui lui bad shisur jong kiba kum kine ki longïing bad kane ka jingshah thok pisa kiba bun ki longïing ha ki riewthok kiba kular ban ai kam sorkar kam dei shuh kaba dang phylla hynrei kaba la ju jia na ka por sha ka por. Hynrei watla hapdeng kiba bun kum kine ki jingjia ki dang don bun hi ki longïing kiba ngop ha kum kine ki jingshah pynbiej.Ha kawei na kiba kum kine ki jingjia, kawei ka longkmie ka la shim da ka ram haduh T. 1,30,000 ban ai ïa uwei u riew thok uba kam ïalade ba u dei u shipai bad ruh uba kular ban ai kam pynkhuid ïa ka bad ai kam sorkar ïa ka khun jong ka. Ïa kane la ïathuh da ka khun kaba la leit ban pan jingiarap na u Samla Lamdame Shangpliang.Kane ka samla bad ka kmie jong ka, ki dei kiba shong ba sah ha Mynthlu, East Jaintia Hills District bad la ïakynduh ïa une u briew uba kular ban ai kam lyngba ka Facebook da ka kmie jong kane ka samla bad une u briew katkum ka jingïathuh kane ka samla u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Dakermi Shadap uba shong ba sah ha ka thain Ri-Bhoi.Kane ka jingïakynduh jong ka kmie jong kane ka samla ka la nang wanrah ka jingsngewskhem bad jingshaniah ïa une u briew ka dei hadien ba u la wan kai wat shaduh sha ïing sah jong ki bad ha kane ka jingwankai ka la nangwanrah ïa ka jingïasngewjan bad shaniah bha na ka liang ka kmie bad kane ka samla ruh.Hapdeng ka jingbymdon kam  kane ka samla, une u briew u la kular ban ai kam ïa ka bad ïa ka kmie jong ka bad pan ruh ka pisa kaba T. 1,30,000 khnang ba un lah ban ai kam sorkar ïa kine ki shi kmie shi khun. Hapdeng ka jingbymdon kam ka kmie jong kane ka samla ka la shim syndon da ka ram ban ai ha une u briew khnang ba kin ïoh ïa ka kam.Hynrei hadien ba la ïoh ïa kane ka pisa, une u briew u la jah kumba lai bnai eiei bad hadien kane u la wan mih biang bad ban pan pisa kylliang na ka kmie jong kane ka samla ban shna ïa ka kali jong u kaba la aksiden.Da ka jingbym shaniah shuh, ka kmie jong kane ka samla ka la kyntait ban ai bad dawa ba u dei ban pynurlong shwa ïa kaei kaba u la kular nyngkong, kata ban ai kam  ïa ka bad ïa ka khun jong ka, hynrei hadien kane ka jingkyntait ka kmie jong kane ka samla, une u briew u la jah syndon khlem wan mih shuh bad watla na ka liang ka kmie jong kane ka samla ka la pyrshang ban phone hynrei ym ïoh shuh bad ka Facebook Account kaba u ju pyndonkam ruh u khlem pyndonkam shuh.Kane ka samla ka la pynpaw ïa ka jingsngewsih kaba jur halor kane ka jingshah thok bad kaei kaba kham pynsngewsih bad sngewkhia ka dei namar ba kane ka pisa ruh ka dei kaba ki shu shim da ka ram hapdeng ka jingkyrmen ba ka jingeh kan kut noh bad ba kin ïoh ïa ka kam sorkar.Na ka liang kane ka samla  ka la ai por ruh shi taiew ba une u briew un wan pynphai ïa kane ka pisa bad ki kot ki sla kiba u la shim bad lada um lah ban pynphai hapoh kane ka shi taiew kin leit ban ujor da ka ejahar sha ki pulit.Na ka liang u Bah Lamdame u la kyntu ïa une u briew ba un wan siew noh ïa ka pisa hapoh shi taiew bad u la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah la ki ïohi ïa une u briew ba kin bat bad pyntip sha u bad une u la kyntu ruh ba kane kan long kum ka jingsneng ïa kiwei pat ki khun samla bad ki paidbah ba kim dei ban ngop ha kum kine ki jingshah pynbiej bad ban long kiba husiar.
title: Haduh T. 1,30,000 shah thok pisa kawei ka longkmie ha u briew ba kular ai kam

content: :Ki riew ngeit jong ka Balang Catholic jong ka Sawsymper Parish ha ka 19 tarik ka sngi u Blei kala ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Proseshon ha kaba ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh ban  plie  ïa ka ïing Skul  St. Ferrendo Higher Secondary School Sawsymper ha ka mang tyngka kaba T.1 klur duna  ïa ka Podium VIP T. 20 lak ïa ka Bishop Victor’s Road T. 95 lak bad ïa ka Land Mark T.5 lak tyngka  ïa kine ki saw tylli ki bynta ka ïoh ban wan plie da u Bah Charles Pangrope MLA ka Nongthymmai bad u Bah Olland Singh Suin MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency la ïoh ruh ka jing kyrkhu pynkyntang  da u Bishop Wilbert Marwein bad u Most Rev. Lyngdoh D.D.U Most Rev Vicctor Lyngdoh haba ai jing kren  ha kane ka sngi u Blei u la ai ka burom ïa u Blei trai kynrad kumjuh  ruh ïa u Conrad K. Sangma Myntri rangbah jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad  ïa u Bah Charles Pangrapoe MLA ka Nongthymai Constituency bad ïa u bah Ollansingh Suin MLA ka Mawsynram Constituency  bad ïa ki ophisar sorkar ba dei lyngba jong ki ba ki la ïoh ban plie ïa kine ki 4 tylli ki jingtei hapoh jong kane ka Sawsymper Parish.Haba kren shaphang ka sngi kyrpang jong ka sngi U Blei u la shim na ki dhot jong ka Bible da kaba pynkynmaw ïa ki khun khristan ba ka sngi u Blei ka dei ka sngi kaba khuid bad ka sngi kaba kyntang ba ki paid riewngeit kim dei ban kheiñ dew thala da kaba pynlut ïa ka por bad  ka pyrthei. Ka sngi u Blei kam dei ka sngi ba ngin leit saitjaiñ sha lum sha wah ne leit sait kali sha surok ne pynlut ïa ka por ha ki rymphong jong ka pyrthei, ka sngi u Blei  ka dei ka sngi ban ai nguh ban ai ka burom sha u Blei da kaba leit ha ki ïing kyntang ne ha ki ïing mane Blei.Shuh shuh  u la  kren shaphang ki sap  ki phong ba u Blei u la ai ha manla u briew shibun ki briew ki la roi bad kiew ka spah  ka kamai kajih ha ka spah ka  phew da ka jing pyndonkam hok ïa kaba u Blei u la bynta ha ki .Namar kata u la kyntu ïa kito ki briew ki bym pat leh ïa kane leh noh mynta ngim dei ban ai lad ïa ki jingjaipdeh jingjaituh bad ka jingsarong kiba don hapoh ka mysiem jong ki hynrei pynroi ïa ka jingngeit ha u Blei bad un sa siew kylliang ïa ngi katkum ka sap bad ki jingleh ba ngi don. Ngim dei ban khñium ne aidaw ïa u Blei wat ïa kaei kaba ngi  don yn sa shimnoh.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang da ki hajar ki paid riewngeit jong ka Balang Catholic na ka Sawsymper Parish bad na kiwei de ki balang na ka liang ka Balang Catholic Sawsymper Parish ki la  ïoh ruh ban ai sngewbha  da ki Blang ïa u MLA ka Mawsynram, u Bah Ollan Singh Suin, u Bah Charles Pangrope MLA ka Nongthymma, ïa u Bishop Wilbert Marwein Nongstoin Dioses, ïa u Most Rev.Lyngdoh D.D ha ryngkat ki Momento kum ka dak ka jingsngewnguh bad ka burom ïa ki jingleh bha ka jong ki ïa ka Balang bad ia ka Sawsymper Parish.
title: Plie u MLA ka Mawsynram bad MLA ka Nongthymmai ïa ka St. Fernando H. Secondary School Sawsymper

content: Uwei na ki nongrwai bapawnam, u Lou Majaw uba la ioh ia ka nam “Bob Dylan of the East,” u la pyniapbiej ia ki nongleh kmen lehsngewbha ha ka Cherry Blossom Festival ha ka 19 tarik u Naweing. U Lou Majaw u la pynshoh biej ia ki paidbah da ki jingrwai Rock & Blue Music. U Lou Majaw u pynkmen pynsngewbha ia ki nongpeit kai bad khynnah bad rangbah da ki jingrwai bapher bapher jong u.
title: Pynshoh biej u Lou Majaw ïa ki nongleh kmen leh sngewbha ha ka Cherry Blossom

content: Uwei na ki Myntri jong ka Sorkar jylla bad uba long ruh u working president jong ka United Democratic Party (UDP), u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba um don jingthmu ban iakhun na ka bynta ka jingjied ia u nongmih khmat sha ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary Assembly.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula ong ruh ba nalor ba um kwah ban iakhun bad sa kawei ruh ka long ba u don ruh sa kawei ka lyngkor kaba khia kaba u dei ban kit bad kata ka dei ka jinglong dkhot jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council. U Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba long ruh u MLA jong ka West Shillong u la iathuh ba um ju don jingmut ban iakhun na ka bynta ka shuki Lok Sabha bad kathong kaba hakhmat jong u ka long ban iatrei lang hapoh jong ka party.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh ula aathuh ruh ba ka Seng kan sa jied ia u kyrtong uba bha tam napdeng jong kine ki saw bad san ngut ki kyrtong kiba la pynpaw ia ki kyrteng jong ki ba ki kwah ban ia khun ia ka suki Lok Sabha. Kine kiba la pynpaw kyrteng ba ki kwah ban iakhun ia ka shuki Lok Sabha na ka UDP ki long u President baynshuwa jong ka HYC u Bah Robertjune Kharjahrin, u dkhot bathymmai ka UDP na Mawkyrwat, uba long ruh u President ka Khasi Author Society, u Dr DRL Nonglait bad MLA bamynshuwa jong ka Mawlai, u Bah P.T. Sawkmie.
title: Ym don jingmut u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ban ïakhun ïa ka shuki nongmihkhmat Shillong Parliamentary Assembly

content: Ka Sorkar jylla kan sa pyndep noh shen ia ki jingbatai ba bniah kiba ia dei bad ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka Ropeway Project ha nongbah Shillong. Ki khubor Sorkar ki iathuh ba ka Sorkar ka dang ap ban ioh ia ka jingmynjur na ka tnad ki khlaw ki btap ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyntrei kam ia kane ka project.Ha u Kyllalyngkot mynta ka snem, ka la don ka jingpynlong ia kawei ka prokmar ha Lum Shillong ha kaba la don lang u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma kaba ia dei bad ka jingaiti ia u Lum Shillong. Ki Ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka Ropeway Project kan bam jaka haduh 1.34 hektar ha ka jinglut kaba 138 klur tyngka. Kane ka project kan kynthup ia ka Lower Terminal Point (LTP) na Forest Nursary Raid Laban ia kaba ban shna hapoh jong ka  11,146.96 Sq.M  ha ka kynjang kaba 838 mitar na sla duriaw.Kane ka jaka kan kynthup ia ka jingshan ia ka Station, ka jaka shna bad jaka die tiket, ophis, jaka buh tiar, ki kamra ia ki nongpahara, ka jaka ap jong ka nongshong rel, ki pain khana bad ki jaka pynieng kali. Ia ka Upper Terminal Point (UTP) yn shana ha ka jaka shnong ha ka jingheh kaba 2025 Sq. mitar ha ka kynjang kaba 1,633  mitar na sla duriaw.Ha katei ka jaka yn don ki iing shong iing sah, ki jaka di tiker bad ophis, ki karkhana, ki jaka ap briew, ki jaka pynieng kali bad ka jingbuh ia ki khyndai tylli ki jaka peitkai jaka. Ka jingiaid jong kane ka rope, ka ialad ia ki nong jngohkai pyrthei ban peit ia ka jingitynnad jong ka Sor Shillong.
title: Shen yn ai ka Sorkar jylla ïa ki jingbatai bniah shaphang ka Ropeway Project ha Lum Shillong

content: Ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah Accredited Social Health Activist, ki la shim ia ka rai ba pynkhlain shuh shuh ia ka jingiakhih jong ki da kaba leti tur khmat jong ka Main Secretariat ha ka 27 mynta u bnai. Kane ka jingiakhih jong ki ka long ban pynsha ia ka jingle bym khlein snep ia ka jingdawa jong ki, kata ka long ban siew ia ka Honorarium kaba long 5,000 tyngka. Ia kane ka rai la shim ha ka jingialang jong ka Executive Committee jong ka Meghalaya Accredited Social Health Activist Workers’ Union (MASHAWU) kaba la long ha Mawlai ha Mawlai Motsyiar.La shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba la pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah. “Ngi la shim ia ka rai ban iaid pyrshah bad ban shong kyllain mongor ha khmat Secretariat ha ka 27 tarik mynta u bnai, ong ka President ka Union ka Kong Marajune Myrsing. Ha kane ka jingiaid paidbah ka Myrsing ka la ong ba ngin ym pyndem lada ka Sorkar kam treh ban iakren halor kane ka bynta kaba iadei bad ki ASHA.Ki nongtrei ASHA ki la dawa ba ka Sorkar ka la kular ban pynkiew ia ka Honorarium na ka 2,000 tyngka sha ka 5,000 tyngka. Ka jingai jingsumar na ka bynta ki 7000 tylli ki shnong ka la shah ktah na ka daw jong ka jingiakhih khlem buh por da ki ASHA ha ki sngi ba la dep. Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la kyrpad ia ki nongtrei ASHA ba kin sahngeh noh ia kane ka jingiakhih ban wan iakren halor kane ka bynta.
title: Rai ki nongtrei ASHA ban leit tur sha Secretarait ha ka 27 tarik u Naiwieng

content: Ka 7 Wasa ka la ioh ia ka jingjop ha ka jingialehkai na ka bynta ka lympung Super Division ka West Jaintia Hills District Sports Association (WJDSA) ïa kaba la tip ruh ‘U Kiang Nangbah Memorial Trophy 2023’ ha ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Mynthong.Ha katei ka jingiakhun kaba la iaid mynta sha ka sngi kaba 21, ka 7 Wasa ka la thep 5 kol katba ka Mynthong ka la ioh ban pynphai tang 2 kol.Ia kitei ki 5 kol na ka bynta ka 7 Wasa la ioh ban thep da u Sucrip Manner haka minit ba 3 bad 49, u Dashngain Sukhlain haka minit ba 35 bad 64 bad ia ka shi kol la ioh da u Samehi Ryngki haka minit ba 48 katba ia ka kol na ka bynta ka Mynthong la ioh ban thep da u Mo Nuwaz haka minit ba 6 bad u Md Aruwaz Khan haka minit ba 81.Ka jingïalehkai ba mynta ka sngi ka 21 Naiwieng kan long hapdeng ka Khimusniang bad Sailung Ialong ha ka por 1:30 mynsngi.
title: Da 5 kol pynliem ka 7 Wasa ïa ka Mynthong

content: Ka Meghalaya High Court, myn ha ka 20 tarik, Naiwieng, ka la khmih bniah ba ym don kano kano ka jingïarap ban lait na ka jingdheng kali hapoh ka jylla, watla shim ïa ki lynti, ba kynthup ïa ka jingdon bynta jong ka kynhun ba la tbit ban teh lakam ïa ka jingdheng kali hapoh sor Shillong.Haba la sngap ïa ka PIL halor kane ka mat, ha ka miej ba kynthup ïa u Chief Justice (Acting) HS Thangkhiew bad u Justice W Diengdoh, ki la ong kumne, “La ïohpdiang da ka jingpynbna da ka ïing kashari kaba la bun ki kaiphod ba la dep ujor lem bad ka jingïadei halor ka jingdheng kali bad ki lynti ba la dep shim, ba kynthup ïa ka jingdon bynta jong ki katto katne ki kynhun ban teh lakam ïa ka jingdheng kali.”“Hynrei, ka jinglong jingman kumba ju long hapoh ka jylla, ka la i kumba la eh ban pynbiang ïa ka jingdheng kali. Haba peit halor kane ka mat, hadien ba la dep ujor da ka affidavit da ki nongkyrpad, ïa katei ka mat, yn sa shimkhia na ka bynta ban khmih bniah,” ong na ka liang ka ïing kashari.Na la liang jong ka miej ki Justice, ki la ong ba la dep peit ba ïa ki kyrteng jong ki katto katne ki briew, la dep phah da u senior counsel na ka bynta katei ka jingkyrpad ka ban dei ban khmih bniah bad kaba long da ki dkhot jong ka Decongestion Committee, ha kaba ïa kajuh ka mat, la thmu ban shimkhia lang bad yn sa pynsngap biang ha ka 1 tarik, Nohprah.
title: Dang bteng ka jingdheng kali hapoh ka jylla: High Court

content: Ki samla pule jong ka North-Eastern Hill University (NEHU) ki la ïakynduh ïa u Vice-Chancellor (VC) ka NEHU, u Prof Prabha Shankar Shukla na ka bynta ban dawa weng kam mar mar ïa u Nantu Das, uba la shah kynnoh ba u la jrong kti pyrshah ïa kawei ka samla ba ïashim bynta ha katei ka jaka pule.Haba la ïoh ïakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, u general secretary ka NEHUSU, u Rudolf Carey Chyne u la dep pyntip ba ïa u Das, dang shen, u la shah kem noh ha ki pulit ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi u Blei.U Chyne u la kam ba u Das dang shen, u dei u Assistant Director jong ka Sports bad ha ka sngi nyngkong, u la leit ban shaw ïa kawei ka nongïashim bynta(volunteer) kaba la shimti ban ïashim bynta ha ka Women’s Inter University Football ka ban sa pynlong ha Odisha.“U Das u la shah kynnoh ba u la leit shaw ïa katei ka lanot tang ha shiteng lynti, ha kaba u la jrong kti ïa ka hapoh ka kali bad haba la poi ha Kiang Nangbah Guest House, u la pyrshang shuh shuh ban jrong kti pyrshah ïa katei ka lanot,” kynnoh u Chyne. U Chyne u la pyntip ba hadien ba la ïoh ka jingujor pyrshah ïa u Das, ka Union lem bad ki kmie ki kpa jong katei ka lanot ki la ujor da ka ejahar pyrshah ïa u Das.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, ka kynhun NEHUSU ka la ïoh ïakynduh ïa u VC ban dawa ban shimkhia da kaba pynshitom pyrshah ïa u Das, khnang ban lah ban pynbiang ïa ki kyndon jong katei ka jaka pule.“Ka jingweng kam noh ïa u Das, ym tang ba ka dei na ak bynta ka hok jong ka lanot, hynrei kumjuh ruh ka long ka lynti jam jong ka jingai jingïada, jingshong shngaiñ bad ka hok jong ki samla pule, ki nongtrei bad ka imlang ka sahlang jong katei ka jaka pule bad ïa u paidbah kumjuh,” bynrap u Chyne.Haba la kylli shaphang ka jingpyntip ba bniah na u VC, u Chyne u la ong ba u VC u la pan por ar sngi na ka bynta ban raii halor ka jingshim khia ban pynshitom ïa u Das.
title: Dawa ka NEHUSU ban weng kam ïa u Das ba jrong kti ïa ka samla ba pule ha NEHU

content: Ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) kan sa ïakren bad ki dkhot jong ka seng hashwa ba kan pynpaw ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ban ïakhun na ka bynta ka ilkshon ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha.Ïa ka rai, la shimkhia hapoh ka jingïalang jong ka state election committee (SEC), da u nongïalam ka seng, u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh ha ka sngi nyngkong.“Ngi la sdang ban pyntreikam bad yn sa don ka jingïakren hashwa ba ngin rai. Ha ka jingïakren, yn sa don ka jingpynpaw ïa ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong,” ong u vice-president ka UDP, u Allantry F Dkhar hadien katei ka jingïalang.U la ong ba katei ka jingïakren kan sa jia noh shen, lyngba ki district president bad ki secretary lem bad ki dhkot ba shah jied bad ki nongtrei jong ka seng.“La ai por ïa ki district president haduh shi taïew ban pyndep ïa katei ka jingïakren bad ba kin ai ïa ka kaiphod sha ka SEC,” ong u Dkhar katba u la bynrap, “Hadien ba la ïoh ïa ka jubab ba biang, ka SEC kan sa poi ha ka rai ba khatduh hadien jong ka jingïakren shuh shuh hapoh ka jingpynïaid jong ka Regional Democratic Alliance (RDA).”Ka UDP bad ka Hill State People’s Democratic Party (HSPDP) ki la dep pynbna shaphang ka rai jong ki naba ka RDA ka la dep ban pynkhreh lang na ka bynta ka ilekshon Lok Sabha. Ka seng UDP kan sa ïakhun lang na ka bynta ki seat parliamentary na Shillong bad Tura.Katba u Dkhar u la kyntait ban pynpaw ïa ki kyrteng jong kiba kwah ïa ki tiket na ka bynta ka seat jong ka Shillong bad ong kumne, “Kumba saw ngut ki la dep ban pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew jong ka jingdon jingmut ban ïakhun hynrei ngim pat shym la pynpaw ïa ki kyrteng jong ki ban ïakhun ilekshon naba ka long kaba donkam ban buhrieh ïa ki kyrteng jong ki tad haduh ba ngin da ïoh ïa ka jubab.”U president barim jong ka HYC, u Robertjune Kharjahrin dang shen, u la dep ïasnohkti bad ka UDP bad u la tyrwa ban ïakhun kum u kyrtong na ka bynta ka Shillong seat. Katba kiwei pat kiba kwah tiket ki kynthup ïa u president jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society (KAS), u Dr DRL Nonglait bad u nongthaw aiñ barim jong ka Mawlai, u PT Sawkmie.U president ka UDP bad u dkhot Myntri, u Paul Lyngdoh u la pynthikna ba un nym ïakhun na ka bynta ban ïoh ïa ka tiket.
title: Yn rai ka UDP na ka bynta ki kyrteng jong ki kyrtong ban ïakhun ha ka ilekshon LS

content: :Na ka bynta ban rakhe ïa ka jingdap 13 snem jong ka Entrepreneurship Development Cell (EDC) jong ka Shillong College, la dep pynlong da ka jingïalang ba nyngkong jong ki nongseng kam lajong ha katei ka College ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka PRIME Meghalaya.Ha ki 13 snem ba la dep, ka EDC jong ka College, ka la ïarap shibun ki nongseng kam lajong na kane ka jylla lem bad ka syrnod ba la pyndep ïa ka jingai jinghikai haduh lai bnai.La pynlong ïa katei ka jingïalang jong ki nongseng kam lajong na ka bynta ban pynkup burom ïa ki nongseng kam lajong kiba la ïaid shaphrang ha ka kam jong ki na ki Start-up jong ki bad ba ka kam jong ki, ka la ïaid shakhmat ha ki kompeni jong ki ha ki snem ba la dep.U Chief secretary, u D P Wahlang u la don bynta ha katei ka prokram kum u chief guest bad ka Kong Isawanda Laloo, Executive Director, MBMA & PRIME ka dei ka nongshah khot sngewbha lem bad ka Dr. E Kharkongor, Principal, Shillong College, ki nongtrei bad kiwei kiwei.La don haduh phra ngut ki nongseng kam lajong na ka certificate course, kiba la ithuh bad ki ka shah pynkup burom lem bad ki nongshem jong kane ka Cell.Katba ka website ba la tip kum ka, ka dei kaba la shem da u nongseng kam lajong, u Nishant Suchiang, la pyni ha kane ka prokram.
title: La pynkup burom ïa ki nongseng kam lajong

content: Ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka tamasa ban wan, ka Monolith Festival 2023 ka la nang ïaid shakhmat naba ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la leit jngoh ïa ka Khasi Heritage Village kaba don hajan jong kawei ka krem bakhuid jong ka Mawphlang ha ka sngi nyngkong. Yn sa sdang noh ïa katei ka tamasa la shem bnai.Ïa ka jingleit jngoh ïa katei ka shnong, la pynlong da u nongïalam ka KHADC, u Pyniaid Sing Syiem lem bad u chairman jong ka Council, u Lamphrang Blah bad uba dei peit ïa ka Arts and Culture jong ka EM, u Bah Victor Ranee, ki heh jong ka Hima Mawphlang bad ki heh jong ka sorkar jylla.Haba la ïoh ka lad ban ïakren bad ki lad pathai khubor, u Syiem u la pynbna ba ka sorkar jylla lyngba ka tnad jngoh kai pyrthei ka la dep bei tyngka haduh T. 4 klur sha ka district council na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka Monolith Festival ha ka Khasi Heritage Village, kaba la pynshna ïa ki 53 tylli ki ïing Hima bad ban pyni ïa ka jingriewspah ka tynrai bad ka kolshor jong ka imlang ka sahlang jong ki Khasi. U la ong ba ka district council kan sa pynlut haduh T. 50 lak na la ka jong ka bai noh synñiang jong ka na ka bynta kane ka tamasa.Da kaba pynpaw halor ka jinghun jong u ïa katei ka jingpynkhreh, u Syiem u la ong ba la don katto katne ki kam kiba donkam ban pyndep, kynthup ïa ka jingpynthymmai ïa ka jingpynwandur ïa ka rukom long ka tynrai ha katei ka shnong ha Mawphlang, ki footpath bad ki park jong ki khynnah.U la bynrap ba ka tnad PWD (Roads) ka la dep bei tyngka haduh T. 4 klur ban shna pynthymmai ïa ka surok na Mawngap haduh Mawphlang kaba lam sha katei ka shnong.
title: Leit jngoh ka KHADC ïa ka Khasi Heritage Village kaba ïaid shakhmat da ka Monolith fest

content: :Ka Khasi Students Union  (KSU) Ranikor Circle hynnin ka 18 tarik Naiwieng 2023 ki la ïoh ban pynhap pyrda noh ïa ka jingialehkai Kynjatbol kaba la tip kum ka 2nd Wicklif Syiem Memorial Football Tournament 2023, ba la pynïaid da ka KSU Ranikor Circle lem bad ka KSU  Nongnah Unit pynlong ha Madan Mawkyndeng  Nongnah South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba ka Nongnah Nongkdait SC bad ka Thiepdingan SC ki la poi sha ka Final  bad ha kane ka jingïakhun Final ka Nongnah Nongkdait SC ka la long ka lah duh da kaba ka la lah ban pynliem noh ïa ka Thiepdingan da shikol.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi lang ruh da u Assistant Education KSU sengkmie u samla Shalkitbok Kharbani, u Samla Poljohn Organising Secretary jong ka SWKHD, u samla Marcony Thongni u President ka Ranikor Circle, ki myntri shnnong lem bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah.Ha kane sngi ka la don ruh ka jingpynkup burom ïa ki samla jong ka dong ka thaiñ ki ba dei na ka shnong Nongnah bad u wei na ka shnong Keniong kiba la wan rah nam bad burom ïa ka shnong bad ïa ka district kum juh ruh ïa ka jylla kiba la ieit ban ïa shim bynta ha ki jinglehkai sport bapher bapher kynthup ïa ka samla Greatmercy Langte kaba la jop ïa ka jingïakop Spark Mrs Northeast India 2023 ba dang pynlong shen ha Guwahati, kaba la jop ïa ka Mrs Northeast India Brand Ambassador.
title: Pynkup burom ka KSU ïa ka Samla Great Mery Langte ba la jop ha ka Mrs Northeast India brand Ambassador

content: Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la khot sngewbha ïa ka Meghalaya Accredited Social Health Activist Workers Union (MASHAWU) ha ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng na ka bynta ban ïakren halor ki jingdawa jong ki.“…katei ka Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka tnad ka koit ka khiah bad ka imlang ka sahlang ka la khot ban pynlong da ka jingïalang bad ki nongtrei jong ka ophis jong ka MASHAWU ha ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng hapoh ka ophis treikam jong ka, ha kaba ïadei bad katei ka mat jong ka jingsangeh treikam jong ki nongtrei ASHA,” katkum ka shithi ba la pynmih da katei ka tnad sha ka Union ha ka sngi nyngkong.Kane ka la jia hadien ba ki nongtrei ASHA ki la rai ban sangeh ka jingtreikam jong ki da kaba pynlong da ka jingïakhih ban ïaid paidbah shaduh Secretariat ha ka 27 tarik, Naiwieng, pyrshah ïa ka jingsngap man man ka sorkar jylla ïa ki jingdawa jong ki ban siew haduh T. 5,000. La pynlong ruh da ka jingïaid paidbah ha ka sngi thohdieng bad la ïashim bynta da ki spah ngut ki nongtrei ASHA.“Ngi la rai ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih ban ïaid paidbah bad ban pynlong da ka jingshong kyllaiñ myngor hakhmat ka ophis secretariat,” ong ka President jong ka Union, ka Marajune Myrsing.Ka Myrsing ka la ong ruh ba yn nym don ka jingsangeh bad nym pyndem lada ka sorkar jylla kam sngap bad kam pynshai halor kine ki mat jong ki ASHA.Ki nongtrei ASHA ki la dawa na ka sorkar jylla ban pynnkiew ïa ka tulop jong ki na ka T. 2,000 shaduh T. 5,000. Katba ki jaka ai jingsumar ha ki 7,000 tylli ki shnong, ki la shah ktah ha katei ka jingïakhih jong ka indefinite strike da ki nongtrei ASHA ha kine ki ar taïew ba la dep.
title: Yn ïakynduh ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ïa ki nongtrei ASHA

content: Ka Passing Out Parade (POP) jong ka 52nd Batch Basic Course Trainees ka la dep pynlong ha ka North Eastern Police Academy (NEPA), Umsaw, Ri Bhoi district ha ka 21 tarik, Naiwieng.Katba u Myntri rangbah jong ka Assam, u Himanta Biswa Sarma u la don ha katei ka prokram kum u chief guest ha ka jingdon lang kiwie pat ki riewpawkhmat.
title: La pynlong ïa ka Passing Out Parade jong ka 52nd Basic Course ha NEPA

content: Ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association jong ka Games Technical Conduct Committee na ka bynta jong ka 5Meghalaya Games-2024 ka la ia kynduh hapoh ka jingpyniaid u Bah John F Kharshiing, Working President, MSOA bad Shongknor ka GTCC ha ka jingiadonlang u Bah Finely L Pariat, General Secretary & Secretary, GTCC, u  Bah. PB War Nongbri, Asst Director, DSYA bad kiwei ki heh MSOA ha ryngkat ki President & Secretary jong ki arphew ar tylli ki State Sports Associations ha ka 20 tarik u Naiwieng-2023  hapoh MSOA Conference Hall.Ha kane ka jingialang, la ioh ban ia kren halor ka jingpynlong ia ka 5th Meghalaya Games -2024) ka ban long naduh 15 tarik January haduh 20tarik January 2024 ha Tura, West Garo Hills District. Ka long ka sien nyngkong ba ia ka Meghalaya Games yn rah sha ki District.Lah ban kynmaw ba baroh saw sien ia kane ka jingiaIehkai kaba heh duh jong ka jylla la pynlong beit tang hapoh nongbah Shillong.Kumban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ka 4th Meghalaya Games u Myntri rangbah halor ka jingkyntu jong ka MSOA u la pynbna ba nangne shakhmat ka Meghalaya Games yn pynlong man ka snem bad katba lah yn pynlong lang sha ki District bapher bapher jong ka jylla kum shibynta ban kyntiew lang ia ki jaka ialehkai ha ki District bapher bapher bad u la pynbna ba ka Meghalaya Games kaba san yn pynlong ha Tura, West Garo Hills District bad un bud biang sha Khasi ne Jaintia Hills. U Bah John F Kharshiing, Working President, u la pynkynmaw ia baroh ki kynhun ba kine ki jingialehkai baroh ki long shibynta ban pynkhreh ruh ia ka XXXIX (39th) National Games kaba ka jylla kan pynlong ha u 2026 lane 2027 hadien ka Uttarakhand bad ka Chhattisgarh bad la kyrmen ba lyngba kine ki jingkyrshan jong ka Sorkar Jylla ha ki sports program bapher bapher bad da kaba pynlong tista ia kine ki State Games bad kiwei kiwei ki jingialehkai ngin sa kyrmen ban ioh sei ia ki khlur ialehkai  na ka jylla.
title: Iakynduh ka MSOA ka GTCC hapoh ka jingpynïaid u Bah John F Kharshiïng

content: The District Tuberculosis Office, Ri Bhoi da ka jingiatrei lang bad ka Nezone Pipes & Structure NTL ka la pyllong ia ka jingleit sam jingbam ia kiba pang TB ha  Civil Hospital, Nongpoh kum shibynta jong ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka skim Pradhan Mantri TB Mukt Bharat Abhiyan (PMTBMBA).Ka jingthmu jong kane ka long ban san ia ki jingbam teimet ia ki nongpang bad ban peit ruh ba ki ioh ia ki dawai dashin. Ia kane ka prokrm la ia shim bynta da Dr. E. Kalwing, District Tuberculosis Officer Ri Bhoi , Dr. T. S Momin, DM& HO Nongpoh, Dr. N. M Sangma, Medical Superintendent Civil Hospital Nongpoh, Sister Dene Rose Syiem, Assistant Nursing Superintendent Civil Hospital Nongpoh, Yash Agarwal, Director Nezone Pipes & Structure NTL Steel bad kiwei ki dkhot ka Nezone Pipes & Structure NTL.
title: Sam jingbam ka District Tuberculosis Office ïa kiba pang TB.

content: Ka Cooperation Department jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya da ka jingiatrei lang jong ka Meghalaya Cooperative Apex Bank (MCAB) Limited ryngkat bad ka Meghalaya Livelihoods and Access to Markets Project, Meghalaya Basin Management Agency (MBMA) ka la rakhe ia ka jingpynkut noh ia ka 70th All India Cooperative Week ha Williamnagarh.Ka phang pdeng jong kane ka long ka bynta jong ki Cooperatives ban pynlong ia ka India ka Five Trillion Dollar Economy bad jingpynurlong ia Sustainable Development Goals” ha DC’s Park, Williamnagar.U Myntri ka tnad PHE, u Marcuise N Marak haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u la iathuh ba u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u angnud ban wanrah ia ka jingroi jingsan hapdeng jong ki nongshong snong. U Myntri ula iathuh ruh ba u Conrad K. Sangma u la iai pynsngew ia ki nongshong jong ka jylla ba ka jylla ka dei ban kot sha kata ka thong ba pynlong ia ka Meghalaya kaba ia ioh ka kot jong ka, kan long haduh shiphew billion.U Myntri u la iathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ryngkat bad ka jingiatrei lang jong ka Bakdil NGO ka la lah ban ai ia ki jingkyrshan pisa ia ki Cooperative Societies hapoh jong ka jingpyntrei kam jong ka FOCUS bad FOCUS Plus. Ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingiamir jingmut halor ka Computerization jong ki PACS, ka jingiasam ia ki jingtip, ka jingpyniaid iew bad kiwei.Kiba la kren ha katei ka sngi ki long u Fr. Sunny Joseph Mavelil, Secretary, All Garo Hills Multipurpose Cooperative Societies Ltd bad u Bah O.E.J. Nongbri, Managing Director, MCAB. Ha katei ka sngi la pyllait ruh ia ki kot jong PAC da u Kongsan. Ha katei ka sngi, la pynkup burom ruh ia ki lai tylli ki PACS.
title: La pynkut noh ïa ka 70th All India Cooperative Week ha Williamnagarh

content: SHILLONG:Ka Shillong Lajong kaba la mad ia ki jingïakhaid ha baroh 2 tylli ki jingïalehkai ha la ïing mynta ka aïom bad kawei ka jingjop pyrshah ia ka Gokulam Kerala FC ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ha madan Shillong Sports Association (SSA), Polo Shillong ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi kan bteng biang ia ka kabu ban ïalehkai ha la ïing ha ka jingkyrshan ba radbah jong ki paid ieit phutbol ka jylla.Mynta ka sngi ka 22 Naiwieng ka Shillong Lajong kan ïakhun pyrshah ia ka Delhi FC kaba dei kawei na ki kynhun ba khlain ha kane ka lympung kaba don ruh ha ka kyrdan ba 4 bad la dep ban ioh 7 poiñ na 4 tylli ki jingiakhun katba ka Lajong kaba don ha ka kyrdan na 6 ka la dep ban ioh 7 poiñ na 4 tylli ki jingiakhun mynta ka samoi.Lada ka Lajong kan khur ia ka jingjop ha kane ka sngi kan knieh noh ia ka kyrdan jong ka Delhi.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ha ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka Sreenidi Deccan Football Club ka jingïalehkai ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid da 2-2 ha.Ka Sreenidi kaba dei ruh ka klob na Hyderabad ka long kawei na ki klob ba khlain ha kane ka lympung I-league mynta ka aïom bad la sakhi ba ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba itynnad bad kaba kham jwat ban ioh pynkhih jar. Ka Sreenidi ka kham ioh kabu khyndiat namar ka jingjeh ka met bad ka rynieng lada ianujor ia ki rangïalehkai Khasi hynrei namar ka jingioh kabu ban ïalehkai ha la ïing ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynphai ia kitei ki 2 kol.Ka Sreenidi ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong lyngba u Rosenberg tang ha ka minit ba 7 hynrei namar ka jingiai iakhun khlem aili ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynphai lyngba ka kol u Ronney ha ka minit ba 29. Tang hadien 5 minit ka Lajong ka la ioh ban pynkhih jar sa kawei lyngba u rangïalehkai ka Japan, u Takuto bad ka jingïakhun ha ka kylla step ka la kut noh da 2-1.
title: Mynta ka sngi yn ïakhun ka SLFC pyrshah ïa ka Delhi FC

content: Ha Iing Bishar Meghalaya High Court ha ka Sngi Baar ka la ong ba kam shym la iohi ba kan don ka jingduna ha ka jingdheng kali ha nongbah Shillong, wat lada ka Sorkar ka la pyndonkam ia ki professiona agencies. Haba shim jingbishar ha kaba ia dei bad ka mukotduma Public Interest Litigation (PIL), ka Iing Bishar ba kynthup ia u Acting Chief Justice, H.S. Thangkhiew bad Justice W Diengdoh ka la ong ba ka la ioh buh ki jingtip kiba ia dei bad ka jingpynshang ban pynduna ia ka jingdheng kali. Hynrei, ki jinglong jingman khapngiah kali kim shym la don jingkylla. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, ka Iing Bishar kan sa bishar biang ia kane. Ka Iing Bishar ka la iathuh ruh ba na ka liang u nongujor u la dep ai ia ki kyrteng jong kito ki briew kiba lah ban long ki dkhot balaitluid jong ka Decongestion Committee bad ba yn sa peit ia kane ka kam ha ka 1 tarik u Nohprah.
title: Sngewkhia ka ïing Bishar Meghalaya High Court ba ka dhang kali ka dang long kum juh

content: :Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council mynta ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Naiwieng 2023 ka la ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka Public Hearing kaba nyngkong hapoh jong ka South West Khasi Hills District lyngba ka Delimitation Committee na ka bynta ka Delimitation Bill na ka bynta ki 29 tylli ki Constituency kiba hap hapoh jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ha kane ka sngi ki la don ki Myntri bad ki rangbah shnong na kylleng ki jaka kiba hap hapoh jong ka Ranikor Konnstitwensi bad na Mawkyrwat Konstitwensi kiba la wan ban pynsngew ha la ki jong ki jing sngew ki jong hapoh jong ka Ophis jong ka District Council South West Khasi Hills District kaba don ha Pyndenpar (Jakrem) South West Khasi Hills District.Haba kylli na ki katto katne ki Myntri shnong kiba la wan sngap ha kane ka sngi halor kane ka bynta na ka liang u bah Kitborlang Nongrem Myntri shnong jong ka Shnong Rangthong u la ong ba ka jingpynbeit ïa ki shnong na kawei ka Konstitwensi sha kawei pat ka Konstitwensi kan jin da la bha ban leh hadien ba ka Amendment jong ka 6 Schedule, ha kaba u la ong ba kane ka jing thmu jong ka Khasi Hills District Autonomous Council ban wad bniah ïa ki jingeh jong ki paidbah hapoh ki ar tylli ki Konstitwensi hapoh ka South West Khasi Hills District ngim pat sngew donkam ban ïakren ei ei mynta namar ba haba phai ha ki kam pynroi lada dei ha kano kano ka Konstitwensi ngi long hi kumjuh. Haba phai pat ban wanrah ïa ki jingeh jong ki shnong ban pynhap noh naka wei ka Konstitwensi sha ka wei pat ngi dang shem jingeh shibun namar ba ka South West Khasi Hills District ka don ar tylli ki Konstitwensi ka baheh bad ba ïar hynrei ngi tip ba ka dei ka lynti ïaid.
title: Ka jingpynbeit ïa ki shnong na kawei ka Konstitwensi sha kawei pat kan jin da la bha ban leh hadien ba ka Amendment ïa ka 6 Schedule Kitborlang Nongrem

content: :U District Magistrate ka Eastern West Khasi Hill District, Mairang u Bah G Kharmawphlang IAS, u la pyntreikam da ka kyndon 144CrPC kaba khang bad mana pyrshah ïa ki briew lane kynhun briew ban kem bad tong dohkha da kaba pyndonkam da ki kynja dawai ha ki wah bah lane wah duid kiba don hapoh ka District. Kane ka jingleh ka wanrah ïa ka jingpynjakhlia bad jingpynjot ïa ki kynja ba im hapoh ki um, ki wah bad ka pynsniew ïa ki sawdong sawkun bad ka pynlong ruh ka jingbym shngaiñ ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki nongshong shnong. Kumta lada lap ïa kiba ïaleh pyrshah yn pynshitom katkum ka kyndon aiñ 188 jong ka Indian Penal Code. Kane ka jingmana kan treikam noh mardor naduh bala pynmih ïa kane ka hukum.
title: Da ka kyndon 144 CrPC pynjari u DM ka EWKHD ban mana pyndonkam dawai ha ki wah

content: :Ka Federation of Khasi Jaiñtia Garo People’s FKJGP South West Khasi Hills District ha ka jing ïalam jong u Bah Kenesjune Nonglait, u President bad u Bah Balse Kharbani, GeneralSecretary ha ryngkat ki katto katne ki dkhot mynta ka sngi kila leit ïakynduh ïa u Deputy Commissioner Southwest Khasi Hills District, u Bah T. Lyngwa ban pan jingshai halor ka jing pynkynriah noh ïa ka jingtrei ïa ka Surok 2 lane, na shilliang ka jing kieng Borbasing Ranikor ka ba ïaid lyngba ka Mawthabah bad ruh ban pan jingshai naka office jong u D/C ka don jing tip ne em ban ïa ka jing trei da ka juh ka Dhar construction Company kata naduh jing kieng Borbasing Ranikor kaba don 5 kms haduh ha lad jong ka Alikwareng ki ba la pynrit ïa ka surok naka 2 lane sha ka Intermediate Road da kaba kim pyntrei shuh kat kum ba dei ban pyntrei.Halor kane ka bynta naka liang ka seng hadien ba kila ïa kynduh ïa u DC ki la pynshai ha ki lad pathai khubor ba naka liang u DC um shym tip eiei halor kane ka bynta ban na liang u DC u la kular ban shimkhia halor kane ka bynta. Namar kata naka liang seng FKJGP ka ai por hapoh mynta u bnai ïa ki bor ba halor ban pynshai halor kane bad lada kam lah ban pynshai naka liang ka seng ym banse kan hap ïaid da ka wei pat ka lynti ban phah ruh da ka PIL sha ka sorkar Jylla, ong u Bah Balse Kharbani bad Bah Kenesjune Nonglait, u President ka FKJGP South West Khasi Hills District.
title: Leit ïakynduh ka FKJGP ïa u DC SWKHD halor ka surok 2 lane na Ranikor sha Alikwareng

content: :Ki dkhot ka Khasi Student Union, mynta ka sngi ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng 2023, ka la kynmaw burom ïa ka lyngkhuh dap shisnem jong ka jingshah siatïap ki 5 ngut ki rangbah Khasi ha ka shnong Mukroh, West Jaintia Hills ha ka ktang suloi ki Pulit Assam.Ki dkhot ka Khasi Student Union mynta ka sngi ki la teh ïa ki baner ha ki katto katne ki bynta ka nongbah Shillong kaba kynthup ha Secretariat, Mot Kiang Nangbah, ha Khyndailad, Motphran, Laitumkhrah bad Golf Links ban kynmaw burom ïa ki san ngut ki khasi ha ka shnong  Mukroh. Lah ban kdew hangne ba ha ka 22 tarik u Naiwieng 2022, ki pulit ka Forest Protection Force ka Assam ki la siat ïap ïa ki 5 ngut ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka shnong Mukroh .Halor kane ka jingjia na ka liang ka Sorkar Assam bad ka Sorkar Meghalaya ha ka 30 tarik Nailar 2023, ha ka jingïalang kaba la long ha Guwahati la shim ïa ka rai ban pynkut noh ïa ka jingtohkit jong ka Judicial Commission jong ki ar jylla bad yn sa aiti noh shen ha ka CBI ba kan tohkit halor kane ka jingjia.Ha ka 16 tarik Naiwieng 2023, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u la ïathuh ba  halor ka jingjia shah siatïap ha Mukroh na ka liang ka Sorkar Assam bad Sorkar Meghalaya ki la ïaid shaid shaid ban aiti noh sha ka kynhun tohkit ka CBI.
title: Kynmaw burom ka KSU ïa ka lyngkhuh sngi ïap ki san ngut ki nongshong shnong ha Mukroh

content: Ka Samvaad (ba la pynmih da ka kompeni Tata Steel Foundation) ka la pyllait ïa ka jingrwai ‘(kaba mut ha pneh i Mei) kaba mut ha ka ktien Khasi, “(ha ka ktien phareng kaba mut Lullabies), ka dei ka kot bapher bad ba thymmai jong kane ka jingrwai ba la pynmih da ka Martin Luther Christian University (MLCU) Press ha ka 19 tarik, Naiwieng, ha Jamshedpur, Jharkhand.Da ka jinglum jinglang jong kine ki jingrwai rim da ka kong Amabel Susngi, kane ka kot jingrwai ka don haduh 25 tylli ki jingrwai kynoi thiah ha ki kyntien bapher, kynthup na Ri Lum Khasi, Ri Lum Jaintia bad Ri Bhoi district, kaba la don bun jait ki jingrwai bapher bapher.Ïa katei ka kot jingrwai, la pynwandur na ka bynta ban suk ban pyndonkam, ha kaba ïa ki kyntien jingrwai, la ai da ka ktien phareng(English) bad ki dak jingrwai na ka bynta ki nongrwai jong baroh ki jait jingai jinghikai.Ïa ka ‘lah ban ïoh kum ha ka kot bad ïa ki jingrwai kynoi thiah ba la dep rekod, lah ban ïoh sngap ha ka channel Tyn-re jong ka YouTube Channel.Ïa kane ka kot, la thoh bad pynmih da ka Kong Amabel Susngi, kaba la pawnam kum ka nongrwai bad ka nonghikai skul ha Hill Crest Higher Secondary School. Ka la dep ïohrah ruh ïa la khusnam jong ka Samvaad Fellowship (ba la pynmih da ka kompeni Tata Steel Foundation), ha u snem 2021.
title: Pyllait ka Samvaad ïa ka jingrwai “Ha Yupiam Ka Bei”

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad K Sangma, mynta ka sngi, u la plie ïa ka United Nations economic and Social Commission for Asia and the Pacific (UNESCAP) Subregional Capacity Building Workshop na ka bynta ka Bangladesh, Bhutan, India and Nepal (BBIN) Connectivity ha Taj Vivanta, Shillong.Ha ka jingpynbna ïa katei, u Conrad K Sangma, u la ong ba jingïasoh jong ka North East India sha kiwei pat ki ri mihngi jong ka Asia bad thaiñ shathie mihngi jong ka Asia, ka long kawei kaba kongsan jong ka sorkar. “Ka Histori ka ngeit ba la don bun ka khaïi ka pateng hapdeng kine ki jaka kiba la ïoh lypa ka jinglaitluid bad la don ka jingkhaïi pateng ka bakhraw bad ka jingïadon jingïadei hapoh kane ka jaka, te kumta ngi donkam ban pynbha bad pynbiang baroh ki jingshah ker kud kiba la pynsangeh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng bad ka jingdon jingïadei,” ong u MR.U Myntri rangbah u la pyntip ruh ba ka jylla North East lada ka ïaid shakhmat lang, ka lah ban noh synñiang na ka bynta la jingthmu jong ka jylla ha ka ban pynïoh ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ka jylla. U la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong ba ym lah ban don ka Act East Policy kaba hiar pateng. “Nga la ai jingmut naduh kaba sdang ba ïa ka Act East Policy, dei ban buh la ka jong. Ngi donkam ban don la ki jong ki bynta, kiba lah ban lam shakhmat ïa ka Act East Policy,” ong Conrad.U la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka don jingmut ban shimkhia na ka bynta ka khaïi ka pateng bad ban pynkiew ïa ka ïoh ka kot bad ka jingdon jingïadei. “Dei ban don da k polisi kiba suk khnang ba ki paidbah kin nym mad jingeh ha ka ban leh ïa ka khaïi ka pateng, da kaba pyndonkam da ki tiar ki tar ba la don lypa kum ki Integrated Check Posts, da kaba pynïasoh ïa ki surok bad shna bha ha ki khappud, kiba ka khaïi ka pateng ruh kan don jingpher,” ong u MR. u la ong ruh ba kum kine ki jingïatreilang hapdeng kine ki ri, kan ïarap ha ka ban pynsuk ha baroh ki liang. “Nga kyrmen ba kane ka prokram ka dei kaba sdang jong ka jingbei ïa ka tyngka ha ka dor baheh bad ka jingpyn kylla dur ïa ka khaïi pateng,” pynkut u Conrad.Ka Director, South and Southwest Asia Sub-Regional Office, ka Mikiko Tanaka ka la ong ka jaka jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha ka BBIN bad ba ka Meghalaya ba ka don mynta, hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Myntri rangbah, u Conrad K Sangma, u la pynkhreh ban pynïaid shaid shaid ha ka ban pynkiew ïa ka kam khaïi pateng bad ka ïoh ka kot, kaba long kaba biang ban pynïaid ïa katei ka workshop na ka bynta ban pynkiew ïa ka jingïadei hapdeng ki ri jong ka BBIN. Ka la ong ba katei ka workshop ka long ka bynta jong ka jingtreikam ka ESCAP prokram na ka bynta ban kyrshan ïa ka jingbiang jong ka jingdon bynta ban ïoh ïaid lyngba ka khappud hapoh ka jaka Asia bad Pacific.Shuh shuh, ha katei ka prokram, ha ka por ba don ka jingplie ïa ka workshop, la don u Commissioner and Secretary, Planning, Investment Promotion & Sustainable Development Department, Government of Meghalaya, kiba la ïohpdiang ïa ka Welcome Address.
title: Plie u Myntri rangbah ïa ka workshop UNESCAP na ka bynta ka BBIN Connectivity

content: U Justice BP Katakey (ba la shongthait noh) u la leit sha ka Single Member Committee, ha kaba u la phah ïa ka kaiphod jong ka 18th interim jong u halor ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ïa u dewïong ha ka jylla Meghalaya. Ïa katei ka kaiphod, la dep ujor hadien ba u Justice Katakey u la leit jngoh ïa ki jaka jong ka East Jaintia Hills bad kiwei kiwei ki jaka.Haba la ïohsngew shaphang ka PIL halor katei ka mat ha ka sngi ba ar, ka Meghalaya High Court ka la kam ïa katei kum ka kaiphod jong ka jingpynhusiar. “Ka jingthoh jong ka kaiphod ka long ka jingpynhusiar,” katkum ka jingthoh jong ka kaiphod.Ka jinghukum ka la ong ba ka jinghusiar jong ka ïing kashari ka la dep thoh halor ka order kaba hap ha ka 4 tarik, Risaw 2023, ha kaba ha ka bynta ba hynriew ne paragraph 6, ka ïing kashari kumta ka la hukum ïa ka jylla ban khmih ïa kine ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ïa uwei u riew shimet bad la ai jingbit ba un ujor da ka affidavit sha ka affidavit ba la ujor da u nongkyrpad ha ka PIL No.8 of 2022.La ong shuh shuh ba la dep phah ba ym don kano kano ka affidavit. “Kumta, la khmih lynti ba ha kawei pat ka tarik, ïa ka affidavit, yn dang phah,” katkum ka jingïathuh na ka ïing kashari.
title: Phah u Katakey ïa ka kaiphod halor ka jingkhaïi beaiñ ïa u dewïong

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la thmu ban siew ïa ka bai bam(pension) jong ki dkhot barim jong ka. Ïa katei, la pyntip hashwa ka Meghalaya High Court ha ka sngi ba ar ha ka por ba pynbna ïa ka jingkyrpad ba la ujor da ki 22 ngut ki MDC barim.Ïa katei ka jinghukum, la phah da ka ïing kashari kaba la ong ha u Bah VGK Kynta, u Sr counsel ba la ïarap da u Bah H Wanshong, u counsel na ka bynta ki nongkyrpad, sa shisien, mynta ka sngi u la phah da kajuh ka jingkyrpad ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingkyrpad jong ki nongujor bad ong ba ïa katei ka mat, dang khmih bad ka jingsiew ïa ka pisa, yn sa pyntreikam noh shen, naba la dep ïohpdiang ïa ki pisa synñiang.U Bah BF Kharwanlang, u nongai jingmut na ka bynta jong ki nongkyrpad u la kynthoh jur bad kyrpad ba dei ban don ka jingkdew lynti kaba biang ban phah ha ka por ba biang ïa kitei ki jingkyrpad bad ban lah ban siew ïa ka bai bam sha ki MDC barim.Ka ïing kashari ka la ong ba ka jingphah jong ki nongai jingmut, la dep buh rekod. “Ka long ka jingshisha kaba long ka lad ban ïakren biang ban ai jingbit na ka bynta ki nongkyrpad ba kin pynïoh ïa ka bai bam tymmen ïa ki MDC barim. Hynrei, ha ka jingdon jingmut jong u justice, la buh ïa kane ka phang ha ka 13 tarik, Nohprah 2023 na ka bynta ki jinghukum ban wan,” katkum ka Meghalaya High Court.
title: Yn siew bai bam tymmen ka KHADC ïa ki dkhot barim jong ka

content: :U Symbud Myntri barim, u Bah Standlington D Khongwir, uba la kot sha ka rta kaba 89, u la pyrsad mynsiem khatduh ha NEIGRIMHS Hospital. La ïoh khubor ba utei u nongseng saiñ hima sima barim u la shitom la slem bha.Katba u Myntri rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih jong u hapoh ka social media, da kaba ong kumne, “Ka mong ka mynsiem ban tip shaphang ka jingkhlad jong u Symbud Myntri barim, u Bah Standlington D Khongwir. Nalor jong ka jingslem jong u ban bat ïa ka kam saiñ hima sima, u Bah Khongwir u long u nongïalam bad uba la shimti kum u Rangbah Shnong ba la slem jong ka Mawlai Nonglum, uba la trei shitom na ka bynta ka imlang ka sahlang jong katei ka shnong tad haduh ki sngi ba khatduh. Nga pynpaw ka jingsngewsih bakhraw na ka bynta ki bahaïing ha sem bad ki baieid bathoiñ jong u. To sa leitsuk.”Ha ka jingpynpaw ïa ka burom, u Myntri rangbah u la leit sha ïingsah jong u Bah Khongwir ban pyndep burom khatduh na ka bynta jong u Bah Khongwir. Katba ïa ka jingleit on tep ïa u, kan sa long ha ka sngi thohdieng ha u Lum Jingtep ka Mawlai Nonglum Presbyterian.Haba kren shaphang jong u Bah Khongwir, la kha ïa u ha u snem 1934, ha kaba u Khongwir u la shimti kum u symbud Myntri ha kane ka sorkar jylla ba lam khmat da ki Myntri rangbah ba la khlad noh, kynthup ïa u Bah Darwin Diengdoh Pugh bad u Bah Brington Buhai Lyngdoh.Kum u nongmihkhmat na ka Mawlai konstituensi, u Bah Khongwir u la bat kum u MLA haduh san snem (25 snem) tad haduh ba un da la shongthait na ka kam politik ha u 1998. U la shimti kum u Rangbah Shnong haduh 55 snem bad hadien u la bat ïa ka kam kum u president jong ka Mawlai Town Dorbar (MTD) haduh 35 snem.
title: Khlad u Symbud Myntri barim, u Standlington D Khongwir ha ka rta kaba 89 snem

content: Ka medical health camp, kaba la pynlong ha ka shnong Harinkata Rabha, North Garo Hills district kum shi bynta jong ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra, ka dei na ka bynta ki shnong bad man u briew kiba la ïoh jingmyntoi na ka developmental scheme.Ka District Medical Health Officer ka la batai bniah ïa ki nongdon bynta halor ka Ayushman Bharat, Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana bad kiwei kiwei ki scheme jong ka Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. La pynlong da ka jingbatai bniah, kaba dei halor ka jinglah ban phah eksamin bha ïalade kum ka blood pressure bad jingdon ka shini kaba la ïashim bynta da ki briew kiba la ïoh ka lad ban ïohpdiang ïa ki ABHA Cards bad Ayushman Health Cards hangto hangto. Katba kaba ïadei bad ka kam rep kam riang, la dep pynbna da ki nongai jingmut ba la tbit halor ka on-site kiba la ïarap ban batai ïa ki mat ba dei halor ka kam rep kam riang, da kaba pynthikna ba ka kynhun rep riang ka la ïohpdiang ïa baroh ki bynta ba pynïoh jingmyntoi bad ki mat ban pynkiew ïa ka jingïoh nong.Ha ka por ba don ka Sankalp Yatra, la pynlong da ka health camp ha ki district, kynthup ha East Khasi Hills, West Jaintia Hills, East Garo Hills bad North Garo Hills, ha kaba ki jaka sumar kum ka jingpynmih ïa ki Ayushman Card, jingpyni paidbah ïa ki jingpang jingshitom kum ka TB, Sickle Cell, (jingpang shini)Diabetes bad ka Hypertension.Ka Brahmaputra Valley Fertilizer Corporation Limited (BVFCL) ka la pynlong da ka jingbatai lyngba ki drone ha Mylliem, East Khasi Hills district kaba la pyni ïa ka jingïoh jingmyntoi na ka jingpyndonkam ïa ka teknoloji ban suk ha ka kam rep kam riang. Ka BVFCL ka la pyni da ki drone ha Dambo Rongjeng, Silchang Gittim, East Garo Hills district.Ïa mynta, ka IEC Van jong ka Ministry of Information and Broadcasting ka la poi ha Harinkata Rabha, North Garo Hills district kaba la sdang da u ADC, u Nipon Hajong. Katba ha ka shnong Lumcharatoh bad Wahrymbai, hapoh ka Thadlaskein Block jong ka West Jaintia Hills district ka la batai halor ka IEC Van ba dei shaphang ki scheme bad ki prokram jong ka sorkar India.
title: La pynlong ïa ka Medical health camps ha kylleng ka jylla

content: U MDC ka Tura na ka seng BJP, u Bernard N Marak u la ong ia u myntri ka tand ka thoh ka pule u Rakkam A. Sangma ba u dei ban ia kren bad ka Sorkar Kmie halor ka jingpynkloi ban ai ia ka scholarships na ka bynta ki samla pule.Ha ka shithi ba u la phah sha u myntri ka tand ka pule u Rakkam A Sangma, u Bernard N. Marak u la ong ba kane ka jingslem ban pyllait ia ka scholarship ka la ktah ia shibun ki khynnah pule jong ka jylla. Bun ki khynnah kim shym la lah ban siew ia ki bai pynkhreh kot bad ym lah shuh ban pyndap ia ki form na ka bynta ki Examination.“Kae ka dei ka jingjia kaba sngewkhia bad nga kyntu ia u Myntri ki kam kathoh ka pule ban pyllait noh ia ka scholarship jong ki samla pule, khnang ba ki samla pule kin lah ban siew lut ia baroh ki jingdonkam jong ki”, la ong u Bernard N. Marak. Une u MDC u la iathuh ba kane ka Scholarship ka kynthup ia ka jingsiew ia ki bai khreh kot, jingthied kot, ki jingsiew sha ki jaka pule bad kiwei ki jingsiew kiba dei ban ai sha ki jaka pule lyngba ka National Scholarship Portal.U Bernard N. Marak u la ong ba kane ka jingbym siew ia ka Scholarship ka long ka jingbam khia ia ki samla pule bad lada kim lah ban pyndep ia kine ki jingsiew kin ym lah ban ioh ia ki Admit Card bad kane kan ialam sha ka jingduh jong ki ban thoh ia ki Examination jong ki.“Nga kyntu ia u Myntri ka thoh ka pule jong ka Meghalaya ban kyrpad ia ka North Eastern Hill University ba ai por shuh ia ki samla kiba ym pat lah ban pyndep ia ki jingsiew ki jong ki”, la ong u Bernard M. Marak ha ka shithi ba u la thoh sha Myntri ka thoh ka pule ong ka Meghalaya, u Rakkam A. Sangma.
title: Thoh u MDC BJP sha u Myntri ka thoh ka pule ka Meghalaya ban siew noh ïa ka scholarship ki samla pule

content: Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Mazel Amareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka Sorkar kam don kano kano ka jingthmu ban aiti ia ka jingpyniaid ia ka koit ka khiah 108 Emergency Services sha ka kompani thymmai.Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba la don haduh hynniew tylli ki ki kompani kiba la a shim bynta ha ka jingkhot Tender jong ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha ka jaka jong ka 108 Emergency Service, tangba haduh mynta, ka Sorkar kam pat shim ia kano kano ka ria halor kane ka bynta.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka dei ban don ka jingpynbiang ia baroh ki kyndoh kiba ia dei bad katei ka Tender bad ka Sorkar kam kyrkieh ha kaba ia dei bad kane ka bynta.Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen ka la iathuh ruh ba kane ka kam kan dang shim por. Kane ka long ba u National Health Mission Director ruh mynta ruh um don bad ba ka Sorkar ruh ka la bynshet ruh ia ka kam elekshon.Ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ruh ba ka don ka jingiasngewthuh bad ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah 108 Emergency Servicces bad kane kano ka jingshim raika dei ban long kaba lait noh ki kynrum kynram.Ka Myntri ka la ong ruh ba kan long ka jingkmen kaba khraw na ka bynta jong ka ban iohi ba ki Ambulance ki ai ia ki jingshakri jong ki ia ki nongpang.
title: Ka Sorkar Meghalaya kam kyrkieh ban bujli ïa ka jingshakri jong ka 108 Emergency Services

content: :Ki khynnah National Cardet Crops NCC jong ka Nongstoin College Nongstoin West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka 22 tarik, Naiwieng 2023 ki la ïoh jingmyntoi shibun naka bynta ka jingïoh jinghikai kaba shi sngi ban pyntbit ïa lade na ka bynta kumno ban tip ha kaba ïadei naka bynta u Zip-lining, Rappling, Rope Knot, Jummaring ka ba kila pynlong ha Kynrewmyllah Adventure Training Centre and Eco-Tourism Mawranglang South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u Bah Pilastar Nongsiej u ba dei u National Mountaineering Climber u la ïoh ban ai jinghikai ïa ki Khynnah NCC jong ka Nongstoin College Nongstoin na West Khasi Hills District.Ïa ki Khynnah NCC jong ka Nongstoin College la ïalam da u Sir. Rubenker Nongrum Associate NCC Officer Nongstoin College Nongstoin ha kaba u la pynpaw ka jingïaroh ba lyngba ka jingïoh jinghikai na u Bah Pilastar Nongsiej ba lyngba jong u ngi la ïoh shibun ki jingmyntoi khamtam na ka bynta ki khynnah NCC jong ka Nongstoin College Nongstoin.
title: Ïoh jingmyntoi ki NCC Nongstoin College na ka jinghikai ha Kynrewmyllah Adventure Training Centre and Eco-Tourism Mawranglang SWKHD

content: SHILLONG:Hadien 2 taiew jong ka jingsangeh treikam ki ASHA mynta ka sngi ka 22 tarik Naiwieng 2023, ka Myntri ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha ka jylla ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la khot ban pynlong ïa ka jingïalang, ha ka ba ka la rai ban pynkiew noh ïa ka jingïarap pisa na ka T. 2000 sha ka T. 3000.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor ka Kong Ampareen ka la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingïalang na ka liang ki nongïalam ka Meghalaya ASHA Worker Union (MAWU) ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingeh jong ki bad namar ki dei ki jingeh ki ba don nongrim kumta ka sorkar ka la shim ïa ka rai ban pynkiew ïa ka jingbei pisa na ka T. 17 klur sha ka T. 26 klur .“Ha kane ka jingïalang ngi la rai ban pyntrei kam noh ïa ka skim thymmai ha kaba ïadei bad ki ASHA ka ban tip kum ka Community Base Health Incentive na ka bynta ban siew ka jingïarap sha ki Asha” ka la ong.Ka la bynrap ” ha kane ka jingïalang la lap shibun ki jingduna ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingïarap ïa ki Asha kumta ka sorkar kan thaw da ka Commitee ka ban kynthup ïa ki Asha, ki dkhot ka Village Health Center (VHC), ki ophisar ka NHM bad ki ophisar ka sorkar jylla ban peit ïa ka jingeh ki Asha”.Ka Myntri ka la ïathuh shuh shuh “na ka liang ka NHM ka ba ju siew 22 klur sha ki Asha kan ïai siew kumjuh hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar kaba siew T.17 klur kan pynkiew noh sha ka T.26 klur  hadien ka jingkyntiew ïa ka CBH Incentive”. Na ka liang ka Myntri ka la ïathuh ba halor kane ka rai na ka liang ki Asha ki la mynjur ba ki pdiang bad shen kin leit phai noh sha la ki kam. Ka myntri ka la ïathuh ba na ka liang ka sorkar ka la pan por 3 bnai ban pyntreikam ïa kane ka skim thymmai.
title: Kohnguh ka sorkar ban kyntiew ïa ka jingïarap pisa sha ki Asha na ka T. 2000 sha ka T. 3000

content: :Ka seng JSU ka pynkynmaw sha baroh ka jaitbynriew Hynñiewtrep ba ngim dei ban klet ïa kaei ba lah dep jia ha ka shnong Mukroh ha u snem ba lah dep ba haduh 5 ngut ki mynsiem ba lui lui ki lah kyllon ïap u ktang suloi ki pulit Assam.Ka seng ka pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingsngewlem sha ki bahaïing bahasem jong kito kiba lah khlad noh ha u kuli ki pulit Assam, ka seng ka pynkynmaw ba dei hadien ka jingdawa ka seng na u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma u ba lah wan ïuh kjat ha Mukroh ha u snem ba lah dep ban dawa na u ban  buh  mardor ïa ka ktem pulit (Border Police Out Post) ha Mukroh ban ai jingïada ïaki paradoh parasnam kiba shong sha khap pud ka jylla hynrei kane ka Oupost ruh kam pat biang than namar kadei ba dang shu sop daki tin.Na liang ka seng JSU ka dawa na u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla ba dei ban pynkloi noh ban ai ti ïa kane ka jing jia ba lah dep ha Mukroh sha ka CBI ban ïoh ka jingbishar kaba khuid bad ym dei shu ban pynslem namar lah jan don ar bnai tam lah shu kut tang haka jingkular ban aiti sha ka CBI hynrei ka sorkar ka dang pynsah teng haduh mynta.
title: Dawa ka JSU ban aiti noh mardor sha ka CBI ban tohkit halor ka jingjia ha Mukroh

content: Ka myntri ka koit ka khiah ka kong Ampreen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka jingdawa pynkiew tulop jong nongtrei ASHA ka dei ba long kaba don jingmut bad iathuh ruh ba ki nongtrei ASHA kin dang iai bteng ia ki jingiakhih jong ki, wat lada la don buh  sien ka jingiakren jong ki bad ka Sorkar.Haba kren ha ki nongthoh kot khubor bad lad pathai khubor, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ka jingdawa jong ki nongtrei ASHA ka dei ban long ruh kaba biang bad kaba lah ban pyn ngeit ia u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma.Ka Myntri ka la iathuh ba ka jingdawa pynkiew tulop kam dei ban ktah ia ka pla tyngka jong ka Sorkar. Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba jingpynkiew tulop hapoh jong ka jylla ka iaid kat kum ka Pay Commission bad kane kam jia khah khah kum ha kiwei ki jingtrei jong ka Sorkar India.
title: Ka jingdawa pynkiew tulop ki nongtrei ASHA dei ban long kaba don nongrim:Ampareen Lyngdoh

content: U Chief Executive Officer, Tura Municipal Board, Tura u la dep pyntip sha ki paidbah ba ha ka jingkhang ïa ka ïew na ka bynta ka jingrakhe ïa ka Golden Jubilee Celebrations jong ka Tura Diocese at Don Bosco Mini Stadium, Tura ha ka 2 tarik, Nohprah, ha kaba ïa ki ïew, yn khang man la ka sngi saitjaiñ.Te kumta, baroh ki dukan jong ka jaka ha Chandmari, la kyrpad ba kin nym shong die dukan ha ka tarik ba la buh. Shuh shuh, baroh ki nongshong shnong jong ka Chandmari ki la ïoh jingkyrpad ban sangeh ban ïaid na ki surok jong ka Chandmari shaduh Don Bosco Mini Stadium na ka bynta ban lait na ka jingdheng kali. Shuh shuh, ym shah ban buh ïa ki dukan ba die ïa ki bam ki dih ha kato ka jaka.
title: Yn khang ïew man ka taïew na ka bynta ka Golden Jubilee ha Tura

content: Ka Shillong Lajong kaba la mad ia ki jingjop kaba 2 mynta ka aïom hadien ba ka la lah ban pynliem ia ka Delhi FC da 2-1 ha ka jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Shillong Sports Association (SSA), Polo Shillong ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.Ka jingiakhun mynta ka sngi ka long kawei na ka jingiakhun ba itynnad mynta ka samoi na ka bynta ka Lajong bad watla ka Delhi ka tam poiñ bad kyrdan ia kane ka kynhun ba na ka jylla hynrei ki la pynkylla ia ka buit ïalehkai bad ñion ia katei ka kynhun na Delhi.U Phrangki Buam uba la khur ruh ia ka khusnam Player of the Match u la ioh ban thep shi kol kaba dei ruh kaba itynnad ha ka minit ba 82 katba ua kawei pat ka kol na ka bynta ka Lajong la ioh ban thep da u E. H. A. K. Samb ha ka minit ba 23.Ka Delhi watla ka la ïakhun khlem da pyni ia ka jingduh bor hynrei namar ka jingskhem ki rangïalehkai ‘dien ka Lajong ki la duh noh ban pynkhih jar bad ioh ban pynphai tang shi kol lyngba G. Rawat (60).Lyngba katei ka Jingjop ka Lajong ka la ioh ban kiew sha ka kyrdan ba 4 jong kane ka lympung I-league 2023-24.Ka jingiakhun ba bud ha la ïing kan long ha kane ka sngi saitjain pyrshah ia ka TRAU kaba dei ruh ka kynhun ba don ha trai duh jong kane ka lympung
title: Khur biang ka Lajong sa 3 poiñ hadien ba pynliem ïa ka Delhi FC

content: U Working President ka National People’s Party u Marcuise N. Marak uba long ruh uwei na ki Myntri jong ka Sorkar Meghalaya, u la iathuh ba ka dkhot ka Iing Dorbar Thawain Lok Sabha na Tura Parliamentary Assembly, ka Agatha K. Sangma kan dang iakhun ia katei ka shuki nongmihkhmat na ka NPP.“Ngi la thikna ba ka Agatha K. Sangma kan iakhun na ka bynta ka Tura Parliamentary Constituency, hynrei ia ka rai ba khatduh yn shim da ka State Election Committee”, la iathuh u Marcuise N. Marak ia ki nongthoh kot khubor.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyrshang jong ka Congress ban ioh bat ia katei ka Constituency, u Marcuise N. Marak ula iathuh ba ka NPP kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah ia kata namarba ka jingjied ia ki nongmihkhmat ka shong ha ka mon jong ki paidbah kiba tip ia kiba kum kino ki nongmihkhmat ki sei na ka bynta ka Iing Dorbar Lok Sabha.Ka jingjied ia ki nongmihkhmat sha ka Iing Dorbar Lok Sabha kane ka la hajan. Bun ki kyrtong ki ban wan shakhmat ban iakhun bad ki paidbah ki tip iano ban jied bad khlem artatien kin ai ia ka jingkyrshan jong ki ia ka seng sain hima sima kaba lehbha ia ki paidbah. Ngi kyrmen ba ka NPP kan leh bha ha Khasi bad Jaintia Hills, la ong u Marcuise N. Marak.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka Shillong Parliamentary Assembly, u Marcuise N. Marak ula iathuh ba ka NPP ka la don lai tylli ki kyrteng ha khmat jong ka. Kita ki long ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Mazel Apareen Lyngdoh, u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang bad u Dasakhia Lamare bad ka Election Committee kan sa leh ia kaba donkam ha kane ka bynta. U Marcuise N. Marak u la iathuh ka Election Committee jong ka National People’s Party kan sa shon pyrkhat tang shu mih ka jingpynbna ia kane ka jingjied nongmihkhmat Lok Sabha da ka Election Commission of India.
title: Yn ïakhun ka Agatha K. Sangma na ka bynta ka Tura Parliamentary Assembly

content: Ka bynta jong ka tnad jingjngoh kai pyrthei ha ka jylla Meghalaya ka lah ban poi sha ka T. 12,000 klur ha u snem 2028 bad ka jngkheiñ ïa ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei man la u snem, ka la kot sha ka T. 20 lak, katkum ka jingïathuh na ka liang jong ki heh sorkar.Haba la kren ha ka International Tourist Mart ha ka sngi balang, u Tourism Director ka Meghalaya, u Bah Cyril V.D. Diengdoh u la ong ba ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei ha Meghalya ka la kot sha ka T. 1,600 klur ha u 2022 bad la lah ban ïathuh lypa ba kan kiew sha ka 10 per cent man la u snem. U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka dang sdang ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti ban pynshlur ïa ki nongseng kam lajong ba dei ki trai ba kin don bynta ha ka ban sdang ïa ki projek ba ïadei bad ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei kiba lah ban ïarap ïa ka karkhana.“Hapoh u snem 2028, ngi la khmih lynti ba ka bynta jong ka jngoh kai pyrthei ha Meghalaya kan sa kiew naduh T. 12,000 klur, lane T.1.5 billion dollar, nga ai khublei ïa ka suiñbneng kaba sngewtynnad bad ba pyngngad, kaba yn sa pdiang sngewbha haduh T. million ne T. 20 lak ngut ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei man la u snem,” ong u Bah Cyril.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u, ka karkhana ka la ïoh nong kumba T. 1,600 klur myn shem snem. Utei u tourism director u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la khmih ba ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei kan sa kiew da 10 per cent man la u snem ha u 2024.Ha ki shiphew snem ba la dep, ka sorkar ka la dep sakhi ïa ka jingkiew ka jingdheng kali kaba ar shah man la u snem ha ka jingwan jngoh kai pyrthei ki nongleit nongwan. Naduh ka T. 6.9 lak ha u 2013 haduh T. 12.7 lak mynta u snem, ka la kiew ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei.“Katkum ka jingkhaiñ jingdiah, la don haduh 9.38 lak ngut ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei tang hapoh jylla lajong, ha kaba ka jingbun ka dei ba wan na ka jylla Assam (43 per cent) bad West Bengal (14 per cent), lem bad ka jingsah ka dei na kiwei pat ki jylla,” ong u Cyril.Shuh shuh, kumba 10,000 ngut ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei na ri phoreiñ kiba la shah pdiang sngewbha da ka jylla, lem bad 79 per cent na ki ki dei kiba wan na Bangladesh, katkum ka jingïathuh na u Cyril. Ki heh sorkar Meghalaya ki la ong ba kumba 2 lak ngut ki nongwan jngoh kai pyrthei ki duna ban wan ha kane ka jylla ha u 2020 bad ha u 2021, na ka jingwan lynshop ka khlam Covid-19, ka la ktah ïa ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei.
title: Yn poi ka bynta jong ka jingjngoh kai pyrthei ha Meghalaya sha ka T. 12,000 klur ha ki san snem ban wan: heh sorkar

content: :U Superintendent of Police, West Khasi Hills District, u la pyntip sha ki paidbah baroh ba i Kong Laidina Rongrin, 27 snem karta iba dei i Khun jong i Kong Lucy Rongrin, ba shong ba sah ha ka shnong Doronggre bad iba hikai ha ka skul Holy Spirit School (Songsak), i la jah naduh ka 2 tarik U Naiwieng, 2023 katba i dang leit sha skul kaba i hikai bad haduh mynta ym shym pat lapdien ïa ka.I Kong Laidina Rongrin i long iba lieh ka sniehdoh, i dei na ka jaitbynriew Khasi hynrei i sngewthuh ruh ïa ka ktien Garo bad Hindi, I don ïa u sniuh uba kdor lyngkot bad tah rong ktieh bad ka ryngieng jong i ka long 5 phut ka jing jrong. I phong ïa ka sopti Salwar kaba rong stem kaba kynthup ïa ka patlun bad ka sopti poh.Halor kane, U Superintendent of Police, West Khasi Hills District, u la pynmih ïa ka jingpyntip na ka bynta ban wad ia i Kong Laidina Rongrin, bad lada don kino kino kiba ïohi ne kiba ïoh jingtip shaphang jong i, kin sngewbha ban pyntip sha ki Police Station kiba hajan eh jong ki bad na ka liang jong U Superintendent of Police, West Khasi Hills District, u la dep ruh ban pyntip sha baroh ki Police Station jong ka Meghalaya bad ki Jylla kiba marjan na ka bynta ban wad ïa i Kong Laidina Rongrin.
title: Jah rngai ka Nonghikai skul na WKH naduh ka 2 tarik u Naiwieng

content: Ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Amapareen Lyngdoh myn ha ka 23 tarik, ka la leit jngoh ïa ka health camp ba la pynlong da ka kynhun Fanwar Faith INC. ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka Martin Luther Christian University (MLCU), Jengjal Sub Divisional Hospital, RoUTES and Seventh-Day Adventist Church ha Madan Pyndeng Mawlieh, Mawshynrut, West Khasi Hills District.Ka Lyngdoh ka la leit sha ki katto katne ki booth na ki jaka ba sah ki doktor bad ka la ïoh ka lad ban kynduh ïa ki doktor, ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, ki nongdie dawai bad ki nongïoh jingmyntoi kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingphah eksamin bad ki dawai ba lait ei ban siew pisa.Ha ka jingïathuh jong ka, katei ka Myntri ka la ai khublei ïa ka kynhun Fanwar Faith INC bad kiwei kiwei ki nongseng kam lajong na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong ki ïa ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka jingïai minot jong ki ban ai ïa ka jingsumar ba biang sha ki jaka ba jngai. Katei ka Myntri kaba la ai khublei, ka la ai khublei ruh ïa ka ïing ka sem jong ka jait Mawsor na ka bynta ka jinglah jong ki ban noh synñiang khyndiat ka jaka na ka bynta ban pynbiang ïa ka ïing skul hapoh katei ka shnong, kaba yn sa sdang plie noh da ka kynhun Fanwar Faith INC.Halor ka jingïoh kynduh bad ki doktor hapoh katei ka health camp, katei ka Myntri ka la ïoh jingtip ba ïa ka jingpang shini ne diabetes bad ka jingpang hypertension, ki long kita ki jingpang kiba ki paidbah ki ïoh bha, ha kaba ka la kyrpad ïa ki nongshnong shnong ba ki dei ban leit phah eksamin ïalade sha ki sub-centre ba hajan ne ki public health centres naba kan pynïoh jingmyntoi bun na ka bynta ka jingkoit jingkhiah jong ki.Ha katei ka camp, la don bynta ruh da ki doktor na Nongstoin Civil Hospital bad Mairang Civil Hospital.
title: Kyrpad ka Ampareen ïa ki paidbah ban leit phah eksamin ïalade

content: Ka sorkar jylla mynta sa shisien pat, ka la pynkynriah ïa ka jingtyrwa jong ka jingïalang bad ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC) na ka bynta ban ïakren halor ka jingleit shong ki nongshong shnong jong ka Harijan Colony na Them Iew Mawlong haduh la shem taïew.Ka sorkar dang shen, ka la pyntip ïa ka Meghalaya High Court shaphang jong ka jingrai ban khot ïa ka HPC na ka bynta ban ïakren halor katei ka mat lehse ha ka 15 tarik, Naiwieng ne 16 tarik, Naiwieng.“Ngi la thmu (ban khot sngewbha ïa ki) mynta ka taïew, hynrei la i kumba don na ki dkhot jong ka HPC kim lait por. Te kumta, ngi la rai ban khot ïa ki la shem taïew,” ong u Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka Urban Affairs, u Sniawbhalang Dhar.U Dhar ruh kumjuh u la pynpaw ka jingshaniah ba ka jingïalang ban wan kan sa long kaba seisoh. “Ngi la khmih lynti ba kan sa seisoh ka jingïakren jong ngi. Te ngi kyrmen ba ha ka jingïalang ban wan, kan sa long kaba seisoh,” la ong u Dhar.Katba ïa ka jingkylli, u Symbud Myntri u la ong ba ka HPC ka la pynpaw ba jingheh jong ki kamra ba la tyrwa da ka sorkar. “Te kumta, ngin sa sngap ïa ka jingkyrpad jong ki bad ka jingai jingmut jong ki ha ka jingïalang ban wan bad ngin sa rai katkum ka jingmih na ka jingïalang,” bynrap u Dhar.Katkum ka jingïathuh jong u, baroh yn sa pynshai mar syn pynlong ïa ka jingïalang.Ha ka 29 tarik, Nailur, ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la dep pyntip sha ka high court ba ka la mynjur ban pynheh ïa ka jaka kumba la kyrpad da kitei ki nongshong shnong.Hangne lah ban ong ba ka sorkar ha ka jingshon shap ka la tyrwa ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing ba kin kynriah sha ka jaka ba la don lypa jong ka Shillong Municipal Board.Ha ka 8 tarik, Naiwieng, ka high court ka la rai ban ai jingbit ïa ki party ban ïakynduh kumba la tyrwa da ka sorkar jylla lem bad jingkdew ba ïa ka kaiphod jong ka jingïalang, dei ban phah sha ka ïing kashari ha ka sngi ban pynsngew ka ban sa long ha ka sdang taïew jong u bnai ban wan.Ka sorkar ka la wanrah lang da ka shon shap(blueprint), hadien ba ka la kyntait ïa ka jingtyrwa jong ka 25 tarik, Ïaïong 2022 jong ka HPC ba ïa ka 200 square meter jong ka jaka, dei ban ai sha man ki 342 tylli ki longïing hapoh ka European ward nalor ka jinglut jingsep jong ka jingshna ïing jong ki.Ha ka 31 tarik, Nailar, ka sorkar jylla ka la dep pynbna shaphang ka jingrai ban shna ïa ki ïing ha ka 2.5 acre jong ka jaka ba dei jong ka SMB na ka bynta ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing.“Mynta ngi la dep pynpra ïa ki ïing barim bad ngi la tei da ki ïing ba thymmai ba don naduh 5 ne 7 mala katkum ka kyndon jong ka Meghalaya Development Urban Authority (MUDA),” ong u Symbud Myntri, u Prestone Tynsong.
title: Pynkynriah ka sorkar jylla ïa ka jingïalang hapdeng jong ka bad ka HPC

content: Ka kampeiñ ba dang ïaid, ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yarta (VBSY) na ka bynta jong ki riew lum ka jylla Meghalaya ka la rung ha ka sngi ba hynñiew jong ka ha ka sngi balang bad tad haduh mynta, ka la dep pynlong ïa ka kampeiñ ha ki shnong bapher bapher ha West Jaintia Hills, East Garo Hills, North Garo Hills bad East Khasi Hills.Ha East Garo Hills district, u Director Ministry jong ka MSME bad u District Prabhari Officer na ka bynta ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra, u Vinamra Mishra ki la don bynta ha katei ka prokram ha Dambo Bima hapoh ka Dambo Rongjeng Block ha East Garo Hills.Ka District Administration, ha ka jingïatreilang bad ka tnad liañ bad ka Gram Panchayat, ka la pynlong da ka prokram pynhusiar halor ki katto katne ki scheme sorkar pdeng kiba la sdang pyntreikam hapoh ka ri. Ki Health camp, ka jingpyntip shaphang u Aadhar, Ujjwala bad ka rukom treikam ka jingregistar ha ki bank, ka jingbatai ïa ki khana jong ka jingjop da ki nongïoh jingmyntoi jong ka welfare scheme sorkar bad ka jingpyni da ki drone, kiba la pyni ha katei ka kampeiñ.Ka Moodop bad ka Kpermynsnieh hapoh ka Thadlaskein Block kaba don ha West Jaintia Hills, ki dei ki jaka ba la dep pynlong ïa ka kampeiñ ha ka sngi balang. Katei ka prokram ka la sdang da ka jingpynithuh ïa ka VBSY da ki heh ba dei peit ba la bud da ka jingpdiang sngewbha da ka Hamara Sankalp Visksit Bharat da ki heh jong ka district.La don ruh ka khana jong ka jingpyni lyngkot halor ka jingïada mariang kaba la ïashim bynta da ki nongshong shnong jong ka Kpermynsieh. Ki dkhot jong ka National Rural Livelihood Mission, kiba dei ki nongtrei mon sngewbha ki la rwai kawei ka jingrwai kyrpang bad ka jingshad ha ka por ba don katei ka prokram.Ki heh sorkar na central bad jylla bad ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Sankalp Yatra ki la pynshlur ïa ki nongshong shnong ba kin shim kabu ïa kitei ki welfare scheme bapher bapher.Ki heh jong ka Brahmaputra Valley Fertilizer Corporation Limited (ba la peit da ka sorkar pdeng) bad ki nongtrei ki la pynlong da ka jingbatai ban pyndonkam da ka drone, kaba lah ban kynshait dawai ïa ki jhur ki jhep, ki symbai ban pyndonkam ha ka ban rep ban riang.Ïa ka jingbatai ban pyndonkam da ka drone, la pynlong ha Mawngap Mawkharshiing, Mawphlang C&RD Block ha kaba ki paidbah ba bun ki la ïalum lang ban sakhi ïa katei ka kampeiñ. Ki nongshong shnong ki la ïaroh ïa ka jingpyrshang ban pyndonkam da ka drone na ka bynta ki jaka rep riang. Katei ka prokram ka la kut da ka jingpynkup burom ïa ki nongïoh jingmyntoi ïa ka kam ba ki seng.Katba ïa ki kalendar jong u snem 2024, ki kot khyrdop, ki kot lynkhot lyngkhai halor ki scheme bapher bapher jong ka development bad welfare na ka bynta ki paidbah ruh, la dep sam hangto hangto. Ïa ki katto katne ki prokram pynhusiar, la dep pynlong ha ki tamasa ba la pynlong ha East Khasi Hills.
title: Wanrah ka Viksit Bharat Sankalp Yatra ïa ka scheme sorkar na ka bynta ki nongïoh jingmyntoi

content: Ha ka jingtrei shitom ban pynhusiar paidbah bad ka jingpynlah ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka kolshor, ki jingtei bad ki ïing ki sem bakhraw hapoh ka jylla, ha kaba ka tnad Tourism and Travel Management jong ka Martin Luther Christian University kaba la pynlong da ka World Heritage Week da kaba pynïaid ïa ka Heritage Walk ha Jowai ha ka sngi balang.Kaba la lam khmat da u Head of the Department, u Dr Iadonlang Tynsong bad la synran da ki katto katne ngut ki dkhot, katei ka jingïaid kjat ka la long da ka jingleit sha Jowai Presbyterian Church, ba la dep tei naduh 150 snem mynshuwa da ka Welsh Presbyterian Mission.Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingleit, u Rev E Nongpluh, uba dei u pastor ba dei peit bad u rangbah, u M C Rymbui, u secretary katei ka ïingmane, ki la ong ba ka dei ka ïingmane ba la rim bha hapoh katei ka jaka bad kaba la pynwandur da ki nong British, ha kaba katei ka ïingmane ka la long kawei na ki ïingmane ba itynnad naduh mynshuwa. Shuh shuh, ki samla ki la leit ïaid kjat shaduh sha ka Thaiwan Jaintia Traditional Museum ha Chutwakhu, kaba la lam khmat da u Bah Waheh Kamai War. Kine ki ïing kiba don haduh 300 tylli ki tiar ki tar, kynthup haduh 13 tylli ki jingtem jingput jong ka Jaintia, ki riam tynrai, ki tair hyndai hynthai bad ki jaiñ ba thaiñ hi. U Bah Waheh Kamai War, ha ka jingkut jingmut jong u na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ki, u la shem ïa ka Thaiwan Arts and Cultural Organization hau 2010.Ki samla pule ki la poi shaduh sha Wah-Ait-Nar ha Iongpiah, kaba dei ka pung bakhuid jong ka Niam-Tre ha kaba ïa ka tamasa Behdienkhlam, la rakhe man la u snem. La pynlong da ka kynhun Seinraij Niamtre, ha katei ka jingleit jong u sha kane ka jaka, ka la pyni ïa ka jingriewspah jong ka kolshor jong ka Ri Lum Khasi bad Ri Lum Jaintia. U Bah Arwatki Sumer, u general secretary ka sein raij, Jowai; ki dkhot jong ka sein raij Jowai, U CA, u Bah Ram Kyndiah, Raymond Nartiang, Pator Jowai bad ka Deibha Rymbai, ki la lam lynti ban pyni ïa ka Aitnar Kongka siangbood, u nongpeit jong ka Iing Blai (ka ïing u Blei) ki la ai jingbit ban rung kine ki samla pule sha katei ka ïing bakhuid.Ha ka jingbteng jong ka jingleit jong ki hadien ka Wah Eit Nar, kitei ki samla pule ki la leit ruh sha Syntu Ksiar, kaba la tip kum ka jaka hyndai bad la ai kyrteng hadien jong ka Syntu u jong ka kpoh jong u Iawchibidi. Hapoh ka Syntu Ksiar, la don ka jingtei jong u Kiang Nangbah, kaba la ai burom na ka bynta ka jingtrei shitom jong u khlur ka ri ban ïoh pynlait luid, u Kiang Nangbah pyrshah ïa ki shipai British ha ka 30 tarik, Nohprah 1862. Katei ka jingtei ka long ka jingkynmaw burom na ka bynta jong u Kiang Nangbah tad haduh mynta.
title: Pynlong prokram ka MLCU jong ka Jowai ïa ka World Heritage Week 2023

content: Ki khun u Hynniewtrep mynta ka sngi ka 23 tarik u Naiwieng, 2023 ki la rakhe ia ka jingdap 124 snem jong Seng Khasi. Ia kane ka sngi la tip kum Seng Kut Snem. Baroh ki para kur para kha kiba dang ia bat la ka tynrai ha ka jingngieit, ka dustur bad riti kum ki Khasi ki la ioh ban ia sngap ia ki ‘tien sneng  ki ‘tien kraw na ki nongialam ka Seng ha ka jingiakynduh lang ha Lympung Weiking harud ka Wah Umkhrah.Ki nongseng ia ka Seng Khasi, ki long da shisha kiba stad, ba tip bad ki la long ki nongsain ia ka mynsiem ieit ri ban iada ia la ka jong ka jaitbynriew Hynniewtrep. Ki la lah ban buh ia ki mawdong nongrim ba kynsai ia ka tynrai Khasi ha ka jingpyntiei kam ia ka Seng Khasi, kata ha ka niam, ka jingngeit bad ia ka jingiakhein kur khein kha.Ka jingrakhe ia ka Seng Kut Snem ka la sdang da ka jingiaid paid ban Madan Iewrynghep shaduh Lympung Wei ha ka ryngkat ia ka jingpyni ia ka rong ka taw kiba ia dei bad ka jingngeit bad ka larity jong ki Khun u Hynniewtrep kiba dang bat ia ka niam tynrai. Ynda la poi ha Lympung Weiking la pyllong ia ka duwai ka phirat bad pynbuh sa ki jingkren na ki nongialam jong ka Seng Khasi.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u President jong ka Seng Khasi Lawbah, u Bah Kerilan Wahlang u la ong ba ka nongtymmeng kaba khrawduh ba ka jaitbynriew Hynnietrep ka la ioh na ki longshu manshuwa ka dei ka “niam ka rukom bad ka larity.Une u Rangbah u la ong ba ki tymmeng ki ju sneng ju kraw ba ym ju dei ban dieduh ia ka nongtymmen ba ioh long ksew. Une u rangbah u la ong ha jingsngewthuh jong u, ka nongtymmen jong kane ka jaitbynriew die ka niam bad ka larity.Une u rangbah u la pynsngew ruh ia ki jingma kiba ai ia kane ka jaitbynriew ha kine ki sngi, ka dei ka bym burom shuh jong u khunbynriew ia ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ia ki khlaw ki btap, kiba long ki jaka shong jaka sah jong u Ryngkew u Basa.U Bah Kerilan Wahlang u la kren ruh shaphang ia ka jingkamai ia ka hok vad ka jingbat ia la kular bad ka juban lak. U la kren ruh shaphang ka jingdonkam ban lehbha ia kiwei.
title: Rakhe ki khun u Hyññiewtrep ïa ka Seng Kut Snem, 2023
