content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma u la ong ba watla ka Sorkar India kam pat pynbna paidbah hi ba kan iarap pisa na ka bynta ka jingpyntreikam ia ka NEP, hynrei ka kyrshan ia ki jylla ha baroh ki lynti ban kham pynbha ia ki jaka pule ha kiba bun ki bynta.Ia kane u la ong haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor ha ka 12 tarik Nailur da kaba ong, “Nga sngewnguh ia ka Sorkar India khamtam eh ia u myntri ka tnad pule puthi jong ngi uba la kyrshan bha ia ka Meghalaya.Kumta ngam kwah ban ong ba kim bei pisa, hynrei ka jingai pisa na ka bynta ka NEP, ka bym pat don haduh mynta ka long ka jinglut kaba khraw bad ngi hap ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti halor kane”.U la kam ruh ba kane ka policy ka long kaba suk ban sngewthuh bad ka jingiatreilang bad ki katto katne ki college bad ki skulbah kan don ka jingktah. U la kam ruh ba ka NEP kam buh jingma, bad u ngeit ba kin don ki kyndon kiba dei ban bud ha ka por ba ki khynnah kin pynthymmai ia ka jingpynrung kyrteng jong ki ha ki por ban wan.
title: Kyrshan ka sorkar Meghalaya ïa ka  jingpyntreikam NEP

content: Ki bor pyniaid district ka Ri Bhoi ha ka 12 tarik Nailur, lyngba u Executive Magistrate, ki la khang ia ka khyrdop khrong khajna beain kiba la pynieng da ka Khasi Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha ka National Highway-6 hapoh ka shnong Umdihar.La iathuh ba kine ki khyrdop ka KHADC ki la treikam beain bad ki la lum beain ruh ia ki khajna na kiba bun ki kali kiba kit ia ki mar ki mata, khamtam eh na kito kiba la niah da ki bar jylla.Ia kane ka khyrdop la khang hadien ka jingujor na kiba bun ki trai kali kiba la mad jingeh na kane ka jingshah pynthud ha kine ki khyrdop khrong khajna kiba don ha shilynter ka National Highway. Ban weng ia  kane ka jingeh halor ka jingbun ki khyrdop khrong khajna, ki la dep ruh ban ujor sha ki bor ba halor jong ka KHADC.Ki bor pyniaid district ka Ri Bhoi hapoh ka jingialam u Deputy Commissioner, ki la ai da  ka hukum ba dei ban khang ia kine ki khyrdop ha ka 12 tarik Nailur namar kine ki jingeh ba la mad da kiba bun ki trai kali. U Magistrate ryngkat bad ki pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki la leit ban khang noh ia kine ki khyrdop hapoh Umdihar.
title: Khang ki bor pyniaid district ka Ri Bhoi ia ki khyrdop ka KHADC

content: Ka ophis jong ka District Mission Co-ordinator, SSA, South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka la rakhe ïa ka World Literacy Day 2023 kaba ha phang pdeng, “Promoting Literacy for a World in transition Building the for sustainable and peaceful societies”,Ha kaba ha kane ka rally kila don haduh 22 tylli skul kila wan ia shim bynta shitrhem ha ryngkat ki nonghikai, ki nongtrei hapoh ka ophis jong ka District Mission Co-ordinator, SSA, South West Khasi Hills District.Ïa  ka jing ia iaid paitbah ha ryngkat ki placard la sdang na Lad Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat bad pynkut ha Maharam Government Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat bad ia ka rally la plie da u bah S. Kharbteng, Sub Inspector of Schools bad uba la pynbud ruh ïa ki kyntien lamphrang halor ka   jingrakhe ïa kane ka sngi ba kyrpang bala tip kum ka World Literacy Day.
title: Rakhe ka Mawkyrwat ïa ka World Literacy Day 2023

content: SHILLONGU khot ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain Lok Sabha, u Bah Vincent Pala jong ka seng sain hima sima Congress, ula ong ba kata ka jingpyrta shla jong ka jingpynlong ia ka jingjied ia ki nongmih khmat sha ki iing dorbar bapher bapher jong ka ri, kam long kaei kaei kaba thymmai. U Bah Vincent Pala ula ong haba peit ia ka jinglong jingman jong ka ri hi baroh kawei, kane ka jingthmu kam iahap satia wat tang khyndiat ruh.U Ban Pala u la ong ba lada pynlong ia kaba kum kane ka elekshon, kan kylla long pynban ia ka jingpynkhein ia ka hok jong ki jylla jong ka ri India. U Bah Vincent Pala u dkhot jong ka Congress u la ong ba ka jingpynlong ia ki elekshon ha India, ki long kiba iaid beit iaid ryntih bad kiba lait noh ki jingbam sap bad ba ka jingleh jong ka BJP ban pynlong ia ka elekshon ha ka juk ka por ka long ban pynduh jait ia ki seng sain hima kiba bit. U Bah Pala u la ong ba ka Congress kam ngeit ia ka jingai jingmut jong ka Sorkar ban pynlong ia ka elekshon ha ka juh ka por ban pynduna ia ka jnglut jingsep jong ka ri.U Bah Pala uba long u dkhot jong ka Iing Dorbar Lok Sabha na Shillong Parliamentary Constituency, ula ong ba ka jingthmu jong ka Sorkar Pdeng ban pynkylla noh ia ka kyrteng India ha ka Bharat ka dei ka dan ka shin jing ka jingduh jingkyrmen jong ka BJP. Une u nongmihkhmat u la ong ba ka Sorkar BJP ka trei tang na ka bynta jong ki katto katne ki jaitbynriew bad ki nongkhaiing pateng. Une u rangbah u la ong ruh ba kane ka jingpyrshang ban kylla kyrteng ia ka India sha ka Bharat ka long kaba ym don jingmut nambarba ba ia kane ka kyntien la tip tang ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka ri India.“Ki nongshong jong ka Dong Shatei Lam Mihngi bad kum juh ruh ki jylla Bashathei jong ka ri India ki long ki bym nang ia ka ktien Hindi bad ka BJP ka pynbor ba baroh ki nongshong shnong jong ka ri India ki dei ban nang ia ka ktien Hindi. Ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpyntrei kam ia ka Uniform Civil Code, u Bah Pala ula ong ba kane ka dei ka mat ialap elekshon jong ka BJP. U la ong ruh ban ka Sorkar Pdeng kan pyntrei kam kynsan kynsan ia ka Uniform Civid Code kumba ka la weng noh ia ka Article 370 kaba ia dei bad Jammu bad Kashmir.
title: Ym ïahap jingmut ka Congress ïa ka jingpynlong elkshon ha ka juk ka por

content: Ka ophis jong ka district mental health jong ka South West Garo Hills ka la rakhe ia ka World Suicide Prevention Day ha Multi Facility Centre ha Ampati. Ka South West Garo Hills district ha kine ki snem ba la dep ka la mad ia ka jingdkhat noh ia la ka jong ka jingim ha katei ka district.Ka phang pdeng jong kane ka jingrakhe ka long, “Ai jingkyrmen da ki kam”. Kiba la ia shim bynta ha kane ka prokram ki long u Vikas Kumar-Superintendent of Police, South West Garo Hills, Denisha Momin-Medical Superintendent of South West Garo Hills; Torali Marak-Child Development Project Officer bad Matgrik K Sangma-district nodal officer, district mental health program, ki khynnah skul bad nonghikai.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Superintendent of Police, South West Garo Hills, u Vikas Kumar u la ong ba dei ban niewkor ia la ka jong ka jingim bad kito kiba iakynduh jingeh, ki dei ban iasyllok bad kiab ha iing hasem. U la pynpaw ia ka mynsiem jong ka jingsngewnguh ia ka District Mental Health Program kaba la pyllong ia kane ka program bad kyntu ia ki nongiashim bynta ba lada ki iakynduh jingeh, dei ban leit iakynduh ia ki doktor.U Matgrik K Sangma, district nodal officer of the District Mental Health Program, u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingkiew jong ka jingdkhat ia la ka jong ka jingim da ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka district. U la ong ka jingdkhat ia la ka jong ka jingim ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewshyrkhei bad kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba ki dei leit ia kynduh ia ki doktor bad kiwei ki nongai jingmut lada ki iakynduh jingeh ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingpang kiba ia dei bad ka jingmut jingpyrkhat.
title: Rakhe ïa ka World Suicide Day ha South West Garo Hills

content: Ka District Task Force halor ka Intensified Mission Indradanush kaba hap hapoh ka jingpyniaid jong u bah T. Lyngwa, IAS, Deputy Commissioner ka South West Khasi Hills District ka la pynlong ia ka jingiakynduh bad ki nongtrei jong ka koit ka khiah  bad kiwei kiwei ki shnat treikam sorkar ha Circuit House da ka jingthmu ban pynduna ia ka jingiap jong ki khyllung khynnah lyngba ka jingai tika ne injection ia ki khyllung kiba hapoh 0 haduh 5 snem bad ruh ia ki longkmie ba armet hapoh ka Intensified Mission Indradhanush 5.0 Round 2 ka ban sdang naduh ka  11 tarik haduh ka 15 tarik u ‘Nailur, 2023.Namarkata, u  Deputy Commissioner jong ka South West Khasi Hills District u la kyrpad  bad pynshlur ia ki kmie ki kpa bad ia kiba haiing hasem kiba don ki khyllung khynnah kiba hapoh ka 0 haduh 5 snem ban wan shakhmat  ban ai injek ia la ki jong ki khun kumjuh ia ki longkmier ba armet na ka bynta ban ioh ia ka met kaba shait ba khlain bad ban kiar na ka jingngeit biej ne ki khubor hamsaia kiba lah lah ban pynduh ia ki lad ki kabu kiba ka sorkar ka ai jingshakri lyngba ka tnat ka koit ka khiah khnang ba iwei i khyllung ruh in ym shah iehnoh khlem da ai injek.
title: La Pynlong ïa ka Intensified Mission Indradanush 5.0 Round 2  ha Mawkyrwat

content: U dkhot jong ka Congress Lok Sabha Member of Parliament (MP) na Shillong, u Vincent H. Pala u la ong ba ka jingtyrwa na ka bynta ka “One Nation, One Election” kam long shuh kaba thymmai bad ïa katei ka mat, la dep ïakren kham mynshuwa.“Hynrei haba peit ïa ka jinglong jingman ha kane ka ri, kam lah ban urlong kane. Hynrei nga sngew ba lada ka sorkar ka pyntreikam ïa kane, kan sa long kum ka jingthombor pyrshah ïa ka hok jong ki jylla ha kaba ki jingthep vote kin kut noh,” ong u Pala sha ki lad pathai khubor khyndiat halor katei ka prokram ha ka sngi ba ar. Utei u MP ka Congress u la ong ba ïa kaba mynta, ki ilekshon ha ki katto katne ki jylla ki long kiba khuid bad ka jingkwah jong ka seng Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ka long ban pyntreikam bad ki party ba rit ba ria.U la ong ba lada ka “One Nation, One Election” kan treikam, ki party ki lah ban duh noh ïa ka lad ban jop bad katei ka jingtyrwa kan sa pynduh lad ïa ki party barit baria.
title: Kren u Vincent halor ka “One Nation, One Election”

content: :U Chief Executive Member (CEM) jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), u Pynïaid Sing Syiem, u la wanrah da ka Garbage Disposal Truck ha ka sngi Balang na ka bynta ban lum ban lang ïa ki ñiut na Ïewduh.Nalor jong u CEM, ïa katei ka prokram ba wanrah ïa ka trok kit ñiut, la don bynta lang da u Executive Member (EM) uba dei peit ïa ka Health and Sanitation, u Victor Ranee, u Syiem jong ka Hima Mylliem, u Paiem Ainam Manik Syiem, ki heh jong ka District Council bad ki nongdie dukan hapoh Ïewduh.Ka jingthmu jong ka jingwanrah ïa ka trok kit ñiut Garbage Disposal bad ban aiti noh sha ka Hima Mylliem, ka long ba ka KHADC ka la shimkhia ïa ka jingkhuid jingsuba ha Ïewduh, ong u CEM, u Pynïaid Sing Syiem.La lah ban ong ba ka KHADC, ha ka jingwanrah ïa katei ka trok da u CEM, ka la don bynta lang ban peit bniah halor ka jingkhuid jingsuba jong ka Ïewduh bad ki hynriew tylli ki kyntoit ba markhap jong ki shnong. Ka committee kan sa khmih bniah halor ki mat ban pynthikna ba dei ban don ka jingkhuid jingsuba hapoh ka Ïewduh. Ïa ka Garbage Disposal Truck, la noh synniang lyngba ka Chief Minister Special Development Fund (CMSDF), kumba la pynbna da u CEM.Ïa katei ka committee, la ïalam da u CEM ka KHADC CEM, u Pynïaid Sing Syiem, lem bad ka Executive Member kaba dei peit ïa ka Market, ka Grace Mary Kharpuri bad u Executive Member uba dei peit ïa ka Solid Waste Management, u Victor Ranee, kum ki dkhot.
title: Wanrah u CEM ka KHADC da ka Garbage Disposal Truck ban lum ïa ki ñiut na Ïewduh

content: Ki shipai iada khappud ka BSF kiba don hapoh ka jylla Meghalaya, ha ka jingiatreilang bad bad ki pulit ka Meghalaya ki la ioh ban kurup ia ka jingthmu shalan ki nongkhaii tuh ia 67 tylli ki masi sha Bangladesh. Ia kine ki masi ki shipai BSF ryngkat ki pulit ki la ioh ban kurup noh na khappud ba don  hapoh East Khasi Hills bad West Jaintia Hills.Ia kane ki shipai ki la lah ban pynpulom ia ka jingthmu ki nongkhaii tuh dei hadien ba ki la ioh ia ka jingtip kaba thikna bad ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ki pulit ka jylla ki la ioh shwa ban kem ia 37 tylli ki masi kiba la buhrieh ha kawei ka khlaw ha ka shnong Kamarphil hapoh East Khasi Hills ia kiba la thmu ban pynhiar sha Bangladesh.Ia kine ki masi, na ka liang ki shipai ki la aiti noh sha ki pulit ka Dangar ban leh ia kaba donkam.Ha kawei pat ka jingiohkurup, ki shipai BSF ki la ioh ban kurup 30 tylli ki masi na kawei ka khappud katba dang pynhiar tuh sha Bangladesh.
title: Ïoh kurup ka BSF 67 tylli ki masi na khappud Meghalaya bad Bangladesh

content: :Kawei ka jingkieng dieng kaba don ha ka shnong Tiehsaw kala kdiah na ki bynta ba hapdeng hadien ba kawei ka trok dumper kaba la kit palat pud kala ïaid lyngba katei ka jingkieng kat haduh ba ka jingkieng kam lah kyrshan shuh ïa ka jingkhia.Katei ka jingjia kala jia hynne ka step ha kapor kumba 11 baje eiei tangba ym shym don kano kano ka jingmynsaw briew ba katei ka jingjia hynrei kala wanrah pat ïa ka jingdheng kali bad ktah ïa ka leit ka wan ki paidbah ba ïaid lyngba katei ka jingkieng. Katei ka trok dumper kadei jong ka kompani kaba dang pyntrei ïa ka surok Nongstoiñ-Rambrai bad kala kit ïa ka khyndew da ka jingthmu ban leit theh ha kawei ka jaka trei jingkieng jong katei ka kompani.Na ka liang jong katei ka kompani ka dang pyrshang ban tan noh ïa katei ka trok kaba la sahkut bad ban maramot pat ïa ka jingkieng kaba la kdiah bad kat haduh ban da dep maramot ki kali ki hap ban pyndonkam na kawei pat ka surok ban ïaid lyngba.
title: Ba kit palat pud ka trok dumper, kdiah ka jingkieng dieng ha Tiehsaw

content: Ka Meghalaya Carrom Association (MCA) shen kan sa ïoh ban pynlong ïa ka lympung corrom board ia kaba la tip da ka 21st Meghalaya Open Garrom championship.Na ka bynta ka State Ranking Tournament 2023 kaba la pynkhreh ban pynlong hapoh Dorball hall, kaba ha Jaiaw Laitdom bad yn sdang naduh ka 27 tarik haduh ka 30 tarik Nailur,2023.Ha kane ka Tournament la ïoh ban bynta haduh lai ki kyrdan lane Event ryngkat bad ka bairung: kaba long na ka bynta ka Team events kan long T. 500/-, Men’s single T. 100, Women’s single T. 100,Veteran’s single T. 100,  Junior’s na ka bynta ki kynthei bad shynrang (Free) yn ym donkam bai rung bad na ka bynta ka Mens Doubles kan long T. 200 tyngka.Ka bai pynrung kyrteng kan long 20 tyngka marwei katba 100 tyngka na ka bynta ki kynhun (kawei ka kynhun). Ki la don ar tylli ki kynhun kiba na shabar kiba la pynthikna ban ïashimbynta ha kane ka lympung.Na ka liang jong ka MCA ka khot sngewbha ïa ki khynnah pule kiba napoh ka jylla ba kin ïashimbynta ha kane ka jingiakob, kiba dang hapoh 18 snem. La dep ban buh ruh ïa ka por ban pynlong ïa ki jinglehkai, kata ha ka por ba lawai ki skul, 4 baje nohphaisngi.Na ka bynta kino kino ki jingtip ba kham bniah, kiba thmu ban iashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalehkai ki lah ban phun ha kine ki nombar, 9402190429, 8414093939, 8119864986.
title: Yn pynlong Meghalaya Open Garrom championship ka MCA

content: Ka ophis jong ka District Mission Co-ordinator, Sakmagra Shiksha Abhiyaan (SSA), South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat mynta ka sngi ka 12 tarik u ‘Nailur, 2023 ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïaid paidbah ne rally da kaba sdang na khmat ka Civil Hospital, Mawkyrwat bad ïaid sha ophis ka Community & Rural Development, Mawkyrwat Block, da kaba ïaid pat sha ïew Mawkyrwat bad pynkut ha Maharam Government Higher Secondary School, Mawkyrwat ban pynlong ïa ka jingrakhe ïa ka World Literacy Day 2023 bad pynsngewthuh halor ka jingpep skul shiteng por. U Bah Staising Kharbteng, Sub Inspector of Schools, Mawkyrwat u la ka weh ïa ka lama kum ka dak ban plie ïa kane ka jingïaid rally kaba la ïashim bynta shitrhem da ki spah ngut ki khynnah skul ha ryngkat ki nonghikai.Ha shwa ban kaweh ia ka lama kum ka dak ban plie ia kane ka jingiaid rally na ka liang u bah Staising Kharbteng u la ong ba ka imlang sahlang bad khamtam ki khynnah pule ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka kyntien Literacy ka kdew ia ka jinglah ban pule bad thoh ha kaba iwei pa iwei na ki nongshong shnong ki don ka hok ban ioh ka lad ban leit sha ki jaka pule. U pynkynmaw ruh ba ka jingnang jingtip ban pule ka dei ban sdang na ki rympei iïng ban long ka nuksa ia ki khun ban sngewtynnad bad bang ban pule. U la ong ruh ba ki long u mawjingkieng ka jingkyrmen hapdeng ki jingeh kiba bun bad kan wanrah ki jingkylla kiba bun ha ka jingim jong ki khynnah pule ha ki sngi bad por ban wan ïa kaba ngin ym lah ban ïohi lypa.Shuh shuh u ong ba ka jingnang jingstad kan ïarap ïa ngi baroh ba ngin don ïa ka bor pyrkhat ne Reasoning Power kaba khlaiñ ban shim ïa kano kano ka rai ha ka jingim jong ngi khlem da shah ïalam bakla ha kiwei. U la kyntu ruh ïa ki khynnah skul ba ki dei ban nang kumno ban pyndonkam ïa ki rynsan social media kiba pher bapher ki ban kyntiew ïa ka jingnang jingtip khnang ba ka lawei jong ki kan long kaba phyrnai da kaba kyntu ba kim dei ban shu ngeit kulmar lut ïa kiei kiei baroh kiba ki ïohi bad lap ha social media namar ka don ka por ba ki don ki jingshim kabu da ki riew thok riew shukor ïa kiba lui lui. U la pynshai ruh ruh ba ka long kaba donkam ba ki khynnah kiba la ïehnoh shiteng por ïa ki jingpule jong ki ban leit phai biang sha ki jaka pule na bynta ka jingmyntoi jong ki.
title: Shim bynta shitrhem ki 22 tylli ki skul ha ka World Literacy Day 2023 ha Mawkyrwat

content: SHILLONG:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka 12 tarik Nailur u la ong ba ka kyrteng Bharat ka la ju don ha ka riti synshar, bad ka jingpyndonkam ia ka ka shong ha ka ktien kaba ngi kren.U Conrad u la kren ia kane hadien ki khubor kiba pynmih ba lah ban pynkylla kyrteng ia ka India sha ka Bharat, ha kaba u la ong ba ia ka resolution ym pat pass, bad ki paidbah pat ki la ia khie khohreh ia kane ka mat bad iakren ha ki lynti syngkien.“Haba nga kren Hindi, ngan pyndonkam da ka Bharat, bad haba nga kren English, ngan  pyndonkam da ka ktien India. Ka India bad ka Bharat ki dei kiba iajan ha ka jingiadei ha ka riti synshar, kumta kamdon kano kano ka jingeh, bad ngi thaw jingeh haba ymdon eiei ruh”, la ong u Conrad haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor.Haba kren halor ka riti synshar, u Conrad u la iathuh ba ha kiba bun ki khep hi haba u kren da ka Hindi, u ju pyndonkam da ka kyntien Bharat.“Kane ka shong beit ha ka jingpyndonkam ia ka ktien, bad ngam tharai ba kandon kano kano ka jingbakla ha kaba pyndonkam ia ka ktien India lane Bharat. Baroh ka shong ha ka rukom ba phi pyndonkam. Ka riti synshar ka ailad ia ngi ban pyndonkam ia kawei napdeng kine”, la ban shuh shuh u Conrad.
title: Ka riti synshar ka shah ban pyndonkam da ka Bharat lane India: Conrad

content: SHILLONGKa Meghalaya Body Builders Association ryngkat bad ka Meghalava Yoga Association ki laïasnohktilang ban pynlong ïa ka 47″ State Body Building Championships bad ïa ka state Yogasana Championships kaba 42 ia kaba la pynbeit ban long ha ka 30 tarik mynta u Nailur, 2023 ha Aurobindo Institute of Indian Culture, Shillong.Nalor ka jingïakop pyni dohksah jong ki shynrang (Men’s Body Building, Men’s Best Physique) kan don ruh ïa ka jingïakop na ka bynta ki kynthei kiba biang ka met ka phad (Women’s Best Physique). Ha kane ka sngi kan don ruh ïa ka jingjied na ka bynta ka Zonal, National Body Building bad ruh ka Yoga.Ka jingthew kilo na ka bynta kiba nongïashimbynta kan long ha ka 28 tarik, Nailur, 2023 naduh ka por 4 baje janmiet hapoh He-Man Physical Institute, Jail Road, Shillong.Na ka bynta ki nongjop ha ki thup bapher bapher yn ai da ki song pisa kum ka khisnam. Ha katei ka sngi yn ban ban don ryngkat ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh, myntri jong ka Health & Family Welfare, jong ka sorkar jylla kum ka Kongsan, bad u Bah Fantin Joseph Lakadong, MDC kum u Symbud Kongsan.
title: Yn pynlong Body Building Championships bad State Yoga ban kyntiew ïa ki samla ha ka kam ïalehkai

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma u la leit ban pynhap pyrda ïa ka sngi pynkut ka jingrakhe ïa ka Contennial Jubili kaba shisnem kynthih jong ka Laban Bengali Higher Secondary School, ha ka jingdon lang u Rakkam Sangma uba dei u Myntri ka tnad pule puthi ha ka Sngi Balang.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi u Myntri Rangbah u la ïaroh ïa ka skul halor ka jingkynjoh sha u mawmer uba la 100 snem bad ba ka dei ka jingïohi jngai jong ki nongseng bad ka jingaiti lut jong ki nonghikai bad ki dkhot ka Managing Committee kiba mynshuwa bad kiba mynta ban pynïoh nam pynïoh burom ia ka skul.U Myntri Rangbah u la kdew ruh ba ha ki 50 snem ba la leit noh, ka rukom pule puthi ka la sakma na ki nongrim kaba dei ka bit ka biang bad ka lawei ki khynnah pule bad ban jur ïa baroh ki rai ba dei ban long kiba hakhmat eh na ka bynta ki khynnah pule. Haba kren shaphang ka pule puthi ha Meghalaya, u la ïathuh ba ka jylla ka don kumba 55,000  ngut ki nonghikai bad kumba 15,000 tylli ki skul bad ki jaka pule.“Ka jingeh ban pynïaid ïa ki skul ka shong katkum ka jingdon ki khynnah pule bad ki noghikai, ki katto katne ki don khyndiat ki khynnah pule katba ki don bun ki nonghikai, ki don katto katne kiba don da ki spah ngut ki khynnah pule bad duna ki nonghikai, kiba buh jingeh ïa ka pule puthi ha kine ki por mynta”, u la ong bad ïathuh ba ka sorkar ka hap ban shim ïa ka rai ban pynïasoh lane hap ban khang noh ïa ki jaka pule ki bym treikam.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka sorkar ka sngewkhia ïa ki skul kiba duna ki khynnah pule bad bym don ki khynnah ki ban pas ïa ka eksamin matrik wat hadien bun snem.U la iathuh shuh shuh ba ïa ka pisa ba la lum na ka bynta ka pule puthi ym shym la pyndonkam haduh u snem 2019 bad ka sorkar kaba mynta ka la pyntyllun ïa ki tyllong ba la lum ha ka dur ka khajna na ka bynta ban maramot bad shna ïa ki jingdonkam ha ki jaka pule jong ki skul sorkar ha kylleng ka jylla.Haba kren shaphang ka National Education Policy (NEP) 2020 u la ïathuh bniah ba ka don jingeh ban pynïar ïa ki jingpule bad ïa ka jingdonkam pisa kaba haduh T.400-500 klur. U la shim ïa ka kabu ban pynbna ïa kiba bun ki projek, kynthup ïa ka Secretariat kaba thymmai, jaka pynieng kali bad kiwei. U la kdew ruh ba ka sorkar ka pynthikna ban ai jingkyrshan ïa ki bynta bapher bapher ha ka imlang sahlang, kynthup ïa ki nongrep, seng kynthei bad ki nongseng kam.Kham hashuwa ïa kane, u Myntri Rangbah u la pynkup burom ïa kiba wan hakhmat na skul ha ka eksamin MBOSE bad pyllait ïa ka Souvenir jong ka jubili bad ïa ka kot ba la pynbit pynbiang da u President ka Managing Committee jong ka skul.Kumta, KA JYWO, ka ai ïa ka khubor kaba shai kdar sha ka sorkar jylla ba ïa mynta hi, da leilei ruh em kan ym lah ban pdiang ïa ka lynti rel ha ka District. Hynrei, ha ka ka jaka jong kane, ka seng ka ai jingmut sha ka sorkar jylla ba kan pynleit jingmut pynban ha ka ban wanrah ïa kiwei pat kiba bun byllien bah ki kam pynroi kiba donkam kyrkieh eh ha ka District, kum kaba pynbha ïa ki jaka ai jingsumar ïa ka koit ka khiah, kaba pynshna ïa ki surok ban pyniasnoh ïa ki thaiñ nongkyndong, kaba wanrah ïa ka Government Secondary, Higher Secondary School bad ka Government College, kaba wanrah ïa ka District Auditorium cum Library, kaba maramot wut wut ia NH-6 ba la isangsot mynta bad ban wanrah da u surok bah sawlaiñ (Fourlane) naduh Damsite, Ri Bhoi District haduh Malidor East Jaintia Hills District bad kiwei kiwei de ki kam pynroi pynpar ba donkam kyrkieh.
title: Pynhap Pyrda u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka Contennial Jubilee ka Laban Bengali HSS

content: Ka All Jaiñtia Youth Welfare Organisation (AJYWO) Central Body ha ryngkat bad ka AJYWO – East Jaiñtia Zone, ki la phah ïa ka dorkhas lyngba ka ophis u Deputy Commissioner sha u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad Sangma ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah halor ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka lynti rel ha East Jaintia Hills District. Ïa kane ka dorkhas la ai ruh sha baroh arngut ki nongmihkhmat ka district, kata u Bah Myrmen Shylla bad ka Kong Santa Mary Shylla.Katkum ka kyrwoh ba la pyllait da u Bah Heatermoon Ryngkhlem, President ka All Jaiñtia Youth Welfare Organisation, East Jaiñtia Zone la ïathuh ba ka seng ka pyrshah jur ïa ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban wanrah ïa ka lynti rel ha ka district kat bym pat pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP).“Kumba long kiwei kiwei ki sengbhalang bad u paidbah jong ka East Jaintia Hills bad u paid ka Bri u Hynniewtrep, ka AJYWO ruh, da kawei ka sur ka pyrshah jur ïa ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar jylla ban wanrah lynti rel ha ka District, halor ka nongrim jong ka jingbym pat pyntreikam ïa ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) tad haduh mynta ruh ha ka jylla, kumba la leh lang ha kiwei pat ki jylla jong ka thaiñ shatei lam-mihngi ka ri India, ia kaba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim ïa rai ha Dorbar Thawaiñ naduh u snem 2019, ban pyntreikam ïa ka na ka bynta ban ïada ïa ki trai ri trai muluk rit paid jong ka jylla, hynrei kaba la shu leh lyndet mynta da ka sorkar jylla bad sorkar pdeng,” ong U Heatermoon Ryngkhlem, President ka AJYWO-East Jaiñtia Zone.Shuh shuh u Bah Heatermoon u la ong, “Ka Jylla Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla kaba rit tam ha ka pyrthei Ri India, kaba dei ka ri ka muluk trai jong ki jaitbynriew riewlum barit paid tam bad kaba dang sahdien tam ha baroh ki liang, kaba don mynta hapdeng ka jingma kaba khraw na ka jingshah tyllep ha kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew heh paid na ri thor India, kiba la ïawan rung ïawan mih, ïawan shong ïawan sah, ïawan trei ïawan ktah, ïawan kamai ïawan kajih katba mon ha ka jylla khlem da don ka aiñ kaba pyrkhing bha ban tehlakam ïa kane, kaba la ktah bad buh shisha ha ka jingma kaba khraw ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew rit”, bynrap biang u Bah Ryngkhlem.U Bah Ryngkhlem u la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong, “Ym lah ban len, ba ka jaitbynriew jong ngi mynta ka don ha ka jingma kaba khraw bad ba kane ka pateng kaba mynta ka lah ban dei ka pateng kaba khatduh eh lehse ka ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban ïada ka jaitbynriew rit paid jong ngi, lym kumta yn nym don shuh lehse mano mano ruh ban leh ïa kata. Kumta lada ma ngi kiba mynta, ngim ïatrei mynta hi ban ïada ïa ka jaitbynriew lajong mano pat bad lano? Ka jingshongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ka jingim laitlud jong ka Jaitbynriew ha la ka jong ka ri wat la da duk da kyrduh ruh ka kham kor shi katdei eh ban ïa ka roi ka par ka ban tuh noh ïa kita baroh na ngi.”Shuh shuh u Bah Ryngkhlem u la ong, “Ka East Jaintia Hills, ka dei ka district kaba rit, kaba don tang 1,22,939 tam ngut ki trai shnong katkum ka khana samari jong u snem 2011. Tang lyngba jong ki surok ka la long lypa ka District kaba la shah jan shah tap tyllep ha ki briew kiba nabar ka jylla, kaba la ktah mynta haduh katta katta, ïa ka ïoh ka kot, ka khaïi ka pateng bad wat ïa ka jingbun paid bad ruh ïa ka jingshongshngaiñ jong ki trai shnong bad sa katno tam lada ka lynti rel kan wan?”Na ka liang jong u General Secretary ka AJWYO Sengkmie u Bah R. Siangshai, u la ong, “Lada katei ka lynti rel kan wan, kan plie lad shuh shuh ïa kiwei ki jaidbynriew heh paid, na ri thor Ri India ban wan rung wan mih, wan shong wan sah bad ruh wan kamai kajih bad wan trei wan ktah katba mon shapoh jong ka District ka ban sa ktah shuh shuh ïa ka ïoh kam ïoh jam jong ki trai trai shnong khamtam ïa kito kiba don truck bad ïa baroh kito kiba im jaka kpoh na ki trok. Wat ki mar rep trai ri trai muluk ruh kin sa shah ktah jur namar kiba kum kita kin sa wan rung suk lyngba katei ka lynti rel na kiwei pat ki jylla.
title: Pyrshah jur ka AJYWO ïa ka Lynti Rel ha EJHD

content: U Lat ka Meghalaya, u Phagu Chauhan u la leit ban shim bynta ha ka jingplie ïa ka Ayushman Bhav Campaign ha ka 13 tarik u Nailur.Ka thong jong kane ka Ayushman Bhav ka long ban pynïoh ïa ka koit ka khiah bad ban pynthikna ïa ka rukom ai jingsumar ïa baroh ba la pynlong ka State Convention Centre, Shillong.Ha kane ka sngi, ka Dr Ampareen Lyngdoh, Myntri ka koit ka khiah jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la leit ban shim bynta lang ryngkat bad ki heh ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.Ka Deputy Commissioner jong ka East Khasi Hills, Director ka Health Services, ki dkhot ka Village Health Council na kylleng ka jylla, ki Asha bad kiwei ki la don lang ha kane ka sngi.Ïa kane ka lympung la plie da ka President Droupadi Murmu da ka jingthmu ban pynïoh ïa ki jingshakri ha kaba ïadei bad ka koit ka khiah ha manla ki shnong bad nongbah jong ka ri.
title: ïashim bynta u Lat ka Jylla bad Ampareen ha ka jingplie ïa ka Ayushman Bhav Campaign

content: Ki shipai pahara khappud ka Border Security Force (BSF) ha ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit ka Meghalaya ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa ar trok ki kwai tyrkhong ba shongdor T.40 lak na khappud jong ka South Garo Hills. Ïa kine ki kwai tyrkhong la ïoh ban kurup ka pyrton 43Bn ryngkat ki pulit ka jylla ha ka 13 tarik u Nailur, hadien ba ki la ïoh jingtip kaba thikna.Ki shipai bad ki pulit ki la leit hiar khynra lang ha thaiñ khappud ka Gaonbari kaba hap hapoh u pud u sam ka Rongra Police Station jong ka South Garo Hills, ha kaba la ïoh ban bat ïa ki ar tylli ki trok kiba kit kwai tyrkhong bad ïoh kurup syndon ïa ki. Ïa ki trok ba la ïoh bat bad ïa ki kwai tyrkhong ba la ïoh kurup la aiti sha Rongra Police Station bad la ujor ejahar na ka bynta ban leh ïa kaba donkam katkum ki kyndon aiñ.
title: Ïoh kurup ki shipai BSF bad pulit 2 trok ki kwai tyrkhong ba shongdor T.40 lak na SG

content: U Conrad K Sangma, Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u la ïathuh ba ka jingïakren pynbeit pud bad ka Assam ka dangïaid shaphrang bad baroh ki jingïakynduh bad ki nongïalam ka Assam ki ai ïa ki lad ki kabu ban ïakren ïa kane ka kam bad ban sngewthuh kham bha ïa kiei kiei baroh.U Myntri Rangbah haba kren ha ka jingplie ïa ka Karbi Hemtu ha Shillong, u la ong, “Ryngkat ka jingthmu ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat, ngi la shim ïa kane ka kabu ban ïashong lang bad ïatai ïa ki jinglong jingman bad ki mat bapher bapher ki ban wan bad kumno ka sorkar ka lah ban ïaid shakhmat”.Haba kdew ba kam don ka jingmih kaba shai, u Conrad u la ong ba kane ka kam kan dangbteng.U la ai khublei ruh ïa u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma, u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) bad u Symbud Myntri Rangbah uba la ïalam ia ka Regional Committee ha Jaintia Hills na ka bynta ban ïakren ia ka jingpynbeit pud.
title: Ka jingïakren pynbeit pud bad ka Assam ka dangïaid shaphrang: Conrad Sangma

content: Kum shi bynta ka jingplie ïa ka Ayushman Bhava jong ka President ka India, ka Draupadi Murmu, u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Conrad K Sangma u la shim bynta ha kane ka jingplie kaba la long ha State Convention Centre, ha ka jingdon lang ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kaba dei ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah bad ki heh sorkar na ka tnad ka koit ka khiah.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka roi ka par kan long ka bym don jingmut lada ka sorkar kam lah ban pynbiang ïa ki ald jingsumar.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ruh ba ka koit ka khiah kam dei tang ka jingkitkhlieh jong ka sorkar, hynrei ka koit ka khiah kaba bha ka sdang na ïing jong ki paidbah shimet shimet. “Ka koit ka khiah ka sdang da ka jinglehkhuid ha la ïing, ha shnong bad ka thaiñ bad kumta ka imlang sahlang ka don ia ka bynta bad ka jingkitkhlieh ban pynthikna ba baroh ki nongshongshnong ka jylla jongngi kin long kiba khiahkrad”, u la ong.U la iathuh ruh khlem ka jingdonkti lang ka imlang sahlang ym don kano kano ka kam kaba jop. “Nga sngewtynnad ban ïohsngew ïa ki jingphla jong ka jingjop ki Village Health Council ha ki shnong bapher bapher namar ngi dei ka imlang sahlang kaba tur shaphrang bad ngi shim ïa kane ka kabu ban pynthikna ba ka jingshakri ïa ka koit ka khiah ka dei naduh tynrai”, u la ong. U la pynbna ruh ban sa ai jingïarap T.20,000 ia kawei pa kawei ka VHC kaba trei shitrhem ban kyrshan ïa ki jingtreikam jong ki.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka jingmang tyngka na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah ka dei kaba heh na ka bynta ka sorkar. U la ïathuh ba watla ki don bun ki jingeh ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah, ka sorkar ka ïaleh ban weng ïa ki jingeh. “Ka jingpynkiew kyrdan ïa ki Sub Centre, CHC, PHC bad ki District Hosiptal, bad ki mat kiba ïadei bad ka jingduna ki jingdonkam, ka um, bording, dawai, ki briew bym pat ïoh jinghikai, rukom pynïaid dei ban pynbeit khnang ban ïaid beit ka jingtreikam ha ki jaka sumar pang”,u la ong.U Myntri Rangbah u la pyllait ruh ïa ka Village Health Council-IEC Book, Register bad plie ïa ka VHC App bad sam khusnam sha kiba tbit tam ka rukom treikam.Ka Ayushma Bhava ka dei ka jingïalap ba kynthup ïa ka Ayushman Apke Dwar 3.0 kaba thmu ban sam ïa ki Ayushman Card sha baroh kiba dei ioh jingmyntoi kiba dangsah. Kin don kumba 60,000 ngut ki briew ban sa ïoh ïa ki Ayushman Bharat Card.Kane ka skhim ka thmu ban pynïoh ïa ki lad jingsumar kiba lah ban kotbor da baroh ha baroh kawei ka India. Kane ka skhim kan pynlah ban ïoh ïa ki jingmyntoi bapher bapher kum ki dawai, ban wad ïa ki jingpang bad jingsumar ïa ki jait jingpang bapher bapher, ka jingïarap ïa kiba thiah hospital bad shah puid bad kiwei.Kane ka skhim kan treikam ïa baroh ki nongshongshnong ka India, khlem da peit ïa ka ïoh ka kot jong ki. Shuh shuh kiba don ïa ki jingpang rim kin shah kynthup hapoh kane ka skhim.
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka Ayushman Bhava

content: ka jingkyrduh  ka kam ka jam ha ka jylla kam dei shuh ka mat jingeh ka ba dang thymmai, ha kaba mynta ka sngi la sakhi ia kane ha ka shlem treikam ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board, Lumpyngngat , ka ba la hap ban pynsngeh shwa shipor na ka jingbun ki nongwan shim bynta ha ka interview .Mynta ka sngi, ka Meghalaya State Pollution control Board ka la  pynlong ïa ka registration ban interview na ka bynta ki 9 tylli ki post ba lait ha kane ka shlem treikam hynrei ïa kane ka interview , la hap ban pynsangeh noh na ka daw ba haduh 427 ngut ki samla ki la wan ban register ïa lade.Na ka liang kane ka tnad treikam kam shem la pynkhreh bad poi pyrkhat ba ki nongwan interview kin wan da ki spah ngut , hadien ba ki la iohi ia ka jingbun ki nongwan interview ki la rai ban pynsangeh shwa noh namar ba kim lah ban pyndep tang shisngi .Haba kren bad u Member Secretary ka MSPCB u R.Nainamalai u la iathuh ba ka ne ka jingpynsangeh ka long hadien ba la iohi ia ka  jingwan ban register ki samla wadkam ka ab la kot sha ka 427 ngut ban register namar ka long ka ba eh ban pyndep ia ka interview na ka bynta shisngi , kumta la rai ban pynlong  noh  ha ki wei ki sngi .“Ngin hap pynbeit biang ia ka sngi namar ngim shem la poi pyrkhat ba kin wan bun ki samla ban shim bynta ha kane  ka interview ,ka la don ka jingkhnium na ki briew namar ba ngi la pynsangeh kynsan  ia ka interview namar ki don ki ba wan na jngai ruh , hynrei ngi la pynshai ba ka long ka ba eh ba ngin pyndep ia ka interview mynta ka sngi kumta ngi la rai ban sa pynlong pat ha kawei ka sngi”u la ong .U la  bynrap shuh shuh “kane ka dei ka sien ka ba nyngkong ban iohi ia ka jingwan bun ki kyrtong ban shim bynta ha ka interview , namar ha ki interview ba la dep  ki ba wan shim bynta ki long tang  20-30  ngut hynrei mynta ka kynti ki la bun bad ngim shem la pynkhreh kumta la hap ban rah noh sha ka wei ka sngi” .
title: Hap pynsangeh interview ka MSPCB ba wan bun ki nonginterview, rai ban pynlong ha kawei ka sngi

content: u bah H.M Shangpliang u MLA barim ka Mawsynram Constituency, mynta ka sngi   ka 13 tarik Nailur 2023 u la  pyniasoh pura ialade sha ka National People’s Party (NPP) ha ka jingialang ka ba la long ha ophis treikam ka ne ka party.Ia u bah Shangpliang la pdiang da u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla bad National President ka NPP u Conrad K Sangma, u symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u ba long ruh u  National Vice President ka NPP, u bah Prestone Tynsong,u Symbud myntri rangbah ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ,       U Myntri Rangbah barim ka Jylla u ba long ruh u nongaijingmut  ka Sorkar MDA u Dr D.D Lapang bad kiwei kiwei ki nongialam ka Party.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah ka Jylla u la ong ba ka  NPP ka pdiang sngewbha ia u MLA barim ka Mawsynram u Bah H.M Shangpliang sha ka ing ka sem jong ka NPP, u bah Shangpliang  u dei u Nnongialam u ba trei shitrhem ha ka kam , u ba ju shim ia ki mat jingeh ki paidbah ha ka Jylla bad ka jingpyniasoh jong u mynta ka sngi kan pynkhlain ia ka NPP  ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ka jingthmu  jong ka party ha ka jylla .Ha ba kren ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u bah HM Shangpliang u la ong ba  dei na ki kam pynroi bad ki sienjam ba la shim na ka bynta ban  kyntiew ia ki samla bad ki nongrep ha ka Jylla da ka Sorkar MDA ba ialam da ka NPP, ka ba la ai mynsiem ia u ban rung sha kane ka  Party.
title: Pyniasoh pura u bah HM Shangpliang sha ka NPP

content: Ka District Animal Monitoring Committee, South Garo Hills district ka la pyllong ia ka jingpynshai paidbah bad ia ki nongdie doh madan ha Iew Baghmara. Ka jingpynlong ia kane ka jingpynshai paidbah ia ki nongdie doh madan bad ruh ia kiwei ki nongdie madan ka long namarba dang shen ka Iing Bishar Meghalaya High Court ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ba ym dei ban pyni paidbah ia ka doh, hynrei dei ban buh ia ka doh hapoh jong ki jingbuh ba la tap bha. UKasanchi M Momin, Food Safety Officer Baghmara,  Dr HB Marak DVO, Dr SRK Marak AH & Vety Officer,  CR Marak ARO Planning bad kiwei ki la ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi.
title: Ai jingpynshai paidbah ka District Animal Monitoring Committee halor ka jingpyni paidbah ïa ka doh

content: Ka jingpynlip khah khah ia ka bording elektrik ha ki bynta Sepngi jong ka Ri Bhoi ka la pynbitar ia ki nongshong shnong bad wanrah ruh ia ka jingpynthud ia ka trei ka ktah jong ki nongshong shong kham tam ia ka jingpule jong ki khynnah skul.Ki dkhot Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) dang shen ki la iakyndoh ia u SDO ka MeECL Patharkhmah Division bad pynsngew ia ba u dei ban weng noh ia kane ka jingeh jong ki. U SDO u la iathuh ba ka jinglip jong ka bording elektrik ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingduna jong ki nongtrei bad ka jingbym siew thikna ia ka Bill elektrik. Ka HYC ka la pynsngew halor ka jingkongsan jong ka MeECL ha kaba pynbiang ia ka bording elektrik. Ki dkhot jong kane ka kynhun ki la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ba ki dei ban siew thikna ia ki Bill bording elektrik jong ka MeECL.
title: Ud ki nongshong shnong ka Ri Bhoi ba lip ding elektrik khah khah

content: :U nongaijingmut ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance-II u ba long ruh u Myntri rangbah barim ka Jylla, u Dr DD Lapang u la ai ka jingïaroh sha ka sorkar MDA ka ba ka la trei shitom naduh tynrai ban weng ïa ki mat jingeh ha ka jylla. U Bah Lapang u la jubab halor ka sorkar MDA ka ba la shynshar mynta la 6 bnai ba la ïalam da ka NPP ha ka ba u la ong ba ki sorkar ki ba la dep ki la theh kti ïa lade ban shim pynbeit ïa kum kine ki mat ba eh ha ka jylla.“Ka long ha ka sien ka ba nyngkong ha ka history jong ka jylla, ba ki Minister na ka Sorkar pdeng kin hiar sha ki thaiñ nongkyndong ha ka jylla ban ïaleh ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingeh jong ki nongshong shnong kumta ka la don ka jingkylla bak – ly – bak hapoh ka jingshynshar ka Sorkar MDA” u la ong.Haba kylli halor ka shong suk shnong shngaiñ ha ka jylla, u Dr Lapang u la kdew ba ka la don ka jingshim khia bha halor kane ka bynta hapoh ka jingshynshar ka sorkar MDA. Ha ka ba ïadei bad ka Congress, u la ong ba um kwah ban kren eiei halor ka Congress party namar kam dei na u ba kan kiew ne hiar kane ka party ha ka jylla. “Ka rai jong nga hi ka long kat kum ka jingkylla ka jinglong jingman hi bad mynta nga la don bad ka NPP nga kwah ban neh hi bad ka NPP bad ka kamram jong nga ka long ban ai mynsiem ïa ki nongïalam ki ba dang thymmai ki ba kwah ban wan sha ka saiñpyrthei ”u la ong.“Kumba ka long mynta nga la kwah ban shong thait noh na ka kam saiñ pyrthei bad nga la kwah ban shong thait noh bad kano kano ka ilektion ruh kan ym lah ban kring biang ïa nga: u la bynrap.
title: Ki sorkar ba la dep thetkti na ki mat jingeh ka jylla hynrei ka Sorkar MDA ka shim khia: Dr DD Lapang

content: :Ha ka jingïakynduh hapdeng ki nongmihkhmat na ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) bad ki nongmih khmat ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka ba la long mynta ka 14 tarik Nailur 2023, ki la mynjur lang ban don ka jingïatrei lang ka ba skhem hapdeng ki ar Council. Mynta ka sngi ki nongmihkhmat ka KAAC hapoh ka jingdonlang u Member of Parliament (MP) ka Karbi Anglong u Horen Singh Bey, u CEM ka KAAC u Dr. Tuliram Ronghang bad 12 ngut ki executive member (EC) ka KAAC ki la hiar sha KHADC ban ïa kynduh ïa ki nongmihkhmat ka KHADC.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC, u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem u la ïathuh ba ha kane ka jingïakynduh la ïoh ban ïakren ïa shibun ki mat ki ba ïadei bad ki ar Council ha ka ba ki la shim ïa ka rai ban don ka jingïatrei lang ha baroh ki liang. “Ngi la shim ïa ka rai ban ïatreilang ha ka ba ïadei bad ka jingpynneh pynsah ïaki riti dustur jong ki nongshong shnong ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka jylla Assam” u la ong. U la bynrap “Nalor kine ngi la ïoh ban ïakren ruh halor ka jingïatrei lang ban wanrah ka jingshong shngaiñ hapdeng ki nong shong shnong ka Meghalaya bad Assam khamtam haki thaiñ khappud”.U bah Pynïaid u la ïathuh ruh ba ha kane ka jingïalang la ïoh ruh ban ïasyllok halor ka jingshong syier ki Khasi pnar ha ki thaiñ khappud kiba sah ha Block II bad kum u CEM ka KAAC u la kular ba un shim khia ban teh lakam  ka suk ka saiñ katba ka jingïakren pynbeit pud hapdeng ka sorkar Meghalaya bad Assam. Haba kylli u bah Pynïaid u la ong “Ka jingïakren hapdeng ki arylli ki sorkar jylla lyngba ki Regional Committee jong ka Meghalaya-Assam ka dang ïaid bad ka KHADC ruh ka ïaid ryngkat ryngkat bad ki ha ka ba ïadei bad ka ne ka mat bad ka rai hi kan shim ka sorkar jylla haka jingïakren bad ka sorkar Assam bad ka rai ba ki artylli ki sorkar jylla kin shim kan dei beit katkum ka jingkwah ki paidbah”. Na ka liang u CEM ka KHADC u la ïathuh ruh ba na ka liang ka Executive Committee (EC) dang shen, ki la leit ruh ban jurip ïaki Khasi-Pnar ba sah ha Block II bad la shem ba ki don 23 tylli ki shnong Khasi-Pnar.
title: Ha ka jingïakynduh, rai ka KHADC bad KAAC ban pynskhem ïa ka jingïatreilang hapdeng ki 2 council

content: :U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla Meghalaya, u Conrad Sangma u la plie pyrda ïa ka North East Fruit Wine Incubation Centre ha ka phyllaw jong ka IHM Shillong kaba don ha Mawdiangdiang, Shillong ha ka 14 tarik, Nailur. Ka centre ka dei kaba ïateilang hapdeng ka Meghalaya Farmers Welfare Commission bad ka IHM, Shillong. Ka centre ka la plie pyrda ïa katei ka tamasa ha ka jingïadon lang jong ka Myntri ka rep ka riang, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Excise, u Kyrmen Shylla.Haba leit sha ka X(Twitter), utei u Myntri Rangbah u la thoh, ‘Ka jingplie pyrda ïa ka North East Fruit Wine Incubation Center ha ka phyllaw jong ka IHM Shillong kaba dei ba nyngkong jong ka tamasa ha ka jylla North East.’ Ka jingshna ïa ka waiñ ka la long ka riti ka dustur jong ki paid riewlum jong ka jylla jong ngi bad lyngba kane, ki nongshong shnong ba dei ki nongshna waiñ bad ki nongseng kam lajong ki lah ban ïoh jingkyrshan ha ka ban shna waiñ, pynsong bad ban die ha ïew ha hat. Kane ka jingïohi jngai ka long ban rah noh ïa ka jingshna ïa ki waiñ ba la shna na ki soh grape katba ngi la khmih bniah ha ki waiñ soh, da kaba pynleit jingmut halor ki soh ba mih na shnong bad ban ïaid shakhmat ha ka jingthmu jong ngi ban pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya kum ka nongbah jong ka jingshna ïa ki waiñ na u soh ne ka “Fruit Wine Capital of India.”‘U Sangma u la bynrap shuh shuh da kaba ong, ‘Nga sngewtynnad ban ïohi ïa ka rukom song ïa ki waiñ shnong kaba long kum ka jingkylla bakhraw naduh ki snem ba la dep. Kane ka jingthmu kan ïarap ïa ki nongrep bad ki nongshna waiñ jong ka jylla ba kin ïoh nong ïoh jingmyntoi na ka jingmih jong ki bad pynshlur ïa ka jingseng kam lajong hapdeng ki samla.’ Haba la kren ha katei ka jinplie pyrda ïa kane ka tamasa, utei u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka jingtei ïa ka jaka jong ki soh waiñ ka pynkynthup lang ïa ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei bad ka kam rep kam riang bad kan ïarap ha ka ban kyrshan ïa ka jingseng kam lajong bad kan kiew ha ka jingïoh kam ïoh jam. Katei ka jingbuh ïa ki waiñ soh ne ka incubation center ka long kaba donkam bad u Myntri Rangbah u la bynrap ba kan wanrah ka jingkylla ha ka jingim jong ki briew.
title: Plie u Myntri Rangbah ïa ka North East Fruit Wine Incubation Centre ha pyllaw jong ka IHM Shillong

content: :Ha ka miet jong ka 12 tarik Nailur 2023, ki pulit ka ANTF, East Khasi Hills, Shillong, ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang ki nongïalam shnong ka shnong Umpling, ki la ïoh ban kem ïa ki ar ngut ki nongkhaïi drug ki ba la tip kyrteng kum u Wantei Manbha Lyngdoh 24 snem ka rta bad u Freddy Bantei Dhar 29 snem ka rta.Ha ka jingkynra ïa ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa u drug Heroin u bah khia 1.13 gms, ki 417 tylli ki tyndong ba thylli, 39 tylli ki thyrnia inject (syringes) bym pat pyndonkam, 2 tylli ki mobile phone bad kawei ka kali Tata Intra pick up ka ba don ïa u registration number ML 05 Z 9479. Halor kane, la dep ban register ïa ka case hapoh ka Rynjah Police Station, kat kum ka Case No. 124(09)2023 U/S21(a)/27(a) NDPS Act. Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh na u bah S. Nongtnger, Superintendent of Police,East Khasi Hills, Shillong.
title: Kem ki pulit ka ANTF ïa ki 2 ngut ki nongkhaïi drug na ka shnong Umpling

content: :Ka Seng Federation of Khasi Jaintia & Garo People (FKJGP) Mawshynrut Circle, mynta ka sngi kala leit ban ïakynduh ïa u DC ban pan jingshai halor ka jingbym pat treikam pura ka Civil Sub Division bad kumjuh ka Shallang C&RD Block kaba dang shu plei thymmai ha u snem bala lah.U samla Eveningstar Marthong General Secretary FKJGP Mawshynrut circle haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka jingplie ïa ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub- Division kala jan kynjoh mynta sha ka 7 snem hynrei haba phai pat ha ka liang ka jingdon jong ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher la sakhi ba kiba bun ki dang hap ban treikam beit napoh Nongstoin.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ka Seng aiti ruh ïa ka dorkhas ban dawa pyntreikam pura noh ïa ki tnad kum ka Election, ka SDSEO ophis, ka tnad Registration, ka Treasury bad kiwei kiwei hapoh katei ka Sub Division khnang ba yn lah ban weng ïa ka jingeh ba ki paidbah.Ka seng kala kyntu ruh ïa MLA ka thaiñ ba un shimkhia na ka bynta ban pynurlong ïa kitei ki mat jingdonkam jong u paidbah ka thaiñ.
title: Kynduh DC ka FKJGP bym pat treikam pura ki tnad treikam ha Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division

content: :U Myntri rangbah ka jylla Assam u Himanta Biswa Sarma, ha ka 13 tarik u Nailur, u la ong ba wat la ki 6 tylli ki jaka ki ba hap hapoh ka jingïakajia u pud u sam hapdeng ka jylla Assam bad Meghalaya, ki dei ki jaka kiba jwat ban pynbeit hynrei ïa kane ka kam la dep ban bynshet ha ki nongïalam ka Regional Committees ki ba biang nadong shadong bad kyrmen ban lah ban pynbeit da ka lynti ba jaijai.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Sarma u la ong, “dang shen, ngi la mynjur lang ban leit jurip ïa ka Hahim bad ngi la mynjur ruh ban buh ïa ki border post ha ka shnong Hahim bad ka don bun ki kam ki ba la ïaid shaid shaid na baroh ar jylla.” U la pyntip ba ha u bnai Risaw na ka liang ki Myntri rangbah jong ki ar jylla kin sa pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ban pynïaid shakhmat ïa ka jingpynbeit noh ïa u pud u sam ha ka wat ba ar ha Guwahati. Na ka liang u Myntri rangbah ka jylla Assam, u la kyntu ïa ki nongshong shnong jong ki ar jylla ha ki thaiñ khappud ba kin pynneh ïa ka suk ka saiñ namar na ka liang ki ar sorkar ki dang don hapdeng ka jingtreishitom ban pynbeit noh ïa kane ka mat.“Ngi kwah ban leh ïa ka bha tam na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong ha ki thaiñ khappud, Ngi kwah ban ïada ïa ki nongshong shnong, te kan bha ba kin tehlakam ïa ka suk ka saiñ bad ngin pyrshang kat ba lah ban pynbeit noh ïa kane ka mat”.
title: Ka Sorkar Assam bad Meghalaya kin shim lut ïa ki sienjam ban pynbeit ïa u pud u sam: Himanta

content: :Ka Ri Bhoi Presbyterian Hr. Sec. School, Nongpoh mynta ka sngi ka la pynïar shuh shuh ïa ka jingai jinghikai jong ka da ka jingplie ïa ka Arts, Commerce bad Science stream. Ïa kane, la plie da u dkhot ka Ïing Dorbar Lok Sabha u Bah Vincent H Pala bad ïa la don lang ruh u bah Mayralborn Syiem, MLA Nongpoh, Ka Kong PL Nonglait, District School Education Officer ka Ri Bhoi, u Bah W Radu, Principal of RBP Hr. Sec School, u Bah HL Myrsing, President Managing Committee, Rev. DS Roy Muktieh, Executive Secretary I/C CED, RBP Synod, Rev. K P Marsharing, Kong VP Nongrum, ki nonghikai, ki nongpule bad ki kmie ki kpa. Ka jingplie ïa ka skul bathymmai bad jinglut haba shna ïa ka ka long haduh 4 klur 64 lak bad 71 hajar tyngka. Kane ka jingpynkiew ïa ka jingai jinghikai kan long ka jingïarap kaba khraw ïa ki samla pule jong ka Nongpoh kaba don ha Ri Bhoi district.
title: Pynïar jingpule ka Ri Bhoi Presbyterian Hr. Sec. School

content: :U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma, mynta ka 14 tarik Nailur, u la ong ba ki mokotduma ki ba la ujor da ka National Investigation Agency (NIA) pyrshah ïa ki dkhot ka Hynniewtrep National Lliberation Council (HNLC), ki dei na ka Sorkar pdeng ym na ka Sorkar jylla hynrei kine baroh ki jingsngewkhia hap ban ia kren ban pynbeit bad ka Sorkar kan dang ap ïa ka jubab ki nongïalam ka seng.Ha ba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u Myntri rangbah u la ong ba baroh ki mokutduma, ba la ujor da ka NIA, ki dei ki mokutduma ki ba la slem bad halor kane kan dang bteng bad ki dei ki mokutduma  jong ka Sorkar pdeng ym jong ka Sorkar Jylla.“Na ka liang ka sorkar  bad ngi la dep ban pyntip sha ki dkhot  ka HNLC ba kat ba ka jingïakren ka dang ïaid shakhmat ki ba bun ki mat ba kum ki dkhot ki sngewkhia ngin ïaleh ban pynbeit hapdeng ka Sorkar jylla ka sorkar pdeng bad ka HNLC ” u la ong. U la bynrap, “Ka long ka ba donkam na ka bynta baroh ki ba don bynta ha ka ne ka jingïakren ïa suk ban pynshai ïa la ki jingsngewkhia na baroh ki liang bad ka dei ka mat ka ba dang ha ban bteng hynrei ngin trei shitom ban lah ban pynbeit noh shen”.U Myntri rangbah u la ïathuh shuh shuh ba na ka liang ka Sorkar ka la dep ban phah ktien lyngba u ksiang na ka Sorkar bad ka dang ap ïa ka jubab ki nongïalam ka HNLC. “Ban weng ïa kano ka no ka  jingsngewkhia ngi donkam ban don ka jingïakren hapdeng baroh ki ba don bynta lang la ka dei ha ka jingsngewkhia na ka liang jong ki ne jong ka sorkar” u la bynrap.
title: Ki mokutduma ki ba la ujor da ka NIA pyrshah ïa ki dkhot ka HNLC ki dei na ka sorkar pdeng bad ïa kine donkam ban ïakren ban pynbeit : Conrad

content: :Ki nongkitkam ka Dorbar Shnong Mawlai Mawiongrim, mynta ka 14 tarik Nailur 2023, ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa ka Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills ka Kong R M Kurbah bad aipor 15 sngi ïa ka ophis deputy commissioner (DC) ban weng noh ïa u Dewiong u bala pyllang harud surok bah ha Mawlai Mawïongrim.Ha ba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlai Maiongrim u Bah S. Lyngdoh hadien ka jingïakynduh bad ka DC u la ong ba na ka liang ka dorbar shong Mawlai Mawiong rim ka la ai por 15 sngi ïa ka ophis ka DC ban pynkhuid noh ïa u dewiong u ba ki la pynlang ha rud surok bah ha kane ka shnong.“Une u Dewïong u ba ki la wan ban pynlang ha kane ka shnong u la don 8 snem tam mynta bad ka buh jingeh ïaki nong shong shnong namar ka pynjaboh ïa ka umbam umdih, ki pung dohkha bad ïa ka mariang baroh kawei bad Kum ka Dorbar Shnong ngi sngew khia bad dei namar kane ngi la ai por 15 sngi ïaka ophis DC ban weng noh ïa u Dewiong na kane ka jaka, lym kumta ka Dorbar Shnong ka shim da kiwei ki sienjam ba tyngeh” u la ong. U rangbah shnong ka Mawlai Mawïong u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïakynduh mynta ka sngi bad ka DC ka la kular sha ka dorbar Shnong ba kan lilam noh ïa une u Dewïong hapoh 1 taiew bad naka liang ka Dorbar Shnong ruh kan ïai buddien ïa haba ïadei bad kane ka kam.
title: Hapoh 15 sngi pynkhuid ïa u Dewïong na Mawïong rim lem kumta ngin shim da ka sienjam ka ba tyngeh : DS Mawïongrim

content: :Mynta ka sngi ka 14 tarik Nailur 2023, ka Committee on Safety Security and Cleanliness of Ïewduh jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la pynlong ïa ka jingïalang ka ba nyngkong ban wad ïa ki lad ki lynti ban wanrah ïa ka khuid ka suba ha ki Ïewduh  ka ba hap hapoh ka jingpeit ka council.Ïa kane ka jingïalang jong ka Commitee la pynïaid da u chief executive member (CEM) ka KHADC u Bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang ka Executive Member ka tnad Market ka Kong Grace Mary Kharpuri, u Executive Member ka tnad Development u Bah Carness Sohshang lem bad ki nongïalam na ki 6 tylli ki shnong ba kynthup ka shnong Mawkhar, Umsohsun, Mission Compound, Wahthapbru, Qualapatty Riatsamthiah bad Wahingdoh, ki nongïalam ki nong shong ïew, ki nongïalam ki seng nongkhaïi, ki bor district bad ki bor pulit.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u CEM ka KHADC u bah Pynïaid Sing Syiem u la ïathuh ba ha ka jingïalang jong na ka Committee la shim ïa ka rai ban mang pisa naka bynta ban tei kham bun ki jaka leit shabar bad ban maramot ïaki ki jaka leit shabar ki ba la i donkam ban pynbha ban maramot ïaki nala um bad ïaki Pipe um bala sniew ha Ïewduh. U CEM ula ïathuh ruh ba ka Committee ka la shim ruh ïa ka rai ban mang tyngka naka bynta ban thied ïaki CCTV bad ki Solar na ka bynta ban pynlong ïa ka Ïewduh ka ba shngaiñ na ka bynta ka ïaid ka ïeng ki briew hapoh ka ïew bad ki shnong marjan.“Ka district council kan sa buh ruh ïa ki khyrdop ban peitngor ïaka rung ka mih ki briew ha Ïewduh bad kan ym shah shuh ïa ki ba ju sah miet ne kiba pyndonkam jaka sah ïaki dukan ha Ïewduh” la ong u CEM ka KHADC. Na ka liang ka Committee on Safety Security and Cleanliness of Ïewduh jong ka KHADC, shen kan sa pynlong ruh ïa ka jingtalasi ïaki dukan die kyiad beaiñ bad ïa ki jaka khalai ha Ïewduh.
title: Shim rai ka KHADC ban talasi ïa ki dukan kyiad beaiñ bad jaka khalai

content: SHILLONGKa long ka jingkmen bad ka jingsngewsarong na ka bynta ka jylla baroh kawei ha kaba u samla na kane ka jylla, u Samuel Lyngdoh Kynshi u la shah jied ha ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol jong ka India ban ïalehkai na ka bynta ka lympung Asian Games 2023.U Samuel u la shah soi ha ka Punjab FC mynta u snem hadien 5 aiom ba u la ïoh ban mih madan ha  ka I-League na ka bynta ka Shillong Lajong FC bad 3 aiom bad ka Real Kashmir FC.Kan long ruh ka kabu na ka bynta une u samla na ka jylla ban ïoh ïalehkai lang bad u Sunil Chhetri uba dei ruh u katpen jong ka India.Ka India ka la shah kynthup lang ha ka group kaba kynthup ïa ka China, Bangladesh bad Myanmar na ka bynta ka Asian Games.Ki ‘rangïalehkai kiba la shah jied mynta u snem ki long u Gurmeet Singh (Hyderabad FC), Dheeraj Singh (FC Goa); Sumit Rathi (Mohun Bagan Super Giant), Nardender Gahlot (Odisha FC), Amarjit Singh Kiyam (Punjab FC), Samuel James Lyngdoh Kynshi (Punjab), Rahul KP (Kerala Blasters), Abdul Rabeeh Anjukandan (Hyderabad FC), Ayush Chhetri (FC Goa), Bryce Miranda (Kerala Blasters), Azfar Noorani (Gokulam Kerala), Rahim Ali (Chennaiyin FC), Vincy Barreto (Chennaiyin FC), Sunil Chhetri (Bengaluru FC), Rohit Danu (Bengaluru FC), Gurkirat Singh (Mumbai City), Aniket Jadhav (Odisha FC), Deepak Tangri (Mohun Bagan Super Giant).
title: Paw ka kyrteng u Samuel Lyngdoh Kynshi ha ka kynhun na ka bynta ka Asian Games

content: :Ka Meghalaya State Commission for the Protection of Child Rights ryngkat bad ka jingïatrei lang bad ka Faith Foundation bad Child Friendly Shillong mynta ka sngi ka la pyllong ïa ka jingïaphylliew jingmut ban shim ïa ki lad ki lynti na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki khynnah. Ha kane ka jingïamir jingmut la ïa shim bynta ruh da ki rangbah shnong, ki nongïalam na ki dong bapher bapher, ki seng samla bad seng niam.Ka Kong C.D. Lyngwa ka Director jong ka Social Welfare ka la ïathuh ba kane ka tnad Sorkar ka la trei bha ban peit ïa ka bha ka miat bad ïa ka hok jong ki khynnah. Ki dkhot jong ka Faith Foundation, Child Friendly Shillong bad BIDS ki la ïa shim bynta ha kane ka jingïalang bad ai ruh ïa ki jingmut jong ki. Ha kane ka jingïalang la ïakren bniah kumno ban shim lut ïa ki lad ki lynti bad ki jingtrei kam kumno ban ïarap ïa ki khynnah bad wad ruh ïa kiwei ki lad ki lynti thymmai ban weng lut ïa ki jingeh ba ki khynnah ki ïakynduh ha Meghalaya. Ka jingthmu jong kane ka jingïalang ka long ban nang pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa kata ka mynsiem ban nang trei kham bha shuh shuh ban ai ïa ka jingïada ïa ki khynnah bad btin lynti ïa ki ba ki ïaid ha ka lynti kaba dei. Ka Meghalaya Meghalaya State Commission for the Protection of Child Rights ka trei bad ka pynthikna ba ki khynnah ki ïoh ïa ka hok bad ban peit ruh ïa ka bha ka miat jong ki.Kane ka jingïalang kaba kaba kongsan ban pynkhlaiñ shuh shuh ïa kane ka jingtrei kam. Ïa kane ka mynsiem jong ka jingïatrei lang la lah ban ïohi ha kane ka jingïalang ha kaba baroh kito kiba ïa ïoh ban ïa shim bynta ki la pynpaw ïa kata ka mynsiem ban pynthikna ki khynnah jong ka Meghalaya kin ïoh ban mad ïa ka lawei baphyrnai.
title: Pynlong jingphylliew jingmut ka MSCPCR na ka bynta ka bha ka miat ki khynnah

content: MAWKYRWATKa Mawkyrwat District Sports Association ha ryngkat daka jing ia trei lang bad ka District Sports Officer South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka 8 tarik u Nailur 2023 ki la ioh ban plie pyrda noh ia ka Super bad ia ka First Division Football League 2023 ha Madan MDSA Nonglang South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u  bah T.Lyngwa Deputy Comissioner South west Khasi Hills District u la long kum u kongsan.U bah T.Lyngwa haba kren ha kane ka sngi u la pynpaw ka jing khublei na ka bynta ka MDSA kaba la pynlong ïa kane ka lympung jingïalehkai bad kaba la pynmih shibun ki nongïalehkai ymtang ha ki kam ialehkai kynjatbol hynrei ha kaba ia dei bad ki nong jngi um ba ka Swimming Association ka la pynmih shibun ki nong jngi um kiba paw watla hapoh ka distrik ngim pat don ka jaka jngi ne ka Swimming pool, kum juh ruh ki nong ia mareh thong ki ba kynsai ki mih nagne naka distrik kaba wanrah shibun ia ka nam bad ka burom ym tang ia ki hynrei ia ka thaiñ bad ia ka jylla hi baroh ka wei.Ha kajuh por u la ai mynsiem na ka bynta ki ‘rangialehkai ba kim dei ban pynleh noh ei ia ka sap ba ki don hynrei ba kin nang iai trei shitom ryngkat ka thong ha ka jingim khnang ba kin nym kut tang hangne hynrei ba kin nang kiew sha kiwei de ki kyrdan jong ka jingialehkai.Ha ka jing ialehkai mynta ka sngi naka bynta ka Super Division hapdeng ka Mawten Sports Club pyrshah ia ka Jakrem Sports Club kim shem ioh ban thep ia ki kol jong ki wat haduh ba kut jong ka jing ialehkai da kaba ia khait 0 la 0 kol.Haba phai pat haka 1st Division ha pdeng ka Snapkirang FC pyrshah ia ka Photjaud SCC la jop noh da ka Snapkirang Football Club da kaba ka la ioh ban thep da 1 – 0 kol pyrshah ïa ka Photjaud Sports & Cultural Club.Naka liang ka Mawkyrwat District Sports Association mynta u snem 2023 ki la ioh ban jied 8 tylli ki  kynhun ialehkai naka bynta ka Super Division bad 12 tylli naka bynta ka first Division.Nalor u kong san bah T.Lyngwa la iadonlang  u bah A.L. Bareh, MCS, EAC, South West Khasi Hills District, ki Nongkitkam jong ki Sports Club, ki nongkitkam ka MDSA lem bad ki paidbah kiba la wan peitkai ha kane ka sngi.
title: Plie pyrda u DC ïa ka Super & First Division naka bynta ka Football League 2023 ha Madan MDSA Nonglang

content: U dkhot ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain ka Meghalaya, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum mynta ka sngi u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingpynlong ia ka Dorbar Synrai tang san sngi. U Bah Adelbert Nongrum uba long ruh u dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah jong ka Voice of the People Party (NPP) u la ong ba kane ka jingpynlong ia ka Iing Dorbar lai sngi ba ka bynta ki kam jong ka Sorkar bad tang arsngi na ka bynta  jong kiwei ki dkhot jong ka Iing Dorbar Private Members Business ka long ka por kaba lyngkot palat. U la ong ba ka jingkylla ka don shibun ki phang ba ka dei ban ia kren.Ha ka jingkren jong u haba u la wanrah ia ka jingtyrwa ba dei ban pynjlan ia ki sngi pynlong dorbar, ha ka sngi bas dang ia ka Iing Dorbar Lyiur kaba san sngi, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ong ba kane ka jingpynlong ia ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain tang san sngi ba ka long ka jingpynkhein ia ka hok synshar paidbah. Une u nongmihkhmat u la ong ruh ba Iing Dorbar ka don bun bah ki phang kiba ktah ia ki paidbah shong shnong bad kiba dei ioh ia ka jingiatainia hapoh ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain jong ka Meghalaya.Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, u dkhot ka Liang Pyrshah bad nongialam jong ka APP u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit u ruh ruh u la ieng bad pyrshah ia kane ka jingpynlong jong ka Sorkar ia ka Iing Dorbar tang san sngi. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong, uba long u Myntri ba dei peit ia ki ain u la pynshai shaphang ia kane bad ong ka jingpynlong ia ka Iing Dorbar san sngi ka dei ba rai jong ka Assembly Advisory Committee ha kaba kiwei ki dkhot jong ki seng sain hima sima ruh ki long ki dkhot jong katei ka Committee.Hadien kane u Lamphang ka Iing ka Dorbar, u Thomas A. Sangma u la kyrpad ia u Bah Adelbert Nongrum ban weng noh ia kata ka jingtyrwa jong u. Hynrei, na ka liang jong u Bah Adelbert Nongrum um shym la treh ban leh ia kat. Hadien kane, u Lamphang ka Iing Dorbar u la buh ia ka jingtyrwa ha ki dkhot jong ka Iing Dorbar Thaw Ain la kin pdiang ne kyntait ia ka jingpynlong ka ka Dorbar Lyiur san sngi. Ha kaba ia dei bad kane, ka sur babun jong ka Iing Dorbar ka ai ia ka jingmynjur jong ka ban pynlong ia ka Dorbar san sngi.
title: Pyrshah u Bah Adelbert Nongrum ba pynlong Dorbar Lyiur tang san sngi

content: Ka jinglah jong ka Ankita Sharma ban ïalehkai bha na ka bynta ka Ri Bhoi District hynnin ka sngi ka 14 Nailur ka la pynlong ïa kane ka kynhun ban jam da kaba suk sha ka phainal jong ka lympung U-19 Girls Inter District Cricket Tournament ha madan Umbuda, Nongpoh.Ka Ri Bhoi ka don ha khlieh duh jong ka Group A katba ka South Garo Hills ruh ka don ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong jong ka Zone 2.Ka SGH ka la kam ban tied nyngkong ha katei ka jingïakhun bad ki la ïoh ban buh tang 77 ron bad baroh ki wiket ki la khyllem lut tang hapoh 18.4 ober.Ka Ri Bhoi kaba dei ka kynhun kaba la ïoh ban jam nyngkong sha ka phainal ka hap ban ap mynta sa kawei pat ka kynhun ban ïakhun pyrshah, kata hapeng ka Shillong Cricket Association bad Tura DCA kiba ban ïakhun mynta ka sngi ka 15 Nailur.
title: Jam ka Ri Bhoi sha ka phainal jong ka U-19 Girls Inter District Cricket Tournament

content: :Ka jingleit khynra kaba kyndit kyndit ba la lam khmat da u Chief Executive Member jong ka KHADC, u Pynïaid Sing Syiem ha ka 15 tarik, Nailur, ha ka jingïadon lang jong u Alvin Sawkmie ba dei u MDC bad kiwei kiwei ki heh ophisar jong ka KHADC. Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingkhynra, ka KHADC ka la lap ba la don palat 40 tylli ki jingtei khlem lisen ne Trading Licence ne Labour Licence na ka bynta ki nongtrei ba tang ha Byrnihat.Ka KHADC ka la pynduh pyndam noh ïa katei ka jingtei lem bad ka jingpynbna ban pynbiang ïa ki jingdonkam jong ki kot ki sla hapoh shi taïew, lada pulom ban leh ïa katei, yn nym shah ïa ki ba kin dang ïoh plie biang ïa ki dukan tad haduh ban la pynbiang lut ki kot ki sla. Baroh ki jingtei ha Mawsmai bad ha ki jaka ha Khanapara, la dep ban tei khlem kot khlem sla bad don na ki, kiba la kut noh ka por bad yn shym la pynthymmai biang.Utei u CEM u la hukum ïa ka Enforcement ban pyndep lut ki kam ki jam hapoh shi taïew, hynrei lada don kino kino kiba la leh klet ïa katei ka jingpynbna bad ka order ba la pynmih da ka KHADC, yn khang khyrdep ïa ki dukan.
title: Leit khynra kyndit kyndit ka KHADC ha ki dukan ba lam khmat da ki bar jylla naduh Khanapara shaduh Byrnihat

content: SHILLONG:U nongïalam jong ka seng Trinamool Congress (TMC), u Mukul Sangma u la kynnoh ba kane ka sorkar ba mynta ka la pyndonkam ïa ka bor tang ban ñion ïa ki paidbah jong ka jylla, kaba katkum ka jingkren jong u, la paw tyngkreiñ ha ka jingïakynad ba dang shen ha Tura bad Thangskai. U Sangma u la kren sha ka jingjia jong ka Law-and-Order hapoh ka jylla kaba hap hapoh ka sorkar MDA 2.0, ha kaba u la kdew halor ka jing huri hura ha Tura bad ka jingpynpaw kaba mar mar jong ki heh ki haiñ.“Lada phi ïohsngew ïa ka jingkren jong ki heh ki haiñ, phin sa ïohi ba ka long kum ka jingthmu lypa da ki pulit. Ha ka por ba don ka jingkawang maw, ka la dei hadien ka por sepngi bad ha kawei pat ka sngi phin ïohi ïa ki pulit ba ki la kem ïa ki paidbah,” kynnoh u Sangma.U la kynnoh shuh shuh ba la don haduh 11 tylli ki kyndon kiba la shah buk lypa na ka bynta ki paidbah, “Ki paidbah ki la dep buk lypa hapoh ki kyndon jong ka act kaba dei ba la ïateh bad ki ehrang. Ka Unlawful Activities Prevention Act (UAPA). Hato don na ki paidbah kiba la shim bynta ha ka jingïalang jong ki riew kieng atiar?” U Sangma u la kynnoh ba ki samla pule kiba la dep shah buk lypa hapoh ka UAPA, kim shym la shah khot da ka sorkar.
title: Thalaiñ tyngeh u Mukul ïa ka sorkar na ka bynta ka jingpyndonkam bakla ïa ka bor

content: :U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Conrad K Sangma ha ka 15 tarik, Nailur, u la kren halor ka jingithuh ïa ka rukom treikam trei jam jong ka Inner Line Permit (ILP) bad ka Meghalaya Residents’ Safety and Security Act (MRSSA), da kaba ban jur shaphang katei ka phang bad ka jingïakren kaba dang ïaid shakhmat.Ha kaba ïadei bad ka ILP, utei u Myntri Rangbah, u Sangma u la ong ba ka la dei hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka sorkar India. U la ong ruh ba ka rai jong ka ILP, la dep phah, da kaba kdew halor ka jingmut shisha jong ka sorkar ha ka ban pynbna shaphang katei. Shuh shuh, u la ong ba ki jingïakren bad ka sorkar India ka dang ïaid mynta na ka bynta ban peit bniah ïa ka lynti jong ka sien jam ban wan ha ka ban sdang pyntreikam ïa ka ILP.Haba la kylli shaphang ka jingktah jong ka ILP halor ki projek rel hapoh kane ka jylla, u Sangma u la pynshai ba ka ILP ka long kum ka shimti ban khmih bniah halor ki mat jong ka jingwan shong sah jong ki bar jylla. U la kren ruh shaphang kiwei ki jingdon jong ki tiar ba la pynwandur na ka bynta kiwei pat ki kam. Kaba kongsan nyngkong hangne ka long ka jingwan shong beaiñ ki bar jylla bad ka jingwan rung jong ki. Don ki nongseng kam lajong ki la pynpaw ka jingngeit jong ki ba ka ILP kan ïarap ban pynbna halor kine ki mat.Utei u Myntri Rangbah u la pynkut da kaba ong, “Ngi sngew ba ki jingïakren jong ngi ki dang ïaid mynta bad ki nongseng kam lajong ki la dep pynpaw shaphang ki jinglong jingman jong ki. To ngin ïapeit mynta kumno kan treikam.”
title: Kren u Myntri Rangbah halor ka jingithuh ïa ka jingtreikam ka MRSSA, ka jingktah halor ka ILP jong ki projek rel

content: :Ki nongïalam jong ki nongdie syiar ki ba don hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya Poultry Assiociation, mynta ka sngi ki la wan ban khot ban wer ïa baroh ki nongdie syiar na ki thaiñ Khasi Jaintia ba kin wan ban pynrung kyrteng ïa lade na ka bynta ban ïoh laisen na ka Food Safety and Starndarad Authority of India (FSSAI) ka ban long ha ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha ba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang u President ka Assiociation u bah Wanshai Kharshandi u la ong ba na ka liang ka Assiociation bad ka FSSAI ka la pynbeit ïa ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ban pynlong ïa ka sngi ban pynrung kyrteng bad ban ïoh ïa ka laisen na kane ka tnad trei kam. “Nga kyrpad ïa baroh ki nongshong shnong ha ka Ri Khasi Jaintia ba kin wan ban register ïa lade na ka bynta ban ïoh jingithuh ha ka kam ban die doh syiar ha ka rukom ka ba khuid suba” u la ong.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang ki nongdie doh kin wanrah ïa ki EPIC, 2 tylli ki dur passport size, ki kot ki sla ki ban kynthup ïa ki NOC na ki shnong lane na Municipal lada ki dukan ki don ha ki jaka ba hap ha Munipal area. U la iathuh ruh ba naka liang ka FSSAI, ha kane ka sngi ka la pynkreh ruh ban ai jinghikai ruh ïa ki nongdie doh syiar ha ka ba ïadei bad ka rukom otdoh syiar katkum kajuh mynta ha ka rukom ka ba khuid kaba suba bad ban batai halor ki kyndon bad ki rukom treikam haba ïadei bad ka rukom otdoh syiar. U la pyntip ruh ba kane ka jingpynrung kyrteng kan long na ka bynta baroh ki nongshong shnong na ki thaiñ ka Khasi bad Jaintia bad kane kan dei ka sien ba khadduh na ka liang ka FSSAI ba kan ailad ban ïoh ban pynrung ïa ki kyrteng jong ki ban ïoh laisen.
title: 19 tarik kan long ka sien ka ba khadduh ba ka FSSAI kan ailad ban pynrung kyrteng na ka bynta ki nongot dohsyiar na Khasi bad Jaintia : khot wer ka MPS ban wan ban shim bynta ha kane ka sngi

content: :Ka jingpynkiew ïa ka jingpyntreikam shna bording naduh na ka district Sibbari shaduh Baghmara ha South Garo Hills ka la pynkhuslai jur na ka daw jong ka jingshah kynnoh ka jingbym treikam bha da ki kontraktor kiba la shah thung da ka tnat bording jong ka jylla.Katei ka projek, kaba la don ka jingsdang ban pynïeng biang ïa ki post bording bad ka jingsam bording, ka la wan bad ka jingbei tyngka kaba mar mar. Hynrei, ha ka jingkhmih bniah halor katei, ka la paw pyrthei ba ïa ka kam ba la trei da ka kompeni jong ki kontraktor, kam shym la ïahap satia.Ka nuksa kaba la ïohi na ka surok ha Baghmara bad Sibbari ka pyni ba la don ka jingbym biang ka rukom treikam na ka bynta kitei ki post bording ba thymmai, kaba la lah ban kdew hangne ba la don ka bym biang ka rukom pynïeng ïa kine ki post. Ka jingbym biang jong ka jingpyn skhem ïa kine ki post ka la kylla long ka jingi sheptieng shaphang ka jingshah khlong noh ka khyndew bad ka jingma ka ap na ka jingkhyllem kloi kine ki post, khamtam ha kum kane ka por aïom slap.Ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la pynpaw ka jingkhuslai jong ki halor katei, da kaba kynnoh ba ki kontraktor ba ïoh ïa kane ka projek ki la trei tang ban dep rukom, da kaba kren shaphang ka jingbym biang ki tiar ki tar bad ym don ba leit khmih na ka liang jong ka tnat bording ba kan korbar ïa kine ki jingbakla baroh.
title: Ka jingkhuslai halor ka jingtreikam shna bording ha SGH

content: :Ka jingsdang ïa ka samoi synrai ne Autumn Session jong ka Meghalaya legislative Session kaba mynta ka sngi, ka 15 tarik, Nailur, u nongïalam jong ka seng Trinamool Congress (TMC), u Mukul Sangma, u la ong ba ka party kan sa shimti ïa ki katto katne tylli ki mat ba kongsan, kynthup ïa ka jonglong jingman ka Law and Order, ka jingïakren bad ka seng HNLC bad kiwei kiwei ha ka Assembly.“Kaei kaei kaba donkam ka ban shimkhia, yn sa ïakren ha Assembly. Don ki katto katne ki mat ba kongsan, kum ka jinglong jingman jong ka Law and Order, ka jingïakren ïasuk bad ka seng HNLC, ka jingshimkhia jong ki paidbah ka ban sa ïakren,” ong u Mukul.U Sangma u la ong ruh ba katkum ki tnat treikam bapher bapher, la don katto katne ki mat jong ka jingbym hok ka jingtreikam, ka jingbym biang ka jingtreikam kaba la dep shimkhia bad yn don ki jingïakren.
title: Yn don bynta ka TMC ha ka Law & Order, pynbna ka HNLC ha Assembly

content: :U nongïalam ka liang pyrshah ne u Leader Opposition (LO), u Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ai jingïaroh ïa ka seng Indian National Congress (INC) na ka bynta ka jingai ïa ka Sixth Schedule sha ki paidbah bad ai jingïada ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah riew lum ka jylla Meghalaya.“Lada ngi la don ha ka jingshngaiñ, ngi dang ïoh kam trai ïa ka jaka lajong, ban don ka rukom treikam kaba katkum ka riti ka dustur, ki kyndon riti, ka long namar jong ka seng Congress. Ka dei ka jingïohi jngai jong ki nongïalam ka seng Congress kiba la pynïoh ïa ka Sixth Schedule,” ong u Lyngdoh katba u dang jubab ïa ka jingkylli shaphang ba lada ka jingïalong paralok ka I.N.D.I.A kan lah ne em ban shimkhia halor ka BJP ha ka jingthep vote ban wan jong ka Lok Sabha. U la kam ba tang ki party national kum ka Congress kaba lah ban shimkhia ïa ki mat hapoh ka ïing dorbar thaw aiñ bad ban ai jingïada ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah ba duna paid.
title: Ïaroh u Ronnie ïa ka Congress na ka bynta ka jingai jingïada ïa ka hok jong ki paidbah ri lum jong ka Meghalaya

content: Ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association (EKHCA) kan pynlong ïa ka Inter School Cricket Tournament ia kaba la tip kum ka (Lt.) Benjamin Diengdoh Memorial Trophy ha ka tiew ba-ar jong u bnai u Risaw mynta u snem.Kane ka lympung ka long na ka bynta ka kyrdan ïalehkai jong ki khynnah shynrang kiba hapoh 15 snem bard hapoh 17 snem na ka bynta ki kynthei.Kino kino ki skul kiba don jingthmu ban ïashim bynta ha katei ka lympung ki lah ban phone ha u nombor 8787715454, 8974-281047, 8787635040) bad 9863024837.
title: Yn pynlong ka EKHCA ïa ka Inter School Cricket Tournament ha u Risaw

content: Ka tnat Ïalehkai jong ka jylla ka la pynlong da ka program ban ai mynsiem bad kitbok ia ki ‘thei ïalehkai jong ka Saiden Secondary School, Nongpoh (kiba hapoh 17 snem) ki ban mih khmat na ka bynta ka jylla sha ka lympung State Level Subroto Mukherjee Cup Football Tournament 2023 ka ban sdang naduh 19 tarik haduh 26 tarik mynta u bnai ha Nongbah Delhi.Ha katei ka sngi ba pynlong ïa kane ka prokram, i Kong Isawanda Laloo, IAS Director Sports & Youth Affairs jong ka sorkar jylla Meghalaya i la wan kum i kongsan ha ryngkat bad u Bah P.B. War Nongbri, Assistant Director Sports & Youth Affairs, u District Sports Officer jong ka Ribhoi District, Headmaster jong ka skul Saiden Secondary School Nongpoh, ki nonghikai lem bad kiwei kiwei. La pynïaid ïa kane ka prokram da u Bah K. Passah, Assistant Director Sports & Youth Affairs.Ha kane ka lympung, la phiah haduh phra tylli ki Pool kiba la bynta mar saw kynhun kawei kawei. Ka kynhun jong ki thei Under-17 jong ka jylla ki la hap hapoh jong ka Pool-G, kiba kynthup ïa ka Goa, Uttrakhand bad ka KVS. Na ka bynta ki ‘thei ïalehkai jong ka jylla kin sdang ia kane ka jingiakhun ha ka 20 tarik, bad ka jingïakhun kan long pyrshah ïa ka Goa.
title: Yn leit ïakhun ki ‘thei ka jylla sha Delhi

content: Ka Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka la weng noh ïa ka dawa jong ka hadien ba ka sorkar ka la kular ban pynjlan ïa ki kynta shong Dorbar Synrai da 2-3 kynta man ka sngi.Kham mynshuwa, haba khyllie ïa kane ka mat, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la ïathuh ba um hun satia ban ïohi ïa ki jingmang ïa ki sngi shong dorbar kiba tang san sngi kiba lyngkot palat, khamtam haba ka sorkar ka pynlong dorbar tang arsien ha ka shisnem.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka jingai por tang 2 sngi ïa ka Private Members’ Business kam pat biang satia, namar ki don bun ki mat ban ïakren na ka bynta ka jylla.U la ïathuh ba ki don shibun ki mat kiba khia jong ka jylla, kynthup ïa ka jingkiew ka jingduk bad ka pule puthi kumba la kdew ha ka jinglum jingkheiñ ha ka ri, kaba duna tam na ka ri baroh kawei, ka jingialeh pyrshah ïa ki drok, ka jingsngewkhia ki samla pule halor ka National Education Policy (NEP), ka jingud jingïam ki samla ba la nang la stad ba kim ïoh kam ïoh kam ïoh jam, ka jingbym biang ka rukom mang bhah ïa ki samla leit pule MBBS, ka jingpynsngew paidbah halor ka jingktah ïa ka mariang na ka jingpynheh ïa ka karkhana dewbilat ha East Jaintia  Hills, ka jingleh hangamei ki pulit, ka jinglong jingman ka Them Metor bad ka jingbei tyngka na ka bynta ka Shillong Cherry Blossom Festival.Haba kyrshan ïa kane ka mat, u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit, MLA ka Nongkrem bad ruh u khliehduh ka VPP u la ong, “Nga sngew ba kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba biang tam ïa ki paidbah ka jylla ban pynjlan shuh shuh ïa ki sngi shong dorbar bad pynbun ïa ki kynta khnang ba ngi lah ban khyllie ïa kiba bun ki mat”.U la pynkynmaw ruh ïa ka sorkar ba ka liang pyrshah ka don ban wohnia ïa ka sorkar khnang ban pyntyllun shakhmat ïa ka jylla.Haba jubab ïa kane ka mat, u Symbud Myntri Rangbah u Bah Prestone Tynsong uba dei peit ïaka tnad Parliamentary Affairs u la ong, “Ha ka jingshisha, ha ka sngi ba ngi lum ïa ka jingïalang ka BAC, ngi la dep ïaphylliew jingmut bad baroh ki dkhot bad ngi la buh san sngi na ka bynta ka dorbar”.“Hynrei ha ki san sngi shong dorbar, ngi la ïathuh ba ngi lah ban pynjlan ïa ki kynta da 2-3 kynta lada donkam. Kumta nga la kheiñ ba ka jingpynjlan da 2-3 kynta man ka sngi kin ïaryngkat bad ka shisngi”, u la bynrap.U Bah Prestone u la ong ba u la ïohi ba ki jingbuh jingkylli, ka Zero Hour bad ki mat ïakren ki lah ban pynsyrwa kai ïa ka por.“Kumta lada ka liang pyrshah ka don ïa ki mat jingïakren, kam dei ban pynsyrwa kai ïa ka por. Ki lah ban  phah ïa ki mat khnang ba ka ophis kan pynbeit ïa ka por”, u la ong haba kyntu ïa u Lamphang ban mynjur ïa ka jingai por tam.Hadien ba la kular ban pynjlan ïa ka por jong ki sngi shong dorbar, u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la mynjur ban weng noh ïa ka jingdawa.
title: Kular ka sorkar ban pynjlan da 2-3 kynta man ka sngi ha ka Dorbar Synrai : VPP

content: Ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) na Meghalaya bad ka Karbi Anglong Autonomous Council (KAAC) kaba na Assam ki la rai ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka shongsuk shongsaiñ ha ki thaiñ ba ïakajia pud jong ki ar tylli ki jylla, kiba hap hapoh Block-II.Ïa kane la rai ha ka jingïalang hapdeng ka KHADC bad ka KAAC ha ka 14 tarik u Nailur.Kane ka jingïakynduh hapdeng ka KHADC na Meghalaya bad ka KAAC na Assam ka la mih hapdeng ka jingïakynad kaba jur hapdeng ki Pnar na Jaintia bad ki Karbi na Assam, ha ki khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam.U Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC bad u Tuliram Ronghang uba dei u khliehduh ka KAAC lem bad u MP ka Karbi Anglong u Horen Singh Bey ki la don lang ha kane ka jingïalang lem bad ki dkhot ka Executive na baroh ar tylli ki Autonomous Council.“Ngi la ïakren ïa ka jinglong jingman kaba dangneh ha ki thaiñ khappud ka Meghalaya bad Assam. Ka jingpynkhreh ban pynbeit ïa ka jingïakajia pud ka la ïaid sahphrang. Ha ka bynta kaba ar la kynthup ïa ka Block-II bad ngi sngewthuh ba bun ki shong ba buhai shnong ki Khasi ki don ha kine ki thain.Naduh ba nga shimti kum u CEM, ngi la leit jurip ïa kine ki thain. Ha Block-II, ki don 23 tylli ki shnong Khasi. Ngi la ïakynduh ïa ki khlieh nongsynshar bad kiwei kiba donkti lang bad ha ka jingïakynduh ngi la kyntu ïa ki ban ïatreilang bad bthah ïa ki ba kim dei ban pyndik ïa ki briew jongngi ha ka jingim kaba man ka sngi ka jong ki”, ong u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.U la ïathuh ruh ba u CEM ka KAAC u la kular ba ka Council kan ïatreilang bad ka KHADC ban ïada ïa ki Khasi kiba shong ha ki shnong kiba don ha Block-II.
title: Rai ka KHADC bad KAAC ban pynnneh pynsah ïa ka jingsuk ha ki thain Block-II

content: Ki pulit jong ka Anti Narcotic Task Force (ANTF) ki la ioh ban bat ïa ar tylli ki kali kiba kit ïa ki jingdih buaid ha ka step jong ka 15 tarik u Nailur na East Jaintia Hills.Ha ka jingpyllait khubor ha ka Sngi Thohdieng, u Superintendent of Police ka East Jaintia Hills u Jagpal Dhanoa u la ïathuh ba la ïoh jingtip kaba thikna ïa ka jingwanrah ïa ki drok ha ki ar tylli ki kali (Toursit) na Mizoram.Kumta ki pulit ANTF ryngkat ki nongtrei ka Umtyra Check Gate bad ki pulit ka Khliehriat ki la ap ktem ha Nongsning hapoh ka jingïalam u Additional Superintendent of Police ka Est Jaintia Hills u Bah Banraplang Jyrwa.Dei ha ka por 8.30 baje mynstep ba la ïoh bat ïa kine ki kali bad ha ka por ba talasi ïa ka kali kaba nyngkong, ka Tata Sumo kaba don ia u number ML-05-M-1597, la lap ïa ki kynja powder rong stem ba la thep ha ki saw tylli ki synduk sabon bad kiba khia 43.33 kram bad haba talasi ïa kawei pat ka kali Tata Sumo kaba don ïa u number MZ-01-K-3872, la lap sa ïa 44 synduk sabon ki powder rong stem soh kiba khia 516.43 kram.Haba la peit bniah, la lap ba ki dei ki drok heroin. Hadien kane, la kurup ïa kine ki song sabon ha ka jingdon lang ki nongsakhi.Ïa ki briew ba la ïoh kem la tip kum u Lorence Zomuanpuia ba la don 32 snem bad u Lalmalsawa ba la don 36 snem ka rta.Nalor kine ki jingdih buaid, ki pulit ki la ïoh kurup ruh ia ka pisa kaba don T.1,000 bad T.1,200 ryngkat bad 2 tylli ki Mobile Phone.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane, la pynngat mukotduma hapoh ki kyndon ka NDPS Act ha Khliehriat Police Station bad ki la tohkit ban thwet da ïa kiba donkti lang.Kham hashuwa jong kane, ki pulit ka Meghalaya ha ka 14 tarik u Nailur ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa 48 synduk ki drok heroin ba shongdor T.5.5 klur na East Jaintia Hills District.Haba thoh ha ka Twitter, u Conrad Sangma, Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u la kdew da kaba ong, “Ki pulit ka East Jaintia Hills ki la pynpulom ïa ka jingthmu ba sniew ki nongkhaïi beaiñ ban pynjot ïa ki samla bad ki la ïoh ban kem ïa arngut ki nongkhaïi beain na ki jylla ba marjan bad ïoh kurup ïa 48 synduk ki drok Heroin ba shongdor T.5.5 klur, ioh bat ia ar tylli ki kali bad kiwei ki kot ki sla. Nga iaroh ia ka jingtrei khlem shongthait u heh pulit LR Bishnoi bad ka kynhun jong u. Ka jinghiar thma jongngi pyrshah ïa ki drok kan dangbteng”.Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw, ki pulit ka Meghalaya ha ka 3 tarik u Nailur ki la kem ïa uwei u nongkhaïi drok bad lap ïa ki drok ba shongdor T.15 klur na u. Na une u briew la ïoh ban kurup ïa ki jait drok Crystal Meth kiba khia 10.16 kilo.
title: Kurup ki pulit ANTF ïa bun bah ki drok na East Jaintia Hills
