content: Ka National Book Trust kaba hap hapoh ka Ministry of Education jong ka sorkar India ka la pynsangeh shuwa ïa ka Shillong Book Fair 2023 ba la thmu ban pynlong naduh ka 18 haduh 24 tarik u Nailur ha State Central Library Shillog, namar ki katto katne ki daw. Ïa ki tarik ba thymmai yn sa pynbna kham hadien. Ïa kane la pyntip da u Deputy Director ka School Education & Literary & Nodal Officer ka Shillong Book Fair.
title: La pynsangeh shuwa ïa ka Shillong Book Fair 2023

content: Ki shipai Border Security Force (BSF) ka 43 Battalion, kum shi bynta ban pynthikna ïa ka jingbit jingbiang ki paidbah ha khappud, ki la pynlong ïa ka jingai jingsumar ei hapoh ka Civil Action Programme ha Border Out Post Chirangri jong ka South Garo Hills. Ha kane ka prokram, ki doktor ka BSF ki la ai jingsumar bad sam ei ïa ki dawai sha ki nongshong shnong khappud.Nalor kane ka jingsumar ei, u Tarni Kumar Tiu, DIG, BSF Sector Headquarter Shillong lem bad u Ratikant Thakur, Commanding Officer ka 43Bn BSF ki la leit sam ïa ki tiar bapher bapher kum ki tiar ilektrik na ka bor jong ka sngi, ki shatri, ki shuki plastik, ki miej, ki tiar ïalehkai bad kiwei sha ki khynnah pule bad sha ki shnong kiba donkam ha ka shnong Rongra, Chirangri, Seemakona bad Dambukaphal. Ha kane ka prokram la don bun ki paidbah kiba la ïaroh ïa ka jingthawlad ki shipai BSF.
title: Sam shatri, shuki bad tiar ïalehkai ki shipai BSF sha ki nongshongshnong ha khappud

content: Ki seng bhalang bapher bapher jong ka Garo Hills ki la byrngem ba kin pynlong ia ki jingiakhih lada ka Sorkar kam khang khyrdep ia ka jingtih maw ha ka thain Chokpot ha South Garo Hills. Kine ki seng ki la ong ba ka jingtih ia ki mawlong mawteh ha katei ka thain da kawei ka kynhun shimet ka la pynjot lut ia katei ka thain baroh kawei.Kane ka jingtih maw ka la ktah jur eh ia ka Budugre kaba dei ka jaka shnong kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit jingjngoh ha ki khlieh nongsynshar Nokma jong ka Garo Hills. La iathuh ba kane ka jingtih maw ka dei jong u briew shimet, uba la buh ruh ia ki kor ki bor tylliat mawria bad pynjot thiaw ia katei ka jaka, ha kaba ki lum ki la madan, ki dieng ki la khyllem lut, kiba lah ban ktah ia ka jinglong jingman jong ki dieng ki siej, ki pung bad ki wah kiba don hajan jong katei ka jaka.Ki nongialam jong ka FKJGP, A’chik Holistic Awakening Movement, Garoland State Movement Committee bad A’chik Youth Welfare Organization ki la iakynduh ia u ophisar jong ka Chokpot Civil Sub-divisional bad ai ruh ha u da ka jingthoh ba dei ban khang khyrdep ia katei ka jintihmaw. Kane ka jingpynjot ia ka mariang ka la ktah ia ka Wah Dareng kaba pyndaw um Chokpot bad ia kiwei ki shnong ki thaw kiba don sharum jong katei ka jaka.Ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingpynjot ia ka mariang ka la sdang naduh u Lber mynta ka snem ha kaba ki kynhun bad ki khynnah skul ki la pyllong ia ka jingiaid pyrshah paidbah. Ki nongshong jong katei ka jaka, ki la kynnoh ba u la shim kabu da ka pynkylla lut ia ki kyndon jong ka ain kiba ia dei bad ka jingioh jingbit bad katei ka jingtihmaw kaba la pynjakhlia ia ka Wah Dareng kaba sdang ruh ban rngat.
title: Pyrshah ki seng bhalang Garo Hills ïa ka jingtih maw ha South Garo Hills

content: U Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council u Pyniaid Sing Syiem mynta ka sngi u la leit jngoh ia ka Khanapara kaba long kawei na ki jaka ka khappud jong ka Assam. Kane ka jingleit jngoh ka long kum shi bynta ban peit ia ki mawbynna kiba long ruh kum ka jingkdew jong u pud u sam jong ka Meghalaya.Ha kane ka jingleit jngoh, u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem ula ia kynduh ia u Rangbah Shnong jong ka Khanapara ha kaba la don lang ruh ki dkhot jong ka Border Welfare Committee ba la ialam da Ka Idalin Lynshing, ka President ka Border Welfare Committee Land Owner ka Kong Kerlyne Rumnong kaba la ai sngewbha ia ka jingpynieng ia ki mawbynna ha katei ka jaka.Ha kane ka jingiakynduh jong u Bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem, la pynsngew ruh ia ka jingduna jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba long ki trai jaka kiba don mynta tang 23 iing ha Khanapara, hynrei kiwei pat ki dei ki bym dei ki trai jylla. Kine ki nong shong shnong ki la ithuh ba bun na ki kam pynroi ha katei ka jaka la leh da ka Sorkar Assam.
title: Leit jngoh u CEM Pyniaid Sing Syiem ïa ka Khanapara

content: :Hadien ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong kiba sah ha Umden bad ki jaka ba markhap ki la mad jingeh man ka ka sngi ha ka leit ka wan jong ki na Nongpoh sha ki shnong jong ki, kumta ka Nongpoh Constituency Political Committee ha ka 15 tarik, Nailur 2023, ka la pynlong da ka Signature Campaign ha Umden Market (Ïew Umden) ban pynpaw da kaba kren halor ki jaka ha Umden kiba dei ki jaka ba la pyndonkam ma ki ban leit ban wan na ka surok Nongpoh Umden sha Sonapur. Bun na ki paidbah kiba la ïashim bynta ha katei ka Signature Campaign ki kynthup ïa ki samla, kynthei, nongniah taxi, khynnah pule, ki rangbah shnong, ka kynhun ïakhih lang ne ki Pressure Group bad kiwei kiwei.Haba la kren ha ka por katei ka kampeiñ, u Sylvanus Mallai, u Chairman u la kylli jingkylli ïa ki MLA jong ka Nongpoh Constituency u la ong “U MLA jong ngi u la dep kren shaphang kane ja surok ba shen, yn sa shna ïa ka hynrei u la ong ruh ba yn sa shna shwa ïa katei ka surok hadien ka aïom slap, Hato ngi donkam ban maramot lada ngi la ïoh surik thymmai?.”“Ka surok na Nongpoh Umden sha Sonapur ka dei kawei na ki surok ba sniew palat bad ngi donkam ka khusnam na ka bynta kane. Ngi la duh ruh wat ïa ki baieid bathoiñ tang namar ba ka jingsniew palat ka surok kaba ngim lah shuh ban poi wat sha ka jaka sumar ha ka por ba biang kaba long ruh ka jingsngewsih ba wat ka kali kit nongpang ne ka Ambulance 108 ka kyntait ban wan sha kane ka jaka jong ngi.” ong u Mallai.U la kylli ruh ïa utei u MLA ba un pynpaw ka jingeh halor kane ha ka Assembly, “ka DPR kaba la dep pynpaw ha ka Assembly ha u snem 2022 bad wat u Myntri jong ka PWD u la pynthikna, hynrei kaei kaba ngi don mynta?” la kylli utei u MLA.“Kito kiba ïaid na kane ka surok ki lah ban sngewthuh, namar ba ym don daw ba kane ka surok kan bha ha kum kane ka por slap bad ka jingsyntuid ka surok katba ha ka por tlang, ka jur ka jingpum pum” la pynut utei u MLA.Kawei ka riew kynthei hadien ba ka la dep soi ha kane ka kampeiñ ka la ong “Ka jingmaramot ïa kane ka surok kan nym ïarap eiei ruh em ïangi namar ba la dep maramot mynta la da ki phew snem, na kata ka daw, ngi donkam ïa ka surok ba bha”. Kiwei pat ki nongkren ki la kyrpad ïa ka sorkar MDA 2.0 ba kan pyndep ïa ka jingkular jong ka namar ba ki paidbah jong ka Umden kiba kynthup bun da ki spah ngut ki la jynjar ban ïaid na kane ka surok.
title: Ud ki paidbah jong ka Umden ba sniew palat ka surok ha Nongpoh

content: :Kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih kaba la jia hapdeng ka ar shaka bad ka trok ha ka 16 tarik, Nailur, kaba la lam sha ka jingkhlad jong u nongniah ïa katei ka ar shaka ha ka por 11 baje mynstep ha ka surok bah ne NH6 ha Ummulong kaba don hajan jong ka surok ban leit sha Moodymmai.Katei ka jingjia ïa takhuh kali ka la ishyrkhei haduh katta katta ha kaba katei ka ar shaka ka la leit tynrah beit beit ïa katei ka trok, kaba la pynlong ïa utei u nongniah ar shaka ba un poi rung shapoh katei ka trok bad shah tylliat na ka khleh jong u.Ki nongsakhi ki la ïathuh ba katei ka trok bad katei ka ar shaka ka la niah stet bha, ha kaba ka la pynlong ïa ki ba kin nym lah shuh ban teh lakam ïa ka jingpyn sangeh ïa ka kali jong ki, kaba la pynlong ruh ban jia katei ka aksiden.
title: Khlad hashen u nongniah ar shaka ha ka jingïa takhuh bad ka trok

content: :Hadien ka jingmih jong ka video ba la ïoh ringdur lyngba ka CCTV jong ka State Bank of India SBI Ranikor Branch la ïoh ïa ka jing ïaknieh rung jong ki paitbah kaba la i shyrkhei ban peit ha kaba wat ïa u nongap pahara jong ka tei ka bank u la jan shah ïuh ha kitei ki paitbah.Halor kane ka bynta mynta ka sngi jong ka 15 tarik Nailur 2023 ka KSU Ranikor circle haka jing ïalam u Bah Siril Langte vice president bad Bah Orisstar Langte General Secretary ki la hiar jurip ïaka ka tei ka SBI Bank Ranikor Branch ïa ka jinglong jingman bad ïaka rukom trei kam da kaba la ïoh ruh  ban ïa kren bad u Branch manager jong ka tei ka Bank ka seng kala lap ïa shibun ki jing duna jong ka tei ka branch ha kaba ki nongtrei ki don tang 6 ngut katba ki shnong kiba ïa trei kam bad ka tei ka bank ki don haduh 150 shnong. Namar kata ka jing ai jingshakri jong kane ka Bank kala long kaba la eh palat, nangta ka light ruh kam biang, bad kaba kongsan tam ka dei ka jing bym biang jong ka network kaba la pyndkoh shi kat dei ïaka rukom trei kam jong katei ka SBI Branch hapoh Ranikor.Na ka liang ka seng kala pynpaw ïa ka jingsngew synei shisha ïa u Branch Manager jong kane ka Bank ha kaba u branch u hap ban trei kam lang bad ki staff jong u kaba um ju ïoh ban shong haka ophis trei kam jong u. Ka seng KSU kala pynpaw ba kala i don kam shuh shuh ban don sa ki wei pat ki Bank kynshew pisa ha kane ka thaiñ namar kumba long mynta kala khia shaba palat ïa kane ka bank kaba don mynta, ha kawei pat ka liang ka seng kala kyntu ïa u nongmih khmat kata ïa u bah Pius Marwein u ba dei u MLA jong kane ka dong ka thain ba un phai khmat lem sha ki paitbah kiba ïa kynduh ïa kane ka jing eh haba ïadei bad ka Bank.
title: Dei naka daw ba duna network bad duh light khah khah bala pynlong ban ïa tur ki paidbah ha ka SBI Ranikor Branch

content: Ki nongshong baioh ia ka jingpang HIV bad tip kum kita ki nonshong shnong People living with HIV (PLHIV) ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingkiew jong ki nongpang kiba ym treh ban buddieng ia kane ka jingpang bad tip kum kita ki nongshong shnong Lost to Follow-Up (LFU) ha Meghalaya. Kiba hap ha ka thup LFU ki don haduh 1500 Meghalaya,” la iathuh u Bah Barry Leslie Kharmalki.U la iathuh ba wat hapdeng ka jingtrei shitom jong ki nongtrei ka koit ka khiah, ki seng bapher bapher kiba trei kam ha ki shong ki thaw bad ruh na ka liang jong ka Sorkar, ka don pat ka jingkiew na ka liang jong ki LFU bad kyntu ia ki ba kin shim ia ki lad ai jingkoit jingkhiah. U la ong ba ka long ka kongsan lada lah ban pyndkut noh ia ka jingsaphriang ia ka jingpang HIV. La khot LFU ia kito ki briew kiba ioh ia ka jingpang AIDS bad kiba ym bteng pat ia ka jingsumar bad jingshim dawai.
title: Bun kiba ïoh ïa ka jingpang HIV bad sangeh sumar bad shim dawai ha Meghalaya

content: Kum shi bynta ban pynshlur ia ki nongrep bad ban kyntiew ia ka rep ka riang ha ka jylla, ka Central Integrated Pest Management Center (CIPMC) Shillong ha ka jingiatreilang bad ka Agricultural Technology Management Agency bad ka Umsning C&RD Block ka la pynlong ia ka jingai jinghikai pyniap khniang khamtam ha Mawlyngkhung ka shnong kaba don ha Ri-Bhoi. Ha kane ka jingai jinghikai la ia don lang ki nongrep ba paw khmat.Kane ka jinghikai ka long ruh kumno ban pynkhreh ia ki symbai bad kumno ban pyndonkam ia ki dawai pyniap khniang bad ha kano ka por dei ban pyndonkam khnang ba lah ban pynduna ia ki khniang ha ki kba. Ha kane ka sngi la iadon lang ki saiantis jng ka CIPMC kiba kynthup ia u Gokulraam M, Plant Protection Officer(E), Dr. Devaraja KP, APPO (E), Aroti Hazarika, APPO (E), Tenzing Wangden, SA bad Mighty Star Lyngdoh Deputy Project Director ATMA Ri Bhoi District, Officer na  Umsning C&RD Block.
title: Ai jinghikai pyniap khniang ka Central Integrated Pest Management Center

content: :Ka long kaei kaei kaba pynlyngngoh ïa ka Seng HYC haba ïa ka kam trei malu mala kaba u Khasi u dang lah ban trei pynban la lap ba ïa kiba kum kita ki kam la aiti bad phah sha ki bar Jylla. Kane ka dei ka jinglap jong ka Seng HYC Mawthadraishan Circle ha ka 15 tarik Nailur hapoh Mawphanlur ha kaba uwei na ki kontraktor u la wanrah ïa ki nongtrei nabar ka Jylla ban pyntrei ïa ki katto katne ki jingtei hapoh Mawphanlur.Haba kylli ïa kitei ki bar kylli ki la ïathuh ba ka jingtrei ka dei ka restaurant, swimming pool bad kiwei bad haba peit ka dei ka jingtrei ba u Khasi u dang suk ban trei pynban la trei ïa kine da ki bar Jylla. Ka Seng HYC ka kyntu ïa utei u kontraktor uba ka Seng kam kwah ban Pynpaw kyrteng ba u dei ban bujli noh ïa ki nongtrei da ki paradoh parasnam ha jaka kitei ki briew kiba nabar hapoh 3 sngi bad lada um lah ban weng ïa kitei ki nongtrei bar jylla hapoh lai sngi ka Seng kan sa weng hi. Ka Seng ka ju kren na ka por sha ka por ba da lei lei kam shah horkit hordang ban wan rah ïa ki bar Jylla ban trei ne rung hapoh ka dong ka thaiñ, lait sa tang lada ka kam ym lah shuh ban trei da u Khasi hap ban ai sha kiwei pat ki briew kiba nabar.Hynrei haba ka kam ka dei kaba suk balei hap ban wanrah da ki briew kiba nabar. Na ka liang ka Seng ka kwah ba baroh ki paradoh parasnam khamtam kiba don ki jingtrei kiba pher ba pher hapoh ka bri u hynniewtrep ba ki dei ban aikam ai jam nyngkong ïa ki Khasi bad lada ki Khasi kim lah shuh ban trei hap khot ïa ki briew kiba nabar.
title: Wanrah u kontraktor da ki bar jylla ban pyntrei ïa ki jaka ha Mawphanlur

content: :Ka seng Khasi Students Union(KSU), East Jaintia Hills District Unit, ha ka jingïalang paidbah ha ka 14 tarik, Nailur, ka la rai ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih ha ka 25 tarik, Nailur kaba la kynthup lang ïa ki dkhot ba thiah surok ha ki surok bah jong ka National Highway 6 kaba don ha Khliehriat, kaba dei ka headquarter jong ka district jong ka East Jaintia Hills, naduh ka 10 baje mynstep haduh 4 baje janmiet.Katei ka jingrai ban pynlong da ka jingïakhih ka dei ka jingbteng jong ka National Highway Authority of India (NHAI) ba kan kair ban pynsngap watla bun ki jingdawa ba la phah da kaeti ka kynhun. Katei ka jingïakhih ka la wan hadien ka jingïakhih kaba ïasyriem ha ka 8 tarik, Nailar 2023, kaba la kren shaphang kajuh ka mat. Ha ka por ba don katei ka jingïakhih, u Technical Manager jong ka NHAI u la pynthikna ha ka kynhun ba yn sa sdang noh ban maramot ïa ka surok tang hapoh hynriew taïew, hynrei ka jingkular kam jia kumba u la ong.Ha ka jingpyllait paidbah ïa katei ha ki kot khubor myn ha ka 15 tarik, Nailur 2023, ka kynhun ka pynpaw ka jingsngew diaw jong ki, da kaba ong, “Ma u (Manager Technical, NHAI) u la kular ïangi ban pyndep ïa ka kam hapoh hynriew taïew, hynrei tad haduh mynta, um pat sdang ïa ka kam ban trei. Ha ka jingshisha, katei ka surok ka la nang sniew shuh shuh na ka daw ka jingtuid ka khyndew ha ka por slap bad ka jingpum pum ha ka por tlang. Wat ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la sheptieng ban mih shabar ïing jong ki, ki jingjia aksiden ki ju jia man la ka sngi bad bun ki jingeh kiba ki paidbah ki mad na ka daw jong ka jingsniew palat ka surok.”Katkum katei ka jingpyllait ha ka kot khubor, ka la don ka jingkyrpad ïa baroh ba kin nym leit jingleit leit trei leit ktah hapdeng ka por 7 baje mynmiet haduh 5 baje mynstep man la ka miet haduh shi taïew lada ka sorkar bad ka NHAI ka la bteng ban kiar ïa katei ka jingïakhih. Hynrei, ki la kyrpad jur ba yn nym don kano kano ka jinghuri hura ha ka por ba don kane ka jingïakhih.Shuh shuh, ka kynhun ka la dep khot ïa ki ar ngut ki MLA jong kane ka district, kynthup ïa u Kyrmen Shylla (MLA Khliehriat Constituency) bad ka Santa Mary Shylla (MLA Sutnga Constituency), ba kin kren halor kane ka mar hapoh ka Assembly. Ki la dawa da ka Call Attention Motion na ka bynta ban pynkhring ïa ka jingïakren halor ka jingsniew palat ka surok bad ban kyrpad ïa u Symbud Myntri, u Prestone Tyngsong, kumjuh ruh ïa u Myntri ka PWD, ba kin batai bniah ba balei ba ka NHAI ka la kyntait ïa kitei ki jingdawa, kaba long kum ka jingsngap mynthi ka sorkar na ka bynta ki paidbah jong ka East Jaintia Hills District.
title: Ïakhih ka KSU ïa ka jingkiar ban pyntrei ïa ka surok bah ha East Jaintia Hills

content: :Ka North-Eastern Hill University Teachers’ Association (NEHUTA) bad ka Meghalaya College Teachers’ Association (MCTA) ha ka sngi thohdieng, ka la kyrpad ïa u Vice-Chancellor jong ka NEHU, u Prof Prabha Shankar Shukla ba un pyntreikam kloi kloi ïa ka National Education Policy (NEP) 2020.“Ngi kyrpad jur ïa u Vice-Chancellor ba un khmih biang halor ka jingpyntreikam bad ban ïatreilang na ka bynta ka jingïaid beit ka kam, ka jingïa pyrkhat bha na ka bynta ka NEP 2020,” ong u president ka NEHUTA, u Prof Lakhon Kma bad u general secretary jong ka MCTA, u Dr AW Rani ha ka jingpynbna da ka jingkren hangne.Na ka bynta ka jingduna ka jingsheptieng ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingpule puthi ha kane ka jylla, ka jingkren ka la ong ba u nongkren jong ka jylla bad ki samla pule ki la duh noh ka jingpule lada ka NEP 2020 kam shym la treikam ka lah ban ktah ïa ka jingngeit jong ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka imlang ka sahlang khamtam ki khliehduh ba pynïaid ïa ki jaka pule ban kin mynjur khlem jingthut ïa ka NEP 2020.“Hato yn dei ban pyntreikam ïa ka NEP 2020 ha Meghalaya ha u 2023, ki samla pule bad ki kmie ki kpa ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka jinghikai ïa ka pule puthi ba mynta ka long sah kumjuh kumba ju long. Ki samla pule kin bteng ban leit pule hapoh lai snem ïa ka jingpule undergraduate program, kaba dei kajuh ka rukom hikai kaba la sah kumjuh haduh mynta. Kane ka jingpynneh ka jinghikai ka la long katkum ka aiñ ka rukom hikai bad kan ïai bteng tad haduh ba ka Meghalaya kan nymdoes not transit to the NEP. Don bun ki jaka pule kynthup ïa ki Central Universities ki bym shym la sdang pyntreikam ïa ka NEP ha u 2023,” ong ka kynhun NEHUTA.
title: Kyrpad ka NEHUTA bad ka MCTA ïa u Vice-Chancellor ka NEHU ban pyntreikam ïa ka National Education Policy (NEP) 2020

content: SHILLONG:Ka sorkar ka la plie ka lad ka lynti ban pynjlan ïa ka samoi ïakren jong ka Assembly kaba dang ïaid mynta naduh lai haduh saw kynta man la ka sngi lada donkam khnang ban lah ban ïa tai nia hapoh Assembly. Da kaba kren halor kane, u Symbud Myntri ba dei peit ïa ka kam hapoh ïing dorbar thaw aiñ, u Prestone Tynsong, u la ai jingmut ïa ki party ba shah shiliang ne ki opposition parties ba kin ïa mir jingmut lem napdeng jong ki halor ki mat kiba kongsan kiba ki kwah ban ïakren hapoh Assembly.Katei ka jingkyntu jong u Tynsong ka la wan hadien ba ka party jong ka liang pyrshah, ka Voice of the People Party (VPP), ha kaba sdang jong kane ka samoi synrai jong ka Assembly ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ka la kyrpad ban pynjlan ïa kane ka samoi. U nongmihkhmat jong ka seng VPP na North Shillong, u Adelbert Nongrum, uba la kyrpad halor kane ka samoi, hadien, u la weng noh ka jingkyrpad jong u.U Tynsong u la ong ba u sngewthuh ïa ka jingmut jong ki dkhot kiba la kren halor ka mat ba kongsan. U la kyrpad ïa ki liang pyrshah ba katba ki la dep phah ïa ki mat ban ïakren hapoh Assembly, kan bha ba ki ïashong lang ban ïakren halor ki mat bapher bapher ki ban nym sah teng lada ki wanrah kum kine ki jingïakren kiba don jingmut.
title: Kyntu u Symbud Myntri ïa ki nongïalam bapher jong ki seng ban ïamir jingmut hapoh Assembly

content: :Ka sorkar jylla ka la pynlut haduh T. 39.88 klur man la u bnai na ka bynta ban siew tulop ïa ki 32 tylli ki jaka pule (college) deficit, ki college jong ki paidbah, college ad hoc bad ki college lump sum ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya. Na katei, la dep pynlut haduh T. 320,868,676 na ka bynta ki 13 tylli ki college deficit, T. 56,198,954 sha ki 8 tylli ki college jong ki paidbah, T. 21,276,960 sha ki 6 tylli ki college ad hoc bad T. 500000 sha ki 5 tylli ki college lump sum, katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki lad pathai khubor.Kitei ki 13 tylli ki college deficit ki kynthup ïa ka St Edmunds College (T. 36038293), St Mary’s College (T. 34803054), St Anthony’s College (T. 51018119), College of Teacher Education (PGT) (T. 5086777), Sankardev College (T. 34858193), Synod College (T. 27153033), Shillong College (T. 38816778), Lady Keane College (T. 38813119), Shillong Commerce (T. 6664360), Union Christian College (T. 26664866), Mendipathar College (T. 4878050), Don Bosco College (T. 11458648) bad ka Seng Khasi College (T. 4615386).
title: Pynlut ka sorkar haduh 39.38 klur ban siew tulop ïa ki nongtrei Deficit

content: :U nongïalam ka liang pyrshah jong ka AITC bad u Myntri Rangbah barim ka Meghalaya, u Mukul Sangma u la maham tyngeh ba lada ka jingbamsap hapoh kane ka jylla ka la nang kynrei, yn sa don bun ki seng lehnoh ha Meghalaya. U la kren shaphang ka jingseng ba dang shen jong ka kynhun riew atiar, kaba la tip kum ka National Liberation Council of Nongkyndong (NLCN) ha ka thaiñ Khasi-Jaintia Hills, kaba pynlong ïa ka jingkyrduh kam, jingïa shah shiliang bad ka jingduna ka khaïa ka pateng hapoh ka jylla. U la ong ruh ba kine ki jingjia ki lah ban pynthut ïa ka imlang ka sahlang bad kane kan sa bteng haduh ki khatsan bad arphew snem, kaba yn sa lam sha ka jingeh jong ka jylla. U Mukul Sangma u la ban jur ba donkam ban pyn kongsan shwa ïa ka jingkhring hapoh jylla bad kren shaphang ka jingkiew ki kam sniew hapoh jylla.
title: Maham u Mukul halor ka jingkynrei ki seng riew kieng atiar ha Meghalaya

content: :U General Secretary ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad u nongïalam barim na Nongthymmai, u Jemino Mawthoh, ha ka 17 tarik, Nailur, u la ong ba ka jingrai ban pyntreikam biang ïa ka National Education Policy (NEP) kan sa ktah ïa ki samla pule jong ka imlang ka sahlang hapoh kane ka jylla.“Ka jingrai ban pyntreikam biang ïa ka NEP kan sa don jingktah na ka bynta jong ki samla pule ha kane ka imlang ka sahlang jong ka jylla jong ngi. To ngin ïapeit shwa nyngkong ïa ka jingkhring jong ki samla pule ha ki laiñ pule puthi ki jong ki,” ong u Mawthoh.
title: Maham u Jemino pyrshah ïa ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka NEP

content: NONGSTOIN:Ha kawei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih kawei ka longkmie kala duh noh ïala i jong i khun namar ka jingbym lap shuh ban poi sha ki jaka ai jingsumar tang namar ka jingdon ka jingpynïakop khwai dohkha hapoh ka pung Pamphyrnai kaba don hapoh ka shnong Ksehkohlong kaba la wanrah ïa ka jingdheng kali kaba shyrkhei bah naduh ka thaiñ Nongspung ter ter sha Pamphyrnai bad haduh ka shnong Umlieh.Katei ka jingjia kala jia ha ka 16 tarik u bnai Nailur 2023 ha kaba ka longkmie napoh ka shnong Mawthawniaw WKHD bad katei ka longkmie mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar hapoh Holy Cross Hospital ha Mairang katba ïa i khun jong ka bala khlad noh la pyndep noh ban tep hynne ka sngi ka 17 tarik, Nailur hapoh shnong. Haba ïakren bad ki katto katne ki nongthoh khubor katei ka longkmie kala ïathuh ba kila mih nala shnong da ka jingthmu ban leit kha khun sha Shillong hynrei ynda kila poi ha Nongspung kila sah kut haduh 3 kynta hapoh surok bad kiba ha ïing jong ka kila pyrshang ban kyrpad ïa ki kali ban ïa pyllait lem ïa ka lynti bad ki don katto katne ki ba ïa pyllait hynrei ki ba bun kim shym la sngap satia.Shuh shuh kala ong ruh ba hadien bala lait na katei ka pung Panphyrnai ka jaka ïa khwai dohkha kila ngat biang ha ka jingsahkut kali sa hapoh ka shnong Umlieh kaba don kham sha khmat jong katei ka pung bad na kane ka jingslem ha lynti katei ka longkmie kaba la don hapdeng ka jingsuh jingthar kala kha noh ïa i khun ha shiteng lynti mar ïapoi ha ka shnong Tiehsaw Khyllem kaba jngai tang kumba katto katne minit na Umlieh hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba i khyllung shynrang i la khlad noh.Nalor katei ka longkmie la ong ruh ba kawei ka kali kit nongpang Ambulance kala sahkut lang ha katei ka jingdheng kali bad kiwei de ki paidbah ba ïaid ba ïeng kaba la pynbitar shisha halor ka jingpynwit katei ka jingpynïakop khwai dohkha ïa ki paidbah ba ïaid ba ïeng namar ka jingïaïeng khlem akor ki kali ka jingbun ki nongbuiad khawiang kiba la pynwit ïa ka lynti jong ka surok bah. Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia na liang jong ki nongïalam ka Seng ba kynthup ïa ka HYC, North West bad ka Ri Khasi Sepngi Federation mynta ka sngi ka 17 tarik, Nailur kila leit sha katei ka Hospital ha Mairang ban ïakynduh ïa katei ka longkmie kaba la ïakynduh ïa katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.U President ka Ri Khasi Sepngi Federation haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba tang na ka daw ka jingpynsngewbha ïa ka doh da ki nongpynïaid bad kiba wan ha katei ka jingïakop khwai kala wanrah jingeh pynban ïa ki paidbah ba ïaid ba ïeng khamtam ïa kiba pang ba shitom kat haduh ban da don ruh ka jingduh noh ïa ka mynsiem ba kordor. Katba na ka liang jong u Samla Shembor Langrin GS ka HYC North West Khasi Hills Mairang u la ong ba jynlada ym don katei ka jingïakop khwai kan nym don hi ruh ka jingdheng kali ha katei ka jaka bad 3 kynta katei ka longkmie kala poi suk sha ka jaka sumar ha Nongbah Shillong.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba hadien bala wai katei ka jingïakop khwai kala don ruh sa kawei ka jingïakhalai nusib kaba heh ba la pynthong da ki kali rem dor bad kaba i kaba i khlemraiñ hangne ka long ba ki briew sorkar kiba phong ïa ka uniform kila kylla long tang kum ki nongpyn pule ïa u slip bad u number na ka bynta ki nongjop. Kumta kitei ki ar ngut ki nongïalam Seng kila dawa ruh na ki bor District ba ban khot hajir bad pynshitom ïa kiba don kti ha katei ka jingpynïaid khwai dohkha bad kila dawa ba dei ban pynsangeh noh ïa kiba kum kitei ki jingpynïakop katba ym pat lah ban pynbeit.
title: Duh ka longkmie ba armet ïa i khun ba dheng kali na ka jingpynïakop khwai ha Panphyrnai

content: :Ka Seminar jong ki dkhot ka Parish Pastoral Council kaba la dep pynlong lai sngi kaba long ka jingmihkhmat ba bun na ki parish bapher bapher hapoh ka Tura Diocese ka la kut noh ha ryngkat ka jingjop bakhraw ha Diocesan Pastoral Centre, Walbakgre Tura, ha ka 18 tarik, Nailur. Ka jingsdang jong kane ka Seminar ha ka 15 tarik, Nailur, ka la long ka tamasa bakhraw kaba la wanrah lang ïa baroh ki nongïalam haduh 60 ngut na ki parish bapher bapher ha ka thaiñ Garo.Ïa katei ka tamasa, la pynïaid da u Most Rev. Andrew R. Marak, uba dei u Bishop jong ka Tura, ha ka jingïa don lang u Most Rev. Jose Chirackal, uba dei u Auxiliary Bishop jong ka Tura bad ki katto katne ngut ki dkhot riewkhuid, kynthup ïa u Fr. Francis, Fr. Joy bad u Fr. Bromith Sangma. Ha katei ka seminar, la don ka jingïashim bynta jong ki riewkhuid ba pawnam kynthup ïa u Bishop Andrew R. Marak, Bishop Jose Chirackal, Fr. Joy, Fr. Francis, Fr. Thomas John bad u Fr. Bromith.Ki la kren shaphang ki mat ba kongsan, da kaba pyn kynthup halor ka bynta jong ka Parish Pastoral Council ha ka jingkynthup lang bad ka Canon Law, kaba dei ka rukom treikam jong ka Pastoral Council bad ka Parish Financial Council hapoh ki Parish, ki la pynlong ka jingduwai na ka bynta ki longïing, ka jing wanrah ïa ka jingim sacrament hapoh ka longïing bad ki parish, ka jing pyn thymmai ïa ka jingïalap ïa ka kot niam (Gospel) ha ka rukom ka bapher, ka Synodal Journey bad ka Instrumentum Laboris bad kiwei kiwei ki mat ïakren kiba kongsan. Ki nongïashim bynta ki la ïaroh bha ïa katei ka prokram, da kaba pynpaw ka jingïoh jingmyntoi na kane ka Seminar.
title: Kut ka Seminar parish pastoral ba lai sngi ha Tura

content: JOWAIHadien ka jinglah ka Diengshynrum ban pynliem noh da 1-0 kol ïa ka Pamrakmai Sports Club lyngba ka shi kol jong u Bewithus Sympli ha ka minit ba 71 kane ka kynhun ka la ioh ban jam ha ka phainal jong ka lympung 2nd Division Football Tournament ïa kaba la pynïaid da ka East Jaiñtia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA).Ka jingïakhun phainal jong ka Iatyllilang Hingaria Sports Club bad ka Diengshynrum SC kan long ha ka 23 tarik Nailur ha ka por 2:30 mynsngi.
title: 2nd Division Football Tournament : Ha ka 23 tarik yn rai īa ka lahduh mynta u snem

content: Ka jingiakob mareh ba la tip kum ka Mawlynnong Run Safari 2023 ba la pynlong ha Mawlynnong ha ka 16 tarik (sngi saitjain) ka la long kaba shongshit bad kaba ioh mynsiem namar ka jingbun ki nongwan iashim bynta na ki distrik bapher bapher bad kumjuh na ka jylla Jammu, Manipur, Assam, Chattisgarh bad Bangladesh.Ia kane ka jingiakob la pynlong da ka Ministry of Tourism. GOI (NE), Meghalaya Tourism & Sportive ha Mawlynnong, East Khasi Hills.Haduh 210 ngut ki la wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingiakob kiba kynthup ha ka thup 25 KM, 10 Km bad 5 KM.
title: Wan ïashim bynta ki nongïamareh na Bangladesh ha ka Mawlynnong Run Safari

content: :Ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingjia ba sngewsih jong ka longkmie ba armet bad kaba la duh noh ïa u khunlung jong ka ha ka kali tourist na ka daw jong ka jingdheng kali namar ba don ka jingïakop khwai dohkha ha pung Pamphyrnai ha ka 16 tarik, Nailur, ha kaba ka West Khasi Hills District Administration ka la pynlong da ka jingïalang ha ka 19 tarik, Nailur, ha kaba u Deputy Commissioner(DC), u Garod LSN Dykes u la pyntip ba ha katei ka jingïalang, la don ka jingrai ban thung da ka jingtohkit jong ka magistrate halor katei ka jingjia bad ba u Superintendent of Police un shim da ka rai ban phah rai ha ka ïing bishar ba kan sa leh hi ïa kaba donkam halor kane ka mukotduma.U DC u la ong, ‘Ngi la dep ïohpdiang ka jingpynbna na ka District Council Affairs (DCA) ba ïa ka jingïoh jingbit na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) kaba la ai jingbit ban pynlong ïa katei ka jingïakop khwai dohkha hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka West Khasi Hills, la dep pynsangeh noh bad ba ka bor synshar district kan sa bud ïa kajuh ka mukotduma.’ U la ong ba ki rangbah shnong jong ka Ksehkohlong bad ki nongpynïaid ïa kane ka jingïakop khwai dohkha kaba la pynlong ha Panphyrnai ha ka 16 tarik, Nailur ki la ïakynduh bad u mynta ka sngi, hynrei u la pynthikna ïa ki ba “kaei kaba la jia, yn sa shim rai da ka aiñ katkum ka jingbit jong ka.”
title: Yn tohkit ka Magistrate halor ka jingduh ïa i khunlung ba dang kha hapoh kali

content: :Ha ka por ba don ka jingkylli mar kylliang ha ka samoi synrai jong ka Question Hour jong ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly, u nongïalam na ka liang pyrshah ne Opposition bad u MLA na Mylliem, u Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la pynpaw katto katne ka jingsngew jong u da kaba kylli jingkylli halor ka mat ba dei shaphang ka Meghalayan Medical Drugs & Services Limited (MMDSL), ha kaba u la kylli pyrshah ïa ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ba kan ai ïa ka jubab ba biang. U Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la kylli shaphang ka rukom treikam jong ki board jong kai director jong ka MMDSL bad ki nongseng kam lajong, da kaba pan ka jingpynshai halor kaba lehse la dep pynlong ïa kino kino ki jingïalang naduh ba don ka jingïatreilang jong kane ka kompeni.Ha kaba jubab ïa kitei ki jingkylli, ka Myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh ka la ong ba ki board jong ki director ki la pynkynthup ïa kiwei ki heh ki haiñ, kum u IAS Commissioner, Director jong ka Medical Institutions (MI), Director jong ka Maternal bad Child Health (MCH) bad ka Family Welfare (FW) bad u Director of Research. Hynrei, ka la pynpaw ïa ka jing bym lah jong ka ban ïathuh bniah ha kato ka por hynrei ka la pynthikna hapoh assembly ba kan sa pynshai shuh shuh halor katei ha ki khyndiat por. Ka la kyrpad ruh ban pynmih da ka jingpynbna na ka bynta ki jingkylli ban sa wan, da kaba batai bniah ba ïa katei ka mat, dang sdang mynta bad shen, yn sa tohkit bniah halor katei.U Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la pynpaw shuh shuh halor ki mat ba kongsan, da kaba kdew ba ka board ka dei ban don palat 15 ngut ki dkhot, katba ka MMDSL ka la don 31 ngut ki dkhot hapoh ka board jong ka. U la ban jur ba lada ka board ka la tam palat 15 ngut ki dkhot, dei ban don ka rai ba biang bad ïa katei ka mat, donkam ban pynbna shai. U la ban jur ba dei ban don kajuh ka jingmut ha kaba ïadei bad ki board jong ki director, nongseng kam lajong bad ka rukom treikam jong ki.
title: Pynpaw u Ronnie da kaba kylli jingkylli ïa ka Ampareen halor ka mat ba ïadei bad ka MMDSL

content: Wat hapdeng ka jingwan jong u slap hapdeng ka jingïalehkai kaba itynnad, ka Tura District Cricket Association ka la pynliem noh ïa ka South Garo Hills DCA da 16 ron ha ka lympung  U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ha Salpara, Mendipathar.Ka Tura ka la  kam ban tied nyngkong bad ka la ioh 107 ron na 35.1 ober. U Salchang Sangma bad u Silgar bad u Silgar M. Sangma ki la ioh 3/22 bad u Ayush M Sangma u la ioh 2/11.Katba ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka Group A ba la pynlong ha Umbuda, Nongpoh, ka Ri Bhoi ka la kam ban tied nyngkong ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka EJH bad ki la lah ban ïalehkai bha ha kaba ki la ioh 6.57 ron shi ober bad ha ka ober 28 ki la ioh 184 ron bad khyllem 8 wiket hynrei u slap u la wan bad la shem jingeh ban bteng ïa ka jingïakhun.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 21 Nailur na ka bynta ka Zone 1 Group B kan long hapdeng ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association pyrshah ïa ka West Jaintia Hills DCA bad ha ka Zone 2, ka North Garo Hills DCA kan ïa aireng pyrshah ïa ka Tura.
title: U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament : Da 16 run liem ka South Garo DCA ha ka Tura DCA

content: Ka West Jaintïa Hills District Cricket Association ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop da shi wiket ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka East Khasi Hills Cricket Association na ka bynta ka Group B  jong ka lympung U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ha Umbuda, Nongpoh.Ka EKH ka la kam ban tied nyngkong bad ki la buh thong da ka ron kaba heh hynrei tang hapoh 30 ron 3 ngut ki snar tied kiba na khmat ki la khyllem noh. Lyngba ka jingkyrshan jong u Nangsan Kynter (14) bad u Daulabiang Shangpliang (35) ka kynhun ka la sdang ban im biang bad kynjoh 100 ron.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 22 Nailur na ka bynta ka Group A, kan long hapdeng ka Shillong Cricket Association A pyrshah ïa ka Ri-Bhoi DCA, katba ka South Garo Hills DCA kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka North Garo Hills DCA na ka bynta ka Zone 2.
title: Liem shi wiket ka EKH DCA ha ka WJH DCA

content: Ka Meghalaya Carrom Association (MCA), ka la pynbna paidbah ba kan sa bteng biang ïa ka jingïakob siat corrom ba la tip kum ka ‘Meghalaya Open Carrom championship’ kaba 21 ha Jaiaw Laitdom naduh ka 27 haduh 30 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kane ka jingïakob kan don haduh 6 tylli ki thup bapher bapher, kynthup ïa ka ‘team event, Men’s single, Women’ single, Junior (kynthei bad shynrang), Veteran’s single bad men’s double. Na ka bynta ka ‘Team’, ki nongïashim bynta kiba don jingmut ban ïakob ki hap ban siew 500 kum ka bairung, T.100 na ka bynta ka men’s,women’s single, veteran single bad 200 na ka bynta ka mens doubles katba na ka bynta ka junior (kynthei bad shynrang) yn ym donkam bai rung.Ka MCA ka khot sngewbha ïa baroh ki nongïalehkai (kynhun bad shimet) ba kin wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung bad ka por ïalehkai kan long 4 baje shaneng.Na ka bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah, lah ban phun ha u nombor, 9402190429, 8414093939, 8119864986.
title: Yn pynlong ka MCA ïa ka Meghalaya Open Carrom Championship 27 tarik mynta u bnai

content: Ka skul Saiden Secondary School na Ri-Bhoi kaba la mih khmat ïa ka jylla Meghalaya sha ka lympung Subroto Cup kaba 62 na ka bynta ki kynthei kiba hapoh 17 ka la sdang ïa ka jingïaid lynti da ka jingjop da 2-0 ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ia ka Goa hynnin ka sngi ka 20 Nailur 2023 ha New Delhi.Ïa kitei ki kol kiba la pynjop na ka bynta ka Meghalaya, la wan lyngba ka Eiladki Ksoo.Ki thei ialehkai jong kane ka kynhun ki kynthup ia ka.Daphishisha Syngkli, Ellen Kynta, Imaia Shylla, Kynjailin Sohtun, Juliana Syiemlieh, Alisha Lyngdoh, Inri- La- I- Dor Kongthaw, Batiplang Khapiah, Eiladki Ksoo, Yulity T. Phanrang, Danisha Lyngdoh, Shimtilang Thongni, Nibari Maring, Barikor Kurbah, Daiamon Makhroh bad ka Unity Maring.
title: Sdang ka Meghalaya da ka jingjop ha ka Subroto Cup

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, kaba la dep pyllait paidbah dang shen, kaba kyrteng ka “Ohh Rossy”, ka dei ka jingrwai jingshad na ka phlim Romeo and Rossy. Katba ïa ka jingthaw bad jingtem ïa katei ka jingrwai, la thaw da u Anthony Khyriem. Ïa ka Make-up bad jingpynwandur ïa u shñiuhkhlieh, la shimti da ka Mediora Mylliem Umlong bad ka Herbie Pathaw. U Director Of Photography, dei u Elvest Thabah bad la shna bad pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Larry Suchiang.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Oh Rossy!”

content: Hadien ka jingjop da 2-0 pyrshah ïa ka Goa ha ka 20 Nailur kaba dei ruh ka jingsdang ïa ka jingïakhun na ka bynta ka lympung U-17 girls’ Subroto Cup  ba la pynlong ha ka nongbah New Delhi, ka skul Saiden Secondary School, Ri-Bhoi kaba la mih khmat na ka bynta ka Meghalaya ha kane ka lympung, ka la khur biang ïa ka jingjop kaba ar ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Kendra Vidyalaya Sangathan.Ïa kitei ki 4 kol la ïoh ban thep da ka Daiamon Maroh, ka Imaia Shylla bad ka Eiladki Ksoo. Ka Meghalaya kan bteng biang ïa ka jingïakhun mynta ka sngi, ka 22 Nailur pyrshah ïa ka Uttarakhand ha ka por 7 baje myntstep kaba dei ruh ka jingïakhun ba khatduh na ka bynta ka pool G.Lyngba kane ka jingjop, ka Meghalaya ka la don ïa ka jingtikna ban jam sha shiliang jong kane ka lympung phutbol na ka bynta ki kynthei kiba hapoh 17 snem.
title: Khur ka Meghalaya ha ka jingïakhun kaba ar jong ka Subroto Cup

content: :Ka jingrwai “Phi wan paw” ka dei ka jingrwai Khasi na ka phlim Romeo and Rossy” kaba dang dep pyllait shen. Haba kren shaphang katei ka phlim, hangne yn ïathuh shaphang ka jingshna ïa katei ka jingrwai jong katei ka phlim. Uwei na kiba leit synran ban ring ïa kane ka jingrwai, u la ong, “Kane ka dei ka jaka kaba hap hapoh Ranikor ka dei ka khappud Bangladesh, te mynta ngi mut ban wan ring ïa kane ka jingrwai ha kane ka jaka, hynrei ngi la kulmar khlieh namar ngim tip, ynda la poi shatei sha jaka Bangla, la ki shah ne em ban ring, peit mo paralok, ngan sa dro da u dak ban pyni ïaphi ba kane ka dei ka khappud ba pyn ïakhlad ïa ka Bangla bad Meghalaya.Te nga kyrmen ba kin shah hi, te ngin sa ïakren. Peit kine ki lieng ki don lai tylli hangne na ka bynta khyndai ngut, kaba mut lai ngut briew kawei ka lieng.Te ngin sa ïa kylli bha ba lada ki shah ne em ba ngin ring, mynta ka jingrwai jong ka phlim Romeo and Rossy, i Paheh bad i Shereen. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la don lai ngut ki star, lada yn don kine ki star ym poi shaei shaei. Te nga kwah ban kylli ïa i Paheh kumno phi shem shaphang kane ka jingrwai ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka projek kaba ngi wan shane sha Ranikor mo? te u la jubab, ‘kane ka projek ka long ka projek kaba sah jingkynmaw, ka lynti ruh kaba jngai, la knieh ktien sa u nong interview uba la ong, ‘na Sikkim hap wanphai sha Ranikor’. La kren biang u Paheh, ‘ïa kane ka jingrwai, ngi la mut ring sha Goa, hynrei na ka daw ba ka jan ka ryngkew te ngi wan noh shane, hynrei ngi la plan ban ïa ap shwa ban ring sha kawei pat ka jaka, hynrei ba ka dei ka jingrwai, te ngi hap ban pyllait noh ha u bnai ba 12, hynrei lehse ngi plan ban ring haduh ar bnai lai bnai, te ngim lah shuh ban ap. La kren biang u nonginterview, “Te nga ai khublei kitbok ïaphi Paheh na ka bynta kane ka music video jong phi na ka phlim Romeo and Rossy. Ngin sa ïashem biang.”
title: La pyni ïa ka jingshna ïa ka jingrwai “Phi wan paw” na ka phlim “Romeo and Rossy”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, ka “Ribon” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait ha ka 20 tarik, Nailur. La pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka kompeni Nangtei Production. La wanrah ïa katei ka jingrwai Ribon (Ribbon) da ka Studio Version bad la rwai da ki nongrwai, kynthup ïa ka Diana bad u Nangtei. La thaw ïa ka da u Nangtei bad ïa ka tune, la shimti da ka Diana M Marbaniang. Ïa ka sur tem, la shimti da u Bishow Chanambam bad la pyntreikam ha DI Studio.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Ribon”

content: :Ka jingrwai “Pyrthei shong ing basa” ka dei ka jingrwai Khasi kaba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 10 tarik, Nailur 2023. La ring ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Amos Suting bad la rwai da u Wanjop Sohkhlet. La thaw ïa ka jingtem da u Bbay Smit bad la pynbit pynbiang da u Joelan Pariat, Bastan Mngap, Shining k.sit, Bantei L Nongbri, Bantei Kharmuti, S Kamwamut Nengnong.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Pyrthei shong ing basa”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Shaei ngan phai”, ka dei kaba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 16 tarik, Nailur 2023. Ïa kane ka jingrwai, la rwai da u Ram Suchiang bad la shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki puron jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u John Rani, Meda Basaiamoit, Shai Wahlang bad ka Ibalucky Sad. Katba ïa ka Make up, la shimti da ka Ibalucky Sad. La shna ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka kompeni Khasi Pyrshang bad ïa ka Video bad Editing, la shimti da u Donbok Marngar.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Shaei ngan phai”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, ka “Sbai Rupa ba kordor” ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 12 tarik, Nailur 2023. Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la rwai da ki nongrwai, kynthup ïa u Khambor Nongneng bad ka Ibahunlang Mary Nongrum, la shimti ban pynmih ïa ka da ka Teibok laloo Studio. La pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Phaibok pariong bad u Sailin Khyllait. Ka Makeup Artist dei ka Susan Dkhar. Katei ka kynhun ka la ai khublei ïa ka Mawsbuit museum, Rymphang Nongrum, Pynshngain Dkhar, Risha kharkaliang bad u Madiang.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Sbai Rupa Ba Kordor”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, ka “Muhor ka jingieid” ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 26 tarik, Nailar 2023 bad ka dei na ka phlim “Ka Nusib”. Ha ka jingrwai “Muhor Ka Jingieid”, la shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki puron jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u Keebor ATK Kurbah bad ka Deicy Mawblei. La pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka kompeni Lamjingshai Film Production.La pynmih lang ïa ka da u Keebor ATK Kurbah bad la shna da u Roping Lawriniang, katba u Director Of Photography, dei u Rockyland Laloo. Ïa ka camera bad editing, la shimti da u Rockyland Laloo, katba ïa ka drone, la pynïaid da u Elvest Thabah.Ka nonghikai shad bad costume designer, la shimti da ka Deicy Mawblei bad la rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Ram Suchiang bad ka Larihun Lapang. La thaw ïa ka da u Roping Lawriniang, ïa ki kyntien jingrwai ba la pynkylla sha ka phareng, la shimti da ka Iada Kurbah bad ka Ridashisha Kurbah bad ka copyright dei ka Lamjingshai Channel Comedy.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Muhor ka Jingieid”, na ka phlim “Ka Nusib”

content: Ka West Jaintia Hills District Cricket Association ka la pynliem noh da kaba suk ïa ka West Khasi Hills DCA, kata da 7 wiket ha ka jingïakhun na ka bynta ka Zone 1 Group B jong ka lympung U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ha madan Umbuda, Nongpoh.U Maremdor Sutnga uba la khur ruh ïa ka khusnam ‘Player of the Match’ ha kane ka jingïakhun u la long u radbah na ka bynta ka West Jaintia ha kaba u la khur 4 wiket bad ïoh 34 run bad kaba kham sngewtynnad ka long ba haduh ban da kut ka jingïalehkai u khlem shah pynhap wiket.Ka WKH ka la jied ban tied nyngkong hynrei baroh ki wiket ki la khyllem noh tang hapoh 23.1 ober na ki 32 tylli ki ober. Na ka bynta ka WKH, u Pynierlang Shangdier u la long u nongïalehkai uba la kyrshan borbah ha kaba u la ïoh haduh 47 ron na 33 tylli ki bol.U Maremdor uba la long ruh uba kongsan ha kane ka jingïalehkai u la ïoh ban kawang bol tang 4.1 katba u Namewanki Pakyntein u la ïoh 7 ober bad pynkhyllem 4 wiket.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 26 Nailur kan long hapdeng ka Shillong Cricket Asso-ciation A pyrshah ïa ka East Jaintia Hills DCA ha ka  Zone 1 Group A.
title: Tyngshaiñ u Maremdor Sutnga na ka bynta ka West Jaintia DCA

content: Ka klob Shillong Lajong kaba dei ruh ka klob kaba la ïoh ïa ka jingithuh ha India bad lah ruh ban ong ba kadei ka klob kaba paw tam ha ka jylla Meghalaya baroh kawei ka la ïai bteng ban soi ïa ki ‘rangïalehkai na shabar ri na ka bynta ban pynkhreh pura ha ka jingïakhun jong ka lympung I-League mynta ka aiom da ka jingthmu ban ïoh rah ïa ka nam lahduh mynta ka samoi ban ïoh rung sha ka lympung Indian Super League (ISL) kaba dei ruh ka league kaba heh tam ha India.Kane ka klob hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Bobby L Nongbet ka dang shu dep ban ïakhun ha ka lympung Durand Cup, ka league kaba la rim tam ha India bad lyngba katei ka jingïoh ïalehkai (experience) ka la long ka jingmyntoi ïa ka klob na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ïa ki lympung bapher bapher mynta u snem.Ha shwa ba ka lympung I-League kan sdang noh shen, kane ka klob kaba la mih khmat na ka bynta ka nongbah Shillong ka la soi biang sa uwei pat u ‘rangïalehkai na shabar ri, kata u Takuto Miki na ka ri Japan uba dei ruh u ‘rangïalehkai ba 4 ba kane ka klob ka la wanrah na shabar ri mynta u snem.Une u samla uba dang 20 snem ka ‘rta, ha shwa ba un jied ban ïalehkai ha India, u la ïalehkai shwa ha Croatia bad Mongolia.Dang ha une u bnai ba lah dep, kane ka klob ka la pynbna paidbah lyngba ki rynsan social Media ba ka la dep ban soi ïa u Daniel Concalves u ‘rangïalehkai na ka ri Brazil.Watla ka jingïakhun ha ka lympung Durand Cup mynta u snem kam long kaba seisoh hynrei da ka jingthmu ban pynpoi jngai ha ka lympung I-League 2023-24, kane ka klob ka la wanrah ïa une u ‘rang-ïalehkai uba dei ruh u nongïalehkai ‘bar ri ba nyngkong.Ka la soi ruh ïa u rangïalehkai na ka ri Senegal, u Adou Karim Samb bad ïa u Renan Paulino De Souza, u ‘rangïalehkai na ka ri Brazil.Dang ha kane ka taiew ba lah dep, kane ka klob ka la ioh ban rah ia ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung Chakradhar Deka Football Tournament ha Assam, da kaba pynliem ia ka Delhi FC da 3-1.
title: Da u ‘rangïalehkai na Japan, wanrah ka Shillong Lajong

content: Ka tnad Sports & Youth Affairs ryngkat bad ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) kin sa pynlong biang ïa ka Sohra International Half Marathon kaba ar ha ka jylla ha ka 30 Nailur mynta u snem.Ïa kane ka jingïakob la ïoh ruh ïa ka jingithuh na ka World Athletics bad ka Athletics Federation, India. Na ka bynta kiba thmu ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïakob lah ban pynrung kyrteng ïalade lyngba ka (online) website jong ka MSOA () lah ruh ban pynrung kyrteng lyngba ka offline, kata ha ka ophis jong ka MSOA ha Shillong bad ka Sohra shop hajan Indian Oil petrol pump.Kaba kham sngew-tynnad ha kane ka jingiakob ka long ym tang ki khynnah rit lane ki tymmen ki kro ki ban wan iashim bynta ha kane ka lympung hynrei kiwei pat ki nongmareh na kiwei ki ri kiba kynthup ruh ia u Elijah Kipruto Kemei, uba na ka ri Kenya (35 snem ka ‘rta) bad kane ka dei ka sien kaba ar na ka bynta jong u ban wan iashim bynta ha kane ka jingiakob kaba heh.Na ka liang jong u, u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen bad ka jingsngewtynnad ban don bynta ha kane ka marathon “ nga kwah shuh shuh ban pynbha ia ka jinglah jong nga bad nga kwah ruh ban jop ha kane ka jingiakob kaba pyn-sngewtynnad ia nga.Ka jingpyniathong ka long kaba phylla ki nongpyniaid ruh ki long kiba paka, baroh ki jingpynkhreh bad ki jingpynbit pynbiang ki long kiba janai” ong u Elijah.Ha kane ka jingïakob mareh, yn don 3 tylli ki thup (category), kynthup ïa ka elite group (shynrang bad kynthei),  Meghalaya-specific na ka bynta kiba 45-haduh 55 snem ka ‘rta, na ka bynta kiba la 55 snem shajrong bad na ka bynta kito kiba kwah ban ia mareh sngewbha (fun run).Ha une u snem ba lah dep, da ki spah ngut ki la wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïakob, kynthup 7 ngut na shabar ri bad ki nongpynïaid ki buh ïa ka thong ban pynlong ïa kane ka jingïakob mynta u snem kaba kham heh ar shah.Ki nongjop ha ha ka thup ‘elite half marathon’ (palat 18 snem) kin ïoh shi lak ka song pisa. Ki nongjop ha ka Meghalaya open half marathon  (palat 18 snem), kin ïoh ban khur 50,000/-, na ka bynta ka thup Meghalaya open 10km race (hapoh 45 snem) kin ïoh 30,000/- tyngka bad na ka bynta kiba 45-55 bad palat 55 snem kin ïoh ïa ka khusnam kaba 20,000/- tyngka.Ïa ki nongïashim bynta kiba wan ha ka kyrdan ba-ar bad ba lai kin ïoh ïa ka song pisa kynthup ïa ki syrnod (Certificate).Baroh ki nongïashim bynta kiba lah ban pyndep ïa ka thong ba la buh kin ïoh ïa ki sopti (t-shirt) bad ki takma. Yn ai khusnam kyrpang ruh na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 14 snem kiba lah ban pyndep ïa ka jingïakob (hapoh 200 ngut).Na ka bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah, lah ban phun ha u nombor 9856041365, 9436102663, 9774062118.
title: Yn wan ïashim bynta biang u ‘rang mareh na Kenya ha ka ‘Sohra International Half Marathon’

content: Lyngba ka jinglah ban ïalehkai bha jong u Avinash Rai bad u Ayushman Rabha, ka Shillong Cricket Association A ka la pynliem da kaba suk ïa ka East Jaintia Hills District Cricket Association, kata da 248 ron ha ka Zone 1 Group A jong ka lympung U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ha madan Umbuda, Nongpoh.Ka SCA ka la jied ban tied nyngkong bad buh da ka thong kaba heh, kata haduh 348 ron na 39.4 bol bad baroh ki wiket ki la khyllem noh. Ka jingtbit ki ‘rangkawang ka SCA ka la pynlong ïa ka Jaintia ban khyllem noh baroh ki wiket tang hapoh 26.1 ober bad ki la lah ban beh tang 100 ron.U Avinash uba la khur ruh ïa ka khusnam ‘Player of the Match’ u la lah shisha ban ïarap borbah ïa ka kynhun ha kaba u la ïoh haduh 150 ron na 108 bol kiba kynthup ïa 24 tylli ki 4 ron bad 6 tylli ki 6 ron.Mynta ka sngi ka jingïakhun kan long hapdeng ka SCA-B pyrshah ïa ka Ri-Bhoi DCA jong ka Zone 1 Group A kaba dei ruh ka jingïakhun ba khatduh na ka bynta ka group.Ka East Jaintia ka la pyrshang katba lah ban kthong ia ka ron kaba khia tam na ka bynta jong ki ia kaba ki la mad mynta u snem ryngkat ki ‘rangkawang bol ba tbit hynrei namar ka jinglah ban neh u Avinash Rai bad ban ioh mar shiteng ia ka ron na ka bynta ka Shillong Cricket Association ka la pynduh buit noh ia ki ‘rangkawang bol ka EJH
title: Khlem lah kthong ka East Jaintia ïa ka ron ba la buh da ka SCA, 150 ron khyrwit u Avinash

content: Ka Sabahmuswang ka la sdang ïa ka jingïakhun ha ka lympung 1st Division West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) ba la tip ruh kum ka  Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy da ka jingjop da 2-1 ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Mookyndur jong ka Pool A ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Iawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khliehiongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Na ka bynta ka Sabahmuswang, ïa ki 2 kol la ïoh ban thep da u Dayo Shylla ha ka minit ba 42 bad u Lakhon Dhar ha ka minit ba 47, katba na ka bynta ka Mookyndur la ïoh ban thep da u Jomsing Pariat ha shwa ban kut ka minit ïalehkai, kata ha ka 90+9.Ka jingïakhun na ka bynta kane ka lympung kan bteng biang ha ka 3 tarik Risaw ha kaba ka Demthring kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Mukhla Evergreen ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: Da ka jingjop, sdang ka Sabahmuswang ïa ka 1st Division WJDSA ha Jowai

content: Ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ka la pynbna paidbah ïa 15 ngut ki ‘rangïalehkai na ka bynta ban leit ïakhun sha ka lympung Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy ba la pynlong da ka Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) ka ban sa sdang naduh ka 16 Risaw haduh 6 tarik Naiwineng mynta u snem.Ki ‘rangïalehkai kiba la shah jied na ka bynta katei ka lympung ki long u Riboklang Hynniewta, Sylvester Mylliempdah, Arien Bonchang Sangma, Chengkam Sangma, Junjun M Sangma, Mewada Shylla, Sanvert Kurkalang, Kilco R Marak, Lerry G Sangma, Ram Gurung, Anish Charak, Akash K Choudhary, Amiangshu Sen, Rajesh Bishnoi, Nahul Verma, kynthup ruh ïa kiwei pat (Standbys) Lakhan Singh, Md Nafees Siddique, Adarsh Joshi, Sengpan Sangma, Robert R Sangma.Ïa kane ka kynhun yn synran ruh da u Goutam Shome (head coach), Moisten Ch Marak (assistant coach), Vikash Singh Chauhan (trainer), Surojit Biswas (physio), Dhruba Jyoti A Sangma (manager).Ka Meghalaya kan sdang ïa ka jingïakhun ha kane ka lympung ha ka 16 Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Hyderabad, ha ka 17 Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Mumbai, haka 19 Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Mizoram, ha ka 21 Risaw pyrshah ïaka Chhatisgarh, haka 23 Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Jammu & Kashmir ha ka 25 Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Haryana bad ha ka 27 tarik pyrshah ïa ka Baroda.
title: Pyllait ka MCA ïa ka kyrteng ki ‘rangïalehkai naka bynta ka Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy

content: Ka Meghalaya Swimming Association (MSA) kan sa pynlong ïa ka lympung 16th Sub-Junior & Junior bad ka 18th Senior State Swimming Championships ha ka 6-7 Risaw ha Crinoline Swimming Pool.Na ka bynta ka thup Sub-Junior bad Junior (kynthei bad shynrang) kan don ha 3 tylli ki group, kata na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 10 -11 snem (ki ba la kha hapoh 2012 bad 2014), 12-14 snem (ki ba la kha hapoh 2009, 2010, bad 2011) bad 15-17 (kiba la kha ha u snem 2006, 2007, bad 2008).Ha kane ka jingïakob kan don haduh 6 jait ki rukom ïalehkai, kynthup ïa ka freestyle, backstroke, breaststroke, butterfly stroke, individual medley, freestyle relay bad medley relay.Ïa ka jingpynrung kyrteng na ka bynta kane ka jingïakob, yn pdiang haduh 30 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kajuh ka por ka MSA ka la pynbna ruh ba kin sa pynlong ïa ka Masters State Swimming Championship kaba nyng-kong duh ha ka jylla ha ka 18 tarik Naiwieng mynta u snem.
title: Shen yn  pynlong ka MSA ïa ka State Swimming Championships

content: Ka Directorate of Sports & Youth Affairs jong ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la pynlong da ka program ban ai mynsiem bad ban kitbok ïa ki khynnah ïalehkai phutbol ka jylla (shynrang) ki ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka lympung U-14 bad U-17 jong ka lympung International Subroto Cup Football Tournament 2023 kaba  62 ïa kaba yn pynlong ha Bengaluru bad Delhi.Na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 14 snem (U-14), ka jingïakhun kan sdang ha ka 1 Risaw tarik bad yn kut ha ka 10 tarik jong u juh u bnai ha Bengaluru, katba na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 17 snem (U-17) ka jingïakhun kan sdang ha ka 14 tarik bad yn kut ha ka 23 Risaw ha Nongbah Delhi.Ha kane ka jingïalang ban ai mynsiem ïa ki khynnah, la don ryngkat ki nongïalam jong ka Directorate of Sports and Youth Affairs kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Paia War Nongbri, Asstt. Director, u Bah Khroobok Passah, Asstt. Director, bad u Bah Oral Mawthoh DSO ka East Khasi Hills ryngkat bad ki khynnah ki ban leit ïashim bynta ha katei ka lympung kaba heh.Tiak, ban shu pyn-kynmaw, na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalya, ka skul H.K. Singh Memorial Secondary School, Jowai kan mih khmat lane ïalehkai ha ka thup U-14 katba ka Assam Rifle Public School, EKH kan ïakhun na ka bynta ka thup U-17.
title: Pynlong ka tnat ïalehkai ïa ka program ban ai mynsiem ïa ki khynnah phutbol ka jylla

content: Ka kynhun jong ka Ri-Bhoi District Cricket Association ka la lah ban pynshohbiej ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Cricket Association B da pyni ïa ka jingtbit jong ki nongtied bad pynliem syndon ïa katei ka kynhun ha ka lympung U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ha madan Umbuda, Nongpoh.Ha ka khyllipmat ba ki la ïoh 43 ron  bad khyllem 5 wiket na 11.3 tylli ki ober, ki la duh jingkyrmen na ka bynta ban beh ïa ka ron kaba heh ba la buh da ka SCA, kata haduh 186 ron hynrei ka jingïaineh bad ka jingtbit jong u Gaurav Narleng bad Macdonald Makdoh la ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka jingïakhun.U Gaurav  la ïoh 62 ron na 30 tylli ki bol kynthup 4 tylli ki 4 ron bad 7 tylli ki 6 ron katba u Macdonald u la ïoh 62 ron na 35 tylli ki bol kynthup 8 tylli ki 4 ron bad 4 tylli ki hynriew ron.Na ka bynta ka SCA, u Toshar Hajong u la lah ban kawang bol bha ha kaba u la ïoh 2 wiket bad tang 27 ron la ïoh na ki ober jong u katba u Harris Ahmed ruh u la ïoh 2 wiket hynrei la kham ïoh ron na ki ober  jong u, kata haduh 48 ron.Ka SCA kaba la ïoh ban tied nyngkong ka lah ban kamai ron bha bad u Trinayan Dutta u la ïarap borbah ïa ka kynhun da kaba  ïoh haduh 90 ron na 76 bol (kynthup 10 tylli ki 4 ron bad 5 tylli ki 6 ron) bad u Manthan Dey u la ïarap 38 ron (kynthup 4 tylli ki 4 ron bad 3 tylli ki 6 ron.
title: U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament : Liem ka SCA B ha ka Ri-Bhoi DCA

content: Lyngba ka kol jong u Luckyness Khyriem uba la thep ha ka minit ba 32, ka Chutwakhu ka la jam sha ka phainal jong ka lympung 2nd Division West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) ïa kaba la tip kum ka 6th Debo Shullai Memorial Trophy ha ka jingïakhun ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ka jingïakhun semi phainal hapdeng ka Chutwakhu bad Lion ka long kaba itynnad hynrei namar ka jingbym ïoh kabu ban thep kol, ka Lion ka duh noh ban rung sha ka phainal jong kane ka lympung.Ka Chutwakhu kaba la jam nyngkong sha ka phainal, kan hap ban mynta ïa kawei na ki kynhun ban ïakhun mynta ka sngi ka 28 Nailur, kata hapdeng ka Shangpung Khliehmuchut bad ka Mooknor Thadmuthlong  ha ka por 1:30 noh phai sngi.
title: Jam ka Chutwakhu sha ka phainal jong ka lympung 2nd Division ka WJDSA

content: Ka Shillong Sports Association ka la pynbna paidbah ba ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ka Third Division football league kan sdang noh ha ka 2 tarik Risaw mynta u snem.Ha ka jingshisha, ïa kane ka lympung la thmu ban sdang ha ka 1 tarik Nailar bad la pynkynriah biang sha ka 17 tarik Nailar hynrei baroh 2 tylli kitei ki tarik  ym shym lah ban pynurlong namar ki katto katne ki daw.Namar ka jingpynkynriah tarik ïa ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ka 3rd Division, ka SSA ka la hap ban pynkynriah ruh ïa ki jingïalehkai na ka bynta ka Second Division, First Division bad Shillong Premier League.Na ka bynta ka 2nd bad 1st Division la buh ban pynlong ha ka taiew ba nyngkong nad ba khatduh jong u Naiwieng, katba ïa ka lympung Shillong Premier League (SPL) kaba la buh shen ban sdang mynta u bnai, la pynkynriah noh ha u Nohprah mynta u snem.Kin don 21 tylli ki kynhun ki ban ïashim bynta ha ka 3rd Division mynta u snem bad la phiah ha 4 tylli ki group bad ha kawei kawei ka group don 5 tylli ki kynhun bad kawei pat kan don 6.Kino kino ki kynhun kiba don ha kjat duh jong ka miej ïakheiñ poiñ (na 4 tylli ki group), kin sa shah pynhiar kyrdan noh sha ka 4th Division ha une u snem ban wan bad 2 tylli ki ki kynhun ki ban ïaknieh ha ka wat ba khatduh kin shah kyntiew sha ka 2nd Division. (Baroh ki jingïalehkai kin long ha madan Third Ground Polo, Shillong).Ki kynhun mynta ka aiom ki long – Group A – Umlyngka SC, Lapalang SC, Krang SC, Nongmensong SC, Gorkha Association, Meghalaya Police, Group B – Nongkseh SC, Mawshbuit SC, PFR Football Academy, Pomlakrai SC, Maw-ryngkneng SC, Group C – Sanmer SC, Umpling SC, Mawpat SC, Mylliem Lum SC, Lumparing SC, Group D – Nongumlong SC, Lawmali Pyllun SC, Rynjah SC, Tynring SC, Lumdiengjri SC.Ki program ialehkai ki long – 3 Risaw – Umlyngka vs Lapalang, Group A, 5:15 PM.4 Risaw – Nongkseh vs Mawshbuit, Group B, 4:45 PM.5 Risaw – PFR Academy vs Pomlakrai, Group B, 5:15 PM.6 Risaw- Sanmer vs Umpling, Group C, 4:15 PM.7 Risaw – Mawpat vs Mylliem Lum, Group C, 2:30 PM.7 Risaw – Nongumlong vs Lawmali Pyllun, Group D, 4:30 PM”
title: Pynkynriah ka SSA ïa ka program ïalehkai jong ka 3rd Division sha ka 2 tarik Risaw

content: Ka  Rymbai Synrang Shah-khain SC ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha ka jingsdang jong ki ïa ka jingïakhun ha ka lympung 1st Division West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) ba la tip ruh kum ka  Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy da ka jingjop da 6-2 ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Rymbai Pohskur SC jong ka Pool A ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Ha ka jingïakhun ba nyngkong ka Rymbai Synrang ka la pynjem khnap ïa ka Rymbai Pohskur SC da kaba khyrwit haduh 6 kol katba ka Pohskur ka la ïoh ban pynphai tang 2 kol.Ha katei ka jingïakhun, u Ïaishah Bareh u la ïoh 2 kol, kata haka minit ba 5 bad ba 71 katba u u Franki Dkhar (42), u Emon Nongtdu (43), u Ferdinand Nongtdu (85) bad  u Shanki Dkhar (90+1) ki la ïoh ban thep mar shi kol. Na ka bynta ka Rymbai Pohskur, la ïoh ban thep da u Chestar Nongtdu (19) bad u Soki Bareh (26).Haba phai pat ha ka jingïakhun ba bud, ka Byndihati SC ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop da kaba pynliem da 1-0 ïa ka Khliehriat West FC lyngba ka kol jong u Enikijuh Shylla haka minit ba 31.
title: 1st Division WDSA : Shiteng dorjon pynbam ka Rymbai Synrang ïa ka Pohskur

content: Ka Khasi Students’Union (KSU) hynnin ka sngi ka 28 Nailur ka la pdiang sngewbha ha ka jingwanphai jong ki khlur ïakura jong ka jylla kiba kynthup ïa u Shanborlang Marbaniang, u Iarapborsing Kharbani bad u Elbin Rani kiba la wanrah burom ïa ka jylla ha ka jingleit ïashim bynta jong ki ha ka lympung Professional Boxing tournament ba la pynlong ha Gujarat.U Shanborlang uba la ïakhun ha ka thup Flyweight u la ïoh ïa ka jingjop da kaba pynliem ïa u nongïalehkai na ka jylla Andra Pradesh katba u Iarapborsing uba la ïakhun ha ka thup Bantam Weight u la ïoh ïa ka jingjop da kaba pynliem ïa u ‘rangïakura na ka jylla Telangana.U Elbin Rani uba la ïakhun na ka bynta ka thup Featherweight, u la liem noh ha u nongïalehkai ba tbit jong ka jylla Harayana.Ïa katei ka program la pynlong ha Umsing bad la don don ryngkat da ki dkhot jong ka Seng kiba kynthup ïa u Bah Hopefulborn L Mawnai, Assistant Organizing Secretary  KSU CEC, u Bah Shngainlang Sohkhlet, President KSU Upper Shillong Circle lem bad kiwei kiwei ki para nongïalam kiba la ai mynsiem ïa kitei ki samla kiba la pynsngewsarong na ka bynta ka jylla baroh kawei.
title: Pynkup burom ka KSU ïa ki samla ïakura ka jyla kiba la wanphai na Gujarat

content: Ka Tura District Cricket Association ka la lah ban pynliem noh da kaba suk ïa ka West Jaintia Hills DCA da 6 wiket ha ka jingïakhun ban ïaknieh sha ka phainal jong ka lympung  U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ba la pynlong ha madan Salpara, Mendipathar.Ka WJH kadei ka kynhun kaba don ha khlieh duh napdeng kiwei pat ki kynhun ha ka Zone 1 Group B, katba ka Tura kadei ka kynhun kaba don ha ka kyrdan ba ar na ka Zone 2.Ka WJH ka la shim ïa ka kabu ban tied nyngkong, hynrei katei ka jingjied jong ki ka khlem treikam namar ki la ïoh ban buh tang 116 ron na 40 tylli ki ober. Watla u Ewanmidao Pyrtuh (24)bad u Dawanchwami Passah (25) ki la kyrshan bad kyntiew ïa ka ron na ka bynta ka kynhun hynrei namar ka jingbym lah jong kiwei pat ki ‘rangtied ban buh ïa ka ron kaba heh ka la pynlong ïa ka Tura ban shim kabu hadien ka pali tied jong ki.Ka Tura ka la lah ban ïalehkai bha ruh naduh ki nongkawang bol ha kaba u Ben Haden N Marak ruh u  la ïoh 3 wiket na ki 5 ober katba u Fernando Barbaryo M Sangma bad u Denikcheng Marak ki la ïoh mar 2 wiket.Mynta ka sngi ka 29 Nailur, ka jingïakhun semi phainal kan long hapdeng ka East Garo Hills DCA pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Cricket Association A, kawei nadeng kine ki kynhun kan sa ïa aireng pyrshah ïa ka Tura ha ka phainal.
title: Pynleit ïing ka Tura DCA ïa ka WJH ha ka U-19 Inter District Cricket Tournament

content: Ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) kaba khmih ïa ka jingïalehkai kriket ha ka jylla kan sa leit ban ïashim bynta ha ka lympung Senior Women’s T20 Trophy jong ka Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) ka ba yn sa pynlong ha Vadora bad kaba yn sa sdang ha une u bnai ban wan.Ka Meghalaya kan sdang ïa ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Pondicherry ha ka 19 tarik Risaw kiwei pat ki kynhun kiba la shah kynthup lang ha ka group ki long ka Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Bengal, Chandigarh, Saurashtra bad Uttar Pradesh.Ki thei ïalehkai kiba la shah jied na ka bynta kane ka lympung ki long ka Ajima A Sangma, Daiaka Emigale Warjri, Debasmita Dutta, Deimaphishisha Lamare, Deiphibapynshngain L Mawnai, Eiffelene K Nongkynrih, Luiza Tamang, Rebeldalis Syiemlieh, Riticia Nongbet, Rubi Chettri, Sanchisa Sangma, Sandria K Momin, Solina Jaba, Suruti K Ray, Monica L Phawa, Pinky Chanda, Neha Hajong, Evanrilin S Syiem, Sara Ananias Kharbani, Fulnessy Mawlong kynthup ruh ia ka Latika Kumari (head coach), Hemant Roy (assistant coach), Darishesha Mawroh (trainer), Marybalahun Sawkmie (physio), Mackie D Blah (manager).Ki program ialehkai na ka bynta ka Meghalaya –Meghalaya vs Pondicherry, 19 RisawMeghalaya vs Karnataka, 20 RisawMeghalaya vs Tamil Nadu, 22 RisawMeghalaya vs Bengal, 24 RisawMeghalaya vs Chandigarh, 26 RisawMeghalaya vs Saurashtra, 28 RisawMeghalaya vs Uttar Pradesh, 30 Risaw
title: Yn leit ïashim bynta ki thei ïalehkai ka Meghalaya sha ka Senior Women’s T20 Trophy

content: Watla ka East Garo Hills District Cricket Asso-ciation ka la ïoh ban buh ïa ka ron kaba rit, kata tang 79 ron ha ka jingïakhun semi phainal ba khatduh jong ka lympung U-19 Boys Inter District Cricket Tournament ba la pynïaid da ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ba la pynlong ha madan Salpara, Mendipathar pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Cricket Association kaba dei ruh ka kynhun kaba khlaiñ, hynrei ka East Garo kam shym don jingeh ban wad ïa ka jingjop namar ki nongkawang bol ruh ki long kiba tbit bad kiba trei shitom.Lyngba kane ka jingjop ka East Garo ka la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban jam sha ka phainal bad ban ïaknieh ïa ka nam lahduh pyrshah ïa ka Tura DCA mynta ka sngi ka 30 Nailur ha kajuh ka madan.U Ayushman Rabha uba dei ruh u ‘rangkawang bol ba paw ha kane ka jingïalehkai u la ïoh 4 wiket bad tang 7 ron la ïoh na ki ober jong u.Lah ban ong ruh ba dei lyngba ka jingtbit ki ‘rangkawang bol ba ka SCA ka la duh buit bad khyllem noh baroh ki wiket tang hapoh 28.2 ober.Kiwei pat ki ‘rangkawang bol ki long u Charm Marbaniang (3/12 7 ober) bad u Angkit Tamang (2/2 na ki 4.2 ober).U Lensbirth, u dei u nongtied uba la ïoh bun ron naka bynta ka EGH bad u dei ruh u nongïalehkai ba don ha ka kyrdan ba ar mynta u snem na ki nongïalehkai ba la ïoh bun ron tam ha kane ka lympung, kata haduh 154 ron.Ha ka jingïakhun ba jwat, ka SCA ka la lah ban pynphai tang 61 ron na 23.1 ober bad baroh ki wiket ki la khyllem noh.Ka Tura bad East Garo ki ban sa ïakhun phainal mynta ka sngi ki dei ruh ki kynhun kiba la dep ban ïakhun ha ka wat jingïakhun na ki group bad ka EGH ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Tura da 12 ron, kane ka kabu dei ruh namar ka jingjur jong u slap.Ka Tura District Cricket Association kaba la jam nyngkong sha ka phainal jong kane ka lympung (hynnin ka sngi ka 28 Nailur) da kaba pynliem da kaba suk ïa ka West Jaintia Hills DCA da 6 wiket..
title: Jam ka East Garo sha ka phainal jong ka U-19 Inter District Cricket Tournament

content: Ka Meghalaya Football Association (MFA) ka la pyllait paidbah ïa ki kyrteng jong ki thei ïalehkai phutbol ki ban mihkhmat ïa ka jylla sha ka lympung Junior Girls’ National Football Championship (Tier 2).Ka Meghalaya ka la shah kynthup lang bad ka kynhun Jammu & Kashmir, Rajasthan, Telangana bad Uttar Pradesh ha ka Group B.Dang shen ka kynhun Sub-Junior bad Junior (shynrang) ki la wan phai ïing noh na katei ka lympung bad ka kynhun sub junior jong ki kynthei ki la poi haduh ka semi phainal.Ki nongïalehkai kiba la shah jied ki long ka Ba Inangsan Langbnang, Balabet Khongsit, Eiladki Ksoo, Bira Pyngrope, Blessiful Thongni, Dakani Shylla, Darika Rani, Daphishisha Syngkli, Eightfulnes Shangdiar, Ibashongkun Shylla, Lapdianghun Ran, Lishaphulda Khongsit, Naphisabet Jyrwa, Nishalahun Khongnoh, Philasakhi Marngar, Rikynti Lyngkhoi, Wansaphi Marpna, Susimeri Lyngdoh, Yulity T Phanrang, Alisha Lyngdoh, Ibashembha Khongsit, bad Rimika Khongkai.
title: Pyllait ka MFA ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongïalehkai na ka bynta ka National Football Championship

content: U Myntri ba khmih ïa ka tnat pule puthi (Education) jong ka jylla, u Rakkam A Sangma ha ka jingïadon ryngkat bad u MLA jong ka Mawkyrwat, u Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar, u Bah Himalaya Shangpliang lem bad kiwei kiwei ki la pynlong ïa ka program ban pynkup burom ïa ki samla ïalehkai jong ka Sngap Syiem College kiba la wanrah burom ïa ka College bad ka distrik da kaba ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh ka NEHU Inter College Athletics Championships 2023, kata ha ka thup jong ki shynrang bad kynthei ba la pynlong ha Shillong.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang u Rakkam u la ïaroh ïa ki samla pule kiba la trei shitom ban jop ïa ka thong wat hapdeng ki jingeh ba ki ïakynduh kum ki khynnah skul. Ha kajuh ka por u la ai mynsiem bad pynshlur ïa ki ban trei shitom khnang ba kin ïoh ban kheit ïa u soh ka jingjop bad ban kiew ha ki liang baroh.Ki khynnah jong ka Sngap Syiem College ki ba la ïoh rah nam jop ha kane ka NEHU Inter College Athletics Championships 2023 ki la don 6 ngut kiba la ïoh ïa ka takma ksiar, kata 4 ngut ki shynrang bad 2 ngut ki kynthei.Na ka liang ki shynrang u Wolbestar Ramsiej u la ïoh 2 tylli ki takma ksiar ha ka 1500m bad 5000 m Races, u Obanshan Nongrem u la ïoh nam jop ha ka 10000m, u Wonderful Paliar u la ïoh haka Men’s Half Marathon Kong Wanresful Jyrwa ha ka Women’s Marathon bad ka Ibandarisha K.Wanniang ha ka Women’s 10000m race.
title: Pynkup burom u Myntri Rakkam A. Sangma ïa ki samla ïalehkai ka Sngap Syiem College, Mawkyrwat

content: Ka Khliehriat West FC ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop da ka said ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Bataw YWSC lyngba ka kol jong u Mihlang Sutnga uba la ïoh ban thep ha ka minit ba 69 lyngba ka free kick kaba dei ruh ka jingïalehkai kaba la ïaid sha ka sngi ba 6 jong ka lympung 1st Division ka East Jaiñtia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA).Katba ha kawei pat ka jingïalehkai, kata hapeng ka Chiehruphi SYWSC bad Rymbai Synrang Shahkhain ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid da 1-1.Ka Chiehruphi ka la ïoh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong lyngba u Defender Pajat ha ka minit ba 47 hynrei khlem ka jingduhjingkyrmen ka Synrang Shahkhian ka la ïai ïakhun bad ïoh ban pynphai noh ha ka minit ba 83 lyngba u Richard Dkhar.Ka jingïakhun na ka bynta kane ka lympung kan long biang ha ka 2 tarik Risaw ha kaba ka Musniang SC kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Wahiajer NYSSC ha ka por 12 baje shiteng sngi bad haka por 2:30 noh phai sngi yn bteng biang ka jingïakhun hadeng ka Rangad SC pyrshah ïa ka Lumshken SC.
title: Pynliem ka Khliehriat West FC ïa ka Bataw YWSC

content: Ka Treilang Welfare Society ryngkat bad ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association ka la pynbna paidbha ba kan sa pyn long ïa ka 1st Shillong Para Arm Fight Championship, 2023 bad ka Shillong Arm Fight Open Challenger Championship, 2023 ha ka 14 tarik Risaw 2023 ha Madan Malki.Ha kaba ïa dei ban kane ka rynsan ïakhun kti yn don shwa ka jingthew jingkhia ïa baroh ki nongïashim bynta haka 13 Risaw 2023 ha Madan Malki naduh ka 11 baje mynstep haduh ka 4 baje janmiet. Kumta ha kaba ïa dei bad kane ka bynta, lah ruh ban shu phone ha kine ki nombor 9774534908, 7005861828, 8414073899, 9774647280 na ka bynta ki jingtip ba kham bniah.Lyngba kane ka rynsan yn jied ïa ki nongjop jong kane ka rynsan ïakhun kti ban ïoh shim bynta ha ka Shillong Arm Fight – All India Championship 2023 ka ban sa pynlong mynta u snem ha u Nohprah mynta u snem.Na ka liang jong ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association ka lah ai ruh ka jingkhublei kitbok kitrwiang ïa ki nongïakhun kti jong ka MLP ki ban ïa leit shim bynta sha ka All India PoliceMeet 2023, ka ban long ha Haryana naduh ka 2 tarik haduh ka 4 tarik u Risaw 2023.Ki nongia shim bynta ki long Alan Sun Marbaniang, Wandalin Syiemiong, Wilynder Khonglam, Larisa Pyrtuh, Rolling.
title: Yn pynlong ka Treilang Welfare Society ïa ka Shillong Para Arm Fight Championship

content: Ha ka sien nyngkong ka jylla lyngba ka Meghalaya Lawn Bowling Association, ka la leit ban ïa shim bynta ha ka 8th Senior and 4th Under 25 Lawn Bowls National Championship 2023 ba la pynïaid da ka Bowling Federation of India (BFI) kaba la long ha Guwahati naduh ka 21 haduh ka 30 tarik Nailur 2023.Kane ka long kawei na ki jingïalehkai kaba ka jylla kan hap ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ka 39 National Games ka ban sa long hapoh jylla Meghalaya ha u snem 2025/2026.Ka kynhun jong ka Meghalaya ka la kynthup ïa hynñiew ngut ki kynthei, bad hynñiew ngut shynrang bad uwei u coach hapoh jingïalam jong u Bah Precious Ranee, Manager Meghalaya Lawn Bowling Association uba long ruh uwei na ki Vice President. Kane ka seng Meghalaya Lawn Bowling Association la seng dang shen bad ka MLBA ka dang thaw lad ban pan jingithuh na ka MSOA bad na ka DSYA.Ka seng ka pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa ki bor ba halor jong ka BFI kiba la shah ïa ki samla Meghalaya ban ïashim bynta beit ha kane ka lympung. Ki don kumba 17 tylli ki jylla kiba la wan ban ïashim bynta bad san tylli ki jylla kynthup ïa ka Meghalaya ki dei ki jylla ki ban mad ha ka sien nyngkong ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalehkai ha Guwahati.Kane ka jingiohlad ka jylla Meghalaya ban ioh ban ïashim bynta ka la long na ka jingshim khia i Kong V Lamare, President, bad i Kong Rikhel Swett, General Secretary, Meghalaya Lawn Bowling Association, kiba la iohlad lyngba ka jingïarap u Bah John F Kharshiing, Vice President, National Rifle Association of India bad Working President MSOA uba la ïarap kyrpang ban ïa kren sha kiba ba halor jong ka Bowling Federation of India (BFI) ha Delhi.Na ka liang ka seng, ka kyrpad ïa ki bor sorkar bad tnad jong ka Sports and Youth Affairs ka sorkar jylla ban shimkhia bad ban thawlad ban ïarap bad kyrshan ïa ki Association ba mih thymmai khnang ban ioh pynkhreh ïa ki nongïalehkai na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya.
title: ïashim bynta ka jylla sha ka Lawn Bowls National Championship

content: U Parthib Sundar Gogoi uba dei ruh u rangïalehkai na ka jylla Assam uba dang 20 snem ka ‘rta u la ïoh 2 kol ha 2 tylli ki jingïalehkai jong ka lympung Indian Super League (ISL) mynta ka aiom na ka bynta ka klob NorthEast United FC.U Gogoi u dei ruh u ‘rangïalehkai ba don ha ka kyrdan ba ar mynta ka samoi, kum u ‘rangïalehkai ba la ïoh bun kol tam (top scorer).Ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Chennaiyin FC (ha ka 29 Nailur) kaba dei ruh kawei na ki klob ba paw ha ka ISL, ka NorthEast ka la lah ban pynliem noh da 3-0 ïa katei ka klob ha kaba u Parthib u la ïoh shi kol ha ka minit ba 43.U Gogoi u la paw bha ruh ha ka lympung Durand cup kaba dang shu dep shen, bad lah ban pynkynmaw hangne ba ha ka jingïakhun ba nyngkong na ka bynta katei ka lympung pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Lajong, u Gogoi u la ïoh ban thep haduh 3 kol.
title: Paw u samla ïalehkai ka Assam ha ka lympung ISL

content: Ka jingpyntrei ïa ka  madan Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium (Polo, Shillong) ka dang ïaid mynta hynrei katkum ka jingleit hiar u Kynjatshai sha katei ka jaka la lap ba ka jingïaid ka kam ka suki bad la i duh  jingkyrmen ban pynlong ïa ka Durand Cup ha kane ka aiom ban wan.Ha ka jingshisha, katkum ka jingpynïaid jong bad ka jingpynbeit jong ka Durand Football Tour-nament Society (DFTS) bad ka All India Football Federation (AIFF), la rai bad jied ban pynlong katto katne ki jingïalehkai ha Shillong na ka bynta kane ka lympung mynta ka aiom, hynrei namar ka jingbym lah ban pyndep ïa ka madan, la ai jingmut ban sa pynlong ha kawei pat ka samoi ïalehkai.Ki paidbah kiba ieit ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol ha ka jylla ki la buh jingkylli, hato ka jingkular ban pynlong bad pdiang ïa ka Durand cup ha u snem ban wan ka lah ban urlong?. Katei ka jingbuh jingkylli bad ka jingkynthoh jong ki kattto katne ka la paw namar ka jingsakhi ïa ka jingïaid ka kam mynta ha Polo. Hynrei haba ïadei bad kane ym lah ban kynnoh ïano namar naduh ba la shim ïa ka jingrai ban pynbha ïa kane ka madan, ka jingtrei ka ïaid beit khlem sangeh.Ha ka 23 Lber 2023 (ha ka dorbor mang tyngka) u Bah Shakliar Warjri, uba dei u myntri ba khmih ïa ka kam Ïalehkai (Sports Minister) ha ka jylla, u la kam ba ka jingtrei na ka bynta ka phase I ka la dep 80 na ka 100 (80%) haduh u bnai Lber 2023.Ki paidbah jong ka jylla ki khmih lynti ba ka jingthmu ban pyndep ïa kane ka madan kan lah ban urlong ha shwa ban sdang ka I-League mynta ka aiom namar ka Shillong Lajong FC kaba dei ruh ka klob kaba la ioh ïa ka kabu ban wanphai biang sha kane ka lympung.
title: Dang shim por ban pyndep ïa ka madan JN Stadium ha Polo

content: Ka Mukhla FC ka la ïoh ban jam sha ka phainal jong ka (L) Kesilroy Pala Invitation Football Tournament 2023, ka lympung ba la pynlong da ka West Jaiñtia Sports Association (WJDSA) ha Jowai.Ka Mukhla ka la ïakhun tyngeh ha kane ka semi phainal ba nyngkong ha kaba ki la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingtbit bad ka jingïasngewthuh jingmut jong ki para nongïalehkai da kaba pynliem da 2-0 ïa ka CSA United.U  Teddy Bang u la ai mynsiem ïa ki para nongïalehkai jong ka Mukhla da kaba thep shi kol ha ka minit ba 64 bad shwa ban kut syndon ka jingïakhun, u Wadajied Ryngkhlem u la ïoh ban thep sa shi kol (90+1) ban pynskhem ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka jingïakhun.Ka jingïakhun semi phainal ba ar mynta ka sngi kan long hapdeng ka Salaroh bad Rymbai Shkenshynriah ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi bad kino kino ki kynhun napdeng kine kin sa ïoh ban ïa aireng ha ka phainal pyrshah ïa ka Mukhla FC.
title: Rung phainal ka Mukhla FC sha ka Kesilroy Pala Invitation Football Tournament 2023

content: Ki thei ïalehkai phutbol jong ka jylla hapoh ka jingïalam jong u coach Janbor Marbaniang ki la sdang ïa ka jingïaid lynti ha ka lympung Girls’ National Football Championship (Tier 2) da ka jingjop da 4-1 pyrshah ïa ka Telangana ha Jaipur.Ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong lyngba ka Eiladki Ksoo katba ïa ka kol kaba ar ki la ïoh  ban thep ha ka kylla miet, kata ha ka minit ba 68 lyngba ka Dakani Shylla.Katba ka jingïakhun ka dang ïaid, ka Telangana ka la ïoh ban pynphai shi kol lyngba ka Alige Sushanthika ha ka minit ba 79 hynrei ka Meghalaya kaba la ïoh kabu lypa na ki 2 kol ki la ñion bad thep biang sa 2 kol lyngba ka Dakani (84) bad ka Balabet Khongsit (87).Ki ‘thei ïalehkai jong ka jylla kin bteng biang ïa ka jingïakhun ha kane ka lympung pyrshah ïa ka Rajasthan kaba dei ruh ka jylla kaba pdiang (host) ïa kane ka lympung lashai ka sngi ka 4 tarik Risaw.
title: Da ka jingjop sdang ka Meghalaya ïa ka Junior Girls’ National Football Championship

content: Ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) kaba dei ruh ka synjuk kaba khmih ïa ka kam ïalehkai kriket ha ka jylla ka la pynbna paidbah ïa ka thup kyrteng jong 15 ngut ki ‘rangïalehkai kriket ki ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka lympung BCCI’s U-23 Men’s State A Trophy.Ha kane ka lympung ka Meghalaya kan hap ban ïakhun haduh hynriew tylli ki jingïakhun jong ka group ki ban long lut baroh ha Chandigarh naduh ka 28 tarik u Risaw. Ki jylla kiba ka Meghalaya kan hap ban ïakhun pyrshah ki kynthup ïa ka Uttar Pradesh, Rajasthan, Assam, Andhra Pradesh, Bengal bad Railways kiba dei ki jylla kiba khlaiñ bor bha.Na ka bynta kane ka lympung, kan don ruh ka jingkilan met kum ka jingpynkhreh ïa ka kynhun ka ban long naduh ka 15 haduh 24 tarik mynta u bnai ha nongbah Shillong. Kumta la kyrpad ïa ki nongïarap, ki rangïalehkai bad kito kiwei na bar jong ka district ba kin wan ai jingtip noh ha ka 14 tarik. Kane ka kynhun ïalehkai ka Jylla kan sa mih na jylla ha ka 25 tarik Risaw ban leit sha Chandigarh.Ki kyrteng jong ki rangïalehkai ka Meghalaya ki long u Abhishek Gupta, Nishanta Chakravarty, Manish Sharma, Md Asif Khan, PM Santhosh, Aaron A Nongrum, Badonnam J Mylliemngap, Joydeepan Deb, Sudhir Sahani, Kevin Sanjeev Christopher, Raghav Magotra, Agreas Chamcham A Sangma, Aryan Borah, Sachin Kumar, Appante Waldora A Sangma.Ki rangïalehkai ba la pynkhreh lypa pat ki long u Mrinal Das, Wankitlang Nongpluh, Abhishek Kumar bad u Kush Agarwal bad ki nongïarap ka kynhun pat ki long u Neetesh Sharma (head coach), Synrapsing Riatham (assistant coach), Skhembor Khongbtep (trainer), Emidao Dhar (physio), Wonderful Pakyntein (manager).Ki jingïalehkai kiba ka Meghalaya kan ïakhun ha katei ka lympung ki long, kata ha ka 28 tarik Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Uttar Pradesh, ha ka 30 tarik Risaw pyrshah ïa ka Rajasthan, ha ka 1 tarik Naiwieng pyrshah ïa ka Assam, ha ka 5 tarik Naiwieng pyrshah ïa ka Andhra Pradesh, ha ka 7 tarik Naiwieng pyrshah ïa ka Bengal bad ha ka 9 tarik Naiwieng pyrshah ïa ka Railways.
title: Pyllait ka MCA ïa ki kyrteng jong ki nongïalehkai ka BCCI U-23 Men State A Trophy

content: Ka HK Singh Memorial Secondary School, Jowai kaba mihkhmat ïa ka jylla Meghalaya sha ka lympung 62nd Edition jong ka Subroto Cup International Football Tournament Under-14 (Sub Junior Boys) ka la sdang ïa ka jingïakhun ha kane ka lympung da ka jingjop  da 3-0 ïa ka  Sainik School  kaba long ha Bengaluru, Karnataka (1tarik Risaw).Haba phai pat ha ka jingïakhun ba hynnin ka sngi ka 2 tarik Risaw, ka Mehalaya ka la mad biang ïa ka jingjop da kaba pynliem ïa ka Maharashtra da 1-0.Ka jingïakhun jong kine ki kynhun ka long kaba itynnad bad kaba ïakhaid bor.
