Haduh ban da kut ka kylla step baroh 2 kynhun ki khlem ïoh pynkhih jar, hynrei hadien ba bteng ka kylla miet, kata ha ka minit ba 47 ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh shi kol lyngba u Markatjuh Shylla kaba dei ruh ka kol kaba pyntikna ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka jingïakhun ba la buh tang 25 minit shiliang.Ka HK Singh kan bteng biang ïa ka jingïakhun ha kane ka lympung lashai ka sngi pyrshah ïa ka IPSC ha ka por 2 baje noh phai
title: 62nd Subroto Cup International Football Tournament 2023 : Pynliem ka Meghalaya ïa ka Mahrashtra

content: Ki thei ïalehkai kriket jong ka jylla hapoh ka jingkhmih jong ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ki la ïai pynkhreh mynta na ka bynta ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka lympung Senior Women’s T20 Trophy jong ka Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) ka ba yn sa pynlong ha Vadora bad kaba yn sa sdang ha une u bnai ban wan.La sakhi ba ka jingpynkhreh jong ki ha madan MCA, Polo Shillong ka ïaid shaid shaid bad khmih lynti ba ka jingleit ïashim bynta sha katei ka lympung kan long kaba seisoh.Ka Meghalaya kan sdang ïa ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Pondicherry ha ka 19 tarik Risaw kiwei pat ki kynhun kiba la shah kynthup lang ha ka group ki long ka Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Bengal, Chandigarh, Saurashtra bad Uttar Pradesh. Ki thei ïalehkai kiba la shah jied na ka bynta kane ka lympung ki long ka Ajima A Sangma, Daiaka Emigale Warjri, Debasmita Dutta, Deimaphishisha Lamare, Deiphibapynshngain L Mawnai, Eiffelene K Nongkynrih, Luiza Tamang, Rebeldalis Syiemlieh, Riticia Nongbet, Rubi Chettri, Sanchisa Sangma, Sandria K Momin, Solina Jaba, Suruti K Ray, Monica L Phawa, Pinky Chanda, Neha Hajong, Evanrilin S Syiem, Sara Ananias Kharbani, Fulnessy Mawlong kynthup ruh ia ka Latika Kumari (head coach), Hemant Roy (assistant coach), Darishesha Mawroh (trainer), Marybalahun Sawkmie (physio), Mackie D Blah (manager).
title: Ïai pynkhreh ki nongïalehkai ka jylla na ka bynta ka Senior Women’s T20 Trophy

content: Ka Chutwakhu ka la long ka lahduh jong ka lympung 2nd Division West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) ïa kaba la tip ruh kum ka 6th Debo Shullai Memorial Trophy ha ka jingïakhun ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai, kata hadien ba ki la lah ban pynliem ïa ka Mooknor Thadmuthlong da 1-0.Ka jingïakhun ka la sdang da kaba pynlyng-ngoh bad pynshaiong ïa ki ‘rangïalehkai jong ka Thadmuthlong ha kaba tang ha ka minit ba 9 ka Chutwakhu ka la ïoh ban pynkhih jar bad lah ban ong ruh ba kadei ka kol kaba khlem pat poi pyrkhat bad khlem pat pynkhreh. Ha ka jingshisha baroh 2 kynhun ki long kiba khlaiñ bad kiba dei hok ban ïakhun ïa ka phainal hynrei na ka jingïoh kabu u Luckyness Khyriem ha ka minit ba 9 ka Chutwakhu ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka nam lahduh jong kane ka lympung.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ha ka jingïakhun semi phainal pyrshah ïa ka Lion, u Luckyness Khyriem u dei pynjop ïa ka jingïakhun da kaba ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol ha ka minit ba 32. Une u ‘rangïalehkai uba la lah shisha ban ïalehkai bha ha kane ka lympung baroh kawei u la khur ruh ïa ka khusnam ‘Player of the Tournament’ bad ‘Man of the Match’.Ha kane ka sngi, la wan ban long sakhi da u MLA jong ka South Shillong, u Bah Sanbor Shullai ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u Dolloi jong ka Elaka Jowai,  u Puramon Kynjing, ki dkhot ka WJDSA, kiba ha ïing jong u (L) Debo Shullai bad kiwei kiwei.La pynkut ïa kane ka lympung ryngkat ka jingkmen bad ka jingsngewbha, baroh ki jingïalehkai ki long kiba ïaid beit naduh ba sdang haduh ban da kut khlem kano kano ka jingpynwit bad ka jingthud.Haba kheiñ kyllum na baroh ki jingïalehkai bad ki ‘rangïalehkai, u Lalmal-sawma Tariang naka Chutwakhu, u la khur ïa ka khusnam ‘Best Goal keeper’ katba ïa ka nam ‘Top Scorer’ la ïoh ban khur da u Chanmitre Dkhar na ka Lion Sports and Youth Affairs uba la ïoh ban thep haduh 6 kol.
title: Rah ka Chutwakhu ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung 2nd Division ka WJDSA

content: Ki khynnah ïalehkai jong ka Garo Hills ruh mynta ki la sdang ban kiew bad paw shibun ha ka kam ïalehkai kynthup ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol kaba long ruh ka jingïalehkai kaba la paw bha ha kane ka jylla bad ka nongbah Shillong ka la ïoh ïa ka nam kum ka jaka shong jong u lyoh bad ka jingriewspah ha ka kam ïalehkai phutbol, hynrei mynta ka kynti la ïoh ïa ka khubor kaba la ai mynsiem ïa kiwei pat ki ‘riew ieit phutbol na ka thaiñ Garo ha kaba 2 ngut ki khynnah kiba hapoh 17 snem ki la shah jied ha kawei na ki klob phutbol ba paw tam ha India ka Hyderabad FC, kata u Bipuish G Marak bad u Donkam M Marak ban don bynta ha katei ka kynhun U-17.U Bipiush uba dei ruh u khynnah skul jong ka Ferrando Memorial School bad uba na ka shnong Dawa Nengkatok, Williamnagar u ju don bynta bad ki katto katno ki klob kiba don ha Williamnagar katba u Donkam Marak uba dei u khynnah skul jong ka Hawakhana Higher Secondary School, Tura bad uba dei na ka shnong Matalagre kaba marjan Okkapara, South West Garo Hills u la ju don bynta bad ka klob Chanmary FC kaba ha Tura.
title: Shah jied u Bipuish G Marak bad u Donkam M Marak ban ïasoh bad ka klob Hyderabad FC

content: Ka  Mukhla Evergreen ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha ka jingsdang jong ki ïa ka jingïakhun ha ka lympung 1st Division West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA) ba la tip ruh kum ka  Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy da ka jingjop da 2-0 ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Demthring jong ka Pool A ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.U Ïoh-I Dhar u la ïoh ban thep ïa kitei ki 2 kol na ka bynta ka Mukhla ha ka minit ba 42 bad 70.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 4 tarik Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Moosyiem Shangpung pyrshah ïa ka Nangbah Ïawmusiang ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi ha kajuh ka madan.
title: Lai poiñ khur ka Mukhla ha ka jingsdang ïa ka lympung 1st Division ka WJDSA

content: Ka Basket Hound Club Mawkyrwat South West Khasi Hills District mynta ka sngi ka 4 tarik u Risaw 2023 kala ïoh ban plie pyrda noh ïa ka Inter School Basketball Competition 2023 kaba la pynlong ha Madan Basketball Court jong ka Nativity Higher Secondary School Mawkyrwat ha kaba u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit MLA ka Nongkrem Constituency u la long kum u kongsan ban plie pyrda ïakane ka lympung ïalehkaiBASKETBALL.Kane ka Inter School Basketball Competition SWKHD ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong ba naka liang ka Basket Hound Club Mawkyrwat kala ïoh pynlong kum ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai ha kaba kila don kumba 5 tylli ki kynhun ïalehkai na ki shynrang bad 3 tylli naka liang ki Kynthei na ki skul bapher bapher kiba la wan ïashimbynta ha kane ka Inter School Basketball Competition 2023.U Bah Ardent haba kren kum u kynsan u la ai mynsiem ïa baroh ki samla kiba la ïoh ban ïa shimbynta ha kane ka Lympung ïalehkai Basketball bad u la ong ba kum ki samla ki donkam ban pyni haka pyrthei ïala ki sap  ki jong ki, lada dei  ha kino kino ki kam ïalehkai, kata haka Basketball, kynjatbol bad kiwei de.Ka jingïalehkai ka dei kawei kaba lah ban kyntiew ïaki samla bad ka long ruh ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ïa kito ki samla kiba trei shitom ha ki sap ba kidon.U la ong ruh ba ki samla kim dei ban kut tang hangne hynrei kin nang ïai kiew shaphrang ha ki wei pat ki bynta ha ki kam ïalehkai lada ki sngewthuh ba ki don ïa kata ka  sap kim dei ban shongthait hynrei  ki dei ban trei shitom khnang ba kata ka kam kan lah ban ai jing myntoi ïa ki. Ha kajuh ka por u la ai mynsiem ruh ïa ka Basket Hound Club Mawkyrwat ba kala ïoh ban pynlong kum ïa kine ki lympung ïalehkai ai ba kan nang kiew shaphrang ban nang pynlong shuh shuh kum kine ki Lympung ïalehkai hapoh ka Distrik.Ka Little Star Higher Secondary School Bad ka Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya (JNV)  Mawkyrwat jong ki Shynrang  bad ka St.Merry Higher Secondary School Rangblang bad ka Nativity H.S School Mawkyrwat jong ki kynthei kila long ki khynhun ïalehkai ba la ïoh ban pynïalehkai sdang ha kane ka sngi.Nalor u kongsan ha kane ka sngi, la donlang ruh u president, Bah Freddy Marweiñ bad Wanskhem-lang Lyngkhoi Secretary jong ka Basket Hound Club Mawkyrwat ha ryngkat bad kiwei de ki ‘riew rangbah jong ka thaiñ. Ha shwa ban pynïalehkai la pynlong shwa ka jingialang ba la pynïaid  da u Bah K.Lyngdoh bad ka jing khublei naka Kong K. Thyrniang.
title: Plie pyrda u Bah Ardent ïa ka Inter School Basketball Competition, 2023 bala pynlong da ka BHCM SWKHD

content: Ka  Nangbah Ïawmusiang ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha ka jingsdang jong ki ïa ka jingïakhun ha ka lympung 1st Division ba la tip ruh kum ka  Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai da ka jingjop da 2-0 ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Moosyiem Shangpung jong ka Pool A ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Haba phai ha ka jingïakhun, u Kynsaibor Dkhar (34) bad u Dawanbiang Passah (55) ki la thep ïa ka kol ban pynjop ïa ka kynhun bad ban khur ïa ka 3 poiñ ha ka jingsdang ïa kane ka lympung.Ka jingïalehkai ba mynta ka sngi ka 4 tarik Nailar kan long hapdeng ka Sohmynting pyrshah ïa ka Khliehiongriang ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: 1st Division WJDSA : Pynliem ka Nangbah Ïawmusiang ïa ka Moosyiem Shangpung da 2-0

content: Ka Meghalaya Cricket Association (MCA) ka la pynlong da ka program ban ai mynsiem ïa ki thei ïalehkai kriket jong ka jylla shi sngi shwa ba kin leit ban ïashim bynta sha ka lympung  ‘BCCI’s Women’s U-19 One Day Trophy’ ha Surat ïa kaba yn sa sdang naduh ka 8 tarik  mynta u bnai.Ha kane ka program ban ai mynsiem bad ban pynshlur ïa kine ki nongïalehkai ki ban mih khmat ïa ka jylla sha katei ka lympung, la ïoh ruh ban pynbna ïa ka Captain Anikita Sharma bad ka Dubleen Nengnong kum ka Vice Captain.Ki don katto katne ki kynhun kiba khlaiñ ha ka group ba la shah kynthup ka Meghalaya, kum ka Tamil Nadu bad Maharashtra hynrei na ka liang u Naba Bhattacharjee uba dei ruh u President u la pynshlur ïa kine ki samla ba kim dei ban sheptieng ïa ka kyrteng jong ka kynhun.Na ka liang u Bah Gideon Kharkongor u la ong “Phi dei ka lawei jong ki nongïalehkai kriket ka Meghalaya. Phi don shibun ka lynti ban  ïaid bad ïaineh ha ka kyrdan ïalehkai jong phi. Kan long ka jingkmen ïa ngi lada ngin ïohi 1 ne 2 ngut ki nongïalehkai ki ban mih khmat na ka bynta ka ri”.
title: Phah ka MCA ïa ki ‘thei ïalehkai sha ka lympung Women’s U-19 One Day Trophy

content: Ka H.K. Singh Memorial Secondary School, Jowai kaba dei ruh ka skul kaba mih khmat ïa ka jylla Meghalaya mynta u snem sha ka lympung 62nd Subroto Cup 2023 International Football Tournament ha ka U-14 Sub Junior Boys ka la ïoh ia ka kabu ban jam sha ka quarter phainal khlem da donkam ban ïalehkai.Ha ka jingshisha ka Meghalaya ka la dei ban ïakynduh bad ka IPSC hynnin ka sngi hynrei na ki daw ba ki khlem lah ban pyndep ïa ki kyndon ba la buh, kum ïa ka Medical test, kumta ka IPSC ka la dei ka skul kaba 16 mynta u snem ban shah kyntait noh mynta u snem ha kane ka lympung.Na ka daw ka jingshah weng jong ka IPSC, ka Meghalaya ka la ïoh ban rung quarter final jong kane ka lympung ba la pynlong ha Bengaluru.Kum ban shu pynkymaw, ki don haduh 15 tylli ki skul kiba la shah weng noh na ka daw ba ki nongïalehkai ki la heh ka ‘rta bad kim ïoh ïa ka medical report.Ka jingïakhun quarter phainal ha kane ka lympung kan long ha ka 6 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ka H.K. Singh Memorial Secondary School, West Jaiñtia Hills, Jowai kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Chawngfianga Middle School, Saidan, Kolasib, Mizoram ha ka por 4 baje janmiet.
title: Subroto Cup : Mynta ka sngi yn ïakhun ka Meghalaya pyrshah ïa ka Mizoram

content: U Spain Ryngkhlem u la long u ‘rangïalehkai ba kongsan ha kane ka jingïakhun hynnin ka sngi ka 5 tarik Risaw, bad lah ban ong lyngba jong u ba ka Sohmynting ka la ïoh ban khur ïa ka 3 poiñ bad pynliem ïa ka Khliehiongriang da 2-1 ha ka jingïakhun na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.U Spain u dei ruh u ‘rangïalehkai ba la ïoh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong ha kane ka jingïakhun, kata ha ka minit ba 28 hynrei ka Khliehiongriang ka la ïoh ban pynphai noh tang hapoh 6 minit lyngba u Founder Passah, kumta ka jingïalehkai ha ka kylla step ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid.Haba bteng pat ka kylla miet, u Spain u la khyrwit sa shi kol ha ka minit ba 58 bad dei lynngba katei ka kol ba ka Sohmynting ka la ïoh ïa ka jingtikna ban  khur ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka jingïakhun.
title: Liem ka Khliehiongriang ha ka Sohmynting lyngba ki 2 kol jong u Spain Ryngkhlem

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Hapoh taxi” ka dei kaba la thoh bad thaw da u Soniwan Langstang. Ïa ka jingpynbit pynbiang bad u nongrwai jong kane ka jingrwai dei u Joedickinson Siangshai bad ka sur tem, la shimti da ka RMB-Music.Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Heisarmi Rymbai bad ka puron, ka Daphi Nam (Pyni Lapasam). Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la shna bad edit da u Soniwan Langstang bad kumjuh ruh ïa ka camera bad jingring ïa katei ka jingrwai, la shimti da u @SoniwanLangstang1. Ki nongshad ha katei ka jingrwai, ki kynthup ïa ka Mebashanki Paslein, Maywarly Rymbai bad u Soniwan Langstang.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Hapoh taxi”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Jubab” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait paidbah myn shem bnai bad ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Shanbor Lyngdoh bad ka puron, ka Ladia kharlyngdoh. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la rwai da ki nongrwai Khasi, kynthup ïa ka Babel Marsing bad u Donbok Tariang.La thaw ïa ka da u Donbok Tariang bad la rekod bad pynbit pynbiang ïa kane ka jingrwai da u Z0I bad la pynbha shuh shuh da u fEd M. La shna ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Phonder Syiem bad ïa ka camera bad edit, la shimti da u Nick syngkli.Ka Make-up, la shimti da ka Andrea Shadap bad pynmih da ka kompeni Ri Syndong Production bad ka Drone, la shimti da u Alvin Timung. Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa ka Rebeca Ronghang, Bahbah Balawan Marwein, Bikas Klein, S. Kharsahnoh, Karow News, Nalari News, U Nongpathai News bad ka Na ki Thiar News.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Jubab”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Shirta bad phi” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 30 tarik, Nailur 2023 bad la rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da u KitzBprince Sari. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Balajied Lyngkhoi bad ka puron, ka Neblejoy Marbaniang. Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la shna bad pynmih da u Komol Lyngkhoi bad ka kompeni Khasi Collection Videos, katba ïa ka Drone, la shimti ban pynïaid da u Sixstar S mawdoh.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Shirta bad phi”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, ka “Lait lah me Pt II” ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha u Nailur bad la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Pynshainam Nongkynrih, Tredaki Ryngkhlem bad ka Badaribha Nongshli. U Director Of Photography, dei u Rockyland Laloo bad la pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Z-0I. La rekod ïa katei ka jingrwai ha Ri-Bhoi Emperor Studio @KhasiRapstudio 7005918726. Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa ka Kyntiewlin Mawphniang bad u Gregorius Maring bad ïa ki Subtitile, la shimti da u Evanland Syiem.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Lait lah me Pt II”

content: :Ïa ka jingpynbna ïa ka trailer jong ka phlim Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Bakla”, la dep pyllait ha ka 3 tarik, Risaw 2023. Ha katei ka phlim Khasi, la shim bynta da ki tyngshop bad ki puron jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa ka Bahun Nongneng, Plieladkyrhai, Raymond Malngiang, Rishan Kharsyntiew bad u Pynshongdor Nongrum.
title: Yn pyni ïa ka trailer jong ka phlim “Bakla”

content: Ka jingrwai Khasi, kaba kyrteng ka “Shipek” (One peck) ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 4 tarik, Risaw bad la pynmih da ka NANGTEI PRODUCTION. Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la rwai bad thaw ïa ka jingrwai da u NANGTEI. Ïa ka tune, la shimti da ka Diana M Marbaniang bad la ai ïa ka sur tem da u BISHOW CHANAMBAM bad la rekod ha DI Studio.:
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Shipek” (One peck)

content: Ki nongpynïaid jong ka Meghalaya Cycling Association (MCA) ki la pynbna paidbah ba kin sa pynlong ïa ka jingïakob ñiah saikil ba la tip kum ka ‘All Meghalaya Cycling Championship’ ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai.U Bah Lening Bareh, President jong ka MCA u la ong ruh ba ka jingthmu ban pynlong ïa kane ka jingïakob ka long ban jied ïa ki nongïalehkai na ka jylla sha ka lympung 20th National MTB Championship kaba yn pynlong da ka Cycling Federation of India.Ym tang katta hynrei u la ong ruh ba kane kan long ruh ka kabu na ka bynta ki nongïalehkai ba kin ïoh ïashim bynta ha ki lympung bapher bapher.Ha katei ka jingïakob kan don ha thup sub junior (hapoh 14 snem), junior bad elite (19 snem shajrong).
title: Yn pynlong ka MCA da ka ‘All Meghalaya Cycling Championship’ ba shi sngi

content: Ki khynnah ïalehkai Kickboxing ka Meghalaya Association of  Kickboxing Organisation (MAKO) hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya School of Martial Arts (MSMA) ki la ïoh ïa ka jingjop don burom ha ka jingleit ïashim bynta ha ka lympung ‘National Kickboxing’ kaba la long da Dehradun, Uttarakhand da kaba ïoh ban khur haduh 8 tylli ki takma Ksiar.Ka Seng ha u kyrwoh lyngba u Publicity Secretary ka pynpaw ba kane ka jingjop ka la wan long hapoh ka jingïalam jong u nongseng jong ka Kick Boxing ha Meghalaya u Bah Donny Ranee bad i Kong Bajoplin Kharmudai kum i Team Manager bad kaba la long shisha ka burom na ka bynta ka jylla Meghalaya hi baroh kawei.Ïa kane ka jingïakop National Kickboxing la pynlong hapoh Multipurpose Sports Hall, Parade Ground, Dehradun, Uttarakhand da ka Uttarakhand Kickboxing Association hapoh ka shatri jong ka National Kickboxing Federation (NKF-NG) kaba kaba la ïoh ïa ka jingithuh da ka Asian Kickboxing Confederation.Ki takma ba la ïoh khur da ki 20 ngut ki khynnah ïalehkai ka MAKO  ha kane ka lympung  naduh ki Sub-Junior, Junior bad Senior ki long baroh 29 tylli. Ha katei ka jingleit ïakhun, la ïoh 8 tylli ki takma ksiar, 14 tylli ki takma rupa bad 7 tylli ki takma rnong.
title: Phra tylli ki Takma Ksiar khur ki khynnah Kickboxing ka MAKO ha ka National Kickboxing

content: 4 ngut ki nongjngi um na Shella kiba kynthup 2 ngut ki kynthei bad 2 ngut ki shynrang kin sa ïoh ïa ka kabu ban leit ïakhun lane ban mih khmat ïa ka jylla sha ka lympung National Games kaba yn sa pynlong ha Goa mynta u snem.Katei ka kabu ka la wan hadien ba ki la lah ban ïalehkai bha ha ka ïakob jngi ba la tip kum ka   “The 16th State Aquatic Championship” ba la pynlong da ka Meghalaya Swimming Association ha Crinoline Shillong.Ha ka 6 tarik Risaw u Myntri Rangbah jong ka jylla Goa, u Dr. Pramod Sawant lem bad ki dkhot jong ka State Sports Minister ki la pynpaw ba ka Goa thaw ïa ka history lyngba ka National Games kaba 37, bad kane ka long ban pynkheiñ ïa ka rekod da kaba kynthup haduh 43 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai (sporting disciplines) mynta u snem.Ha u ne u snem kin don katto katne ki jait jingïalehkai kiba na ka liang jong ka jylla ka la thmu ban wanrah ka ban tam palat ïa u snem ba ladep ba la long ha Gujarat, kaba kynthup tang 36 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai, bad ha Kerala snem 2015 da 33 tylli, mynta u snem ka National Games kan sa nangïar shuh shuh.U Dr. Pramod Sawant u la pynpaw ba u don ka jingthmu kaba kyrpang na bynta ka jylla, da kaba ong, “Ngi kwah ban kyntiew ïa ka sawdon sawkun jong ka Goa haba ïadei bad ki kam ïalehkai. Kumba long ki nongjngohkai kiba sngewtynnat ban wankai sha ki rudnong kiba hapoh ka jylla, mynta ngi don jingthmu ban khring bad kyntiew ïa ka Sports. Ki rynsan ïalehkai kum ka Ironman bad ka World Table Tennis ki la ai jingmut ïa ngi ban kynthuplang ha kane ka kynti ba mynta.Ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ki kynhun ba khmih ïa ki jait jingïalehkai na bynta kane ka National Games, ngi kyrpad ruh ïa ki sports associations bad ïa ka national federations ban kyrshan lem ha kaba ïadei bad kane-. Bad ka thong ka jong ngi ka long ban kyntiew ïa ka sport ha Goa shajrong bad kham shajrong.”Kane ka tamasa lehkai kaba kynthup ïa kiba bun ki jait Sport (multisport event) kan sakhi haduh 28 tylli ki jylla bad 8 tylli ki union territory ki ban sa shim bynta, kaba la pynkhreh ban sdang naduh 26 tarik u Risaw haduh 9 tarik u Naiwieng. La pynkhreh bun ki jaka ki ban pynlong ïa ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher, ïa ka cycling bad golf yn pynlong ha Delhi.Kane kan dei ka sienjam kaba thymmai ïa ka National Games, ha kaba mynta u snem yn sakhi ïa kiba bun ki jait sports ki ban sa kynthuplang, kiba kynthup ïa ka beach football, roll ball, golf, sepaktakraw, sqay martial arts, kalliyarapattu, and pencak silat. Additionally, yachting bad taekwondo ki ban sa ïohrung biang sha kane ka lympung hadien ba shah weng ha ka sien pynlong ba khadduh. Shuh shuh, kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka tynrai jong ka jylla, la ïoh ruh ban kynthup ïa ka lagori bad gatka kum ka sport.Na ka liang jong u Myntri ka Sport jylla Goa, u Govind Gaude u la pynpaw ïa ka jingdonkam jong kane ka lympung, da kaba ong, “Kane ka 37th National Games kam long tang ka lympung; ka long ka kabu ban kyntiew ïa ki nongïalehkai ha kylleng ka ri ndia. Katba ngi dang pynkhreh ban pdiang pynlong ïa kane ka lympung ha Goa, ym dei tang ba ngi rakhe lehkmen na bynta ka Sports hynrei ban kynmaw ruh ïa ka Asian Games. Ka thong ka jong ngi kam long tang ban pynïar ïa ki nongshimbynta hynrei bankyntiew ïa ka Sport na bynta baroh ki jylla.Ryngkatlang ngin pynlong ïa ka 37th National Games ka lympung ka ban sah jingkynmaw, ka shap ka jingïatylli bad u mawjam na bynta ka lawei jong ka sports ha India.” Haba phai sha ki snem ba ladep jong ka National Games la sakhi ïa ka jingwanshimbynta ki nongïalehkai kiba ju mihkhmat ïa ri kum u Neeraj Chopra, Sania Mirza, Mirabai Chanu, Sajan Prakash, bad u Manu Bhaker. Ha u ne u snem kin don palat 10,000 ngut ki nongïalehkai kiba shimbynta ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher bad na ka liang jong ka jylla Goa ka khmihlynti ïa ka jingïasnohktilang jong ki jylla ban pynlong ïa kane ka National Games kaba shongshit bad ka ban sah jingkynmaw ym tang ïa ka jylla hynrei ïa ka ri India baroh kawei.
title: Paw ki nongjngi na Shella ha ka State Aquatic Champion

content: Ka Dulong SC ka la mad ïa ka nam rem ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Wahiajer SC na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Ka jingïalehkai jong kine ki 2 kynhun ha ka kylla step ka long kaba ïakhaid bor bad baroh 2 kynhun ki khlem ïoh pynkhih jar, dei ha ka minit ba 56 u Janario Phawa u la ïoh ban thep ïa ka kol kaba nyngkong na ka bynta ka Wahïajer katba ïa kawei pat ka kol u la ïoh ban thep ha ka minit ba 88.Tang hadien 7 mint ba u Janario u la ïoh ban thep kol, ka Dulong SC ruh ka la ïoh ban pynphai shi kol lyngba u Wansa O Laloo hynrei haduh ban da kut ka minit ïalehkai, ka Dulong ka khlem ïoh shuh ïa ka kabu ban pynphai bad ban pynurlong ïa ka jingïasam mar shi poiñ.Ïa ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta kane ka lympung yn bteng biang ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka jingïakhun ka Luti Tuber SW pyrshah ïa ka Moosalyngkat haka por 2 baje noh phai sngi ha kajuh ka madan.
title: Lyngba ki 2 kol jong u Janario Phawa, liem ka Dulong SC ha ka Wahiajer SC

content: Ka Shillong College bad Sngap Syiem College ki la ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung NEHU Inter College Cross Country Championship 2023 ba la pynlong da ka tnat Ïalehkai jong ka skul bah NEHU, Shillong.Haduh 125 ngut ki khynnah pule ki la wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalehkai.Ha katei ka sngi la wan ban don ryngkat ruh u Prof. B. Panda, NEHU Finance Officer kum u kongsan ha kaba u la ïoh ruh ïa ka kabu ban sam ïa ka khusnam sha ki nongjop. La don ryngkat ruh u N. Das, Asst. Director (PE & Sports), ki dkhot bad ki nongpynïaid jong kane ka skul bah kynthup ki nonghikai.Ha ka liang jong ki shynrang, ka Sngap Syiem College, Mawkyrwat ka la khur ïa ka nam lahduh bad ïa ka kyrdan ba ar la ïoh da ka Shillong College, kata ha ka liang jong ki kynthei, ka Shillong College ki la ïoh ban khur ïa ka nam lahduh bad ka Sngap Syiem ka la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan ba ar.
title: Lahduh ka Shillong College bad Sngap Syiem College ha ka NEHU Inter College Cross Country Championship

content: Ki khynnah jong ka skul H.K. Singh Memorial Secondary School, Jowai kiba la mihkhmat ïa ka jylla Meghalaya sha ka lympung 62nd Subroto Cup 2023 International Football Tournament (U-14 Sub Junior Boys) ki la diaw shibun namar ki la hap ban leit ïing noh na ka jingbym lah ban pynurlong ïa ka jingangnud, kata ban jam sha ka semi phainal jong kane ka lympung. Ryngkat ka jingbynnud bad ka jingjaw ummat ki khynnah ïalehkai jong ka Meghalaya ki la mih noh na madan ha katei ka jingïakhun.Ha kane ka jingïalehkai quarter phainal pyrshah ïa ka skul Chawngfianga Middle School, Saidan, Kolasib, Mizoram ka Meghalaya ka la liem noh da ka said, kata da 1-0.Ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba itynnad bad baroh arliang ki la pyni ïa ki sap bad ki jingtbit jong ki hynrei namar ka jingbym ïoh kabu ban pynkhih jar ka Meghalaya ka la duh noh jam sha shiliang jong kane ka lympung kaba heh.Ka Mizoram ka la ïoh ban thep ïa ka shi kol ha ka minit ba 16 lyngba u Isak. Hooid ka jingïalehkai ka long kaba jwat bad na ka bynta ka Meghalaya ruh ka long kaba la pynduh mynsiem namar tang ha ka kylla step ki la shah thep noh hynrei la katta ruh ki nongïalehkai jong ka skul H.K. Singh ki la ïai ïakhun tyngeh, da ka jingthmu ban ïoh pynphai ïa katei ka shikol hynrei namar ka jingskhem ki nongïalehkai ka Mizoram la pynduh buit noh ïa ka Meghalaya ban thaw lad.Haba phai sha kiwei pat ka jingïalehkai jong kane ka lympung, ka West Bengal ka la pynliem ïa ka Sikkim da 2-0, ka CISE ka la pynliem ïa ka Kerala da 1-0 bad ka Assam ka la jop kput ïa ka Chandigarh da 9-0.
title: Subroto Cup : Ïam kthang ki khynnah jong ka Skul H.K Sing ba liem ha ka Mizoram

content: Ka Ladrymbai-B ka la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban rung (qualified) sha ka quarter final jong ka lympung  First Division Football Tournament kaba pynïaid daka East Jaintia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA) na ka Pool-A ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Musniang SC ba la pynlong ha madan artificial turf Diengshynrum, Khliehriat .U Dasukmiki Dkhar u la long u ‘rangïalehkai ba kongsan ha kane ka jingïakhun ha kaba u la ïoh baroh 2 tylli ki kol kiba la pynlah ïa ka kynhun ban jam sha shiliang jong kane ka lympung. Ïa ka kol ba nyngkong u la ïoh ban thep ha ka minit ba 24 katba ïa kawei pat la ïoh ha ka minit ba 78.Haba phai sha kawei pat ka jingïakhun, ka Lumshken ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Shiliang Umshong SC da 1-0 lyngba kol jong u Markos Bareh (11).Kine ki 2 kynhun kiba la ïoh ïa ka jingjop ha kane ka sngi ki la ïoh ban bsut ïalade sha ka quarter final jong kane ka lympung ba la pynlong da ka EJHDFA.Ka jingïakhun na ka bynta kane ka lympung kan bteng biang mynta ka sngi ka 10 tarik Risaw ha kaba ka Rymbai Synrang Shahkhain SC kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Paithlu SC  ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi bud pat ka jingïakhun hapdeng ka Lumputhoi SC pyrshah ïa ka Khliehriat West FC.
title: Jam ka Ladrymbai sha ka quarter jong ka lympung 1st Division EJHDFA

content: Kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ïa ka kam ïalehkai sport hapoh ka dong, ka Ladnongsba Sport Club ha ka sngi Saitjaiñ jong ka taiew bala lah, ka 7 tarik u Risaw kala ïoh ban plie pyrda noh ïa ka lympung kynjatbol kaba la tip kum ka 1st Knockout Football Tournament 2023.Ïa katei ka lympung la ïoh ban plie pyrda da u Samla K. Syiemlieh, Secretary ka Green Tech Foundation Meghalaya kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ruh u Rangbah Dong ka Ladnongsba ki nongkïalam bad nongkitkam ka Sport Club bad kiwei kiwei.Ka jingïalehkai kaba nyngkong kaba la long hapoh ka Madan Ladnongsba kala long hapdeng ka Dong Mawlein SC pyrshah ïa ka MNU Driver ha kaba ka kynhun jong ka MNU Driver kala ïoh ban khur ïa ka nam jop da 3-1, katba ka jingïakhun kaba ar ka 11 Brother kala ïoh ban khur ïa ka jingjop da kab pynliem noh ïa ka Maitshaphrang da 5 kol la 2.
title: Plie pyrda ka Ladnongsba SC ïa ka lympung 1st Knockout Football Tournament 2023

content: Ka Moosalyngkat SC ka la mad ïa ka jingjop ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Luti Tuber SW na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Ha katei ka jingïakhun,  u Datngen I Dan (25) bad Lalthakhuna Ngaite (90+3) ki la ioh mar shi kol katba u Edius L Laloo u la ioh ban thep 2 kol (80 & 89) bad na ka bynta ka Luti Tuber SW ïa ka shi kol la ioh ban thep da u Kordor Dkhar (55).Ka jingïalehkai ba mynta ka sngi ka 10 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Nangbah Ïawmusiang pyrshah ïa ka Sabahmuswang  ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: 1st Division WJDSA : Liem ka Dulong SC ha ka Wahiajer SC 2 kol

content: Ka West Jaiñtia Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai kaba dei ruh ka seng kaba la pynïaid ïa ka lympung (L) Kesilroy Pala Invitation Football Tournament 2023, ka la pynbna paidbah ba ka jingïakhun phainal jong kane ka lympung hapdeng ka  Mukhla FC bad Salaroh FC kan long noh ha ka 13 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 1 baje.Ha ka jingshisha ïa ka jingïakhun phainal la la dep ban pynbeit ha ka 7 tarik hynrei la pynkynriah noh ïa katei ka jingïakhun na ka daw jong ka suiñbneng.Ka Mukhla FC ka la ïoh ban jam  nyngkong ha ka phainal jong kane ka lympung da kaba pynliem ïa ka CSA United da 2-0.Katba ka Salaroh FC kaba la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban jam sha ka wat ba khatduh jong kane ka jingïakhun kadei hadien ba ki la pynliem ïa ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah da 1-0 ha ka semi phainal ba ar.Ha katei ka jingïakhun phainal yn wan ban sakhi da u Bah Sniawbhal
title: Pynkynriah ka WJDSA ïa ka jingïakhun phainal jong ka (L) Kesilroy Pala Invitation Football Tournament

content: Ka Meghalaya Golf Promoter’s Society (MGPS) ka la pyllait paidbah ïa 4 ngut ki nongïalehkai Golf na ka jylla ba kin leit ban ïashim bynta ha ka lympung Asian Games ka ban sa long ha Goa mynta u snem.Kine 4 ngut ki kynthup ïa u Johnwell Momin, (professional category) u Jonathan Ïawphniaw (amateur), ka  Daphisha Phanbuh Shullai (professional) bad ka Teesta Rawat (amateur).Katei ka kabu ka la wan hadien ba ki la shah jied ha ka program (trial) ba la pynlong ha une u bnai ba lah dep bad mynta u bnai ha Golf Course, Shillong.Watla ka ka Goa kan pdiang bad pynlong (host) ïa ka National Games 2023 hynrei haba phai ha ka jingialehkai Golf bad jingiakob ñiah saikil yn pynlong ha ka nongbah New Delhi (Delhi Golf Club) naduh 5 haduh 9 tarik Naiwieng.Kane ka tamasa lehkai kaba kynthup ïa kiba bun ki jait Sport (multisport event) kan sakhi haduh 28 tylli ki jylla bad 8 tylli ki union territory ki ban sa shim bynta, kaba la pynkhreh ban sdang naduh 26 tarik u Risaw haduh 9 tarik u Naiwieng.Kane kan dei ka sienjam kaba thymmai ïa ka National Games, ha kaba mynta u snem yn sakhi ïa kiba bun ki jait sports ki ban sa kynthuplang, kiba kynthup ïa ka beach football, roll ball, golf, sepaktakraw, sqay martial arts, kalliyarapattu, and pencak silat. Shuh shuh, kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka tynrai jong ka jylla, la ïoh ruh ban kynthup ïa ka lagori bad gatka kum ka sport.
title: Shah jied 4 ngut ki nongïalehkai Golf na ka jylla sha ka National Games

content: Ka Sabahmuswang SC ïoh ïa ka jingjop kaba khlem poi pyrkhat shuh namar ha baroh ki minit ïalehkai, ym shym don ba lah ban pynkhih jar, hynrei shwa shi minit ban kut syndon ka minit ba la buh, u Myson Shylla u la ïoh ïa shi kol ban pynjop ïa ka kynhun ban pynduh poiñ noh ïa ka Nangbah Ïawmusiang SC ha ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 11 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Mookyndur pyrshah ïa ka Mukhla Evergreen ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: 1st Division WJDSA :Da ka said, liem ka Nangbah Iawmusiang SC ha ka Sabahmuswang SC

content: Ka long ka khubor kaba pynkynkmen ym tang ïa u Bah Alison Kharsyntiew, hynrei ka jingkmen bad ka jingsarong ïa ka jylla baroh kawei ha kaba une u coach barim jong ka Shillong Lajong FC u la shah  thung kum u assistant coach ba pura jong ka klob Mohammedan Sporting SC (ka klob na West Bengal, Kolkata) ryngkat u coach Andrey Chershynov na Russia.Kawei na ka khubor kaba kham sngewtynnad ka long ba u Bah Kharsyntiew u dei ruh u assistant coach ba nyngkong napdeng ki Khasi ban ïoh ïa katei ka kyrdan ha ka lympung I-League.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw, ha u Naitung jong une u snem, kane ka klob ka jied ïa u Bah Alisan ban long kum u reserves coach lane u coach u ban pynap bujli bad u ban long ruh kum u nongbtin lynti ïa ki rangïalehkai kiba dang kham khynnah (youth team), hynrei tang hadien 2 bnai, kane ka klob ka la ibit ban kyntiew kyrdan ïa une u nongïalam ban long u symbud coach jong kane ka klob.Ka Mohammedan kadei ka klob kaba don ha ka lympung I-League bad kan long ka bynta kaba eh ïa u namar lada kane ka kynhun kan hun ïa ka rukom pynïaid ba thymmai ka lah ban bujli noh ha kano kano ka por.Halor ka jingshah jied kum u reservers coach na ka bynta katei ka klob u Bah Alisan u la ong, “Nga kmen ba ngan ïoh ban ïasoh bad kane ka kynhun bad ngan pyndonkam hok ïa kaei kaba nga la mad ha kane ka kam ban btin lynti ïa ki samla ki ban buh ïa ki matti jong ki samla ha kane ka shlem ha kine ki snem ban wan” ong u Bah Kharsyntiew.U Bah Alison uba dei ruh u rangïalehkai barim ka jylla, u la shimti pura ïa Lajong naduh ka aiom ïalehkai jong u snem 2018-20.Kane ka jingwan ïasoh bad kane ka klob ha Kolkata kadei hadien kyndiat por ba u la don bynta bad ka Sports Authority of India (SA) kum u coach/technical director ha kaba u la ïasoh ha shiteng samoi ha une u snem ba lah dep. Ha shwa ïa katei ka bynta u la dei ruh u Assistant Manager jong ka klob North East United kaba don ha ka lympung Indian Super League (ISL) kaba dei ruh ka league ba heh tam ha India.U la ïasoh bad kane ka klob kaba la mih khmat ïa ki jylla na ki thaiñ Shatei Lam Mihngi ha u Nohprah 2020 haduh 2022.U Kharsyntiew u la sdang ïa kane ka kam kaba khraw naduh ka kyrdan barit, kata ban ïalam ïa ka kynhun jong ka Lajong (Youth Team) bad haduh bad ka kynhun kan jam sha ka I-League.Katba u dang don bad ka Lajong, u la pyndep ruh ïa ka  AFC A Licence course ha u snem 2019.Tiak ban shu phai shaphang ka jingim jong une u nongïalam uba dang 36 snem ka ‘rta, u Alison u dei u khynnah uba ieit ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol naduh ba u dang kham khynnah ka rta. Namar ka jingieit ïa kane ka jajit jingïalehkai u la sdang ban jam sha kawei pat ka bynta.Sngewsih tang ha ka rta ba  19 u la mad ïa ka jingmynsaw bad namar katei ka jingkhanglad ban ïalehkai, u la jied pat ban ïaid ha kawei pat ka lynti, kata ban pule pyndep ïa ka coaching class.Ka Lajong kadei ka kabu na ka bynta jong u ban ïoh sdang ïa kane ka jingangnud bad ka thong ba thymmai. U la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban ïalam ïa katei ka kynhun ha shwa ba ka klob kan paw, kata ha shwa ruh ba kynhun kan shah kyntiew ha ka Shillong Premier League (SPL).U la don bynta ruh bad ka Lajong ba kan ïoh ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh kaba nyngkong jong ka lympung SPL, kata ha u snem 2014.
title: Kyntiew ka Mohammedan Sporting ïa u Bah Alison Kharsyntiew sha ka kyrdan ‘Assistant Coach’

content: Hadien ka Ladrymbai-B, ka Rymbai Synrang Shahkhain bad Khliehriat West FC  ki la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban rung (qualified) sha ka quarter final jong ka lympung  First Division Football Tour-nament kaba pynïaid daka East Jaintia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA) ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Musniang SC ba la pynlong ha madan artificial turf Diengshynrum, Khliehriat .Haba phai ha ka jingïalehkai ba nyngkong, ka jingïakhun hapdeng ka Rymbai Synrang Shahkhain SC bad Pamra Paithlu SC ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid da 0-0 hynrei ka Rymbai kaba la tam poiñ lypa ka la ïoh ban jam sha shiliang jong kane ka lympung.Ha ka jingïakhun ba bud, ka Khliehriat West FC ka la pynliem noh da 3-1  ïa ka Lumputhoi SC. U Jasmine Tlang u la ïoh ban thep 2 kol ha kane ka jingïakhun, kata ha ka minit ba 4 bad 10 katba u Silgrak Pala u la ïoh ban thep ha ka minit ba 43 bad na ka bynta ka Lumputhoi la ïoh ban thep da u Rishan Lyngdoh ha ka minit ba 17.Ki kynhun kiba la shah pynhiar sha ka 2nd Division ha kane ka samoi ban wan ki long ka Lumputhoi SC Rymbai Pohskur SC, Pamra paithlu SC, bad Musniang SC.
title: Jam ka Rymbai Synrang bad Khliehriat West sha ka quarter final

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya, u Conrad K. Sangma mynta ka sngi, ka 12 Risaw ula buh ïa u mawnongrim jong ka Rongjeng Stadium ha East Garo Hills ha kaba la don lang u Myntri Shakliar Warjri bad MLA u Jim Sangma bad Rupert Momin. Ka jingshna ïa kane ka Stadium kan kot i aka T.9.25 klur ka ban kynthup ïa ka jingpynbha ïa ka madan ïalehkai phutbol bad ïa jaka shong jong ki nongpeit.Haba kren ha katei ka sngi, u Conrad K. Sangma u la pynkynmaw ïa ki jingïohi jngai jong u kpa jong u, u Purno A. Sangma uba don ka jingïadei kaba jan bad ki nongshong shnong jong ka Rongjeng. U la ïathuh ba dei u kpa jong u, u Purno A. Sangma uba la wanrah ïa ka jingbuh ïa ka Rongjeng Sub Division bad kiwei ki jingtei jong ka Sorkar na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki nongshong shnong jong ka Rongjeng.Ha kaba kren shaphang ka jingtei ïa kine ki jaka ïalehkai, u Conrad K. Sangma ula ïathuh ba ha kine ki san snem ba la dep, ka la Sorkar ka la dep pynlut haduh T.400 klur haba ïanujor bad ki jingpynlut ïa ki kam ïalehkai ha kine ki 45 snem ba la dep. U la ïathuh ruh ba ha kine ki san snem kiba wan, ka Sorkar kan pynlut haduh T.1000 klur na ka bynta ka jingshna ïa ki jaka ïalehkai.U la ïathuh ba shuwa jong kane, ym shym la don kata ka jingpynlut ha kaba ka dei bad ka jingshna ïa ki jaka ïalehkai. Hynrei, ka jingpynlut na ka bynta ki kam ïalehkai ka la long kaba bun haduh katta hadien ka snem 2018 naduh bawan ka Sorkar Synrop Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA). U Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma u la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar jylla ka don jingthmu ban pynbha shuh shuh ïa ki 25 tylli ki jaka ïalehkai phutbol hapoh ka jylla bad ban buh ruh ïa ki phlang ïalehkkai Artificial Turf ha kitei ki jaka ïalehkai. U la ïathuh ba yn pynlong ïa ka Meghalaya Games 2023 ha Tura mynta ka snem, ha kaba yn ïa shim bynta da ki 3,000 ngut ki nongïalehkai na kylleng jong ka jylla. U la kyntu ruh ïa ki paidbah shong shnong ba kin shim kabu ïa ka CM Elevate Programme.Ha katei ka sngi, la pyllong ruh ïa ka jingïalehkai MLA Cup hapdeng ka United Shallang FC bad  Balbarian Sports Club Rongjeng.
title: Buh maw nongrim u Myntri Rangbah Conrad K. Sangma ïa ka Rongjeng Stadium ha East Garo Hills

content: Ka Mookyndur SC ïoh ïa ka jingjop kaba khlem poi pyrkhat shuh namar ha baroh ki minit ïalehkai, ym shym don ba lah ban pynkhih jar, hynrei lyngba ka extra time, kat ha ka minitba 90+6 u Jomsing Pariat u la ïoh ïa shi kol ban pynjop ïa ka kynhun ban pynduh poiñ noh ïa ka Mukhla Evergreen  ha ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 12 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Demthring pyrshah ia ka Moosyiem Shangpung ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: 1st Division WJDSA : Liem ka Mukhla Evergreen lyngba ka shi kol jong u Jomsing Pariat

content: : Ka kynhun ïalehkai kriket jong ka jylla Meghalaya ka la liem noh ha ka Manipur da 7 wiket ha lympung Women’s U-19 One Day Trophy ba la pynlong ha Surat, katba ha ka liang jong ki shynrang ruh ki la mad ïa ka nam rem da 346 ron ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Bengal kaba dei ruh ka jingsdang jong ki ïa ka jingïaid lynti ha ka lympung Vinoo Mankad Trophy ha Vijayawada.Ka Manipur kaba la jied ban kawang bol nyngkong bad ka la ailad ïa ka Meghalaya ba kin buh ïa ka ron ha ka jingsdang ïa ka jingïakhun na ka bynta katei ka lympung. Tang hapoh 36.4 ober, baroh ki  nongïalehkai ki la khyllem noh bad na kitei ki ober la ïoh tang 97 ron. Katei ka jinglah ban kynjoh sha katei ka ron ka dei ruh na ka jinglah kyrshan jong ka Janicka R Marak, kata da kaba ïoh 46 ron na 78 bol.Ka Meghalaya ka la sdang ruh ïa ka jingïalehkai kaba khlem pat ïoh nongrim, ha kaba tang hapoh 49 ron la khyllem lypa 6 wiket.Kane ka kynhun jong ka jylla kan bteng biang ïa ka jingïalehkai pyrshah ïa ka Tamil Nadu ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai.Haba phai pat ha ka jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha Vijayawada, ka Meghalaya ka la mad ïa ka nam rem kaba kthang bad kaba khlem khmih lynti. Ka Bengal ka la jied ban tied nyngkong da kaba buh ruh da ka ron kaba heh, kata haduh 402 ron na  50 tylli ki ober hynrei ha ka jingbeh thong ïa katei ka ron, ka Meghalaya ka la khyllem noh baroh ki wiket tang hapoh ka 35 ober bad ïoh ban pynphai tang 56 ron.Ka long ka jingïakhun kaba ka pynduh mynsiem ïa ki nongtied bad ki nongkawang bol jong ka Meghalaya hynrei kyrmen ba ka jingsdang kan long ka jingai jinghikai namar kane ka kynhun kan bteng biang ïa ka jingïakhun ha kane ka sngi saitjain pyrshah ïa ka Uttarakhand.
title: Pynliem kput ka Bengal ïa ka Meghalaya ha ka Vinoo Mankad Trophy

content: Ka lehkmen kienglieng ‘6th Megha Kayak Festival’ ba la pyllong da ka Ri Bhoi Water Sports and Tourism Corporation Society Limited bad Tourism Corporation Society Limited halor jong ka Wah Umtrew ha Umtham jong ka Ri-Bhoi District ka la sdang mynta ka sngi ka 12 Risaw.Ïa kane ka lehkmen kienglieng la kyrshan da ka Department of Sports and Youth Affairs, Government, Meghalaya, bad  Indian Kayaking ryngkat bad Canoeing Association (IKCA). Ha kane ka lehkmen leh sngewbha ba lai sngi yn ïoh ïa ka jingïashim bynta jong bun ngut ki nongking lieng.Yn don ruh bun ngut ki nongking lieng Kayaker na kylleng ka pyrthei kum ka Sri Lanka, Switzerland, New Zealand, the United Kingdom, the United States of America, the Czech Republic, Australia, Norway, Chile, Mexico, Germany, bad France kynthup ruh 8 ngut ki nongking lieng Kayaker ka Meghalaya bad uwei na Arunachal Pradesh.Ki khubor ki ïathuh ba ka Meghalaya ka don sap ha ka thup jingïakop jong ka thup ‘Intermediate’. Ki nongking lieng Kayaker ki lah ban ïa shim bynta haka Down River Sprint bad Canoe Slalom Cross. Kane ka lehkmen leh sngewbha king lieng Kayak kan sa long ba ban pynsah jingkynmaw ïa ki nongïashim bynta.
title: Sdang ka lehkmen lehsngewbha king lieng ‘Kayak’ ha Ri Bhoi District

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la pynkhreh ban leit ïashim bynta sha ka lympung ‘National Games 2023’ ba yn pynlong ha Goa naduh ka 26 mynta u bnai haduh 9 tarik u Naiwieng mynta u snem, ka la pyntikna ba yn ïashim bynta tang 7 jait ki jingïalehkai ha katei ka lympung kaba heh. Kane ka long ka jingduhnong na ka bynta ki nongïalehkai ka jylla bad ka long ruh ka jingduh jingkyrmen lypa na ka bynta ka jylla namar katkum ka jingbuh jong ki nongpynïaid, la kyntiew shuh shuh ïa ka jingdon ki jait jingïalehkai, hynrei na ka liang ka jylla Meghalaya ka khlem lah ban sei madan ïa ki nongïalehkai ki ban ïashim bynta ha baroh kitei ki jait jingïalehkai ka ban long ruh shi bynta ka jingkhmih lynti lypa ïa ka jingïoh takma.U snem 2023 un dei ruh u snem uba kham kyrpang bad kane ka long ban pynkheiñ ïa ka rekod da kaba kynthup haduh 43 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai (sporting disciplines) mynta u snem yn sa ïohi ha katei ka lympung.Kane kan dei ka sienjam kaba thymmai ïa ka National Games, ha kaba mynta u snem yn sakhi ïa kiba bun ki jait sports ki ban sa pynïalehkai, kiba kynthup ïa ka beach football, roll ball, golf, sepaktakraw, sqay martial arts, kalliyarapattu, and pencak silat, bad ka yachting bad taekwondo ki ban sa ïohrung biang sha kane ka lympung hadien ba shah weng ha ka sien pynlong ba khadduh. Shuh shuh, kum shi bynta ban rakhe ïa ka tynrai jong ka jylla, la ïoh ruh ban kynthup ïa ka lagori bad gatka kum ka sport.Ha u ne u snem kin don katto katne ki jait jingïalehkai kiba na ka liang jong ka jylla ka la thmu ban wanrah ka ban tam palat ïa u snem ba ladep ba la long ha Gujarat, kaba kynthup tang 36 tylli ki jait jingïalehkai, bad ha Kerala snem 2015 da 33 tylli, mynta u snem ka National Games kan sa nangïar shuh shuh.Kine ki kynthup ïa ka Athletics (ka ban phah tang 2 ngut ki nongïaleh -kai), phutbol (shynrang), swimming (4 ngut), mar iwei ha ka Wushu & Judo, Shooting bad ka Golf (4 ngut).Ïa kane la ïathuh da u General Secretary ka Meghalaya State Olympic Association (MSOA) u Bah Finley L. Pariat ha kaba u la pynpaw ka jingkyrmen ba lehse Jylla kan danglah ba kan ïoh shuh shuh ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka lympung namar ka dangïai ap na ki synjuk ïalehkai ba kin ai jingtip hashwa ïa ka por.Haba ïadei bad ka jingpynkhreh u Bah Finely u la kam ba la sdang ban pynkhreh bha, khamtam lei lei ka football kaba don bha ka jingkyrmen ba ka Jylla kan ïoh beit ba kan khur takma.Haba ïadei bad ka jingpynlut baroh, u Bah Finely u la pyntip ba la dep ban phah sha ka Sorkar, khamtam ïa ka bai leit namar mynta ka kynti yn hap ban leit da ka liengsuiñ, bad haba kheiñ kyllum, ka jinglut baroh kan nym duna ïa ka T.45 lak.
title: Na 43 tylli ki jingïalehkai, tang 7 jait yn ïashim bynta ka jylla ha ka ‘National Games 2023’

content: Ki nongïalehkai ka jylla kiba hap hapoh ka shatri jong ka Meghalaya Athletics Association (MAA) kin sa ïoh ïa ka kabu ban leit ïashim bynta ha ka lympung East Zone Athletics Championship kaba 34 ïa kaba yn pynlong ha Kolkata naduh 17 haduh 19 tairk mynta u bnai.Na kane ka jylla yn don tang 18 ngut ki shynrang bad 19 ngut ki kynthei ki ban ïoh ïa ka kabu ban leit ïashim bynta sha katei ka lympung.Ïa kane ka kynhun, yn synran da u coach Pleasantly Synnah bad ka Kong Maradona Khongsni (physio).Ki nongïalehkai ki kynthup ha ka U-20 (Shynrang) ki kynthup ïa u Donbok Shabong (400m), Kyrshanlang Shylla(200m & 400m), Repol Dkhar  (100m, 200m), Pringchang N Sangma (high jump), Simeon Marak (high jump), Everroy Myrsing (100m), Primus Ronghi (high jump & long jump).Ha ka thup U-18 (Shynrang) ki long u Renaldi Dhar(100m & long jump), Tushal M Sangma (javelin), Nidawan Lyngdoh (400m).Katba ha ka thup U-16 (Shynrang), ki long u Bettingstar N Sangma (long jump), Henry Yoga Sangma (100m), Embhahlang Lyngdoh (100m, 300m), Rishanmehi Ryngkhlem (2000m), Ram Shylla (2000m), Channangbirth R Marak (long jump).Bad ha ka thup U-14 (Shynrang), ki long u Saidul Ali (60m & long jump), John Milton Sohphoh ( shot put &  javelin)Katba ha ka liang jong ki kynthei kiba hapoh 20 snem (U-20), ki long ka Bethlyne G Makri (400m & 800m), Rinalis Ingty (high jump), Marqueenless Ramsiej  (3000m & 5000m), Riyoka Rymbai (long jump).Ha ka thup U-18 (Kynthei), ki long ka Anuska Majhong (high jump), Joytiful Narlong  (long jump), Anrisha Klein (high jump), Damika R Lyngdoh (100m & 200m).Ha ka thup U-16, ki kynthup ia ka Wailuti Lyngdoh ( shot put), Kasanchi D Marak (long jump), Melibad Kro (discus &, javelin), Sibilda Maring (high jump), bad ha ka thup U-14, ki long ka  Rukini RT Dkhar (600m), Turoi Phawa (60m & long jump), Tusame Marak (high jump), Carla Emika Myrboh (60m), Enriyana G Momin (long jump & high jump), Adorebella Syntem (shot put & javelin), bad ka Assembly Dkhar (shot put & javelin).
title: Yn leit ïashim bynta ka jylla sha ka East Zone Athletics Championship

content: Ka Demthring ïoh ïa ka jingjop lyngba ki ar kol kiba la wan lyngba u Wellmisson Dkhar uba la ioh ban thep ha ka minit ba 28 bad u Pyndap Liam uba la ioh ban thep ha ka minit ba 79.Ha ka jingiakhun na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ha jingïalehkai ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai ka Demthring ka khlem ailad ia ka Moosyiem Shangpung ba kin ioh pynkhih jar, kumta lyngba kane ka jingjop da 2-0, ka Demthring ka la khur ia ka 3 poiñ.Ha kane ka lympung don 2 tylli ki Pool, ha ka Pool A ki kynthup ïa ka  Sabahmuswang, Mookyndur, Demthring SC, Mukhla Evergreen, Moosyiem Shangpung, bad Nangbah Ïawmusiang katba ha ka Pool B ki long ka Sohmynting,  Khlieh-iongriang, Wahiajer, Dulong, Luti Tuber SW bad Moosalyngkat.Ka jingiakhun ka long kaba itynnad bad ka bym da noh shilliang hynrei ka Demthring ka kham ioh kabu ban ñion bad iakhun ban thep kol da kaba khanglad ruh ia ka Shangpung ba kin tur ha ka box jong ki lyngba ka jingkyrshan ba radbah jong ki ‘rangialehkai ‘dien bad la sakhi ruh ia ka jingwan ban kyrshan jong ki paidbah.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 13 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Moosalyngkat pyrshah ia ka Sohmynting ha ka por 2 baje noh phai
title: 1st Division WJDSA : Pynliem ka Demthring ïa ka Moosyiem Shangpung da 2-0

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, ka “Wat leh mynleh” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 6 tarik, Risaw 2023. U nongshna bad nongring ïa katei ka jingrwai, dei u Sharpstarwell Syiem. Katba la rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da ki nongrwai Khasi, kynthup ïa u Phira Dohtdong, Wenzy bad u Pynskhem Dohtdong. La pynbit pynbiang ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka Sonido Vibes Studio. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u Phira Dohtdong, Wenzy Myrchiang, Pynskhem Dohtdong, Baia Sohtun, Melisha Shylla, Rikashisha Warjri bad ka Meda Syiemlieh.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Wat leh mynleh!”

content: :Ka puron jong ka Khasi, ka Wanri Pyngrope, ka dei ka puron ba pawnam ha ryngkat ka jingstad bad jingthrang jong ka, ka la dep shim bynta ha ki phlim Khasi, kynthup ïa ka “Ha Nga Marwei,” “9Lad,” “Jingim,” bad ka “Ka Daw.”Man ki phlim ba ka ak, ka la tbit palat ban ak katkum ka bynta jong ka khana jong ki phlim, kaba la pynkhring ïa ki paidbah ba bun jong ka karkhana ak phlim ha kane ka nongbah Meghalaya. Hynrei ym tang katei, ha kaba ka sap jong ka Pyngrope ka la kiew shadien jong ka cinema; ka long ruh ka puron ba la dep leit ïa ka laiñ model bad ka nonghikai ïa ka sobjek Hindi ha ka skul ha Nongkrem.Haba kren shaphang ki phlim jong ka, katei ka puron ka la pynkhreh na ka bynta ka phlim ba thymmai jong ka, ka “Borsing” kaba la shna da u nongshna phlim ba tbit, u Kiki Garod. Katei ka puron ka la dep ïohpdiang ruh ïa ka khusnam Best Actor (Female) ym tang shisien, hynrei ar sien! Ka la dep ïohrah ïa ka khusnam jong ka Prag Cine Awards ha u snem 2021 na ka bynta ka phlim “9Lad” bad ha u snem 2023 na ka bynta ka phlim “Ka Daw.”
title: Ar sien ïoh Best aktress ha North-East ka Wanri

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, ka “Ah! Lano” ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 6 tarik, Risaw 2023 kaba la shna bad pynmih da u Johny Stone Nongbet. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Johny Stone bad ka puron, ka Kyntisha. Katba ki nongshad shiliang, ki kynthup ïa u John Rani, Philbanri sohshang, sibika Lawai, Teihun Ryntathiang, Natasha Nongbet, Samanbha Syiemlieh.Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la rwai da u kitzBPrince Sari bad ka Barisha Suna. Ki make-up artist, dei ka Malbashisha Nongbet bad ka Daroi Rangslang. La ring dur ïa kane ka jingrwai da u Hocky Kharthangmaw bad ka beautiful life art page. Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa ka Phibawansha Bina, Naphisa wahlang, wanz Syiemlieh, Bani Lyngdoh Mairang, #Durkhih Production #Hocky kharthangmaw #John Rani.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Ah! Lano”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, ka “You are my Angel” ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 8 tarik, Risaw 2023. La thaw ïa katei ka jingrwai bad shimti ïa ka sur jingtem da u Jopthiaw Mylliemngap bad u Tyngshaiñ Mylliemngap.La rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Wonderson Mylliemngap bad ka Phiwanbet Mylliemngap. Ïa ka jingring ïa ka jingrwai bad editing, la shimti da u Bibhav Giwali. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Nam Mylliemngap bad ki puron, ka Urmila Kharmalki bad ka Armisha Kharbuki. La pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Nangkhraw Mylliemngap bad la shna da u Tyngshaiñ Mylliemngap.Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa ka Lapynsuk kharbyngar, Donriti passah, Banskhemlang lynshiang, Kitdor B.suting, Damelabiang Mylliemngap, Patshakordor Mylliemngap, Nabakor Warjri, Da i sabet warbah, Wanlamjingjop khariemmujat, Kong R Nongkynrih, Lary Kharrngi, Wankmenlang Warbah, Ownner Laitdiengsai Restaurant.Kane ka kynhun ka ai khublei kyrpang ïa ki nongkyrshan jong ka NangJop Entertainment. Ka la ong kumne, ‘Ha kaba ka jing kyrshan jong phi ngi la lah pat ban pynmih biang sa ïa kane ka jing rwai. Nga kyrmen ba phin nang ïai ai shuh ïa ki jing kyrshan jong phi ïa ngi.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “You are my Angel”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi, ka “Man ka sngi” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait paidbah ga ka 8 tarik, Risaw, 2023 bad ïa ka beat jong ka jingrwai, la pynmih bad rekording, la pynbiang ha EDM Production. La pynbit pynbiang da u David Kharkongor bad la pyni ïa katei ka video ha @elvestthabahstudio.Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la shna da u Wanstar Thabah bad u Director of Photography, dei u Elvest Thabah.Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Amunick Shadap bad ka puron, ka Florentina Sunn bad u Eric Longley Dkhar. Ka nongpynwandur ïa u shñiuhkhlieh na ka bynta kiba ak ha katei ka jingrwai, dei ka Hame Malai.Ïa katei ka jingrwai, la ring ha ki jaka ba kynthup ha Micheal Dhar Cottage Bhoirymbong Lumdaitkhla, Infant School for Little Angels bad ha (L) Belma Kharshong Residency. Katei ka kynhun ka ai khublei ïa ka NPYF General Secretary Ma Poipynhun Rynghang, Headmistress Infant School for Little Angles, Lumdaitkhla Sports Club Mr.Marshal Dhar, Mr. Micheal Dhar, Umroi Constituency MLA Mr Damanbait Lamare, NPYF President Umroi Constituency Mr. JR NONGTHAM, Mr Lumlang Lamare, Mr.Francis Dhar, Mr.Micheal Susngi, NTCG Members bad u Mr.Calvin Nongkhlaw.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Man ka sngi”

content: Ka West Jaiñtia Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai kaba dei ruh ka seng kaba la pynïaid ïa ka lympung (L) Kesilroy Pala Invitation Football Tournament 2023, ka la pynkut noh ia ka  jingïakhun phainal jong kane ka lympung ha ka jingïakhun kaba la long hapdeng ka  Mukhla FC bad Salaroh FC ryngkat ka jingphuh jingphieng bad ka jingïaid beit ka jingïalehkai khlem kano kano ka jingpynthud.Ha ka jingshisha ïa ka jingïakhun phainal la la dep ban pynbeit ha ka 7 tarik hynrei la pynkynriah noh ïa katei ka jingïakhun na ka daw jong ka suiñbneng.Ka Mukhla FC ka la ïoh ban jam  nyngkong ha ka phainal jong kane ka lympung da kaba pynliem ïa ka CSA United da 2-0.Katba ka Salaroh FC kaba la ïoh ïa ka kabu ban jam sha ka wat ba khatduh jong kane ka jingïakhun kadei hadien ba ki la pynliem ïa ka Rymbai Shkenshynriah da 1-0 ha ka semi phainal ba ar.Ha kane ka jingïakhun phainal la wan ban sakhi da u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla uba dei ruh u khun jong u Bah (L) Kesilroy Pala.Ka jingïakhun phainal ka long kaba jwat bad kaba la pynshongshit ïa ki nongwan peit kai. Ka Mukhla ka la ïoh ïa ka jingjop kaba kham phylla namar ha baroh ki minit ïalehkai ba la buh ki khlem ïoh pynkhih jar hynrei dei lyngba ka extra time kata ha ka minit ba 45+2 bad 90+5, kane ka kynhun ka la ïoh ïa kane ka burom. Ka jingïaroh ka leit sha u Primrose Lamat uba la ïoh ïa kitei ki 2 kol kaba pynlong ruh ïa ka kynhun ba kan ïoh rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong kane ka lympung. Ka Mukhla kaba la ïoh ruh ban rah ïa ka trophi ka la ïoh ruh ïa ka song pisa kaba long T. 5,00,00,/- katba ka Salaroh FC kaba la ïoh ïa ka kyrdan ba ar ka la ïoh ban leit ïing ryngkat ka song pisa kaba long 2,00,000/- tyngka.U Primrose Lamat uba dei ruh u ‘rangïalehkai ba kongsan ha katei ka jingïakhun u la ïoh ruh ban khur ïa ka khusnam ‘Man of the Match’ ryngkat ka song pisa kaba long 5,000/-, katba u Aibormiki Suchiang uba dei ruh u ‘rangapkol jong ka Mukhla FC u la khur ïa ka khusnam ‘Best Goalkeeper’ bad ka song pisa kaba long 5000/- tyngka.
title: Rah ka Mukhla FC ïa ka nam jong ka lympung  (L) Kesilroy Pala Invitation Football Tournament 2023

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, ka “Nga ieid ïaphi” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 10 tarik, Risaw 2023. La ring ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Komol lyngkhoi bad ïa ka drone, la shimti da ka Editing YT. Ïa ka video editing, la shimti da u Komol lyngkhoi bad la pyndep ring da u Bakyrmen Sun. Ki nongthaw ïa katei ka jingrwai dei u Bakyrmen Sun bad la rwai da u Bakyrmen Sun bad ka Neltiris syiem. La rekod da ka mobile App Banlap app bad la rekod ïa ka sur tem ha Anime studio.Ki kynhun ba shim bynta ha kane ka jingrwai,ki kynthup ïa u tyngshop ka Khasi ba kongsan, u Ros Dkhar bad ka puron, ka Phar marbaniang, katba ka side aktres, dei ka Rahdahun nongphud bad side aktor, dei u Halnes lyngkhoi. ïoh Dkhar. Ki jaka ba la ring ïa katei ka jingrwai, ki kynthup ha Mawphanlur, Mairang Nongkhlaw Highway, Kyllang Rock bad ha shyrwang petrol pump.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Nga ieid ia phi”

content: Ka Evergreen Mukhla ka la lah ban pynjem khnap ia ka Moosyiem Shangpung  ha ka jingiakhun kaba khadsan  jong ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ka Mukhla ka la mad ia kawei na ki jingiakhun kaba jem mynta ka samoi ha kaba ki la thep haduh 5 kol, katba ka Shangpung ka la ioh ban pynphai tang shi kol.U Nidaioh I Dhar u la long u ‘rangialehkai ba paw ha kane ka jingialehkai ha kaba u la ioh ban thep 3 kol, kata ha ka minit ba 8, 20 bad 65, katba u Pynioladmiki Ryngkhlem (9) bad u Dauni Suna (67) ki la ioh ban thep mar shi kol. Ka Shangpung kaba la iakhun tyngeh ban pynphai ia kitei ki 5 kol ka khlem ioh kabu satia ban tur shakhmat na ka jingskhem ki ‘rangialehkai ‘dien ka Mukhla, kumta haduh ba kut ka jingiakhun ki la ioh ban pynphai tang shi kol lyngba u Kenny Langbang (43).Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 20 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Sohmynting pyrshah ia ka Wahiajer ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: 1st Division WJDSA : Jan shiteng dorjon pynbam ka Evergreen Mukhla ïa ka Shangpung

content: Ka Mawkyrwat District Sports Association (MDSA) mynta ka sngi ka 19 tarik u Risaw 2023 kala ïoh ban pynkut noh ia ka Championship jong ka Super Division MDSA Football League 2023 ka ba kila pynlong ha Madan MDSA Nonglang South West Khasi Hills District ha kaba u Bah  Renikton L.Tongkhar MLA Mawkyrwat Constituency u la long kum u kongsan ha kaba u la kitbok kitrwiang ia baroh artylli ki kynhun ïalehkai ba kin nang ïai kiew ha ki kam ïalehkai da kaba ngi dei ban don kata ka mynsien ialehkai kaba khuid kaba ym don kano kano ka jing ia bishni ne pynmynsaw iano iano ruh khnang ka jing ïalehkai kan ïaid beit ïaid ryntieh bad ngin nang ïai kiew shaphrang.Ha ka jingialehkai mynta ka sngi hapdeng ka Mawten SC bad ka Wahsiej US&CC kala long shisha kaba itynnad naka jing tbit jong ki rang ïalehkai ha baroh ar tylli ki kynhun ha kaba ka Wahsiej US&CC kala ïoh ban thep Shi kol ha ka kylla step da u bah Bosmingstar  Ïawsei bad haka kylla mit ka Mawten SC kala ioh ban pynphai da shi kol lyngba u Overshap Ïawphñiaw da ka Penalty.Haduh  kaba kut jong ka jing ïalehkai ha baroh ar tylli ki kynhun kim shem la ïoh shuh ban pynphai ia ki kol ki jong ki da ka ba ki ia khait mar shi kol bad  ha kaba kut jong ka jing ïalehkai ka Mawten SC kala ïoh khur 17 point bad ka Wahsiej US&CC ka dang ïoh tang 14 point.Narmarkata ka Mawten SC kala ïoh rah ia ka nam lah duh  baka la ïoh ban khur bun ki point ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Super Division MDSA Football League 2023 jong ka  South West Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat ka trophy bad song pisa kaba T.50 hajar tyngka.Ha kane ka sngi la ïoh ruh bam sam ïa ki khusnam sha ka Mawten Sports Club kaba la rah ïa ka nam jop bad ki khusnam shimet kata nongap kol ba tbit ka leit sha u Hulbinroy Khardewsaw jong ka Rangjadong Sports Club, ki nongthep kol bun eh sha u Geovanny Syiemiong jong ka Sakwang Sports Club bad u Bosmingstar Iawsei jong ka Wahsiej United Sports & Cultural Club kiba la thep mar 7 kol bad rangïalehkai ba tbit sha u Manbhalang Nongmin jong ka Mawten Sports Club.Nalor u Kong san bah Renikton L.Tongkhar la don ryngkat ruh u Bah T.Lyngwa Deputy Commissioner SWKHD  bad ki wei de ki nongtrei naka ophis  jong u DSO ki nongkitkam jong ka MDSA bad da ki hajar ngut  ki paidbah kiba la wan ban sakhie lang ha kane ka sngi.
title: Lah duh ka Mawten SC, ha ka Super Division MDSA Football League 2023 SWKH

content: Hynnin ka sngi ka Khliehriat West ka la ïoh kabu ban rung sha ka semi phainal jong ka lympung First Division Football Tournament kaba la pynïaid da ka East Jaintia Hills District Football Association (EJHDFA) lyngba ka jingpynliem ïa ka Rangad SC da 5-4 (penalty) ha ka jingïakhun ba la pynlong ha madan artificial turf Diengshynrum, Khliehriat. Hadien katei ka klob, ka Tpepswer SSWO ruh ka la ïoh ban jam sha ka semi phainal jong kane ka lympung lyngba ka jingpynliem ïa ka Byndihati da 1-0.Ka jingïakhun quarter phainal jong kine ki ar kynhun ka long kaba itynnad bad kaba ïakhaid bor hynrei lyngba ka kol jong u Danny Shylla uba la ïoh ban thep ha ka minit ba 29, ka Tpepswer ka la jam sha shiliang jong kane ka lympung katba ka Byndihati ka la kut noh ka jingïaid lynti ha kane ka lympung. Ka jingïakhun semi phainal ba nyngkong na ka bynta kane ka lympung kan long ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha kaba ka Chiehruphi SYWSC kan ïa aireng pyrshah ïa ka Khliehriat West FC bad ka jingïakhun semi phainal ba ar kan long ha ka sngi ba bud, kata hapdeng ka Ladrymbai-B SC pyrshah ïa ka Tpepswer SSWO. Baroh 2 tylli ki jingïalehkai semi phainal kin long ha ka por 1 baje noh phai sngi.
title: Hadien ka Khliehriat West, jam sa ka Tpepswer sha ka semi phainal jong ka lympung 1st Division EJHDFA

content: Kum ka dak jong ka jingrakhe ha ka jingdap 13 snem jong ka shnong Nongbah-Marshilong, na ka liang ka Dorbar Shnong Nongbah-Marshilong lyngba ka Orgnising Committee ka la pynlong ïa ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol kaba la tip kum ka Charitable Football Friendly Match ha madan jong ka Tyllilang Secondary School jong ka Shnong Nongbah-Marshilong, South West Khasi Hills District.Ka jingïalehkai ha kane ka sngi ka dei hapdeng ka Seng Kynthei Shnong Nongbah-Marshilong ka la shah rem noh da 2 – 1 kol ha ka Jingïaseng Kynthei Nongbah-Marshilong Presbyterian Church kaba dei ha ka jingïalehkai jong ki kynthei. Ha ka jingïalehkai jong ki rangbah pat ki Rangbah jong ka Shnong Nongbah-Marshilong ki la jop da 4 – 3 kol ha ka Tie Breaker pyrshah ïa ki Rangbah na ka Balang Presbyterian Nongbah-Marshilong.Ïa kane ka lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol la wan ban plie pyrda da u bah G.D. Kharwanlang, Superintendent of Police, South West Khasi Hills District kum u kongsan uba la shim ruh ïa ka bynta ban pynher ïa ka lama, u Dr. W.L. Narry, Medical Officer, Civil Hospital Mawkyrwat kum u symbud kongsan ryngkat ka jingïadonlang u bah Lostar Lyngdoh, Myntri Shnong Nongbah-Marshilong bad la wan khang pat da u bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar, MLA ka Mawkyrwat Constituency ryngkat ka jingïadonlang ki riew rangbah, ki samla, ki hep kiba rit jong ka Shnong Nongbah-Marshilong lem bad ki nongshah khot sngewbha.Ïa ka jingïalang la pynïaid da u bah S. Lyngkhoi, Secretary jong ka shnong Nongbah-Marshilong, ka jingkren pdiang na ka kong Anita Lyngdoh, ka jingrwai kyrpang na ka Village Organization jong ka Shmong Nongbah-Marshilong bad ka jingkren khublei na ka kong Banteilang Lyngkhoi.
title: Da ka Cheritable Football Friendly Match lehkmen ka shnong Nongbah-Marshilong ïa ka jingdap 13 snem

content: Ka 7 Wasa United bad ka Mukhla Raij ki la sdang ia ka jingiaid lynti ha ka lympung Super Division ka Amlarem Sub-Divisional Sports Association da ka jingiakhaid mar shi kol, ia kane ka lympung la pyniaid da ka West Jainta District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai.Ka jingiakhun ka long kaba iakhaid bor bad kaba jwat, baroh 2 liang ki la iakhun ban pynkhih jar hynrei ka Mukhla ka la ioh ban thep kol nyngkong lyngba u Timmy Ryngkhlem ha ka minit ba 9 katba ka 7 Wasa ka la ioh ia ka shi kol lyngba u Pynshrai Lathong. Kumta ka jingialehkai ka la kut noh mar shi kol.Ka jingiakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 20 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Sailung Ialong pyrshah ia ka Ladthadlaboh ha ka por 2:30 noh phai sngi.
title: Super Division WJDSA : Mar shi poiñ ïasam ka 7 Wasa bad Mukhla Raij

content: U samla Skhemlang Subba uba dei uwei na ki nongmareh na ka jylla Meghalaya u shah jied ban leit ïakhun sha ka lympung 3rd Under-23 Open National Championship 800mts ka ban sa long ha Chandigarh naduh ka 20 haduh 24 tarik mynta u bnai. Une u samla u la ïoh ruh ïa ka kabu ban mih khmat ïa ka jylla sha ka lympung National Games ka ban sa long ha Goa.
title: Yn leit ïakhun u Skhemlang Subba sha ka lympung Open National Championship 800mts

content: Ka Meghalaya Athletics Association (MAA) kaba la leit ban iashim bynta ha ka lympung 34th East Zone Junior Athletics Championship ba la pynlong ha ka Kolkata ka la khur 4 tylli ki takma, kynthup 2 tylli ki takma rupa bad 2 tylli ki takma rnong.Na ka liang ka MAA ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ryngkat ka jingaikhublei ia u coach Pleasantly Synnah bad ia baroh kiba la don bynta bad ka kynhun kum ki nongiarap. Ka seng ka la ai khublei ruh na ka bynta ka Kong Kong Isawanda Laloo IAS kaba dei ruh ka Director Sports & Youth Affair bad ia ka sorkar kaba la ai ia ka jingkyrshan ha ka jinglut jingsep.Ki nongjop takma ki long ka Rukini RT Dkhar kaba la khur ia ka takma rupa ha ka jingialehkai 60 M U-14, ka Sibilda Maring kaba la khur takma rupa High Jump U-16, u Pringchang N Sangma kaba la khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka High High Jump, Under 20 bad ka Anrisha Klein kaba la khur ia ka takma rnong ha ka High Jump  Under 18.
title: 4 tylli ki takma khur ka Meghalaya ha ka 34th East zone Junior National Athletics

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, ka “Nga thrang ïaphi” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait ha ka 14 tarik, Risaw 2023.La shna ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Donbok Marngar bad pynmih da ka kompeni JINGSHAI KA LAWEI.La hikai shad da ka Ibansuk Lyngdoh bad la rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Briding syiemlieh bad ka Ibantisha Khardewsaw.Katba ïa ki kyntien jong ka jingrwai, la thaw da u Briding syiemlieh. La pynbit pynbiang da u Distar syiem bad la shim bynta da ki tyngshop jong ka Khasi, kynthup ïa u Teiborlin Wanñiang, Banri Kharsyntiew (SWA), Freewell Riangshiang, Bansahnam shyrkon, Pynshngaiñ kharmusalman, Mandashisha puweiñ bad u Shaiban langrin. U Director Of Photography bad video editing, dei u Donbok Marngar.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Nga Thrang ia Phi”

content: :Watla hapdeng ki por jong ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha ka jylla Manipur, hynrei, la don ar ngut ki nongshna phlim na katei ka jylla, kynthup ïa u Mayanglangbam Romi Meitei bad u Saikhom Ratan, ha ka sngi ba ar, ba hap ha ka 17 tarik, Risaw, ki la ïohrah ïa ka khusnam ha ka bynta ba 69 jong ka National Film Awards kaba la dep pynlong ha New Delhi.Nalor jong kitei ki ar ngut ki nongshna phlim ba pawnam, u Borun Thokcom, uba dei na katei ka jylla, u la wan ha katei ka tamasa ba sam khusnam, naba udei uwei na ki khlur ak phlim jong ka jylla, uba dei ruh u dkhot nongbishar jong ka bynta jong ka non-feature film ne non-feature film category. Katba ka President jong ka India, ka Droupadi Murmu ka la sam ïa ki khusnam sha ki nongshna phlim ba pawnam bad ki nongtrei bad ki nongak phlim ha katei ka tamasa ba ladon bynta lang da ki khlur ak phlim ka Bollywood bad ki nongpynïaidïew ïa ki phlim.Mynta u snem, ka Dada Saheb Phalke Award, kaba dei ka khusnam bakhraw hapoh ka ri, la ïoh nam da ka puron ka Bollywood, ka Waheeda Rehman. Katba u Romi u la ïohpdiang ïa katei ka khusnam na ka bynta ka iconic feature film jong u, ka “Eikhoigi Yum” (Our House), katba u Ratan u la ïohrah ïa ka khusnam ha ka phlim “Beyond Blast.” U Romi u la shah pynkup burom da ka khusnam jong ka bynta jong ka best Manipuri feature film, katba u Ratan u la ïohrah ïa ka khusnam jong ka best biographical non-feature film.Hashwa ban shna ïa ka phlim nyngkong u, ka “Eikhoigi Yum,” u Romi u long u nongshna phlim ba pawnam naba u la dep shna haduh 100 tylli ki phlim kiba la ïaidïew bha.Tang hadien ba u la ïohpdiang ïa katei ka khusnam national award ha ka sien nyngkong, u Romi u la ong ha ka sngi ba ar ha katei ka tamasa ba ka la pynsah jingkynmaw ïa u, hynrei na ka daw jong ka jingïaumsnam ha ka jylla Manipur, ka la pynlong ïa u ba um don jingmut ban rakhe sngewbha.“Nga dap da ka jingkmen bad ka jingithuh kaba la ai sha ka “Eikhoigi Yum”, kaba dei ka projek ba nyngkong jong nga. Katba nga la thrang, ngam lah ban leh kmen ha katei ka tamasa kaba na ka daw jong ka jinglong jingman ha ka jylla jong ngi ha Manipur,” ong u Romi.“Nga ai khublei ïa ka Manipur State Film Development Society (MFSDS) na ka daw jong ka jingai mynsiem ïanga lem bad kane ka tamasa ba ka la pynlong la slem bha na ka bynta ban pyndon burom ïa ka Golden Jubilee of Manipuri Cinema (1972-2022). Ha ka jingshisha, ka phlim “Eikhoigi Yum” ka ïoh lad ban plie ïa ka jingleh sngewbha ha kane ka tamasa, kaba dei ba nyngkong, ka ‘Eikhoigi Imphal International Film Festival’ (EIIFF),” bynrap u Romi.U Ratan u la ong kumne, “Ka jingïohpdiang khusnam myn ha ka sngi ba ar ka long ka jingjam jong nga ha ka kam shna phlim kaba nga la sdang ha u snem 1992. Nga dap da ka jingkmen ba nga la ïoh ïa kane ka khusnam hynrei kaba sngewsih, ka long ba ka jinglong ha ka jylla jong ngi ka pynlong ïanga ba ngan duna ban don bynta ha ka jingrakhe”.U dkhot nongbishar jong kane ka tamasa, u Borun Thokcom, uba ïalade u dei uba la ïohrah ïa katei ka khusnam kum u nongshna phlim, uba la shah jied ruh kum u nongbishar na ka bynta kane ka tamasa ha ka sien nyngkong u la ong, “Ngi hap ban peit ïa ki phlim lyngkot kiba don haduh 200 tylli bad ki phlim documentary ha bun tylli ki kyntien. Hynrei, ha kaba kut jong ka sngi, ka jingbhabriew kam don pud don sam ha kaba ïadei bad ka ktien ba kren bad ka kyntien jong ka cinema kaba la don bad ki phlim kiba la shna da ka jingthrang bad ka jingmut ba bha kaba la ju don ha ngi.”
title: Pawnam ki nongshna phlim ka Manipur ha ka National Film Awards watla don ka jingïaumsnam

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thmmai, ka “Ha ksang Kti” ka dei kaba la dep pyllait ha ka 14 tarik, Risaw 2023, da ka Channel jong u W.kharpran. La rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da ki nongrwai Khasi, kynthup ïa u Ram Suchiang bad ka Larihun Lapang. La pynmih ïa ka da u W.kharpran bad la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u W.kharpran bad ka puron, ka Medahun Basaiamoit. La shna ïa katei ka jingrwai da u W.kharpran bad ïa ka camera, editing bad thaw da u skhembha kharsati. Ka makeup artist, dei ka dapkyrhailin lyngdoh. Ki nongshad ha kane ka jingrwai, dei ka Erisha thabah, Cabie nongkynrih bad u Badon Ryntong. Katei ka kynhun ba pynmih ïa kane ka jingrwai, ka ai khublei ïa ka wandermere resort, B.Sawkmie channel, Eve lapasan channel, Amos suting channel, Kit Rina channel, F.nongbri channel, Kynsai 01 official video, Nongsain hima, Batesi tv bad ka skhembha kharsati channel.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Ha Ksang Kti”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, ka “Jingbakla” ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 13 tarik, Risaw 2023. La thaw ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka Evan Swer bad u Nick Don bad la tem drum da ka Wiktoria Bialic bad ka bass, da u David Huges. Katba ïa ka jingtem ïa ka flute, la shimti da u Nelson Rangell, ka Guitar da u Kasper Jalily bad u Paul Jackson bad ïa ka pre-Mixed, la shimti da u Gyeong-mo (South Korea).La pynbit pynbiang ïa katei ka jingrwai da u G. Hairston bad la ring ïa katei ka video bad edit da u James. La pynmih ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Alister Nongdhar jong ka Krazie Feet Production.Ki nongshad ha katei ka jingrwai, kynthup ïa ki kynthei, dei ka Daphishisha Kharbani, Gilbert Mawlong, Pooja Sharma, Iamon Kharjana, Sheawta Thapa Priya Das, Rulin Rongpipi, Evaki N Arengh, Daisy Hmar, Susha Chakma, Haimonglang Biam bad ka Saphisha Lyngdoh Rngaid. Katba na ki shynrang, dei u Ricky.K. Sangma (nonghikai shad), Eddie, Tuki, Befulstar Kshiar bad u Mewankitbok Kharbani, Rohit Sarki, Anil Chettri, Deep Thapa, Ricky Sharma, Vivek Pradhan, Nisha Biswa bad u Anku Kuri.
title: Ka jingrwai “JINGBAKLA”, ba la thaw da ka Evanzany

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, kaba kyrteng ka “Long lehnohei”, ka dei ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 11 tarik, Risaw 2023 ha Mawpdang. La rwai ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Kitprince Sari bad ka khana jong katei ka jingrwai, ka dei shaphang ka jingpait u dohnud na ka jingshah shet kylla ha ka jingieid. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Micheal pyngrope, Kendrasing Kurkalang bad ka puron, ka Phinolin Mawkhiew. La pynmih ïa ka da u Kendrasingh kurkalang bad la shna da u Mike Denzil Khasi.Katba ïa ka camera bad editing, la shimti da u SkhemTron.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Longleh nohei”

content: :Ka jingrwai Khasi ba thymmai, ka “Por jinglong khynnah”, ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah ha ka 14 tarik, Risaw 2023. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la rwai bad thaw da u Carmel Dohling bad u Dbryn bad u nongpynmih ïa ka, dei u Dbryn. U Asst. music producer, dei u Ksan Kharbuli bad thaw da ka kompeni Dbryn records bad ka Elvest Thabah. U head Director Of Photography, dei u Elvest Thabah.La kyrshan ïa katei ka jingrwai da u Rahul Dutta, Naphi Phanbuh, Barisha Kharbuli, Kelvin Lyngdoh bad ka Dr. Wadamika Lyngdoh. La kyrshan lang da u Rupert B. Pathaw bad la pynbit pynbiang ïa katei ka jingrwai da ka kompeni Dbryn record.Katba ïa ki jaka ba la ring dur ïa katei ka jingrwai, ki kynthup ha Wah Nongkseh, Sohiong.Ki Khynnah kiba ïashim bynta, ki kynthup ïa ka Iallin Shabong, Lidia Shabong, Nibada Shabong, Miwanshai Shabong, Niskoda Shabong, Lissida Shabong, Kiewshaphrang Shabong, Shemboklang Shabong, Inrihun Shabong, Iairihun Shabong, Elbokstar Shabong, Salina Shabong, Amparisha Shabong, Wispilisi Nongbri, ryngkat lem bad ki katto katne ngut ki khynnah kiba kim shym lah ban ïoh ïa ki kyrteng.Ka Jingaikhublei ïa I Sordar Bah Shain Khasain, bad i Secy. Bah Ailing Thabah jong Ka Wah Nongkseh Sohiong bad Lait Nongkseh, bad ïa ka ïing ka sem ka jong ki. Ka Jingkhublei ruh ïa i Purningstar Shabong, Jefferson Thabah, Rahul Dutta, Barisha Kharbuli, Naphi Phanbuh, Kelvin Lyngdoh, Dr. Wadamika Lyngdoh, Ibalahunshisha Wahlang, Gordon Diengdoh, Norbert Pathaw, Rupert Pathaw, Neil Kharmawlong, Ben Pathaw, Dayan Khyriem, Ksan Kharbuli, Mack Nongkynrih, Fer Sten bad ïa baroh ki Paralok parajor bad kumjuh ïa ki nongkyrshan kiba ju don bad ai mynsiem man ka por ïa ngi ka kynhun DBRYN Records.Ka Jingkhublei ba kyrpang ka leit ruh sha ka Batesi TV, U Nongsain Hima, Shillong Mail – U Kyrwoh, Ka Atiar bad T7 News kiba long ki media partner jong ka kynhun jong ngi bad kumjuh ïa baroh ki media/press kiba la ïa don bynta. KHUBLEI SHIBUN na ka DBRYN RECORDS.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Por jinglong khynnah”

content: :Ka jingrwai Pnar ba thymmai, ka “Duriaw Langen”, ka dei ka jingrwai ba la dep pyllait paidbah shen bad la pynbit pynbiang da u Bankershwa Suchiang. Ha katei ka jingrwai, la rwai da u Bankershwa Suchiang bad ka Sakani Sna bad la shim bynta da u tyngshop ka Khasi, u Eiwan bad ka Priyanka Lamare. La shna ïa katei ka jingrwai da u BANKERSHWA SUCHIANG. La edit da u Julian bad ring ïa ka video da u SoniwanLangstang1.
title: La pyllait paidbah ïa ka jingrwai “Duriaw Langen”

content: Ka Amlarem Social Club ka la sdang ïa ka jingïaid lynti ha ka lympung Super Division ka Amlarem Sub-Divisional Sports Association da ka nam jop. Ïa kane ka lympung la pynïaid da ka West Jainta District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai.Ka jingïakhun ka long kaba kham noh shiliang bad ka Amlarem Social Club ka la thep haduh 4 -0 ïa ka  Dongmihsngi Mupyut lyngba ka kol jong u Tori Jungai haka minit ba 16 bad 25, u Iaiddakyrmen Jungai haka minit ba 57 bad u Tiplang Rasmut haka minit ba 62.Ïa ka jingïakhun ha kane ka lympung yn bteng biang ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai ha kabaka Man I Bha SC kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Pdengkarong YC ha ka por 2:30 noh phai sngi.
title: Super Division WJDSA : Da 4 kol liem ka Dongmihsngi Mupyut ha ka Amlarem Social Club

content: Ka Meghalaya ka la pynkut ïa ka jingïaid lynti ha ka lympung Vinoo Mankad mynta ka samoi da ka nam rem ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Mahrashtra.Ha katei ka jingïakhun kaba khatduh, ka Meghalaya ka la hap ban kawang bol nyngkong bad ka Maharashtra ka la buh da ka ron kaba heh tam mynta ka aiom, kata haduh 466 ron bad kyllem tang 6 wiket. U Digvijay Patil u la kamai bun ron tam na ka bynta ka Maharashtra ha kaba u la ïoh haduh 239 ron na ki 139 bol. Hadien ka jingïoh kabu ban tied bha, u Patil u la shah pynhap noh ka wiket ha u Angkit Tamang.Ka Meghalay ka tlot shibun ha ka pali  tied bad ha ka jingkthong ïa katei ka ron ki la ïoh tang 75 ron bad tang hapoh 27 obar. U Lenbirth Marak u la ïoh 12 ron, u Shubham Rasaily u la ïarap 17 ron katba u Angkit uba la mih hadien u la ïoh 16 ron. Watla ka Meghalaya ka la mad ïa ka nam rem ha baroh ki jingïakhun mynta ka samoi hynrei ka long pat ka jingmyntoi ban ïoh ïa ka kabu ban ïa aireng pyrshah ïa ki kynhun kiba khlaiñ ba don ha kane ka lympung.Katba haba phai ha ka jingïakhun  jong ki kynthei (senior), ka Meghalaya ka la liem noh ha ka Karnataka. Ka jingïakhun ba bud na ka bynta kane ka kynhun kan long pyrshah ïa ka Tamil Nadu ha kane ka sngi U Blei bad ha ka lympung Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy jong ki shynrang (senior) kan long mynta ka sngi pyrshah ïa ka Chhttisgarh ha Jaipur.
title: Pynkut ka Meghalaya ïa ka jingïaid lynti ka Vinoo Mankad da ka nam rem

content: Ka Iatyllilang SC ka la ioh ia ka kabu ban jam sha ka semi final jong ka lympung  SSA 4th DIVISION Football League 2023. Kane kadei ruh ka kynhun ba ar ban ioh rung (qualified) sha ka semi jong kane ka lympung, kata hadien ka Kharang SC.
