Ia kane ka jingialehkai la pynlong ha madan First Ground SSA Stadium Polo, Shillong.Katei ka lad ka la wan hadien ba ka Iatyllilang SC ka la lah ban pynliem ia ka Mawpdang SC lyngba ka kol kaba la wan na u Iatyllibor Mynsong ha ka minit ba 30.Ka jingiakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 27 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Mawkriah West SC pyrshah ia ka Mawkasiang SC ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.Ka Mawkriah ka dei ka kynhun kaba khlaiñ tam na ka Group A, kata kaba don ha ka kyrdan ba nyngkong jong katei ka group, katba ka Mawkasiang ka dei ka kynhun ba don ha ka kyrdan ba ar jong ka Group B.
title: Jam ka Iatyllilang SC sha ka semi final jong ka SSA 4th Division

content: Ka ophis jong ka West Jaiñtia Hills Deputy Commissioner ha ryngkat ka jingïatreilang bad ka ophis District Sports Officer kan sa pynlong ïa ka jingïakob mareh ba la tip kum ka ‘Fit India Freedom Run 4.0 bad ka National Unity Day Run (Rashtriya Ekta Diwas)’ na ka bynta ki kynthei bad shynrang ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai.Ïa kane ka jingïakob yn sdang na ka khyrdop jong ka Kiang Nangbah Stadium ha ka por 6 baje mynstep. Ka jingmareh kan long lyngba na Ladthadlaboh Main Road –  Jowai Public School – Gate Polytechnic – Kshaid Rymphum – Salaroh – Dulong Poh-hali Road – Dulong – Pamhadem – Panaliar (Civil Hospital) – Iongpiah -Mission Compound – H.K.Singh School – D.C Office – New Hill – National Highway bad yn kut biang ha Stadium.Na ka bynta ka jingpynrung kyrteng yn pdiang ha katei hi ka sngi ha ka por 5:30 mynstep.Na ka liang ki nongpyniaid ki la pyntip ba kane ka jingïakob kan long kyrpang na ka bynta ki nongshong shnong jong ka West Jaintia District.
title: Yn pynlong ka ophis DC bad DSO West Jaintia ïa ka ‘Fit India Freedom Run’ ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai

content: Ka Jingïakhun hapdeng ka Nangbah Iawmusiang bad Demthring ka la kut noh ha ka jingïakhaid da 1-1  ha ka jingïakhun na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ka Iawmusing ka la ïoh ban pynkhih jar nyngkong lyngba ka kol ba la wan na u Joplangki Challam ha ka minit ba 55 hynrei lyngba ka jingïai ïakhun bad ka jingtbit jong u Maidong Mukhim uba la ïoh ban thep ha ka minit ba 81, kine ki ar kynhun ki la hap ban ïasam mar shi poiñ.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 27 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Dulong pyrshah ïa ka Sohmynting ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi.
title: 1st Division WJDSA : ïakhaid ka Iawmusiang bad Demthring

content: U Wirldrick Susngi u la lah ban pynïoh jingjop ïa ka Nangbah Mulang ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Ladthadlaboh jong ka lympung Super Division ka West Jaintia Hills District Sports Association (WJDSA) ïa kaba la tip ruh ‘U Kiang Nangbah Memorial Trophy 2023’.Ha katei ka jingïakhun ka Nangbah ka la lah ban pynliem ïa ka Lad-thadlaboh da 3-1 ha kaba u Wirldrick u la ïoh ban thep 2 kol, kata ha ka minit ba 27 bad 66 katba ïa kawei pat ka kol la ïoh ban thep da u Chanbok Siangshai ha ka minit ba 90+1. Ka Ladthadlaboh ka la ïoh ban pynphai tang shi kol lyngba u Banteilang Shylla (60).Ka jingiakhun ka long kaba iakhaid bor hynrei na ka jingbym ioh kabu ban pyrshang thep kol na ka jingskhem ki rangialehkai dien ka Mulang, ka Ladthadlaboh ka la duh noh ia ka 3 poiñ.Ka jingïalehkai ba bud jong kane ka lympung kan long lashai ka sngi ka 28 Risaw hapdeng ka Khimusniang bad Mukhla Raij SC ha ka por 2 baje noh phai sngi.
title: Super Division WJDSA : Liem ka Ladthadlaboh ha ka Nangbah Mulang lyngba ki 2 kol jong u Wirldrick Susngi

content: Ki nongpynïaid jong ka Shillong Sports Association ki la pyntikna ba ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta ka Second Division mynta ka aiom yn sdang noh ha ka 30 tarik mynta u bnai.Ha kane ka samoi, haduh 14 tylli ki klob yn sa ïashim bynta ha kaba yn phiah ha ar tylli ki group, kata 7 tylli ki klob ha kawei ka group.Ha ka jingshisha ïa kane ka lympung la thmu ban pynlong ha u Nailar hynrei na ka jingbym pat biang ka madan First ground la pynkynriah sha katei ka tarik haneng.Ki kynhun kiba don ha ka group A ki kynthup ïa ka Mawtawar SC, Sohryngkham SC, Laitlyngkot SC, Jongksha SC, Nongkrem SC, Sohiong SC bad Marbisu SC katba ha ka Group B ki long ka Nongrah SC, Pohkseh SC, Lumshyiap SC, Imson SC, Umphrup SC, Laitkyrhong SC bad Smit SC.Ki kynhun ba thymmai lane kiba dang shu kyntiew na ka third division ki long ka  Mawtawar (kaba dei ruh ka lahduh), Nongrah, Sohryngkham bad Laitlyngkot.
title: Mynta u bnai yn sdang ïa ka lympung SSA 2nd Division

content: Ka Dulong kaba la duh poiñ noh ha ka jingïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Wahïajer SC ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai ka la wanphai biang da ka jingjop ryngkat ka 3 poiñ lyngba ka jingjop pyrshah ïa ka Sohmynting ha ka jingïakhun na ka bynta ka lympung Chatister Kharkongor Memorial Trophy ba la pynïaid da ka West Jaiñtia District Sports Association (WJDSA), Jowai, ba la pynlong ha madan Kiang Nangbah Stadium, Jowai.Ïa katei ka kol kaba la pynjop ruh ïa ka kynhun la ïoh ban thep da u Kevin Rymbai ha ka minit ba 10 katba ka Sohmynting ka khlem ïoh ban pynkhih jar haduh ban da kut ka minit ïalehkai watla ka la iakhun katba lah ban pynurlong ia ka jingangnud ban knieh ia ka poiñ ha katei ka jingiakhun.Ka jingïakhun ba mynta ka sngi ka 28 Risaw kan long hapdeng ka Luti Tuber SW pyrshah ïa ka Khliehiongriang ha ka por 12 baje mynsngi.
title: Khur ka Dulong ïa ka 3 poiñ lyngba u Kevin Rymbai

content: Ka Sor Meghalaya ka don jingthmu ban pynkiew shuh shuh ïa ka thoh ka pule hapoh ka jylla da kaba pyniasyriem dur bad Central Board of Secondary Education.Ïa kane ka ïathuh da u Myntri ka thoh ka pule, u Rakkam A.Sangma, uba la ong ba, ka Sorkar ka don ka jingthmu ban pyntrei kam noh ïa kane ha ka snem ka ban wan. U Myntri u la ïathuh ba ka tnad ka thoh ka pule, ka la ïaid shaphrang ban pynurlor ïa kane ka jingthmu.U la ïathuh ba ka Sorkar ka la jan dep ha kaba bishar bniah ha kaba ia dei bad ka Subject jingkheiñ bad saian jong ka CBSE bad shen kan sa shim ïa ka rai ka jong ka. U Rakkam A.Sangma ula iïathuh ruh ba ka Sorkar ka dang pynlong ïa ki jingbishar bniah ïa kiwei ki subject jong ka CBSE shuwa ba kan pyntrei kam, kaba ka jingthmu jong ka long ban pynkiew shuh shuh ïa ka thoh ka pule ha Meghalaya.
title: Thmu ka Sorkar Meghalaya ban pynïasyriem ïa ka thoh ka pule bad ka CBSE

content: Ha ka phang jingkynthoh ba mynshuwa ngi la ïa tai ïa ka jingmih jong ka New Testament (ka Jutang kaba thymmai) snem 1831 ha kaba U Ram Singh Rani bad U Bi Tham ki la long kum ki khlur kiba shat jingshai ha ka pyrthei kaba dum. Ki la long ki college student kiba nynkong eh na ka Ri bad kiba la pyndep ïa ka jingpule ha Serampore College kaba long naduh 1819 haduh 1826 ha kawei na ki lai tylli ki college kiba nyngkong ha India kiba la plie ha kito ki snem ha ka nongbah Kolkata (Calcutta) kaba mynta. Khlem pep ki la long ki student kiba nep kiba la ioh pule ïa ki phang ba pher ha ka science humanities, geography, agriculture, accountancy encyclopedia, law bad kiwei de.Mynta pat ngin khmih bishar khyndiat ïa ka jingsdang jong ki skul kiba la kynjoh ia ka kyrdan High school bad kiba la seng da ki Trai Ri kiba nep ka khlieh, kiba shemphang kiba angnud bad kiba thrang ban leh bad pyndep ïa ki kam kyntiew Ri kiba shah ha khmat eh ha kito ki por: bad kiba la kynthup ïa ka jingsdang shibun kiwei pat ki kam ba radbah ban pynlong ïa ka Ri kaba ïa tbeh jingshai ryngkat bad kiwei ki Jaid bynriew kiba la wan kham sha khmat ha ka jingstad bad jingshemphang, ka Imlang sahlang, ka trei ka ktah bad ter ter.U E.W. Dkhar, uwei hapdeng ki nongthoh kiba kham kongsan eh ha kane ka por (bad da kaba sngewburom ïa u) u la thoh ha ka kot phareng jong u kaba kyrteng “Primary Education in the Khasi and Jaiñtia Hills” ba ka Hima Shella ka la pynieng bad sdang ïa ka skul ba nyngkong eh ha ka Ri bun phew snem kiba la leit noh shuwa ka jingwan ki phareng kaba ngi pyrshang pynkylla khasi harum:“Teachers appointed initially carried out the task with much industriousness and enthusiasm, and within a short span the school grew up beautifully which attracted learners and admirers from far and wide. In the year 1829 when peace was concluded between Duwakdar and British East India Company, with the aid and assistance of the local educationists, the one and the only Middle school (minor) blossomed forth with many bright and promising scholars. Thus Shella became the home of education and the only State having an educational institution prior to the advent of the British in the hills.”Ngi tip ba kiba kham bun ki nonghikai mynnyngkong (wat lada don khyndiat ki Trai ri) bun ki dei kiba la wanlam na ki thaiñ marjan kiba na Bangladesh. “Mynba katei ka skul ka sdang bad tang hadien shipor, ka nam jong ka ka la phriang tad haduh ba ka la khring ïa shibun ki nongwan pule bad ki nongwan jngoh ïa ka na kylleng sawdong. Kumta ha ka snem 1829 ynda la ïateh soskular ïa suk ki Dawukdar Shella bad East India Company hadien ka jingialeh thma, ka la kylla ka skul pdeng M.E. (minor) school kaba la phuh itynnad namar ki nongpule kiba nep bad ki khraw pyrkhat kiba la mih na ka. Kumta ka Hima Shella ka la kylla long tang ma ka hi ka Hima kaba la seng bad pynsan ïa ka skul mynshuwa ka jingwan poi u phareng dohlieh shane”. U Bah E.W. Dkhar shaphang ka jingkiew ka skul kaba la jia long hadien u la buh kumne –“In the year 1860 – 61, a proceeding high school was founded which marked the advance of the people from 1845 to 1897, the school produced renowned students such as Jeebon Roy Mairom, the first khasi to secure the coveted post of Assistant Commissioner, u Shloin Duwakdar, a renowned politician, Rev. J.J.M.Nichols Roy one of the greatest politicians and statesmen, Prof. R.R.Thomas the first Premchand Roy Scholarship helder from Assam and many others of their own rank and ability”.Ha ka snem 1860 – 61 ka la kylla long ka High school kaba iaid shaphrang kaba la pynmih ïa ki khlur ka Ri kum U Jeebon Roy Mairom uba la bat ïa ka kam Assistant Commissioner, u Rev. J.J.M. Nichols Roy uwei u nongsaiñ hima bad nongsynshar uba proh u Prof. R.R.Thomas uba tang ma u hi u Premchand Roy Scholarship ha ka jylla shatei lam mihngi, u shloiñ uba long u politician bad bun kiwei de.Kane ka skul ka la pynrung ïa ki khynnah pule kiba long ki trai shnong Shella bad kumjuh ki Khynnah Pule na kiwei ki Hima kiba mynshwa: ka la hikai ïa ki subject bapher ha ki dak Bangla bad hadien ka la kynthup ïa ka khasi bad phareng ynda ki ktien ki la ioh suhthied ha ki kam hikai bad pule skul. Ka skul Shella kaba la kylla long ka Proceeding High School 1860, kat kum ka dulir ka don bun ngut ki khynnah shynrang kiba pule ha skul ha ka snem 1872 – 73: hynrei tang 30 ngut na ki, ki la shim ïa ka Bengali bad kiwei ki subject pule jong ki. Kiwei ki khynnah ki pule baroh ki subject khlem da shim Bengali, ha katei ka snem baroh ki khynnah kiba pule ha ki primary school kynthup ïa ki primary school ka Welsh Mission ki don baroh 914 bad tang 129 ki dei ki khynnah Khristan.Hapdeng kine, 34 ngut ki khun shynrang kiba leit pule skul ki dei ki kynja khun syiem ne pyrsa syiem. “As regards the 34 princes and nawabs said to be studying now in the Khasi schools and in the highest social rank. They are sons nad newphews of Sims “(Syiems)” Na ka tyllong jingtip “General Report on Public Instruction in Bengal in 1872 – 73. Appendix A, pp. 257 – 259.Ka jinghikai ïa ka Khasi kum ka Ktien Trai Ri ka la ioh rung ha ka skul mission Middle English ha Nongsawlia kaba don 157 ki khynnah shynrang kiba pule ha ka. Bad ka jinghikai ïa ki subject ha ka phareng ka la ioh sdang suhthied. Imat don khyndiat eh ki khynnah kynthei kiba ioh pule ha ka skul pule kyrdan pdeng.Ngi iohi ha ka snem 1872 – 73 ka skul Shella kaba la kylla long ka Shella Proceeding High school: nalor ka skul shynrang kyrdan Middle English School bad Normal School Nongsawlia bad kumjuh ki skul primary ka mission kiba la sdang suhthied hajan bad pajih na ka shnong Sohra. Ka snem 1897 ka dei ka snem ba u jumai ba jur u la khie mynba U Rev. J.J.M.Nichols Roy bad u para jong u U Prof. Rowland Roy Thomas ki dang pule skul ha la ka jong ka shnong jong ki ha Shella. Bad ki long ki khynnah pule kiba proh bad nep bha.Ngi tip bha ba u Jeebon Roy uba long mynshuwa u Police Inspector bad hadien u Extra Assistant Commissioner u la plie ïa ka skul High school kaba nyngkong eh kata mynba ka Sor Shillong ba mynta ka la kylla ka nongbah jong ka Province Assam ha ka 1874. U la plie ïa katei ka skul kaba u jer kyrteng ka Shillong Zillah High School pyrshah ïa ki jingeh kiba khraw namar ba ka sorkar kam lah kubur satia halor ka jingthrang jong u ban plie noh shisyndon ïa ka High School kaba thikna namar ba ka Shella ka dang sah hi ka Proceeding High School.Hynrei ym shym la lah leh ei ei ban plie ha ka snem 1874 na ka jingwan jong ka khlam kaba la sar shibun ki ïing. Bad don ruh kiwei ki daw kiba la pynsangeh ïa ka sorkar (Provincial Government) ban seng High School. Kumta U Babu Jeebon da la ka bor lade marwei u la plie ïa ka Shillong Zillah High School ha ka snem 1876 kaba sdang na class VII bad tang kumba 50 ngut ki khynnah bad ki nonghikai kiba bun ki dei ki dkhar kiba la wallam nabar. Ka skul ka la kiew ha ka jingbun ki nonghikai ynda ki klas kiba kham shaneng ki la iaid ha ki snem ba bud.Kumta ha ka snem 1880 I Babu Sib Charan Roy I la pass ïa ka Entrance Examination kaba kylla matriculation hadien. Bad ha ka snem 1881 la mih sa u Babu Hari Charan Roy u la pass Entrance kumjuh. La buh ïa kiba na ka Shillong Zillah High School ban leit ïaleh examin ha Sylhet kum ka Centre examination kaba kham jan. Ka course jong ka Calcutta University kaba la seng dang shibit ha ka 1857 ka long kaba kham eh bad kaba bun ki subject kum ki Jaid ktien India kiba la ithuh, ka ktien English, ki rukom jingkheiñ jingdiah bun jaid, ki tnad Science ba paw khmat, ki subject Humanities bad ter ter : bad la buh ïa ka kyrdan ban pass ha ka rukom ba kham hajrong ha kaba wad bniah (analytical), kaba nujor (critical) kaba ïa – tai bha (standard essay) ka rukom nujor bad kynmaw lyngba ki aiñ pule (methods of study), ka jingpynpliah ïa ki aiñ tynrai sciences (Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Botany, Mathematical).Kaba phylla ka long ba u Babu Jeebon Roy u la bei pisa na la ka pla ha ki khyndiat snem ban pynlong kam ïa ka skul na ka bynta ka jingtbit bad ka jingnang jingstad jong ki khun samla kata tad haduh kitei snem ba la wan rung kham bun ki nongpule. Kane ka la ktik ïa ka Sorkar ban plie High School. Kumta ka Sorkar ka la sdang ïa ka Shillong Government Boys’ High School kaba sdang naduh klas IV ha ka snem 1889 na ka bynta ki khynnah dkhar kiba dei ki jaid ktien ba la ithuh ïa kum ka Arabic, Bengali, Assamese bad hadien ïa ka Khasi ha ka kyrdan high School (wat lada ïa ki khynnah shynrang Khasi ym shym pynrung ha ka Middle Section jong ka skul Govt) wat la ka Sorkar ka la sdang ïa ka High School section naduh ka klass VII ha ka snem 1891. Kumta ka Government High School Mawkhar ka la shimti ïa ka Shillong Zillah School kaba la seng da u Babu Jeebon Roy bad kaba la pynlong ïa ka Govt. Boys’ High School ha ki snem 1889 – 1891 bad mih pli ïa ka Shillong Zillah High School jong U Jeebon Roy.Kumta ïa ka Khasi la kynthup ha ka kyrdan High School.Utei u rangbah hadien u la plie ïa ka skul middle kaba kawei ka subject hikai ka dei ka Bengali ryngkat bad kiwei ki subject ha Mawkhar: U da noh tyngka na lade haduh lai hajar tyngka. Kumta u Babu Jeebon Roy u la seng 3 tylli ki skul kiba long ka Shillong Zillah, ka Government Boys’ High School bad ka School Middle Mawkhar.U la thoh bun ki kot na ka bynta ki skul bad ki paidbah.U la plie ïa ka press kaba nyngkong (1896) kaba long ka kam kaba jwat kaba dei ka Ri Khasi press. U la wanlam ïa ka rukom thung coffee, ka jingrep ïa ki soh lyiur soh tlang kiba dei ki jaid soh plum, soh phareng, soh grape bad ter ter kiba la pynim ïa shibun ki ïing ki sem. U la plie ruh ïa ki jingtih dewiong, kaba la plie lad ïa ka kamai kajih ïa ki briew, bad ki rukom rep soh kiba la kham pyntbit. U la long na kiwei ki nongaibuit ban pynieng ïa ka Seng Khasi.Katba nga tip u la wallam ïa ka rukom thaw ïing kiba mynta kiba nadong shadong ki ïa syriem bha ïa ki ïing phareng kiba kylluid kiba biang ki kper bad ki phyllaw kiba u la lah ban kham pynitynnad bad kaba dei ïaroh wat da ki phareng nongsynshar. Ha kaba nyngkong kine ki kynja Bungalow lane Bhavan ki long ki kam kiba jwat ban pynieng bad pynlongkam hynrei u Babu Jeebon uba biang ka khlieh u la lah pynieng ki jingtei ïing kiba skhem, kiba biang ki dur ki dar ha ki rukom mynta.U la long u atiar uba pynlong kam ïa ka Shillong Master Plan mynba la seng nyngkong ïa ka nongbah. U la leh shibun ki kam radbah kiba pynlong ka jingim bathymmai ïa ka province Assam. Kumta kalor kine ki nongrim ka Welsh Mission ka la plie ïa ka skul kynthei High School ha ka 1897. Ka jinglah seng ban pynlong ki skul ba kham shaneng ka kyrdan pule da ki Trai Muluk ha ki por kiba khohruh khohram naduh ki phew snem shuwa ka jingwankiew ki phareng (kiba la ioh shimti katto katne ki jaka sha Sylhet (1765) haduh 1891) ka kdew ruh sha ka jingkiew rasong ka Ri kaba ngim lah ban len.
title: U Khasi ha Ka Ïeng Rasong (Ka Thup Ba Ar) artylli ki High School jong ki trai ri naduh 1775 haduh 1898. Mynba ngi ïeng rasong

content: Ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy ka la lah ban rah ïa ka nam lahduh jong ka lympung ïalehkai 2nd Meghalaya Open Table Tennis Cash Prize Tournament lyngba ka jingïoh ban khur bun tam ki takma ksiar.Ïa kane ka lympung la sdang ha ka 2 bad 3 tarik Jylliew 2023 bad la pynïaid da ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy, lyngba kane la ïohi shibun bah ki sap ïalehkai jong ki nongïashim  bynta kiba la ïalehkai ha ki thup bapher bapher.Kane ka lympung ïalehkai ka la poi noh sha kaba kut myn ha ka sngi saitjain jong kane u taiew ba lah dep ha kaba ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy kaba la long ka lahduh  ka la lah ban khur haduh 10 tylli ki takma ha kaba 7 tylli ki takma ksiar bad 3 tylli ki takma rupa.Ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka thup Under-15 Boys Singles , u Debobrata Paul u la pynliem noh ïa u Sagnik Choudhury da 3 la 0, kine baroh arngut ki dei na ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy, ha katei ki jingïakhun ki la pyni shisha ïa ka sap tbit ïalehkai ka jong ki.Ha ka jingïalehkai jong ka thup Under-19 Boys Singles, u Kapil Biswakarma na ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy u la long kum u lahduh hadien ba u la pynliem noh ïa u Labeeb Faisel Ahmed da 4 la 3.Katba ha ka thup Mens Singles, u Suranjit Dey na ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy u la long kum u nongjop hadien ba u la pynliem noh ïa u Sandeep Kumar da 4 la 1.Ka Tanushree Dasgupta, kaba la mihkhmat ïa ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy, ka la lah ban long ka lahduh ha ka  Women’s Singles event, hadien ba ka la pynliem noh da 4 la 0 ïa ka Diva Tang.Na ka bynta ka thup Veteran Singles, u Amit Gupta na ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy u la pynliem noh ïa u Santanu Ghosh da 3 la 1.U Suranjit Dey bad u Sandeep Kumar na ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy ki la long kum ki lahduh ha ka jingïakhun jong ka thup Men’s Doubles hadien ba ki la pynliem noh ïa u Santanu Ghosh bad ïa u Rituraj Shabong da 3 la 0.Bad ha ka jingïalehkai Veteran Doubles, u Bishnu Joshi bad u Santanu Ghosh ki la khur ïa ka nam lahduh hadien ba ki la pynliem noh ïa u Ranjan Deb bad ïa u Biswajit Das Gupta da 3 la 1.U Debobrata Paul na ka Laban Sports Club Table Tennis Academy u la khur ïa ka nam “Most Promising Player of the Tournament” hadien ba u la lah ban ïalehkai bha ha kane ka lympung.Ki nongïalehkai kiba la khur jingjop ki la ïoh ruh ban khur ïa ki trophi ryngkat bad ki song khusnam ki bapher bapher ha la ki jong ki kyrdan ïalehkai.
title: Lahduh ka Laban SC Table Tennis Academy ha ka ‘Meghalaya Open Table Tennis’

content: Ka St. Anthonys Higher Secondary School bad ka ‘Meghalaya Speed Skating Association’ ha ryngkat bad jingïatreilang bad ka ‘Speed Skating Federation of India’ lah ban pynlong ïa ka Lympung Speed Skating Competition kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jylla ha kaba la ïoh ban pynlong ha madan basketball jong ka St. Anthony’s School, Shillong.U MDC ka Laitumkhrah-Malki u Bah Fantin Joseph Lakadong u la long u kongsan ha ka sngi ba plie pyrda ïa ka lympung bad u la ai ka jingïaroh kaba kyrpang ïa ki nongpynïaid bad ki nongïashim bynta kiba lah pynshongshit bad pynlong ïa kane ka lympung.La wan ban ïashim bynta ha kane ka jinglehkai da ki khynnah na ka thaiñ East Khasi hills, West Khasi Hills bad Jaintia Hills bad lah don ruh ki khynnah ba wan ïashim bynta naduh ka jylla Assam.Kumba 75 ngut tam ki khynnah ki lah ïashim bynta ha kane ka jingïalehkai. Lah pyni ruh ïa ka jingbatai jong ka Roll Ball game hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya kaba la shah kynthup shen ha ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 37th National Games ka ban long ha Goa.
title: La pynlong ïa ka ‘Speed Skating Competition’ ha ka jylla

content: Ka jylla Meghalaya ka la long mynta kum ka shlem kaba pynkha bad pynmih shibun ki rangïalehkai bad ki nongïalam ha ka kam ïalehkai. Mynta ka kynti ruh ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ka ri India hapoh ka jingïalam jong u Bah Finely Pariat kum u Manager jong ka kynhun ïalehkai ka ri India, ka la khur ar tylli ki takma ksiar na ka jingleit ïashim bynta ha ka Asian U20 Athletics Championship.Kane ka jingwanrah burom ka long ka jingsarong ym tang ïa ka Jylla hynrei ïa ka ri baroh kawei namar la ïoh ïa ka jingithuh na kiwei pat ki ri ha ka Asia. Ka Athletics Federation of India kaba la jied ïa u Bah Finely ban long u nongïalam jong kane ka kynhun ka la sngewkmen na ka bynta jong une u manager uba la sei na ka jylla Meghalaya.Ïa kane ka lympung ba la pynlong ha  South Korea la sdang naduh ka 4 tarik bad kan kut ha ka 7 tarik Jylliew 2023.Kane ka kynhun ha ka sngi sdang jong kane ka lympung ïalehkai ka la lah ban khur hynriew tylli ki takma ha kaba ar tylli ki takma ksiar, artylli ki takma rupa bad artylli ki takma rnong.U Bhartpreet Singh u la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka jingïalehkai Discus throw men ha kaba u la lah ban kawang 55.66m, ka  Rezoana Mallick Heena ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka jingïalehkai 400m Women ha kaba ka la lah ban mareh hapoh 53:31 sekhon bad ka Antima Pal kaba la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka jingïalehkai 5000m ha kaba ka la lah ban mareh hapoh 17:11 minit.U Shivam Lohakare u la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka jingïalehkai Javelin Throw hadien ba u la kawang 72.34m, u Shakeel u la jop ïa ka takma rnong ha ka jingïamareh kaba jngai 800m ha kaba u la lah ban mareh pyndep hapoh 1:49.79 sekhon bad u Sharuk Khan u la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka jingïalehkai 3000m steeplechase ha kaba u la mareh 8:51.74 sekhon.U Bah Finely Pariat u long ruh u nongïalam uba nyngkong eh na ka Athletics jong ka jylla ban ïoh ïa kane ka kabu ksiar ban ïalam ïa ka kynhun jong ka ri India bad ban wanrah burom ïa ka ri baroh kawei da ka jingkhur ïa ki takma ha ki jingïalehkai bapher bapher.
title: Khur takma ksiar ka India ha ka Asian U20 Athletics Championship

content: Ka jingïalehkai kaba khatduh jong ka Group-D bad Group-C na ka bynta ka lympung Meghalaya State League (MSL) kaba la long mynta ka sngi  ka 5 tarik Jylliew ha Tura, ka Chipakkore ka la lah ban pynliem noh da 9 la 2 ïa ka Wasa FC bad ka Mawten ka la pynliem noh ïa ka Lumdiengngan da 3 la 0.Ka jingïalehkai kaba la long ha Chandmari Ground ha Tura,  u Balkan Marak (Chipakkore) u la ïoh ban thep 4 kol, kata ha ka minit kaba 18, 47, 63, bad 65, u Harlee K Marak u la thep ïa ki kol ha ka minit kaba 13, 84, u Ranggira R Marak u la thep ïa ki kol ha ka minit kaba 80, 90 bad u Johnfield A Sangma u la thep kol ha ka minit kaba 47. Katba ki nongïalehkai jong ka WASA FC kiba la ïoh ban thep i ki ar kol ki long u Gilseng Momin uba la thep ïa ka kol ha ka minit kaba 8 bad u Threesbirth Momin u la thep ïa ka kol ha ka minit kaba 62.Katba ha ka jingïalehkai kaba la long ha MDSA Ground ha Mawkyrwat, ki nongïalehkai jong ka Mawten kiba la ïoh ban thep ïa ki lai kol ki long u Reinjoywell Wasrde uba la thep ïa ka kol ha ka minit kaba 31, u Lastbornson Marwein u la thep ïa ka kol ha ka minit kaba 60 bad u Ïaidborlang Thongni u la thep ïa ka kol ha ka minit kaba 90+1.Ka Mawlai SC kan sa ïakhun semi phainal pyrshah ïa ka Khliehmawlieh Youth Club, katba ka Rangdajied United kaba la khur ïa ka kyrdan ba ar ha ka snem 2019 kan sa ïalehkai pyrshah ïa ka Shillong Lajong kaba dang dei ka lahduh jong kane ka lympung MSL 2023.Ïa ka jingïalehkai semi phainal yn sa pynïalehkai ha la ïing bad shabar (home and away), ka ban sdang naduh ka 10 tarik Jylliew, bad ka second leg jong kane ka lympung ïalehkai kan sdang naduh ka 13 tarik Jylliew. Ïa ka jingïalehkai phainal jong kane ka lympung yn sa pynïalehkai hapoh ka madan First Ground, Polo, ha Shillong ha ka 17 tarik Jylliew 2023.La pyndep ïa ka program ne ka jingbuh beit ïa ki kynhun ïalehkai ban ïakhun ïa ka semi phainal (draw), ha ka  jingïadon lang ki khlur ïalehkai phutbol ba paw jong ka jylla kiba kynthup ïa u Redeem Tlang, Aiban Dohling bad u Halen Nongtdu – bad ha ryngkat ka jingïadon lang ka FIFA Assistant Referee ka kong Ri-ïohlang Dhar. Bad la pynlong ïa kane ka draw hapoh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong u Bah Wanshanbor Kharkrang uba long kum u MSL Tournament Director bad ki nongmihkhmat jong kine ki saw tylli ki Klob ïalehkai.Kane ka dei ka samoi ïalehkai kaba nyngkong ba ka Mawlai kan ïa shim bynta ha ka MSL bad ka la lah shisha ban pyni ïa ka jngkhlaiñbor bad ka jingtbit jong kane ka kynhun ha kaba ka la lah ban khur jingjop ha baroh san tylli ki jingïalehkai ba ka la ïakhun jong ka Group A. Ka Rangdajied ka la long ka Klob ba don ha khliehduh ha ka miej ïakhein poiñ ka Group B bad kan ïalehkai pyrshah ïa ka ShillongLajong FC kaba la don ha khliehduh jong ka miej ïakhein poiñ jong ka Group C watla ki dang sah sa kawei ka jingïakhun.Ka Khliehmawlieh ka long ka kynhun ïalehkai ka bym shym la dei napoh nongbah Shillong hynrei kadei tang kane hi ka kynhun ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills kaba la lah ban rung sha ka kylla ïalehkai jong ka semi phainal.Ka jingïalehkai mynta ka sngi, ka 7 tarik Jylliew kan long na ka bynta ka ka Group C (Mawkyrwat zone) ha kaba ka Shillong Lajong kan ïalehkai pyrshah ïa ka Riangdo ha ka por 3 baje janmiet.
title: Yn ïaknieh rung phainal ka Lajong, Mawlai, Rangdajied bad Khliehmawlieh

content: U Myntri sorkar bad u nongïalam ka United Democratic Party (UDP) u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ha ka 5 tarik Jylliew u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki jaitbynriew Garo halor ka jingsngewthuh jong ki ïa ka saiñpyrthei ha ka jylla ban ha ba ïa nujor bad ki jaitbynriew Khasi.“Ki jaitbynriew Garo ki la kham rangbah ka jingmut jingpyrkhat ha ba ïa dei bad ka saiñpyrthei haba ïa nujor bad ki jaitbynriew Khasi”, la ong u bah Paul Lyngdoh sha ki ladpathai khubor.“Ki jaitbynriew Khasi, ki ju mlien tang ban hylla ha ka ba ïadei bad ki ba bun ki mat hynrei lada phi peit ïa ki jaitbynriew Garo kim ju leh kumta hynrei ki leh da ka jingstad bad ka jingpynïaid ka ba long rangbah”, u la ong.“Ha ka kam saiñpyrthei, nga la ïohi ba bun na ngi,  ngi dang long khyllung khynnah ha ka jingmut jingpyrkhat  katba ki jaitbynriew Garo ki la ju pynpaw ba ki la long rangbah ban sngewthuh ïa kane ka bynta”.Lada phi peit halor ka jingdawa Myntri Rangbah da u Khasi, u nongïalam ka UDP u la kylli hato phi la ju ïohsngew ïa kano kano ka sur na Garo hill ha ka ba ïadei bad kane ka bynta “Em, hynrei ki la pynpaw ïa kane ha ka election ka ba dang shu dep, da ka ba ai ïa ka National People’s Party (NPP) – 18 MLA na ki 24 tylli ki Constituency, ban pynthikna ba u Myntri Rangbah un dei ban long beit na ka jaitbynriew jong ki”.Ha ba kren halor ka Reservation Policy, u Bah Paul u la ong, “Halor kane ka mat lada ngi hylla bad pynmih shibun ka nia, kan khring ym tang ïa ka high court hynrei wat ïa ka supreme court ruh. Mynta phi lah ban ïohi ba bun na ki ritpaid (minority group) ki la mih shakhmat ban dawa ïa la ka jong ka bhah, ka ba lah ban wanrah ïa ka jingeh ban pynbeit ïa kane ka mat”.Halor ka jingkynnoh ba u sngap jar halor ka mat reservation, u Bah Lyngdoh u la ong , “Kum u nongïalam, kam long ka ba stad ban pynpaw ïa ki buit bad ki lynti ba kumno ngan pynurlong ïa kane ka jingdawa, kiwei ki shu kren, hynrei nga trei.”“Hato kan long ka ba dei ba u khynnah pule  class 8 lane  9 un wan ban batai halor ka jingthaw ïa ka policy, lada la long kumta nga ruh nga la dei ban pyndep tang ïa ka jingpule tang haduh class 8 bad batai ïa kane, bad kum kane ka jingpynshlur ïa ki samla pule da ki katto katne ki kynhun ka long ka jingbakla”, u la bynrap.“Kiwei ki pyndonkam da ka jabieng hynrei ngi ju pyndonkam da ka dohnud hynrei ym ha ka lynti ka ba dei  ngi pyntreikam da ka jingsngew kaba bakla ban synshar” u la ong haba u ther ïa ka Voice of the People Party (VPP).
title: Ki Garo ki kham rangbah jingmut ha ka saiñpyrthei: Paul Lyngdoh

content: Saw sngi hadien ba sangeh shah thngan u President ka Voice of the People Party (VPP), u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ban dawa na ka sorkar jylla ba pynbeit thymmai ïa ka Reservation Policy, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u nongïalam ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad u Myntri ka sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) u la buh ka jingkylli ïa u Bah Ardent, ba balei um treh ban pynkhih ïa ka Reservation Policy, ha ka por ba u Dr Mukul Sangma u dang long kum u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla.Ha ka 5 tarik Jylliew, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u MLA ka West Shillong Constituency, u la mih shakhmat ban pynshai halor ka jingshah kynthoh jong u, na ki ba bun balang ba u jah na ka jylla katba dang don ka jingïakhih ban dawa pynbeit ïa ka Reservation Policy.Ha ba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Paul u la ong, “Halor ka mat Reservation Policy, nga la dep ban kren 20 snem mynshwa, bad kane ka paw ha ki video ki ba la saphriang mynta hynrei nga kwah ban  kylli kylla, hangno ka don ka jingkren u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ha kato ka por halor kane ka mat namar ba u ruh u dang long kum u nongïalam ka Sengbhalang? Kam shem la don kano kano ka jingkren na ka liang jong u namar ba u khlem wan ban ïasoh lang ha ka jingshah thngan jong ngi”.“Watla katta ruh ngi khlem beiñ ïa u ha kato ka por, namar ba kan shitom bha ïa u, ban kren halor ka Reservation Policy, namar u dei u President ka Ferderation of Khasi Jaiñtia and Garo People (FKJGP), kumta ngim kwah ban buh ïa u ha kane ka jingeh, hynrei ha ka jingïakhih shah thngan u Bah Ardent, watla u khlem khot lang ïa ngi hynrei u General Sesretary ka  UDP u Bah Jemino Mawthoh, u la leit ban ïakynduh ïa u,” la ong u Bah Paul.U Bah Paul u la ong shuh shuh, “Kane ka jingkylli ba balei ngam leit ha ka jaka ba u Bah Ardent u shah thngan? Ka jubab ka ba shai ka long ba kumba u paidbah u la jied ïa nga ban long kum u nongïalam bad nongmihkhmat ngan pyndep ïa kata ka kamram hapoh ka kynhun myntri”.“Ha ka sngi ba ngan mih na Shillong ban leit sha Swizerland, 8 sngi shwa kane ka sngi ka la don ka jingïakynduh ban ïa kren halor kane ka mat bad kaei ka ba nga la kren haphoh ka jingïalang ki kynhun myntri, ngam lah ban ïathuh mynta namar ngam lah ban  pynkheiñ ïa ka kular ba nga la smai ha ba shim ïa nga kum u Myntri Sorkar. Hynrei haba la jied ïa nga ba ngan pyndep ïa la ka kamram sha ki kynhun myntri”, u la bynrap.U la buh ruh ka jingkylli sha u Bah Ardent, “Ngam sngewthuh ba balei donkam ban lum, ban lang ban pynkhih win ïa u paidbah ha kane ka rukom, tang 3 bnai ba la thaw ïa ka sorkar ba thymmai hynrei u Dr Mukul Sangma u ba la ïoh ban pynïaid ïa ka sorkar 8 snem ki sngap jarjar halor kane ka mat”.“Ki paidbah ki dang shu dep ban jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat, wat tang ka sia ba tah ha tyrsim ruh ym pat khuid, mynta ïa ki juh ki paidbah ban wan sha Secretariat ban ïa shong madan haba ka long kumta kan don jingmut aïu ban jied nongmihkhmat namar ha ba la jied ïa ki nongmihkhmat kan dei ka  kamram jong u, ban long nongïasaid na ka bynta u paidbah khnang ba phi phin ïoh ban bteng ïa ka kamai jakpoh”, u la bynrap.“Ngam sngewthuh ruh ba don na ki katto katne ngut ki nongñiah taksi,  ki  ba la wan shane sha ïing ban kren halor ka Reservation Policy, ngam tip kin ïoh jingmyntoi aïu lada pynkiew ïa ka bhah thungkam sha ka 70% ruh? Namar ki  kin ym ïoh jingmyntoi shuh namar kin ym ïoh kam sorkar shuh.  Haba ki ong nongmihkhmat, ai ba un long uba mih khmat na ka bynta jong phi, dei ban ai lad ïa ki ban kren”, u la ong.U Bah Paul u la ong ruh ba u ai  khublei ïa u nongïalam ka KSU uba la ai jingmut ban thaw da ka Expert Committee,  namar ngi donkam ïa ki stad (expert) ki ba  la  tbit  ha baroh ki liang ban pynbeit ïa kane ka mat. Ha ba ong ki Expert kin dei ki briew ki  ba tip ïa ka riti shynshar, ïa ka aiñ, ïa ki rule, bad kiwei kiwei hynrei ha ka jaka ki stad (expert) kin wan batai noh da ki nongñiah auto, ki  nongdie madan halor ka Reservation Policy te kam long ka ba dei”.
title: Donkam da ki Expert ban kren halor ka RP, ym ki nongñiah taksi, ki nongdie madan: Paul Lyngdoh

content: U myntri ka Sorkar Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ym da ka jingpynkhih win ïa ki paidbah ka ba lah ban pynbeit ïa kano kano ka jingeh ha ka jylla hynrei da ka bor bad ka iktiar ka ba u paidbah u la pynkup ki lah ban pynbeit ïa kano kano ka jingeh.Haba kren halor kane ka bynta u Bah Paul u la kdew ïa ka wei ka jingjia ka ba ïadei bad ka MUDA, da ka ba ong, “U la don teng u wei u nongïalam u ba la ïalam, ïa ki paidbah na ka bynta ban pynkylla noh ïa ki By-law ka MUDA, ban pynkhlaiñ noh ïa ki dorbar shnong ïa ka bor ba bat da ka MUDA ai noh sha ka District Council bad ka lynti ka ba u jied ka long ban ïalam ïa ki paidbah ban ïa mih, ïa mareh, ïa kawang maw ïa ki pulit, ïa  ki media, kaei ka ba mih nangta lait tang ka snam jong ki briew”.“Hynrei halor kane ka juh ka mat, nga la leit kum u EM incharge ka Building Bylaw ryngkat u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Titosstarwell Chyne ban ïakynduh ïa u Minister Incharge u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, ngi khlem rah maw khlem rah jri, ngi khlem kawang ïano ïano, ngi la ïakren ha ka jingïalang ba la long ar sien ha ka jingïadon lang u advocate general, ki la kubur ba ki don ki jaka ban donkam ban ai noh sha District Council, bad hadien kane ki la rai ban pynkylla ruh ïa Meghalaya by-laws bad ka thaw ïa ka Building Regulatory Authority, ka ba pynlong ba wat ban thaw ïa ka ïingdorbar thymmai ruh ki hap ban shim jingbit na ka District Council mynta”, u la bynrap.U la ong shuh shuh, “Na ka liang  u Myntri ka tnad  Urban Affair, u la thaw da ka thup kyrteng ki jaka ban ai pynïaid ka District Council ka ba kynthup ïa  ki 6 tylli ki jaka, ki ba ju peit da ka MUDA, bad  la ai noh sha ka Council lyngba ka iktiar kum ki nongthawaiñ, ngim shem leit ban lympat ne kyrdem ïa ka miej u myntri, hynrei da ka jingjaijai ka kam ka la urlong bad ka juh ka kam ka ba la lum paidbah haduh 2 lak ngut ha Polo khlem lah ban pynurlong ïa ka”.U Bah Paul u la ong ruh, “Haba phi long kum u nongïalam, phi dei ban  pyni ïa ka da ka jingshlur, ka sorkar u Dr Mukul Sangma,  ka la wanrah ïa ka Bill ki ba kren shaphang ki dual post ban long MLA bad MDC ha ka juh ka por, bad don uwei u ba la resign nyngkong duh tang da ki kynta hadien ba la rah ïa kane ka Bill hapoh ka ïingdorbar thawaiñ”.“Une  u hero u ba la resign nyngkong duh, katba ka dorbar kam pat kut, ka shithi iehnoh kam u MDC ka la poi ha miej u Dr Mukul Sangma, katno ngut ki ba ai burom ïa une u  MLA, MDC u ba ïakhun ïai neh bad poi shaduh High Court  ban pyrshah ïa kane ka  bill ba wanrah u Mukul Sangma bad ïoh ruh ïa ka jingjop, u la jop namar ba ka ïingbishar ka la pynskhem ba kane ka kam MDC kam dei ka ban ïoh jingmyntoi bad u ta u dei u Bah PN Syiem”, u la bynrap shuh shuh.U Bah Paul u la ong, “Ai ngin ai burom ïa ki ba dei ban ïoh burom, phi kren ïa kano ka kam kaba ngam shem la leh, la ka dei ha ka  trade laisen kaei ka ba nga la dep ban leh, ki minister ha kato ka por ki poi sha District Council  namar ba ka ktah ïa ki nongthep vote jong ki, hynrei nga ong em ïa ngi namar nga ju treikam kum ba nga la bam smai, ngan trei khlem ka jingtieng, ka jingleh shiliang, khlem ka jingmut sniew ïano ïano ruh bad ngi trei kam da ka ta, kam dei tang ban ïoh jingmyntoi ïa lade ha ka kam saiñpyrthei”.“Halor ka mat Reservation Policy, ka jingshah kynthoh jong nga, marwei ka long  namar ba ka thaiñ motphran ba kadei ka jaka ba ju don ka jingïakhih na ki lai tylli Constituency kata ka Mawkhar-Jaiaw, Mawlai bad Mawprem, ïa  ka Mawkhar bad  Mawlai ka VPP ka la jop bad ka bym lah ban jop ka dei Mawprem kumta ki kynthoh ïa kane namar kim lah ban ïoh jingjop na kane ka thaiñ”, u la bynrap shuh shuh.U Bah Paul u la kdew shuh shuh, “Kan kham eh ban kren bad ban leh eiei na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew nangne na Mawpren ban na Nongkrem, na Nongkren phi lah ban kren kop katno katno ruh kam don jingthud, hynrei lada phi kren tang na ka bynta ka trading laisen, na kine ki thaiñ,  ki la thud lut ki nongthep vote hynrei nga khlem kynran dien bad nga la leh ïa kata ruh hynrei haba phi kren tang na Nongkrem, kyrhuh katba mon kan leh aïu haba hato don ki Khasi suda”.“Ki briew ki ba wan ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah hangne, kumno kin pyrshah ha ba u kyrtong jong ki u long basaw ha ka election, ha ba phi long basaw ha ka election pdiang ïa kata bad ki paidbah ki la jied ïa u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ym  ba u thung hi ïa lade da lade, hynrei ki wanrah placard hangne ki la dei ban rah bad ap haduh 2028 keiñ ynda ki la pynjop u Prah”, u la ong.U la bynrap shuh shuh, “Ka jingieid jaitbynriew, kam dei ka nongkynti jongno jongno ruh bad don bun ki briew,  kim ju kren kim ku pynpaw ba ki ieid jaitbynriew hynrei ki leh bun ki kam na ka bynta ka jaitbynriew, ki wad jingtip bniah halor ka jaitbynriew  Khasi, ki pynlut ka spah ka phew ban thoh ban lum ban lang kita, ki dang kham ieit jaitbynriew bun maki”.“Nga ju soi bun ki file, na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi ïa ka jaitbynriew bad ïa ka jylla jong ngi, hynrei ngam ju kwah ban kiew sha tnum ka secretariat ban pynbna paidbah ba nga la dep leh ïa kane ka kam, namar kam dei kumta  hynrei ha ka kam paidbah ngin trei kum ki rangbah, ki ba la dep ban ai ïa ngi, ka jingkitkhlieh”, u la ong shuh shuh.
title: Ban kren ieit jaitbynriew ka khamsuk na Nongkrem ban na Mawprem : Paul Lyngdoh

content: U Myntri ka Tnad Food, Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Bah Comingone Ymbon ula kyntu ïa ki Ophisar ban shimkhia halor ka jingpyndonkam ïa ki electronic Point-of-Sale (e-POS) machine da ki Fair Price Shop khnang ba baroh ki nongïoh marbam kin ïoh ïala ka bhah kumba dei hok ban ïoh. U la kyntu ruh ba dei ban pynthikna ruh ïa ka jingpynrung kyrteng Aadhaar ba 100 na ka 100 khnang ba kan nym don ka jingkhate ïa ka bhah ba ki nongïoh kidei ban ïoh.Ha kane ka jingïalang la shim bynta lang da u Commissioner & Secretary ba dei peit ïa ka tnad Consumer Affairs ki heh ophisar kumjuh ki DC bad ki SDO.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Comingone u la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ka tnad halor ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka Online Tracking ba ïadei bad ka jingïaid ki marbam mardih na ki kudam sha ki FPS na East Khasi Hills namar kane kan ïarap ban tehlakam ïa ka jingphah ïa ki marbam sha kiwei pat ki jaka.U Bah Coming ula pynlong ïa ka jingïalang bishar kam ban peit ïa ka jingtreikam jong ki kam bapher bapher kum ka One Nation One Ration Card (ONORC), Aadhaar Seeding, electronic Point-of-Sale (e-POS), ka jinglum thup ïa baroh ki FPS GPS Coordinates bad ka jingpeit bniah ïaka jingïaid ki kali kiba kit ïa u khaw rashon ha kylleng ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya bad kiwei kiwei.Lah ban kdew ba ka One Nation One Ration Card ka dei kaba la pyntreikam ha ka jylla kum shi bynta ban plie lad ïa ki paidbah ba kin kit ïa u khaw rashon na kino kino ki dukan rashon kiba don ha ka jylla bad haka ri hi baroh kawei kata tang lada u Aadhaar nombar jong ki u dei uba la pynïasoh lang bad ka database jong ka PDS.Ban pynthikna ba kan don ka khuid ka suba bad ka jingkhein jingdiah kaba paka, kumta la buh ïaki electronic Point-of-Sale ha man la ki dukan sam rashon kiba don haka jylla.
title: Kyntu u Myntri ban pynthikna ka jingpyndonkam e-POS ha ki Fair Price Shop

content: Ka seng Voice of the People Party (VPP) ka la ai jingpynshai ba ka mat ba la shim da ka seng halor ka Reservation Policy kam dei ka jingpyn ïapher jaitbynriew bad kam don ei ei ban pyrshah ïa kano kano ka jaitbynriew.U nongaiktien ka seng VPP, u Bah Batskhem Myrboh u la ong ba ka mat ba la shim da ka seng halor ka jingpynshong hok da kaba bud ïa ki kyndon jong ka policy kam don ei ei haba ïadei bad ka jingsngew pher jaitbynriew bad ka jingleh pyrshah ïano ïano. Ka VPP ka dei ka seng saiñ pyrthei na bynta jong baroh ki ba shong basah ha ka jylla Meghalaya kaba kham ban jur haba ïadei bad ka hok jong ki paid riewlum.U Bah Batskhem u la ïathuh ba ka seng ka pynpaw ka jingsngew khia ba ka bhah thungkam thungjam lane ka Job Reservation Policy jong u snem 1972 ka la pynmih ka jingsngew lyngnga ha ki jingmut jingpyrkhat jong ki dkhot ki ar jait bynriew na Rilum kata ki jaitbynriew Khasi bad Garo.U nongaiktien ka VPP u la ong ba hadien ka jingpyntreikam ïa ka roster system, khlem ka jingkhmih lane bishar biang ïa ka policy kan sa wanrah ka jingbym biang tarajur ha ka jingithuh ha ki kam sorkar kaba lah ban ïai bteng pateng la pateng.Katkum ka jingong jong u Bah Batskhem, la slem bah la dei ban pynthymmai ïa ka policy khnang ban pynthikna ba ki kyndon ba la buh kin shong hok hapdeng ki ar jaitbynriew hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ki seng saiñ pyrthei tang na bynta ka jingmyntoi ha ka synshar khaddar ki kyntait ban shim ïa ka jingbah khlieh ban tyrwa ïaka jingdonkam ban khmih ïa ka reservation policy.U Bah Batskhem u la ong ba ka jingpynkhih jong ka seng VPP ban khmih biang ïa ka policy kam shah shiliang ïa kano kano ka jaitbynriew pyrshah ïa kiwei pat, hynrei ka long tang ban pynthikna ba dei ban don ka jingpynshong hok haba ïadei bad kane. Kumta, u la ong , “Ai ba ka mynsiem jong ka jinglong kawei bad ka jinglong shipara kan ïai neh mynta haduh hadien habud ryngkat ka jingshimkhia na baroh ar jaitbynriew,” la ong u nongaiktien ka VPP.“Ka VPP ka pyrshah ïa ka jingsdang treikam jong ka jingshah ñion jong kawei ka jaitbynriew halor jong kawei pat. Ki Khasi bad ki Garo ki ba dei ki trai Riewlum jong ka jylla ki la ïatreilang na bynta ban ïoh la ka jong ka jylla ha ka jingïaleh pyrshah ïa  ka Assam”, la ong u Bah Batskhem.
title: Tang na bynta ka jingmyntoi ha ka saiñ pyrthei, ki kyntait ban khmih ïa ka Reservation: Batskhem

content: U Myntri ka sorkar jylla, u Bah Kyrmen Shylla, ha ka 5 tarik Jylliew u la ong ba ki paidbah ha Jaiñtia kim lah ban im lada ka sorkar ka khang dam ïa ka jingtih dewïong.“Kane ka jingtih dewïong thymmai kan ïarap ïa ki paidbah ha Jaiñtia Hills bad ïa kito kiba shaniah ha u dewïong, hynrei haba kren halor ki kam beaiñ kum ka jingtih dewïong beaiñ lane jingshalan beaiñ, ngam don eiei ban ong hynrei nga kyrmen ba ka tnad kaba dei ïa kane ka bynta kan ïai peit pyrman”, la ong u Bah Kyrmen.Haba kylli la kane ka buit tih dewïong thymmai mynta kan khanglad ïa ka jingtih bad shalan dewïong beaiñ, u la ong ba ka aiñ ka don ïa baroh, pynban kane kam lah ban khang ïa ki briew na kab a leh ïa kine kino ki kam kiba long beaiñ.“Ha u dewïong, ki lah ban don katto katne ki bynta ba ki briew kim lah ban bud, lada ki buh ka aiñ ha ka jaka ba ki briew kim lah ban bud, kam dei ban long kaba pyrkhing haduh katta katta khnang ba kin nym ïap, ki briew ki pynkhein ïa ka aiñ namar ba don ki daw. Hynrei ngam pynshlur ïa kane, lada phi don jingeh, ki lah ban ai ka jingai jingmut”, u la ong.Shuh shuh une u myntri sorkar u la ong ruh ba ki paidbah ha Jaiñtia Hills ki don ka jingngeit kaba skhem ba ha kane ka jingtyrwa ba thymmai bad ba kin nym ailad ïa ki briew ban pynkheiñ ïa ka aiñ.
title: Ki paidbah na Jaiñtia kim lah ban im lada sangeh tih dewïong: Kyrmen Shylla

content: U Bah T.Lyngwa IAS Deputy Comissioner South West Khasi Hills District ha ba kren kum u kongsan haka sngi rakhe kyrpang jong ka World Environment Day ha Mawkyrwat u la ong ba ha baroh shi tyllup ka pyrthei kumba 40 Million ton la pynmih plastic ha manla u snem bad lada ki briew kim bang ban pyndonkam ïaki tang ha dien 40 snem ki plastic kin sa dap lut ha ki wah, ki khlaw ki shnong wat hapoh ki kamra iing jong ngi ki briew. Namarkata u la kyntu ïa ki paidbah nongpyndonkam ïa ki kynja plastic ba kim dei ban bret pathar ïa ki  ba kin nang ban pyndonkam ïa ki da kaba sait khuid biang ïa kita ki plastic ban pyndonkam da ki juh haba ki leit siew sha iew da kane ka lynti ngi lah ban pynduna ïaka jingbun ki plastic. Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kane ka jingrakhe don burom ïa kane ka sngi ka 5tarik Jylliew kaba la tip baroh shi tyllup ka pyrthei kum ka World Environment Day ka long ruh ka bynta ban ai jinghikai ïa ki khynnah ban kynmaw pateng la pateng ba ngi dei ban burom ïa ka mariang kaba ma ngi ngi im lyngba jongka.U Bah G.D. Kharwanlang SP jong ka Mawkyrwat u la ong ba ka kamram jong ngi ki briew ymdei tang ban thung ïa ki dieng hynrei kaba kongsan ngi dei ban sumar ïa ki. U la ong ruh ba ha ki 50 snem ki ban sawan lada ki briew kim ñiewkor ïa ki khlaw ki btap bad ruh ïa ki wahduid kan sa poi ka por kaba ka thma kaba kham khraw ka dei ka jingkyrduh um, ha kaba ki briew ha kane ka sla pyrthei tang na ka bynta ka jingkyrduh um kan sa long ka thma bah. Namarkata ha shwa ban poi kata ka por ka mynta kaba donkam tam ba ngin burom da kaba tyngkai ïa ka mei mariang.Ha kane ka sngi kynmaw burom ïaka mariang ha Mawkyrwat la pynlong da ka ophis jong u Divisional Forest Officer  Social Forestry & Territorial Division  South West Khasi Hills District ha ryngkat daka jingïatrei lang bad ka ophis jong ka District Admistration South West Khasi Hills District Mawkyrwat da kaba buh ruh ïa ka phang “Beat Plastic Pollution” bala pynlong ha Mini Secretariat Mawkyrwat.Ha kane ka sngi kyrpang jong ka World Environment Day naka liang ka ophis jong u Divisional Forest Officer lyngba u Dr. G.H. Chyrmang u la ioh ruh ban pyn i ïa ka phlim lyngkot ( Documentary flim) ha kaba ïa dei bad  ka juk ba mynta ba ki briew kila pynjot ïa ka mariang ha kiba bun ki bynta,da kaba ki pyndonkam ïa ka Plastic, ki jing don ki kharkhana ( Factory) ka jing pom ïaki khlaw kumjuh ruh ka jingtih ïa ki marpoh khyndew, ka jingwanrah ka jingjakhlia ki um ki wah.Lyngba kane ka phlim lyngkot ka la ioh jinghikai shibun  khamtam ïa ki khynnah skul ki rangbah kiba la wan ïa shim bynta ha kane ka sngi.Ha shwa ban leit thung dieng la ioh  ban pynlong ka jingïalang kaba lyngkot ha kaba la ioh ka jingkren na ka Kong S.Kharsahnoh DSEO, SWKHD Bah G.D. Kharwanlang Supritendent of Police Mawkyrwat bad ka jingkren na u Bah T. Lyngwa IAS Deputy Comissioner South West Khasi Hills District kum u kongsan la ïa  donlang ruh kiwei de ki ophisar sorkar ki myntri shong ki nonghikai bad ki khynnah skul na ka thaiñ Mawkyrwat.
title: Hadien 40 snem yn sa dap tang ki plastic lada ngim nang pyndonkam ïa ka

content: U nongaiktien ka Voice of the People Party (VPP), u Bah Batskhem Myrboh, u la ong ba ka VPP ka don jingtip bad ka sngewkhia ïa ki jingduna ha ki kam pynroi ha ki bynta bapher bapher jong ka jylla khamtam ha ki bynta jong ka pule puthi.Katkum ka jingsngew jong u, ka resol ba dang shu pyllait shen da ka Meghalaya Board of School Education (MBOSE) ka pynpaw ïa ka jingbym sngewtynnad bad jinghiar ha ka jinglong jingman jong ka pule puthi ha Garo Hills ha kaba ka percentage jong ki khynnah ba pass ki duna bha ha ka jylla.U la ong ba ka long kaba sngewsih ba ki sorkar naduh barim haduh ba thymmai kim shym la lah ban kyntiew ïa ka jinglong jingman ha ka pule puthi ha ka jylla baroh kawei bad kyrpang ha Garo Hills.U Bah Bahskhem u la ong ba ka jinghiar ka pule puthi ha Garo Hills ka dei na ka daw ka jingshah ieh beiñ jong ki skul sorkar.U la pynkynmaw ba ka Garo Hills ka shaniah tylli tyllon ha ka sorkar, khamtam ha ki bynta ba kham hapoh.“Hynrei kane kam mut ba ka pule puthi ha ka thaiñ Khasi-Jaiñtia ka biang. Ka long ka jingshisha ba ka pule puthi ha baroh kawei ka jylla Meghalaya ka la hiar lane kam shym la lah ban ïaid ryngkat bad ka por. Kane ka shai na ka jingbym lah ki samla pule jong ngi ban ïakhun ha ka Ri,” la ong u nongaiktien ka VPP.U la ong ba dei na kane ka daw ba ka VPP kumba la kdew ha ka mat treikam jong ka ha ka elekshon sha Ïingdorbar thawaiñ 2023 ka la skhem ban pynbha ïa ka jinglong ha ka pule puthi ha ka jylla ban tei ïa ka jinglah ki samla ban ïakhun ha ka Ri hi baroh kawei.U la ong ruh ba ki nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya ki dei kiba la shah ktah ha ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei kiba bamsap kiba ka jingbamsap jong ki ka saphriang ha baroh ki bynta bad ha baroh ki kyrdan ha ka sorkar.U Marboh u la ong ruh ba ki dkhot jong ka political class ha ki saiñ pyrthei bapher bapher ki long kiba don kti ha ka jingduk ha ka roi ka par.“Kaba sngewsih ka long ba kiba duk bad kiba shah ban beiñ jong ka jylla ki hap ban siew ïa ka dor jong ka jingbamsap, kam pher la ki dei na kano kano ka jaitbynriew. Ka jylla ka la sakhi ïa ka jingroi ki nongsaiñ pyrthei kiba riewspah haduh katta katta hynrei ka jylla bad ki paidbah ki duk. Ka jylla Meghalaya ka la ju long ka jylla kaba wan shadien ha ka Ri India. Wat ka High Court jong ka Meghalaya ka la ju kren na ka por sha ka por halor ka jingbamsap jong ki political class,” u la ong.Ka VPP ka ong ba ki jingthmu jong ka seng ka long ban ai ka synshar khaddar kaba skhem kaba hapoh ka jingïalam ki nongmihkhmat ki ba biang kin kyntiew ïa ka jylla baieid shakliar na bynta ka lawei ba bha jong uwei pa uwei u briew ka jylla.U Bah Batskhem u la wer ïa ki paidbah ka Garo Hills ban ïasnoh kti lang bad ka seng VPP ha ka jingpyrshang ban wanrah jingkylla ha ka saiñ pyrthei jong ka jylla Meghalaya ha kaba ki nongïalam saiñ pyrthei kin don ka jingkitkhlieh ïa ki paidbah bad kin trei da ka hok na bynta ka bha ka miat jong ki riew paidbah.
title: Sngewkhia ka VPP ïa ki jingduna ha ki kam pynroi ha ka jylla khamtam ha ka pule puthi

content: Ka kynhun Muaythai Association of Meghalaya (MTAM) ka la lah ban wanrah burom ïa ka jylla da ka jingïoh ïa ki takma bapher bapher na ka jingwan ban ïashim bynta na ka UMAI National Championship kaba la dep ban pynlong ha ka SKR Engineering College Nazathpettal Chennai naduh ka 26 haduh ka 30 tarik Jymmang 2023.Kane ka kynhun ïalehkai na ka jylla kaba la ïashim bynta ha ki thup bapher bapher kum ha ka  sub Juniors, Juniors, Seniors mens bad women, ELITE ki la khur haduh 49 tylli ki takma na katei ka lympung.Ïa kitei ki nongjop kiba ïoh ban khur ïa ki takma ksiar na katei ka championship naduh ki sub Juniors,Juniors kin ïoh ïoh ïa ka kabu ban leit ban mih khmat na ka UMAI, India sha ka Youth IFMA Muaythai world championship ka ban sa long ha Ri Turkey ka ban sdang naduh ka 29 tarik Naitung haduh ka 7 tarik Risaw 2023.Ki nongïalehkai na ka jylla kiba la la khur takma ki kynthup ïa u Andy Taro u la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka 45kg 14-15 snem,  ka Monica Nongrum ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka 67 KG palat-24-40 snem, ka Ineshabahun Dkhar ka la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka 48 kg Palat 24-40 snem, u Banrilang Ingty u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka 54 Kg Pynkhrawbor Shylla u la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -45 kg U-23 snem, ka Alfonsa Zinia Wriang ka la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -35 kg 14-15 snem, u Edilbert ïaraplang ryndongsngi u la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -85 palat 23-40 snem, u Ujal R Marak u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -57 kg U-23 snem, u Daniewkor Mynsong u la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka -42kg 14-15snem, u Pynnehbor Mylliemngap snem, u Shailesstar Mylliem u la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -54 kg hapoh 23 snem, ka Naphilawanbet Nongspung ka la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -48 kg 14-15 snem, u Nehbor Mawthoh u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -45 kg hapoh 23 snem, u Teiboklang Marbaniang u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -51kg 14 -15 snem, ka Calfari Warkhyllew ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -51 kg hapoh 23 snem, u Brockstar Papang h la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -75 kg hapoh 23 snem, u Rohan Ram Rajak u la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -54 kg palat 23-40snem, ka Tiewlili mukhim ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -54kg 16-17snem, ka Jenifer Mukhim ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka -54kg 16-17snem, ka Evakordor R Nongrum ka la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -45kg 14-15snem, ka Annette netanya carla suiam ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -34kg 10-11snem, ka Maya sweety Marboh ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -48kg 16-17snem, u Barkis Nongkhlaw u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -51kg 14-15snem, ka Dority umsong ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -42kg 12-13snem, ka Na I sha kshiar ka la khur ïa ka takma rupa ha ka -38kg 13-14snem, u Arbabet L nongbri ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -54kg 13-14snem, 14-15 snem, u Blansing Kurbah u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -60 kg palat 23-40 snem, Comford L Mawlong u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -60 Kg Hapoh 23 snem, Wadborlang Marwein u la khur ïa ka
