Rufolf Lyngdoh u la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka -37 kg 11-12 snem.Katba ki nongïalehkai kiba la khur takma ha ka jingïalehkai Waikhru ki long ka Mary Christine Wriang ka la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka thup jong kiba la 16 snem, Anita Rai ka la khur ïa ka takma rnong ha ka thup 19 snem, ka Alphonsa Zinia Wriang ka la khur ïa ka takm rupa ha ka thup 15 snem, bad u Arnold Kharbyngar u la khur ïa ka takma ksiar ha ka thup jong ki khynnah kiba hapoh 13 snem.
title: 49 tylli ki takma Wanrah burom ka MTAM ha ka jingïashim bynta ha UMAI National Championship

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, ha ka 7 tarik Jylliew, u la ong ba kum shibynta ban kiar na ka jingduhnong ki khun samla ki ba wad kam wad jam ha ka jylla, ka sorkar ka la shim ïa ka rai ban bteng ïa ka jingthungkam hadien ba la pynkylla thymmai ïa ka Office Memorandum (OM) 2022 halor ka Reservation Roster,  katba ka jingbishar ïa ka Reservation Policy kan dang ïaid shakhmat.Ha ba kren sha ki ladpathai khubor, halor ka Expert Committee, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma  u la ïathuh, ba ha ka jingïalang jong ki kynhun myntri, la ai ka jingmynjur ban thung ïa u Chief Secretary bad uwei u dkhot na ka tnad Aiñ bad uwei u dkhot na ka tnad Personnel na ka bynta ka Search Committee, kane ka Committee ka long ban wad ïa ki experts  ki ban long ki dkhot jong ka Expert Committee ka ban pynbeit ïa ka Reservation Policy.“La ai jingmut ruh ba ha kane ka Expert Committee, dei ban kynthup ïa ki san ngut ki dkhot ki ba la tbit ha la ka jong ka kyrdan katkum ba la pynmih ha ka notification bad na ka liang ka sorkar ka la bthah ïa ka Search Committee ban kan pynkloi halor kane ka bynta ban jied ïa ki kyrteng jong ki briew ban long ki dkhot ka Expert Committee”, u la ong.Haba kylli halor ka jingdawa ban thung ïa ki dkhot ka Expert Committee da ki briew na ka jylla u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong, “Halor kane ka jingdawa ka Search Committee kan sa bishar”.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh ba ha ka jingïalang la pdiang ruh ïa ka jingpynkylla thymmai ïa ka Office Memorandum (om) 2022, halor ka reservation roster, katkum ka jingai jingmut na ka All Party Committee bad kane ka jingpynkylla yn pyndep noh ha ki ar sngi bad hadien kane ka jingpynkylla yn sa sdang noh ïa ka jingthungkam hapoh ka jylla.Haba kylli halor u snem ba kin pyntrei kam ïa ka roster u Myntri Rangbah u la ong “Halor u snem nga la ong da ka ba shai naduh nyngkong, ba ka roster ka dei ka  process ka ba hap ban bteng, kaba la sdang naduh u snem 1972, bad ka dei ka ban hap ban bteng ïa kane hynrei ha kine ki snem ba la dep ki don ki post ki ba la pyndap katkum ka jinglong jingman bad ki jaitbynriew (Khasi-Garo) ha ka jylla hynrei la ka long kumno kumno ruh  ïa kine ki post la ju pyndap”.“Hynrei ka jingdonkam ban pynbeit katkum ka Roster, ka long ban ïoh jingtip ïa ki jingkheiñ ba ngi don haei mynta? Bad kane ka jingkheiñ roster  kan ai jingtip ba ngin sdang ban pyntreikam biang naei ïa kane; kumta ka jingpynbna kan sa mih na kata ka serial number bad kane ka jingthmu ban bishar naduh u snem 1972, haba don ki jingtip ngin sdang nangta bad lada ym don ngin sdang naduh nyngkong”, u la bynrap.U Conrad u la ong shuh shuh “Hadien ba la dep ban pynbiang ïa ka roster ka jingthungkam kan sdang noh, namar ïa ka jingthungkam ym lah ban pynsangeh; lada pynsangeh shwa ïa ka jingthungkam mynta, bun na ki samla ki ba wad kam bad ki ba la apply kam mynta kin shem jingeh namar ka snem kan ym ïahap shuh katba nang ïaid ki sngi; bad kan long ka jingduh nong ïa ki kumta ka jingleh ka sorkar ka long ban pynthikna ba ki khun samla kin ïoh ïa ki kam ki jam”.Haba kylli halor ka jingdawa ban pynsangeh shwa ïa ka jingthungkam katba ym pat lah ban pynbeit ïa ka reservation policy, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong, “Ka jingthungkam kan sdang noh tang shu dep ban pynkylla thymmai ïa ka office memorandum katba ka jingbishar ïa ka reservation policy ruh kan dang ïaid sha khmat”.Haba kylli halor kane ka jingai jingmut ban pynkylla thymmai ïa ka OM, u la ong “Kan don ka jingpynrung ïa ki katto katne ki jingpynbha bad ngin sa pyntip halor kine ki jingkylla lashai lane la shisngi, hynrei kane ka jingai jingmut ka dei ka ba la ai sha ka All Party Committee ka ba dang shu dep ka jingïalang”.
title: Yn sdang ka jingthungkam hadien ba la dep pynkylla thymmai ïa ka OM: Conrad Sangma

content: Ka jingïalehkai kaba khatduh na ka bynta ka group ha ka Lympung ïalehkai kynjatbol jong ka Meghalaya State League (MSL) kala poi ha kaba kut noh mynta ka sngi ka 6 tarik u Jylliew 2023 ha kaba ka Shillong Lajong FC kala ïoh rung da kaba suk sha ka Semi Final ha kaba kan sa ïoh ban ïa kynduh bad ka Rangdajied United FC ha ka 13 Tarik u jylliew 2023 ha kane hi ka juh ka  Madan MDSA Artificial Turf Mawkyrwat   South West Khasi Hills District.Ha ka jingïalehkai Mynta ka sngi ka 6 tarik u Jylliew ka Shillong Lajong FC ka la ïoh ban ïalehkai khadduh pyrshah  bad ka Riangdo YSCA, ha katei ka jingïakhun ka Shillong Lajong FC kala pynliem da 2 la 0 ïa ka Riangdo bad ïa kine ki kol jong ka Shillong Lajong FC la ïoh ban thep da u Shano Tariang bad u Santijanai Shianglong hynrei naka liang ka Riangdo YSCA watla kala pyrshang ban ïaleh bha ban ïoh pynkhih ïa ka jar hynrei haduh kaba kut ka jing ïalehkai kam shem la lah ban pynphai ïa kane ka kynhun kaba dang dei ka lahduh jong kane ka lympung haduh ban da kut ka minit ïalehkai.Haba phai ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka Meghalaya State League na ka Mawkyrwat Zone, ka Shillong Lajong kala long ka kynhun kaba la ïoh khur bun ki poiñ ha kaba la ïoh haduh 13 point bad ka kynhun ïalehkai ka ba wan ha ka kyrdan kaba ar ka dei ka Seven United SC kala ïoh 9 poiñ  ka ba dei ka kynhun kaba napoh Mairang Eastern West Khasi Hills District.Namar kata ha kane ka jing ïalehkai ba khatduh mynta ka sngi ka 6 tarik u Jylliew hapdeng ka Shillong Lajong FC pyrshah ïa ka Riangdo YSCA ka Shillong Lajong FC kala long lypa ka nongjop ha kaba kala ïoh ban khur bun tam ki poiñ namar ba ka Riangdo YSCA naduh ba sdang haduh ba kut ki jingïalehkai ka dang ïoh tang 6 poiñ ha kane ka MSL kaba la long ka Mawkyrwat Zone mynta u snem.Ïa ka jingïalehkai semi phainal yn sa pynïalehkai ha ka rukom home bad away basis, ka ban sdang naduh ka 10 tarik Jylliew, bad ka second leg jong kane ka lympung ïalehkai kan sdang naduh ka 13 tarik Jylliew. Bad ïa ka jingïalehkai phainal jong kane ka lympung yn sa pynïalehkai hapoh ka madan First Ground, Polo, ha Shillong ha ka 17 tarik Jylliew 2023.Lah ban kdew hangne ba tang ka Mawlai bad ka Lajong kiba dei ki kynhun kiba la kham ïalehkai bha mynta ka aiom, kata na ka jingïoh jingjop na baroh 5 sien ba ki la dep ïakhun ha ka group. Lah ban ong ruh ba ka jingïakhun semi phainal mynta u snem kan long ka jingïakhun kaba phylla bad kham itynnad ban ïa kane ka samoi ba lah dep namar ka jingdon jong ka Mawlai kaba dei ka lahduh jong ka lympung Shillong Premier League (SPL) kaba dei ruh ka kynhun kaba la ïoh ban ïalehkai ha ka sien ba nyngkong ha kane ka lympung bad kawei pat ka jingitynnad ha kane ka jingïakhun semi phainal ka long lyngba ka jingdon jong ka Khliehmawlieh, ka kynhun kaba tbit tam na ka thaiñ West Khasi Hills Distrct.
title: Pynkut ka Lajong ïa ka jingïakhun ha ka Group da ka jingjop da 2-1

content: U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Conrad K Sangma, u la ïathuh ba ka sorkar jylla ka hap ban pynlut ym duna ïa ka T. 600 klur na ka State revenue ha ka shisnem, na ka bynta ban pynbiang pynbit ïa ka tnad bording ka ba kynthup ruh ban thied ïa ka bording elektrik na kiwei ki jylla.Haba kren halor ka ka tnad bording ha ka jylla, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong “Ka Umïam ka la poi haduh u pud ban hap khang noh ka jingpynmih ïa ka bording elektrik, namar ka jingbym hap  u slap, une u  dei u bnai u ba jynjar bha ïa ka jylla namar kam ïoh ïa u slap na ka bynta ban pynmih bording, hynrei kumba ka long mynta ym tang ka jylla Meghalaya hynrei kiwei kiwei ki jylla ruh ki mad ka juh ka jingeh na ka jingbym don slap”.“Lada nga kdew ïa ka jingwad lad ka sorkar ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh, ka sorkar mynta la 2 snem, ka pynlut ym duna ïa ka T. 600 klur na ka state revenue, na ka bynta ban siew ïa ki jinglut jingsep bapher bapher ha ka tnad bording, ka ba kynthup ruh ïa ka jingthied ïa ka bording elektrik bad ban pyndap ïa ka bording kumba ka long mynta”, u la ong.“Ngi ju thied ïa ka bording elektrik, T. 3 klur man ka sngi, haduh mynta bad lada kane kan dang bteng sa 100 sngi ngin hap ban pynlut haduh T.300 klur tang ban thied bording kat ban lah ban pynneh kumba ka long mynta, ha ryngkat ka jingpynlip bording katkum ka kynta ba la buh”, u la bynrap.U la ong shuh shuh ba “kane ka jingthied bording ka long ban pyndap bad pynthikna ban ym pynjlan ïa ka jingshah pynlip bording ha ka jylla bad kum ka sorkar ka khlem shong kli kti, hynrei ka treishitom ban pynthikna ba kan neh kumne kumba ka long mynta”.“Ngi donkam ïa u slap ban ïoh ban pynmih bording eklektrik hynrei ka sorkar kan dang pyrshang ban wad ruh ïa kiwei pat ki lad ban long ka jingïarap ka ban neh shirta bad ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh”, u la bynrap.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong, “Kawei ka lad ka ba ka sorkar ka la pyrshang mynta ka long ka jingsdang ïa ka Solar Mission, kane ka dei ka  sienjam ka ba, wat la ka long ka ba dang hap ban shim por hynrei nga kyrmen ba ha ki 2-3 snem ban wan ngin lah ban ïoh jingmyntoi na ka bor sngi”.U myntri rangbah u la pynpaw ruh ïa ka jingkyrmen ban lah ban pynmih bording  electrick na ka Thermal Producing Plan, da ka ba ong, “Hadien ba ngi la ïoh ïa ki laisen ban tih dewïong  ngi kyrmen ban ïoh ban sdang noh ïa ki Thermal Plan ruh bad kane kan long ka sienjam kaba lah ban neh shrita bad ka ba lah ban pynurlong noh ha ki 3-4 snem ban wan”.“Ka sorkar ka dang shim ïa ki sienjam ki ba donkam ban weng ïa kane ka jingeh bad ha kine ki bnai ba la dep haduh mynta ka jinglong jingman ka long ka ba jynjar bad ka dei ruh ka por ka ba ka MeECL ka mad ïa ka jingeh ka ba khraw namar ki ba bun ki daw”, u la ong.U la kdew ruh, “Kawei ka jingeh ka long halor ka jingbuh dor hi na ka Central Electricity Regulatory Commission (CERC), bad  ngim don ka bor ban buh dor ïa ka bording eklektrik bad ka Regulatory Commission, ka buh ïa ka dor ka ba ki ba pyndonkam bording ka ba pynlong ba kiba pyndonkam bording eklektrik ha ïing ki sem ki hap ban siew khambun ban ïa kiba pyndonkam bording eklektrik ha ki karkhana”.U Myntri Rangbah u la ïathuh ruh, “Na ka liang ka sorkar ka la kyrpad sha ka CERC, ba ki kharkhana ki dei ban siew kham bun ban ïa ki ba pyndonkam bording ha ïing, hynrei ngim shem la ïoh kano kano ka jingpyntip na ka Commission, hynrei ka sorkar ka dang ïakren halor kane ka bynta, bad ngin pyrshang ban pynbeit ïa kane ka bynta bad kine ki jingeh hap ban pynbeit lada kwah ban don ka jingkiew ka ba neh ha ka MeECL”.“Nalor katne ngi don ruh ki jingduhnong ha ka AT&C hynrei ha kine ki snem mynat kane ka la kham duna hynrei  dang donkam shibun ban pynbha dei na ka ne ka daw ba ka skim Revamped Distribution Sector Scheme ( RDSS) la pyntreikam mynta, ban pynthikna ban don u meter u ba biang, ban pynduna ïa ka jingduhnong bad ngin hap ban pynbha shuh shuh ïa ki jaka pynmih bording eklektrik, bad ban dang wad ïa kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti ha ka ba ïadei bad ka jingpynmih bording eklektrik ha ka jylla”, u la ong.Haba kylli halor ka jingkynnoh u Myntri Rangbah barim ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma halor ka jingmad jingeh ka jylla ha ka ba ïadei bad ka bording eklektrik, u Conrad u la ong, “Ki don bun ki project ki ba la soi ha kato ka por, hynrei ym ba ngi la pynduh pyndam ïa kine ki project khlem bishar hynrei ngi la buh da ka Committee ban bishar shwa ban pynduh pyndam ïa kine ki project, bad hadien ba la bishar la shem ba kine ki project ki ba la sdang ki bun ki jingduna ki ba lada ngi ïaid shakhmat kin buh ïa ka jylla ha ka jingeh bakhraw kumta ngi pynduh pyndam noh”.“Ha ka ba ïadei bad ka jingshna ïa ki jaka ban pynmih bording,  ngin hap bud ïa ki kyndon, hynrei ki khlem bud ïa kita bad ka long ka ba bakla ban shu ïa kynnoh uwei ïa uwei, bad lada nga kwah ban shu kdew kti beit ki bun kiei kiei ki ba nga lah ban kdew hynrei kane kan ym lah ban ïarap ïa ka jylla na kane ka jingeh”, u la bynrap.
title: Bym don slap hap khang noh ka jingpynmih bording na Umiam: Conrad Sangma

content: Ka kynhun Meghalaya State Volleyball Association (MSVA) ha ka jingïalam jong u Bah Sanbor Shullai, MLA jong ka South Shillong, Bah P.T Passah, Working President, Bah KV Kharlyngdoh, Vice President, Bah Gilbert Laloo, Asst Secretary, MSVA bad kiwei ki dkhot ki la leit ban ïakynduh ïa u Bah John F. Kharshiing Working President MSOA ha ka 5 tarik Jylliew 2023 por 3baje janmiet hapoh office treikam MSOA, JN Stadium, Polo Grounds ban ïa kren halor ka jingai jingithuh (Affiliation) na ka liang ka MSOA ïa ka MSVA khnang ba ka Meghalaya State Volleyball Association kan ïoh ban pynïaid ïa ki kam shakhmat namar ba ka Volleyball ka long kawei na ki jingïalehkai ka ban  pynlong ha ka 5th Meghalaya Games ka ban long mynta u snem 2023.Na ka liang jong ki nongïalam ka MSVA ki la dep ban ïakynduh ruh ïa u Bah Finely L Pariat, General Secretary, MSOA ha kane ka taiew ba lah dep ban ïatai halor kane ka phang.  Na ka liang u Working President MSOA u la pynshai ba u General Secretary, MSOA, u la pyntip ba ynda ka kynhun MSVA ki la lah ban pynbiang lut ïa ki kot baroh, ka office MSOA kin sa leh ïa kaba donkam.Ha katei ka jingïakren, la don lang u Bah PB War Nongbri, Asst Director, DSYA bad kiwei. La ïakren ruh  kumno ka long kaba donkam ban ïoh ïa ka Volleyball Association kaba khlaiñ hapoh ka jylla namar kumba ka paw, ki don bun ngut ki nongïashim bynta ha kane ka jait jingïalehkai.
title: Ïakynduh ki nongïalam MSVA ïa u President ka MSOA ban ïoh jingithuh ïa ka jingïalehkai Volleybal

content: Ka KSU Seng kmie ka lah ïoh ban pynkup burom ïa ki nong ïalehkai ïakhun kti (arm wrestling) kiba la leit ïakhunkti sha ka lympung 45th National Arm Wrestling Championship ha kaba la lam khmat da ka ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association. Ïa kane ka program la pynlong ha ka 5 tarik u Jylliew 2023.Ïa katei ka lympung ïakhun kti ba la dep ban pynlong naduh ka 22 Tarik u Jymmang haduh ka 26 Tarik U Jymmang 2023 la pynïaid da ka JK Arm wrestling Association. Na katei ka jingleit ïashim bynta sha katei ka lympung kaba heh, uwei na ki samla u la la khur ïa u takma ksiar.Ha katei ka jingpynkup burom la don lang u Sports & Cultural Secretary ka KSU CEC u Samla Eric Nongkynrih, u Assistant Organising Secretary KSU CEC  u Samla Cleenstar Shabong lem bad ki dkhot ka KSU Laitumkhrah Unit bad ka KSU Nongthymmai Circle bad ïa kitei ki nongïalehkai la wan ïalam da u coach jong ki, u Samla Allan Marbaniang uba dei ruh u President ka Meghalaya Arm Wrestling Association.
title: Pynkup burom ka KSU ïa ki Samla Ïakhun kti kiba la wan ïashim bynta ha 45 National Arm wrestling

content: Ka tnat sports bad youth affairs ka sorkar jylla ka ai ka jingkitbok kit rwiang ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai Table tennis, Judo bad ka kynhun ïalehkai phutbol jong ka jylla kiba leit ban ïa shim bynta sha ka lympung ïalehkai ba la tip kum ka 66th National School games ka ban long ha Bhopal, Madhya Pradesh  ka ban sdang naduh ka 8 tarik haduh ka 12 tarik u bnai Jylliew 2023.Ha kane ka sngi u Bah P. B War Nongbri u la long kum u kongsan, ha kaba u la ai ka jingkitbok kitrwiang, kyntien kyrkhu kyrdoh bad ki jingaimynsiem ïa ki khynnah ba kin ïalehkai bha bad ban ïakhun tyngeh ban wanrah nam bad burom ïa ka jylla.Haduh mynta phra tylli ki kynhun ïalehkai na ki jait jingïalehkai bapher bapher kiba lah mih ban leit ïakhun sha kane ka lympung ïalehkai jong ka 66 National School games kiba kynthup ïa ka Table tennis, Judo, football, Basketball, badminton, Athletics, boxing bad ka Shooting.
title: Da ka program ban kitbok kitrwiang pynlong ka tnat ïalehkai na ka bynta ki khynnah

content: Ka Tramline Badminton Academy ka ai ka jingkitbok kit rwiang, ki kyntien ai mynsiem ïa ka kynhun ïalehkai Badminton jong ka jylla, kynthup ïa u Manager u Bah Kiefer W Shullai, ka Kong Eranecles Syiem kaba dei ka coach kiba leit ïa shim bynta ha ka jingïalehkai Badminton sha ka 66 National School games.Ïa ka lympung ïalehkai 66 National School games yn sa pynlong ha Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, ka ban sdang naduh ka 8 tarik haduh ka 12 tarik u bnai Jylliew 2023.Ka kynhun kaba ban leit sha katei ka lympung ki kynthup ïa u Pratham Majumdar, Mewanpyntngen Shadap, Akshit Upadhya, Aaron S Momin, Sneha Chettri, Geryma L Nongkhlaw, Ibapynhunshisha Kharbani, Shimti Lyngdoh, Netania T Tariang, ryngkat bad ka Kong Eranecles Syiem (Coach) bad u Bah Kiefer W Shullai (Manager).
title: Yn mihkhmat ka kynhun ïalehkai Badminton ka jylla sha National School games, M.P.

content: U rangïalehkai barim jong ka kynhun Junior ka India, u Ricky Shabong u la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya kadei ka jylla kaba ieit ïa ka jingïalehkai phutbol bad bun ki shim ïa kane ka jait jingïalehkai kum ka jingpynbyrngia bad ka jingsngewtynnad hynrei na ka bynta jong u, ka phutbol hi kadei ka lad aikam aijam namar shwa ba un shim ïa kane ka jingïalehkai kum ka kam u la trei ha ka jaka shoh mawria ha Laitlyngkot na ka bynta ban kyrshan ïa ka longïing jong u.U la ong lada ki khynnah ki don ïa ka sap, ym lah ban len ba ki lah beit ban rung sha kano kano ka klob shnong lane ki klob heh.Une u rangïalehkai uba la don mynta ha ka klob ATK Mohun Bagan, ka klob kaba don ha ka kyrdan ba 3 jong ka lympung Indian Super League (ISL) mynta ka aiom, u la ïaid lyngba shibun ki jingïaid lynti ha kaba u la don bynta ruh bad ka klob Indian Arrows bad Rajasthan United.Ki sap jong u Shabong ki la paw naduh ba u dang khynnah bad namar ka jingsngewthuh ba kane ka sap kaba u don kan ïarap ïa u, u la jied ban ïasoh nyngkong bad ka klob kaba na kane ka jylla, ka Royal Wahingdoh.Haba kylli kumno u sngew ïa ki jingïaid lynti kum u rangïalehkai phutbol, u la ong ba ka long ka jingmad bad ka jingïad lynti kaba bha tam ha ka jingim jong u.U Shabong u la ïoh kabu ruh ban mih madan nyngkong (khlem shah pynshong ben) na ka bynta ka kynhun ïalehkai ka India ha ka jingïakhun ha Malaysia ha kaba u la long uwei na ki rangïalehkai ‘dien ba paw jong ka kynhun.“U Cocha Bibiano u dei uwei na ki coach ba tbit haba hikai na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba dang sdang khie san” ong u Shabong.Ha ka jingïakhun tournement jong u snem 2018, ka India ka la pynliem ïa ka Vietnam ha ka jingïalehkai Group, kata shwa ba kan ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka Indonesia bad Iran na ka bynta ban ïaknieh ban ïoh rung sha ka quarter phainal ha kaba ki la ïakhun pyrshah ïa ka South Korea, ka kynhun kaba tbit na dewbah Asia.“Ka long ka jingïakhun kaba eh na ka bynta jong ngi, hynrei nga ngeit ba ka ai ka jinghikai na ka bynta jong ngi. Nga la nang shibun lyngba katei ka jingïakhun bad haba ngi wanphai sha ka lympung I-League ban ïakhun pyrshah ïa ki rangïalehkai kiba la san ka la long ka jingmyntoi. Lyngba kato ka jingïakhun nga don ïa ka jingsngewthuh ba ka la pynlong rangbah ïa nga ban ïapynibor bad ki rangïalehkai kiba la paw ha ISL lyngba ka jingïoh ban ïakynduh ïa ki”.U Shabong u don ka jingthrang ba ka kynhun ïalehkai jong ki khynnah kiba hapoh 17 snem jong ka India kin lah ban ïalehkai bha namar ki don shibun ki khynnah don sap ryngkat bad ki nongïalam ba tikna “Nga tip ba kane ka kynhun ba mynta u snem ka lah ban poi jngai namar ki don ruh shibun ki tiar kiba biang ryngkat ki khynnah kiba tbit. Nga tikna ba ki lah ban poi beit sha ka semi phainal bad ban ïoh rung sha ka U-17 World Cup na ka bynta ka India.Ka jingai jingmut jong nga na ka bynta jong ki ka long hi kajuh, bad nga tikna ba u coach (Bibiano) u lah ban ai ïa ki ïa kaei kaba u la ai ïa nga mynshwa. Leit da ka jingshlur khlem jingartatien ne ka jingtieng, ïalehkai laitluid bad lehkmen ïalade, ka don beit ka nong hadien” ong u Shabong.
title: “Ka kynhun U-17 jong ka India ka don shibun ki kabu ban thaw ïa ki khana pateng”:Ricky Shabong

content: U MLA ka Congress na Umsning konstitwensi, u Dr. Celestine Lyngdoh ha ka 6 tarik Jylliew u la buh jingkylli la ka jingdawa jong ka seng Voice of the People Party (VPP) ban khmih ïa ka Reservation Policy kan ai jingmyntoi ïa ka jaitbynriew Khasi Jaiñtia lane la kan ktah pynban ïa ki.U la kren ïa kine ha ka por ba dang ai jingkren ha ka jingïalang paidbah kaba la long ha Umsning hynnin ka sngi ban pynshai sha ki paidbah halor ka jingsngew jong u haba ïadei bad kane ka mat kaba thnem bha mynta.Haba pdiang ïa ka rai jong ka sorkar ban thung da ka komiti jong ki riewstad lane ka “Expert Committee” ban bishar bad pule sani bha shaphang ka mat Reservation Policy, u Dr. Celestine u la ong ba kane ka dei ka mat kaba donkam ban da pule jylliew bad bishar bniah bha bad ym ban shu kyntu ïa ki paidbhur ban mih paidbah bad ban shu shah thngan.Haba khot ïa ki nongïalam ka seng VPP kibym lah ban ïaishah, u nongïalam ka seng Congress u la ong ba ka jingïakhih jong ki nongïalam ka VPP ka long ban dawa khmih ïa ka bhah thungkam thungjam hynrei kat haduh mynta, kim long kiba shai haba ïadei bad ka jingdawa jong ki.“La kan ai jingmyntoi ïa ki jaitbynriew Khasi bad Jaiñtia lane la kan long pynban ka jingma ïa ki?” la buh jingkylli u Dr.CelestineShuh shuh u la bynrap ba ka jingshah thngan ba la pynlong da u president ka seng VPP, u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit ban dawa khmih ïa ka Reservation Policy ka long ka jingkhring ïa u paidbah.Hynrei kane kam don jingshai halor ka jingdawa. “Ha kano ka nongrim la pynlong ïa kane ka jingdawa?” u la kylli shuh shuh la ka jingmut ka long ba baroh lai jaitbynriew, kata ki Khasi, Jaiñtia  bad Garo kin ïakhun kyllum ha ka shatri jong 80 per cent kyllum lang kawei, ne ki kwah ba ka bhah ka dei ban kham noh liang sha ka jaitbynriew Khasi – Jaiñtia.Haba maham ïa ki paidbah, u Bah Celestine u la kylli, “Kan jia aïu pat lada kan korbar sa ka Ïing Bishar bad kan bhah noh tang 60 per cent ïa baroh lai jaitbynriew bad kaba sah 40 per cent kan leit sha ki unreserved?”“Ka Expert Committee ba la thaw da ka sorkar jylla kam lah ban ïaid lait ïa ka Mandal Commission Reports kaba ïadei bad ki Ïing Bishar High Court bad Supreme Court ha kaba ka la kdew shai ba kan ym don kano kano ka jaitbynriew ka ba lah ban ïoh 50 per cent reservation, “hynrei ha Meghalaya, ki jaitbynriew Khasi, Jaiñtia bad Garo ki ïoh 80 per cent,” u la ongU la kdew shuh shuh ruh ba shen hadien ba ka VPP ka la weng ïa ka jingïakhih, u MLA ka Rajabala konstitwensi u Dr.Azad Zaman u la pynpaw ïa ka jingdawa ba shonghok na bynta ki Unreserved ruh kumjuh.U la ong ba kane ka mat ka long kaba donkam ban phikir bha namar lada ym leh da ka jingsngewthuh bad jingpyrkhat ka lah ban wanrah ka jingbym sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki jaitbynriew bapher bapher jong ka jylla kaba phuh ba phieng.
title: Hadien u Paul, buh jingkylli sa u nongïalam ka Congress ïa ka VPP halor ka Reservation Policy

content: Ka East Khasi Hills District Badminton Association (EKHDBA) shen kan sa pynlong  biang ïa ka 7th East Khasi Hills District Badminton Championship 2023 ha ka 29 tarik Jylliew bad ka ban kut haduh ka 1 tarik Naitung 2023.Ka jingïalehkai na ka bynta kane ka lympung kan long ha ki thup bapher bapher, kata ka Senior Mens bad Womens, under-19, under-17, under 15 years bad under-13 single bad doubles na bynta ki khynnah shynrang bad kynthei.Ka seng ka pyntip ruh ba ka tarik kaba khatduh na bynta ban pynpoi ïa ki kyrteng ban ïa shim bynta kan long ha lane shuwa ka 23 tarik Jylliew 2023. Ka la pyntip ruh ba lada don kino kino ki kynhun lane ki nongïalehkai kiba thmu ban ïashim bynta bad kiba kwah ïa ka jingtip ba kham bniah ki lah ban phun ha u nombor 9856709479 (Aibor Ranee), 8787325224 (Aibanker Kharbithai), 9862908986/8259828881 (Shri Kiefer W Shullai), 7049234154 (Eranecles Syiem)
title: Yn pynlong EKHD Badminton Championship ka EKHDBA

content: Ki paidbah ka jylla mynta ki sah umdum ha kaba ïadei bad ka bam ka dih jong ki, kata hadien ba ki mih bun ki jingeh kawei hadien kawei pat bad ka jingbymthikna ïa ka bam la ka long kaba bit na ka bynta ka koit ka khiah jong ki. Kane ka kynthup naduh u khaw haduh ka doh kaba ki bam man la ka sngi. Dang khyndiat taiew la ïohi ba ka don kawei ka longïing kaba lap ïa u khaw ba la khleh dawai urea bad tang hadien la don sa ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha Assam ha kaba ki paidbah na Garo kiba shong markhap bad ka shnong ha Assam ki la mad ïa ka jingjia ba sngewsih namar ka jingbam ïa ka dohkha bad katkum ka jingkam la ong ba kane ka dohkha ka dei kaba don ïa u dawai formalin lane uta u  dawai ban pynneh pynsah ïa ka dohkha.Ym slem hadien kane, la ïohi ba ki paidbah ki la mad ruh ka jingeh sa ha kaba ïadei bad ka dohsniang hadien ba la don ka jingïap ki sniang ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka jylla namar ka jingpang African Swine Flu (ASF) bad mynta ka kynti ka don ruh sa ka jingpang jong ki masi kaba ktah ïa ka sniehdoh jong ki, kaba la tip kum ka Lumpy Skin Disease (LSD). Mynta kaba ki paidbah ki ap ka dei sa tang ka jingpynshai bad jingpynskhem ka sorkar la kine ki doh ki long kiba bit ba biang ban bam bad ka ban ym ktah ïa ka koit ka khiah jong ki.Hooid na ka liang ka sorkar naduh u Myntri ba peit ïa ka tnad ri jingri haduh ki ophisar ki la batai shai ba kane kam don jingktah bad ka long kaba biang ban bam ïa ki doh, tangba ki doh ki dei ban long na ki sniang lane masi kiba shait ba khlain ki bym shah ktah ha kane ka jingpang kaba don mynta ha ka jylla.Hynrei la ïohi ruh ïa ka jingshim sting bad ka jingbym shimkhia na ka liang ka tnad, ha kaba ïadei bad kawei ka jingpyntip shaphang ka jingkhangdam bad ka jingdon ka jingpang ASF ha ki saw tylli ki shnong ha Ri-Bhoi District.Ha kaba ïadei bad kane ka jingjia, na ka liang u myntri ka sorkar jylla, u Bah AL Hek, uba dei peit ïa ka tnad Animal Husbandry and Veterinary, u la pyntip ba u la ïohpdiang ïa ka shithi kaba naduh ka 16 tarik Jymmang, 2023 kaba pyntip ïa ki saw tylli ki shnong hapoh Ri-Bhoi District kiba don hapdeng ka jingkhangdam namar ka jingpang sniang kaba la tip kum ka African Swine Flu (ASF).Katkum ka jingïathuh u Bah Hek, kane ka shithi kadei kaba la ïoh na ka district Animal Husbandry and Veterinary officer jong ka Ri Bhoi District kaba pyntip ba ki don saw tylli ki shnong hapoh kane ka district ki la shah ktah na ka jingpang African Swine Flu (ASF), bad na ka liang u DC u la buh da ka hukum ban pynbna ba kine ki saw tylli ki shnong ki hap ha ka jingkhangdam (containment zones).“Ka dei ka shithi kaba la rim kaba nga ïoh mynta ka sngi, kaba ong ba ka dei ka kaiphod ba la ïoh na u District Animal Husbandry and Veterinary Officer, Ri-Bhoi District ba ki don katto katne ki shnong ha Ri Bhoi kiba la antad ba ki don ka jingpang ASF”, la ong u Bah Hek.“Ki saw tylli ki shnong, kata  ka Umsawriang, Madan Longlakhiat, Mawlyngkhung bad Syllei-U-Lar ki dei ki shnong ha Ri Bhoi kiba la pynbna kum ki shnong ba hap hapoh ka jingkhangdam”, la ong shuh shuh u Bah Hek haba kren bad ki nongthoh khubor.U la ong ruh ba ki la phah da ka rapid response team sha kine ki jaka ban shim ïa ki sienjam ba donkam ban khanglad ïa ka jingsaphriang jong une u khniang jingpang ha ki sniang.U Bah Hek u la kren ruh shaphang ka LSD kaba ktah ïa ki masi bad u la ong ba la lah ban tehlakam ïa kane, ha kaba u la ong ruh ba ka don ka jingpang LSD ha Pynthorumkhrah, kaba dei ka konstitwensi jong u, hynrei kane ka jingtip kaba u ïoh ka dei na ki briew kiba nabar ymdei na kiba hapoh kane ka jaka.“Ki don ki briew kiba ïathuh ïanga ymdei na Pynthorumkhrah, ba ki don katto katne tylli ki masi kiba la ïap. Haduh mynta ymdon ba pyntip sha nga napoh ka konstitwensi”, la ong shuh shuh u Bah Hek bad ong ruh ba tang shu ïoh ïa ka kaiphod un sa leit sha katei ka jaka bad ban peit halor kane.
title: Naduh 16 tarik Jymmang, dang ïohpdiang u Myntri mynta ïa ka shithi ba don ASF

content: U Myntri ka tnad Social Welfare, u bah Paul Lyngdoh, u la ïathuh ba kat kum ka kaiphot jong ka jingtohkit halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap ICDS ka long ka bym don nongrim bad kan dei kum ba la kynnoh ba ka dei ka jingbamsap.Ha ba kren sha kilad pathai khubor u Bah Paul Lyngdoh  u la ong ba, “Nga la ïoh ïa ka kaiphot jingtohkit halor ka jingkynnoh bamsap ïa u khaw bad kane ka jingshah kynnoh ka  dei ka bym don ka jingshisha”.“Kam shem la don kano kano ka jingshisha halor kane ka jingshah kynnoh bamsap, bad ïa kane la pynshisha ka kaiphot ka ba la ïoh na ka jingtohkit halor ka ne ka jingshah kynnoh bad halor kane la dep ban aiti ha ka AG jong ka jylla bad ïa kane ka case ym lah ban shim kum ka jingkynnoh bamsap,” u la bynrap.U Bah Paul u ba long u myntri ka tnad Social Welfare , u la pyntip ba ka jingpynslem ban tohkit ïa kane ka case ka long namar ba ka don ka jingbym don ka jingïatreilang bad ki pulit ka Assam , ki ba la kynnoh ba la jïa kane ka jingkynnoh bamsap.“Ha ki sngi ban wan,  ka dei ban don ka jingbuh por ïa baroh ki jingtohkit ban kin pyndep ha ka por ba biang  ,khnang ba kano kano ka party ka ba ngat ha ka jingkynnoh bamsap kin ym shah ktah hakum kine ki jingjia bym don ka jingshisha”.Lah ban kdew hangne m ba ka independent enquiry committee la thung na ka bynta ban tohkit halor kane ka jingshah kynnoh bamsap ka ba la jia ha u bnai Jylliew 2021, ha ba na ka liang ki pulit Assam ki la kam ba ki la ïoh ban kurup ïa 1 lakh tylli ki borni khaw  na ka wei ka godown riewshimer ha Kamrup district, ha kane ka por u bah Kyrmen Shylla u dang long kum u Myntri ka tnad Social Welfare.Une u  khaw u dei na ka bynta ki Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) programme jong ka  Social Welfare Department, Government of Meghalaya.
title: Ka jingshah kynnoh halor ka jingbamsap  ICDS  ka dei ka ba khlem nongrim: Paul Lyngdoh

content: Kat kum ka jingpyntip jong ka Ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court, ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC), ka la pdiang ïa ka blue print jong ka sorkar, hynrei ka kwah ba ka sorkar kan pdiang ïa ki katto katne tylli ki jingaijingmut na ka.Ha ka hukum bala pynmih da ka Ïingbishar, ka Division Bench ka Ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court,  bala khlieh da u Chief Justice Sanjib Banerjee bad Justice W Diengdoh ka la ïathuh ba ka Harijan Panchayat Committee ka la mynjur ïa ka Blueprint jong ka sorkar .“U Advocate General u la pyntip ba ka Harijan Panchayat Committee kala mynjur ïa ka blueprint ba la pynkhreh da ka Sorkar jylla hynrei kala buh ïa ki jingai jingmut ban pynkylla ïa katto katne ki bynta jong ka”.Ka Ïingkashari ka la ong ruh, “Namar ba ki dang donkam ban khmih ïa kine ki jingai jingmut ban pynkylla, kumta  ai ba kane ka kam kan wan biang sha ka jingbishar hadien lai taïew bad la  kyrmen ruh ba ki kynhun mamla kin pynbeit noh ïa kane ka kam ba sahteng bad lah ban pynkut noh shisyndon ïa kine ki kam”.Ka Iingkashari ka la buh ban shong bishar biang ïa kane ka mukotduma ha ka 3 tarik u Naitung, 2023.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ha ka 25 tarik u Ïaïong 2022, ka sorkar jylla ka la phah ïa ka blueprint ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longing jong ka jaitbynriew Harijan na ThemiewMawlong sha ka jaka jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB).Ha ka ba ïadei bad ka ne,ka Sorkar ka la rai ban pynshna da ki  ïing bun mala ha ka jaka ba heh 2.5 akar ,ha Cotton Bishop Road ka jaka ba don ka ophis Shillong Municipal Board (SMB)  katba na ka liang ka HPC ban kynriah noh ïa ki na Them Ïew Mawlong ka , ka la pan na ka sorkar 200 square meter ka jaka na ka bynta  kawei pa kawei ka longïing,  ban ai bai shna ing shaki,  ban ai jaka ïa ki hapoh ka European Ward.
title: Pdiang ka HPC ïa ka blueprint lada ka sorkar ka kloi ban pynkylla ha ki katto katne ki bynta

content: Ka ophis treikam jong ka District Sports Officer (DSO) ka West Khasi Hills District (WKHD), Nongstoin kan sa pynlong ïa ka West Khasi Hills District Level Inter-School Subroto Mukherjee Cup Football Tournament 2023 na ka bynta ki Sub-Junior (Shynrang hapoh 14 snem) bad ki Junior (Shynrang bad Kynthei hapoh 17 snem) naduh ka 26 tarik u bnai Jylliew, 2023.Kumta na ka liang ka ophis treikam jong ka DSO ka la bthah ïa ki skul kiba don hapoh jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District kiba kwah ban ïa shim bynta ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai kin sngewbha ban wan shim ïa ki phorm (Registration form) na ka Ophis treikam jong ka DSO, West Khasi Hills District ha ki sngi long trei. Ka tarik ba khatduh ban pynpoi ïa ki phorm kan long hapoh ka 13 tarik Jylliew, 2023.Kan don ruh ka jing screening ïa ki nongïalehkai ka ban sa long ha ka 21 tarik Jylliew 2023 ha Indoor Stadium, Ladweitang, Nongstoin naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep.Ka Sngi kha ban pdiang na ka bynta kito ki nongïashimbynta ha ka thup jong ki khynnah kiba hapoh 14 snem kan long, kiba la kha naduh 1 tarik Jymmang 2010 shaneng, na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 17 snem (shynrang bad kynthei) yn shim ïa kiba la kha naduh 1 tarik Jymmang 2007 shaneng.Ki syrnot ki ba donkam ban pdiang ki long ka  Aadhaar Card, ka syrnot ban pynshisha ïa ka rta ba la ai da ka Municipal Board (birth certificate) bad ka School ID. Bad yn shah tang 25 ngut ki khynnah ïalehkai ban don ha kawei ka kynhun.Ïa ki jingtip ba kham bniah phi lah ban wan kylli na ophis lane phone ha u nombor 9402300795, 8014251242.
title: Da ka District Level Inter-School Subroto Mukherjee Cup Football yn pynlong ka DSO Nongstoin

content: Kum u riew paitbah u ba la tymmen tam hapoh West Khasi Hills, nga ong kumta namar ba (1) ka bhah thung kam ka long mar kajuh ïa ki hynñiew trep kiba la kham bun paitbah bad ki Garo ki kham rit pait  (2) ki 260 ngut ki nonghikai kontrak ruh kiba shah beh na ka kam hikai skul ki dei tang na ki hynñiew trep katba na Garo ‘Dedengkre’ pat ki khlem shah beh kam. Kata ka dei katkum ba la thoh ha ka kot khubor kaba 7-10-22 bad kaba 23-12-22. Te kane ruh ka paw shai  ba ka tarajur ka noh shiliang, te to ïa kylli kiei ki ba pynnoh shiliang ïa ka jingthew. Te ban ïa kaba long kumne kan kham bha ban ïa khlad noh la kajong kajong, Hynñiew Trep Land bad Garo Land.Ha ka kot khubor kaba 3-11-22, la thoh ba ka MDA ka dei ka sorkar kaba ju sngap ïa ka sur ki seng bhalang, te imat kadei namar ka shu sngap ïa ka sur hynrei ka khlem leh eiei. Namar ka kotkhubor kaba 8-10-22, ki nonghikai kontrak kiba pynlong ka jingïakhih shi bnai pura ruh ym don MDA ba sngap ïa ka jingud jingnam jong ki bad ka 7-10-22 ruh la ong ba 4 ngut ki nonghikai ki la mynsaw jur, ym don MDA ba peit ne ba sngewlem ïa ki, hynrei la kawang pynban da ka lyer pynsat khmat ïa ki, haba ki nonghikai kila dawa ïa la ka hok lajong.Te ha katei ka MDA Number 1, baroh ki jait nonghikai ki la pynlong lynter da ki jingïakhih namar ka jingshah behkam noh ki nonghikai ba shah kynnoh tah sia lieh bad ki nonghikai kontrak. Te kane ka MDA ka ba mynta,tip kan sa beh kam sa katno ngut ne kan sa thung kam noh ïa baroh ki nonghikai ba la shah beh namar ba haka kotkhubor kaba 11-3-23, u minister uba thymmai mynta u la ong ba un sa leh ïa kaba bha tam.To sa ïa kynmaw ba ki jingïakhih kiba bun syrtap tam kadei ha kapor jong ka MDA number 1, bad sa ka kotkhubor kaba 1-11-22 la thoh ba 50 hajar marwei dain kuna ka sorkar ïa ki 157 ki nonghikai ba shah weng kam. Te lada  ka long shisha kumta, te ka sorkar jong ngi ka la riewspah.Ha ka kotkhubor kaba 18-5-23, la thoh ba ki MLA khasi ki ba kynshoit ïa ki Garo ba kin pyrshah ïa ka Reservation Policy. Te lada ki don shisha ki MLA kiba kum kita, kala dei ïa ki ba kin leit tyrwa rung shnong noh sha Garo namar lehse kim dei ki symbai jong ki hynniew trep.Te kum u riew paitbah u ba la tynmen u ba la ïaid lai tylli ki kjat, nga tharai baroh kin beiñ ïa ka jingdawa jong u bah Ardent namar ki MLA, mar ïa jop ki la ïa mareh ki la leit tied jingkhang sha ka NPP, wat la ki la kren beiñ ïa ka NPP ha ka por election ba ki ong ka party Garo hynrei ynda ki lajop ym don Garo shuh(, ong ka ktien tynmen te ka la dei mynta), te kim dei ki riew ieid ri, hynrei ki riew ieid shuki.Ieng skhem bah Ardent, phi dei tang ma phi u khraw pyrkhat uba ïohi jngai na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki khun saml;a u hynneiw trep jong ngi,phi long u MLA jong u prah, te to sa peh, sa tai lut ïa ki arsap laisap jong ka jaidbynriew, ngi ïa sngew donbok lang ba phi don ma phi hapoh Assembly. To ngi ngin ïa kyrmen ba  u Blei u dang buh slem ïa u bah Ardent ha sla pyrthei.Ha ka snem 1970 ngi ïa don 300 tam ki volunteer ïaleh Hills State, ngi la ïa sdang naduh Mawlai shaduh Distict Council. Ngi la ïa pyrta, “We Want Hills State, No Hills State No Rest”. Ngi la shah shoh shah tied bad shah kynjat ha ki pulit Assam, ngi la hap ban shah sumar hapoh hospital, bad 3 miet 3 sngi ïa ngi ki khlem ai jingbam eiei ha patok, nalor kata ngi la shah set patok hynniew bnai na ka jingïaleh Hills State. Naduh u bnai February haduh bakut jong u bnai July 1970. Ha katei ka jingïakhih ym don u wei ruh na ki Garo ki nongïaleh Hills State.                                          Hynrei ynda la ïoh hills state pat ïa ka bhah thung kam ïoh kabu pynban ma ki, te ka dei kane keiñ ka pyni ba ka la noh shiliang ka tarajur. Te ka jingdawa u bah Ardent ka la dei shispah naka shispah.Ka jingïaleh Hills State ba pura ka la sdang ha ka snem 1970, te kito ki volunteer kiba la ïaleh kham shuwa ïa katei ka snem 1970 ka la kut noh haka Sub-State, namar kita ki ba ïaleh Hills State ki la pdiang noh ïa ka Sub-State ha u bnai April 1970. Katba ka jong ngi pat ka la sdang ha u bnai February 1970 bad ka sa kut noh ha ka Full-State ha u bnai January 1972. Namar ha ka sngi ba ki pdiang ïa ka Sub-State, ka kynhun volunteer jong ngi da ki hajar ngut ki kynthei ki la rah lama ïaong ha surok ha khmat ka Indira Gandhi, namar ngim pdiang ïa katei ka Sub-State, ngi dawa Full-State.Te mynta kane ka jingjyrwit jyrwat ka mih na kane ka jingnoh shiliang ka bhah thung kam bad ki Garo, balei phi dang ïa bynnud, ki Garo ki kwah Garoland, te phi MLA khasi ruh phi dei ban dawa noh da ka Hynniew Trep Land.Ha ka snem 1970 ngi la ïa demand Hills State , hynrei ngi ïoh pynban da ka Meghalaya Land. baroh ngi tharai ba ngi sngew ïahap bha ïa ka kyrteng jong ka Nagaland bad ka kyrteng Mizoram, namar ki ai kyrteng ïa la ka jong ka state katkum ka jaid bynriew, ha kaba ki shong .U khasi , u Pnar, u Bhoi, u War, u Lyngam, u Maram, u Muliang baroh ngi dei u hynniew trep te balei ngi shah ai kyrteng pynban da ka kyrteng Megha….. Da kane ka kyrteng suki suki ha ki longdien, ka kyrteng ki hynniew trep kan sa jah noh na ka sla pyrthei.Ko ki para ri to sa ïa pyrkhat bha ma phi kumno kane ka kyrteng kan ïai neh pateng pakit. Ko ki nongthaw aiñ sngewbha phiah noh ha ka kyrteng Hynniew Trep Land, namar ki Garo ruh ki kwah Garoland, khnang ba ka bhah thung kam ruh kan ym ïatur klar shuh.1.    U bah Ardent u riew satarU ba tip bha ïa jingjynjarU ba da ïohi jngai shishaÏa ka lawei ki khun samla.2.    Um ju salia ïa la jingimU ïaid shaphrang khlem rit mynsiemBan im ki khun u Hynñiew trepKumba u kren un sa pyndep.3.    Ïa bhah thung kam un pynkyllaBan pynbiang thik ïa ka palaKo khun samla jong ngi myntaÏ’u bah Ardent kyrshan pura.4.    Wat nym ïa kren ïa ka partyHa ïing ha sem ne ha lyntiWat ym ïa pait wat ym ïa praÏeng tylli lang ka dei mynta.
title: Shah khñiot beiñ ki samla Hynñiewtrep

content: U Bah Himalaya Shangpliang, u nongïalam jong ka seng BJP bad ruh uba dei u MLA barim jong ka Mawsynram, ha ka 2 tarik Jylliew, 2023 u la shah thung  ha u Lat ka jylla kum u nongaibuit jong ka tnad pule puthi.Haba kren mynta ka sngi bad ki nongthoh khubor halor ka kam jong u u la ïathuh, “Ka kam jong nga ka long ban ïarap ïa u Myntri ka tnad pule puthi ha kaba ai jingmut bad ban ïalam lynti ïa ka tnad”.U Bah Himalaya u la ïathuh ruh ba naduh hynnin ka sngi baroh shi sngi u la ïoh ban ïaphylliew jingmut bad u myntri ka tnad pule puthi, kumjuh ruh mynta ka sngi bad u ong ba ki dang don bun kiwei pat ki jingïalang ban wanrah biang pat ïa ka pule puthi ha kata ka kyrdan ba ki paidbah ki angnud.“Ngin sdang da kaba pynbeit thymmai bad ban peit bha ïa ka jingeh jong baroh ki jaka ai jinghikai”, la ong u Bah Himalaya, da kaba pynkynmaw ruh ba ha ka dorbar ba dang shu dep, na ka liang ka sorkar ka la kular ban shimkhia ha kaba ïadei bad kane da kaba kan pyntip ïa baroh ki district ba kan don ka District Level Review and Monitoring Body Committee.U Bah Himalaya u la ong ruh ba da kane ka jingleh ka sorkar kan lah ban pynkhie khlieh pat ïa ka pule puthi ha ka jylla kaba la hiar arsut mynta sha trai, ha kaba shisien la tip teng kum ka jaka jong ka pule puthi.“Manga bad u Myntri ba peit ïa kane tnad pule puthi ngin sa leit ban shong ha ki 12 tylli ki Review Meeting ha ki 12 tylli ki District”.“Ha kine ki jingïalang ngin sa lah ban lap, ban pynbeit bad ban sngap ïa ka jingeh jong kawei pa kawei ka district”, la ong shuh shuh u Bah Himalaya ha kaba u la ong  ruh ba u Myntri u pdiang ïa ka jingai jingmut jong u ban khot lang ïa ki MLA jong ki konstitwensi bapher bapher kiba don ha kine ki district, ha kaba ki MLA ruh ki lah ban ai lang ka jingai jingmut.“Kaei kaba ngi kwah ban leh da kaba buh ïa kane ka Review Meeting ha man la ki district, ka long ba ngi kwah ban pynduna ïa ka jingbankhia kine ki jingeh kiba wan poi beit ha ka nongbah ka jylla”, la ai jingshai u Bah Himalaya.U Bah Himalaya u la ong ruh ba da kaba leh kumne ka long ba ki don ki jingeh kiba rit kiba lah ban pynbeit tang ha ki district bad kane ka Review Meeting ka dei ka jaka ba kin ïatai ïa kine ki jingeh, kiba long kum ka jingbymbiang ki iing skul, ka jingbym tista ha ka jingwan skul, ka jingbymwan tista ki nonghikai, bad kiwei kiwei ki jingeh bad kumta ngi kwah ban leh ïa kane ban sngap ban pynbeit ha la ki jong ki jong ki district.
title: Ban pynkhie khlieh pat ïa ka jinghiar ka pule puthi, da ka review meeting ha man la ki distrik

content: Kumta na ka liang ka ophis treikam jong ka DSO ka la bthah ïa ki skul kiba don hapoh jong ka Eastern West Khasi Hills District kiba kwah ban ïa shim bynta ha kane ka lympung ïalehkai kin sngewbha ban wan shim ïa ki phorm (Registration form) na ka Ophis treikam jong ka DSO, Eastern West Khasi Hills District ha ki sngi long trei. Ka tarik ba khatduh ban pynpoi ïa ki phorm kan long hapoh ka 13 tarik Jylliew, 2023.Kan don ruh ka jing screening ïa ki nongïalehkai ka ban sa long ha ka 21 tarik Jylliew 2023 ha Indoor Stadium, Ladweitang, Nongstoin naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep.Ka Sngi kha ban pdiang na ka bynta kito ki nongïashimbynta ha ka thup jong ki khynnah kiba hapoh 14 snem kan long, kiba la kha naduh 1 tarik Jymmang 2010 shaneng, na ka bynta ki khynnah kiba hapoh 17 snem (shynrang bad kynthei) yn shim ïa kiba la kha naduh 1 tarik Jymmang 2007 shaneng.Ki syrnot ki ba donkam ban pdiang ki long ka  Aadhaar Card, ka syrnot ban pynshisha ïa ka rta ba la ai da ka Municipal Board (birth certificate) bad ka School ID.
title: Yn sdang ka District Level Inter-School ha Mairang 26 Jylliew

content: Kawei ka video kaba saphriang bha mynta kaba pyni ba katto katne ki khynnah skul khynthei kim shym la shah satia ban rung ha ka bos kamai paidbah kaba la jia ha Tura Hawakhana, West Garo Hills.Ha kata ka jingjia, la pynlong ïa kine ki khynnah skul ban shong shabar ka bos ha ka jaka ap bos tad haduh ba baroh ki passenger ki la dep ban rung ha ka bos.Ym pat lah ban pynthikna ïa ka tarik jong kane ka jingjia watla kiba ai jingtip shaphang kane ka jingjia ki la ïathuh ba ka la jia ha ka 7 tarik Jylliew.Kane ka jaka ap bos ba ju kit ïa ki nongleit nongwan sha ki jaka bapher bapher  ha West Garo Hills bad kiba bun na kine ki khynnah ki ju pyndonkam ïa ki bos na kane ka jaka ban leit phai sha la ïing ha ka shnong  Damalgre bad Garobadha, kaba long shiteng lynti naduh na Tura.Namar ba ki kali kit nongleit nongwan ki dei ruh ban hap ïarap kit ïa ki khynnah skul da kaba ki hap shim ïa ka dor kaba rit, ka la pynlong ïa ki nongpynïaid bos ban sngew duhnong lada kit ïa ki.Shuh shuh, ki nongpynïaid bos ha Tura ki la pynshai ba ki pulit kin shah pynhap hapoh ki kyndon lada ka bos ka kit palat pud.Ki la kam ba ka jingjia ba dang shen kata ha ka 25 tarik Jymmang, ki la ngat shah phah siew haduh T 2000 tyngka  na ka daw ba don ki passenger ba shu ïeng.
title: Kyntait ka bos kamai paidbah ban kit ïa ki khynnah skul ha Tura

content: U President ka Voice of People Party (VPP) u Bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit, u la ong ba ka jingmih ban ïa khih ka VPP na ka bynta ban dawa ban pynbeit ïa ka Reservation Policy kam dei na ka bynta kino kino ki  riew shimet hynrei kadei na ka bynta ban dawa ban pynbeit ïa ka jingeh ka ba mih na ka ne ka Policy.Ha ba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Ardent u la ong ka jingïaleh kam dei na ka bynta uno uno u riew shimet, ne kano kano ka jaitbynriew,  ka jingïaleh ka long ban pynbeit ïa ka jingeh ka ba mih na ka Reservation Policy.“Kane ka  jingïaleh jong ngi ka long ba weng ïa ki jingeh ki khun samla ki ba wad kam, ngim donpor ban ïakren ïa ki kam shimet jongno jongno hynrei ngi don ïa ka kamram ka ba khraw ban saiñdur ïa ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew”, u la ong.“Kum ba ngi ju ong ba ka VPP ka dei na ka bynat ban pynim pat ban  pynbha pat bad pynkylla dur pat, te kum ka party ka don ïa ka kamram kaba kham kraw bad ym ban ïakren halor ki kam shimet jong ki briew”, u la bynrap.Ha ba kylli halor ka jingbym don ka jingïatylli, namar halor kane ka mat mih ka jingïakawang ktien para nongïalam, u la ong, “Kane ka jingkynthoh kam dei tang ha ka jaitbynriew jong ngi, ki jingïapait ïa pra, ki jingïa kynad kam dei tang ha u Khasi hynrei kiwei kiwei ki jaitbynriew ki ïa shrut hi, hynrei ngim dei ban pynleit jingmut than ïa kita ki jingsniew kiba don ha ka jaitbynriew”.“Mynta ki ong ba ki bun ki ba pyrshah ïa kane ka jingïakhih hynrei ha ka jingshisha u bun u ba kyrshan bad teng teng ngi la shu pynheh ïa ka ba sniew, bad ha kane ka khep mynta halor ka ne ka mat, ka jaitbynriew kan shem la ïapait hynrei ka nang ïatylli shuh shuh namar ka dei ka nongrim kaba biang kaba skhem, bad da lynti  ka ba beit kum u nongïalam, ki  paidbah ruh ki ai ka jingkyrshan hynrei lada ka lynti kam biang te u paidbah ruh um lah ban ai ka jingkyrshan”, u la bynrap.“Lada phi ïakhih khlem ka nongrim ka ba biang, u ban kyrshan ïa phi lehse un dei tang u briew u  ba ieid  shimet ïa phi ne u ba sngew ïadei hynrei mynta ka kynti halor kane ka mat ka don ka jingïaryntih kumba ka long bad nangne shakhmat kan nang kham skhem ka jingïatylli”, u la ong shuh shuh.U Bah Ardent u la ong shuh shuh, “Lada  kwah tang ban woh daw woh dong, phi lah ban kynthoh da kumno kumno ruh hynrei mynta ki paidbah ki sdang ban sngewthuh ïa ka jingshah ktah na ka Roster naduh u snem 2022 ba la pyntreikam ïa ka”.“Ha u snem 2022 ngim pat long MLA, hynrei  kum ka party ka ba dang shu mih ngi ïohi ïa ka jingeh ki khun samla bad kane ka pynlong ïa ngi ban shimkhia halor kane ka mat”, u la bynrap.U la ong shuh shuh, “Ka jingkynthoh ba ka VPP ka shim kabu halor kane ka mat, ka dei tang ka jingkynthoh sngew kutlad jong ki, namar ka  jingjop jong ngi hynrei ngi sngew ba ngim donpor ban pynsngap ïa kata namar ngi la kren shai ba ka ka jingpynbeit ïa ka Reservation Policy kam dei tang na ka bynta ban ïoh kam sorkar ïa baroh ki ba wan sha ka jingïakhih”.“Na ka liang jong ngi, ngi la  kular ban  weng ïa kane ka jingeh hynrei ngi khlem kular ban baroh kin ïoh ïa ka kam sorkar bad ïa kata wat u paidbah u ba wan ban shim bynta ha ka jingïakhih ruh u tip bha bad u ai ka jingkyrshan ïa kane”, u la bynrap.
title: Ka don ka kamram kaba khraw, ban saiñdur ïa ka Ri bad ka Jaitbynriew: Ardent Basaiawmoit

content: U Lamphrang jong ka Ïingdor-bar Thawaiñ ka jylla Meghalaya, u Thomas Sangma, ha ka 8 tarik Jylliew , u la ai ka jingithuh ïa u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Mylliem Konstitwensi na ka seng Congress kum u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka Ïingdor-bar Thawaiñ ka jylla.Ïa ka Notification ba la pynmih na Asssembly Secretariat, lyngba u Dr Andrew Simon Commissioner & secretary ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ u la ïathuh, “la ai ka jingithuh ïa u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u Member ka Legislative Assembly (MLA), kum u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla bad kane kan treikam naduh ka 8 tarik u Jylliew”.La ai ka jingithuh ruh ïa u Saleng A Sangma u MLA ka Gambegre Konstitwensi na ka seng Congress kum  Chief Whip jong ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla bad kane kan treikam naduh ka 8 tarik u Jylliew 2023.Lah ban kdew hangne ba hadien ba ka jylla ka la dep ïa ka General Election bad ka Sorkar Synrop Meghalaya Democratic Alliance (MDA) ka ba la synrop lang ïa ka National People Party (NPP), ka United Democratic Party (UDP), Hills State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) bad ka Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) ki la ïoh ban long ki liang shynshar , ka liang pyrshah kam shem la ïoh u nongïalam jong ka.Ka jingbym don ïa u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka Ïingdorbar ka long ba ki party ki ba don ha ka liang pyrshah ki ba kynthup ïa ka Congress ka don 5 ngut ki MLA , ka Trinamool Congress ka don  5 ngut ki MLA bad ka Voice of People Party (VPP) ka don 4 ngut ki MLA , kim kwah ban synrop lang ban long kawei ka liang pyrshah.Hynrei hadien ka 3 bnai tam, mynta ka sngi, u Lamphrang ka Ïingdorbar  u la ai ka jingithuh noh ïa u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ba yn long kum u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah, bad u Saleng A Sangma kum u Chief Whip hapoh ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ.
title: Ai jingithuh u Lamphang ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ïa u Bah Ronnie kum u nongïalam ka liang pyrshah

content: U nongïalam ka Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC), u Gurjit Singh, u la ïathuh ba ka Harijan Committee shen kan sa pynpaw ïa ki nongrim jong ka hadien ba la ïoh ïa ki jingai jingmut na u nongsaid aiñ halor ka Blueprint ba la phah ka sorkar ban pynkynriah ïa ki na Them Ïew Mawlong.U Gurjit Singh ha ba kren bad ki ladpathai khubor u la ong “Na ka liang ka HPC kan sa pyntip halor kane ka bynta, tang hadien ba ki la ïoh ban ïakren bad bishar bha shwa bad u Muktiar jong ki”.Lah ban kdew hangne, ha ka 07 tarik u Jylliew ka Ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court, ka la pyntip ba ka  Harijan Panchayat Committee (HPC), ka pdiang ïa ka blueprint jong ka sorkar ,hynrei ka kwah ba ka sorkar kan pdiang ïa ki katto katne tylli ki jingaijingmut na ka.Ha ka hukum bala pynmih da ka Ïingbishar, ka Division Bench ka Ïingkashari Meghalaya High Court,  bala khlieh da u Chief Justice Sanjib Banerjee bad Justice W Diengdoh ka la ïathuh ba ka Harijan Panchayat Committee ka la mynjur ïa ka Blueprint jong ka sorkar .”U Advocate General u la pyntip ba ka Harijan Panchayat Committee kala mynjur ïa ka blueprint ba la pynkhreh da ka Sorkar jylla hynrei kala buh ïa ki jingai jingmut ban pynkylla ïa katto katne ki bynta jong ka”, ong ka kashari.Ka Ïingkashari ka la buh ban shong bishar biang ïa kane ka mukotduma ha ka 3 tarik u Naitung, 2023.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba na ka liang ka sorkar jylla ka la phah ïa ka blueprint sha ka HPC, ban pynkynriah ïa ki 342 tylli ki longïing jong ka jaitbynriew Harijan ki ba shong ba sah ha Them Ïew Mawlong sha ka jaka jong ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB).Ha ka ba ïadei bad kane,ka Sorkar ka la rai ban pynshna da ki ïing bun mala ha ka jaka ba heh 2.5 akar, ha Cotton Bishop Road ka jaka ba don ka ophis Shillong Municipal Board (SMB)  katba na ka liang ka HPC ban kynriah noh ïa ki na Them Ïew Mawlong ka, ka la pan na ka sorkar  200 square meter ka jaka na ka bynta  kawei pa kawei ka longïing,  ban ai bai shna ïing shaki,  ban ai ai jaka ïa ki hapoh ka European Ward.
title: Yn sa pynpaw ka HPC ïa ki nongrim jong ka halor ka Blueprint: Gurjit Singh

content: U Myntri sorkar bad u MLA ka Rongara Siju, u Rakkam A Sangma, u la ong ban un pan ïa ka kaiphot ka ba pura halor ka jingwanrung tuh ki Shipai Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) sha u pud u sam ka Ri India.Lah ban kdew hangne ba ha ka 7 tarik u Jylliew, ki ar ngut ki shipai ka Border Guard Bangladesh (BGB) ki la wan rung sha u pud u sam jong ka Ri India bad poi sha ka shnong ha ka Rongara Imbloka (Waek) ha Garo Hills, ban kthong ïa ki nongkhaïi beaiñ , ki ba la phet sha kane ka thaiñ, ka ba la mih ka jingïakajia hadien ba ki la pyrshang ban tohkit ïa ki briew ba sah ha kane ka shnong.Halor kane ka jingjia, u Myntri u la ong, “Ngan dang ap ban ïoh ïa ka kaiphot ba pura halor kane ka jingjia, ngan hap ban wad ïa ka jingshisha ka ba la jia shwa ban ngan shim kano kano ka sien jam. Katkum ka jingsngewthuh jong nga, ki shipai iada ki don ha kine ki jaka ban ïada ym ban thombor ïa ki nongshong shnong”.Ha ba kylli hato yn rah ïa kane ka mat ban ïakren bad ki shipai ka Border Security Force (BSF), u Sangma u la ong ba un hap ban pan shwa ïa ka kaiphot ba pura halor kane ka jingjia na u Superintendent of Police (SP) kane ka thaiñ hadien yn sa pynïaid ïa ka jingïakren halor kane ka mat .Katkum ka jingïathuh jong ki shipai BSF, ki la ong ba la ïoh ïa ka jingbatai halor kane na ki shipai ka Bangladesh, ki la ïathuh “ki shipai ka BGB, ki dang beh ïa ki briew ki ba leh ïa ka kam beaiñ ha ki thaiñ khappud hynrei ha ka jingbym tip ki la kum rung sha ki shnong ki ba hap hapoh ka Ri India”.Katkum ka tyllong khubor na ka BSF, ki la kam ba kam shem la don kano kano ka jingshah thombor ki nongshong shnong ka Ri India. “Ki nongshong shnong kane ka shnong ki la lum lang hajuh bad pynpaw ïa ka jingbitar ïa ki shipai ka BGB, namar ba ki la wan rung sha ki shnong jong ki bad kumjuh ki la kylli jingkylli ïa ki, kumta ki la beh ïa kine ki shipai ba kin mih noh na kane ka shnong bad leit phai sha u pud u sam ka Bangladesh”.Ha kane ka jingïakajia ka la mih hadien ba ki don na ki nongshong shnong kiba la ring video ïa kane ka jingjia, ki shipai ka Ri Bangladesh ki la byrngem ïa ki nongshong shnong, ban ym ring video bad rah ban pynma ruh da ki tiar pynmynsaw (weapon).Na ka liang u Superintendent of Police ka South Garo Hills Abraham T Sangma, u la ïathuh ba ki la dep ban phah ïa ki pulit sha kane ka shnong ban pynlong ïa ka jingtohkit hadien ba ki la ïoh ïa ka jingujor halor ka jingshah thombor ki nongshnong shnong na ki shipai BGB.
title: Yn pan kaiphot u Myntri halor ka jingwan rung ki shipai BGB sha shnong briew ha Rilum Garo

content: Ki dkhot jong ka High Powered Committee (HPC) ki ba dei ban peit halor ka jing-shna thymmai ïa ka Ïing-dorbar Thawaiñ  thymmai ha ka jylla ha Mawdiang-diang, ha ka 8 tarik Jylliew ki la pynlong ïa ka jingïakynduh ha Taj Vivanta, Shillong.Ha kane ka jingïalang la wan ban shim bynta da u  Lamphang ka Ïingdorbar Thawaiñ ka jylla u Thomas A. Sangma, u Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Conrad Sangma, u Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong bad u bah  Sniawbhalang Dhar bad kiwei ki MLA bad ki ophisar na ki tnad bapher bapher.Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor u Lamphang ka Ïingdorbar u la pyntip, ba ki mat jingïakren ba la shim ha kane ka sngi ki long ban bishar bniah halor ka jingïaid shakhmat ka jingpyntrei ïa ka jingshna ïa ka Ïingdorbar thymmai, bad la wanrah ruh ïa ka jingtyrwa ban bteng ïa ka jingtei ïa ka wat baar jong ka Ïingdorbar thymmmai bad la ïakren ruh  halor ka mat security system.U la ïathuh ruh ba ka HPC, ka Assembly Secretariat, bad ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher ki la pdiang ïa kane ka jingtyrwa ban bteng ïa ka jingtei ïa ka wat baar  jong ka Ïingdorbar bad ïa kane ka jingtyrwa shen yn sa aiti noh sha ka Ministry of DoNER.
title: Pdiang ka HPC ïa ka jingtyrwa ban bteng tei ïa ka wat baar jong ka Ïingdorbar thymmai

content: U Bah  T. Lyngwa District Magistrate ka South West Khasi Hills District, Mawkyrwat u la pynjari da ka Section 144 CrPC ban mana pyrshah ïa ki briew  ba  ym bit ban ïaid ne ïeng ha ki khappud India bad Bangladesh palat ïa ka 100 metres na khappud  Indo-Bangladesh, naduh ka por 7 baje janmiet haduh  6 baje mynstep hadien ba la ïoh jingtip ba ki don ki runar na kawei ka ri bad ki nongkhaïi tuh kiba rung ba mih ha shilynter u pud ka India-Bangladesh, ha ki thaiñ ka South West Khasi Hills.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba kine ki runar ki dei kiba khaïi tuh ne khaïi  beaiñ kum ïa ki Masi, kyiad, Drugs bad kiwei kiwei kum kine ki kam kiba long kiba mynsaw ïa ki nong shongshnong  bad ruh kiba long pyrshah ïaka Aiñ. Kumta khnang ban tehlakam ïa ki kam runar bad ki kam beaiñ ha khappud ka India bad Bangladesh, la pynjari da kane ka kyndon.Kane ka la treikam naduh ba la pynjari ïa katei ka kyndon haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: Khang u DC ban ïaid 100 meter ha pud Indo-Bangla naduh 7 baje janmiet haduh 6 baje mynstep
